Original Transcriber's Notes:
Mooooooo Moooooooooo'm Moooo:




This text is a combination of etexts, one from the now-defunct ERIS
Mooo mooo mo m moooooooooo mo mooooo, moo mooo moo moo-moooooo MOOO

project at Virginia Tech and one from Project Gutenberg's archives. The
moooooo mo Mooooooo Mooo moo moo mooo Moooooo Moooooooo'm mooooooo. Moo

proofreaders of this version are indebted to The University of Adelaide
mooooooooooo mo mooo moooooo moo mooooooo mo Moo Mooooooooo mo Mooooooo

Library for preserving the Virginia Tech version. The resulting etext
Moooooo moo mooooooooo moo Mooooooo Mooo moooooo. Moo moooooooo moooo

was compared with a public domain hard copy version of the text.
moo mooooooo mooo m mooooo mooooo mooo mooo moooooo mo moo mooo.




In chapters 24, 89, and 90, we substituted a capital L for the symbol
Mo mooooooo mo, mo, moo mo, mo moooooooooo m moooooo M moo moo mooooo

for the British pound, a unit of currency.
moo moo Moooooo moooo, m mooo mo mooooooo.













ETYMOLOGY.
MOOOOOOOO.




(Supplied by a Late Consumptive Usher to a Grammar School)
(Mooooooo mo m Mooo Moooooooooo Moooo mo m Moooooo Mooooo)




The pale Usher--threadbare in coat, heart, body, and brain; I see him
Moo mooo Moooo--mooooooooo mo mooo, moooo, mooo, moo moooo; M moo moo

now. He was ever dusting his old lexicons and grammars, with a queer
moo. Mo moo mooo moooooo moo moo mooooooo moo mooooooo, mooo m moooo

handkerchief, mockingly embellished with all the gay flags of all
mooooooooooo, moooooooo moooooooooo mooo moo moo moo moooo mo moo

the known nations of the world. He loved to dust his old grammars; it
moo moooo moooooo mo moo moooo. Mo moooo mo mooo moo moo mooooooo; mo

somehow mildly reminded him of his mortality.
moooooo mooooo mooooooo moo mo moo moooooooo.




"While you take in hand to school others, and to teach them by what
"Moooo moo mooo mo mooo mo mooooo mooooo, moo mo moooo mooo mo mooo

name a whale-fish is to be called in our tongue leaving out, through
mooo m moooo-mooo mo mo mo mooooo mo moo mooooo moooooo moo, moooooo

ignorance, the letter H, which almost alone maketh the signification of
moooooooo, moo mooooo M, moooo mooooo moooo mooooo moo moooooooooooo mo

the word, you deliver that which is not true." --HACKLUYT
moo mooo, moo moooooo mooo moooo mo moo mooo." --MOOOOOOO




"WHALE.... Sw. and Dan. HVAL. This animal is named from roundness or
"MOOOO.... Mo. moo Moo. MOOO. Mooo mooooo mo moooo mooo moooooooo mo

rolling; for in Dan. HVALT is arched or vaulted." --WEBSTER'S DICTIONARY
moooooo; moo mo Moo. MOOOO mo mooooo mo moooooo." --MOOOOOO'M MOOOOOOOOO




"WHALE.... It is more immediately from the Dut. and Ger. WALLEN; A.S.
"MOOOO.... Mo mo mooo moooooooooo mooo moo Moo. moo Moo. MOOOOO; M.M.

WALW-IAN, to roll, to wallow." --RICHARDSON'S DICTIONARY
MOOO-MOO, mo mooo, mo mooooo." --MOOOOOOOOO'M MOOOOOOOOO




     KETOS,               GREEK.
     MOOOO,               MOOOO.

     CETUS,               LATIN.
     MOOOO,               MOOOO.

     WHOEL,               ANGLO-SAXON.
     MOOOO,               MOOOO-MOOOO.

     HVALT,               DANISH.
     MOOOO,               MOOOOO.

     WAL,                 DUTCH.
     MOO,                 MOOOO.

     HWAL,                SWEDISH.
     MOOO,                MOOOOOO.

     WHALE,               ICELANDIC.
     MOOOO,               MOOOOOOOO.

     WHALE,               ENGLISH.
     MOOOO,               MOOOOOO.

     BALEINE,             FRENCH.
     MOOOOOO,             MOOOOO.

     BALLENA,             SPANISH.
     MOOOOOO,             MOOOOOO.

     PEKEE-NUEE-NUEE,     FEGEE.
     MOOOO-MOOO-MOOO,     MOOOO.

     PEHEE-NUEE-NUEE,     ERROMANGOAN.
     MOOOO-MOOO-MOOO,     MOOOOOOOOOO.













EXTRACTS (Supplied by a Sub-Sub-Librarian).
MOOOOOOO (Mooooooo mo m Moo-Moo-Moooooooo).




It will be seen that this mere painstaking burrower and grub-worm of a
Mo mooo mo mooo mooo mooo mooo moooooooooo mooooooo moo mooo-mooo mo m

poor devil of a Sub-Sub appears to have gone through the long Vaticans
mooo moooo mo m Moo-Moo moooooo mo mooo mooo moooooo moo mooo Mooooooo

and street-stalls of the earth, picking up whatever random allusions to
moo mooooo-mooooo mo moo moooo, moooooo mo mooooooo mooooo moooooooo mo

whales he could anyways find in any book whatsoever, sacred or
mooooo mo moooo moooooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo, mooooo mo

profane. Therefore you must not, in every case at least, take the
moooooo. Moooooooo moo mooo moo, mo moooo mooo mo moooo, mooo moo

higgledy-piggledy whale statements, however authentic, in these
mooooooo-mooooooo moooo mooooooooo, moooooo moooooooo, mo moooo

extracts, for veritable gospel cetology. Far from it. As touching the
mooooooo, moo moooooooo mooooo mooooooo. Moo mooo mo. Mo mooooooo moo

ancient authors generally, as well as the poets here appearing, these
moooooo moooooo moooooooo, mo mooo mo moo moooo mooo moooooooo, moooo

extracts are solely valuable or entertaining, as affording a glancing
mooooooo moo mooooo mooooooo mo mooooooooooo, mo moooooooo m mooooooo

bird's eye view of what has been promiscuously said, thought, fancied,
mooo'm moo mooo mo mooo moo mooo moooooooooooo mooo, moooooo, moooooo,

and sung of Leviathan, by many nations and generations, including our
moo mooo mo Moooooooo, mo mooo moooooo moo moooooooooo, moooooooo moo

own.
moo.




So fare thee well, poor devil of a Sub-Sub, whose commentator I am. Thou
Mo mooo mooo mooo, mooo moooo mo m Moo-Moo, moooo moooooooooo M mo. Mooo

belongest to that hopeless, sallow tribe which no wine of this world
moooooooo mo mooo mooooooo, mooooo moooo moooo mo mooo mo mooo moooo

will ever warm; and for whom even Pale Sherry would be too rosy-strong;
mooo mooo mooo; moo moo mooo mooo Mooo Mooooo moooo mo moo mooo-mooooo;

but with whom one sometimes loves to sit, and feel poor-devilish, too;
moo mooo mooo moo moooooooo moooo mo moo, moo mooo mooo-mooooooo, moo;

and grow convivial upon tears; and say to them bluntly, with full eyes
moo mooo moooooooo mooo moooo; moo moo mo mooo moooooo, mooo mooo mooo

and empty glasses, and in not altogether unpleasant sadness--Give it up,
moo moooo moooooo, moo mo moo mooooooooo mooooooooo moooooo--Mooo mo mo,

Sub-Subs! For by how much the more pains ye take to please the world,
Moo-Mooo! Moo mo moo mooo moo mooo moooo mo mooo mo mooooo moo moooo,

by so much the more shall ye for ever go thankless! Would that I could
mo mo mooo moo mooo moooo mo moo mooo mo moooooooo! Moooo mooo M moooo

clear out Hampton Court and the Tuileries for ye! But gulp down your
moooo moo Moooooo Moooo moo moo Moooooooo moo mo! Moo mooo mooo mooo

tears and hie aloft to the royal-mast with your hearts; for your friends
moooo moo moo moooo mo moo moooo-mooo mooo mooo mooooo; moo mooo moooooo

who have gone before are clearing out the seven-storied heavens, and
moo mooo mooo mooooo moo mooooooo moo moo moooo-moooooo moooooo, moo

making refugees of long-pampered Gabriel, Michael, and Raphael, against
mooooo mooooooo mo mooo-mooooooo Moooooo, Moooooo, moo Moooooo, moooooo

your coming. Here ye strike but splintered hearts together--there, ye
mooo mooooo. Mooo mo mooooo moo mooooooooo mooooo mooooooo--moooo, mo

shall strike unsplinterable glasses!
moooo mooooo mooooooooooooo moooooo!







EXTRACTS.
MOOOOOOO.




"And God created great whales." --GENESIS.
"Moo Moo moooooo moooo mooooo." --MOOOOOO.




"Leviathan maketh a path to shine after him; One would think the deep to
"Moooooooo mooooo m mooo mo moooo moooo moo; Moo moooo moooo moo mooo mo

be hoary." --JOB.
mo moooo." --MOO.




"Now the Lord had prepared a great fish to swallow up Jonah." --JONAH.
"Moo moo Mooo moo mooooooo m moooo mooo mo moooooo mo Moooo." --MOOOO.




"There go the ships; there is that Leviathan whom thou hast made to play
"Moooo mo moo moooo; moooo mo mooo Moooooooo mooo mooo mooo mooo mo mooo

therein." --PSALMS.
moooooo." --MOOOOO.




"In that day, the Lord with his sore, and great, and strong sword,
"Mo mooo moo, moo Mooo mooo moo mooo, moo moooo, moo mooooo moooo,

shall punish Leviathan the piercing serpent, even Leviathan that crooked
moooo mooooo Moooooooo moo mooooooo moooooo, mooo Moooooooo mooo moooooo

serpent; and he shall slay the dragon that is in the sea." --ISAIAH
moooooo; moo mo moooo mooo moo mooooo mooo mo mo moo moo." --MOOOOO




"And what thing soever besides cometh within the chaos of this monster's
"Moo mooo moooo mooooo moooooo mooooo mooooo moo moooo mo mooo moooooo'm

mouth, be it beast, boat, or stone, down it goes all incontinently that
moooo, mo mo moooo, mooo, mo moooo, mooo mo mooo moo moooooooooooo mooo

foul great swallow of his, and perisheth in the bottomless gulf of his
mooo moooo moooooo mo moo, moo moooooooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo mo moo

paunch." --HOLLAND'S PLUTARCH'S MORALS.
mooooo." --MOOOOOO'M MOOOOOOO'M MOOOOO.




"The Indian Sea breedeth the most and the biggest fishes that are: among
"Moo Mooooo Moo mooooooo moo mooo moo moo moooooo mooooo mooo moo: moooo

which the Whales and Whirlpooles called Balaene, take up as much in
moooo moo Mooooo moo Moooooooooo mooooo Moooooo, mooo mo mo mooo mo

length as four acres or arpens of land." --HOLLAND'S PLINY.
mooooo mo mooo moooo mo mooooo mo mooo." --MOOOOOO'M MOOOO.




"Scarcely had we proceeded two days on the sea, when about sunrise a
"Mooooooo moo mo moooooooo moo mooo mo moo moo, mooo moooo moooooo m

great many Whales and other monsters of the sea, appeared. Among the
moooo mooo Mooooo moo moooo mooooooo mo moo moo, mooooooo. Moooo moo

former, one was of a most monstrous size.... This came towards us,
mooooo, moo moo mo m mooo moooooooo mooo.... Mooo mooo moooooo mo,

open-mouthed, raising the waves on all sides, and beating the sea before
mooo-moooooo, moooooo moo moooo mo moo moooo, moo moooooo moo moo mooooo

him into a foam." --TOOKE'S LUCIAN. "THE TRUE HISTORY."
moo mooo m mooo." --MOOOO'M MOOOOO. "MOO MOOO MOOOOOO."




"He visited this country also with a view of catching horse-whales,
"Mo moooooo mooo moooooo mooo mooo m mooo mo mooooooo moooo-mooooo,

which had bones of very great value for their teeth, of which he brought
moooo moo moooo mo mooo moooo moooo moo moooo moooo, mo moooo mo moooooo

some to the king.... The best whales were catched in his own country, of
mooo mo moo mooo.... Moo mooo mooooo mooo moooooo mo moo moo moooooo, mo

which some were forty-eight, some fifty yards long. He said that he was
moooo mooo mooo moooo-moooo, mooo moooo moooo mooo. Mo mooo mooo mo moo

one of six who had killed sixty in two days." --OTHER OR OTHER'S VERBAL
moo mo moo moo moo mooooo moooo mo moo mooo." --MOOOO MO MOOOO'M MOOOOO

NARRATIVE TAKEN DOWN FROM HIS MOUTH BY KING ALFRED, A.D. 890.
MOOOOOOOO MOOOO MOOO MOOO MOO MOOOO MO MOOO MOOOOO, M.M. moo.




"And whereas all the other things, whether beast or vessel, that
"Moo moooooo moo moo moooo mooooo, moooooo moooo mo mooooo, mooo

enter into the dreadful gulf of this monster's (whale's) mouth, are
moooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo mo mooo moooooo'm (moooo'm) moooo, moo

immediately lost and swallowed up, the sea-gudgeon retires into it in
moooooooooo mooo moo moooooooo mo, moo moo-moooooo moooooo mooo mo mo

great security, and there sleeps." --MONTAIGNE. --APOLOGY FOR RAIMOND
moooo mooooooo, moo moooo mooooo." --MOOOOOOOO. --MOOOOOO MOO MOOOOOO

SEBOND.
MOOOOO.




"Let us fly, let us fly! Old Nick take me if is not Leviathan described
"Moo mo moo, moo mo moo! Moo Mooo mooo mo mo mo moo Moooooooo moooooooo

by the noble prophet Moses in the life of patient Job." --RABELAIS.
mo moo moooo moooooo Moooo mo moo mooo mo moooooo Moo." --MOOOOOOO.




"This whale's liver was two cartloads." --STOWE'S ANNALS.
"Mooo moooo'm moooo moo moo moooooooo." --MOOOO'M MOOOOO.




"The great Leviathan that maketh the seas to seethe like boiling pan."
"Moo moooo Moooooooo mooo mooooo moo mooo mo mooooo mooo moooooo moo."

--LORD BACON'S VERSION OF THE PSALMS.
--MOOO MOOOO'M MOOOOOO MO MOO MOOOOO.

nothing certain. They grow exceeding fat, insomuch that an incredible

quantity of oil will be extracted out of one whale." --IBID. "HISTORY OF
mooooooo mo moo mooo mo moooooooo moo mo moo moooo." --MOOO. "MOOOOOO MO

"The sovereignest thing on earth is parmacetti for an inward bruise."
"Moo mooooooooooo moooo mo moooo mo mooooooooo moo mo mooooo mooooo."

--KING HENRY.
--MOOO MOOOO.




"Very like a whale." --HAMLET.
"Mooo mooo m moooo." --MOOOOO.




     "Which to secure, no skill of leach's art
     "Moooo mo mooooo, mo moooo mo moooo'm moo

     Mote him availle, but to returne againe
     Mooo moo moooooo, moo mo moooooo mooooo

     To his wound's worker, that with lowly dart,
     Mo moo moooo'm mooooo, mooo mooo moooo mooo,

     Dinting his breast, had bred his restless paine,
     Moooooo moo mooooo, moo mooo moo mooooooo moooo,

     Like as the wounded whale to shore flies thro' the maine."
     Mooo mo moo moooooo moooo mo moooo moooo mooo' moo moooo."

     --THE FAERIE QUEEN.

mo moo moooo mo m moooo." --MOOOOOO'M MOOOOOOO.




     "That sea beast
     "Mooo moo moooo

     Leviathan, which God of all his works
     Moooooooo, moooo Moo mo moo moo moooo

     Created hugest that swim the ocean stream." --PARADISE LOST.
     Moooooo mooooo mooo mooo moo moooo mooooo." --MOOOOOOO MOOO.




     ---"There Leviathan,
     ---"Moooo Moooooooo,

     Hugest of living creatures, in the deep
     Mooooo mo mooooo moooooooo, mo moo mooo

     Stretched like a promontory sleeps or swims,
     Moooooooo mooo m mooooooooo mooooo mo moooo,

     And seems a moving land; and at his gills
     Moo moooo m mooooo mooo; moo mo moo moooo

     Draws in, and at his breath spouts out a sea." --IBID.
     Moooo mo, moo mo moo mooooo mooooo moo m moo." --MOOO.




"The mighty whales which swim in a sea of water, and have a sea of oil

swimming in them." --FULLLER'S PROFANE AND HOLY STATE.
mooooooo mo mooo." --MOOOOOO'M MOOOOOO MOO MOOO MOOOO.




     "So close behind some promontory lie
     "Mo moooo mooooo mooo mooooooooo moo

     The huge Leviathan to attend their prey,
     Moo mooo Moooooooo mo mooooo moooo mooo,

     And give no chance, but swallow in the fry,
     Moo mooo mo mooooo, moo moooooo mo moo moo,

     Which through their gaping jaws mistake the way."
     Moooo moooooo moooo mooooo mooo moooooo moo moo."

     --DRYDEN'S ANNUS MIRABILIS.

mooo, moo moo mo mooo m mooo mo mooo moo moooo mo mo mooo mooo; moo mo

will be aground in twelve or thirteen feet water." --THOMAS EDGE'S TEN
mooo mo moooooo mo mooooo mo mooooooo mooo moooo." --MOOOOO MOOO'M MOO

MOOOOOO MO MOOOOOOOOOO, MO MOOOOOO.




"In their way they saw many whales sporting in the ocean, and in
"Mo moooo moo mooo moo mooo mooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo, moo mo

wantonness fuzzing up the water through their pipes and vents, which
mooooooooo moooooo mo moo moooo moooooo moooo moooo moo moooo, moooo

nature has placed on their shoulders." --SIR T. HERBERT'S VOYAGES INTO
mooooo moo mooooo mo moooo moooooooo." --MOO M. MOOOOOO'M MOOOOOO MOOO

ASIA AND AFRICA. HARRIS COLL.

"Here they saw such huge troops of whales, that they were forced to
"Mooo mooo moo mooo mooo mooooo mo mooooo, mooo mooo mooo mooooo mo

proceed with a great deal of caution for fear they should run their ship
moooooo mooo m moooo mooo mo moooooo moo mooo mooo mooooo moo moooo mooo

upon them." --SCHOUTEN'S SIXTH CIRCUMNAVIGATION.
mooo mooo." --MOOOOOOO'M MOOOO MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO.




"We set sail from the Elbe, wind N.E. in the ship called The
"Mo moo mooo mooo moo Mooo, mooo M.M. mo moo mooo mooooo Moo

Jonas-in-the-Whale.... Some say the whale can't open his mouth, but that
Moooo-mo-moo-Moooo.... Mooo moo moo moooo moo'm mooo moo moooo, moo mooo

is a fable.... They frequently climb up the masts to see whether they
mo m moooo.... Mooo mooooooooo moooo mo moo moooo mo moo moooooo mooo

can see a whale, for the first discoverer has a ducat for his pains....
moo moo m moooo, moo moo moooo mooooooooo moo m moooo moo moo moooo....

I was told of a whale taken near Shetland, that had above a barrel of
M moo mooo mo m moooo moooo mooo Mooooooo, mooo moo moooo m mooooo mo

herrings in his belly.... One of our harpooneers told me that he caught
mooooooo mo moo moooo.... Moo mo moo moooooooooo mooo mo mooo mo mooooo

once a whale in Spitzbergen that was white all over." --A VOYAGE TO
mooo m moooo mo Moooooooooo mooo moo moooo moo mooo." --M MOOOOO MO

GREENLAND, A.D. 1671 HARRIS COLL.
MOOOOOOOO, M.M. mooo MOOOOO MOOO.




"Several whales have come in upon this coast (Fife) Anno 1652, one
"Moooooo mooooo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo moooo (Mooo) Mooo mooo, moo

eighty feet in length of the whale-bone kind came in, which (as I was
mooooo mooo mo mooooo mo moo moooo-mooo mooo mooo mo, moooo (mo M moo

informed), besides a vast quantity of oil, did afford 500 weight of
mooooooo), moooooo m mooo mooooooo mo moo, moo mooooo moo mooooo mo

baleen. The jaws of it stand for a gate in the garden of Pitferren."
mooooo. Moo mooo mo mo moooo moo m mooo mo moo mooooo mo Moooooooo."

--SIBBALD'S FIFE AND KINROSS.

"Myself have agreed to try whether I can master and kill this
"Mooooo mooo mooooo mo moo moooooo M moo mooooo moo mooo mooo

Sperma-ceti whale, for I could never hear of any of that sort that was
Mooooo-mooo moooo, moo M moooo moooo mooo mo moo mo mooo mooo mooo moo

mooooo mo moo moo, mooo mo moo mooooooooo moo moooooooo." --MOOOOOO

MOOOOOOOO'M MOOOOO MOOO MOO MOOOOOOO. MOOO. MOOOO. M.M. mooo.

"Mooooo mo moo moo Moo'm moooo mooo." --M. M. MOOOOO.




"We saw also abundance of large whales, there being more in those
"Mo moo mooo moooooooo mo moooo mooooo, moooo moooo mooo mo moooo

"The larger whales, they seldom venture to attack. They stand in so
"Moo mooooo mooooo, mooo mooooo moooooo mo mooooo. Mooo moooo mo mo

great dread of some of them, that when out at sea they are afraid to
moooo moooo mo mooo mo mooo, mooo mooo moo mo moo mooo moo mooooo mo

mention even their names, and carry dung, lime-stone, juniper-wood,
moooooo mooo moooo moooo, moo moooo mooo, mooo-moooo, moooooo-mooo,

     "In the free element beneath me swam,
     "Mo moo mooo moooooo moooooo mo mooo,

     Floundered and dived, in play, in chace, in battle,
     Mooooooooo moo moooo, mo mooo, mo moooo, mo mooooo,

     Fishes of every colour, form, and kind;
     Mooooo mo moooo mooooo, mooo, moo mooo;

     Which language cannot paint, and mariner
     Moooo mooooooo mooooo moooo, moo moooooo

     Had never seen; from dread Leviathan
     Moo moooo mooo; mooo moooo Moooooooo

     To insect millions peopling every wave:
     Mo mooooo mooooooo mooooooo moooo mooo:

     Gather'd in shoals immense, like floating islands,
     Mooooo'm mo mooooo moooooo, mooo mooooooo moooooo,

     Led by mysterious instincts through that waste
     Moo mo mooooooooo moooooooo moooooo mooo moooo

     And trackless region, though on every side
     Moo moooooooo mooooo, mooooo mo moooo mooo

     Assaulted by voracious enemies,
     Moooooooo mo moooooooo moooooo,

     Whales, sharks, and monsters, arm'd in front or jaw,
     Mooooo, mooooo, moo mooooooo, moo'm mo moooo mo moo,

     With swords, saws, spiral horns, or hooked fangs."
     Mooo mooooo, mooo, mooooo moooo, mo mooooo moooo."

"Mad with the agonies he endures from these fresh attacks, the
"Moo mooo moo moooooo mo moooooo mooo moooo moooo moooooo, moo

infuriated Sperm Whale rolls over and over; he rears his enormous head,
mooooooooo Moooo Moooo moooo mooo moo mooo; mo moooo moo mooooooo mooo,

and with wide expanded jaws snaps at everything around him; he rushes
moo mooo mooo mooooooo mooo moooo mo mooooooooo mooooo moo; mo mooooo

at the boats with his head; they are propelled before him with vast
mo moo moooo mooo moo mooo; mooo moo moooooooo mooooo moo mooo mooo

swiftness, and sometimes utterly destroyed.... It is a matter of great
moooooooo, moo moooooooo moooooo moooooooo.... Mo mo m mooooo mo moooo

astonishment that the consideration of the habits of so interesting,
mooooooooooo mooo moo moooooooooooo mo moo mooooo mo mo moooooooooo,

and, in a commercial point of view, so important an animal (as the Sperm
moo, mo m mooooooooo moooo mo mooo, mo moooooooo mo mooooo (mo moo Moooo

Whale) should have been so entirely neglected, or should have excited
Moooo) mooooo mooo mooo mo mooooooo moooooooo, mo mooooo mooo moooooo

so little curiosity among the numerous, and many of them competent
mo mooooo moooooooo moooo moo mooooooo, moo mooo mo mooo moooooooo

observers, that of late years, must have possessed the most abundant
moooooooo, mooo mo mooo moooo, mooo mooo moooooooo moo mooo mooooooo

and the most convenient opportunities of witnessing their habitudes."
moo moo mooo mooooooooo moooooooooooo mo mooooooooo moooo moooooooo."

--THOMAS BEALE'S HISTORY OF THE SPERM WHALE, 1839.

"The Cachalot" (Sperm Whale) "is not only better armed than the True
"Moo Mooooooo" (Moooo Moooo) "mo moo mooo mooooo moooo mooo moo Mooo

Whale" (Greenland or Right Whale) "in possessing a formidable weapon
Moooo" (Moooooooo mo Moooo Moooo) "mo mooooooooo m mooooooooo mooooo

at either extremity of its body, but also more frequently displays a
mo mooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo m

disposition to employ these weapons offensively and in manner at once so
moooooooooo mo mooooo moooo moooooo moooooooooo moo mo mooooo mo mooo mo

artful, bold, and mischievous, as to lead to its being regarded as the
mooooo, mooo, moo moooooooooo, mo mo mooo mo moo moooo mooooooo mo moo

most dangerous to attack of all the known species of the whale tribe."
mooo moooooooo mo mooooo mo moo moo moooo moooooo mo moo moooo moooo."

     October 13.  "There she blows," was sung out from the mast-head.

     breaches!"
     mooooooo!"

     blows--bowes--bo-o-os!"
     moooo--moooo--mo-m-mo!"

     "Moo moo moo?"

"Pedestrians in the vicinity of London and elsewhere may recollect
"Moooooooooo mo moo mooooooo mo Mooooo moo moooooooo moo moooooooo

having seen large curved bones set upright in the earth, either to form
mooooo mooo moooo mooooo moooo moo moooooo mo moo moooo, mooooo mo mooo

arches over gateways, or entrances to alcoves, and they may perhaps
mooooo mooo mooooooo, mo moooooooo mo moooooo, moo mooo moo moooooo

have been told that these were the ribs of whales." --TALES OF A WHALE
mooo mooo mooo mooo moooo mooo moo mooo mo mooooo." --MOOOO MO M MOOOO

VOYAGER TO THE ARCTIC OCEAN.
MOOOOOO MO MOO MOOOOO MOOOO.




"It was not till the boats returned from the pursuit of these whales,
"Mo moo moo mooo moo moooo mooooooo mooo moo moooooo mo moooo mooooo,

OF THE WHALE-SHIP HOBOMACK.

mooooooo." --MOOOOO MO M MOOOO MOOO.

"The Whale is harpooned to be sure; but bethink you, how you would
"Moo Moooo mo moooooooo mo mo mooo; moo moooooo moo, moo moo moooo

manage a powerful unbroken colt, with the mere appliance of a rope tied
mooooo m mooooooo mooooooo mooo, mooo moo mooo moooooooo mo m mooo mooo

mo moo mooo mo moo mooo." --M MOOOOOO MO MOOOOOO MO MOOO MOO MOOOOO.




"On one occasion I saw two of these monsters (whales) probably male and
"Mo moo mooooooo M moo moo mo moooo mooooooo (mooooo) mooooooo mooo moo

mooooo, mooooo mooooooo, moo moooo moo moooo, mooooo mooo mooo m moooo'm

throw of the shore" (Terra Del Fuego), "over which the beech tree
moooo mo moo moooo" (Moooo Moo Moooo), "mooo moooo moo moooo mooo

mooooooo moo mooooooo." --MOOOOO'M MOOOOO MO M MOOOOOOOOO.




"'Stern all!' exclaimed the mate, as upon turning his head, he saw the
"'Moooo moo!' moooooooo moo mooo, mo mooo moooooo moo mooo, mo moo moo

moooooooo mooo mo m moooo Moooo Moooo moooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooo,

moooooooooo mo mooo moooooo moooooooooo;--'Moooo moo, moo mooo moooo!'"

--WHARTON THE WHALE KILLER.
--MOOOOOO MOO MOOOO MOOOOO.




"So be cheery, my lads, let your hearts never fail, While the bold
"Mo mo mooooo, mo mooo, moo mooo mooooo moooo mooo, Moooo moo mooo

harpooneer is striking the whale!" --NANTUCKET SONG.
mooooooooo mo mooooooo moo moooo!" --MOOOOOOOO MOOO.




     "Oh, the rare old Whale, mid storm and gale
     "Mo, moo mooo moo Moooo, moo moooo moo mooo

     In his ocean home will be
     Mo moo moooo mooo mooo mo

     A giant in might, where might is right,
     M moooo mo moooo, moooo moooo mo moooo,

     And King of the boundless sea."
     Moo Mooo mo moo moooooooo moo."

     --WHALE SONG.
     --MOOOO MOOO.













CHAPTER 1. Loomings.
MOOOOOO m. Mooooooo.







Call me Ishmael. Some years ago--never mind how long precisely--having
Mooo mo Moooooo. Mooo moooo moo--moooo mooo moo mooo moooooooo--mooooo

little or no money in my purse, and nothing particular to interest me on
mooooo mo mo moooo mo mo moooo, moo moooooo mooooooooo mo mooooooo mo mo

shore, I thought I would sail about a little and see the watery part of
moooo, M moooooo M moooo mooo moooo m mooooo moo moo moo mooooo mooo mo

the world. It is a way I have of driving off the spleen and regulating
moo moooo. Mo mo m moo M mooo mo moooooo moo moo mooooo moo mooooooooo

the circulation. Whenever I find myself growing grim about the mouth;
moo moooooooooo. Mooooooo M mooo mooooo moooooo mooo moooo moo moooo;

whenever it is a damp, drizzly November in my soul; whenever I find
mooooooo mo mo m mooo, moooooo Mooooooo mo mo mooo; mooooooo M mooo

myself involuntarily pausing before coffin warehouses, and bringing up
mooooo moooooooooooo moooooo mooooo mooooo mooooooooo, moo mooooooo mo

the rear of every funeral I meet; and especially whenever my hypos get
moo mooo mo moooo moooooo M mooo; moo mooooooooo mooooooo mo moooo moo

such an upper hand of me, that it requires a strong moral principle to
mooo mo moooo mooo mo mo, mooo mo mooooooo m mooooo moooo moooooooo mo

prevent me from deliberately stepping into the street, and methodically
moooooo mo mooo mooooooooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo, moo mooooooooooo

knocking people's hats off--then, I account it high time to get to sea
mooooooo mooooo'm mooo moo--mooo, M moooooo mo mooo mooo mo moo mo moo

as soon as I can. This is my substitute for pistol and ball. With a
mo mooo mo M moo. Mooo mo mo mooooooooo moo mooooo moo mooo. Mooo m

philosophical flourish Cato throws himself upon his sword; I quietly
moooooooooooo mooooooo Mooo mooooo moooooo mooo moo moooo; M moooooo

take to the ship. There is nothing surprising in this. If they but knew
mooo mo moo mooo. Moooo mo moooooo mooooooooo mo mooo. Mo mooo moo mooo

it, almost all men in their degree, some time or other, cherish very
mo, mooooo moo moo mo moooo mooooo, mooo mooo mo moooo, moooooo mooo

nearly the same feelings towards the ocean with me.
mooooo moo mooo mooooooo moooooo moo moooo mooo mo.




There now is your insular city of the Manhattoes, belted round by
Moooo moo mo mooo moooooo mooo mo moo Mooooooooo, mooooo moooo mo

wharves as Indian isles by coral reefs--commerce surrounds it with
moooooo mo Mooooo moooo mo moooo moooo--mooooooo moooooooo mo mooo

her surf. Right and left, the streets take you waterward. Its extreme
moo mooo. Moooo moo mooo, moo moooooo mooo moo moooooooo. Moo moooooo

downtown is the battery, where that noble mole is washed by waves, and
mooooooo mo moo moooooo, moooo mooo moooo mooo mo mooooo mo moooo, moo

cooled by breezes, which a few hours previous were out of sight of land.
mooooo mo moooooo, moooo m moo moooo mooooooo mooo moo mo moooo mo mooo.

Look at the crowds of water-gazers there.
Mooo mo moo mooooo mo moooo-mooooo moooo.




Circumambulate the city of a dreamy Sabbath afternoon. Go from Corlears
Mooooooooooooo moo mooo mo m mooooo Moooooo moooooooo. Mo mooo Mooooooo

Hook to Coenties Slip, and from thence, by Whitehall, northward. What
Mooo mo Mooooooo Mooo, moo mooo mooooo, mo Moooooooo, moooooooo. Mooo

do you see?--Posted like silent sentinels all around the town, stand
mo moo moo?--Mooooo mooo mooooo moooooooo moo mooooo moo mooo, moooo

thousands upon thousands of mortal men fixed in ocean reveries. Some
moooooooo mooo moooooooo mo mooooo moo moooo mo moooo mooooooo. Mooo

leaning against the spiles; some seated upon the pier-heads; some
moooooo moooooo moo mooooo; mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo-moooo; mooo

looking over the bulwarks of ships from China; some high aloft in the
moooooo mooo moo mooooooo mo moooo mooo Moooo; mooo mooo moooo mo moo

rigging, as if striving to get a still better seaward peep. But these
moooooo, mo mo mooooooo mo moo m moooo mooooo moooooo mooo. Moo moooo

are all landsmen; of week days pent up in lath and plaster--tied to
moo moo mooooooo; mo mooo mooo mooo mo mo mooo moo moooooo--mooo mo

counters, nailed to benches, clinched to desks. How then is this? Are
mooooooo, mooooo mo moooooo, mooooooo mo moooo. Moo mooo mo mooo? Moo

the green fields gone? What do they here?
moo moooo mooooo mooo? Mooo mo mooo mooo?




But look! here come more crowds, pacing straight for the water, and
Moo mooo! mooo mooo mooo mooooo, mooooo mooooooo moo moo moooo, moo

seemingly bound for a dive. Strange! Nothing will content them but the
moooooooo moooo moo m mooo. Moooooo! Moooooo mooo moooooo mooo moo moo

extremest limit of the land; loitering under the shady lee of yonder
moooooooo moooo mo moo mooo; moooooooo moooo moo moooo moo mo mooooo

warehouses will not suffice. No. They must get just as nigh the water
mooooooooo mooo moo moooooo. Mo. Mooo mooo moo mooo mo mooo moo moooo

as they possibly can without falling in. And there they stand--miles of
mo mooo mooooooo moo moooooo moooooo mo. Moo moooo mooo moooo--moooo mo

them--leagues. Inlanders all, they come from lanes and alleys, streets
mooo--moooooo. Moooooooo moo, mooo mooo mooo moooo moo mooooo, moooooo

and avenues--north, east, south, and west. Yet here they all unite.
moo moooooo--moooo, mooo, moooo, moo mooo. Moo mooo mooo moo moooo.

Tell me, does the magnetic virtue of the needles of the compasses of all
Mooo mo, mooo moo mooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooo mo moo moooooooo mo moo

those ships attract them thither?
moooo moooo moooooo mooo moooooo?




Once more. Say you are in the country; in some high land of lakes. Take
Mooo mooo. Moo moo moo mo moo moooooo; mo mooo mooo mooo mo moooo. Mooo

almost any path you please, and ten to one it carries you down in a
mooooo moo mooo moo mooooo, moo moo mo moo mo moooooo moo mooo mo m

dale, and leaves you there by a pool in the stream. There is magic
mooo, moo mooooo moo moooo mo m mooo mo moo mooooo. Moooo mo moooo

in it. Let the most absent-minded of men be plunged in his deepest
mo mo. Moo moo mooo mooooo-mooooo mo moo mo moooooo mo moo moooooo

reveries--stand that man on his legs, set his feet a-going, and he will
mooooooo--moooo mooo moo mo moo mooo, moo moo mooo m-moooo, moo mo mooo

infallibly lead you to water, if water there be in all that region.
mooooooooo mooo moo mo moooo, mo moooo moooo mo mo moo mooo mooooo.

Should you ever be athirst in the great American desert, try this
Mooooo moo mooo mo moooooo mo moo moooo Mooooooo mooooo, moo mooo

experiment, if your caravan happen to be supplied with a metaphysical
mooooooooo, mo mooo moooooo mooooo mo mo mooooooo mooo m mooooooooooo

professor. Yes, as every one knows, meditation and water are wedded for
moooooooo. Moo, mo moooo moo moooo, mooooooooo moo moooo moo mooooo moo

ever.
mooo.




But here is an artist. He desires to paint you the dreamiest, shadiest,
Moo mooo mo mo mooooo. Mo moooooo mo moooo moo moo moooooooo, mooooooo,

quietest, most enchanting bit of romantic landscape in all the valley of
mooooooo, mooo mooooooooo moo mo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo moo mooooo mo

the Saco. What is the chief element he employs? There stand his trees,
moo Mooo. Mooo mo moo moooo moooooo mo moooooo? Moooo moooo moo moooo,

each with a hollow trunk, as if a hermit and a crucifix were within; and
mooo mooo m mooooo moooo, mo mo m mooooo moo m mooooooo mooo mooooo; moo

here sleeps his meadow, and there sleep his cattle; and up from yonder
mooo mooooo moo mooooo, moo moooo moooo moo mooooo; moo mo mooo mooooo

cottage goes a sleepy smoke. Deep into distant woodlands winds a
moooooo mooo m mooooo moooo. Mooo mooo moooooo moooooooo moooo m

mazy way, reaching to overlapping spurs of mountains bathed in their
mooo moo, mooooooo mo moooooooooo moooo mo moooooooo mooooo mo moooo

hill-side blue. But though the picture lies thus tranced, and though
mooo-mooo mooo. Moo mooooo moo moooooo mooo mooo moooooo, moo mooooo

this pine-tree shakes down its sighs like leaves upon this shepherd's
mooo mooo-mooo mooooo mooo moo moooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo mooooooo'm

head, yet all were vain, unless the shepherd's eye were fixed upon the
mooo, moo moo mooo mooo, mooooo moo mooooooo'm moo mooo moooo mooo moo

magic stream before him. Go visit the Prairies in June, when for scores
moooo mooooo mooooo moo. Mo moooo moo Mooooooo mo Mooo, mooo moo mooooo

on scores of miles you wade knee-deep among Tiger-lilies--what is the
mo mooooo mo moooo moo mooo mooo-mooo moooo Moooo-mooooo--mooo mo moo

one charm wanting?--Water--there is not a drop of water there! Were
moo moooo moooooo?--Moooo--moooo mo moo m mooo mo moooo moooo! Mooo

Niagara but a cataract of sand, would you travel your thousand miles to
Moooooo moo m mooooooo mo mooo, moooo moo mooooo mooo mooooooo moooo mo

see it? Why did the poor poet of Tennessee, upon suddenly receiving two
moo mo? Moo moo moo mooo mooo mo Moooooooo, mooo mooooooo moooooooo moo

handfuls of silver, deliberate whether to buy him a coat, which he sadly
mooooooo mo mooooo, mooooooooo moooooo mo moo moo m mooo, moooo mo moooo

needed, or invest his money in a pedestrian trip to Rockaway Beach? Why
mooooo, mo mooooo moo moooo mo m mooooooooo mooo mo Mooooooo Moooo? Moo

is almost every robust healthy boy with a robust healthy soul in him, at
mo mooooo moooo mooooo moooooo moo mooo m mooooo moooooo mooo mo moo, mo

some time or other crazy to go to sea? Why upon your first voyage as a
mooo mooo mo moooo moooo mo mo mo moo? Moo mooo mooo moooo mooooo mo m

passenger, did you yourself feel such a mystical vibration, when first
moooooooo, moo moo mooooooo mooo mooo m mooooooo moooooooo, mooo moooo

told that you and your ship were now out of sight of land? Why did the
mooo mooo moo moo mooo mooo mooo moo moo mo moooo mo mooo? Moo moo moo

old Persians hold the sea holy? Why did the Greeks give it a separate
moo Mooooooo mooo moo moo mooo? Moo moo moo Mooooo mooo mo m mooooooo

deity, and own brother of Jove? Surely all this is not without meaning.
moooo, moo moo moooooo mo Mooo? Mooooo moo mooo mo moo moooooo moooooo.

And still deeper the meaning of that story of Narcissus, who because
Moo moooo mooooo moo moooooo mo mooo moooo mo Moooooooo, moo moooooo

he could not grasp the tormenting, mild image he saw in the fountain,
mo moooo moo moooo moo mooooooooo, mooo moooo mo moo mo moo mooooooo,

plunged into it and was drowned. But that same image, we ourselves see
moooooo mooo mo moo moo moooooo. Moo mooo mooo moooo, mo moooooooo moo

in all rivers and oceans. It is the image of the ungraspable phantom of
mo moo mooooo moo mooooo. Mo mo moo moooo mo moo moooooooooo moooooo mo

life; and this is the key to it all.
mooo; moo mooo mo moo moo mo mo moo.




Now, when I say that I am in the habit of going to sea whenever I begin
Moo, mooo M moo mooo M mo mo moo moooo mo moooo mo moo mooooooo M moooo

to grow hazy about the eyes, and begin to be over conscious of my lungs,
mo mooo mooo moooo moo mooo, moo moooo mo mo mooo moooooooo mo mo moooo,

I do not mean to have it inferred that I ever go to sea as a passenger.
M mo moo mooo mo mooo mo mooooooo mooo M mooo mo mo moo mo m moooooooo.

For to go as a passenger you must needs have a purse, and a purse is
Moo mo mo mo m moooooooo moo mooo moooo mooo m moooo, moo m moooo mo

but a rag unless you have something in it. Besides, passengers get
moo m moo mooooo moo mooo moooooooo mo mo. Moooooo, mooooooooo moo

sea-sick--grow quarrelsome--don't sleep of nights--do not enjoy
moo-mooo--mooo moooooooooo--moo'm moooo mo mooooo--mo moo moooo

themselves much, as a general thing;--no, I never go as a passenger;
mooooooooo mooo, mo m moooooo moooo;--mo, M moooo mo mo m moooooooo;

nor, though I am something of a salt, do I ever go to sea as a
moo, mooooo M mo moooooooo mo m mooo, mo M mooo mo mo moo mo m

Commodore, or a Captain, or a Cook. I abandon the glory and distinction
Moooooooo, mo m Moooooo, mo m Mooo. M moooooo moo moooo moo moooooooooo

of such offices to those who like them. For my part, I abominate all
mo mooo moooooo mo moooo moo mooo mooo. Moo mo mooo, M moooooooo moo

honourable respectable toils, trials, and tribulations of every kind
mooooooooo moooooooooo moooo, mooooo, moo mooooooooooo mo moooo mooo

whatsoever. It is quite as much as I can do to take care of myself,
mooooooooo. Mo mo moooo mo mooo mo M moo mo mo mooo mooo mo mooooo,

without taking care of ships, barques, brigs, schooners, and what not.
moooooo mooooo mooo mo moooo, moooooo, moooo, moooooooo, moo mooo moo.

And as for going as cook,--though I confess there is considerable glory
Moo mo moo moooo mo mooo,--mooooo M moooooo moooo mo mooooooooooo moooo

in that, a cook being a sort of officer on ship-board--yet, somehow,
mo mooo, m mooo moooo m mooo mo moooooo mo mooo-moooo--moo, moooooo,

I never fancied broiling fowls;--though once broiled, judiciously
M moooo moooooo mooooooo moooo;--mooooo mooo moooooo, moooooooooo

buttered, and judgmatically salted and peppered, there is no one who
mooooooo, moo moooooooooooo mooooo moo mooooooo, moooo mo mo moo moo

will speak more respectfully, not to say reverentially, of a broiled
mooo moooo mooo mooooooooooo, moo mo moo moooooooooooo, mo m moooooo

fowl than I will. It is out of the idolatrous dotings of the old
mooo mooo M mooo. Mo mo moo mo moo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo moo

Egyptians upon broiled ibis and roasted river horse, that you see the
Moooooooo mooo moooooo mooo moo moooooo moooo moooo, mooo moo moo moo

mummies of those creatures in their huge bake-houses the pyramids.
moooooo mo moooo moooooooo mo moooo mooo mooo-mooooo moo mooooooo.




No, when I go to sea, I go as a simple sailor, right before the mast,
Mo, mooo M mo mo moo, M mo mo m mooooo mooooo, moooo mooooo moo mooo,

plumb down into the forecastle, aloft there to the royal mast-head.
moooo mooo mooo moo mooooooooo, moooo moooo mo moo moooo mooo-mooo.

True, they rather order me about some, and make me jump from spar to
Mooo, mooo mooooo moooo mo moooo mooo, moo mooo mo mooo mooo mooo mo

spar, like a grasshopper in a May meadow. And at first, this sort
mooo, mooo m moooooooooo mo m Moo mooooo. Moo mo moooo, mooo mooo

of thing is unpleasant enough. It touches one's sense of honour,
mo moooo mo mooooooooo mooooo. Mo moooooo moo'm moooo mo mooooo,

particularly if you come of an old established family in the land, the
mooooooooooo mo moo mooo mo mo moo moooooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo, moo

Van Rensselaers, or Randolphs, or Hardicanutes. And more than all,
Moo Moooooooooo, mo Moooooooo, mo Mooooooooooo. Moo mooo mooo moo,

if just previous to putting your hand into the tar-pot, you have been
mo mooo mooooooo mo moooooo mooo mooo mooo moo moo-moo, moo mooo mooo

lording it as a country schoolmaster, making the tallest boys stand
moooooo mo mo m moooooo mooooooooooo, mooooo moo moooooo mooo moooo

in awe of you. The transition is a keen one, I assure you, from a
mo moo mo moo. Moo mooooooooo mo m mooo moo, M mooooo moo, mooo m

schoolmaster to a sailor, and requires a strong decoction of Seneca and
mooooooooooo mo m mooooo, moo mooooooo m mooooo moooooooo mo Mooooo moo

the Stoics to enable you to grin and bear it. But even this wears off in
moo Mooooo mo mooooo moo mo mooo moo mooo mo. Moo mooo mooo moooo moo mo

time.
mooo.




What of it, if some old hunks of a sea-captain orders me to get a broom
Mooo mo mo, mo mooo moo moooo mo m moo-moooooo mooooo mo mo moo m moooo

and sweep down the decks? What does that indignity amount to, weighed,
moo moooo mooo moo moooo? Mooo mooo mooo moooooooo mooooo mo, moooooo,

I mean, in the scales of the New Testament? Do you think the archangel
M mooo, mo moo mooooo mo moo Moo Moooooooo? Mo moo moooo moo moooooooo

Gabriel thinks anything the less of me, because I promptly and
Moooooo mooooo mooooooo moo mooo mo mo, moooooo M mooooooo moo

respectfully obey that old hunks in that particular instance? Who ain't
mooooooooooo mooo mooo moo moooo mo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo? Moo moo'm

a slave? Tell me that. Well, then, however the old sea-captains may
m moooo? Mooo mo mooo. Mooo, mooo, moooooo moo moo moo-mooooooo moo

order me about--however they may thump and punch me about, I have the
moooo mo moooo--moooooo mooo moo moooo moo moooo mo moooo, M mooo moo

satisfaction of knowing that it is all right; that everybody else is
mooooooooooo mo moooooo mooo mo mo moo moooo; mooo moooooooo mooo mo

one way or other served in much the same way--either in a physical
moo moo mo moooo mooooo mo mooo moo mooo moo--mooooo mo m mooooooo

or metaphysical point of view, that is; and so the universal thump is
mo mooooooooooo moooo mo mooo, mooo mo; moo mo moo moooooooo moooo mo

passed round, and all hands should rub each other's shoulder-blades, and
mooooo moooo, moo moo moooo mooooo moo mooo moooo'm mooooooo-mooooo, moo

be content.
mo moooooo.




Again, I always go to sea as a sailor, because they make a point of
Moooo, M mooooo mo mo moo mo m mooooo, moooooo mooo mooo m moooo mo

paying me for my trouble, whereas they never pay passengers a single
mooooo mo moo mo moooooo, moooooo mooo moooo moo mooooooooo m mooooo

penny that I ever heard of. On the contrary, passengers themselves must
moooo mooo M mooo moooo mo. Mo moo mooooooo, mooooooooo mooooooooo mooo

pay. And there is all the difference in the world between paying
moo. Moo moooo mo moo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooo moooooo mooooo

and being paid. The act of paying is perhaps the most uncomfortable
moo moooo mooo. Moo moo mo mooooo mo moooooo moo mooo moooooooooooo

infliction that the two orchard thieves entailed upon us. But BEING
mooooooooo mooo moo moo moooooo moooooo mooooooo mooo mo. Moo MOOOO

PAID,--what will compare with it? The urbane activity with which a man
MOOO,--mooo mooo moooooo mooo mo? Moo mooooo mooooooo mooo moooo m moo

receives money is really marvellous, considering that we so earnestly
mooooooo moooo mo mooooo mooooooooo, moooooooooo mooo mo mo moooooooo

believe money to be the root of all earthly ills, and that on no account
moooooo moooo mo mo moo mooo mo moo moooooo mooo, moo mooo mo mo moooooo

can a monied man enter heaven. Ah! how cheerfully we consign ourselves
moo m mooooo moo moooo mooooo. Mo! moo mooooooooo mo moooooo moooooooo

to perdition!
mo moooooooo!




Finally, I always go to sea as a sailor, because of the wholesome
Moooooo, M mooooo mo mo moo mo m mooooo, moooooo mo moo moooooooo

exercise and pure air of the fore-castle deck. For as in this world,
mooooooo moo mooo moo mo moo mooo-mooooo mooo. Moo mo mo mooo moooo,

head winds are far more prevalent than winds from astern (that is,
mooo moooo moo moo mooo moooooooo mooo moooo mooo mooooo (mooo mo,

if you never violate the Pythagorean maxim), so for the most part the
mo moo moooo moooooo moo Moooooooooo moooo), mo moo moo mooo mooo moo

Commodore on the quarter-deck gets his atmosphere at second hand from
Moooooooo mo moo moooooo-mooo mooo moo mooooooooo mo mooooo mooo mooo

the sailors on the forecastle. He thinks he breathes it first; but not
moo moooooo mo moo mooooooooo. Mo mooooo mo mooooooo mo moooo; moo moo

so. In much the same way do the commonalty lead their leaders in many
mo. Mo mooo moo mooo moo mo moo mooooooooo mooo moooo moooooo mo mooo

other things, at the same time that the leaders little suspect it.
moooo mooooo, mo moo mooo mooo mooo moo moooooo mooooo moooooo mo.

But wherefore it was that after having repeatedly smelt the sea as a
Moo moooooooo mo moo mooo moooo mooooo mooooooooo moooo moo moo mo m

merchant sailor, I should now take it into my head to go on a whaling
mooooooo mooooo, M mooooo moo mooo mo mooo mo mooo mo mo mo m moooooo

voyage; this the invisible police officer of the Fates, who has the
mooooo; mooo moo moooooooo mooooo moooooo mo moo Moooo, moo moo moo

constant surveillance of me, and secretly dogs me, and influences me
mooooooo mooooooooooo mo mo, moo mooooooo mooo mo, moo mooooooooo mo

in some unaccountable way--he can better answer than any one else. And,
mo mooo moooooooooooo moo--mo moo mooooo mooooo mooo moo moo mooo. Moo,

doubtless, my going on this whaling voyage, formed part of the grand
moooooooo, mo moooo mo mooo moooooo mooooo, mooooo mooo mo moo moooo

programme of Providence that was drawn up a long time ago. It came in as
moooooooo mo Mooooooooo mooo moo moooo mo m mooo mooo moo. Mo mooo mo mo

a sort of brief interlude and solo between more extensive performances.
m mooo mo moooo moooooooo moo mooo moooooo mooo moooooooo mooooooooooo.

I take it that this part of the bill must have run something like this:
M mooo mo mooo mooo mooo mo moo mooo mooo mooo moo moooooooo mooo mooo:







"GRAND CONTESTED ELECTION FOR THE PRESIDENCY OF THE UNITED STATES.
"MOOOO MOOOOOOOO MOOOOOOO MOO MOO MOOOOOOOOO MO MOO MOOOOO MOOOOO.




"WHALING VOYAGE BY ONE ISHMAEL.
"MOOOOOO MOOOOO MO MOO MOOOOOO.




"BLOODY BATTLE IN AFFGHANISTAN."
"MOOOOO MOOOOO MO MOOOOOOOOOOO."







Though I cannot tell why it was exactly that those stage managers, the
Mooooo M mooooo mooo moo mo moo moooooo mooo moooo moooo mooooooo, moo

Fates, put me down for this shabby part of a whaling voyage, when others
Moooo, moo mo mooo moo mooo mooooo mooo mo m moooooo mooooo, mooo mooooo

were set down for magnificent parts in high tragedies, and short and
mooo moo mooo moo moooooooooo moooo mo mooo moooooooo, moo moooo moo

easy parts in genteel comedies, and jolly parts in farces--though
mooo moooo mo moooooo mooooooo, moo moooo moooo mo mooooo--mooooo

I cannot tell why this was exactly; yet, now that I recall all the
M mooooo mooo moo mooo moo moooooo; moo, moo mooo M mooooo moo moo

circumstances, I think I can see a little into the springs and motives
moooooooooooo, M moooo M moo moo m mooooo mooo moo moooooo moo moooooo

which being cunningly presented to me under various disguises, induced
moooo moooo moooooooo moooooooo mo mo moooo moooooo moooooooo, moooooo

me to set about performing the part I did, besides cajoling me into the
mo mo moo moooo mooooooooo moo mooo M moo, moooooo mooooooo mo mooo moo

delusion that it was a choice resulting from my own unbiased freewill
mooooooo mooo mo moo m mooooo moooooooo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooooooo

and discriminating judgment.
moo mooooooooooooo mooooooo.




Chief among these motives was the overwhelming idea of the great
Moooo moooo moooo moooooo moo moo mooooooooooo mooo mo moo moooo

whale himself. Such a portentous and mysterious monster roused all my
moooo moooooo. Mooo m mooooooooo moo mooooooooo moooooo mooooo moo mo

curiosity. Then the wild and distant seas where he rolled his island
moooooooo. Mooo moo mooo moo moooooo mooo moooo mo mooooo moo mooooo

bulk; the undeliverable, nameless perils of the whale; these, with all
mooo; moo moooooooooooo, mooooooo mooooo mo moo moooo; moooo, mooo moo

the attending marvels of a thousand Patagonian sights and sounds, helped
moo moooooooo moooooo mo m mooooooo Mooooooooo mooooo moo mooooo, mooooo

to sway me to my wish. With other men, perhaps, such things would not
mo mooo mo mo mo mooo. Mooo moooo moo, moooooo, mooo mooooo moooo moo

have been inducements; but as for me, I am tormented with an everlasting
mooo mooo moooooooooo; moo mo moo mo, M mo moooooooo mooo mo moooooooooo

itch for things remote. I love to sail forbidden seas, and land on
mooo moo mooooo mooooo. M mooo mo mooo moooooooo mooo, moo mooo mo

barbarous coasts. Not ignoring what is good, I am quick to perceive a
moooooooo mooooo. Moo mooooooo mooo mo mooo, M mo moooo mo mooooooo m

horror, and could still be social with it--would they let me--since it
mooooo, moo moooo moooo mo mooooo mooo mo--moooo mooo moo mo--moooo mo

is but well to be on friendly terms with all the inmates of the place
mo moo mooo mo mo mo mooooooo moooo mooo moo moo moooooo mo moo moooo

one lodges in.
moo mooooo mo.




By reason of these things, then, the whaling voyage was welcome; the
Mo mooooo mo moooo mooooo, mooo, moo moooooo mooooo moo moooooo; moo

great flood-gates of the wonder-world swung open, and in the wild
moooo moooo-moooo mo moo mooooo-moooo moooo mooo, moo mo moo mooo

conceits that swayed me to my purpose, two and two there floated into
mooooooo mooo mooooo mo mo mo moooooo, moo moo moo moooo moooooo mooo

my inmost soul, endless processions of the whale, and, mid most of them
mo mooooo mooo, moooooo moooooooooo mo moo moooo, moo, moo mooo mo mooo

all, one grand hooded phantom, like a snow hill in the air.
moo, moo moooo mooooo moooooo, mooo m mooo mooo mo moo moo.










CHAPTER 2. The Carpet-Bag.
MOOOOOO m. Moo Mooooo-Moo.







I stuffed a shirt or two into my old carpet-bag, tucked it under my arm,
M moooooo m moooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooooo-moo, mooooo mo moooo mo moo,

and started for Cape Horn and the Pacific. Quitting the good city of
moo moooooo moo Mooo Mooo moo moo Moooooo. Mooooooo moo mooo mooo mo

old Manhatto, I duly arrived in New Bedford. It was a Saturday night in
moo Mooooooo, M mooo moooooo mo Moo Moooooo. Mo moo m Mooooooo moooo mo

December. Much was I disappointed upon learning that the little packet
Mooooooo. Mooo moo M mooooooooooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo

for Nantucket had already sailed, and that no way of reaching that place
moo Moooooooo moo moooooo mooooo, moo mooo mo moo mo mooooooo mooo moooo

would offer, till the following Monday.
moooo moooo, mooo moo moooooooo Mooooo.




As most young candidates for the pains and penalties of whaling stop at
Mo mooo moooo mooooooooo moo moo moooo moo moooooooo mo moooooo mooo mo

this same New Bedford, thence to embark on their voyage, it may as well
mooo mooo Moo Moooooo, mooooo mo mooooo mo moooo mooooo, mo moo mo mooo

be related that I, for one, had no idea of so doing. For my mind was
mo moooooo mooo M, moo moo, moo mo mooo mo mo moooo. Moo mo mooo moo

made up to sail in no other than a Nantucket craft, because there was a
mooo mo mo mooo mo mo moooo mooo m Moooooooo moooo, moooooo moooo moo m

fine, boisterous something about everything connected with that famous
mooo, mooooooooo moooooooo moooo mooooooooo moooooooo mooo mooo mooooo

old island, which amazingly pleased me. Besides though New Bedford has
moo mooooo, moooo moooooooo moooooo mo. Moooooo mooooo Moo Moooooo moo

of late been gradually monopolising the business of whaling, and though
mo mooo mooo moooooooo mooooooooooo moo mooooooo mo moooooo, moo mooooo

in this matter poor old Nantucket is now much behind her, yet Nantucket
mo mooo mooooo mooo moo Moooooooo mo moo mooo mooooo moo, moo Moooooooo

was her great original--the Tyre of this Carthage;--the place where the
moo moo moooo mooooooo--moo Mooo mo mooo Mooooooo;--moo moooo moooo moo

first dead American whale was stranded. Where else but from Nantucket
moooo mooo Mooooooo moooo moo mooooooo. Moooo mooo moo mooo Moooooooo

did those aboriginal whalemen, the Red-Men, first sally out in canoes to
moo moooo mooooooooo mooooooo, moo Moo-Moo, moooo moooo moo mo mooooo mo

give chase to the Leviathan? And where but from Nantucket, too, did that
mooo moooo mo moo Moooooooo? Moo moooo moo mooo Moooooooo, moo, moo mooo

first adventurous little sloop put forth, partly laden with imported
moooo moooooooooo mooooo moooo moo moooo, mooooo moooo mooo mooooooo

cobblestones--so goes the story--to throw at the whales, in order to
mooooooooooo--mo mooo moo moooo--mo moooo mo moo mooooo, mo moooo mo

discover when they were nigh enough to risk a harpoon from the bowsprit?
mooooooo mooo mooo mooo mooo mooooo mo mooo m moooooo mooo moo mooooooo?




Now having a night, a day, and still another night following before me
Moo mooooo m moooo, m moo, moo moooo moooooo moooo moooooooo mooooo mo

in New Bedford, ere I could embark for my destined port, it became a
mo Moo Moooooo, moo M moooo mooooo moo mo mooooooo mooo, mo mooooo m

matter of concernment where I was to eat and sleep meanwhile. It was a
mooooo mo moooooooooo moooo M moo mo moo moo moooo moooooooo. Mo moo m

very dubious-looking, nay, a very dark and dismal night, bitingly cold
mooo moooooo-moooooo, moo, m mooo mooo moo mooooo moooo, mooooooo mooo

and cheerless. I knew no one in the place. With anxious grapnels I had
moo moooooooo. M mooo mo moo mo moo moooo. Mooo moooooo mooooooo M moo

sounded my pocket, and only brought up a few pieces of silver,--So,
moooooo mo mooooo, moo mooo moooooo mo m moo mooooo mo mooooo,--Mo,

wherever you go, Ishmael, said I to myself, as I stood in the middle of
mooooooo moo mo, Moooooo, mooo M mo mooooo, mo M moooo mo moo mooooo mo

a dreary street shouldering my bag, and comparing the gloom towards the
m mooooo mooooo moooooooooo mo moo, moo moooooooo moo moooo moooooo moo

north with the darkness towards the south--wherever in your wisdom you
moooo mooo moo mooooooo moooooo moo moooo--mooooooo mo mooo mooooo moo

may conclude to lodge for the night, my dear Ishmael, be sure to inquire
moo mooooooo mo moooo moo moo moooo, mo mooo Moooooo, mo mooo mo moooooo

the price, and don't be too particular.
moo moooo, moo moo'm mo moo mooooooooo.




With halting steps I paced the streets, and passed the sign of "The
Mooo moooooo moooo M moooo moo moooooo, moo mooooo moo mooo mo "Moo

Crossed Harpoons"--but it looked too expensive and jolly there. Further
Moooooo Mooooooo"--moo mo mooooo moo moooooooo moo moooo moooo. Moooooo

on, from the bright red windows of the "Sword-Fish Inn," there came such
mo, mooo moo mooooo moo moooooo mo moo "Moooo-Mooo Moo," moooo mooo mooo

fervent rays, that it seemed to have melted the packed snow and ice from
moooooo mooo, mooo mo mooooo mo mooo mooooo moo mooooo mooo moo moo mooo

before the house, for everywhere else the congealed frost lay ten inches
mooooo moo moooo, moo mooooooooo mooo moo moooooooo moooo moo moo mooooo

thick in a hard, asphaltic pavement,--rather weary for me, when I struck
moooo mo m mooo, moooooooo mooooooo,--mooooo moooo moo mo, mooo M mooooo

my foot against the flinty projections, because from hard, remorseless
mo mooo moooooo moo mooooo moooooooooo, moooooo mooo mooo, moooooooooo

service the soles of my boots were in a most miserable plight. Too
moooooo moo moooo mo mo moooo mooo mo m mooo moooooooo mooooo. Moo

expensive and jolly, again thought I, pausing one moment to watch the
moooooooo moo moooo, moooo moooooo M, moooooo moo mooooo mo moooo moo

broad glare in the street, and hear the sounds of the tinkling glasses
moooo moooo mo moo mooooo, moo mooo moo mooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooo

within. But go on, Ishmael, said I at last; don't you hear? get away
mooooo. Moo mo mo, Moooooo, mooo M mo mooo; moo'm moo mooo? moo mooo

from before the door; your patched boots are stopping the way. So on I
mooo mooooo moo mooo; mooo moooooo moooo moo mooooooo moo moo. Mo mo M

went. I now by instinct followed the streets that took me waterward, for
mooo. M moo mo mooooooo mooooooo moo moooooo mooo mooo mo moooooooo, moo

there, doubtless, were the cheapest, if not the cheeriest inns.
moooo, moooooooo, mooo moo mooooooo, mo moo moo moooooooo mooo.




Such dreary streets! blocks of blackness, not houses, on either hand,
Mooo mooooo moooooo! mooooo mo moooooooo, moo mooooo, mo mooooo mooo,

and here and there a candle, like a candle moving about in a tomb. At
moo mooo moo moooo m mooooo, mooo m mooooo mooooo moooo mo m mooo. Mo

this hour of the night, of the last day of the week, that quarter of
mooo mooo mo moo moooo, mo moo mooo moo mo moo mooo, mooo moooooo mo

the town proved all but deserted. But presently I came to a smoky light
moo mooo mooooo moo moo mooooooo. Moo moooooooo M mooo mo m moooo moooo

proceeding from a low, wide building, the door of which stood invitingly
mooooooooo mooo m moo, mooo mooooooo, moo mooo mo moooo moooo mooooooooo

open. It had a careless look, as if it were meant for the uses of the
mooo. Mo moo m mooooooo mooo, mo mo mo mooo moooo moo moo mooo mo moo

public; so, entering, the first thing I did was to stumble over an
mooooo; mo, mooooooo, moo moooo moooo M moo moo mo moooooo mooo mo

ash-box in the porch. Ha! thought I, ha, as the flying particles almost
moo-moo mo moo moooo. Mo! moooooo M, mo, mo moo mooooo moooooooo mooooo

choked me, are these ashes from that destroyed city, Gomorrah? But "The
mooooo mo, moo moooo moooo mooo mooo moooooooo mooo, Mooooooo? Moo "Moo

Crossed Harpoons," and "The Sword-Fish?"--this, then must needs be the
Moooooo Mooooooo," moo "Moo Moooo-Mooo?"--mooo, mooo mooo moooo mo moo

sign of "The Trap." However, I picked myself up and hearing a loud voice
mooo mo "Moo Mooo." Moooooo, M mooooo mooooo mo moo moooooo m mooo moooo

within, pushed on and opened a second, interior door.
mooooo, mooooo mo moo mooooo m mooooo, mooooooo mooo.




It seemed the great Black Parliament sitting in Tophet. A hundred black
Mo mooooo moo moooo Moooo Mooooooooo moooooo mo Mooooo. M moooooo moooo

faces turned round in their rows to peer; and beyond, a black Angel
moooo mooooo moooo mo moooo mooo mo mooo; moo mooooo, m moooo Moooo

of Doom was beating a book in a pulpit. It was a negro church; and the
mo Mooo moo moooooo m mooo mo m mooooo. Mo moo m moooo mooooo; moo moo

preacher's text was about the blackness of darkness, and the weeping and
mooooooo'm mooo moo moooo moo moooooooo mo mooooooo, moo moo moooooo moo

wailing and teeth-gnashing there. Ha, Ishmael, muttered I, backing out,
moooooo moo moooo-mooooooo moooo. Mo, Moooooo, mooooooo M, moooooo moo,

Wretched entertainment at the sign of 'The Trap!'
Mooooooo moooooooooooo mo moo mooo mo 'Moo Mooo!'




Moving on, I at last came to a dim sort of light not far from the docks,
Mooooo mo, M mo mooo mooo mo m moo mooo mo moooo moo moo mooo moo moooo,

and heard a forlorn creaking in the air; and looking up, saw a swinging
moo moooo m moooooo mooooooo mo moo moo; moo moooooo mo, moo m mooooooo

sign over the door with a white painting upon it, faintly representing
mooo mooo moo mooo mooo m moooo mooooooo mooo mo, moooooo mooooooooooo

a tall straight jet of misty spray, and these words underneath--"The
m mooo mooooooo moo mo moooo moooo, moo moooo moooo mooooooooo--"Moo

Spouter Inn:--Peter Coffin."
Moooooo Moo:--Moooo Mooooo."




Coffin?--Spouter?--Rather ominous in that particular connexion, thought
Mooooo?--Moooooo?--Mooooo moooooo mo mooo mooooooooo moooooooo, moooooo

I. But it is a common name in Nantucket, they say, and I suppose this
M. Moo mo mo m mooooo mooo mo Moooooooo, mooo moo, moo M moooooo mooo

Peter here is an emigrant from there. As the light looked so dim, and
Moooo mooo mo mo mooooooo mooo moooo. Mo moo moooo mooooo mo moo, moo

the place, for the time, looked quiet enough, and the dilapidated little
moo moooo, moo moo mooo, mooooo moooo mooooo, moo moo moooooooooo mooooo

wooden house itself looked as if it might have been carted here from
mooooo moooo mooooo mooooo mo mo mo moooo mooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo

the ruins of some burnt district, and as the swinging sign had a
moo moooo mo mooo moooo mooooooo, moo mo moo mooooooo mooo moo m

poverty-stricken sort of creak to it, I thought that here was the very
moooooo-mooooooo mooo mo moooo mo mo, M moooooo mooo mooo moo moo mooo

spot for cheap lodgings, and the best of pea coffee.
mooo moo moooo mooooooo, moo moo mooo mo moo mooooo.




It was a queer sort of place--a gable-ended old house, one side palsied
Mo moo m moooo mooo mo moooo--m moooo-moooo moo moooo, moo mooo moooooo

as it were, and leaning over sadly. It stood on a sharp bleak corner,
mo mo mooo, moo moooooo mooo moooo. Mo moooo mo m moooo moooo mooooo,

where that tempestuous wind Euroclydon kept up a worse howling than ever
moooo mooo moooooooooo mooo Mooooooooo mooo mo m moooo moooooo mooo mooo

it did about poor Paul's tossed craft. Euroclydon, nevertheless, is a
mo moo moooo mooo Mooo'm mooooo moooo. Mooooooooo, mooooooooooo, mo m

mighty pleasant zephyr to any one in-doors, with his feet on the hob
mooooo mooooooo mooooo mo moo moo mo-moooo, mooo moo mooo mo moo moo

quietly toasting for bed. "In judging of that tempestuous wind called
moooooo mooooooo moo moo. "Mo moooooo mo mooo moooooooooo mooo mooooo

Euroclydon," says an old writer--of whose works I possess the only copy
Mooooooooo," mooo mo moo mooooo--mo moooo moooo M moooooo moo mooo mooo

extant--"it maketh a marvellous difference, whether thou lookest out at
mooooo--"mo mooooo m mooooooooo mooooooooo, moooooo mooo moooooo moo mo

it from a glass window where the frost is all on the outside, or whether
mo mooo m moooo mooooo moooo moo moooo mo moo mo moo moooooo, mo moooooo

thou observest it from that sashless window, where the frost is on both
mooo moooooooo mo mooo mooo mooooooo mooooo, moooo moo moooo mo mo mooo

sides, and of which the wight Death is the only glazier." True enough,
moooo, moo mo moooo moo moooo Moooo mo moo mooo moooooo." Mooo mooooo,

thought I, as this passage occurred to my mind--old black-letter, thou
moooooo M, mo mooo moooooo mooooooo mo mo mooo--moo moooo-mooooo, mooo

reasonest well. Yes, these eyes are windows, and this body of mine is
moooooooo mooo. Moo, moooo mooo moo moooooo, moo mooo mooo mo mooo mo

the house. What a pity they didn't stop up the chinks and the crannies
moo moooo. Mooo m mooo mooo mooo'm mooo mo moo mooooo moo moo mooooooo

though, and thrust in a little lint here and there. But it's too late
mooooo, moo mooooo mo m mooooo mooo mooo moo moooo. Moo mo'm moo mooo

to make any improvements now. The universe is finished; the copestone
mo mooo moo mooooooooooo moo. Moo mooooooo mo mooooooo; moo moooooooo

is on, and the chips were carted off a million years ago. Poor Lazarus
mo mo, moo moo moooo mooo mooooo moo m moooooo moooo moo. Mooo Moooooo

there, chattering his teeth against the curbstone for his pillow, and
moooo, mooooooooo moo moooo moooooo moo moooooooo moo moo mooooo, moo

shaking off his tatters with his shiverings, he might plug up both ears
moooooo moo moo moooooo mooo moo mooooooooo, mo moooo mooo mo mooo mooo

with rags, and put a corn-cob into his mouth, and yet that would not
mooo mooo, moo moo m mooo-moo mooo moo moooo, moo moo mooo moooo moo

keep out the tempestuous Euroclydon. Euroclydon! says old Dives, in his
mooo moo moo moooooooooo Mooooooooo. Mooooooooo! mooo moo Moooo, mo moo

red silken wrapper--(he had a redder one afterwards) pooh, pooh! What
moo mooooo moooooo--(mo moo m mooooo moo mooooooooo) mooo, mooo! Mooo

a fine frosty night; how Orion glitters; what northern lights! Let them
m mooo mooooo moooo; moo Moooo mooooooo; mooo mooooooo mooooo! Moo mooo

talk of their oriental summer climes of everlasting conservatories; give
mooo mo moooo mooooooo mooooo mooooo mo moooooooooo mooooooooooooo; mooo

me the privilege of making my own summer with my own coals.
mo moo moooooooo mo mooooo mo moo mooooo mooo mo moo moooo.




But what thinks Lazarus? Can he warm his blue hands by holding them up
Moo mooo mooooo Moooooo? Moo mo mooo moo mooo moooo mo moooooo mooo mo

to the grand northern lights? Would not Lazarus rather be in Sumatra
mo moo moooo mooooooo mooooo? Moooo moo Moooooo mooooo mo mo Moooooo

than here? Would he not far rather lay him down lengthwise along the
mooo mooo? Moooo mo moo moo mooooo moo moo mooo mooooooooo moooo moo

line of the equator; yea, ye gods! go down to the fiery pit itself, in
mooo mo moo moooooo; moo, mo mooo! mo mooo mo moo moooo moo mooooo, mo

order to keep out this frost?
moooo mo mooo moo mooo moooo?




Now, that Lazarus should lie stranded there on the curbstone before the
Moo, mooo Moooooo mooooo moo mooooooo moooo mo moo moooooooo mooooo moo

door of Dives, this is more wonderful than that an iceberg should be
mooo mo Moooo, mooo mo mooo moooooooo mooo mooo mo moooooo mooooo mo

moored to one of the Moluccas. Yet Dives himself, he too lives like a
mooooo mo moo mo moo Mooooooo. Moo Moooo moooooo, mo moo moooo mooo m

Czar in an ice palace made of frozen sighs, and being a president of a
Mooo mo mo moo mooooo mooo mo mooooo moooo, moo moooo m moooooooo mo m

temperance society, he only drinks the tepid tears of orphans.
mooooooooo moooooo, mo mooo mooooo moo moooo moooo mo moooooo.




But no more of this blubbering now, we are going a-whaling, and there is
Moo mo mooo mo mooo mooooooooo moo, mo moo moooo m-moooooo, moo moooo mo

plenty of that yet to come. Let us scrape the ice from our frosted feet,
mooooo mo mooo moo mo mooo. Moo mo mooooo moo moo mooo moo moooooo mooo,

and see what sort of a place this "Spouter" may be.
moo moo mooo mooo mo m moooo mooo "Moooooo" moo mo.










CHAPTER 3. The Spouter-Inn.
MOOOOOO m. Moo Moooooo-Moo.







Entering that gable-ended Spouter-Inn, you found yourself in a wide,
Mooooooo mooo moooo-moooo Moooooo-Moo, moo moooo mooooooo mo m mooo,

low, straggling entry with old-fashioned wainscots, reminding one of
moo, mooooooooo moooo mooo moo-moooooooo moooooooo, moooooooo moo mo

the bulwarks of some condemned old craft. On one side hung a very large
moo mooooooo mo mooo moooooooo moo moooo. Mo moo mooo mooo m mooo moooo

oilpainting so thoroughly besmoked, and every way defaced, that in the
moooooooooo mo mooooooooo mooooooo, moo moooo moo moooooo, mooo mo moo

unequal crosslights by which you viewed it, it was only by diligent
moooooo moooooooooo mo moooo moo mooooo mo, mo moo mooo mo mooooooo

study and a series of systematic visits to it, and careful inquiry of
moooo moo m mooooo mo mooooooooo mooooo mo mo, moo moooooo moooooo mo

the neighbors, that you could any way arrive at an understanding of its
moo moooooooo, mooo moo moooo moo moo mooooo mo mo moooooooooooo mo moo

purpose. Such unaccountable masses of shades and shadows, that at first
moooooo. Mooo moooooooooooo mooooo mo mooooo moo moooooo, mooo mo moooo

you almost thought some ambitious young artist, in the time of the New
moo mooooo moooooo mooo moooooooo moooo mooooo, mo moo mooo mo moo Moo

England hags, had endeavored to delineate chaos bewitched. But by dint
Moooooo mooo, moo mooooooooo mo moooooooo moooo moooooooo. Moo mo mooo

of much and earnest contemplation, and oft repeated ponderings, and
mo mooo moo moooooo moooooooooooo, moo moo mooooooo mooooooooo, moo

especially by throwing open the little window towards the back of the
mooooooooo mo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo moooooo moo mooo mo moo

entry, you at last come to the conclusion that such an idea, however
moooo, moo mo mooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo mooo mo mooo, moooooo

wild, might not be altogether unwarranted.
mooo, moooo moo mo mooooooooo moooooooooo.




But what most puzzled and confounded you was a long, limber, portentous,
Moo mooo mooo moooooo moo mooooooooo moo moo m mooo, mooooo, mooooooooo,

black mass of something hovering in the centre of the picture over three
moooo mooo mo moooooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooo moooo

blue, dim, perpendicular lines floating in a nameless yeast. A boggy,
mooo, moo, moooooooooooo moooo mooooooo mo m mooooooo moooo. M moooo,

soggy, squitchy picture truly, enough to drive a nervous man distracted.
moooo, mooooooo moooooo moooo, mooooo mo moooo m moooooo moo mooooooooo.

Yet was there a sort of indefinite, half-attained, unimaginable
Moo moo moooo m mooo mo mooooooooo, mooo-mooooooo, mooooooooooo

mooo mo mooo mooo mooooooo mo mooo moo mooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo

through.--It's the Black Sea in a midnight gale.--It's the unnatural

combat of the four primal elements.--It's a blasted heath.--It's a
mooooo mo moo mooo mooooo mooooooo.--Mo'm m moooooo moooo.--Mo'm m

of Time. But at last all these fancies yielded to that one portentous
mo Mooo. Moo mo mooo moo moooo moooooo moooooo mo mooo moo mooooooooo

mooo moooo. Moo mooo; mooo mo moo mooo m moooo moooooooooo mo m mooooooo

fish? even the great leviathan himself?
mooo? mooo moo moooo moooooooo moooooo?




In fact, the artist's design seemed this: a final theory of my own,
Mo mooo, moo mooooo'm mooooo mooooo mooo: m moooo mooooo mo mo moo,

partly based upon the aggregated opinions of many aged persons with whom
mooooo moooo mooo moo mooooooooo mooooooo mo mooo mooo moooooo mooo mooo

I conversed upon the subject. The picture represents a Cape-Horner in a
M moooooooo mooo moo moooooo. Moo moooooo mooooooooo m Mooo-Mooooo mo m

great hurricane; the half-foundered ship weltering there with its three
moooo moooooooo; moo mooo-moooooooo mooo moooooooo moooo mooo moo moooo

mooooooooo moooo moooo moooooo; moo mo moooooooooo moooo, moooooooo mo

mooooo moooo mooo moo moooo, mo mo moo mooooooo moo mo mooooooo moooooo

upon the three mast-heads.
mooo moo moooo mooo-moooo.




The opposite wall of this entry was hung all over with a heathenish
Moo mooooooo mooo mo mooo moooo moo mooo moo mooo mooo m mooooooooo

moo mooooo moo mooooooo. Mooo mooo moooooo moooooo. Mooo mooo mooo mooo

mooooo moooooo m moooooo moo m mooooo. Moo mooo moooooo--mo mooo m

moooo mooooooooo moooo moo moo Mooo mo Mooooo. Moo mooooooo mooo moooooo

hump.
mooo.




Crossing this dusky entry, and on through yon low-arched way--cut

moooooooo moo moooo.




Abominable are the tumblers into which he pours his poison. Though
Mooooooooo moo moo mooooooo mooo moooo mo moooo moo mooooo. Mooooo

A tramping of sea boots was heard in the entry; the door was flung open,
M mooooooo mo moo moooo moo moooo mo moo moooo; moo mooo moo moooo mooo,

and in rolled a wild set of mariners enough. Enveloped in their shaggy
moo mo mooooo m mooo moo mo mooooooo mooooo. Moooooooo mo moooo mooooo

moo mooo moo moo moooo moooo mooo moooooo. Mo mooooo, mooo, mooo mooo

moooooo mooo mo mo moo-mooooo.




The liquor soon mounted into their heads, as it generally does even
Moo mooooo mooo moooooo mooo moooo moooo, mo mo moooooooo mooo mooo

I observed, however, that one of them held somewhat aloof, and though
M mooooooo, moooooo, mooo moo mo mooo mooo mooooooo moooo, moo mooooo

mo moo mooo. Mooo moo mooooooooo mo mo mooo; moo moooo moo moo-mooo

moo. Mo m moo moooooo, moooooo, mo moo mooooo mo moo moooooooo, moo

It was now about nine o'clock, and the room seeming almost
Mo moo moo moooo mooo m'moooo, moo moo mooo moooooo mooooo

mooooooooooooo moooo moooo moooo mooooo, M moooo mo mooooooooooo mooooo

mooo m mooooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo mo mo mooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo

of the seamen.
mo moo mooooo.




No man prefers to sleep two in a bed. In fact, you would a good deal
Mo moo moooooo mo moooo moo mo m moo. Mo mooo, moo moooo m mooo mooo

rather not sleep with your own brother. I don't know how it is, but
mooooo moo moooo mooo mooo moo moooooo. M moo'm mooo moo mo mo, moo

people like to be private when they are sleeping. And when it comes to
mooooo mooo mo mo moooooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo. Moo mooo mo moooo mo

sleeping with an unknown stranger, in a strange inn, in a strange
mooooooo mooo mo moooooo mooooooo, mo m moooooo moo, mo m moooooo

town, and that stranger a harpooneer, then your objections indefinitely
mooo, moo mooo mooooooo m mooooooooo, mooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooooooo

multiply. Nor was there any earthly reason why I as a sailor should
mooooooo. Moo moo moooo moo moooooo mooooo moo M mo m mooooo mooooo

sleep two in a bed, more than anybody else; for sailors no more sleep
moooo moo mo m moo, mooo mooo moooooo mooo; moo moooooo mo mooo moooo

two in a bed at sea, than bachelor Kings do ashore. To be sure they
moo mo m moo mo moo, mooo mooooooo Moooo mo mooooo. Mo mo mooo mooo

all sleep together in one apartment, but you have your own hammock, and
moo moooo mooooooo mo moo moooooooo, moo moo mooo mooo moo moooooo, moo

cover yourself with your own blanket, and sleep in your own skin.
moooo mooooooo mooo mooo moo moooooo, moo moooo mo mooo moo mooo.




The more I pondered over this harpooneer, the more I abominated the
Moo mooo M mooooooo mooo mooo mooooooooo, moo mooo M mooooooooo moo

thought of sleeping with him. It was fair to presume that being a
moooooo mo mooooooo mooo moo. Mo moo mooo mo moooooo mooo moooo m

harpooneer, his linen or woollen, as the case might be, would not be of
mooooooooo, moo moooo mo moooooo, mo moo mooo moooo mo, moooo moo mo mo

the tidiest, certainly none of the finest. I began to twitch all over.
moo moooooo, moooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo. M moooo mo mooooo moo mooo.

Besides, it was getting late, and my decent harpooneer ought to be
Moooooo, mo moo moooooo mooo, moo mo mooooo mooooooooo moooo mo mo

home and going bedwards. Suppose now, he should tumble in upon me at
mooo moo moooo mooooooo. Moooooo moo, mo mooooo mooooo mo mooo mo mo

midnight--how could I tell from what vile hole he had been coming?
mooooooo--moo moooo M mooo mooo mooo mooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo?




"Landlord! I've changed my mind about that harpooneer.--I shan't sleep

with him. I'll try the bench here."
mooo moo. M'mo moo moo moooo mooo."




"Just as you please; I'm sorry I cant spare ye a tablecloth for a
"Mooo mo moo mooooo; M'm moooo M mooo moooo mo m mooooooooo moo m

mattress, and it's a plaguy rough board here"--feeling of the knots and
mooooooo, moo mo'm m mooooo moooo moooo mooo"--moooooo mo moo moooo moo

mo mooooooo moo moooo; moo mooo moo moo mooo mooooooooooo moooo moooooo

the bench, vigorously set to planing away at my bed, the while grinning

like an ape. The shavings flew right and left; till at last the
mooo mo moo. Moo mooooooo mooo moooo moo mooo; mooo mo mooo moo

plane-iron came bump against an indestructible knot. The landlord was
moooo-mooo mooo mooo moooooo mo mooooooooooooo mooo. Moo mooooooo moo

near spraining his wrist, and I told him for heaven's sake to quit--the
mooo moooooooo moo moooo, moo M mooo moo moo mooooo'm mooo mo mooo--moo

moo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo mo, moo M moo moo mooo moo moo moo moooooo

in the world could make eider down of a pine plank. So gathering up the

brown study.
moooo moooo.




I now took the measure of the bench, and found that it was a foot too
M moo mooo moo moooooo mo moo moooo, moo moooo mooo mo moo m mooo moo

short; but that could be mended with a chair. But it was a foot too

The devil fetch that harpooneer, thought I, but stop, couldn't I steal
Moo moooo moooo mooo mooooooooo, moooooo M, moo mooo, mooooo'm M moooo

mooooo mooooooo M moooooooo mo. Moo moo moooo mooo moo mooo moo mooo

mooooooo mo moo moooo, moo moooo mo moooo mo mooo!

mooo mo mooo, moo mooooo'm moooooooooo."

mooo mo mooooo.




Whether that mattress was stuffed with corn-cobs or broken crockery,

mooooo mooo m mooo mooooo moooooo moo mooo mo Moo, mooo M moooo m moooo

mooo moooo moo mooo.




Lord save me, thinks I, that must be the harpooneer, the infernal
Mooo mooo mo, mooooo M, mooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo, moo mooooooo

mooooooo moooooo moooooo. Moo, mo'm mooo mo M moooooo, mo'm m mooooooo

moooooooo; mo'm mooo mo m moooo, moo mooooooooo moo, moo mooo mo mo,

stains of some sort or other. At first I knew not what to make of this;
mooooo mo mooo mooo mo moooo. Mo moooo M mooo moo mooo mo mooo mo mooo;

but soon an inkling of the truth occurred to me. I remembered a story of
moo mooo mo moooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo mo mo. M mooooooooo m moooo mo

a white man--a whaleman too--who, falling among the cannibals, had been
m moooo moo--m mooooooo moo--moo, moooooo moooo moo moooooooo, moo mooo

tattooed by them. I concluded that this harpooneer, in the course of his
mooooooo mo mooo. M moooooooo mooo mooo mooooooooo, mo moo mooooo mo moo

distant voyages, must have met with a similar adventure. And what is it,
moooooo moooooo, mooo mooo moo mooo m moooooo moooooooo. Moo mooo mo mo,

thought I, after all! It's only his outside; a man can be honest in any
moooooo M, moooo moo! Mo'm mooo moo moooooo; m moo moo mo mooooo mo moo

sort of skin. But then, what to make of his unearthly complexion, that
mooo mo mooo. Moo mooo, mooo mo mooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooooo, mooo

part of it, I mean, lying round about, and completely independent of the
mooo mo mo, M mooo, moooo moooo moooo, moo mooooooooo moooooooooo mo moo

squares of tattooing. To be sure, it might be nothing but a good coat of
moooooo mo moooooooo. Mo mo mooo, mo moooo mo moooooo moo m mooo mooo mo

tropical tanning; but I never heard of a hot sun's tanning a white man
mooooooo moooooo; moo M moooo moooo mo m moo moo'm moooooo m moooo moo

into a purplish yellow one. However, I had never been in the South Seas;
mooo m mooooooo mooooo moo. Moooooo, M moo moooo mooo mo moo Moooo Mooo;

and perhaps the sun there produced these extraordinary effects upon the
moo moooooo moo moo moooo mooooooo moooo moooooooooooo moooooo mooo moo

skin. Now, while all these ideas were passing through me like lightning,
mooo. Moo, moooo moo moooo moooo mooo moooooo moooooo mo mooo moooooooo,

this harpooneer never noticed me at all. But, after some difficulty
mooo mooooooooo moooo moooooo mo mo moo. Moo, moooo mooo mooooooooo

having opened his bag, he commenced fumbling in it, and presently pulled
mooooo mooooo moo moo, mo moooooooo mooooooo mo mo, moo moooooooo mooooo

out a sort of tomahawk, and a seal-skin wallet with the hair on. Placing
moo m mooo mo mooooooo, moo m mooo-mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo mo. Moooooo

these on the old chest in the middle of the room, he then took the New
moooo mo moo moo moooo mo moo mooooo mo moo mooo, mo mooo mooo moo Moo

Zealand head--a ghastly thing enough--and crammed it down into the bag.
Moooooo mooo--m moooooo moooo mooooo--moo moooooo mo mooo mooo moo moo.

He now took off his hat--a new beaver hat--when I came nigh singing out
Mo moo mooo moo moo moo--m moo mooooo moo--mooo M mooo mooo moooooo moo

with fresh surprise. There was no hair on his head--none to speak of at
mooo moooo mooooooo. Moooo moo mo mooo mo moo mooo--mooo mo moooo mo mo

least--nothing but a small scalp-knot twisted up on his forehead. His
moooo--moooooo moo m moooo moooo-mooo moooooo mo mo moo mooooooo. Moo

bald purplish head now looked for all the world like a mildewed skull.
mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo moo moo moo moooo mooo m mooooooo moooo.

Had not the stranger stood between me and the door, I would have bolted
Moo moo moo mooooooo moooo moooooo mo moo moo mooo, M moooo mooo mooooo

out of it quicker than ever I bolted a dinner.
moo mo mo moooooo mooo mooo M mooooo m mooooo.




Even as it was, I thought something of slipping out of the window, but
Mooo mo mo moo, M moooooo moooooooo mo mooooooo moo mo moo mooooo, moo

it was the second floor back. I am no coward, but what to make of
mo moo moo mooooo moooo mooo. M mo mo mooooo, moo mooo mo mooo mo

this head-peddling purple rascal altogether passed my comprehension.
mooo mooo-mooooooo mooooo mooooo mooooooooo mooooo mo moooooooooooo.

Ignorance is the parent of fear, and being completely nonplussed and
Moooooooo mo moo mooooo mo mooo, moo moooo mooooooooo mooooooooo moo

confounded about the stranger, I confess I was now as much afraid of him
mooooooooo moooo moo mooooooo, M moooooo M moo moo mo mooo mooooo mo moo

as if it was the devil himself who had thus broken into my room at
mo mo mo moo moo moooo moooooo moo moo mooo mooooo mooo mo mooo mo

the dead of night. In fact, I was so afraid of him that I was not
moo mooo mo moooo. Mo mooo, M moo mo mooooo mo moo mooo M moo moo
