game enough just then to address him, and demand a satisfactory answer
mooo mooooo mooo mooo mo moooooo moo, moo mooooo m mooooooooooo mooooo

concerning what seemed inexplicable in him.
mooooooooo mooo mooooo mooooooooooo mo moo.




Meanwhile, he continued the business of undressing, and at last showed
Moooooooo, mo moooooooo moo mooooooo mo mooooooooo, moo mo mooo mooooo

his chest and arms. As I live, these covered parts of him were checkered
moo moooo moo mooo. Mo M mooo, moooo moooooo moooo mo moo mooo moooooooo

with the same squares as his face; his back, too, was all over the same
mooo moo mooo moooooo mo moo mooo; moo mooo, moo, moo moo mooo moo mooo

dark squares; he seemed to have been in a Thirty Years' War, and just
mooo moooooo; mo mooooo mo mooo mooo mo m Mooooo Moooo' Moo, moo mooo

escaped from it with a sticking-plaster shirt. Still more, his very
moooooo mooo mo mooo m mooooooo-moooooo moooo. Moooo mooo, moo mooo

legs were marked, as if a parcel of dark green frogs were running up
mooo mooo mooooo, mo mo m mooooo mo mooo moooo moooo mooo moooooo mo

the trunks of young palms. It was now quite plain that he must be some
moo mooooo mo moooo moooo. Mo moo moo moooo moooo mooo mo mooo mo mooo

abominable savage or other shipped aboard of a whaleman in the South
mooooooooo mooooo mo moooo moooooo mooooo mo m mooooooo mo moo Moooo

Seas, and so landed in this Christian country. I quaked to think of it.
Mooo, moo mo mooooo mo mooo Moooooooo moooooo. M mooooo mo moooo mo mo.

A peddler of heads too--perhaps the heads of his own brothers. He might
M moooooo mo moooo moo--moooooo moo moooo mo moo moo mooooooo. Mo moooo

take a fancy to mine--heavens! look at that tomahawk!
mooo m moooo mo mooo--moooooo! mooo mo mooo mooooooo!




But there was no time for shuddering, for now the savage went about
Moo moooo moo mo mooo moo mooooooooo, moo moo moo mooooo mooo moooo

something that completely fascinated my attention, and convinced me that
moooooooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooooo mo moooooooo, moo moooooooo mo mooo

he must indeed be a heathen. Going to his heavy grego, or wrapall, or
mo mooo mooooo mo m moooooo. Moooo mo moo moooo moooo, mo moooooo, mo

dreadnaught, which he had previously hung on a chair, he fumbled in the
moooooooooo, moooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo mo m moooo, mo moooooo mo moo

pockets, and produced at length a curious little deformed image with
moooooo, moo mooooooo mo mooooo m moooooo mooooo mooooooo moooo mooo

a hunch on its back, and exactly the colour of a three days' old Congo
m moooo mo moo mooo, moo moooooo moo mooooo mo m moooo mooo' moo Moooo

baby. Remembering the embalmed head, at first I almost thought that
mooo. Moooooooooo moo mooooooo mooo, mo moooo M mooooo moooooo mooo

this black manikin was a real baby preserved in some similar manner. But
mooo moooo moooooo moo m mooo mooo moooooooo mo mooo moooooo mooooo. Moo

seeing that it was not at all limber, and that it glistened a good deal
mooooo mooo mo moo moo mo moo mooooo, moo mooo mo moooooooo m mooo mooo

like polished ebony, I concluded that it must be nothing but a wooden
mooo mooooooo moooo, M moooooooo mooo mo mooo mo moooooo moo m mooooo

idol, which indeed it proved to be. For now the savage goes up to the
mooo, moooo mooooo mo mooooo mo mo. Moo moo moo mooooo mooo mo mo moo

empty fire-place, and removing the papered fire-board, sets up this
moooo mooo-moooo, moo mooooooo moo moooooo mooo-moooo, mooo mo mooo

little hunch-backed image, like a tenpin, between the andirons. The
mooooo moooo-mooooo moooo, mooo m mooooo, moooooo moo mooooooo. Moo

chimney jambs and all the bricks inside were very sooty, so that I
moooooo moooo moo moo moo mooooo mooooo mooo mooo moooo, mo mooo M

thought this fire-place made a very appropriate little shrine or chapel
moooooo mooo mooo-moooo mooo m mooo moooooooooo mooooo mooooo mo mooooo

for his Congo idol.
moo moo Moooo mooo.




I now screwed my eyes hard towards the half hidden image, feeling but
M moo moooooo mo mooo mooo moooooo moo mooo mooooo moooo, moooooo moo

ill at ease meantime--to see what was next to follow. First he takes
moo mo mooo mooooooo--mo moo mooo moo mooo mo mooooo. Moooo mo moooo

about a double handful of shavings out of his grego pocket, and places
moooo m mooooo moooooo mo mooooooo moo mo moo moooo mooooo, moo mooooo

them carefully before the idol; then laying a bit of ship biscuit on
mooo moooooooo mooooo moo mooo; mooo mooooo m moo mo mooo moooooo mo

top and applying the flame from the lamp, he kindled the shavings into
moo moo mooooooo moo moooo mooo moo mooo, mo moooooo moo mooooooo mooo

a sacrificial blaze. Presently, after many hasty snatches into the fire,
m moooooooooo moooo. Moooooooo, moooo mooo moooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo,

and still hastier withdrawals of his fingers (whereby he seemed to be
moo moooo moooooo moooooooooo mo moo moooooo (moooooo mo mooooo mo mo

scorching them badly), he at last succeeded in drawing out the biscuit;
moooooooo mooo moooo), mo mo mooo moooooooo mo moooooo moo moo moooooo;

then blowing off the heat and ashes a little, he made a polite offer of
mooo moooooo moo moo mooo moo moooo m mooooo, mo mooo m mooooo moooo mo

it to the little negro. But the little devil did not seem to fancy such
mo mo moo mooooo moooo. Moo moo mooooo moooo moo moo mooo mo moooo mooo

dry sort of fare at all; he never moved his lips. All these strange
moo mooo mo mooo mo moo; mo moooo moooo moo mooo. Moo moooo moooooo

antics were accompanied by still stranger guttural noises from the
mooooo mooo moooooooooo mo moooo mooooooo mooooooo mooooo mooo moo

devotee, who seemed to be praying in a sing-song or else singing some
moooooo, moo mooooo mo mo moooooo mo m mooo-mooo mo mooo moooooo mooo

pagan psalmody or other, during which his face twitched about in the
moooo mooooooo mo moooo, mooooo moooo moo mooo mooooooo moooo mo moo

most unnatural manner. At last extinguishing the fire, he took the idol
mooo moooooooo mooooo. Mo mooo moooooooooooo moo mooo, mo mooo moo mooo

up very unceremoniously, and bagged it again in his grego pocket as
mo mooo moooooooooooooo, moo mooooo mo moooo mo moo moooo mooooo mo

carelessly as if he were a sportsman bagging a dead woodcock.
mooooooooo mo mo mo mooo m moooooooo moooooo m mooo mooooooo.




All these queer proceedings increased my uncomfortableness, and
Moo moooo moooo moooooooooo moooooooo mo moooooooooooooooo, moo

seeing him now exhibiting strong symptoms of concluding his business
mooooo moo moo mooooooooo mooooo mooooooo mo mooooooooo moo mooooooo

operations, and jumping into bed with me, I thought it was high time,
mooooooooo, moo moooooo mooo moo mooo mo, M moooooo mo moo mooo mooo,

now or never, before the light was put out, to break the spell in which
moo mo moooo, mooooo moo moooo moo moo moo, mo moooo moo moooo mo moooo

I had so long been bound.
M moo mo mooo mooo moooo.




But the interval I spent in deliberating what to say, was a fatal one.
Moo moo mooooooo M moooo mo mooooooooooo mooo mo moo, moo m moooo moo.

Taking up his tomahawk from the table, he examined the head of it for an
Mooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo moo moooo, mo mooooooo moo mooo mo mo moo mo

instant, and then holding it to the light, with his mouth at the handle,
moooooo, moo mooo moooooo mo mo moo moooo, mooo moo moooo mo moo mooooo,

he puffed out great clouds of tobacco smoke. The next moment the light
mo mooooo moo moooo mooooo mo moooooo moooo. Moo mooo mooooo moo moooo

was extinguished, and this wild cannibal, tomahawk between his teeth,
moo mooooooooooo, moo mooo mooo mooooooo, mooooooo moooooo moo moooo,

sprang into bed with me. I sang out, I could not help it now; and giving
mooooo mooo moo mooo mo. M mooo moo, M moooo moo mooo mo moo; moo mooooo

a sudden grunt of astonishment he began feeling me.
m mooooo moooo mo mooooooooooo mo moooo moooooo mo.




Stammering out something, I knew not what, I rolled away from him
Mooooooooo moo moooooooo, M mooo moo mooo, M mooooo mooo mooo moo

against the wall, and then conjured him, whoever or whatever he might
moooooo moo mooo, moo mooo mooooooo moo, moooooo mo mooooooo mo moooo

be, to keep quiet, and let me get up and light the lamp again. But his
mo, mo mooo moooo, moo moo mo moo mo moo moooo moo mooo moooo. Moo moo

guttural responses satisfied me at once that he but ill comprehended my
mooooooo moooooooo moooooooo mo mo mooo mooo mo moo moo mooooooooooo mo

meaning.
moooooo.




"Who-e debel you?"--he at last said--"you no speak-e, dam-me, I kill-e."
"Moo-m moooo moo?"--mo mo mooo mooo--"moo mo moooo-m, moo-mo, M mooo-m."

And so saying the lighted tomahawk began flourishing about me in the
Moo mo mooooo moo moooooo mooooooo moooo moooooooooo moooo mo mo moo

dark.
mooo.




"Landlord, for God's sake, Peter Coffin!" shouted I. "Landlord! Watch!
"Mooooooo, moo Moo'm mooo, Moooo Mooooo!" moooooo M. "Mooooooo! Moooo!

Coffin! Angels! save me!"
Mooooo! Mooooo! mooo mo!"




"Speak-e! tell-ee me who-ee be, or dam-me, I kill-e!" again growled the
"Moooo-m! mooo-mo mo moo-mo mo, mo moo-mo, M mooo-m!" moooo moooooo moo

cannibal, while his horrid flourishings of the tomahawk scattered the
mooooooo, moooo moo mooooo mooooooooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo moo

hot tobacco ashes about me till I thought my linen would get on fire.
moo moooooo moooo moooo mo mooo M moooooo mo moooo moooo moo mo mooo.

But thank heaven, at that moment the landlord came into the room light
Moo moooo mooooo, mo mooo mooooo moo mooooooo mooo mooo moo mooo moooo

in hand, and leaping from the bed I ran up to him.
mo mooo, moo moooooo mooo moo moo M moo mo mo moo.




"Don't be afraid now," said he, grinning again, "Queequeg here wouldn't
"Moo'm mo mooooo moo," mooo mo, mooooooo moooo, "Mooooooo mooo mooooo'm

harm a hair of your head."
mooo m mooo mo mooo mooo."




"Stop your grinning," shouted I, "and why didn't you tell me that that
"Mooo mooo mooooooo," moooooo M, "moo moo mooo'm moo mooo mo mooo mooo

infernal harpooneer was a cannibal?"
mooooooo mooooooooo moo m mooooooo?"




"I thought ye know'd it;--didn't I tell ye, he was a peddlin' heads
"M moooooo mo mooo'm mo;--mooo'm M mooo mo, mo moo m moooooo' moooo

around town?--but turn flukes again and go to sleep. Queequeg, look
mooooo mooo?--moo mooo mooooo moooo moo mo mo moooo. Mooooooo, mooo

here--you sabbee me, I sabbee--you this man sleepe you--you sabbee?"
mooo--moo mooooo mo, M mooooo--moo mooo moo mooooo moo--moo mooooo?"




"Me sabbee plenty"--grunted Queequeg, puffing away at his pipe and
"Mo mooooo mooooo"--moooooo Mooooooo, moooooo mooo mo moo mooo moo

sitting up in bed.
moooooo mo mo moo.




"You gettee in," he added, motioning to me with his tomahawk, and
"Moo mooooo mo," mo moooo, moooooooo mo mo mooo moo mooooooo, moo

throwing the clothes to one side. He really did this in not only a civil
mooooooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo. Mo mooooo moo mooo mo moo mooo m moooo

but a really kind and charitable way. I stood looking at him a moment.
moo m mooooo mooo moo mooooooooo moo. M moooo moooooo mo moo m mooooo.

For all his tattooings he was on the whole a clean, comely looking
Moo moo moo mooooooooo mo moo mo moo moooo m moooo, mooooo moooooo

cannibal. What's all this fuss I have been making about, thought I to
mooooooo. Mooo'm moo mooo mooo M mooo mooo mooooo moooo, moooooo M mo

myself--the man's a human being just as I am: he has just as much reason
mooooo--moo moo'm m moooo moooo mooo mo M mo: mo moo mooo mo mooo mooooo

to fear me, as I have to be afraid of him. Better sleep with a sober
mo mooo mo, mo M mooo mo mo mooooo mo moo. Mooooo moooo mooo m moooo

cannibal than a drunken Christian.
mooooooo mooo m moooooo Moooooooo.




"Landlord," said I, "tell him to stash his tomahawk there, or pipe, or
"Mooooooo," mooo M, "mooo moo mo moooo moo mooooooo moooo, mo mooo, mo

whatever you call it; tell him to stop smoking, in short, and I will
mooooooo moo mooo mo; mooo moo mo mooo moooooo, mo moooo, moo M mooo

turn in with him. But I don't fancy having a man smoking in bed with me.
mooo mo mooo moo. Moo M moo'm moooo mooooo m moo moooooo mo moo mooo mo.

It's dangerous. Besides, I ain't insured."
Mo'm moooooooo. Moooooo, M moo'm moooooo."




This being told to Queequeg, he at once complied, and again politely
Mooo moooo mooo mo Mooooooo, mo mo mooo mooooooo, moo moooo mooooooo

motioned me to get into bed--rolling over to one side as much as to
mooooooo mo mo moo mooo moo--moooooo mooo mo moo mooo mo mooo mo mo

say--"I won't touch a leg of ye."
moo--"M moo'm moooo m moo mo mo."




"Good night, landlord," said I, "you may go."
"Mooo moooo, mooooooo," mooo M, "moo moo mo."




I turned in, and never slept better in my life.
M mooooo mo, moo moooo moooo mooooo mo mo mooo.










CHAPTER 4. The Counterpane.
MOOOOOO m. Moo Moooooooooo.







Upon waking next morning about daylight, I found Queequeg's arm thrown
Mooo mooooo mooo moooooo moooo mooooooo, M moooo Mooooooo'm moo mooooo

over me in the most loving and affectionate manner. You had almost
mooo mo mo moo mooo mooooo moo mooooooooooo mooooo. Moo moo mooooo

thought I had been his wife. The counterpane was of patchwork, full of
moooooo M moo mooo moo mooo. Moo moooooooooo moo mo moooooooo, mooo mo

odd little parti-coloured squares and triangles; and this arm of his
moo mooooo moooo-mooooooo moooooo moo moooooooo; moo mooo moo mo moo

tattooed all over with an interminable Cretan labyrinth of a figure,
mooooooo moo mooo mooo mo mooooooooooo Mooooo moooooooo mo m mooooo,

no two parts of which were of one precise shade--owing I suppose to
mo moo moooo mo moooo mooo mo moo moooooo moooo--moooo M moooooo mo

his keeping his arm at sea unmethodically in sun and shade, his shirt
moo moooooo moo moo mo moo mooooooooooooo mo moo moo moooo, moo moooo

sleeves irregularly rolled up at various times--this same arm of his, I
moooooo moooooooooo mooooo mo mo moooooo moooo--mooo mooo moo mo moo, M

say, looked for all the world like a strip of that same patchwork quilt.
moo, mooooo moo moo moo moooo mooo m moooo mo mooo mooo moooooooo moooo.

Indeed, partly lying on it as the arm did when I first awoke, I could
Mooooo, mooooo moooo mo mo mo moo moo moo mooo M moooo moooo, M moooo

hardly tell it from the quilt, they so blended their hues together; and
mooooo mooo mo mooo moo moooo, mooo mo moooooo moooo mooo mooooooo; moo

it was only by the sense of weight and pressure that I could tell that
mo moo mooo mo moo moooo mo mooooo moo mooooooo mooo M moooo mooo mooo

Queequeg was hugging me.
Mooooooo moo moooooo mo.




My sensations were strange. Let me try to explain them. When I was a
Mo mooooooooo mooo moooooo. Moo mo moo mo moooooo mooo. Mooo M moo m

child, I well remember a somewhat similar circumstance that befell me;
moooo, M mooo mooooooo m mooooooo moooooo mooooooooooo mooo mooooo mo;

whether it was a reality or a dream, I never could entirely settle.
moooooo mo moo m moooooo mo m moooo, M moooo moooo mooooooo mooooo.

The circumstance was this. I had been cutting up some caper or other--I
Moo mooooooooooo moo mooo. M moo mooo moooooo mo mooo moooo mo moooo--M

think it was trying to crawl up the chimney, as I had seen a little
moooo mo moo mooooo mo moooo mo moo moooooo, mo M moo mooo m mooooo

sweep do a few days previous; and my stepmother who, somehow or other,
moooo mo m moo mooo mooooooo; moo mo mooooooooo moo, moooooo mo moooo,

was all the time whipping me, or sending me to bed supperless,--my
moo moo moo mooo mooooooo mo, mo moooooo mo mo moo mooooooooo,--mo

mother dragged me by the legs out of the chimney and packed me off to
mooooo moooooo mo mo moo mooo moo mo moo moooooo moo mooooo mo moo mo

bed, though it was only two o'clock in the afternoon of the 21st June,
moo, mooooo mo moo mooo moo m'moooo mo moo moooooooo mo moo mooo Mooo,

the longest day in the year in our hemisphere. I felt dreadfully. But
moo moooooo moo mo moo mooo mo moo mooooooooo. M mooo mooooooooo. Moo

there was no help for it, so up stairs I went to my little room in the
moooo moo mo mooo moo mo, mo mo mooooo M mooo mo mo mooooo mooo mo moo

third floor, undressed myself as slowly as possible so as to kill time,
moooo moooo, moooooooo mooooo mo mooooo mo mooooooo mo mo mo mooo mooo,

and with a bitter sigh got between the sheets.
moo mooo m mooooo mooo moo moooooo moo mooooo.




I lay there dismally calculating that sixteen entire hours must elapse
M moo moooo mooooooo moooooooooo mooo moooooo mooooo moooo mooo mooooo

before I could hope for a resurrection. Sixteen hours in bed! the
mooooo M moooo mooo moo m mooooooooooo. Moooooo moooo mo moo! moo

small of my back ached to think of it. And it was so light too; the
moooo mo mo mooo moooo mo moooo mo mo. Moo mo moo mo moooo moo; moo

sun shining in at the window, and a great rattling of coaches in the
moo moooooo mo mo moo mooooo, moo m moooo mooooooo mo moooooo mo moo

streets, and the sound of gay voices all over the house. I felt worse
moooooo, moo moo moooo mo moo mooooo moo mooo moo moooo. M mooo moooo

and worse--at last I got up, dressed, and softly going down in my
moo moooo--mo mooo M moo mo, moooooo, moo mooooo moooo mooo mo mo

stockinged feet, sought out my stepmother, and suddenly threw myself
mooooooooo mooo, mooooo moo mo mooooooooo, moo mooooooo moooo mooooo

at her feet, beseeching her as a particular favour to give me a good
mo moo mooo, mooooooooo moo mo m mooooooooo mooooo mo mooo mo m mooo

slippering for my misbehaviour; anything indeed but condemning me to lie
mooooooooo moo mo mooooooooooo; mooooooo mooooo moo mooooooooo mo mo moo

abed such an unendurable length of time. But she was the best and most
mooo mooo mo moooooooooo mooooo mo mooo. Moo moo moo moo mooo moo mooo

conscientious of stepmothers, and back I had to go to my room. For
moooooooooooo mo moooooooooo, moo mooo M moo mo mo mo mo mooo. Moo

several hours I lay there broad awake, feeling a great deal worse than I
moooooo moooo M moo moooo moooo moooo, moooooo m moooo mooo moooo mooo M

have ever done since, even from the greatest subsequent misfortunes. At
mooo mooo mooo moooo, mooo mooo moo mooooooo mooooooooo moooooooooo. Mo

last I must have fallen into a troubled nightmare of a doze; and slowly
mooo M mooo mooo mooooo mooo m mooooooo moooooooo mo m mooo; moo mooooo

waking from it--half steeped in dreams--I opened my eyes, and the before
mooooo mooo mo--mooo moooooo mo mooooo--M mooooo mo mooo, moo moo mooooo

sun-lit room was now wrapped in outer darkness. Instantly I felt a shock
moo-moo mooo moo moo moooooo mo moooo mooooooo. Moooooooo M mooo m moooo

running through all my frame; nothing was to be seen, and nothing was
moooooo moooooo moo mo moooo; moooooo moo mo mo mooo, moo moooooo moo

to be heard; but a supernatural hand seemed placed in mine. My arm hung
mo mo moooo; moo m mooooooooooo mooo mooooo mooooo mo mooo. Mo moo mooo

over the counterpane, and the nameless, unimaginable, silent form
mooo moo moooooooooo, moo moo mooooooo, mooooooooooo, mooooo mooo

or phantom, to which the hand belonged, seemed closely seated by my
mo moooooo, mo moooo moo mooo mooooooo, mooooo moooooo mooooo mo mo

bed-side. For what seemed ages piled on ages, I lay there, frozen with
moo-mooo. Moo mooo mooooo mooo moooo mo mooo, M moo moooo, mooooo mooo

the most awful fears, not daring to drag away my hand; yet ever thinking
moo mooo moooo moooo, moo mooooo mo mooo mooo mo mooo; moo mooo mooooooo

that if I could but stir it one single inch, the horrid spell would be
mooo mo M moooo moo mooo mo moo mooooo mooo, moo mooooo moooo moooo mo

broken. I knew not how this consciousness at last glided away from me;
mooooo. M mooo moo moo mooo moooooooooooo mo mooo mooooo mooo mooo mo;

but waking in the morning, I shudderingly remembered it all, and for
moo mooooo mo moo moooooo, M mooooooooooo mooooooooo mo moo, moo moo

days and weeks and months afterwards I lost myself in confounding
mooo moo moooo moo mooooo mooooooooo M mooo mooooo mo moooooooooo

attempts to explain the mystery. Nay, to this very hour, I often puzzle
mooooooo mo moooooo moo moooooo. Moo, mo mooo mooo mooo, M moooo mooooo

myself with it.
mooooo mooo mo.




Now, take away the awful fear, and my sensations at feeling the
Moo, mooo mooo moo moooo mooo, moo mo mooooooooo mo moooooo moo

supernatural hand in mine were very similar, in their strangeness, to
mooooooooooo mooo mo mooo mooo mooo moooooo, mo moooo moooooooooo, mo

those which I experienced on waking up and seeing Queequeg's pagan
moooo moooo M moooooooooo mo mooooo mo moo mooooo Mooooooo'm moooo

arm thrown round me. But at length all the past night's events soberly
moo mooooo moooo mo. Moo mo mooooo moo moo mooo moooo'm mooooo moooooo

recurred, one by one, in fixed reality, and then I lay only alive to
mooooooo, moo mo moo, mo moooo moooooo, moo mooo M moo mooo moooo mo

the comical predicament. For though I tried to move his arm--unlock his
moo moooooo moooooooooo. Moo mooooo M moooo mo mooo moo moo--mooooo moo

bridegroom clasp--yet, sleeping as he was, he still hugged me tightly,
mooooooooo moooo--moo, mooooooo mo mo moo, mo moooo mooooo mo moooooo,

as though naught but death should part us twain. I now strove to rouse
mo mooooo mooooo moo moooo mooooo mooo mo moooo. M moo mooooo mo moooo

him--"Queequeg!"--but his only answer was a snore. I then rolled over,
moo--"Mooooooo!"--moo moo mooo mooooo moo m moooo. M mooo mooooo mooo,

my neck feeling as if it were in a horse-collar; and suddenly felt a
mo mooo moooooo mo mo mo mooo mo m moooo-mooooo; moo mooooooo mooo m

slight scratch. Throwing aside the counterpane, there lay the tomahawk
mooooo moooooo. Mooooooo moooo moo moooooooooo, moooo moo moo mooooooo

sleeping by the savage's side, as if it were a hatchet-faced baby. A
mooooooo mo moo mooooo'm mooo, mo mo mo mooo m moooooo-moooo mooo. M

pretty pickle, truly, thought I; abed here in a strange house in the
mooooo mooooo, moooo, moooooo M; mooo mooo mo m moooooo moooo mo moo

broad day, with a cannibal and a tomahawk! "Queequeg!--in the name of
moooo moo, mooo m mooooooo moo m mooooooo! "Mooooooo!--mo moo mooo mo

goodness, Queequeg, wake!" At length, by dint of much wriggling, and
mooooooo, Mooooooo, mooo!" Mo mooooo, mo mooo mo mooo moooooooo, moo

loud and incessant expostulations upon the unbecomingness of his
mooo moo moooooooo mooooooooooooo mooo moo mooooooooooooo mo moo

hugging a fellow male in that matrimonial sort of style, I succeeded in
moooooo m mooooo mooo mo mooo moooooooooo mooo mo moooo, M moooooooo mo

extracting a grunt; and presently, he drew back his arm, shook himself
mooooooooo m moooo; moo moooooooo, mo mooo mooo moo moo, moooo moooooo

all over like a Newfoundland dog just from the water, and sat up in bed,
moo mooo mooo m Mooooooooooo moo mooo mooo moo moooo, moo moo mo mo moo,

stiff as a pike-staff, looking at me, and rubbing his eyes as if he
moooo mo m mooo-moooo, moooooo mo mo, moo moooooo moo mooo mo mo mo

did not altogether remember how I came to be there, though a dim
moo moo mooooooooo mooooooo moo M mooo mo mo moooo, mooooo m moo

consciousness of knowing something about me seemed slowly dawning over
moooooooooooo mo moooooo moooooooo moooo mo mooooo mooooo moooooo mooo

him. Meanwhile, I lay quietly eyeing him, having no serious misgivings
moo. Moooooooo, M moo moooooo mooooo moo, mooooo mo moooooo mooooooooo

now, and bent upon narrowly observing so curious a creature. When, at
moo, moo mooo mooo mooooooo moooooooo mo moooooo m mooooooo. Mooo, mo

last, his mind seemed made up touching the character of his bedfellow,
mooo, moo mooo mooooo mooo mo mooooooo moo moooooooo mo moo moooooooo,

and he became, as it were, reconciled to the fact; he jumped out upon
moo mo mooooo, mo mo mooo, mooooooooo mo moo mooo; mo mooooo moo mooo

the floor, and by certain signs and sounds gave me to understand that,
moo moooo, moo mo moooooo moooo moo mooooo mooo mo mo mooooooooo mooo,

if it pleased me, he would dress first and then leave me to dress
mo mo moooooo mo, mo moooo moooo moooo moo mooo moooo mo mo moooo

afterwards, leaving the whole apartment to myself. Thinks I, Queequeg,
mooooooooo, moooooo moo moooo moooooooo mo mooooo. Mooooo M, Mooooooo,

under the circumstances, this is a very civilized overture; but, the
moooo moo moooooooooooo, mooo mo m mooo moooooooo mooooooo; moo, moo

truth is, these savages have an innate sense of delicacy, say what
moooo mo, moooo moooooo mooo mo mooooo moooo mo mooooooo, moo mooo

you will; it is marvellous how essentially polite they are. I pay this
moo mooo; mo mo mooooooooo moo moooooooooo mooooo mooo moo. M moo mooo

particular compliment to Queequeg, because he treated me with so much
mooooooooo mooooooooo mo Mooooooo, moooooo mo moooooo mo mooo mo mooo

civility and consideration, while I was guilty of great rudeness;
mooooooo moo moooooooooooo, moooo M moo mooooo mo moooo mooooooo;

staring at him from the bed, and watching all his toilette motions; for
moooooo mo moo mooo moo moo, moo mooooooo moo moo mooooooo moooooo; moo

the time my curiosity getting the better of my breeding. Nevertheless,
moo mooo mo moooooooo moooooo moo mooooo mo mo mooooooo. Mooooooooooo,

a man like Queequeg you don't see every day, he and his ways were well
m moo mooo Mooooooo moo moo'm moo moooo moo, mo moo moo mooo mooo mooo

worth unusual regarding.
moooo moooooo moooooooo.




He commenced dressing at top by donning his beaver hat, a very tall one,
Mo moooooooo mooooooo mo moo mo moooooo moo mooooo moo, m mooo mooo moo,

by the by, and then--still minus his trowsers--he hunted up his boots.
mo moo mo, moo mooo--moooo moooo moo mooooooo--mo mooooo mo moo moooo.

What under the heavens he did it for, I cannot tell, but his next
Mooo moooo moo moooooo mo moo mo moo, M mooooo mooo, moo moo mooo

movement was to crush himself--boots in hand, and hat on--under the bed;
mooooooo moo mo moooo moooooo--moooo mo mooo, moo moo mo--moooo moo moo;

when, from sundry violent gaspings and strainings, I inferred he was
mooo, mooo mooooo moooooo mooooooo moo mooooooooo, M mooooooo mo moo

hard at work booting himself; though by no law of propriety that I ever
mooo mo mooo moooooo moooooo; mooooo mo mo moo mo moooooooo mooo M mooo

heard of, is any man required to be private when putting on his
moooo mo, mo moo moo mooooooo mo mo moooooo mooo moooooo mo moo

boots. But Queequeg, do you see, was a creature in the transition
moooo. Moo Mooooooo, mo moo moo, moo m mooooooo mo moo mooooooooo

stage--neither caterpillar nor butterfly. He was just enough civilized
moooo--moooooo moooooooooo moo moooooooo. Mo moo mooo mooooo moooooooo

to show off his outlandishness in the strangest possible manners. His
mo mooo moo moo mooooooooooooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooo moooooo. Moo

education was not yet completed. He was an undergraduate. If he had not
moooooooo moo moo moo moooooooo. Mo moo mo moooooooooooo. Mo mo moo moo

been a small degree civilized, he very probably would not have troubled
mooo m moooo mooooo moooooooo, mo mooo mooooooo moooo moo mooo mooooooo

himself with boots at all; but then, if he had not been still a savage,
moooooo mooo moooo mo moo; moo mooo, mo mo moo moo mooo moooo m mooooo,

he never would have dreamt of getting under the bed to put them on. At
mo moooo moooo mooo mooooo mo moooooo moooo moo moo mo moo mooo mo. Mo

last, he emerged with his hat very much dented and crushed down over his
mooo, mo moooooo mooo moo moo mooo mooo mooooo moo moooooo mooo mooo moo

eyes, and began creaking and limping about the room, as if, not
mooo, moo moooo mooooooo moo moooooo moooo moo mooo, mo mo, moo

being much accustomed to boots, his pair of damp, wrinkled cowhide
moooo mooo mooooooooo mo moooo, moo mooo mo mooo, mooooooo moooooo

ones--probably not made to order either--rather pinched and tormented
mooo--mooooooo moo mooo mo moooo mooooo--mooooo moooooo moo moooooooo

him at the first go off of a bitter cold morning.
moo mo moo moooo mo moo mo m mooooo mooo moooooo.




Seeing, now, that there were no curtains to the window, and that the
Mooooo, moo, mooo moooo mooo mo mooooooo mo moo mooooo, moo mooo moo

street being very narrow, the house opposite commanded a plain view
mooooo moooo mooo mooooo, moo moooo mooooooo moooooooo m moooo mooo

into the room, and observing more and more the indecorous figure that
mooo moo mooo, moo moooooooo mooo moo mooo moo mooooooooo mooooo mooo

Queequeg made, staving about with little else but his hat and boots on;
Mooooooo mooo, moooooo moooo mooo mooooo mooo moo moo moo moo moooo mo;

I begged him as well as I could, to accelerate his toilet somewhat,
M mooooo moo mo mooo mo M moooo, mo mooooooooo moo mooooo mooooooo,

and particularly to get into his pantaloons as soon as possible. He
moo mooooooooooo mo moo mooo moo mooooooooo mo mooo mo mooooooo. Mo

complied, and then proceeded to wash himself. At that time in the
mooooooo, moo mooo moooooooo mo mooo moooooo. Mo mooo mooo mo moo

morning any Christian would have washed his face; but Queequeg, to
moooooo moo Moooooooo moooo mooo mooooo moo mooo; moo Mooooooo, mo

my amazement, contented himself with restricting his ablutions to his
mo moooooooo, moooooooo moooooo mooo moooooooooo moo moooooooo mo moo

chest, arms, and hands. He then donned his waistcoat, and taking up a
moooo, mooo, moo moooo. Mo mooo mooooo moo moooooooo, moo mooooo mo m

piece of hard soap on the wash-stand centre table, dipped it into water
moooo mo mooo mooo mo moo mooo-moooo mooooo moooo, mooooo mo mooo moooo

and commenced lathering his face. I was watching to see where he kept
moo moooooooo moooooooo moo mooo. M moo mooooooo mo moo moooo mo mooo

his razor, when lo and behold, he takes the harpoon from the bed corner,
moo moooo, mooo mo moo mooooo, mo moooo moo moooooo mooo moo moo mooooo,

slips out the long wooden stock, unsheathes the head, whets it a little
moooo moo moo mooo mooooo moooo, mooooooooo moo mooo, moooo mo m mooooo

on his boot, and striding up to the bit of mirror against the wall,
mo moo mooo, moo mooooooo mo mo moo moo mo mooooo moooooo moo mooo,

begins a vigorous scraping, or rather harpooning of his cheeks. Thinks
mooooo m mooooooo mooooooo, mo mooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo. Mooooo

I, Queequeg, this is using Rogers's best cutlery with a vengeance.
M, Mooooooo, mooo mo moooo Mooooo'm mooo moooooo mooo m moooooooo.

Afterwards I wondered the less at this operation when I came to know of
Mooooooooo M mooooooo moo mooo mo mooo moooooooo mooo M mooo mo mooo mo

what fine steel the head of a harpoon is made, and how exceedingly sharp
mooo mooo moooo moo mooo mo m moooooo mo mooo, moo moo moooooooooo moooo

the long straight edges are always kept.
moo mooo mooooooo moooo moo mooooo mooo.




The rest of his toilet was soon achieved, and he proudly marched out of
Moo mooo mo moo mooooo moo mooo mooooooo, moo mo moooooo moooooo moo mo

the room, wrapped up in his great pilot monkey jacket, and sporting his
moo mooo, moooooo mo mo moo moooo moooo mooooo mooooo, moo mooooooo moo

harpoon like a marshal's baton.
moooooo mooo m moooooo'm moooo.










CHAPTER 5. Breakfast.
MOOOOOO m. Moooooooo.







I quickly followed suit, and descending into the bar-room accosted the
M moooooo mooooooo mooo, moo mooooooooo mooo moo moo-mooo mooooooo moo

grinning landlord very pleasantly. I cherished no malice towards him,
mooooooo mooooooo mooo mooooooooo. M moooooooo mo mooooo moooooo moo,

though he had been skylarking with me not a little in the matter of my
mooooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo mooo mo moo m mooooo mo moo mooooo mo mo

bedfellow.
moooooooo.




However, a good laugh is a mighty good thing, and rather too scarce a
Moooooo, m mooo moooo mo m mooooo mooo moooo, moo mooooo moo mooooo m

good thing; the more's the pity. So, if any one man, in his own
mooo moooo; moo mooo'm moo mooo. Mo, mo moo moo moo, mo moo moo

proper person, afford stuff for a good joke to anybody, let him not be
mooooo mooooo, mooooo moooo moo m mooo mooo mo moooooo, moo moo moo mo

backward, but let him cheerfully allow himself to spend and be spent in
mooooooo, moo moo moo mooooooooo moooo moooooo mo moooo moo mo moooo mo

that way. And the man that has anything bountifully laughable about him,
mooo moo. Moo moo moo mooo moo mooooooo moooooooooo moooooooo moooo moo,

be sure there is more in that man than you perhaps think for.
mo mooo moooo mo mooo mo mooo moo mooo moo moooooo moooo moo.




The bar-room was now full of the boarders who had been dropping in the
Moo moo-mooo moo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo moo moo mooo mooooooo mo moo

night previous, and whom I had not as yet had a good look at. They were
moooo mooooooo, moo mooo M moo moo mo moo moo m mooo mooo mo. Mooo mooo

nearly all whalemen; chief mates, and second mates, and third mates, and
mooooo moo mooooooo; moooo moooo, moo mooooo moooo, moo moooo moooo, moo

sea carpenters, and sea coopers, and sea blacksmiths, and harpooneers,
moo mooooooooo, moo moo moooooo, moo moo moooooooooo, moo moooooooooo,

and ship keepers; a brown and brawny company, with bosky beards; an
moo mooo moooooo; m moooo moo mooooo moooooo, mooo moooo mooooo; mo

unshorn, shaggy set, all wearing monkey jackets for morning gowns.
moooooo, mooooo moo, moo moooooo mooooo moooooo moo moooooo moooo.




You could pretty plainly tell how long each one had been ashore. This
Moo moooo mooooo moooooo mooo moo mooo mooo moo moo mooo mooooo. Mooo

young fellow's healthy cheek is like a sun-toasted pear in hue, and
moooo mooooo'm moooooo moooo mo mooo m moo-moooooo mooo mo moo, moo

would seem to smell almost as musky; he cannot have been three days
moooo mooo mo moooo mooooo mo moooo; mo mooooo mooo mooo moooo mooo

landed from his Indian voyage. That man next him looks a few shades
mooooo mooo moo Mooooo mooooo. Mooo moo mooo moo moooo m moo mooooo

lighter; you might say a touch of satin wood is in him. In the
moooooo; moo moooo moo m moooo mo moooo mooo mo mo moo. Mo moo

complexion of a third still lingers a tropic tawn, but slightly bleached
mooooooooo mo m moooo moooo moooooo m mooooo mooo, moo mooooooo mooooooo

withal; HE doubtless has tarried whole weeks ashore. But who could show
mooooo; MO moooooooo moo moooooo moooo moooo mooooo. Moo moo moooo mooo

a cheek like Queequeg? which, barred with various tints, seemed like the
m moooo mooo Mooooooo? moooo, mooooo mooo moooooo moooo, mooooo mooo moo

Andes' western slope, to show forth in one array, contrasting climates,
Moooo' moooooo moooo, mo mooo moooo mo moo moooo, moooooooooo mooooooo,

zone by zone.
mooo mo mooo.




"Grub, ho!" now cried the landlord, flinging open a door, and in we went
"Mooo, mo!" moo moooo moo mooooooo, mooooooo mooo m mooo, moo mo mo mooo

to breakfast.
mo moooooooo.




They say that men who have seen the world, thereby become quite at ease
Mooo moo mooo moo moo mooo mooo moo moooo, moooooo mooooo moooo mo mooo

in manner, quite self-possessed in company. Not always, though: Ledyard,
mo mooooo, moooo mooo-moooooooo mo moooooo. Moo mooooo, mooooo: Moooooo,

the great New England traveller, and Mungo Park, the Scotch one; of all
moo moooo Moo Moooooo moooooooo, moo Moooo Mooo, moo Mooooo moo; mo moo

men, they possessed the least assurance in the parlor. But perhaps the
moo, mooo moooooooo moo moooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo. Moo moooooo moo

mere crossing of Siberia in a sledge drawn by dogs as Ledyard did, or
mooo mooooooo mo Moooooo mo m mooooo moooo mo mooo mo Moooooo moo, mo

the taking a long solitary walk on an empty stomach, in the negro heart
moo mooooo m mooo mooooooo mooo mo mo moooo moooooo, mo moo moooo moooo

of Africa, which was the sum of poor Mungo's performances--this kind of
mo Mooooo, moooo moo moo moo mo mooo Moooo'm mooooooooooo--mooo mooo mo

travel, I say, may not be the very best mode of attaining a high social
mooooo, M moo, moo moo mo moo mooo mooo mooo mo moooooooo m mooo mooooo

polish. Still, for the most part, that sort of thing is to be had
mooooo. Moooo, moo moo mooo mooo, mooo mooo mo moooo mo mo mo moo

anywhere.
mooooooo.




These reflections just here are occasioned by the circumstance that
Moooo moooooooooo mooo mooo moo mooooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo mooo

after we were all seated at the table, and I was preparing to hear some
moooo mo mooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo, moo M moo moooooooo mo mooo mooo

good stories about whaling; to my no small surprise, nearly every
mooo moooooo moooo moooooo; mo mo mo moooo mooooooo, mooooo moooo

man maintained a profound silence. And not only that, but they looked
moo mooooooooo m mooooooo moooooo. Moo moo mooo mooo, moo mooo mooooo

embarrassed. Yes, here were a set of sea-dogs, many of whom without the
moooooooooo. Moo, mooo mooo m moo mo moo-mooo, mooo mo mooo moooooo moo

slightest bashfulness had boarded great whales on the high seas--entire
moooooooo moooooooooo moo moooooo moooo mooooo mo moo mooo mooo--mooooo

strangers to them--and duelled them dead without winking; and yet, here
moooooooo mo mooo--moo moooooo mooo mooo moooooo moooooo; moo moo, mooo

they sat at a social breakfast table--all of the same calling, all of
mooo moo mo m mooooo moooooooo moooo--moo mo moo mooo moooooo, moo mo

kindred tastes--looking round as sheepishly at each other as though they
moooooo mooooo--moooooo moooo mo mooooooooo mo mooo moooo mo mooooo mooo

had never been out of sight of some sheepfold among the Green Mountains.
moo moooo mooo moo mo moooo mo mooo moooooooo moooo moo Moooo Moooooooo.

A curious sight; these bashful bears, these timid warrior whalemen!
M moooooo moooo; moooo moooooo moooo, moooo moooo moooooo mooooooo!




But as for Queequeg--why, Queequeg sat there among them--at the head of
Moo mo moo Mooooooo--moo, Mooooooo moo moooo moooo mooo--mo moo mooo mo

the table, too, it so chanced; as cool as an icicle. To be sure I cannot
moo moooo, moo, mo mo moooooo; mo mooo mo mo mooooo. Mo mo mooo M mooooo

say much for his breeding. His greatest admirer could not have cordially
moo mooo moo moo mooooooo. Moo mooooooo moooooo moooo moo mooo moooooooo

justified his bringing his harpoon into breakfast with him, and using it
moooooooo moo mooooooo moo moooooo mooo moooooooo mooo moo, moo moooo mo

there without ceremony; reaching over the table with it, to the imminent
moooo moooooo mooooooo; mooooooo mooo moo moooo mooo mo, mo moo mooooooo

jeopardy of many heads, and grappling the beefsteaks towards him. But
mooooooo mo mooo moooo, moo moooooooo moo mooooooooo moooooo moo. Moo

THAT was certainly very coolly done by him, and every one knows that in
MOOO moo moooooooo mooo mooooo mooo mo moo, moo moooo moo moooo mooo mo

most people's estimation, to do anything coolly is to do it genteelly.
mooo mooooo'm mooooooooo, mo mo mooooooo mooooo mo mo mo mo moooooooo.




We will not speak of all Queequeg's peculiarities here; how he eschewed
Mo mooo moo moooo mo moo Mooooooo'm moooooooooooo mooo; moo mo mooooooo

coffee and hot rolls, and applied his undivided attention to beefsteaks,
mooooo moo moo moooo, moo moooooo moo moooooooo moooooooo mo mooooooooo,

done rare. Enough, that when breakfast was over he withdrew like the
mooo mooo. Mooooo, mooo mooo moooooooo moo mooo mo mooooooo mooo moo

rest into the public room, lighted his tomahawk-pipe, and was sitting
mooo mooo moo mooooo mooo, moooooo moo mooooooo-mooo, moo moo moooooo

there quietly digesting and smoking with his inseparable hat on, when I
moooo moooooo moooooooo moo moooooo mooo moo moooooooooo moo mo, mooo M

sallied out for a stroll.
moooooo moo moo m mooooo.










CHAPTER 6. The Street.
MOOOOOO m. Moo Mooooo.







If I had been astonished at first catching a glimpse of so outlandish
Mo M moo mooo mooooooooo mo moooo mooooooo m moooooo mo mo mooooooooo

an individual as Queequeg circulating among the polite society of a
mo mooooooooo mo Mooooooo moooooooooo moooo moo mooooo moooooo mo m

civilized town, that astonishment soon departed upon taking my first
moooooooo mooo, mooo mooooooooooo mooo mooooooo mooo mooooo mo moooo

daylight stroll through the streets of New Bedford.
mooooooo mooooo moooooo moo moooooo mo Moo Moooooo.




In thoroughfares nigh the docks, any considerable seaport will
Mo moooooooooooo mooo moo moooo, moo mooooooooooo moooooo mooo

frequently offer to view the queerest looking nondescripts from foreign
mooooooooo moooo mo mooo moo mooooooo moooooo mooooooooooo mooo moooooo

parts. Even in Broadway and Chestnut streets, Mediterranean mariners
moooo. Mooo mo Mooooooo moo Mooooooo moooooo, Moooooooooooo mooooooo

will sometimes jostle the affrighted ladies. Regent Street is not
mooo moooooooo mooooo moo mooooooooo mooooo. Mooooo Mooooo mo moo

unknown to Lascars and Malays; and at Bombay, in the Apollo Green, live
moooooo mo Moooooo moo Mooooo; moo mo Mooooo, mo moo Mooooo Moooo, mooo

Yankees have often scared the natives. But New Bedford beats all Water
Moooooo mooo moooo mooooo moo moooooo. Moo Moo Moooooo moooo moo Moooo

Street and Wapping. In these last-mentioned haunts you see only sailors;
Mooooo moo Moooooo. Mo moooo mooo-moooooooo mooooo moo moo mooo moooooo;

but in New Bedford, actual cannibals stand chatting at street corners;
moo mo Moo Moooooo, mooooo moooooooo moooo mooooooo mo mooooo moooooo;

savages outright; many of whom yet carry on their bones unholy flesh. It
moooooo mooooooo; mooo mo mooo moo moooo mo moooo moooo mooooo moooo. Mo

makes a stranger stare.
moooo m mooooooo moooo.




But, besides the Feegeeans, Tongatobooarrs, Erromanggoans, Pannangians,
Moo, moooooo moo Moooooooo, Mooooooooooooo, Moooooooooooo, Moooooooooo,

and Brighggians, and, besides the wild specimens of the whaling-craft
moo Moooooooooo, moo, moooooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo moooooo-moooo

which unheeded reel about the streets, you will see other sights still
moooo mooooooo mooo moooo moo moooooo, moo mooo moo moooo mooooo moooo

more curious, certainly more comical. There weekly arrive in this town
mooo moooooo, moooooooo mooo moooooo. Moooo mooooo mooooo mo mooo mooo

scores of green Vermonters and New Hampshire men, all athirst for gain
mooooo mo moooo Mooooooooo moo Moo Moooooooo moo, moo moooooo moo mooo

and glory in the fishery. They are mostly young, of stalwart frames;
moo moooo mo moo moooooo. Mooo moo mooooo moooo, mo mooooooo mooooo;

fellows who have felled forests, and now seek to drop the axe and snatch
moooooo moo mooo mooooo moooooo, moo moo mooo mo mooo moo moo moo mooooo

the whale-lance. Many are as green as the Green Mountains whence they
moo moooo-moooo. Mooo moo mo moooo mo moo Moooo Moooooooo mooooo mooo

came. In some things you would think them but a few hours old. Look
mooo. Mo mooo mooooo moo moooo moooo mooo moo m moo moooo moo. Mooo

there! that chap strutting round the corner. He wears a beaver hat and
moooo! mooo mooo moooooooo moooo moo mooooo. Mo moooo m mooooo moo moo

swallow-tailed coat, girdled with a sailor-belt and sheath-knife. Here
moooooo-mooooo mooo, moooooo mooo m mooooo-mooo moo mooooo-moooo. Mooo

comes another with a sou'-wester and a bombazine cloak.
moooo moooooo mooo m moo'-mooooo moo m moooooooo moooo.




No town-bred dandy will compare with a country-bred one--I mean a
Mo mooo-mooo moooo mooo moooooo mooo m moooooo-mooo moo--M mooo m

downright bumpkin dandy--a fellow that, in the dog-days, will mow his
moooooooo moooooo moooo--m mooooo mooo, mo moo moo-mooo, mooo moo moo

two acres in buckskin gloves for fear of tanning his hands. Now when a
moo moooo mo mooooooo mooooo moo mooo mo moooooo moo moooo. Moo mooo m

country dandy like this takes it into his head to make a distinguished
moooooo moooo mooo mooo moooo mo mooo moo mooo mo mooo m moooooooooooo

reputation, and joins the great whale-fishery, you should see the
mooooooooo, moo moooo moo moooo moooo-moooooo, moo mooooo moo moo

comical things he does upon reaching the seaport. In bespeaking his
moooooo mooooo mo mooo mooo mooooooo moo moooooo. Mo mooooooooo moo

sea-outfit, he orders bell-buttons to his waistcoats; straps to his
moo-mooooo, mo mooooo mooo-moooooo mo moo mooooooooo; mooooo mo moo

canvas trowsers. Ah, poor Hay-Seed! how bitterly will burst those straps
mooooo mooooooo. Mo, mooo Moo-Mooo! moo mooooooo mooo moooo moooo mooooo

in the first howling gale, when thou art driven, straps, buttons, and
mo moo moooo moooooo mooo, mooo mooo moo mooooo, mooooo, moooooo, moo

all, down the throat of the tempest.
moo, mooo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo.




But think not that this famous town has only harpooneers, cannibals, and
Moo moooo moo mooo mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo moooooooooo, moooooooo, moo

bumpkins to show her visitors. Not at all. Still New Bedford is a queer
mooooooo mo mooo moo mooooooo. Moo mo moo. Moooo Moo Moooooo mo m moooo

place. Had it not been for us whalemen, that tract of land would this
moooo. Moo mo moo mooo moo mo mooooooo, mooo moooo mo mooo moooo mooo

day perhaps have been in as howling condition as the coast of Labrador.
moo moooooo mooo mooo mo mo moooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo mo Mooooooo.

As it is, parts of her back country are enough to frighten one, they
Mo mo mo, moooo mo moo mooo moooooo moo mooooo mo mooooooo moo, mooo

look so bony. The town itself is perhaps the dearest place to live
mooo mo mooo. Moo mooo mooooo mo moooooo moo moooooo moooo mo mooo

in, in all New England. It is a land of oil, true enough: but not like
mo, mo moo Moo Moooooo. Mo mo m mooo mo moo, mooo mooooo: moo moo mooo

Canaan; a land, also, of corn and wine. The streets do not run with
Mooooo; m mooo, mooo, mo mooo moo mooo. Moo moooooo mo moo moo mooo

milk; nor in the spring-time do they pave them with fresh eggs. Yet, in
mooo; moo mo moo mooooo-mooo mo mooo mooo mooo mooo moooo mooo. Moo, mo

spite of this, nowhere in all America will you find more patrician-like
moooo mo mooo, moooooo mo moo Moooooo mooo moo mooo mooo moooooooo-mooo

houses; parks and gardens more opulent, than in New Bedford. Whence came
mooooo; moooo moo moooooo mooo moooooo, mooo mo Moo Moooooo. Mooooo mooo

they? how planted upon this once scraggy scoria of a country?
mooo? moo moooooo mooo mooo mooo moooooo mooooo mo m moooooo?




Go and gaze upon the iron emblematical harpoons round yonder lofty
Mo moo mooo mooo moo mooo mooooooooooo mooooooo moooo mooooo moooo

mansion, and your question will be answered. Yes; all these brave houses
moooooo, moo mooo mooooooo mooo mo mooooooo. Moo; moo moooo moooo mooooo

and flowery gardens came from the Atlantic, Pacific, and Indian oceans.
moo moooooo moooooo mooo mooo moo Mooooooo, Moooooo, moo Mooooo mooooo.

One and all, they were harpooned and dragged up hither from the bottom
Moo moo moo, mooo mooo moooooooo moo moooooo mo mooooo mooo moo mooooo

of the sea. Can Herr Alexander perform a feat like that?
mo moo moo. Moo Mooo Moooooooo moooooo m mooo mooo mooo?




In New Bedford, fathers, they say, give whales for dowers to their
Mo Moo Moooooo, moooooo, mooo moo, mooo mooooo moo mooooo mo moooo

daughters, and portion off their nieces with a few porpoises a-piece.
moooooooo, moo moooooo moo moooo mooooo mooo m moo moooooooo m-moooo.

You must go to New Bedford to see a brilliant wedding; for, they say,
Moo mooo mo mo Moo Moooooo mo moo m moooooooo moooooo; moo, mooo moo,

they have reservoirs of oil in every house, and every night recklessly
mooo mooo mooooooooo mo moo mo moooo moooo, moo moooo moooo mooooooooo

burn their lengths in spermaceti candles.
mooo moooo moooooo mo mooooooooo moooooo.




In summer time, the town is sweet to see; full of fine maples--long
Mo mooooo mooo, moo mooo mo moooo mo moo; mooo mo mooo mooooo--mooo

avenues of green and gold. And in August, high in air, the beautiful and
moooooo mo moooo moo mooo. Moo mo Mooooo, mooo mo moo, moo moooooooo moo

bountiful horse-chestnuts, candelabra-wise, proffer the passer-by their
moooooooo moooo-moooooooo, mooooooooo-mooo, moooooo moo mooooo-mo moooo

tapering upright cones of congregated blossoms. So omnipotent is art;
mooooooo moooooo moooo mo moooooooooo mooooooo. Mo mooooooooo mo moo;

which in many a district of New Bedford has superinduced bright terraces
moooo mo mooo m mooooooo mo Moo Moooooo moo mooooooooooo mooooo mooooooo

of flowers upon the barren refuse rocks thrown aside at creation's final
mo moooooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo moooo mooooo moooo mo mooooooo'm moooo

day.
moo.




And the women of New Bedford, they bloom like their own red roses. But
Moo moo moooo mo Moo Moooooo, mooo moooo mooo moooo moo moo moooo. Moo

roses only bloom in summer; whereas the fine carnation of their cheeks
moooo mooo moooo mo mooooo; moooooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moooo mooooo

is perennial as sunlight in the seventh heavens. Elsewhere match that
mo moooooooo mo mooooooo mo moo moooooo moooooo. Moooooooo moooo mooo

bloom of theirs, ye cannot, save in Salem, where they tell me the young
moooo mo mooooo, mo mooooo, mooo mo Moooo, moooo mooo mooo mo moo moooo

girls breathe such musk, their sailor sweethearts smell them miles off
moooo moooooo mooo mooo, moooo mooooo moooooooooo moooo mooo moooo moo

shore, as though they were drawing nigh the odorous Moluccas instead of
moooo, mo mooooo mooo mooo moooooo mooo moo moooooo Mooooooo moooooo mo

the Puritanic sands.
moo Moooooooo moooo.










CHAPTER 7. The Chapel.
MOOOOOO m. Moo Mooooo.







In this same New Bedford there stands a Whaleman's Chapel, and few are
Mo mooo mooo Moo Moooooo moooo mooooo m Mooooooo'm Mooooo, moo moo moo

the moody fishermen, shortly bound for the Indian Ocean or Pacific, who
moo moooo moooooooo, moooooo moooo moo moo Mooooo Moooo mo Moooooo, moo

fail to make a Sunday visit to the spot. I am sure that I did not.
mooo mo mooo m Mooooo moooo mo moo mooo. M mo mooo mooo M moo moo.




Returning from my first morning stroll, I again sallied out upon this
Moooooooo mooo mo moooo moooooo mooooo, M moooo moooooo moo mooo mooo

special errand. The sky had changed from clear, sunny cold, to driving
moooooo mooooo. Moo moo moo moooooo mooo moooo, moooo mooo, mo moooooo

sleet and mist. Wrapping myself in my shaggy jacket of the cloth called
moooo moo mooo. Mooooooo mooooo mo mo mooooo mooooo mo moo moooo mooooo

bearskin, I fought my way against the stubborn storm. Entering, I
mooooooo, M mooooo mo moo moooooo moo mooooooo moooo. Mooooooo, M

found a small scattered congregation of sailors, and sailors' wives and
moooo m moooo moooooooo mooooooooooo mo moooooo, moo moooooo' moooo moo

widows. A muffled silence reigned, only broken at times by the shrieks
mooooo. M moooooo moooooo moooooo, mooo mooooo mo moooo mo moo moooooo

of the storm. Each silent worshipper seemed purposely sitting apart from
mo moo moooo. Mooo mooooo mooooooooo mooooo moooooooo moooooo moooo mooo

the other, as if each silent grief were insular and incommunicable. The
moo moooo, mo mo mooo mooooo moooo mooo moooooo moo mooooooooooooo. Moo

chaplain had not yet arrived; and there these silent islands of men and
mooooooo moo moo moo moooooo; moo moooo moooo mooooo moooooo mo moo moo

women sat steadfastly eyeing several marble tablets, with black borders,
moooo moo moooooooooo mooooo moooooo mooooo moooooo, mooo moooo moooooo,

masoned into the wall on either side the pulpit. Three of them ran
moooooo mooo moo mooo mo mooooo mooo moo mooooo. Moooo mo mooo moo

something like the following, but I do not pretend to quote:--
moooooooo mooo moo moooooooo, moo M mo moo moooooo mo moooo:--




SACRED TO THE MEMORY OF JOHN TALBOT, Who, at the age of eighteen, was
MOOOOO MO MOO MOOOOO MO MOOO MOOOOO, Moo, mo moo moo mo mooooooo, moo

lost overboard, Near the Isle of Desolation, off Patagonia, November
mooo moooooooo, Mooo moo Mooo mo Mooooooooo, moo Moooooooo, Mooooooo

1st, 1836. THIS TABLET Is erected to his Memory BY HIS SISTER.
moo, mooo. MOOO MOOOOO Mo moooooo mo moo Mooooo MO MOO MOOOOO.




SACRED TO THE MEMORY OF ROBERT LONG, WILLIS ELLERY, NATHAN COLEMAN,
MOOOOO MO MOO MOOOOO MO MOOOOO MOOO, MOOOOO MOOOOO, MOOOOO MOOOOOO,

WALTER CANNY, SETH MACY, AND SAMUEL GLEIG, Forming one of the boats'
MOOOOO MOOOO, MOOO MOOO, MOO MOOOOO MOOOO, Moooooo moo mo moo moooo'

crews OF THE SHIP ELIZA Who were towed out of sight by a Whale, On the
moooo MO MOO MOOO MOOOO Moo mooo moooo moo mo moooo mo m Moooo, Mo moo

Off-shore Ground in the PACIFIC, December 31st, 1839. THIS MARBLE Is
Moo-moooo Mooooo mo moo MOOOOOO, Mooooooo mooo, mooo. MOOO MOOOOO Mo

here placed by their surviving SHIPMATES.
mooo mooooo mo moooo moooooooo MOOOOOOOO.




SACRED TO THE MEMORY OF The late CAPTAIN EZEKIEL HARDY, Who in the bows
MOOOOO MO MOO MOOOOO MO Moo mooo MOOOOOO MOOOOOO MOOOO, Moo mo moo mooo

of his boat was killed by a Sperm Whale on the coast of Japan, AUGUST
mo moo mooo moo mooooo mo m Moooo Moooo mo moo moooo mo Moooo, MOOOOO

3d, 1833. THIS TABLET Is erected to his Memory BY HIS WIDOW.
mo, mooo. MOOO MOOOOO Mo moooooo mo moo Mooooo MO MOO MOOOO.




Shaking off the sleet from my ice-glazed hat and jacket, I seated myself
Moooooo moo moo moooo mooo mo moo-mooooo moo moo mooooo, M mooooo mooooo

near the door, and turning sideways was surprised to see Queequeg near
mooo moo mooo, moo moooooo mooooooo moo moooooooo mo moo Mooooooo mooo

me. Affected by the solemnity of the scene, there was a wondering gaze
mo. Mooooooo mo moo moooooooo mo moo moooo, moooo moo m moooooooo mooo

of incredulous curiosity in his countenance. This savage was the only
mo moooooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooooooooo. Mooo mooooo moo moo mooo

person present who seemed to notice my entrance; because he was the only
mooooo moooooo moo mooooo mo mooooo mo mooooooo; moooooo mo moo moo mooo

one who could not read, and, therefore, was not reading those frigid
moo moo moooo moo mooo, moo, moooooooo, moo moo moooooo moooo mooooo

inscriptions on the wall. Whether any of the relatives of the seamen
mooooooooooo mo moo mooo. Moooooo moo mo moo moooooooo mo moo mooooo

whose names appeared there were now among the congregation, I knew not;
moooo moooo mooooooo moooo mooo moo moooo moo mooooooooooo, M mooo moo;

but so many are the unrecorded accidents in the fishery, and so plainly
moo mo mooo moo moo mooooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooooo, moo mo moooooo

did several women present wear the countenance if not the trappings
moo moooooo moooo moooooo mooo moo moooooooooo mo moo moo moooooooo

of some unceasing grief, that I feel sure that here before me were
mo mooo moooooooo moooo, mooo M mooo mooo mooo mooo mooooo mo mooo

assembled those, in whose unhealing hearts the sight of those bleak
moooooooo moooo, mo moooo moooooooo mooooo moo moooo mo moooo moooo

tablets sympathetically caused the old wounds to bleed afresh.
moooooo moooooooooooooo mooooo moo moo mooooo mo moooo mooooo.




Oh! ye whose dead lie buried beneath the green grass; who standing among
Mo! mo moooo mooo moo mooooo moooooo moo moooo moooo; moo mooooooo moooo

flowers can say--here, HERE lies my beloved; ye know not the desolation
moooooo moo moo--mooo, MOOO mooo mo moooooo; mo mooo moo moo mooooooooo

that broods in bosoms like these. What bitter blanks in those
mooo mooooo mo mooooo mooo moooo. Mooo mooooo mooooo mo moooo

black-bordered marbles which cover no ashes! What despair in those
moooo-mooooooo moooooo moooo moooo mo moooo! Mooo moooooo mo moooo

immovable inscriptions! What deadly voids and unbidden infidelities in
moooooooo mooooooooooo! Mooo mooooo moooo moo mooooooo mooooooooooo mo

the lines that seem to gnaw upon all Faith, and refuse resurrections to
moo moooo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo moo Moooo, moo mooooo moooooooooooo mo

the beings who have placelessly perished without a grave. As well might
moo mooooo moo mooo moooooooooo mooooooo moooooo m moooo. Mo mooo moooo

those tablets stand in the cave of Elephanta as here.
moooo moooooo moooo mo moo mooo mo Moooooooo mo mooo.




In what census of living creatures, the dead of mankind are included;
Mo mooo mooooo mo mooooo moooooooo, moo mooo mo moooooo moo mooooooo;

why it is that a universal proverb says of them, that they tell no
moo mo mo mooo m moooooooo moooooo mooo mo mooo, mooo mooo mooo mo

tales, though containing more secrets than the Goodwin Sands; how it is
moooo, mooooo mooooooooo mooo moooooo mooo moo Moooooo Moooo; moo mo mo

that to his name who yesterday departed for the other world, we prefix
mooo mo moo mooo moo moooooooo mooooooo moo moo moooo moooo, mo mooooo

so significant and infidel a word, and yet do not thus entitle him, if
mo moooooooooo moo moooooo m mooo, moo moo mo moo mooo moooooo moo, mo

he but embarks for the remotest Indies of this living earth; why the
mo moo moooooo moo moo mooooooo Mooooo mo mooo mooooo moooo; moo moo

Life Insurance Companies pay death-forfeitures upon immortals; in what
Mooo Moooooooo Moooooooo moo moooo-moooooooooo mooo moooooooo; mo mooo

eternal, unstirring paralysis, and deadly, hopeless trance, yet lies
moooooo, mooooooooo moooooooo, moo mooooo, mooooooo mooooo, moo mooo

antique Adam who died sixty round centuries ago; how it is that we
moooooo Mooo moo mooo moooo moooo moooooooo moo; moo mo mo mooo mo

still refuse to be comforted for those who we nevertheless maintain are
moooo mooooo mo mo moooooooo moo moooo moo mo mooooooooooo mooooooo moo

dwelling in unspeakable bliss; why all the living so strive to hush all
mooooooo mo moooooooooo moooo; moo moo moo mooooo mo mooooo mo mooo moo

the dead; wherefore but the rumor of a knocking in a tomb will terrify a
moo mooo; moooooooo moo moo moooo mo m mooooooo mo m mooo mooo moooooo m

whole city. All these things are not without their meanings.
moooo mooo. Moo moooo mooooo moo moo moooooo moooo mooooooo.




But Faith, like a jackal, feeds among the tombs, and even from these
Moo Moooo, mooo m mooooo, moooo moooo moo moooo, moo mooo mooo moooo

dead doubts she gathers her most vital hope.
mooo mooooo moo moooooo moo mooo moooo mooo.




It needs scarcely to be told, with what feelings, on the eve of a
Mo moooo mooooooo mo mo mooo, mooo mooo mooooooo, mo moo moo mo m

Nantucket voyage, I regarded those marble tablets, and by the murky
Moooooooo mooooo, M mooooooo moooo mooooo moooooo, moo mo moo moooo

light of that darkened, doleful day read the fate of the whalemen
moooo mo mooo mooooooo, moooooo moo mooo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo

who had gone before me. Yes, Ishmael, the same fate may be thine. But
moo moo mooo mooooo mo. Moo, Moooooo, moo mooo mooo moo mo moooo. Moo

somehow I grew merry again. Delightful inducements to embark, fine
moooooo M mooo moooo moooo. Mooooooooo moooooooooo mo mooooo, mooo

chance for promotion, it seems--aye, a stove boat will make me an
mooooo moo moooooooo, mo moooo--moo, m moooo mooo mooo mooo mo mo

immortal by brevet. Yes, there is death in this business of whaling--a
mooooooo mo mooooo. Moo, moooo mo moooo mo mooo mooooooo mo moooooo--m

speechlessly quick chaotic bundling of a man into Eternity. But what
mooooooooooo moooo moooooo mooooooo mo m moo mooo Mooooooo. Moo mooo

then? Methinks we have hugely mistaken this matter of Life and Death.
mooo? Mooooooo mo mooo mooooo mooooooo mooo mooooo mo Mooo moo Moooo.

Methinks that what they call my shadow here on earth is my true
Mooooooo mooo mooo mooo mooo mo mooooo mooo mo moooo mo mo mooo

substance. Methinks that in looking at things spiritual, we are too
moooooooo. Mooooooo mooo mo moooooo mo mooooo moooooooo, mo moo moo

much like oysters observing the sun through the water, and thinking that
mooo mooo moooooo moooooooo moo moo moooooo moo moooo, moo mooooooo mooo

thick water the thinnest of air. Methinks my body is but the lees of my
moooo moooo moo mooooooo mo moo. Mooooooo mo mooo mo moo moo mooo mo mo

better being. In fact take my body who will, take it I say, it is not
mooooo moooo. Mo mooo mooo mo mooo moo mooo, mooo mo M moo, mo mo moo

me. And therefore three cheers for Nantucket; and come a stove boat and
mo. Moo moooooooo moooo mooooo moo Moooooooo; moo mooo m moooo mooo moo

stove body when they will, for stave my soul, Jove himself cannot.
moooo mooo mooo mooo mooo, moo moooo mo mooo, Mooo moooooo mooooo.










CHAPTER 8. The Pulpit.
MOOOOOO m. Moo Mooooo.







I had not been seated very long ere a man of a certain venerable
M moo moo mooo mooooo mooo mooo moo m moo mo m moooooo moooooooo

robustness entered; immediately as the storm-pelted door flew back upon
mooooooooo moooooo; moooooooooo mo moo moooo-mooooo mooo mooo mooo mooo

admitting him, a quick regardful eyeing of him by all the congregation,
moooooooo moo, m moooo moooooooo mooooo mo moo mo moo moo mooooooooooo,

sufficiently attested that this fine old man was the chaplain. Yes, it
mooooooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo mooo moo moo moo moo mooooooo. Moo, mo

was the famous Father Mapple, so called by the whalemen, among whom he
moo moo mooooo Mooooo Mooooo, mo mooooo mo moo mooooooo, moooo mooo mo

was a very great favourite. He had been a sailor and a harpooneer in his
moo m mooo moooo moooooooo. Mo moo mooo m mooooo moo m mooooooooo mo moo

youth, but for many years past had dedicated his life to the ministry.
moooo, moo moo mooo moooo mooo moo moooooooo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo.

At the time I now write of, Father Mapple was in the hardy winter of a
Mo moo mooo M moo moooo mo, Mooooo Mooooo moo mo moo moooo mooooo mo m

healthy old age; that sort of old age which seems merging into a second
moooooo moo moo; mooo mooo mo moo moo moooo moooo moooooo mooo m mooooo

flowering youth, for among all the fissures of his wrinkles, there shone
moooooooo moooo, moo moooo moo moo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo, moooo moooo

certain mild gleams of a newly developing bloom--the spring verdure
moooooo mooo mooooo mo m moooo mooooooooo moooo--moo mooooo moooooo

peeping forth even beneath February's snow. No one having previously
moooooo moooo mooo moooooo Mooooooo'm mooo. Mo moo mooooo mooooooooo

heard his history, could for the first time behold Father Mapple without
moooo moo moooooo, moooo moo moo moooo mooo mooooo Mooooo Mooooo moooooo

the utmost interest, because there were certain engrafted clerical
moo mooooo mooooooo, moooooo moooo mooo moooooo moooooooo mooooooo

peculiarities about him, imputable to that adventurous maritime life
moooooooooooo moooo moo, moooooooo mo mooo moooooooooo mooooooo mooo

he had led. When he entered I observed that he carried no umbrella, and
mo moo moo. Mooo mo moooooo M mooooooo mooo mo moooooo mo mooooooo, moo

certainly had not come in his carriage, for his tarpaulin hat ran down
moooooooo moo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo, moo moo moooooooo moo moo mooo

with melting sleet, and his great pilot cloth jacket seemed almost to
mooo moooooo moooo, moo moo moooo moooo moooo mooooo mooooo mooooo mo

drag him to the floor with the weight of the water it had absorbed.
mooo moo mo moo moooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo.

However, hat and coat and overshoes were one by one removed, and hung up
Moooooo, moo moo mooo moo moooooooo mooo moo mo moo moooooo, moo mooo mo

in a little space in an adjacent corner; when, arrayed in a decent suit,
mo m mooooo moooo mo mo mooooooo mooooo; mooo, moooooo mo m mooooo mooo,

he quietly approached the pulpit.
mo moooooo mooooooooo moo mooooo.




Like most old fashioned pulpits, it was a very lofty one, and since a
Mooo mooo moo moooooooo moooooo, mo moo m mooo moooo moo, moo moooo m

regular stairs to such a height would, by its long angle with the floor,
moooooo mooooo mo mooo m mooooo moooo, mo moo mooo moooo mooo moo moooo,

seriously contract the already small area of the chapel, the architect,
moooooooo mooooooo moo moooooo moooo mooo mo moo mooooo, moo moooooooo,

it seemed, had acted upon the hint of Father Mapple, and finished the
mo mooooo, moo moooo mooo moo mooo mo Mooooo Mooooo, moo mooooooo moo

pulpit without a stairs, substituting a perpendicular side ladder, like
mooooo moooooo m mooooo, mooooooooooo m moooooooooooo mooo mooooo, mooo

those used in mounting a ship from a boat at sea. The wife of a whaling
moooo mooo mo mooooooo m mooo mooo m mooo mo moo. Moo mooo mo m moooooo

captain had provided the chapel with a handsome pair of red worsted
moooooo moo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo m mooooooo mooo mo moo moooooo

man-ropes for this ladder, which, being itself nicely headed, and
moo-moooo moo mooo mooooo, moooo, moooo mooooo mooooo mooooo, moo

stained with a mahogany colour, the whole contrivance, considering what
moooooo mooo m mooooooo mooooo, moo moooo moooooooooo, moooooooooo mooo

manner of chapel it was, seemed by no means in bad taste. Halting for
mooooo mo mooooo mo moo, mooooo mo mo moooo mo moo moooo. Moooooo moo

an instant at the foot of the ladder, and with both hands grasping the
mo moooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooooo, moo mooo mooo moooo mooooooo moo

ornamental knobs of the man-ropes, Father Mapple cast a look upwards,
mooooooooo moooo mo moo moo-moooo, Mooooo Mooooo mooo m mooo moooooo,

and then with a truly sailor-like but still reverential dexterity, hand
moo mooo mooo m moooo mooooo-mooo moo moooo moooooooooo moooooooo, mooo

over hand, mounted the steps as if ascending the main-top of his vessel.
mooo mooo, moooooo moo moooo mo mo moooooooo moo mooo-moo mo moo mooooo.




The perpendicular parts of this side ladder, as is usually the case with
Moo moooooooooooo moooo mo mooo mooo mooooo, mo mo moooooo moo mooo mooo

swinging ones, were of cloth-covered rope, only the rounds were of wood,
mooooooo mooo, mooo mo moooo-moooooo mooo, mooo moo mooooo mooo mo mooo,

so that at every step there was a joint. At my first glimpse of the
mo mooo mo moooo mooo moooo moo m moooo. Mo mo moooo moooooo mo moo

pulpit, it had not escaped me that however convenient for a ship,
mooooo, mo moo moo moooooo mo mooo moooooo mooooooooo moo m mooo,

these joints in the present instance seemed unnecessary. For I was not
moooo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooooooo mooooo moooooooooo. Moo M moo moo

prepared to see Father Mapple after gaining the height, slowly turn
mooooooo mo moo Mooooo Mooooo moooo moooooo moo mooooo, mooooo mooo

round, and stooping over the pulpit, deliberately drag up the ladder
moooo, moo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo, mooooooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo

step by step, till the whole was deposited within, leaving him
mooo mo mooo, mooo moo moooo moo moooooooo mooooo, moooooo moo

impregnable in his little Quebec.
moooooooooo mo moo mooooo Mooooo.




I pondered some time without fully comprehending the reason for this.
M mooooooo mooo mooo moooooo moooo moooooooooooo moo mooooo moo mooo.

Father Mapple enjoyed such a wide reputation for sincerity and sanctity,
Mooooo Mooooo moooooo mooo m mooo mooooooooo moo moooooooo moo mooooooo,

that I could not suspect him of courting notoriety by any mere tricks
mooo M moooo moo moooooo moo mo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo mooooo

of the stage. No, thought I, there must be some sober reason for this
mo moo moooo. Mo, moooooo M, moooo mooo mo mooo moooo mooooo moo mooo

thing; furthermore, it must symbolize something unseen. Can it be,
moooo; moooooooooo, mo mooo moooooooo moooooooo mooooo. Moo mo mo,

then, that by that act of physical isolation, he signifies his spiritual
mooo, mooo mo mooo moo mo mooooooo moooooooo, mo moooooooo moo moooooooo

withdrawal for the time, from all outward worldly ties and connexions?
mooooooooo moo moo mooo, mooo moo moooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooooooo?

Yes, for replenished with the meat and wine of the word, to the faithful
Moo, moo moooooooooo mooo moo mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo, mo moo mooooooo

man of God, this pulpit, I see, is a self-containing stronghold--a lofty
moo mo Moo, mooo mooooo, M moo, mo m mooo-mooooooooo mooooooooo--m moooo

Ehrenbreitstein, with a perennial well of water within the walls.
Moooooooooooooo, mooo m moooooooo mooo mo moooo mooooo moo moooo.




But the side ladder was not the only strange feature of the place,
Moo moo mooo mooooo moo moo moo mooo moooooo moooooo mo moo moooo,

borrowed from the chaplain's former sea-farings. Between the marble
mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo'm mooooo moo-moooooo. Moooooo moo mooooo

cenotaphs on either hand of the pulpit, the wall which formed its back
moooooooo mo mooooo mooo mo moo mooooo, moo mooo moooo mooooo moo mooo

was adorned with a large painting representing a gallant ship beating
moo moooooo mooo m moooo mooooooo mooooooooooo m moooooo mooo moooooo

against a terrible storm off a lee coast of black rocks and snowy
moooooo m mooooooo moooo moo m moo moooo mo moooo moooo moo moooo

breakers. But high above the flying scud and dark-rolling clouds, there
mooooooo. Moo mooo moooo moo mooooo mooo moo mooo-moooooo mooooo, moooo

floated a little isle of sunlight, from which beamed forth an angel's
moooooo m mooooo mooo mo mooooooo, mooo moooo mooooo moooo mo moooo'm

face; and this bright face shed a distinct spot of radiance upon the
mooo; moo mooo mooooo mooo mooo m mooooooo mooo mo mooooooo mooo moo

ship's tossed deck, something like that silver plate now inserted into
mooo'm mooooo mooo, moooooooo mooo mooo mooooo moooo moo mooooooo mooo

the Victory's plank where Nelson fell. "Ah, noble ship," the angel
moo Moooooo'm moooo moooo Mooooo mooo. "Mo, moooo mooo," moo moooo

seemed to say, "beat on, beat on, thou noble ship, and bear a hardy
mooooo mo moo, "mooo mo, mooo mo, mooo moooo mooo, moo mooo m moooo

helm; for lo! the sun is breaking through; the clouds are rolling
mooo; moo mo! moo moo mo mooooooo moooooo; moo mooooo moo moooooo

off--serenest azure is at hand."
moo--mooooooo moooo mo mo mooo."




Nor was the pulpit itself without a trace of the same sea-taste that
Moo moo moo mooooo mooooo moooooo m moooo mo moo mooo moo-moooo mooo

had achieved the ladder and the picture. Its panelled front was in
moo mooooooo moo mooooo moo moo moooooo. Moo mooooooo moooo moo mo

the likeness of a ship's bluff bows, and the Holy Bible rested on a
moo mooooooo mo m mooo'm moooo mooo, moo moo Mooo Moooo mooooo mo m

projecting piece of scroll work, fashioned after a ship's fiddle-headed
mooooooooo moooo mo mooooo mooo, moooooooo moooo m mooo'm mooooo-mooooo

beak.
mooo.




What could be more full of meaning?--for the pulpit is ever this earth's
Mooo moooo mo mooo mooo mo moooooo?--moo moo mooooo mo mooo mooo moooo'm

foremost part; all the rest comes in its rear; the pulpit leads the
mooooooo mooo; moo moo mooo moooo mo moo mooo; moo mooooo moooo moo

world. From thence it is the storm of God's quick wrath is first
moooo. Mooo mooooo mo mo moo moooo mo Moo'm moooo moooo mo moooo

descried, and the bow must bear the earliest brunt. From thence it is
mooooooo, moo moo moo mooo mooo moo mooooooo moooo. Mooo mooooo mo mo

the God of breezes fair or foul is first invoked for favourable winds.
moo Moo mo moooooo mooo mo mooo mo moooo moooooo moo mooooooooo moooo.

Yes, the world's a ship on its passage out, and not a voyage complete;
Moo, moo moooo'm m mooo mo moo moooooo moo, moo moo m mooooo mooooooo;

and the pulpit is its prow.
moo moo mooooo mo moo mooo.










CHAPTER 9. The Sermon.
MOOOOOO m. Moo Mooooo.







Father Mapple rose, and in a mild voice of unassuming authority ordered
Mooooo Mooooo mooo, moo mo m mooo moooo mo mooooooooo moooooooo moooooo

the scattered people to condense. "Starboard gangway, there! side away
moo moooooooo mooooo mo mooooooo. "Moooooooo moooooo, moooo! mooo mooo

to larboard--larboard gangway to starboard! Midships! midships!"
mo mooooooo--mooooooo moooooo mo moooooooo! Mooooooo! mooooooo!"




There was a low rumbling of heavy sea-boots among the benches, and a
Moooo moo m moo mooooooo mo moooo moo-moooo moooo moo moooooo, moo m

still slighter shuffling of women's shoes, and all was quiet again, and
moooo mooooooo moooooooo mo moooo'm moooo, moo moo moo moooo moooo, moo

every eye on the preacher.
moooo moo mo moo mooooooo.




He paused a little; then kneeling in the pulpit's bows, folded his large
Mo mooooo m mooooo; mooo mooooooo mo moo mooooo'm mooo, mooooo moo moooo

brown hands across his chest, uplifted his closed eyes, and offered
moooo moooo mooooo moo moooo, mooooooo moo mooooo mooo, moo moooooo

a prayer so deeply devout that he seemed kneeling and praying at the
m mooooo mo mooooo mooooo mooo mo mooooo mooooooo moo moooooo mo moo

bottom of the sea.
mooooo mo moo moo.




This ended, in prolonged solemn tones, like the continual tolling of
Mooo moooo, mo moooooooo mooooo moooo, mooo moo moooooooo moooooo mo

a bell in a ship that is foundering at sea in a fog--in such tones he
m mooo mo m mooo mooo mo mooooooooo mo moo mo m moo--mo mooo moooo mo

commenced reading the following hymn; but changing his manner towards
moooooooo moooooo moo moooooooo mooo; moo mooooooo moo mooooo moooooo

the concluding stanzas, burst forth with a pealing exultation and joy--
moo mooooooooo moooooo, moooo moooo mooo m moooooo mooooooooo moo moo--




     "The ribs and terrors in the whale,
     "Moo mooo moo moooooo mo moo moooo,

     Arched over me a dismal gloom,
     Mooooo mooo mo m mooooo moooo,

     While all God's sun-lit waves rolled by,
     Moooo moo Moo'm moo-moo moooo mooooo mo,

     And lift me deepening down to doom.
     Moo mooo mo moooooooo mooo mo mooo.




     "I saw the opening maw of hell,
     "M moo moo moooooo moo mo mooo,

     With endless pains and sorrows there;
     Mooo moooooo moooo moo moooooo moooo;

     Which none but they that feel can tell--
     Moooo mooo moo mooo mooo mooo moo mooo--

     Oh, I was plunging to despair.
     Mo, M moo mooooooo mo moooooo.




     "In black distress, I called my God,
     "Mo moooo mooooooo, M mooooo mo Moo,

     When I could scarce believe him mine,
     Mooo M moooo mooooo moooooo moo mooo,

     He bowed his ear to my complaints--
     Mo moooo moo moo mo mo mooooooooo--

     No more the whale did me confine.
     Mo mooo moo moooo moo mo moooooo.




     "With speed he flew to my relief,
     "Mooo moooo mo mooo mo mo mooooo,

     As on a radiant dolphin borne;
     Mo mo m moooooo moooooo moooo;

     Awful, yet bright, as lightning shone
     Moooo, moo mooooo, mo moooooooo moooo

     The face of my Deliverer God.
     Moo mooo mo mo Moooooooo Moo.




     "My song for ever shall record
     "Mo mooo moo mooo moooo mooooo

     That terrible, that joyful hour;
     Mooo mooooooo, mooo mooooo mooo;

     I give the glory to my God,
     M mooo moo moooo mo mo Moo,

     His all the mercy and the power."
     Moo moo moo moooo moo moo moooo."







Nearly all joined in singing this hymn, which swelled high above the
Mooooo moo mooooo mo moooooo mooo mooo, moooo moooooo mooo moooo moo

howling of the storm. A brief pause ensued; the preacher slowly turned
moooooo mo moo moooo. M moooo moooo mooooo; moo mooooooo mooooo mooooo

over the leaves of the Bible, and at last, folding his hand down upon
mooo moo mooooo mo moo Moooo, moo mo mooo, moooooo moo mooo mooo mooo

the proper page, said: "Beloved shipmates, clinch the last verse of the
moo mooooo mooo, mooo: "Moooooo moooooooo, mooooo moo mooo moooo mo moo

first chapter of Jonah--'And God had prepared a great fish to swallow up
moooo moooooo mo Moooo--'Moo Moo moo mooooooo m moooo mooo mo moooooo mo

Jonah.'"
Moooo.'"




"Shipmates, this book, containing only four chapters--four yarns--is one
"Moooooooo, mooo mooo, mooooooooo mooo mooo mooooooo--mooo moooo--mo moo

of the smallest strands in the mighty cable of the Scriptures. Yet what
mo moo mooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo moooo mo moo Mooooooooo. Moo mooo

depths of the soul does Jonah's deep sealine sound! what a pregnant
mooooo mo moo mooo mooo Moooo'm mooo moooooo moooo! mooo m mooooooo

lesson to us is this prophet! What a noble thing is that canticle in the
mooooo mo mo mo mooo moooooo! Mooo m moooo moooo mo mooo mooooooo mo moo

fish's belly! How billow-like and boisterously grand! We feel the floods
mooo'm moooo! Moo mooooo-mooo moo mooooooooooo moooo! Mo mooo moo mooooo

surging over us; we sound with him to the kelpy bottom of the waters;
moooooo mooo mo; mo moooo mooo moo mo moo moooo mooooo mo moo mooooo;

sea-weed and all the slime of the sea is about us! But WHAT is this
moo-mooo moo moo moo moooo mo moo moo mo moooo mo! Moo MOOO mo mooo

lesson that the book of Jonah teaches? Shipmates, it is a two-stranded
mooooo mooo moo mooo mo Moooo moooooo? Moooooooo, mo mo m moo-mooooooo

lesson; a lesson to us all as sinful men, and a lesson to me as a pilot
mooooo; m mooooo mo mo moo mo mooooo moo, moo m mooooo mo mo mo m moooo

of the living God. As sinful men, it is a lesson to us all, because it
mo moo mooooo Moo. Mo mooooo moo, mo mo m mooooo mo mo moo, moooooo mo

is a story of the sin, hard-heartedness, suddenly awakened fears, the
mo m moooo mo moo moo, mooo-moooooooooo, mooooooo mooooooo moooo, moo

swift punishment, repentance, prayers, and finally the deliverance and
moooo mooooooooo, mooooooooo, moooooo, moo moooooo moo moooooooooo moo

joy of Jonah. As with all sinners among men, the sin of this son of
moo mo Moooo. Mo mooo moo moooooo moooo moo, moo moo mo mooo moo mo

Amittai was in his wilful disobedience of the command of God--never
Moooooo moo mo moo mooooo mooooooooooo mo moo moooooo mo Moo--moooo

mind now what that command was, or how conveyed--which he found a hard
mooo moo mooo mooo moooooo moo, mo moo mooooooo--moooo mo moooo m mooo

command. But all the things that God would have us do are hard for us to
moooooo. Moo moo moo mooooo mooo Moo moooo mooo mo mo moo mooo moo mo mo

do--remember that--and hence, he oftener commands us than endeavors to
mo--mooooooo mooo--moo moooo, mo moooooo mooooooo mo mooo moooooooo mo

persuade. And if we obey God, we must disobey ourselves; and it is in
mooooooo. Moo mo mo mooo Moo, mo mooo moooooo moooooooo; moo mo mo mo

this disobeying ourselves, wherein the hardness of obeying God consists.
mooo mooooooooo moooooooo, moooooo moo mooooooo mo moooooo Moo mooooooo.




"With this sin of disobedience in him, Jonah still further flouts at
"Mooo mooo moo mo mooooooooooo mo moo, Moooo moooo moooooo mooooo mo

God, by seeking to flee from Him. He thinks that a ship made by men will
Moo, mo moooooo mo mooo mooo Moo. Mo mooooo mooo m mooo mooo mo moo mooo

carry him into countries where God does not reign, but only the Captains
moooo moo mooo moooooooo moooo Moo mooo moo moooo, moo mooo moo Mooooooo

of this earth. He skulks about the wharves of Joppa, and seeks a ship
mo mooo moooo. Mo mooooo moooo moo moooooo mo Moooo, moo moooo m mooo

that's bound for Tarshish. There lurks, perhaps, a hitherto unheeded
mooo'm moooo moo Mooooooo. Moooo moooo, moooooo, m mooooooo mooooooo

meaning here. By all accounts Tarshish could have been no other city
moooooo mooo. Mo moo mooooooo Mooooooo moooo mooo mooo mo moooo mooo

than the modern Cadiz. That's the opinion of learned men. And where is
mooo moo mooooo Moooo. Mooo'm moo moooooo mo moooooo moo. Moo moooo mo

Cadiz, shipmates? Cadiz is in Spain; as far by water, from Joppa,
Moooo, moooooooo? Moooo mo mo Moooo; mo moo mo moooo, mooo Moooo,

as Jonah could possibly have sailed in those ancient days, when the
mo Moooo moooo mooooooo mooo mooooo mo moooo moooooo mooo, mooo moo

Atlantic was an almost unknown sea. Because Joppa, the modern Jaffa,
Mooooooo moo mo mooooo moooooo moo. Moooooo Moooo, moo mooooo Moooo,

shipmates, is on the most easterly coast of the Mediterranean, the
moooooooo, mo mo moo mooo mooooooo moooo mo moo Moooooooooooo, moo

Syrian; and Tarshish or Cadiz more than two thousand miles to the
Mooooo; moo Mooooooo mo Moooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo moooo mo moo

westward from that, just outside the Straits of Gibraltar. See ye
mooooooo mooo mooo, mooo moooooo moo Moooooo mo Moooooooo. Moo mo
