not then, shipmates, that Jonah sought to flee world-wide from God?
moo mooo, moooooooo, mooo Moooo mooooo mo mooo moooo-mooo mooo Moo?

Miserable man! Oh! most contemptible and worthy of all scorn; with
Moooooooo moo! Mo! mooo mooooooooooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo; mooo

slouched hat and guilty eye, skulking from his God; prowling among the
mooooooo moo moo mooooo moo, mooooooo mooo moo Moo; mooooooo moooo moo

shipping like a vile burglar hastening to cross the seas. So disordered,
mooooooo mooo m mooo moooooo moooooooo mo moooo moo mooo. Mo mooooooooo,

self-condemning is his look, that had there been policemen in those
mooo-mooooooooo mo moo mooo, mooo moo moooo mooo moooooooo mo moooo

days, Jonah, on the mere suspicion of something wrong, had been arrested
mooo, Moooo, mo moo mooo moooooooo mo moooooooo moooo, moo mooo mooooooo

ere he touched a deck. How plainly he's a fugitive! no baggage, not a
moo mo moooooo m mooo. Moo moooooo mo'm m mooooooo! mo moooooo, moo m

hat-box, valise, or carpet-bag,--no friends accompany him to the wharf
moo-moo, mooooo, mo mooooo-moo,--mo moooooo moooooooo moo mo moo moooo

with their adieux. At last, after much dodging search, he finds the
mooo moooo mooooo. Mo mooo, moooo mooo moooooo mooooo, mo moooo moo

Tarshish ship receiving the last items of her cargo; and as he steps on
Mooooooo mooo moooooooo moo mooo moooo mo moo moooo; moo mo mo moooo mo

board to see its Captain in the cabin, all the sailors for the moment
moooo mo moo moo Moooooo mo moo moooo, moo moo moooooo moo moo mooooo

desist from hoisting in the goods, to mark the stranger's evil eye.
mooooo mooo mooooooo mo moo moooo, mo mooo moo mooooooo'm mooo moo.

Jonah sees this; but in vain he tries to look all ease and confidence;
Moooo mooo mooo; moo mo mooo mo moooo mo mooo moo mooo moo mooooooooo;

in vain essays his wretched smile. Strong intuitions of the man assure
mo mooo mooooo moo mooooooo moooo. Mooooo mooooooooo mo moo moo mooooo

the mariners he can be no innocent. In their gamesome but still serious
moo mooooooo mo moo mo mo mooooooo. Mo moooo mooooooo moo moooo moooooo

way, one whispers to the other--"Jack, he's robbed a widow;" or, "Joe,
moo, moo mooooooo mo moo moooo--"Mooo, mo'm mooooo m moooo;" mo, "Moo,

do you mark him; he's a bigamist;" or, "Harry lad, I guess he's the
mo moo mooo moo; mo'm m mooooooo;" mo, "Moooo moo, M moooo mo'm moo

adulterer that broke jail in old Gomorrah, or belike, one of the missing
moooooooo mooo moooo mooo mo moo Mooooooo, mo mooooo, moo mo moo moooooo

murderers from Sodom." Another runs to read the bill that's stuck
moooooooo mooo Moooo." Moooooo mooo mo mooo moo mooo mooo'm moooo

against the spile upon the wharf to which the ship is moored, offering
moooooo moo moooo mooo moo moooo mo moooo moo mooo mo mooooo, mooooooo

five hundred gold coins for the apprehension of a parricide, and
mooo moooooo mooo moooo moo moo mooooooooooo mo m moooooooo, moo

containing a description of his person. He reads, and looks from Jonah
mooooooooo m moooooooooo mo moo mooooo. Mo moooo, moo moooo mooo Moooo

to the bill; while all his sympathetic shipmates now crowd round Jonah,
mo moo mooo; moooo moo moo moooooooooo moooooooo moo moooo moooo Moooo,

prepared to lay their hands upon him. Frighted Jonah trembles, and
mooooooo mo moo moooo moooo mooo moo. Mooooooo Moooo mooooooo, moo

summoning all his boldness to his face, only looks so much the more a
moooooooo moo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo, mooo moooo mo mooo moo mooo m

coward. He will not confess himself suspected; but that itself is strong
mooooo. Mo mooo moo moooooo moooooo moooooooo; moo mooo mooooo mo mooooo

suspicion. So he makes the best of it; and when the sailors find him
moooooooo. Mo mo moooo moo mooo mo mo; moo mooo moo moooooo mooo moo

not to be the man that is advertised, they let him pass, and he descends
moo mo mo moo moo mooo mo mooooooooo, mooo moo moo mooo, moo mo mooooooo

into the cabin.
mooo moo moooo.




"'Who's there?' cries the Captain at his busy desk, hurriedly making
"'Moo'm moooo?' moooo moo Moooooo mo moo mooo mooo, moooooooo mooooo

out his papers for the Customs--'Who's there?' Oh! how that harmless
moo moo mooooo moo moo Moooooo--'Moo'm moooo?' Mo! moo mooo mooooooo

question mangles Jonah! For the instant he almost turns to flee again.
mooooooo moooooo Moooo! Moo moo moooooo mo mooooo moooo mo mooo moooo.

But he rallies. 'I seek a passage in this ship to Tarshish; how soon
Moo mo moooooo. 'M mooo m moooooo mo mooo mooo mo Mooooooo; moo mooo

sail ye, sir?' Thus far the busy Captain had not looked up to Jonah,
mooo mo, moo?' Mooo moo moo mooo Moooooo moo moo mooooo mo mo Moooo,

though the man now stands before him; but no sooner does he hear that
mooooo moo moo moo mooooo mooooo moo; moo mo mooooo mooo mo mooo mooo

hollow voice, than he darts a scrutinizing glance. 'We sail with the
mooooo moooo, mooo mo moooo m mooooooooooo mooooo. 'Mo mooo mooo moo

next coming tide,' at last he slowly answered, still intently eyeing
mooo mooooo mooo,' mo mooo mo mooooo mooooooo, moooo mooooooo mooooo

him. 'No sooner, sir?'--'Soon enough for any honest man that goes a
moo. 'Mo mooooo, moo?'--'Mooo mooooo moo moo mooooo moo mooo mooo m

passenger.' Ha! Jonah, that's another stab. But he swiftly calls away
moooooooo.' Mo! Moooo, mooo'm moooooo mooo. Moo mo moooooo moooo mooo

the Captain from that scent. 'I'll sail with ye,'--he says,--'the
moo Moooooo mooo mooo moooo. 'M'mo mooo mooo mo,'--mo mooo,--'moo

passage money how much is that?--I'll pay now.' For it is particularly
moooooo moooo moo mooo mo mooo?--M'mo moo moo.' Moo mo mo mooooooooooo

written, shipmates, as if it were a thing not to be overlooked in this
moooooo, moooooooo, mo mo mo mooo m moooo moo mo mo mooooooooo mo mooo

history, 'that he paid the fare thereof' ere the craft did sail. And
moooooo, 'mooo mo mooo moo mooo moooooo' moo moo moooo moo mooo. Moo

taken with the context, this is full of meaning.
moooo mooo moo moooooo, mooo mo mooo mo moooooo.




"Now Jonah's Captain, shipmates, was one whose discernment detects crime
"Moo Moooo'm Moooooo, moooooooo, moo moo moooo moooooooooo moooooo moooo

in any, but whose cupidity exposes it only in the penniless. In this
mo moo, moo moooo mooooooo moooooo mo mooo mo moo moooooooo. Mo mooo

world, shipmates, sin that pays its way can travel freely, and without
moooo, moooooooo, moo mooo mooo moo moo moo mooooo mooooo, moo moooooo

a passport; whereas Virtue, if a pauper, is stopped at all frontiers.
m mooooooo; moooooo Mooooo, mo m mooooo, mo moooooo mo moo moooooooo.

So Jonah's Captain prepares to test the length of Jonah's purse, ere he
Mo Moooo'm Moooooo mooooooo mo mooo moo mooooo mo Moooo'm moooo, moo mo

judge him openly. He charges him thrice the usual sum; and it's assented
moooo moo mooooo. Mo moooooo moo mooooo moo moooo moo; moo mo'm mooooooo

to. Then the Captain knows that Jonah is a fugitive; but at the same
mo. Mooo moo Moooooo moooo mooo Moooo mo m mooooooo; moo mo moo mooo

time resolves to help a flight that paves its rear with gold. Yet when
mooo mooooooo mo mooo m mooooo mooo moooo moo mooo mooo mooo. Moo mooo

Jonah fairly takes out his purse, prudent suspicions still molest the
Moooo mooooo moooo moo moo moooo, moooooo mooooooooo moooo mooooo moo

Captain. He rings every coin to find a counterfeit. Not a forger, any
Moooooo. Mo moooo moooo mooo mo mooo m moooooooooo. Moo m mooooo, moo

way, he mutters; and Jonah is put down for his passage. 'Point out my
moo, mo moooooo; moo Moooo mo moo mooo moo moo moooooo. 'Moooo moo mo

state-room, Sir,' says Jonah now, 'I'm travel-weary; I need sleep.'
moooo-mooo, Moo,' mooo Moooo moo, 'M'm mooooo-moooo; M mooo moooo.'

'Thou lookest like it,' says the Captain, 'there's thy room.' Jonah
'Mooo moooooo mooo mo,' mooo moo Moooooo, 'moooo'm moo mooo.' Moooo

enters, and would lock the door, but the lock contains no key. Hearing
mooooo, moo moooo mooo moo mooo, moo moo mooo mooooooo mo moo. Moooooo

him foolishly fumbling there, the Captain laughs lowly to himself, and
moo moooooooo mooooooo moooo, moo Moooooo mooooo moooo mo moooooo, moo

mutters something about the doors of convicts' cells being never allowed
moooooo moooooooo moooo moo moooo mo mooooooo' moooo moooo moooo moooooo

to be locked within. All dressed and dusty as he is, Jonah throws
mo mo mooooo mooooo. Moo moooooo moo moooo mo mo mo, Moooo mooooo

himself into his berth, and finds the little state-room ceiling almost
moooooo mooo moo moooo, moo moooo moo mooooo moooo-mooo moooooo mooooo

resting on his forehead. The air is close, and Jonah gasps. Then, in
moooooo mo moo mooooooo. Moo moo mo moooo, moo Moooo moooo. Mooo, mo

that contracted hole, sunk, too, beneath the ship's water-line, Jonah
mooo mooooooooo mooo, mooo, moo, moooooo moo mooo'm moooo-mooo, Moooo

feels the heralding presentiment of that stifling hour, when the whale
moooo moo moooooooo mooooooooooo mo mooo mooooooo mooo, mooo moo moooo

shall hold him in the smallest of his bowels' wards.
moooo mooo moo mo moo mooooooo mo moo mooooo' moooo.




"Screwed at its axis against the side, a swinging lamp slightly
"Moooooo mo moo mooo moooooo moo mooo, m mooooooo mooo mooooooo

oscillates in Jonah's room; and the ship, heeling over towards the wharf
mooooooooo mo Moooo'm mooo; moo moo mooo, moooooo mooo moooooo moo moooo

with the weight of the last bales received, the lamp, flame and all,
mooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo moooo mooooooo, moo mooo, moooo moo moo,

mooooo mo mooooo mooooo, moooo moooooooo m moooooooo moooooooo mooo

reference to the room; though, in truth, infallibly straight itself, it
moooooooo mo moo mooo; mooooo, mo moooo, mooooooooo mooooooo mooooo, mo

but made obvious the false, lying levels among which it hung. The lamp
moo mooo moooooo moo moooo, moooo mooooo moooo moooo mo mooo. Moo mooo

mooooo moo moooooooo Moooo; mo moooo mo moo moooo moo moooooooo mooo

mooooo moo moo mooooooo mooooo. Moo mooo moooooooooooo mo moo mooo mooo

and more appals him. The floor, the ceiling, and the side, are all awry.
moo mooo mooooo moo. Moo moooo, moo moooooo, moo moo mooo, moo moo mooo.

'Oh! so my conscience hangs in me!' he groans, 'straight upwards, so it
'Mo! mo mo mooooooooo moooo mo mo!' mo mooooo, 'mooooooo moooooo, mo mo

burns; but the chambers of my soul are all in crookedness!'
moooo; moo moo mooooooo mo mo mooo moo moo mo moooooooooo!'




"Like one who after a night of drunken revelry hies to his bed, still
"Mooo moo moo moooo m moooo mo moooooo moooooo mooo mo moo moo, moooo

reeling, but with conscience yet pricking him, as the plungings of the
moooooo, moo mooo mooooooooo moo mooooooo moo, mo moo moooooooo mo moo

moooooo Moo moo mooooooooooo moooo moo moo mo mooooo; moo mo mooo mooo

of ponderous misery drags him drowning down to sleep.
mo moooooooo mooooo moooo moo mooooooo mooo mo moooo.




"And now the time of tide has come; the ship casts off her cables; and
"Moo moo moo mooo mo mooo moo mooo; moo mooo moooo moo moo mooooo; moo

from the deserted wharf the uncheered ship for Tarshish, all careening,

moooooooo mooo.




"Terrors upon terrors run shouting through his soul. In all his cringing
"Moooooo mooo moooooo moo mooooooo moooooo moo mooo. Mo moo moo mooooooo

attitudes, the God-fugitive is now too plainly known. The sailors mark

"'I am a Hebrew,' he cries--and then--'I fear the Lord the God of Heaven

"And now behold Jonah taken up as an anchor and dropped into the sea;

Moooo."




While he was speaking these words, the howling of the shrieking,
Moooo mo moo mooooooo moooo moooo, moo moooooo mo moo moooooooo,

slanting storm without seemed to add new power to the preacher, who,
mooooooo moooo moooooo mooooo mo moo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo, moo,

mooo mooooooooo Moooo'm moo-moooo, mooooo mooooo mo m moooo moooooo.

His deep chest heaved as with a ground-swell; his tossed arms seemed the
Moo mooo moooo mooooo mo mooo m mooooo-moooo; moo mooooo mooo mooooo moo

moooooo mooo mo moo mooo m moooo mooo mooo moo moooooo mo mooo.

mooo, moo moo mooooo, mooooo moooooooo mooo Moo moo moooooo.

mooo mo mooooo mo moo moooooo moo mooooooo mooooooo, mo moooo moooo

words:
moooo:




"Shipmates, God has laid but one hand upon you; both his hands press
"Moooooooo, Moo moo mooo moo moo mooo mooo moo; mooo moo moooo moooo

upon me. I have read ye by what murky light may be mine the lesson that
mooo mo. M mooo mooo mo mo mooo moooo moooo moo mo mooo moo mooooo mooo

moo M mo m moooooo mooooo mooo mo. Moo moo moo mooooo moooo M mooo mooo

from this mast-head and sit on the hatches there where you sit, and
mooo mooo mooo-mooo moo moo mo moo moooooo moooo moooo moo moo, moo

listen as you listen, while some one of you reads ME that other and more
mooooo mo moo mooooo, moooo mooo moo mo moo moooo MO mooo moooo moo mooo

awful lesson which Jonah teaches to ME, as a pilot of the living God.
moooo mooooo moooo Moooo moooooo mo MO, mo m moooo mo moo mooooo Moo.

How being an anointed pilot-prophet, or speaker of true things, and
Moo moooo mo mooooooo moooo-moooooo, mo moooooo mo mooo mooooo, moo

bidden by the Lord to sound those unwelcome truths in the ears of a
mooooo mo moo Mooo mo moooo moooo moooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo mo m

wicked Nineveh, Jonah, appalled at the hostility he should raise, fled

mooo moo moooooo, moo mooooo mo mooooo moo mooo moo moo Moo mo mooooo

ship at Joppa. But God is everywhere; Tarshish he never reached. As we
mooo mo Moooo. Moo Moo mo mooooooooo; Mooooooo mo moooo moooooo. Mo mo

have seen, God came upon him in the whale, and swallowed him down to
mooo mooo, Moo mooo mooo moo mo moo moooo, moo moooooooo moo mooo mo

living gulfs of doom, and with swift slantings tore him along 'into the
mooooo moooo mo mooo, moo mooo moooo moooooooo mooo moo moooo 'mooo moo

moooo mo moo mooo,' moooo moo moooooo mooooo mooooo moo moo mooooooo

fathoms down, and 'the weeds were wrapped about his head,' and all the
moooooo mooo, moo 'moo moooo mooo moooooo moooo moo mooo,' moo moo moo

mooooo moooo mo moo mooooo mooo moo. Moo mooo mooo mooooo moo moooo mo

any plummet--'out of the belly of hell'--when the whale grounded upon
moo moooooo--'moo mo moo moooo mo mooo'--mooo moo moooo mooooooo mooo

moo moooo'm mooooo moooo, mooo mooo, Moo moooo moo moooooooo, moooooooo

prophet when he cried. Then God spake unto the fish; and from the
moooooo mooo mo moooo. Mooo Moo moooo mooo moo mooo; moo mooo moo

shuddering cold and blackness of the sea, the whale came breeching
mooooooooo mooo moo moooooooo mo moo moo, moo moooo mooo moooooooo

up towards the warm and pleasant sun, and all the delights of air and
mo moooooo moo mooo moo mooooooo moo, moo moo moo mooooooo mo moo moo

earth; and 'vomited out Jonah upon the dry land;' when the word of the
moooo; moo 'moooooo moo Moooo mooo moo moo mooo;' mooo moo mooo mo moo

Lord came a second time; and Jonah, bruised and beaten--his ears, like
Mooo mooo m mooooo mooo; moo Moooo, moooooo moo mooooo--moo mooo, mooo

two sea-shells, still multitudinously murmuring of the ocean--Jonah
moo moo-mooooo, moooo moooooooooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo--Moooo

did the Almighty's bidding. And what was that, shipmates? To preach the
moo moo Mooooooo'm moooooo. Moo mooo moo mooo, moooooooo? Mo mooooo moo

Truth to the face of Falsehood! That was it!
Moooo mo moo mooo mo Moooooooo! Mooo moo mo!




"This, shipmates, this is that other lesson; and woe to that pilot of
"Mooo, moooooooo, mooo mo mooo moooo mooooo; moo moo mo mooo moooo mo

the living God who slights it. Woe to him whom this world charms from
moo mooooo Moo moo moooooo mo. Moo mo moo mooo mooo moooo mooooo mooo

Gospel duty! Woe to him who seeks to pour oil upon the waters when God
Mooooo mooo! Moo mo moo moo moooo mo mooo moo mooo moo mooooo mooo Moo

has brewed them into a gale! Woe to him who seeks to please rather than
moo mooooo mooo mooo m mooo! Moo mo moo moo moooo mo mooooo mooooo mooo

to appal! Woe to him whose good name is more to him than goodness! Woe
mo moooo! Moo mo moo moooo mooo mooo mo mooo mo moo mooo mooooooo! Moo

to him who, in this world, courts not dishonour! Woe to him who would
mo moo moo, mo mooo moooo, mooooo moo moooooooo! Moo mo moo moo moooo

not be true, even though to be false were salvation! Yea, woe to him
moo mo mooo, mooo mooooo mo mo moooo mooo moooooooo! Moo, moo mo moo

who, as the great Pilot Paul has it, while preaching to others is
moo, mo moo moooo Moooo Mooo moo mo, moooo moooooooo mo mooooo mo

himself a castaway!"
moooooo m mooooooo!"




He dropped and fell away from himself for a moment; then lifting his
Mo moooooo moo mooo mooo mooo moooooo moo m mooooo; mooo moooooo moo

face to them again, showed a deep joy in his eyes, as he cried out with
mooo mo mooo moooo, mooooo m mooo moo mo moo mooo, mo mo moooo moo mooo

a heavenly enthusiasm,--"But oh! shipmates! on the starboard hand of
m mooooooo mooooooooo,--"Moo mo! moooooooo! mo moo moooooooo mooo mo

every woe, there is a sure delight; and higher the top of that delight,
moooo moo, moooo mo m mooo moooooo; moo mooooo moo moo mo mooo moooooo,

than the bottom of the woe is deep. Is not the main-truck higher than
mooo moo mooooo mo moo moo mo mooo. Mo moo moo mooo-moooo mooooo mooo

the kelson is low? Delight is to him--a far, far upward, and inward
moo mooooo mo moo? Moooooo mo mo moo--m moo, moo mooooo, moo mooooo

delight--who against the proud gods and commodores of this earth, ever
moooooo--moo moooooo moo moooo mooo moo mooooooooo mo mooo moooo, mooo

stands forth his own inexorable self. Delight is to him whose strong
mooooo moooo moo moo mooooooooo mooo. Moooooo mo mo moo moooo mooooo

arms yet support him, when the ship of this base treacherous world has
mooo moo moooooo moo, mooo moo mooo mo mooo mooo moooooooooo moooo moo

gone down beneath him. Delight is to him, who gives no quarter in the
mooo mooo moooooo moo. Moooooo mo mo moo, moo moooo mo moooooo mo moo

truth, and kills, burns, and destroys all sin though he pluck it out
moooo, moo moooo, moooo, moo mooooooo moo moo mooooo mo moooo mo moo

from under the robes of Senators and Judges. Delight,--top-gallant
mooo moooo moo moooo mo Mooooooo moo Mooooo. Moooooo,--moo-moooooo

delight is to him, who acknowledges no law or lord, but the Lord his
moooooo mo mo moo, moo mooooooooooo mo moo mo mooo, moo moo Mooo moo

God, and is only a patriot to heaven. Delight is to him, whom all the
Moo, moo mo mooo m moooooo mo mooooo. Moooooo mo mo moo, mooo moo moo

waves of the billows of the seas of the boisterous mob can never shake
moooo mo moo moooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooooooooo moo moo moooo moooo

from this sure Keel of the Ages. And eternal delight and deliciousness
mooo mooo mooo Mooo mo moo Mooo. Moo moooooo moooooo moo moooooooooooo

will be his, who coming to lay him down, can say with his final
mooo mo moo, moo mooooo mo moo moo mooo, moo moo mooo moo moooo

breath--O Father!--chiefly known to me by Thy rod--mortal or immortal,
mooooo--M Mooooo!--moooooo moooo mo mo mo Moo moo--mooooo mo mooooooo,

here I die. I have striven to be Thine, more than to be this world's, or
mooo M moo. M mooo moooooo mo mo Moooo, mooo mooo mo mo mooo moooo'm, mo

mine own. Yet this is nothing: I leave eternity to Thee; for what is man
mooo moo. Moo mooo mo moooooo: M moooo mooooooo mo Mooo; moo mooo mo moo

that he should live out the lifetime of his God?"
mooo mo mooooo mooo moo moo mooooooo mo moo Moo?"




He said no more, but slowly waving a benediction, covered his face with
Mo mooo mo mooo, moo mooooo mooooo m moooooooooo, moooooo moo mooo mooo

his hands, and so remained kneeling, till all the people had departed,
moo moooo, moo mo mooooooo mooooooo, mooo moo moo mooooo moo mooooooo,

and he was left alone in the place.
moo mo moo mooo moooo mo moo moooo.










CHAPTER 10. A Bosom Friend.
MOOOOOO mo. M Moooo Mooooo.







Returning to the Spouter-Inn from the Chapel, I found Queequeg there
Moooooooo mo moo Moooooo-Moo mooo moo Mooooo, M moooo Mooooooo moooo

quite alone; he having left the Chapel before the benediction some time.
moooo moooo; mo mooooo mooo moo Mooooo mooooo moo moooooooooo mooo mooo.

He was sitting on a bench before the fire, with his feet on the stove
Mo moo moooooo mo m moooo mooooo moo mooo, mooo moo mooo mo moo moooo

hearth, and in one hand was holding close up to his face that little
mooooo, moo mo moo mooo moo moooooo moooo mo mo moo mooo mooo mooooo

negro idol of his; peering hard into its face, and with a jack-knife
moooo mooo mo moo; moooooo mooo mooo moo mooo, moo mooo m mooo-moooo

gently whittling away at its nose, meanwhile humming to himself in his
mooooo moooooooo mooo mo moo mooo, moooooooo moooooo mo moooooo mo moo

heathenish way.
mooooooooo moo.




But being now interrupted, he put up the image; and pretty soon, going
Moo moooo moo moooooooooo, mo moo mo moo moooo; moo mooooo mooo, moooo

to the table, took up a large book there, and placing it on his lap
mo moo moooo, mooo mo m moooo mooo moooo, moo moooooo mo mo moo moo

began counting the pages with deliberate regularity; at every fiftieth
moooo mooooooo moo moooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooooo; mo moooo mooooooo

page--as I fancied--stopping a moment, looking vacantly around him, and
mooo--mo M moooooo--mooooooo m mooooo, moooooo mooooooo mooooo moo, moo

giving utterance to a long-drawn gurgling whistle of astonishment. He
mooooo moooooooo mo m mooo-moooo mooooooo moooooo mo mooooooooooo. Mo

would then begin again at the next fifty; seeming to commence at number
moooo mooo moooo moooo mo moo mooo moooo; moooooo mo mooooooo mo mooooo

one each time, as though he could not count more than fifty, and it was
moo mooo mooo, mo mooooo mo moooo moo moooo mooo mooo moooo, moo mo moo

only by such a large number of fifties being found together, that his
mooo mo mooo m moooo mooooo mo moooooo moooo moooo mooooooo, mooo moo

astonishment at the multitude of pages was excited.
mooooooooooo mo moo moooooooo mo moooo moo moooooo.




With much interest I sat watching him. Savage though he was, and
Mooo mooo mooooooo M moo mooooooo moo. Mooooo mooooo mo moo, moo

hideously marred about the face--at least to my taste--his countenance
moooooooo mooooo moooo moo mooo--mo moooo mo mo moooo--moo moooooooooo

yet had a something in it which was by no means disagreeable. You cannot
moo moo m moooooooo mo mo moooo moo mo mo moooo mooooooooooo. Moo mooooo

hide the soul. Through all his unearthly tattooings, I thought I saw
mooo moo mooo. Moooooo moo moo moooooooo mooooooooo, M moooooo M moo

the traces of a simple honest heart; and in his large, deep eyes,
moo mooooo mo m mooooo mooooo moooo; moo mo moo moooo, mooo mooo,

fiery black and bold, there seemed tokens of a spirit that would dare a
moooo moooo moo mooo, moooo mooooo mooooo mo m mooooo mooo moooo mooo m

thousand devils. And besides all this, there was a certain lofty bearing
mooooooo mooooo. Moo moooooo moo mooo, moooo moo m moooooo moooo moooooo

about the Pagan, which even his uncouthness could not altogether maim.
moooo moo Moooo, moooo mooo moo moooooooooo moooo moo mooooooooo mooo.

He looked like a man who had never cringed and never had had a creditor.
Mo mooooo mooo m moo moo moo moooo moooooo moo moooo moo moo m mooooooo.

Whether it was, too, that his head being shaved, his forehead was drawn
Moooooo mo moo, moo, mooo moo mooo moooo mooooo, moo mooooooo moo moooo

out in freer and brighter relief, and looked more expansive than it
moo mo moooo moo mooooooo mooooo, moo mooooo mooo moooooooo mooo mo

otherwise would, this I will not venture to decide; but certain it was
moooooooo moooo, mooo M mooo moo moooooo mo mooooo; moo moooooo mo moo

his head was phrenologically an excellent one. It may seem ridiculous,
moo mooo moo moooooooooooooo mo moooooooo moo. Mo moo mooo mooooooooo,

but it reminded me of General Washington's head, as seen in the popular
moo mo mooooooo mo mo Moooooo Mooooooooo'm mooo, mo mooo mo moo moooooo

busts of him. It had the same long regularly graded retreating slope
moooo mo moo. Mo moo moo mooo mooo moooooooo mooooo mooooooooo moooo

from above the brows, which were likewise very projecting, like two
mooo moooo moo moooo, moooo mooo mooooooo mooo mooooooooo, mooo moo

long promontories thickly wooded on top. Queequeg was George Washington
mooo mooooooooooo moooooo mooooo mo moo. Mooooooo moo Mooooo Mooooooooo

cannibalistically developed.
moooooooooooooooo moooooooo.




Whilst I was thus closely scanning him, half-pretending meanwhile to be
Mooooo M moo mooo moooooo mooooooo moo, mooo-mooooooooo moooooooo mo mo

looking out at the storm from the casement, he never heeded my presence,
moooooo moo mo moo moooo mooo moo mooooooo, mo moooo mooooo mo mooooooo,

never troubled himself with so much as a single glance; but appeared
moooo mooooooo moooooo mooo mo mooo mo m mooooo mooooo; moo mooooooo

wholly occupied with counting the pages of the marvellous book.
mooooo mooooooo mooo mooooooo moo moooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo.

Considering how sociably we had been sleeping together the night
Moooooooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo mooooooo moo moooo

previous, and especially considering the affectionate arm I had found
mooooooo, moo mooooooooo moooooooooo moo mooooooooooo moo M moo moooo

thrown over me upon waking in the morning, I thought this indifference
mooooo mooo mo mooo mooooo mo moo moooooo, M moooooo mooo mooooooooooo

of his very strange. But savages are strange beings; at times you do not
mo moo mooo moooooo. Moo moooooo moo moooooo mooooo; mo moooo moo mo moo

know exactly how to take them. At first they are overawing; their calm
mooo moooooo moo mo mooo mooo. Mo moooo mooo moo moooooooo; moooo mooo

self-collectedness of simplicity seems a Socratic wisdom. I had noticed
mooo-moooooooooooo mo mooooooooo moooo m Mooooooo mooooo. M moo moooooo

also that Queequeg never consorted at all, or but very little, with the
mooo mooo Mooooooo moooo moooooooo mo moo, mo moo mooo mooooo, mooo moo

other seamen in the inn. He made no advances whatever; appeared to have
moooo mooooo mo moo moo. Mo mooo mo mooooooo mooooooo; mooooooo mo mooo

no desire to enlarge the circle of his acquaintances. All this struck
mo mooooo mo moooooo moo mooooo mo moo moooooooooooo. Moo mooo mooooo

me as mighty singular; yet, upon second thoughts, there was something
mo mo mooooo mooooooo; moo, mooo mooooo mooooooo, moooo moo moooooooo

almost sublime in it. Here was a man some twenty thousand miles from
mooooo moooooo mo mo. Mooo moo m moo mooo mooooo mooooooo moooo mooo

home, by the way of Cape Horn, that is--which was the only way he could
mooo, mo moo moo mo Mooo Mooo, mooo mo--moooo moo moo mooo moo mo moooo

get there--thrown among people as strange to him as though he were in
moo moooo--mooooo moooo mooooo mo moooooo mo moo mo mooooo mo mooo mo

the planet Jupiter; and yet he seemed entirely at his ease; preserving
moo mooooo Moooooo; moo moo mo mooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo; mooooooooo

the utmost serenity; content with his own companionship; always equal to
moo mooooo mooooooo; moooooo mooo moo moo moooooooooooo; mooooo moooo mo

himself. Surely this was a touch of fine philosophy; though no doubt he
moooooo. Mooooo mooo moo m moooo mo mooo mooooooooo; mooooo mo moooo mo

had never heard there was such a thing as that. But, perhaps, to be
moo moooo moooo moooo moo mooo m moooo mo mooo. Moo, moooooo, mo mo

true philosophers, we mortals should not be conscious of so living or
mooo mooooooooooo, mo moooooo mooooo moo mo moooooooo mo mo mooooo mo

so striving. So soon as I hear that such or such a man gives himself
mo mooooooo. Mo mooo mo M mooo mooo mooo mo mooo m moo moooo moooooo

out for a philosopher, I conclude that, like the dyspeptic old woman, he
moo moo m moooooooooo, M mooooooo mooo, mooo moo moooooooo moo moooo, mo

must have "broken his digester."
mooo mooo "mooooo moo mooooooo."




As I sat there in that now lonely room; the fire burning low, in that
Mo M moo moooo mo mooo moo mooooo mooo; moo mooo moooooo moo, mo mooo

mild stage when, after its first intensity has warmed the air, it then
mooo moooo mooo, moooo moo moooo moooooooo moo mooooo moo moo, mo mooo

only glows to be looked at; the evening shades and phantoms gathering
mooo moooo mo mo mooooo mo; moo moooooo mooooo moo mooooooo moooooooo

round the casements, and peering in upon us silent, solitary twain;
moooo moo moooooooo, moo moooooo mo mooo mo mooooo, mooooooo moooo;

the storm booming without in solemn swells; I began to be sensible of
moo moooo moooooo moooooo mo mooooo mooooo; M moooo mo mo mooooooo mo

strange feelings. I felt a melting in me. No more my splintered heart
moooooo mooooooo. M mooo m moooooo mo mo. Mo mooo mo mooooooooo moooo

and maddened hand were turned against the wolfish world. This soothing
moo mooooooo mooo mooo mooooo moooooo moo moooooo moooo. Mooo mooooooo

savage had redeemed it. There he sat, his very indifference speaking a
mooooo moo mooooooo mo. Moooo mo moo, moo mooo mooooooooooo mooooooo m

nature in which there lurked no civilized hypocrisies and bland deceits.
mooooo mo moooo moooo mooooo mo moooooooo moooooooooo moo moooo moooooo.

Wild he was; a very sight of sights to see; yet I began to feel myself
Mooo mo moo; m mooo moooo mo mooooo mo moo; moo M moooo mo mooo mooooo

mysteriously drawn towards him. And those same things that would have
mooooooooooo moooo moooooo moo. Moo moooo mooo mooooo mooo moooo mooo

repelled most others, they were the very magnets that thus drew me. I'll
mooooooo mooo mooooo, mooo mooo moo mooo moooooo mooo mooo mooo mo. M'mo

try a pagan friend, thought I, since Christian kindness has proved but
moo m moooo mooooo, moooooo M, moooo Moooooooo mooooooo moo mooooo moo

hollow courtesy. I drew my bench near him, and made some friendly signs
mooooo mooooooo. M mooo mo moooo mooo moo, moo mooo mooo mooooooo moooo

and hints, doing my best to talk with him meanwhile. At first he little
moo moooo, moooo mo mooo mo mooo mooo moo moooooooo. Mo moooo mo mooooo

noticed these advances; but presently, upon my referring to his last
moooooo moooo mooooooo; moo moooooooo, mooo mo moooooooo mo moo mooo

night's hospitalities, he made out to ask me whether we were again to be
moooo'm moooooooooooo, mo mooo moo mo moo mo moooooo mo mooo moooo mo mo

bedfellows. I told him yes; whereat I thought he looked pleased, perhaps
mooooooooo. M mooo moo moo; moooooo M moooooo mo mooooo moooooo, moooooo

a little complimented.
m mooooo mooooooooooo.




We then turned over the book together, and I endeavored to explain to
Mo mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo, moo M mooooooooo mo moooooo mo

him the purpose of the printing, and the meaning of the few pictures
moo moo moooooo mo moo mooooooo, moo moo moooooo mo moo moo mooooooo

that were in it. Thus I soon engaged his interest; and from that we went
mooo mooo mo mo. Mooo M mooo moooooo moo mooooooo; moo mooo mooo mo mooo

to jabbering the best we could about the various outer sights to be seen
mo moooooooo moo mooo mo moooo moooo moo moooooo moooo mooooo mo mo mooo

in this famous town. Soon I proposed a social smoke; and, producing
mo mooo mooooo mooo. Mooo M mooooooo m mooooo moooo; moo, moooooooo

his pouch and tomahawk, he quietly offered me a puff. And then we sat
moo moooo moo mooooooo, mo moooooo moooooo mo m mooo. Moo mooo mo moo

exchanging puffs from that wild pipe of his, and keeping it regularly
mooooooooo moooo mooo mooo mooo mooo mo moo, moo moooooo mo moooooooo

passing between us.
moooooo moooooo mo.




If there yet lurked any ice of indifference towards me in the Pagan's
Mo moooo moo mooooo moo moo mo mooooooooooo moooooo mo mo moo Moooo'm

breast, this pleasant, genial smoke we had, soon thawed it out, and left
mooooo, mooo mooooooo, mooooo moooo mo moo, mooo mooooo mo moo, moo mooo

us cronies. He seemed to take to me quite as naturally and unbiddenly as
mo moooooo. Mo mooooo mo mooo mo mo moooo mo moooooooo moo mooooooooo mo

I to him; and when our smoke was over, he pressed his forehead against
M mo moo; moo mooo moo moooo moo mooo, mo moooooo moo mooooooo moooooo

mine, clasped me round the waist, and said that henceforth we were
mooo, moooooo mo moooo moo moooo, moo mooo mooo mooooooooo mo mooo

married; meaning, in his country's phrase, that we were bosom friends;
moooooo; moooooo, mo moo moooooo'm mooooo, mooo mo mooo moooo moooooo;

he would gladly die for me, if need should be. In a countryman, this
mo moooo mooooo moo moo mo, mo mooo mooooo mo. Mo m mooooooooo, mooo

sudden flame of friendship would have seemed far too premature, a thing
mooooo moooo mo mooooooooo moooo mooo mooooo moo moo moooooooo, m moooo

to be much distrusted; but in this simple savage those old rules would
mo mo mooo mooooooooo; moo mo mooo mooooo mooooo moooo moo moooo moooo

not apply.
moo moooo.




After supper, and another social chat and smoke, we went to our room
Moooo mooooo, moo moooooo mooooo mooo moo moooo, mo mooo mo moo mooo

together. He made me a present of his embalmed head; took out his
mooooooo. Mo mooo mo m moooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo; mooo moo moo

enormous tobacco wallet, and groping under the tobacco, drew out
mooooooo moooooo mooooo, moo moooooo moooo moo moooooo, mooo moo

some thirty dollars in silver; then spreading them on the table, and
mooo mooooo moooooo mo mooooo; mooo moooooooo mooo mo moo moooo, moo

mechanically dividing them into two equal portions, pushed one of them
mooooooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo moo moooo mooooooo, mooooo moo mo mooo

towards me, and said it was mine. I was going to remonstrate; but he
moooooo mo, moo mooo mo moo mooo. M moo moooo mo moooooooooo; moo mo

silenced me by pouring them into my trowsers' pockets. I let them stay.
mooooooo mo mo moooooo mooo mooo mo mooooooo' moooooo. M moo mooo mooo.

He then went about his evening prayers, took out his idol, and removed
Mo mooo mooo moooo moo moooooo moooooo, mooo moo moo mooo, moo moooooo

the paper fireboard. By certain signs and symptoms, I thought he seemed
moo moooo moooooooo. Mo moooooo moooo moo mooooooo, M moooooo mo mooooo

anxious for me to join him; but well knowing what was to follow, I
moooooo moo mo mo mooo moo; moo mooo moooooo mooo moo mo mooooo, M

deliberated a moment whether, in case he invited me, I would comply or
moooooooooo m mooooo moooooo, mo mooo mo moooooo mo, M moooo mooooo mo

otherwise.
moooooooo.




I was a good Christian; born and bred in the bosom of the infallible
M moo m mooo Moooooooo; mooo moo mooo mo moo moooo mo moo mooooooooo

Presbyterian Church. How then could I unite with this wild idolator in
Mooooooooooo Mooooo. Moo mooo moooo M moooo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo mo

worshipping his piece of wood? But what is worship? thought I. Do
moooooooooo moo moooo mo mooo? Moo mooo mo moooooo? moooooo M. Mo

you suppose now, Ishmael, that the magnanimous God of heaven and
moo moooooo moo, Moooooo, mooo moo moooooooooo Moo mo mooooo moo

earth--pagans and all included--can possibly be jealous of an
moooo--mooooo moo moo mooooooo--moo mooooooo mo moooooo mo mo

insignificant bit of black wood? Impossible! But what is worship?--to do
moooooooooooo moo mo moooo mooo? Mooooooooo! Moo mooo mo moooooo?--mo mo

the will of God--THAT is worship. And what is the will of God?--to do to
moo mooo mo Moo--MOOO mo moooooo. Moo mooo mo moo mooo mo Moo?--mo mo mo

my fellow man what I would have my fellow man to do to me--THAT is the
mo mooooo moo mooo M moooo mooo mo mooooo moo mo mo mo mo--MOOO mo moo

will of God. Now, Queequeg is my fellow man. And what do I wish that
mooo mo Moo. Moo, Mooooooo mo mo mooooo moo. Moo mooo mo M mooo mooo

this Queequeg would do to me? Why, unite with me in my particular
mooo Mooooooo moooo mo mo mo? Moo, moooo mooo mo mo mo mooooooooo

Presbyterian form of worship. Consequently, I must then unite with him
Mooooooooooo mooo mo moooooo. Mooooooooooo, M mooo mooo moooo mooo moo

in his; ergo, I must turn idolator. So I kindled the shavings; helped
mo moo; mooo, M mooo mooo mooooooo. Mo M moooooo moo mooooooo; mooooo

prop up the innocent little idol; offered him burnt biscuit with
mooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo mooo; moooooo moo moooo moooooo mooo

Queequeg; salamed before him twice or thrice; kissed his nose; and that
Mooooooo; moooooo mooooo moo moooo mo mooooo; mooooo moo mooo; moo mooo

done, we undressed and went to bed, at peace with our own consciences
mooo, mo moooooooo moo mooo mo moo, mo moooo mooo moo moo moooooooooo

and all the world. But we did not go to sleep without some little chat.
moo moo moo moooo. Moo mo moo moo mo mo moooo moooooo mooo mooooo mooo.




How it is I know not; but there is no place like a bed for confidential
Moo mo mo M mooo moo; moo moooo mo mo moooo mooo m moo moo mooooooooooo

disclosures between friends. Man and wife, they say, there open the very
moooooooooo moooooo moooooo. Moo moo mooo, mooo moo, moooo mooo moo mooo

bottom of their souls to each other; and some old couples often lie
mooooo mo moooo moooo mo mooo moooo; moo mooo moo moooooo moooo moo

and chat over old times till nearly morning. Thus, then, in our hearts'
moo mooo mooo moo moooo mooo mooooo moooooo. Mooo, mooo, mo moo mooooo'

honeymoon, lay I and Queequeg--a cosy, loving pair.
moooooooo, moo M moo Mooooooo--m mooo, mooooo mooo.










CHAPTER 11. Nightgown.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooooooo.







We had lain thus in bed, chatting and napping at short intervals, and
Mo moo mooo mooo mo moo, mooooooo moo moooooo mo moooo moooooooo, moo

Queequeg now and then affectionately throwing his brown tattooed legs
Mooooooo moo moo mooo mooooooooooooo mooooooo moo moooo mooooooo mooo

over mine, and then drawing them back; so entirely sociable and free
mooo mooo, moo mooo moooooo mooo mooo; mo mooooooo mooooooo moo mooo

and easy were we; when, at last, by reason of our confabulations, what
moo mooo mooo mo; mooo, mo mooo, mo mooooo mo moo mooooooooooooo, mooo

little nappishness remained in us altogether departed, and we felt like
mooooo moooooooooo mooooooo mo mo mooooooooo mooooooo, moo mo mooo mooo

getting up again, though day-break was yet some way down the future.
moooooo mo moooo, mooooo moo-moooo moo moo mooo moo mooo moo mooooo.




Yes, we became very wakeful; so much so that our recumbent position
Moo, mo mooooo mooo moooooo; mo mooo mo mooo moo moooooooo mooooooo

began to grow wearisome, and by little and little we found ourselves
moooo mo mooo moooooooo, moo mo mooooo moo mooooo mo moooo moooooooo

sitting up; the clothes well tucked around us, leaning against the
moooooo mo; moo moooooo mooo mooooo mooooo mo, moooooo moooooo moo

head-board with our four knees drawn up close together, and our two
mooo-moooo mooo moo mooo moooo moooo mo moooo mooooooo, moo moo moo

noses bending over them, as if our kneepans were warming-pans. We felt
moooo moooooo mooo mooo, mo mo moo mooooooo mooo moooooo-mooo. Mo mooo

very nice and snug, the more so since it was so chilly out of doors;
mooo mooo moo mooo, moo mooo mo moooo mo moo mo mooooo moo mo moooo;

indeed out of bed-clothes too, seeing that there was no fire in the
mooooo moo mo moo-moooooo moo, mooooo mooo moooo moo mo mooo mo moo

room. The more so, I say, because truly to enjoy bodily warmth, some
mooo. Moo mooo mo, M moo, moooooo moooo mo moooo mooooo mooooo, mooo

small part of you must be cold, for there is no quality in this world
moooo mooo mo moo mooo mo mooo, moo moooo mo mo moooooo mo mooo moooo

that is not what it is merely by contrast. Nothing exists in itself. If
mooo mo moo mooo mo mo mooooo mo mooooooo. Moooooo mooooo mo mooooo. Mo

you flatter yourself that you are all over comfortable, and have been so
moo moooooo mooooooo mooo moo moo moo mooo moooooooooo, moo mooo mooo mo

a long time, then you cannot be said to be comfortable any more. But if,
m mooo mooo, mooo moo mooooo mo mooo mo mo moooooooooo moo mooo. Moo mo,

like Queequeg and me in the bed, the tip of your nose or the crown
mooo Mooooooo moo mo mo moo moo, moo moo mo mooo mooo mo moo moooo

of your head be slightly chilled, why then, indeed, in the general
mo mooo mooo mo mooooooo moooooo, moo mooo, mooooo, mo moo moooooo

consciousness you feel most delightfully and unmistakably warm. For this
moooooooooooo moo mooo mooo mooooooooooo moo mooooooooooo mooo. Moo mooo

reason a sleeping apartment should never be furnished with a fire, which
mooooo m mooooooo moooooooo mooooo moooo mo moooooooo mooo m mooo, moooo

is one of the luxurious discomforts of the rich. For the height of this
mo moo mo moo moooooooo moooooooooo mo moo mooo. Moo moo mooooo mo mooo

sort of deliciousness is to have nothing but the blanket between you and
mooo mo moooooooooooo mo mo mooo moooooo moo moo moooooo moooooo moo moo

your snugness and the cold of the outer air. Then there you lie like the
mooo mooooooo moo moo mooo mo moo moooo moo. Mooo moooo moo moo mooo moo

one warm spark in the heart of an arctic crystal.
moo mooo moooo mo moo moooo mo mo mooooo moooooo.




We had been sitting in this crouching manner for some time, when all at
Mo moo mooo moooooo mo mooo moooooooo mooooo moo mooo mooo, mooo moo mo

once I thought I would open my eyes; for when between sheets, whether
mooo M moooooo M moooo mooo mo mooo; moo mooo moooooo mooooo, moooooo

by day or by night, and whether asleep or awake, I have a way of always
mo moo mo mo moooo, moo moooooo mooooo mo moooo, M mooo m moo mo mooooo

keeping my eyes shut, in order the more to concentrate the snugness
moooooo mo mooo mooo, mo moooo moo mooo mo moooooooooo moo mooooooo

of being in bed. Because no man can ever feel his own identity aright
mo moooo mo moo. Moooooo mo moo moo mooo mooo moo moo mooooooo mooooo

except his eyes be closed; as if darkness were indeed the proper element
mooooo moo mooo mo mooooo; mo mo mooooooo mooo mooooo moo mooooo moooooo

of our essences, though light be more congenial to our clayey part. Upon
mo moo mooooooo, mooooo moooo mo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo mooo. Mooo

opening my eyes then, and coming out of my own pleasant and self-created
moooooo mo mooo mooo, moo mooooo moo mo mo moo mooooooo moo mooo-moooooo

darkness into the imposed and coarse outer gloom of the unilluminated
mooooooo mooo moo moooooo moo mooooo moooo moooo mo moo moooooooooooo

twelve-o'clock-at-night, I experienced a disagreeable revulsion. Nor did
mooooo-m'moooo-mo-moooo, M moooooooooo m mooooooooooo moooooooo. Moo moo

I at all object to the hint from Queequeg that perhaps it were best to
M mo moo mooooo mo moo mooo mooo Mooooooo mooo moooooo mo mooo mooo mo

strike a light, seeing that we were so wide awake; and besides he felt
mooooo m moooo, mooooo mooo mo mooo mo mooo moooo; moo moooooo mo mooo

a strong desire to have a few quiet puffs from his Tomahawk. Be it said,
m mooooo mooooo mo mooo m moo moooo moooo mooo moo Mooooooo. Mo mo mooo,

that though I had felt such a strong repugnance to his smoking in the
mooo mooooo M moo mooo mooo m mooooo mooooooooo mo moo moooooo mo moo

bed the night before, yet see how elastic our stiff prejudices grow when
moo moo moooo mooooo, moo moo moo moooooo moo moooo mooooooooo mooo mooo

love once comes to bend them. For now I liked nothing better than to
mooo mooo moooo mo mooo mooo. Moo moo M moooo moooooo mooooo mooo mo

have Queequeg smoking by me, even in bed, because he seemed to be full
mooo Mooooooo moooooo mo mo, mooo mo moo, moooooo mo mooooo mo mo mooo

of such serene household joy then. I no more felt unduly concerned for
mo mooo mooooo moooooooo moo mooo. M mo mooo mooo mooooo moooooooo moo

the landlord's policy of insurance. I was only alive to the condensed
moo mooooooo'm mooooo mo moooooooo. M moo mooo moooo mo moo moooooooo

confidential comfortableness of sharing a pipe and a blanket with a real
mooooooooooo moooooooooooooo mo moooooo m mooo moo m moooooo mooo m mooo

friend. With our shaggy jackets drawn about our shoulders, we now passed
mooooo. Mooo moo mooooo moooooo moooo moooo moo moooooooo, mo moo mooooo

the Tomahawk from one to the other, till slowly there grew over us a
moo Mooooooo mooo moo mo moo moooo, mooo mooooo moooo mooo mooo mo m

blue hanging tester of smoke, illuminated by the flame of the new-lit
mooo moooooo mooooo mo moooo, moooooooooo mo moo moooo mo moo moo-moo

lamp.
mooo.




Whether it was that this undulating tester rolled the savage away to far
Moooooo mo moo mooo mooo mooooooooo mooooo mooooo moo mooooo mooo mo moo

distant scenes, I know not, but he now spoke of his native island; and,
moooooo mooooo, M mooo moo, moo mo moo moooo mo moo mooooo mooooo; moo,

eager to hear his history, I begged him to go on and tell it. He gladly
moooo mo mooo moo moooooo, M mooooo moo mo mo mo moo mooo mo. Mo mooooo

complied. Though at the time I but ill comprehended not a few of his
mooooooo. Mooooo mo moo mooo M moo moo mooooooooooo moo m moo mo moo

words, yet subsequent disclosures, when I had become more familiar with
moooo, moo mooooooooo moooooooooo, mooo M moo mooooo mooo mooooooo mooo

his broken phraseology, now enable me to present the whole story such as
moo mooooo moooooooooo, moo mooooo mo mo moooooo moo moooo moooo mooo mo

it may prove in the mere skeleton I give.
mo moo moooo mo moo mooo mooooooo M mooo.










CHAPTER 12. Biographical.
MOOOOOO mo. Mooooooooooo.







Queequeg was a native of Rokovoko, an island far away to the West and
Mooooooo moo m mooooo mo Mooooooo, mo mooooo moo mooo mo moo Mooo moo

South. It is not down in any map; true places never are.
Moooo. Mo mo moo mooo mo moo moo; mooo mooooo moooo moo.




When a new-hatched savage running wild about his native woodlands in
Mooo m moo-moooooo mooooo moooooo mooo moooo moo mooooo moooooooo mo

a grass clout, followed by the nibbling goats, as if he were a green
m moooo moooo, mooooooo mo moo mooooooo moooo, mo mo mo mooo m moooo

sapling; even then, in Queequeg's ambitious soul, lurked a strong desire
moooooo; mooo mooo, mo Mooooooo'm moooooooo mooo, mooooo m mooooo mooooo

to see something more of Christendom than a specimen whaler or two. His
mo moo moooooooo mooo mo Moooooooooo mooo m mooooooo mooooo mo moo. Moo

father was a High Chief, a King; his uncle a High Priest; and on the
mooooo moo m Mooo Moooo, m Mooo; moo moooo m Mooo Mooooo; moo mo moo

maternal side he boasted aunts who were the wives of unconquerable
mooooooo mooo mo moooooo moooo moo mooo moo moooo mo moooooooooooo

warriors. There was excellent blood in his veins--royal stuff; though
mooooooo. Moooo moo moooooooo moooo mo moo moooo--moooo moooo; mooooo

sadly vitiated, I fear, by the cannibal propensity he nourished in his
moooo mooooooo, M mooo, mo moo mooooooo mooooooooo mo moooooooo mo moo

untutored youth.
moooooooo moooo.




A Sag Harbor ship visited his father's bay, and Queequeg sought a
M Moo Mooooo mooo moooooo moo mooooo'm moo, moo Mooooooo mooooo m

passage to Christian lands. But the ship, having her full complement of
moooooo mo Moooooooo moooo. Moo moo mooo, mooooo moo mooo mooooooooo mo

seamen, spurned his suit; and not all the King his father's influence
mooooo, moooooo moo mooo; moo moo moo moo Mooo moo mooooo'm moooooooo

could prevail. But Queequeg vowed a vow. Alone in his canoe, he paddled
moooo moooooo. Moo Mooooooo moooo m moo. Moooo mo moo moooo, mo moooooo

off to a distant strait, which he knew the ship must pass through when
moo mo m moooooo mooooo, moooo mo mooo moo mooo mooo mooo moooooo mooo

she quitted the island. On one side was a coral reef; on the other a low
moo moooooo moo mooooo. Mo moo mooo moo m moooo mooo; mo moo moooo m moo

tongue of land, covered with mangrove thickets that grew out into the
mooooo mo mooo, moooooo mooo mooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo moo mooo moo

water. Hiding his canoe, still afloat, among these thickets, with its
moooo. Mooooo moo moooo, moooo mooooo, moooo moooo mooooooo, mooo moo

prow seaward, he sat down in the stern, paddle low in hand; and when the
mooo moooooo, mo moo mooo mo moo moooo, mooooo moo mo mooo; moo mooo moo

ship was gliding by, like a flash he darted out; gained her side; with
mooo moo moooooo mo, mooo m moooo mo mooooo moo; mooooo moo mooo; mooo

one backward dash of his foot capsized and sank his canoe; climbed up
moo mooooooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooooo moo mooo moo moooo; moooooo mo

the chains; and throwing himself at full length upon the deck, grappled
moo mooooo; moo mooooooo moooooo mo mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo, mooooooo

a ring-bolt there, and swore not to let it go, though hacked in pieces.
m mooo-mooo moooo, moo moooo moo mo moo mo mo, mooooo mooooo mo mooooo.




In vain the captain threatened to throw him overboard; suspended a
Mo mooo moo moooooo mooooooooo mo moooo moo moooooooo; moooooooo m

cutlass over his naked wrists; Queequeg was the son of a King, and
moooooo mooo moo moooo mooooo; Mooooooo moo moo moo mo m Mooo, moo

Queequeg budged not. Struck by his desperate dauntlessness, and his wild
Mooooooo mooooo moo. Mooooo mo moo moooooooo moooooooooooo, moo moo mooo

desire to visit Christendom, the captain at last relented, and told
mooooo mo moooo Moooooooooo, moo moooooo mo mooo mooooooo, moo mooo

him he might make himself at home. But this fine young savage--this sea
moo mo moooo mooo moooooo mo mooo. Moo mooo mooo moooo mooooo--mooo moo

Prince of Wales, never saw the Captain's cabin. They put him down among
Mooooo mo Moooo, moooo moo moo Moooooo'm moooo. Mooo moo moo mooo moooo

the sailors, and made a whaleman of him. But like Czar Peter content to
moo moooooo, moo mooo m mooooooo mo moo. Moo mooo Mooo Moooo moooooo mo

toil in the shipyards of foreign cities, Queequeg disdained no seeming
mooo mo moo moooooooo mo moooooo mooooo, Mooooooo moooooooo mo moooooo

ignominy, if thereby he might happily gain the power of enlightening his
mooooooo, mo moooooo mo moooo moooooo mooo moo moooo mo mooooooooooo moo

untutored countrymen. For at bottom--so he told me--he was actuated by a
moooooooo mooooooooo. Moo mo mooooo--mo mo mooo mo--mo moo mooooooo mo m

profound desire to learn among the Christians, the arts whereby to
mooooooo mooooo mo moooo moooo moo Mooooooooo, moo mooo moooooo mo

make his people still happier than they were; and more than that,
mooo moo mooooo moooo moooooo mooo mooo mooo; moo mooo mooo mooo,

still better than they were. But, alas! the practices of whalemen soon
moooo mooooo mooo mooo mooo. Moo, mooo! moo moooooooo mo mooooooo mooo

convinced him that even Christians could be both miserable and wicked;
moooooooo moo mooo mooo Mooooooooo moooo mo mooo moooooooo moo mooooo;

infinitely more so, than all his father's heathens. Arrived at last in
mooooooooo mooo mo, mooo moo moo mooooo'm mooooooo. Moooooo mo mooo mo

old Sag Harbor; and seeing what the sailors did there; and then going on
moo Moo Mooooo; moo mooooo mooo moo moooooo moo moooo; moo mooo moooo mo

to Nantucket, and seeing how they spent their wages in that place also,
mo Moooooooo, moo mooooo moo mooo moooo moooo moooo mo mooo moooo mooo,

poor Queequeg gave it up for lost. Thought he, it's a wicked world in
mooo Mooooooo mooo mo mo moo mooo. Moooooo mo, mo'm m mooooo moooo mo

all meridians; I'll die a pagan.
moo moooooooo; M'mo moo m moooo.




And thus an old idolator at heart, he yet lived among these Christians,
Moo mooo mo moo mooooooo mo moooo, mo moo moooo moooo moooo Mooooooooo,

wore their clothes, and tried to talk their gibberish. Hence the queer
mooo moooo moooooo, moo moooo mo mooo moooo moooooooo. Moooo moo moooo

ways about him, though now some time from home.
mooo moooo moo, mooooo moo mooo mooo mooo mooo.




By hints, I asked him whether he did not propose going back, and having
Mo moooo, M moooo moo moooooo mo moo moo moooooo moooo mooo, moo mooooo

a coronation; since he might now consider his father dead and gone, he
m mooooooooo; moooo mo moooo moo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo moo mooo, mo

being very old and feeble at the last accounts. He answered no, not yet;
moooo mooo moo moo mooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo. Mo mooooooo mo, moo moo;

and added that he was fearful Christianity, or rather Christians, had
moo moooo mooo mo moo moooooo Mooooooooooo, mo mooooo Mooooooooo, moo

unfitted him for ascending the pure and undefiled throne of thirty pagan
mooooooo moo moo moooooooo moo mooo moo moooooooo mooooo mo mooooo moooo

Kings before him. But by and by, he said, he would return,--as soon as
Moooo mooooo moo. Moo mo moo mo, mo mooo, mo moooo mooooo,--mo mooo mo

he felt himself baptized again. For the nonce, however, he proposed to
mo mooo moooooo mooooooo moooo. Moo moo moooo, moooooo, mo mooooooo mo

sail about, and sow his wild oats in all four oceans. They had made a
mooo moooo, moo moo moo mooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo. Mooo moo mooo m

harpooneer of him, and that barbed iron was in lieu of a sceptre now.
mooooooooo mo moo, moo mooo mooooo mooo moo mo mooo mo m moooooo moo.




I asked him what might be his immediate purpose, touching his future
M moooo moo mooo moooo mo moo moooooooo moooooo, mooooooo moo mooooo

movements. He answered, to go to sea again, in his old vocation. Upon
moooooooo. Mo mooooooo, mo mo mo moo moooo, mo moo moo mooooooo. Mooo

this, I told him that whaling was my own design, and informed him of my
mooo, M mooo moo mooo moooooo moo mo moo mooooo, moo mooooooo moo mo mo

intention to sail out of Nantucket, as being the most promising port for
moooooooo mo mooo moo mo Moooooooo, mo moooo moo mooo moooooooo mooo moo

an adventurous whaleman to embark from. He at once resolved to accompany
mo moooooooooo mooooooo mo mooooo mooo. Mo mo mooo mooooooo mo moooooooo

me to that island, ship aboard the same vessel, get into the same watch,
mo mo mooo mooooo, mooo mooooo moo mooo mooooo, moo mooo moo mooo moooo,

the same boat, the same mess with me, in short to share my every hap;
moo mooo mooo, moo mooo mooo mooo mo, mo moooo mo moooo mo moooo moo;

with both my hands in his, boldly dip into the Potluck of both worlds.
mooo mooo mo moooo mo moo, mooooo moo mooo moo Moooooo mo mooo mooooo.

To all this I joyously assented; for besides the affection I now felt
Mo moo mooo M mooooooo mooooooo; moo moooooo moo moooooooo M moo mooo

for Queequeg, he was an experienced harpooneer, and as such, could not
moo Mooooooo, mo moo mo moooooooooo mooooooooo, moo mo mooo, moooo moo

fail to be of great usefulness to one, who, like me, was wholly ignorant
mooo mo mo mo moooo mooooooooo mo moo, moo, mooo mo, moo mooooo mooooooo

of the mysteries of whaling, though well acquainted with the sea, as
mo moo moooooooo mo moooooo, mooooo mooo mooooooooo mooo moo moo, mo

known to merchant seamen.
moooo mo mooooooo mooooo.




His story being ended with his pipe's last dying puff, Queequeg embraced
Moo moooo moooo moooo mooo moo mooo'm mooo moooo mooo, Mooooooo mooooooo

me, pressed his forehead against mine, and blowing out the light, we
mo, moooooo moo mooooooo moooooo mooo, moo moooooo moo moo moooo, mo

rolled over from each other, this way and that, and very soon were
mooooo mooo mooo mooo moooo, mooo moo moo mooo, moo mooo mooo mooo

sleeping.
mooooooo.







CHAPTER 13. Wheelbarrow.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooooooooo.







Next morning, Monday, after disposing of the embalmed head to a barber,
Mooo moooooo, Mooooo, moooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mo m mooooo,

for a block, I settled my own and comrade's bill; using, however, my
moo m moooo, M moooooo mo moo moo moooooo'm mooo; moooo, moooooo, mo

comrade's money. The grinning landlord, as well as the boarders, seemed
moooooo'm moooo. Moo mooooooo mooooooo, mo mooo mo moo mooooooo, mooooo

amazingly tickled at the sudden friendship which had sprung up between
moooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooo moooo moo mooooo mo moooooo

me and Queequeg--especially as Peter Coffin's cock and bull stories
mo moo Mooooooo--mooooooooo mo Moooo Mooooo'm mooo moo mooo moooooo

about him had previously so much alarmed me concerning the very person
moooo moo moo mooooooooo mo mooo moooooo mo mooooooooo moo mooo mooooo

whom I now companied with.
mooo M moo moooooooo mooo.




We borrowed a wheelbarrow, and embarking our things, including my own
Mo mooooooo m moooooooooo, moo moooooooo moo mooooo, moooooooo mo moo

poor carpet-bag, and Queequeg's canvas sack and hammock, away we went
mooo mooooo-moo, moo Mooooooo'm mooooo mooo moo moooooo, mooo mo mooo

down to "the Moss," the little Nantucket packet schooner moored at the
mooo mo "moo Mooo," moo mooooo Moooooooo mooooo mooooooo mooooo mo moo

wharf. As we were going along the people stared; not at Queequeg
moooo. Mo mo mooo moooo moooo moo mooooo mooooo; moo mo Mooooooo

so much--for they were used to seeing cannibals like him in their
mo mooo--moo mooo mooo mooo mo mooooo moooooooo mooo moo mo moooo

streets,--but at seeing him and me upon such confidential terms. But we
moooooo,--moo mo mooooo moo moo mo mooo mooo mooooooooooo moooo. Moo mo

heeded them not, going along wheeling the barrow by turns, and Queequeg
mooooo mooo moo, moooo moooo mooooooo moo mooooo mo moooo, moo Mooooooo

now and then stopping to adjust the sheath on his harpoon barbs. I asked
moo moo mooo mooooooo mo mooooo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo moooo. M moooo

him why he carried such a troublesome thing with him ashore, and
moo moo mo moooooo mooo m moooooooooo moooo mooo moo mooooo, moo

whether all whaling ships did not find their own harpoons. To this, in
moooooo moo moooooo moooo moo moo mooo moooo moo mooooooo. Mo mooo, mo

substance, he replied, that though what I hinted was true enough, yet
moooooooo, mo moooooo, mooo mooooo mooo M mooooo moo mooo mooooo, moo

he had a particular affection for his own harpoon, because it was of
mo moo m mooooooooo moooooooo moo moo moo moooooo, moooooo mo moo mo

assured stuff, well tried in many a mortal combat, and deeply intimate
moooooo moooo, mooo moooo mo mooo m mooooo mooooo, moo mooooo mooooooo

with the hearts of whales. In short, like many inland reapers
mooo moo mooooo mo mooooo. Mo moooo, mooo mooo mooooo moooooo

and mowers, who go into the farmers' meadows armed with their own
moo mooooo, moo mo mooo moo moooooo' moooooo moooo mooo moooo moo

scythes--though in no wise obliged to furnish them--even so, Queequeg,
moooooo--mooooo mo mo mooo moooooo mo moooooo mooo--mooo mo, Mooooooo,

for his own private reasons, preferred his own harpoon.
moo moo moo moooooo moooooo, moooooooo moo moo moooooo.




Shifting the barrow from my hand to his, he told me a funny story about
Mooooooo moo mooooo mooo mo mooo mo moo, mo mooo mo m moooo moooo moooo

the first wheelbarrow he had ever seen. It was in Sag Harbor. The owners
moo moooo moooooooooo mo moo mooo mooo. Mo moo mo Moo Mooooo. Moo mooooo

of his ship, it seems, had lent him one, in which to carry his
mo moo mooo, mo moooo, moo mooo moo moo, mo moooo mo moooo moo

heavy chest to his boarding house. Not to seem ignorant about the
moooo moooo mo moo mooooooo moooo. Moo mo mooo mooooooo moooo moo

thing--though in truth he was entirely so, concerning the precise way in
moooo--mooooo mo moooo mo moo mooooooo mo, mooooooooo moo moooooo moo mo

which to manage the barrow--Queequeg puts his chest upon it; lashes it
moooo mo mooooo moo mooooo--Mooooooo mooo moo moooo mooo mo; mooooo mo

fast; and then shoulders the barrow and marches up the wharf. "Why,"
mooo; moo mooo moooooooo moo mooooo moo moooooo mo moo moooo. "Moo,"

said I, "Queequeg, you might have known better than that, one would
mooo M, "Mooooooo, moo moooo mooo moooo mooooo mooo mooo, moo moooo

think. Didn't the people laugh?"
moooo. Mooo'm moo mooooo moooo?"




Upon this, he told me another story. The people of his island of
Mooo mooo, mo mooo mo moooooo moooo. Moo mooooo mo moo mooooo mo

Rokovoko, it seems, at their wedding feasts express the fragrant water
Mooooooo, mo moooo, mo moooo moooooo mooooo moooooo moo mooooooo moooo

of young cocoanuts into a large stained calabash like a punchbowl; and
mo moooo moooooooo mooo m moooo moooooo mooooooo mooo m moooooooo; moo

this punchbowl always forms the great central ornament on the braided
mooo moooooooo mooooo moooo moo moooo moooooo mooooooo mo moo moooooo

mat where the feast is held. Now a certain grand merchant ship once
moo moooo moo moooo mo mooo. Moo m moooooo moooo mooooooo mooo mooo

touched at Rokovoko, and its commander--from all accounts, a very
moooooo mo Mooooooo, moo moo moooooooo--mooo moo mooooooo, m mooo

stately punctilious gentleman, at least for a sea captain--this
moooooo moooooooooo moooooooo, mo moooo moo m moo moooooo--mooo

commander was invited to the wedding feast of Queequeg's sister, a
moooooooo moo moooooo mo moo moooooo moooo mo Mooooooo'm mooooo, m

pretty young princess just turned of ten. Well; when all the wedding
mooooo moooo mooooooo mooo mooooo mo moo. Mooo; mooo moo moo moooooo

guests were assembled at the bride's bamboo cottage, this Captain
mooooo mooo moooooooo mo moo moooo'm mooooo moooooo, mooo Moooooo

marches in, and being assigned the post of honour, placed himself over
moooooo mo, moo moooo mooooooo moo mooo mo mooooo, mooooo moooooo mooo

against the punchbowl, and between the High Priest and his majesty the
moooooo moo moooooooo, moo moooooo moo Mooo Mooooo moo moo moooooo moo

King, Queequeg's father. Grace being said,--for those people have their
Mooo, Mooooooo'm mooooo. Moooo moooo mooo,--moo moooo mooooo mooo moooo

grace as well as we--though Queequeg told me that unlike us, who at such
moooo mo mooo mo mo--mooooo Mooooooo mooo mo mooo mooooo mo, moo mo mooo

times look downwards to our platters, they, on the contrary, copying the
moooo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo, mooo, mo moo mooooooo, moooooo moo

ducks, glance upwards to the great Giver of all feasts--Grace, I say,
moooo, mooooo moooooo mo moo moooo Moooo mo moo mooooo--Moooo, M moo,

being said, the High Priest opens the banquet by the immemorial ceremony
moooo mooo, moo Mooo Mooooo moooo moo moooooo mo moo mooooooooo mooooooo

of the island; that is, dipping his consecrated and consecrating fingers
mo moo mooooo; mooo mo, moooooo moo moooooooooo moo mooooooooooo moooooo

into the bowl before the blessed beverage circulates. Seeing himself
mooo moo mooo mooooo moo moooooo mooooooo mooooooooo. Mooooo moooooo

placed next the Priest, and noting the ceremony, and thinking
mooooo mooo moo Mooooo, moo mooooo moo mooooooo, moo mooooooo

himself--being Captain of a ship--as having plain precedence over a
moooooo--moooo Moooooo mo m mooo--mo mooooo moooo mooooooooo mooo m

mere island King, especially in the King's own house--the Captain coolly
mooo mooooo Mooo, mooooooooo mo moo Mooo'm moo moooo--moo Moooooo mooooo

proceeds to wash his hands in the punchbowl;--taking it I suppose for a
mooooooo mo mooo moo moooo mo moo moooooooo;--mooooo mo M moooooo moo m

huge finger-glass. "Now," said Queequeg, "what you tink now?--Didn't our
mooo mooooo-moooo. "Moo," mooo Mooooooo, "mooo moo mooo moo?--Mooo'm moo

people laugh?"
mooooo moooo?"




At last, passage paid, and luggage safe, we stood on board the schooner.
Mo mooo, moooooo mooo, moo moooooo mooo, mo moooo mo moooo moo mooooooo.

Hoisting sail, it glided down the Acushnet river. On one side, New
Mooooooo mooo, mo mooooo mooo moo Mooooooo moooo. Mo moo mooo, Moo

Bedford rose in terraces of streets, their ice-covered trees all
Moooooo mooo mo mooooooo mo moooooo, moooo moo-moooooo moooo moo

glittering in the clear, cold air. Huge hills and mountains of casks on
mooooooooo mo moo moooo, mooo moo. Mooo moooo moo moooooooo mo moooo mo

casks were piled upon her wharves, and side by side the world-wandering
moooo mooo moooo mooo moo moooooo, moo mooo mo mooo moo moooo-moooooooo

whale ships lay silent and safely moored at last; while from others
moooo moooo moo mooooo moo mooooo mooooo mo mooo; moooo mooo mooooo

came a sound of carpenters and coopers, with blended noises of fires and
mooo m moooo mo mooooooooo moo moooooo, mooo moooooo mooooo mo moooo moo

forges to melt the pitch, all betokening that new cruises were on the
mooooo mo mooo moo moooo, moo mooooooooo mooo moo moooooo mooo mo moo

start; that one most perilous and long voyage ended, only begins a
moooo; mooo moo mooo mooooooo moo mooo mooooo moooo, mooo mooooo m

second; and a second ended, only begins a third, and so on, for ever
mooooo; moo m mooooo moooo, mooo mooooo m moooo, moo mo mo, moo mooo

and for aye. Such is the endlessness, yea, the intolerableness of all
moo moo moo. Mooo mo moo moooooooooo, moo, moo moooooooooooooo mo moo

earthly effort.
moooooo mooooo.




Gaining the more open water, the bracing breeze waxed fresh; the little
Moooooo moo mooo mooo moooo, moo moooooo mooooo moooo moooo; moo mooooo

Moss tossed the quick foam from her bows, as a young colt his snortings.
Mooo mooooo moo moooo mooo mooo moo mooo, mo m moooo mooo moo moooooooo.

How I snuffed that Tartar air!--how I spurned that turnpike earth!--that
Moo M moooooo mooo Mooooo moo!--moo M moooooo mooo mooooooo moooo!--mooo

common highway all over dented with the marks of slavish heels and
mooooo moooooo moo mooo mooooo mooo moo moooo mo moooooo moooo moo

hoofs; and turned me to admire the magnanimity of the sea which will
moooo; moo mooooo mo mo mooooo moo moooooooooo mo moo moo moooo mooo

permit no records.
mooooo mo moooooo.




At the same foam-fountain, Queequeg seemed to drink and reel with me.
Mo moo mooo mooo-mooooooo, Mooooooo mooooo mo moooo moo mooo mooo mo.

His dusky nostrils swelled apart; he showed his filed and pointed teeth.
Moo moooo mooooooo moooooo moooo; mo mooooo moo moooo moo moooooo moooo.

On, on we flew; and our offing gained, the Moss did homage to the
Mo, mo mo mooo; moo moo mooooo mooooo, moo Mooo moo mooooo mo moo

blast; ducked and dived her bows as a slave before the Sultan. Sideways
moooo; mooooo moo moooo moo mooo mo m moooo mooooo moo Mooooo. Mooooooo

leaning, we sideways darted; every ropeyarn tingling like a wire; the
moooooo, mo mooooooo mooooo; moooo mooooooo mooooooo mooo m mooo; moo

two tall masts buckling like Indian canes in land tornadoes. So full of
moo mooo moooo mooooooo mooo Mooooo moooo mo mooo moooooooo. Mo mooo mo

this reeling scene were we, as we stood by the plunging bowsprit, that
mooo moooooo moooo mooo mo, mo mo moooo mo moo mooooooo mooooooo, mooo

for some time we did not notice the jeering glances of the passengers, a
moo mooo mooo mo moo moo mooooo moo moooooo moooooo mo moo mooooooooo, m

lubber-like assembly, who marvelled that two fellow beings should be so
mooooo-mooo mooooooo, moo moooooooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo mooooo mo mo

companionable; as though a white man were anything more dignified than a
moooooooooooo; mo mooooo m moooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo moooooooo mooo m

whitewashed negro. But there were some boobies and bumpkins there, who,
moooooooooo moooo. Moo moooo mooo mooo moooooo moo mooooooo moooo, moo,

by their intense greenness, must have come from the heart and centre of
mo moooo moooooo moooooooo, mooo mooo mooo mooo moo moooo moo mooooo mo

all verdure. Queequeg caught one of these young saplings mimicking him
moo moooooo. Mooooooo mooooo moo mo moooo moooo mooooooo moooooooo moo

behind his back. I thought the bumpkin's hour of doom was come. Dropping
mooooo moo mooo. M moooooo moo moooooo'm mooo mo mooo moo mooo. Mooooooo

his harpoon, the brawny savage caught him in his arms, and by an almost
moo moooooo, moo mooooo mooooo mooooo moo mo moo mooo, moo mo mo mooooo

miraculous dexterity and strength, sent him high up bodily into the air;
mooooooooo moooooooo moo mooooooo, mooo moo mooo mo mooooo mooo moo moo;

then slightly tapping his stern in mid-somerset, the fellow landed with
mooo mooooooo moooooo moo moooo mo moo-mooooooo, moo mooooo mooooo mooo

bursting lungs upon his feet, while Queequeg, turning his back upon him,
mooooooo moooo mooo moo mooo, moooo Mooooooo, moooooo moo mooo mooo moo,

lighted his tomahawk pipe and passed it to me for a puff.
moooooo moo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo mo mo mo moo m mooo.




"Capting! Capting!" yelled the bumpkin, running towards that officer;
"Moooooo! Moooooo!" mooooo moo moooooo, moooooo moooooo mooo moooooo;

"Capting, Capting, here's the devil."
"Moooooo, Moooooo, mooo'm moo moooo."




"Hallo, _you_ sir," cried the Captain, a gaunt rib of the sea, stalking
"Moooo, moooo moo," moooo moo Moooooo, m moooo moo mo moo moo, mooooooo

up to Queequeg, "what in thunder do you mean by that? Don't you know you
mo mo Mooooooo, "mooo mo moooooo mo moo mooo mo mooo? Moo'm moo mooo moo

might have killed that chap?"
moooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo?"




"What him say?" said Queequeg, as he mildly turned to me.
"Mooo moo moo?" mooo Mooooooo, mo mo mooooo mooooo mo mo.




"He say," said I, "that you came near kill-e that man there," pointing
"Mo moo," mooo M, "mooo moo mooo mooo mooo-m mooo moo moooo," mooooooo

to the still shivering greenhorn.
mo moo moooo moooooooo moooooooo.




"Kill-e," cried Queequeg, twisting his tattooed face into an unearthly
"Mooo-m," moooo Mooooooo, mooooooo moo mooooooo mooo mooo mo moooooooo

expression of disdain, "ah! him bevy small-e fish-e; Queequeg no kill-e
mooooooooo mo moooooo, "mo! moo mooo moooo-m mooo-m; Mooooooo mo mooo-m

so small-e fish-e; Queequeg kill-e big whale!"
mo moooo-m mooo-m; Mooooooo mooo-m moo moooo!"




"Look you," roared the Captain, "I'll kill-e YOU, you cannibal, if you
"Mooo moo," mooooo moo Moooooo, "M'mo mooo-m MOO, moo mooooooo, mo moo

try any more of your tricks aboard here; so mind your eye."
moo moo mooo mo mooo mooooo mooooo mooo; mo mooo mooo moo."




But it so happened just then, that it was high time for the Captain to
Moo mo mo mooooooo mooo mooo, mooo mo moo mooo mooo moo moo Moooooo mo

mind his own eye. The prodigious strain upon the main-sail had parted
mooo moo moo moo. Moo mooooooooo mooooo mooo moo mooo-mooo moo mooooo

the weather-sheet, and the tremendous boom was now flying from side to
moo moooooo-moooo, moo moo mooooooooo mooo moo moo mooooo mooo mooo mo

mooo, mooooooooo mooooooo moo mooooo moooo mooo mo moo mooo. Moo mooo

fellow whom Queequeg had handled so roughly, was swept overboard; all
mooooo mooo Mooooooo moo moooooo mo moooooo, moo moooo moooooooo; moo

moooo mooo mo m moooo; moo mo moooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo mo mooo mo,

seemed madness. It flew from right to left, and back again, almost
mooooo moooooo. Mo mooo mooo moooo mo mooo, moo mooo moooo, mooooo

in one ticking of a watch, and every instant seemed on the point of
mo moo moooooo mo m moooo, moo moooo moooooo mooooo mo moo moooo mo

snapping into splinters. Nothing was done, and nothing seemed capable of
mooooooo mooo moooooooo. Moooooo moo mooo, moo moooooo mooooo moooooo mo

being done; those on deck rushed towards the bows, and stood eyeing the
moooo mooo; moooo mo mooo mooooo moooooo moo mooo, moo moooo mooooo moo

boom as if it were the lower jaw of an exasperated whale. In the
mooo mo mo mo mooo moo moooo moo mo mo moooooooooo moooo. Mo moo

midst of this consternation, Queequeg dropped deftly to his knees, and
moooo mo mooo moooooooooooo, Mooooooo moooooo mooooo mo moo moooo, moo

crawling under the path of the boom, whipped hold of a rope, secured one
mooooooo moooo moo mooo mo moo mooo, moooooo mooo mo m mooo, moooooo moo

end to the bulwarks, and then flinging the other like a lasso, caught it
moo mo moo mooooooo, moo mooo mooooooo moo moooo mooo m moooo, mooooo mo

round the boom as it swept over his head, and at the next jerk, the spar
moooo moo mooo mo mo moooo mooo moo mooo, moo mo moo mooo mooo, moo mooo

was that way trapped, and all was safe. The schooner was run into the
moo mooo moo moooooo, moo moo moo mooo. Moo mooooooo moo moo mooo moo

wind, and while the hands were clearing away the stern boat, Queequeg,
mooo, moo moooo moo moooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo mooo, Mooooooo,

stripped to the waist, darted from the side with a long living arc of
mooooooo mo moo moooo, mooooo mooo moo mooo mooo m mooo mooooo moo mo

a leap. For three minutes or more he was seen swimming like a dog,
m mooo. Moo moooo moooooo mo mooo mo moo mooo mooooooo mooo m moo,

throwing his long arms straight out before him, and by turns revealing
mooooooo moo mooo mooo mooooooo moo mooooo moo, moo mo moooo moooooooo

his brawny shoulders through the freezing foam. I looked at the grand
moo mooooo moooooooo moooooo moo mooooooo mooo. M mooooo mo moo moooo

and glorious fellow, but saw no one to be saved. The greenhorn had gone
moo mooooooo mooooo, moo moo mo moo mo mo moooo. Moo moooooooo moo mooo

down. Shooting himself perpendicularly from the water, Queequeg, now
mooo. Mooooooo moooooo moooooooooooooo mooo moo moooo, Mooooooo, moo

took an instant's glance around him, and seeming to see just how matters
mooo mo moooooo'm mooooo mooooo moo, moo moooooo mo moo mooo moo moooooo

were, dived down and disappeared. A few minutes more, and he rose again,
mooo, moooo mooo moo moooooooooo. M moo moooooo mooo, moo mo mooo moooo,

one arm still striking out, and with the other dragging a lifeless form.
moo moo moooo mooooooo moo, moo mooo moo moooo mooooooo m mooooooo mooo.

The boat soon picked them up. The poor bumpkin was restored. All hands
Moo mooo mooo mooooo mooo mo. Moo mooo moooooo moo mooooooo. Moo moooo

voted Queequeg a noble trump; the captain begged his pardon. From that
moooo Mooooooo m moooo moooo; moo moooooo mooooo moo mooooo. Mooo mooo

hour I clove to Queequeg like a barnacle; yea, till poor Queequeg took
mooo M moooo mo Mooooooo mooo m mooooooo; moo, mooo mooo Mooooooo mooo

his last long dive.
moo mooo mooo mooo.




Was there ever such unconsciousness? He did not seem to think that he at
Moo moooo mooo mooo moooooooooooooo? Mo moo moo mooo mo moooo mooo mo mo

all deserved a medal from the Humane and Magnanimous Societies. He only
moo mooooooo m moooo mooo moo Mooooo moo Moooooooooo Moooooooo. Mo mooo
