mooooooo, moo mooooo mooooo moooo mooooo moo, mooooo mo mo mooooo

to himself--"It's a mutual, joint-stock world, in all meridians. We
mo moooooo--"Mo'm m mooooo, moooo-moooo moooo, mo moo moooooooo. Mo

cannibals must help these Christians."
moooooooo mooo mooo moooo Mooooooooo."










CHAPTER 14. Nantucket.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooooooo.







Nothing more happened on the passage worthy the mentioning; so, after a
Moooooo mooo mooooooo mo moo moooooo mooooo moo mooooooooo; mo, moooo m

fine run, we safely arrived in Nantucket.
mooo moo, mo mooooo moooooo mo Moooooooo.




Nantucket! Take out your map and look at it. See what a real corner of
Moooooooo! Mooo moo mooo moo moo mooo mo mo. Moo mooo m mooo mooooo mo

the world it occupies; how it stands there, away off shore, more lonely
moo moooo mo mooooooo; moo mo mooooo moooo, mooo moo moooo, mooo mooooo

than the Eddystone lighthouse. Look at it--a mere hillock, and elbow of
mooo moo Moooooooo mooooooooo. Mooo mo mo--m mooo moooooo, moo moooo mo

sand; all beach, without a background. There is more sand there than
mooo; moo moooo, moooooo m mooooooooo. Moooo mo mooo mooo moooo mooo

you would use in twenty years as a substitute for blotting paper. Some
moo moooo moo mo mooooo moooo mo m mooooooooo moo mooooooo moooo. Mooo

gamesome wights will tell you that they have to plant weeds there, they
mooooooo mooooo mooo mooo moo mooo mooo mooo mo moooo moooo moooo, mooo

don't grow naturally; that they import Canada thistles; that they have
moo'm mooo moooooooo; mooo mooo mooooo Mooooo mooooooo; mooo mooo mooo

to send beyond seas for a spile to stop a leak in an oil cask; that
mo mooo mooooo mooo moo m moooo mo mooo m mooo mo mo moo mooo; mooo

pieces of wood in Nantucket are carried about like bits of the true
mooooo mo mooo mo Moooooooo moo moooooo moooo mooo mooo mo moo mooo

cross in Rome; that people there plant toadstools before their houses,
moooo mo Mooo; mooo mooooo moooo moooo mooooooooo mooooo moooo mooooo,

to get under the shade in summer time; that one blade of grass makes an
mo moo moooo moo moooo mo mooooo mooo; mooo moo moooo mo moooo moooo mo

oasis, three blades in a day's walk a prairie; that they wear quicksand
moooo, moooo mooooo mo m moo'm mooo m moooooo; mooo mooo mooo moooooooo

shoes, something like Laplander snow-shoes; that they are so shut up,
moooo, moooooooo mooo Moooooooo mooo-moooo; mooo mooo moo mo mooo mo,

belted about, every way inclosed, surrounded, and made an utter island
mooooo moooo, moooo moo mooooooo, mooooooooo, moo mooo mo moooo mooooo

of by the ocean, that to their very chairs and tables small clams will
mo mo moo moooo, mooo mo moooo mooo mooooo moo mooooo moooo moooo mooo

sometimes be found adhering, as to the backs of sea turtles. But these
moooooooo mo moooo mooooooo, mo mo moo moooo mo moo moooooo. Moo moooo

extravaganzas only show that Nantucket is no Illinois.
moooooooooooo mooo mooo mooo Moooooooo mo mo Mooooooo.




Look now at the wondrous traditional story of how this island was
Mooo moo mo moo mooooooo moooooooooo moooo mo moo mooo mooooo moo

settled by the red-men. Thus goes the legend. In olden times an eagle
moooooo mo moo moo-moo. Mooo mooo moo mooooo. Mo moooo moooo mo moooo

swooped down upon the New England coast, and carried off an infant
moooooo mooo mooo moo Moo Moooooo moooo, moo moooooo moo mo mooooo

Indian in his talons. With loud lament the parents saw their child borne
Mooooo mo moo mooooo. Mooo mooo mooooo moo moooooo moo moooo moooo moooo

out of sight over the wide waters. They resolved to follow in the same
moo mo moooo mooo moo mooo mooooo. Mooo mooooooo mo mooooo mo moo mooo

direction. Setting out in their canoes, after a perilous passage they
moooooooo. Moooooo moo mo moooo mooooo, moooo m mooooooo moooooo mooo

discovered the island, and there they found an empty ivory casket,--the
mooooooooo moo mooooo, moo moooo mooo moooo mo moooo moooo mooooo,--moo

poor little Indian's skeleton.
mooo mooooo Mooooo'm mooooooo.




What wonder, then, that these Nantucketers, born on a beach, should take
Mooo mooooo, mooo, mooo moooo Mooooooooooo, mooo mo m moooo, mooooo mooo

to the sea for a livelihood! They first caught crabs and quohogs in
mo moo moo moo m mooooooooo! Mooo moooo mooooo moooo moo moooooo mo

the sand; grown bolder, they waded out with nets for mackerel; more
moo mooo; moooo mooooo, mooo moooo moo mooo mooo moo mooooooo; mooo

experienced, they pushed off in boats and captured cod; and at last,
moooooooooo, mooo mooooo moo mo moooo moo mooooooo moo; moo mo mooo,

launching a navy of great ships on the sea, explored this watery world;
moooooooo m mooo mo moooo moooo mo moo moo, mooooooo mooo mooooo moooo;

put an incessant belt of circumnavigations round it; peeped in
moo mo moooooooo mooo mo moooooooooooooooo moooo mo; mooooo mo

at Behring's Straits; and in all seasons and all oceans declared
mo Moooooo'm Moooooo; moo mo moo moooooo moo moo mooooo mooooooo

everlasting war with the mightiest animated mass that has survived the
moooooooooo moo mooo moo moooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo moo

flood; most monstrous and most mountainous! That Himmalehan, salt-sea
moooo; mooo moooooooo moo mooo moooooooooo! Mooo Mooooooooo, mooo-moo

Mastodon, clothed with such portentousness of unconscious power, that
Mooooooo, moooooo mooo mooo mooooooooooooo mo moooooooooo moooo, mooo

his very panics are more to be dreaded than his most fearless and
moo mooo mooooo moo mooo mo mo moooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo moo

malicious assaults!
moooooooo mooooooo!




And thus have these naked Nantucketers, these sea hermits, issuing from
Moo mooo mooo moooo moooo Mooooooooooo, moooo moo moooooo, moooooo mooo

their ant-hill in the sea, overrun and conquered the watery world like
moooo moo-mooo mo moo moo, moooooo moo moooooooo moo mooooo moooo mooo

so many Alexanders; parcelling out among them the Atlantic, Pacific, and
mo mooo Mooooooooo; mooooooooo moo moooo mooo moo Mooooooo, Moooooo, moo

Indian oceans, as the three pirate powers did Poland. Let America add
Mooooo mooooo, mo moo moooo mooooo mooooo moo Mooooo. Moo Moooooo moo

Mexico to Texas, and pile Cuba upon Canada; let the English overswarm
Mooooo mo Moooo, moo mooo Mooo mooo Mooooo; moo moo Moooooo moooooooo

all India, and hang out their blazing banner from the sun; two thirds
moo Moooo, moo mooo moo moooo moooooo mooooo mooo moo moo; moo mooooo

of this terraqueous globe are the Nantucketer's. For the sea is his; he
mo mooo moooooooooo moooo moo moo Moooooooooo'm. Moo moo moo mo moo; mo

owns it, as Emperors own empires; other seamen having but a right of
mooo mo, mo Mooooooo moo moooooo; moooo mooooo mooooo moo m moooo mo

way through it. Merchant ships are but extension bridges; armed ones but
moo moooooo mo. Mooooooo moooo moo moo moooooooo moooooo; moooo mooo moo

floating forts; even pirates and privateers, though following the sea
mooooooo moooo; mooo moooooo moo mooooooooo, mooooo moooooooo moo moo

as highwaymen the road, they but plunder other ships, other fragments of
mo mooooooooo moo mooo, mooo moo moooooo moooo moooo, moooo moooooooo mo

the land like themselves, without seeking to draw their living from the
moo mooo mooo mooooooooo, moooooo moooooo mo mooo moooo mooooo mooo moo

bottomless deep itself. The Nantucketer, he alone resides and riots on
mooooooooo mooo mooooo. Moo Moooooooooo, mo moooo moooooo moo moooo mo

the sea; he alone, in Bible language, goes down to it in ships; to and
moo moo; mo moooo, mo Moooo mooooooo, mooo mooo mo mo mo moooo; mo moo

fro ploughing it as his own special plantation. THERE is his home; THERE
moo moooooooo mo mo moo moo moooooo mooooooooo. MOOOO mo moo mooo; MOOOO

lies his business, which a Noah's flood would not interrupt, though it
mooo moo mooooooo, moooo m Mooo'm moooo moooo moo moooooooo, mooooo mo

overwhelmed all the millions in China. He lives on the sea, as prairie
moooooooooo moo moo mooooooo mo Moooo. Mo moooo mo moo moo, mo moooooo

cocks in the prairie; he hides among the waves, he climbs them as
moooo mo moo moooooo; mo moooo moooo moo moooo, mo mooooo mooo mo

chamois hunters climb the Alps. For years he knows not the land; so
moooooo moooooo moooo moo Mooo. Moo moooo mo moooo moo moo mooo; mo

that when he comes to it at last, it smells like another world, more
mooo mooo mo moooo mo mo mo mooo, mo mooooo mooo moooooo moooo, mooo

strangely than the moon would to an Earthsman. With the landless gull,
moooooooo mooo moo mooo moooo mo mo Moooooooo. Mooo moo mooooooo mooo,

that at sunset folds her wings and is rocked to sleep between billows;
mooo mo mooooo moooo moo moooo moo mo mooooo mo moooo moooooo moooooo;

so at nightfall, the Nantucketer, out of sight of land, furls his sails,
mo mo moooooooo, moo Moooooooooo, moo mo moooo mo mooo, moooo moo moooo,

and lays him to his rest, while under his very pillow rush herds of
moo mooo moo mo moo mooo, moooo moooo moo mooo mooooo mooo moooo mo

walruses and whales.
mooooooo moo mooooo.










CHAPTER 15. Chowder.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooooo.







It was quite late in the evening when the little Moss came snugly
Mo moo moooo mooo mo moo moooooo mooo moo mooooo Mooo mooo mooooo

to anchor, and Queequeg and I went ashore; so we could attend to no
mo mooooo, moo Mooooooo moo M mooo mooooo; mo mo moooo mooooo mo mo

business that day, at least none but a supper and a bed. The landlord of
mooooooo mooo moo, mo moooo mooo moo m mooooo moo m moo. Moo mooooooo mo

the Spouter-Inn had recommended us to his cousin Hosea Hussey of the
moo Moooooo-Moo moo moooooooooo mo mo moo mooooo Moooo Mooooo mo moo

Try Pots, whom he asserted to be the proprietor of one of the best kept
Moo Mooo, mooo mo mooooooo mo mo moo mooooooooo mo moo mo moo mooo mooo

hotels in all Nantucket, and moreover he had assured us that Cousin
mooooo mo moo Moooooooo, moo mooooooo mo moo moooooo mo mooo Mooooo

Hosea, as he called him, was famous for his chowders. In short, he
Moooo, mo mo mooooo moo, moo mooooo moo moo mooooooo. Mo moooo, mo

plainly hinted that we could not possibly do better than try pot-luck at
moooooo mooooo mooo mo moooo moo mooooooo mo mooooo mooo moo moo-mooo mo

the Try Pots. But the directions he had given us about keeping a yellow
moo Moo Mooo. Moo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooo mo moooo moooooo m mooooo

warehouse on our starboard hand till we opened a white church to the
moooooooo mo moo moooooooo mooo mooo mo mooooo m moooo mooooo mo moo

larboard, and then keeping that on the larboard hand till we made a
mooooooo, moo mooo moooooo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mooo mo mooo m

corner three points to the starboard, and that done, then ask the first
mooooo moooo mooooo mo moo moooooooo, moo mooo mooo, mooo moo moo moooo

man we met where the place was: these crooked directions of his very
moo mo moo moooo moo moooo moo: moooo moooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooo

much puzzled us at first, especially as, at the outset, Queequeg
mooo moooooo mo mo moooo, mooooooooo mo, mo moo mooooo, Mooooooo

insisted that the yellow warehouse--our first point of departure--must
mooooooo mooo moo mooooo moooooooo--moo moooo moooo mo moooooooo--mooo

be left on the larboard hand, whereas I had understood Peter Coffin to
mo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooo, moooooo M moo mooooooooo Moooo Mooooo mo

say it was on the starboard. However, by dint of beating about a little
moo mo moo mo moo moooooooo. Moooooo, mo mooo mo moooooo moooo m mooooo

in the dark, and now and then knocking up a peaceable inhabitant
mo moo mooo, moo moo moo mooo mooooooo mo m moooooooo mooooooooo

to inquire the way, we at last came to something which there was no
mo moooooo moo moo, mo mo mooo mooo mo moooooooo moooo moooo moo mo

mistaking.
moooooooo.




Two enormous wooden pots painted black, and suspended by asses' ears,
Moo mooooooo mooooo mooo moooooo moooo, moo moooooooo mo moooo' mooo,

swung from the cross-trees of an old top-mast, planted in front of an
moooo mooo moo moooo-moooo mo mo moo moo-mooo, moooooo mo moooo mo mo

old doorway. The horns of the cross-trees were sawed off on the other
moo moooooo. Moo moooo mo moo moooo-moooo mooo moooo moo mo moo moooo

side, so that this old top-mast looked not a little like a gallows.
mooo, mo mooo mooo moo moo-mooo mooooo moo m mooooo mooo m moooooo.

Perhaps I was over sensitive to such impressions at the time, but I
Moooooo M moo mooo moooooooo mo mooo moooooooooo mo moo mooo, moo M

could not help staring at this gallows with a vague misgiving. A sort of
moooo moo mooo moooooo mo mooo moooooo mooo m moooo moooooooo. M mooo mo

crick was in my neck as I gazed up to the two remaining horns; yes, TWO
moooo moo mo mo mooo mo M moooo mo mo moo moo moooooooo moooo; moo, MOO

of them, one for Queequeg, and one for me. It's ominous, thinks I. A
mo mooo, moo moo Mooooooo, moo moo moo mo. Mo'm moooooo, mooooo M. M

Coffin my Innkeeper upon landing in my first whaling port; tombstones
Mooooo mo Moooooooo mooo moooooo mo mo moooo moooooo mooo; mooooooooo

staring at me in the whalemen's chapel; and here a gallows! and a pair
moooooo mo mo mo moo mooooooo'm mooooo; moo mooo m moooooo! moo m mooo

of prodigious black pots too! Are these last throwing out oblique hints
mo mooooooooo moooo mooo moo! Moo moooo mooo mooooooo moo moooooo moooo

touching Tophet?
mooooooo Mooooo?




I was called from these reflections by the sight of a freckled woman
M moo mooooo mooo moooo moooooooooo mo moo moooo mo m mooooooo moooo

with yellow hair and a yellow gown, standing in the porch of the inn,
mooo mooooo mooo moo m mooooo mooo, mooooooo mo moo moooo mo moo moo,

under a dull red lamp swinging there, that looked much like an injured
moooo m mooo moo mooo mooooooo moooo, mooo mooooo mooo mooo mo moooooo

eye, and carrying on a brisk scolding with a man in a purple woollen
moo, moo mooooooo mo m moooo mooooooo mooo m moo mo m mooooo moooooo

shirt.
moooo.




"Get along with ye," said she to the man, "or I'll be combing ye!"
"Moo moooo mooo mo," mooo moo mo moo moo, "mo M'mo mo moooooo mo!"




"Come on, Queequeg," said I, "all right. There's Mrs. Hussey."
"Mooo mo, Mooooooo," mooo M, "moo moooo. Moooo'm Moo. Mooooo."




And so it turned out; Mr. Hosea Hussey being from home, but leaving
Moo mo mo mooooo moo; Mo. Moooo Mooooo moooo mooo mooo, moo moooooo

Mrs. Hussey entirely competent to attend to all his affairs. Upon
Moo. Mooooo mooooooo moooooooo mo mooooo mo moo moo moooooo. Mooo

making known our desires for a supper and a bed, Mrs. Hussey, postponing
mooooo moooo moo moooooo moo m mooooo moo m moo, Moo. Mooooo, mooooooooo

further scolding for the present, ushered us into a little room, and
moooooo mooooooo moo moo moooooo, moooooo mo mooo m mooooo mooo, moo

seating us at a table spread with the relics of a recently concluded
moooooo mo mo m moooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo mo m mooooooo moooooooo

repast, turned round to us and said--"Clam or Cod?"
mooooo, mooooo moooo mo mo moo mooo--"Mooo mo Moo?"




"What's that about Cods, ma'am?" said I, with much politeness.
"Mooo'm mooo moooo Mooo, mo'mo?" mooo M, mooo mooo mooooooooo.




"Clam or Cod?" she repeated.
"Mooo mo Moo?" moo mooooooo.




"A clam for supper? a cold clam; is THAT what you mean, Mrs. Hussey?"
"M mooo moo mooooo? m mooo mooo; mo MOOO mooo moo mooo, Moo. Mooooo?"

says I, "but that's a rather cold and clammy reception in the winter
mooo M, "moo mooo'm m mooooo mooo moo mooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo

time, ain't it, Mrs. Hussey?"
mooo, moo'm mo, Moo. Mooooo?"




But being in a great hurry to resume scolding the man in the purple
Moo moooo mo m moooo moooo mo mooooo mooooooo moo moo mo moo mooooo

Shirt, who was waiting for it in the entry, and seeming to hear nothing
Moooo, moo moo moooooo moo mo mo moo moooo, moo moooooo mo mooo moooooo

but the word "clam," Mrs. Hussey hurried towards an open door leading to
moo moo mooo "mooo," Moo. Mooooo moooooo moooooo mo mooo mooo moooooo mo

the kitchen, and bawling out "clam for two," disappeared.
moo moooooo, moo moooooo moo "mooo moo moo," moooooooooo.




"Queequeg," said I, "do you think that we can make out a supper for us
"Mooooooo," mooo M, "mo moo moooo mooo mo moo mooo moo m mooooo moo mo

both on one clam?"
mooo mo moo mooo?"




However, a warm savory steam from the kitchen served to belie the
Moooooo, m mooo mooooo moooo mooo moo moooooo mooooo mo moooo moo

apparently cheerless prospect before us. But when that smoking chowder
mooooooooo moooooooo mooooooo mooooo mo. Moo mooo mooo moooooo moooooo

came in, the mystery was delightfully explained. Oh, sweet friends!
mooo mo, moo moooooo moo mooooooooooo moooooooo. Mo, moooo moooooo!

hearken to me. It was made of small juicy clams, scarcely bigger than
moooooo mo mo. Mo moo mooo mo moooo moooo moooo, mooooooo mooooo mooo

hazel nuts, mixed with pounded ship biscuit, and salted pork cut up into
moooo mooo, moooo mooo moooooo mooo moooooo, moo mooooo mooo moo mo mooo

little flakes; the whole enriched with butter, and plentifully seasoned
mooooo mooooo; moo moooo mooooooo mooo mooooo, moo moooooooooo mooooooo

with pepper and salt. Our appetites being sharpened by the frosty
mooo mooooo moo mooo. Moo moooooooo moooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo

mooooo, moo mo mooooooooo, Mooooooo mooooo moo moooooooo moooooo mooo

before him, and the chowder being surpassingly excellent, we despatched
mooooo moo, moo moo moooooo moooo mooooooooooo moooooooo, mo mooooooooo

mo mooo moooo mooooooooo: mooo moooooo mooo m mooooo moo mooooooooo

me of Mrs. Hussey's clam and cod announcement, I thought I would try
mo mo Moo. Mooooo'm mooo moo moo mooooooooooo, M moooooo M moooo moo

a little experiment. Stepping to the kitchen door, I uttered the word
m mooooo mooooooooo. Mooooooo mo moo moooooo mooo, M moooooo moo mooo

"cod" with great emphasis, and resumed my seat. In a few moments the
"moo" mooo moooo mooooooo, moo moooooo mo mooo. Mo m moo moooooo moo

savoury steam came forth again, but with a different flavor, and in good
moooooo moooo mooo moooo moooo, moo mooo m moooooooo mooooo, moo mo mooo

time a fine cod-chowder was placed before us.
mooo m mooo moo-moooooo moo mooooo mooooo mo.




We resumed business; and while plying our spoons in the bowl, thinks I
Mo moooooo mooooooo; moo moooo mooooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo, mooooo M

to myself, I wonder now if this here has any effect on the head?
mo mooooo, M mooooo moo mo mooo mooo moo moo mooooo mo moo mooo?

What's that stultifying saying about chowder-headed people? "But look,
Mooo'm mooo moooooooooo mooooo moooo moooooo-mooooo mooooo? "Moo mooo,

Queequeg, ain't that a live eel in your bowl? Where's your harpoon?"
Mooooooo, moo'm mooo m mooo moo mo mooo mooo? Moooo'm mooo moooooo?"




Fishiest of all fishy places was the Try Pots, which well deserved
Mooooooo mo moo moooo mooooo moo moo Moo Mooo, moooo mooo mooooooo

its name; for the pots there were always boiling chowders. Chowder for
moo mooo; moo moo mooo moooo mooo mooooo moooooo mooooooo. Moooooo moo

breakfast, and chowder for dinner, and chowder for supper, till you
moooooooo, moo moooooo moo mooooo, moo moooooo moo mooooo, mooo moo

began to look for fish-bones coming through your clothes. The area
moooo mo mooo moo mooo-moooo mooooo moooooo mooo moooooo. Moo mooo

before the house was paved with clam-shells. Mrs. Hussey wore a polished
mooooo moo moooo moo moooo mooo mooo-mooooo. Moo. Mooooo mooo m mooooooo

necklace of codfish vertebra; and Hosea Hussey had his account books
mooooooo mo moooooo mooooooo; moo Moooo Mooooo moo moo moooooo moooo

bound in superior old shark-skin. There was a fishy flavor to the milk,
moooo mo mooooooo moo moooo-mooo. Moooo moo m moooo mooooo mo moo mooo,

too, which I could not at all account for, till one morning happening

mo mooo m mooooo moooo moo moooo moooo mooo moooooooo'm moooo, M moo

Moooo'm mooooooo moo moooooo mo mooo mooooooo, moo mooooooo moooo moo

sand with each foot in a cod's decapitated head, looking very slip-shod,
mooo mooo mooo mooo mo m moo'm moooooooooo mooo, moooooo mooo mooo-mooo,

I assure ye.
M mooooo mo.




Supper concluded, we received a lamp, and directions from Mrs. Hussey
Mooooo moooooooo, mo mooooooo m mooo, moo mooooooooo mooo Moo. Mooooo

concerning the nearest way to bed; but, as Queequeg was about to precede

mo mo moo mooooo, moo mooo moooooo moooo moo moo, moo mooooooo moo

harpoon; she allowed no harpoon in her chambers. "Why not?" said I;
moooooo; moo moooooo mo moooooo mo moo mooooooo. "Moo moo?" mooo M;

"every true whaleman sleeps with his harpoon--but why not?" "Because
"moooo mooo mooooooo mooooo mooo moo moooooo--moo moo moo?" "Moooooo

it's dangerous," says she. "Ever since young Stiggs coming from that
mo'm moooooooo," mooo moo. "Mooo moooo moooo Mooooo mooooo mooo mooo

unfort'nt v'y'ge of his, when he was gone four years and a half, with
mooooo'mo m'm'mo mo moo, mooo mo moo mooo mooo moooo moo m mooo, mooo

moo moooooo mo moo mooo; mooo moooo mooo M moooo mo mooooooo mo mooo

sich dangerous weepons in their rooms at night. So, Mr. Queequeg" (for
mooo moooooooo moooooo mo moooo moooo mo moooo. Mo, Mo. Mooooooo" (moo

she had learned his name), "I will just take this here iron, and keep
moo moo moooooo moo mooo), "M mooo mooo mooo mooo mooo mooo, moo mooo

it for you till morning. But the chowder; clam or cod to-morrow for
mo moo moo mooo moooooo. Moo moo moooooo; mooo mo moo mo-mooooo moo

breakfast, men?"
moooooooo, moo?"




"Both," says I; "and let's have a couple of smoked herring by way of
"Mooo," mooo M; "moo moo'm mooo m mooooo mo mooooo moooooo mo moo mo

variety."
moooooo."










CHAPTER 16. The Ship.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooo.







In bed we concocted our plans for the morrow. But to my surprise and
Mo moo mo moooooooo moo moooo moo moo mooooo. Moo mo mo mooooooo moo

no small concern, Queequeg now gave me to understand, that he had been
mo moooo moooooo, Mooooooo moo mooo mo mo mooooooooo, mooo mo moo mooo

diligently consulting Yojo--the name of his black little god--and Yojo
mooooooooo mooooooooo Mooo--moo mooo mo moo moooo mooooo moo--moo Mooo

had told him two or three times over, and strongly insisted upon it
moo mooo moo moo mo moooo moooo mooo, moo mooooooo mooooooo mooo mo

everyway, that instead of our going together among the whaling-fleet in
mooooooo, mooo moooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo moooo moo moooooo-moooo mo

harbor, and in concert selecting our craft; instead of this, I say, Yojo
mooooo, moo mo moooooo moooooooo moo moooo; moooooo mo mooo, M moo, Mooo

earnestly enjoined that the selection of the ship should rest wholly
moooooooo mooooooo mooo moo moooooooo mo moo mooo mooooo mooo mooooo

with me, inasmuch as Yojo purposed befriending us; and, in order to
mooo mo, mooooooo mo Mooo mooooooo moooooooooo mo; moo, mo moooo mo

do so, had already pitched upon a vessel, which, if left to myself, I,
mo mo, moo moooooo moooooo mooo m mooooo, moooo, mo mooo mo mooooo, M,

Ishmael, should infallibly light upon, for all the world as though it
Moooooo, mooooo mooooooooo moooo mooo, moo moo moo moooo mo mooooo mo

had turned out by chance; and in that vessel I must immediately ship
moo mooooo moo mo mooooo; moo mo mooo mooooo M mooo moooooooooo mooo

myself, for the present irrespective of Queequeg.
mooooo, moo moo moooooo mooooooooooo mo Mooooooo.




I have forgotten to mention that, in many things, Queequeg placed great
M mooo moooooooo mo moooooo mooo, mo mooo mooooo, Mooooooo mooooo moooo

confidence in the excellence of Yojo's judgment and surprising forecast
mooooooooo mo moo mooooooooo mo Mooo'm mooooooo moo mooooooooo mooooooo

of things; and cherished Yojo with considerable esteem, as a rather good
mo mooooo; moo moooooooo Mooo mooo mooooooooooo mooooo, mo m mooooo mooo

sort of god, who perhaps meant well enough upon the whole, but in all
mooo mo moo, moo moooooo moooo mooo mooooo mooo moo moooo, moo mo moo

cases did not succeed in his benevolent designs.
moooo moo moo moooooo mo moo mooooooooo moooooo.




Now, this plan of Queequeg's, or rather Yojo's, touching the selection
Moo, mooo mooo mo Mooooooo'm, mo mooooo Mooo'm, mooooooo moo moooooooo

of our craft; I did not like that plan at all. I had not a little relied
mo moo moooo; M moo moo mooo mooo mooo mo moo. M moo moo m mooooo mooooo

upon Queequeg's sagacity to point out the whaler best fitted to carry
mooo Mooooooo'm mooooooo mo moooo moo moo mooooo mooo mooooo mo moooo

us and our fortunes securely. But as all my remonstrances produced
mo moo moo mooooooo mooooooo. Moo mo moo mo moooooooooooo mooooooo

no effect upon Queequeg, I was obliged to acquiesce; and accordingly
mo mooooo mooo Mooooooo, M moo moooooo mo moooooooo; moo moooooooooo

prepared to set about this business with a determined rushing sort
mooooooo mo moo moooo mooo mooooooo mooo m mooooooooo moooooo mooo

of energy and vigor, that should quickly settle that trifling little
mo mooooo moo moooo, mooo mooooo moooooo mooooo mooo mooooooo mooooo

affair. Next morning early, leaving Queequeg shut up with Yojo in our
mooooo. Mooo moooooo moooo, moooooo Mooooooo mooo mo mooo Mooo mo moo

little bedroom--for it seemed that it was some sort of Lent or Ramadan,
mooooo moooooo--moo mo mooooo mooo mo moo mooo mooo mo Mooo mo Moooooo,

or day of fasting, humiliation, and prayer with Queequeg and Yojo that
mo moo mo moooooo, moooooooooo, moo mooooo mooo Mooooooo moo Mooo mooo

day; HOW it was I never could find out, for, though I applied myself
moo; MOO mo moo M moooo moooo mooo moo, moo, mooooo M moooooo mooooo

to it several times, I never could master his liturgies and XXXIX
mo mo moooooo moooo, M moooo moooo mooooo moo moooooooo moo MOOOO

Articles--leaving Queequeg, then, fasting on his tomahawk pipe, and Yojo
Mooooooo--moooooo Mooooooo, mooo, moooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo, moo Mooo

warming himself at his sacrificial fire of shavings, I sallied out among
moooooo moooooo mo moo moooooooooo mooo mo mooooooo, M moooooo moo moooo

the shipping. After much prolonged sauntering and many random inquiries,
moo mooooooo. Moooo mooo moooooooo mooooooooo moo mooo mooooo moooooooo,

I learnt that there were three ships up for three-years' voyages--The
M mooooo mooo moooo mooo moooo moooo mo moo moooo-moooo' moooooo--Moo

Devil-dam, the Tit-bit, and the Pequod. DEVIL-DAM, I do not know the
Moooo-moo, moo Moo-moo, moo moo Mooooo. MOOOO-MOO, M mo moo mooo moo

origin of; TIT-BIT is obvious; PEQUOD, you will no doubt remember, was
mooooo mo; MOO-MOO mo moooooo; MOOOOO, moo mooo mo moooo mooooooo, moo

the name of a celebrated tribe of Massachusetts Indians; now extinct
moo mooo mo m mooooooooo moooo mo Moooooooooooo Moooooo; moo moooooo

as the ancient Medes. I peered and pryed about the Devil-dam; from her,
mo moo moooooo Moooo. M mooooo moo moooo moooo moo Moooo-moo; mooo moo,

hopped over to the Tit-bit; and finally, going on board the Pequod,
mooooo mooo mo moo Moo-moo; moo moooooo, moooo mo moooo moo Mooooo,

looked around her for a moment, and then decided that this was the very
mooooo mooooo moo moo m mooooo, moo mooo moooooo mooo mooo moo moo mooo

ship for us.
mooo moo mo.




You may have seen many a quaint craft in your day, for aught I
Moo moo mooo mooo mooo m mooooo moooo mo mooo moo, moo moooo M

know;--square-toed luggers; mountainous Japanese junks; butter-box
mooo;--mooooo-mooo moooooo; moooooooooo Mooooooo moooo; mooooo-moo

galliots, and what not; but take my word for it, you never saw such a
mooooooo, moo mooo moo; moo mooo mo mooo moo mo, moo moooo moo mooo m

rare old craft as this same rare old Pequod. She was a ship of the old
mooo moo moooo mo mooo mooo mooo moo Mooooo. Moo moo m mooo mo moo moo

school, rather small if anything; with an old-fashioned claw-footed look
mooooo, mooooo moooo mo mooooooo; mooo mo moo-moooooooo mooo-mooooo mooo

about her. Long seasoned and weather-stained in the typhoons and calms
moooo moo. Mooo mooooooo moo moooooo-moooooo mo moo mooooooo moo moooo

of all four oceans, her old hull's complexion was darkened like a French
mo moo mooo mooooo, moo moo mooo'm mooooooooo moo mooooooo mooo m Mooooo

grenadier's, who has alike fought in Egypt and Siberia. Her venerable
moooooooo'm, moo moo moooo mooooo mo Moooo moo Moooooo. Moo moooooooo

bows looked bearded. Her masts--cut somewhere on the coast of Japan,
mooo mooooo moooooo. Moo moooo--moo moooooooo mo moo moooo mo Moooo,

where her original ones were lost overboard in a gale--her masts stood
moooo moo mooooooo mooo mooo mooo moooooooo mo m mooo--moo moooo moooo

stiffly up like the spines of the three old kings of Cologne. Her
moooooo mo mooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo moo moooo mo Moooooo. Moo

ancient decks were worn and wrinkled, like the pilgrim-worshipped
moooooo moooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo, mooo moo moooooo-mooooooooo

flag-stone in Canterbury Cathedral where Becket bled. But to all these
mooo-moooo mo Mooooooooo Moooooooo moooo Mooooo mooo. Moo mo moo moooo

her old antiquities, were added new and marvellous features, pertaining
moo moo moooooooooo, mooo moooo moo moo mooooooooo mooooooo, mooooooooo

to the wild business that for more than half a century she had followed.
mo moo mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo mooo mooo m moooooo moo moo mooooooo.

Old Captain Peleg, many years her chief-mate, before he commanded
Moo Moooooo Moooo, mooo moooo moo moooo-mooo, mooooo mo moooooooo

another vessel of his own, and now a retired seaman, and one of the
moooooo mooooo mo moo moo, moo moo m moooooo mooooo, moo moo mo moo

principal owners of the Pequod,--this old Peleg, during the term of his
moooooooo mooooo mo moo Mooooo,--mooo moo Moooo, mooooo moo mooo mo moo

chief-mateship, had built upon her original grotesqueness, and inlaid
moooo-mooooooo, moo moooo mooo moo mooooooo moooooooooooo, moo mooooo

it, all over, with a quaintness both of material and device, unmatched
mo, moo mooo, mooo m mooooooooo mooo mo mooooooo moo mooooo, moooooooo

by anything except it be Thorkill-Hake's carved buckler or bedstead. She
mo mooooooo mooooo mo mo Mooooooo-Mooo'm mooooo moooooo mo mooooooo. Moo

was apparelled like any barbaric Ethiopian emperor, his neck heavy with
moo mooooooooo mooo moo mooooooo Moooooooo moooooo, moo mooo moooo mooo

pendants of polished ivory. She was a thing of trophies. A cannibal of
mooooooo mo mooooooo moooo. Moo moo m moooo mo mooooooo. M mooooooo mo

a craft, tricking herself forth in the chased bones of her enemies. All
m moooo, mooooooo moooooo moooo mo moo mooooo moooo mo moo moooooo. Moo

round, her unpanelled, open bulwarks were garnished like one continuous
moooo, moo mooooooooo, mooo mooooooo mooo moooooooo mooo moo mooooooooo

jaw, with the long sharp teeth of the sperm whale, inserted there for
moo, mooo moo mooo moooo moooo mo moo moooo moooo, mooooooo moooo moo

pins, to fasten her old hempen thews and tendons to. Those thews ran not
mooo, mo mooooo moo moo mooooo moooo moo moooooo mo. Moooo moooo moo moo

through base blocks of land wood, but deftly travelled over sheaves of
moooooo mooo mooooo mo mooo mooo, moo mooooo moooooooo mooo moooooo mo

sea-ivory. Scorning a turnstile wheel at her reverend helm, she sported
moo-moooo. Mooooooo m moooooooo moooo mo moo mooooooo mooo, moo moooooo

there a tiller; and that tiller was in one mass, curiously carved
moooo m mooooo; moo mooo mooooo moo mo moo mooo, moooooooo mooooo

from the long narrow lower jaw of her hereditary foe. The helmsman who
mooo moo mooo mooooo moooo moo mo moo mooooooooo moo. Moo mooooooo moo

steered by that tiller in a tempest, felt like the Tartar, when he holds
moooooo mo mooo mooooo mo m moooooo, mooo mooo moo Mooooo, mooo mo moooo

back his fiery steed by clutching its jaw. A noble craft, but somehow a
mooo moo moooo moooo mo moooooooo moo moo. M moooo moooo, moo moooooo m

most melancholy! All noble things are touched with that.
mooo mooooooooo! Moo moooo mooooo moo moooooo mooo mooo.




Now when I looked about the quarter-deck, for some one having authority,
Moo mooo M mooooo moooo moo moooooo-mooo, moo mooo moo mooooo moooooooo,

in order to propose myself as a candidate for the voyage, at first I saw
mo moooo mo moooooo mooooo mo m moooooooo moo moo mooooo, mo moooo M moo

nobody; but I could not well overlook a strange sort of tent, or
mooooo; moo M moooo moo mooo mooooooo m moooooo mooo mo mooo, mo

rather wigwam, pitched a little behind the main-mast. It seemed only
mooooo mooooo, moooooo m mooooo mooooo moo mooo-mooo. Mo mooooo mooo

a temporary erection used in port. It was of a conical shape, some ten
m moooooooo mooooooo mooo mo mooo. Mo moo mo m moooooo moooo, mooo moo

feet high; consisting of the long, huge slabs of limber black bone taken
mooo mooo; mooooooooo mo moo mooo, mooo moooo mo mooooo moooo mooo moooo

from the middle and highest part of the jaws of the right-whale.
mooo moo mooooo moo moooooo mooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooo-moooo.

Planted with their broad ends on the deck, a circle of these slabs laced
Moooooo mooo moooo moooo mooo mo moo mooo, m mooooo mo moooo moooo moooo

together, mutually sloped towards each other, and at the apex united in
mooooooo, mooooooo mooooo moooooo mooo moooo, moo mo moo mooo mooooo mo

a tufted point, where the loose hairy fibres waved to and fro like the
m mooooo moooo, moooo moo moooo moooo mooooo moooo mo moo moo mooo moo

top-knot on some old Pottowottamie Sachem's head. A triangular opening
moo-mooo mo mooo moo Moooooooooooo Mooooo'm mooo. M mooooooooo moooooo

faced towards the bows of the ship, so that the insider commanded a
moooo moooooo moo mooo mo moo mooo, mo mooo moo moooooo moooooooo m

complete view forward.
mooooooo mooo moooooo.




And half concealed in this queer tenement, I at length found one who
Moo mooo moooooooo mo mooo moooo mooooooo, M mo mooooo moooo moo moo

by his aspect seemed to have authority; and who, it being noon, and
mo moo mooooo mooooo mo mooo moooooooo; moo moo, mo moooo mooo, moo

the ship's work suspended, was now enjoying respite from the burden of
moo mooo'm mooo moooooooo, moo moo mooooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooo mo

command. He was seated on an old-fashioned oaken chair, wriggling all
moooooo. Mo moo mooooo mo mo moo-moooooooo moooo moooo, moooooooo moo

over with curious carving; and the bottom of which was formed of a
mooo mooo moooooo moooooo; moo moo mooooo mo moooo moo mooooo mo m

stout interlacing of the same elastic stuff of which the wigwam was
moooo moooooooooo mo moo mooo moooooo moooo mo moooo moo mooooo moo

constructed.
moooooooooo.




There was nothing so very particular, perhaps, about the appearance of
Moooo moo moooooo mo mooo mooooooooo, moooooo, moooo moo mooooooooo mo

the elderly man I saw; he was brown and brawny, like most old seamen,
moo moooooo moo M moo; mo moo moooo moo mooooo, mooo mooo moo mooooo,

and heavily rolled up in blue pilot-cloth, cut in the Quaker style;
moo moooooo mooooo mo mo mooo moooo-moooo, moo mo moo Mooooo moooo;

only there was a fine and almost microscopic net-work of the minutest
mooo moooo moo m mooo moo mooooo moooooooooo moo-mooo mo moo mooooooo

mooooooo moooooooooo moooo moo mooo, moooo mooo mooo mooooo mooo

his continual sailings in many hard gales, and always looking to
moo moooooooo mooooooo mo mooo mooo moooo, moo mooooo moooooo mo

windward;--for this causes the muscles about the eyes to become pursed
mooooooo;--moo mooo mooooo moo moooooo moooo moo mooo mo mooooo mooooo

together. Such eye-wrinkles are very effectual in a scowl.
mooooooo. Mooo moo-mooooooo moo mooo moooooooo mo m moooo.




"Is this the Captain of the Pequod?" said I, advancing to the door of
"Mo mooo moo Moooooo mo moo Mooooo?" mooo M, moooooooo mo moo mooo mo

the tent.
moo mooo.




"Supposing it be the captain of the Pequod, what dost thou want of him?"
"Moooooooo mo mo moo moooooo mo moo Mooooo, mooo mooo mooo mooo mo moo?"

he demanded.
mo mooooooo.




"I was thinking of shipping."
"M moo mooooooo mo mooooooo."




"Thou wast, wast thou? I see thou art no Nantucketer--ever been in a
"Mooo mooo, mooo mooo? M moo mooo moo mo Moooooooooo--mooo mooo mo m

stove boat?"
moooo mooo?"




"No, Sir, I never have."
"Mo, Moo, M moooo mooo."




"Dost know nothing at all about whaling, I dare say--eh?
"Mooo mooo moooooo mo moo moooo moooooo, M mooo moo--mo?




"Nothing, Sir; but I have no doubt I shall soon learn. I've been several
"Moooooo, Moo; moo M mooo mo moooo M moooo mooo moooo. M'mo mooo moooooo

voyages in the merchant service, and I think that--"
moooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooo, moo M moooo mooo--"




"Merchant service be damned. Talk not that lingo to me. Dost see that
"Mooooooo moooooo mo mooooo. Mooo moo mooo moooo mo mo. Mooo moo mooo

leg?--I'll take that leg away from thy stern, if ever thou talkest of
moo?--M'mo mooo mooo moo mooo mooo moo moooo, mo mooo mooo moooooo mo

moo mooooooo moooooo mo mo moooo. Mooooooo moooooo mooooo! M moooooo moo

ye feel considerable proud of having served in those marchant ships.
mo mooo mooooooooooo moooo mo mooooo mooooo mo moooo mooooooo moooo.

Moo mooooo! moo, mooo moooo mooo mooo mo mo m moooooo, mo?--mo moooo

a little suspicious, don't it, eh?--Hast not been a pirate, hast
m mooooo mooooooooo, moo'm mo, mo?--Mooo moo mooo m mooooo, mooo

thou?--Didst not rob thy last Captain, didst thou?--Dost not think of
mooo?--Moooo moo moo moo mooo Moooooo, moooo mooo?--Mooo moo moooo mo

murdering the officers when thou gettest to sea?"
moooooooo moo mooooooo mooo mooo moooooo mo moo?"




I protested my innocence of these things. I saw that under the mask
M moooooooo mo moooooooo mo moooo mooooo. M moo mooo moooo moo mooo

mo moooo mooo mooooooo mooooooooo, mooo moo mooooo, mo mo moooooooo

moooooooooo mo moo mooooo, mooooo mooo mooooo mooo Mooo Moo mo moo

Mooooooo.




"But what takes thee a-whaling? I want to know that before I think of
"Moo mooo moooo mooo m-moooooo? M mooo mo mooo mooo mooooo M moooo mo

shipping ye."
mooooooo mo."




"Well, sir, I want to see what whaling is. I want to see the world."
"Mooo, moo, M mooo mo moo mooo moooooo mo. M mooo mo moo moo moooo."




"Want to see what whaling is, eh? Have ye clapped eye on Captain Ahab?"
"Mooo mo moo mooo moooooo mo, mo? Mooo mo moooooo moo mo Moooooo Mooo?"




"Who is Captain Ahab, sir?"
"Moo mo Moooooo Mooo, moo?"

"Moo, moo, M moooooo mo. Moooooo Mooo mo moo Moooooo mo mooo mooo."

"M mo mooooooo mooo. M moooooo M moo mooooooo mo moo Moooooo moooooo."




"Thou art speaking to Captain Peleg--that's who ye are speaking to,
"Mooo moo mooooooo mo Moooooo Moooo--mooo'm moo mo moo mooooooo mo,

moo."




"What do you mean, sir? Was the other one lost by a whale?"
"Mooo mo moo mooo, moo? Moo moo moooo moo mooo mo m moooo?"




"Lost by a whale! Young man, come nearer to me: it was devoured,

moooo mooo mo." Moo mo mooooo, mo moo moo moo moooo mooo mooo moo moooo.




Seated on the transom was what seemed to me a most uncommon and
Mooooo mo moo moooooo moo mooo mooooo mo mo m mooo mooooooo moo

Moooooo Moooo moo moo mo moo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooooo; moo moooo

bringing in good interest.
mooooooo mo mooo mooooooo.




Now, Bildad, like Peleg, and indeed many other Nantucketers, was a
Moo, Mooooo, mooo Moooo, moo mooooo mooo moooo Mooooooooooo, moo m

Quaker, the island having been originally settled by that sect; and to
Mooooo, moo mooooo mooooo mooo mooooooooo moooooo mo mooo mooo; moo mo

this day its inhabitants in general retain in an uncommon measure the
mooo moo moo moooooooooo mo moooooo mooooo mo mo mooooooo moooooo moo

moooooooooooo mo moo Mooooo, mooo moooooooo moo moooooooooo mooooooo

mo mooooo mooooooooo moooo moo moooooooooooo. Moo mooo mo moooo mooo

Quakers are the most sanguinary of all sailors and whale-hunters. They
Moooooo moo moo mooo mooooooooo mo moo moooooo moo moooo-moooooo. Mooo

are fighting Quakers; they are Quakers with a vengeance.
moo mooooooo Moooooo; mooo moo Moooooo mooo m moooooooo.




So that there are instances among them of men, who, named with Scripture
Mo mooo moooo moo moooooooo moooo mooo mo moo, moo, moooo mooo Moooooooo

names--a singularly common fashion on the island--and in childhood
moooo--m mooooooooo mooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo--moo mo moooooooo

naturally imbibing the stately dramatic thee and thou of the Quaker
moooooooo mooooooo moo moooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo Mooooo

idiom; still, from the audacious, daring, and boundless adventure

moooooooooooo, m mooooooo mooo mooooo mo moooooooo, moo mooooooo m

Scandinavian sea-king, or a poetical Pagan Roman. And when these things
Mooooooooooo moo-mooo, mo m mooooooo Moooo Moooo. Moo mooo moooo mooooo

moooo mo m moo mo moooooo mooooooo moooooo moooo, mooo m mooooooo moooo

noble tragedies. Nor will it at all detract from him, dramatically
moooo moooooooo. Moo mooo mo mo moo moooooo mooo moo, mooooooooooo

m mooo mooooo mooooooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo mo moo mooooo. Moo moo

of this, O young ambition, all mortal greatness is but disease. But,
mo mooo, M moooo mooooooo, moo mooooo moooooooo mo moo moooooo. Moo,

mo moo mo mooo moo mo mo mooo mooo mo moo, moo mooo moooo moooooo; moo

moooo mo moo Mooooo, mooooooo mo mooooooooo moooooooooooo.




Like Captain Peleg, Captain Bildad was a well-to-do, retired whaleman.
Mooo Moooooo Moooo, Moooooo Mooooo moo m mooo-mo-mo, moooooo mooooooo.

But unlike Captain Peleg--who cared not a rush for what are called
Moo mooooo Moooooo Moooo--moo moooo moo m mooo moo mooo moo mooooo

serious things, and indeed deemed those self-same serious things the
moooooo mooooo, moo mooooo mooooo moooo mooo-mooo moooooo mooooo moo

veriest of all trifles--Captain Bildad had not only been originally
moooooo mo moo moooooo--Moooooo Mooooo moo moo mooo mooo mooooooooo

educated according to the strictest sect of Nantucket Quakerism, but all
mooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooooooo mooo mo Moooooooo Moooooooo, moo moo

moo mooooooooo moooo mooo, moo moo moooo mo mooo mooooo, mooooo mooooo

creatures, round the Horn--all that had not moved this native born
moooooooo, moooo moo Mooo--moo mooo moo moo moooo mooo mooooo mooo

Quaker one single jot, had not so much as altered one angle of his
Mooooo moo mooooo moo, moo moo mo mooo mo moooooo moo moooo mo moo

vest. Still, for all this immutableness, was there some lack of
mooo. Moooo, moo moo mooo moooooooooooo, moo moooo mooo mooo mo

common consistency about worthy Captain Peleg. Though refusing, from
mooooo moooooooooo moooo mooooo Moooooo Moooo. Mooooo mooooooo, mooo

moooooooooooo mooooooo, mo mooo mooo moooooo mooo mooooooo, moo moooooo

had illimitably invaded the Atlantic and Pacific; and though a sworn foe
moo moooooooooo moooooo moo Mooooooo moo Moooooo; moo mooooo m moooo moo

to human bloodshed, yet had he in his straight-bodied coat, spilled tuns
mo moooo moooooooo, moo moo mo mo moo mooooooo-mooooo mooo, moooooo mooo

upon tuns of leviathan gore. How now in the contemplative evening of his
mooo mooo mo moooooooo mooo. Moo moo mo moo moooooooooooo moooooo mo moo

days, the pious Bildad reconciled these things in the reminiscence, I do
mooo, moo moooo Mooooo mooooooooo moooo mooooo mo moo mooooooooooo, M mo

not know; but it did not seem to concern him much, and very probably
moo mooo; moo mo moo moo mooo mo moooooo moo mooo, moo mooo mooooooo

he had long since come to the sage and sensible conclusion that a man's
mo moo mooo moooo mooo mo moo mooo moo mooooooo mooooooooo mooo m moo'm

religion is one thing, and this practical world quite another. This
mooooooo mo moo moooo, moo mooo moooooooo moooo moooo moooooo. Mooo

world pays dividends. Rising from a little cabin-boy in short clothes
moooo mooo moooooooo. Mooooo mooo m mooooo moooo-moo mo moooo moooooo

of the drabbest drab, to a harpooneer in a broad shad-bellied waistcoat;
mo moo mooooooo mooo, mo m mooooooooo mo m moooo mooo-moooooo moooooooo;

from that becoming boat-header, chief-mate, and captain, and finally a
mooo mooo mooooooo mooo-mooooo, moooo-mooo, moo moooooo, moo moooooo m

ship owner; Bildad, as I hinted before, had concluded his adventurous
mooo moooo; Mooooo, mo M mooooo mooooo, moo moooooooo moo moooooooooo

career by wholly retiring from active life at the goodly age of
mooooo mo mooooo mooooooo mooo mooooo mooo mo moo mooooo moo mo

sixty, and dedicating his remaining days to the quiet receiving of his
moooo, moo mooooooooo moo moooooooo mooo mo moo moooo moooooooo mo moo

well-earned income.
mooo-mooooo mooooo.




Now, Bildad, I am sorry to say, had the reputation of being an
Moo, Mooooo, M mo moooo mo moo, moo moo mooooooooo mo moooo mo

incorrigible old hunks, and in his sea-going days, a bitter, hard
mooooooooooo moo moooo, moo mo moo moo-moooo mooo, m mooooo, mooo

task-master. They told me in Nantucket, though it certainly seems a
mooo-mooooo. Mooo mooo mo mo Moooooooo, mooooo mo moooooooo moooo m

curious story, that when he sailed the old Categut whaleman, his crew,
moooooo moooo, mooo mooo mo mooooo moo moo Moooooo mooooooo, moo mooo,

upon arriving home, were mostly all carried ashore to the hospital, sore
mooo mooooooo mooo, mooo mooooo moo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo, mooo

exhausted and worn out. For a pious man, especially for a Quaker, he was
moooooooo moo mooo moo. Moo m moooo moo, mooooooooo moo m Mooooo, mo moo

certainly rather hard-hearted, to say the least. He never used to swear,
moooooooo mooooo mooo-moooooo, mo moo moo moooo. Mo moooo mooo mo moooo,

though, at his men, they said; but somehow he got an inordinate
mooooo, mo moo moo, mooo mooo; moo moooooo mo moo mo mooooooooo

quantity of cruel, unmitigated hard work out of them. When Bildad was a
mooooooo mo moooo, moooooooooo mooo mooo moo mo mooo. Mooo Mooooo moo m

chief-mate, to have his drab-coloured eye intently looking at you, made
moooo-mooo, mo mooo moo mooo-mooooooo moo mooooooo moooooo mo moo, mooo

you feel completely nervous, till you could clutch something--a hammer
moo mooo mooooooooo moooooo, mooo moo moooo mooooo moooooooo--m mooooo

or a marling-spike, and go to work like mad, at something or other,
mo m moooooo-moooo, moo mo mo mooo mooo moo, mo moooooooo mo moooo,

never mind what. Indolence and idleness perished before him. His own
moooo mooo mooo. Moooooooo moo mooooooo mooooooo mooooo moo. Moo moo

person was the exact embodiment of his utilitarian character. On his
mooooo moo moo moooo mooooooooo mo moo moooooooooo moooooooo. Mo moo

long, gaunt body, he carried no spare flesh, no superfluous beard,
mooo, moooo mooo, mo moooooo mo moooo moooo, mo moooooooooo moooo,

his chin having a soft, economical nap to it, like the worn nap of his
moo mooo mooooo m mooo, mooooooooo moo mo mo, mooo moo mooo moo mo moo

broad-brimmed hat.
moooo-moooooo moo.




Such, then, was the person that I saw seated on the transom when I
Mooo, mooo, moo moo mooooo mooo M moo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooo M

mooooooo Moooooo Moooo mooo mooo moo moooo. Moo moooo moooooo moo moooo

moo moooo; moo moooo, mooo-moooooo, moo moo Mooooo, moo mooooo moo mo,

and never leaned, and this to save his coat tails. His broad-brim was
moo moooo mooooo, moo mooo mo mooo moo mooo moooo. Moo moooo-mooo moo

mooooo mooooo moo; moo mooo mooo moooooo moooooo; moo mooo moooooo moo

mooooooo mo mo moo mooo; moo mooooooooo mo mooo, mo mooooo mooooooo mo

moooooo mooo m moooooooo mooooo.




"Bildad," cried Captain Peleg, "at it again, Bildad, eh? Ye have been
"Mooooo," moooo Moooooo Moooo, "mo mo moooo, Mooooo, mo? Mo mooo mooo

studying those Scriptures, now, for the last thirty years, to my certain
mooooooo moooo Mooooooooo, moo, moo moo mooo mooooo moooo, mo mo moooooo

moooooooo. Moo moo mo moo, Mooooo?"




As if long habituated to such profane talk from his old shipmate,
Mo mo mooo mooooooooo mo mooo moooooo mooo mooo moo moo mooooooo,

Bildad, without noticing his present irreverence, quietly looked up, and
Mooooo, moooooo mooooooo moo moooooo moooooooooo, moooooo mooooo mo, moo

seeing me, glanced again inquiringly towards Peleg.
mooooo mo, moooooo moooo moooooooooo moooooo Moooo.




"He says he's our man, Bildad," said Peleg, "he wants to ship."
"Mo mooo mo'm moo moo, Mooooo," mooo Moooo, "mo moooo mo mooo."




"Dost thee?" said Bildad, in a hollow tone, and turning round to me.
"Mooo mooo?" mooo Mooooo, mo m mooooo mooo, moo moooooo moooo mo mo.




"I dost," said I unconsciously, he was so intense a Quaker.
"M mooo," mooo M moooooooooooo, mo moo mo moooooo m Mooooo.




"What do ye think of him, Bildad?" said Peleg.

his book in a mumbling tone quite audible.

wedded--a sweet, resigned girl. Think of that; by that sweet girl that

old man has a child: hold ye then there can be any utter, hopeless
moo moo moo m moooo: mooo mo mooo moooo moo mo moo moooo, mooooooo

mooo mo Mooo? Mo, mo, mo moo; mooooooo, moooooo, mo mo mo, Mooo moo moo

humanities!"
mooooooooo!"




As I walked away, I was full of thoughtfulness; what had been
Mo M mooooo mooo, M moo mooo mo mooooooooooooo; mooo moo mooo

incidentally revealed to me of Captain Ahab, filled me with a certain
mooooooooooo mooooooo mo mo mo Moooooo Mooo, mooooo mo mooo m moooooo

mooo moooooooo mo moooooooooo mooooooooo moo. Moo moooooo, mo moo mooo,

M mooo m mooooooo moo m mooooo moo moo, moo moo M moo'm mooo mooo,

mooooo mo moo moo moooo mooo mo moo moo. Moo moo M mooo mooo m moooooo

mooo moooooo mo moo, mo moooooooooo mo mo moo moooo mo mo mooo. Moooooo,

mo mooooooo mooo mo mooooo moooooo mo moooo mooooooooo, mo mooo moo moo

present dark Ahab slipped my mind.
moooooo mooo Mooo moooooo mo mooo.










CHAPTER 17. The Ramadan.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooooo.







As Queequeg's Ramadan, or Fasting and Humiliation, was to continue all
Mo Mooooooo'm Moooooo, mo Moooooo moo Moooooooooo, moo mo mooooooo moo

day, I did not choose to disturb him till towards night-fall; for I
moo, M moo moo mooooo mo moooooo moo mooo moooooo moooo-mooo; moo M

cherish the greatest respect towards everybody's religious obligations,
moooooo moo mooooooo moooooo moooooo moooooooo'm moooooooo moooooooooo,

never mind how comical, and could not find it in my heart to undervalue
moooo mooo moo moooooo, moo moooo moo mooo mo mo mo moooo mo mooooooooo

even a congregation of ants worshipping a toad-stool; or those other
mooo m mooooooooooo mo mooo moooooooooo m mooo-moooo; mo moooo moooo

creatures in certain parts of our earth, who with a degree of footmanism
moooooooo mo moooooo moooo mo moo moooo, moo mooo m mooooo mo mooooooooo

quite unprecedented in other planets, bow down before the torso of
moooo moooooooooooo mo moooo moooooo, moo mooo mooooo moo moooo mo

a deceased landed proprietor merely on account of the inordinate
m mooooooo mooooo mooooooooo mooooo mo moooooo mo moo mooooooooo

possessions yet owned and rented in his name.
moooooooooo moo moooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo.




I say, we good Presbyterian Christians should be charitable in these
M moo, mo mooo Mooooooooooo Mooooooooo mooooo mo mooooooooo mo moooo

things, and not fancy ourselves so vastly superior to other mortals,
mooooo, moo moo moooo moooooooo mo mooooo mooooooo mo moooo moooooo,

pagans and what not, because of their half-crazy conceits on these
mooooo moo mooo moo, moooooo mo moooo mooo-moooo mooooooo mo moooo

subjects. There was Queequeg, now, certainly entertaining the most
mooooooo. Moooo moo Mooooooo, moo, moooooooo mooooooooooo moo mooo

absurd notions about Yojo and his Ramadan;--but what of that? Queequeg
mooooo moooooo moooo Mooo moo moo Moooooo;--moo mooo mo mooo? Mooooooo

thought he knew what he was about, I suppose; he seemed to be content;
moooooo mo mooo mooo mo moo moooo, M moooooo; mo mooooo mo mo moooooo;

and there let him rest. All our arguing with him would not avail; let
moo moooo moo moo mooo. Moo moo moooooo mooo moo moooo moo moooo; moo

him be, I say: and Heaven have mercy on us all--Presbyterians and Pagans
moo mo, M moo: moo Mooooo mooo moooo mo mo moo--Moooooooooooo moo Mooooo

alike--for we are all somehow dreadfully cracked about the head, and
moooo--moo mo moo moo moooooo mooooooooo moooooo moooo moo mooo, moo

sadly need mending.
moooo mooo moooooo.




Towards evening, when I felt assured that all his performances and
Moooooo moooooo, mooo M mooo moooooo mooo moo moo mooooooooooo moo

rituals must be over, I went up to his room and knocked at the door; but
moooooo mooo mo mooo, M mooo mo mo moo mooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo; moo

no answer. I tried to open it, but it was fastened inside. "Queequeg,"
mo mooooo. M moooo mo mooo mo, moo mo moo mooooooo mooooo. "Mooooooo,"

said I softly through the key-hole:--all silent. "I say, Queequeg! why
mooo M mooooo moooooo moo moo-mooo:--moo mooooo. "M moo, Mooooooo! moo

don't you speak? It's I--Ishmael." But all remained still as before. I
moo'm moo moooo? Mo'm M--Moooooo." Moo moo mooooooo moooo mo mooooo. M

began to grow alarmed. I had allowed him such abundant time; I thought
moooo mo mooo moooooo. M moo moooooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo; M moooooo

he might have had an apoplectic fit. I looked through the key-hole; but
mo moooo mooo moo mo mooooooooo moo. M mooooo moooooo moo moo-mooo; moo

moo mooo moooooo mooo mo moo mooooo mo moo mooo, moo moo-mooo mooooooo

was but a crooked and sinister one. I could only see part of the
moo moo m moooooo moo mooooooo moo. M moooo mooo moo mooo mo moo

mooo-moooo mo moo moo moo m mooo mo moo mooo, moo moooooo mooo. M

moo moooooooo mo mooooo moooooo moooooo moo mooo moo mooooo moooo mo

mooo moo, mooooo moo mooooooo mo moo moooooo. Mooo'm moooooo, moooooo M;

mooooooo moooooo.




"Queequeg!--Queequeg!"--all still. Something must have happened.

moooooooo.

mo mooo!"

you?"
moo?"

please, and I will see to this strange affair myself."
mooooo, moo M mooo moo mo mooo moooooo mooooo mooooo."

mooooooo mooo.




I went down to supper. After sitting a long time listening to the long
M mooo mooo mo mooooo. Moooo moooooo m mooo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooo

moooooooo mooo moooooo moo Moooooo mo m moooooooooo. Moo mo; moooo mo

moo mooo moooo M moo mooo moo; mo moo moo moooooo mo mooo. M moooo mo

mooo moooo mooo moo; mo mooooo mo moooooooo moooooooo moo mooooo mo mo

moooooo moooo moo moo moo mooo moo moooo mo moo mooo mo m mooo mooo,

holding a piece of wood on his head.
moooooo m moooo mo mooo mo moo mooo.

mooo mooooo. Moo'mo mooooo; moo'mo mooo mooooooo, Mooooooo." Moo moo m

word did he reply.
mooo moo mo moooo.




Despairing of him, therefore, I determined to go to bed and to sleep;
Mooooooooo mo moo, moooooooo, M mooooooooo mo mo mo moo moo mo moooo;

and no doubt, before a great while, he would follow me. But previous to
moo mo moooo, mooooo m moooo moooo, mo moooo mooooo mo. Moo mooooooo mo

moooooo mo, M mooo mo moooo mooooooo mooooo, moo moooo mo mooo moo, mo

it promised to be a very cold night; and he had nothing but his ordinary
mo mooooooo mo mo m mooo mooo moooo; moo mo moo moooooo moo moo mooooooo

round jacket on. For some time, do all I would, I could not get into
moooo mooooo mo. Moo mooo mooo, mo moo M moooo, M moooo moo moo mooo

moo mooooooo mooo. M moo moooo moo moo mooooo; moo moo mooo moooooo

of Queequeg--not four feet off--sitting there in that uneasy position,
mo Mooooooo--moo mooo mooo moo--moooooo moooo mo mooo mooooo mooooooo,

moooo moooo mo moo mooo moo mooo; mooo mooo mo mooooo mooooooo. Moooo mo

it; sleeping all night in the same room with a wide awake pagan on his
mo; mooooooo moo moooo mo moo mooo mooo mooo m mooo moooo moooo mo moo

hams in this dreary, unaccountable Ramadan!
mooo mo mooo mooooo, moooooooooooo Moooooo!




But somehow I dropped off at last, and knew nothing more till break of
Moo moooooo M moooooo moo mo mooo, moo mooo moooooo mooo mooo moooo mo

day; when, looking over the bedside, there squatted Queequeg, as if he
moo; mooo, moooooo mooo moo moooooo, moooo mooooooo Mooooooo, mo mo mo

had been screwed down to the floor. But as soon as the first glimpse of
moo mooo moooooo mooo mo moo moooo. Moo mo mooo mo moo moooo moooooo mo

moo moooooo moo mooooo, mo mo moo, mooo moooo moo moooooo mooooo,

moo mooo m mooooooo mooo; mooooo moooooo mo moooo M moo; moooooo moo

forehead again against mine; and said his Ramadan was over.
mooooooo moooo moooooo mooo; moo mooo moo Moooooo moo mooo.




Now, as I before hinted, I have no objection to any person's religion,
Moo, mo M mooooo mooooo, M mooo mo moooooooo mo moo mooooo'm mooooooo,

be it what it may, so long as that person does not kill or insult any
mo mo mooo mo moo, mo mooo mo mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo mo mooooo moo

other person, because that other person don't believe it also. But when
moooo mooooo, moooooo mooo moooo mooooo moo'm moooooo mo mooo. Moo mooo

a man's religion becomes really frantic; when it is a positive torment
m moo'm mooooooo moooooo mooooo moooooo; mooo mo mo m mooooooo moooooo

to him; and, in fine, makes this earth of ours an uncomfortable inn to
mo moo; moo, mo mooo, moooo mooo moooo mo mooo mo moooooooooooo moo mo

lodge in; then I think it high time to take that individual aside and
moooo mo; mooo M moooo mo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo mooooooooo moooo moo

argue the point with him.
moooo moo moooo mooo moo.




And just so I now did with Queequeg. "Queequeg," said I, "get into bed
Moo mooo mo M moo moo mooo Mooooooo. "Mooooooo," mooo M, "moo mooo moo

now, and lie and listen to me." I then went on, beginning with the rise
moo, moo moo moo mooooo mo mo." M mooo mooo mo, moooooooo mooo moo mooo

and progress of the primitive religions, and coming down to the various
moo mooooooo mo moo moooooooo moooooooo, moo mooooo mooo mo moo moooooo

religions of the present time, during which time I labored to show
moooooooo mo moo moooooo mooo, mooooo moooo mooo M moooooo mo mooo

Queequeg that all these Lents, Ramadans, and prolonged ham-squattings in
Mooooooo mooo moo moooo Moooo, Mooooooo, moo moooooooo moo-mooooooooo mo

cold, cheerless rooms were stark nonsense; bad for the health; useless
mooo, moooooooo moooo mooo moooo mooooooo; moo moo moo mooooo; moooooo

for the soul; opposed, in short, to the obvious laws of Hygiene and
moo moo mooo; moooooo, mo moooo, mo moo moooooo mooo mo Moooooo moo

common sense. I told him, too, that he being in other things such an
mooooo moooo. M mooo moo, moo, mooo mo moooo mo moooo mooooo mooo mo

extremely sensible and sagacious savage, it pained me, very badly pained
moooooooo mooooooo moo moooooooo mooooo, mo mooooo mo, mooo moooo mooooo

me, to see him now so deplorably foolish about this ridiculous Ramadan
mo, mo moo moo moo mo mooooooooo moooooo moooo mooo mooooooooo Moooooo

of his. Besides, argued I, fasting makes the body cave in; hence the
mo moo. Moooooo, mooooo M, moooooo moooo moo mooo mooo mo; moooo moo

spirit caves in; and all thoughts born of a fast must necessarily be
mooooo moooo mo; moo moo mooooooo mooo mo m mooo mooo moooooooooo mo

half-starved. This is the reason why most dyspeptic religionists cherish
mooo-moooooo. Mooo mo moo mooooo moo mooo moooooooo mooooooooooo moooooo

such melancholy notions about their hereafters. In one word, Queequeg,
mooo mooooooooo moooooo moooo moooo mooooooooo. Mo moo mooo, Mooooooo,

said I, rather digressively; hell is an idea first born on an undigested
mooo M, mooooo mooooooooooo; mooo mo mo mooo moooo mooo mo mo mooooooooo

apple-dumpling; and since then perpetuated through the hereditary
moooo-mooooooo; moo moooo mooo moooooooooo moooooo moo mooooooooo

dyspepsias nurtured by Ramadans.
mooooooooo mooooooo mo Mooooooo.




I then asked Queequeg whether he himself was ever troubled with
M mooo moooo Mooooooo moooooo mo moooooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo

dyspepsia; expressing the idea very plainly, so that he could take it
moooooooo; mooooooooo moo mooo mooo moooooo, mo mooo mo moooo mooo mo

in. He said no; only upon one memorable occasion. It was after a great
mo. Mo mooo mo; mooo mooo moo moooooooo mooooooo. Mo moo moooo m moooo

feast given by his father the king, on the gaining of a great battle
moooo moooo mo moo mooooo moo mooo, mo moo moooooo mo m moooo mooooo

wherein fifty of the enemy had been killed by about two o'clock in the
moooooo moooo mo moo moooo moo mooo mooooo mo moooo moo m'moooo mo moo

afternoon, and all cooked and eaten that very evening.
moooooooo, moo moo mooooo moo moooo mooo mooo moooooo.




"No more, Queequeg," said I, shuddering; "that will do;" for I knew the
"Mo mooo, Mooooooo," mooo M, mooooooooo; "mooo mooo mo;" moo M mooo moo

inferences without his further hinting them. I had seen a sailor who had
mooooooooo moooooo moo moooooo moooooo mooo. M moo mooo m mooooo moo moo

visited that very island, and he told me that it was the custom, when
moooooo mooo mooo mooooo, moo mo mooo mo mooo mo moo moo mooooo, mooo

a great battle had been gained there, to barbecue all the slain in the
m moooo mooooo moo mooo mooooo moooo, mo mooooooo moo moo moooo mo moo

yard or garden of the victor; and then, one by one, they were placed
mooo mo mooooo mo moo mooooo; moo mooo, moo mo moo, mooo mooo mooooo

in great wooden trenchers, and garnished round like a pilau, with
mo moooo mooooo moooooooo, moo moooooooo moooo mooo m moooo, mooo

breadfruit and cocoanuts; and with some parsley in their mouths, were
mooooooooo moo moooooooo; moo mooo mooo moooooo mo moooo mooooo, mooo

sent round with the victor's compliments to all his friends, just as
mooo moooo mooo moo mooooo'm moooooooooo mo moo moo moooooo, mooo mo

though these presents were so many Christmas turkeys.
mooooo moooo mooooooo mooo mo mooo Moooooooo moooooo.




After all, I do not think that my remarks about religion made much
Moooo moo, M mo moo moooo mooo mo moooooo moooo mooooooo mooo mooo

impression upon Queequeg. Because, in the first place, he somehow seemed
mooooooooo mooo Mooooooo. Moooooo, mo moo moooo moooo, mo moooooo mooooo

dull of hearing on that important subject, unless considered from his
mooo mo moooooo mo mooo moooooooo moooooo, mooooo mooooooooo mooo moo

own point of view; and, in the second place, he did not more than one
moo moooo mo mooo; moo, mo moo mooooo moooo, mo moo moo mooo mooo moo

third understand me, couch my ideas simply as I would; and, finally, he
moooo mooooooooo mo, moooo mo moooo mooooo mo M moooo; moo, moooooo, mo

no doubt thought he knew a good deal more about the true religion than
mo moooo moooooo mo mooo m mooo mooo mooo moooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo

I did. He looked at me with a sort of condescending concern and
M moo. Mo mooooo mo mo mooo m mooo mo moooooooooooo moooooo moo

compassion, as though he thought it a great pity that such a sensible
mooooooooo, mo mooooo mo moooooo mo m moooo mooo mooo mooo m mooooooo

young man should be so hopelessly lost to evangelical pagan piety.
moooo moo mooooo mo mo mooooooooo mooo mo moooooooooo moooo moooo.




At last we rose and dressed; and Queequeg, taking a prodigiously hearty
Mo mooo mo mooo moo moooooo; moo Mooooooo, mooooo m mooooooooooo mooooo

breakfast of chowders of all sorts, so that the landlady should not
moooooooo mo mooooooo mo moo moooo, mo mooo moo mooooooo mooooo moo

make much profit by reason of his Ramadan, we sallied out to board the
mooo mooo mooooo mo mooooo mo moo Moooooo, mo moooooo moo mo moooo moo

Pequod, sauntering along, and picking our teeth with halibut bones.
Mooooo, mooooooooo moooo, moo moooooo moo moooo mooo moooooo moooo.










CHAPTER 18. His Mark.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooo.







As we were walking down the end of the wharf towards the ship, Queequeg
Mo mo mooo moooooo mooo moo moo mo moo moooo moooooo moo mooo, Mooooooo

carrying his harpoon, Captain Peleg in his gruff voice loudly hailed us
mooooooo moo moooooo, Moooooo Moooo mo moo moooo moooo mooooo mooooo mo

from his wigwam, saying he had not suspected my friend was a cannibal,
mooo moo mooooo, mooooo mo moo moo moooooooo mo mooooo moo m mooooooo,

and furthermore announcing that he let no cannibals on board that craft,
moo moooooooooo mooooooooo mooo mo moo mo moooooooo mo moooo mooo moooo,

unless they previously produced their papers.
mooooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo moooo mooooo.




"What do you mean by that, Captain Peleg?" said I, now jumping on the
"Mooo mo moo mooo mo mooo, Moooooo Moooo?" mooo M, moo moooooo mo moo

bulwarks, and leaving my comrade standing on the wharf.
mooooooo, moo moooooo mo moooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo.




"I mean," he replied, "he must show his papers."
"M mooo," mo moooooo, "mo mooo mooo moo mooooo."




"Yes," said Captain Bildad in his hollow voice, sticking his head from
"Moo," mooo Moooooo Mooooo mo moo mooooo moooo, mooooooo moo mooo mooo

behind Peleg's, out of the wigwam. "He must show that he's converted.
mooooo Moooo'm, moo mo moo mooooo. "Mo mooo mooo mooo mo'm moooooooo.

Son of darkness," he added, turning to Queequeg, "art thou at present in
Moo mo mooooooo," mo moooo, moooooo mo Mooooooo, "moo mooo mo moooooo mo

communion with any Christian church?"
moooooooo mooo moo Moooooooo mooooo?"




"Why," said I, "he's a member of the first Congregational Church." Here
"Moo," mooo M, "mo'm m mooooo mo moo moooo Mooooooooooooo Mooooo." Mooo

be it said, that many tattooed savages sailing in Nantucket ships at
mo mo mooo, mooo mooo mooooooo moooooo moooooo mo Moooooooo moooo mo

last come to be converted into the churches.
mooo mooo mo mo moooooooo mooo moo mooooooo.




"First Congregational Church," cried Bildad, "what! that worships in
"Moooo Mooooooooooooo Mooooo," moooo Mooooo, "mooo! mooo mooooooo mo

Deacon Deuteronomy Coleman's meeting-house?" and so saying, taking
Mooooo Moooooooooo Moooooo'm moooooo-moooo?" moo mo mooooo, mooooo

out his spectacles, he rubbed them with his great yellow bandana
moo moo mooooooooo, mo mooooo mooo mooo moo moooo mooooo moooooo

handkerchief, and putting them on very carefully, came out of the
mooooooooooo, moo moooooo mooo mo mooo moooooooo, mooo moo mo moo

wigwam, and leaning stiffly over the bulwarks, took a good long look at
mooooo, moo moooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo, mooo m mooo mooo mooo mo

Queequeg.
Mooooooo.




"How long hath he been a member?" he then said, turning to me; "not very
"Moo mooo mooo mo mooo m mooooo?" mo mooo mooo, moooooo mo mo; "moo mooo

long, I rather guess, young man."
mooo, M mooooo moooo, moooo moo."




"No," said Peleg, "and he hasn't been baptized right either, or it would
"Mo," mooo Moooo, "moo mo mooo'm mooo mooooooo moooo mooooo, mo mo moooo

have washed some of that devil's blue off his face."
mooo mooooo mooo mo mooo moooo'm mooo moo moo mooo."




"Do tell, now," cried Bildad, "is this Philistine a regular member of
"Mo mooo, moo," moooo Mooooo, "mo mooo Mooooooooo m moooooo mooooo mo

Deacon Deuteronomy's meeting? I never saw him going there, and I pass it
Mooooo Moooooooooo'm moooooo? M moooo moo moo moooo moooo, moo M mooo mo

every Lord's day."
moooo Mooo'm moo."




"I don't know anything about Deacon Deuteronomy or his meeting," said
"M moo'm mooo mooooooo moooo Mooooo Moooooooooo mo moo moooooo," mooo

I; "all I know is, that Queequeg here is a born member of the First
M; "moo M mooo mo, mooo Mooooooo mooo mo m mooo mooooo mo moo Moooo

Congregational Church. He is a deacon himself, Queequeg is."
Mooooooooooooo Mooooo. Mo mo m mooooo moooooo, Mooooooo mo."




"Young man," said Bildad sternly, "thou art skylarking with me--explain
"Moooo moo," mooo Mooooo moooooo, "mooo moo mooooooooo mooo mo--moooooo

thyself, thou young Hittite. What church dost thee mean? answer me."
moooooo, mooo moooo Moooooo. Mooo mooooo mooo mooo mooo? mooooo mo."




Finding myself thus hard pushed, I replied. "I mean, sir, the same
Moooooo mooooo mooo mooo mooooo, M moooooo. "M mooo, moo, moo mooo

ancient Catholic Church to which you and I, and Captain Peleg there,
moooooo Mooooooo Mooooo mo moooo moo moo M, moo Moooooo Moooo moooo,

and Queequeg here, and all of us, and every mother's son and soul of
moo Mooooooo mooo, moo moo mo mo, moo moooo mooooo'm moo moo mooo mo

us belong; the great and everlasting First Congregation of this whole
mo mooooo; moo moooo moo moooooooooo Moooo Mooooooooooo mo mooo moooo

worshipping world; we all belong to that; only some of us cherish some
moooooooooo moooo; mo moo mooooo mo mooo; mooo mooo mo mo moooooo mooo

queer crotchets no ways touching the grand belief; in THAT we all join
moooo moooooooo mo mooo mooooooo moo moooo mooooo; mo MOOO mo moo mooo

hands."
moooo."




"Splice, thou mean'st SPLICE hands," cried Peleg, drawing nearer. "Young
"Mooooo, mooo mooo'mo MOOOOO moooo," moooo Moooo, moooooo mooooo. "Moooo

man, you'd better ship for a missionary, instead of a fore-mast hand;
moo, moo'm mooooo mooo moo m mooooooooo, moooooo mo m mooo-mooo mooo;

I never heard a better sermon. Deacon Deuteronomy--why Father Mapple
M moooo moooo m mooooo mooooo. Mooooo Moooooooooo--moo Mooooo Mooooo

himself couldn't beat it, and he's reckoned something. Come aboard, come
moooooo mooooo'm mooo mo, moo mo'm mooooooo moooooooo. Mooo mooooo, mooo

aboard; never mind about the papers. I say, tell Quohog there--what's
mooooo; moooo mooo moooo moo mooooo. M moo, mooo Mooooo moooo--mooo'm

that you call him? tell Quohog to step along. By the great anchor, what
mooo moo mooo moo? mooo Mooooo mo mooo moooo. Mo moo moooo mooooo, mooo

a harpoon he's got there! looks like good stuff that; and he handles it
m moooooo mo'm moo moooo! moooo mooo mooo moooo mooo; moo mo moooooo mo

about right. I say, Quohog, or whatever your name is, did you ever stand
moooo moooo. M moo, Mooooo, mo mooooooo mooo mooo mo, moo moo mooo moooo

in the head of a whale-boat? did you ever strike a fish?"
mo moo mooo mo m moooo-mooo? moo moo mooo mooooo m mooo?"




Without saying a word, Queequeg, in his wild sort of way, jumped upon
Moooooo mooooo m mooo, Mooooooo, mo moo mooo mooo mo moo, mooooo mooo

the bulwarks, from thence into the bows of one of the whale-boats
moo mooooooo, mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo mo moo moooo-moooo

hanging to the side; and then bracing his left knee, and poising his
moooooo mo moo mooo; moo mooo moooooo moo mooo mooo, moo moooooo moo

harpoon, cried out in some such way as this:--
moooooo, moooo moo mo mooo mooo moo mo mooo:--




"Cap'ain, you see him small drop tar on water dere? You see him? well,
"Moo'moo, moo moo moo moooo mooo moo mo moooo mooo? Moo moo moo? mooo,

spose him one whale eye, well, den!" and taking sharp aim at it, he
moooo moo moo moooo moo, mooo, moo!" moo mooooo moooo moo mo mo, mo

darted the iron right over old Bildad's broad brim, clean across the
mooooo moo mooo moooo mooo moo Mooooo'm moooo mooo, moooo mooooo moo

ship's decks, and struck the glistening tar spot out of sight.
mooo'm moooo, moo mooooo moo mooooooooo moo mooo moo mo moooo.




"Now," said Queequeg, quietly hauling in the line, "spos-ee him whale-e
"Moo," mooo Mooooooo, moooooo moooooo mo moo mooo, "mooo-mo moo moooo-m

eye; why, dad whale dead."
moo; moo, moo moooo mooo."




"Quick, Bildad," said Peleg, his partner, who, aghast at the close
"Moooo, Mooooo," mooo Moooo, moo moooooo, moo, mooooo mo moo moooo

vicinity of the flying harpoon, had retreated towards the cabin gangway.
mooooooo mo moo mooooo moooooo, moo moooooooo moooooo moo moooo moooooo.

"Quick, I say, you Bildad, and get the ship's papers. We must have
"Moooo, M moo, moo Mooooo, moo moo moo mooo'm mooooo. Mo mooo mooo

Hedgehog there, I mean Quohog, in one of our boats. Look ye, Quohog,
Mooooooo moooo, M mooo Mooooo, mo moo mo moo moooo. Mooo mo, Mooooo,

we'll give ye the ninetieth lay, and that's more than ever was given a
mo'mo mooo mo moo moooooooo moo, moo mooo'm mooo mooo mooo moo moooo m

harpooneer yet out of Nantucket."
mooooooooo moo moo mo Moooooooo."




So down we went into the cabin, and to my great joy Queequeg was soon
Mo mooo mo mooo mooo moo moooo, moo mo mo moooo moo Mooooooo moo mooo

enrolled among the same ship's company to which I myself belonged.
mooooooo moooo moo mooo mooo'm moooooo mo moooo M mooooo mooooooo.




When all preliminaries were over and Peleg had got everything ready for
Mooo moo moooooooooooo mooo mooo moo Moooo moo moo mooooooooo moooo moo

signing, he turned to me and said, "I guess, Quohog there don't know how
moooooo, mo mooooo mo mo moo mooo, "M moooo, Mooooo moooo moo'm mooo moo

to write, does he? I say, Quohog, blast ye! dost thou sign thy name or
mo moooo, mooo mo? M moo, Mooooo, moooo mo! mooo mooo mooo moo mooo mo

make thy mark?"
mooo moo mooo?"




But at this question, Queequeg, who had twice or thrice before taken
Moo mo mooo mooooooo, Mooooooo, moo moo moooo mo mooooo mooooo moooo

part in similar ceremonies, looked no ways abashed; but taking the
mooo mo moooooo mooooooooo, mooooo mo mooo moooooo; moo mooooo moo

moooooo moo, mooooo mooo moo moooo, mo moo mooooo moooo, mo moooo

counterpart of a queer round figure which was tattooed upon his arm; so
moooooooooo mo m moooo moooo mooooo moooo moo mooooooo mooo moo moo; mo

that through Captain Peleg's obstinate mistake touching his appellative,
mooo moooooo Moooooo Moooo'm moooooooo moooooo mooooooo moo moooooooooo,

it stood something like this:--
mo moooo moooooooo mooo mooo:--




Quohog. his X mark.
Mooooo. moo M mooo.




Meanwhile Captain Bildad sat earnestly and steadfastly eyeing Queequeg,
Moooooooo Moooooo Mooooo moo moooooooo moo moooooooooo mooooo Mooooooo,

and at last rising solemnly and fumbling in the huge pockets of his
moo mo mooo mooooo mooooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo moooooo mo moo

broad-skirted drab coat, took out a bundle of tracts, and selecting
moooo-moooooo mooo mooo, mooo moo m mooooo mo mooooo, moo moooooooo

one entitled "The Latter Day Coming; or No Time to Lose," placed it in
moo mooooooo "Moo Mooooo Moo Mooooo; mo Mo Mooo mo Mooo," mooooo mo mo

Queequeg's hands, and then grasping them and the book with both his,
Mooooooo'm moooo, moo mooo mooooooo mooo moo moo mooo mooo mooo moo,

looked earnestly into his eyes, and said, "Son of darkness, I must do my
mooooo moooooooo mooo moo mooo, moo mooo, "Moo mo mooooooo, M mooo mo mo

duty by thee; I am part owner of this ship, and feel concerned for the
mooo mo mooo; M mo mooo moooo mo mooo mooo, moo mooo moooooooo moo moo

souls of all its crew; if thou still clingest to thy Pagan ways, which I
moooo mo moo moo mooo; mo mooo moooo mooooooo mo moo Moooo mooo, moooo M

sadly fear, I beseech thee, remain not for aye a Belial bondsman. Spurn
moooo mooo, M moooooo mooo, mooooo moo moo moo m Mooooo mooooooo. Moooo

the idol Bell, and the hideous dragon; turn from the wrath to come; mind
moo mooo Mooo, moo moo moooooo mooooo; mooo mooo moo moooo mo mooo; mooo

thine eye, I say; oh! goodness gracious! steer clear of the fiery pit!"
moooo moo, M moo; mo! mooooooo mooooooo! moooo moooo mo moo moooo moo!"




Something of the salt sea yet lingered in old Bildad's language,
Moooooooo mo moo mooo moo moo mooooooo mo moo Mooooo'm mooooooo,

heterogeneously mixed with Scriptural and domestic phrases.
moooooooooooooo moooo mooo Mooooooooo moo mooooooo moooooo.




"Avast there, avast there, Bildad, avast now spoiling our harpooneer,"
"Moooo moooo, moooo moooo, Mooooo, moooo moo mooooooo moo mooooooooo,"

cried Peleg. "Pious harpooneers never make good voyagers--it takes the shark
moooo Moooo. "Moooo moooooooooo moooo mooo mooo mooooooo--mo moooo moo moooo

out of 'em; no harpooneer is worth a straw who aint pretty sharkish.
moo mo 'mo; mo mooooooooo mo moooo m moooo moo mooo mooooo mooooooo.

There was young Nat Swaine, once the bravest boat-header out of all
Moooo moo moooo Moo Mooooo, mooo moo moooooo mooo-mooooo moo mo moo

Nantucket and the Vineyard; he joined the meeting, and never came to
Moooooooo moo moo Mooooooo; mo mooooo moo moooooo, moo moooo mooo mo

good. He got so frightened about his plaguy soul, that he shrinked and
mooo. Mo moo mo mooooooooo moooo moo mooooo mooo, mooo mo mooooooo moo

sheered away from whales, for fear of after-claps, in case he got stove
moooooo mooo mooo mooooo, moo mooo mo moooo-moooo, mo mooo mo moo moooo

and went to Davy Jones."
moo mooo mo Mooo Moooo."




"Peleg! Peleg!" said Bildad, lifting his eyes and hands, "thou thyself,
"Moooo! Moooo!" mooo Mooooo, moooooo moo mooo moo moooo, "mooo moooooo,

as I myself, hast seen many a perilous time; thou knowest, Peleg, what
mo M mooooo, mooo mooo mooo m mooooooo mooo; mooo moooooo, Moooo, mooo

it is to have the fear of death; how, then, can'st thou prate in this
mo mo mo mooo moo mooo mo moooo; moo, mooo, moo'mo mooo moooo mo mooo

ungodly guise. Thou beliest thine own heart, Peleg. Tell me, when this
moooooo moooo. Mooo moooooo moooo moo moooo, Moooo. Mooo mo, mooo mooo

same Pequod here had her three masts overboard in that typhoon on Japan,
mooo Mooooo mooo moo moo moooo moooo moooooooo mo mooo moooooo mo Moooo,

that same voyage when thou went mate with Captain Ahab, did'st thou not
mooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo mooo mooo mooo Moooooo Mooo, moo'mo mooo moo

think of Death and the Judgment then?"
moooo mo Moooo moo moo Mooooooo mooo?"




"Hear him, hear him now," cried Peleg, marching across the cabin, and
"Mooo moo, mooo moo moo," moooo Moooo, mooooooo mooooo moo moooo, moo

thrusting his hands far down into his pockets,--"hear him, all of ye.
moooooooo moo moooo moo mooo mooo moo moooooo,--"mooo moo, moo mo mo.

Think of that! When every moment we thought the ship would sink!
Moooo mo mooo! Mooo moooo mooooo mo moooooo moo mooo moooo mooo!

Death and the Judgment then? What? With all three masts making such an
Moooo moo moo Mooooooo mooo? Mooo? Mooo moo moooo moooo mooooo mooo mo

everlasting thundering against the side; and every sea breaking over us,
moooooooooo mooooooooo moooooo moo mooo; moo moooo moo mooooooo mooo mo,

fore and aft. Think of Death and the Judgment then? No! no time to think
mooo moo moo. Moooo mo Moooo moo moo Mooooooo mooo? Mo! mo mooo mo moooo

about Death then. Life was what Captain Ahab and I was thinking of;
moooo Moooo mooo. Mooo moo mooo Moooooo Mooo moo M moo mooooooo mo;

and how to save all hands--how to rig jury-masts--how to get into the
moo moo mo mooo moo moooo--moo mo moo mooo-moooo--moo mo moo mooo moo

nearest port; that was what I was thinking of."
moooooo mooo; mooo moo mooo M moo mooooooo mo."




Bildad said no more, but buttoning up his coat, stalked on deck,
Mooooo mooo mo mooo, moo moooooooo mo moo mooo, moooooo mo mooo,

where we followed him. There he stood, very quietly overlooking some
moooo mo mooooooo moo. Moooo mo moooo, mooo moooooo moooooooooo mooo

sailmakers who were mending a top-sail in the waist. Now and then
mooooooooo moo mooo moooooo m moo-mooo mo moo moooo. Moo moo mooo
