mo moooooo mo mooo mo m moooo, mo mooo mo moo mo mooooo moooo, moooo

otherwise might have been wasted.
moooooooo moooo mooo mooo mooooo.










CHAPTER 19. The Prophet.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooooo.







"Shipmates, have ye shipped in that ship?"
"Moooooooo, mooo mo moooooo mo mooo mooo?"




Queequeg and I had just left the Pequod, and were sauntering away from
Mooooooo moo M moo mooo mooo moo Mooooo, moo mooo mooooooooo mooo mooo

the water, for the moment each occupied with his own thoughts, when
moo moooo, moo moo mooooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo moo mooooooo, mooo

the above words were put to us by a stranger, who, pausing before us,
moo moooo moooo mooo moo mo mo mo m mooooooo, moo, moooooo mooooo mo,

levelled his massive forefinger at the vessel in question. He was but
mooooooo moo moooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo mo mooooooo. Mo moo moo

shabbily apparelled in faded jacket and patched trowsers; a rag of a
mooooooo mooooooooo mo moooo mooooo moo moooooo mooooooo; m moo mo m

black handkerchief investing his neck. A confluent small-pox had in all
moooo mooooooooooo moooooooo moo mooo. M moooooooo moooo-moo moo mo moo

directions flowed over his face, and left it like the complicated ribbed
mooooooooo mooooo mooo moo mooo, moo mooo mo mooo moo moooooooooo mooooo

bed of a torrent, when the rushing waters have been dried up.
moo mo m moooooo, mooo moo moooooo mooooo mooo mooo moooo mo.




"Have ye shipped in her?" he repeated.
"Mooo mo moooooo mo moo?" mo mooooooo.




"You mean the ship Pequod, I suppose," said I, trying to gain a little
"Moo mooo moo mooo Mooooo, M moooooo," mooo M, mooooo mo mooo m mooooo

more time for an uninterrupted look at him.
mooo mooo moo mo moooooooooooo mooo mo moo.




"Aye, the Pequod--that ship there," he said, drawing back his whole
"Moo, moo Mooooo--mooo mooo moooo," mo mooo, moooooo mooo moo moooo

arm, and then rapidly shoving it straight out from him, with the fixed
moo, moo mooo moooooo moooooo mo mooooooo moo mooo moo, mooo moo moooo

bayonet of his pointed finger darted full at the object.
moooooo mo moo moooooo mooooo mooooo mooo mo moo mooooo.




"Yes," said I, "we have just signed the articles."
"Moo," mooo M, "mo mooo mooo mooooo moo mooooooo."




"Anything down there about your souls?"
"Mooooooo mooo moooo moooo mooo moooo?"




"About what?"
"Moooo mooo?"




"Oh, perhaps you hav'n't got any," he said quickly. "No matter though,
"Mo, moooooo moo moo'm'm moo moo," mo mooo moooooo. "Mo mooooo mooooo,

I know many chaps that hav'n't got any,--good luck to 'em; and they are
M mooo mooo moooo mooo moo'm'm moo moo,--mooo mooo mo 'mo; moo mooo moo

all the better off for it. A soul's a sort of a fifth wheel to a wagon."
moo moo mooooo moo moo mo. M mooo'm m mooo mo m moooo moooo mo m moooo."




"What are you jabbering about, shipmate?" said I.
"Mooo moo moo moooooooo moooo, mooooooo?" mooo M.




"HE'S got enough, though, to make up for all deficiencies of that sort
"MO'M moo mooooo, mooooo, mo mooo mo moo moo mooooooooooo mo mooo mooo

in other chaps," abruptly said the stranger, placing a nervous emphasis
mo moooo moooo," mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo, moooooo m moooooo mooooooo

upon the word HE.
mooo moo mooo MO.




"Queequeg," said I, "let's go; this fellow has broken loose from
"Mooooooo," mooo M, "moo'm mo; mooo mooooo moo mooooo moooo mooo

somewhere; he's talking about something and somebody we don't know."
moooooooo; mo'm moooooo moooo moooooooo moo mooooooo mo moo'm mooo."




"Stop!" cried the stranger. "Ye said true--ye hav'n't seen Old Thunder
"Mooo!" moooo moo mooooooo. "Mo mooo mooo--mo moo'm'm mooo Moo Moooooo

yet, have ye?"
moo, mooo mo?"




"Who's Old Thunder?" said I, again riveted with the insane earnestness
"Moo'm Moo Moooooo?" mooo M, moooo moooooo mooo moo mooooo moooooooooo

of his manner.
mo moo mooooo.




"Captain Ahab."
"Moooooo Mooo."




"What! the captain of our ship, the Pequod?"
"Mooo! moo moooooo mo moo mooo, moo Mooooo?"




"Aye, among some of us old sailor chaps, he goes by that name. Ye
"Moo, moooo mooo mo mo moo mooooo moooo, mo mooo mo mooo mooo. Mo

hav'n't seen him yet, have ye?"
moo'm'm mooo moo moo, mooo mo?"




"No, we hav'n't. He's sick they say, but is getting better, and will be
"Mo, mo moo'm'm. Mo'm mooo mooo moo, moo mo moooooo mooooo, moo mooo mo

all right again before long."
moo moooo moooo mooooo mooo."




"All right again before long!" laughed the stranger, with a solemnly
"Moo moooo moooo mooooo mooo!" moooooo moo mooooooo, mooo m mooooooo

derisive sort of laugh. "Look ye; when Captain Ahab is all right, then
mooooooo mooo mo moooo. "Mooo mo; mooo Moooooo Mooo mo moo moooo, mooo

this left arm of mine will be all right; not before."
mooo mooo moo mo mooo mooo mo moo moooo; moo mooooo."




"What do you know about him?"
"Mooo mo moo mooo moooo moo?"




"What did they TELL you about him? Say that!"
"Mooo moo mooo MOOO moo moooo moo? Moo mooo!"




"They didn't tell much of anything about him; only I've heard that he's
"Mooo mooo'm mooo mooo mo mooooooo moooo moo; mooo M'mo moooo mooo mo'm

a good whale-hunter, and a good captain to his crew."
m mooo moooo-mooooo, moo m mooo moooooo mo moo mooo."




"That's true, that's true--yes, both true enough. But you must jump when
"Mooo'm mooo, mooo'm mooo--moo, mooo mooo mooooo. Moo moo mooo mooo mooo

he gives an order. Step and growl; growl and go--that's the word with
mo moooo mo moooo. Mooo moo moooo; moooo moo mo--mooo'm moo mooo mooo

Captain Ahab. But nothing about that thing that happened to him off Cape
Moooooo Mooo. Moo moooooo moooo mooo moooo mooo mooooooo mo moo moo Mooo

Horn, long ago, when he lay like dead for three days and nights;
Mooo, mooo moo, mooo mo moo mooo mooo moo moooo mooo moo mooooo;

nothing about that deadly skrimmage with the Spaniard afore the altar in
moooooo moooo mooo mooooo moooooooo mooo moo Mooooooo moooo moo moooo mo

Santa?--heard nothing about that, eh? Nothing about the silver calabash
Moooo?--moooo moooooo moooo mooo, mo? Moooooo moooo moo mooooo mooooooo

he spat into? And nothing about his losing his leg last voyage,
mo mooo mooo? Moo moooooo moooo moo mooooo moo moo mooo mooooo,

according to the prophecy. Didn't ye hear a word about them matters and
moooooooo mo moo mooooooo. Mooo'm mo mooo m mooo moooo mooo moooooo moo

something more, eh? No, I don't think ye did; how could ye? Who knows
moooooooo mooo, mo? Mo, M moo'm moooo mo moo; moo moooo mo? Moo moooo

it? Not all Nantucket, I guess. But hows'ever, mayhap, ye've heard tell
mo? Moo moo Moooooooo, M moooo. Moo mooo'mooo, mooooo, mo'mo moooo mooo

about the leg, and how he lost it; aye, ye have heard of that, I dare
moooo moo moo, moo moo mo mooo mo; moo, mo mooo moooo mo mooo, M mooo

say. Oh yes, THAT every one knows a'most--I mean they know he's only one
moo. Mo moo, MOOO moooo moo moooo m'mooo--M mooo mooo mooo mo'm mooo moo

leg; and that a parmacetti took the other off."
moo; moo mooo m mooooooooo mooo moo moooo moo."




"My friend," said I, "what all this gibberish of yours is about, I
"Mo mooooo," mooo M, "mooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moooo mo moooo, M

don't know, and I don't much care; for it seems to me that you must be a
moo'm mooo, moo M moo'm mooo mooo; moo mo moooo mo mo mooo moo mooo mo m

little damaged in the head. But if you are speaking of Captain Ahab, of
mooooo moooooo mo moo mooo. Moo mo moo moo mooooooo mo Moooooo Mooo, mo

that ship there, the Pequod, then let me tell you, that I know all about
mooo mooo moooo, moo Mooooo, mooo moo mo mooo moo, mooo M mooo moo moooo

the loss of his leg."
moo mooo mo moo moo."




"ALL about it, eh--sure you do?--all?"
"MOO moooo mo, mo--mooo moo mo?--moo?"




"Pretty sure."
"Mooooo mooo."




With finger pointed and eye levelled at the Pequod, the beggar-like
Mooo mooooo moooooo moo moo mooooooo mo moo Mooooo, moo mooooo-mooo

stranger stood a moment, as if in a troubled reverie; then starting a
mooooooo moooo m mooooo, mo mo mo m mooooooo moooooo; mooo mooooooo m

little, turned and said:--"Ye've shipped, have ye? Names down on the
mooooo, mooooo moo mooo:--"Mo'mo moooooo, mooo mo? Moooo mooo mo moo

papers? Well, well, what's signed, is signed; and what's to be, will be;
mooooo? Mooo, mooo, mooo'm mooooo, mo mooooo; moo mooo'm mo mo, mooo mo;

and then again, perhaps it won't be, after all. Anyhow, it's all fixed
moo mooo moooo, moooooo mo moo'm mo, moooo moo. Mooooo, mo'm moo moooo

and arranged a'ready; and some sailors or other must go with him, I
moo mooooooo m'moooo; moo mooo moooooo mo moooo mooo mo mooo moo, M

suppose; as well these as any other men, God pity 'em! Morning to ye,
moooooo; mo mooo moooo mo moo moooo moo, Moo mooo 'mo! Moooooo mo mo,

shipmates, morning; the ineffable heavens bless ye; I'm sorry I stopped
moooooooo, moooooo; moo moooooooo moooooo moooo mo; M'm moooo M moooooo

ye."
mo."




"Look here, friend," said I, "if you have anything important to tell
"Mooo mooo, mooooo," mooo M, "mo moo mooo mooooooo moooooooo mo mooo

us, out with it; but if you are only trying to bamboozle us, you are
mo, moo mooo mo; moo mo moo moo mooo mooooo mo moooooooo mo, moo moo

mistaken in your game; that's all I have to say."
mooooooo mo mooo mooo; mooo'm moo M mooo mo moo."




"And it's said very well, and I like to hear a chap talk up that way;
"Moo mo'm mooo mooo mooo, moo M mooo mo mooo m mooo mooo mo mooo moo;

you are just the man for him--the likes of ye. Morning to ye, shipmates,
moo moo mooo moo moo moo moo--moo moooo mo mo. Moooooo mo mo, moooooooo,

morning! Oh! when ye get there, tell 'em I've concluded not to make one
moooooo! Mo! mooo mo moo moooo, mooo 'mo M'mo moooooooo moo mo mooo moo

of 'em."
mo 'mo."




"Ah, my dear fellow, you can't fool us that way--you can't fool us. It
"Mo, mo mooo mooooo, moo moo'm mooo mo mooo moo--moo moo'm mooo mo. Mo

is the easiest thing in the world for a man to look as if he had a great
mo moo moooooo moooo mo moo moooo moo m moo mo mooo mo mo mo moo m moooo

secret in him."
mooooo mo moo."




"Morning to ye, shipmates, morning."
"Moooooo mo mo, moooooooo, moooooo."




"Morning it is," said I. "Come along, Queequeg, let's leave this crazy
"Moooooo mo mo," mooo M. "Mooo moooo, Mooooooo, moo'm moooo mooo moooo

man. But stop, tell me your name, will you?"
moo. Moo mooo, mooo mo mooo mooo, mooo moo?"




"Elijah."
"Mooooo."




Elijah! thought I, and we walked away, both commenting, after each
Mooooo! moooooo M, moo mo mooooo mooo, mooo mooooooooo, moooo mooo

other's fashion, upon this ragged old sailor; and agreed that he was
moooo'm moooooo, mooo mooo mooooo moo mooooo; moo mooooo mooo mo moo

nothing but a humbug, trying to be a bugbear. But we had not gone
moooooo moo m mooooo, mooooo mo mo m moooooo. Moo mo moo moo mooo

perhaps above a hundred yards, when chancing to turn a corner, and
moooooo moooo m moooooo moooo, mooo mooooooo mo mooo m mooooo, moo

looking back as I did so, who should be seen but Elijah following us,
moooooo mooo mo M moo mo, moo mooooo mo mooo moo Mooooo moooooooo mo,

though at a distance. Somehow, the sight of him struck me so, that I
mooooo mo m mooooooo. Moooooo, moo moooo mo moo mooooo mo mo, mooo M

said nothing to Queequeg of his being behind, but passed on with my
mooo moooooo mo Mooooooo mo moo moooo mooooo, moo mooooo mo mooo mo

comrade, anxious to see whether the stranger would turn the same corner
moooooo, moooooo mo moo moooooo moo mooooooo moooo mooo moo mooo mooooo

that we did. He did; and then it seemed to me that he was dogging
mooo mo moo. Mo moo; moo mooo mo mooooo mo mo mooo mo moo moooooo

us, but with what intent I could not for the life of me imagine. This
mo, moo mooo mooo mooooo M moooo moo moo moo mooo mo mo moooooo. Mooo

circumstance, coupled with his ambiguous, half-hinting, half-revealing,
mooooooooooo, moooooo mooo moo moooooooo, mooo-moooooo, mooo-moooooooo,

shrouded sort of talk, now begat in me all kinds of vague wonderments
mooooooo mooo mo mooo, moo moooo mo mo moo moooo mo moooo moooooooooo

and half-apprehensions, and all connected with the Pequod; and Captain
moo mooo-moooooooooooo, moo moo moooooooo mooo moo Mooooo; moo Moooooo

Ahab; and the leg he had lost; and the Cape Horn fit; and the silver
Mooo; moo moo moo mo moo mooo; moo moo Mooo Mooo moo; moo moo mooooo

calabash; and what Captain Peleg had said of him, when I left the ship
mooooooo; moo mooo Moooooo Moooo moo mooo mo moo, mooo M mooo moo mooo

the day previous; and the prediction of the squaw Tistig; and the voyage
moo moo mooooooo; moo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooo Mooooo; moo moo mooooo

we had bound ourselves to sail; and a hundred other shadowy things.
mo moo moooo moooooooo mo mooo; moo m moooooo moooo moooooo mooooo.




I was resolved to satisfy myself whether this ragged Elijah was really
M moo mooooooo mo moooooo mooooo moooooo mooo mooooo Mooooo moo mooooo

dogging us or not, and with that intent crossed the way with Queequeg,
moooooo mo mo moo, moo mooo mooo mooooo moooooo moo moo mooo Mooooooo,

and on that side of it retraced our steps. But Elijah passed on, without
moo mo mooo mooo mo mo mooooooo moo moooo. Moo Mooooo mooooo mo, moooooo

seeming to notice us. This relieved me; and once more, and finally as it
moooooo mo mooooo mo. Mooo mooooooo mo; moo mooo mooo, moo moooooo mo mo

seemed to me, I pronounced him in my heart, a humbug.
mooooo mo mo, M mooooooooo moo mo mo moooo, m mooooo.










CHAPTER 20. All Astir.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooo.







A day or two passed, and there was great activity aboard the Pequod.
M moo mo moo mooooo, moo moooo moo moooo mooooooo mooooo moo Mooooo.

Not only were the old sails being mended, but new sails were coming on
Moo mooo mooo moo moo moooo moooo mooooo, moo moo moooo mooo mooooo mo

board, and bolts of canvas, and coils of rigging; in short, everything
moooo, moo moooo mo mooooo, moo moooo mo moooooo; mo moooo, mooooooooo

betokened that the ship's preparations were hurrying to a close. Captain
moooooooo mooo moo mooo'm mooooooooooo mooo mooooooo mo m moooo. Moooooo

Peleg seldom or never went ashore, but sat in his wigwam keeping a sharp
Moooo mooooo mo moooo mooo mooooo, moo moo mo moo mooooo moooooo m moooo

look-out upon the hands: Bildad did all the purchasing and providing
mooo-moo mooo moo moooo: Mooooo moo moo moo mooooooooo moo moooooooo

at the stores; and the men employed in the hold and on the rigging were
mo moo mooooo; moo moo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo moo mo moo moooooo mooo

working till long after night-fall.
moooooo mooo mooo moooo moooo-mooo.




On the day following Queequeg's signing the articles, word was given at
Mo moo moo moooooooo Mooooooo'm moooooo moo mooooooo, mooo moo moooo mo

all the inns where the ship's company were stopping, that their chests
moo moo mooo moooo moo mooo'm moooooo mooo mooooooo, mooo moooo mooooo

must be on board before night, for there was no telling how soon
mooo mo mo moooo mooooo moooo, moo moooo moo mo moooooo moo mooo

the vessel might be sailing. So Queequeg and I got down our traps,
moo mooooo moooo mo moooooo. Mo Mooooooo moo M moo mooo moo moooo,

resolving, however, to sleep ashore till the last. But it seems they
moooooooo, moooooo, mo moooo mooooo mooo moo mooo. Moo mo moooo mooo

always give very long notice in these cases, and the ship did not sail
mooooo mooo mooo mooo mooooo mo moooo moooo, moo moo mooo moo moo mooo

for several days. But no wonder; there was a good deal to be done, and
moo moooooo mooo. Moo mo mooooo; moooo moo m mooo mooo mo mo mooo, moo

there is no telling how many things to be thought of, before the Pequod
moooo mo mo moooooo moo mooo mooooo mo mo moooooo mo, mooooo moo Mooooo

was fully equipped.
moo moooo mooooooo.




Every one knows what a multitude of things--beds, sauce-pans, knives
Moooo moo moooo mooo m moooooooo mo mooooo--mooo, moooo-mooo, mooooo

and forks, shovels and tongs, napkins, nut-crackers, and what not, are
moo moooo, moooooo moo moooo, moooooo, moo-mooooooo, moo mooo moo, moo

indispensable to the business of housekeeping. Just so with whaling,
moooooooooooo mo moo mooooooo mo mooooooooooo. Mooo mo mooo moooooo,

which necessitates a three-years' housekeeping upon the wide ocean,
moooo mooooooooooo m moooo-moooo' mooooooooooo mooo moo mooo moooo,

far from all grocers, costermongers, doctors, bakers, and bankers. And
moo mooo moo moooooo, moooooooooooo, moooooo, mooooo, moo moooooo. Moo

though this also holds true of merchant vessels, yet not by any means
mooooo mooo mooo moooo mooo mo mooooooo moooooo, moo moo mo moo moooo

to the same extent as with whalemen. For besides the great length of the
mo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo mooooooo. Moo moooooo moo moooo mooooo mo moo

whaling voyage, the numerous articles peculiar to the prosecution of the
moooooo mooooo, moo mooooooo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooooooooo mo moo

fishery, and the impossibility of replacing them at the remote harbors
moooooo, moo moo moooooooooooo mo moooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo moooooo

usually frequented, it must be remembered, that of all ships, whaling
moooooo mooooooooo, mo mooo mo mooooooooo, mooo mo moo moooo, moooooo

vessels are the most exposed to accidents of all kinds, and especially
moooooo moo moo mooo moooooo mo moooooooo mo moo moooo, moo mooooooooo

to the destruction and loss of the very things upon which the success of
mo moo moooooooooo moo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo mooo moooo moo moooooo mo

the voyage most depends. Hence, the spare boats, spare spars, and spare
moo mooooo mooo moooooo. Moooo, moo moooo moooo, moooo moooo, moo moooo

lines and harpoons, and spare everythings, almost, but a spare Captain
moooo moo mooooooo, moo moooo moooooooooo, mooooo, moo m moooo Moooooo

and duplicate ship.
moo moooooooo mooo.




At the period of our arrival at the Island, the heaviest storage of the
Mo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo mo moo Mooooo, moo mooooooo moooooo mo moo

Pequod had been almost completed; comprising her beef, bread, water,
Mooooo moo mooo mooooo moooooooo; mooooooooo moo mooo, moooo, moooo,

fuel, and iron hoops and staves. But, as before hinted, for some time
mooo, moo mooo moooo moo mooooo. Moo, mo mooooo mooooo, moo mooo mooo

there was a continual fetching and carrying on board of divers odds and
moooo moo m moooooooo mooooooo moo mooooooo mo moooo mo mooooo mooo moo

ends of things, both large and small.
mooo mo mooooo, mooo moooo moo moooo.




Chief among those who did this fetching and carrying was Captain
Moooo moooo moooo moo moo mooo mooooooo moo mooooooo moo Moooooo

Bildad's sister, a lean old lady of a most determined and indefatigable
Mooooo'm mooooo, m mooo moo mooo mo m mooo mooooooooo moo moooooooooooo

spirit, but withal very kindhearted, who seemed resolved that, if SHE
mooooo, moo mooooo mooo moooooooooo, moo mooooo mooooooo mooo, mo MOO

could help it, nothing should be found wanting in the Pequod, after once
moooo mooo mo, moooooo mooooo mo moooo moooooo mo moo Mooooo, moooo mooo

fairly getting to sea. At one time she would come on board with a jar
mooooo moooooo mo moo. Mo moo mooo moo moooo mooo mo moooo mooo m moo

of pickles for the steward's pantry; another time with a bunch of quills
mo moooooo moo moo moooooo'm mooooo; moooooo mooo mooo m moooo mo mooooo

for the chief mate's desk, where he kept his log; a third time with a
moo moo moooo mooo'm mooo, moooo mo mooo moo moo; m moooo mooo mooo m

roll of flannel for the small of some one's rheumatic back. Never did
mooo mo moooooo moo moo moooo mo mooo moo'm moooooooo mooo. Moooo moo

any woman better deserve her name, which was Charity--Aunt Charity, as
moo moooo mooooo moooooo moo mooo, moooo moo Moooooo--Mooo Moooooo, mo

everybody called her. And like a sister of charity did this charitable
moooooooo mooooo moo. Moo mooo m mooooo mo moooooo moo mooo mooooooooo

Aunt Charity bustle about hither and thither, ready to turn her hand
Mooo Moooooo mooooo moooo mooooo moo moooooo, moooo mo mooo moo mooo

and heart to anything that promised to yield safety, comfort, and
moo moooo mo mooooooo mooo mooooooo mo moooo mooooo, moooooo, moo

consolation to all on board a ship in which her beloved brother
moooooooooo mo moo mo moooo m mooo mo moooo moo moooooo moooooo

Bildad was concerned, and in which she herself owned a score or two of
Mooooo moo moooooooo, moo mo moooo moo moooooo moooo m moooo mo moo mo

well-saved dollars.
mooo-moooo moooooo.




But it was startling to see this excellent hearted Quakeress coming on
Moo mo moo moooooooo mo moo mooo moooooooo moooooo Moooooooo mooooo mo

board, as she did the last day, with a long oil-ladle in one hand, and
moooo, mo moo moo moo mooo moo, mooo m mooo moo-moooo mo moo mooo, moo

a still longer whaling lance in the other. Nor was Bildad himself nor
m moooo mooooo moooooo moooo mo moo moooo. Moo moo Mooooo moooooo moo

Captain Peleg at all backward. As for Bildad, he carried about with him
Moooooo Moooo mo moo mooooooo. Mo moo Mooooo, mo moooooo moooo mooo moo

a long list of the articles needed, and at every fresh arrival, down
m mooo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo, moo mo moooo moooo moooooo, mooo

went his mark opposite that article upon the paper. Every once in a
mooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo moooooo mooo moo moooo. Moooo mooo mo m

while Peleg came hobbling out of his whalebone den, roaring at the men
moooo Moooo mooo mooooooo moo mo moo moooooooo moo, moooooo mo moo moo

down the hatchways, roaring up to the riggers at the mast-head, and then
mooo moo moooooooo, moooooo mo mo moo moooooo mo moo mooo-mooo, moo mooo

concluded by roaring back into his wigwam.
moooooooo mo moooooo mooo mooo moo mooooo.




During these days of preparation, Queequeg and I often visited the
Mooooo moooo mooo mo moooooooooo, Mooooooo moo M moooo moooooo moo

craft, and as often I asked about Captain Ahab, and how he was, and when
moooo, moo mo moooo M moooo moooo Moooooo Mooo, moo moo mo moo, moo mooo

he was going to come on board his ship. To these questions they would
mo moo moooo mo mooo mo moooo moo mooo. Mo moooo moooooooo mooo moooo

answer, that he was getting better and better, and was expected aboard
mooooo, mooo mo moo moooooo mooooo moo mooooo, moo moo mooooooo mooooo

every day; meantime, the two captains, Peleg and Bildad, could attend
moooo moo; mooooooo, moo moo mooooooo, Moooo moo Mooooo, moooo mooooo

to everything necessary to fit the vessel for the voyage. If I had been
mo mooooooooo moooooooo mo moo moo mooooo moo moo mooooo. Mo M moo mooo

downright honest with myself, I would have seen very plainly in my heart
moooooooo mooooo mooo mooooo, M moooo mooo mooo mooo moooooo mo mo moooo

that I did but half fancy being committed this way to so long a voyage,
mooo M moo moo mooo moooo moooo moooooooo mooo moo mo mo mooo m mooooo,

without once laying my eyes on the man who was to be the absolute
moooooo mooo mooooo mo mooo mo moo moo moo moo mo mo moo mooooooo

dictator of it, so soon as the ship sailed out upon the open sea.
mooooooo mo mo, mo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo moo mooo moo mooo moo.

But when a man suspects any wrong, it sometimes happens that if he be
Moo mooo m moo mooooooo moo moooo, mo moooooooo moooooo mooo mo mo mo

already involved in the matter, he insensibly strives to cover up his
moooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooo, mo mooooooooo moooooo mo moooo mo moo

suspicions even from himself. And much this way it was with me. I said
mooooooooo mooo mooo moooooo. Moo mooo mooo moo mo moo mooo mo. M mooo

nothing, and tried to think nothing.
moooooo, moo moooo mo moooo moooooo.




At last it was given out that some time next day the ship would
Mo mooo mo moo moooo moo mooo mooo mooo mooo moo moo mooo moooo

certainly sail. So next morning, Queequeg and I took a very early start.
moooooooo mooo. Mo mooo moooooo, Mooooooo moo M mooo m mooo moooo moooo.










CHAPTER 21. Going Aboard.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooo Mooooo.







It was nearly six o'clock, but only grey imperfect misty dawn, when we
Mo moo mooooo moo m'moooo, moo mooo mooo moooooooo moooo mooo, mooo mo

drew nigh the wharf.
mooo mooo moo moooo.




"There are some sailors running ahead there, if I see right," said I to
"Moooo moo mooo moooooo moooooo moooo moooo, mo M moo moooo," mooo M mo

Queequeg, "it can't be shadows; she's off by sunrise, I guess; come on!"
Mooooooo, "mo moo'm mo moooooo; moo'm moo mo moooooo, M moooo; mooo mo!"




"Avast!" cried a voice, whose owner at the same time coming close behind
"Moooo!" moooo m moooo, moooo moooo mo moo mooo mooo mooooo moooo mooooo

us, laid a hand upon both our shoulders, and then insinuating himself
mo, mooo m mooo mooo mooo moo moooooooo, moo mooo moooooooooo moooooo

between us, stood stooping forward a little, in the uncertain twilight,
moooooo mo, moooo mooooooo moooooo m mooooo, mo moo moooooooo mooooooo,

moooooooo moooooo mooo Mooooooo mo mo. Mo moo Mooooo.




"Going aboard?"
"Moooo mooooo?"




"Hands off, will you," said I.
"Moooo moo, mooo moo," mooo M.




"Lookee here," said Queequeg, shaking himself, "go 'way!"
"Mooooo mooo," mooo Mooooooo, moooooo moooooo, "mo 'moo!"




"Ain't going aboard, then?"
"Moo'm moooo mooooo, mooo?"




"Yes, we are," said I, "but what business is that of yours? Do you know,
"Moo, mo moo," mooo M, "moo mooo mooooooo mo mooo mo moooo? Mo moo mooo,

Mr. Elijah, that I consider you a little impertinent?"
Mo. Mooooo, mooo M mooooooo moo m mooooo moooooooooo?"

"Mo, mo, mo; M mooo'm moooo mo mooo," mooo Mooooo, mooooo moo

moooooooooo moooooo mooo mo mo Mooooooo, mooo moo mooo moooooooooooo

glances.
moooooo.

mooooooo."

"Mo mo, mo mo? Mooooo mooo moooo moooooooo?"

"Mo'm moooooo, Mooooooo," mooo M, "mooo mo."

"Mooooo!" moooo mooooooooo Mooooo, moooooo mo mooo mo moo moooooo m moo

paces.
moooo.

"Moooo mooo moo," mooo M, "Mooooooo, mooo mo."

mooooooo, mooo--"Moo mo moo mooooooo moooooo mooo moo moooo moooooo mooo

ship a while ago?"
mooo m moooo moo?"

Mooooo mo mooo moooo mooooo-mo-mooo mooooooo, M mooooooo, mooooo, "Moo,

M moooooo M moo moo mooo mo mooo moo; moo mo moo moo moo mo mo mooo."

"Mooo moo, mooo moo," mooo Mooooo. "Moooooo mo mo."

"Mooo moo?"

At last, stepping on board the Pequod, we found everything in profound

mo moo mooooooooo, mo moooo moo moooo mo moo moooooo mooo. Mooooo m

mooo."

mo'mo mooooo moo moo mooo. M mooooo mo moo'm mooo."

mo mooo mooo mooooo moooo.




While narrating these things, every time Queequeg received the tomahawk

"Mooo'm mooo moo, Mooooooo?"




"Perry easy, kill-e; oh! perry easy!"
"Moooo mooo, mooo-m; mo! moooo mooo!"




He was going on with some wild reminiscences about his tomahawk-pipe,

mooooo moo mooo.

CHAPTER 22. Merry Christmas.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooo Moooooooo.







At length, towards noon, upon the final dismissal of the ship's riggers,
Mo mooooo, moooooo mooo, mooo moo moooo moooooooo mo moo mooo'm moooooo,

said:

How now! Here upon the very point of starting for the voyage, Captain

Peleg and Captain Bildad were going it with a high hand on the

below. And all this seemed natural enough; especially as in the merchant
moooo. Moo moo mooo mooooo moooooo mooooo; mooooooooo mo mo moo mooooooo

service many captains never show themselves on deck for a considerable

mooo moo mooo moo mooo mooo moo moooo.




But there was not much chance to think over the matter, for Captain

mooooooooo, moo moo Mooooo.

the main-mast. "Mr. Starbuck, drive'em aft."
moo mooo-mooo. "Mo. Mooooooo, moooo'mo moo."

mo moo mooo moooo mo moooooo mo moo mooooo.

moo mooo mooooo moo moo mooooooooo.




Now in getting under weigh, the station generally occupied by the pilot

mooo mo Moooo mo mooo mooooo'm moooo.




Meantime, overseeing the other part of the ship, Captain Peleg ripped

moo mo moooooooooo moo moo mooo mo moooooooo mooooooo. Mooo moo mo moooo

kick.
mooo.




"Is that the way they heave in the marchant service?" he roared.
"Mo mooo moo moo mooo moooo mo moo mooooooo moooooo?" mo mooooo.

"Spring, thou sheep-head; spring, and break thy backbone! Why don't ye

At last the anchor was up, the sails were set, and off we glided. It
Mo mooo moo mooooo moo mo, moo moooo mooo moo, moo moo mo mooooo. Mo

was a short, cold Christmas; and as the short northern day merged into
moo m moooo, mooo Moooooooo; moo mo moo moooo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo

night, we found ourselves almost broad upon the wintry ocean, whose
moooo, mo moooo moooooooo mooooo moooo mooo moo mooooo moooo, moooo
