mooooooo moooo moooo mo mo moo, mo mo mooooooo moooo. Moo mooo mooo mo

teeth on the bulwarks glistened in the moonlight; and like the white
moooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooooooo; moo mooo moo moooo

ivory tusks of some huge elephant, vast curving icicles depended from
moooo moooo mo mooo mooo mooooooo, mooo moooooo moooooo mooooooo mooo

the bows.
moo mooo.




Lank Bildad, as pilot, headed the first watch, and ever and anon, as the
Mooo Mooooo, mo moooo, mooooo moo moooo moooo, moo mooo moo mooo, mo moo

old craft deep dived into the green seas, and sent the shivering frost
moo moooo mooo moooo mooo moo moooo mooo, moo mooo moo moooooooo moooo

all over her, and the winds howled, and the cordage rang, his steady
moo mooo moo, moo moo moooo mooooo, moo moo moooooo mooo, moo mooooo

notes were heard,--
moooo mooo moooo,--




"Sweet fields beyond the swelling flood, Stand dressed in living green.
"Moooo mooooo mooooo moo mooooooo moooo, Moooo moooooo mo mooooo moooo.

So to the Jews old Canaan stood, While Jordan rolled between."
Mo mo moo Mooo moo Mooooo moooo, Moooo Mooooo mooooo moooooo."







Never did those sweet words sound more sweetly to me than then. They
Moooo moo moooo moooo moooo moooo mooo moooooo mo mo mooo mooo. Mooo

were full of hope and fruition. Spite of this frigid winter night in the
mooo mooo mo mooo moo mooooooo. Moooo mo mooo mooooo mooooo moooo mo moo

boisterous Atlantic, spite of my wet feet and wetter jacket, there was
mooooooooo Mooooooo, moooo mo mo moo mooo moo mooooo mooooo, moooo moo

yet, it then seemed to me, many a pleasant haven in store; and meads
moo, mo mooo mooooo mo mo, mooo m mooooooo moooo mo moooo; moo moooo

and glades so eternally vernal, that the grass shot up by the spring,
moo mooooo mo moooooooo mooooo, mooo moo moooo mooo mo mo moo mooooo,

untrodden, unwilted, remains at midsummer.
moooooooo, mooooooo, moooooo mo moooooooo.




At last we gained such an offing, that the two pilots were needed
Mo mooo mo mooooo mooo mo mooooo, mooo moo moo mooooo mooo mooooo

no longer. The stout sail-boat that had accompanied us began ranging
mo mooooo. Moo moooo mooo-mooo mooo moo moooooooooo mo moooo moooooo

alongside.
moooooooo.




It was curious and not unpleasing, how Peleg and Bildad were affected at
Mo moo moooooo moo moo mooooooooo, moo Moooo moo Mooooo mooo mooooooo mo

this juncture, especially Captain Bildad. For loath to depart, yet;
mooo mooooooo, mooooooooo Moooooo Mooooo. Moo moooo mo mooooo, moo;

very loath to leave, for good, a ship bound on so long and perilous a
mooo moooo mo moooo, moo mooo, m mooo moooo mo mo mooo moo mooooooo m

voyage--beyond both stormy Capes; a ship in which some thousands of
mooooo--mooooo mooo mooooo Moooo; m mooo mo moooo mooo moooooooo mo

his hard earned dollars were invested; a ship, in which an old shipmate
moo mooo mooooo moooooo mooo mooooooo; m mooo, mo moooo mo moo mooooooo

sailed as captain; a man almost as old as he, once more starting to
mooooo mo moooooo; m moo mooooo mo moo mo mo, mooo mooo mooooooo mo

encounter all the terrors of the pitiless jaw; loath to say good-bye to
moooooooo moo moo moooooo mo moo mooooooo moo; moooo mo moo mooo-moo mo

a thing so every way brimful of every interest to him,--poor old Bildad
m moooo mo moooo moo moooooo mo moooo mooooooo mo moo,--mooo moo Mooooo

lingered long; paced the deck with anxious strides; ran down into the
mooooooo mooo; moooo moo mooo mooo moooooo moooooo; moo mooo mooo moo

cabin to speak another farewell word there; again came on deck, and
moooo mo moooo moooooo mooooooo mooo moooo; moooo mooo mo mooo, moo

looked to windward; looked towards the wide and endless waters, only
mooooo mo mooooooo; mooooo moooooo moo mooo moo moooooo mooooo, mooo

bounded by the far-off unseen Eastern Continents; looked towards
moooooo mo moo moo-moo mooooo Moooooo Mooooooooo; mooooo moooooo

the land; looked aloft; looked right and left; looked everywhere
moo mooo; mooooo moooo; mooooo moooo moo mooo; mooooo mooooooooo

and nowhere; and at last, mechanically coiling a rope upon its pin,
moo moooooo; moo mo mooo, mooooooooooo moooooo m mooo mooo moo moo,

convulsively grasped stout Peleg by the hand, and holding up a lantern,
mooooooooooo moooooo moooo Moooo mo moo mooo, moo moooooo mo m moooooo,

for a moment stood gazing heroically in his face, as much as to say,
moo m mooooo moooo mooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooo, mo mooo mo mo moo,

"Nevertheless, friend Peleg, I can stand it; yes, I can."
"Mooooooooooo, mooooo Moooo, M moo moooo mo; moo, M moo."




As for Peleg himself, he took it more like a philosopher; but for all
Mo moo Moooo moooooo, mo mooo mo mooo mooo m moooooooooo; moo moo moo

his philosophy, there was a tear twinkling in his eye, when the lantern
moo mooooooooo, moooo moo m mooo moooooooo mo moo moo, mooo moo moooooo

came too near. And he, too, did not a little run from cabin to deck--now
mooo moo mooo. Moo mo, moo, moo moo m mooooo moo mooo moooo mo mooo--moo

a word below, and now a word with Starbuck, the chief mate.
m mooo moooo, moo moo m mooo mooo Mooooooo, moo moooo mooo.




But, at last, he turned to his comrade, with a final sort of look
Moo, mo mooo, mo mooooo mo moo moooooo, mooo m moooo mooo mo mooo

about him,--"Captain Bildad--come, old shipmate, we must go. Back the
moooo moo,--"Moooooo Mooooo--mooo, moo mooooooo, mo mooo mo. Mooo moo

main-yard there! Boat ahoy! Stand by to come close alongside, now!
mooo-mooo moooo! Mooo mooo! Moooo mo mo mooo moooo moooooooo, moo!

Careful, careful!--come, Bildad, boy--say your last. Luck to ye,
Moooooo, moooooo!--mooo, Mooooo, moo--moo mooo mooo. Mooo mo mo,

Starbuck--luck to ye, Mr. Stubb--luck to ye, Mr. Flask--good-bye and
Mooooooo--mooo mo mo, Mo. Moooo--mooo mo mo, Mo. Moooo--mooo-moo moo

good luck to ye all--and this day three years I'll have a hot supper
mooo mooo mo mo moo--moo mooo moo moooo moooo M'mo mooo m moo mooooo

smoking for ye in old Nantucket. Hurrah and away!"
moooooo moo mo mo moo Moooooooo. Mooooo moo mooo!"




"God bless ye, and have ye in His holy keeping, men," murmured old
"Moo moooo mo, moo mooo mo mo Moo mooo moooooo, moo," mooooooo moo

Bildad, almost incoherently. "I hope ye'll have fine weather now, so
Mooooo, mooooo mooooooooooo. "M mooo mo'mo mooo mooo moooooo moo, mo

that Captain Ahab may soon be moving among ye--a pleasant sun is all
mooo Moooooo Mooo moo mooo mo mooooo moooo mo--m mooooooo moo mo moo

he needs, and ye'll have plenty of them in the tropic voyage ye go.
mo moooo, moo mo'mo mooo mooooo mo mooo mo moo mooooo mooooo mo mo.

Be careful in the hunt, ye mates. Don't stave the boats needlessly,
Mo moooooo mo moo mooo, mo moooo. Moo'm moooo moo moooo mooooooooo,

ye harpooneers; good white cedar plank is raised full three per cent.
mo moooooooooo; mooo moooo moooo moooo mo mooooo mooo moooo moo mooo.

within the year. Don't forget your prayers, either. Mr. Starbuck, mind
mooooo moo mooo. Moo'm mooooo mooo moooooo, mooooo. Mo. Mooooooo, mooo

that cooper don't waste the spare staves. Oh! the sail-needles are in
mooo mooooo moo'm moooo moo moooo mooooo. Mo! moo mooo-moooooo moo mo

the green locker! Don't whale it too much a' Lord's days, men; but don't
moo moooo mooooo! Moo'm moooo mo moo mooo m' Mooo'm mooo, moo; moo moo'm

miss a fair chance either, that's rejecting Heaven's good gifts. Have an
mooo m mooo mooooo mooooo, mooo'm moooooooo Mooooo'm mooo moooo. Mooo mo

eye to the molasses tierce, Mr. Stubb; it was a little leaky, I thought.
moo mo moo mooooooo mooooo, Mo. Moooo; mo moo m mooooo moooo, M moooooo.

If ye touch at the islands, Mr. Flask, beware of fornication. Good-bye,
Mo mo moooo mo moo moooooo, Mo. Moooo, mooooo mo moooooooooo. Mooo-moo,

good-bye! Don't keep that cheese too long down in the hold, Mr.
mooo-moo! Moo'm mooo mooo mooooo moo mooo mooo mo moo mooo, Mo.

Starbuck; it'll spoil. Be careful with the butter--twenty cents the
Mooooooo; mo'mo moooo. Mo moooooo mooo moo mooooo--mooooo moooo moo

pound it was, and mind ye, if--"
moooo mo moo, moo mooo mo, mo--"




"Come, come, Captain Bildad; stop palavering,--away!" and with that,
"Mooo, mooo, Moooooo Mooooo; mooo mooooooooo,--mooo!" moo mooo mooo,

Peleg hurried him over the side, and both dropt into the boat.
Moooo moooooo moo mooo moo mooo, moo mooo moooo mooo moo mooo.




Ship and boat diverged; the cold, damp night breeze blew between; a
Mooo moo mooo mooooooo; moo mooo, mooo moooo mooooo mooo moooooo; m

screaming gull flew overhead; the two hulls wildly rolled; we gave
moooooooo mooo mooo mooooooo; moo moo moooo mooooo mooooo; mo mooo

three heavy-hearted cheers, and blindly plunged like fate into the lone
moooo moooo-moooooo mooooo, moo moooooo moooooo mooo mooo mooo moo mooo

Atlantic.
Mooooooo.










CHAPTER 23. The Lee Shore.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moo Moooo.







Some chapters back, one Bulkington was spoken of, a tall, newlanded
Mooo mooooooo mooo, moo Mooooooooo moo mooooo mo, m mooo, moooooooo

mariner, encountered in New Bedford at the inn.
moooooo, moooooooooo mo Moo Moooooo mo moo moo.




When on that shivering winter's night, the Pequod thrust her vindictive
Mooo mo mooo moooooooo mooooo'm moooo, moo Mooooo mooooo moo mooooooooo

bows into the cold malicious waves, who should I see standing at her
mooo mooo moo mooo moooooooo moooo, moo mooooo M moo mooooooo mo moo

helm but Bulkington! I looked with sympathetic awe and fearfulness upon
mooo moo Mooooooooo! M mooooo mooo moooooooooo moo moo moooooooooo mooo

the man, who in mid-winter just landed from a four years' dangerous
moo moo, moo mo moo-mooooo mooo mooooo mooo m mooo moooo' moooooooo

voyage, could so unrestingly push off again for still another
mooooo, moooo mo moooooooooo mooo moo moooo moo moooo moooooo

tempestuous term. The land seemed scorching to his feet. Wonderfullest
moooooooooo mooo. Moo mooo mooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo. Moooooooooooo

things are ever the unmentionable; deep memories yield no epitaphs; this
mooooo moo mooo moo moooooooooooo; mooo mooooooo moooo mo mooooooo; mooo

six-inch chapter is the stoneless grave of Bulkington. Let me only say
moo-mooo moooooo mo moo moooooooo moooo mo Mooooooooo. Moo mo mooo moo

that it fared with him as with the storm-tossed ship, that miserably
mooo mo moooo mooo moo mo mooo moo moooo-mooooo mooo, mooo moooooooo

drives along the leeward land. The port would fain give succor; the port
mooooo moooo moo moooooo mooo. Moo mooo moooo mooo mooo mooooo; moo mooo

is pitiful; in the port is safety, comfort, hearthstone, supper, warm
mo moooooo; mo moo mooo mo mooooo, moooooo, moooooooooo, mooooo, mooo

blankets, friends, all that's kind to our mortalities. But in that gale,
mooooooo, moooooo, moo mooo'm mooo mo moo moooooooooo. Moo mo mooo mooo,

the port, the land, is that ship's direst jeopardy; she must fly all
moo mooo, moo mooo, mo mooo mooo'm mooooo mooooooo; moo mooo moo moo

hospitality; one touch of land, though it but graze the keel, would make
moooooooooo; moo moooo mo mooo, mooooo mo moo moooo moo mooo, moooo mooo

her shudder through and through. With all her might she crowds all sail
moo moooooo moooooo moo moooooo. Mooo moo moo moooo moo mooooo moo mooo

off shore; in so doing, fights 'gainst the very winds that fain would
moo moooo; mo mo moooo, mooooo 'mooooo moo mooo moooo mooo mooo moooo

blow her homeward; seeks all the lashed sea's landlessness again;
mooo moo mooooooo; moooo moo moo mooooo moo'm mooooooooooo moooo;

for refuge's sake forlornly rushing into peril; her only friend her
moo mooooo'm mooo moooooooo moooooo mooo moooo; moo mooo mooooo moo

bitterest foe!
moooooooo moo!




Know ye now, Bulkington? Glimpses do ye seem to see of that mortally
Mooo mo moo, Mooooooooo? Mooooooo mo mo mooo mo moo mo mooo mooooooo

intolerable truth; that all deep, earnest thinking is but the intrepid
moooooooooo moooo; mooo moo mooo, moooooo mooooooo mo moo moo mooooooo

effort of the soul to keep the open independence of her sea; while
mooooo mo moo mooo mo mooo moo mooo mooooooooooo mo moo moo; moooo

the wildest winds of heaven and earth conspire to cast her on the
moo moooooo moooo mo mooooo moo moooo mooooooo mo mooo moo mo moo

treacherous, slavish shore?
moooooooooo, moooooo moooo?




But as in landlessness alone resides highest truth, shoreless,
Moo mo mo mooooooooooo moooo moooooo moooooo moooo, moooooooo,

indefinite as God--so, better is it to perish in that howling infinite,
mooooooooo mo Moo--mo, mooooo mo mo mo mooooo mo mooo moooooo mooooooo,

than be ingloriously dashed upon the lee, even if that were safety!
mooo mo mooooooooooo mooooo mooo moo moo, mooo mo mooo mooo mooooo!

For worm-like, then, oh! who would craven crawl to land! Terrors of
Moo mooo-mooo, mooo, mo! moo moooo mooooo moooo mo mooo! Moooooo mo

the terrible! is all this agony so vain? Take heart, take heart,
moo mooooooo! mo moo mooo moooo mo mooo? Mooo moooo, mooo moooo,

O Bulkington! Bear thee grimly, demigod! Up from the spray of thy
M Mooooooooo! Mooo mooo mooooo, moooooo! Mo mooo moo moooo mo moo

ocean-perishing--straight up, leaps thy apotheosis!
moooo-moooooooo--mooooooo mo, moooo moo mooooooooo!










CHAPTER 24. The Advocate.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooooooo.







As Queequeg and I are now fairly embarked in this business of whaling;
Mo Mooooooo moo M moo moo mooooo mooooooo mo mooo mooooooo mo moooooo;

and as this business of whaling has somehow come to be regarded among
moo mo mooo mooooooo mo moooooo moo moooooo mooo mo mo mooooooo moooo

landsmen as a rather unpoetical and disreputable pursuit; therefore, I
mooooooo mo m mooooo mooooooooo moo mooooooooooo moooooo; moooooooo, M

am all anxiety to convince ye, ye landsmen, of the injustice hereby done
mo moo moooooo mo mooooooo mo, mo mooooooo, mo moo moooooooo mooooo mooo

to us hunters of whales.
mo mo moooooo mo mooooo.




In the first place, it may be deemed almost superfluous to establish
Mo moo moooo moooo, mo moo mo mooooo mooooo moooooooooo mo moooooooo

the fact, that among people at large, the business of whaling is not
moo mooo, mooo moooo mooooo mo moooo, moo mooooooo mo moooooo mo moo

accounted on a level with what are called the liberal professions. If a
moooooooo mo m moooo mooo mooo moo mooooo moo moooooo moooooooooo. Mo m

stranger were introduced into any miscellaneous metropolitan society,
mooooooo mooo mooooooooo mooo moo moooooooooooo mooooooooooo moooooo,

it would but slightly advance the general opinion of his merits, were
mo moooo moo mooooooo moooooo moo moooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo, mooo

he presented to the company as a harpooneer, say; and if in emulation
mo moooooooo mo moo moooooo mo m mooooooooo, moo; moo mo mo moooooooo

of the naval officers he should append the initials S.W.F. (Sperm
mo moo moooo mooooooo mo mooooo mooooo moo mooooooo M.M.M. (Moooo

Whale Fishery) to his visiting card, such a procedure would be deemed
Moooo Moooooo) mo moo mooooooo mooo, mooo m moooooooo moooo mo mooooo

pre-eminently presuming and ridiculous.
moo-moooooooo moooooooo moo mooooooooo.




Doubtless one leading reason why the world declines honouring us
Moooooooo moo moooooo mooooo moo moo moooo mooooooo moooooooo mo

whalemen, is this: they think that, at best, our vocation amounts to a
mooooooo, mo mooo: mooo moooo mooo, mo mooo, moo mooooooo moooooo mo m

butchering sort of business; and that when actively engaged therein, we
mooooooooo mooo mo mooooooo; moo mooo mooo mooooooo moooooo moooooo, mo

are surrounded by all manner of defilements. Butchers we are, that is
moo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo mo moooooooooo. Mooooooo mo moo, mooo mo

true. But butchers, also, and butchers of the bloodiest badge have been
mooo. Moo mooooooo, mooo, moo mooooooo mo moo moooooooo moooo mooo mooo

all Martial Commanders whom the world invariably delights to honour. And
moo Moooooo Mooooooooo mooo moo moooo mooooooooo mooooooo mo mooooo. Moo

as for the matter of the alleged uncleanliness of our business, ye shall
mo moo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo moooooooooooo mo moo mooooooo, mo moooo

soon be initiated into certain facts hitherto pretty generally unknown,
mooo mo moooooooo mooo moooooo moooo mooooooo mooooo moooooooo moooooo,

and which, upon the whole, will triumphantly plant the sperm whale-ship
moo moooo, mooo moo moooo, mooo mooooooooooo moooo moo moooo moooo-mooo

at least among the cleanliest things of this tidy earth. But even
mo moooo moooo moo mooooooooo mooooo mo mooo mooo moooo. Moo mooo

granting the charge in question to be true; what disordered slippery
mooooooo moo mooooo mo mooooooo mo mo mooo; mooo mooooooooo mooooooo

decks of a whale-ship are comparable to the unspeakable carrion of those
moooo mo m moooo-mooo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooooooooo moooooo mo moooo

battle-fields from which so many soldiers return to drink in all ladies'
mooooo-mooooo mooo moooo mo mooo mooooooo mooooo mo moooo mo moo mooooo'

plaudits? And if the idea of peril so much enhances the popular conceit
mooooooo? Moo mo moo mooo mo moooo mo mooo mooooooo moo moooooo moooooo

of the soldier's profession; let me assure ye that many a veteran
mo moo moooooo'm mooooooooo; moo mo mooooo mo mooo mooo m moooooo

who has freely marched up to a battery, would quickly recoil at the
moo moo mooooo moooooo mo mo m moooooo, moooo moooooo mooooo mo moo

apparition of the sperm whale's vast tail, fanning into eddies the air
mooooooooo mo moo moooo moooo'm mooo mooo, moooooo mooo mooooo moo moo

over his head. For what are the comprehensible terrors of man compared
mooo moo mooo. Moo mooo moo moo mooooooooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooooo

with the interlinked terrors and wonders of God!
mooo moo moooooooooo moooooo moo moooooo mo Moo!




But, though the world scouts at us whale hunters, yet does it
Moo, mooooo moo moooo mooooo mo mo moooo moooooo, moo mooo mo

unwittingly pay us the profoundest homage; yea, an all-abounding
moooooooooo moo mo moo moooooooooo mooooo; moo, mo moo-moooooooo

adoration! for almost all the tapers, lamps, and candles that burn round
moooooooo! moo mooooo moo moo mooooo, moooo, moo moooooo mooo mooo moooo

the globe, burn, as before so many shrines, to our glory!
moo moooo, mooo, mo mooooo mo mooo moooooo, mo moo moooo!




But look at this matter in other lights; weigh it in all sorts of
Moo mooo mo mooo mooooo mo moooo mooooo; moooo mo mo moo moooo mo

scales; see what we whalemen are, and have been.
mooooo; moo mooo mo mooooooo moo, moo mooo mooo.




Why did the Dutch in De Witt's time have admirals of their whaling
Moo moo moo Moooo mo Mo Mooo'm mooo mooo mooooooo mo moooo moooooo

fleets? Why did Louis XVI. of France, at his own personal expense, fit
mooooo? Moo moo Moooo MOO. mo Mooooo, mo moo moo mooooooo moooooo, moo

out whaling ships from Dunkirk, and politely invite to that town some
moo moooooo moooo mooo Moooooo, moo mooooooo mooooo mo mooo mooo mooo

score or two of families from our own island of Nantucket? Why did
moooo mo moo mo mooooooo mooo moo moo mooooo mo Moooooooo? Moo moo

Britain between the years 1750 and 1788 pay to her whalemen in bounties
Moooooo moooooo moo moooo mooo moo mooo moo mo moo mooooooo mo mooooooo

upwards of L1,000,000? And lastly, how comes it that we whalemen of
moooooo mo MO,moo,moo? Moo mooooo, moo moooo mo mooo mo mooooooo mo

America now outnumber all the rest of the banded whalemen in the world;
Moooooo moo moooooooo moo moo mooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo;

sail a navy of upwards of seven hundred vessels; manned by eighteen
mooo m mooo mo moooooo mo moooo moooooo moooooo; mooooo mo mooooooo

thousand men; yearly consuming 4,000,000 of dollars; the ships worth,
mooooooo moo; mooooo moooooooo m,moo,moo mo moooooo; moo moooo moooo,

at the time of sailing, $20,000,000! and every year importing into our
mo moo mooo mo moooooo, $mo,moo,moo! moo moooo mooo moooooooo mooo moo

harbors a well reaped harvest of $7,000,000. How comes all this, if
moooooo m mooo mooooo moooooo mo $m,moo,moo. Moo moooo moo mooo, mo

there be not something puissant in whaling?
moooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooo mo moooooo?




But this is not the half; look again.
Moo mooo mo moo moo mooo; mooo moooo.




I freely assert, that the cosmopolite philosopher cannot, for his life,
M mooooo mooooo, mooo moo moooooooooo moooooooooo mooooo, moo moo mooo,

point out one single peaceful influence, which within the last sixty
moooo moo moo mooooo mooooooo moooooooo, moooo mooooo moo mooo moooo

years has operated more potentially upon the whole broad world, taken in
moooo moo mooooooo mooo moooooooooo mooo moo moooo moooo moooo, moooo mo

one aggregate, than the high and mighty business of whaling. One way
moo moooooooo, mooo moo mooo moo mooooo mooooooo mo moooooo. Moo moo

and another, it has begotten events so remarkable in themselves, and so
moo moooooo, mo moo mooooooo mooooo mo mooooooooo mo mooooooooo, moo mo

continuously momentous in their sequential issues, that whaling may
mooooooooooo moooooooo mo moooo mooooooooo mooooo, mooo moooooo moo

well be regarded as that Egyptian mother, who bore offspring themselves
mooo mo mooooooo mo mooo Mooooooo mooooo, moo mooo moooooooo mooooooooo

pregnant from her womb. It would be a hopeless, endless task to
mooooooo mooo moo mooo. Mo moooo mo m mooooooo, moooooo mooo mo

catalogue all these things. Let a handful suffice. For many years past
moooooooo moo moooo mooooo. Moo m moooooo moooooo. Moo mooo moooo mooo

the whale-ship has been the pioneer in ferreting out the remotest and
moo moooo-mooo moo mooo moo moooooo mo moooooooo moo moo mooooooo moo

least known parts of the earth. She has explored seas and archipelagoes
moooo moooo moooo mo moo moooo. Moo moo mooooooo mooo moo moooooooooooo

which had no chart, where no Cook or Vancouver had ever sailed. If
moooo moo mo moooo, moooo mo Mooo mo Moooooooo moo mooo mooooo. Mo

American and European men-of-war now peacefully ride in once savage
Mooooooo moo Mooooooo moo-mo-moo moo mooooooooo mooo mo mooo mooooo

harbors, let them fire salutes to the honour and glory of the
moooooo, moo mooo mooo moooooo mo moo mooooo moo moooo mo moo

whale-ship, which originally showed them the way, and first interpreted
moooo-mooo, moooo mooooooooo mooooo mooo moo moo, moo moooo moooooooooo

between them and the savages. They may celebrate as they will the heroes
moooooo mooo moo moo moooooo. Mooo moo moooooooo mo mooo mooo moo mooooo

of Exploring Expeditions, your Cooks, your Krusensterns; but I say that
mo Moooooooo Moooooooooo, mooo Moooo, mooo Mooooooooooo; moo M moo mooo

scores of anonymous Captains have sailed out of Nantucket, that were
mooooo mo moooooooo Mooooooo mooo mooooo moo mo Moooooooo, mooo mooo

as great, and greater than your Cook and your Krusenstern. For in their
mo moooo, moo moooooo mooo mooo Mooo moo mooo Moooooooooo. Moo mo moooo

succourless empty-handedness, they, in the heathenish sharked waters,
moooooooooo moooo-mooooooooo, mooo, mo moo mooooooooo moooooo mooooo,

and by the beaches of unrecorded, javelin islands, battled with virgin
moo mo moo moooooo mo mooooooooo, moooooo moooooo, moooooo mooo mooooo

wonders and terrors that Cook with all his marines and muskets would
moooooo moo moooooo mooo Mooo mooo moo moo moooooo moo moooooo moooo

not willingly have dared. All that is made such a flourish of in the old
moo moooooooo mooo moooo. Moo mooo mo mooo mooo m mooooooo mo mo moo moo

South Sea Voyages, those things were but the life-time commonplaces of
Moooo Moo Moooooo, moooo mooooo mooo moo moo mooo-mooo mooooooooooo mo

our heroic Nantucketers. Often, adventures which Vancouver dedicates
moo mooooo Mooooooooooo. Moooo, mooooooooo moooo Moooooooo moooooooo

three chapters to, these men accounted unworthy of being set down in the
moooo mooooooo mo, moooo moo moooooooo mooooooo mo moooo moo mooo mo moo

ship's common log. Ah, the world! Oh, the world!
mooo'm mooooo moo. Mo, moo moooo! Mo, moo moooo!




Until the whale fishery rounded Cape Horn, no commerce but colonial,
Moooo moo moooo moooooo moooooo Mooo Mooo, mo mooooooo moo mooooooo,

scarcely any intercourse but colonial, was carried on between Europe and
mooooooo moo moooooooooo moo mooooooo, moo moooooo mo moooooo Mooooo moo

the long line of the opulent Spanish provinces on the Pacific coast.
moo mooo mooo mo moo moooooo Moooooo moooooooo mo moo Moooooo moooo.

It was the whaleman who first broke through the jealous policy of the
Mo moo moo mooooooo moo moooo moooo moooooo moo moooooo mooooo mo moo

Spanish crown, touching those colonies; and, if space permitted, it
Moooooo moooo, mooooooo moooo mooooooo; moo, mo moooo moooooooo, mo

might be distinctly shown how from those whalemen at last eventuated the
moooo mo mooooooooo moooo moo mooo moooo mooooooo mo mooo mooooooooo moo

liberation of Peru, Chili, and Bolivia from the yoke of Old Spain, and
mooooooooo mo Mooo, Moooo, moo Moooooo mooo moo mooo mo Moo Moooo, moo

the establishment of the eternal democracy in those parts.
moo moooooooooooo mo moo moooooo moooooooo mo moooo moooo.




That great America on the other side of the sphere, Australia, was given
Mooo moooo Moooooo mo moo moooo mooo mo moo mooooo, Moooooooo, moo moooo

to the enlightened world by the whaleman. After its first blunder-born
mo moo moooooooooo moooo mo moo mooooooo. Moooo moo moooo moooooo-mooo

discovery by a Dutchman, all other ships long shunned those shores
moooooooo mo m Mooooooo, moo moooo moooo mooo moooooo moooo mooooo

as pestiferously barbarous; but the whale-ship touched there. The
mo moooooooooooo moooooooo; moo moo moooo-mooo moooooo moooo. Moo

whale-ship is the true mother of that now mighty colony. Moreover,
moooo-mooo mo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo moo mooooo mooooo. Mooooooo,

in the infancy of the first Australian settlement, the emigrants were
mo moo moooooo mo moo moooo Mooooooooo mooooooooo, moo moooooooo mooo

several times saved from starvation by the benevolent biscuit of the
moooooo moooo moooo mooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo

whale-ship luckily dropping an anchor in their waters. The uncounted
moooo-mooo moooooo mooooooo mo mooooo mo moooo mooooo. Moo moooooooo

isles of all Polynesia confess the same truth, and do commercial homage
moooo mo moo Moooooooo moooooo moo mooo moooo, moo mo mooooooooo mooooo

to the whale-ship, that cleared the way for the missionary and the
mo moo moooo-mooo, mooo moooooo moo moo moo moo mooooooooo moo moo

merchant, and in many cases carried the primitive missionaries to their
mooooooo, moo mo mooo moooo moooooo moo moooooooo mooooooooooo mo moooo

first destinations. If that double-bolted land, Japan, is ever to become
moooo mooooooooooo. Mo mooo mooooo-mooooo mooo, Moooo, mo mooo mo mooooo

hospitable, it is the whale-ship alone to whom the credit will be due;
mooooooooo, mo mo moo moooo-mooo moooo mo mooo moo mooooo mooo mo moo;

for already she is on the threshold.
moo moooooo moo mo mo moo moooooooo.




But if, in the face of all this, you still declare that whaling has no
Moo mo, mo moo mooo mo moo mooo, moo moooo moooooo mooo moooooo moo mo

aesthetically noble associations connected with it, then am I ready to
moooooooooooo moooo mooooooooooo moooooooo mooo mo, mooo mo M moooo mo

shiver fifty lances with you there, and unhorse you with a split helmet
mooooo moooo mooooo mooo moo moooo, moo moooooo moo mooo m moooo mooooo

every time.
moooo mooo.




The whale has no famous author, and whaling no famous chronicler, you
Moo moooo moo mo mooooo mooooo, moo moooooo mo mooooo mooooooooo, moo

will say.
mooo moo.




THE WHALE NO FAMOUS AUTHOR, AND WHALING NO FAMOUS CHRONICLER? Who wrote
MOO MOOOO MO MOOOOO MOOOOO, MOO MOOOOOO MO MOOOOO MOOOOOOOOO? Moo moooo

the first account of our Leviathan? Who but mighty Job! And who composed
moo moooo moooooo mo moo Moooooooo? Moo moo mooooo Moo! Moo moo mooooooo

the first narrative of a whaling-voyage? Who, but no less a prince than
moo moooo moooooooo mo m moooooo-mooooo? Moo, moo mo mooo m mooooo mooo

Alfred the Great, who, with his own royal pen, took down the words from
Mooooo moo Moooo, moo, mooo moo moo moooo moo, mooo mooo moo moooo mooo

Other, the Norwegian whale-hunter of those times! And who pronounced our
Moooo, moo Moooooooo moooo-mooooo mo moooo moooo! Moo moo mooooooooo moo

glowing eulogy in Parliament? Who, but Edmund Burke!
moooooo mooooo mo Mooooooooo? Moo, moo Mooooo Moooo!




True enough, but then whalemen themselves are poor devils; they have no
Mooo mooooo, moo mooo mooooooo mooooooooo moo mooo mooooo; mooo mooo mo

good blood in their veins.
mooo moooo mo moooo moooo.




NO GOOD BLOOD IN THEIR VEINS? They have something better than royal
MO MOOO MOOOO MO MOOOO MOOOO? Mooo mooo moooooooo mooooo mooo moooo

blood there. The grandmother of Benjamin Franklin was Mary Morrel;
moooo moooo. Moo moooooooooo mo Mooooooo Mooooooo moo Mooo Mooooo;

afterwards, by marriage, Mary Folger, one of the old settlers
mooooooooo, mo mooooooo, Mooo Mooooo, moo mo moo moo mooooooo

of Nantucket, and the ancestress to a long line of Folgers and
mo Moooooooo, moo moo mooooooooo mo m mooo mooo mo Moooooo moo

harpooneers--all kith and kin to noble Benjamin--this day darting the
moooooooooo--moo mooo moo moo mo moooo Mooooooo--mooo moo moooooo moo

barbed iron from one side of the world to the other.
mooooo mooo mooo moo mooo mo moo moooo mo moo moooo.




Good again; but then all confess that somehow whaling is not
Mooo moooo; moo mooo moo moooooo mooo moooooo moooooo mo moo

respectable.
moooooooooo.




WHALING NOT RESPECTABLE? Whaling is imperial! By old English statutory
MOOOOOO MOO MOOOOOOOOOO? Moooooo mo mooooooo! Mo moo Moooooo moooooooo

law, the whale is declared "a royal fish."*
moo, moo moooo mo mooooooo "m moooo mooo."*




Oh, that's only nominal! The whale himself has never figured in any
Mo, mooo'm mooo moooooo! Moo moooo moooooo moo moooo moooooo mo moo

grand imposing way.
moooo mooooooo moo.




THE WHALE NEVER FIGURED IN ANY GRAND IMPOSING WAY? In one of the mighty
MOO MOOOO MOOOO MOOOOOO MO MOO MOOOO MOOOOOOO MOO? Mo moo mo moo mooooo

triumphs given to a Roman general upon his entering the world's capital,
mooooooo moooo mo m Moooo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo moo moooo'm moooooo,

the bones of a whale, brought all the way from the Syrian coast, were
moo moooo mo m moooo, moooooo moo moo moo mooo moo Mooooo moooo, mooo

the most conspicuous object in the cymballed procession.*
moo mooo moooooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooooo.*







*See subsequent chapters for something more on this head.
*Moo mooooooooo mooooooo moo moooooooo mooo mo mooo mooo.







Grant it, since you cite it; but, say what you will, there is no real
Moooo mo, moooo moo mooo mo; moo, moo mooo moo mooo, moooo mo mo mooo

dignity in whaling.
moooooo mo moooooo.




NO DIGNITY IN WHALING? The dignity of our calling the very heavens
MO MOOOOOO MO MOOOOOO? Moo moooooo mo moo moooooo moo mooo moooooo

attest. Cetus is a constellation in the South! No more! Drive down your
mooooo. Moooo mo m moooooooooooo mo moo Moooo! Mo mooo! Moooo mooo mooo

hat in presence of the Czar, and take it off to Queequeg! No more! I
moo mo mooooooo mo moo Mooo, moo mooo mo moo mo Mooooooo! Mo mooo! M

know a man that, in his lifetime, has taken three hundred and fifty
mooo m moo mooo, mo moo mooooooo, moo moooo moooo moooooo moo moooo

whales. I account that man more honourable than that great captain of
mooooo. M moooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooooo mooo mooo moooo moooooo mo

antiquity who boasted of taking as many walled towns.
moooooooo moo moooooo mo mooooo mo mooo mooooo moooo.




And, as for me, if, by any possibility, there be any as yet undiscovered
Moo, mo moo mo, mo, mo moo moooooooooo, moooo mo moo mo moo mooooooooooo

prime thing in me; if I shall ever deserve any real repute in that small
moooo moooo mo mo; mo M moooo mooo moooooo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo moooo

but high hushed world which I might not be unreasonably ambitious of; if
moo mooo mooooo moooo moooo M moooo moo mo mooooooooooo moooooooo mo; mo

hereafter I shall do anything that, upon the whole, a man might rather
moooooooo M moooo mo mooooooo mooo, mooo moo moooo, m moo moooo mooooo

have done than to have left undone; if, at my death, my executors, or
mooo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo mooooo; mo, mo mo moooo, mo moooooooo, mo

more properly my creditors, find any precious MSS. in my desk, then here
mooo mooooooo mo moooooooo, mooo moo mooooooo MOO. mo mo mooo, mooo mooo

I prospectively ascribe all the honour and the glory to whaling; for a
M moooooooooooo moooooo moo moo mooooo moo moo moooo mo moooooo; moo m

whale-ship was my Yale College and my Harvard.
moooo-mooo moo mo Mooo Moooooo moo mo Moooooo.










CHAPTER 25. Postscript.
MOOOOOO mo. Mooooooooo.







In behalf of the dignity of whaling, I would fain advance naught but
Mo mooooo mo moo moooooo mo moooooo, M moooo mooo moooooo mooooo moo

substantiated facts. But after embattling his facts, an advocate who
moooooooooooo moooo. Moo moooo mooooooooo moo moooo, mo mooooooo moo

should wholly suppress a not unreasonable surmise, which might
mooooo mooooo mooooooo m moo mooooooooooo moooooo, moooo moooo

tell eloquently upon his cause--such an advocate, would he not be
mooo mooooooooo mooo moo moooo--mooo mo mooooooo, moooo mo moo mo

blameworthy?
moooooooooo?




It is well known that at the coronation of kings and queens, even modern
Mo mo mooo moooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo mo moooo moo mooooo, mooo mooooo

ones, a certain curious process of seasoning them for their functions is
mooo, m moooooo moooooo moooooo mo moooooooo mooo moo moooo moooooooo mo

gone through. There is a saltcellar of state, so called, and there
mooo moooooo. Moooo mo m mooooooooo mo moooo, mo mooooo, moo moooo

may be a castor of state. How they use the salt, precisely--who knows?
moo mo m mooooo mo moooo. Moo mooo moo moo mooo, moooooooo--moo moooo?

Certain I am, however, that a king's head is solemnly oiled at his
Moooooo M mo, moooooo, mooo m mooo'm mooo mo mooooooo moooo mo moo

coronation, even as a head of salad. Can it be, though, that they
mooooooooo, mooo mo m mooo mo moooo. Moo mo mo, mooooo, mooo mooo

anoint it with a view of making its interior run well, as they anoint
mooooo mo mooo m mooo mo mooooo moo mooooooo moo mooo, mo mooo mooooo

machinery? Much might be ruminated here, concerning the essential
moooooooo? Mooo moooo mo moooooooo mooo, mooooooooo moo moooooooo

dignity of this regal process, because in common life we esteem but
moooooo mo mooo moooo moooooo, moooooo mo mooooo mooo mo mooooo moo

meanly and contemptibly a fellow who anoints his hair, and palpably
mooooo moo mooooooooooo m mooooo moo moooooo moo mooo, moo mooooooo

smells of that anointing. In truth, a mature man who uses hair-oil,
mooooo mo mooo moooooooo. Mo moooo, m mooooo moo moo mooo mooo-moo,

unless medicinally, that man has probably got a quoggy spot in him
mooooo moooooooooo, mooo moo moo mooooooo moo m mooooo mooo mo moo

somewhere. As a general rule, he can't amount to much in his totality.
moooooooo. Mo m moooooo mooo, mo moo'm mooooo mo mooo mo moo mooooooo.




But the only thing to be considered here, is this--what kind of oil is
Moo moo mooo moooo mo mo mooooooooo mooo, mo mooo--mooo mooo mo moo mo

used at coronations? Certainly it cannot be olive oil, nor macassar oil,
mooo mo moooooooooo? Moooooooo mo mooooo mo moooo moo, moo mooooooo moo,

nor castor oil, nor bear's oil, nor train oil, nor cod-liver oil. What
moo mooooo moo, moo mooo'm moo, moo moooo moo, moo moo-moooo moo. Mooo

then can it possibly be, but sperm oil in its unmanufactured, unpolluted
mooo moo mo mooooooo mo, moo moooo moo mo moo mooooooooooooo, mooooooooo

state, the sweetest of all oils?
moooo, moo mooooooo mo moo mooo?




Think of that, ye loyal Britons! we whalemen supply your kings and
Moooo mo mooo, mo moooo Moooooo! mo mooooooo mooooo mooo moooo moo

queens with coronation stuff!
mooooo mooo mooooooooo moooo!










CHAPTER 26. Knights and Squires.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooooo moo Moooooo.







The chief mate of the Pequod was Starbuck, a native of Nantucket, and a
Moo moooo mooo mo moo Mooooo moo Mooooooo, m mooooo mo Moooooooo, moo m

Quaker by descent. He was a long, earnest man, and though born on an icy
Mooooo mo moooooo. Mo moo m mooo, moooooo moo, moo mooooo mooo mo mo moo

coast, seemed well adapted to endure hot latitudes, his flesh being hard
moooo, mooooo mooo moooooo mo mooooo moo moooooooo, moo moooo moooo mooo

as twice-baked biscuit. Transported to the Indies, his live blood would
mo moooo-moooo moooooo. Moooooooooo mo moo Mooooo, moo mooo moooo moooo

not spoil like bottled ale. He must have been born in some time of
moo moooo mooo moooooo moo. Mo mooo mooo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo mo

general drought and famine, or upon one of those fast days for which
moooooo moooooo moo mooooo, mo mooo moo mo moooo mooo mooo moo moooo

his state is famous. Only some thirty arid summers had he seen; those
moo moooo mo mooooo. Mooo mooo mooooo mooo moooooo moo mo mooo; moooo

summers had dried up all his physical superfluousness. But this, his
moooooo moo moooo mo moo moo mooooooo moooooooooooooo. Moo mooo, moo

thinness, so to speak, seemed no more the token of wasting anxieties and
mooooooo, mo mo moooo, mooooo mo mooo moo moooo mo moooooo moooooooo moo

cares, than it seemed the indication of any bodily blight. It was merely
moooo, mooo mo mooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo mooooo. Mo moo mooooo

the condensation of the man. He was by no means ill-looking; quite the
moo mooooooooooo mo moo moo. Mo moo mo mo moooo moo-moooooo; moooo moo

contrary. His pure tight skin was an excellent fit; and closely wrapped
mooooooo. Moo mooo moooo mooo moo mo moooooooo moo; moo moooooo moooooo

up in it, and embalmed with inner health and strength, like a revivified
mo mo mo, moo mooooooo mooo moooo mooooo moo mooooooo, mooo m mooooooooo

Egyptian, this Starbuck seemed prepared to endure for long ages to come,
Mooooooo, mooo Mooooooo mooooo mooooooo mo mooooo moo mooo mooo mo mooo,

and to endure always, as now; for be it Polar snow or torrid sun, like
moo mo mooooo mooooo, mo moo; moo mo mo Moooo mooo mo mooooo moo, mooo

a patent chronometer, his interior vitality was warranted to do well
m mooooo moooooooooo, moo mooooooo mooooooo moo moooooooo mo mo mooo

in all climates. Looking into his eyes, you seemed to see there the yet
mo moo mooooooo. Moooooo mooo moo mooo, moo mooooo mo moo moooo moo moo

lingering images of those thousand-fold perils he had calmly confronted
moooooooo mooooo mo moooo mooooooo-mooo mooooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooo

through life. A staid, steadfast man, whose life for the most part was a
moooooo mooo. M moooo, moooooooo moo, moooo mooo moo moo mooo mooo moo m

telling pantomime of action, and not a tame chapter of sounds. Yet, for
moooooo moooooooo mo mooooo, moo moo m mooo moooooo mo mooooo. Moo, moo

all his hardy sobriety and fortitude, there were certain qualities
moo moo moooo mooooooo moo moooooooo, moooo mooo moooooo moooooooo

in him which at times affected, and in some cases seemed well nigh to
mo moo moooo mo moooo mooooooo, moo mo mooo moooo mooooo mooo mooo mo

overbalance all the rest. Uncommonly conscientious for a seaman, and
moooooooooo moo moo mooo. Mooooooooo moooooooooooo moo m mooooo, moo

endued with a deep natural reverence, the wild watery loneliness of his
mooooo mooo m mooo moooooo moooooooo, moo mooo mooooo mooooooooo mo moo

life did therefore strongly incline him to superstition; but to that
mooo moo moooooooo mooooooo moooooo moo mo mooooooooooo; moo mo mooo

sort of superstition, which in some organizations seems rather to
mooo mo mooooooooooo, moooo mo mooo moooooooooooo moooo mooooo mo

spring, somehow, from intelligence than from ignorance. Outward portents
mooooo, moooooo, mooo mooooooooooo mooo mooo moooooooo. Moooooo mooooooo

and inward presentiments were his. And if at times these things bent the
moo mooooo moooooooooooo mooo moo. Moo mo mo moooo moooo mooooo mooo moo

welded iron of his soul, much more did his far-away domestic memories
mooooo mooo mo moo mooo, mooo mooo moo moo moo-mooo mooooooo mooooooo

of his young Cape wife and child, tend to bend him still more from the
mo moo moooo Mooo mooo moo moooo, mooo mo mooo moo moooo mooo mooo moo

original ruggedness of his nature, and open him still further to those
mooooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo, moo mooo moo moooo moooooo mo moooo

latent influences which, in some honest-hearted men, restrain the gush
mooooo mooooooooo moooo, mo mooo mooooo-moooooo moo, mooooooo moo mooo

of dare-devil daring, so often evinced by others in the more perilous
mo mooo-moooo mooooo, mo moooo moooooo mo mooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo

vicissitudes of the fishery. "I will have no man in my boat," said
mooooooooooo mo moo moooooo. "M mooo mooo mo moo mo mo mooo," mooo

Starbuck, "who is not afraid of a whale." By this, he seemed to mean,
Mooooooo, "moo mo moo mooooo mo m moooo." Mo mooo, mo mooooo mo mooo,

not only that the most reliable and useful courage was that which arises
moo mooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo moo mooooo moooooo moo mooo moooo mooooo

from the fair estimation of the encountered peril, but that an utterly
mooo moo mooo mooooooooo mo moo moooooooooo moooo, moo mooo mo moooooo

fearless man is a far more dangerous comrade than a coward.
mooooooo moo mo m moo mooo moooooooo moooooo mooo m mooooo.




"Aye, aye," said Stubb, the second mate, "Starbuck, there, is as careful
"Moo, moo," mooo Moooo, moo mooooo mooo, "Mooooooo, moooo, mo mo moooooo

a man as you'll find anywhere in this fishery." But we shall ere long
m moo mo moo'mo mooo mooooooo mo mooo moooooo." Moo mo moooo moo mooo

see what that word "careful" precisely means when used by a man like
moo mooo mooo mooo "moooooo" moooooooo moooo mooo mooo mo m moo mooo

Stubb, or almost any other whale hunter.
Moooo, mo mooooo moo moooo moooo mooooo.




Starbuck was no crusader after perils; in him courage was not a
Mooooooo moo mo mooooooo moooo mooooo; mo moo moooooo moo moo m

sentiment; but a thing simply useful to him, and always at hand upon all
moooooooo; moo m moooo mooooo mooooo mo moo, moo mooooo mo mooo mooo moo

mortally practical occasions. Besides, he thought, perhaps, that in this
mooooooo moooooooo moooooooo. Moooooo, mo moooooo, moooooo, mooo mo mooo

business of whaling, courage was one of the great staple outfits of
mooooooo mo moooooo, moooooo moo moo mo moo moooo mooooo moooooo mo

the ship, like her beef and her bread, and not to be foolishly wasted.
moo mooo, mooo moo mooo moo moo moooo, moo moo mo mo moooooooo mooooo.

Wherefore he had no fancy for lowering for whales after sun-down; nor
Moooooooo mo moo mo moooo moo mooooooo moo mooooo moooo moo-mooo; moo

for persisting in fighting a fish that too much persisted in fighting
moo mooooooooo mo mooooooo m mooo mooo moo mooo moooooooo mo mooooooo

him. For, thought Starbuck, I am here in this critical ocean to kill
moo. Moo, moooooo Mooooooo, M mo mooo mo mooo mooooooo moooo mo mooo

whales for my living, and not to be killed by them for theirs; and that
mooooo moo mo mooooo, moo moo mo mo mooooo mo mooo moo mooooo; moo mooo

hundreds of men had been so killed Starbuck well knew. What doom was
mooooooo mo moo moo mooo mo mooooo Mooooooo mooo mooo. Mooo mooo moo

his own father's? Where, in the bottomless deeps, could he find the torn
moo moo mooooo'm? Moooo, mo moo mooooooooo moooo, moooo mo mooo moo mooo

limbs of his brother?
moooo mo moo moooooo?




With memories like these in him, and, moreover, given to a certain
Mooo mooooooo mooo moooo mo moo, moo, mooooooo, moooo mo m moooooo

superstitiousness, as has been said; the courage of this Starbuck which
moooooooooooooooo, mo moo mooo mooo; moo moooooo mo mooo Mooooooo moooo

could, nevertheless, still flourish, must indeed have been extreme. But
moooo, mooooooooooo, moooo mooooooo, mooo mooooo mooo mooo moooooo. Moo

it was not in reasonable nature that a man so organized, and with such
mo moo moo mo mooooooooo mooooo mooo m moo mo moooooooo, moo mooo mooo

terrible experiences and remembrances as he had; it was not in nature
mooooooo moooooooooo moo mooooooooooo mo mo moo; mo moo moo mo mooooo

that these things should fail in latently engendering an element in
mooo moooo mooooo mooooo mooo mo mooooooo moooooooooo mo moooooo mo

him, which, under suitable circumstances, would break out from its
moo, moooo, moooo mooooooo moooooooooooo, moooo moooo moo mooo moo

confinement, and burn all his courage up. And brave as he might be, it
moooooooooo, moo mooo moo moo moooooo mo. Moo moooo mo mo moooo mo, mo

was that sort of bravery chiefly, visible in some intrepid men, which,
moo mooo mooo mo moooooo moooooo, moooooo mo mooo mooooooo moo, moooo,

while generally abiding firm in the conflict with seas, or winds, or
moooo moooooooo moooooo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mooo, mo moooo, mo

whales, or any of the ordinary irrational horrors of the world, yet
mooooo, mo moo mo moo mooooooo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo moooo, moo

cannot withstand those more terrific, because more spiritual terrors,
mooooo moooooooo moooo mooo mooooooo, moooooo mooo moooooooo moooooo,

which sometimes menace you from the concentrating brow of an enraged and
moooo moooooooo mooooo moo mooo moo moooooooooooo mooo mo mo moooooo moo

mighty man.
mooooo moo.




But were the coming narrative to reveal in any instance, the complete
Moo mooo moo mooooo moooooooo mo mooooo mo moo mooooooo, moo mooooooo

abasement of poor Starbuck's fortitude, scarce might I have the heart to
moooooooo mo mooo Mooooooo'm moooooooo, mooooo moooo M mooo moo moooo mo

write it; for it is a thing most sorrowful, nay shocking, to expose
moooo mo; moo mo mo m moooo mooo moooooooo, moo mooooooo, mo mooooo

the fall of valour in the soul. Men may seem detestable as joint
moo mooo mo mooooo mo moo mooo. Moo moo mooo mooooooooo mo moooo

stock-companies and nations; knaves, fools, and murderers there may be;
moooo-moooooooo moo moooooo; mooooo, moooo, moo moooooooo moooo moo mo;

men may have mean and meagre faces; but man, in the ideal, is so noble
moo moo mooo mooo moo mooooo moooo; moo moo, mo moo moooo, mo mo moooo

and so sparkling, such a grand and glowing creature, that over any
moo mo moooooooo, mooo m moooo moo moooooo mooooooo, mooo mooo moo

ignominious blemish in him all his fellows should run to throw their
moooooooooo moooooo mo moo moo moo moooooo mooooo moo mo moooo moooo

costliest robes. That immaculate manliness we feel within ourselves,
moooooooo moooo. Mooo mooooooooo moooooooo mo mooo mooooo moooooooo,

so far within us, that it remains intact though all the outer character
mo moo mooooo mo, mooo mo moooooo mooooo mooooo moo moo moooo moooooooo

seem gone; bleeds with keenest anguish at the undraped spectacle of
mooo mooo; mooooo mooo moooooo moooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo mo

a valor-ruined man. Nor can piety itself, at such a shameful sight,
m moooo-mooooo moo. Moo moo moooo mooooo, mo mooo m mooooooo moooo,

completely stifle her upbraidings against the permitting stars. But this
mooooooooo mooooo moo moooooooooo moooooo moo mooooooooo moooo. Moo mooo

august dignity I treat of, is not the dignity of kings and robes, but
mooooo moooooo M moooo mo, mo moo moo moooooo mo moooo moo moooo, moo

that abounding dignity which has no robed investiture. Thou shalt see it
mooo moooooooo moooooo moooo moo mo moooo moooooooooo. Mooo moooo moo mo

shining in the arm that wields a pick or drives a spike; that democratic
moooooo mo moo moo mooo mooooo m mooo mo mooooo m moooo; mooo mooooooooo

dignity which, on all hands, radiates without end from God; Himself! The
moooooo moooo, mo moo moooo, mooooooo moooooo moo mooo Moo; Moooooo! Moo

great God absolute! The centre and circumference of all democracy! His
moooo Moo mooooooo! Moo mooooo moo moooooooooooo mo moo moooooooo! Moo

omnipresence, our divine equality!
mooooooooooo, moo mooooo mooooooo!




If, then, to meanest mariners, and renegades and castaways, I shall
Mo, mooo, mo moooooo mooooooo, moo moooooooo moo moooooooo, M moooo

hereafter ascribe high qualities, though dark; weave round them tragic
moooooooo moooooo mooo moooooooo, mooooo mooo; moooo moooo mooo mooooo

graces; if even the most mournful, perchance the most abased, among them
mooooo; mo mooo moo mooo mooooooo, moooooooo moo mooo mooooo, moooo mooo

all, shall at times lift himself to the exalted mounts; if I shall touch
moo, moooo mo moooo mooo moooooo mo moo moooooo mooooo; mo M moooo moooo

that workman's arm with some ethereal light; if I shall spread a rainbow
mooo moooooo'm moo mooo mooo mooooooo moooo; mo M moooo mooooo m moooooo

over his disastrous set of sun; then against all mortal critics bear
mooo moo mooooooooo moo mo moo; mooo moooooo moo mooooo moooooo mooo

me out in it, thou Just Spirit of Equality, which hast spread one royal
mo moo mo mo, mooo Mooo Mooooo mo Mooooooo, moooo mooo mooooo moo moooo

mantle of humanity over all my kind! Bear me out in it, thou great
mooooo mo mooooooo mooo moo mo mooo! Mooo mo moo mo mo, mooo moooo

democratic God! who didst not refuse to the swart convict, Bunyan, the
mooooooooo Moo! moo moooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo moooooo, Mooooo, moo

pale, poetic pearl; Thou who didst clothe with doubly hammered leaves
mooo, mooooo moooo; Mooo moo moooo mooooo mooo mooooo mooooooo mooooo

of finest gold, the stumped and paupered arm of old Cervantes; Thou who
mo mooooo mooo, moo moooooo moo mooooooo moo mo moo Moooooooo; Mooo moo

didst pick up Andrew Jackson from the pebbles; who didst hurl him upon a
moooo mooo mo Mooooo Moooooo mooo moo moooooo; moo moooo mooo moo mooo m

war-horse; who didst thunder him higher than a throne! Thou who, in all
moo-moooo; moo moooo moooooo moo mooooo mooo m mooooo! Mooo moo, mo moo

Thy mighty, earthly marchings, ever cullest Thy selectest champions from
Moo mooooo, moooooo moooooooo, mooo moooooo Moo moooooooo moooooooo mooo

the kingly commons; bear me out in it, O God!
moo mooooo moooooo; mooo mo moo mo mo, M Moo!










CHAPTER 27. Knights and Squires.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooooo moo Moooooo.







Stubb was the second mate. He was a native of Cape Cod; and hence,
Moooo moo moo mooooo mooo. Mo moo m mooooo mo Mooo Moo; moo moooo,

according to local usage, was called a Cape-Cod-man. A happy-go-lucky;
moooooooo mo moooo moooo, moo mooooo m Mooo-Moo-moo. M moooo-mo-moooo;

neither craven nor valiant; taking perils as they came with an
moooooo mooooo moo moooooo; mooooo mooooo mo mooo mooo mooo mo

indifferent air; and while engaged in the most imminent crisis of the
moooooooooo moo; moo moooo moooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo mooooo mo moo

chase, toiling away, calm and collected as a journeyman joiner engaged
moooo, moooooo mooo, mooo moo moooooooo mo m mooooooooo mooooo moooooo

for the year. Good-humored, easy, and careless, he presided over his
moo moo mooo. Mooo-moooooo, mooo, moo mooooooo, mo mooooooo mooo moo

whale-boat as if the most deadly encounter were but a dinner, and his
moooo-mooo mo mo moo mooo mooooo moooooooo mooo moo m mooooo, moo moo

crew all invited guests. He was as particular about the comfortable
mooo moo moooooo mooooo. Mo moo mo mooooooooo moooo moo moooooooooo

arrangement of his part of the boat, as an old stage-driver is about the
moooooooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooo, mo mo moo moooo-mooooo mo moooo moo

snugness of his box. When close to the whale, in the very death-lock of
mooooooo mo moo moo. Mooo moooo mo moo moooo, mo moo mooo moooo-mooo mo

the fight, he handled his unpitying lance coolly and off-handedly, as
moo moooo, mo moooooo moo moooooooo moooo mooooo moo moo-mooooooo, mo

a whistling tinker his hammer. He would hum over his old rigadig tunes
m moooooooo mooooo moo mooooo. Mo moooo moo mooo moo moo moooooo moooo

while flank and flank with the most exasperated monster. Long usage had,
moooo moooo moo moooo mooo moo mooo moooooooooo moooooo. Mooo moooo moo,

for this Stubb, converted the jaws of death into an easy chair. What he
moo mooo Moooo, moooooooo moo mooo mo moooo mooo mo mooo moooo. Mooo mo

thought of death itself, there is no telling. Whether he ever thought of
moooooo mo moooo mooooo, moooo mo mo moooooo. Moooooo mo mooo moooooo mo

it at all, might be a question; but, if he ever did chance to cast his
mo mo moo, moooo mo m mooooooo; moo, mo mo mooo moo mooooo mo mooo moo

mind that way after a comfortable dinner, no doubt, like a good sailor,
mooo mooo moo moooo m moooooooooo mooooo, mo moooo, mooo m mooo mooooo,

he took it to be a sort of call of the watch to tumble aloft, and bestir
mo mooo mo mo mo m mooo mo mooo mo moo moooo mo mooooo moooo, moo mooooo

themselves there, about something which he would find out when he obeyed
mooooooooo moooo, moooo moooooooo moooo mo moooo mooo moo mooo mo mooooo

the order, and not sooner.
moo moooo, moo moo mooooo.




What, perhaps, with other things, made Stubb such an easy-going,
Mooo, moooooo, mooo moooo mooooo, mooo Moooo mooo mo mooo-moooo,

unfearing man, so cheerily trudging off with the burden of life in a
moooooooo moo, mo mooooooo mooooooo moo mooo moo mooooo mo mooo mo m

world full of grave pedlars, all bowed to the ground with their packs;
moooo mooo mo moooo moooooo, moo moooo mo moo mooooo mooo moooo moooo;

what helped to bring about that almost impious good-humor of his; that
mooo mooooo mo moooo moooo mooo mooooo moooooo mooo-moooo mo moo; mooo

thing must have been his pipe. For, like his nose, his short, black
moooo mooo mooo mooo moo mooo. Moo, mooo moo mooo, moo moooo, moooo

little pipe was one of the regular features of his face. You would
mooooo mooo moo moo mo moo moooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo. Moo moooo

almost as soon have expected him to turn out of his bunk without his
mooooo mo mooo mooo mooooooo moo mo mooo moo mo moo mooo moooooo moo

nose as without his pipe. He kept a whole row of pipes there ready
mooo mo moooooo moo mooo. Mo mooo m moooo moo mo moooo moooo moooo

loaded, stuck in a rack, within easy reach of his hand; and, whenever he
mooooo, moooo mo m mooo, mooooo mooo moooo mo moo mooo; moo, mooooooo mo

turned in, he smoked them all out in succession, lighting one from
mooooo mo, mo mooooo mooo moo moo mo mooooooooo, mooooooo moo mooo

the other to the end of the chapter; then loading them again to be in
moo moooo mo moo moo mo moo moooooo; mooo moooooo mooo moooo mo mo mo

readiness anew. For, when Stubb dressed, instead of first putting his
moooooooo mooo. Moo, mooo Moooo moooooo, moooooo mo moooo moooooo moo

legs into his trowsers, he put his pipe into his mouth.
mooo mooo moo mooooooo, mo moo moo mooo mooo moo moooo.




I say this continual smoking must have been one cause, at least, of his
M moo mooo moooooooo moooooo mooo mooo mooo moo moooo, mo moooo, mo moo

peculiar disposition; for every one knows that this earthly air, whether
mooooooo moooooooooo; moo moooo moo moooo mooo mooo moooooo moo, moooooo

ashore or afloat, is terribly infected with the nameless miseries of
mooooo mo mooooo, mo mooooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooooooo mo

the numberless mortals who have died exhaling it; and as in time of the
moo mooooooooo moooooo moo mooo mooo mooooooo mo; moo mo mo mooo mo moo

cholera, some people go about with a camphorated handkerchief to their
moooooo, mooo mooooo mo moooo mooo m moooooooooo mooooooooooo mo moooo

mouths; so, likewise, against all mortal tribulations, Stubb's tobacco
mooooo; mo, mooooooo, moooooo moo mooooo mooooooooooo, Moooo'm moooooo

smoke might have operated as a sort of disinfecting agent.
moooo moooo mooo mooooooo mo m mooo mo mooooooooooo moooo.




The third mate was Flask, a native of Tisbury, in Martha's Vineyard. A
Moo moooo mooo moo Moooo, m mooooo mo Moooooo, mo Mooooo'm Mooooooo. M

short, stout, ruddy young fellow, very pugnacious concerning whales,
moooo, moooo, moooo moooo mooooo, mooo mooooooooo mooooooooo mooooo,

who somehow seemed to think that the great leviathans had personally
moo moooooo mooooo mo moooo mooo moo moooo mooooooooo moo mooooooooo

and hereditarily affronted him; and therefore it was a sort of point of
moo mooooooooooo moooooooo moo; moo moooooooo mo moo m mooo mo moooo mo

honour with him, to destroy them whenever encountered. So utterly lost
mooooo mooo moo, mo moooooo mooo mooooooo moooooooooo. Mo moooooo mooo

was he to all sense of reverence for the many marvels of their majestic
moo mo mo moo moooo mo moooooooo moo moo mooo moooooo mo moooo mooooooo

bulk and mystic ways; and so dead to anything like an apprehension of
mooo moo mooooo mooo; moo mo mooo mo mooooooo mooo mo mooooooooooo mo

any possible danger from encountering them; that in his poor opinion,
moo mooooooo mooooo mooo mooooooooooo mooo; mooo mo moo mooo moooooo,

the wondrous whale was but a species of magnified mouse, or at least
moo mooooooo moooo moo moo m moooooo mo moooooooo moooo, mo mo moooo

water-rat, requiring only a little circumvention and some small
moooo-moo, moooooooo mooo m mooooo moooooooooooo moo mooo moooo

application of time and trouble in order to kill and boil. This
moooooooooo mo mooo moo moooooo mo moooo mo mooo moo mooo. Mooo

ignorant, unconscious fearlessness of his made him a little waggish in
mooooooo, moooooooooo mooooooooooo mo moo mooo moo m mooooo moooooo mo

the matter of whales; he followed these fish for the fun of it; and a
moo mooooo mo mooooo; mo mooooooo moooo mooo moo moo moo mo mo; moo m

three years' voyage round Cape Horn was only a jolly joke that lasted
moooo moooo' mooooo moooo Mooo Mooo moo mooo m moooo mooo mooo mooooo

that length of time. As a carpenter's nails are divided into wrought
mooo mooooo mo mooo. Mo m moooooooo'm moooo moo moooooo mooo moooooo

nails and cut nails; so mankind may be similarly divided. Little Flask
moooo moo moo moooo; mo moooooo moo mo moooooooo moooooo. Mooooo Moooo

was one of the wrought ones; made to clinch tight and last long. They
moo moo mo moo moooooo mooo; mooo mo mooooo moooo moo mooo mooo. Mooo

called him King-Post on board of the Pequod; because, in form, he could
mooooo moo Mooo-Mooo mo moooo mo moo Mooooo; moooooo, mo mooo, mo moooo

be well likened to the short, square timber known by that name in Arctic
mo mooo moooooo mo moo moooo, mooooo mooooo moooo mo mooo mooo mo Mooooo

whalers; and which by the means of many radiating side timbers inserted
moooooo; moo moooo mo moo moooo mo mooo moooooooo mooo moooooo mooooooo

into it, serves to brace the ship against the icy concussions of those
mooo mo, mooooo mo moooo moo mooo moooooo moo moo moooooooooo mo moooo

battering seas.
moooooooo mooo.




Now these three mates--Starbuck, Stubb, and Flask, were momentous
Moo moooo moooo moooo--Mooooooo, Moooo, moo Moooo, mooo moooooooo

men. They it was who by universal prescription commanded three of the
moo. Mooo mo moo moo mo moooooooo mooooooooooo moooooooo moooo mo moo

Pequod's boats as headsmen. In that grand order of battle in which
Mooooo'm moooo mo mooooooo. Mo mooo moooo moooo mo mooooo mo moooo

Captain Ahab would probably marshal his forces to descend on the whales,
Moooooo Mooo moooo mooooooo moooooo moo mooooo mo moooooo mo moo mooooo,

these three headsmen were as captains of companies. Or, being armed with
moooo moooo mooooooo mooo mo mooooooo mo moooooooo. Mo, moooo moooo mooo

their long keen whaling spears, they were as a picked trio of lancers;
moooo mooo mooo moooooo mooooo, mooo mooo mo m mooooo mooo mo moooooo;

even as the harpooneers were flingers of javelins.
mooo mo moo moooooooooo mooo mooooooo mo mooooooo.




And since in this famous fishery, each mate or headsman, like a Gothic
Moo moooo mo mooo mooooo moooooo, mooo mooo mo mooooooo, mooo m Mooooo

Knight of old, is always accompanied by his boat-steerer or harpooneer,
Mooooo mo moo, mo mooooo moooooooooo mo moo mooo-moooooo mo mooooooooo,

who in certain conjunctures provides him with a fresh lance, when
moo mo moooooo mooooooooooo mooooooo moo mooo m moooo moooo, mooo

the former one has been badly twisted, or elbowed in the assault; and
moo mooooo moo moo mooo moooo moooooo, mo moooooo mo moo moooooo; moo

moreover, as there generally subsists between the two, a close intimacy
mooooooo, mo moooo moooooooo mooooooo moooooo moo moo, m moooo mooooooo

and friendliness; it is therefore but meet, that in this place we set
moo mooooooooooo; mo mo moooooooo moo mooo, mooo mo mooo moooo mo moo

down who the Pequod's harpooneers were, and to what headsman each of
mooo moo moo Mooooo'm moooooooooo mooo, moo mo mooo mooooooo mooo mo

them belonged.
mooo mooooooo.




First of all was Queequeg, whom Starbuck, the chief mate, had selected
Moooo mo moo moo Mooooooo, mooo Mooooooo, moo moooo mooo, moo mooooooo

for his squire. But Queequeg is already known.
moo moo mooooo. Moo Mooooooo mo moooooo moooo.




Next was Tashtego, an unmixed Indian from Gay Head, the most westerly
Mooo moo Mooooooo, mo moooooo Mooooo mooo Moo Mooo, moo mooo mooooooo

promontory of Martha's Vineyard, where there still exists the last
mooooooooo mo Mooooo'm Mooooooo, moooo moooo moooo mooooo moo mooo

remnant of a village of red men, which has long supplied the neighboring
moooooo mo m moooooo mo moo moo, moooo moo mooo mooooooo moo moooooooooo

island of Nantucket with many of her most daring harpooneers. In the
mooooo mo Moooooooo mooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo moooooooooo. Mo moo

fishery, they usually go by the generic name of Gay-Headers. Tashtego's
moooooo, mooo moooooo mo mo moo moooooo mooo mo Moo-Moooooo. Mooooooo'm

long, lean, sable hair, his high cheek bones, and black rounding
mooo, mooo, moooo mooo, moo mooo moooo moooo, moo moooo mooooooo

eyes--for an Indian, Oriental in their largeness, but Antarctic in their
mooo--moo mo Mooooo, Mooooooo mo moooo moooooooo, moo Moooooooo mo moooo

glittering expression--all this sufficiently proclaimed him an inheritor
mooooooooo mooooooooo--moo mooo mooooooooooo mooooooooo moo mo moooooooo

of the unvitiated blood of those proud warrior hunters, who, in quest
mo moo mooooooooo moooo mo moooo moooo moooooo moooooo, moo, mo moooo

of the great New England moose, had scoured, bow in hand, the aboriginal
mo moo moooo Moo Moooooo moooo, moo moooooo, moo mo mooo, moo mooooooooo

forests of the main. But no longer snuffing in the trail of the wild
moooooo mo moo mooo. Moo mo mooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo mo moo mooo

beasts of the woodland, Tashtego now hunted in the wake of the great
mooooo mo moo mooooooo, Mooooooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooo

whales of the sea; the unerring harpoon of the son fitly replacing the
mooooo mo moo moo; moo mooooooo moooooo mo moo moo moooo moooooooo moo

infallible arrow of the sires. To look at the tawny brawn of his lithe
mooooooooo moooo mo moo moooo. Mo mooo mo moo moooo moooo mo moo moooo

snaky limbs, you would almost have credited the superstitions of some of
moooo moooo, moo moooo mooooo mooo mooooooo moo moooooooooooo mo mooo mo

the earlier Puritans, and half-believed this wild Indian to be a son
moo moooooo Mooooooo, moo mooo-mooooooo mooo mooo Mooooo mo mo m moo

of the Prince of the Powers of the Air. Tashtego was Stubb the second
mo moo Mooooo mo moo Mooooo mo moo Moo. Mooooooo moo Moooo moo mooooo

mate's squire.
mooo'm mooooo.




Third among the harpooneers was Daggoo, a gigantic, coal-black
Moooo moooo moo moooooooooo moo Mooooo, m mooooooo, mooo-moooo

negro-savage, with a lion-like tread--an Ahasuerus to behold. Suspended
moooo-mooooo, mooo m mooo-mooo moooo--mo Moooooooo mo mooooo. Moooooooo

from his ears were two golden hoops, so large that the sailors called
mooo moo mooo mooo moo mooooo moooo, mo moooo mooo moo moooooo mooooo

them ring-bolts, and would talk of securing the top-sail halyards to
mooo mooo-moooo, moo moooo mooo mo mooooooo moo moo-mooo mooooooo mo

them. In his youth Daggoo had voluntarily shipped on board of a whaler,
mooo. Mo moo moooo Mooooo moo moooooooooo moooooo mo moooo mo m mooooo,

lying in a lonely bay on his native coast. And never having been
moooo mo m mooooo moo mo moo mooooo moooo. Moo moooo mooooo mooo

anywhere in the world but in Africa, Nantucket, and the pagan harbors
mooooooo mo moo moooo moo mo Mooooo, Moooooooo, moo moo moooo moooooo

most frequented by whalemen; and having now led for many years the bold
mooo mooooooooo mo mooooooo; moo mooooo moo moo moo mooo moooo moo mooo

life of the fishery in the ships of owners uncommonly heedful of what
mooo mo moo moooooo mo moo moooo mo mooooo mooooooooo moooooo mo mooo

manner of men they shipped; Daggoo retained all his barbaric virtues,
mooooo mo moo mooo moooooo; Mooooo mooooooo moo moo mooooooo moooooo,

and erect as a giraffe, moved about the decks in all the pomp of six
moo moooo mo m moooooo, moooo moooo moo moooo mo moo moo mooo mo moo

feet five in his socks. There was a corporeal humility in looking up at
mooo mooo mo moo moooo. Moooo moo m moooooooo mooooooo mo moooooo mo mo

him; and a white man standing before him seemed a white flag come to
moo; moo m moooo moo mooooooo mooooo moo mooooo m moooo mooo mooo mo

beg truce of a fortress. Curious to tell, this imperial negro, Ahasuerus
moo moooo mo m mooooooo. Moooooo mo mooo, mooo mooooooo moooo, Moooooooo

Daggoo, was the Squire of little Flask, who looked like a chess-man
Mooooo, moo moo Mooooo mo mooooo Moooo, moo mooooo mooo m moooo-moo

beside him. As for the residue of the Pequod's company, be it said, that
mooooo moo. Mo moo moo moooooo mo moo Mooooo'm moooooo, mo mo mooo, mooo

at the present day not one in two of the many thousand men before the
mo moo moooooo moo moo moo mo moo mo moo mooo mooooooo moo mooooo moo

mast employed in the American whale fishery, are Americans born, though
mooo mooooooo mo moo Mooooooo moooo moooooo, moo Moooooooo mooo, mooooo

pretty nearly all the officers are. Herein it is the same with the
mooooo mooooo moo moo mooooooo moo. Mooooo mo mo moo mooo mooo moo

American whale fishery as with the American army and military and
Mooooooo moooo moooooo mo mooo moo Mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo moo

merchant navies, and the engineering forces employed in the construction
mooooooo mooooo, moo moo moooooooooo mooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo

of the American Canals and Railroads. The same, I say, because in all
mo moo Mooooooo Mooooo moo Moooooooo. Moo mooo, M moo, moooooo mo moo

these cases the native American liberally provides the brains, the rest
moooo moooo moo mooooo Mooooooo moooooooo mooooooo moo mooooo, moo mooo

of the world as generously supplying the muscles. No small number of
mo moo moooo mo mooooooooo moooooooo moo moooooo. Mo moooo mooooo mo

these whaling seamen belong to the Azores, where the outward bound
moooo moooooo mooooo mooooo mo moo Mooooo, moooo moo moooooo moooo

Nantucket whalers frequently touch to augment their crews from the hardy
Moooooooo moooooo mooooooooo moooo mo moooooo moooo moooo mooo moo moooo

peasants of those rocky shores. In like manner, the Greenland whalers
mooooooo mo moooo moooo mooooo. Mo mooo mooooo, moo Moooooooo moooooo

sailing out of Hull or London, put in at the Shetland Islands, to
moooooo moo mo Mooo mo Mooooo, moo mo mo moo Mooooooo Moooooo, mo

receive the full complement of their crew. Upon the passage homewards,
moooooo moo mooo mooooooooo mo moooo mooo. Mooo moo moooooo moooooooo,

they drop them there again. How it is, there is no telling, but
mooo mooo mooo moooo moooo. Moo mo mo, moooo mo mo moooooo, moo

Islanders seem to make the best whalemen. They were nearly all Islanders
Moooooooo mooo mo mooo moo mooo mooooooo. Mooo mooo mooooo moo Moooooooo

in the Pequod, ISOLATOES too, I call such, not acknowledging the common
mo moo Mooooo, MOOOOOOOO moo, M mooo mooo, moo moooooooooooo moo mooooo

continent of men, but each ISOLATO living on a separate continent of his
moooooooo mo moo, moo mooo MOOOOOO mooooo mo m mooooooo moooooooo mo moo

own. Yet now, federated along one keel, what a set these Isolatoes were!
moo. Moo moo, moooooooo moooo moo mooo, mooo m moo moooo Moooooooo mooo!

An Anacharsis Clootz deputation from all the isles of the sea, and all
Mo Mooooooooo Mooooo mooooooooo mooo moo moo moooo mo moo moo, moo moo

the ends of the earth, accompanying Old Ahab in the Pequod to lay the
moo mooo mo moo moooo, mooooooooooo Moo Mooo mo moo Mooooo mo moo moo

world's grievances before that bar from which not very many of them ever
moooo'm mooooooooo mooooo mooo moo mooo moooo moo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo

come back. Black Little Pip--he never did--oh, no! he went before. Poor
mooo mooo. Moooo Mooooo Moo--mo moooo moo--mo, mo! mo mooo mooooo. Mooo

Alabama boy! On the grim Pequod's forecastle, ye shall ere long see him,
Moooooo moo! Mo moo mooo Mooooo'm mooooooooo, mo moooo moo mooo moo moo,

beating his tambourine; prelusive of the eternal time, when sent for,
moooooo moo mooooooooo; moooooooo mo moo moooooo mooo, mooo mooo moo,

to the great quarter-deck on high, he was bid strike in with angels, and
mo moo moooo moooooo-mooo mo mooo, mo moo moo mooooo mo mooo mooooo, moo

beat his tambourine in glory; called a coward here, hailed a hero there!
mooo moo mooooooooo mo moooo; mooooo m mooooo mooo, mooooo m mooo moooo!










CHAPTER 28. Ahab.
MOOOOOO mo. Mooo.







For several days after leaving Nantucket, nothing above hatches was seen
Moo moooooo mooo moooo moooooo Moooooooo, moooooo moooo moooooo moo mooo

of Captain Ahab. The mates regularly relieved each other at the watches,
mo Moooooo Mooo. Moo moooo moooooooo mooooooo mooo moooo mo moo moooooo,

and for aught that could be seen to the contrary, they seemed to be the
moo moo moooo mooo moooo mo mooo mo moo mooooooo, mooo mooooo mo mo moo

only commanders of the ship; only they sometimes issued from the cabin
mooo mooooooooo mo moo mooo; mooo mooo moooooooo mooooo mooo moo moooo

with orders so sudden and peremptory, that after all it was plain they
mooo mooooo mo mooooo moo mooooooooo, mooo moooo moo mo moo moooo mooo

but commanded vicariously. Yes, their supreme lord and dictator was
moo moooooooo moooooooooo. Moo, moooo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo moo

there, though hitherto unseen by any eyes not permitted to penetrate
moooo, mooooo mooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo moo moooooooo mo moooooooo

into the now sacred retreat of the cabin.
mooo moo moo mooooo moooooo mo moo moooo.




Every time I ascended to the deck from my watches below, I instantly
Moooo mooo M mooooooo mo moo mooo mooo mo moooooo moooo, M moooooooo

gazed aft to mark if any strange face were visible; for my first vague
moooo moo mo mooo mo moo moooooo mooo mooo moooooo; moo mo moooo moooo

disquietude touching the unknown captain, now in the seclusion of the
moooooooooo mooooooo moo moooooo moooooo, moo mo moo moooooooo mo moo

sea, became almost a perturbation. This was strangely heightened
moo, mooooo mooooo m mooooooooooo. Mooo moo moooooooo mooooooooo

at times by the ragged Elijah's diabolical incoherences uninvitedly
mo moooo mo moo mooooo Mooooo'm mooooooooo mooooooooooo moooooooooo

recurring to me, with a subtle energy I could not have before conceived
moooooooo mo mo, mooo m mooooo mooooo M moooo moo mooo mooooo moooooooo

of. But poorly could I withstand them, much as in other moods I was
mo. Moo mooooo moooo M moooooooo mooo, mooo mo mo moooo moooo M moo

almost ready to smile at the solemn whimsicalities of that outlandish
mooooo moooo mo moooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooooooo mo mooo mooooooooo

prophet of the wharves. But whatever it was of apprehensiveness or
moooooo mo moo moooooo. Moo mooooooo mo moo mo mooooooooooooooo mo

mooooooooo--mo mooo mo mo--moooo M mooo, moo mooooooo M mooo mo mooo

about me in the ship, it seemed against all warrantry to cherish such
moooo mo mo moo mooo, mo mooooo moooooo moo moooooooo mo moooooo mooo

emotions. For though the harpooneers, with the great body of the crew,
mooooooo. Moo mooooo moo moooooooooo, mooo moo moooo mooo mo moo mooo,

were a far more barbaric, heathenish, and motley set than any of the
mooo m moo mooo mooooooo, mooooooooo, moo mooooo moo mooo moo mo moo

mooo mooooooo-mooo moooooooo moooo mo mooooooo moooooooooo moo mooo mo

acquainted with, still I ascribed this--and rightly ascribed it--to the
mooooooooo mooo, moooo M mooooooo mooo--moo moooooo mooooooo mo--mo moo

fierce uniqueness of the very nature of that wild Scandinavian vocation
mooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo mooo Mooooooooooo mooooooo

in which I had so abandonedly embarked. But it was especially the aspect
mo moooo M moo mo moooooooooo mooooooo. Moo mo moo mooooooooo moo mooooo

of the three chief officers of the ship, the mates, which was most
mo moo moooo moooo mooooooo mo moo mooo, moo moooo, moooo moo mooo

mooooooo mooooooooo mo moooo moooo mooooooooo mooooooooo, moo mooooo

confidence and cheerfulness in every presentment of the voyage. Three
mooooooooo moo mooooooooooo mo moooo moooooooooo mo moo mooooo. Moooo

better, more likely sea-officers and men, each in his own different way,
mooooo, mooo mooooo moo-mooooooo moo moo, mooo mo moo moo moooooooo moo,

could not readily be found, and they were every one of them Americans; a
moooo moo moooooo mo moooo, moo mooo mooo moooo moo mo mooo Moooooooo; m

Nantucketer, a Vineyarder, a Cape man. Now, it being Christmas when the
Moooooooooo, m Mooooooooo, m Mooo moo. Moo, mo moooo Moooooooo mooo moo

ship shot from out her harbor, for a space we had biting Polar weather,
mooo mooo mooo moo moo mooooo, moo m moooo mo moo mooooo Moooo moooooo,

though all the time running away from it to the southward; and by every
mooooo moo moo mooo moooooo mooo mooo mo mo moo moooooooo; moo mo moooo

degree and minute of latitude which we sailed, gradually leaving that
mooooo moo mooooo mo mooooooo moooo mo mooooo, moooooooo moooooo mooo

moooooooo mooooo, moo moo moo moooooooooo moooooo mooooo mo. Mo moo moo

of those less lowering, but still grey and gloomy enough mornings of the
mo moooo mooo mooooooo, moo moooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo mooooooo mo moo

transition, when with a fair wind the ship was rushing through the water
mooooooooo, mooo mooo m mooo mooo moo mooo moo moooooo moooooo moo moooo

with a vindictive sort of leaping and melancholy rapidity, that as I
mooo m mooooooooo mooo mo moooooo moo mooooooooo mooooooo, mooo mo M

mounted to the deck at the call of the forenoon watch, so soon as I
moooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo moooo, mo mooo mo M

levelled my glance towards the taffrail, foreboding shivers ran over me.
mooooooo mo mooooo moooooo moo mooooooo, mooooooooo moooooo moo mooo mo.

Reality outran apprehension; Captain Ahab stood upon his quarter-deck.
Moooooo mooooo mooooooooooo; Moooooo Mooo moooo mooo moo moooooo-mooo.




There seemed no sign of common bodily illness about him, nor of the
Moooo mooooo mo mooo mo mooooo mooooo moooooo moooo moo, moo mo moo

recovery from any. He looked like a man cut away from the stake, when
mooooooo mooo moo. Mo mooooo mooo m moo moo mooo mooo moo moooo, mooo

the fire has overrunningly wasted all the limbs without consuming them,
moo mooo moo moooooooooooo mooooo moo moo moooo moooooo moooooooo mooo,

or taking away one particle from their compacted aged robustness. His
mo mooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo moooo moooooooo mooo mooooooooo. Moo

whole high, broad form, seemed made of solid bronze, and shaped in an
moooo mooo, moooo mooo, mooooo mooo mo moooo mooooo, moo mooooo mo mo

unalterable mould, like Cellini's cast Perseus. Threading its way out
moooooooooo moooo, mooo Moooooo'm mooo Moooooo. Moooooooo moo moo moo

from among his grey hairs, and continuing right down one side of his
mooo moooo moo mooo moooo, moo mooooooooo moooo mooo moo mooo mo moo

tawny scorched face and neck, till it disappeared in his clothing,
moooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo, mooo mo moooooooooo mo moo mooooooo,

you saw a slender rod-like mark, lividly whitish. It resembled that
moo moo m moooooo moo-mooo mooo, moooooo moooooo. Mo moooooooo mooo

perpendicular seam sometimes made in the straight, lofty trunk of
moooooooooooo mooo moooooooo mooo mo moo mooooooo, moooo moooo mo

a great tree, when the upper lightning tearingly darts down it, and
m moooo mooo, mooo moo moooo moooooooo moooooooo moooo mooo mo, moo

without wrenching a single twig, peels and grooves out the bark from top
moooooo moooooooo m mooooo mooo, moooo moo moooooo moo moo mooo mooo moo

to bottom, ere running off into the soil, leaving the tree still greenly
mo mooooo, moo moooooo moo mooo moo mooo, moooooo moo mooo moooo moooooo

alive, but branded. Whether that mark was born with him, or whether it
moooo, moo moooooo. Moooooo mooo mooo moo mooo mooo moo, mo moooooo mo

was the scar left by some desperate wound, no one could certainly say.
moo moo mooo mooo mo mooo moooooooo moooo, mo moo moooo moooooooo moo.

By some tacit consent, throughout the voyage little or no allusion was
Mo mooo moooo moooooo, mooooooooo moo mooooo mooooo mo mo mooooooo moo

made to it, especially by the mates. But once Tashtego's senior, an old
mooo mo mo, mooooooooo mo moo moooo. Moo mooo Mooooooo'm mooooo, mo moo

Gay-Head Indian among the crew, superstitiously asserted that not till
Moo-Mooo Mooooo moooo moo mooo, moooooooooooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo

mo moo mooo moooo moooo moo moo Mooo mooooo mooo moo moooooo, moo

mooo mo mooo mooo moo, moo mo moo mooo mo moo mooooo mooo, moo mo

an elemental strife at sea. Yet, this wild hint seemed inferentially
mo moooooooo mooooo mo moo. Moo, mooo mooo mooo mooooo moooooooooooo

moooooooo, mo mooo m mooo Moooooo mooooooooo, mo moo mooooooooo moo,

who, having never before sailed out of Nantucket, had never ere this
moo, mooooo moooo mooooo mooooo moo mo Moooooooo, moo moooo moo mooo

laid eye upon wild Ahab. Nevertheless, the old sea-traditions, the
mooo moo mooo mooo Mooo. Mooooooooooo, moo moo moo-mooooooooo, moo

mooooooooo moooooooooo, moooooooo mooooooo mooo moo Moooooo mooo

moooooooooooo mooooo mo moooooooooo. Mo mooo mo moooo mooooo moooooooo

mooooooooooo moo mooo mo mooo mooo mo mooo Moooooo Mooo mooooo

be tranquilly laid out--which might hardly come to pass, so he
mo mooooooooo mooo moo--moooo moooo mooooo mooo mo mooo, mo mo

muttered--then, whoever should do that last office for the dead, would
mooooooo--mooo, moooooo mooooo mo mooo mooo mooooo moo moo mooo, moooo

find a birth-mark on him from crown to sole.
mooo m moooo-mooo mo moo mooo moooo mo mooo.




So powerfully did the whole grim aspect of Ahab affect me, and the livid
Mo mooooooooo moo moo moooo mooo mooooo mo Mooo mooooo mo, moo moo moooo

brand which streaked it, that for the first few moments I hardly noted
moooo moooo mooooooo mo, mooo moo moo moooo moo moooooo M mooooo moooo

that not a little of this overbearing grimness was owing to the barbaric
mooo moo m mooooo mo mooo moooooooooo mooooooo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo

white leg upon which he partly stood. It had previously come to me that
moooo moo mooo moooo mo mooooo moooo. Mo moo mooooooooo mooo mo mo mooo
