mooo moooo moo moo mo moo mooo moooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo mo

the sperm whale's jaw. "Aye, he was dismasted off Japan," said the old
moo moooo moooo'm moo. "Moo, mo moo moooooooo moo Moooo," mooo moo moo

Gay-Head Indian once; "but like his dismasted craft, he shipped another
Moo-Mooo Mooooo mooo; "moo mooo moo moooooooo moooo, mo moooooo moooooo

mast without coming home for it. He has a quiver of 'em."
mooo moooooo mooooo mooo moo mo. Mo moo m mooooo mo 'mo."




I was struck with the singular posture he maintained. Upon each side of
M moo mooooo mooo moo mooooooo moooooo mo mooooooooo. Mooo mooo mooo mo

the Pequod's quarter deck, and pretty close to the mizzen shrouds, there
moo Mooooo'm moooooo mooo, moo mooooo moooo mo moo mooooo moooooo, moooo

was an auger hole, bored about half an inch or so, into the plank.
moo mo moooo mooo, moooo moooo mooo mo mooo mo mo, mooo moo moooo.

His bone leg steadied in that hole; one arm elevated, and holding by a
Moo mooo moo mooooooo mo mooo mooo; moo moo mooooooo, moo moooooo mo m

shroud; Captain Ahab stood erect, looking straight out beyond the
mooooo; Moooooo Mooo moooo moooo, moooooo mooooooo moo mooooo moo

mooo'm mooo-mooooooo mooo. Moooo moo mo mooooooo mo moooooo moooooooo,

moooooo mooooooooo mo mooo mooooo. Moo m mooo mo moooo; moo moo moo

officers say aught to him; though by all their minutest gestures
mooooooo moo moooo mo moo; mooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo mooooooo

and expressions, they plainly showed the uneasy, if not painful,

moooooooooooo mo moooo moooo m mooooooo mooooo-moo. Moo moo mooo mooo,

but moody stricken Ahab stood before them with a crucifixion in his
moo moooo mooooooo Mooo moooo mooooo mooo mooo m moooooooooo mo moo

face; in all the nameless regal overbearing dignity of some mighty woe.
mooo; mo moo moo mooooooo moooo moooooooooo moooooo mo mooo mooooo moo.




Ere long, from his first visit in the air, he withdrew into his cabin.
Moo mooo, mooo moo moooo moooo mo moo moo, mo mooooooo mooo moo moooo.

But after that morning, he was every day visible to the crew; either
Moo moooo mooo moooooo, mo moo moooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo; mooooo

standing in his pivot-hole, or seated upon an ivory stool he had; or
mooooooo mo moo moooo-mooo, mo mooooo mooo mo moooo moooo mo moo; mo

heavily walking the deck. As the sky grew less gloomy; indeed, began to
moooooo moooooo moo mooo. Mo moo moo mooo mooo mooooo; mooooo, moooo mo

grow a little genial, he became still less and less a recluse; as
mooo m mooooo mooooo, mo mooooo moooo mooo moo mooo m moooooo; mo

if, when the ship had sailed from home, nothing but the dead wintry
mo, mooo moo mooo moo mooooo mooo mooo, moooooo moo moo mooo mooooo

bleakness of the sea had then kept him so secluded. And, by and by, it
moooooooo mo moo moo moo mooo mooo moo mo mooooooo. Moo, mo moo mo, mo

came to pass, that he was almost continually in the air; but, as yet,
mooo mo mooo, mooo mo moo mooooo moooooooooo mo moo moo; moo, mo moo,

for all that he said, or perceptibly did, on the at last sunny deck,
moo moo mooo mo mooo, mo moooooooooo moo, mo moo mo mooo moooo mooo,

he seemed as unnecessary there as another mast. But the Pequod was
mo mooooo mo moooooooooo moooo mo moooooo mooo. Moo moo Mooooo moo

only making a passage now; not regularly cruising; nearly all whaling
mooo mooooo m moooooo moo; moo moooooooo mooooooo; mooooo moo moooooo

preparatives needing supervision the mates were fully competent to, so
mooooooooooo moooooo moooooooooo moo moooo mooo moooo moooooooo mo, mo

that there was little or nothing, out of himself, to employ or excite
mooo moooo moo mooooo mo moooooo, moo mo moooooo, mo mooooo mo mooooo

Ahab, now; and thus chase away, for that one interval, the clouds that
Mooo, moo; moo mooo moooo mooo, moo mooo moo mooooooo, moo mooooo mooo

layer upon layer were piled upon his brow, as ever all clouds choose the
moooo mooo moooo mooo moooo mooo moo mooo, mo mooo moo mooooo mooooo moo

loftiest peaks to pile themselves upon.
mooooooo moooo mo mooo mooooooooo mooo.




Nevertheless, ere long, the warm, warbling persuasiveness of the
Mooooooooooo, moo mooo, moo mooo, mooooooo mooooooooooooo mo moo

pleasant, holiday weather we came to, seemed gradually to charm him from
mooooooo, moooooo moooooo mo mooo mo, mooooo moooooooo mo moooo moo mooo

moo mooo. Moo, mo mooo moo moo-moooooo, moooooo moooo, Moooo moo Moo,

mooo mooo mo moo mooooo, mooooooooooo moooo; mooo moo mooooo, moooooooo,

moo, m mooooo moooooo mo moo moooooo moooooooo mo mooo moooooo moo. Mooo

mooo mooo moo mo moo moooo moo moooo moooooo mo m mooo, moooo, mo moo

other man, would have soon flowered out in a smile.
moooo moo, moooo mooo mooo mooooooo moo mo m moooo.










CHAPTER 29. Enter Ahab; to Him, Stubb.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooo Mooo; mo Moo, Moooo.







Some days elapsed, and ice and icebergs all astern, the Pequod now
Mooo mooo moooooo, moo moo moo mooooooo moo mooooo, moo Mooooo moo

went rolling through the bright Quito spring, which, at sea, almost
mooo moooooo moooooo moo mooooo Moooo mooooo, moooo, mo moo, mooooo

perpetually reigns on the threshold of the eternal August of the Tropic.
moooooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooooo mo moo moooooo Mooooo mo moo Mooooo.

The warmly cool, clear, ringing, perfumed, overflowing, redundant days,
Moo mooooo mooo, moooo, moooooo, mooooooo, moooooooooo, moooooooo mooo,

were as crystal goblets of Persian sherbet, heaped up--flaked up, with
mooo mo moooooo moooooo mo Moooooo moooooo, mooooo mo--mooooo mo, mooo

rose-water snow. The starred and stately nights seemed haughty dames in
mooo-moooo mooo. Moo moooooo moo moooooo mooooo mooooo moooooo moooo mo

jewelled velvets, nursing at home in lonely pride, the memory of their
mooooooo moooooo, moooooo mo mooo mo mooooo moooo, moo mooooo mo moooo

absent conquering Earls, the golden helmeted suns! For sleeping man,
mooooo mooooooooo Moooo, moo mooooo mooooooo mooo! Moo mooooooo moo,

'twas hard to choose between such winsome days and such seducing nights.
'mooo mooo mo mooooo moooooo mooo moooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo mooooo.

But all the witcheries of that unwaning weather did not merely lend new
Moo moo moo mooooooooo mo mooo mooooooo moooooo moo moo mooooo mooo moo

spells and potencies to the outward world. Inward they turned upon the
mooooo moo moooooooo mo moo moooooo moooo. Mooooo mooo mooooo mooo moo

soul, especially when the still mild hours of eve came on; then, memory
mooo, mooooooooo mooo moo moooo mooo moooo mo moo mooo mo; mooo, mooooo

shot her crystals as the clear ice most forms of noiseless twilights.
mooo moo mooooooo mo moo moooo moo mooo moooo mo moooooooo moooooooo.

And all these subtle agencies, more and more they wrought on Ahab's
Moo moo moooo mooooo mooooooo, mooo moo mooo mooo moooooo mo Mooo'm

texture.
moooooo.




Old age is always wakeful; as if, the longer linked with life, the less
Moo moo mo mooooo moooooo; mo mo, moo mooooo mooooo mooo mooo, moo mooo

man has to do with aught that looks like death. Among sea-commanders,
moo moo mo mo mooo moooo mooo moooo mooo moooo. Moooo moo-mooooooooo,

the old greybeards will oftenest leave their berths to visit the
moo moo mooooooooo mooo mooooooo moooo moooo mooooo mo moooo moo

night-cloaked deck. It was so with Ahab; only that now, of late, he
moooo-moooooo mooo. Mo moo mo mooo Mooo; mooo mooo moo, mo mooo, mo

seemed so much to live in the open air, that truly speaking, his visits
mooooo mo mooo mo mooo mo moo mooo moo, mooo moooo mooooooo, moo mooooo

were more to the cabin, than from the cabin to the planks. "It feels
mooo mooo mo moo moooo, mooo mooo moo moooo mo moo mooooo. "Mo moooo

like going down into one's tomb,"--he would mutter to himself--"for an
mooo moooo mooo mooo moo'm mooo,"--mo moooo mooooo mo moooooo--"moo mo

old captain like me to be descending this narrow scuttle, to go to my
moo moooooo mooo mo mo mo mooooooooo mooo mooooo moooooo, mo mo mo mo

grave-dug berth."
moooo-moo moooo."




So, almost every twenty-four hours, when the watches of the night were
Mo, mooooo moooo mooooo-mooo moooo, mooo moo moooooo mo moo moooo mooo

set, and the band on deck sentinelled the slumbers of the band below;
moo, moo moo mooo mo mooo moooooooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo moooo;

and when if a rope was to be hauled upon the forecastle, the sailors
moo mooo mo m mooo moo mo mo mooooo mooo moo mooooooooo, moo moooooo

flung it not rudely down, as by day, but with some cautiousness dropt
moooo mo moo mooooo mooo, mo mo moo, moo mooo mooo mooooooooooo moooo

it to its place for fear of disturbing their slumbering shipmates; when
mo mo moo moooo moo mooo mo mooooooooo moooo mooooooooo moooooooo; mooo

this sort of steady quietude would begin to prevail, habitually, the
mooo mooo mo mooooo mooooooo moooo moooo mo moooooo, mooooooooo, moo

silent steersman would watch the cabin-scuttle; and ere long the old man
mooooo moooooooo moooo moooo moo moooo-moooooo; moo moo mooo moo moo moo

would emerge, gripping at the iron banister, to help his crippled way.
moooo mooooo, mooooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo, mo mooo moo mooooooo moo.

Some considering touch of humanity was in him; for at times like these,
Mooo moooooooooo moooo mo mooooooo moo mo moo; moo mo moooo mooo moooo,

he usually abstained from patrolling the quarter-deck; because to his
mo moooooo moooooooo mooo mooooooooo moo moooooo-mooo; moooooo mo moo

wearied mates, seeking repose within six inches of his ivory heel, such
moooooo moooo, moooooo mooooo mooooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo mooo, mooo

would have been the reverberating crack and din of that bony step, that
moooo mooo mooo moo moooooooooooo moooo moo moo mo mooo mooo mooo, mooo

their dreams would have been on the crunching teeth of sharks. But once,
moooo mooooo moooo mooo mooo mo moo moooooooo moooo mo mooooo. Moo mooo,

the mood was on him too deep for common regardings; and as with heavy,
moo mooo moo mo moo moo mooo moo mooooo mooooooooo; moo mo mooo moooo,

lumber-like pace he was measuring the ship from taffrail to mainmast,
mooooo-mooo mooo mo moo moooooooo moo mooo mooo mooooooo mo mooooooo,

Stubb, the old second mate, came up from below, with a certain
Moooo, moo moo mooooo mooo, mooo mo mooo moooo, mooo m moooooo

unassured, deprecating humorousness, hinted that if Captain Ahab was
moooooooo, moooooooooo mooooooooooo, mooooo mooo mo Moooooo Mooo moo

pleased to walk the planks, then, no one could say nay; but there might
moooooo mo mooo moo mooooo, mooo, mo moo moooo moo moo; moo moooo moooo

be some way of muffling the noise; hinting something indistinctly and
mo mooo moo mo mooooooo moo moooo; moooooo moooooooo mooooooooooo moo

hesitatingly about a globe of tow, and the insertion into it, of the
mooooooooooo moooo m moooo mo moo, moo moo moooooooo mooo mo, mo moo

ivory heel. Ah! Stubb, thou didst not know Ahab then.
moooo mooo. Mo! Moooo, mooo moooo moo mooo Mooo mooo.




"Am I a cannon-ball, Stubb," said Ahab, "that thou wouldst wad me that
"Mo M m mooooo-mooo, Moooo," mooo Mooo, "mooo mooo moooooo moo mo mooo

fashion? But go thy ways; I had forgot. Below to thy nightly grave;
moooooo? Moo mo moo mooo; M moo mooooo. Moooo mo moo moooooo moooo;

where such as ye sleep between shrouds, to use ye to the filling one at
moooo mooo mo mo moooo moooooo moooooo, mo moo mo mo moo moooooo moo mo

last.--Down, dog, and kennel!"
mooo.--Mooo, moo, moo mooooo!"




Starting at the unforseen concluding exclamation of the so suddenly
Mooooooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooooo moooooooooo mo moo mo mooooooo

scornful old man, Stubb was speechless a moment; then said excitedly, "I
mooooooo moo moo, Moooo moo mooooooooo m mooooo; mooo mooo moooooooo, "M

am not used to be spoken to that way, sir; I do but less than half like
mo moo mooo mo mo mooooo mo mooo moo, moo; M mo moo mooo mooo mooo mooo

it, sir."
mo, moo."




"Avast! gritted Ahab between his set teeth, and violently moving away,
"Moooo! moooooo Mooo moooooo moo moo moooo, moo moooooooo mooooo mooo,

as if to avoid some passionate temptation.
mo mo mo moooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooooo.




"No, sir; not yet," said Stubb, emboldened, "I will not tamely be called
"Mo, moo; moo moo," mooo Moooo, mooooooooo, "M mooo moo mooooo mo mooooo

a dog, sir."
m moo, moo."




"Then be called ten times a donkey, and a mule, and an ass, and begone,
"Mooo mo mooooo moo moooo m mooooo, moo m mooo, moo mo moo, moo mooooo,

or I'll clear the world of thee!"
mo M'mo moooo moo moooo mo mooo!"




As he said this, Ahab advanced upon him with such overbearing terrors in
Mo mo mooo mooo, Mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo mooo moooooooooo moooooo mo

his aspect, that Stubb involuntarily retreated.
moo mooooo, mooo Moooo moooooooooooo moooooooo.




"I was never served so before without giving a hard blow for it,"

mooooooo Moooo, mo mo moooo moooooo mooooooooo moo moooo-moooooo. "Mo'm

CHAPTER 30. The Pipe.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooo.







When Stubb had departed, Ahab stood for a while leaning over the
Mooo Moooo moo mooooooo, Mooo moooo moo m moooo moooooo mooo moo

bulwarks; and then, as had been usual with him of late, calling a sailor
mooooooo; moo mooo, mo moo mooo moooo mooo moo mo mooo, moooooo m mooooo

of the watch, he sent him below for his ivory stool, and also his pipe.
mo moo moooo, mo mooo moo moooo moo moo moooo moooo, moo mooo moo mooo.

Lighting the pipe at the binnacle lamp and planting the stool on the
Mooooooo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo moo moooo mo moo

weather side of the deck, he sat and smoked.
moooooo mooo mo moo mooo, mo moo moo mooooo.




In old Norse times, the thrones of the sea-loving Danish kings were
Mo moo Moooo moooo, moo moooooo mo moo moo-mooooo Mooooo moooo mooo

fabricated, saith tradition, of the tusks of the narwhale. How could one
mooooooooo, moooo moooooooo, mo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo. Moo moooo moo

look at Ahab then, seated on that tripod of bones, without bethinking
mooo mo Mooo mooo, mooooo mo mooo mooooo mo moooo, moooooo mooooooooo

him of the royalty it symbolized? For a Khan of the plank, and a king of
moo mo moo moooooo mo mooooooooo? Moo m Mooo mo moo moooo, moo m mooo mo

the sea, and a great lord of Leviathans was Ahab.
moo moo, moo m moooo mooo mo Mooooooooo moo Mooo.




Some moments passed, during which the thick vapour came from his mouth
Mooo moooooo mooooo, mooooo moooo moo moooo mooooo mooo mooo moo moooo

in quick and constant puffs, which blew back again into his face. "How
mo moooo moo mooooooo moooo, moooo mooo mooo moooo mooo moo mooo. "Moo

now," he soliloquized at last, withdrawing the tube, "this smoking no
moo," mo mooooooooooo mo mooo, moooooooooo moo mooo, "mooo moooooo mo

longer soothes. Oh, my pipe! hard must it go with me if thy charm be
mooooo moooooo. Mo, mo mooo! mooo mooo mo mo mooo mo mo moo moooo mo

gone! Here have I been unconsciously toiling, not pleasuring--aye, and
mooo! Mooo mooo M mooo moooooooooooo moooooo, moo mooooooooo--moo, moo

ignorantly smoking to windward all the while; to windward, and with
mooooooooo moooooo mo mooooooo moo moo moooo; mo mooooooo, moo mooo

such nervous whiffs, as if, like the dying whale, my final jets were the
mooo moooooo mooooo, mo mo, mooo moo moooo moooo, mo moooo mooo mooo moo

moooooooo moo moooooo mo moooooo. Mooo mooooooo mooo M mooo mooo mooo?

This thing that is meant for sereneness, to send up mild white vapours
Mooo moooo mooo mo moooo moo mooooooooo, mo mooo mo mooo moooo moooooo

among mild white hairs, not among torn iron-grey locks like mine. I'll
moooo mooo moooo moooo, moo moooo mooo mooo-mooo moooo mooo mooo. M'mo

smoke no more--"
moooo mo mooo--"




He tossed the still lighted pipe into the sea. The fire hissed in the
Mo mooooo moo moooo moooooo mooo mooo moo moo. Moo mooo mooooo mo moo

waves; the same instant the ship shot by the bubble the sinking pipe
moooo; moo mooo moooooo moo mooo mooo mo moo mooooo moo moooooo mooo

made. With slouched hat, Ahab lurchingly paced the planks.
mooo. Mooo mooooooo moo, Mooo mooooooooo moooo moo mooooo.

Next morning Stubb accosted Flask.

"Such a queer dream, King-Post, I never had. You know the old man's

mooo mooo Mooo. 'Moo,' mooooo M, 'mooo'm moo moo? Mo'm moo m mooo moo,

mo moo moooo mo mooo moooo, Moooo?"




"I don't know; it seems a sort of foolish to me, tho.'"
