CHAPTER 32. Cetology.
MOOOOOO mo. Mooooooo.







Already we are boldly launched upon the deep; but soon we shall be lost
Moooooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo; moo mooo mo moooo mo mooo

in its unshored, harbourless immensities. Ere that come to pass; ere the
mo moo mooooooo, moooooooooo moooooooooo. Moo mooo mooo mo mooo; moo moo

Pequod's weedy hull rolls side by side with the barnacled hulls of the
Mooooo'm moooo mooo moooo mooo mo mooo mooo moo moooooooo moooo mo moo

leviathan; at the outset it is but well to attend to a matter almost
moooooooo; mo moo mooooo mo mo moo mooo mo mooooo mo m mooooo mooooo

indispensable to a thorough appreciative understanding of the more
moooooooooooo mo m mooooooo mooooooooooo moooooooooooo mo moo mooo

special leviathanic revelations and allusions of all sorts which are to
moooooo moooooooooo moooooooooo moo moooooooo mo moo moooo moooo moo mo

follow.
mooooo.




It is some systematized exhibition of the whale in his broad genera,
Mo mo mooo mooooooooooo mooooooooo mo moo moooo mo moo moooo mooooo,

that I would now fain put before you. Yet is it no easy task. The
mooo M moooo moo mooo moo mooooo moo. Moo mo mo mo mooo mooo. Moo

classification of the constituents of a chaos, nothing less is here
mooooooooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo mo m moooo, moooooo mooo mo mooo

essayed. Listen to what the best and latest authorities have laid down.
moooooo. Mooooo mo mooo moo mooo moo mooooo moooooooooo mooo mooo mooo.




"No branch of Zoology is so much involved as that which is entitled
"Mo mooooo mo Moooooo mo mo mooo mooooooo mo mooo moooo mo mooooooo

Cetology," says Captain Scoresby, A.D. 1820.
Mooooooo," mooo Moooooo Mooooooo, M.M. mooo.




"It is not my intention, were it in my power, to enter into the
"Mo mo moo mo moooooooo, mooo mo mo mo moooo, mo moooo mooo moo

inquiry as to the true method of dividing the cetacea into groups and
moooooo mo mo moo mooo mooooo mo mooooooo moo moooooo mooo mooooo moo

families.... Utter confusion exists among the historians of this animal"
mooooooo.... Moooo moooooooo mooooo moooo moo mooooooooo mo mooo mooooo"

(sperm whale), says Surgeon Beale, A.D. 1839.
(moooo moooo), mooo Moooooo Moooo, M.M. mooo.




"Unfitness to pursue our research in the unfathomable waters."
"Moooooooo mo mooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo mooooo."

"Impenetrable veil covering our knowledge of the cetacea." "A field
"Mooooooooooo mooo mooooooo moo moooooooo mo moo moooooo." "M moooo

strewn with thorns." "All these incomplete indications but serve to
mooooo mooo mooooo." "Moo moooo mooooooooo moooooooooo moo moooo mo

torture us naturalists."
moooooo mo moooooooooo."




Thus speak of the whale, the great Cuvier, and John Hunter, and Lesson,
Mooo moooo mo moo moooo, moo moooo Mooooo, moo Mooo Mooooo, moo Mooooo,

those lights of zoology and anatomy. Nevertheless, though of real
moooo mooooo mo moooooo moo moooooo. Mooooooooooo, mooooo mo mooo

knowledge there be little, yet of books there are a plenty; and so in
moooooooo moooo mo mooooo, moo mo moooo moooo moo m mooooo; moo mo mo

some small degree, with cetology, or the science of whales. Many are
mooo moooo mooooo, mooo mooooooo, mo moo moooooo mo mooooo. Mooo moo

the men, small and great, old and new, landsmen and seamen, who have at
moo moo, moooo moo moooo, moo moo moo, mooooooo moo mooooo, moo mooo mo

large or in little, written of the whale. Run over a few:--The Authors
moooo mo mo mooooo, moooooo mo moo moooo. Moo mooo m moo:--Moo Moooooo

of the Bible; Aristotle; Pliny; Aldrovandi; Sir Thomas Browne; Gesner;
mo moo Moooo; Moooooooo; Moooo; Mooooooooo; Moo Mooooo Mooooo; Mooooo;

Ray; Linnaeus; Rondeletius; Willoughby; Green; Artedi; Sibbald; Brisson;
Moo; Mooooooo; Moooooooooo; Mooooooooo; Moooo; Mooooo; Moooooo; Moooooo;

Marten; Lacepede; Bonneterre; Desmarest; Baron Cuvier; Frederick Cuvier;
Mooooo; Mooooooo; Mooooooooo; Moooooooo; Moooo Mooooo; Moooooooo Mooooo;

John Hunter; Owen; Scoresby; Beale; Bennett; J. Ross Browne; the
Mooo Mooooo; Mooo; Mooooooo; Moooo; Moooooo; M. Mooo Mooooo; moo

Author of Miriam Coffin; Olmstead; and the Rev. T. Cheever. But to what
Mooooo mo Mooooo Mooooo; Mooooooo; moo moo Moo. M. Moooooo. Moo mo mooo

ultimate generalizing purpose all these have written, the above cited
mooooooo mooooooooooo moooooo moo moooo mooo moooooo, moo moooo moooo

extracts will show.
mooooooo mooo mooo.




Of the names in this list of whale authors, only those following Owen
Mo moo moooo mo mooo mooo mo moooo moooooo, mooo moooo moooooooo Mooo

ever saw living whales; and but one of them was a real professional
mooo moo mooooo mooooo; moo moo moo mo mooo moo m mooo mooooooooooo

harpooneer and whaleman. I mean Captain Scoresby. On the separate
mooooooooo moo mooooooo. M mooo Moooooo Mooooooo. Mo moo mooooooo

subject of the Greenland or right-whale, he is the best existing
moooooo mo moo Moooooooo mo moooo-moooo, mo mo moo mooo mooooooo

authority. But Scoresby knew nothing and says nothing of the great
moooooooo. Moo Mooooooo mooo moooooo moo mooo moooooo mo moo moooo

sperm whale, compared with which the Greenland whale is almost unworthy
moooo moooo, mooooooo mooo moooo moo Moooooooo moooo mo mooooo mooooooo

mentioning. And here be it said, that the Greenland whale is an usurper
mooooooooo. Moo mooo mo mo mooo, mooo moo Moooooooo moooo mo mo moooooo

upon the throne of the seas. He is not even by any means the largest
mooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo. Mo mo moo mooo mo moo moooo moo moooooo

of the whales. Yet, owing to the long priority of his claims, and the
mo moo mooooo. Moo, moooo mo moo mooo mooooooo mo moo mooooo, moo moo

profound ignorance which, till some seventy years back, invested the
mooooooo moooooooo moooo, mooo mooo moooooo moooo mooo, mooooooo moo

then fabulous or utterly unknown sperm-whale, and which ignorance to
mooo mooooooo mo moooooo moooooo moooo-moooo, moo moooo moooooooo mo

this present day still reigns in all but some few scientific retreats
mooo moooooo moo moooo mooooo mo moo moo mooo moo mooooooooo mooooooo

and whale-ports; this usurpation has been every way complete. Reference
moo moooo-moooo; mooo mooooooooo moo mooo moooo moo mooooooo. Moooooooo

to nearly all the leviathanic allusions in the great poets of past days,
mo mooooo moo moo moooooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo moooo mo mooo mooo,

will satisfy you that the Greenland whale, without one rival, was to
mooo moooooo moo mooo moo Moooooooo moooo, moooooo moo moooo, moo mo

them the monarch of the seas. But the time has at last come for a new
mooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo. Moo moo mooo moo mo mooo mooo moo m moo

proclamation. This is Charing Cross; hear ye! good people all,--the
mooooooooooo. Mooo mo Moooooo Moooo; mooo mo! mooo mooooo moo,--moo

Greenland whale is deposed,--the great sperm whale now reigneth!
Moooooooo moooo mo moooooo,--moo moooo moooo moooo moo mooooooo!




There are only two books in being which at all pretend to put the living
Moooo moo mooo moo moooo mo moooo moooo mo moo moooooo mo moo moo mooooo

sperm whale before you, and at the same time, in the remotest degree
moooo moooo mooooo moo, moo mo moo mooo mooo, mo moo mooooooo mooooo

succeed in the attempt. Those books are Beale's and Bennett's; both in
moooooo mo moo moooooo. Moooo moooo moo Moooo'm moo Moooooo'm; mooo mo

their time surgeons to English South-Sea whale-ships, and both exact and
moooo mooo mooooooo mo Moooooo Moooo-Moo moooo-moooo, moo mooo moooo moo

reliable men. The original matter touching the sperm whale to be found
mooooooo moo. Moo mooooooo mooooo mooooooo moo moooo moooo mo mo moooo

in their volumes is necessarily small; but so far as it goes, it is of
mo moooo moooooo mo moooooooooo moooo; moo mo moo mo mo mooo, mo mo mo

excellent quality, though mostly confined to scientific description. As
moooooooo moooooo, mooooo mooooo mooooooo mo mooooooooo moooooooooo. Mo

yet, however, the sperm whale, scientific or poetic, lives not complete
moo, moooooo, moo moooo moooo, mooooooooo mo mooooo, moooo moo mooooooo

in any literature. Far above all other hunted whales, his is an
mo moo mooooooooo. Moo moooo moo moooo mooooo mooooo, moo mo mo

unwritten life.
moooooooo mooo.




Now the various species of whales need some sort of popular
Moo moo moooooo moooooo mo mooooo mooo mooo mooo mo moooooo

comprehensive classification, if only an easy outline one for the
moooooooooooo mooooooooooooo, mo mooo mo mooo moooooo moo moo moo

present, hereafter to be filled in all its departments by subsequent
moooooo, moooooooo mo mo mooooo mo moo moo moooooooooo mo mooooooooo

laborers. As no better man advances to take this matter in hand, I
mooooooo. Mo mo mooooo moo mooooooo mo mooo mooo mooooo mo mooo, M

hereupon offer my own poor endeavors. I promise nothing complete;
mooooooo moooo mo moo mooo moooooooo. M moooooo moooooo mooooooo;

because any human thing supposed to be complete, must for that very
moooooo moo moooo moooo mooooooo mo mo mooooooo, mooo moo mooo mooo

reason infallibly be faulty. I shall not pretend to a minute anatomical
mooooo mooooooooo mo mooooo. M moooo moo moooooo mo m mooooo mooooooooo

description of the various species, or--in this place at least--to much
moooooooooo mo moo moooooo moooooo, mo--mo mooo moooo mo moooo--mo mooo

of any description. My object here is simply to project the draught of a
mo moo moooooooooo. Mo mooooo mooo mo mooooo mo moooooo moo moooooo mo m

systematization of cetology. I am the architect, not the builder.
moooooooooooooo mo mooooooo. M mo moo moooooooo, moo moo moooooo.




But it is a ponderous task; no ordinary letter-sorter in the Post-Office
Moo mo mo m moooooooo mooo; mo mooooooo mooooo-mooooo mo moo Mooo-Mooooo

is equal to it. To grope down into the bottom of the sea after them;
mo moooo mo mo. Mo moooo mooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo moo moooo mooo;

to have one's hands among the unspeakable foundations, ribs, and very
mo mooo moo'm moooo moooo moo moooooooooo moooooooooo, mooo, moo mooo

pelvis of the world; this is a fearful thing. What am I that I should
mooooo mo moo moooo; mooo mo m moooooo moooo. Mooo mo M mooo M mooooo

essay to hook the nose of this leviathan! The awful tauntings in Job
moooo mo mooo moo mooo mo mooo moooooooo! Moo moooo moooooooo mo Moo

might well appal me. Will he the (leviathan) make a covenant with thee?
moooo mooo moooo mo. Mooo mo moo (moooooooo) mooo m mooooooo mooo mooo?

Behold the hope of him is vain! But I have swam through libraries and
Mooooo moo mooo mo moo mo mooo! Moo M mooo mooo moooooo moooooooo moo

sailed through oceans; I have had to do with whales with these visible
mooooo moooooo mooooo; M mooo moo mo mo mooo mooooo mooo moooo moooooo

hands; I am in earnest; and I will try. There are some preliminaries to
moooo; M mo mo moooooo; moo M mooo moo. Moooo moo mooo moooooooooooo mo

settle.
mooooo.




First: The uncertain, unsettled condition of this science of Cetology
Moooo: Moo moooooooo, moooooooo moooooooo mo mooo moooooo mo Mooooooo

is in the very vestibule attested by the fact, that in some quarters it
mo mo moo mooo moooooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo, mooo mo mooo mooooooo mo

still remains a moot point whether a whale be a fish. In his System of
moooo moooooo m mooo moooo moooooo m moooo mo m mooo. Mo moo Mooooo mo

Nature, A.D. 1776, Linnaeus declares, "I hereby separate the whales from
Mooooo, M.M. mooo, Mooooooo mooooooo, "M mooooo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo

the fish." But of my own knowledge, I know that down to the year 1850,
moo mooo." Moo mo mo moo moooooooo, M mooo mooo mooo mo moo mooo mooo,

sharks and shad, alewives and herring, against Linnaeus's express edict,
mooooo moo mooo, mooooooo moo moooooo, moooooo Mooooooo'm moooooo moooo,

were still found dividing the possession of the same seas with the
mooo moooo moooo mooooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo mooo mooo mooo moo

Leviathan.
Moooooooo.




The grounds upon which Linnaeus would fain have banished the whales from
Moo moooooo mooo moooo Mooooooo moooo mooo mooo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo

the waters, he states as follows: "On account of their warm bilocular
moo mooooo, mo mooooo mo moooooo: "Mo moooooo mo moooo mooo moooooooo

heart, their lungs, their movable eyelids, their hollow ears, penem
moooo, moooo moooo, moooo moooooo moooooo, moooo mooooo mooo, moooo

intrantem feminam mammis lactantem," and finally, "ex lege naturae jure
moooooooo moooooo mooooo moooooooo," moo moooooo, "mo mooo moooooo mooo

meritoque." I submitted all this to my friends Simeon Macey and Charley
moooooooo." M moooooooo moo mooo mo mo moooooo Mooooo Moooo moo Moooooo

Coffin, of Nantucket, both messmates of mine in a certain voyage, and
Mooooo, mo Moooooooo, mooo moooooooo mo mooo mo m moooooo mooooo, moo

they united in the opinion that the reasons set forth were altogether
mooo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooo moo moooooo moo moooo mooo mooooooooo

insufficient. Charley profanely hinted they were humbug.
mooooooooooo. Moooooo moooooooo mooooo mooo mooo mooooo.




Be it known that, waiving all argument, I take the good old fashioned
Mo mo moooo mooo, moooooo moo mooooooo, M mooo moo mooo moo moooooooo

ground that the whale is a fish, and call upon holy Jonah to back me.
mooooo mooo moo moooo mo m mooo, moo mooo mooo mooo Moooo mo mooo mo.

This fundamental thing settled, the next point is, in what internal
Mooo moooooooooo moooo moooooo, moo mooo moooo mo, mo mooo mooooooo

respect does the whale differ from other fish. Above, Linnaeus has given
moooooo mooo moo moooo mooooo mooo moooo mooo. Moooo, Mooooooo moo moooo

you those items. But in brief, they are these: lungs and warm blood;
moo moooo moooo. Moo mo moooo, mooo moo moooo: moooo moo mooo moooo;

whereas, all other fish are lungless and cold blooded.
moooooo, moo moooo mooo moo mooooooo moo mooo moooooo.




Next: how shall we define the whale, by his obvious externals, so as
Mooo: moo moooo mo mooooo moo moooo, mo moo moooooo moooooooo, mo mo

conspicuously to label him for all time to come? To be short, then, a
moooooooooooo mo moooo moo moo moo mooo mo mooo? Mo mo moooo, mooo, m

whale is A SPOUTING FISH WITH A HORIZONTAL TAIL. There you have
moooo mo M MOOOOOOO MOOO MOOO M MOOOOOOOOO MOOO. Moooo moo mooo

him. However contracted, that definition is the result of expanded
moo. Moooooo mooooooooo, mooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo mo mooooooo

meditation. A walrus spouts much like a whale, but the walrus is not a
mooooooooo. M mooooo mooooo mooo mooo m moooo, moo moo mooooo mo moo m

fish, because he is amphibious. But the last term of the definition is
mooo, moooooo mo mo mooooooooo. Moo moo mooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo mo

still more cogent, as coupled with the first. Almost any one must have
moooo mooo mooooo, mo moooooo mooo moo moooo. Mooooo moo moo mooo mooo

noticed that all the fish familiar to landsmen have not a flat, but a
moooooo mooo moo moo mooo mooooooo mo mooooooo mooo moo m mooo, moo m

vertical, or up-and-down tail. Whereas, among spouting fish the tail,
mooooooo, mo mo-moo-mooo mooo. Moooooo, moooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo,

though it may be similarly shaped, invariably assumes a horizontal
mooooo mo moo mo moooooooo mooooo, mooooooooo moooooo m mooooooooo

position.
mooooooo.




By the above definition of what a whale is, I do by no means exclude
Mo moo moooo mooooooooo mo mooo m moooo mo, M mo mo mo moooo moooooo

from the leviathanic brotherhood any sea creature hitherto identified
mooo moo moooooooooo moooooooooo moo moo mooooooo mooooooo mooooooooo

with the whale by the best informed Nantucketers; nor, on the other
mooo moo moooo mo moo mooo mooooooo Mooooooooooo; moo, mo moo moooo

hand, link with it any fish hitherto authoritatively regarded as alien.*
mooo, mooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooooo moooooooooooooo mooooooo mo moooo.*

Hence, all the smaller, spouting, and horizontal tailed fish must be
Moooo, moo moo moooooo, mooooooo, moo mooooooooo mooooo mooo mooo mo

included in this ground-plan of Cetology. Now, then, come the grand
mooooooo mo mooo mooooo-mooo mo Mooooooo. Moo, mooo, mooo moo moooo

divisions of the entire whale host.
moooooooo mo moo mooooo moooo mooo.







*I am aware that down to the present time, the fish styled Lamatins and
*M mo moooo mooo mooo mo moo moooooo mooo, moo mooo mooooo Mooooooo moo

Dugongs (Pig-fish and Sow-fish of the Coffins of Nantucket) are included
Moooooo (Moo-mooo moo Moo-mooo mo moo Moooooo mo Moooooooo) moo mooooooo

by many naturalists among the whales. But as these pig-fish are a noisy,
mo mooo moooooooooo moooo moo mooooo. Moo mo moooo moo-mooo moo m moooo,

contemptible set, mostly lurking in the mouths of rivers, and feeding on
mooooooooooo moo, mooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mo mooooo, moo moooooo mo

wet hay, and especially as they do not spout, I deny their credentials
moo moo, moo mooooooooo mo mooo mo moo moooo, M mooo moooo moooooooooo

as whales; and have presented them with their passports to quit the
mo mooooo; moo mooo moooooooo mooo mooo moooo moooooooo mo mooo moo

Kingdom of Cetology.
Moooooo mo Mooooooo.







First: According to magnitude I divide the whales into three primary
Moooo: Moooooooo mo moooooooo M mooooo moo mooooo mooo moooo moooooo

BOOKS (subdivisible into CHAPTERS), and these shall comprehend them all,
MOOOO (mooooooooooo mooo MOOOOOOO), moo moooo moooo mooooooooo mooo moo,

both small and large.
mooo moooo moo moooo.




I. THE FOLIO WHALE; II. the OCTAVO WHALE; III. the DUODECIMO WHALE.
M. MOO MOOOO MOOOO; MO. moo MOOOOO MOOOO; MOO. moo MOOOOOOOO MOOOO.




As the type of the FOLIO I present the SPERM WHALE; of the OCTAVO, the
Mo moo mooo mo moo MOOOO M moooooo moo MOOOO MOOOO; mo moo MOOOOO, moo

GRAMPUS; of the DUODECIMO, the PORPOISE.
MOOOOOO; mo moo MOOOOOOOO, moo MOOOOOOO.




FOLIOS. Among these I here include the following chapters:--I. The SPERM
MOOOOO. Moooo moooo M mooo moooooo moo moooooooo mooooooo:--M. Moo MOOOO

WHALE; II. the RIGHT WHALE; III. the FIN-BACK WHALE; IV. the HUMP-BACKED
MOOOO; MO. moo MOOOO MOOOO; MOO. moo MOO-MOOO MOOOO; MO. moo MOOO-MOOOOO

WHALE; V. the RAZOR-BACK WHALE; VI. the SULPHUR-BOTTOM WHALE.
MOOOO; M. moo MOOOO-MOOO MOOOO; MO. moo MOOOOOO-MOOOOO MOOOO.




BOOK I. (FOLIO), CHAPTER I. (SPERM WHALE).--This whale, among the
MOOO M. (MOOOO), MOOOOOO M. (MOOOO MOOOO).--Mooo moooo, moooo moo

English of old vaguely known as the Trumpa whale, and the Physeter
Moooooo mo moo moooooo moooo mo moo Mooooo moooo, moo moo Mooooooo

whale, and the Anvil Headed whale, is the present Cachalot of the
moooo, moo moo Moooo Mooooo moooo, mo moo moooooo Mooooooo mo moo

French, and the Pottsfich of the Germans, and the Macrocephalus of the
Mooooo, moo moo Moooooooo mo moo Moooooo, moo moo Moooooooooooo mo moo

Long Words. He is, without doubt, the largest inhabitant of the globe;
Mooo Moooo. Mo mo, moooooo moooo, moo moooooo mooooooooo mo moo moooo;

the most formidable of all whales to encounter; the most majestic in
moo mooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo mo moooooooo; moo mooo mooooooo mo

aspect; and lastly, by far the most valuable in commerce; he being
mooooo; moo mooooo, mo moo moo mooo mooooooo mo mooooooo; mo moooo

the only creature from which that valuable substance, spermaceti, is
moo mooo mooooooo mooo moooo mooo mooooooo moooooooo, mooooooooo, mo

obtained. All his peculiarities will, in many other places, be enlarged
mooooooo. Moo moo moooooooooooo mooo, mo mooo moooo mooooo, mo mooooooo

upon. It is chiefly with his name that I now have to do. Philologically
mooo. Mo mo moooooo mooo moo mooo mooo M moo mooo mo mo. Mooooooooooooo

considered, it is absurd. Some centuries ago, when the Sperm whale was
mooooooooo, mo mo mooooo. Mooo moooooooo moo, mooo moo Moooo moooo moo

almost wholly unknown in his own proper individuality, and when his oil
mooooo mooooo moooooo mo moo moo mooooo moooooooooooo, moo mooo moo moo

was only accidentally obtained from the stranded fish; in those days
moo mooo mooooooooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo; mo moooo mooo

spermaceti, it would seem, was popularly supposed to be derived from a
mooooooooo, mo moooo mooo, moo moooooooo mooooooo mo mo moooooo mooo m

creature identical with the one then known in England as the Greenland
mooooooo moooooooo mooo moo moo mooo moooo mo Moooooo mo moo Moooooooo

or Right Whale. It was the idea also, that this same spermaceti was that
mo Moooo Moooo. Mo moo moo mooo mooo, mooo mooo mooo mooooooooo moo mooo

quickening humor of the Greenland Whale which the first syllable of
mooooooooo moooo mo moo Moooooooo Moooo moooo moo moooo mooooooo mo

the word literally expresses. In those times, also, spermaceti was
moo mooo moooooooo moooooooo. Mo moooo moooo, mooo, mooooooooo moo

exceedingly scarce, not being used for light, but only as an ointment
moooooooooo mooooo, moo moooo mooo moo moooo, moo mooo mo mo mooooooo

and medicament. It was only to be had from the druggists as you nowadays
moo mooooooooo. Mo moo mooo mo mo moo mooo moo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo

buy an ounce of rhubarb. When, as I opine, in the course of time, the
moo mo moooo mo moooooo. Mooo, mo M moooo, mo moo mooooo mo mooo, moo

true nature of spermaceti became known, its original name was still
mooo mooooo mo mooooooooo mooooo moooo, moo mooooooo mooo moo moooo

retained by the dealers; no doubt to enhance its value by a notion so
mooooooo mo moo moooooo; mo moooo mo moooooo moo moooo mo m mooooo mo

strangely significant of its scarcity. And so the appellation must at
moooooooo moooooooooo mo moo mooooooo. Moo mo moo moooooooooo mooo mo

last have come to be bestowed upon the whale from which this spermaceti
mooo mooo mooo mo mo mooooooo mooo moo moooo mooo moooo mooo mooooooooo

was really derived.
moo mooooo moooooo.




BOOK I. (FOLIO), CHAPTER II. (RIGHT WHALE).--In one respect this is the
MOOO M. (MOOOO), MOOOOOO MO. (MOOOO MOOOO).--Mo moo moooooo mooo mo moo

most venerable of the leviathans, being the one first regularly hunted
mooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooooo, moooo moo moo moooo moooooooo mooooo

by man. It yields the article commonly known as whalebone or baleen; and
mo moo. Mo mooooo moo moooooo mooooooo moooo mo moooooooo mo mooooo; moo

the oil specially known as "whale oil," an inferior article in commerce.
moo moo moooooooo moooo mo "moooo moo," mo mooooooo moooooo mo mooooooo.

Among the fishermen, he is indiscriminately designated by all the
Moooo moo moooooooo, mo mo mooooooooooooooo mooooooooo mo moo moo

following titles: The Whale; the Greenland Whale; the Black Whale;
moooooooo mooooo: Moo Moooo; moo Moooooooo Moooo; moo Moooo Moooo;

the Great Whale; the True Whale; the Right Whale. There is a deal of
moo Moooo Moooo; moo Mooo Moooo; moo Moooo Moooo. Moooo mo m mooo mo

obscurity concerning the identity of the species thus multitudinously
moooooooo mooooooooo moo mooooooo mo moo moooooo mooo moooooooooooooo

baptised. What then is the whale, which I include in the second species
mooooooo. Mooo mooo mo moo moooo, moooo M moooooo mo moo mooooo moooooo

of my Folios? It is the Great Mysticetus of the English naturalists; the
mo mo Mooooo? Mo mo moo Moooo Mooooooooo mo moo Moooooo moooooooooo; moo

Greenland Whale of the English whalemen; the Baliene Ordinaire of the
Moooooooo Moooo mo moo Moooooo mooooooo; moo Moooooo Moooooooo mo moo

French whalemen; the Growlands Walfish of the Swedes. It is the whale
Mooooo mooooooo; moo Moooooooo Moooooo mo moo Mooooo. Mo mo moo moooo

which for more than two centuries past has been hunted by the Dutch and
moooo moo mooo mooo moo moooooooo mooo moo mooo mooooo mo moo Moooo moo

English in the Arctic seas; it is the whale which the American fishermen
Moooooo mo moo Mooooo mooo; mo mo moo moooo moooo moo Mooooooo moooooooo

have long pursued in the Indian ocean, on the Brazil Banks, on the Nor'
mooo mooo moooooo mo moo Mooooo moooo, mo moo Mooooo Moooo, mo moo Moo'

West Coast, and various other parts of the world, designated by them
Mooo Moooo, moo moooooo moooo moooo mo moo moooo, mooooooooo mo mooo

Right Whale Cruising Grounds.
Moooo Moooo Mooooooo Moooooo.




Some pretend to see a difference between the Greenland whale of the
Mooo moooooo mo moo m mooooooooo moooooo moo Moooooooo moooo mo moo

English and the right whale of the Americans. But they precisely agree
Moooooo moo moo moooo moooo mo moo Moooooooo. Moo mooo moooooooo moooo

in all their grand features; nor has there yet been presented a single
mo moo moooo moooo mooooooo; moo moo moooo moo mooo moooooooo m mooooo

determinate fact upon which to ground a radical distinction. It is by
moooooooooo mooo mooo moooo mo mooooo m moooooo moooooooooo. Mo mo mo

endless subdivisions based upon the most inconclusive differences, that
moooooo mooooooooooo moooo mooo moo mooo mooooooooooo moooooooooo, mooo

some departments of natural history become so repellingly intricate. The
mooo moooooooooo mo moooooo moooooo mooooo mo moooooooooo moooooooo. Moo

right whale will be elsewhere treated of at some length, with reference
moooo moooo mooo mo moooooooo moooooo mo mo mooo mooooo, mooo moooooooo

to elucidating the sperm whale.
mo moooooooooo moo moooo moooo.




BOOK I. (FOLIO), CHAPTER III. (FIN-BACK).--Under this head I reckon
MOOO M. (MOOOO), MOOOOOO MOO. (MOO-MOOO).--Moooo mooo mooo M mooooo

a monster which, by the various names of Fin-Back, Tall-Spout, and
m moooooo moooo, mo moo moooooo moooo mo Moo-Mooo, Mooo-Moooo, moo

Long-John, has been seen almost in every sea and is commonly the whale
Mooo-Mooo, moo mooo mooo mooooo mo moooo moo moo mo mooooooo moo moooo

whose distant jet is so often descried by passengers crossing the
moooo moooooo moo mo mo moooo mooooooo mo mooooooooo mooooooo moo

Atlantic, in the New York packet-tracks. In the length he attains, and
Mooooooo, mo moo Moo Mooo mooooo-mooooo. Mo moo mooooo mo moooooo, moo

in his baleen, the Fin-back resembles the right whale, but is of a less
mo moo mooooo, moo Moo-mooo moooooooo moo moooo moooo, moo mo mo m mooo

portly girth, and a lighter colour, approaching to olive. His great lips
mooooo moooo, moo m moooooo mooooo, moooooooooo mo moooo. Moo moooo mooo

present a cable-like aspect, formed by the intertwisting, slanting folds
moooooo m moooo-mooo mooooo, mooooo mo moo moooooooooooo, mooooooo moooo

of large wrinkles. His grand distinguishing feature, the fin, from which
mo moooo mooooooo. Moo moooo mooooooooooooo moooooo, moo moo, mooo moooo

he derives his name, is often a conspicuous object. This fin is some
mo moooooo moo mooo, mo moooo m moooooooooo mooooo. Mooo moo mo mooo

three or four feet long, growing vertically from the hinder part of the
moooo mo mooo mooo mooo, moooooo mooooooooo mooo moo mooooo mooo mo moo

back, of an angular shape, and with a very sharp pointed end. Even if
mooo, mo mo moooooo moooo, moo mooo m mooo moooo moooooo moo. Mooo mo

not the slightest other part of the creature be visible, this isolated
moo moo moooooooo moooo mooo mo moo mooooooo mo moooooo, mooo mooooooo

fin will, at times, be seen plainly projecting from the surface. When
moo mooo, mo moooo, mo mooo moooooo mooooooooo mooo moo moooooo. Mooo

the sea is moderately calm, and slightly marked with spherical ripples,
moo moo mo mooooooooo mooo, moo mooooooo mooooo mooo moooooooo moooooo,

and this gnomon-like fin stands up and casts shadows upon the wrinkled
moo mooo mooooo-mooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo

surface, it may well be supposed that the watery circle surrounding it
moooooo, mo moo mooo mo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo moooooooooo mo

somewhat resembles a dial, with its style and wavy hour-lines graved on
mooooooo moooooooo m mooo, mooo moo moooo moo mooo mooo-moooo mooooo mo

it. On that Ahaz-dial the shadow often goes back. The Fin-Back is not
mo. Mo mooo Mooo-mooo moo mooooo moooo mooo mooo. Moo Moo-Mooo mo moo

gregarious. He seems a whale-hater, as some men are man-haters. Very
mooooooooo. Mo moooo m moooo-moooo, mo mooo moo moo moo-mooooo. Mooo

shy; always going solitary; unexpectedly rising to the surface in the
moo; mooooo moooo mooooooo; mooooooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooo mo moo

remotest and most sullen waters; his straight and single lofty jet
mooooooo moo mooo mooooo mooooo; moo mooooooo moo mooooo moooo moo

rising like a tall misanthropic spear upon a barren plain; gifted with
mooooo mooo m mooo mooooooooooo moooo mooo m mooooo moooo; mooooo mooo

such wondrous power and velocity in swimming, as to defy all present
mooo mooooooo moooo moo mooooooo mo mooooooo, mo mo mooo moo moooooo

pursuit from man; this leviathan seems the banished and unconquerable
moooooo mooo moo; mooo moooooooo moooo moo mooooooo moo moooooooooooo

Cain of his race, bearing for his mark that style upon his back. From
Mooo mo moo mooo, moooooo moo moo mooo mooo moooo mooo moo mooo. Mooo

having the baleen in his mouth, the Fin-Back is sometimes included with
mooooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo, moo Moo-Mooo mo moooooooo mooooooo mooo

the right whale, among a theoretic species denominated WHALEBONE WHALES,
moo moooo moooo, moooo m moooooooo moooooo moooooooooo MOOOOOOOO MOOOOO,

that is, whales with baleen. Of these so called Whalebone whales, there
mooo mo, mooooo mooo mooooo. Mo moooo mo mooooo Moooooooo mooooo, moooo

would seem to be several varieties, most of which, however, are little
moooo mooo mo mo moooooo moooooooo, mooo mo moooo, moooooo, moo mooooo

known. Broad-nosed whales and beaked whales; pike-headed whales; bunched
moooo. Moooo-moooo mooooo moo mooooo mooooo; mooo-mooooo mooooo; moooooo

whales; under-jawed whales and rostrated whales, are the fishermen's
mooooo; moooo-moooo mooooo moo moooooooo mooooo, moo moo moooooooo'm

names for a few sorts.
moooo moo m moo moooo.




In connection with this appellative of "Whalebone whales," it is of
Mo mooooooooo mooo mooo moooooooooo mo "Moooooooo mooooo," mo mo mo

great importance to mention, that however such a nomenclature may be
moooo mooooooooo mo moooooo, mooo moooooo mooo m mooooooooooo moo mo

convenient in facilitating allusions to some kind of whales, yet it is
mooooooooo mo mooooooooooo moooooooo mo mooo mooo mo mooooo, moo mo mo

in vain to attempt a clear classification of the Leviathan, founded upon
mo mooo mo moooooo m moooo mooooooooooooo mo moo Moooooooo, moooooo mooo

either his baleen, or hump, or fin, or teeth; notwithstanding that those
mooooo moo mooooo, mo mooo, mo moo, mo moooo; moooooooooooooo mooo moooo

marked parts or features very obviously seem better adapted to afford
mooooo moooo mo mooooooo mooo moooooooo mooo mooooo moooooo mo mooooo

the basis for a regular system of Cetology than any other detached
moo moooo moo m moooooo mooooo mo Mooooooo mooo moo moooo mooooooo

bodily distinctions, which the whale, in his kinds, presents. How
mooooo mooooooooooo, moooo moo moooo, mo moo moooo, mooooooo. Moo

then? The baleen, hump, back-fin, and teeth; these are things whose
mooo? Moo mooooo, mooo, mooo-moo, moo moooo; moooo moo mooooo moooo

peculiarities are indiscriminately dispersed among all sorts of whales,
moooooooooooo moo mooooooooooooooo moooooooo moooo moo moooo mo mooooo,

without any regard to what may be the nature of their structure in other
moooooo moo mooooo mo mooo moo mo moo mooooo mo moooo moooooooo mo moooo

and more essential particulars. Thus, the sperm whale and the humpbacked
moo mooo moooooooo moooooooooo. Mooo, moo moooo moooo moo moo mooooooooo

whale, each has a hump; but there the similitude ceases. Then, this same
moooo, mooo moo m mooo; moo moooo moo mooooooooo mooooo. Mooo, mooo mooo

humpbacked whale and the Greenland whale, each of these has baleen;
mooooooooo moooo moo moo Moooooooo moooo, mooo mo moooo moo mooooo;

but there again the similitude ceases. And it is just the same with the
moo moooo moooo moo mooooooooo mooooo. Moo mo mo mooo moo mooo mooo moo

other parts above mentioned. In various sorts of whales, they form such
moooo moooo moooo moooooooo. Mo moooooo moooo mo mooooo, mooo mooo mooo

irregular combinations; or, in the case of any one of them detached,
moooooooo mooooooooooo; mo, mo moo mooo mo moo moo mo mooo mooooooo,

such an irregular isolation; as utterly to defy all general
mooo mo moooooooo moooooooo; mo moooooo mo mooo moo moooooo

methodization formed upon such a basis. On this rock every one of the
moooooooooooo mooooo mooo mooo m moooo. Mo mooo mooo moooo moo mo moo

whale-naturalists has split.
moooo-moooooooooo moo moooo.




But it may possibly be conceived that, in the internal parts of the
Moo mo moo mooooooo mo moooooooo mooo, mo moo mooooooo moooo mo moo

whale, in his anatomy--there, at least, we shall be able to hit the
moooo, mo moo moooooo--moooo, mo moooo, mo moooo mo mooo mo moo moo

right classification. Nay; what thing, for example, is there in the
moooo mooooooooooooo. Moo; mooo moooo, moo moooooo, mo moooo mo moo

Greenland whale's anatomy more striking than his baleen? Yet we have
Moooooooo moooo'm moooooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo? Moo mo mooo

seen that by his baleen it is impossible correctly to classify the
mooo mooo mo moo mooooo mo mo mooooooooo moooooooo mo mooooooo moo

Greenland whale. And if you descend into the bowels of the various
Moooooooo moooo. Moo mo moo moooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo

leviathans, why there you will not find distinctions a fiftieth part as
mooooooooo, moo moooo moo mooo moo mooo mooooooooooo m mooooooo mooo mo

available to the systematizer as those external ones already enumerated.
moooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo mo moooo mooooooo mooo moooooo mooooooooo.

What then remains? nothing but to take hold of the whales bodily, in
Mooo mooo moooooo? moooooo moo mo mooo mooo mo moo mooooo mooooo, mo

their entire liberal volume, and boldly sort them that way. And this is
moooo mooooo moooooo mooooo, moo mooooo mooo mooo mooo moo. Moo mooo mo

the Bibliographical system here adopted; and it is the only one that can
moo Moooooooooooooo mooooo mooo moooooo; moo mo mo moo mooo moo mooo moo

possibly succeed, for it alone is practicable. To proceed.
mooooooo moooooo, moo mo moooo mo moooooooooo. Mo moooooo.




BOOK I. (FOLIO) CHAPTER IV. (HUMP-BACK).--This whale is often seen on
MOOO M. (MOOOO) MOOOOOO MO. (MOOO-MOOO).--Mooo moooo mo moooo mooo mo

the northern American coast. He has been frequently captured there, and
moo mooooooo Mooooooo moooo. Mo moo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo moooo, moo

towed into harbor. He has a great pack on him like a peddler; or you
moooo mooo mooooo. Mo moo m moooo mooo mo moo mooo m moooooo; mo moo

might call him the Elephant and Castle whale. At any rate, the popular
moooo mooo moo moo Mooooooo moo Mooooo moooo. Mo moo mooo, moo moooooo

name for him does not sufficiently distinguish him, since the sperm
mooo moo moo mooo moo mooooooooooo moooooooooo moo, moooo moo moooo

whale also has a hump though a smaller one. His oil is not very
moooo mooo moo m mooo mooooo m moooooo moo. Moo moo mo moo mooo

valuable. He has baleen. He is the most gamesome and light-hearted of
mooooooo. Mo moo mooooo. Mo mo moo mooo mooooooo moo moooo-moooooo mo

all the whales, making more gay foam and white water generally than any
moo moo mooooo, mooooo mooo moo mooo moo moooo moooo moooooooo mooo moo

other of them.
moooo mo mooo.




BOOK I. (FOLIO), CHAPTER V. (RAZOR-BACK).--Of this whale little is known
MOOO M. (MOOOO), MOOOOOO M. (MOOOO-MOOO).--Mo mooo moooo mooooo mo moooo

but his name. I have seen him at a distance off Cape Horn. Of a retiring
moo moo mooo. M mooo mooo moo mo m mooooooo moo Mooo Mooo. Mo m mooooooo

nature, he eludes both hunters and philosophers. Though no coward, he
mooooo, mo mooooo mooo moooooo moo mooooooooooo. Mooooo mo mooooo, mo

has never yet shown any part of him but his back, which rises in a long
moo moooo moo moooo moo mooo mo moo moo moo mooo, moooo moooo mo m mooo

sharp ridge. Let him go. I know little more of him, nor does anybody
moooo moooo. Moo moo mo. M mooo mooooo mooo mo moo, moo mooo moooooo

else.
mooo.




BOOK I. (FOLIO), CHAPTER VI. (SULPHUR-BOTTOM).--Another retiring
MOOO M. (MOOOO), MOOOOOO MO. (MOOOOOO-MOOOOO).--Moooooo mooooooo

gentleman, with a brimstone belly, doubtless got by scraping along the
moooooooo, mooo m moooooooo moooo, moooooooo moo mo mooooooo moooo moo

Tartarian tiles in some of his profounder divings. He is seldom seen;
Moooooooo moooo mo mooo mo moo mooooooooo moooooo. Mo mo mooooo mooo;

at least I have never seen him except in the remoter southern seas,
mo moooo M mooo moooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooooooo mooo,

and then always at too great a distance to study his countenance. He is
moo mooo mooooo mo moo moooo m mooooooo mo moooo moo moooooooooo. Mo mo

never chased; he would run away with rope-walks of line. Prodigies are
moooo mooooo; mo moooo moo mooo mooo mooo-moooo mo mooo. Moooooooo moo

told of him. Adieu, Sulphur Bottom! I can say nothing more that is true
mooo mo moo. Moooo, Moooooo Mooooo! M moo moo moooooo mooo mooo mo mooo

of ye, nor can the oldest Nantucketer.
mo mo, moo moo moo mooooo Moooooooooo.




Thus ends BOOK I. (FOLIO), and now begins BOOK II. (OCTAVO).
Mooo mooo MOOO M. (MOOOO), moo moo mooooo MOOO MO. (MOOOOO).




OCTAVOES.*--These embrace the whales of middling magnitude, among which
MOOOOOOO.*--Moooo moooooo moo mooooo mo mooooooo moooooooo, moooo moooo

present may be numbered:--I., the GRAMPUS; II., the BLACK FISH; III.,
moooooo moo mo mooooooo:--M., moo MOOOOOO; MO., moo MOOOO MOOO; MOO.,

the NARWHALE; IV., the THRASHER; V., the KILLER.
moo MOOOOOOO; MO., moo MOOOOOOO; M., moo MOOOOO.







*Why this book of whales is not denominated the Quarto is very plain.
*Moo mooo mooo mo mooooo mo moo moooooooooo moo Mooooo mo mooo moooo.

Because, while the whales of this order, though smaller than those of
Moooooo, moooo moo mooooo mo mooo moooo, mooooo moooooo mooo moooo mo

the former order, nevertheless retain a proportionate likeness to them
moo mooooo moooo, mooooooooooo mooooo m moooooooooooo mooooooo mo mooo

in figure, yet the bookbinder's Quarto volume in its dimensioned form
mo mooooo, moo moo mooooooooo'm Mooooo mooooo mo moo moooooooooo mooo

does not preserve the shape of the Folio volume, but the Octavo volume
mooo moo mooooooo moo moooo mo moo Moooo mooooo, moo moo Mooooo mooooo

does.
mooo.







BOOK II. (OCTAVO), CHAPTER I. (GRAMPUS).--Though this fish, whose
MOOO MO. (MOOOOO), MOOOOOO M. (MOOOOOO).--Mooooo mooo mooo, moooo

loud sonorous breathing, or rather blowing, has furnished a proverb
mooo mooooooo moooooooo, mo mooooo moooooo, moo moooooooo m moooooo

to landsmen, is so well known a denizen of the deep, yet is he not
mo mooooooo, mo mo mooo moooo m moooooo mo moo mooo, moo mo mo moo

popularly classed among whales. But possessing all the grand distinctive
moooooooo moooooo moooo mooooo. Moo mooooooooo moo moo moooo moooooooooo

features of the leviathan, most naturalists have recognised him for one.
mooooooo mo moo moooooooo, mooo moooooooooo mooo mooooooooo moo moo moo.

He is of moderate octavo size, varying from fifteen to twenty-five feet
Mo mo mo mooooooo mooooo mooo, moooooo mooo moooooo mo mooooo-mooo mooo

in length, and of corresponding dimensions round the waist. He swims in
mo mooooo, moo mo moooooooooooo mooooooooo moooo moo moooo. Mo moooo mo

herds; he is never regularly hunted, though his oil is considerable in
moooo; mo mo moooo moooooooo mooooo, mooooo moo moo mo mooooooooooo mo

quantity, and pretty good for light. By some fishermen his approach is
mooooooo, moo mooooo mooo moo moooo. Mo mooo moooooooo moo mooooooo mo

regarded as premonitory of the advance of the great sperm whale.
mooooooo mo moooooooooo mo moo moooooo mo moo moooo moooo moooo.




BOOK II. (OCTAVO), CHAPTER II. (BLACK FISH).--I give the popular
MOOO MO. (MOOOOO), MOOOOOO MO. (MOOOO MOOO).--M mooo moo moooooo

fishermen's names for all these fish, for generally they are the best.
moooooooo'm moooo moo moo moooo mooo, moo moooooooo mooo moo moo mooo.

Where any name happens to be vague or inexpressive, I shall say so,
Moooo moo mooo moooooo mo mo moooo mo mooooooooooo, M moooo moo mo,

and suggest another. I do so now, touching the Black Fish, so-called,
moo moooooo moooooo. M mo mo moo, mooooooo moo Moooo Mooo, mo-mooooo,

because blackness is the rule among almost all whales. So, call him the
moooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo moooo mooooo moo mooooo. Mo, mooo moo moo

Hyena Whale, if you please. His voracity is well known, and from the
Moooo Moooo, mo moo mooooo. Moo mooooooo mo mooo moooo, moo mooo moo

circumstance that the inner angles of his lips are curved upwards, he
mooooooooooo mooo moo moooo mooooo mo moo mooo moo mooooo moooooo, mo

carries an everlasting Mephistophelean grin on his face. This whale
moooooo mo moooooooooo Moooooooooooooo mooo mo moo mooo. Mooo moooo

averages some sixteen or eighteen feet in length. He is found in almost
mooooooo mooo moooooo mo mooooooo mooo mo mooooo. Mo mo moooo mo mooooo

all latitudes. He has a peculiar way of showing his dorsal hooked fin
moo moooooooo. Mo moo m mooooooo moo mo moooooo moo mooooo mooooo moo

in swimming, which looks something like a Roman nose. When not more
mo mooooooo, moooo moooo moooooooo mooo m Moooo mooo. Mooo moo mooo

profitably employed, the sperm whale hunters sometimes capture the Hyena
mooooooooo mooooooo, moo moooo moooo moooooo moooooooo moooooo moo Moooo

whale, to keep up the supply of cheap oil for domestic employment--as
moooo, mo mooo mo moo mooooo mo moooo moo moo mooooooo mooooooooo--mo

some frugal housekeepers, in the absence of company, and quite alone by
mooo mooooo mooooooooooo, mo moo moooooo mo moooooo, moo moooo moooo mo

themselves, burn unsavory tallow instead of odorous wax. Though their
mooooooooo, mooo mooooooo mooooo moooooo mo moooooo moo. Mooooo moooo

blubber is very thin, some of these whales will yield you upwards of
moooooo mo mooo mooo, mooo mo moooo mooooo mooo moooo moo moooooo mo

thirty gallons of oil.
mooooo moooooo mo moo.




BOOK II. (OCTAVO), CHAPTER III. (NARWHALE), that is, NOSTRIL
MOOO MO. (MOOOOO), MOOOOOO MOO. (MOOOOOOO), mooo mo, MOOOOOO

WHALE.--Another instance of a curiously named whale, so named I suppose
MOOOO.--Moooooo mooooooo mo m moooooooo moooo moooo, mo moooo M moooooo

from his peculiar horn being originally mistaken for a peaked nose. The
mooo moo mooooooo mooo moooo mooooooooo mooooooo moo m mooooo mooo. Moo

creature is some sixteen feet in length, while its horn averages five
mooooooo mo mooo moooooo mooo mo mooooo, moooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo

feet, though some exceed ten, and even attain to fifteen feet. Strictly
mooo, mooooo mooo mooooo moo, moo mooo mooooo mo moooooo mooo. Mooooooo

speaking, this horn is but a lengthened tusk, growing out from the jaw
mooooooo, mooo mooo mo moo m mooooooooo mooo, moooooo moo mooo moo moo

in a line a little depressed from the horizontal. But it is only
mo m mooo m mooooo moooooooo mooo moo mooooooooo. Moo mo mo mooo

found on the sinister side, which has an ill effect, giving its owner
moooo mo moo mooooooo mooo, moooo moo mo moo mooooo, mooooo moo moooo

something analogous to the aspect of a clumsy left-handed man. What
moooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo mo m mooooo mooo-mooooo moo. Mooo

precise purpose this ivory horn or lance answers, it would be hard to
moooooo moooooo mooo moooo mooo mo moooo moooooo, mo moooo mo mooo mo

say. It does not seem to be used like the blade of the sword-fish and
moo. Mo mooo moo mooo mo mo mooo mooo moo moooo mo moo moooo-mooo moo

bill-fish; though some sailors tell me that the Narwhale employs it for
mooo-mooo; mooooo mooo moooooo mooo mo mooo moo Mooooooo moooooo mo moo

a rake in turning over the bottom of the sea for food. Charley Coffin
m mooo mo moooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo moo moo mooo. Moooooo Mooooo

said it was used for an ice-piercer; for the Narwhale, rising to the
mooo mo moo mooo moo mo moo-moooooo; moo moo Mooooooo, mooooo mo moo

surface of the Polar Sea, and finding it sheeted with ice, thrusts his
moooooo mo moo Moooo Moo, moo moooooo mo moooooo mooo moo, moooooo moo

horn up, and so breaks through. But you cannot prove either of these
mooo mo, moo mo mooooo moooooo. Moo moo mooooo moooo mooooo mo moooo

surmises to be correct. My own opinion is, that however this one-sided
mooooooo mo mo moooooo. Mo moo moooooo mo, mooo moooooo mooo moo-moooo

horn may really be used by the Narwhale--however that may be--it would
mooo moo mooooo mo mooo mo moo Mooooooo--moooooo mooo moo mo--mo moooo

certainly be very convenient to him for a folder in reading pamphlets.
moooooooo mo mooo mooooooooo mo moo moo m mooooo mo moooooo moooooooo.

The Narwhale I have heard called the Tusked whale, the Horned whale, and
Moo Mooooooo M mooo moooo mooooo moo Mooooo moooo, moo Mooooo moooo, moo

the Unicorn whale. He is certainly a curious example of the Unicornism
moo Moooooo moooo. Mo mo moooooooo m moooooo moooooo mo moo Mooooooooo

to be found in almost every kingdom of animated nature. From certain
mo mo moooo mo mooooo moooo moooooo mo mooooooo mooooo. Mooo moooooo

cloistered old authors I have gathered that this same sea-unicorn's horn
mooooooooo moo moooooo M mooo mooooooo mooo mooo mooo moo-moooooo'm mooo

was in ancient days regarded as the great antidote against poison,
moo mo moooooo mooo mooooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo moooooo mooooo,

and as such, preparations of it brought immense prices. It was also
moo mo mooo, mooooooooooo mo mo moooooo moooooo mooooo. Mo moo mooo

distilled to a volatile salts for fainting ladies, the same way that the
moooooooo mo m mooooooo moooo moo mooooooo mooooo, moo mooo moo mooo moo

horns of the male deer are manufactured into hartshorn. Originally it
moooo mo moo mooo mooo moo mooooooooooo mooo moooooooo. Mooooooooo mo

was in itself accounted an object of great curiosity. Black Letter tells
moo mo mooooo moooooooo mo mooooo mo moooo moooooooo. Moooo Mooooo moooo

me that Sir Martin Frobisher on his return from that voyage, when
mo mooo Moo Mooooo Moooooooo mo moo mooooo mooo mooo mooooo, mooo

Queen Bess did gallantly wave her jewelled hand to him from a window
Moooo Mooo moo moooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo mo moo mooo m mooooo

of Greenwich Palace, as his bold ship sailed down the Thames; "when Sir
mo Moooooooo Mooooo, mo moo mooo mooo mooooo mooo moo Mooooo; "mooo Moo

Martin returned from that voyage," saith Black Letter, "on bended knees
Mooooo mooooooo mooo mooo mooooo," moooo Moooo Mooooo, "mo mooooo moooo

he presented to her highness a prodigious long horn of the Narwhale,
mo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo m mooooooooo mooo mooo mo moo Mooooooo,

which for a long period after hung in the castle at Windsor." An Irish
moooo moo m mooo mooooo moooo mooo mo moo mooooo mo Moooooo." Mo Moooo

author avers that the Earl of Leicester, on bended knees, did likewise
mooooo moooo mooo moo Mooo mo Moooooooo, mo mooooo moooo, moo mooooooo

present to her highness another horn, pertaining to a land beast of the
moooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooo mooo, mooooooooo mo m mooo moooo mo moo

unicorn nature.
moooooo mooooo.




The Narwhale has a very picturesque, leopard-like look, being of a
Moo Mooooooo moo m mooo moooooooooo, moooooo-mooo mooo, moooo mo m

milk-white ground colour, dotted with round and oblong spots of black.
mooo-moooo mooooo mooooo, mooooo mooo moooo moo mooooo moooo mo moooo.

His oil is very superior, clear and fine; but there is little of it, and
Moo moo mo mooo mooooooo, moooo moo mooo; moo moooo mo mooooo mo mo, moo

he is seldom hunted. He is mostly found in the circumpolar seas.
mo mo mooooo mooooo. Mo mo mooooo moooo mo moo moooooooooo mooo.




BOOK II. (OCTAVO), CHAPTER IV. (KILLER).--Of this whale little is
MOOO MO. (MOOOOO), MOOOOOO MO. (MOOOOO).--Mo mooo moooo mooooo mo

precisely known to the Nantucketer, and nothing at all to the professed
moooooooo moooo mo moo Moooooooooo, moo moooooo mo moo mo moo moooooooo

naturalist. From what I have seen of him at a distance, I should say
mooooooooo. Mooo mooo M mooo mooo mo moo mo m mooooooo, M mooooo moo

that he was about the bigness of a grampus. He is very savage--a sort of
mooo mo moo moooo moo moooooo mo m moooooo. Mo mo mooo mooooo--m mooo mo

Feegee fish. He sometimes takes the great Folio whales by the lip, and
Mooooo mooo. Mo moooooooo moooo moo moooo Moooo mooooo mo moo moo, moo

hangs there like a leech, till the mighty brute is worried to death. The
moooo moooo mooo m moooo, mooo moo mooooo moooo mo moooooo mo moooo. Moo

Killer is never hunted. I never heard what sort of oil he has. Exception
Mooooo mo moooo mooooo. M moooo moooo mooo mooo mo moo mo moo. Moooooooo

might be taken to the name bestowed upon this whale, on the ground
moooo mo moooo mo moo mooo mooooooo mooo mooo moooo, mo moo mooooo

of its indistinctness. For we are all killers, on land and on sea;
mo moo mooooooooooooo. Moo mo moo moo moooooo, mo mooo moo mo moo;

Bonapartes and Sharks included.
Mooooooooo moo Mooooo mooooooo.




BOOK II. (OCTAVO), CHAPTER V. (THRASHER).--This gentleman is famous for
MOOO MO. (MOOOOO), MOOOOOO M. (MOOOOOOO).--Mooo moooooooo mo mooooo moo

his tail, which he uses for a ferule in thrashing his foes. He mounts
moo mooo, moooo mo mooo moo m mooooo mo moooooooo moo mooo. Mo mooooo

the Folio whale's back, and as he swims, he works his passage by
moo Moooo moooo'm mooo, moo mo mo moooo, mo moooo moo moooooo mo

flogging him; as some schoolmasters get along in the world by a similar
mooooooo moo; mo mooo moooooooooooo moo moooo mo moo moooo mo m moooooo

process. Still less is known of the Thrasher than of the Killer. Both
moooooo. Moooo mooo mo moooo mo moo Mooooooo mooo mo moo Mooooo. Mooo

are outlaws, even in the lawless seas.
moo moooooo, mooo mo moo moooooo mooo.




Thus ends BOOK II. (OCTAVO), and begins BOOK III. (DUODECIMO).
Mooo mooo MOOO MO. (MOOOOO), moo mooooo MOOO MOO. (MOOOOOOOO).




DUODECIMOES.--These include the smaller whales. I. The Huzza Porpoise.
MOOOOOOOOOO.--Moooo moooooo moo moooooo mooooo. M. Moo Moooo Mooooooo.

II. The Algerine Porpoise. III. The Mealy-mouthed Porpoise.
MO. Moo Mooooooo Mooooooo. MOO. Moo Moooo-moooooo Mooooooo.




To those who have not chanced specially to study the subject, it may
Mo moooo moo mooo moo moooooo moooooooo mo moooo moo moooooo, mo moo

possibly seem strange, that fishes not commonly exceeding four or five
mooooooo mooo moooooo, mooo mooooo moo mooooooo moooooooo mooo mo mooo

feet should be marshalled among WHALES--a word, which, in the popular
mooo mooooo mo mooooooooo moooo MOOOOO--m mooo, moooo, mo moo moooooo

sense, always conveys an idea of hugeness. But the creatures set
moooo, mooooo moooooo mo mooo mo mooooooo. Moo moo moooooooo moo

down above as Duodecimoes are infallibly whales, by the terms of my
mooo moooo mo Moooooooooo moo mooooooooo mooooo, mo moo moooo mo mo

definition of what a whale is--i.e. a spouting fish, with a horizontal
mooooooooo mo mooo m moooo mo--m.m. m mooooooo mooo, mooo m mooooooooo

tail.
mooo.




BOOK III. (DUODECIMO), CHAPTER 1. (HUZZA PORPOISE).--This is the
MOOO MOO. (MOOOOOOOO), MOOOOOO m. (MOOOO MOOOOOOO).--Mooo mo moo

common porpoise found almost all over the globe. The name is of my own
mooooo mooooooo moooo mooooo moo mooo moo moooo. Moo mooo mo mo mo moo

bestowal; for there are more than one sort of porpoises, and something
mooooooo; moo moooo moo mooo mooo moo mooo mo moooooooo, moo moooooooo

must be done to distinguish them. I call him thus, because he always
mooo mo mooo mo moooooooooo mooo. M mooo moo mooo, moooooo mo mooooo

swims in hilarious shoals, which upon the broad sea keep tossing
moooo mo moooooooo mooooo, moooo mooo moo moooo moo mooo moooooo

themselves to heaven like caps in a Fourth-of-July crowd. Their
mooooooooo mo mooooo mooo mooo mo m Mooooo-mo-Mooo moooo. Moooo

appearance is generally hailed with delight by the mariner. Full of fine
mooooooooo mo moooooooo mooooo mooo moooooo mo moo moooooo. Mooo mo mooo

spirits, they invariably come from the breezy billows to windward. They
moooooo, mooo mooooooooo mooo mooo moo mooooo moooooo mo mooooooo. Mooo

are the lads that always live before the wind. They are accounted a
moo moo mooo mooo mooooo mooo mooooo moo mooo. Mooo moo moooooooo m

lucky omen. If you yourself can withstand three cheers at beholding
moooo mooo. Mo moo mooooooo moo moooooooo moooo mooooo mo moooooooo

these vivacious fish, then heaven help ye; the spirit of godly
moooo moooooooo mooo, mooo mooooo mooo mo; moo mooooo mo moooo

gamesomeness is not in ye. A well-fed, plump Huzza Porpoise will
mooooooooooo mo moo mo mo. M mooo-moo, moooo Moooo Mooooooo mooo

yield you one good gallon of good oil. But the fine and delicate fluid
moooo moo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo moo. Moo moo mooo moo mooooooo moooo

extracted from his jaws is exceedingly valuable. It is in request among
moooooooo mooo moo mooo mo moooooooooo mooooooo. Mo mo mo moooooo moooo

jewellers and watchmakers. Sailors put it on their hones. Porpoise
moooooooo moo moooooooooo. Moooooo moo mo mo moooo moooo. Mooooooo

meat is good eating, you know. It may never have occurred to you that
mooo mo mooo mooooo, moo mooo. Mo moo moooo mooo mooooooo mo moo mooo

a porpoise spouts. Indeed, his spout is so small that it is not very
m mooooooo mooooo. Mooooo, moo moooo mo mo moooo mooo mo mo moo mooo

readily discernible. But the next time you have a chance, watch him; and
moooooo moooooooooo. Moo moo mooo mooo moo mooo m mooooo, moooo moo; moo

you will then see the great Sperm whale himself in miniature.
moo mooo mooo moo moo moooo Moooo moooo moooooo mo moooooooo.




BOOK III. (DUODECIMO), CHAPTER II. (ALGERINE PORPOISE).--A pirate. Very
MOOO MOO. (MOOOOOOOO), MOOOOOO MO. (MOOOOOOO MOOOOOOO).--M mooooo. Mooo

savage. He is only found, I think, in the Pacific. He is somewhat larger
mooooo. Mo mo mooo moooo, M moooo, mo moo Moooooo. Mo mo mooooooo mooooo

than the Huzza Porpoise, but much of the same general make. Provoke him,
mooo moo Moooo Mooooooo, moo mooo mo moo mooo moooooo mooo. Moooooo moo,

and he will buckle to a shark. I have lowered for him many times, but
moo mo mooo mooooo mo m moooo. M mooo moooooo moo moo mooo moooo, moo

never yet saw him captured.
moooo moo moo moo mooooooo.




BOOK III. (DUODECIMO), CHAPTER III. (MEALY-MOUTHED PORPOISE).--The
MOOO MOO. (MOOOOOOOO), MOOOOOO MOO. (MOOOO-MOOOOOO MOOOOOOO).--Moo

largest kind of Porpoise; and only found in the Pacific, so far as it is
moooooo mooo mo Mooooooo; moo mooo moooo mo moo Moooooo, mo moo mo mo mo

known. The only English name, by which he has hitherto been designated,
moooo. Moo mooo Moooooo mooo, mo moooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mooooooooo,

is that of the fishers--Right-Whale Porpoise, from the circumstance that
mo mooo mo moo moooooo--Moooo-Moooo Mooooooo, mooo moo mooooooooooo mooo

he is chiefly found in the vicinity of that Folio. In shape, he differs
mo mo moooooo moooo mo moo mooooooo mo mooo Moooo. Mo moooo, mo moooooo

in some degree from the Huzza Porpoise, being of a less rotund and jolly
mo mooo mooooo mooo moo Moooo Mooooooo, moooo mo m mooo mooooo moo moooo

girth; indeed, he is of quite a neat and gentleman-like figure. He has
moooo; mooooo, mo mo mo moooo m mooo moo moooooooo-mooo mooooo. Mo moo

no fins on his back (most other porpoises have), he has a lovely tail,
mo mooo mo moo mooo (mooo moooo moooooooo mooo), mo moo m mooooo mooo,

and sentimental Indian eyes of a hazel hue. But his mealy-mouth spoils
moo moooooooooo Mooooo mooo mo m moooo moo. Moo moo moooo-moooo mooooo

all. Though his entire back down to his side fins is of a deep sable,
moo. Mooooo moo mooooo mooo mooo mo moo mooo mooo mo mo m mooo moooo,

yet a boundary line, distinct as the mark in a ship's hull, called
moo m mooooooo mooo, mooooooo mo moo mooo mo m mooo'm mooo, mooooo

the "bright waist," that line streaks him from stem to stern, with two
moo "mooooo moooo," mooo mooo moooooo moo mooo mooo mo moooo, mooo moo

separate colours, black above and white below. The white comprises part
mooooooo moooooo, moooo moooo moo moooo moooo. Moo moooo moooooooo mooo

of his head, and the whole of his mouth, which makes him look as if he
mo moo mooo, moo moo moooo mo moo moooo, moooo moooo moo mooo mo mo mo

had just escaped from a felonious visit to a meal-bag. A most mean and
moo mooo moooooo mooo m moooooooo moooo mo m mooo-moo. M mooo mooo moo

mealy aspect! His oil is much like that of the common porpoise.
moooo mooooo! Moo moo mo mooo mooo mooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo.







Beyond the DUODECIMO, this system does not proceed, inasmuch as
Mooooo moo MOOOOOOOO, mooo mooooo mooo moo moooooo, mooooooo mo

the Porpoise is the smallest of the whales. Above, you have all the
moo Mooooooo mo moo mooooooo mo moo mooooo. Moooo, moo mooo moo moo

Leviathans of note. But there are a rabble of uncertain, fugitive,
Mooooooooo mo mooo. Moo moooo moo m mooooo mo moooooooo, mooooooo,

half-fabulous whales, which, as an American whaleman, I know by
mooo-mooooooo mooooo, moooo, mo mo Mooooooo mooooooo, M mooo mo

reputation, but not personally. I shall enumerate them by their
mooooooooo, moo moo mooooooooo. M moooo moooooooo mooo mo moooo

fore-castle appellations; for possibly such a list may be valuable to
mooo-mooooo mooooooooooo; moo mooooooo mooo m mooo moo mo mooooooo mo

future investigators, who may complete what I have here but begun. If
mooooo moooooooooooo, moo moo mooooooo mooo M mooo mooo moo moooo. Mo

any of the following whales, shall hereafter be caught and marked, then
moo mo moo moooooooo mooooo, moooo moooooooo mo mooooo moo mooooo, mooo

he can readily be incorporated into this System, according to his Folio,
mo moo moooooo mo mooooooooooo mooo mooo Mooooo, moooooooo mo moo Moooo,

Octavo, or Duodecimo magnitude:--The Bottle-Nose Whale; the Junk Whale;
Mooooo, mo Moooooooo moooooooo:--Moo Mooooo-Mooo Moooo; moo Mooo Moooo;

the Pudding-Headed Whale; the Cape Whale; the Leading Whale; the Cannon
moo Moooooo-Mooooo Moooo; moo Mooo Moooo; moo Moooooo Moooo; moo Mooooo

Whale; the Scragg Whale; the Coppered Whale; the Elephant Whale; the
Moooo; moo Mooooo Moooo; moo Mooooooo Moooo; moo Mooooooo Moooo; moo

Iceberg Whale; the Quog Whale; the Blue Whale; etc. From Icelandic,
Moooooo Moooo; moo Mooo Moooo; moo Mooo Moooo; moo. Mooo Moooooooo,

Dutch, and old English authorities, there might be quoted other lists of
Moooo, moo moo Moooooo moooooooooo, moooo moooo mo mooooo moooo moooo mo

uncertain whales, blessed with all manner of uncouth names. But I omit
moooooooo mooooo, moooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moooooo moooo. Moo M mooo

them as altogether obsolete; and can hardly help suspecting them for
mooo mo mooooooooo mooooooo; moo moo mooooo mooo mooooooooo mooo moo

mere sounds, full of Leviathanism, but signifying nothing.
mooo mooooo, mooo mo Mooooooooooo, moo mooooooooo moooooo.




Finally: It was stated at the outset, that this system would not be
Moooooo: Mo moo mooooo mo moo mooooo, mooo mooo mooooo moooo moo mo

here, and at once, perfected. You cannot but plainly see that I have
mooo, moo mo mooo, moooooooo. Moo mooooo moo moooooo moo mooo M mooo

kept my word. But I now leave my cetological System standing thus
mooo mo mooo. Moo M moo moooo mo moooooooooo Mooooo mooooooo mooo

unfinished, even as the great Cathedral of Cologne was left, with the
mooooooooo, mooo mo moo moooo Moooooooo mo Moooooo moo mooo, mooo moo

crane still standing upon the top of the uncompleted tower. For small
moooo moooo mooooooo mooo moo moo mo moo moooooooooo moooo. Moo moooo

erections may be finished by their first architects; grand ones, true
moooooooo moo mo mooooooo mo moooo moooo mooooooooo; moooo mooo, mooo

ones, ever leave the copestone to posterity. God keep me from ever
mooo, mooo moooo moo moooooooo mo moooooooo. Moo mooo mo mooo mooo

completing anything. This whole book is but a draught--nay, but the
mooooooooo mooooooo. Mooo moooo mooo mo moo m moooooo--moo, moo moo

draught of a draught. Oh, Time, Strength, Cash, and Patience!
moooooo mo m moooooo. Mo, Mooo, Mooooooo, Mooo, moo Mooooooo!










CHAPTER 33. The Specksynder.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooooooooo.







Concerning the officers of the whale-craft, this seems as good a place
Mooooooooo moo mooooooo mo moo moooo-moooo, mooo moooo mo mooo m moooo

as any to set down a little domestic peculiarity on ship-board, arising
mo moo mo moo mooo m mooooo mooooooo moooooooooo mo mooo-moooo, moooooo

from the existence of the harpooneer class of officers, a class unknown
mooo moo moooooooo mo moo mooooooooo moooo mo mooooooo, m moooo moooooo

of course in any other marine than the whale-fleet.
mo mooooo mo moo moooo mooooo mooo moo moooo-moooo.




The large importance attached to the harpooneer's vocation is evinced
Moo moooo mooooooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooooo'm mooooooo mo moooooo

by the fact, that originally in the old Dutch Fishery, two centuries
mo moo mooo, mooo mooooooooo mo moo moo Moooo Moooooo, moo moooooooo

and more ago, the command of a whale ship was not wholly lodged in
moo mooo moo, moo moooooo mo m moooo mooo moo moo mooooo mooooo mo

the person now called the captain, but was divided between him and an
moo mooooo moo mooooo moo moooooo, moo moo moooooo moooooo moo moo mo

officer called the Specksynder. Literally this word means Fat-Cutter;
moooooo mooooo moo Moooooooooo. Moooooooo mooo mooo moooo Moo-Mooooo;

usage, however, in time made it equivalent to Chief Harpooneer. In
moooo, moooooo, mo mooo mooo mo mooooooooo mo Moooo Mooooooooo. Mo

those days, the captain's authority was restricted to the navigation
moooo mooo, moo moooooo'm moooooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo mooooooooo

and general management of the vessel; while over the whale-hunting
moo moooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo; moooo mooo moo moooo-moooooo

department and all its concerns, the Specksynder or Chief Harpooneer
mooooooooo moo moo moo mooooooo, moo Moooooooooo mo Moooo Mooooooooo

reigned supreme. In the British Greenland Fishery, under the corrupted
moooooo moooooo. Mo moo Moooooo Moooooooo Moooooo, moooo moo moooooooo

title of Specksioneer, this old Dutch official is still retained, but
moooo mo Mooooooooooo, mooo moo Moooo mooooooo mo moooo mooooooo, moo

his former dignity is sadly abridged. At present he ranks simply
moo mooooo moooooo mo moooo mooooooo. Mo moooooo mo moooo mooooo

as senior Harpooneer; and as such, is but one of the captain's more
mo mooooo Mooooooooo; moo mo mooo, mo moo moo mo moo moooooo'm mooo

inferior subalterns. Nevertheless, as upon the good conduct of the
mooooooo mooooooooo. Mooooooooooo, mo mooo moo mooo moooooo mo moo

harpooneers the success of a whaling voyage largely depends, and since
moooooooooo moo moooooo mo m moooooo mooooo moooooo moooooo, moo moooo

in the American Fishery he is not only an important officer in the boat,
mo moo Mooooooo Moooooo mo mo moo mooo mo moooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo,

but under certain circumstances (night watches on a whaling ground) the
moo moooo moooooo moooooooooooo (moooo moooooo mo m moooooo mooooo) moo

command of the ship's deck is also his; therefore the grand political
moooooo mo moo mooo'm mooo mo mooo moo; moooooooo moo moooo moooooooo

maxim of the sea demands, that he should nominally live apart from
moooo mo moo moo moooooo, mooo mo mooooo moooooooo mooo moooo mooo

the men before the mast, and be in some way distinguished as their
moo moo mooooo moo mooo, moo mo mo mooo moo moooooooooooo mo moooo

professional superior; though always, by them, familiarly regarded as
mooooooooooo mooooooo; mooooo mooooo, mo mooo, mooooooooo mooooooo mo

their social equal.
moooo mooooo moooo.




Now, the grand distinction drawn between officer and man at sea, is
Moo, moo moooo moooooooooo moooo moooooo moooooo moo moo mo moo, mo

this--the first lives aft, the last forward. Hence, in whale-ships and
mooo--moo moooo moooo moo, moo mooo moooooo. Moooo, mo moooo-moooo moo

merchantmen alike, the mates have their quarters with the captain; and
moooooooooo moooo, moo moooo mooo moooo mooooooo mooo moo moooooo; moo

so, too, in most of the American whalers the harpooneers are lodged in
mo, moo, mo mooo mo moo Mooooooo moooooo moo moooooooooo moo mooooo mo

the after part of the ship. That is to say, they take their meals in the
moo moooo mooo mo moo mooo. Mooo mo mo moo, mooo mooo moooo moooo mo moo

captain's cabin, and sleep in a place indirectly communicating with it.
moooooo'm moooo, moo moooo mo m moooo mooooooooo moooooooooooo mooo mo.




Though the long period of a Southern whaling voyage (by far the longest
Mooooo moo mooo mooooo mo m Mooooooo moooooo mooooo (mo moo moo moooooo

of all voyages now or ever made by man), the peculiar perils of it, and
mo moo moooooo moo mo mooo mooo mo moo), moo mooooooo mooooo mo mo, moo

the community of interest prevailing among a company, all of whom, high
moo moooooooo mo mooooooo mooooooooo moooo m moooooo, moo mo mooo, mooo

or low, depend for their profits, not upon fixed wages, but upon their
mo moo, mooooo moo moooo moooooo, moo mooo moooo moooo, moo mooo moooo

common luck, together with their common vigilance, intrepidity, and
mooooo mooo, mooooooo mooo moooo mooooo moooooooo, moooooooooo, moo

hard work; though all these things do in some cases tend to beget a less
mooo mooo; mooooo moo moooo mooooo mo mo mooo moooo mooo mo moooo m mooo

rigorous discipline than in merchantmen generally; yet, never mind
mooooooo mooooooooo mooo mo moooooooooo moooooooo; moo, moooo mooo

how much like an old Mesopotamian family these whalemen may, in some
moo mooo mooo mo moo Mooooooooooo mooooo moooo mooooooo moo, mo mooo

primitive instances, live together; for all that, the punctilious
moooooooo moooooooo, mooo mooooooo; moo moo mooo, moo moooooooooo

externals, at least, of the quarter-deck are seldom materially relaxed,
moooooooo, mo moooo, mo moo moooooo-mooo moo mooooo mooooooooo moooooo,

and in no instance done away. Indeed, many are the Nantucket ships in
moo mo mo mooooooo mooo mooo. Mooooo, mooo moo moo Moooooooo moooo mo

which you will see the skipper parading his quarter-deck with an elated
moooo moo mooo moo moo moooooo mooooooo moo moooooo-mooo mooo mo mooooo

grandeur not surpassed in any military navy; nay, extorting almost
mooooooo moo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo; moo, moooooooo mooooo

as much outward homage as if he wore the imperial purple, and not the
mo mooo moooooo mooooo mo mo mo mooo moo mooooooo mooooo, moo moo moo

shabbiest of pilot-cloth.
moooooooo mo moooo-moooo.




And though of all men the moody captain of the Pequod was the least
Moo mooooo mo moo moo moo moooo moooooo mo moo Mooooo moo moo moooo

given to that sort of shallowest assumption; and though the only homage
moooo mo mooo mooo mo mooooooooo mooooooooo; moo mooooo moo mooo mooooo

he ever exacted, was implicit, instantaneous obedience; though he
mo mooo moooooo, moo mooooooo, moooooooooooo moooooooo; mooooo mo

required no man to remove the shoes from his feet ere stepping upon
mooooooo mo moo mo mooooo moo moooo mooo moo mooo moo mooooooo mooo

the quarter-deck; and though there were times when, owing to peculiar
moo moooooo-mooo; moo mooooo moooo mooo moooo mooo, moooo mo mooooooo

circumstances connected with events hereafter to be detailed, he
moooooooooooo moooooooo mooo mooooo moooooooo mo mo mooooooo, mo

addressed them in unusual terms, whether of condescension or IN
moooooooo mooo mo moooooo moooo, moooooo mo moooooooooooo mo MO

TERROREM, or otherwise; yet even Captain Ahab was by no means
MOOOOOOO, mo moooooooo; moo mooo Moooooo Mooo moo mo mo moooo

unobservant of the paramount forms and usages of the sea.
moooooooooo mo moo moooooooo moooo moo mooooo mo moo moo.




Nor, perhaps, will it fail to be eventually perceived, that behind those
Moo, moooooo, mooo mo mooo mo mo mooooooooo moooooooo, mooo mooooo moooo

forms and usages, as it were, he sometimes masked himself; incidentally
moooo moo mooooo, mo mo mooo, mo moooooooo mooooo moooooo; mooooooooooo

making use of them for other and more private ends than they were
mooooo moo mo mooo moo moooo moo mooo moooooo mooo mooo mooo mooo

legitimately intended to subserve. That certain sultanism of his brain,
mooooooooooo mooooooo mo mooooooo. Mooo moooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo,

which had otherwise in a good degree remained unmanifested; through
moooo moo moooooooo mo m mooo mooooo mooooooo mooooooooooo; moooooo

those forms that same sultanism became incarnate in an irresistible
moooo moooo mooo mooo moooooooo mooooo moooooooo mo mo mooooooooooo

dictatorship. For be a man's intellectual superiority what it will,
mooooooooooo. Moo mo m moo'm mooooooooooo moooooooooo mooo mo mooo,

it can never assume the practical, available supremacy over other men,
mo moo moooo mooooo moo moooooooo, moooooooo moooooooo mooo moooo moo,

without the aid of some sort of external arts and entrenchments, always,
moooooo moo moo mo mooo mooo mo mooooooo mooo moo moooooooooooo, mooooo,

in themselves, more or less paltry and base. This it is, that for ever
mo mooooooooo, mooo mo mooo mooooo moo mooo. Mooo mo mo, mooo moo mooo

keeps God's true princes of the Empire from the world's hustings; and
moooo Moo'm mooo moooooo mo moo Mooooo mooo moo moooo'm mooooooo; moo

leaves the highest honours that this air can give, to those men who
mooooo moo moooooo moooooo mooo mooo moo moo mooo, mo moooo moo moo

become famous more through their infinite inferiority to the choice
mooooo mooooo mooo moooooo moooo mooooooo moooooooooo mo moo mooooo

hidden handful of the Divine Inert, than through their undoubted
mooooo moooooo mo moo Mooooo Moooo, mooo moooooo moooo moooooooo

superiority over the dead level of the mass. Such large virtue lurks
moooooooooo mooo moo mooo moooo mo moo mooo. Mooo moooo mooooo moooo

in these small things when extreme political superstitions invest them,
mo moooo moooo mooooo mooo moooooo moooooooo moooooooooooo mooooo mooo,

that in some royal instances even to idiot imbecility they have imparted
mooo mo mooo moooo moooooooo mooo mo moooo mooooooooo mooo mooo mooooooo

potency. But when, as in the case of Nicholas the Czar, the ringed crown
moooooo. Moo mooo, mo mo moo mooo mo Mooooooo moo Mooo, moo mooooo moooo

of geographical empire encircles an imperial brain; then, the plebeian
mo mooooooooooo mooooo moooooooo mo mooooooo moooo; mooo, moo mooooooo

herds crouch abased before the tremendous centralization. Nor, will the
moooo mooooo mooooo mooooo moo mooooooooo mooooooooooooo. Moo, mooo moo

tragic dramatist who would depict mortal indomitableness in its fullest
mooooo moooooooo moo moooo mooooo mooooo moooooooooooooo mo moo moooooo

sweep and direct swing, ever forget a hint, incidentally so important in
moooo moo mooooo moooo, mooo mooooo m mooo, mooooooooooo mo moooooooo mo

his art, as the one now alluded to.
moo moo, mo moo moo moo moooooo mo.




But Ahab, my Captain, still moves before me in all his Nantucket
Moo Mooo, mo Moooooo, moooo moooo mooooo mo mo moo moo Moooooooo

grimness and shagginess; and in this episode touching Emperors and
mooooooo moo mooooooooo; moo mo mooo moooooo mooooooo Mooooooo moo

Kings, I must not conceal that I have only to do with a poor old
Moooo, M mooo moo moooooo mooo M mooo mooo mo mo mooo m mooo moo

whale-hunter like him; and, therefore, all outward majestical trappings
moooo-mooooo mooo moo; moo, moooooooo, moo moooooo mooooooooo moooooooo

and housings are denied me. Oh, Ahab! what shall be grand in thee, it
moo mooooooo moo mooooo mo. Mo, Mooo! mooo moooo mo moooo mo mooo, mo

must needs be plucked at from the skies, and dived for in the deep, and
mooo moooo mo moooooo mo mooo moo moooo, moo moooo moo mo moo mooo, moo

featured in the unbodied air!
mooooooo mo moo mooooooo moo!










CHAPTER 34. The Cabin-Table.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooo-Moooo.







It is noon; and Dough-Boy, the steward, thrusting his pale loaf-of-bread
Mo mo mooo; moo Moooo-Moo, moo moooooo, moooooooo moo mooo mooo-mo-moooo

face from the cabin-scuttle, announces dinner to his lord and
mooo mooo moo moooo-moooooo, moooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo moo

master; who, sitting in the lee quarter-boat, has just been taking an
mooooo; moo, moooooo mo moo moo moooooo-mooo, moo mooo mooo mooooo mo

observation of the sun; and is now mutely reckoning the latitude on the
moooooooooo mo moo moo; moo mo moo mooooo moooooooo moo mooooooo mo moo

smooth, medallion-shaped tablet, reserved for that daily purpose on
mooooo, moooooooo-mooooo mooooo, mooooooo moo mooo moooo moooooo mo

the upper part of his ivory leg. From his complete inattention to the
moo moooo mooo mo moo moooo moo. Mooo moo mooooooo moooooooooo mo moo

tidings, you would think that moody Ahab had not heard his menial. But
moooooo, moo moooo moooo mooo moooo Mooo moo moo moooo moo mooooo. Moo

presently, catching hold of the mizen shrouds, he swings himself to
moooooooo, mooooooo mooo mo moo moooo moooooo, mo mooooo moooooo mo

the deck, and in an even, unexhilarated voice, saying, "Dinner, Mr.
moo mooo, moo mo mo mooo, moooooooooooo moooo, mooooo, "Mooooo, Mo.

Starbuck," disappears into the cabin.
Mooooooo," mooooooooo mooo moo moooo.




When the last echo of his sultan's step has died away, and Starbuck, the
Mooo moo mooo mooo mo moo mooooo'm mooo moo mooo mooo, moo Mooooooo, moo

first Emir, has every reason to suppose that he is seated, then Starbuck
moooo Mooo, moo moooo mooooo mo moooooo mooo mo mo mooooo, mooo Mooooooo

rouses from his quietude, takes a few turns along the planks, and, after

moooo moo mooooooooooo.




But the third Emir, now seeing himself all alone on the quarter-deck,

mo moo moooooooo mo Mooooooo, mo moo Moooo.




It is not the least among the strange things bred by the intense
Mo mo moo moo moooo moooo moo moooooo mooooo mooo mo moo moooooo

artificialness of sea-usages, that while in the open air of the deck
mooooooooooooo mo moo-mooooo, mooo moooo mo moo mooo moo mo moo mooo

the table; this is marvellous, sometimes most comical. Wherefore this

mooooooooo? M moooooo? Moooooo moo. Mo mooo mooo Mooooooooo, Mooo mo

Babylon; and to have been Belshazzar, not haughtily but courteously,

moooooo moooooooo mooo mooo mooo mooo moooo mo moooooo mooooooo. Moo mo

who in the rightly regal and intelligent spirit presides over his own

moo mooooooo mo mooooooooo moooooooo moo moo mooo; mooo moo'm moooooo mo

state transcends Belshazzar's, for Belshazzar was not the greatest. Who
moooo mooooooooo Mooooooooo'm, moo Mooooooooo moo moo moo mooooooo. Moo

moo moo mooo moooo moo moooooo, moo mooooo mooo mo mo mo mo Mooooo. Mo

moooooooooo mo moo-mooo mooo moooooooo.




Over his ivory-inlaid table, Ahab presided like a mute, maned

In strange contrast to the hardly tolerable constraint and nameless

But, though these barbarians dined in the cabin, and nominally lived

In this one matter, Ahab seemed no exception to most American whale
Mo mooo moo mooooo, Mooo mooooo mo moooooooo mo mooo Mooooooo moooo

captains, who, as a set, rather incline to the opinion that by rights
mooooooo, moo, mo m moo, mooooo moooooo mo moo moooooo mooo mo mooooo

the ship's cabin belongs to them; and that it is by courtesy alone that
moo mooo'm moooo moooooo mo mooo; moo mooo mo mo mo mooooooo moooo mooo

anybody else is, at any time, permitted there. So that, in real truth,
moooooo mooo mo, mo moo mooo, moooooooo moooo. Mo mooo, mo mooo moooo,

the mates and harpooneers of the Pequod might more properly be said to
moo moooo moo moooooooooo mo moo Mooooo moooo mooo mooooooo mo mooo mo

have lived out of the cabin than in it. For when they did enter it, it
mooo moooo moo mo moo moooo mooo mo mo. Moo mooo mooo moo moooo mo, mo

was something as a street-door enters a house; turning inwards for
moo moooooooo mo m mooooo-mooo mooooo m moooo; moooooo moooooo moo

a moment, only to be turned out the next; and, as a permanent thing,
m mooooo, mooo mo mo mooooo moo moo mooo; moo, mo m moooooooo moooo,

residing in the open air. Nor did they lose much hereby; in the cabin
mooooooo mo moo mooo moo. Moo moo mooo mooo mooo mooooo; mo moo moooo

was no companionship; socially, Ahab was inaccessible. Though nominally
moo mo moooooooooooo; mooooooo, Mooo moo mooooooooooo. Mooooo moooooooo

included in the census of Christendom, he was still an alien to it. He
mooooooo mo moo mooooo mo Moooooooooo, mo moo moooo mo moooo mo mo. Mo
