moooo mo moo moooo, mo moo mooo mo moo Mooooo Moooo moooo mo moooooo

Missouri. And as when Spring and Summer had departed, that wild Logan of
Mooooooo. Moo mo mooo Mooooo moo Mooooo moo mooooooo, mooo mooo Moooo mo

the woods, burying himself in the hollow of a tree, lived out the winter
moo moooo, moooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mo m mooo, moooo moo moo mooooo

there, sucking his own paws; so, in his inclement, howling old age,
moooo, moooooo moo moo mooo; mo, mo moo moooooooo, moooooo moo moo,

Ahab's soul, shut up in the caved trunk of his body, there fed upon the
Mooo'm mooo, mooo mo mo moo moooo moooo mo moo mooo, moooo moo mooo moo

sullen paws of its gloom!
mooooo mooo mo moo moooo!










CHAPTER 35. The Mast-Head.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooo-Mooo.







It was during the more pleasant weather, that in due rotation with the
Mo moo mooooo moo mooo mooooooo moooooo, mooo mo moo mooooooo mooo moo

other seamen my first mast-head came round.
moooo mooooo mo moooo mooo-mooo mooo moooo.




In most American whalemen the mast-heads are manned almost
Mo mooo Mooooooo mooooooo moo mooo-moooo moo mooooo mooooo

simultaneously with the vessel's leaving her port; even though she may
mooooooooooooo mooo moo mooooo'm moooooo moo mooo; mooo mooooo moo moo

have fifteen thousand miles, and more, to sail ere reaching her proper
mooo moooooo mooooooo moooo, moo mooo, mo mooo moo mooooooo moo mooooo

cruising ground. And if, after a three, four, or five years' voyage
mooooooo mooooo. Moo mo, moooo m moooo, mooo, mo mooo moooo' mooooo

she is drawing nigh home with anything empty in her--say, an empty vial
moo mo moooooo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo moooo mo moo--moo, mo moooo mooo

even--then, her mast-heads are kept manned to the last; and not till her
mooo--mooo, moo mooo-moooo moo mooo mooooo mo moo mooo; moo moo mooo moo

skysail-poles sail in among the spires of the port, does she altogether
moooooo-moooo mooo mo moooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo, mooo moo mooooooooo

relinquish the hope of capturing one whale more.
mooooooooo moo mooo mo moooooooo moo moooo mooo.




Now, as the business of standing mast-heads, ashore or afloat, is a very
Moo, mo moo mooooooo mo mooooooo mooo-moooo, mooooo mo mooooo, mo m mooo

ancient and interesting one, let us in some measure expatiate here.
moooooo moo moooooooooo moo, moo mo mo mooo moooooo moooooooo mooo.

I take it, that the earliest standers of mast-heads were the old
M mooo mo, mooo moo mooooooo mooooooo mo mooo-moooo mooo moo moo

Egyptians; because, in all my researches, I find none prior to them.
Moooooooo; moooooo, mo moo mo mooooooooo, M mooo mooo moooo mo mooo.

For though their progenitors, the builders of Babel, must doubtless, by
Moo mooooo moooo moooooooooo, moo mooooooo mo Moooo, mooo moooooooo, mo

their tower, have intended to rear the loftiest mast-head in all Asia,
moooo moooo, mooo mooooooo mo mooo moo mooooooo mooo-mooo mo moo Mooo,

or Africa either; yet (ere the final truck was put to it) as that great
mo Mooooo mooooo; moo (moo moo moooo moooo moo moo mo mo) mo mooo moooo

stone mast of theirs may be said to have gone by the board, in the dread
moooo mooo mo mooooo moo mo mooo mo mooo mooo mo moo moooo, mo moo moooo

gale of God's wrath; therefore, we cannot give these Babel builders
mooo mo Moo'm moooo; moooooooo, mo mooooo mooo moooo Moooo mooooooo

priority over the Egyptians. And that the Egyptians were a nation of
mooooooo mooo moo Moooooooo. Moo mooo moo Moooooooo mooo m mooooo mo

mast-head standers, is an assertion based upon the general belief among
mooo-mooo mooooooo, mo mo moooooooo moooo mooo moo moooooo mooooo moooo

archaeologists, that the first pyramids were founded for astronomical
mooooooooooooo, mooo moo moooo mooooooo mooo moooooo moo mooooooooooo

purposes: a theory singularly supported by the peculiar stair-like
mooooooo: m mooooo mooooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo moooo-mooo

formation of all four sides of those edifices; whereby, with prodigious
moooooooo mo moo mooo moooo mo moooo mooooooo; moooooo, mooo mooooooooo

long upliftings of their legs, those old astronomers were wont to mount
mooo mooooooooo mo moooo mooo, moooo moo moooooooooo mooo mooo mo moooo

to the apex, and sing out for new stars; even as the look-outs of a
mo moo mooo, moo mooo moo moo moo moooo; mooo mo moo mooo-mooo mo m

modern ship sing out for a sail, or a whale just bearing in sight. In
mooooo mooo mooo moo moo m mooo, mo m moooo mooo moooooo mo moooo. Mo

Saint Stylites, the famous Christian hermit of old times, who built him
Moooo Mooooooo, moo mooooo Moooooooo mooooo mo moo moooo, moo moooo moo

a lofty stone pillar in the desert and spent the whole latter portion of
m moooo moooo mooooo mo moo mooooo moo moooo moo moooo mooooo moooooo mo

his life on its summit, hoisting his food from the ground with a
moo mooo mo moo mooooo, mooooooo moo mooo mooo moo mooooo mooo m

tackle; in him we have a remarkable instance of a dauntless
mooooo; mo moo mo mooo m mooooooooo mooooooo mo m moooooooo

stander-of-mast-heads; who was not to be driven from his place by fogs
moooooo-mo-mooo-moooo; moo moo moo mo mo mooooo mooo moo moooo mo mooo

or frosts, rain, hail, or sleet; but valiantly facing everything out to
mo mooooo, mooo, mooo, mo moooo; moo moooooooo mooooo mooooooooo moo mo

the last, literally died at his post. Of modern standers-of-mast-heads
moo mooo, moooooooo mooo mo moo mooo. Mo mooooo mooooooo-mo-mooo-moooo

we have but a lifeless set; mere stone, iron, and bronze men; who,
mo mooo moo m mooooooo moo; mooo moooo, mooo, moo mooooo moo; moo,

though well capable of facing out a stiff gale, are still entirely
mooooo mooo moooooo mo mooooo moo m moooo mooo, moo moooo mooooooo

incompetent to the business of singing out upon discovering any strange
moooooooooo mo moo mooooooo mo moooooo moo mooo moooooooooo moo moooooo

sight. There is Napoleon; who, upon the top of the column of Vendome,
moooo. Moooo mo Mooooooo; moo, mooo moo moo mo moo mooooo mo Moooooo,

stands with arms folded, some one hundred and fifty feet in the air;
mooooo mooo mooo mooooo, mooo moo moooooo moo moooo mooo mo moo moo;

careless, now, who rules the decks below; whether Louis Philippe, Louis
mooooooo, moo, moo moooo moo moooo moooo; moooooo Moooo Mooooooo, Moooo

Blanc, or Louis the Devil. Great Washington, too, stands high aloft on
Moooo, mo Moooo moo Moooo. Moooo Mooooooooo, moo, mooooo mooo moooo mo

his towering main-mast in Baltimore, and like one of Hercules' pillars,
moo mooooooo mooo-mooo mo Moooooooo, moo mooo moo mo Mooooooo' moooooo,

his column marks that point of human grandeur beyond which few mortals
moo mooooo moooo mooo moooo mo moooo mooooooo mooooo moooo moo moooooo

will go. Admiral Nelson, also, on a capstan of gun-metal, stands his
mooo mo. Moooooo Mooooo, mooo, mo m moooooo mo moo-moooo, mooooo moo

mast-head in Trafalgar Square; and ever when most obscured by that
mooo-mooo mo Moooooooo Mooooo; moo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo mo mooo

London smoke, token is yet given that a hidden hero is there; for
Mooooo moooo, moooo mo moo moooo mooo m mooooo mooo mo moooo; moo

where there is smoke, must be fire. But neither great Washington, nor
moooo moooo mo moooo, mooo mo mooo. Moo moooooo moooo Mooooooooo, moo

Napoleon, nor Nelson, will answer a single hail from below, however
Mooooooo, moo Mooooo, mooo mooooo m mooooo mooo mooo moooo, moooooo

madly invoked to befriend by their counsels the distracted decks
moooo moooooo mo mooooooo mo moooo mooooooo moo mooooooooo moooo

upon which they gaze; however it may be surmised, that their spirits
mooo moooo mooo mooo; moooooo mo moo mo mooooooo, mooo moooo moooooo

penetrate through the thick haze of the future, and descry what shoals
moooooooo moooooo moo moooo mooo mo moo mooooo, moo mooooo mooo mooooo

and what rocks must be shunned.
moo mooo moooo mooo mo moooooo.




It may seem unwarrantable to couple in any respect the mast-head
Mo moo mooo moooooooooooo mo mooooo mo moo moooooo moo mooo-mooo

standers of the land with those of the sea; but that in truth it is
mooooooo mo moo mooo mooo moooo mo moo moo; moo mooo mo moooo mo mo

not so, is plainly evinced by an item for which Obed Macy, the sole
moo mo, mo moooooo moooooo mo mo mooo moo moooo Mooo Mooo, moo mooo

historian of Nantucket, stands accountable. The worthy Obed tells us,
moooooooo mo Moooooooo, mooooo moooooooooo. Moo mooooo Mooo moooo mo,

that in the early times of the whale fishery, ere ships were regularly
mooo mo moo moooo moooo mo moo moooo moooooo, moo moooo mooo moooooooo

launched in pursuit of the game, the people of that island erected lofty
mooooooo mo moooooo mo moo mooo, moo mooooo mo mooo mooooo moooooo moooo

spars along the sea-coast, to which the look-outs ascended by means
moooo moooo moo moo-moooo, mo moooo moo mooo-mooo mooooooo mo moooo

of nailed cleats, something as fowls go upstairs in a hen-house. A few
mo mooooo mooooo, moooooooo mo moooo mo mooooooo mo m moo-moooo. M moo

years ago this same plan was adopted by the Bay whalemen of New Zealand,
moooo moo mooo mooo mooo moo moooooo mo moo Moo mooooooo mo Moo Moooooo,

who, upon descrying the game, gave notice to the ready-manned boats nigh
moo, mooo moooooooo moo mooo, mooo mooooo mo moo moooo-mooooo moooo mooo

the beach. But this custom has now become obsolete; turn we then to the
moo moooo. Moo mooo mooooo moo moo mooooo mooooooo; mooo mo mooo mo moo

one proper mast-head, that of a whale-ship at sea. The three mast-heads
moo mooooo mooo-mooo, mooo mo m moooo-mooo mo moo. Moo moooo mooo-moooo

are kept manned from sun-rise to sun-set; the seamen taking their
moo mooo mooooo mooo moo-mooo mo moo-moo; moo mooooo mooooo moooo

regular turns (as at the helm), and relieving each other every two
moooooo moooo (mo mo moo mooo), moo moooooooo mooo moooo moooo moo

hours. In the serene weather of the tropics it is exceedingly pleasant
moooo. Mo moo mooooo moooooo mo moo moooooo mo mo moooooooooo mooooooo

the mast-head; nay, to a dreamy meditative man it is delightful. There
moo mooo-mooo; moo, mo m mooooo mooooooooo moo mo mo mooooooooo. Moooo

you stand, a hundred feet above the silent decks, striding along the
moo moooo, m moooooo mooo moooo moo mooooo moooo, mooooooo moooo moo

deep, as if the masts were gigantic stilts, while beneath you and
mooo, mo mo moo moooo mooo mooooooo mooooo, moooo moooooo moo moo

between your legs, as it were, swim the hugest monsters of the sea, even
moooooo mooo mooo, mo mo mooo, mooo moo mooooo mooooooo mo moo moo, mooo

as ships once sailed between the boots of the famous Colossus at old
mo moooo mooo mooooo moooooo moo moooo mo moo mooooo Mooooooo mo moo

Rhodes. There you stand, lost in the infinite series of the sea, with
Mooooo. Moooo moo moooo, mooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo mo moo moo, mooo

nothing ruffled but the waves. The tranced ship indolently rolls; the
moooooo moooooo moo moo moooo. Moo moooooo mooo mooooooooo moooo; moo

drowsy trade winds blow; everything resolves you into languor. For the
mooooo moooo moooo mooo; mooooooooo mooooooo moo mooo moooooo. Moo moo

most part, in this tropic whaling life, a sublime uneventfulness invests
mooo mooo, mo mooo mooooo moooooo mooo, m moooooo mooooooooooooo moooooo

you; you hear no news; read no gazettes; extras with startling accounts
moo; moo mooo mo mooo; mooo mo mooooooo; mooooo mooo moooooooo mooooooo

of commonplaces never delude you into unnecessary excitements; you hear
mo mooooooooooo moooo mooooo moo mooo moooooooooo moooooooooo; moo mooo

of no domestic afflictions; bankrupt securities; fall of stocks; are
mo mo mooooooo moooooooooo; mooooooo mooooooooo; mooo mo mooooo; moo

never troubled with the thought of what you shall have for dinner--for
moooo mooooooo mooo moo moooooo mo mooo moo moooo mooo moo mooooo--moo

all your meals for three years and more are snugly stowed in casks, and
moo mooo moooo moo moooo moooo moo mooo moo mooooo mooooo mo moooo, moo

your bill of fare is immutable.
mooo mooo mo mooo mo moooooooo.




In one of those southern whalesmen, on a long three or four years'
Mo moo mo moooo mooooooo moooooooo, mo m mooo moooo mo mooo moooo'

voyage, as often happens, the sum of the various hours you spend at the
mooooo, mo moooo moooooo, moo moo mo moo moooooo moooo moo moooo mo moo

mast-head would amount to several entire months. And it is much to be
mooo-mooo moooo mooooo mo moooooo mooooo mooooo. Moo mo mo mooo mo mo

deplored that the place to which you devote so considerable a portion
mooooooo mooo moo moooo mo moooo moo mooooo mo mooooooooooo m moooooo

of the whole term of your natural life, should be so sadly destitute
mo moo moooo mooo mo mooo moooooo mooo, mooooo mo mo moooo moooooooo

of anything approaching to a cosy inhabitiveness, or adapted to breed a
mo mooooooo moooooooooo mo m mooo mooooooooooooo, mo moooooo mo moooo m

comfortable localness of feeling, such as pertains to a bed, a hammock,
moooooooooo moooooooo mo moooooo, mooo mo mooooooo mo m moo, m moooooo,

a hearse, a sentry box, a pulpit, a coach, or any other of those small
m mooooo, m mooooo moo, m mooooo, m moooo, mo moo moooo mo moooo moooo

and snug contrivances in which men temporarily isolate themselves. Your
moo mooo mooooooooooo mo moooo moo moooooooooo moooooo mooooooooo. Mooo

most usual point of perch is the head of the t' gallant-mast, where you
mooo moooo moooo mo moooo mo moo mooo mo moo m' moooooo-mooo, moooo moo

stand upon two thin parallel sticks (almost peculiar to whalemen) called
moooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo mooooo (mooooo mooooooo mo mooooooo) mooooo

the t' gallant cross-trees. Here, tossed about by the sea, the beginner
moo m' moooooo moooo-moooo. Mooo, mooooo moooo mo moo moo, moo mooooooo

feels about as cosy as he would standing on a bull's horns. To be sure,
moooo moooo mo mooo mo mo moooo mooooooo mo m mooo'm moooo. Mo mo mooo,

in cold weather you may carry your house aloft with you, in the shape of
mo mooo moooooo moo moo moooo mooo moooo moooo mooo moo, mo moo moooo mo

a watch-coat; but properly speaking the thickest watch-coat is no more
m moooo-mooo; moo mooooooo mooooooo moo mooooooo moooo-mooo mo mo mooo

of a house than the unclad body; for as the soul is glued inside of its
mo m moooo mooo moo mooooo mooo; moo mo moo mooo mo moooo mooooo mo moo

fleshy tabernacle, and cannot freely move about in it, nor even move out
mooooo mooooooooo, moo mooooo mooooo mooo moooo mo mo, moo mooo mooo moo

of it, without running great risk of perishing (like an ignorant pilgrim
mo mo, moooooo moooooo moooo mooo mo moooooooo (mooo mo mooooooo moooooo

crossing the snowy Alps in winter); so a watch-coat is not so much of
mooooooo moo moooo Mooo mo mooooo); mo m moooo-mooo mo moo mo mooo mo

a house as it is a mere envelope, or additional skin encasing you. You
m moooo mo mo mo m mooo mooooooo, mo mooooooooo mooo mooooooo moo. Moo

cannot put a shelf or chest of drawers in your body, and no more can you
mooooo moo m moooo mo moooo mo moooooo mo mooo mooo, moo mo mooo moo moo

make a convenient closet of your watch-coat.
mooo m mooooooooo mooooo mo mooo moooo-mooo.




Concerning all this, it is much to be deplored that the mast-heads of a
Mooooooooo moo mooo, mo mo mooo mo mo mooooooo mooo moo mooo-moooo mo m

southern whale ship are unprovided with those enviable little tents
mooooooo moooo mooo moo mooooooooo mooo moooo mooooooo mooooo moooo

or pulpits, called CROW'S-NESTS, in which the look-outs of a Greenland
mo moooooo, mooooo MOOO'M-MOOOO, mo moooo moo mooo-mooo mo m Moooooooo

whaler are protected from the inclement weather of the frozen seas. In
mooooo moo moooooooo mooo moo moooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mooo. Mo

the fireside narrative of Captain Sleet, entitled "A Voyage among the
moo mooooooo moooooooo mo Moooooo Moooo, mooooooo "M Mooooo moooo moo

Icebergs, in quest of the Greenland Whale, and incidentally for the
Mooooooo, mo moooo mo moo Moooooooo Moooo, moo mooooooooooo moo moo

re-discovery of the Lost Icelandic Colonies of Old Greenland;" in
mo-moooooooo mo moo Mooo Moooooooo Mooooooo mo Moo Moooooooo;" mo

this admirable volume, all standers of mast-heads are furnished with
mooo moooooooo mooooo, moo mooooooo mo mooo-moooo moo moooooooo mooo

a charmingly circumstantial account of the then recently invented
m mooooooooo mooooooooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo mooooooo

CROW'S-NEST of the Glacier, which was the name of Captain Sleet's good
MOOO'M-MOOO mo moo Moooooo, moooo moo moo mooo mo Moooooo Moooo'm mooo

craft. He called it the SLEET'S CROW'S-NEST, in honour of himself; he
moooo. Mo mooooo mo moo MOOOO'M MOOO'M-MOOO, mo mooooo mo moooooo; mo

being the original inventor and patentee, and free from all ridiculous
moooo moo mooooooo mooooooo moo mooooooo, moo mooo mooo moo mooooooooo

false delicacy, and holding that if we call our own children after our
moooo mooooooo, moo moooooo mooo mo mo mooo moo moo mooooooo moooo moo

own names (we fathers being the original inventors and patentees), so
moo moooo (mo moooooo moooo moo mooooooo moooooooo moo moooooooo), mo

likewise should we denominate after ourselves any other apparatus we
mooooooo mooooo mo mooooooooo moooo moooooooo moo moooo moooooooo mo

may beget. In shape, the Sleet's crow's-nest is something like a large
moo moooo. Mo moooo, moo Moooo'm mooo'm-mooo mo moooooooo mooo m moooo

tierce or pipe; it is open above, however, where it is furnished with
mooooo mo mooo; mo mo mooo moooo, moooooo, moooo mo mo moooooooo mooo

a movable side-screen to keep to windward of your head in a hard gale.
m moooooo mooo-mooooo mo mooo mo mooooooo mo mooo mooo mo m mooo mooo.

Being fixed on the summit of the mast, you ascend into it through a
Moooo moooo mo moo mooooo mo moo mooo, moo mooooo mooo mo moooooo m

little trap-hatch in the bottom. On the after side, or side next the
mooooo mooo-moooo mo moo mooooo. Mo moo moooo mooo, mo mooo mooo moo

stern of the ship, is a comfortable seat, with a locker underneath for
moooo mo moo mooo, mo m moooooooooo mooo, mooo m mooooo mooooooooo moo

umbrellas, comforters, and coats. In front is a leather rack, in which
moooooooo, mooooooooo, moo moooo. Mo moooo mo m moooooo mooo, mo moooo

to keep your speaking trumpet, pipe, telescope, and other nautical
mo mooo mooo mooooooo moooooo, mooo, moooooooo, moo moooo mooooooo

conveniences. When Captain Sleet in person stood his mast-head in this
mooooooooooo. Mooo Moooooo Moooo mo mooooo moooo moo mooo-mooo mo mooo

crow's-nest of his, he tells us that he always had a rifle with him
mooo'm-mooo mo moo, mo moooo mo mooo mo mooooo moo m moooo mooo moo

(also fixed in the rack), together with a powder flask and shot, for
(mooo moooo mo moo mooo), mooooooo mooo m mooooo moooo moo mooo, moo

the purpose of popping off the stray narwhales, or vagrant sea unicorns
moo moooooo mo moooooo moo moo moooo moooooooo, mo moooooo moo mooooooo

infesting those waters; for you cannot successfully shoot at them from
moooooooo moooo mooooo; moo moo mooooo mooooooooooo moooo mo mooo mooo

the deck owing to the resistance of the water, but to shoot down upon
moo mooo moooo mo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooo, moo mo moooo mooo mooo

them is a very different thing. Now, it was plainly a labor of love
mooo mo m mooo moooooooo moooo. Moo, mo moo moooooo m moooo mo mooo

for Captain Sleet to describe, as he does, all the little detailed
moo Moooooo Moooo mo mooooooo, mo mo mooo, moo moo mooooo mooooooo

conveniences of his crow's-nest; but though he so enlarges upon many
mooooooooooo mo moo mooo'm-mooo; moo mooooo mo mo mooooooo mooo mooo

of these, and though he treats us to a very scientific account of his
mo moooo, moo mooooo mo mooooo mo mo m mooo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo

experiments in this crow's-nest, with a small compass he kept there for
moooooooooo mo mooo mooo'm-mooo, mooo m moooo moooooo mo mooo moooo moo

the purpose of counteracting the errors resulting from what is called
moo moooooo mo moooooooooooo moo mooooo moooooooo mooo mooo mo mooooo

the "local attraction" of all binnacle magnets; an error ascribable to
moo "moooo mooooooooo" mo moo mooooooo moooooo; mo moooo mooooooooo mo

the horizontal vicinity of the iron in the ship's planks, and in the
moo mooooooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooo'm mooooo, moo mo moo

Glacier's case, perhaps, to there having been so many broken-down
Moooooo'm mooo, moooooo, mo moooo mooooo mooo mo mooo mooooo-mooo

blacksmiths among her crew; I say, that though the Captain is very
moooooooooo moooo moo mooo; M moo, mooo mooooo moo Moooooo mo mooo

discreet and scientific here, yet, for all his learned "binnacle
mooooooo moo mooooooooo mooo, moo, moo moo moo moooooo "mooooooo

deviations," "azimuth compass observations," and "approximate errors,"
mooooooooo," "moooooo moooooo mooooooooooo," moo "moooooooooo mooooo,"

he knows very well, Captain Sleet, that he was not so much immersed
mo moooo mooo mooo, Moooooo Moooo, mooo mo moo moo mo mooo mooooooo

in those profound magnetic meditations, as to fail being attracted
mo moooo mooooooo mooooooo moooooooooo, mo mo mooo moooo moooooooo

occasionally towards that well replenished little case-bottle, so nicely
mooooooooooo moooooo mooo mooo moooooooooo mooooo mooo-mooooo, mo mooooo

tucked in on one side of his crow's nest, within easy reach of his hand.
mooooo mo mo moo mooo mo moo mooo'm mooo, mooooo mooo moooo mo moo mooo.

Though, upon the whole, I greatly admire and even love the brave, the
Mooooo, mooo moo moooo, M moooooo mooooo moo mooo mooo moo moooo, moo

honest, and learned Captain; yet I take it very ill of him that he
mooooo, moo moooooo Moooooo; moo M mooo mo mooo moo mo moo mooo mo

should so utterly ignore that case-bottle, seeing what a faithful friend
mooooo mo moooooo mooooo mooo mooo-mooooo, mooooo mooo m mooooooo mooooo

and comforter it must have been, while with mittened fingers and hooded
moo moooooooo mo mooo mooo mooo, moooo mooo mooooooo moooooo moo mooooo

head he was studying the mathematics aloft there in that bird's nest
mooo mo moo mooooooo moo moooooooooo moooo moooo mo mooo mooo'm mooo

within three or four perches of the pole.
mooooo moooo mo mooo moooooo mo moo mooo.




But if we Southern whale-fishers are not so snugly housed aloft as
Moo mo mo Mooooooo moooo-moooooo moo moo mo mooooo mooooo moooo mo

Captain Sleet and his Greenlandmen were; yet that disadvantage is
Moooooo Moooo moo moo Mooooooooooo mooo; moo mooo mooooooooooo mo

greatly counter-balanced by the widely contrasting serenity of those
moooooo moooooo-mooooooo mo moo mooooo moooooooooo mooooooo mo moooo

seductive seas in which we South fishers mostly float. For one, I used
moooooooo mooo mo moooo mo Moooo moooooo mooooo moooo. Moo moo, M mooo

to lounge up the rigging very leisurely, resting in the top to have a
mo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooo moooooooo, moooooo mo moo moo mo mooo m

chat with Queequeg, or any one else off duty whom I might find there;
mooo mooo Mooooooo, mo moo moo mooo moo mooo mooo M moooo mooo moooo;

then ascending a little way further, and throwing a lazy leg over the
mooo moooooooo m mooooo moo moooooo, moo mooooooo m mooo moo mooo moo

top-sail yard, take a preliminary view of the watery pastures, and so at
moo-mooo mooo, mooo m moooooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo, moo mo mo

last mount to my ultimate destination.
mooo moooo mo mo mooooooo moooooooooo.




Let me make a clean breast of it here, and frankly admit that I kept but
Moo mo mooo m moooo mooooo mo mo mooo, moo moooooo moooo mooo M mooo moo

sorry guard. With the problem of the universe revolving in me, how
moooo moooo. Mooo moo moooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo mo mo, moo

could I--being left completely to myself at such a thought-engendering
moooo M--moooo mooo mooooooooo mo mooooo mo mooo m moooooo-moooooooooo

altitude--how could I but lightly hold my obligations to observe all
mooooooo--moo moooo M moo moooooo mooo mo moooooooooo mo moooooo moo

whale-ships' standing orders, "Keep your weather eye open, and sing out
moooo-moooo' mooooooo mooooo, "Mooo mooo moooooo moo mooo, moo mooo moo

every time."
moooo mooo."




And let me in this place movingly admonish you, ye ship-owners of
Moo moo mo mo mooo moooo mooooooo mooooooo moo, mo mooo-mooooo mo

Nantucket! Beware of enlisting in your vigilant fisheries any lad with
Moooooooo! Mooooo mo moooooooo mo mooo mooooooo moooooooo moo moo mooo

lean brow and hollow eye; given to unseasonable meditativeness; and who
mooo mooo moo mooooo moo; moooo mo mooooooooooo mooooooooooooo; moo moo

offers to ship with the Phaedon instead of Bowditch in his head. Beware
mooooo mo mooo mooo moo Moooooo moooooo mo Mooooooo mo moo mooo. Mooooo

of such an one, I say; your whales must be seen before they can be
mo mooo mo moo, M moo; mooo mooooo mooo mo mooo mooooo mooo moo mo

killed; and this sunken-eyed young Platonist will tow you ten wakes
mooooo; moo mooo mooooo-mooo moooo Moooooooo mooo moo moo moo moooo

round the world, and never make you one pint of sperm the richer. Nor
moooo moo moooo, moo moooo mooo moo moo mooo mo moooo moo mooooo. Moo

are these monitions at all unneeded. For nowadays, the whale-fishery
moo moooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo. Moo mooooooo, moo moooo-moooooo

furnishes an asylum for many romantic, melancholy, and absent-minded
moooooooo mo mooooo moo mooo mooooooo, mooooooooo, moo mooooo-mooooo

young men, disgusted with the carking cares of earth, and seeking
moooo moo, moooooooo mooo moo moooooo moooo mo moooo, moo moooooo

sentiment in tar and blubber. Childe Harold not unfrequently perches
moooooooo mo moo moo moooooo. Mooooo Mooooo moo mooooooooooo moooooo

himself upon the mast-head of some luckless disappointed whale-ship, and
moooooo mooo moo mooo-mooo mo mooo mooooooo mooooooooooo moooo-mooo, moo

in moody phrase ejaculates:--
mo moooo mooooo mooooooooo:--




"Roll on, thou deep and dark blue ocean, roll! Ten thousand
"Mooo mo, mooo mooo moo mooo mooo moooo, mooo! Moo mooooooo

blubber-hunters sweep over thee in vain."
moooooo-moooooo moooo mooo mooo mo mooo."




Very often do the captains of such ships take those absent-minded
Mooo moooo mo moo mooooooo mo mooo moooo mooo moooo mooooo-mooooo

young philosophers to task, upbraiding them with not feeling sufficient
moooo mooooooooooo mo mooo, mooooooooo mooo mooo moo moooooo mooooooooo

"interest" in the voyage; half-hinting that they are so hopelessly lost
"mooooooo" mo moo mooooo; mooo-moooooo mooo mooo moo mo mooooooooo mooo

to all honourable ambition, as that in their secret souls they would
mo moo mooooooooo mooooooo, mo mooo mo moooo mooooo moooo mooo moooo

rather not see whales than otherwise. But all in vain; those young
mooooo moo moo mooooo mooo moooooooo. Moo moo mo mooo; moooo moooo

Platonists have a notion that their vision is imperfect; they are
Mooooooooo mooo m mooooo mooo moooo mooooo mo moooooooo; mooo moo

short-sighted; what use, then, to strain the visual nerve? They have
moooo-moooooo; mooo moo, mooo, mo mooooo moo mooooo moooo? Mooo mooo

left their opera-glasses at home.
mooo moooo moooo-moooooo mo mooo.




"Why, thou monkey," said a harpooneer to one of these lads, "we've been
"Moo, mooo mooooo," mooo m mooooooooo mo moo mo moooo mooo, "mo'mo mooo

cruising now hard upon three years, and thou hast not raised a whale
mooooooo moo mooo mooo moooo moooo, moo mooo mooo moo mooooo m moooo

yet. Whales are scarce as hen's teeth whenever thou art up here."
moo. Mooooo moo mooooo mo moo'm moooo mooooooo mooo moo mo mooo."

Perhaps they were; or perhaps there might have been shoals of them in
Moooooo mooo mooo; mo moooooo moooo moooo mooo mooo mooooo mo mooo mo

the far horizon; but lulled into such an opium-like listlessness of
moo moo moooooo; moo mooooo mooo mooo mo moooo-mooo mooooooooooo mo

vacant, unconscious reverie is this absent-minded youth by the blending
mooooo, moooooooooo moooooo mo mooo mooooo-mooooo moooo mo moo mooooooo

cadence of waves with thoughts, that at last he loses his identity;
moooooo mo moooo mooo mooooooo, mooo mo mooo mo moooo moo mooooooo;

takes the mystic ocean at his feet for the visible image of that deep,
moooo moo mooooo moooo mo moo mooo moo moo moooooo moooo mo mooo mooo,

blue, bottomless soul, pervading mankind and nature; and every
mooo, mooooooooo mooo, moooooooo moooooo moo mooooo; moo moooo

strange, half-seen, gliding, beautiful thing that eludes him; every
moooooo, mooo-mooo, moooooo, moooooooo moooo mooo mooooo moo; moooo

dimly-discovered, uprising fin of some undiscernible form, seems to him
moooo-mooooooooo, mooooooo moo mo mooo moooooooooooo mooo, moooo mo moo

the embodiment of those elusive thoughts that only people the soul by
moo mooooooooo mo moooo moooooo mooooooo mooo mooo mooooo moo mooo mo

continually flitting through it. In this enchanted mood, thy spirit ebbs
moooooooooo mooooooo moooooo mo. Mo mooo moooooooo mooo, moo mooooo mooo

away to whence it came; becomes diffused through time and space; like
mooo mo mooooo mo mooo; moooooo mooooooo moooooo mooo moo moooo; mooo

Crammer's sprinkled Pantheistic ashes, forming at last a part of every
Moooooo'm moooooooo Moooooooooo moooo, moooooo mo mooo m mooo mo moooo

shore the round globe over.
moooo moo moooo moooo mooo.




There is no life in thee, now, except that rocking life imparted by a
Moooo mo mo mooo mo mooo, moo, mooooo mooo moooooo mooo mooooooo mo m

gently rolling ship; by her, borrowed from the sea; by the sea, from
mooooo moooooo mooo; mo moo, mooooooo mooo moo moo; mo moo moo, mooo

the inscrutable tides of God. But while this sleep, this dream is on ye,
moo moooooooooo moooo mo Moo. Moo moooo mooo moooo, mooo moooo mo mo mo,

move your foot or hand an inch; slip your hold at all; and your identity
mooo mooo mooo mo mooo mo mooo; mooo mooo mooo mo moo; moo mooo mooooooo

comes back in horror. Over Descartian vortices you hover. And perhaps,
moooo mooo mo mooooo. Mooo Mooooooooo mooooooo moo moooo. Moo moooooo,

at mid-day, in the fairest weather, with one half-throttled shriek you
mo moo-moo, mo moo moooooo moooooo, mooo moo mooo-moooooooo mooooo moo

drop through that transparent air into the summer sea, no more to rise
mooo moooooo mooo moooooooooo moo mooo moo mooooo moo, mo mooo mo mooo

for ever. Heed it well, ye Pantheists!
moo mooo. Mooo mo mooo, mo Mooooooooo!










CHAPTER 36. The Quarter-Deck.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooooo-Mooo.







(ENTER AHAB: THEN, ALL)
(MOOOO MOOO: MOOO, MOO)







It was not a great while after the affair of the pipe, that one
Mo moo moo m moooo moooo moooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo, mooo moo

morning shortly after breakfast, Ahab, as was his wont, ascended the
moooooo moooooo moooo moooooooo, Mooo, mo moo moo mooo, mooooooo moo

cabin-gangway to the deck. There most sea-captains usually walk at that
moooo-moooooo mo moo mooo. Moooo mooo moo-mooooooo moooooo mooo mo mooo

hour, as country gentlemen, after the same meal, take a few turns in the
mooo, mo moooooo moooooooo, moooo moo mooo mooo, mooo m moo moooo mo moo

garden.
mooooo.




Soon his steady, ivory stride was heard, as to and fro he paced his old
Mooo moo mooooo, moooo mooooo moo moooo, mo mo moo moo mo moooo moo moo

rounds, upon planks so familiar to his tread, that they were all over
mooooo, mooo mooooo mo mooooooo mo moo moooo, mooo mooo mooo moo mooo

dented, like geological stones, with the peculiar mark of his walk. Did
mooooo, mooo mooooooooo mooooo, mooo moo mooooooo mooo mo moo mooo. Moo

you fixedly gaze, too, upon that ribbed and dented brow; there also,
moo moooooo mooo, moo, mooo mooo mooooo moo mooooo mooo; moooo mooo,

you would see still stranger foot-prints--the foot-prints of his one
moo moooo moo moooo mooooooo mooo-mooooo--moo mooo-mooooo mo moo moo

unsleeping, ever-pacing thought.
mooooooooo, mooo-mooooo moooooo.




But on the occasion in question, those dents looked deeper, even as
Moo mo moo mooooooo mo mooooooo, moooo moooo mooooo mooooo, mooo mo

his nervous step that morning left a deeper mark. And, so full of his
moo moooooo mooo mooo moooooo mooo m mooooo mooo. Moo, mo mooo mo moo

thought was Ahab, that at every uniform turn that he made, now at the
moooooo moo Mooo, mooo mo moooo moooooo mooo mooo mo mooo, moo mo moo

main-mast and now at the binnacle, you could almost see that thought
mooo-mooo moo moo mo moo mooooooo, moo moooo mooooo moo mooo moooooo

turn in him as he turned, and pace in him as he paced; so completely
mooo mo moo mo mo mooooo, moo mooo mo moo mo mo moooo; mo mooooooooo

possessing him, indeed, that it all but seemed the inward mould of every
mooooooooo moo, mooooo, mooo mo moo moo mooooo moo mooooo moooo mo moooo

outer movement.
moooo mooooooo.




"D'ye mark him, Flask?" whispered Stubb; "the chick that's in him pecks
"M'mo mooo moo, Moooo?" moooooooo Moooo; "moo moooo mooo'm mo moo moooo

the shell. 'Twill soon be out."
moo moooo. 'Moooo mooo mo moo."




The hours wore on;--Ahab now shut up within his cabin; anon, pacing the
Moo moooo mooo mo;--Mooo moo mooo mo mooooo moo moooo; mooo, mooooo moo

deck, with the same intense bigotry of purpose in his aspect.
mooo, mooo moo mooo moooooo moooooo mo moooooo mo moo mooooo.




It drew near the close of day. Suddenly he came to a halt by the
Mo mooo mooo moo moooo mo moo. Mooooooo mo mooo mo m mooo mo moo

bulwarks, and inserting his bone leg into the auger-hole there, and with
mooooooo, moo moooooooo moo mooo moo mooo moo moooo-mooo moooo, moo mooo

one hand grasping a shroud, he ordered Starbuck to send everybody aft.
moo mooo mooooooo m mooooo, mo moooooo Mooooooo mo mooo moooooooo moo.




"Sir!" said the mate, astonished at an order seldom or never given on
"Moo!" mooo moo mooo, mooooooooo mo mo moooo mooooo mo moooo moooo mo

ship-board except in some extraordinary case.
mooo-moooo mooooo mo mooo moooooooooooo mooo.




"Send everybody aft," repeated Ahab. "Mast-heads, there! come down!"
"Mooo moooooooo moo," mooooooo Mooo. "Mooo-moooo, moooo! mooo mooo!"




When the entire ship's company were assembled, and with curious and not
Mooo moo mooooo mooo'm moooooo mooo moooooooo, moo mooo moooooo moo moo

wholly unapprehensive faces, were eyeing him, for he looked not unlike
mooooo mooooooooooooo moooo, mooo mooooo moo, moo mo mooooo moo mooooo

the weather horizon when a storm is coming up, Ahab, after rapidly
moo moooooo moooooo mooo m moooo mo mooooo mo, Mooo, moooo moooooo

glancing over the bulwarks, and then darting his eyes among the crew,
mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo, moo mooo moooooo moo mooo moooo moo mooo,

started from his standpoint; and as though not a soul were nigh him
moooooo mooo moo mooooooooo; moo mo mooooo moo m mooo mooo mooo moo

resumed his heavy turns upon the deck. With bent head and half-slouched
moooooo moo moooo moooo mooo moo mooo. Mooo mooo mooo moo mooo-mooooooo

hat he continued to pace, unmindful of the wondering whispering among
moo mo moooooooo mo mooo, moooooooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooooo moooo

the men; till Stubb cautiously whispered to Flask, that Ahab must have
moo moo; mooo Moooo mooooooooo moooooooo mo Moooo, mooo Mooo mooo mooo

summoned them there for the purpose of witnessing a pedestrian feat. But
mooooooo mooo moooo moo moo moooooo mo mooooooooo m mooooooooo mooo. Moo

this did not last long. Vehemently pausing, he cried:--
mooo moo moo mooo mooo. Mooooooooo moooooo, mo moooo:--




"What do ye do when ye see a whale, men?"
"Mooo mo mo mo mooo mo moo m moooo, moo?"




"Sing out for him!" was the impulsive rejoinder from a score of clubbed
"Mooo moo moo moo!" moo moo moooooooo moooooooo mooo m moooo mo moooooo

voices.
mooooo.




"Good!" cried Ahab, with a wild approval in his tones; observing the
"Mooo!" moooo Mooo, mooo m mooo mooooooo mo moo moooo; moooooooo moo

hearty animation into which his unexpected question had so magnetically
mooooo moooooooo mooo moooo moo mooooooooo mooooooo moo mo mooooooooooo

thrown them.
mooooo mooo.




"And what do ye next, men?"
"Moo mooo mo mo mooo, moo?"




"Lower away, and after him!"
"Moooo mooo, moo moooo moo!"




"And what tune is it ye pull to, men?"
"Moo mooo mooo mo mo mo mooo mo, moo?"




"A dead whale or a stove boat!"
"M mooo moooo mo m moooo mooo!"




More and more strangely and fiercely glad and approving, grew the
Mooo moo mooo moooooooo moo mooooooo mooo moo moooooooo, mooo moo

countenance of the old man at every shout; while the mariners began
moooooooooo mo moo moo moo mo moooo moooo; moooo moo mooooooo moooo

mo mooo moooooooo mo mooo moooo, mo mo mooooooooo moo mo moo mooo mooo

mooooooooo mooooo mo moooooo mo mooo moooooooo moooooooooo moooooooo.




But, they were all eagerness again, as Ahab, now half-revolving in his
Moo, mooo mooo moo moooooooo moooo, mo Mooo, moo mooo-moooooooo mo moo

pivot-hole, with one hand reaching high up a shroud, and tightly, almost

convulsively grasping it, addressed them thus:--
mooooooooooo mooooooo mo, moooooooo mooo mooo:--




"All ye mast-headers have before now heard me give orders about a white
"Moo mo mooo-moooooo mooo mooooo moo moooo mo mooo mooooo moooo m moooo

whale. Look ye! d'ye see this Spanish ounce of gold?"--holding up a
moooo. Mooo mo! m'mo moo mooo Moooooo moooo mo mooo?"--moooooo mo m

broad bright coin to the sun--"it is a sixteen dollar piece, men. D'ye
moooo mooooo mooo mo moo moo--"mo mo m moooooo mooooo moooo, moo. M'mo

see it? Mr. Starbuck, hand me yon top-maul."
moo mo? Mo. Mooooooo, mooo mo moo moo-mooo."




While the mate was getting the hammer, Ahab, without speaking, was
Moooo moo mooo moo moooooo moo mooooo, Mooo, moooooo mooooooo, moo

slowly rubbing the gold piece against the skirts of his jacket, as if
mooooo moooooo moo mooo moooo moooooo moo mooooo mo moo mooooo, mo mo

to heighten its lustre, and without using any words was meanwhile
mo mooooooo moo mooooo, moo moooooo moooo moo moooo moo moooooooo

lowly humming to himself, producing a sound so strangely muffled and
moooo moooooo mo moooooo, moooooooo m moooo mo moooooooo moooooo moo

inarticulate that it seemed the mechanical humming of the wheels of his
mooooooooooo mooo mo mooooo moo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mo moo

vitality in him.
mooooooo mo moo.




Receiving the top-maul from Starbuck, he advanced towards the main-mast
Moooooooo moo moo-mooo mooo Mooooooo, mo mooooooo moooooo moo mooo-mooo

with the hammer uplifted in one hand, exhibiting the gold with the
mooo moo mooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo, mooooooooo moo mooo mooo moo

other, and with a high raised voice exclaiming: "Whosoever of ye
moooo, moo mooo m mooo mooooo moooo mooooooooo: "Moooooooo mo mo

raises me a white-headed whale with a wrinkled brow and a crooked jaw;
mooooo mo m moooo-mooooo moooo mooo m mooooooo mooo moo m moooooo moo;

whosoever of ye raises me that white-headed whale, with three holes
moooooooo mo mo mooooo mo mooo moooo-mooooo moooo, mooo moooo moooo

punctured in his starboard fluke--look ye, whosoever of ye raises me
moooooooo mo moo moooooooo moooo--mooo mo, moooooooo mo mo mooooo mo

that same white whale, he shall have this gold ounce, my boys!"
mooo mooo moooo moooo, mo moooo mooo mooo mooo moooo, mo mooo!"




"Huzza! huzza!" cried the seamen, as with swinging tarpaulins they
"Moooo! moooo!" moooo moo mooooo, mo mooo mooooooo mooooooooo mooo

hailed the act of nailing the gold to the mast.
mooooo moo moo mo moooooo moo mooo mo moo mooo.




"It's a white whale, I say," resumed Ahab, as he threw down the topmaul:
"Mo'm m moooo moooo, M moo," moooooo Mooo, mo mo moooo mooo moo moooooo:

"a white whale. Skin your eyes for him, men; look sharp for white water;
"m moooo moooo. Mooo mooo mooo moo moo, moo; mooo moooo moo moooo moooo;

if ye see but a bubble, sing out."
mo mo moo moo m mooooo, mooo moo."




All this while Tashtego, Daggoo, and Queequeg had looked on with even
Moo mooo moooo Mooooooo, Mooooo, moo Mooooooo moo mooooo mo mooo mooo

more intense interest and surprise than the rest, and at the mention
mooo moooooo mooooooo moo mooooooo mooo moo mooo, moo mo moo moooooo

mo moo mooooooo mooo moo moooooo moo mooo moo moooooo mo mo mooo moo

separately touched by some specific recollection.
mooooooooo moooooo mo mooo mooooooo mooooooooooo.




"Captain Ahab," said Tashtego, "that white whale must be the same that
"Moooooo Mooo," mooo Mooooooo, "mooo moooo moooo mooo mo moo mooo mooo

some call Moby Dick."
mooo mooo Mooo Mooo."




"Moby Dick?" shouted Ahab. "Do ye know the white whale then, Tash?"
"Mooo Mooo?" moooooo Mooo. "Mo mo mooo moo moooo moooo mooo, Mooo?"




"Does he fan-tail a little curious, sir, before he goes down?" said the
"Mooo mo moo-mooo m mooooo moooooo, moo, mooooo mo mooo mooo?" mooo moo

Gay-Header deliberately.
Moo-Mooooo mooooooooooo.




"And has he a curious spout, too," said Daggoo, "very bushy, even for a
"Moo moo mo m moooooo moooo, moo," mooo Mooooo, "mooo moooo, mooo moo m

parmacetty, and mighty quick, Captain Ahab?"
mooooooooo, moo mooooo moooo, Moooooo Mooo?"




"And he have one, two, three--oh! good many iron in him hide, too,
"Moo mo mooo moo, moo, moooo--mo! mooo mooo mooo mo moo mooo, moo,

Captain," cried Queequeg disjointedly, "all twiske-tee be-twisk, like
Moooooo," moooo Mooooooo mooooooooooo, "moo mooooo-moo mo-moooo, mooo

him--him--" faltering hard for a word, and screwing his hand round and
moo--moo--" moooooooo mooo moo m mooo, moo mooooooo moo mooo moooo moo

round as though uncorking a bottle--"like him--him--"
moooo mo mooooo moooooooo m mooooo--"mooo moo--moo--"




"Corkscrew!" cried Ahab, "aye, Queequeg, the harpoons lie all twisted
"Moooooooo!" moooo Mooo, "moo, Mooooooo, moo mooooooo moo moo moooooo

and wrenched in him; aye, Daggoo, his spout is a big one, like a whole
moo mooooooo mo moo; moo, Mooooo, moo moooo mo m moo moo, mooo m moooo

moooo mooooo moooo-mooooooo; moo, Mooooooo, moo mo moo-moooo mooo m

split jib in a squall. Death and devils! men, it is Moby Dick ye have
moooo moo mo m mooooo. Moooo moo mooooo! moo, mo mo Mooo Mooo mo mooo

seen--Moby Dick--Moby Dick!"
mooo--Mooo Mooo--Mooo Mooo!"




"Captain Ahab," said Starbuck, who, with Stubb and Flask, had thus far
"Moooooo Mooo," mooo Mooooooo, moo, mooo Moooo moo Moooo, moo mooo moo

been eyeing his superior with increasing surprise, but at last seemed
mooo mooooo moo mooooooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo, moo mo mooo mooooo

mooooo mooo m moooooo moooo mooooooo moooooooo moo moo mooooo. "Moooooo

Ahab, I have heard of Moby Dick--but it was not Moby Dick that took off

thy leg?"
moo moo?"




"Who told thee that?" cried Ahab; then pausing, "Aye, Starbuck; aye, my
"Moo mooo mooo mooo?" moooo Mooo; mooo moooooo, "Moo, Mooooooo; moo, mo

hearties all round; it was Moby Dick that dismasted me; Moby Dick that
mooooooo moo moooo; mo moo Mooo Mooo mooo moooooooo mo; Mooo Mooo mooo

moooooo mo mo mooo mooo moooo M moooo mo moo. Moo, moo," mo moooooo mooo

m mooooooo, mooo, mooooo moo, mooo mooo mo m moooo-mooooooo moooo;

"Aye, aye! it was that accursed white whale that razeed me; made a poor
"Moo, moo! mo moo mooo mooooooo moooo moooo mooo mooooo mo; mooo m mooo

pegging lubber of me for ever and a day!" Then tossing both arms, with
moooooo mooooo mo mo moo mooo moo m moo!" Mooo moooooo mooo mooo, mooo

moooooooooo mooooooooooo mo moooooo moo: "Moo, moo! moo M'mo moooo moo

moooo Mooo Mooo, moo moooo moo Mooo, moo moooo moo Mooooo Moooooooo, moo

moooo moooooooo'm mooooo mooooo M mooo moo mo. Moo mooo mo mooo mo mooo

moooooo moo, moo! mo moooo mooo moooo moooo mo mooo moooo mo mooo, moo

mooo moo moooo mo moooo, mooo mo mooooo moooo moooo moo moooo moo moo.

What say ye, men, will ye splice hands on it, now? I think ye do look
Mooo moo mo, moo, mooo mo mooooo moooo mo mo, moo? M moooo mo mo mooo

brave."
moooo."




"Aye, aye!" shouted the harpooneers and seamen, running closer to the
"Moo, moo!" moooooo moo moooooooooo moo mooooo, moooooo mooooo mo moo

excited old man: "A sharp eye for the white whale; a sharp lance for
moooooo moo moo: "M moooo moo moo moo moooo moooo; m moooo moooo moo

Moby Dick!"
Mooo Mooo!"




"God bless ye," he seemed to half sob and half shout. "God bless ye,
"Moo moooo mo," mo mooooo mo mooo moo moo mooo moooo. "Moo moooo mo,

men. Steward! go draw the great measure of grog. But what's this long
moo. Moooooo! mo mooo moo moooo moooooo mo mooo. Moo mooo'm mooo mooo

face about, Mr. Starbuck; wilt thou not chase the white whale? art not
mooo moooo, Mo. Mooooooo; mooo mooo moo moooo moo moooo moooo? moo moo

game for Moby Dick?"
mooo moo Mooo Mooo?"




"I am game for his crooked jaw, and for the jaws of Death too, Captain
"M mo mooo moo moo moooooo moo, moo moo moo mooo mo Moooo moo, Moooooo

Ahab, if it fairly comes in the way of the business we follow; but I
Mooo, mo mo mooooo moooo mo moo moo mo moo mooooooo mo mooooo; moo M

came here to hunt whales, not my commander's vengeance. How many barrels

mooo moo moooooooo moooo mooo mooo mo mooo moooooo mo, Moooooo Mooo? mo

will not fetch thee much in our Nantucket market."
mooo moo moooo mooo mooo mo moo Moooooooo mooooo."




"Nantucket market! Hoot! But come closer, Starbuck; thou requirest

a little lower layer. If money's to be the measurer, man, and the

"He smites his chest," whispered Stubb, "what's that for? methinks it

rings most vast, but hollow."
moooo mooo mooo, moo mooooo."




"Vengeance on a dumb brute!" cried Starbuck, "that simply smote thee

Moooooo Mooo, moooo moooooooooo."




"Hark ye yet again--the little lower layer. All visible objects, man,
"Mooo mo moo moooo--moo mooooo moooo moooo. Moo moooooo moooooo, moo,

mooo mooooo, mooooo moooooo moo mooo! Moo moo moo mooooooo moooo moooooo

man; I'd strike the sun if it insulted me. For could the sun do that,

mooo moooo M mo moo moooo; moooo moooo mo mooo m mooo mo mooo mooo

mooooo, mooooooo moooooooo mooo moo moooooooo. Moo moo mo mooooo, moo,

mo mooo mooo mooo mooo. Moo'm mooo mo? Moooo mooo mo mooooooo. Mooo moo

thine eye! more intolerable than fiends' glarings is a doltish

moooo moo mo moooooo mooo. Moo mo mo. Mooo! moo mooooo Moooooo mooooo mo

But in his joy at the enchanted, tacit acquiescence of the mate, Ahab

moooooooooo mo moo moooo, moooo moooo moooo mo mo.

moo mooo moo moooo, mo moooooooooo!"

CHAPTER 37. Sunset.
MOOOOOO mo. Mooooo.







THE CABIN; BY THE STERN WINDOWS; AHAB SITTING ALONE, AND GAZING OUT.
MOO MOOOO; MO MOO MOOOO MOOOOOO; MOOO MOOOOOO MOOOO, MOO MOOOOO MOO.







I leave a white and turbid wake; pale waters, paler cheeks, where'er I
M moooo m moooo moo mooooo mooo; mooo mooooo, moooo mooooo, moooo'mo M

sail. The envious billows sidelong swell to whelm my track; let them;
mooo. Moo moooooo moooooo mooooooo moooo mo moooo mo moooo; moo mooo;

but first I pass.
moo moooo M mooo.




Yonder, by ever-brimming goblet's rim, the warm waves blush like wine.
Mooooo, mo mooo-mooooooo mooooo'm moo, moo mooo moooo moooo mooo mooo.

The gold brow plumbs the blue. The diver sun--slow dived from noon--goes
Moo mooo mooo mooooo moo mooo. Moo moooo moo--mooo moooo mooo mooo--mooo

down; my soul mounts up! she wearies with her endless hill. Is, then,
mooo; mo mooo mooooo mo! moo moooooo mooo moo moooooo mooo. Mo, mooo,

the crown too heavy that I wear? this Iron Crown of Lombardy. Yet is
moo moooo moo moooo mooo M mooo? mooo Mooo Moooo mo Mooooooo. Moo mo

it bright with many a gem; I the wearer, see not its far flashings; but
mo mooooo mooo mooo m moo; M moo mooooo, moo moo moo moo moooooooo; moo

darkly feel that I wear that, that dazzlingly confounds. 'Tis iron--that
mooooo mooo mooo M mooo mooo, mooo mooooooooo moooooooo. 'Moo mooo--mooo

I know--not gold. 'Tis split, too--that I feel; the jagged edge galls
M mooo--moo mooo. 'Moo moooo, moo--mooo M mooo; moo mooooo mooo moooo

me so, my brain seems to beat against the solid metal; aye, steel skull,
mo mo, mo moooo moooo mo mooo moooooo moo moooo moooo; moo, moooo moooo,

mine; the sort that needs no helmet in the most brain-battering fight!
mooo; moo mooo mooo moooo mo mooooo mo moo mooo moooo-moooooooo moooo!




Dry heat upon my brow? Oh! time was, when as the sunrise nobly spurred
Moo mooo mooo mo mooo? Mo! mooo moo, mooo mo moo moooooo moooo moooooo

me, so the sunset soothed. No more. This lovely light, it lights not me;
mo, mo moo mooooo moooooo. Mo mooo. Mooo mooooo moooo, mo mooooo moo mo;

all loveliness is anguish to me, since I can ne'er enjoy. Gifted with
moo mooooooooo mo moooooo mo mo, moooo M moo mo'mo moooo. Mooooo mooo

the high perception, I lack the low, enjoying power; damned, most subtly
moo mooo mooooooooo, M mooo moo moo, mooooooo moooo; mooooo, mooo mooooo

and most malignantly! damned in the midst of Paradise! Good night--good
moo mooo moooooooooo! mooooo mo moo moooo mo Mooooooo! Mooo moooo--mooo

night! (WAVING HIS HAND, HE MOVES FROM THE WINDOW.)
moooo! (MOOOOO MOO MOOO, MO MOOOO MOOO MOO MOOOOO.)




'Twas not so hard a task. I thought to find one stubborn, at the least;
'Mooo moo mo mooo m mooo. M moooooo mo mooo moo mooooooo, mo moo moooo;

but my one cogged circle fits into all their various wheels, and they
moo mo moo mooooo mooooo mooo mooo moo moooo moooooo mooooo, moo mooo

revolve. Or, if you will, like so many ant-hills of powder, they all
moooooo. Mo, mo moo mooo, mooo mo mooo moo-moooo mo mooooo, mooo moo

stand before me; and I their match. Oh, hard! that to fire others, the
moooo mooooo mo; moo M moooo moooo. Mo, mooo! mooo mo mooo mooooo, moo

match itself must needs be wasting! What I've dared, I've willed; and
moooo mooooo mooo moooo mo moooooo! Mooo M'mo moooo, M'mo mooooo; moo

what I've willed, I'll do! They think me mad--Starbuck does; but I'm
mooo M'mo mooooo, M'mo mo! Mooo moooo mo moo--Mooooooo mooo; moo M'm

demoniac, I am madness maddened! That wild madness that's only calm
mooooooo, M mo moooooo mooooooo! Mooo mooo moooooo mooo'm mooo mooo

to comprehend itself! The prophecy was that I should be dismembered;
mo mooooooooo mooooo! Moo mooooooo moo mooo M mooooo mo moooooooooo;

and--Aye! I lost this leg. I now prophesy that I will dismember my
moo--Moo! M mooo mooo moo. M moo mooooooo mooo M mooo moooooooo mo

dismemberer. Now, then, be the prophet and the fulfiller one. That's
moooooooooo. Moo, mooo, mo moo moooooo moo moo moooooooo moo. Mooo'm

more than ye, ye great gods, ever were. I laugh and hoot at ye, ye
mooo mooo mo, mo moooo mooo, mooo mooo. M moooo moo mooo mo mo, mo

cricket-players, ye pugilists, ye deaf Burkes and blinded Bendigoes!
moooooo-moooooo, mo moooooooo, mo mooo Mooooo moo moooooo Moooooooo!

I will not say as schoolboys do to bullies--Take some one of your own
M mooo moo moo mo mooooooooo mo mo moooooo--Mooo mooo moo mo mooo moo

size; don't pommel ME! No, ye've knocked me down, and I am up again; but
mooo; moo'm mooooo MO! Mo, mo'mo moooooo mo mooo, moo M mo mo moooo; moo

YE have run and hidden. Come forth from behind your cotton bags! I have
MO mooo moo moo mooooo. Mooo moooo mooo mooooo mooo mooooo mooo! M mooo

no long gun to reach ye. Come, Ahab's compliments to ye; come and see
mo mooo moo mo moooo mo. Mooo, Mooo'm moooooooooo mo mo; mooo moo moo

if ye can swerve me. Swerve me? ye cannot swerve me, else ye swerve
mo mo moo mooooo mo. Mooooo mo? mo mooooo mooooo mo, mooo mo mooooo

yourselves! man has ye there. Swerve me? The path to my fixed purpose is
mooooooooo! moo moo mo moooo. Mooooo mo? Moo mooo mo mo moooo moooooo mo

laid with iron rails, whereon my soul is grooved to run. Over unsounded
mooo mooo mooo moooo, moooooo mo mooo mo moooooo mo moo. Mooo moooooooo

gorges, through the rifled hearts of mountains, under torrents' beds,
mooooo, moooooo moo mooooo mooooo mo moooooooo, moooo mooooooo' mooo,

unerringly I rush! Naught's an obstacle, naught's an angle to the iron
mooooooooo M mooo! Mooooo'm mo mooooooo, mooooo'm mo moooo mo moo mooo

way!
moo!










CHAPTER 38. Dusk.
MOOOOOO mo. Mooo.







BY THE MAINMAST; STARBUCK LEANING AGAINST IT.
MO MOO MOOOOOOO; MOOOOOOO MOOOOOO MOOOOOO MO.







My soul is more than matched; she's overmanned; and by a madman!
Mo mooo mo mooo mooo moooooo; moo'm mooooooooo; moo mo m mooooo!

Insufferable sting, that sanity should ground arms on such a field! But
Mooooooooooo moooo, mooo mooooo mooooo mooooo mooo mo mooo m moooo! Moo

he drilled deep down, and blasted all my reason out of me! I think I see
mo moooooo mooo mooo, moo moooooo moo mo mooooo moo mo mo! M moooo M moo

his impious end; but feel that I must help him to it. Will I, nill I,
moo moooooo moo; moo mooo mooo M mooo mooo moo mo mo. Mooo M, mooo M,

the ineffable thing has tied me to him; tows me with a cable I have no
moo moooooooo moooo moo mooo mo mo moo; mooo mo mooo m moooo M mooo mo

knife to cut. Horrible old man! Who's over him, he cries;--aye, he would
moooo mo moo. Mooooooo moo moo! Moo'm mooo moo, mo moooo;--moo, mo moooo

be a democrat to all above; look, how he lords it over all below! Oh! I
mo m mooooooo mo moo moooo; mooo, moo mo moooo mo mooo moo moooo! Mo! M

plainly see my miserable office,--to obey, rebelling; and worse yet,
moooooo moo mo moooooooo mooooo,--mo mooo, moooooooo; moo moooo moo,

to hate with touch of pity! For in his eyes I read some lurid woe would
mo mooo mooo moooo mo mooo! Moo mo moo mooo M mooo mooo moooo moo moooo

shrivel me up, had I it. Yet is there hope. Time and tide flow wide.
moooooo mo mo, moo M mo. Moo mo moooo mooo. Mooo moo mooo mooo mooo.

The hated whale has the round watery world to swim in, as the small
Moo moooo moooo moo moo moooo mooooo moooo mo mooo mo, mo moo moooo

gold-fish has its glassy globe. His heaven-insulting purpose, God may
mooo-mooo moo moo mooooo moooo. Moo mooooo-moooooooo moooooo, Moo moo

wedge aside. I would up heart, were it not like lead. But my whole
moooo moooo. M moooo mo moooo, mooo mo moo mooo mooo. Moo mo moooo

clock's run down; my heart the all-controlling weight, I have no key to
moooo'm moo mooo; mo moooo moo moo-moooooooooo mooooo, M mooo mo moo mo

lift again.
mooo moooo.







[A BURST OF REVELRY FROM THE FORECASTLE.]
[M MOOOO MO MOOOOOO MOOO MOO MOOOOOOOOO.]







Oh, God! to sail with such a heathen crew that have small touch of human
Mo, Moo! mo mooo mooo mooo m moooooo mooo mooo mooo moooo moooo mo moooo

mothers in them! Whelped somewhere by the sharkish sea. The white whale
moooooo mo mooo! Moooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo moo. Moo moooo moooo

is their demigorgon. Hark! the infernal orgies! that revelry is forward!
mo moooo mooooooooo. Mooo! moo mooooooo mooooo! mooo moooooo mo moooooo!

mark the unfaltering silence aft! Methinks it pictures life. Foremost
mooo moo moooooooooo moooooo moo! Mooooooo mo mooooooo mooo. Mooooooo

through the sparkling sea shoots on the gay, embattled, bantering
moooooo moo moooooooo moo mooooo mo moo moo, moooooooo, moooooooo

bow, but only to drag dark Ahab after it, where he broods within his
moo, moo mooo mo mooo mooo Mooo moooo mo, moooo mo mooooo mooooo moo

sternward cabin, builded over the dead water of the wake, and further
moooooooo moooo, moooooo mooo moo mooo moooo mo moo mooo, moo moooooo

on, hunted by its wolfish gurglings. The long howl thrills me through!
mo, mooooo mo moo moooooo moooooooo. Moo mooo mooo moooooo mo moooooo!

Peace! ye revellers, and set the watch! Oh, life! 'tis in an hour like
Moooo! mo moooooooo, moo moo moo moooo! Mo, mooo! 'moo mo mo mooo mooo

this, with soul beat down and held to knowledge,--as wild, untutored
mooo, mooo mooo mooo mooo moo mooo mo moooooooo,--mo mooo, moooooooo

things are forced to feed--Oh, life! 'tis now that I do feel the latent
mooooo moo mooooo mo mooo--Mo, mooo! 'moo moo mooo M mo mooo moo mooooo

horror in thee! but 'tis not me! that horror's out of me! and with the
mooooo mo mooo! moo 'moo moo mo! mooo mooooo'm moo mo mo! moo mooo moo

soft feeling of the human in me, yet will I try to fight ye, ye grim,
mooo moooooo mo moo moooo mo mo, moo mooo M moo mo moooo mo, mo mooo,

phantom futures! Stand by me, hold me, bind me, O ye blessed influences!
moooooo moooooo! Moooo mo mo, mooo mo, mooo mo, M mo moooooo mooooooooo!










CHAPTER 39. First Night Watch.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooo Moooo Moooo.




Fore-Top.
Mooo-Moo.




(STUBB SOLUS, AND MENDING A BRACE.)
(MOOOO MOOOO, MOO MOOOOOO M MOOOO.)







Ha! ha! ha! ha! hem! clear my throat!--I've been thinking over it
Mo! mo! mo! mo! moo! moooo mo mooooo!--M'mo mooo mooooooo mooo mo

ever since, and that ha, ha's the final consequence. Why so? Because a
mooo moooo, moo mooo mo, mo'm moo moooo moooooooooo. Moo mo? Moooooo m

laugh's the wisest, easiest answer to all that's queer; and come what
moooo'm moo mooooo, moooooo mooooo mo moo mooo'm moooo; moo mooo mooo

will, one comfort's always left--that unfailing comfort is, it's all
mooo, moo moooooo'm mooooo mooo--mooo moooooooo moooooo mo, mo'm moo

predestinated. I heard not all his talk with Starbuck; but to my poor
moooooooooooo. M moooo moo moo moo mooo mooo Mooooooo; moo mo mo mooo

eye Starbuck then looked something as I the other evening felt. Be sure
moo Mooooooo mooo mooooo moooooooo mo M moo moooo moooooo mooo. Mo mooo

the old Mogul has fixed him, too. I twigged it, knew it; had had the
moo moo Moooo moo moooo moo, moo. M moooooo mo, mooo mo; moo moo moo

gift, might readily have prophesied it--for when I clapped my eye upon
mooo, moooo moooooo mooo mooooooooo mo--moo mooo M moooooo mo moo mooo

his skull I saw it. Well, Stubb, WISE Stubb--that's my title--well,
moo moooo M moo mo. Mooo, Moooo, MOOO Moooo--mooo'm mo moooo--mooo,

Stubb, what of it, Stubb? Here's a carcase. I know not all that may be
Moooo, mooo mo mo, Moooo? Mooo'm m moooooo. M mooo moo moo mooo moo mo

coming, but be it what it will, I'll go to it laughing. Such a waggish
mooooo, moo mo mo mooo mo mooo, M'mo mo mo mo mooooooo. Mooo m moooooo

leering as lurks in all your horribles! I feel funny. Fa, la! lirra,
moooooo mo moooo mo moo mooo moooooooo! M mooo moooo. Mo, mo! moooo,

skirra! What's my juicy little pear at home doing now? Crying its eyes
mooooo! Mooo'm mo moooo mooooo mooo mo mooo moooo moo? Mooooo moo mooo

out?--Giving a party to the last arrived harpooneers, I dare say, gay as
moo?--Mooooo m moooo mo moo mooo moooooo moooooooooo, M mooo moo, moo mo

a frigate's pennant, and so am I--fa, la! lirra, skirra! Oh--
m moooooo'm moooooo, moo mo mo M--mo, mo! moooo, mooooo! Mo--




We'll drink to-night with hearts as light, To love, as gay and fleeting
Mo'mo moooo mo-moooo mooo mooooo mo moooo, Mo mooo, mo moo moo mooooooo

As bubbles that swim, on the beaker's brim, And break on the lips while
Mo moooooo mooo mooo, mo moo mooooo'm mooo, Moo moooo mo moo mooo moooo

meeting.
moooooo.







A brave stave that--who calls? Mr. Starbuck? Aye, aye, sir--(ASIDE) he's
M moooo moooo mooo--moo moooo? Mo. Mooooooo? Moo, moo, moo--(MOOOO) mo'm

my superior, he has his too, if I'm not mistaken.--Aye, aye, sir, just
mo mooooooo, mo moo moo moo, mo M'm moo mooooooo.--Moo, moo, moo, mooo

through with this job--coming.
moooooo mooo mooo moo--mooooo.










CHAPTER 40. Midnight, Forecastle.
MOOOOOO mo. Mooooooo, Mooooooooo.




HARPOONEERS AND SAILORS.
MOOOOOOOOOO MOO MOOOOOO.




(FORESAIL RISES AND DISCOVERS THE WATCH STANDING, LOUNGING, LEANING, AND
(MOOOOOOO MOOOO MOO MOOOOOOOO MOO MOOOO MOOOOOOO, MOOOOOOO, MOOOOOO, MOO

LYING IN VARIOUS ATTITUDES, ALL SINGING IN CHORUS.)
MOOOO MO MOOOOOO MOOOOOOOO, MOO MOOOOOO MO MOOOOO.)




     Farewell and adieu to you, Spanish ladies!
     Mooooooo moo moooo mo moo, Moooooo mooooo!

     Farewell and adieu to you, ladies of Spain!
     Mooooooo moo moooo mo moo, mooooo mo Moooo!

     Our captain's commanded.--
     Moo moooooo'm moooooooo.--




1ST NANTUCKET SAILOR. Oh, boys, don't be sentimental; it's bad for the
MOO MOOOOOOOO MOOOOO. Mo, mooo, moo'm mo moooooooooo; mo'm moo moo moo

digestion! Take a tonic, follow me! (SINGS, AND ALL FOLLOW)
moooooooo! Mooo m moooo, mooooo mo! (MOOOO, MOO MOO MOOOOO)




    Our captain stood upon the deck,
    Moo moooooo moooo mooo moo mooo,

    A spy-glass in his hand,
    M moo-moooo mo moo mooo,

    A viewing of those gallant whales
    M moooooo mo moooo moooooo mooooo

    That blew at every strand.
    Mooo mooo mo moooo mooooo.

    Oh, your tubs in your boats, my boys,
    Mo, mooo mooo mo mooo moooo, mo mooo,

    And by your braces stand,
    Moo mo mooo mooooo moooo,

    And we'll have one of those fine whales,
    Moo mo'mo mooo moo mo moooo mooo mooooo,

    Hand, boys, over hand!
    Mooo, mooo, mooo mooo!

    So, be cheery, my lads! may your hearts never fail!
    Mo, mo mooooo, mo mooo! moo mooo mooooo moooo mooo!

    While the bold harpooner is striking the whale!
    Moooo moo mooo moooooooo mo mooooooo moo moooo!




MATE'S VOICE FROM THE QUARTER-DECK. Eight bells there, forward!
MOOO'M MOOOO MOOO MOO MOOOOOO-MOOO. Moooo moooo moooo, moooooo!




2ND NANTUCKET SAILOR. Avast the chorus! Eight bells there! d'ye hear,
MOO MOOOOOOOO MOOOOO. Moooo moo mooooo! Moooo moooo moooo! m'mo mooo,

bell-boy? Strike the bell eight, thou Pip! thou blackling! and let me
mooo-moo? Mooooo moo mooo moooo, mooo Moo! mooo moooooooo! moo moo mo

call the watch. I've the sort of mouth for that--the hogshead mouth.
mooo moo moooo. M'mo moo mooo mo moooo moo mooo--moo mooooooo moooo.

So, so, (THRUSTS HIS HEAD DOWN THE SCUTTLE,) Star-bo-l-e-e-n-s, a-h-o-y!
Mo, mo, (MOOOOOO MOO MOOO MOOO MOO MOOOOOO,) Mooo-mo-m-m-m-m-m, m-m-m-m!

Eight bells there below! Tumble up!
Moooo moooo moooo moooo! Mooooo mo!




DUTCH SAILOR. Grand snoozing to-night, maty; fat night for that. I
MOOOO MOOOOO. Moooo mooooooo mo-moooo, mooo; moo moooo moo mooo. M

mark this in our old Mogul's wine; it's quite as deadening to some as
mooo mooo mo moo moo Moooo'm mooo; mo'm moooo mo moooooooo mo mooo mo

filliping to others. We sing; they sleep--aye, lie down there, like
moooooooo mo mooooo. Mo mooo; mooo moooo--moo, moo mooo moooo, mooo

ground-tier butts. At 'em again! There, take this copper-pump, and hail
mooooo-mooo moooo. Mo 'mo moooo! Moooo, mooo mooo mooooo-mooo, moo mooo

'em through it. Tell 'em to avast dreaming of their lasses. Tell 'em
'mo moooooo mo. Mooo 'mo mo moooo mooooooo mo moooo mooooo. Mooo 'mo

it's the resurrection; they must kiss their last, and come to judgment.
mo'm moo mooooooooooo; mooo mooo mooo moooo mooo, moo mooo mo mooooooo.

That's the way--THAT'S it; thy throat ain't spoiled with eating
Mooo'm moo moo--MOOO'M mo; moo mooooo moo'm moooooo mooo mooooo

Amsterdam butter.
Moooooooo mooooo.




FRENCH SAILOR. Hist, boys! let's have a jig or two before we ride to
MOOOOO MOOOOO. Mooo, mooo! moo'm mooo m moo mo moo mooooo mo mooo mo

anchor in Blanket Bay. What say ye? There comes the other watch. Stand
mooooo mo Moooooo Moo. Mooo moo mo? Moooo moooo moo moooo moooo. Moooo

by all legs! Pip! little Pip! hurrah with your tambourine!
mo moo mooo! Moo! mooooo Moo! mooooo mooo mooo mooooooooo!




PIP. (SULKY AND SLEEPY) Don't know where it is.
MOO. (MOOOO MOO MOOOOO) Moo'm mooo moooo mo mo.




FRENCH SAILOR. Beat thy belly, then, and wag thy ears. Jig it, men,
MOOOOO MOOOOO. Mooo moo moooo, mooo, moo moo moo mooo. Moo mo, moo,

I say; merry's the word; hurrah! Damn me, won't you dance? Form, now,
M moo; moooo'm moo mooo; mooooo! Mooo mo, moo'm moo moooo? Mooo, moo,

Indian-file, and gallop into the double-shuffle? Throw yourselves! Legs!
Mooooo-mooo, moo mooooo mooo moo mooooo-moooooo? Moooo mooooooooo! Mooo!

legs!
mooo!




ICELAND SAILOR. I don't like your floor, maty; it's too springy to my

taste. I'm used to ice-floors. I'm sorry to throw cold water on the

subject; but excuse me.
moooooo; moo mooooo mo.




MALTESE SAILOR. Me too; where's your girls? Who but a fool would take

mooo mooo mooooooo!

LONG-ISLAND SAILOR. Well, well, ye sulkies, there's plenty more of us.

moooo moo moooo; moo moo mo!

humph! I save my sweat.

OLD MANX SAILOR. I wonder whether those jolly lads bethink them of what
MOO MOOO MOOOOO. M mooooo moooooo moooo moooo mooo moooooo mooo mo mooo

mooo moo moooooo mooo. M'mo moooo mooo mooo moooo, M mooo--mooo'm

moo moooooooo mooooo mo mooo moooo-moooo, mooo mooo mooo-moooo moooo

moooooo. M Mooooo! mo moooo mo moo moooo mooooo moo moo moooo-moooooo

moooo! Mooo, mooo; mooooo moo moooo moooo'm m mooo, mo moo mooooooo mooo

young; I was once.
moooo; M moo mooo.




3D NANTUCKET SAILOR. Spell oh!--whew! this is worse than pulling after

MALTESE SAILOR. (RECLINING AND SHAKING HIS CAP.) It's the waves--the
MOOOOOO MOOOOO. (MOOOOOOOO MOO MOOOOOO MOO MOO.) Mo'm moo moooo--moo

mo!--mo moooo moooo moooooo mo mooo, mooo mooooo mo moo moooo, mooo moo

SICILIAN SAILOR. (RECLINING.) Tell me not of it! Hark ye, lad--fleet

interlacings of the limbs--lithe swayings--coyings--flutterings! lip!

TAHITAN SAILOR. (RECLINING ON A MAT.) Hail, holy nakedness of our
MOOOOOO MOOOOO. (MOOOOOOOO MO M MOO.) Mooo, mooo moooooooo mo moo

dancing girls!--the Heeva-Heeva! Ah! low veiled, high palmed Tahiti! I

moo mooooo moooo. Mo mo!--moo mooo moo M moo mooo moo mooooo! Moo

PORTUGUESE SAILOR. How the sea rolls swashing 'gainst the side! Stand

mooo'mo mo moooooo moooooooo.

mooo moooo-mooooo mooo, mo moooo moo moo-mooo moooo!




4TH NANTUCKET SAILOR. He has his orders, mind ye that. I heard old

mooooooooo mooo m mooooo--mooo mooo mooo moooo mooo mo!




ENGLISH SAILOR. Blood! but that old man's a grand old cove! We are the

lads to hunt him up his whale!
mooo mo mooo moo mo moo moooo!




ALL. Aye! aye!
MOO. Moo! moo!




OLD MANX SAILOR. How the three pines shake! Pines are the hardest sort
MOO MOOO MOOOOO. Moo moo moooo moooo moooo! Moooo moo moo moooooo mooo

of tree to live when shifted to any other soil, and here there's none
mo mooo mo mooo mooo moooooo mo moo moooo mooo, moo mooo moooo'm mooo

moo moo mooo'm mooooo mooo. Mooooo, mooooooo! mooooo. Mooo mo moo mooo

mo moooooo mooo moooo mooooo mooo mooooo, moo mooooo moooo moooo mo moo.

sky--lurid-like, ye see, all else pitch black.
moo--moooo-mooo, mo moo, moo mooo moooo moooo.

moo mo mo!

PIP (SHRINKING UNDER THE WINDLASS). Jollies? Lord help such jollies!
MOO (MOOOOOOOO MOOOO MOO MOOOOOOO). Moooooo? Mooo mooo mooo moooooo!

Moo, mooo moooo moo moooo mooo! Mo'm moooo mooo moooo mo moo moooooo

mooo'mo mo moo mooo mo mooooo. Mooo mo mooo! Moooooo, mooo m mooooo!
