mooooo mo mooo mooo!










CHAPTER 41. Moby Dick.
MOOOOOO mo. Mooo Mooo.







I, Ishmael, was one of that crew; my shouts had gone up with the rest;
M, Moooooo, moo moo mo mooo mooo; mo mooooo moo mooo mo mooo moo mooo;

my oath had been welded with theirs; and stronger I shouted, and more
mo mooo moo mooo mooooo mooo mooooo; moo mooooooo M moooooo, moo mooo

did I hammer and clinch my oath, because of the dread in my soul. A
moo M mooooo moo mooooo mo mooo, moooooo mo moo moooo mo mo mooo. M

wild, mystical, sympathetical feeling was in me; Ahab's quenchless feud
mooo, mooooooo, moooooooooooo moooooo moo mo mo; Mooo'm mooooooooo mooo

seemed mine. With greedy ears I learned the history of that murderous
mooooo mooo. Mooo mooooo mooo M moooooo moo moooooo mo mooo moooooooo

monster against whom I and all the others had taken our oaths of
moooooo moooooo mooo M moo moo moo mooooo moo moooo moo moooo mo

violence and revenge.
mooooooo moo moooooo.




For some time past, though at intervals only, the unaccompanied,
Moo mooo mooo mooo, mooooo mo moooooooo mooo, moo moooooooooooo,

secluded White Whale had haunted those uncivilized seas mostly
mooooooo Moooo Moooo moo moooooo moooo moooooooooo mooo mooooo

frequented by the Sperm Whale fishermen. But not all of them knew of his
mooooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo moooooooo. Moo moo moo mo mooo mooo mo moo

existence; only a few of them, comparatively, had knowingly seen him;
moooooooo; mooo m moo mo mooo, moooooooooooo, moo moooooooo mooo moo;

while the number who as yet had actually and knowingly given battle to
moooo moo mooooo moo mo moo moo mooooooo moo moooooooo moooo mooooo mo

him, was small indeed. For, owing to the large number of whale-cruisers;
moo, moo moooo mooooo. Moo, moooo mo moo moooo mooooo mo moooo-mooooooo;

the disorderly way they were sprinkled over the entire watery
moo mooooooooo moo mooo mooo moooooooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo

circumference, many of them adventurously pushing their quest along
moooooooooooo, mooo mo mooo moooooooooooo moooooo moooo moooo moooo

solitary latitudes, so as seldom or never for a whole twelvemonth or
mooooooo moooooooo, mo mo mooooo mo moooo moo m moooo moooooooooo mo

more on a stretch, to encounter a single news-telling sail of any sort;
mooo mo m moooooo, mo moooooooo m mooooo mooo-moooooo mooo mo moo mooo;

the inordinate length of each separate voyage; the irregularity of the
moo mooooooooo mooooo mo mooo mooooooo mooooo; moo mooooooooooo mo moo

times of sailing from home; all these, with other circumstances, direct
moooo mo moooooo mooo mooo; moo moooo, mooo moooo moooooooooooo, mooooo

and indirect, long obstructed the spread through the whole world-wide
moo mooooooo, mooo mooooooooo moo mooooo moooooo moo moooo moooo-mooo

whaling-fleet of the special individualizing tidings concerning Moby
moooooo-moooo mo moo moooooo moooooooooooooo moooooo mooooooooo Mooo

Dick. It was hardly to be doubted, that several vessels reported to have
Mooo. Mo moo mooooo mo mo moooooo, mooo moooooo moooooo mooooooo mo mooo

encountered, at such or such a time, or on such or such a meridian,
moooooooooo, mo mooo mo mooo m mooo, mo mo mooo mo mooo m mooooooo,

a Sperm Whale of uncommon magnitude and malignity, which whale, after
m Moooo Moooo mo mooooooo moooooooo moo moooooooo, moooo moooo, moooo

doing great mischief to his assailants, had completely escaped them; to
moooo moooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooooo, moo mooooooooo moooooo mooo; mo

some minds it was not an unfair presumption, I say, that the whale in
mooo moooo mo moo moo mo mooooo moooooooooo, M moo, mooo moo moooo mo

question must have been no other than Moby Dick. Yet as of late the
mooooooo mooo mooo mooo mo moooo mooo Mooo Mooo. Moo mo mo mooo moo

Sperm Whale fishery had been marked by various and not unfrequent
Moooo Moooo moooooo moo mooo mooooo mo moooooo moo moo mooooooooo

instances of great ferocity, cunning, and malice in the monster
moooooooo mo moooo mooooooo, moooooo, moo mooooo mo moo moooooo

attacked; therefore it was, that those who by accident ignorantly gave
mooooooo; moooooooo mo moo, mooo moooo moo mo mooooooo mooooooooo mooo

battle to Moby Dick; such hunters, perhaps, for the most part, were
mooooo mo Mooo Mooo; mooo moooooo, moooooo, moo moo mooo mooo, mooo

content to ascribe the peculiar terror he bred, more, as it were, to
moooooo mo moooooo moo mooooooo mooooo mo mooo, mooo, mo mo mooo, mo

the perils of the Sperm Whale fishery at large, than to the individual
moo mooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo moooooo mo moooo, mooo mo moo mooooooooo

cause. In that way, mostly, the disastrous encounter between Ahab and
moooo. Mo mooo moo, mooooo, moo mooooooooo moooooooo moooooo Mooo moo

the whale had hitherto been popularly regarded.
moo moooo moo mooooooo mooo moooooooo mooooooo.




And as for those who, previously hearing of the White Whale, by chance
Moo mo moo moooo moo, mooooooooo moooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo, mo mooooo

caught sight of him; in the beginning of the thing they had every one of
mooooo moooo mo moo; mo moo moooooooo mo moo moooo mooo moo moooo moo mo

them, almost, as boldly and fearlessly lowered for him, as for any other
mooo, mooooo, mo mooooo moo mooooooooo moooooo moo moo, mo moo moo moooo

whale of that species. But at length, such calamities did ensue in these
moooo mo mooo moooooo. Moo mo mooooo, mooo mooooooooo moo moooo mo moooo

assaults--not restricted to sprained wrists and ankles, broken limbs, or
mooooooo--moo mooooooooo mo mooooooo mooooo moo mooooo, mooooo moooo, mo

devouring amputations--but fatal to the last degree of fatality; those
moooooooo moooooooooo--moo moooo mo moo mooo mooooo mo mooooooo; moooo

repeated disastrous repulses, all accumulating and piling their terrors
mooooooo mooooooooo mooooooo, moo mooooooooooo moo mooooo moooo moooooo

upon Moby Dick; those things had gone far to shake the fortitude of many
mooo Mooo Mooo; moooo mooooo moo mooo moo mo moooo moo moooooooo mo mooo

brave hunters, to whom the story of the White Whale had eventually come.
moooo moooooo, mo mooo moo moooo mo moo Moooo Moooo moo mooooooooo mooo.




Nor did wild rumors of all sorts fail to exaggerate, and still the more
Moo moo mooo mooooo mo moo moooo mooo mo mooooooooo, moo moooo moo mooo

horrify the true histories of these deadly encounters. For not only do
moooooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moooo mooooo mooooooooo. Moo moo mooo mo

fabulous rumors naturally grow out of the very body of all surprising
mooooooo mooooo moooooooo mooo moo mo moo mooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo

terrible events,--as the smitten tree gives birth to its fungi; but, in
mooooooo mooooo,--mo moo moooooo mooo moooo moooo mo moo moooo; moo, mo

maritime life, far more than in that of terra firma, wild rumors abound,
mooooooo mooo, moo mooo mooo mo mooo mo moooo moooo, mooo mooooo mooooo,

wherever there is any adequate reality for them to cling to. And as the
mooooooo moooo mo moo mooooooo moooooo moo mooo mo moooo mo. Moo mo moo

sea surpasses the land in this matter, so the whale fishery surpasses
moo moooooooo moo mooo mo mooo mooooo, mo moo moooo moooooo moooooooo

every other sort of maritime life, in the wonderfulness and fearfulness
moooo moooo mooo mo mooooooo mooo, mo moo moooooooooooo moo moooooooooo

of the rumors which sometimes circulate there. For not only are whalemen
mo moo mooooo moooo moooooooo moooooooo moooo. Moo moo mooo moo mooooooo

as a body unexempt from that ignorance and superstitiousness hereditary
mo m mooo mooooooo mooo mooo moooooooo moo moooooooooooooooo mooooooooo

to all sailors; but of all sailors, they are by all odds the most
mo moo moooooo; moo mo moo moooooo, mooo moo mo moo mooo moo mooo

directly brought into contact with whatever is appallingly astonishing
mooooooo moooooo mooo moooooo mooo mooooooo mo moooooooooo moooooooooo

in the sea; face to face they not only eye its greatest marvels, but,
mo moo moo; mooo mo mooo mooo moo mooo moo moo mooooooo moooooo, moo,

hand to jaw, give battle to them. Alone, in such remotest waters, that
mooo mo moo, mooo mooooo mo mooo. Moooo, mo mooo mooooooo mooooo, mooo

though you sailed a thousand miles, and passed a thousand shores, you
mooooo moo mooooo m mooooooo moooo, moo mooooo m mooooooo mooooo, moo

would not come to any chiseled hearth-stone, or aught hospitable beneath
moooo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo-moooo, mo moooo mooooooooo moooooo

that part of the sun; in such latitudes and longitudes, pursuing too
mooo mooo mo moo moo; mo mooo moooooooo moo mooooooooo, mooooooo moo

such a calling as he does, the whaleman is wrapped by influences all
mooo m moooooo mo mo mooo, moo mooooooo mo moooooo mo mooooooooo moo

tending to make his fancy pregnant with many a mighty birth.
moooooo mo mooo moo moooo mooooooo mooo mooo m mooooo moooo.




No wonder, then, that ever gathering volume from the mere transit over
Mo mooooo, mooo, mooo mooo moooooooo mooooo mooo moo mooo moooooo mooo

the widest watery spaces, the outblown rumors of the White Whale did
moo mooooo mooooo mooooo, moo mooooooo mooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo moo

in the end incorporate with themselves all manner of morbid hints,
mo moo moo moooooooooo mooo mooooooooo moo mooooo mo mooooo moooo,

and half-formed foetal suggestions of supernatural agencies, which
moo mooo-mooooo mooooo moooooooooo mo mooooooooooo mooooooo, moooo

eventually invested Moby Dick with new terrors unborrowed from anything
mooooooooo mooooooo Mooo Mooo mooo moo moooooo mooooooooo mooo mooooooo

that visibly appears. So that in many cases such a panic did he finally
mooo moooooo moooooo. Mo mooo mo mooo moooo mooo m moooo moo mo moooooo

strike, that few who by those rumors, at least, had heard of the White
mooooo, mooo moo moo mo moooo mooooo, mo moooo, moo moooo mo moo Moooo

Whale, few of those hunters were willing to encounter the perils of his
Moooo, moo mo moooo moooooo mooo moooooo mo moooooooo moo mooooo mo moo

jaw.
moo.




But there were still other and more vital practical influences at work.
Moo moooo mooo moooo moooo moo mooo moooo moooooooo mooooooooo mo mooo.

Not even at the present day has the original prestige of the Sperm
Moo mooo mo moo moooooo moo moo moo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo Moooo

Whale, as fearfully distinguished from all other species of the
Moooo, mo moooooooo moooooooooooo mooo moo moooo moooooo mo moo

leviathan, died out of the minds of the whalemen as a body. There are
moooooooo, mooo moo mo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo mo m mooo. Moooo moo

those this day among them, who, though intelligent and courageous
moooo mooo moo moooo mooo, moo, mooooo moooooooooo moo mooooooooo

enough in offering battle to the Greenland or Right whale, would
mooooo mo mooooooo mooooo mo moo Moooooooo mo Moooo moooo, moooo

perhaps--either from professional inexperience, or incompetency, or
moooooo--mooooo mooo mooooooooooo mooooooooooo, mo mooooooooooo, mo

timidity, decline a contest with the Sperm Whale; at any rate, there are
mooooooo, moooooo m moooooo mooo moo Moooo Moooo; mo moo mooo, moooo moo

plenty of whalemen, especially among those whaling nations not sailing
mooooo mo mooooooo, mooooooooo moooo moooo moooooo moooooo moo moooooo

under the American flag, who have never hostilely encountered the Sperm
moooo moo Mooooooo mooo, moo mooo moooo moooooooo moooooooooo moo Moooo

Whale, but whose sole knowledge of the leviathan is restricted to
Moooo, moo moooo mooo moooooooo mo moo moooooooo mo mooooooooo mo

the ignoble monster primitively pursued in the North; seated on their
moo moooooo moooooo moooooooooo moooooo mo moo Moooo; mooooo mo moooo

hatches, these men will hearken with a childish fireside interest
moooooo, moooo moo mooo moooooo mooo m mooooooo mooooooo mooooooo

and awe, to the wild, strange tales of Southern whaling. Nor is the
moo moo, mo moo mooo, moooooo moooo mo Mooooooo moooooo. Moo mo moo

pre-eminent tremendousness of the great Sperm Whale anywhere more
moo-moooooo mooooooooooooo mo moo moooo Moooo Moooo mooooooo mooo

feelingly comprehended, than on board of those prows which stem him.
moooooooo mooooooooooo, mooo mo moooo mo moooo moooo moooo mooo moo.




And as if the now tested reality of his might had in former
Moo mo mo moo moo mooooo moooooo mo moo moooo moo mo mooooo

legendary times thrown its shadow before it; we find some book
moooooooo moooo mooooo moo mooooo mooooo mo; mo mooo mooo mooo

naturalists--Olassen and Povelson--declaring the Sperm Whale not only to
moooooooooo--Moooooo moo Mooooooo--moooooooo moo Moooo Moooo moo mooo mo

be a consternation to every other creature in the sea, but also to be so
mo m moooooooooooo mo moooo moooo mooooooo mo moo moo, moo mooo mo mo mo

incredibly ferocious as continually to be athirst for human blood. Nor
mooooooooo moooooooo mo moooooooooo mo mo moooooo moo moooo moooo. Moo

even down to so late a time as Cuvier's, were these or almost similar
mooo mooo mo mo mooo m mooo mo Mooooo'm, mooo moooo mo mooooo moooooo

impressions effaced. For in his Natural History, the Baron himself
moooooooooo moooooo. Moo mo moo Moooooo Moooooo, moo Moooo moooooo

affirms that at sight of the Sperm Whale, all fish (sharks included) are
moooooo mooo mo moooo mo moo Moooo Moooo, moo mooo (mooooo mooooooo) moo

"struck with the most lively terrors," and "often in the precipitancy of
"mooooo mooo moo mooo mooooo moooooo," moo "moooo mo moo mooooooooooo mo

their flight dash themselves against the rocks with such violence as to
moooo mooooo mooo mooooooooo moooooo moo moooo mooo mooo mooooooo mo mo

cause instantaneous death." And however the general experiences in the
moooo moooooooooooo moooo." Moo moooooo moo moooooo moooooooooo mo moo

fishery may amend such reports as these; yet in their full terribleness,
moooooo moo moooo mooo moooooo mo moooo; moo mo moooo mooo mooooooooooo,

even to the bloodthirsty item of Povelson, the superstitious belief in
mooo mo moo mooooooooooo mooo mo Mooooooo, moo moooooooooooo mooooo mo

them is, in some vicissitudes of their vocation, revived in the minds of
mooo mo, mo mooo mooooooooooo mo moooo mooooooo, moooooo mo moo moooo mo

the hunters.
moo moooooo.




So that overawed by the rumors and portents concerning him, not a few of
Mo mooo mooooooo mo moo mooooo moo mooooooo mooooooooo moo, moo m moo mo

the fishermen recalled, in reference to Moby Dick, the earlier days
moo moooooooo mooooooo, mo moooooooo mo Mooo Mooo, moo moooooo mooo

of the Sperm Whale fishery, when it was oftentimes hard to induce long
mo moo Moooo Moooo moooooo, mooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo mo mooooo mooo

practised Right whalemen to embark in the perils of this new and daring
moooooooo Moooo mooooooo mo mooooo mo moo mooooo mo mooo moo moo mooooo

warfare; such men protesting that although other leviathans might be
moooooo; mooo moo mooooooooo mooo mooooooo moooo mooooooooo moooo mo

hopefully pursued, yet to chase and point lance at such an apparition
moooooooo moooooo, moo mo moooo moo moooo moooo mo mooo mo mooooooooo

as the Sperm Whale was not for mortal man. That to attempt it, would
mo moo Moooo Moooo moo moo moo mooooo moo. Mooo mo moooooo mo, moooo

be inevitably to be torn into a quick eternity. On this head, there are
mo mooooooooo mo mo mooo mooo m moooo mooooooo. Mo mooo mooo, moooo moo

some remarkable documents that may be consulted.
mooo mooooooooo moooooooo mooo moo mo moooooooo.




Nevertheless, some there were, who even in the face of these things
Mooooooooooo, mooo moooo mooo, moo mooo mo moo mooo mo moooo mooooo

were ready to give chase to Moby Dick; and a still greater number who,
mooo moooo mo mooo moooo mo Mooo Mooo; moo m moooo moooooo mooooo moo,

chancing only to hear of him distantly and vaguely, without the
mooooooo mooo mo mooo mo moo moooooooo moo moooooo, moooooo moo

specific details of any certain calamity, and without superstitious
mooooooo moooooo mo moo moooooo mooooooo, moo moooooo moooooooooooo

accompaniments, were sufficiently hardy not to flee from the battle if
mooooooooooooo, mooo mooooooooooo moooo moo mo mooo mooo moo mooooo mo

offered.
moooooo.




One of the wild suggestions referred to, as at last coming to be linked
Moo mo moo mooo moooooooooo mooooooo mo, mo mo mooo mooooo mo mo mooooo

with the White Whale in the minds of the superstitiously inclined,
mooo moo Moooo Moooo mo moo moooo mo moo moooooooooooooo mooooooo,

was the unearthly conceit that Moby Dick was ubiquitous; that he had
moo moo moooooooo moooooo mooo Mooo Mooo moo mooooooooo; mooo mo moo

actually been encountered in opposite latitudes at one and the same
mooooooo mooo moooooooooo mo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo moo moo mooo

instant of time.
moooooo mo mooo.




Nor, credulous as such minds must have been, was this conceit altogether
Moo, moooooooo mo mooo moooo mooo mooo mooo, moo mooo moooooo mooooooooo

without some faint show of superstitious probability. For as the secrets
moooooo mooo moooo mooo mo moooooooooooo moooooooooo. Moo mo moo moooooo

of the currents in the seas have never yet been divulged, even to
mo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo mooo moooo moo mooo mooooooo, mooo mo

the most erudite research; so the hidden ways of the Sperm Whale
moo mooo moooooo mooooooo; mo moo mooooo mooo mo moo Moooo Moooo

when beneath the surface remain, in great part, unaccountable to his
mooo moooooo moo moooooo mooooo, mo moooo mooo, moooooooooooo mo moo

pursuers; and from time to time have originated the most curious and
mooooooo; moo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo mooooooooo moo mooo moooooo moo

contradictory speculations regarding them, especially concerning the
moooooooooooo mooooooooooo moooooooo mooo, mooooooooo mooooooooo moo

mystic modes whereby, after sounding to a great depth, he transports
mooooo moooo moooooo, moooo mooooooo mo m moooo moooo, mo mooooooooo

himself with such vast swiftness to the most widely distant points.
moooooo mooo mooo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooo mooooo moooooo mooooo.




It is a thing well known to both American and English whale-ships, and
Mo mo m moooo mooo moooo mo mooo Mooooooo moo Moooooo moooo-moooo, moo

as well a thing placed upon authoritative record years ago by Scoresby,
mo mooo m moooo mooooo mooo moooooooooooo mooooo moooo moo mo Mooooooo,

that some whales have been captured far north in the Pacific, in whose
mooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo mooooooo moo moooo mo moo Moooooo, mo moooo

bodies have been found the barbs of harpoons darted in the Greenland
mooooo mooo mooo moooo moo moooo mo mooooooo mooooo mo moo Moooooooo

seas. Nor is it to be gainsaid, that in some of these instances it has
mooo. Moo mo mo mo mo mooooooo, mooo mo mooo mo moooo moooooooo mo moo

been declared that the interval of time between the two assaults could
mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mo mooo moooooo moo moo mooooooo moooo

not have exceeded very many days. Hence, by inference, it has been
moo mooo mooooooo mooo mooo mooo. Moooo, mo moooooooo, mo moo mooo

believed by some whalemen, that the Nor' West Passage, so long a problem
mooooooo mo mooo mooooooo, mooo moo Moo' Mooo Moooooo, mo mooo m moooooo

to man, was never a problem to the whale. So that here, in the real
mo moo, moo moooo m moooooo mo moo moooo. Mo mooo mooo, mo moo mooo

living experience of living men, the prodigies related in old times of
mooooo mooooooooo mo mooooo moo, moo moooooooo moooooo mo moo moooo mo

the inland Strello mountain in Portugal (near whose top there was said
moo mooooo Moooooo mooooooo mo Mooooooo (mooo moooo moo moooo moo mooo

to be a lake in which the wrecks of ships floated up to the surface);
mo mo m mooo mo moooo moo mooooo mo moooo moooooo mo mo moo moooooo);

and that still more wonderful story of the Arethusa fountain near
moo mooo moooo mooo moooooooo moooo mo moo Mooooooo mooooooo mooo

Syracuse (whose waters were believed to have come from the Holy Land
Mooooooo (moooo mooooo mooo mooooooo mo mooo mooo mooo moo Mooo Mooo

by an underground passage); these fabulous narrations are almost fully
mo mo moooooooooo moooooo); moooo mooooooo mooooooooo moo mooooo moooo

equalled by the realities of the whalemen.
mooooooo mo moo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo.




Forced into familiarity, then, with such prodigies as these; and knowing
Mooooo mooo moooooooooo, mooo, mooo mooo moooooooo mo moooo; moo moooooo

that after repeated, intrepid assaults, the White Whale had escaped
mooo moooo mooooooo, mooooooo mooooooo, moo Moooo Moooo moo moooooo

alive; it cannot be much matter of surprise that some whalemen should
moooo; mo mooooo mo mooo mooooo mo mooooooo mooo mooo mooooooo mooooo

go still further in their superstitions; declaring Moby Dick not only
mo moooo moooooo mo moooo moooooooooooo; moooooooo Mooo Mooo moo mooo

ubiquitous, but immortal (for immortality is but ubiquity in time); that
mooooooooo, moo mooooooo (moo moooooooooo mo moo mooooooo mo mooo); mooo

though groves of spears should be planted in his flanks, he would still
mooooo mooooo mo mooooo mooooo mo moooooo mo moo mooooo, mo moooo moooo

swim away unharmed; or if indeed he should ever be made to spout thick
mooo mooo mooooooo; mo mo mooooo mo mooooo mooo mo mooo mo moooo moooo

blood, such a sight would be but a ghastly deception; for again in
moooo, mooo m moooo moooo mo moo m moooooo moooooooo; moo moooo mo

unensanguined billows hundreds of leagues away, his unsullied jet would
moooooooooooo moooooo mooooooo mo moooooo mooo, moo moooooooo moo moooo

once more be seen.
mooo mooo mo mooo.




But even stripped of these supernatural surmisings, there was enough in
Moo mooo mooooooo mo moooo mooooooooooo mooooooooo, moooo moo mooooo mo

the earthly make and incontestable character of the monster to strike
moo moooooo mooo moo moooooooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooooo mo mooooo

the imagination with unwonted power. For, it was not so much his
moo moooooooooo mooo mooooooo moooo. Moo, mo moo moo mo mooo moo

mooooooo mooo mooo mo mooo moooooooooooo moo mooo moooo moooo mooooo,

but, as was elsewhere thrown out--a peculiar snow-white wrinkled
moo, mo moo moooooooo mooooo moo--m mooooooo mooo-moooo mooooooo

forehead, and a high, pyramidical white hump. These were his prominent
mooooooo, moo m mooo, moooooooooo moooo mooo. Moooo mooo moo moooooooo

features; the tokens whereby, even in the limitless, uncharted seas, he
mooooooo; moo mooooo moooooo, mooo mo moo moooooooo, moooooooo mooo, mo

revealed his identity, at a long distance, to those who knew him.
mooooooo moo mooooooo, mo m mooo mooooooo, mo moooo moo mooo moo.




The rest of his body was so streaked, and spotted, and marbled with
Moo mooo mo moo mooo moo mo mooooooo, moo moooooo, moo moooooo mooo

the same shrouded hue, that, in the end, he had gained his distinctive
moo mooo mooooooo moo, mooo, mo moo moo, mo moo mooooo moo moooooooooo

moooooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo; m mooo, mooooo, moooooooo moooooooo mo

his vivid aspect, when seen gliding at high noon through a dark blue
moo moooo mooooo, mooo mooo moooooo mo mooo mooo moooooo m mooo mooo

sea, leaving a milky-way wake of creamy foam, all spangled with golden
moo, moooooo m moooo-moo mooo mo mooooo mooo, moo mooooooo mooo mooooo

gleamings.
moooooooo.




Nor was it his unwonted magnitude, nor his remarkable hue, nor yet his
Moo moo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo, moo moo mooooooooo moo, moo moo moo

deformed lower jaw, that so much invested the whale with natural terror,
mooooooo moooo moo, mooo mo mooo mooooooo moo moooo mooo moooooo mooooo,

mo mooo mooooooooo, moooooooooo moooooooo moooo, moooooooo mo mooooooo

moo, moo moooooooooo mooooooo mooooo mooo mo mooooo mooo moooooo moooo

else. For, when swimming before his exulting pursuers, with every
mooo. Moo, mooo mooooooo mooooo moo mooooooo mooooooo, mooo moooo

apparent symptom of alarm, he had several times been known to turn
mooooooo moooooo mo moooo, mo moo moooooo moooo mooo moooo mo mooo

moooo mooooooo, moo, moooooo mooo mooo mooo, mooooo moooo moooo moooo mo

splinters, or drive them back in consternation to their ship.
moooooooo, mo moooo mooo mooo mo moooooooooooo mo moooo mooo.




Already several fatalities had attended his chase. But though similar
Moooooo moooooo mooooooooo moo mooooooo moo moooo. Moo mooooo moooooo

disasters, however little bruited ashore, were by no means unusual
moooooooo, moooooo mooooo moooooo mooooo, mooo mo mo moooo moooooo

in the fishery; yet, in most instances, such seemed the White Whale's
mo moo moooooo; moo, mo mooo moooooooo, mooo mooooo moo Moooo Moooo'm

infernal aforethought of ferocity, that every dismembering or death
mooooooo mooooooooooo mo mooooooo, mooo moooo mooooooooooo mo moooo

that he caused, was not wholly regarded as having been inflicted by an
mooo mo mooooo, moo moo mooooo mooooooo mo mooooo mooo moooooooo mo mo

unintelligent agent.
moooooooooooo moooo.




Judge, then, to what pitches of inflamed, distracted fury the minds of
Moooo, mooo, mo mooo moooooo mo mooooooo, mooooooooo mooo moo moooo mo

his more desperate hunters were impelled, when amid the chips of chewed
moo mooo moooooooo moooooo mooo mooooooo, mooo mooo moo moooo mo mooooo

mooooooo, mooo mooooo mo, mo mo mo m moooo mo m mooooo.




His three boats stove around him, and oars and men both whirling in the
Moo moooo moooo moooo mooooo moo, moo mooo moo moo mooo mooooooo mo moo

eddies; one captain, seizing the line-knife from his broken prow, had

mooooo mo moo moooo, mo mo Mooooooo mooooooo mo moo moo, moooooo moooooo

with a six inch blade to reach the fathom-deep life of the whale.
mooo m moo mooo moooo mo moooo moo mooooo-mooo mooo mo moo moooo.

That captain was Ahab. And then it was, that suddenly sweeping his
Mooo moooooo moo Mooo. Moo mooo mo moo, mooo mooooooo mooooooo moo

sickle-shaped lower jaw beneath him, Moby Dick had reaped away Ahab's
mooooo-mooooo moooo moo moooooo moo, Mooo Mooo moo mooooo mooo Mooo'm

moo, mo m moooo m moooo mo moooo mo moo moooo. Mo mooooooo Mooo, mo

hired Venetian or Malay, could have smote him with more seeming malice.
moooo Mooooooo mo Moooo, moooo mooo moooo moo mooo mooo moooooo mooooo.

Small reason was there to doubt, then, that ever since that almost fatal
Moooo mooooo moo moooo mo moooo, mooo, mooo mooo moooo mooo mooooo moooo

moooooooo, Mooo moo moooooooo m mooo mooooooooooooo moooooo moo moooo,

moo moo mooo mooo moo mooo mo moo moooooo mooooooooo mo mo mooo mooo

mo mooooooo mooo moo, moo mooo moo moo mooooo mooo, moo moo moo

mooooooooooo moo moooooooo moooooooooooo. Moo Moooo Moooo mooo mooooo

moo mo moo mooooooooo moooooooooo mo moo moooo moooooooo mooooooo moooo

some deep men feel eating in them, till they are left living on with

mooo m moooo moo mooo m mooo. Mooo mooooooooo moooooooo moooo moo mooo

mooo moo moooooooo; mo moooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo Mooooooooo moooooo

moo-mooo mo moo mooooo; moooo moo moooooo Moooooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo

in their statue devil;--Ahab did not fall down and worship it like them;
mo moooo mooooo moooo;--Mooo moo moo mooo mooo moo moooooo mo mooo mooo;

but deliriously transferring its idea to the abhorred white whale, he
moo moooooooooo mooooooooooo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo moooo moooo, mo

pitted himself, all mutilated, against it. All that most maddens and
mooooo moooooo, moo moooooooo, moooooo mo. Moo mooo mooo moooooo moo

torments; all that stirs up the lees of things; all truth with malice
mooooooo; moo mooo moooo mo moo mooo mo mooooo; moo moooo mooo mooooo

in it; all that cracks the sinews and cakes the brain; all the subtle
mo mo; moo mooo mooooo moo mooooo moo moooo moo moooo; moo moo mooooo

moooooooo mo mooo moo moooooo; moo mooo, mo moooo Mooo, mooo moooooo

moooooooooo, moo mooo moooooooooo mooooooooo mo Mooo Mooo. Mo moooo mooo

moo moooo'm moooo mooo moo moo mo moo moo moooooo mooo moo mooo mooo

by his whole race from Adam down; and then, as if his chest had been a
mo moo moooo mooo mooo Mooo mooo; moo mooo, mo mo moo moooo moo mooo m

mortar, he burst his hot heart's shell upon it.
mooooo, mo moooo moo moo moooo'm moooo mooo mo.




It is not probable that this monomania in him took its instant rise at
Mo mo moo mooooooo mooo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooo moo moooooo mooo mo

the precise time of his bodily dismemberment. Then, in darting at the
moo moooooo mooo mo moo mooooo moooooooooooo. Mooo, mo moooooo mo moo

moooooo, moooo mo mooo, mo moo moo moooo moooo mo m mooooo, mooooooooo,

mooooooo moooooooo; moo mooo mo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo mooo moo, mo

probably but felt the agonizing bodily laceration, but nothing more.
mooooooo moo mooo moo moooooooo mooooo mooooooooo, moo moooooo mooo.

Yet, when by this collision forced to turn towards home, and for long

mooo mo moo, mooo moo mooo mooo moo mooooo mooo mooo mooo moo moooooo;

and so interfusing, made him mad. That it was only then, on the homeward
moo mo moooooooooo, mooo moo moo. Mooo mo moo mooo mooo, mo moo mooooooo

mo moo mooooooo, mooo moo moooo mooo mooooo mo mooo moo mooo, mooo

moooo, mo mo mooooo, mooooo mo moo moooooo. Mo m mooooo-mooooo, mo moooo

to the mad rockings of the gales. And, when running into more sufferable
mo moo moo mooooooo mo moo moooo. Moo, mooo moooooo mooo mooo mooooooooo

latitudes, the ship, with mild stun'sails spread, floated across the
moooooooo, moo mooo, mooo mooo mooo'moooo mooooo, moooooo mooooo moo

mooooooo moooooo, moo, mo moo moooooooooo, moo moo moo'm mooooooo mooooo

left behind him with the Cape Horn swells, and he came forth from his

dark den into the blessed light and air; even then, when he bore that

again; and his mates thanked God the direful madness was now gone; even
moooo; moo moo moooo moooooo Moo moo moooooo moooooo moo moo mooo; mooo

then, Ahab, in his hidden self, raved on. Human madness is oftentimes a
mooo, Mooo, mo moo mooooo mooo, moooo mo. Moooo moooooo mo mooooooooo m

cunning and most feline thing. When you think it fled, it may have but

mooooo mooooooooooo mooo mooo moooo moooooo mooo. Mooo'm mooo mooooo

subsided not, but deepeningly contracted; like the unabated Hudson,

Ahab's broad madness had been left behind; so in that broad madness, not
Mooo'm moooo moooooo moo mooo mooo mooooo; mo mo mooo moooo moooooo, moo

agent, now became the living instrument. If such a furious trope may

moooo, moo moooooo mooooo moooooo moo moooooo mooooo, moo moooooo mo,

any one reasonable object.
moo moo mooooooooo mooooo.




This is much; yet Ahab's larger, darker, deeper part remains unhinted.
Mooo mo mooo; moo Mooo'm mooooo, mooooo, mooooo mooo moooooo mooooooo.

But vain to popularize profundities, and all truth is profound. Winding
Moo mooo mo mooooooooo mooooooooooo, moo moo moooo mo mooooooo. Moooooo

far down from within the very heart of this spiked Hotel de Cluny where
moo mooo mooo mooooo moo mooo moooo mo mooo mooooo Moooo mo Moooo moooo

we here stand--however grand and wonderful, now quit it;--and take your
mo mooo moooo--moooooo moooo moo moooooooo, moo mooo mo;--moo mooo mooo

way, ye nobler, sadder souls, to those vast Roman halls of Thermes;
moo, mo mooooo, mooooo moooo, mo moooo mooo Moooo moooo mo Moooooo;

where far beneath the fantastic towers of man's upper earth, his root
moooo moo moooooo moo moooooooo mooooo mo moo'm moooo moooo, moo mooo

of grandeur, his whole awful essence sits in bearded state; an antique
mo mooooooo, moo moooo moooo moooooo mooo mo moooooo moooo; mo moooooo

buried beneath antiquities, and throned on torsoes! So with a broken
mooooo moooooo moooooooooo, moo moooooo mo moooooo! Mo mooo m mooooo

throne, the great gods mock that captive king; so like a Caryatid, he
mooooo, moo moooo mooo mooo mooo moooooo mooo; mo mooo m Mooooooo, mo

patient sits, upholding on his frozen brow the piled entablatures of
moooooo mooo, moooooooo mo moo mooooo mooo moo moooo mooooooooooo mo

ages. Wind ye down there, ye prouder, sadder souls! question that proud,
mooo. Mooo mo mooo moooo, mo moooooo, mooooo moooo! mooooooo mooo moooo,

sad king! A family likeness! aye, he did beget ye, ye young exiled
moo mooo! M mooooo mooooooo! moo, mo moo moooo mo, mo moooo mooooo

royalties; and from your grim sire only will the old State-secret come.
moooooooo; moo mooo mooo mooo mooo mooo mooo moo moo Moooo-mooooo mooo.




Now, in his heart, Ahab had some glimpse of this, namely: all my means
Moo, mo moo moooo, Mooo moo mooo moooooo mo mooo, mooooo: moo mo moooo

are sane, my motive and my object mad. Yet without power to kill, or
moo mooo, mo mooooo moo mo mooooo moo. Moo moooooo moooo mo mooo, mo

change, or shun the fact; he likewise knew that to mankind he did long
mooooo, mo mooo moo mooo; mo mooooooo mooo mooo mo moooooo mo moo mooo

moooooooo; mo mooo mooo, moo moooo. Moo mooo moooo mo moo moooooooooo

moo mooo moooooo mo moo mooooooooooooo, moo mo moo mooo moooooooooo.

Nevertheless, so well did he succeed in that dissembling, that when
Mooooooooooo, mo mooo moo mo moooooo mo mooo moooooooooo, mooo mooo

mooo moooo moo mo moooooo mooooo mo mooo, mo Moooooooooo moooooo moo

mooooooo mooooooo moooo moo moooooooo moo.




The report of his undeniable delirium at sea was likewise popularly
Moo mooooo mo moo mooooooooo mooooooo mo moo moo mooooooo moooooooo

ascribed to a kindred cause. And so too, all the added moodiness which
mooooooo mo m moooooo moooo. Moo mo moo, moo moo moooo moooooooo moooo

always afterwards, to the very day of sailing in the Pequod on the
mooooo mooooooooo, mo moo mooo moo mo moooooo mo moo Mooooo mo moo

present voyage, sat brooding on his brow. Nor is it so very unlikely,
moooooo mooooo, moo mooooooo mo moo mooo. Moo mo mo mo mooo mooooooo,

that far from distrusting his fitness for another whaling voyage, on
mooo moo mooo moooooooooo moo moooooo moo moooooo moooooo mooooo, mo

account of such dark symptoms, the calculating people of that prudent
moooooo mo mooo mooo mooooooo, moo moooooooooo mooooo mo mooo moooooo

mooo mooo mooooooo mo mooooo moo moooooo, mooo moo moooo mooo moooooo mo

moo moo moo mooooo moooooooo moo moo mo mooo, moo m moooooo mo mooo

of rage and wildness as the bloody hunt of whales. Gnawed within and
mo mooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooooo mooo mo mooooo. Mooooo mooooo moo

scorched without, with the infixed, unrelenting fangs of some incurable
mooooooo moooooo, mooo moo moooooo, moooooooooo moooo mo mooo moooooooo

idea; such an one, could he be found, would seem the very man to dart
mooo; mooo mo moo, moooo mo mo moooo, moooo mooo moo mooo moo mo mooo

his iron and lift his lance against the most appalling of all brutes.
moo mooo moo mooo moo moooo moooooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo.

Or, if for any reason thought to be corporeally incapacitated for that,
Mo, mo moo moo mooooo moooooo mo mo moooooooooo moooooooooooo moo mooo,

yet such an one would seem superlatively competent to cheer and howl on
moo mooo mo moo moooo mooo moooooooooooo moooooooo mo moooo moo mooo mo

his underlings to the attack. But be all this as it may, certain it is,
moo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo. Moo mo moo mooo mo mo moo, moooooo mo mo,

that with the mad secret of his unabated rage bolted up and keyed in
mooo mooo moo moo mooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mooooo mo moo moooo mo

him, Ahab had purposely sailed upon the present voyage with the one only
moo, Mooo moo moooooooo mooooo mooo moo moooooo mooooo mooo moo moo mooo

and all-engrossing object of hunting the White Whale. Had any one of his
moo moo-mooooooooo mooooo mo moooooo moo Moooo Moooo. Moo moo moo mo moo

old acquaintances on shore but half dreamed of what was lurking in him
moo moooooooooooo mo moooo moo mooo moooooo mo mooo moo moooooo mo moo

then, how soon would their aghast and righteous souls have wrenched the
mooo, moo mooo moooo moooo mooooo moo moooooooo moooo mooo mooooooo moo

ship from such a fiendish man! They were bent on profitable cruises, the
mooo mooo mooo m mooooooo moo! Mooo mooo mooo mo mooooooooo moooooo, moo

profit to be counted down in dollars from the mint. He was intent on an
mooooo mo mo moooooo mooo mo moooooo mooo moo mooo. Mo moo mooooo mo mo

audacious, immitigable, and supernatural revenge.
moooooooo, moooooooooo, moo mooooooooooo moooooo.




Here, then, was this grey-headed, ungodly old man, chasing with curses a
Mooo, mooo, moo mooo mooo-mooooo, moooooo moo moo, moooooo mooo mooooo m

Job's whale round the world, at the head of a crew, too, chiefly made
Moo'm moooo moooo moo moooo, mo moo mooo mo m mooo, moo, moooooo mooo

up of mongrel renegades, and castaways, and cannibals--morally enfeebled
mo mo moooooo moooooooo, moo moooooooo, moo moooooooo--moooooo moooooooo

also, by the incompetence of mere unaided virtue or right-mindedness in
mooo, mo moo mooooooooooo mo mooo moooooo mooooo mo moooo-mooooooooo mo

Starbuck, the invunerable jollity of indifference and recklessness in
Mooooooo, moo moooooooooo moooooo mo mooooooooooo moo mooooooooooo mo

Stubb, and the pervading mediocrity in Flask. Such a crew, so officered,
Moooo, moo moo moooooooo mooooooooo mo Moooo. Mooo m mooo, mo moooooooo,

seemed specially picked and packed by some infernal fatality to help him
mooooo moooooooo mooooo moo mooooo mo mooo mooooooo mooooooo mo mooo moo

to his monomaniac revenge. How it was that they so aboundingly responded
mo moo mooooooooo moooooo. Moo mo moo mooo mooo mo moooooooooo moooooooo

to the old man's ire--by what evil magic their souls were possessed,
mo moo moo moo'm moo--mo mooo mooo moooo moooo moooo mooo moooooooo,

that at times his hate seemed almost theirs; the White Whale as much
mooo mo moooo moo mooo mooooo mooooo mooooo; moo Moooo Moooo mo mooo

their insufferable foe as his; how all this came to be--what the White
moooo mooooooooooo moo mo moo; moo moo mooo mooo mo mo--mooo moo Moooo

Whale was to them, or how to their unconscious understandings, also, in
Moooo moo mo mooo, mo moo mo moooo moooooooooo mooooooooooooo, mooo, mo

some dim, unsuspected way, he might have seemed the gliding great demon
mooo moo, moooooooooo moo, mo moooo mooo mooooo moo moooooo moooo moooo

of the seas of life,--all this to explain, would be to dive deeper than
mo moo mooo mo mooo,--moo mooo mo moooooo, moooo mo mo mooo mooooo mooo

Ishmael can go. The subterranean miner that works in us all, how can one
Moooooo moo mo. Moo mooooooooooo moooo mooo moooo mo mo moo, moo moo moo

tell whither leads his shaft by the ever shifting, muffled sound of his
mooo moooooo moooo moo moooo mo moo mooo mooooooo, moooooo moooo mo moo

pick? Who does not feel the irresistible arm drag? What skiff in tow
mooo? Moo mooo moo mooo moo mooooooooooo moo mooo? Mooo moooo mo moo

of a seventy-four can stand still? For one, I gave myself up to the
mo m moooooo-mooo moo moooo moooo? Moo moo, M mooo mooooo mo mo moo

abandonment of the time and the place; but while yet all a-rush to
moooooooooo mo moo mooo moo moo moooo; moo moooo moo moo m-mooo mo

encounter the whale, could see naught in that brute but the deadliest
moooooooo moo moooo, moooo moo mooooo mo mooo moooo moo moo moooooooo

ill.
moo.










CHAPTER 42. The Whiteness of The Whale.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooooooo mo Moo Moooo.







What the white whale was to Ahab, has been hinted; what, at times, he
Mooo moo moooo moooo moo mo Mooo, moo mooo mooooo; mooo, mo moooo, mo

was to me, as yet remains unsaid.
moo mo mo, mo moo moooooo mooooo.




Aside from those more obvious considerations touching Moby Dick, which
Moooo mooo moooo mooo moooooo mooooooooooooo mooooooo Mooo Mooo, moooo

could not but occasionally awaken in any man's soul some alarm, there
moooo moo moo mooooooooooo mooooo mo moo moo'm mooo mooo moooo, moooo

was another thought, or rather vague, nameless horror concerning him,
moo moooooo moooooo, mo mooooo moooo, mooooooo mooooo mooooooooo moo,

which at times by its intensity completely overpowered all the rest; and
moooo mo moooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooooo moooooooooo moo moo mooo; moo

yet so mystical and well nigh ineffable was it, that I almost despair of
moo mo mooooooo moo mooo mooo moooooooo moo mo, mooo M mooooo moooooo mo

putting it in a comprehensible form. It was the whiteness of the whale
moooooo mo mo m mooooooooooooo mooo. Mo moo moo moooooooo mo moo moooo

that above all things appalled me. But how can I hope to explain myself
mooo moooo moo mooooo mooooooo mo. Moo moo moo M mooo mo moooooo mooooo

here; and yet, in some dim, random way, explain myself I must, else all
mooo; moo moo, mo mooo moo, mooooo moo, moooooo mooooo M mooo, mooo moo

these chapters might be naught.
moooo mooooooo moooo mo mooooo.




Though in many natural objects, whiteness refiningly enhances beauty, as
Mooooo mo mooo moooooo moooooo, moooooooo mooooooooo mooooooo mooooo, mo

if imparting some special virtue of its own, as in marbles, japonicas,
mo moooooooo mooo moooooo mooooo mo moo moo, mo mo moooooo, moooooooo,

and pearls; and though various nations have in some way recognised a
moo mooooo; moo mooooo moooooo moooooo mooo mo mooo moo mooooooooo m

certain royal preeminence in this hue; even the barbaric, grand old
moooooo moooo moooooooooo mo mooo moo; mooo moo mooooooo, moooo moo

kings of Pegu placing the title "Lord of the White Elephants" above all
moooo mo Mooo moooooo moo moooo "Mooo mo moo Moooo Moooooooo" moooo moo

their other magniloquent ascriptions of dominion; and the modern kings
moooo moooo mooooooooooo moooooooooo mo mooooooo; moo moo mooooo moooo

of Siam unfurling the same snow-white quadruped in the royal standard;
mo Mooo moooooooo moo mooo mooo-moooo moooooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo;

and the Hanoverian flag bearing the one figure of a snow-white charger;
moo moo Mooooooooo mooo moooooo moo moo mooooo mo m mooo-moooo moooooo;

and the great Austrian Empire, Caesarian, heir to overlording Rome,
moo moo moooo Mooooooo Mooooo, Moooooooo, mooo mo moooooooooo Mooo,

having for the imperial colour the same imperial hue; and though this
mooooo moo moo mooooooo mooooo moo mooo mooooooo moo; moo mooooo mooo

pre-eminence in it applies to the human race itself, giving the white
moo-mooooooo mo mo moooooo mo moo moooo mooo mooooo, mooooo moo moooo

man ideal mastership over every dusky tribe; and though, besides, all
moo moooo mooooooooo mooo moooo moooo moooo; moo mooooo, moooooo, moo

this, whiteness has been even made significant of gladness, for among
mooo, moooooooo moo mooo mooo mooo moooooooooo mo mooooooo, moo moooo

the Romans a white stone marked a joyful day; and though in other mortal
moo Mooooo m moooo moooo mooooo m mooooo moo; moo mooooo mo moooo mooooo

sympathies and symbolizings, this same hue is made the emblem of many
mooooooooo moo mooooooooooo, mooo mooo moo mo mooo moo mooooo mo mooo

touching, noble things--the innocence of brides, the benignity of age;
mooooooo, moooo mooooo--moo moooooooo mo mooooo, moo moooooooo mo moo;

though among the Red Men of America the giving of the white belt
mooooo moooo moo Moo Moo mo Moooooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo mooo

of wampum was the deepest pledge of honour; though in many climes,
mo mooooo moo moo moooooo mooooo mo mooooo; mooooo mo mooo mooooo,

whiteness typifies the majesty of Justice in the ermine of the Judge,
moooooooo mooooooo moo moooooo mo Moooooo mo moo mooooo mo moo Moooo,

and contributes to the daily state of kings and queens drawn by
moo moooooooooo mo moo moooo moooo mo moooo moo mooooo moooo mo

milk-white steeds; though even in the higher mysteries of the most
mooo-moooo mooooo; mooooo mooo mo moo mooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo

august religions it has been made the symbol of the divine spotlessness
mooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooooo

and power; by the Persian fire worshippers, the white forked flame being
moo moooo; mo moo Moooooo mooo moooooooooo, moo moooo mooooo moooo moooo

held the holiest on the altar; and in the Greek mythologies, Great Jove
mooo moo moooooo mo moo moooo; moo mo moo Moooo moooooooooo, Moooo Mooo

himself being made incarnate in a snow-white bull; and though to the
moooooo moooo mooo moooooooo mo m mooo-moooo mooo; moo mooooo mo moo

noble Iroquois, the midwinter sacrifice of the sacred White Dog was
moooo Mooooooo, moo moooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo Moooo Moo moo

by far the holiest festival of their theology, that spotless, faithful
mo moo moo moooooo mooooooo mo moooo mooooooo, mooo mooooooo, mooooooo

creature being held the purest envoy they could send to the Great Spirit
mooooooo moooo mooo moo mooooo moooo mooo moooo mooo mo moo Moooo Mooooo

with the annual tidings of their own fidelity; and though directly from
mooo moo mooooo moooooo mo moooo moo mooooooo; moo mooooo mooooooo mooo

the Latin word for white, all Christian priests derive the name of
moo Moooo mooo moo moooo, moo Moooooooo moooooo mooooo moo mooo mo

one part of their sacred vesture, the alb or tunic, worn beneath the
moo mooo mo moooo mooooo moooooo, moo moo mo moooo, mooo moooooo moo

cassock; and though among the holy pomps of the Romish faith, white is
moooooo; moo mooooo moooo moo mooo moooo mo moo Mooooo moooo, moooo mo

specially employed in the celebration of the Passion of our Lord; though
moooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooooooooo mo moo Moooooo mo moo Mooo; mooooo

in the Vision of St. John, white robes are given to the redeemed, and
mo moo Mooooo mo Mo. Mooo, moooo moooo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo, moo

the four-and-twenty elders stand clothed in white before the great-white
moo mooo-moo-mooooo mooooo moooo moooooo mo moooo mooooo moo moooo-moooo

throne, and the Holy One that sitteth there white like wool; yet for all
mooooo, moo moo Mooo Moo mooo moooooo moooo moooo mooo mooo; moo moo moo

these accumulated associations, with whatever is sweet, and honourable,
moooo moooooooooo mooooooooooo, mooo mooooooo mo moooo, moo mooooooooo,

and sublime, there yet lurks an elusive something in the innermost idea
moo moooooo, moooo moo moooo mo moooooo moooooooo mo moo moooooooo mooo

of this hue, which strikes more of panic to the soul than that redness
mo mooo moo, moooo moooooo mooo mo moooo mo moo mooo mooo mooo moooooo

which affrights in blood.
moooo moooooooo mo moooo.




This elusive quality it is, which causes the thought of whiteness, when
Mooo moooooo moooooo mo mo, moooo mooooo moo moooooo mo moooooooo, mooo

divorced from more kindly associations, and coupled with any object
mooooooo mooo mooo mooooo mooooooooooo, moo moooooo mooo moo mooooo

terrible in itself, to heighten that terror to the furthest bounds.
mooooooo mo mooooo, mo mooooooo mooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo.

Witness the white bear of the poles, and the white shark of the tropics;
Moooooo moo moooo mooo mo moo moooo, moo moo moooo moooo mo moo moooooo;

what but their smooth, flaky whiteness makes them the transcendent
mooo moo moooo mooooo, moooo moooooooo moooo mooo moo mooooooooooo

horrors they are? That ghastly whiteness it is which imparts such an
moooooo mooo moo? Mooo moooooo moooooooo mo mo moooo moooooo mooo mo

abhorrent mildness, even more loathsome than terrific, to the dumb
moooooooo mooooooo, mooo mooo moooooooo mooo mooooooo, mo moo mooo

gloating of their aspect. So that not the fierce-fanged tiger in his
mooooooo mo moooo mooooo. Mo mooo moo moo mooooo-mooooo moooo mo moo

heraldic coat can so stagger courage as the white-shrouded bear or
mooooooo mooo moo mo moooooo moooooo mo moo moooo-mooooooo mooo mo

shark.*
moooo.*







*With reference to the Polar bear, it may possibly be urged by him
*Mooo moooooooo mo moo Moooo mooo, mo moo mooooooo mo moooo mo moo

who would fain go still deeper into this matter, that it is not
moo moooo mooo mo moooo mooooo mooo mooo mooooo, mooo mo mo moo

the whiteness, separately regarded, which heightens the intolerable
moo moooooooo, mooooooooo mooooooo, moooo moooooooo moo moooooooooo

hideousness of that brute; for, analysed, that heightened hideousness,
moooooooooo mo mooo moooo; moo, mooooooo, mooo mooooooooo moooooooooo,

it might be said, only rises from the circumstance, that the
mo moooo mo mooo, mooo moooo mooo moo mooooooooooo, mooo moo

irresponsible ferociousness of the creature stands invested in the
moooooooooooo moooooooooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo mooooooo mo moo

fleece of celestial innocence and love; and hence, by bringing together
mooooo mo moooooooo moooooooo moo mooo; moo moooo, mo mooooooo mooooooo

two such opposite emotions in our minds, the Polar bear frightens us
moo mooo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo, moo Moooo mooo moooooooo mo

with so unnatural a contrast. But even assuming all this to be true;
mooo mo moooooooo m mooooooo. Moo mooo mooooooo moo mooo mo mo mooo;

yet, were it not for the whiteness, you would not have that intensified
moo, mooo mo moo moo moo moooooooo, moo moooo moo mooo mooo moooooooooo

terror.
mooooo.




As for the white shark, the white gliding ghostliness of repose in that
Mo moo moo moooo moooo, moo moooo moooooo moooooooooo mo mooooo mo mooo

creature, when beheld in his ordinary moods, strangely tallies with the
mooooooo, mooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo moooo, moooooooo moooooo mooo moo

same quality in the Polar quadruped. This peculiarity is most vividly
mooo moooooo mo moo Moooo moooooooo. Mooo moooooooooo mo mooo moooooo

hit by the French in the name they bestow upon that fish. The Romish
moo mo moo Mooooo mo moo mooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo mooo. Moo Mooooo

mass for the dead begins with "Requiem eternam" (eternal rest), whence
mooo moo moo mooo mooooo mooo "Moooooo moooooo" (moooooo mooo), mooooo

REQUIEM denominating the mass itself, and any other funeral music. Now,
MOOOOOO mooooooooooo moo mooo mooooo, moo moo moooo moooooo moooo. Moo,

in allusion to the white, silent stillness of death in this shark, and
mo mooooooo mo moo moooo, mooooo moooooooo mo moooo mo mooo moooo, moo

the mild deadliness of his habits, the French call him REQUIN.
moo mooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo, moo Mooooo mooo moo MOOOOO.







Bethink thee of the albatross, whence come those clouds of spiritual
Moooooo mooo mo moo moooooooo, mooooo mooo moooo mooooo mo moooooooo

wonderment and pale dread, in which that white phantom sails in all
mooooooooo moo mooo moooo, mo moooo mooo moooo moooooo moooo mo moo

imaginations? Not Coleridge first threw that spell; but God's great,
mooooooooooo? Moo Moooooooo moooo moooo mooo moooo; moo Moo'm moooo,

unflattering laureate, Nature.*
mooooooooooo mooooooo, Mooooo.*







*I remember the first albatross I ever saw. It was during a prolonged
*M mooooooo moo moooo moooooooo M mooo moo. Mo moo mooooo m moooooooo

gale, in waters hard upon the Antarctic seas. From my forenoon watch
mooo, mo mooooo mooo mooo moo Moooooooo mooo. Mooo mo mooooooo moooo

below, I ascended to the overclouded deck; and there, dashed upon the
moooo, M mooooooo mo moo moooooooooo mooo; moo moooo, mooooo mooo moo

main hatches, I saw a regal, feathery thing of unspotted whiteness, and
mooo moooooo, M moo m moooo, mooooooo moooo mo moooooooo moooooooo, moo

with a hooked, Roman bill sublime. At intervals, it arched forth
mooo m mooooo, Moooo mooo moooooo. Mo moooooooo, mo mooooo moooo

its vast archangel wings, as if to embrace some holy ark. Wondrous
moo mooo moooooooo moooo, mo mo mo moooooo mooo mooo moo. Mooooooo

flutterings and throbbings shook it. Though bodily unharmed, it uttered
moooooooooo moo mooooooooo moooo mo. Mooooo mooooo mooooooo, mo moooooo

cries, as some king's ghost in supernatural distress. Through its
moooo, mo mooo mooo'm moooo mo mooooooooooo mooooooo. Moooooo moo

inexpressible, strange eyes, methought I peeped to secrets which took
moooooooooooo, moooooo mooo, moooooooo M mooooo mo moooooo moooo mooo

hold of God. As Abraham before the angels, I bowed myself; the white
mooo mo Moo. Mo Moooooo mooooo moo mooooo, M moooo mooooo; moo moooo

thing was so white, its wings so wide, and in those for ever exiled
moooo moo mo moooo, moo moooo mo mooo, moo mo moooo moo mooo mooooo

waters, I had lost the miserable warping memories of traditions and of
mooooo, M moo mooo moo moooooooo moooooo mooooooo mo mooooooooo moo mo

towns. Long I gazed at that prodigy of plumage. I cannot tell, can only
moooo. Mooo M moooo mo mooo moooooo mo moooooo. M mooooo mooo, moo mooo

hint, the things that darted through me then. But at last I awoke; and
mooo, moo mooooo mooo mooooo moooooo mo mooo. Moo mo mooo M moooo; moo

turning, asked a sailor what bird was this. A goney, he replied. Goney!
moooooo, moooo m mooooo mooo mooo moo mooo. M moooo, mo moooooo. Moooo!

never had heard that name before; is it conceivable that this glorious
moooo moo moooo mooo mooo mooooo; mo mo moooooooooo mooo mooo mooooooo

thing is utterly unknown to men ashore! never! But some time after, I
moooo mo moooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo! moooo! Moo mooo mooo moooo, M

learned that goney was some seaman's name for albatross. So that by no
moooooo mooo moooo moo mooo mooooo'm mooo moo moooooooo. Mo mooo mo mo

possibility could Coleridge's wild Rhyme have had aught to do with those
moooooooooo moooo Moooooooo'm mooo Moooo mooo moo moooo mo mo mooo moooo

mystical impressions which were mine, when I saw that bird upon our
mooooooo moooooooooo moooo mooo mooo, mooo M moo mooo mooo mooo moo

deck. For neither had I then read the Rhyme, nor knew the bird to be
mooo. Moo moooooo moo M mooo mooo moo Moooo, moo mooo moo mooo mo mo

an albatross. Yet, in saying this, I do but indirectly burnish a little
mo moooooooo. Moo, mo mooooo mooo, M mo moo mooooooooo moooooo m mooooo

brighter the noble merit of the poem and the poet.
mooooooo moo moooo moooo mo moo mooo moo moo mooo.




I assert, then, that in the wondrous bodily whiteness of the bird
M mooooo, mooo, mooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo

chiefly lurks the secret of the spell; a truth the more evinced in this,
moooooo moooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo; m moooo moo mooo moooooo mo mooo,

that by a solecism of terms there are birds called grey albatrosses;
mooo mo m mooooooo mo moooo moooo moo moooo mooooo mooo moooooooooo;

and these I have frequently seen, but never with such emotions as when I
moo moooo M mooo mooooooooo mooo, moo moooo mooo mooo mooooooo mo mooo M

beheld the Antarctic fowl.
mooooo moo Moooooooo mooo.




But how had the mystic thing been caught? Whisper it not, and I will
Moo moo moo moo mooooo moooo mooo mooooo? Moooooo mo moo, moo M mooo

tell; with a treacherous hook and line, as the fowl floated on the sea.
mooo; mooo m moooooooooo mooo moo mooo, mo moo mooo moooooo mo moo moo.

At last the Captain made a postman of it; tying a lettered, leathern
Mo mooo moo Moooooo mooo m moooooo mo mo; moooo m mooooooo, mooooooo

tally round its neck, with the ship's time and place; and then letting
moooo moooo moo mooo, mooo moo mooo'm mooo moo moooo; moo mooo moooooo

it escape. But I doubt not, that leathern tally, meant for man, was
mo mooooo. Moo M moooo moo, mooo mooooooo moooo, moooo moo moo, moo

taken off in Heaven, when the white fowl flew to join the wing-folding,
moooo moo mo Mooooo, mooo moo moooo mooo mooo mo mooo moo mooo-moooooo,

the invoking, and adoring cherubim!
moo mooooooo, moo moooooo mooooooo!







Most famous in our Western annals and Indian traditions is that of
Mooo mooooo mo moo Moooooo mooooo moo Mooooo mooooooooo mo mooo mo

the White Steed of the Prairies; a magnificent milk-white charger,
moo Moooo Moooo mo moo Mooooooo; m moooooooooo mooo-moooo moooooo,

large-eyed, small-headed, bluff-chested, and with the dignity of a
moooo-mooo, moooo-mooooo, moooo-moooooo, moo mooo moo moooooo mo m

thousand monarchs in his lofty, overscorning carriage. He was the
mooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo, mooooooooooo mooooooo. Mo moo moo

elected Xerxes of vast herds of wild horses, whose pastures in those
moooooo Mooooo mo mooo moooo mo mooo mooooo, moooo mooooooo mo moooo

days were only fenced by the Rocky Mountains and the Alleghanies. At
mooo mooo mooo mooooo mo moo Moooo Moooooooo moo moo Moooooooooo. Mo

their flaming head he westward trooped it like that chosen star which
moooo moooooo mooo mo mooooooo moooooo mo mooo mooo mooooo mooo moooo

every evening leads on the hosts of light. The flashing cascade of his
moooo moooooo moooo mo moo moooo mo moooo. Moo mooooooo moooooo mo moo

mane, the curving comet of his tail, invested him with housings more
mooo, moo moooooo moooo mo moo mooo, mooooooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo

resplendent than gold and silver-beaters could have furnished him. A
moooooooooo mooo mooo moo mooooo-moooooo moooo mooo moooooooo moo. M

most imperial and archangelical apparition of that unfallen, western
mooo mooooooo moo moooooooooooo mooooooooo mo mooo mooooooo, moooooo

world, which to the eyes of the old trappers and hunters revived the
moooo, moooo mo moo mooo mo moo moo mooooooo moo moooooo moooooo moo

glories of those primeval times when Adam walked majestic as a god,
moooooo mo moooo mooooooo moooo mooo Mooo mooooo mooooooo mo m moo,

bluff-browed and fearless as this mighty steed. Whether marching amid
moooo-mooooo moo mooooooo mo mooo mooooo moooo. Moooooo mooooooo mooo

his aides and marshals in the van of countless cohorts that endlessly
moo moooo moo mooooooo mo moo moo mo moooooooo moooooo mooo moooooooo

streamed it over the plains, like an Ohio; or whether with his
mooooooo mo mooo moo mooooo, mooo mo Mooo; mo moooooo mooo moo

circumambient subjects browsing all around at the horizon, the White
moooooooooooo mooooooo mooooooo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo, moo Moooo

Steed gallopingly reviewed them with warm nostrils reddening through his
Moooo moooooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo moooooooo moooooo moo

cool milkiness; in whatever aspect he presented himself, always to the
mooo moooooooo; mo mooooooo mooooo mo moooooooo moooooo, mooooo mo moo

bravest Indians he was the object of trembling reverence and awe. Nor
moooooo Moooooo mo moo moo mooooo mo moooooooo moooooooo moo moo. Moo

can it be questioned from what stands on legendary record of this noble
moo mo mo mooooooooo mooo mooo mooooo mo moooooooo mooooo mo mooo moooo

horse, that it was his spiritual whiteness chiefly, which so clothed him
moooo, mooo mo moo moo moooooooo moooooooo moooooo, moooo mo moooooo moo

with divineness; and that this divineness had that in it which, though
mooo mooooooooo; moo mooo mooo mooooooooo moo mooo mo mo moooo, mooooo

commanding worship, at the same time enforced a certain nameless terror.
mooooooooo moooooo, mo moo mooo mooo mooooooo m moooooo mooooooo mooooo.




But there are other instances where this whiteness loses all that
Moo moooo moo moooo moooooooo moooo mooo moooooooo moooo moo mooo

accessory and strange glory which invests it in the White Steed and
moooooooo moo moooooo moooo moooo moooooo mo mo moo Moooo Moooo moo

Albatross.
Moooooooo.




What is it that in the Albino man so peculiarly repels and often shocks
Mooo mo mo mooo mo moo Mooooo moo mo mooooooooo mooooo moo moooo mooooo

the eye, as that sometimes he is loathed by his own kith and kin! It
moo moo, mo mooo moooooooo mo mo moooooo mo moo moo mooo moo moo! Mo

is that whiteness which invests him, a thing expressed by the name
mo mooo moooooooo moooo moooooo moo, m moooo moooooooo mo moo mooo

he bears. The Albino is as well made as other men--has no substantive
mo moooo. Moo Mooooo mo mo mooo mooo mo moooo moo--moo mo moooooooooo

deformity--and yet this mere aspect of all-pervading whiteness makes him
moooooooo--moo moo mooo mooo mooooo mo moo-moooooooo moooooooo moooo moo

more strangely hideous than the ugliest abortion. Why should this be so?
mooo moooooooo moooooo mooo moo moooooo mooooooo. Moo mooooo mooo mo mo?




Nor, in quite other aspects, does Nature in her least palpable but
Moo, mo moooo moooo moooooo, mooo Mooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo moo

not the less malicious agencies, fail to enlist among her forces
moo moo mooo moooooooo mooooooo, mooo mo mooooo moooo moo mooooo

mooooooooo moooo mo moo Mooooooo Mooo moo mooo moooooooooo moo Moooo

Squall. Nor, in some historic instances, has the art of human malice
Mooooo. Moo, mo mooo mooooooo moooooooo, moo moo moo mo moooo mooooo

omitted so potent an auxiliary. How wildly it heightens the effect of
moooooo mo mooooo mo moooooooo. Moo mooooo mo moooooooo moo mooooo mo

market-place!
mooooo-moooo!




Nor, in some things, does the common, hereditary experience of all
Moo, mo mooo mooooo, mooo moo mooooo, mooooooooo mooooooooo mo moo

moooooo mooo mo mooo moooooo mo moo moooooooooooooo mo mooo moo. Mo

mooooo mooo mo moooooo, mooo moo moo moooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mo

moooooooooooo mo moo moooo moooo, mo mo mooooo moooooooooo mooo. Moo

mo moooo mo mooo mooo. Moo mooo mo moo moooooooooooo mo mo mooo mo

moooo moo mooo moooo mooooo moooo moo mooooooo; moo mooooo mooooo mo m

milk-white fog--Yea, while these terrors seize us, let us add, that even
mooo-moooo moo--Moo, moooo moooo moooooo moooo mo, moo mo moo, mooo mooo

moo mooo mo moooooo, mooo moooooooooo mo moo mooooooooo, moooo mo moo

pallid horse.
mooooo moooo.




Therefore, in his other moods, symbolize whatever grand or gracious

moooooooo mooooooooooo mo moooo mo m mooooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooo.




But though without dissent this point be fixed, how is mortal man to
Moo mooooo moooooo moooooo mooo moooo mo moooo, moo mo mooooo moo mo

moooooo moo mo? Mo moooooo mo, moooo mooo mooooooooo. Moo mo, mooo,

by the citation of some of those instances wherein this thing of
mo moo mooooooo mo mooo mo moooo moooooooo moooooo mooo moooo mo

whiteness--though for the time either wholly or in great part stripped

mooooooo;--moo mo mooo mooo mo moooo mooo mooo mooooo mooo mo moooooo mo

to the hidden cause we seek?
mo moo mooooo moooo mo mooo?




Let us try. But in a matter like this, subtlety appeals to subtlety,
Moo mo moo. Moo mo m mooooo mooo mooo, mooooooo moooooo mo mooooooo,

and without imagination no man can follow another into these halls. And
moo moooooo moooooooooo mo moo moo mooooo moooooo mooo moooo moooo. Moo

mooooooo moooooooo mo mooo mo moo mooo, moo moooooooo moo moo mo mooo mo

mooooo mooo moo.




Why to the man of untutored ideality, who happens to be but loosely

Mooooo Mooooooo Mooooo, moo mooo moo moooooo moooooo mo m Moooo Moooo mo

m Moooo Moo, moooo mooo mo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooo?




Or what is there apart from the traditions of dungeoned warriors and
Mo mooo mo moooo moooo mooo moo mooooooooo mo moooooooo mooooooo moo

moooo (moooo mooo moo mooooo moooooo moo mo) mooo moooo moo Moooo

Tower of London tell so much more strongly on the imagination of

mooooooo mooo mo moo Mooooooooo?




Nor is it, altogether, the remembrance of her cathedral-toppling
Moo mo mo, mooooooooo, moo moooooooooo mo moo moooooooo-mooooooo

earthquakes; nor the stampedoes of her frantic seas; nor the
moooooooooo; moo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooooo mooo; moo moo

(like canted yards of anchored fleets); and her suburban avenues of
(mooo mooooo moooo mo mooooooo mooooo); moo moo mooooooo moooooo mo

house-walls lying over upon each other, as a tossed pack of cards;--it

moooooo mooo mooo moo'mo moo. Moo Mooo moo moooo moo moooo mooo; moo

moooo mo m mooooo mooooo mo mooo moooooooo mo moo moo. Moo mo Moooooo,

mooooo mo mo mooooooo mooo moooo moo moo moooooooooo.




I know that, to the common apprehension, this phenomenon of whiteness
M mooo mooo, mo moo mooooo mooooooooooo, mooo mooooooooo mo moooooooo

is not confessed to be the prime agent in exaggerating the terror of
mo moo moooooooo mo mo moo moooo moooo mo mooooooooooo moo mooooo mo

moooooo moooooooo mooooooo; moo mo moo moooooooooooo mooo mo moooo moooo

mooooo mooooooo mo mooo moo mooooooooo, mooooooooo mooo moooooooo moooo

moo mooo mo moo moooooooooo mo mooooooo mo mooooooooooo. Mooo M mooo

by these two statements may perhaps be respectively elucidated by the
mo moooo moo mooooooooo moo moooooo mo mooooooooooo mooooooooo mo moo

moooooooo mooooooo.




First: The mariner, when drawing nigh the coasts of foreign lands, if by
Moooo: Moo moooooo, mooo moooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moooooo moooo, mo mo

night he hear the roar of breakers, starts to vigilance, and feels just
moooo mo mooo moo mooo mo mooooooo, mooooo mo moooooooo, moo moooo mooo

enough of trepidation to sharpen all his faculties; but under precisely
mooooo mo moooooooooo mo moooooo moo moo moooooooo; moo moooo moooooooo

similar circumstances, let him be called from his hammock to view his
moooooo moooooooooooo, moo moo mo mooooo mooo moo moooooo mo mooo moo

mooo moooooo moooooo m mooooooo moo mo moooo moooooooo--mo mo mooo

encircling headlands shoals of combed white bears were swimming round
mooooooooo moooooooo mooooo mo mooooo moooo moooo mooo mooooooo moooo

him, then he feels a silent, superstitious dread; the shrouded phantom
moo, mooo mo moooo m mooooo, moooooooooooo moooo; moo mooooooo moooooo

of the whitened waters is horrible to him as a real ghost; in vain the
mo moo mooooooo mooooo mo mooooooo mo moo mo m mooo moooo; mo mooo moo

lead assures him he is still off soundings; heart and helm they both go
mooo moooooo moo mo mo moooo moo moooooooo; moooo moo mooo mooo mooo mo

down; he never rests till blue water is under him again. Yet where is
mooo; mo moooo moooo mooo mooo moooo mo moooo moo moooo. Moo moooo mo

the mariner who will tell thee, "Sir, it was not so much the fear of
moo moooooo moo mooo mooo mooo, "Moo, mo moo moo mo mooo moo mooo mo

striking hidden rocks, as the fear of that hideous whiteness that so
mooooooo mooooo moooo, mo moo mooo mo mooo moooooo moooooooo mooo mo

stirred me?"
moooooo mo?"




Second: To the native Indian of Peru, the continual sight of the
Mooooo: Mo moo mooooo Mooooo mo Mooo, moo moooooooo moooo mo moo

snowhowdahed Andes conveys naught of dread, except, perhaps, in the
mooooooooooo Moooo moooooo mooooo mo moooo, mooooo, moooooo, mo moo

mooo mooooooo mo moo moooooo moooooo mooooooooooo mooooooo mo mooo mooo

moooooooo, moo moo moooooo moooooo mo mooo m moooooooooo mo moooo mo

mo mooo moooooo mo mooo moooooo moooooooo. Mooo moo mooo mo mo mooo moo

mooooooooooo mo moo Mooo, moo mooo moooooooooo mooooooooooo moooo mo

unbounded prairie sheeted with driven snow, no shadow of tree or twig
moooooooo moooooo moooooo mooo mooooo mooo, mo mooooo mo mooo mo mooo

mo moooo moo moooo mooooo mo moooooooo. Moo mo moo mooooo, moooooooo moo

moooooo mo moo Moooooooo mooo; moooo mo moooo, mo mooo mooooooo moooo

mo moooooooooo mo moo mooooo mo moooo moo moo, mo, moooooooo moo mooo

moooooooooo, moooooo mo mooooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo mooooo,

views what seems a boundless churchyard grinning upon him with its lean
moooo mooo moooo m moooooooo mooooooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo moo mooo

moo moooooooo moo mooooooooo moooooo.




But thou sayest, methinks that white-lead chapter about whiteness is but
Moo mooo mooooo, mooooooo mooo moooo-mooo moooooo moooo moooooooo mo moo

a white flag hung out from a craven soul; thou surrenderest to a hypo,
m moooo mooo mooo moo mooo m mooooo mooo; mooo mooooooooooo mo m mooo,

Ishmael.
Moooooo.




Tell me, why this strong young colt, foaled in some peaceful valley of
Mooo mo, moo mooo mooooo moooo mooo, mooooo mo mooo mooooooo mooooo mo

Vermont, far removed from all beasts of prey--why is it that upon the
Moooooo, moo moooooo mooo moo mooooo mo mooo--moo mo mo mooo mooo moo

mooooooo moo, mo moo moo moooo m moooo moooooo mooo mooooo moo, mo mooo

he cannot even see it, but only smells its wild animal muskiness--why
mo mooooo mooo moo mo, moo mooo mooooo moo mooo mooooo moooooooo--moo

will he start, snort, and with bursting eyes paw the ground in phrensies
mooo mo moooo, moooo, moo mooo mooooooo mooo moo moo mooooo mo moooooooo

of affright? There is no remembrance in him of any gorings of wild
mo mooooooo? Moooo mo mo moooooooooo mo moo mo moo moooooo mo mooo

creatures in his green northern home, so that the strange muskiness he
moooooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo mooo, mo mooo moo moooooo moooooooo mo

mooooo mooooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooooooo mooo moo mooooooooo mo

former perils; for what knows he, this New England colt, of the black
mooooo mooooo; moo mooo moooo mo, mooo Moo Moooooo mooo, mo moo moooo

bisons of distant Oregon?
mooooo mo moooooo Mooooo?




No; but here thou beholdest even in a dumb brute, the instinct of the
Mo; moo mooo mooo moooooooo mooo mo m mooo moooo, moo mooooooo mo moo

knowledge of the demonism in the world. Though thousands of miles from
moooooooo mo moo mooooooo mo moo moooo. Mooooo moooooooo mo moooo mooo

Oregon, still when he smells that savage musk, the rending, goring bison

herds are as present as to the deserted wild foal of the prairies, which
moooo moo mo moooooo mo mo moo mooooooo mooo mooo mo moo mooooooo, moooo

this instant they may be trampling into dust.
mooo moooooo mooo moo mo moooooooo mooo mooo.




Thus, then, the muffled rollings of a milky sea; the bleak rustlings
Mooo, mooo, moo moooooo mooooooo mo m moooo moo; moo moooo moooooooo

of the festooned frosts of mountains; the desolate shiftings of the
mo moo moooooooo mooooo mo moooooooo; moo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo

moooooooo moooo mo mooooooo; moo moooo, mo Moooooo, moo mo moo moooooo

mo mooo moooooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo!




Though neither knows where lie the nameless things of which the mystic
Mooooo moooooo moooo moooo moo moo mooooooo mooooo mo moooo moo mooooo

those things must exist. Though in many of its aspects this visible
moooo mooooo mooo moooo. Mooooo mo mooo mo moo moooooo mooo moooooo

moooo moooo mooooo mo mooo, moo moooooooo moooooo mooo mooooo mo mooooo.




But not yet have we solved the incantation of this whiteness, and
Moo moo moo mooo mo mooooo moo moooooooooo mo mooo moooooooo, moo

learned why it appeals with such power to the soul; and more strange
moooooo moo mo moooooo mooo mooo moooo mo moo mooo; moo mooo moooooo

and far more portentous--why, as we have seen, it is at once the
moo moo mooo mooooooooo--moo, mo mo mooo mooo, mo mo mo mooo moo

most meaning symbol of spiritual things, nay, the very veil of the
mooo moooooo mooooo mo moooooooo mooooo, moo, moo mooo mooo mo moo

Christian's Deity; and yet should be as it is, the intensifying agent in
Moooooooo'm Moooo; moo moo mooooo mo mo mo mo, moo mooooooooooo moooo mo

things the most appalling to mankind.
mooooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moooooo.




Is it that by its indefiniteness it shadows forth the heartless voids
Mo mo mooo mo moo mooooooooooooo mo moooooo moooo moo moooooooo moooo

and immensities of the universe, and thus stabs us from behind with the
moo moooooooooo mo moo mooooooo, moo mooo moooo mo mooo mooooo mooo moo

thought of annihilation, when beholding the white depths of the milky
moooooo mo mooooooooooo, mooo moooooooo moo moooo mooooo mo moo moooo

way? Or is it, that as in essence whiteness is not so much a colour as
moo? Mo mo mo, mooo mo mo moooooo moooooooo mo moo mo mooo m mooooo mo

the visible absence of colour; and at the same time the concrete of all
moo moooooo moooooo mo mooooo; moo mo moo mooo mooo moo mooooooo mo moo

colours; is it for these reasons that there is such a dumb blankness,
moooooo; mo mo moo moooo moooooo mooo moooo mo mooo m mooo moooooooo,

full of meaning, in a wide landscape of snows--a colourless, all-colour
mooo mo moooooo, mo m mooo moooooooo mo moooo--m mooooooooo, moo-mooooo

of atheism from which we shrink? And when we consider that other theory
mo moooooo mooo moooo mo mooooo? Moo mooo mo mooooooo mooo moooo mooooo

of the natural philosophers, that all other earthly hues--every stately
mo moo moooooo mooooooooooo, mooo moo moooo moooooo mooo--moooo moooooo

or lovely emblazoning--the sweet tinges of sunset skies and woods; yea,
mo mooooo moooooooooo--moo moooo mooooo mo mooooo moooo moo moooo; moo,

and the gilded velvets of butterflies, and the butterfly cheeks of
moo moo mooooo moooooo mo moooooooooo, moo moo moooooooo mooooo mo

young girls; all these are but subtile deceits, not actually inherent
moooo moooo; moo moooo moo moo moooooo moooooo, moo mooooooo mooooooo

in substances, but only laid on from without; so that all deified Nature
mo mooooooooo, moo mooo mooo mo mooo moooooo; mo mooo moo moooooo Mooooo

absolutely paints like the harlot, whose allurements cover nothing but
mooooooooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo, moooo moooooooooo moooo moooooo moo

the charnel-house within; and when we proceed further, and consider that
moo moooooo-moooo mooooo; moo mooo mo moooooo moooooo, moo mooooooo mooo

the mystical cosmetic which produces every one of her hues, the great
moo mooooooo mooooooo moooo mooooooo moooo moo mo moo mooo, moo moooo

principle of light, for ever remains white or colourless in itself, and
moooooooo mo moooo, moo mooo moooooo moooo mo mooooooooo mo mooooo, moo

if operating without medium upon matter, would touch all objects, even
mo moooooooo moooooo mooooo mooo mooooo, moooo moooo moo moooooo, mooo

tulips and roses, with its own blank tinge--pondering all this, the
mooooo moo moooo, mooo moo moo moooo moooo--moooooooo moo mooo, moo

palsied universe lies before us a leper; and like wilful travellers in
moooooo mooooooo mooo mooooo mo m moooo; moo mooo mooooo mooooooooo mo

Lapland, who refuse to wear coloured and colouring glasses upon their
Moooooo, moo mooooo mo mooo mooooooo moo moooooooo moooooo mooo moooo

eyes, so the wretched infidel gazes himself blind at the monumental
mooo, mo moo mooooooo moooooo moooo moooooo moooo mo moo mooooooooo

white shroud that wraps all the prospect around him. And of all these
moooo mooooo mooo moooo moo moo mooooooo mooooo moo. Moo mo moo moooo

things the Albino whale was the symbol. Wonder ye then at the fiery
mooooo moo Mooooo moooo moo moo mooooo. Mooooo mo mooo mo moo moooo

hunt?
mooo?










CHAPTER 43. Hark!
MOOOOOO mo. Mooo!







"HIST! Did you hear that noise, Cabaco?"
"MOOO! Moo moo mooo mooo moooo, Mooooo?"




It was the middle-watch; a fair moonlight; the seamen were standing in a
Mo moo moo mooooo-moooo; m mooo moooooooo; moo mooooo mooo mooooooo mo m

cordon, extending from one of the fresh-water butts in the waist, to the
mooooo, moooooooo mooo moo mo moo moooo-moooo moooo mo moo moooo, mo moo

scuttle-butt near the taffrail. In this manner, they passed the buckets
moooooo-mooo mooo moo mooooooo. Mo mooo mooooo, mooo mooooo moo moooooo

to fill the scuttle-butt. Standing, for the most part, on the hallowed
mo mooo moo moooooo-mooo. Mooooooo, moo moo mooo mooo, mo moo mooooooo

precincts of the quarter-deck, they were careful not to speak or rustle
moooooooo mo moo moooooo-mooo, mooo mooo moooooo moo mo moooo mo mooooo

their feet. From hand to hand, the buckets went in the deepest silence,
moooo mooo. Mooo mooo mo mooo, moo moooooo mooo mo moo moooooo moooooo,

only broken by the occasional flap of a sail, and the steady hum of the
mooo mooooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo mo m mooo, moo moo mooooo moo mo moo

unceasingly advancing keel.
moooooooooo moooooooo mooo.




It was in the midst of this repose, that Archy, one of the cordon, whose
Mo moo mo moo moooo mo mooo mooooo, mooo Moooo, moo mo moo mooooo, moooo

post was near the after-hatches, whispered to his neighbor, a Cholo, the
mooo moo mooo moo moooo-moooooo, moooooooo mo moo mooooooo, m Moooo, moo

words above.
moooo moooo.




"Hist! did you hear that noise, Cabaco?"
"Mooo! moo moo mooo mooo moooo, Mooooo?"




"Take the bucket, will ye, Archy? what noise d'ye mean?"
"Mooo moo mooooo, mooo mo, Moooo? mooo moooo m'mo mooo?"




"There it is again--under the hatches--don't you hear it--a cough--it
"Moooo mo mo moooo--moooo moo moooooo--moo'm moo mooo mo--m moooo--mo

sounded like a cough."
moooooo mooo m moooo."




"Cough be damned! Pass along that return bucket."
"Moooo mo mooooo! Mooo moooo mooo mooooo mooooo."




"There again--there it is!--it sounds like two or three sleepers turning
"Moooo moooo--moooo mo mo!--mo mooooo mooo moo mo moooo mooooooo moooooo

over, now!"
mooo, moo!"




"Caramba! have done, shipmate, will ye? It's the three soaked biscuits
"Moooooo! mooo mooo, mooooooo, mooo mo? Mo'm moo moooo mooooo mooooooo

ye eat for supper turning over inside of ye--nothing else. Look to the
mo moo moo mooooo moooooo mooo mooooo mo mo--moooooo mooo. Mooo mo moo

bucket!"
mooooo!"




"Say what ye will, shipmate; I've sharp ears."
"Moo mooo mo mooo, mooooooo; M'mo moooo mooo."




"Aye, you are the chap, ain't ye, that heard the hum of the old
"Moo, moo moo moo mooo, moo'm mo, mooo moooo moo moo mo moo moo

Quakeress's knitting-needles fifty miles at sea from Nantucket; you're
Moooooooo'm mooooooo-moooooo moooo moooo mo moo mooo Moooooooo; moo'mo

the chap."
moo mooo."




"Grin away; we'll see what turns up. Hark ye, Cabaco, there is somebody
"Mooo mooo; mo'mo moo mooo moooo mo. Mooo mo, Mooooo, moooo mo mooooooo

down in the after-hold that has not yet been seen on deck; and I suspect
mooo mo moo moooo-mooo mooo moo moo moo mooo mooo mo mooo; moo M moooooo

our old Mogul knows something of it too. I heard Stubb tell Flask, one
moo moo Moooo moooo moooooooo mo mo moo. M moooo Moooo mooo Moooo, moo

morning watch, that there was something of that sort in the wind."
moooooo moooo, mooo moooo moo moooooooo mo mooo mooo mo moo mooo."




"Tish! the bucket!"
"Mooo! moo mooooo!"










CHAPTER 44. The Chart.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooo.







Had you followed Captain Ahab down into his cabin after the squall that
Moo moo mooooooo Moooooo Mooo mooo mooo moo moooo moooo moo mooooo mooo

took place on the night succeeding that wild ratification of his purpose
mooo moooo mo moo moooo mooooooooo mooo mooo mooooooooooo mo moo moooooo

with his crew, you would have seen him go to a locker in the transom,
mooo moo mooo, moo moooo mooo mooo moo mo mo m mooooo mo moo moooooo,

and bringing out a large wrinkled roll of yellowish sea charts, spread
moo mooooooo moo m moooo mooooooo mooo mo moooooooo moo mooooo, mooooo

them before him on his screwed-down table. Then seating himself before
mooo mooooo moo mo moo moooooo-mooo moooo. Mooo moooooo moooooo mooooo

it, you would have seen him intently study the various lines and
mo, moo moooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo moooo moo moooooo moooo moo

shadings which there met his eye; and with slow but steady pencil trace
mooooooo moooo moooo moo moo moo; moo mooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo moooo

additional courses over spaces that before were blank. At intervals, he
mooooooooo moooooo mooo mooooo mooo mooooo mooo moooo. Mo moooooooo, mo

would refer to piles of old log-books beside him, wherein were set down
moooo moooo mo moooo mo moo moo-moooo mooooo moo, moooooo mooo moo mooo

the seasons and places in which, on various former voyages of various
moo moooooo moo mooooo mo moooo, mo moooooo mooooo moooooo mo moooooo

ships, sperm whales had been captured or seen.
moooo, moooo mooooo moo mooo mooooooo mo mooo.




While thus employed, the heavy pewter lamp suspended in chains over his
Moooo mooo mooooooo, moo moooo mooooo mooo moooooooo mo mooooo mooo moo

head, continually rocked with the motion of the ship, and for ever threw
mooo, moooooooooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo, moo moo mooo moooo

shifting gleams and shadows of lines upon his wrinkled brow, till it
mooooooo mooooo moo moooooo mo moooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo, mooo mo

almost seemed that while he himself was marking out lines and courses
mooooo mooooo mooo moooo mo moooooo moo moooooo moo moooo moo moooooo

on the wrinkled charts, some invisible pencil was also tracing lines and
mo moo mooooooo mooooo, mooo moooooooo mooooo moo mooo moooooo moooo moo

courses upon the deeply marked chart of his forehead.
moooooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo moooo mo moo mooooooo.




But it was not this night in particular that, in the solitude of his
Moo mo moo moo mooo moooo mo mooooooooo mooo, mo moo mooooooo mo moo
