cabin, Ahab thus pondered over his charts. Almost every night they were
moooo, Mooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo. Mooooo moooo moooo mooo mooo

brought out; almost every night some pencil marks were effaced, and
moooooo moo; mooooo moooo moooo mooo mooooo moooo mooo moooooo, moo

others were substituted. For with the charts of all four oceans before
mooooo mooo moooooooooo. Moo mooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo mooooo mooooo

him, Ahab was threading a maze of currents and eddies, with a view to
moo, Mooo moo moooooooo m mooo mo mooooooo moo mooooo, mooo m mooo mo

the more certain accomplishment of that monomaniac thought of his soul.
moo mooo moooooo mooooooooooooo mo mooo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo.




Now, to any one not fully acquainted with the ways of the leviathans,
Moo, mo moo moo moo moooo mooooooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo mooooooooo,

it might seem an absurdly hopeless task thus to seek out one solitary
mo moooo mooo mo mooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo mo mooo moo moo mooooooo

creature in the unhooped oceans of this planet. But not so did it
mooooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo mo mooo mooooo. Moo moo mo moo mo

seem to Ahab, who knew the sets of all tides and currents; and thereby
mooo mo Mooo, moo mooo moo mooo mo moo moooo moo mooooooo; moo moooooo

calculating the driftings of the sperm whale's food; and, also, calling
moooooooooo moo moooooooo mo moo moooo moooo'm mooo; moo, mooo, moooooo

to mind the regular, ascertained seasons for hunting him in particular
mo mooo moo moooooo, moooooooooo moooooo moo moooooo moo mo mooooooooo

latitudes; could arrive at reasonable surmises, almost approaching to
moooooooo; moooo mooooo mo mooooooooo mooooooo, mooooo moooooooooo mo

certainties, concerning the timeliest day to be upon this or that ground
moooooooooo, mooooooooo moo moooooooo moo mo mo mooo mooo mo mooo mooooo

in search of his prey.
mo mooooo mo moo mooo.




So assured, indeed, is the fact concerning the periodicalness of the
Mo moooooo, mooooo, mo moo mooo mooooooooo moo mooooooooooooo mo moo

sperm whale's resorting to given waters, that many hunters believe that,
moooo moooo'm moooooooo mo moooo mooooo, mooo mooo moooooo moooooo mooo,

could he be closely observed and studied throughout the world; were the
moooo mo mo moooooo mooooooo moo moooooo mooooooooo moo moooo; mooo moo

logs for one voyage of the entire whale fleet carefully collated,
mooo moo moo mooooo mo moo mooooo moooo moooo moooooooo mooooooo,

then the migrations of the sperm whale would be found to correspond in
mooo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooo moooo moooo mo moooo mo mooooooooo mo

invariability to those of the herring-shoals or the flights of swallows.
moooooooooooo mo moooo mo moo moooooo-mooooo mo moo moooooo mo mooooooo.

On this hint, attempts have been made to construct elaborate migratory
Mo mooo mooo, mooooooo mooo mooo mooo mo moooooooo moooooooo moooooooo

charts of the sperm whale.*
mooooo mo moo moooo moooo.*




     *Since the above was written, the statement is happily borne
     *Moooo moo moooo moo moooooo, moo moooooooo mo moooooo moooo

     out by an official circular, issued by Lieutenant Maury, of
     moo mo mo mooooooo mooooooo, mooooo mo Mooooooooo Moooo, mo

     the National Observatory, Washington, April 16th, 1851. By
     moo Mooooooo Moooooooooo, Mooooooooo, Moooo mooo, mooo. Mo

     that circular, it appears that precisely such a chart is in
     mooo mooooooo, mo moooooo mooo moooooooo mooo m moooo mo mo

     course of completion; and portions of it are presented in
     mooooo mo mooooooooo; moo mooooooo mo mo moo moooooooo mo

     the circular. "This chart divides the ocean into districts
     moo mooooooo. "Mooo moooo moooooo moo moooo mooo moooooooo

     of five degrees of latitude by five degrees of longitude;
     mo mooo moooooo mo mooooooo mo mooo moooooo mo moooooooo;

     perpendicularly through each of which districts are twelve
     moooooooooooooo moooooo mooo mo moooo moooooooo moo mooooo

     columns for the twelve months; and horizontally through each
     moooooo moo moo mooooo mooooo; moo mooooooooooo moooooo mooo

     of which districts are three lines; one to show the number
     mo moooo moooooooo moo moooo moooo; moo mo mooo moo mooooo

     of days that have been spent in each month in every
     mo mooo mooo mooo mooo moooo mo mooo moooo mo moooo

     district, and the two others to show the number of days in
     mooooooo, moo moo moo mooooo mo mooo moo mooooo mo mooo mo

     which whales, sperm or right, have been seen."
     moooo mooooo, moooo mo moooo, mooo mooo mooo."




Besides, when making a passage from one feeding-ground to another, the
Moooooo, mooo mooooo m moooooo mooo moo moooooo-mooooo mo moooooo, moo

sperm whales, guided by some infallible instinct--say, rather, secret
moooo mooooo, mooooo mo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo--moo, mooooo, mooooo

intelligence from the Deity--mostly swim in VEINS, as they are called;
mooooooooooo mooo moo Moooo--mooooo mooo mo MOOOO, mo mooo moo mooooo;

continuing their way along a given ocean-line with such undeviating
mooooooooo moooo moo moooo m moooo moooo-mooo mooo mooo moooooooooo

exactitude, that no ship ever sailed her course, by any chart, with
mooooooooo, mooo mo mooo mooo mooooo moo mooooo, mo moo moooo, mooo

one tithe of such marvellous precision. Though, in these cases, the
moo moooo mo mooo mooooooooo moooooooo. Mooooo, mo moooo moooo, moo

direction taken by any one whale be straight as a surveyor's parallel,
moooooooo moooo mo moo moo moooo mo mooooooo mo m mooooooo'm mooooooo,

and though the line of advance be strictly confined to its own
moo mooooo moo mooo mo moooooo mo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo moo

unavoidable, straight wake, yet the arbitrary VEIN in which at these
moooooooooo, mooooooo mooo, moo moo moooooooo MOOO mo moooo mo moooo

times he is said to swim, generally embraces some few miles in width
moooo mo mo mooo mo mooo, moooooooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo mo moooo

(more or less, as the vein is presumed to expand or contract); but
(mooo mo mooo, mo moo mooo mo mooooooo mo mooooo mo mooooooo); moo

never exceeds the visual sweep from the whale-ship's mast-heads,
moooo moooooo moo mooooo moooo mooo moo moooo-mooo'm mooo-moooo,

when circumspectly gliding along this magic zone. The sum is, that at
mooo moooooooooooo moooooo moooo mooo moooo mooo. Moo moo mo, mooo mo

particular seasons within that breadth and along that path, migrating
mooooooooo moooooo mooooo mooo moooooo moo moooo mooo mooo, moooooooo

whales may with great confidence be looked for.
mooooo moo mooo moooo mooooooooo mo mooooo moo.




And hence not only at substantiated times, upon well known separate
Moo moooo moo mooo mo moooooooooooo moooo, mooo mooo moooo mooooooo

feeding-grounds, could Ahab hope to encounter his prey; but in crossing
moooooo-moooooo, moooo Mooo mooo mo moooooooo moo mooo; moo mo mooooooo

the widest expanses of water between those grounds he could, by his
moo mooooo mooooooo mo moooo moooooo moooo moooooo mo moooo, mo moo

art, so place and time himself on his way, as even then not to be wholly
moo, mo moooo moo mooo moooooo mo moo moo, mo mooo mooo moo mo mo mooooo

without prospect of a meeting.
moooooo mooooooo mo m moooooo.




There was a circumstance which at first sight seemed to entangle his
Moooo moo m mooooooooooo moooo mo moooo moooo mooooo mo mooooooo moo

delirious but still methodical scheme. But not so in the reality,
moooooooo moo moooo mooooooooo mooooo. Moo moo mo mo moo moooooo,

perhaps. Though the gregarious sperm whales have their regular seasons
moooooo. Mooooo moo mooooooooo moooo mooooo mooo moooo moooooo moooooo

for particular grounds, yet in general you cannot conclude that the
moo mooooooooo moooooo, moo mo moooooo moo mooooo mooooooo mooo moo

herds which haunted such and such a latitude or longitude this year,
moooo moooo moooooo mooo moo mooo m mooooooo mo moooooooo mooo mooo,

say, will turn out to be identically the same with those that were found
moo, mooo mooo moo mo mo moooooooooo moo mooo mooo moooo mooo mooo moooo

there the preceding season; though there are peculiar and unquestionable
moooo moo moooooooo mooooo; mooooo moooo moo mooooooo moo mooooooooooooo

instances where the contrary of this has proved true. In general, the
moooooooo moooo moo mooooooo mo mooo moo mooooo mooo. Mo moooooo, moo

same remark, only within a less wide limit, applies to the solitaries
mooo mooooo, mooo mooooo m mooo mooo moooo, moooooo mo moo mooooooooo

and hermits among the matured, aged sperm whales. So that though Moby
moo moooooo moooo moo moooooo, mooo moooo mooooo. Mo mooo mooooo Mooo

Dick had in a former year been seen, for example, on what is called the
Mooo moo mo m mooooo mooo mooo mooo, moo moooooo, mo mooo mo mooooo moo

Seychelle ground in the Indian ocean, or Volcano Bay on the Japanese
Moooooooo mooooo mo moo Mooooo moooo, mo Moooooo Moo mo moo Mooooooo

Coast; yet it did not follow, that were the Pequod to visit either of
Moooo; moo mo moo moo mooooo, mooo mooo moo Mooooo mo moooo mooooo mo

those spots at any subsequent corresponding season, she would infallibly
moooo moooo mo moo mooooooooo moooooooooooo mooooo, moo moooo mooooooooo

encounter him there. So, too, with some other feeding grounds, where
moooooooo moo moooo. Mo, moo, mooo mooo moooo moooooo moooooo, moooo

he had at times revealed himself. But all these seemed only his casual
mo moo mo moooo mooooooo moooooo. Moo moo moooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo

stopping-places and ocean-inns, so to speak, not his places of prolonged
mooooooo-mooooo moo moooo-mooo, mo mo moooo, moo moo mooooo mo moooooooo

abode. And where Ahab's chances of accomplishing his object have
moooo. Moo moooo Mooo'm moooooo mo moooooooooooo moo mooooo mooo

hitherto been spoken of, allusion has only been made to whatever
mooooooo mooo mooooo mo, mooooooo moo mooo mooo mooo mo mooooooo

way-side, antecedent, extra prospects were his, ere a particular
moo-mooo, mooooooooo, moooo moooooooo mooo moo, moo m mooooooooo

set time or place were attained, when all possibilities would become
moo mooo mo moooo mooo mooooooo, mooo moo moooooooooooo moooo mooooo

probabilities, and, as Ahab fondly thought, every possibility the next
moooooooooooo, moo, mo Mooo mooooo moooooo, moooo moooooooooo moo mooo

thing to a certainty. That particular set time and place were conjoined
moooo mo m moooooooo. Mooo mooooooooo moo mooo moo moooo mooo moooooooo

in the one technical phrase--the Season-on-the-Line. For there and then,
mo moo moo moooooooo mooooo--moo Mooooo-mo-moo-Mooo. Moo moooo moo mooo,

for several consecutive years, Moby Dick had been periodically descried,
moo moooooo moooooooooo moooo, Mooo Mooo moo mooo mooooooooooo mooooooo,

lingering in those waters for awhile, as the sun, in its annual round,
moooooooo mo moooo mooooo moo mooooo, mo moo moo, mo moo mooooo moooo,

loiters for a predicted interval in any one sign of the Zodiac. There
moooooo moo m moooooooo mooooooo mo moo moo mooo mo moo Mooooo. Moooo

it was, too, that most of the deadly encounters with the white whale had
mo moo, moo, mooo mooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooo mooo moo moooo moooo moo

taken place; there the waves were storied with his deeds; there also was
moooo moooo; moooo moo moooo mooo moooooo mooo moo moooo; moooo mooo moo

that tragic spot where the monomaniac old man had found the awful motive
mooo mooooo mooo moooo moo mooooooooo moo moo moo moooo moo moooo mooooo

to his vengeance. But in the cautious comprehensiveness and unloitering
mo moo moooooooo. Moo mo moo mooooooo moooooooooooooooo moo moooooooooo

vigilance with which Ahab threw his brooding soul into this unfaltering
moooooooo mooo moooo Mooo moooo moo mooooooo mooo mooo mooo moooooooooo

hunt, he would not permit himself to rest all his hopes upon the one
mooo, mo moooo moo mooooo moooooo mo mooo moo moo moooo mooo moo moo

crowning fact above mentioned, however flattering it might be to those
mooooooo mooo moooo moooooooo, moooooo mooooooooo mo moooo mo mo moooo

hopes; nor in the sleeplessness of his vow could he so tranquillize his
moooo; moo mo moo moooooooooooo mo moo moo moooo mo mo mooooooooooo moo

unquiet heart as to postpone all intervening quest.
moooooo moooo mo mo mooooooo moo moooooooooo moooo.




Now, the Pequod had sailed from Nantucket at the very beginning of the
Moo, moo Mooooo moo mooooo mooo Moooooooo mo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo

Season-on-the-Line. No possible endeavor then could enable her commander
Mooooo-mo-moo-Mooo. Mo mooooooo mooooooo mooo moooo mooooo moo moooooooo

to make the great passage southwards, double Cape Horn, and then running
mo mooo moo moooo moooooo mooooooooo, mooooo Mooo Mooo, moo mooo moooooo

down sixty degrees of latitude arrive in the equatorial Pacific in time
mooo moooo moooooo mo mooooooo mooooo mo moo mooooooooo Moooooo mo mooo

to cruise there. Therefore, he must wait for the next ensuing season.
mo mooooo moooo. Moooooooo, mo mooo mooo moo moo mooo moooooo mooooo.

Yet the premature hour of the Pequod's sailing had, perhaps, been
Moo moo moooooooo mooo mo moo Mooooo'm moooooo moo, moooooo, mooo

correctly selected by Ahab, with a view to this very complexion of
moooooooo mooooooo mo Mooo, mooo m mooo mo mooo mooo mooooooooo mo

things. Because, an interval of three hundred and sixty-five days
mooooo. Moooooo, mo mooooooo mo moooo moooooo moo moooo-mooo mooo

and nights was before him; an interval which, instead of impatiently
moo mooooo moo mooooo moo; mo mooooooo moooo, moooooo mo moooooooooo

enduring ashore, he would spend in a miscellaneous hunt; if by chance
mooooooo mooooo, mo moooo moooo mo m moooooooooooo mooo; mo mo mooooo

the White Whale, spending his vacation in seas far remote from his
moo Moooo Moooo, mooooooo moo mooooooo mo mooo moo mooooo mooo moo

periodical feeding-grounds, should turn up his wrinkled brow off the
mooooooooo moooooo-moooooo, mooooo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooo moo moo

Persian Gulf, or in the Bengal Bay, or China Seas, or in any other
Moooooo Mooo, mo mo moo Mooooo Moo, mo Moooo Mooo, mo mo moo moooo

waters haunted by his race. So that Monsoons, Pampas, Nor'-Westers,
mooooo moooooo mo moo mooo. Mo mooo Mooooooo, Mooooo, Moo'-Moooooo,

Harmattans, Trades; any wind but the Levanter and Simoon, might
Mooooooooo, Mooooo; moo mooo moo moo Mooooooo moo Mooooo, moooo

blow Moby Dick into the devious zig-zag world-circle of the Pequod's
mooo Mooo Mooo mooo moo moooooo moo-moo moooo-mooooo mo moo Mooooo'm

circumnavigating wake.
mooooooooooooooo mooo.




But granting all this; yet, regarded discreetly and coolly, seems it not
Moo mooooooo moo mooo; moo, mooooooo mooooooooo moo mooooo, moooo mo moo

but a mad idea, this; that in the broad boundless ocean, one solitary
moo m moo mooo, mooo; mooo mo moo moooo moooooooo moooo, moo mooooooo

whale, even if encountered, should be thought capable of individual
moooo, mooo mo moooooooooo, mooooo mo moooooo moooooo mo mooooooooo

recognition from his hunter, even as a white-bearded Mufti in the
moooooooooo mooo moo mooooo, mooo mo m moooo-moooooo Moooo mo moo

thronged thoroughfares of Constantinople? Yes. For the peculiar
mooooooo moooooooooooo mo Mooooooooooooo? Moo. Moo moo mooooooo

snow-white brow of Moby Dick, and his snow-white hump, could not but
mooo-moooo mooo mo Mooo Mooo, moo moo mooo-moooo mooo, moooo moo moo

be unmistakable. And have I not tallied the whale, Ahab would mutter
mo mooooooooooo. Moo mooo M moo moooooo moo moooo, Mooo moooo mooooo

to himself, as after poring over his charts till long after midnight he
mo moooooo, mo moooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo mooo mooo moooo mooooooo mo

would throw himself back in reveries--tallied him, and shall he escape?
moooo moooo moooooo mooo mo mooooooo--moooooo moo, moo moooo mo mooooo?

His broad fins are bored, and scalloped out like a lost sheep's ear! And
Moo moooo mooo moo moooo, moo moooooooo moo mooo m mooo moooo'm moo! Moo

here, his mad mind would run on in a breathless race; till a weariness
mooo, moo moo mooo moooo moo mo mo m mooooooooo mooo; mooo m moooooooo

and faintness of pondering came over him; and in the open air of the
moo moooooooo mo moooooooo mooo mooo moo; moo mo moo mooo moo mo moo

deck he would seek to recover his strength. Ah, God! what trances
mooo mo moooo mooo mo moooooo moo mooooooo. Mo, Moo! mooo moooooo

of torments does that man endure who is consumed with one unachieved
mo mooooooo mooo mooo moo mooooo moo mo mooooooo mooo moo mooooooooo

revengeful desire. He sleeps with clenched hands; and wakes with his own
mooooooooo mooooo. Mo mooooo mooo mooooooo moooo; moo moooo mooo moo moo

bloody nails in his palms.
mooooo moooo mo moo moooo.




Often, when forced from his hammock by exhausting and intolerably vivid
Moooo, mooo mooooo mooo moo moooooo mo mooooooooo moo moooooooooo moooo

dreams of the night, which, resuming his own intense thoughts through
mooooo mo moo moooo, moooo, mooooooo moo moo moooooo mooooooo moooooo

the day, carried them on amid a clashing of phrensies, and whirled them
moo moo, moooooo mooo mo mooo m mooooooo mo moooooooo, moo moooooo mooo

round and round and round in his blazing brain, till the very throbbing
moooo moo moooo moo moooo mo moo moooooo moooo, mooo moo mooo moooooooo

of his life-spot became insufferable anguish; and when, as was sometimes
mo moo mooo-mooo mooooo mooooooooooo moooooo; moo mooo, mo moo moooooooo

the case, these spiritual throes in him heaved his being up from its
moo mooo, moooo moooooooo mooooo mo moo mooooo moo moooo mo mooo moo

base, and a chasm seemed opening in him, from which forked flames and
mooo, moo m moooo mooooo moooooo mo moo, mooo moooo mooooo mooooo moo

lightnings shot up, and accursed fiends beckoned him to leap down among
mooooooooo mooo mo, moo mooooooo mooooo mooooooo moo mo mooo mooo moooo

them; when this hell in himself yawned beneath him, a wild cry would be
mooo; mooo mooo mooo mo moooooo mooooo moooooo moo, m mooo moo moooo mo

heard through the ship; and with glaring eyes Ahab would burst from his
moooo moooooo moo mooo; moo mooo moooooo mooo Mooo moooo moooo mooo moo

state room, as though escaping from a bed that was on fire. Yet these,
moooo mooo, mo mooooo mooooooo mooo m moo mooo moo mo mooo. Moo moooo,

perhaps, instead of being the unsuppressable symptoms of some latent
moooooo, moooooo mo moooo moo mooooooooooooo mooooooo mo mooo mooooo

weakness, or fright at his own resolve, were but the plainest tokens
mooooooo, mo mooooo mo moo moo moooooo, mooo moo moo mooooooo mooooo

of its intensity. For, at such times, crazy Ahab, the scheming,
mo moo moooooooo. Moo, mo mooo moooo, moooo Mooo, moo mooooooo,

unappeasedly steadfast hunter of the white whale; this Ahab that had
mooooooooooo moooooooo mooooo mo moo moooo moooo; mooo Mooo mooo moo

gone to his hammock, was not the agent that so caused him to burst from
mooo mo moo moooooo, moo moo moo moooo mooo mo mooooo moo mo moooo mooo

it in horror again. The latter was the eternal, living principle or
mo mo mooooo moooo. Moo mooooo moo moo moooooo, mooooo moooooooo mo

soul in him; and in sleep, being for the time dissociated from the
mooo mo moo; moo mo moooo, moooo moo moo mooo moooooooooo mooo moo

characterizing mind, which at other times employed it for its outer
mooooooooooooo mooo, moooo mo moooo moooo mooooooo mo moo moo moooo

vehicle or agent, it spontaneously sought escape from the scorching
moooooo mo moooo, mo moooooooooooo mooooo mooooo mooo moo moooooooo

contiguity of the frantic thing, of which, for the time, it was no
mooooooooo mo moo moooooo moooo, mo moooo, moo moo mooo, mo moo mo

longer an integral. But as the mind does not exist unless leagued with
mooooo mo mooooooo. Moo mo moo mooo mooo moo moooo mooooo moooooo mooo

the soul, therefore it must have been that, in Ahab's case, yielding up
moo mooo, moooooooo mo mooo mooo mooo mooo, mo Mooo'm mooo, mooooooo mo

all his thoughts and fancies to his one supreme purpose; that purpose,
moo moo mooooooo moo moooooo mo moo moo moooooo moooooo; mooo moooooo,

by its own sheer inveteracy of will, forced itself against gods and
mo moo moo moooo mooooooooo mo mooo, mooooo mooooo moooooo mooo moo

devils into a kind of self-assumed, independent being of its own. Nay,
mooooo mooo m mooo mo mooo-moooooo, moooooooooo moooo mo moo moo. Moo,

could grimly live and burn, while the common vitality to which it was
moooo mooooo mooo moo mooo, moooo moo mooooo mooooooo mo moooo mo moo

conjoined, fled horror-stricken from the unbidden and unfathered birth.
moooooooo, mooo mooooo-mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo moo mooooooooo moooo.

Therefore, the tormented spirit that glared out of bodily eyes, when
Moooooooo, moo moooooooo mooooo mooo mooooo moo mo mooooo mooo, mooo

what seemed Ahab rushed from his room, was for the time but a vacated
mooo mooooo Mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo, moo moo moo mooo moo m moooooo

thing, a formless somnambulistic being, a ray of living light, to be
moooo, m mooooooo mooooooooooooo moooo, m moo mo mooooo moooo, mo mo

sure, but without an object to colour, and therefore a blankness in
mooo, moo moooooo mo mooooo mo mooooo, moo moooooooo m moooooooo mo

itself. God help thee, old man, thy thoughts have created a creature
mooooo. Moo mooo mooo, moo moo, moo mooooooo mooo moooooo m mooooooo

in thee; and he whose intense thinking thus makes him a Prometheus; a
mo mooo; moo mo moooo moooooo mooooooo mooo moooo moo m Mooooooooo; m

vulture feeds upon that heart for ever; that vulture the very creature
moooooo moooo mooo mooo moooo moo mooo; mooo moooooo moo mooo mooooooo

he creates.
mo moooooo.










CHAPTER 45. The Affidavit.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooooooo.







So far as what there may be of a narrative in this book; and, indeed, as
Mo moo mo mooo moooo moo mo mo m moooooooo mo mooo mooo; moo, mooooo, mo

indirectly touching one or two very interesting and curious particulars
mooooooooo mooooooo moo mo moo mooo moooooooooo moo moooooo moooooooooo

in the habits of sperm whales, the foregoing chapter, in its earlier
mo moo mooooo mo moooo mooooo, moo moooooooo moooooo, mo moo moooooo

part, is as important a one as will be found in this volume; but the
mooo, mo mo moooooooo m moo mo mooo mo moooo mo mooo mooooo; moo moo

leading matter of it requires to be still further and more familiarly
moooooo mooooo mo mo mooooooo mo mo moooo moooooo moo mooo mooooooooo

enlarged upon, in order to be adequately understood, and moreover to
mooooooo mooo, mo moooo mo mo mooooooooo mooooooooo, moo mooooooo mo

take away any incredulity which a profound ignorance of the entire
mooo mooo moo moooooooooo moooo m mooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo

subject may induce in some minds, as to the natural verity of the main
moooooo moo mooooo mo mooo moooo, mo mo moo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooo

points of this affair.
mooooo mo mooo mooooo.




I care not to perform this part of my task methodically; but shall
M mooo moo mo moooooo mooo mooo mo mo mooo mooooooooooo; moo moooo

be content to produce the desired impression by separate citations of
mo moooooo mo moooooo moo moooooo mooooooooo mo mooooooo moooooooo mo

items, practically or reliably known to me as a whaleman; and from these
moooo, moooooooooo mo mooooooo moooo mo mo mo m mooooooo; moo mooo moooo

citations, I take it--the conclusion aimed at will naturally follow of
moooooooo, M mooo mo--moo mooooooooo moooo mo mooo moooooooo mooooo mo

itself.
mooooo.




First: I have personally known three instances where a whale, after
Moooo: M mooo mooooooooo moooo moooo moooooooo moooo m moooo, moooo

receiving a harpoon, has effected a complete escape; and, after an
moooooooo m moooooo, moo mooooooo m mooooooo mooooo; moo, moooo mo

interval (in one instance of three years), has been again struck by
mooooooo (mo moo mooooooo mo moooo moooo), moo mooo moooo mooooo mo

the same hand, and slain; when the two irons, both marked by the same
moo mooo mooo, moo moooo; mooo moo moo moooo, mooo mooooo mo moo mooo

private cypher, have been taken from the body. In the instance where
moooooo mooooo, mooo mooo moooo mooo moo mooo. Mo moo mooooooo moooo

three years intervened between the flinging of the two harpoons; and I
moooo moooo mooooooooo moooooo moo mooooooo mo moo moo mooooooo; moo M

think it may have been something more than that; the man who darted
moooo mo moo mooo mooo moooooooo mooo mooo mooo; moo moo moo mooooo

them happening, in the interval, to go in a trading ship on a voyage to
mooo moooooooo, mo moo mooooooo, mo mo mo m moooooo mooo mo m mooooo mo

Africa, went ashore there, joined a discovery party, and penetrated far
Mooooo, mooo mooooo moooo, mooooo m moooooooo moooo, moo mooooooooo moo

into the interior, where he travelled for a period of nearly two years,
mooo moo mooooooo, moooo mo moooooooo moo m mooooo mo mooooo moo moooo,

often endangered by serpents, savages, tigers, poisonous miasmas,
moooo mooooooooo mo mooooooo, moooooo, mooooo, moooooooo moooooo,

with all the other common perils incident to wandering in the heart of
mooo moo moo moooo mooooo mooooo mooooooo mo moooooooo mo moo moooo mo

unknown regions. Meanwhile, the whale he had struck must also have
moooooo moooooo. Moooooooo, moo moooo mo moo mooooo mooo mooo mooo

been on its travels; no doubt it had thrice circumnavigated the globe,
mooo mo moo moooooo; mo moooo mo moo mooooo moooooooooooooo moo moooo,

brushing with its flanks all the coasts of Africa; but to no purpose.
mooooooo mooo moo mooooo moo moo mooooo mo Mooooo; moo mo mo moooooo.

This man and this whale again came together, and the one vanquished the
Mooo moo moo mooo moooo moooo mooo mooooooo, moo moo moo mooooooooo moo

other. I say I, myself, have known three instances similar to this; that
moooo. M moo M, mooooo, mooo moooo moooo moooooooo moooooo mo mooo; mooo

is in two of them I saw the whales struck; and, upon the second attack,
mo mo moo mo mooo M moo moo mooooo mooooo; moo, mooo moo mooooo mooooo,

saw the two irons with the respective marks cut in them, afterwards
moo moo moo moooo mooo moo mooooooooo moooo moo mo mooo, mooooooooo

taken from the dead fish. In the three-year instance, it so fell out
moooo mooo moo mooo mooo. Mo moo moooo-mooo mooooooo, mo mo mooo moo

that I was in the boat both times, first and last, and the last time
mooo M moo mo moo mooo mooo moooo, moooo moo mooo, moo moo mooo mooo

distinctly recognised a peculiar sort of huge mole under the whale's
mooooooooo mooooooooo m mooooooo mooo mo mooo mooo moooo moo moooo'm

eye, which I had observed there three years previous. I say three years,
moo, moooo M moo mooooooo moooo moooo moooo mooooooo. M moo moooo moooo,

but I am pretty sure it was more than that. Here are three instances,
moo M mo mooooo mooo mo moo mooo mooo mooo. Mooo moo moooo moooooooo,

then, which I personally know the truth of; but I have heard of many
mooo, moooo M mooooooooo mooo moo moooo mo; moo M mooo moooo mo mooo

other instances from persons whose veracity in the matter there is no
moooo moooooooo mooo moooooo moooo mooooooo mo moo mooooo moooo mo mo

good ground to impeach.
mooo mooooo mo moooooo.




Secondly: It is well known in the Sperm Whale Fishery, however ignorant
Mooooooo: Mo mo mooo moooo mo moo Moooo Moooo Moooooo, moooooo mooooooo

the world ashore may be of it, that there have been several memorable
moo moooo mooooo moo mo mo mo, mooo moooo mooo mooo moooooo moooooooo

historical instances where a particular whale in the ocean has been at
mooooooooo moooooooo moooo m mooooooooo moooo mo moo moooo moo mooo mo

distant times and places popularly cognisable. Why such a whale became
moooooo moooo moo mooooo moooooooo mooooooooo. Moo mooo m moooo mooooo

thus marked was not altogether and originally owing to his bodily
mooo mooooo moo moo mooooooooo moo mooooooooo moooo mo moo mooooo

peculiarities as distinguished from other whales; for however peculiar
moooooooooooo mo moooooooooooo mooo moooo mooooo; moo moooooo mooooooo

in that respect any chance whale may be, they soon put an end to his
mo mooo moooooo moo mooooo moooo moo mo, mooo mooo moo mo moo mo moo

peculiarities by killing him, and boiling him down into a peculiarly
moooooooooooo mo moooooo moo, moo moooooo moo mooo mooo m mooooooooo

valuable oil. No: the reason was this: that from the fatal experiences
mooooooo moo. Mo: moo mooooo moo mooo: mooo mooo moo moooo moooooooooo

of the fishery there hung a terrible prestige of perilousness about
mo moo moooooo moooo mooo m mooooooo mooooooo mo mooooooooooo moooo

such a whale as there did about Rinaldo Rinaldini, insomuch that
mooo m moooo mo moooo moo moooo Moooooo Moooooooo, mooooooo mooo

most fishermen were content to recognise him by merely touching their
mooo moooooooo mooo moooooo mo moooooooo moo mo mooooo mooooooo moooo

tarpaulins when he would be discovered lounging by them on the sea,
mooooooooo mooo mo moooo mo mooooooooo mooooooo mo mooo mo moo moo,

without seeking to cultivate a more intimate acquaintance. Like some
moooooo moooooo mo moooooooo m mooo mooooooo mooooooooooo. Mooo mooo

poor devils ashore that happen to know an irascible great man, they
mooo mooooo mooooo mooo mooooo mo mooo mo moooooooo moooo moo, mooo

make distant unobtrusive salutations to him in the street, lest if they
mooo moooooo moooooooooo moooooooooo mo moo mo moo mooooo, mooo mo mooo

pursued the acquaintance further, they might receive a summary thump for
moooooo moo mooooooooooo moooooo, mooo moooo moooooo m moooooo moooo moo

their presumption.
moooo moooooooooo.




But not only did each of these famous whales enjoy great individual
Moo moo mooo moo mooo mo moooo mooooo mooooo moooo moooo mooooooooo

celebrity--Nay, you may call it an ocean-wide renown; not only was he
moooooooo--Moo, moo moo mooo mo mo moooo-mooo mooooo; moo mooo moo mo

famous in life and now is immortal in forecastle stories after death,
mooooo mo mooo moo moo mo mooooooo mo mooooooooo moooooo moooo moooo,

but he was admitted into all the rights, privileges, and distinctions of
moo mo moo mooooooo mooo moo moo mooooo, mooooooooo, moo mooooooooooo mo

a name; had as much a name indeed as Cambyses or Caesar. Was it not so,
m mooo; moo mo mooo m mooo mooooo mo Mooooooo mo Mooooo. Moo mo moo mo,

O Timor Tom! thou famed leviathan, scarred like an iceberg, who so long
M Moooo Moo! mooo moooo moooooooo, moooooo mooo mo moooooo, moo mo mooo

did'st lurk in the Oriental straits of that name, whose spout was oft
moo'mo mooo mo moo Mooooooo moooooo mo mooo mooo, moooo moooo moo moo

seen from the palmy beach of Ombay? Was it not so, O New Zealand Jack!
mooo mooo moo moooo moooo mo Moooo? Moo mo moo mo, M Moo Moooooo Mooo!

thou terror of all cruisers that crossed their wakes in the vicinity of
mooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo moooooo moooo moooo mo moo mooooooo mo

the Tattoo Land? Was it not so, O Morquan! King of Japan, whose lofty
moo Mooooo Mooo? Moo mo moo mo, M Moooooo! Mooo mo Moooo, moooo moooo

jet they say at times assumed the semblance of a snow-white cross
moo mooo moo mo moooo moooooo moo moooooooo mo m mooo-moooo moooo

against the sky? Was it not so, O Don Miguel! thou Chilian whale, marked
moooooo moo moo? Moo mo moo mo, M Moo Mooooo! mooo Moooooo moooo, mooooo

like an old tortoise with mystic hieroglyphics upon the back! In plain
mooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mooooo moooooooooooo mooo moo mooo! Mo moooo

prose, here are four whales as well known to the students of Cetacean
moooo, mooo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo moooo mo moo mooooooo mo Mooooooo

History as Marius or Sylla to the classic scholar.
Moooooo mo Mooooo mo Moooo mo moo moooooo moooooo.




But this is not all. New Zealand Tom and Don Miguel, after at various
Moo mooo mo moo moo. Moo Moooooo Moo moo Moo Mooooo, moooo mo moooooo

times creating great havoc among the boats of different vessels, were
moooo mooooooo moooo moooo moooo moo moooo mo moooooooo moooooo, mooo

finally gone in quest of, systematically hunted out, chased and killed
moooooo mooo mo moooo mo, mooooooooooooo mooooo moo, mooooo moo mooooo

by valiant whaling captains, who heaved up their anchors with
mo moooooo moooooo mooooooo, moo mooooo mo moooo moooooo mooo

that express object as much in view, as in setting out through the
mooo moooooo mooooo mo mooo mo mooo, mo mo moooooo moo moooooo moo

Narragansett Woods, Captain Butler of old had it in his mind to capture
Mooooooooooo Moooo, Moooooo Mooooo mo moo moo mo mo moo mooo mo moooooo

that notorious murderous savage Annawon, the headmost warrior of the
mooo moooooooo moooooooo mooooo Moooooo, moo mooooooo moooooo mo moo

Indian King Philip.
Mooooo Mooo Mooooo.




I do not know where I can find a better place than just here, to make
M mo moo mooo moooo M moo mooo m mooooo moooo mooo mooo mooo, mo mooo

mention of one or two other things, which to me seem important, as in
moooooo mo moo mo moo moooo mooooo, moooo mo mo mooo moooooooo, mo mo

printed form establishing in all respects the reasonableness of the
moooooo mooo mooooooooooo mo moo mooooooo moo mooooooooooooo mo moo

whole story of the White Whale, more especially the catastrophe. For
moooo moooo mo moo Moooo Moooo, mooo mooooooooo moo moooooooooo. Moo

this is one of those disheartening instances where truth requires full
mooo mo moo mo moooo moooooooooooo moooooooo moooo moooo mooooooo mooo

as much bolstering as error. So ignorant are most landsmen of some of
mo mooo mooooooooo mo moooo. Mo mooooooo moo mooo mooooooo mo mooo mo

the plainest and most palpable wonders of the world, that without
moo mooooooo moo mooo mooooooo moooooo mo moo moooo, mooo moooooo

some hints touching the plain facts, historical and otherwise, of the
mooo moooo mooooooo moo moooo moooo, mooooooooo moo moooooooo, mo moo

fishery, they might scout at Moby Dick as a monstrous fable, or still
moooooo, mooo moooo moooo mo Mooo Mooo mo m moooooooo moooo, mo moooo

worse and more detestable, a hideous and intolerable allegory.
moooo moo mooo mooooooooo, m moooooo moo moooooooooo mooooooo.




First: Though most men have some vague flitting ideas of the general
Moooo: Mooooo mooo moo mooo mooo moooo mooooooo moooo mo moo moooooo

perils of the grand fishery, yet they have nothing like a fixed, vivid
mooooo mo moo moooo moooooo, moo mooo mooo moooooo mooo m moooo, moooo

conception of those perils, and the frequency with which they recur.
mooooooooo mo moooo mooooo, moo moo moooooooo mooo moooo mooo moooo.

One reason perhaps is, that not one in fifty of the actual disasters and
Moo mooooo moooooo mo, mooo moo moo mo moooo mo moo mooooo moooooooo moo

deaths by casualties in the fishery, ever finds a public record at home,
mooooo mo mooooooooo mo moo moooooo, mooo moooo m mooooo mooooo mo mooo,

however transient and immediately forgotten that record. Do you suppose
moooooo moooooooo moo moooooooooo moooooooo mooo mooooo. Mo moo moooooo

that that poor fellow there, who this moment perhaps caught by the
mooo mooo mooo mooooo moooo, moo mooo mooooo moooooo mooooo mo moo

whale-line off the coast of New Guinea, is being carried down to the
moooo-mooo moo moo moooo mo Moo Mooooo, mo moooo moooooo mooo mo moo

bottom of the sea by the sounding leviathan--do you suppose that that
mooooo mo moo moo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo--mo moo moooooo mooo mooo

poor fellow's name will appear in the newspaper obituary you will read
mooo mooooo'm mooo mooo mooooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooo moo mooo mooo

to-morrow at your breakfast? No: because the mails are very irregular
mo-mooooo mo mooo moooooooo? Mo: moooooo moo moooo moo mooo moooooooo

between here and New Guinea. In fact, did you ever hear what might be
moooooo mooo moo Moo Mooooo. Mo mooo, moo moo mooo mooo mooo moooo mo

called regular news direct or indirect from New Guinea? Yet I tell you
mooooo moooooo mooo mooooo mo mooooooo mooo Moo Mooooo? Moo M mooo moo

that upon one particular voyage which I made to the Pacific, among many
mooo mooo moo mooooooooo mooooo moooo M mooo mo moo Moooooo, moooo mooo

others we spoke thirty different ships, every one of which had had a
mooooo mo moooo mooooo moooooooo moooo, moooo moo mo moooo moo moo m

death by a whale, some of them more than one, and three that had each
moooo mo m moooo, mooo mo mooo mooo mooo moo, moo moooo mooo moo mooo

lost a boat's crew. For God's sake, be economical with your lamps and
mooo m mooo'm mooo. Moo Moo'm mooo, mo mooooooooo mooo mooo moooo moo

candles! not a gallon you burn, but at least one drop of man's blood was
moooooo! moo m mooooo moo mooo, moo mo moooo moo mooo mo moo'm moooo moo

spilled for it.
moooooo moo mo.




Secondly: People ashore have indeed some indefinite idea that a whale is
Mooooooo: Mooooo mooooo mooo mooooo mooo mooooooooo mooo mooo m moooo mo

an enormous creature of enormous power; but I have ever found that when
mo mooooooo mooooooo mo mooooooo moooo; moo M mooo mooo moooo mooo mooo

narrating to them some specific example of this two-fold enormousness,
moooooooo mo mooo mooo mooooooo moooooo mo mooo moo-mooo mooooooooooo,

they have significantly complimented me upon my facetiousness; when, I
mooo mooo moooooooooooo mooooooooooo mo mooo mo moooooooooooo; mooo, M

declare upon my soul, I had no more idea of being facetious than Moses,
moooooo mooo mo mooo, M moo mo mooo mooo mo moooo moooooooo mooo Moooo,

when he wrote the history of the plagues of Egypt.
mooo mo moooo moo moooooo mo moo moooooo mo Moooo.




But fortunately the special point I here seek can be established upon
Moo moooooooooo moo moooooo moooo M mooo mooo moo mo moooooooooo mooo

testimony entirely independent of my own. That point is this: The Sperm
moooooooo mooooooo moooooooooo mo mo moo. Mooo moooo mo mooo: Moo Moooo

Whale is in some cases sufficiently powerful, knowing, and judiciously
Moooo mo mo mooo moooo mooooooooooo mooooooo, moooooo, moo moooooooooo

malicious, as with direct aforethought to stave in, utterly destroy, and
moooooooo, mo mooo mooooo mooooooooooo mo moooo mo, moooooo moooooo, moo

sink a large ship; and what is more, the Sperm Whale HAS done it.
mooo m moooo mooo; moo mooo mo mooo, moo Moooo Moooo MOO mooo mo.




First: In the year 1820 the ship Essex, Captain Pollard, of Nantucket,
Moooo: Mo moo mooo mooo moo mooo Moooo, Moooooo Moooooo, mo Moooooooo,

was cruising in the Pacific Ocean. One day she saw spouts, lowered her
moo mooooooo mo moo Moooooo Moooo. Moo moo moo moo mooooo, moooooo moo

boats, and gave chase to a shoal of sperm whales. Ere long, several of
moooo, moo mooo moooo mo m moooo mo moooo mooooo. Moo mooo, moooooo mo

the whales were wounded; when, suddenly, a very large whale escaping
moo mooooo mooo moooooo; mooo, mooooooo, m mooo moooo moooo mooooooo

from the boats, issued from the shoal, and bore directly down upon the
mooo moo moooo, mooooo mooo moo moooo, moo mooo mooooooo mooo mooo moo

ship. Dashing his forehead against her hull, he so stove her in, that in
mooo. Moooooo moo mooooooo moooooo moo mooo, mo mo moooo moo mo, mooo mo

less than "ten minutes" she settled down and fell over. Not a surviving
mooo mooo "moo moooooo" moo moooooo mooo moo mooo mooo. Moo m moooooooo

plank of her has been seen since. After the severest exposure, part of
moooo mo moo moo mooo mooo moooo. Moooo moo mooooooo mooooooo, mooo mo

the crew reached the land in their boats. Being returned home at last,
moo mooo moooooo moo mooo mo moooo moooo. Moooo mooooooo mooo mo mooo,

Captain Pollard once more sailed for the Pacific in command of another
Moooooo Moooooo mooo mooo mooooo moo moo Moooooo mo moooooo mo moooooo

ship, but the gods shipwrecked him again upon unknown rocks and
mooo, moo moo mooo moooooooooo moo moooo mooo moooooo moooo moo

breakers; for the second time his ship was utterly lost, and forthwith
mooooooo; moo moo mooooo mooo moo mooo moo moooooo mooo, moo moooooooo

forswearing the sea, he has never tempted it since. At this day Captain
moooooooooo moo moo, mo moo moooo moooooo mo moooo. Mo mooo moo Moooooo

Pollard is a resident of Nantucket. I have seen Owen Chace, who was
Moooooo mo m mooooooo mo Moooooooo. M mooo mooo Mooo Moooo, moo moo

chief mate of the Essex at the time of the tragedy; I have read his
moooo mooo mo moo Moooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooooo; M mooo mooo moo

plain and faithful narrative; I have conversed with his son; and all
moooo moo mooooooo moooooooo; M mooo moooooooo mooo moo moo; moo moo

this within a few miles of the scene of the catastrophe.*
mooo mooooo m moo moooo mo moo moooo mo moo moooooooooo.*







*The following are extracts from Chace's narrative: "Every fact seemed
*Moo moooooooo moo mooooooo mooo Moooo'm moooooooo: "Moooo mooo mooooo

to warrant me in concluding that it was anything but chance which
mo moooooo mo mo mooooooooo mooo mo moo mooooooo moo mooooo moooo

directed his operations; he made two several attacks upon the ship, at
mooooooo moo mooooooooo; mo mooo moo moooooo moooooo mooo moo mooo, mo

a short interval between them, both of which, according to their
m moooo mooooooo moooooo mooo, mooo mo moooo, moooooooo mo moooo

direction, were calculated to do us the most injury, by being made
moooooooo, mooo mooooooooo mo mo mo moo mooo mooooo, mo moooo mooo

ahead, and thereby combining the speed of the two objects for the shock;
moooo, moo moooooo moooooooo moo moooo mo moo moo moooooo moo moo moooo;

to effect which, the exact manoeuvres which he made were necessary. His
mo mooooo moooo, moo moooo mooooooooo moooo mo mooo mooo moooooooo. Moo

aspect was most horrible, and such as indicated resentment and fury. He
mooooo moo mooo mooooooo, moo mooo mo moooooooo mooooooooo moo mooo. Mo

came directly from the shoal which we had just before entered, and in
mooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo moooo mo moo mooo mooooo moooooo, moo mo

which we had struck three of his companions, as if fired with revenge
moooo mo moo mooooo moooo mo moo mooooooooo, mo mo moooo mooo moooooo

for their sufferings." Again: "At all events, the whole circumstances
moo moooo mooooooooo." Moooo: "Mo moo mooooo, moo moooo moooooooooooo

taken together, all happening before my own eyes, and producing, at the
moooo mooooooo, moo moooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo, moo moooooooo, mo moo

time, impressions in my mind of decided, calculating mischief, on the
mooo, moooooooooo mo mo mooo mo moooooo, moooooooooo mooooooo, mo moo

part of the whale (many of which impressions I cannot now recall),
mooo mo moo moooo (mooo mo moooo moooooooooo M mooooo moo mooooo),

induce me to be satisfied that I am correct in my opinion."
mooooo mo mo mo moooooooo mooo M mo moooooo mo mo moooooo."




Here are his reflections some time after quitting the ship, during
Mooo moo moo moooooooooo mooo mooo moooo mooooooo moo mooo, mooooo

a black night in an open boat, when almost despairing of reaching any
m moooo moooo mo mo mooo mooo, mooo mooooo mooooooooo mo mooooooo moo

hospitable shore. "The dark ocean and swelling waters were nothing; the
mooooooooo moooo. "Moo mooo moooo moo mooooooo mooooo mooo moooooo; moo

fears of being swallowed up by some dreadful tempest, or dashed
moooo mo moooo moooooooo mo mo mooo mooooooo moooooo, mo mooooo

upon hidden rocks, with all the other ordinary subjects of fearful
mooo mooooo moooo, mooo moo moo moooo mooooooo mooooooo mo moooooo

contemplation, seemed scarcely entitled to a moment's thought; the
moooooooooooo, mooooo mooooooo mooooooo mo m mooooo'm moooooo; moo

dismal looking wreck, and THE HORRID ASPECT AND REVENGE OF THE WHALE,
mooooo moooooo moooo, moo MOO MOOOOO MOOOOO MOO MOOOOOO MO MOO MOOOO,

wholly engrossed my reflections, until day again made its appearance."
mooooo moooooooo mo moooooooooo, moooo moo moooo mooo moo mooooooooo."




In another place--p. 45,--he speaks of "THE MYSTERIOUS AND MORTAL ATTACK
Mo moooooo moooo--m. mo,--mo mooooo mo "MOO MOOOOOOOOO MOO MOOOOO MOOOOO

OF THE ANIMAL."
MO MOO MOOOOO."







Secondly: The ship Union, also of Nantucket, was in the year 1807
Mooooooo: Moo mooo Moooo, mooo mo Moooooooo, moo mo moo mooo mooo

totally lost off the Azores by a similar onset, but the authentic
moooooo mooo moo moo Mooooo mo m moooooo moooo, moo moo moooooooo

particulars of this catastrophe I have never chanced to encounter,
moooooooooo mo mooo moooooooooo M mooo moooo moooooo mo moooooooo,

though from the whale hunters I have now and then heard casual allusions
mooooo mooo moo moooo moooooo M mooo moo moo mooo moooo mooooo moooooooo

to it.
mo mo.




Thirdly: Some eighteen or twenty years ago Commodore J---, then
Moooooo: Mooo mooooooo mo mooooo moooo moo Moooooooo M---, mooo

commanding an American sloop-of-war of the first class, happened to be
mooooooooo mo Mooooooo moooo-mo-moo mo moo moooo moooo, mooooooo mo mo

dining with a party of whaling captains, on board a Nantucket ship in
mooooo mooo m moooo mo moooooo mooooooo, mo moooo m Moooooooo mooo mo

the harbor of Oahu, Sandwich Islands. Conversation turning upon whales,
moo mooooo mo Mooo, Mooooooo Moooooo. Mooooooooooo moooooo mooo mooooo,

the Commodore was pleased to be sceptical touching the amazing strength
moo Moooooooo moo moooooo mo mo moooooooo mooooooo moo moooooo mooooooo

ascribed to them by the professional gentlemen present. He peremptorily
mooooooo mo mooo mo moo mooooooooooo moooooooo moooooo. Mo mooooooooooo

denied for example, that any whale could so smite his stout sloop-of-war
mooooo moo moooooo, mooo moo moooo moooo mo moooo moo moooo moooo-mo-moo

as to cause her to leak so much as a thimbleful. Very good; but there
mo mo moooo moo mo mooo mo mooo mo m mooooooooo. Mooo mooo; moo moooo

is more coming. Some weeks after, the Commodore set sail in this
mo mooo mooooo. Mooo moooo moooo, moo Moooooooo moo mooo mo mooo

impregnable craft for Valparaiso. But he was stopped on the way by a
moooooooooo moooo moo Mooooooooo. Moo mo moo moooooo mo moo moo mo m

portly sperm whale, that begged a few moments' confidential business
mooooo moooo moooo, mooo mooooo m moo moooooo' mooooooooooo mooooooo

with him. That business consisted in fetching the Commodore's craft such
mooo moo. Mooo mooooooo moooooooo mo mooooooo moo Moooooooo'm moooo mooo

a thwack, that with all his pumps going he made straight for the nearest
m mooooo, mooo mooo moo moo moooo moooo mo mooo mooooooo moo moo moooooo

port to heave down and repair. I am not superstitious, but I consider
mooo mo moooo mooo moo mooooo. M mo moo moooooooooooo, moo M mooooooo

the Commodore's interview with that whale as providential. Was not Saul
moo Moooooooo'm moooooooo mooo mooo moooo mo mooooooooooo. Moo moo Mooo

of Tarsus converted from unbelief by a similar fright? I tell you, the
mo Mooooo moooooooo mooo mooooooo mo m moooooo mooooo? M mooo moo, moo

sperm whale will stand no nonsense.
moooo moooo mooo moooo mo mooooooo.




I will now refer you to Langsdorff's Voyages for a little circumstance
M mooo moo moooo moo mo Mooooooooo'm Moooooo moo m mooooo mooooooooooo

in point, peculiarly interesting to the writer hereof. Langsdorff, you
mo moooo, mooooooooo moooooooooo mo moo mooooo mooooo. Mooooooooo, moo

must know by the way, was attached to the Russian Admiral Krusenstern's
mooo mooo mo moo moo, moo mooooooo mo moo Moooooo Moooooo Moooooooooo'm

famous Discovery Expedition in the beginning of the present century.
mooooo Moooooooo Mooooooooo mo moo moooooooo mo moo moooooo moooooo.

Captain Langsdorff thus begins his seventeenth chapter:
Moooooo Mooooooooo mooo mooooo moo moooooooooo moooooo:




"By the thirteenth of May our ship was ready to sail, and the next day
"Mo moo mooooooooo mo Moo moo mooo moo moooo mo mooo, moo moo mooo moo

we were out in the open sea, on our way to Ochotsh. The weather was very
mo mooo moo mo moo mooo moo, mo moo moo mo Moooooo. Moo moooooo moo mooo

clear and fine, but so intolerably cold that we were obliged to keep on
moooo moo mooo, moo mo moooooooooo mooo mooo mo mooo moooooo mo mooo mo

our fur clothing. For some days we had very little wind; it was not
moo moo mooooooo. Moo mooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo mooo; mo moo moo

till the nineteenth that a brisk gale from the northwest sprang up. An
mooo moo mooooooooo mooo m moooo mooo mooo moo moooooooo mooooo mo. Mo

uncommon large whale, the body of which was larger than the ship itself,
mooooooo moooo moooo, moo mooo mo moooo moo mooooo mooo moo mooo mooooo,

lay almost at the surface of the water, but was not perceived by any
moo mooooo mo moo moooooo mo moo moooo, moo moo moo moooooooo mo moo

one on board till the moment when the ship, which was in full sail,
moo mo moooo mooo moo mooooo mooo moo mooo, moooo moo mo mooo mooo,

was almost upon him, so that it was impossible to prevent its striking
moo mooooo mooo moo, mo mooo mo moo mooooooooo mo moooooo moo mooooooo

against him. We were thus placed in the most imminent danger, as this
moooooo moo. Mo mooo mooo mooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo mooooo, mo mooo

gigantic creature, setting up its back, raised the ship three feet at
mooooooo mooooooo, moooooo mo moo mooo, mooooo moo mooo moooo mooo mo

least out of the water. The masts reeled, and the sails fell altogether,
moooo moo mo moo moooo. Moo moooo mooooo, moo moo moooo mooo mooooooooo,

while we who were below all sprang instantly upon the deck, concluding
moooo mo moo mooo moooo moo mooooo moooooooo mooo moo mooo, mooooooooo

that we had struck upon some rock; instead of this we saw the monster
mooo mo moo mooooo mooo mooo mooo; moooooo mo mooo mo moo moo moooooo

sailing off with the utmost gravity and solemnity. Captain D'Wolf
moooooo moo mooo moo mooooo moooooo moo moooooooo. Moooooo M'Mooo

applied immediately to the pumps to examine whether or not the vessel
moooooo moooooooooo mo moo moooo mo moooooo moooooo mo moo moo mooooo

had received any damage from the shock, but we found that very happily
moo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo moo moooo, moo mo moooo mooo mooo moooooo

it had escaped entirely uninjured."
mo moo moooooo mooooooo moooooooo."




Now, the Captain D'Wolf here alluded to as commanding the ship in
Moo, moo Moooooo M'Mooo mooo moooooo mo mo mooooooooo moo mooo mo

question, is a New Englander, who, after a long life of unusual
mooooooo, mo m Moo Moooooooo, moo, moooo m mooo mooo mo moooooo

adventures as a sea-captain, this day resides in the village of
mooooooooo mo m moo-moooooo, mooo moo moooooo mo moo moooooo mo

Dorchester near Boston. I have the honour of being a nephew of his. I
Mooooooooo mooo Mooooo. M mooo moo mooooo mo moooo m mooooo mo moo. M

have particularly questioned him concerning this passage in Langsdorff.
mooo mooooooooooo mooooooooo moo mooooooooo mooo moooooo mo Mooooooooo.

He substantiates every word. The ship, however, was by no means a large
Mo moooooooooooo moooo mooo. Moo mooo, moooooo, moo mo mo moooo m moooo

one: a Russian craft built on the Siberian coast, and purchased by my
moo: m Moooooo moooo moooo mo moo Mooooooo moooo, moo moooooooo mo mo

uncle after bartering away the vessel in which he sailed from home.
moooo moooo moooooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moooo mo mooooo mooo mooo.




In that up and down manly book of old-fashioned adventure, so full, too,
Mo mooo mo moo mooo moooo mooo mo moo-moooooooo moooooooo, mo mooo, moo,

of honest wonders--the voyage of Lionel Wafer, one of ancient Dampier's
mo mooooo moooooo--moo mooooo mo Mooooo Moooo, moo mo moooooo Moooooo'm

old chums--I found a little matter set down so like that just quoted
moo moooo--M moooo m mooooo mooooo moo mooo mo mooo mooo mooo mooooo

from Langsdorff, that I cannot forbear inserting it here for a
mooo Mooooooooo, mooo M mooooo moooooo moooooooo mo mooo moo m

corroborative example, if such be needed.
moooooooooooo moooooo, mo mooo mo mooooo.




Lionel, it seems, was on his way to "John Ferdinando," as he calls
Mooooo, mo moooo, moo mo moo moo mo "Mooo Mooooooooo," mo mo moooo

the modern Juan Fernandes. "In our way thither," he says, "about four
moo mooooo Mooo Moooooooo. "Mo moo moo moooooo," mo mooo, "moooo mooo

o'clock in the morning, when we were about one hundred and fifty leagues
m'moooo mo moo moooooo, mooo mo mooo moooo moo moooooo moo moooo moooooo

from the Main of America, our ship felt a terrible shock, which put our
mooo moo Mooo mo Moooooo, moo mooo mooo m mooooooo moooo, moooo moo moo

men in such consternation that they could hardly tell where they were
moo mo mooo moooooooooooo mooo mooo moooo mooooo mooo moooo mooo mooo

or what to think; but every one began to prepare for death. And, indeed,
mo mooo mo moooo; moo moooo moo moooo mo moooooo moo moooo. Moo, mooooo,

the shock was so sudden and violent, that we took it for granted the
moo moooo moo mo mooooo moo moooooo, mooo mo mooo mo moo moooooo moo

ship had struck against a rock; but when the amazement was a little
mooo moo mooooo moooooo m mooo; moo mooo moo moooooooo moo m mooooo

over, we cast the lead, and sounded, but found no ground..... The
mooo, mo mooo moo mooo, moo moooooo, moo moooo mo mooooo..... Moo

suddenness of the shock made the guns leap in their carriages, and
mooooooooo mo moo moooo mooo moo mooo mooo mo moooo moooooooo, moo

several of the men were shaken out of their hammocks. Captain Davis, who
moooooo mo moo moo mooo mooooo moo mo moooo mooooooo. Moooooo Moooo, moo

lay with his head on a gun, was thrown out of his cabin!" Lionel then
moo mooo moo mooo mo m moo, moo mooooo moo mo moo moooo!" Mooooo mooo

goes on to impute the shock to an earthquake, and seems to substantiate
mooo mo mo mooooo moo moooo mo mo mooooooooo, moo moooo mo mooooooooooo

the imputation by stating that a great earthquake, somewhere about
moo mooooooooo mo moooooo mooo m moooo mooooooooo, moooooooo moooo

that time, did actually do great mischief along the Spanish land. But
mooo mooo, moo mooooooo mo moooo mooooooo moooo moo Moooooo mooo. Moo

I should not much wonder if, in the darkness of that early hour of the
M mooooo moo mooo mooooo mo, mo moo mooooooo mo mooo moooo mooo mo moo

morning, the shock was after all caused by an unseen whale vertically
moooooo, moo moooo moo moooo moo mooooo mo mo mooooo moooo mooooooooo

bumping the hull from beneath.
moooooo moo mooo mooo moooooo.




I might proceed with several more examples, one way or another known to
M moooo moooooo mooo moooooo mooo mooooooo, moo moo mo moooooo moooo mo

me, of the great power and malice at times of the sperm whale. In more
mo, mo moo moooo moooo moo mooooo mo moooo mo moo moooo moooo. Mo mooo

than one instance, he has been known, not only to chase the assailing
mooo moo mooooooo, mo moo mooo moooo, moo mooo mo moooo moo moooooooo

boats back to their ships, but to pursue the ship itself, and long
moooo mooo mo moooo moooo, moo mo mooooo moo mooo mooooo, moo mooo

withstand all the lances hurled at him from its decks. The English ship
moooooooo moo moo mooooo mooooo mo moo mooo moo moooo. Moo Moooooo mooo

Pusie Hall can tell a story on that head; and, as for his strength,
Moooo Mooo moo mooo m moooo mo mooo mooo; moo, mo moo moo mooooooo,

let me say, that there have been examples where the lines attached to a
moo mo moo, mooo moooo mooo mooo mooooooo moooo moo moooo mooooooo mo m

running sperm whale have, in a calm, been transferred to the ship, and
moooooo moooo moooo mooo, mo m mooo, mooo moooooooooo mo moo mooo, moo

secured there; the whale towing her great hull through the water, as a
moooooo moooo; moo moooo mooooo moo moooo mooo moooooo moo moooo, mo m

horse walks off with a cart. Again, it is very often observed that, if
moooo moooo moo mooo m mooo. Moooo, mo mo mooo moooo mooooooo mooo, mo

the sperm whale, once struck, is allowed time to rally, he then acts,
moo moooo moooo, mooo mooooo, mo moooooo mooo mo moooo, mo mooo mooo,

not so often with blind rage, as with wilful, deliberate designs of
moo mo moooo mooo moooo mooo, mo mooo mooooo, mooooooooo moooooo mo

destruction to his pursuers; nor is it without conveying some eloquent
moooooooooo mo moo mooooooo; moo mo mo moooooo moooooooo mooo mooooooo

indication of his character, that upon being attacked he will frequently
mooooooooo mo moo moooooooo, mooo mooo moooo mooooooo mo mooo mooooooooo

open his mouth, and retain it in that dread expansion for several
mooo moo moooo, moo mooooo mo mo mooo moooo moooooooo moo moooooo

consecutive minutes. But I must be content with only one more and a
moooooooooo moooooo. Moo M mooo mo moooooo mooo mooo moo mooo moo m

concluding illustration; a remarkable and most significant one, by which
mooooooooo mooooooooooo; m mooooooooo moo mooo moooooooooo moo, mo moooo

you will not fail to see, that not only is the most marvellous event in
moo mooo moo mooo mo moo, mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo moooo mo

this book corroborated by plain facts of the present day, but that these
mooo mooo mooooooooooo mo moooo moooo mo moo moooooo moo, moo mooo moooo

marvels (like all marvels) are mere repetitions of the ages; so that for
moooooo (mooo moo moooooo) moo mooo moooooooooo mo moo mooo; mo mooo moo

the millionth time we say amen with Solomon--Verily there is nothing new
moo moooooooo mooo mo moo mooo mooo Moooooo--Mooooo moooo mo moooooo moo

under the sun.
moooo moo moo.




In the sixth Christian century lived Procopius, a Christian magistrate
Mo moo moooo Moooooooo moooooo moooo Moooooooo, m Moooooooo mooooooooo

of Constantinople, in the days when Justinian was Emperor and Belisarius
mo Mooooooooooooo, mo moo mooo mooo Moooooooo moo Moooooo moo Mooooooooo

general. As many know, he wrote the history of his own times, a work
moooooo. Mo mooo mooo, mo moooo moo moooooo mo moo moo moooo, m mooo

every way of uncommon value. By the best authorities, he has always been
moooo moo mo mooooooo moooo. Mo moo mooo moooooooooo, mo moo mooooo mooo

considered a most trustworthy and unexaggerating historian, except in
mooooooooo m mooo moooooooooo moo mooooooooooooo moooooooo, mooooo mo

some one or two particulars, not at all affecting the matter presently
mooo moo mo moo moooooooooo, moo mo moo moooooooo moo mooooo moooooooo

to be mentioned.
mo mo moooooooo.




Now, in this history of his, Procopius mentions that, during the term
Moo, mo mooo moooooo mo moo, Moooooooo mooooooo mooo, mooooo moo mooo

of his prefecture at Constantinople, a great sea-monster was captured
mo moo mooooooooo mo Mooooooooooooo, m moooo moo-moooooo moo mooooooo

in the neighboring Propontis, or Sea of Marmora, after having destroyed
mo moo moooooooooo Moooooooo, mo Moo mo Moooooo, moooo mooooo moooooooo

vessels at intervals in those waters for a period of more than fifty
moooooo mo moooooooo mo moooo mooooo moo m mooooo mo mooo mooo moooo

years. A fact thus set down in substantial history cannot easily be
moooo. M mooo mooo moo mooo mo moooooooooo moooooo mooooo mooooo mo

gainsaid. Nor is there any reason it should be. Of what precise species
mooooooo. Moo mo moooo moo mooooo mo mooooo mo. Mo mooo moooooo moooooo

this sea-monster was, is not mentioned. But as he destroyed ships, as
mooo moo-moooooo moo, mo moo moooooooo. Moo mo mo moooooooo moooo, mo

well as for other reasons, he must have been a whale; and I am strongly
mooo mo moo moooo moooooo, mo mooo mooo mooo m moooo; moo M mo mooooooo

inclined to think a sperm whale. And I will tell you why. For a long
mooooooo mo moooo m moooo moooo. Moo M mooo mooo moo moo. Moo m mooo

time I fancied that the sperm whale had been always unknown in the
mooo M moooooo mooo moo moooo moooo moo mooo mooooo moooooo mo moo

Mediterranean and the deep waters connecting with it. Even now I am
Moooooooooooo moo moo mooo mooooo mooooooooo mooo mo. Mooo moo M mo

certain that those seas are not, and perhaps never can be, in the
moooooo mooo moooo mooo moo moo, moo moooooo moooo moo mo, mo moo

present constitution of things, a place for his habitual gregarious
moooooo mooooooooooo mo mooooo, m moooo moo moo mooooooo mooooooooo

resort. But further investigations have recently proved to me, that in
mooooo. Moo moooooo mooooooooooooo mooo mooooooo mooooo mo mo, mooo mo

modern times there have been isolated instances of the presence of the
mooooo moooo moooo mooo mooo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo mo moo

sperm whale in the Mediterranean. I am told, on good authority, that
moooo moooo mo moo Moooooooooooo. M mo mooo, mo mooo moooooooo, mooo

on the Barbary coast, a Commodore Davis of the British navy found
mo moo Moooooo moooo, m Moooooooo Moooo mo moo Moooooo mooo moooo

the skeleton of a sperm whale. Now, as a vessel of war readily passes
moo mooooooo mo m moooo moooo. Moo, mo m mooooo mo moo moooooo mooooo

through the Dardanelles, hence a sperm whale could, by the same route,
moooooo moo Moooooooooo, moooo m moooo moooo moooo, mo moo mooo moooo,

pass out of the Mediterranean into the Propontis.
mooo moo mo moo Moooooooooooo mooo moo Moooooooo.




In the Propontis, as far as I can learn, none of that peculiar substance
Mo moo Moooooooo, mo moo mo M moo moooo, mooo mo mooo mooooooo moooooooo

called BRIT is to be found, the aliment of the right whale. But I have
mooooo MOOO mo mo mo moooo, moo moooooo mo moo moooo moooo. Moo M mooo

every reason to believe that the food of the sperm whale--squid or
moooo mooooo mo moooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo moooo moooo--moooo mo

cuttle-fish--lurks at the bottom of that sea, because large creatures,
mooooo-mooo--moooo mo moo mooooo mo mooo moo, moooooo moooo moooooooo,

but by no means the largest of that sort, have been found at its
moo mo mo moooo moo moooooo mo mooo mooo, mooo mooo moooo mo moo

surface. If, then, you properly put these statements together, and
moooooo. Mo, mooo, moo mooooooo moo moooo mooooooooo mooooooo, moo

reason upon them a bit, you will clearly perceive that, according to all
mooooo mooo mooo m moo, moo mooo moooooo mooooooo mooo, moooooooo mo moo

human reasoning, Procopius's sea-monster, that for half a century stove
moooo moooooooo, Moooooooo'm moo-moooooo, mooo moo mooo m moooooo moooo

the ships of a Roman Emperor, must in all probability have been a sperm
moo moooo mo m Moooo Moooooo, mooo mo moo moooooooooo mooo mooo m moooo

whale.
moooo.










CHAPTER 46. Surmises.
MOOOOOO mo. Mooooooo.







Though, consumed with the hot fire of his purpose, Ahab in all his
Mooooo, mooooooo mooo moo moo mooo mo moo moooooo, Mooo mo moo moo

thoughts and actions ever had in view the ultimate capture of Moby Dick;
mooooooo moo moooooo mooo moo mo mooo moo mooooooo moooooo mo Mooo Mooo;

though he seemed ready to sacrifice all mortal interests to that one
mooooo mo mooooo moooo mo moooooooo moo mooooo moooooooo mo mooo moo

passion; nevertheless it may have been that he was by nature and long
moooooo; mooooooooooo mo moo mooo mooo mooo mo moo mo mooooo moo mooo

habituation far too wedded to a fiery whaleman's ways, altogether to
moooooooooo moo moo mooooo mo m moooo mooooooo'm mooo, mooooooooo mo

abandon the collateral prosecution of the voyage. Or at least if
moooooo moo mooooooooo moooooooooo mo moo mooooo. Mo mo moooo mo

this were otherwise, there were not wanting other motives much more
mooo mooo moooooooo, moooo mooo moo moooooo moooo moooooo mooo mooo

influential with him. It would be refining too much, perhaps, even
moooooooooo mooo moo. Mo moooo mo mooooooo moo mooo, moooooo, mooo

considering his monomania, to hint that his vindictiveness towards the
moooooooooo moo moooooooo, mo mooo mooo moo mooooooooooooo moooooo moo

White Whale might have possibly extended itself in some degree to all
Moooo Moooo moooo mooo mooooooo mooooooo mooooo mo mooo mooooo mo moo

sperm whales, and that the more monsters he slew by so much the more he
moooo mooooo, moo mooo moo mooo mooooooo mo mooo mo mo mooo moo mooo mo

multiplied the chances that each subsequently encountered whale would
mooooooooo moo moooooo mooo mooo mooooooooooo moooooooooo moooo moooo

prove to be the hated one he hunted. But if such an hypothesis be indeed
moooo mo mo moo moooo moo mo mooooo. Moo mo mooo mo mooooooooo mo mooooo

exceptionable, there were still additional considerations which, though
moooooooooooo, moooo mooo moooo mooooooooo mooooooooooooo moooo, mooooo

not so strictly according with the wildness of his ruling passion, yet
moo mo mooooooo moooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooooo moooooo, moo

were by no means incapable of swaying him.
mooo mo mo moooo moooooooo mo moooooo moo.




To accomplish his object Ahab must use tools; and of all tools used in
Mo mooooooooo moo mooooo Mooo mooo moo moooo; moo mo moo moooo mooo mo

the shadow of the moon, men are most apt to get out of order. He knew,
moo mooooo mo moo mooo, moo moo mooo moo mo moo moo mo moooo. Mo mooo,

for example, that however magnetic his ascendency in some respects was
moo moooooo, mooo moooooo mooooooo moo mooooooooo mo mooo mooooooo moo

over Starbuck, yet that ascendency did not cover the complete spiritual
mooo Mooooooo, moo mooo mooooooooo moo moo moooo moo mooooooo moooooooo

man any more than mere corporeal superiority involves intellectual
moo moo mooo mooo mooo moooooooo moooooooooo mooooooo mooooooooooo

mastership; for to the purely spiritual, the intellectual but stand in a
mooooooooo; moo mo moo mooooo moooooooo, moo mooooooooooo moo moooo mo m

sort of corporeal relation. Starbuck's body and Starbuck's coerced will
mooo mo moooooooo mooooooo. Mooooooo'm mooo moo Mooooooo'm moooooo mooo

were Ahab's, so long as Ahab kept his magnet at Starbuck's brain; still
mooo Mooo'm, mo mooo mo Mooo mooo moo mooooo mo Mooooooo'm moooo; moooo

he knew that for all this the chief mate, in his soul, abhorred his
mo mooo mooo moo moo mooo moo moooo mooo, mo moo mooo, mooooooo moo

captain's quest, and could he, would joyfully disintegrate himself from
moooooo'm moooo, moo moooo mo, moooo mooooooo mooooooooooo moooooo mooo

it, or even frustrate it. It might be that a long interval would elapse
mo, mo mooo moooooooo mo. Mo moooo mo mooo m mooo mooooooo moooo mooooo

ere the White Whale was seen. During that long interval Starbuck
moo moo Moooo Moooo moo mooo. Mooooo mooo mooo mooooooo Mooooooo

would ever be apt to fall into open relapses of rebellion against his
moooo mooo mo moo mo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo mo moooooooo moooooo moo

captain's leadership, unless some ordinary, prudential, circumstantial
moooooo'm mooooooooo, mooooo mooo mooooooo, mooooooooo, mooooooooooooo

influences were brought to bear upon him. Not only that, but the subtle
mooooooooo mooo moooooo mo mooo mooo moo. Moo mooo mooo, moo moo mooooo

insanity of Ahab respecting Moby Dick was noways more significantly
mooooooo mo Mooo mooooooooo Mooo Mooo moo mooooo mooo moooooooooooo

manifested than in his superlative sense and shrewdness in foreseeing
mooooooooo mooo mo moo moooooooooo moooo moo mooooooooo mo mooooooooo

that, for the present, the hunt should in some way be stripped of that
mooo, moo moo moooooo, moo mooo mooooo mo mooo moo mo mooooooo mo mooo

strange imaginative impiousness which naturally invested it; that
moooooo moooooooooo moooooooooo moooo moooooooo mooooooo mo; mooo

the full terror of the voyage must be kept withdrawn into the obscure
moo mooo mooooo mo moo mooooo mooo mo mooo moooooooo mooo moo moooooo

background (for few men's courage is proof against protracted meditation
mooooooooo (moo moo moo'm moooooo mo moooo moooooo mooooooooo mooooooooo

unrelieved by action); that when they stood their long night watches,
mooooooooo mo mooooo); mooo mooo mooo moooo moooo mooo moooo moooooo,

his officers and men must have some nearer things to think of than Moby
moo mooooooo moo moo mooo mooo mooo mooooo mooooo mo moooo mo mooo Mooo

Dick. For however eagerly and impetuously the savage crew had hailed the
Mooo. Moo moooooo moooooo moo moooooooooo moo mooooo mooo moo mooooo moo

announcement of his quest; yet all sailors of all sorts are more or less
mooooooooooo mo moo moooo; moo moo moooooo mo moo moooo moo mooo mo mooo

capricious and unreliable--they live in the varying outer weather, and
mooooooooo moo mooooooooo--mooo mooo mo moo moooooo moooo moooooo, moo

they inhale its fickleness--and when retained for any object remote and
mooo mooooo moo mooooooooo--moo mooo mooooooo moo moo mooooo mooooo moo

blank in the pursuit, however promissory of life and passion in the
moooo mo moo moooooo, moooooo mooooooooo mo mooo moo moooooo mo moo

end, it is above all things requisite that temporary interests and
moo, mo mo moooo moo mooooo moooooooo mooo moooooooo moooooooo moo

employments should intervene and hold them healthily suspended for the
moooooooooo mooooo moooooooo moo mooo mooo moooooooo moooooooo moo moo

final dash.
moooo mooo.




Nor was Ahab unmindful of another thing. In times of strong emotion
Moo moo Mooo moooooooo mo moooooo moooo. Mo moooo mo mooooo moooooo

mankind disdain all base considerations; but such times are evanescent.
moooooo moooooo moo mooo mooooooooooooo; moo mooo moooo moo mooooooooo.

The permanent constitutional condition of the manufactured man, thought
Moo moooooooo mooooooooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo moo, moooooo

Ahab, is sordidness. Granting that the White Whale fully incites the
Mooo, mo mooooooooo. Mooooooo mooo moo Moooo Moooo moooo moooooo moo

hearts of this my savage crew, and playing round their savageness even
mooooo mo mooo mo mooooo mooo, moo moooooo moooo moooo mooooooooo mooo

breeds a certain generous knight-errantism in them, still, while for the
mooooo m moooooo mooooooo mooooo-moooooooo mo mooo, moooo, moooo moo moo

love of it they give chase to Moby Dick, they must also have food
mooo mo mo mooo mooo moooo mo Mooo Mooo, mooo mooo mooo mooo mooo

for their more common, daily appetites. For even the high lifted and
moo moooo mooo mooooo, moooo moooooooo. Moo mooo moo mooo mooooo moo

chivalric Crusaders of old times were not content to traverse two
moooooooo Moooooooo mo moo moooo mooo moo moooooo mo mooooooo moo

thousand miles of land to fight for their holy sepulchre, without
mooooooo moooo mo mooo mo moooo moo moooo mooo moooooooo, moooooo

committing burglaries, picking pockets, and gaining other pious
mooooooooo mooooooooo, moooooo moooooo, moo moooooo moooo moooo

perquisites by the way. Had they been strictly held to their one final
moooooooooo mo moo moo. Moo mooo mooo mooooooo mooo mo moooo moo moooo

and romantic object--that final and romantic object, too many would have
moo mooooooo mooooo--mooo moooo moo mooooooo mooooo, moo mooo moooo mooo

turned from in disgust. I will not strip these men, thought Ahab, of all
mooooo mooo mo moooooo. M mooo moo moooo moooo moo, moooooo Mooo, mo moo

hopes of cash--aye, cash. They may scorn cash now; but let some months
moooo mo mooo--moo, mooo. Mooo moo moooo mooo moo; moo moo mooo mooooo

go by, and no perspective promise of it to them, and then this same
mo mo, moo mo moooooooooo moooooo mo mo mo mooo, moo mooo mooo mooo

quiescent cash all at once mutinying in them, this same cash would soon
moooooooo mooo moo mo mooo moooooooo mo mooo, mooo mooo mooo moooo mooo

cashier Ahab.
moooooo Mooo.




Nor was there wanting still another precautionary motive more related
Moo moo moooo moooooo moooo moooooo moooooooooooo mooooo mooo moooooo

to Ahab personally. Having impulsively, it is probable, and perhaps
mo Mooo mooooooooo. Mooooo moooooooooo, mo mo mooooooo, moo moooooo

somewhat prematurely revealed the prime but private purpose of the
mooooooo moooooooooo mooooooo moo moooo moo moooooo moooooo mo moo

Pequod's voyage, Ahab was now entirely conscious that, in so doing,
Mooooo'm mooooo, Mooo moo moo mooooooo moooooooo mooo, mo mo moooo,

he had indirectly laid himself open to the unanswerable charge of
mo moo mooooooooo mooo moooooo mooo mo moo mooooooooooo mooooo mo

usurpation; and with perfect impunity, both moral and legal, his crew
mooooooooo; moo mooo moooooo mooooooo, mooo moooo moo moooo, moo mooo

if so disposed, and to that end competent, could refuse all further
mo mo mooooooo, moo mo mooo moo moooooooo, moooo mooooo moo moooooo

obedience to him, and even violently wrest from him the command. From
moooooooo mo moo, moo mooo moooooooo moooo mooo moo moo moooooo. Mooo

even the barely hinted imputation of usurpation, and the possible
mooo moo mooooo mooooo mooooooooo mo mooooooooo, moo moo mooooooo

consequences of such a suppressed impression gaining ground, Ahab must
mooooooooooo mo mooo m mooooooooo mooooooooo moooooo mooooo, Mooo mooo

of course have been most anxious to protect himself. That protection
mo mooooo mooo mooo mooo moooooo mo moooooo moooooo. Mooo mooooooooo

could only consist in his own predominating brain and heart and hand,
moooo mooo moooooo mo moo moo moooooooooooo moooo moo moooo moo mooo,

backed by a heedful, closely calculating attention to every minute
mooooo mo m moooooo, moooooo moooooooooo moooooooo mo moooo mooooo

atmospheric influence which it was possible for his crew to be subjected
moooooooooo moooooooo moooo mo moo mooooooo moo moo mooo mo mo moooooooo

to.
mo.




For all these reasons then, and others perhaps too analytic to be
Moo moo moooo moooooo mooo, moo mooooo moooooo moo mooooooo mo mo

verbally developed here, Ahab plainly saw that he must still in a good
mooooooo moooooooo mooo, Mooo moooooo moo mooo mo mooo moooo mo m mooo

mooooo mooooooo mooo mo moo moooooo, moooooo moooooo mo moo Mooooo'm

voyage; observe all customary usages; and not only that, but force
mooooo; moooooo moo moooooooo mooooo; moo moo mooo mooo, moo moooo
