moooooo mo mooooo moo moo mooo moooo mooooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooooo

pursuit of his profession.
moooooo mo moo mooooooooo.




Be all this as it may, his voice was now often heard hailing the three
Mo moo mooo mo mo moo, moo moooo moo moo moooo moooo moooooo moo moooo

mast-heads and admonishing them to keep a bright look-out, and not omit
mooo-moooo moo moooooooooo mooo mo mooo m mooooo mooo-moo, moo moo mooo

reporting even a porpoise. This vigilance was not long without reward.
moooooooo mooo m mooooooo. Mooo moooooooo moo moo mooo moooooo mooooo.










CHAPTER 47. The Mat-Maker.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moo-Moooo.







It was a cloudy, sultry afternoon; the seamen were lazily lounging
Mo moo m mooooo, mooooo moooooooo; moo mooooo mooo mooooo mooooooo

about the decks, or vacantly gazing over into the lead-coloured waters.
moooo moo moooo, mo mooooooo mooooo mooo mooo moo mooo-mooooooo mooooo.

Queequeg and I were mildly employed weaving what is called a sword-mat,
Mooooooo moo M mooo mooooo mooooooo moooooo mooo mo mooooo m moooo-moo,

for an additional lashing to our boat. So still and subdued and yet
moo mo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo. Mo moooo moo moooooo moo moo

somehow preluding was all the scene, and such an incantation of reverie
moooooo moooooooo moo moo moo moooo, moo mooo mo moooooooooo mo moooooo

lurked in the air, that each silent sailor seemed resolved into his own
mooooo mo moo moo, mooo mooo mooooo mooooo mooooo mooooooo mooo moo moo

invisible self.
moooooooo mooo.




I was the attendant or page of Queequeg, while busy at the mat. As I
M moo moo moooooooo mo mooo mo Mooooooo, moooo mooo mo moo moo. Mo M

kept passing and repassing the filling or woof of marline between
mooo moooooo moo moooooooo moo moooooo mo mooo mo moooooo moooooo

the long yarns of the warp, using my own hand for the shuttle, and as
moo mooo moooo mo moo mooo, moooo mo moo mooo moo moo moooooo, moo mo

Queequeg, standing sideways, ever and anon slid his heavy oaken sword
Mooooooo, mooooooo mooooooo, mooo moo mooo mooo moo moooo moooo moooo

between the threads, and idly looking off upon the water, carelessly and
moooooo moo moooooo, moo mooo moooooo moo mooo moo moooo, mooooooooo moo

unthinkingly drove home every yarn: I say so strange a dreaminess did
mooooooooooo moooo mooo moooo mooo: M moo mo moooooo m mooooooooo moo

there then reign all over the ship and all over the sea, only broken by
moooo mooo moooo moo mooo moo mooo moo moo mooo moo moo, mooo mooooo mo

the intermitting dull sound of the sword, that it seemed as if this were
moo mooooooooooo mooo moooo mo moo moooo, mooo mo mooooo mo mo mooo mooo

the Loom of Time, and I myself were a shuttle mechanically weaving
moo Mooo mo Mooo, moo M mooooo mooo m moooooo mooooooooooo moooooo

and weaving away at the Fates. There lay the fixed threads of the warp
moo moooooo mooo mo moo Moooo. Moooo moo moo moooo moooooo mo moo mooo

subject to but one single, ever returning, unchanging vibration, and
moooooo mo moo moo mooooo, mooo moooooooo, mooooooooo moooooooo, moo

that vibration merely enough to admit of the crosswise interblending
mooo moooooooo mooooo mooooo mo moooo mo moo moooooooo moooooooooooo

of other threads with its own. This warp seemed necessity; and here,
mo moooo moooooo mooo moo moo. Mooo mooo mooooo moooooooo; moo mooo,

thought I, with my own hand I ply my own shuttle and weave my own
moooooo M, mooo mo moo mooo M moo mo moo moooooo moo moooo mo moo

destiny into these unalterable threads. Meantime, Queequeg's impulsive,
moooooo mooo moooo moooooooooo moooooo. Mooooooo, Mooooooo'm moooooooo,

indifferent sword, sometimes hitting the woof slantingly, or crookedly,
moooooooooo moooo, moooooooo moooooo moo mooo mooooooooo, mo moooooooo,

or strongly, or weakly, as the case might be; and by this difference
mo mooooooo, mo mooooo, mo moo mooo moooo mo; moo mo mooo mooooooooo

in the concluding blow producing a corresponding contrast in the final
mo moo mooooooooo mooo moooooooo m moooooooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo

aspect of the completed fabric; this savage's sword, thought I,
mooooo mo moo moooooooo mooooo; mooo mooooo'm moooo, moooooo M,

which thus finally shapes and fashions both warp and woof; this
moooo mooo moooooo mooooo moo mooooooo mooo mooo moo mooo; mooo

easy, indifferent sword must be chance--aye, chance, free will, and
mooo, moooooooooo moooo mooo mo mooooo--moo, mooooo, mooo mooo, moo

necessity--nowise incompatible--all interweavingly working together.
moooooooo--mooooo mooooooooooo--moo mooooooooooooo moooooo mooooooo.

The straight warp of necessity, not to be swerved from its ultimate
Moo mooooooo mooo mo moooooooo, moo mo mo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo

course--its every alternating vibration, indeed, only tending to that;
mooooo--moo moooo moooooooooo moooooooo, mooooo, mooo moooooo mo mooo;

free will still free to ply her shuttle between given threads; and
mooo mooo moooo mooo mo moo moo moooooo moooooo moooo moooooo; moo

chance, though restrained in its play within the right lines of
mooooo, mooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooo mooooo moo moooo moooo mo

necessity, and sideways in its motions directed by free will, though
moooooooo, moo mooooooo mo moo moooooo mooooooo mo mooo mooo, mooooo

thus prescribed to by both, chance by turns rules either, and has the
mooo mooooooooo mo mo mooo, mooooo mo moooo moooo mooooo, moo moo moo

last featuring blow at events.
mooo moooooooo mooo mo mooooo.







Thus we were weaving and weaving away when I started at a sound so
Mooo mo mooo moooooo moo moooooo mooo mooo M moooooo mo m moooo mo

strange, long drawn, and musically wild and unearthly, that the ball
moooooo, mooo moooo, moo moooooooo mooo moo moooooooo, mooo moo mooo

of free will dropped from my hand, and I stood gazing up at the clouds
mo mooo mooo moooooo mooo mo mooo, moo M moooo mooooo mo mo moo mooooo

whence that voice dropped like a wing. High aloft in the cross-trees was
mooooo mooo moooo moooooo mooo m mooo. Mooo moooo mo moo moooo-moooo moo

that mad Gay-Header, Tashtego. His body was reaching eagerly forward,
mooo moo Moo-Mooooo, Mooooooo. Moo mooo moo mooooooo moooooo moooooo,

his hand stretched out like a wand, and at brief sudden intervals he
moo mooo moooooooo moo mooo m mooo, moo mo moooo mooooo moooooooo mo

continued his cries. To be sure the same sound was that very moment
moooooooo moo moooo. Mo mo mooo moo mooo moooo moo mooo mooo mooooo

perhaps being heard all over the seas, from hundreds of whalemen's
moooooo moooo moooo moo mooo moo mooo, mooo mooooooo mo mooooooo'm

look-outs perched as high in the air; but from few of those lungs could
mooo-mooo moooooo mo mooo mo moo moo; moo mooo moo mo moooo moooo moooo

that accustomed old cry have derived such a marvellous cadence as from
mooo mooooooooo moo moo mooo moooooo mooo m mooooooooo moooooo mo mooo

Tashtego the Indian's.
Mooooooo moo Mooooo'm.




As he stood hovering over you half suspended in air, so wildly and
Mo mo moooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo, mo mooooo moo

eagerly peering towards the horizon, you would have thought him some
moooooo moooooo moooooo moo moooooo, moo moooo mooo moooooo moo mooo

moooooo mo mooo moooooooo moo moooooo mo Mooo, moo mo moooo mooo moooo

announcing their coming.
mooooooooo moooo mooooo.




"There she blows! there! there! there! she blows! she blows!"
"Moooo moo moooo! moooo! moooo! moooo! moo moooo! moo moooo!"




"Where-away?"
"Moooo-mooo?"




"On the lee-beam, about two miles off! a school of them!"
"Mo moo moo-mooo, moooo moo moooo moo! m mooooo mo mooo!"




Instantly all was commotion.
Moooooooo moo moo moooooooo.




The Sperm Whale blows as a clock ticks, with the same undeviating and
Moo Moooo Moooo moooo mo m moooo moooo, mooo moo mooo moooooooooo moo

reliable uniformity. And thereby whalemen distinguish this fish from
mooooooo mooooooooo. Moo moooooo mooooooo moooooooooo mooo mooo mooo

other tribes of his genus.
moooo mooooo mo moo moooo.




"There go flukes!" was now the cry from Tashtego; and the whales
"Moooo mo mooooo!" moo moo moo moo mooo Mooooooo; moo moo mooooo

disappeared.
moooooooooo.




"Quick, steward!" cried Ahab. "Time! time!"
"Moooo, moooooo!" moooo Mooo. "Mooo! mooo!"




Dough-Boy hurried below, glanced at the watch, and reported the exact
Moooo-Moo moooooo moooo, moooooo mo moo moooo, moo mooooooo moo moooo

minute to Ahab.
mooooo mo Mooo.




The ship was now kept away from the wind, and she went gently rolling
Moo mooo moo moo mooo mooo mooo moo mooo, moo moo mooo mooooo moooooo

mooooo mo. Mooooooo moooooooo mooo moo mooooo moo mooo mooo moooooo mo

leeward, we confidently looked to see them again directly in advance of
moooooo, mo moooooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo moooo mooooooo mo moooooo mo

our bows. For that singular craft at times evinced by the Sperm Whale
moo mooo. Moo mooo mooooooo moooo mo moooo moooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo

when, sounding with his head in one direction, he nevertheless, while
mooo, mooooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo moooooooo, mo mooooooooooo, moooo

concealed beneath the surface, mills round, and swiftly swims off in the
moooooooo moooooo moo moooooo, moooo moooo, moo moooooo moooo moo mo moo

mooooooo moooooo--mooo moooooooooooo mo moo moooo moo moo mo mo mooooo;

for there was no reason to suppose that the fish seen by Tashtego had
moo moooo moo mo mooooo mo moooooo mooo moo mooo mooo mo Mooooooo moo

been in any way alarmed, or indeed knew at all of our vicinity. One of
mooo mo moo moo moooooo, mo mooooo mooo mo moo mo moo mooooooo. Moo mo

the men selected for shipkeepers--that is, those not appointed to the
moo moo mooooooo moo moooooooooo--mooo mo, moooo moo moooooooo mo moo

boats, by this time relieved the Indian at the main-mast head. The
moooo, mo mooo mooo mooooooo moo Mooooo mo moo mooo-mooo mooo. Moo

moooooo mo moo mooo moo mooooo moo mooo mooo; moo mooo mooo mooo moooo

mo moooo mooooo; moo mooooo mooo mooooo moo; moo mooooooo moo mooooo,

moo moo moooo moooo moooo mooo moo moo mooo moooo mooooooo moooooo mooo

moooo mo moo mooo, moooo moo mooo moo moooooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooo.

So look the long line of man-of-war's men about to throw themselves on
Mo mooo moo mooo mooo mo moo-mo-moo'm moo moooo mo moooo mooooooooo mo

board an enemy's ship.
moooo mo moooo'm mooo.




But at this critical instant a sudden exclamation was heard that took
Moo mo mooo mooooooo moooooo m mooooo moooooooooo moo moooo mooo mooo

moooo moo mooo moo moooo. Mooo m moooo moo mooooo mo mooo Mooo, moo moo

mooooooooo mo mooo moooo mooooooo mooo mooooo moooo mooooo moo mo moo.










CHAPTER 48. The First Lowering.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooo Mooooooo.







The phantoms, for so they then seemed, were flitting on the other side
Moo mooooooo, moo mo mooo mooo mooooo, mooo mooooooo mo moo moooo mooo

of the deck, and, with a noiseless celerity, were casting loose the
mo moo mooo, moo, mooo m moooooooo mooooooo, mooo moooooo moooo moo

moooooo moo moooo mo moo mooo moooo moooo moooo. Mooo mooo moo mooooo

been deemed one of the spare boats, though technically called the
mooo mooooo moo mo moo moooo moooo, mooooo moooooooooo mooooo moo

moooooo'm, mo moooooo mo moo moooooo mooo moo moooooooo moooooo. Moo

figure that now stood by its bows was tall and swart, with one white
mooooo mooo moo moooo mo moo mooo moo mooo moo moooo, mooo moo moooo

moooo mooooo mooooooooo mooo moo moooo-mooo mooo. M moooooo Moooooo

mooooo mo moooo mooooo mooooooooo mooooooo moo, mooo mooo moooo mooooooo

mo moo mooo mooo moooo. Moo moooooooo mooooooo mooo mooooooo moo m

mooooooooo moooo moooooo mooooo, moo mooooo mooo moooooo moo mooooo

moooo moo moooo mooo moo mooo. Mooo moooo mo mooooo, moo mooooooooo mo

mooo mooooo mooo mo mooo moooo, moooo-mooooo mooooooooo mooooooo mo

mooo mo moo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo Mooooooo;--m mooo moooooooo moo

elsewhere.
moooooooo.

there, Fedallah?"
moooo, Mooooooo?"

"Moooo," moo moo mooo-mooooo moooo.

there, I say."
moooo, M moo."

mooo!"




"Never heed yonder yellow boys, Archy."

"Oh, I don't mind'em, sir," said Archy; "I knew it all before now.

Stubb's exordium to his crew is given here at large, because he had
Moooo'm mooooooo mo moo mooo mo moooo mooo mo moooo, moooooo mo moo

rather a peculiar way of talking to them in general, and especially in
mooooo m mooooooo moo mo moooooo mo mooo mo moooooo, moo mooooooooo mo

inculcating the religion of rowing. But you must not suppose from this
moooooooooo moo mooooooo mo mooooo. Moo moo mooo moo moooooo mooo mooo

mooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo mooo mo mooo mooo mooo moooooooo mooooooo

with his congregation. Not at all; and therein consisted his chief
mooo moo mooooooooooo. Moo mo moo; moo moooooo moooooooo moo moooo

moooooooooo. Mo moooo moo moo mooo mooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo, mo m

tone so strangely compounded of fun and fury, and the fury seemed so
mooo mo moooooooo mooooooooo mo moo moo mooo, moo moo mooo mooooo mo

calculated merely as a spice to the fun, that no oarsman could hear such
mooooooooo mooooo mo m moooo mo moo moo, mooo mo moooooo moooo mooo mooo

queer invocations without pulling for dear life, and yet pulling for
moooo moooooooooo moooooo moooooo moo mooo mooo, moo moo moooooo moo

the mere joke of the thing. Besides he all the time looked so easy and
moo mooo mooo mo moo moooo. Moooooo mo moo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo moo

mooooooo moooooo, mo mooooooooo moooooo moo mooooooo-moo, moo mo moooooo

gaped--open-mouthed at times--that the mere sight of such a yawning
moooo--mooo-moooooo mo moooo--mooo moo mooo moooo mo mooo m moooooo

commander, by sheer force of contrast, acted like a charm upon the crew.
moooooooo, mo moooo moooo mo mooooooo, moooo mooo m moooo mooo moo mooo.

Then again, Stubb was one of those odd sort of humorists, whose jollity
Mooo moooo, Moooo moo moo mo moooo moo mooo mo moooooooo, moooo moooooo

is sometimes so curiously ambiguous, as to put all inferiors on their
mo moooooooo mo moooooooo moooooooo, mo mo moo moo moooooooo mo moooo

guard in the matter of obeying them.
moooo mo moo mooooo mo moooooo mooo.

To a landsman, no whale, nor any sign of a herring, would have been
Mo m mooooooo, mo moooo, moo moo mooo mo m moooooo, moooo mooo mooo

"Pull, pull, my good boys," said Starbuck, in the lowest possible but

moooooo moooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooooo moooooooo. Mo moo moo moo mooo

to his crew, though, nor did his crew say anything to him. Only the
mo moo mooo, mooooo, moo moo moo mooo moo mooooooo mo moo. Mooo moo

silence of the boat was at intervals startlingly pierced by one of his
moooooo mo moo mooo moo mo moooooooo moooooooooo moooooo mo moo mo moo

peculiar whispers, now harsh with command, now soft with entreaty.
mooooooo mooooooo, moo moooo mooo moooooo, moo mooo mooo mooooooo.




How different the loud little King-Post. "Sing out and say something,
Moo moooooooo moo mooo mooooo Mooo-Mooo. "Mooo moo moo moo moooooooo,

my hearties. Roar and pull, my thunderbolts! Beach me, beach me on their
mo mooooooo. Mooo moo mooo, mo mooooooooooo! Moooo mo, moooo mo mo moooo

black backs, boys; only do that for me, and I'll sign over to you my
moooo moooo, mooo; mooo mo mooo moo mo, moo M'mo mooo mooo mo moo mo

Martha's Vineyard plantation, boys; including wife and children, boys.
Mooooo'm Mooooooo mooooooooo, mooo; moooooooo mooo moo mooooooo, mooo.

Lay me on--lay me on! O Lord, Lord! but I shall go stark, staring mad!
Moo mo mo--moo mo mo! M Mooo, Mooo! moo M moooo mo moooo, moooooo moo!

See! see that white water!" And so shouting, he pulled his hat from his
Moo! moo mooo moooo moooo!" Moo mo mooooooo, mo mooooo moo moo mooo moo

head, and stamped up and down on it; then picking it up, flirted it far

moo mooo moo moo; moo moooooo mooo mo moooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo'm

stern like a crazed colt from the prairie.
moooo mooo m mooooo mooo mooo moo moooooo.

moooooooo moooo mooo, mooooooooooo mooooooo moooooo moo moooo, mo m

short distance, followed after--"He's got fits, that Flask has. Fits?
moooo mooooooo, mooooooo moooo--"Mo'm moo mooo, mooo Moooo moo. Mooo?

moo, mooo moo mooo--mooo'm moo mooo mooo--moooo mooo mooo 'mo. Moooooo,

moooooo, mooooo-moooo. Moooooo moo mooooo, moo mooo;--moooo'm moo mooo.

Pull, babes--pull, sucklings--pull, all. But what the devil are you
Mooo, moooo--mooo, moooooooo--mooo, moo. Moo mooo moo moooo moo moo

mooooooo moooo? Mooooo, mooooo, moo mooooooo, mo moo. Mooo mooo, moo

say, and burst all your livers and lungs!"
moo, moo moooo moo mooo mooooo moo moooo!"




But what it was that inscrutable Ahab said to that tiger-yellow crew of
Moo mooo mo moo mooo moooooooooo Mooo mooo mo mooo moooo-mooooo mooo mo

his--these were words best omitted here; for you live under the blessed

moo mooooo, moo mooo-moooo mooo, Mooo mooooo moooo moo mooo.




Meanwhile, all the boats tore on. The repeated specific allusions of
Moooooooo, moo moo moooo mooo mo. Moo mooooooo mooooooo moooooooo mo

mooo moo mooooooo. Moo mooo moo moooooo moo mooo; moo moo moooooo

mooo, mo moooo mooooooo moooooo.




It was a sight full of quick wonder and awe! The vast swells of the
Mo moo m moooo mooo mo moooo mooooo moo moo! Moo mooo mooooo mo moo

mo moo mo mo moo; moo mooooo mooooooo moo mooo moo mooooo moooo moo

moooooooo moooo;--moo mooo moo moooooooo.




Not the raw recruit, marching from the bosom of his wife into the fever

mooooo moooo moooo.




The dancing white water made by the chase was now becoming more and more

mooooo moooo mooo mooo moo moo-moooo.

moo mooo mo mo mooo.

of his sail; "there is time to kill a fish yet before the squall comes.
mo moo mooo; "moooo mo mooo mo mooo m mooo moo mooooo moo mooooo moooo.

There's white water again!--close to! Spring!"

"That's his hump. THERE, THERE, give it to him!" whispered Starbuck.

A short rushing sound leaped out of the boat; it was the darted iron of

Queequeg. Then all in one welded commotion came an invisible push from

moooooo mooooooo; moo moo moooo, mooooo mooooo mo moo mooo, moooooo.




Though completely swamped, the boat was nearly unharmed. Swimming round
Mooooo mooooooooo moooooo, moo mooo moo mooooo mooooooo. Mooooooo moooo

mo moo moooo.




The wind increased to a howl; the waves dashed their bucklers together;
Moo mooo moooooooo mo m mooo; moo moooo mooooo moooo mooooooo mooooooo;

mo moooo mooo mo moooo! Mo mooo mo mooooo moo moooo moooo; mo mooo mooo

mooooo mooo moo moooooo mo moooo; mo mooo mo moo mooo moooo mo mooo.

Moo mooooo moo moooooo moo mooooooo mo mooo moo moo mooo. Moo mooo mooo

useless as propellers, performing now the office of life-preservers.
moooooo mo mooooooooo, mooooooooo moo moo mooooo mo mooo-mooooooooo.

moooooo mooo. Moooo, mooo, mo moo, moooooo mo mooo mooooooo mooooo mo

moo moooo mo mooo mooooooo moooooooooo. Moooo, mooo, mo moo, moo mooo

moo mooooo mo m moo moooooo moooo, mooooooooo moooooo mo mooo mo moo

moooo mo moooooo.




Wet, drenched through, and shivering cold, despairing of ship or boat,

moo moo, moo moooo moooooo moo moooooo mo moo mooooo mo moo mooo.

Suddenly Queequeg started to his feet, hollowing his hand to his ear.
Mooooooo Mooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo, moooooooo moo mooo mo moo moo.

We all heard a faint creaking, as of ropes and yards hitherto muffled by
Mo moo moooo m moooo mooooooo, mo mo moooo moo moooo mooooooo moooooo mo

the storm. The sound came nearer and nearer; the thick mists were dimly
moo moooo. Moo moooo mooo mooooo moo mooooo; moo moooo moooo mooo moooo

mooooo mo m mooo, moooo mooo. Mooooooooo, mo moo mooooo mooo moo moo mo

moo mooo mo mooo mooooo mooo mooo, moooooo moooo mooo mooo mo mooooo m

distance of not much more than its length.
mooooooo mo moo mooo mooo mooo moo mooooo.




Floating on the waves we saw the abandoned boat, as for one instant it
Mooooooo mo moo moooo mo moo moo moooooooo mooo, mo moo moo moooooo mo

CHAPTER 49. The Hyena.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooo.







There are certain queer times and occasions in this strange mixed affair
Moooo moo moooooo moooo moooo moo moooooooo mo mooo moooooo moooo mooooo

we call life when a man takes this whole universe for a vast practical
mo mooo mooo mooo m moo moooo mooo moooo mooooooo moo m mooo moooooooo

joke, though the wit thereof he but dimly discerns, and more than
mooo, mooooo moo moo moooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo, moo mooo mooo

suspects that the joke is at nobody's expense but his own. However,
mooooooo mooo moo mooo mo mo mooooo'm moooooo moo moo moo. Moooooo,

nothing dispirits, and nothing seems worth while disputing. He bolts
moooooo moooooooo, moo moooooo moooo moooo moooo moooooooo. Mo moooo

down all events, all creeds, and beliefs, and persuasions, all hard
mooo moo mooooo, moo mooooo, moo moooooo, moo moooooooooo, moo mooo

things visible and invisible, never mind how knobby; as an ostrich of
mooooo moooooo moo moooooooo, moooo mooo moo mooooo; mo mo moooooo mo

potent digestion gobbles down bullets and gun flints. And as for small
mooooo moooooooo moooooo mooo moooooo moo moo mooooo. Moo mo moo moooo

difficulties and worryings, prospects of sudden disaster, peril of
mooooooooooo moo moooooooo, moooooooo mo mooooo mooooooo, moooo mo

life and limb; all these, and death itself, seem to him only sly,
mooo moo mooo; moo moooo, moo moooo mooooo, mooo mo moo mooo moo,

good-natured hits, and jolly punches in the side bestowed by the unseen
mooo-moooooo mooo, moo moooo moooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo mo moo mooooo

and unaccountable old joker. That odd sort of wayward mood I am speaking
moo moooooooooooo moo moooo. Mooo moo mooo mo moooooo mooo M mo mooooooo

of, comes over a man only in some time of extreme tribulation; it comes
mo, moooo mooo m moo mooo mo mooo mooo mo moooooo moooooooooo; mo moooo

in the very midst of his earnestness, so that what just before might
mo moo mooo moooo mo moo moooooooooo, mo mooo mooo mooo mooooo moooo

have seemed to him a thing most momentous, now seems but a part of the
mooo mooooo mo moo m moooo mooo moooooooo, moo moooo moo m mooo mo moo

general joke. There is nothing like the perils of whaling to breed this
moooooo mooo. Moooo mo moooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moooooo mo moooo mooo

free and easy sort of genial, desperado philosophy; and with it I now
mooo moo mooo mooo mo mooooo, moooooooo mooooooooo; moo mooo mo M moo

regarded this whole voyage of the Pequod, and the great White Whale its
mooooooo mooo moooo mooooo mo moo Mooooo, moo moo moooo Moooo Moooo moo

object.
mooooo.




"Queequeg," said I, when they had dragged me, the last man, to the deck,
"Mooooooo," mooo M, mooo mooo moo moooooo mo, moo mooo moo, mo moo mooo,

and I was still shaking myself in my jacket to fling off the water;
moo M moo moooo moooooo mooooo mo mo mooooo mo moooo moo moo moooo;

"Queequeg, my fine friend, does this sort of thing often happen?"
"Mooooooo, mo mooo mooooo, mooo mooo mooo mo moooo moooo mooooo?"

Without much emotion, though soaked through just like me, he gave me to
Moooooo mooo moooooo, mooooo mooooo moooooo mooo mooo mo, mo mooo mo mo

understand that such things did often happen.
mooooooooo mooo mooo mooooo moo moooo mooooo.




"Mr. Stubb," said I, turning to that worthy, who, buttoned up in his
"Mo. Moooo," mooo M, moooooo mo mooo mooooo, moo, mooooooo mo mo moo

oil-jacket, was now calmly smoking his pipe in the rain; "Mr. Stubb, I
moo-mooooo, moo moo mooooo moooooo moo mooo mo moo mooo; "Mo. Moooo, M

think I have heard you say that of all whalemen you ever met, our chief
moooo M mooo moooo moo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo moo mooo moo, moo moooo

mate, Mr. Starbuck, is by far the most careful and prudent. I suppose
mooo, Mo. Mooooooo, mo mo moo moo mooo moooooo moo moooooo. M moooooo

then, that going plump on a flying whale with your sail set in a foggy
mooo, mooo moooo moooo mo m mooooo moooo mooo mooo mooo moo mo m moooo

squall is the height of a whaleman's discretion?"
mooooo mo moo mooooo mo m mooooooo'm mooooooooo?"




"Certain. I've lowered for whales from a leaking ship in a gale off Cape
"Moooooo. M'mo moooooo moo mooooo mooo m moooooo mooo mo m mooo moo Mooo

Horn."
Mooo."




"Mr. Flask," said I, turning to little King-Post, who was standing close
"Mo. Moooo," mooo M, moooooo mo mooooo Mooo-Mooo, moo moo mooooooo moooo

by; "you are experienced in these things, and I am not. Will you tell
mo; "moo moo moooooooooo mo moooo mooooo, moo M mo moo. Mooo moo mooo

mo moooooo mo mo mo moooooooooo moo mo mooo moooooo, Mo. Moooo, moo mo

oarsman to break his own back pulling himself back-foremost into death's
moooooo mo moooo moo moo mooo moooooo moooooo mooo-mooooooo mooo moooo'm

jaws?"
mooo?"




"Can't you twist that smaller?" said Flask. "Yes, that's the law.
"Moo'm moo moooo mooo moooooo?" mooo Moooo. "Moo, mooo'm moo moo.

I should like to see a boat's crew backing water up to a whale face
M mooooo mooo mo moo m mooo'm mooo moooooo moooo mo mo m moooo mooo

foremost. Ha, ha! the whale would give them squint for squint, mind
mooooooo. Mo, mo! moo moooo moooo mooo mooo mooooo moo mooooo, mooo

that!"
mooo!"




Here then, from three impartial witnesses, I had a deliberate statement
Mooo mooo, mooo moooo moooooooo moooooooo, M moo m mooooooooo moooooooo

of the entire case. Considering, therefore, that squalls and capsizings
mo moo mooooo mooo. Moooooooooo, moooooooo, mooo moooooo moo mooooooooo

in the water and consequent bivouacks on the deep, were matters
mo moo moooo moo mooooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo, mooo moooooo

of common occurrence in this kind of life; considering that at the
mo mooooo mooooooooo mo mooo mooo mo mooo; moooooooooo mooo mo moo

superlatively critical instant of going on to the whale I must resign my
moooooooooooo mooooooo moooooo mo moooo mo mo moo moooo M mooo mooooo mo

life into the hands of him who steered the boat--oftentimes a fellow who
mooo mooo moo moooo mo moo moo moooooo moo mooo--mooooooooo m mooooo moo

at that very moment is in his impetuousness upon the point of scuttling
mo mooo mooo mooooo mo mo moo moooooooooooo mooo moo moooo mo moooooooo

the craft with his own frantic stampings; considering that the
moo moooo mooo moo moo moooooo moooooooo; moooooooooo mooo moo

particular disaster to our own particular boat was chiefly to be imputed
mooooooooo mooooooo mo moo moo mooooooooo mooo moo moooooo mo mo moooooo

to Starbuck's driving on to his whale almost in the teeth of a squall,
mo Mooooooo'm moooooo mo mo moo moooo mooooo mo moo moooo mo m mooooo,

and considering that Starbuck, notwithstanding, was famous for his
moo moooooooooo mooo Mooooooo, moooooooooooooo, moo mooooo moo moo

great heedfulness in the fishery; considering that I belonged to this
moooo moooooooooo mo moo moooooo; moooooooooo mooo M mooooooo mo mooo

uncommonly prudent Starbuck's boat; and finally considering in what a
mooooooooo moooooo Mooooooo'm mooo; moo moooooo moooooooooo mo mooo m

devil's chase I was implicated, touching the White Whale: taking all
moooo'm moooo M moo mooooooooo, mooooooo moo Moooo Moooo: mooooo moo

things together, I say, I thought I might as well go below and make a
mooooo mooooooo, M moo, M moooooo M moooo mo mooo mo moooo moo mooo m

rough draft of my will. "Queequeg," said I, "come along, you shall be my
moooo moooo mo mo mooo. "Mooooooo," mooo M, "mooo moooo, moo moooo mo mo

lawyer, executor, and legatee."
mooooo, mooooooo, moo moooooo."




It may seem strange that of all men sailors should be tinkering at their
Mo moo mooo moooooo mooo mo moo moo moooooo mooooo mo moooooooo mo moooo

last wills and testaments, but there are no people in the world more
mooo moooo moo mooooooooo, moo moooo moo mo mooooo mo moo moooo mooo

fond of that diversion. This was the fourth time in my nautical life
mooo mo mooo moooooooo. Mooo moo moo mooooo mooo mo mo mooooooo mooo

that I had done the same thing. After the ceremony was concluded upon
mooo M moo mooo moo mooo moooo. Moooo moo mooooooo moo moooooooo mooo

the present occasion, I felt all the easier; a stone was rolled away
moo moooooo mooooooo, M mooo moo moo mooooo; m moooo moo mooooo mooo

from my heart. Besides, all the days I should now live would be as good
mooo mo moooo. Moooooo, moo moo mooo M mooooo moo mooo moooo mo mo mooo

as the days that Lazarus lived after his resurrection; a supplementary
mo moo mooo mooo Moooooo moooo moooo moo mooooooooooo; m moooooooooooo

clean gain of so many months or weeks as the case might be. I survived
moooo mooo mo mo mooo mooooo mo moooo mo moo mooo moooo mo. M mooooooo

myself; my death and burial were locked up in my chest. I looked
mooooo; mo moooo moo mooooo mooo mooooo mo mo mo moooo. M mooooo

round me tranquilly and contentedly, like a quiet ghost with a clean
moooo mo mooooooooo moo moooooooooo, mooo m moooo moooo mooo m moooo

conscience sitting inside the bars of a snug family vault.
mooooooooo moooooo mooooo moo mooo mo m mooo mooooo moooo.




Now then, thought I, unconsciously rolling up the sleeves of my frock,
Moo mooo, moooooo M, moooooooooooo moooooo mo moo moooooo mo mo moooo,

here goes for a cool, collected dive at death and destruction, and the
mooo mooo moo m mooo, moooooooo mooo mo moooo moo moooooooooo, moo moo

devil fetch the hindmost.
moooo moooo moo mooooooo.










CHAPTER 50. Ahab's Boat and Crew. Fedallah.
MOOOOOO mo. Mooo'm Mooo moo Mooo. Mooooooo.







"Who would have thought it, Flask!" cried Stubb; "if I had but one leg
"Moo moooo mooo moooooo mo, Moooo!" moooo Moooo; "mo M moo moo moo moo

you would not catch me in a boat, unless maybe to stop the plug-hole
moo moooo moo moooo mo mo m mooo, mooooo moooo mo mooo moo mooo-mooo

with my timber toe. Oh! he's a wonderful old man!"
mooo mo mooooo moo. Mo! mo'm m moooooooo moo moo!"




"I don't think it so strange, after all, on that account," said Flask.
"M moo'm moooo mo mo moooooo, moooo moo, mo mooo moooooo," mooo Moooo.

"If his leg were off at the hip, now, it would be a different thing.
"Mo moo moo mooo moo mo moo moo, moo, mo moooo mo m moooooooo moooo.

That would disable him; but he has one knee, and good part of the other
Mooo moooo moooooo moo; moo mo moo moo mooo, moo mooo mooo mo moo moooo

left, you know."
mooo, moo mooo."




"I don't know that, my little man; I never yet saw him kneel."
"M moo'm mooo mooo, mo mooooo moo; M moooo moo moo moo moooo."







Among whale-wise people it has often been argued whether, considering
Moooo moooo-mooo mooooo mo moo moooo mooo mooooo moooooo, moooooooooo

the paramount importance of his life to the success of the voyage, it is
moo moooooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooooo mo moo mooooo, mo mo

right for a whaling captain to jeopardize that life in the active perils
moooo moo m moooooo moooooo mo mooooooooo mooo mooo mo moo mooooo mooooo

of the chase. So Tamerlane's soldiers often argued with tears in their
mo moo moooo. Mo Moooooooo'm mooooooo moooo mooooo mooo moooo mo moooo

eyes, whether that invaluable life of his ought to be carried into the
mooo, moooooo mooo mooooooooo mooo mo moo moooo mo mo moooooo mooo moo

thickest of the fight.
mooooooo mo moo moooo.




But with Ahab the question assumed a modified aspect. Considering
Moo mooo Mooo moo mooooooo moooooo m mooooooo mooooo. Moooooooooo

that with two legs man is but a hobbling wight in all times of danger;
mooo mooo moo mooo moo mo moo m mooooooo moooo mo moo moooo mo mooooo;

considering that the pursuit of whales is always under great and
moooooooooo mooo moo moooooo mo mooooo mo mooooo moooo moooo moo

extraordinary difficulties; that every individual moment, indeed, then
moooooooooooo mooooooooooo; mooo moooo mooooooooo mooooo, mooooo, mooo

comprises a peril; under these circumstances is it wise for any
moooooooo m moooo; moooo moooo moooooooooooo mo mo mooo moo moo

maimed man to enter a whale-boat in the hunt? As a general thing, the
mooooo moo mo moooo m moooo-mooo mo moo mooo? Mo m moooooo moooo, moo

joint-owners of the Pequod must have plainly thought not.
moooo-mooooo mo moo Mooooo mooo mooo moooooo moooooo moo.




Ahab well knew that although his friends at home would think little of
Mooo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo moo moooooo mo mooo moooo moooo mooooo mo

his entering a boat in certain comparatively harmless vicissitudes of
moo mooooooo m mooo mo moooooo moooooooooooo mooooooo mooooooooooo mo

the chase, for the sake of being near the scene of action and giving
moo moooo, moo moo mooo mo moooo mooo moo moooo mo mooooo moo mooooo

his orders in person, yet for Captain Ahab to have a boat actually
moo mooooo mo mooooo, moo moo Moooooo Mooo mo mooo m mooo mooooooo

apportioned to him as a regular headsman in the hunt--above all for
moooooooooo mo moo mo m moooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo--moooo moo moo

Moooooo Mooo mo mo mooooooo mooo mooo moooo moo, mo mooo mooo mooo'm

crew, he well knew that such generous conceits never entered the heads
mooo, mo mooo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo mooooooo moooo moooooo moo moooo

of the owners of the Pequod. Therefore he had not solicited a boat's
mo moo mooooo mo moo Mooooo. Moooooooo mo moo moo moooooooo m mooo'm

crew from them, nor had he in any way hinted his desires on that head.
mooo mooo mooo, moo moo mo mo moo moo mooooo moo moooooo mo mooo mooo.

Nevertheless he had taken private measures of his own touching all
Mooooooooooo mo moo moooo moooooo mooooooo mo moo moo mooooooo moo

that matter. Until Cabaco's published discovery, the sailors had little
mooo mooooo. Moooo Mooooo'm moooooooo moooooooo, moo moooooo moo mooooo

foreseen it, though to be sure when, after being a little while out
mooooooo mo, mooooo mo mo mooo mooo, moooo moooo m mooooo moooo moo

of port, all hands had concluded the customary business of fitting the
mo mooo, moo moooo moo moooooooo moo moooooooo mooooooo mo moooooo moo

whaleboats for service; when some time after this Ahab was now and then
mooooooooo moo moooooo; mooo mooo mooo moooo mooo Mooo moo moo moo mooo

found bestirring himself in the matter of making thole-pins with his
moooo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mo mooooo moooo-mooo mooo moo

own hands for what was thought to be one of the spare boats, and even
moo moooo moo mooo moo moooooo mo mo moo mo moo moooo moooo, moo mooo

mooooooooooo moooooo moo moooo mooooo moooooo, moooo mooo moo mooo mo

running out are pinned over the groove in the bow: when all this was
moooooo moo moo mooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo moo: mooo moo mooo moo

observed in him, and particularly his solicitude in having an extra
mooooooo mo moo, moo mooooooooooo moo mooooooooo mo mooooo mo moooo

mooo mo moooooooo mo moo mooooo mo moo mooo, mo mo mo mooo mo mooooo

moooooooo moo moooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo mooo; moo mooo moo moooooo

mo moooooo mo moooooo moooooo moo moooo moooo, mo mooooo moooo, mo mo mo

sometimes called, the horizontal piece in the boat's bow for bracing the
moooooooo mooooo, moo mooooooooo moooo mo moo mooo'm moo moo moooooo moo

knee against in darting or stabbing at the whale; when it was observed
mooo moooooo mo moooooo mo mooooooo mo moo moooo; mooo mo moo mooooooo

how often he stood up in that boat with his solitary knee fixed in the
moo moooo mo moooo mo mo mooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo moooo mo moo

semi-circular depression in the cleat, and with the carpenter's chisel
mooo-mooooooo mooooooooo mo moo moooo, moo mooo moo moooooooo'm mooooo

mooooo, M moo, moo mooooooo mooo mooooooo moo moooooooo mo moo mooo. Moo

almost everybody supposed that this particular preparative heedfulness
mooooo moooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo mooooooooo moooooooooo moooooooooo

mo Mooo mooo mooo mo mooo m mooo mo moo mooooooo moooo mo Mooo Mooo;

for he had already revealed his intention to hunt that mortal monster
moo mo moo moooooo mooooooo moo moooooooo mo mooo mooo mooooo moooooo

mo mooooo. Moo mooo m moooooooooo moo mo mo moooo moooooo moo mooooooo

moooooooo mo mo moo mooo'm mooo moooo mooooooo mo mooo mooo.




Now, with the subordinate phantoms, what wonder remained soon waned
Moo, mooo moo moooooooooo mooooooo, mooo mooooo mooooooo mooo moooo

mooo; moo mo m mooooo moooooo mooo mooo. Moooooo, moo moo mooo mooo

mooooooooo mo moo mooooooooo.




But be all this as it may, certain it is that while the subordinate
Moo mo moo mooo mo mo moo, moooooo mo mo mooo moooo moo moooooooooo

mooooooo mooo moooo moooo moooo moooo moo mooo, mooooo moooo mo mo mooo

moooooo mooooooo mooo mooo, moo mooo mooo-mooooooo Mooooooo mooooooo

mooooo mooo Mooo'm mooooooo mooooooo; moo, mo moo mo mo mooo mooo mooo

mo m mooo-mooooo moooooooo; Mooooo moooo, moo mo moooo mooo mooo mooo

moooooooo mooo moo; moo mooo mooo mooo. Moo moo mooooo moooooo

mo moooooooooo moo mooooooooo Mooooooo. Mo moo mooo m mooooooo mo

moooo moo mooooooooo Moooooo moooooooooo, mooooooooo moo Mooooooo moooo

mo moo mooo mo moo moooooooo--moooo moooooooo, mooooooooo, moooooooooo

moooooooo, moooo mooo mo moooo mooooo mooo moooo mooooooo mooo mo moo

moooooo mooooooooooooo mo moooo'm mooooo moooooooooo, mooo moo mooooo mo

moo moooo moo moo m mooooooo mooooooooooo, moo moo moo moo moooooooooo,

moooooooo mooooo mo mooo, mooo mooo moooo mo mooo mooooooo, moo moooo mo

the sun and the moon why they were created and to what end; when though,
moo moo moo moo mooo moo mooo mooo moooooo moo mo mooo moo; mooo mooooo,

according to Genesis, the angels indeed consorted with the daughters of
moooooooo mo Moooooo, moo mooooo mooooo moooooooo mooo moo moooooooo mo
