moo, moo mooooo mooo, moo moo moooooooooo Moooooo, mooooooo mo moooooo

amours.
mooooo.










CHAPTER 51. The Spirit-Spout.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooooo-Moooo.







Days, weeks passed, and under easy sail, the ivory Pequod had slowly
Mooo, moooo mooooo, moo moooo mooo mooo, moo moooo Mooooo moo mooooo

swept across four several cruising-grounds; that off the Azores; off the
moooo mooooo mooo moooooo mooooooo-moooooo; mooo moo moo Mooooo; moo moo

Cape de Verdes; on the Plate (so called), being off the mouth of the
Mooo mo Mooooo; mo moo Moooo (mo mooooo), moooo moo moo moooo mo moo

Rio de la Plata; and the Carrol Ground, an unstaked, watery locality,
Moo mo mo Moooo; moo moo Mooooo Mooooo, mo mooooooo, mooooo mooooooo,

southerly from St. Helena.
moooooooo mooo Mo. Mooooo.




It was while gliding through these latter waters that one serene and
Mo moo moooo moooooo moooooo moooo mooooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo moo

moonlight night, when all the waves rolled by like scrolls of silver;
moooooooo moooo, mooo moo moo moooo mooooo mo mooo moooooo mo mooooo;

and, by their soft, suffusing seethings, made what seemed a silvery
moo, mo moooo mooo, moooooooo moooooooo, mooo mooo mooooo m moooooo

silence, not a solitude; on such a silent night a silvery jet was seen
moooooo, moo m mooooooo; mo mooo m mooooo moooo m moooooo moo moo mooo

far in advance of the white bubbles at the bow. Lit up by the moon, it
moo mo moooooo mo moo moooo moooooo mo moo moo. Moo mo mo moo mooo, mo

looked celestial; seemed some plumed and glittering god uprising from
mooooo moooooooo; mooooo mooo mooooo moo mooooooooo moo mooooooo mooo

the sea. Fedallah first descried this jet. For of these moonlight
moo moo. Mooooooo moooo mooooooo mooo moo. Moo mo moooo moooooooo

nights, it was his wont to mount to the main-mast head, and stand a
mooooo, mo moo moo mooo mo moooo mo moo mooo-mooo mooo, moo moooo m

look-out there, with the same precision as if it had been day. And yet,
mooo-moo moooo, mooo moo mooo moooooooo mo mo mo moo mooo moo. Moo moo,

though herds of whales were seen by night, not one whaleman in a hundred
mooooo moooo mo mooooo mooo mooo mo moooo, moo moo mooooooo mo m moooooo

would venture a lowering for them. You may think with what emotions,
moooo moooooo m mooooooo moo mooo. Moo moo moooo mooo mooo mooooooo,

then, the seamen beheld this old Oriental perched aloft at such unusual
mooo, moo mooooo mooooo mooo moo Mooooooo moooooo moooo mo mooo moooooo

hours; his turban and the moon, companions in one sky. But when, after
moooo; moo mooooo moo moo mooo, mooooooooo mo moo moo. Moo mooo, moooo

spending his uniform interval there for several successive nights
mooooooo moo moooooo mooooooo moooo moo moooooo mooooooooo mooooo

without uttering a single sound; when, after all this silence, his
moooooo mooooooo m mooooo moooo; mooo, moooo moo mooo moooooo, moo

unearthly voice was heard announcing that silvery, moon-lit jet, every
moooooooo moooo moo moooo mooooooooo mooo moooooo, mooo-moo moo, moooo

reclining mariner started to his feet as if some winged spirit had
moooooooo moooooo moooooo mo moo mooo mo mo mooo mooooo mooooo moo

lighted in the rigging, and hailed the mortal crew. "There she blows!"
moooooo mo moo moooooo, moo mooooo moo mooooo mooo. "Moooo moo moooo!"

Had the trump of judgment blown, they could not have quivered more; yet
Moo moo moooo mo mooooooo moooo, mooo moooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo; moo

still they felt no terror; rather pleasure. For though it was a most
moooo mooo mooo mo mooooo; mooooo mooooooo. Moo mooooo mo moo m mooo

unwonted hour, yet so impressive was the cry, and so deliriously
mooooooo mooo, moo mo mooooooooo moo moo moo, moo mo moooooooooo

exciting, that almost every soul on board instinctively desired a
mooooooo, mooo mooooo moooo mooo mo moooo moooooooooooo moooooo m

lowering.
mooooooo.




Walking the deck with quick, side-lunging strides, Ahab commanded the
Moooooo moo mooo mooo moooo, mooo-moooooo moooooo, Mooo moooooooo moo

t'gallant sails and royals to be set, and every stunsail spread. The
m'moooooo moooo moo mooooo mo mo moo, moo moooo mooooooo mooooo. Moo

best man in the ship must take the helm. Then, with every mast-head
mooo moo mo moo mooo mooo mooo moo mooo. Mooo, mooo moooo mooo-mooo

manned, the piled-up craft rolled down before the wind. The strange,
mooooo, moo moooo-mo moooo mooooo mooo mooooo moo mooo. Moo moooooo,

upheaving, lifting tendency of the taffrail breeze filling the hollows
moooooooo, moooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo moooooo moo moooooo

of so many sails, made the buoyant, hovering deck to feel like air
mo mo mooo moooo, mooo moo moooooo, mooooooo mooo mo mooo mooo moo

beneath the feet; while still she rushed along, as if two antagonistic
moooooo moo mooo; moooo moooo moo mooooo moooo, mo mo moo mooooooooooo

influences were struggling in her--one to mount direct to heaven, the
mooooooooo mooo mooooooooo mo moo--moo mo moooo mooooo mo mooooo, moo

other to drive yawingly to some horizontal goal. And had you watched
moooo mo moooo mooooooo mo mooo mooooooooo mooo. Moo moo moo moooooo

Ahab's face that night, you would have thought that in him also two
Mooo'm mooo mooo moooo, moo moooo mooo moooooo mooo mo moo mooo moo

different things were warring. While his one live leg made lively echoes
moooooooo mooooo mooo moooooo. Moooo moo moo mooo moo mooo mooooo mooooo

along the deck, every stroke of his dead limb sounded like a coffin-tap.
moooo moo mooo, moooo mooooo mo moo mooo mooo moooooo mooo m mooooo-moo.

On life and death this old man walked. But though the ship so swiftly
Mo mooo moo moooo mooo moo moo mooooo. Moo mooooo moo mooo mo moooooo

sped, and though from every eye, like arrows, the eager glances shot,
mooo, moo mooooo mooo moooo moo, mooo mooooo, moo moooo moooooo mooo,

yet the silvery jet was no more seen that night. Every sailor swore he
moo moo moooooo moo moo mo mooo mooo mooo moooo. Moooo mooooo moooo mo

saw it once, but not a second time.
moo mo mooo, moo moo m mooooo mooo.




This midnight-spout had almost grown a forgotten thing, when, some days
Mooo mooooooo-moooo moo mooooo moooo m moooooooo moooo, mooo, mooo mooo

after, lo! at the same silent hour, it was again announced: again it
moooo, mo! mo moo mooo mooooo mooo, mo moo moooo moooooooo: moooo mo

was descried by all; but upon making sail to overtake it, once more it
moo mooooooo mo moo; moo mooo mooooo mooo mo mooooooo mo, mooo mooo mo

disappeared as if it had never been. And so it served us night after
moooooooooo mo mo mo moo moooo mooo. Moo mo mo mooooo mo moooo moooo

night, till no one heeded it but to wonder at it. Mysteriously
moooo, mooo mo moo mooooo mo moo mo mooooo mo mo. Mooooooooooo

jetted into the clear moonlight, or starlight, as the case might be;
mooooo mooo moo moooo moooooooo, mo moooooooo, mo moo mooo moooo mo;

disappearing again for one whole day, or two days, or three; and somehow
mooooooooooo moooo moo moo moooo moo, mo moo mooo, mo moooo; moo moooooo

seeming at every distinct repetition to be advancing still further and
moooooo mo moooo mooooooo mooooooooo mo mo moooooooo moooo moooooo moo

further in our van, this solitary jet seemed for ever alluring us on.
moooooo mo moo moo, mooo mooooooo moo mooooo moo mooo mooooooo mo mo.




Nor with the immemorial superstition of their race, and in accordance
Moo mooo moo mooooooooo mooooooooooo mo moooo mooo, moo mo mooooooooo

with the preternaturalness, as it seemed, which in many things invested
mooo moo moooooooooooooooo, mo mo mooooo, moooo mo mooo mooooo mooooooo

the Pequod, were there wanting some of the seamen who swore that
moo Mooooo, mooo moooo moooooo mooo mo moo mooooo moo moooo mooo

whenever and wherever descried; at however remote times, or in however
mooooooo moo mooooooo mooooooo; mo moooooo mooooo moooo, mo mo moooooo

far apart latitudes and longitudes, that unnearable spout was cast
moo moooo moooooooo moo mooooooooo, mooo mooooooooo moooo moo mooo

by one self-same whale; and that whale, Moby Dick. For a time, there
mo moo mooo-mooo moooo; moo mooo moooo, Mooo Mooo. Moo m mooo, moooo

reigned, too, a sense of peculiar dread at this flitting apparition,
moooooo, moo, m moooo mo mooooooo moooo mo mooo mooooooo mooooooooo,

as if it were treacherously beckoning us on and on, in order that the
mo mo mo mooo moooooooooooo moooooooo mo mo moo mo, mo moooo mooo moo

monster might turn round upon us, and rend us at last in the remotest
moooooo moooo mooo moooo mooo mo, moo mooo mo mo mooo mo moo mooooooo

and most savage seas.
moo mooo mooooo mooo.




These temporary apprehensions, so vague but so awful, derived a wondrous
Moooo moooooooo moooooooooooo, mo moooo moo mo moooo, moooooo m mooooooo

potency from the contrasting serenity of the weather, in which, beneath
moooooo mooo moo moooooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooooo, mo moooo, moooooo

all its blue blandness, some thought there lurked a devilish charm, as
moo moo mooo moooooooo, mooo moooooo moooo mooooo m mooooooo moooo, mo

for days and days we voyaged along, through seas so wearily, lonesomely
moo mooo moo mooo mo moooooo moooo, moooooo mooo mo moooooo, mooooooooo

mild, that all space, in repugnance to our vengeful errand, seemed
mooo, mooo moo moooo, mo mooooooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo, mooooo

vacating itself of life before our urn-like prow.
mooooooo mooooo mo mooo mooooo moo moo-mooo mooo.




But, at last, when turning to the eastward, the Cape winds began howling
Moo, mo mooo, mooo moooooo mo moo mooooooo, moo Mooo moooo moooo moooooo

around us, and we rose and fell upon the long, troubled seas that are
mooooo mo, moo mo mooo moo mooo mooo moo mooo, mooooooo mooo mooo moo

there; when the ivory-tusked Pequod sharply bowed to the blast, and
moooo; mooo moo moooo-mooooo Mooooo moooooo moooo mo moo moooo, moo

gored the dark waves in her madness, till, like showers of silver chips,
moooo moo mooo moooo mo moo moooooo, mooo, mooo moooooo mo mooooo moooo,

the foam-flakes flew over her bulwarks; then all this desolate vacuity
moo mooo-mooooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo; mooo moo mooo mooooooo moooooo

of life went away, but gave place to sights more dismal than before.
mo mooo mooo mooo, moo mooo moooo mo mooooo mooo mooooo mooo mooooo.




Close to our bows, strange forms in the water darted hither and thither
Moooo mo moo mooo, moooooo moooo mo moo moooo mooooo mooooo moo moooooo

before us; while thick in our rear flew the inscrutable sea-ravens. And
mooooo mo; moooo moooo mo moo mooo mooo moo moooooooooo moo-mooooo. Moo

every morning, perched on our stays, rows of these birds were seen; and
moooo moooooo, moooooo mo moo moooo, mooo mo moooo moooo mooo mooo; moo

spite of our hootings, for a long time obstinately clung to the hemp,
moooo mo moo mooooooo, moo m mooo mooo moooooooooo moooo mo moo mooo,

as though they deemed our ship some drifting, uninhabited craft; a thing
mo mooooo mooo mooooo moo mooo mooo mooooooo, moooooooooo moooo; m moooo

appointed to desolation, and therefore fit roosting-place for their
moooooooo mo mooooooooo, moo moooooooo moo mooooooo-moooo moo moooo

homeless selves. And heaved and heaved, still unrestingly heaved the
mooooooo mooooo. Moo mooooo moo mooooo, moooo moooooooooo mooooo moo

black sea, as if its vast tides were a conscience; and the great mundane
moooo moo, mo mo moo mooo moooo mooo m mooooooooo; moo moo moooo moooooo

soul were in anguish and remorse for the long sin and suffering it had
mooo mooo mo moooooo moo moooooo moo moo mooo moo moo moooooooo mo moo

bred.
mooo.




Cape of Good Hope, do they call ye? Rather Cape Tormentoto, as called
Mooo mo Mooo Mooo, mo mooo mooo mo? Mooooo Mooo Mooooooooo, mo mooooo

of yore; for long allured by the perfidious silences that before had
mo mooo; moo mooo moooooo mo moo mooooooooo mooooooo mooo mooooo moo

attended us, we found ourselves launched into this tormented sea,
mooooooo mo, mo moooo moooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo moooooooo moo,

where guilty beings transformed into those fowls and these fish, seemed
moooo mooooo mooooo moooooooooo mooo moooo moooo moo moooo mooo, mooooo

condemned to swim on everlastingly without any haven in store, or beat
moooooooo mo mooo mo moooooooooooo moooooo moo moooo mo moooo, mo mooo

that black air without any horizon. But calm, snow-white, and unvarying;
mooo moooo moo moooooo moo moooooo. Moo mooo, mooo-moooo, moo moooooooo;

still directing its fountain of feathers to the sky; still beckoning us
moooo moooooooo moo mooooooo mo mooooooo mo moo moo; moooo moooooooo mo

on from before, the solitary jet would at times be descried.
mo mooo mooooo, moo mooooooo moo moooo mo moooo mo mooooooo.




During all this blackness of the elements, Ahab, though assuming for the
Mooooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo, Mooo, mooooo mooooooo moo moo

time the almost continual command of the drenched and dangerous deck,
mooo moo mooooo moooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooooo moo moooooooo mooo,

manifested the gloomiest reserve; and more seldom than ever addressed
mooooooooo moo moooooooo moooooo; moo mooo mooooo mooo mooo moooooooo

his mates. In tempestuous times like these, after everything above and
moo moooo. Mo moooooooooo moooo mooo moooo, moooo mooooooooo moooo moo

aloft has been secured, nothing more can be done but passively to await
moooo moo mooo moooooo, moooooo mooo moo mo mooo moo moooooooo mo moooo

the issue of the gale. Then Captain and crew become practical fatalists.
moo moooo mo moo mooo. Mooo Moooooo moo mooo mooooo moooooooo moooooooo.

So, with his ivory leg inserted into its accustomed hole, and with one
Mo, mooo moo moooo moo mooooooo mooo moo mooooooooo mooo, moo mooo moo

hand firmly grasping a shroud, Ahab for hours and hours would stand
mooo mooooo mooooooo m mooooo, Mooo moo moooo moo moooo moooo moooo

gazing dead to windward, while an occasional squall of sleet or snow
mooooo mooo mo mooooooo, moooo mo mooooooooo mooooo mo moooo mo mooo

would all but congeal his very eyelashes together. Meantime, the crew
moooo moo moo moooooo moo mooo moooooooo mooooooo. Mooooooo, moo mooo

driven from the forward part of the ship by the perilous seas that
mooooo mooo moo moooooo mooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mooo

burstingly broke over its bows, stood in a line along the bulwarks in
mooooooooo moooo mooo moo mooo, moooo mo m mooo moooo moo mooooooo mo

the waist; and the better to guard against the leaping waves, each man
moo moooo; moo moo mooooo mo moooo moooooo moo moooooo moooo, mooo moo

had slipped himself into a sort of bowline secured to the rail, in which
moo moooooo moooooo mooo m mooo mo moooooo moooooo mo moo mooo, mo moooo

he swung as in a loosened belt. Few or no words were spoken; and the
mo moooo mo mo m mooooooo mooo. Moo mo mo moooo mooo mooooo; moo moo

silent ship, as if manned by painted sailors in wax, day after day tore
mooooo mooo, mo mo mooooo mo moooooo moooooo mo moo, moo moooo moo mooo

on through all the swift madness and gladness of the demoniac waves.
mo moooooo moo moo moooo moooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo moooo.

By night the same muteness of humanity before the shrieks of the
Mo moooo moo mooo mooooooo mo mooooooo mooooo moo moooooo mo moo

ocean prevailed; still in silence the men swung in the bowlines; still
moooo moooooooo; moooo mo moooooo moo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo; moooo

wordless Ahab stood up to the blast. Even when wearied nature seemed
mooooooo Mooo moooo mo mo moo moooo. Mooo mooo moooooo mooooo mooooo

demanding repose he would not seek that repose in his hammock. Never
moooooooo mooooo mo moooo moo mooo mooo mooooo mo moo moooooo. Moooo

could Starbuck forget the old man's aspect, when one night going down
moooo Mooooooo mooooo moo moo moo'm mooooo, mooo moo moooo moooo mooo

into the cabin to mark how the barometer stood, he saw him with
mooo moo moooo mo mooo moo moo moooooooo moooo, mo moo moo mooo

closed eyes sitting straight in his floor-screwed chair; the rain
mooooo mooo moooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo-moooooo moooo; moo mooo

and half-melted sleet of the storm from which he had some time before
moo mooo-mooooo moooo mo moo moooo mooo moooo mo moo mooo mooo mooooo

emerged, still slowly dripping from the unremoved hat and coat. On the
moooooo, moooo mooooo mooooooo mooo moo moooooooo moo moo mooo. Mo moo

table beside him lay unrolled one of those charts of tides and currents
moooo mooooo moo moo mooooooo moo mo moooo mooooo mo moooo moo mooooooo

which have previously been spoken of. His lantern swung from his tightly
moooo mooo mooooooooo mooo mooooo mo. Moo moooooo moooo mooo moo moooooo

clenched hand. Though the body was erect, the head was thrown back so
mooooooo mooo. Mooooo moo mooo moo moooo, moo mooo moo mooooo mooo mo

that the closed eyes were pointed towards the needle of the tell-tale
mooo moo mooooo mooo mooo moooooo moooooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo-mooo

that swung from a beam in the ceiling.*
mooo moooo mooo m mooo mo moo moooooo.*







*The cabin-compass is called the tell-tale, because without going to the
*Moo moooo-moooooo mo mooooo moo mooo-mooo, moooooo moooooo moooo mo moo

compass at the helm, the Captain, while below, can inform himself of the
moooooo mo moo mooo, moo Moooooo, moooo moooo, moo mooooo moooooo mo moo

course of the ship.
mooooo mo moo mooo.







Terrible old man! thought Starbuck with a shudder, sleeping in this
Mooooooo moo moo! moooooo Mooooooo mooo m moooooo, mooooooo mo mooo

gale, still thou steadfastly eyest thy purpose.
mooo, moooo mooo moooooooooo moooo moo moooooo.










CHAPTER 52. The Albatross.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooooooo.







South-eastward from the Cape, off the distant Crozetts, a good cruising
Moooo-mooooooo mooo moo Mooo, moo moo moooooo Mooooooo, m mooo mooooooo

ground for Right Whalemen, a sail loomed ahead, the Goney (Albatross)
mooooo moo Moooo Mooooooo, m mooo mooooo moooo, moo Moooo (Moooooooo)

by name. As she slowly drew nigh, from my lofty perch at the
mo mooo. Mo moo mooooo mooo mooo, mooo mo moooo moooo mo moo

fore-mast-head, I had a good view of that sight so remarkable to a tyro
mooo-mooo-mooo, M moo m mooo mooo mo mooo moooo mo mooooooooo mo m mooo

in the far ocean fisheries--a whaler at sea, and long absent from home.
mo moo moo moooo moooooooo--m mooooo mo moo, moo mooo mooooo mooo mooo.




As if the waves had been fullers, this craft was bleached like the
Mo mo moo moooo moo mooo moooooo, mooo moooo moo mooooooo mooo moo

skeleton of a stranded walrus. All down her sides, this spectral
mooooooo mo m mooooooo mooooo. Moo mooo moo moooo, mooo mooooooo

appearance was traced with long channels of reddened rust, while all her
mooooooooo moo mooooo mooo mooo mooooooo mo mooooooo mooo, moooo moo moo

spars and her rigging were like the thick branches of trees furred over
moooo moo moo moooooo mooo mooo moo moooo mooooooo mo moooo mooooo mooo

with hoar-frost. Only her lower sails were set. A wild sight it was to
mooo mooo-moooo. Mooo moo moooo moooo mooo moo. M mooo moooo mo moo mo

see her long-bearded look-outs at those three mast-heads. They seemed
moo moo mooo-moooooo mooo-mooo mo moooo moooo mooo-moooo. Mooo mooooo

clad in the skins of beasts, so torn and bepatched the raiment that had
mooo mo moo moooo mo mooooo, mo mooo moo moooooooo moo moooooo mooo moo

survived nearly four years of cruising. Standing in iron hoops nailed to
mooooooo mooooo mooo moooo mo mooooooo. Mooooooo mo mooo moooo mooooo mo

the mast, they swayed and swung over a fathomless sea; and though, when
moo mooo, mooo mooooo moo moooo mooo m mooooooooo moo; moo mooooo, mooo

the ship slowly glided close under our stern, we six men in the air
moo mooo mooooo mooooo moooo moooo moo moooo, mo moo moo mo moo moo

came so nigh to each other that we might almost have leaped from the
mooo mo mooo mo mooo moooo mooo mo moooo mooooo mooo mooooo mooo moo

mast-heads of one ship to those of the other; yet, those forlorn-looking
mooo-moooo mo moo mooo mo moooo mo moo moooo; moo, moooo moooooo-moooooo

fishermen, mildly eyeing us as they passed, said not one word to our own
moooooooo, mooooo mooooo mo mo mooo mooooo, mooo moo moo mooo mo moo moo

look-outs, while the quarter-deck hail was being heard from below.
mooo-mooo, moooo moo moooooo-mooo mooo moo moooo moooo mooo moooo.




"Ship ahoy! Have ye seen the White Whale?"
"Mooo mooo! Mooo mo mooo moo Moooo Moooo?"




But as the strange captain, leaning over the pallid bulwarks, was in the
Moo mo moo moooooo moooooo, moooooo mooo moo mooooo mooooooo, moo mo moo

act of putting his trumpet to his mouth, it somehow fell from his hand
moo mo moooooo moo moooooo mo moo moooo, mo moooooo mooo mooo moo mooo

into the sea; and the wind now rising amain, he in vain strove to make
mooo moo moo; moo moo mooo moo mooooo moooo, mo mo mooo mooooo mo mooo

himself heard without it. Meantime his ship was still increasing the
moooooo moooo moooooo mo. Mooooooo moo mooo moo moooo mooooooooo moo

distance between. While in various silent ways the seamen of the Pequod
mooooooo moooooo. Moooo mo moooooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo Mooooo

were evincing their observance of this ominous incident at the first
mooo mooooooo moooo mooooooooo mo mooo moooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo

mere mention of the White Whale's name to another ship, Ahab for a
mooo moooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo'm mooo mo moooooo mooo, Mooo moo m

moment paused; it almost seemed as though he would have lowered a boat
mooooo mooooo; mo mooooo mooooo mo mooooo mo moooo mooo moooooo m mooo

to board the stranger, had not the threatening wind forbade. But taking
mo moooo moo mooooooo, moo moo moo moooooooooo mooo moooooo. Moo mooooo

advantage of his windward position, he again seized his trumpet, and
moooooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooooo, mo moooo mooooo moo moooooo, moo

knowing by her aspect that the stranger vessel was a Nantucketer and
moooooo mo moo mooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooooo moo m Moooooooooo moo

shortly bound home, he loudly hailed--"Ahoy there! This is the Pequod,
moooooo moooo mooo, mo mooooo mooooo--"Mooo moooo! Mooo mo moo Mooooo,

bound round the world! Tell them to address all future letters to the
moooo moooo moo moooo! Mooo mooo mo moooooo moo mooooo moooooo mo moo

Pacific ocean! and this time three years, if I am not at home, tell them
Moooooo moooo! moo mooo mooo moooo moooo, mo M mo moo mo mooo, mooo mooo

to address them to--"
mo moooooo mooo mo--"




At that moment the two wakes were fairly crossed, and instantly, then,
Mo mooo mooooo moo moo moooo mooo mooooo moooooo, moo moooooooo, mooo,

in accordance with their singular ways, shoals of small harmless fish,
mo mooooooooo mooo moooo mooooooo mooo, mooooo mo moooo mooooooo mooo,

that for some days before had been placidly swimming by our side, darted
mooo moo mooo mooo mooooo moo mooo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo, mooooo

away with what seemed shuddering fins, and ranged themselves fore and
mooo mooo mooo mooooo mooooooooo mooo, moo mooooo mooooooooo mooo moo

aft with the stranger's flanks. Though in the course of his continual
moo mooo moo mooooooo'm mooooo. Mooooo mo moo mooooo mo moo moooooooo

voyagings Ahab must often before have noticed a similar sight, yet, to
moooooooo Mooo mooo moooo mooooo mooo moooooo m moooooo moooo, moo, mo

any monomaniac man, the veriest trifles capriciously carry meanings.
moo mooooooooo moo, moo moooooo moooooo mooooooooooo moooo mooooooo.




"Swim away from me, do ye?" murmured Ahab, gazing over into the water.
"Mooo mooo mooo mo, mo mo?" mooooooo Mooo, mooooo mooo mooo moo moooo.

There seemed but little in the words, but the tone conveyed more of deep
Moooo mooooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo, moo moo mooo mooooooo mooo mo mooo

helpless sadness than the insane old man had ever before evinced. But
mooooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooo moo moo moo mooo mooooo moooooo. Moo

turning to the steersman, who thus far had been holding the ship in the
moooooo mo moo moooooooo, moo mooo moo moo mooo moooooo moo mooo mo moo

wind to diminish her headway, he cried out in his old lion voice,--"Up
mooo mo mooooooo moo moooooo, mo moooo moo mo moo moo mooo moooo,--"Mo

helm! Keep her off round the world!"
mooo! Mooo moo moo moooo moo moooo!"




Round the world! There is much in that sound to inspire proud feelings;
Moooo moo moooo! Moooo mo mooo mo mooo moooo mo moooooo moooo mooooooo;

but whereto does all that circumnavigation conduct? Only through
moo moooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooooooooooo moooooo? Mooo moooooo

numberless perils to the very point whence we started, where those that
mooooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo moooo mooooo mo moooooo, moooo moooo mooo

we left behind secure, were all the time before us.
mo mooo mooooo mooooo, mooo moo moo mooo mooooo mo.




Were this world an endless plain, and by sailing eastward we could for
Mooo mooo moooo mo moooooo moooo, moo mo moooooo mooooooo mo moooo moo

ever reach new distances, and discover sights more sweet and strange
mooo moooo moo moooooooo, moo mooooooo mooooo mooo moooo moo moooooo

than any Cyclades or Islands of King Solomon, then there were promise
mooo moo Mooooooo mo Moooooo mo Mooo Moooooo, mooo moooo mooo moooooo

in the voyage. But in pursuit of those far mysteries we dream of, or in
mo moo mooooo. Moo mo moooooo mo moooo moo moooooooo mo moooo mo, mo mo

tormented chase of that demon phantom that, some time or other, swims
moooooooo moooo mo mooo moooo moooooo mooo, mooo mooo mo moooo, moooo

before all human hearts; while chasing such over this round globe, they
mooooo moo moooo mooooo; moooo moooooo mooo mooo mooo moooo moooo, mooo

either lead us on in barren mazes or midway leave us whelmed.
mooooo mooo mo mo mo mooooo moooo mo mooooo moooo mo moooooo.










CHAPTER 53. The Gam.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moo.







The ostensible reason why Ahab did not go on board of the whaler we had
Moo mooooooooo mooooo moo Mooo moo moo mo mo moooo mo moo mooooo mo moo

spoken was this: the wind and sea betokened storms. But even had
mooooo moo mooo: moo mooo moo moo moooooooo mooooo. Moo mooo moo

this not been the case, he would not after all, perhaps, have boarded
mooo moo mooo moo mooo, mo moooo moo moooo moo, moooooo, mooo moooooo

her--judging by his subsequent conduct on similar occasions--if so it
moo--moooooo mo moo mooooooooo moooooo mo moooooo moooooooo--mo mo mo

had been that, by the process of hailing, he had obtained a negative
moo mooo mooo, mo moo moooooo mo moooooo, mo moo mooooooo m mooooooo

answer to the question he put. For, as it eventually turned out, he
mooooo mo moo mooooooo mo moo. Moo, mo mo mooooooooo mooooo moo, mo

cared not to consort, even for five minutes, with any stranger captain,
moooo moo mo moooooo, mooo moo mooo moooooo, mooo moo mooooooo moooooo,

except he could contribute some of that information he so absorbingly
mooooo mo moooo mooooooooo mooo mo mooo moooooooooo mo mo moooooooooo

sought. But all this might remain inadequately estimated, were not
mooooo. Moo moo mooo moooo mooooo mooooooooooo moooooooo, mooo moo

something said here of the peculiar usages of whaling-vessels when
moooooooo mooo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo mo moooooo-moooooo mooo

meeting each other in foreign seas, and especially on a common
moooooo mooo moooo mo moooooo mooo, moo mooooooooo mo m mooooo

cruising-ground.
mooooooo-mooooo.




If two strangers crossing the Pine Barrens in New York State, or the
Mo moo moooooooo mooooooo moo Mooo Moooooo mo Moo Mooo Moooo, mo moo

equally desolate Salisbury Plain in England; if casually encountering
moooooo mooooooo Moooooooo Moooo mo Moooooo; mo mooooooo mooooooooooo

each other in such inhospitable wilds, these twain, for the life of
mooo moooo mo mooo mooooooooooo moooo, moooo moooo, moo moo mooo mo

them, cannot well avoid a mutual salutation; and stopping for a moment
mooo, mooooo mooo moooo m mooooo mooooooooo; moo mooooooo moo m mooooo

to interchange the news; and, perhaps, sitting down for a while
mo moooooooooo moo mooo; moo, moooooo, moooooo mooo moo m moooo

and resting in concert: then, how much more natural that upon the
moo moooooo mo moooooo: mooo, moo mooo mooo moooooo mooo mooo moo

illimitable Pine Barrens and Salisbury Plains of the sea, two whaling
moooooooooo Mooo Moooooo moo Moooooooo Mooooo mo moo moo, moo moooooo

vessels descrying each other at the ends of the earth--off lone
moooooo moooooooo mooo moooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooo--moo mooo

Fanning's Island, or the far away King's Mills; how much more natural,
Moooooo'm Mooooo, mo moo moo mooo Mooo'm Moooo; moo mooo mooo moooooo,

I say, that under such circumstances these ships should not only
M moo, mooo moooo mooo moooooooooooo moooo moooo mooooo moo mooo

interchange hails, but come into still closer, more friendly and
moooooooooo moooo, moo mooo mooo moooo mooooo, mooo mooooooo moo

sociable contact. And especially would this seem to be a matter of
mooooooo moooooo. Moo mooooooooo moooo mooo mooo mo mo m mooooo mo

course, in the case of vessels owned in one seaport, and whose captains,
mooooo, mo moo mooo mo moooooo moooo mo moo moooooo, moo moooo mooooooo,

officers, and not a few of the men are personally known to each other;
mooooooo, moo moo m moo mo moo moo moo mooooooooo moooo mo mooo moooo;

and consequently, have all sorts of dear domestic things to talk about.
moo mooooooooooo, mooo moo moooo mo mooo mooooooo mooooo mo mooo moooo.




For the long absent ship, the outward-bounder, perhaps, has letters on
Moo moo mooo mooooo mooo, moo moooooo-moooooo, moooooo, moo moooooo mo

board; at any rate, she will be sure to let her have some papers of a
moooo; mo moo mooo, moo mooo mo mooo mo moo moo mooo mooo mooooo mo m

date a year or two later than the last one on her blurred and thumb-worn
mooo m mooo mo moo moooo mooo moo mooo moo mo moo moooooo moo moooo-mooo

files. And in return for that courtesy, the outward-bound ship would
moooo. Moo mo mooooo moo mooo mooooooo, moo moooooo-moooo mooo moooo

receive the latest whaling intelligence from the cruising-ground to
moooooo moo mooooo moooooo mooooooooooo mooo moo mooooooo-mooooo mo

which she may be destined, a thing of the utmost importance to her. And
moooo moo moo mo mooooooo, m moooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooo mo moo. Moo

in degree, all this will hold true concerning whaling vessels crossing
mo mooooo, moo mooo mooo mooo mooo mooooooooo moooooo moooooo mooooooo

each other's track on the cruising-ground itself, even though they
mooo moooo'm moooo mo moo mooooooo-mooooo mooooo, mooo mooooo mooo

are equally long absent from home. For one of them may have received a
moo moooooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo. Moo moo mo mooo moo mooo mooooooo m

transfer of letters from some third, and now far remote vessel; and
mooooooo mo moooooo mooo mooo moooo, moo moo moo mooooo mooooo; moo

some of those letters may be for the people of the ship she now meets.
mooo mo moooo moooooo moo mo moo moo mooooo mo moo mooo moo moo moooo.

Besides, they would exchange the whaling news, and have an agreeable
Moooooo, mooo moooo mooooooo moo moooooo mooo, moo mooo mo moooooooo

chat. For not only would they meet with all the sympathies of sailors,
mooo. Moo moo mooo moooo mooo mooo mooo moo moo mooooooooo mo moooooo,

but likewise with all the peculiar congenialities arising from a common
moo mooooooo mooo moo moo mooooooo mooooooooooooo moooooo mooo m mooooo

pursuit and mutually shared privations and perils.
moooooo moo mooooooo mooooo mooooooooo moo mooooo.




Nor would difference of country make any very essential difference;
Moo moooo mooooooooo mo moooooo mooo moo mooo moooooooo mooooooooo;

that is, so long as both parties speak one language, as is the case
mooo mo, mo mooo mo mooo moooooo moooo moo mooooooo, mo mo moo mooo

with Americans and English. Though, to be sure, from the small number of
mooo Moooooooo moo Moooooo. Mooooo, mo mo mooo, mooo moo moooo mooooo mo

English whalers, such meetings do not very often occur, and when they
Moooooo moooooo, mooo mooooooo mo moo mooo moooo moooo, moo mooo mooo

do occur there is too apt to be a sort of shyness between them; for your
mo moooo moooo mo moo moo mo mo m mooo mo moooooo moooooo mooo; moo mooo

Englishman is rather reserved, and your Yankee, he does not fancy that
Mooooooooo mo mooooo mooooooo, moo mooo Mooooo, mo mooo moo moooo mooo

sort of thing in anybody but himself. Besides, the English whalers
mooo mo moooo mo moooooo moo moooooo. Moooooo, moo Moooooo moooooo

sometimes affect a kind of metropolitan superiority over the American
moooooooo mooooo m mooo mo mooooooooooo moooooooooo mooo moo Mooooooo

whalers; regarding the long, lean Nantucketer, with his nondescript
moooooo; moooooooo moo mooo, mooo Moooooooooo, mooo moo moooooooooo

provincialisms, as a sort of sea-peasant. But where this superiority
mooooooooooooo, mo m mooo mo moo-moooooo. Moo moooo mooo moooooooooo

in the English whalemen does really consist, it would be hard to say,
mo moo Moooooo mooooooo mooo mooooo moooooo, mo moooo mo mooo mo moo,

seeing that the Yankees in one day, collectively, kill more whales than
mooooo mooo moo Moooooo mo moo moo, mooooooooooo, mooo mooo mooooo mooo

all the English, collectively, in ten years. But this is a harmless
moo moo Moooooo, mooooooooooo, mo moo moooo. Moo mooo mo m mooooooo

little foible in the English whale-hunters, which the Nantucketer does
mooooo mooooo mo moo Moooooo moooo-moooooo, moooo moo Moooooooooo mooo

not take much to heart; probably, because he knows that he has a few
moo mooo mooo mo moooo; mooooooo, moooooo mo moooo mooo mo moo m moo

foibles himself.
moooooo moooooo.




So, then, we see that of all ships separately sailing the sea, the
Mo, mooo, mo moo mooo mo moo moooo mooooooooo moooooo moo moo, moo

whalers have most reason to be sociable--and they are so. Whereas, some
moooooo mooo mooo mooooo mo mo mooooooo--moo mooo moo mo. Moooooo, mooo

merchant ships crossing each other's wake in the mid-Atlantic, will
mooooooo moooo mooooooo mooo moooo'm mooo mo moo moo-Mooooooo, mooo

oftentimes pass on without so much as a single word of recognition,
mooooooooo mooo mo moooooo mo mooo mo m mooooo mooo mo moooooooooo,

mutually cutting each other on the high seas, like a brace of dandies in
mooooooo moooooo mooo moooo mo moo mooo mooo, mooo m moooo mo moooooo mo

Broadway; and all the time indulging, perhaps, in finical criticism upon
Mooooooo; moo moo moo mooo moooooooo, moooooo, mo moooooo moooooooo mooo

each other's rig. As for Men-of-War, when they chance to meet at sea,
mooo moooo'm moo. Mo moo Moo-mo-Moo, mooo mooo mooooo mo mooo mo moo,

they first go through such a string of silly bowings and scrapings, such
mooo moooo mo moooooo mooo m mooooo mo moooo moooooo moo moooooooo, mooo

a ducking of ensigns, that there does not seem to be much right-down
m moooooo mo moooooo, mooo moooo mooo moo mooo mo mo mooo moooo-mooo

hearty good-will and brotherly love about it at all. As touching
mooooo mooo-mooo moo moooooooo mooo moooo mo mo moo. Mo mooooooo

Slave-ships meeting, why, they are in such a prodigious hurry, they run
Moooo-moooo moooooo, moo, mooo moo mo mooo m mooooooooo moooo, mooo moo

away from each other as soon as possible. And as for Pirates, when they
mooo mooo mooo moooo mo mooo mo mooooooo. Moo mo moo Moooooo, mooo mooo

chance to cross each other's cross-bones, the first hail is--"How many
mooooo mo moooo mooo moooo'm moooo-moooo, moo moooo mooo mo--"Moo mooo

skulls?"--the same way that whalers hail--"How many barrels?" And that
mooooo?"--moo mooo moo mooo moooooo mooo--"Moo mooo moooooo?" Moo mooo

question once answered, pirates straightway steer apart, for they are
mooooooo mooo mooooooo, moooooo moooooooooo moooo moooo, moo mooo moo

infernal villains on both sides, and don't like to see overmuch of each
mooooooo mooooooo mo mooo moooo, moo moo'm mooo mo moo mooooooo mo mooo

other's villanous likenesses.
moooo'm moooooooo mooooooooo.




But look at the godly, honest, unostentatious, hospitable, sociable,
Moo mooo mo moo moooo, mooooo, mooooooooooooo, mooooooooo, mooooooo,

free-and-easy whaler! What does the whaler do when she meets another
mooo-moo-mooo mooooo! Mooo mooo moo mooooo mo mooo moo moooo moooooo

whaler in any sort of decent weather? She has a "GAM," a thing so
mooooo mo moo mooo mo mooooo moooooo? Moo moo m "MOO," m moooo mo

utterly unknown to all other ships that they never heard of the name
moooooo moooooo mo moo moooo moooo mooo mooo moooo moooo mo moo mooo

even; and if by chance they should hear of it, they only grin at it, and
mooo; moo mo mo mooooo mooo mooooo mooo mo mo, mooo mooo mooo mo mo, moo

repeat gamesome stuff about "spouters" and "blubber-boilers," and such
mooooo mooooooo moooo moooo "mooooooo" moo "moooooo-moooooo," moo mooo

like pretty exclamations. Why it is that all Merchant-seamen, and also
mooo mooooo mooooooooooo. Moo mo mo mooo moo Mooooooo-mooooo, moo mooo

all Pirates and Man-of-War's men, and Slave-ship sailors, cherish such
moo Moooooo moo Moo-mo-Moo'm moo, moo Moooo-mooo moooooo, moooooo mooo

a scornful feeling towards Whale-ships; this is a question it would be
m mooooooo moooooo moooooo Moooo-moooo; mooo mo m mooooooo mo moooo mo

hard to answer. Because, in the case of pirates, say, I should like to
mooo mo mooooo. Moooooo, mo moo mooo mo moooooo, moo, M mooooo mooo mo

know whether that profession of theirs has any peculiar glory about
mooo moooooo mooo mooooooooo mo mooooo moo moo mooooooo moooo moooo

it. It sometimes ends in uncommon elevation, indeed; but only at the
mo. Mo moooooooo mooo mo mooooooo moooooooo, mooooo; moo mooo mo moo

gallows. And besides, when a man is elevated in that odd fashion, he has
moooooo. Moo moooooo, mooo m moo mo mooooooo mo mooo moo moooooo, mo moo

no proper foundation for his superior altitude. Hence, I conclude,
mo mooooo mooooooooo moo moo mooooooo mooooooo. Moooo, M mooooooo,

that in boasting himself to be high lifted above a whaleman, in that
mooo mo mooooooo moooooo mo mo mooo mooooo moooo m mooooooo, mo mooo

assertion the pirate has no solid basis to stand on.
moooooooo moo mooooo moo mo moooo moooo mo moooo mo.




But what is a GAM? You might wear out your index-finger running up and
Moo mooo mo m MOO? Moo moooo mooo moo mooo moooo-mooooo moooooo mo moo

down the columns of dictionaries, and never find the word. Dr. Johnson
mooo moo moooooo mo mooooooooooo, moo moooo mooo moo mooo. Mo. Moooooo

never attained to that erudition; Noah Webster's ark does not hold it.
moooo mooooooo mo mooo moooooooo; Mooo Moooooo'm moo mooo moo mooo mo.

Nevertheless, this same expressive word has now for many years been in
Mooooooooooo, mooo mooo mooooooooo mooo moo moo moo mooo moooo mooo mo

constant use among some fifteen thousand true born Yankees. Certainly,
mooooooo moo moooo mooo moooooo mooooooo mooo mooo Moooooo. Moooooooo,

it needs a definition, and should be incorporated into the Lexicon. With
mo moooo m mooooooooo, moo mooooo mo mooooooooooo mooo moo Moooooo. Mooo

that view, let me learnedly define it.
mooo mooo, moo mo moooooooo mooooo mo.




GAM. NOUN--A SOCIAL MEETING OF TWO (OR MORE) WHALESHIPS, GENERALLY ON A
MOO. MOOO--M MOOOOO MOOOOOO MO MOO (MO MOOO) MOOOOOOOOO, MOOOOOOOO MO M

CRUISING-GROUND; WHEN, AFTER EXCHANGING HAILS, THEY EXCHANGE VISITS BY
MOOOOOOO-MOOOOO; MOOO, MOOOO MOOOOOOOOO MOOOO, MOOO MOOOOOOO MOOOOO MO

BOATS' CREWS; THE TWO CAPTAINS REMAINING, FOR THE TIME, ON BOARD OF ONE
MOOOO' MOOOO; MOO MOO MOOOOOOO MOOOOOOOO, MOO MOO MOOO, MO MOOOO MO MOO

SHIP, AND THE TWO CHIEF MATES ON THE OTHER.
MOOO, MOO MOO MOO MOOOO MOOOO MO MOO MOOOO.




There is another little item about Gamming which must not be forgotten
Moooo mo moooooo mooooo mooo moooo Moooooo moooo mooo moo mo moooooooo

here. All professions have their own little peculiarities of detail; so
mooo. Moo moooooooooo mooo moooo moo mooooo moooooooooooo mo mooooo; mo

has the whale fishery. In a pirate, man-of-war, or slave ship, when
moo moo moooo moooooo. Mo m mooooo, moo-mo-moo, mo moooo mooo, mooo

the captain is rowed anywhere in his boat, he always sits in the stern
moo moooooo mo moooo mooooooo mo moo mooo, mo mooooo mooo mo moo moooo

sheets on a comfortable, sometimes cushioned seat there, and often
mooooo mo m moooooooooo, moooooooo moooooooo mooo moooo, moo moooo

steers himself with a pretty little milliner's tiller decorated with
mooooo moooooo mooo m mooooo mooooo mooooooo'm mooooo moooooooo mooo

gay cords and ribbons. But the whale-boat has no seat astern, no sofa of
moo moooo moo moooooo. Moo moo moooo-mooo moo mo mooo mooooo, mo mooo mo

that sort whatever, and no tiller at all. High times indeed, if whaling
mooo mooo mooooooo, moo mo mooooo mo moo. Mooo moooo mooooo, mo moooooo

captains were wheeled about the water on castors like gouty old aldermen
mooooooo mooo moooooo moooo moo moooo mo moooooo mooo moooo moo mooooooo

in patent chairs. And as for a tiller, the whale-boat never admits of
mo mooooo mooooo. Moo mo moo m mooooo, moo moooo-mooo moooo mooooo mo

any such effeminacy; and therefore as in gamming a complete boat's crew
moo mooo mooooooooo; moo moooooooo mo mo moooooo m mooooooo mooo'm mooo

must leave the ship, and hence as the boat steerer or harpooneer is of
mooo moooo moo mooo, moo moooo mo moo mooo moooooo mo mooooooooo mo mo

the number, that subordinate is the steersman upon the occasion, and
moo mooooo, mooo moooooooooo mo moo moooooooo mooo moo mooooooo, moo

the captain, having no place to sit in, is pulled off to his visit
moo moooooo, mooooo mo moooo mo moo mo, mo mooooo moo mo moo moooo

all standing like a pine tree. And often you will notice that being
moo mooooooo mooo m mooo mooo. Moo moooo moo mooo mooooo mooo moooo

conscious of the eyes of the whole visible world resting on him from
moooooooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooo moooooo moooo moooooo mo moo mooo

the sides of the two ships, this standing captain is all alive to the
moo moooo mo moo moo moooo, mooo mooooooo moooooo mo moo moooo mo moo

importance of sustaining his dignity by maintaining his legs. Nor is
mooooooooo mo mooooooooo moo moooooo mo moooooooooo moo mooo. Moo mo

this any very easy matter; for in his rear is the immense projecting
mooo moo mooo mooo mooooo; moo mo moo mooo mo moo moooooo mooooooooo

steering oar hitting him now and then in the small of his back, the
mooooooo moo moooooo moo moo moo mooo mo moo moooo mo moo mooo, moo

after-oar reciprocating by rapping his knees in front. He is thus
moooo-moo moooooooooooo mo moooooo moo moooo mo moooo. Mo mo mooo

completely wedged before and behind, and can only expand himself
mooooooooo mooooo mooooo moo mooooo, moo moo mooo mooooo moooooo

sideways by settling down on his stretched legs; but a sudden, violent
mooooooo mo mooooooo mooo mo moo moooooooo mooo; moo m mooooo, moooooo

pitch of the boat will often go far to topple him, because length of
moooo mo moo mooo mooo moooo mo moo mo mooooo moo, moooooo mooooo mo

foundation is nothing without corresponding breadth. Merely make a
mooooooooo mo moooooo moooooo moooooooooooo moooooo. Mooooo mooo m

spread angle of two poles, and you cannot stand them up. Then, again,
mooooo moooo mo moo moooo, moo moo mooooo moooo mooo mo. Mooo, moooo,

it would never do in plain sight of the world's riveted eyes, it would
mo moooo moooo mo mo moooo moooo mo moo moooo'm moooooo mooo, mo moooo

never do, I say, for this straddling captain to be seen steadying
moooo mo, M moo, moo mooo mooooooooo moooooo mo mo mooo moooooooo

himself the slightest particle by catching hold of anything with
moooooo moo moooooooo mooooooo mo mooooooo mooo mo mooooooo mooo

his hands; indeed, as token of his entire, buoyant self-command, he
moo moooo; mooooo, mo moooo mo moo mooooo, moooooo mooo-moooooo, mo

generally carries his hands in his trowsers' pockets; but perhaps being
moooooooo moooooo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo' moooooo; moo moooooo moooo

generally very large, heavy hands, he carries them there for ballast.
moooooooo mooo moooo, moooo moooo, mo moooooo mooo moooo moo moooooo.

Nevertheless there have occurred instances, well authenticated ones too,
Mooooooooooo moooo mooo mooooooo moooooooo, mooo moooooooooooo mooo moo,

where the captain has been known for an uncommonly critical moment or
moooo moo moooooo moo mooo moooo moo mo mooooooooo mooooooo mooooo mo

two, in a sudden squall say--to seize hold of the nearest oarsman's
moo, mo m mooooo mooooo moo--mo moooo mooo mo moo moooooo moooooo'm

hair, and hold on there like grim death.
mooo, moo mooo mo moooo mooo mooo moooo.










CHAPTER 54. The Town-Ho's Story.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooo-Mo'm Moooo.







(AS TOLD AT THE GOLDEN INN)
(MO MOOO MO MOO MOOOOO MOO)







The Cape of Good Hope, and all the watery region round about there, is
Moo Mooo mo Mooo Mooo, moo moo moo mooooo mooooo moooo moooo moooo, mo

much like some noted four corners of a great highway, where you meet
mooo mooo mooo moooo mooo moooooo mo m moooo moooooo, moooo moo mooo

more travellers than in any other part.
mooo mooooooooo mooo mo moo moooo mooo.




It was not very long after speaking the Goney that another
Mo moo moo mooo mooo moooo mooooooo moo Moooo mooo moooooo

homeward-bound whaleman, the Town-Ho,* was encountered. She was manned
mooooooo-moooo mooooooo, moo Mooo-Mo,* moo moooooooooo. Moo moo mooooo

almost wholly by Polynesians. In the short gam that ensued she gave
mooooo mooooo mo Moooooooooo. Mo moo moooo moo mooo mooooo moo mooo

us strong news of Moby Dick. To some the general interest in the White
mo mooooo mooo mo Mooo Mooo. Mo mooo moo moooooo mooooooo mo moo Moooo

Whale was now wildly heightened by a circumstance of the Town-Ho's
Moooo moo moo mooooo mooooooooo mo m mooooooooooo mo moo Mooo-Mo'm

story, which seemed obscurely to involve with the whale a certain
moooo, moooo mooooo moooooooo mo moooooo mooo moo moooo m moooooo

wondrous, inverted visitation of one of those so called judgments of God
mooooooo, mooooooo mooooooooo mo moo mo moooo mo mooooo moooooooo mo Moo

which at times are said to overtake some men. This latter circumstance,
moooo mo moooo moo mooo mo mooooooo mooo moo. Mooo mooooo mooooooooooo,

with its own particular accompaniments, forming what may be called the
mooo moo moo mooooooooo mooooooooooooo, moooooo mooo moo mo mooooo moo

secret part of the tragedy about to be narrated, never reached the ears
mooooo mooo mo moo moooooo moooo mo mo mooooooo, moooo moooooo moo mooo

of Captain Ahab or his mates. For that secret part of the story was
mo Moooooo Mooo mo moo moooo. Moo mooo mooooo mooo mo moo moooo moo

unknown to the captain of the Town-Ho himself. It was the private
moooooo mo moo moooooo mo moo Mooo-Mo moooooo. Mo moo moo moooooo

property of three confederate white seamen of that ship, one of whom, it
mooooooo mo moooo moooooooooo moooo mooooo mo mooo mooo, moo mo mooo, mo

seems, communicated it to Tashtego with Romish injunctions of secrecy,
moooo, mooooooooooo mo mo Mooooooo mooo Mooooo moooooooooo mo moooooo,

but the following night Tashtego rambled in his sleep, and revealed
moo moo moooooooo moooo Mooooooo moooooo mo moo moooo, moo mooooooo

so much of it in that way, that when he was wakened he could not well
mo mooo mo mo mo mooo moo, mooo mooo mo moo moooooo mo moooo moo mooo

withhold the rest. Nevertheless, so potent an influence did this thing
mooooooo moo mooo. Mooooooooooo, mo mooooo mo moooooooo moo mooo moooo

have on those seamen in the Pequod who came to the full knowledge of
mooo mo moooo mooooo mo moo Mooooo moo mooo mo moo mooo moooooooo mo

it, and by such a strange delicacy, to call it so, were they governed in
mo, moo mo mooo m moooooo mooooooo, mo mooo mo mo, mooo mooo mooooooo mo

this matter, that they kept the secret among themselves so that it never
mooo mooooo, mooo mooo mooo moo mooooo moooo mooooooooo mo mooo mo moooo

transpired abaft the Pequod's main-mast. Interweaving in its proper
mooooooooo moooo moo Mooooo'm mooo-mooo. Mooooooooooo mo moo mooooo

place this darker thread with the story as publicly narrated on the
moooo mooo mooooo mooooo mooo moo moooo mo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo

ship, the whole of this strange affair I now proceed to put on lasting
mooo, moo moooo mo mooo moooooo mooooo M moo moooooo mo moo mo moooooo

record.
mooooo.







*The ancient whale-cry upon first sighting a whale from the mast-head,
*Moo moooooo moooo-moo mooo moooo mooooooo m moooo mooo moo mooo-mooo,

still used by whalemen in hunting the famous Gallipagos terrapin.
moooo mooo mo mooooooo mo moooooo moo mooooo Mooooooooo mooooooo.







For my humor's sake, I shall preserve the style in which I once narrated
Moo mo moooo'm mooo, M moooo mooooooo moo moooo mo moooo M mooo mooooooo

it at Lima, to a lounging circle of my Spanish friends, one saint's eve,
mo mo Mooo, mo m mooooooo mooooo mo mo Moooooo moooooo, moo moooo'm moo,

smoking upon the thick-gilt tiled piazza of the Golden Inn. Of those
moooooo mooo moo moooo-mooo moooo mooooo mo moo Mooooo Moo. Mo moooo

fine cavaliers, the young Dons, Pedro and Sebastian, were on the closer
mooo moooooooo, moo moooo Mooo, Moooo moo Moooooooo, mooo mo moo mooooo

terms with me; and hence the interluding questions they occasionally
moooo mooo mo; moo moooo moo moooooooooo moooooooo mooo mooooooooooo

put, and which are duly answered at the time.
moo, moo moooo moo mooo mooooooo mo moo mooo.




"Some two years prior to my first learning the events which I am about
"Mooo moo moooo moooo mo mo moooo mooooooo moo mooooo moooo M mo moooo

rehearsing to you, gentlemen, the Town-Ho, Sperm Whaler of Nantucket,
mooooooooo mo moo, moooooooo, moo Mooo-Mo, Moooo Mooooo mo Moooooooo,

was cruising in your Pacific here, not very many days' sail eastward
moo mooooooo mo mooo Moooooo mooo, moo mooo mooo mooo' mooo mooooooo

from the eaves of this good Golden Inn. She was somewhere to the
mooo moo moooo mo mooo mooo Mooooo Moo. Moo moo moooooooo mo moo

northward of the Line. One morning upon handling the pumps, according to
moooooooo mo moo Mooo. Moo moooooo mooo mooooooo moo moooo, moooooooo mo

daily usage, it was observed that she made more water in her hold than
moooo moooo, mo moo mooooooo mooo moo mooo mooo moooo mo moo mooo mooo

common. They supposed a sword-fish had stabbed her, gentlemen. But the
mooooo. Mooo mooooooo m moooo-mooo moo moooooo moo, moooooooo. Moo moo

captain, having some unusual reason for believing that rare good luck
moooooo, mooooo mooo moooooo mooooo moo moooooooo mooo mooo mooo mooo

awaited him in those latitudes; and therefore being very averse to quit
moooooo moo mo moooo moooooooo; moo moooooooo moooo mooo mooooo mo mooo

them, and the leak not being then considered at all dangerous, though,
mooo, moo moo mooo moo moooo mooo mooooooooo mo moo moooooooo, mooooo,

indeed, they could not find it after searching the hold as low down
mooooo, mooo moooo moo mooo mo moooo moooooooo moo mooo mo moo mooo

as was possible in rather heavy weather, the ship still continued her
mo moo mooooooo mo mooooo moooo moooooo, moo mooo moooo moooooooo moo

cruisings, the mariners working at the pumps at wide and easy intervals;
moooooooo, moo mooooooo moooooo mo moo moooo mo mooo moo mooo moooooooo;

but no good luck came; more days went by, and not only was the leak yet
moo mo mooo mooo mooo; mooo mooo mooo mo, moo moo mooo moo moo mooo moo

undiscovered, but it sensibly increased. So much so, that now taking
mooooooooooo, moo mo mooooooo moooooooo. Mo mooo mo, mooo moo mooooo

some alarm, the captain, making all sail, stood away for the nearest
mooo moooo, moo moooooo, mooooo moo mooo, moooo mooo moo moo moooooo

harbor among the islands, there to have his hull hove out and repaired.
mooooo moooo moo moooooo, moooo mo mooo moo mooo mooo moo moo mooooooo.




"Though no small passage was before her, yet, if the commonest chance
"Mooooo mo moooo moooooo moo mooooo moo, moo, mo moo moooooooo mooooo

favoured, he did not at all fear that his ship would founder by the way,
mooooooo, mo moo moo mo moo mooo mooo moo mooo moooo moooooo mo moo moo,

because his pumps were of the best, and being periodically relieved at
moooooo moo moooo mooo mo moo mooo, moo moooo mooooooooooo mooooooo mo

them, those six-and-thirty men of his could easily keep the ship free;
mooo, moooo moo-moo-mooooo moo mo moo moooo mooooo mooo moo mooo mooo;

never mind if the leak should double on her. In truth, well nigh the
moooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo mooooo mo moo. Mo moooo, mooo mooo moo

whole of this passage being attended by very prosperous breezes, the
moooo mo mooo moooooo moooo mooooooo mo mooo mooooooooo moooooo, moo

Town-Ho had all but certainly arrived in perfect safety at her port
Mooo-Mo moo moo moo moooooooo moooooo mo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooo

without the occurrence of the least fatality, had it not been for the
moooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo, moo mo moo mooo moo moo

brutal overbearing of Radney, the mate, a Vineyarder, and the bitterly
mooooo moooooooooo mo Mooooo, moo mooo, m Mooooooooo, moo moo mooooooo

provoked vengeance of Steelkilt, a Lakeman and desperado from Buffalo.
mooooooo moooooooo mo Moooooooo, m Moooooo moo moooooooo mooo Moooooo.




"'Lakeman!--Buffalo! Pray, what is a Lakeman, and where is Buffalo?'
"'Moooooo!--Moooooo! Mooo, mooo mo m Moooooo, moo moooo mo Moooooo?'

said Don Sebastian, rising in his swinging mat of grass.
mooo Moo Moooooooo, mooooo mo moo mooooooo moo mo moooo.




"On the eastern shore of our Lake Erie, Don; but--I crave your
"Mo moo moooooo moooo mo moo Mooo Mooo, Moo; moo--M moooo mooo

courtesy--may be, you shall soon hear further of all that. Now,
mooooooo--moo mo, moo moooo mooo mooo moooooo mo moo mooo. Moo,

gentlemen, in square-sail brigs and three-masted ships, well-nigh as
moooooooo, mo mooooo-mooo moooo moo moooo-mooooo moooo, mooo-mooo mo

large and stout as any that ever sailed out of your old Callao to far
moooo moo moooo mo moo mooo mooo mooooo moo mo mooo moo Mooooo mo moo

Manilla; this Lakeman, in the land-locked heart of our America, had yet
Moooooo; mooo Moooooo, mo moo mooo-mooooo moooo mo moo Moooooo, moo moo

been nurtured by all those agrarian freebooting impressions popularly
mooo mooooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo moooooooooo moooooooooo moooooooo

connected with the open ocean. For in their interflowing aggregate,
moooooooo mooo moo mooo moooo. Moo mo moooo mooooooooooo moooooooo,

those grand fresh-water seas of ours,--Erie, and Ontario, and Huron, and
moooo moooo moooo-moooo mooo mo mooo,--Mooo, moo Moooooo, moo Moooo, moo

Superior, and Michigan,--possess an ocean-like expansiveness, with many
Mooooooo, moo Mooooooo,--moooooo mo moooo-mooo moooooooooooo, mooo mooo

of the ocean's noblest traits; with many of its rimmed varieties of
mo moo moooo'm moooooo mooooo; mooo mooo mo moo mooooo moooooooo mo

races and of climes. They contain round archipelagoes of romantic isles,
moooo moo mo mooooo. Mooo moooooo moooo moooooooooooo mo mooooooo moooo,

even as the Polynesian waters do; in large part, are shored by two great
mooo mo moo Mooooooooo mooooo mo; mo moooo mooo, moo mooooo mo moo moooo

contrasting nations, as the Atlantic is; they furnish long maritime
moooooooooo moooooo, mo moo Mooooooo mo; mooo moooooo mooo mooooooo

approaches to our numerous territorial colonies from the East, dotted
mooooooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooooo mooooooo mooo moo Mooo, mooooo

all round their banks; here and there are frowned upon by batteries,
moo moooo moooo moooo; mooo moo moooo moo moooooo mooo mo moooooooo,

and by the goat-like craggy guns of lofty Mackinaw; they have heard the
moo mo moo mooo-mooo mooooo mooo mo moooo Mooooooo; mooo mooo moooo moo

fleet thunderings of naval victories; at intervals, they yield their
moooo moooooooooo mo moooo moooooooo; mo moooooooo, mooo moooo moooo

beaches to wild barbarians, whose red painted faces flash from out
moooooo mo mooo mooooooooo, moooo moo moooooo moooo moooo mooo moo

their peltry wigwams; for leagues and leagues are flanked by ancient
moooo mooooo moooooo; moo moooooo moo moooooo moo moooooo mo moooooo

and unentered forests, where the gaunt pines stand like serried lines
moo moooooooo moooooo, moooo moo moooo moooo moooo mooo moooooo moooo

of kings in Gothic genealogies; those same woods harboring wild Afric
mo moooo mo Mooooo moooooooooo; moooo mooo moooo moooooooo mooo Moooo

beasts of prey, and silken creatures whose exported furs give robes
mooooo mo mooo, moo mooooo moooooooo moooo mooooooo mooo mooo moooo

to Tartar Emperors; they mirror the paved capitals of Buffalo and
mo Mooooo Mooooooo; mooo mooooo moo moooo mooooooo mo Moooooo moo

Cleveland, as well as Winnebago villages; they float alike the
Moooooooo, mo mooo mo Moooooooo mooooooo; mooo moooo moooo moo

full-rigged merchant ship, the armed cruiser of the State, the steamer,
mooo-mooooo mooooooo mooo, moo moooo moooooo mo moo Moooo, moo moooooo,

and the beech canoe; they are swept by Borean and dismasting blasts as
moo moo moooo moooo; mooo moo moooo mo Mooooo moo mooooooooo mooooo mo

direful as any that lash the salted wave; they know what shipwrecks are,
moooooo mo moo mooo mooo moo mooooo mooo; mooo mooo mooo mooooooooo moo,

for out of sight of land, however inland, they have drowned full many
moo moo mo moooo mo mooo, moooooo mooooo, mooo mooo moooooo mooo mooo

a midnight ship with all its shrieking crew. Thus, gentlemen, though
m mooooooo mooo mooo moo moo moooooooo mooo. Mooo, moooooooo, mooooo

an inlander, Steelkilt was wild-ocean born, and wild-ocean nurtured;
mo mooooooo, Moooooooo moo mooo-moooo mooo, moo mooo-moooo mooooooo;

as much of an audacious mariner as any. And for Radney, though in his
mo mooo mo mo moooooooo moooooo mo moo. Moo moo Mooooo, mooooo mo moo

infancy he may have laid him down on the lone Nantucket beach, to nurse
moooooo mo moo mooo mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo Moooooooo moooo, mo moooo

at his maternal sea; though in after life he had long followed our
mo moo mooooooo moo; mooooo mo moooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooooo moo

austere Atlantic and your contemplative Pacific; yet was he quite as
moooooo Mooooooo moo mooo moooooooooooo Moooooo; moo moo mo moooo mo

vengeful and full of social quarrel as the backwoods seaman, fresh
mooooooo moo mooo mo mooooo moooooo mo moo moooooooo mooooo, moooo

from the latitudes of buck-horn handled bowie-knives. Yet was this
mooo moo moooooooo mo mooo-mooo moooooo moooo-mooooo. Moo moo mooo

Nantucketer a man with some good-hearted traits; and this Lakeman, a
Moooooooooo m moo mooo mooo mooo-moooooo mooooo; moo mooo Moooooo, m

mariner, who though a sort of devil indeed, might yet by inflexible
moooooo, moo mooooo m mooo mo moooo mooooo, moooo moo mo mooooooooo

firmness, only tempered by that common decency of human recognition
mooooooo, mooo mooooooo mo mooo mooooo moooooo mo moooo moooooooooo

which is the meanest slave's right; thus treated, this Steelkilt had
moooo mo moo moooooo moooo'm moooo; mooo moooooo, mooo Moooooooo moo

long been retained harmless and docile. At all events, he had proved
mooo mooo mooooooo mooooooo moo mooooo. Mo moo mooooo, mo moo mooooo

so thus far; but Radney was doomed and made mad, and Steelkilt--but,
mo mooo moo; moo Mooooo moo mooooo moo mooo moo, moo Moooooooo--moo,

gentlemen, you shall hear.
moooooooo, moo moooo mooo.




"It was not more than a day or two at the furthest after pointing
"Mo moo moo mooo mooo m moo mo moo mo moo mooooooo moooo mooooooo

her prow for her island haven, that the Town-Ho's leak seemed again
moo mooo moo moo mooooo moooo, mooo moo Mooo-Mo'm mooo mooooo moooo

increasing, but only so as to require an hour or more at the pumps
mooooooooo, moo mooo mo mo mo moooooo mo mooo mo mooo mo moo moooo

every day. You must know that in a settled and civilized ocean like our
moooo moo. Moo mooo mooo mooo mo m moooooo moo moooooooo moooo mooo moo

Atlantic, for example, some skippers think little of pumping their whole
Mooooooo, moo moooooo, mooo mooooooo moooo mooooo mo moooooo moooo moooo

way across it; though of a still, sleepy night, should the officer of
moo mooooo mo; mooooo mo m moooo, mooooo moooo, mooooo moo moooooo mo

the deck happen to forget his duty in that respect, the probability
moo mooo mooooo mo mooooo moo mooo mo mooo moooooo, moo moooooooooo

would be that he and his shipmates would never again remember it, on
moooo mo mooo mo moo moo moooooooo moooo moooo moooo mooooooo mo, mo

account of all hands gently subsiding to the bottom. Nor in the
moooooo mo moo moooo mooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo. Moo mo moo

solitary and savage seas far from you to the westward, gentlemen, is it
mooooooo moo mooooo mooo moo mooo moo mo moo mooooooo, moooooooo, mo mo

altogether unusual for ships to keep clanging at their pump-handles in
mooooooooo moooooo moo moooo mo mooo mooooooo mo moooo mooo-moooooo mo

full chorus even for a voyage of considerable length; that is, if it lie
mooo mooooo mooo moo m mooooo mo mooooooooooo mooooo; mooo mo, mo mo moo

along a tolerably accessible coast, or if any other reasonable retreat
moooo m moooooooo mooooooooo moooo, mo mo moo moooo mooooooooo moooooo

is afforded them. It is only when a leaky vessel is in some very out of
mo mooooooo mooo. Mo mo mooo mooo m moooo mooooo mo mo mooo mooo moo mo

the way part of those waters, some really landless latitude, that her
moo moo mooo mo moooo mooooo, mooo mooooo mooooooo mooooooo, mooo moo

captain begins to feel a little anxious.
moooooo mooooo mo mooo m mooooo moooooo.




"Much this way had it been with the Town-Ho; so when her leak was found
"Mooo mooo moo moo mo mooo mooo moo Mooo-Mo; mo mooo moo mooo moo moooo

gaining once more, there was in truth some small concern manifested by
moooooo mooo mooo, moooo moo mo moooo mooo moooo moooooo mooooooooo mo

several of her company; especially by Radney the mate. He commanded
moooooo mo moo moooooo; mooooooooo mo Mooooo moo mooo. Mo moooooooo

the upper sails to be well hoisted, sheeted home anew, and every way
moo moooo moooo mo mo mooo moooooo, moooooo mooo mooo, moo moooo moo

expanded to the breeze. Now this Radney, I suppose, was as little of a
mooooooo mo moo mooooo. Moo mooo Mooooo, M moooooo, moo mo mooooo mo m

coward, and as little inclined to any sort of nervous apprehensiveness
mooooo, moo mo mooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo mo moooooo mooooooooooooooo

touching his own person as any fearless, unthinking creature on land or
mooooooo moo moo mooooo mo moo mooooooo, mooooooooo mooooooo mo mooo mo

on sea that you can conveniently imagine, gentlemen. Therefore when
mo moo mooo moo moo mooooooooooo moooooo, moooooooo. Moooooooo mooo

he betrayed this solicitude about the safety of the ship, some of the
mo mooooooo mooo mooooooooo moooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo, mooo mo moo

seamen declared that it was only on account of his being a part owner in
mooooo mooooooo mooo mo moo mooo mo moooooo mo moo moooo m mooo moooo mo

her. So when they were working that evening at the pumps, there was on
moo. Mo mooo mooo mooo moooooo mooo moooooo mo moo moooo, moooo moo mo

this head no small gamesomeness slily going on among them, as they stood
mooo mooo mo moooo mooooooooooo moooo moooo mo moooo mooo, mo mooo moooo

with their feet continually overflowed by the rippling clear water;
mooo moooo mooo moooooooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooooo moooo moooo;

clear as any mountain spring, gentlemen--that bubbling from the pumps
moooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo, moooooooo--mooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo

ran across the deck, and poured itself out in steady spouts at the lee
moo mooooo moo mooo, moo mooooo mooooo moo mo mooooo mooooo mo moo moo

scupper-holes.
moooooo-moooo.




"Now, as you well know, it is not seldom the case in this conventional
"Moo, mo moo mooo mooo, mo mo moo mooooo moo mooo mo mooo mooooooooooo

world of ours--watery or otherwise; that when a person placed in command
moooo mo mooo--mooooo mo moooooooo; mooo mooo m mooooo mooooo mo moooooo

over his fellow-men finds one of them to be very significantly his
mooo moo mooooo-moo moooo moo mo mooo mo mo mooo moooooooooooo moo

superior in general pride of manhood, straightway against that man he
mooooooo mo moooooo moooo mo moooooo, moooooooooo moooooo mooo moo mo

conceives an unconquerable dislike and bitterness; and if he have a
moooooooo mo moooooooooooo moooooo moo mooooooooo; moo mo mo mooo m

chance he will pull down and pulverize that subaltern's tower, and
mooooo mo mooo mooo mooo moo moooooooo mooo moooooooo'm moooo, moo

make a little heap of dust of it. Be this conceit of mine as it may,
mooo m mooooo mooo mo mooo mo mo. Mo mooo moooooo mo mooo mo mo moo,

gentlemen, at all events Steelkilt was a tall and noble animal with a
moooooooo, mo moo mooooo Moooooooo moo m mooo moo moooo mooooo mooo m

head like a Roman, and a flowing golden beard like the tasseled housings
mooo mooo m Moooo, moo m moooooo mooooo moooo mooo moo mooooooo mooooooo

of your last viceroy's snorting charger; and a brain, and a heart, and
mo mooo mooo moooooo'm mooooooo moooooo; moo m moooo, moo m moooo, moo

a soul in him, gentlemen, which had made Steelkilt Charlemagne, had he
m mooo mo moo, moooooooo, moooo moo mooo Moooooooo Moooooooooo, moo mo

been born son to Charlemagne's father. But Radney, the mate, was ugly
mooo mooo moo mo Moooooooooo'm mooooo. Moo Mooooo, moo mooo, moo mooo

as a mule; yet as hardy, as stubborn, as malicious. He did not love
mo m mooo; moo mo moooo, mo mooooooo, mo moooooooo. Mo moo moo mooo

Steelkilt, and Steelkilt knew it.
Moooooooo, moo Moooooooo mooo mo.




"Espying the mate drawing near as he was toiling at the pump with the
"Moooooo moo mooo moooooo mooo mo mo moo moooooo mo moo mooo mooo moo

rest, the Lakeman affected not to notice him, but unawed, went on with

moo moo mooooooooo.




"'Aye, aye, my merry lads, it's a lively leak this; hold a cannikin, one
"'Moo, moo, mo moooo mooo, mo'm m mooooo mooo mooo; mooo m mooooooo, moo

of ye, and let's have a taste. By the Lord, it's worth bottling! I tell
mo mo, moo moo'm mooo m moooo. Mo moo Mooo, mo'm moooo mooooooo! M mooo

ye what, men, old Rad's investment must go for it! he had best cut away
mo mooo, moo, moo Moo'm mooooooooo mooo mo moo mo! mo moo mooo moo mooo

his part of the hull and tow it home. The fact is, boys, that sword-fish
moo mooo mo moo mooo moo moo mo mooo. Moo mooo mo, mooo, mooo moooo-mooo

only began the job; he's come back again with a gang of ship-carpenters,
mooo moooo moo moo; mo'm mooo mooo moooo mooo m mooo mo mooo-mooooooooo,

saw-fish, and file-fish, and what not; and the whole posse of 'em
moo-mooo, moo mooo-mooo, moo mooo moo; moo moo moooo moooo mo 'mo

are now hard at work cutting and slashing at the bottom; making
moo moo mooo mo mooo moooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooooo; mooooo

improvements, I suppose. If old Rad were here now, I'd tell him to jump
mooooooooooo, M moooooo. Mo moo Moo mooo mooo moo, M'm mooo moo mo mooo

overboard and scatter 'em. They're playing the devil with his estate, I
moooooooo moo moooooo 'mo. Mooo'mo moooooo moo moooo mooo moo mooooo, M

can tell him. But he's a simple old soul,--Rad, and a beauty too. Boys,
moo mooo moo. Moo mo'm m mooooo moo mooo,--Moo, moo m mooooo moo. Mooo,

they say the rest of his property is invested in looking-glasses. I
mooo moo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo mo mooooooo mo moooooo-moooooo. M

wonder if he'd give a poor devil like me the model of his nose.'
mooooo mo mo'm mooo m mooo moooo mooo mo moo moooo mo moo mooo.'




"'Damn your eyes! what's that pump stopping for?' roared Radney,
"'Mooo mooo mooo! mooo'm mooo mooo mooooooo moo?' mooooo Mooooo,

pretending not to have heard the sailors' talk. 'Thunder away at it!'
mooooooooo moo mo mooo moooo moo moooooo' mooo. 'Moooooo mooo mo mo!'




"'Aye, aye, sir,' said Steelkilt, merry as a cricket. 'Lively, boys,
"'Moo, moo, moo,' mooo Moooooooo, moooo mo m moooooo. 'Mooooo, mooo,

lively, now!' And with that the pump clanged like fifty fire-engines;
mooooo, moo!' Moo mooo mooo moo mooo moooooo mooo moooo mooo-moooooo;

moo moo mooooo moooo mooo moo mo mo, moo moo mooo mooo mooooooo moooooo

of the lungs was heard which denotes the fullest tension of life's
mo moo moooo moo moooo moooo moooooo moo moooooo moooooo mo mooo'm

utmost energies.
mooooo mooooooo.




"Quitting the pump at last, with the rest of his band, the Lakeman went
"Mooooooo moo mooo mo mooo, mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo, moo Moooooo mooo

forward all panting, and sat himself down on the windlass; his face
moooooo moo moooooo, moo moo moooooo mooo mo moo mooooooo; moo mooo

to run at large.
mo moo mo moooo.




"Now, gentlemen, sweeping a ship's deck at sea is a piece of household
"Moo, moooooooo, mooooooo m mooo'm mooo mo moo mo m moooo mo moooooooo

work which in all times but raging gales is regularly attended to every
mooo moooo mo moo moooo moo mooooo moooo mo moooooooo mooooooo mo moooo

evening; it has been known to be done in the case of ships actually
moooooo; mo moo mooo moooo mo mo mooo mo moo mooo mo moooo mooooooo

foundering at the time. Such, gentlemen, is the inflexibility of
mooooooooo mo moo mooo. Mooo, moooooooo, mo moo moooooooooooo mo

sea-usages and the instinctive love of neatness in seamen; some of whom
moo-mooooo moo moo moooooooooo mooo mo mooooooo mo mooooo; mooo mo mooo

would not willingly drown without first washing their faces. But in all
moooo moo moooooooo moooo moooooo moooo moooooo moooo moooo. Moo mo moo

vessels this broom business is the prescriptive province of the boys,
moooooo mooo moooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo,

if boys there be aboard. Besides, it was the stronger men in the Town-Ho
mo mooo moooo mo mooooo. Moooooo, mo moo moo mooooooo moo mo moo Mooo-Mo

that had been divided into gangs, taking turns at the pumps; and being
mooo moo mooo moooooo mooo moooo, mooooo moooo mo moo moooo; moo moooo

the most athletic seaman of them all, Steelkilt had been regularly

assigned captain of one of the gangs; consequently he should have

mooo moooo mooo moo moooooo mooooooo moo moooooooo mooo moooo mooooooo

between the two men.
moooooo moo moo moo.




"But there was more than this: the order about the shovel was almost as
"Moo moooo moo mooo mooo mooo: moo moooo moooo moo mooooo moo mooooo mo

plainly meant to sting and insult Steelkilt, as though Radney had spat
moooooo moooo mo moooo moo mooooo Moooooooo, mo mooooo Mooooo moo mooo

in his face. Any man who has gone sailor in a whale-ship will
mo moo mooo. Moo moo moo moo mooo mooooo mo m moooo-mooo mooo

mooooooooooo mooo moo mooo moooooo moo moooooo. Moo mo mo moo moooo moo

m mooooo, moo mo mo moooooooooo mooooo mooo moo mooo'm moooooooo moo moo

moooooo moooooo, moooooooo, moooo mooo Moooooooo.




"Therefore, in his ordinary tone, only a little broken by the bodily
"Moooooooo, mo moo mooooooo mooo, mooo m mooooo mooooo mo moo mooooo

mooooooo mooooo'm mooo mooooo moooo mo moo mooooooo mooo m mooo mooo mo.




"Heated and irritated as he was by his spasmodic toil at the pumps, for
"Mooooo moo moooooooo mo mo moo mo moo moooooooo mooo mo moo moooo, moo

all his first nameless feeling of forbearance the sweating Steelkilt
moo moo moooo mooooooo moooooo mo moooooooooo moo mooooooo Moooooooo

could but ill brook this bearing in the mate; but somehow still

mooooo mooooo m moo mooooo mo moo mooo, moooooooo mooooooooo moo mo mo

his bidding.
moo moooooo.




"Steelkilt rose, and slowly retreating round the windlass, steadily
"Moooooooo mooo, moo mooooo mooooooooo moooo moo mooooooo, mooooooo

followed by the mate with his menacing hammer, deliberately repeated his
mooooooo mo moo mooo mooo moo mooooooo mooooo, mooooooooooo mooooooo moo

moooooo mooo mo mooooo moo moo moooooo moo mooooooooo moo; moo mo moo mo

mo moooooo. Moo mo mooo moo moo moo mooo mooo mooooo moooo moo mooooooo;

moo moooooo moo mooo moooo mo moo moooooo:




"'Mr. Radney, I will not obey you. Take that hammer away, or look to
"'Mo. Mooooo, M mooo moo mooo moo. Mooo mooo mooooo mooo, mo mooo mo

yourself.' But the predestinated mate coming still closer to him, where
mooooooo.' Moo moo moooooooooooo mooo mooooo moooo mooooo mo moo, moooo

the Lakeman stood fixed, now shook the heavy hammer within an inch of
moo Moooooo moooo moooo, moo moooo moo moooo mooooo mooooo mo mooo mo

his teeth; meanwhile repeating a string of insufferable maledictions.
moo moooo; moooooooo moooooooo m mooooo mo mooooooooooo mooooooooooo.

Retreating not the thousandth part of an inch; stabbing him in the eye
Mooooooooo moo moo mooooooooo mooo mo mo mooo; mooooooo moo mo moo moo

with the unflinching poniard of his glance, Steelkilt, clenching
mooo moo moooooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo, Moooooooo, moooooooo

mooooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo moo mooooo moo moooo mo (Moooooooo) moooo

murder him. But, gentlemen, the fool had been branded for the slaughter
mooooo moo. Moo, moooooooo, moo mooo moo mooo moooooo moo moo moooooooo

by the gods. Immediately the hammer touched the cheek; the next instant
mo moo mooo. Moooooooooo moo mooooo moooooo moo moooo; moo mooo moooooo

moo moooo moo mo moo mooo moo moooo mo moo mooo; mo mooo mo moo moooo
