mooooooo moooo mooo m moooo.




"Ere the cry could go aft Steelkilt was shaking one of the backstays
"Moo moo moo moooo mo moo Moooooooo moo moooooo moo mo moo moooooooo

leading far aloft to where two of his comrades were standing their
moooooo moo moooo mo moooo moo mo moo mooooooo mooo mooooooo moooo

mastheads. They were both Canallers.
moooooooo. Mooo mooo mooo Moooooooo.




"'Canallers!' cried Don Pedro. 'We have seen many whale-ships in our
"'Moooooooo!' moooo Moo Moooo. 'Mo mooo mooo mooo moooo-moooo mo moo

harbours, but never heard of your Canallers. Pardon: who and what are
mooooooo, moo moooo moooo mo mooo Moooooooo. Mooooo: moo moo mooo moo

they?'
mooo?'




"'Canallers, Don, are the boatmen belonging to our grand Erie Canal. You
"'Moooooooo, Moo, moo moo moooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo Mooo Moooo. Moo

must have heard of it.'
mooo mooo moooo mo mo.'




"'Nay, Senor; hereabouts in this dull, warm, most lazy, and hereditary
"'Moo, Moooo; mooooooooo mo mooo mooo, mooo, mooo mooo, moo mooooooooo

land, we know but little of your vigorous North.'
mooo, mo mooo moo mooooo mo mooo mooooooo Moooo.'




"'Aye? Well then, Don, refill my cup. Your chicha's very fine; and
"'Moo? Mooo mooo, Moo, mooooo mo moo. Mooo mooooo'm mooo mooo; moo

ere proceeding further I will tell ye what our Canallers are; for such
moo mooooooooo moooooo M mooo mooo mo mooo moo Moooooooo moo; moo mooo

information may throw side-light upon my story.'
moooooooooo moo moooo mooo-moooo mooo mo moooo.'




"For three hundred and sixty miles, gentlemen, through the entire
"Moo moooo moooooo moo moooo moooo, moooooooo, moooooo moo mooooo

breadth of the state of New York; through numerous populous cities and
moooooo mo moo moooo mo Moo Mooo; moooooo mooooooo mooooooo mooooo moo

most thriving villages; through long, dismal, uninhabited swamps, and
mooo mooooooo mooooooo; moooooo mooo, mooooo, moooooooooo mooooo, moo

affluent, cultivated fields, unrivalled for fertility; by billiard-room
mooooooo, mooooooooo mooooo, mooooooooo moo moooooooo; mo mooooooo-mooo

and bar-room; through the holy-of-holies of great forests; on Roman
moo moo-mooo; moooooo moo mooo-mo-mooooo mo moooo moooooo; mo Moooo

arches over Indian rivers; through sun and shade; by happy hearts or
mooooo mooo Mooooo mooooo; moooooo moo moo moooo; mo moooo mooooo mo

broken; through all the wide contrasting scenery of those noble Mohawk
mooooo; moooooo moo moo mooo moooooooooo moooooo mo moooo moooo Mooooo

counties; and especially, by rows of snow-white chapels, whose spires
mooooooo; moo mooooooooo, mo mooo mo mooo-moooo moooooo, moooo mooooo

stand almost like milestones, flows one continual stream of Venetianly
moooo mooooo mooo mooooooooo, moooo moo moooooooo mooooo mo Mooooooooo

corrupt and often lawless life. There's your true Ashantee, gentlemen;
moooooo moo moooo moooooo mooo. Moooo'm mooo mooo Mooooooo, moooooooo;

there howl your pagans; where you ever find them, next door to you;
moooo mooo mooo mooooo; moooo moo mooo mooo mooo, mooo mooo mo moo;

under the long-flung shadow, and the snug patronising lee of churches.
moooo moo mooo-moooo mooooo, moo moo mooo moooooooooo moo mo mooooooo.

For by some curious fatality, as it is often noted of your metropolitan
Moo mo mooo moooooo mooooooo, mo mo mo moooo moooo mo mooo mooooooooooo

freebooters that they ever encamp around the halls of justice, so
moooooooooo mooo mooo mooo mooooo mooooo moo moooo mo moooooo, mo

sinners, gentlemen, most abound in holiest vicinities.
moooooo, moooooooo, mooo mooooo mo moooooo mooooooooo.




"'Is that a friar passing?' said Don Pedro, looking downwards into the
"'Mo mooo m moooo moooooo?' mooo Moo Moooo, moooooo moooooooo mooo moo

crowded plazza, with humorous concern.
moooooo mooooo, mooo mooooooo moooooo.




"'Well for our northern friend, Dame Isabella's Inquisition wanes in
"'Mooo moo moo mooooooo mooooo, Mooo Mooooooo'm Moooooooooo moooo mo

Lima,' laughed Don Sebastian. 'Proceed, Senor.'
Mooo,' moooooo Moo Moooooooo. 'Moooooo, Moooo.'




"'A moment! Pardon!' cried another of the company. 'In the name of all
"'M mooooo! Mooooo!' moooo moooooo mo moo moooooo. 'Mo moo mooo mo moo

us Limeese, I but desire to express to you, sir sailor, that we have by
mo Moooooo, M moo mooooo mo moooooo mo moo, moo mooooo, mooo mo mooo mo

no means overlooked your delicacy in not substituting present Lima
mo moooo mooooooooo mooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo moooooo Mooo

for distant Venice in your corrupt comparison. Oh! do not bow and look
moo moooooo Mooooo mo mooo moooooo mooooooooo. Mo! mo moo moo moo mooo

surprised; you know the proverb all along this coast--"Corrupt as
moooooooo; moo mooo moo moooooo moo moooo mooo moooo--"Moooooo mo

Lima." It but bears out your saying, too; churches more plentiful than
Mooo." Mo moo moooo moo mooo mooooo, moo; mooooooo mooo moooooooo mooo

billiard-tables, and for ever open--and "Corrupt as Lima." So, too,
mooooooo-mooooo, moo moo mooo mooo--moo "Moooooo mo Mooo." Mo, moo,

Venice; I have been there; the holy city of the blessed evangelist, St.
Mooooo; M mooo mooo moooo; moo mooo mooo mo moo moooooo mooooooooo, Mo.

Mark!--St. Dominic, purge it! Your cup! Thanks: here I refill; now, you
Mooo!--Mo. Moooooo, moooo mo! Mooo moo! Mooooo: mooo M mooooo; moo, moo

pour out again.'
mooo moo moooo.'




"Freely depicted in his own vocation, gentlemen, the Canaller would make
"Mooooo mooooooo mo moo moo mooooooo, moooooooo, moo Mooooooo moooo mooo

a fine dramatic hero, so abundantly and picturesquely wicked is he. Like
m mooo mooooooo mooo, mo mooooooooo moo moooooooooooo mooooo mo mo. Mooo

Mark Antony, for days and days along his green-turfed, flowery Nile,
Mooo Mooooo, moo mooo moo mooo moooo moo moooo-mooooo, moooooo Mooo,

he indolently floats, openly toying with his red-cheeked Cleopatra,
mo mooooooooo mooooo, mooooo mooooo mooo moo moo-moooooo Moooooooo,

ripening his apricot thigh upon the sunny deck. But ashore, all this
mooooooo moo moooooo moooo mooo moo moooo mooo. Moo mooooo, moo mooo

effeminacy is dashed. The brigandish guise which the Canaller so proudly
mooooooooo mo mooooo. Moo mooooooooo moooo moooo moo Mooooooo mo moooooo

sports; his slouched and gaily-ribboned hat betoken his grand features.
mooooo; moo mooooooo moo moooo-mooooooo moo moooooo moo moooo mooooooo.

A terror to the smiling innocence of the villages through which he
M mooooo mo moo moooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooo moooo mo

floats; his swart visage and bold swagger are not unshunned in cities.
mooooo; moo moooo mooooo moo mooo moooooo moo moo moooooooo mo mooooo.

Once a vagabond on his own canal, I have received good turns from one of
Mooo m mooooooo mo moo moo moooo, M mooo mooooooo mooo moooo mooo moo mo

these Canallers; I thank him heartily; would fain be not ungrateful;
moooo Moooooooo; M moooo moo mooooooo; moooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo;

but it is often one of the prime redeeming qualities of your man of
moo mo mo moooo moo mo moo moooo moooooooo moooooooo mo mooo moo mo

violence, that at times he has as stiff an arm to back a poor stranger
mooooooo, mooo mo moooo mo moo mo moooo mo moo mo mooo m mooo mooooooo

in a strait, as to plunder a wealthy one. In sum, gentlemen, what the
mo m mooooo, mo mo moooooo m moooooo moo. Mo moo, moooooooo, mooo moo

wildness of this canal life is, is emphatically evinced by this; that
mooooooo mo mooo moooo mooo mo, mo mooooooooooo moooooo mo mooo; mooo

our wild whale-fishery contains so many of its most finished graduates,
moo mooo moooo-moooooo mooooooo mo mooo mo moo mooo mooooooo moooooooo,

and that scarce any race of mankind, except Sydney men, are so much
moo mooo mooooo moo mooo mo moooooo, mooooo Mooooo moo, moo mo mooo

distrusted by our whaling captains. Nor does it at all diminish the
mooooooooo mo moo moooooo mooooooo. Moo mooo mo mo moo mooooooo moo

curiousness of this matter, that to many thousands of our rural boys and
moooooooooo mo mooo mooooo, mooo mo mooo moooooooo mo moo moooo mooo moo

young men born along its line, the probationary life of the Grand Canal
moooo moo mooo moooo moo mooo, moo mooooooooooo mooo mo moo Moooo Moooo

furnishes the sole transition between quietly reaping in a Christian
moooooooo moo mooo mooooooooo moooooo moooooo moooooo mo m Moooooooo

corn-field, and recklessly ploughing the waters of the most barbaric
mooo-moooo, moo mooooooooo moooooooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo

seas.
mooo.




"'I see! I see!' impetuously exclaimed Don Pedro, spilling his chicha
"'M moo! M moo!' moooooooooo moooooooo Moo Moooo, mooooooo moo mooooo

upon his silvery ruffles. 'No need to travel! The world's one Lima. I
mooo moo moooooo moooooo. 'Mo mooo mo mooooo! Moo moooo'm moo Mooo. M

had thought, now, that at your temperate North the generations were cold
moo moooooo, moo, mooo mo mooo moooooooo Moooo moo moooooooooo mooo mooo

moo mooo mo moo moooo.--Moo moo moooo.'




"I left off, gentlemen, where the Lakeman shook the backstay. Hardly
"M mooo moo, moooooooo, moooo moo Moooooo moooo moo mooooooo. Mooooo

had he done so, when he was surrounded by the three junior mates and the
moo mo mooo mo, mooo mo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooo mooooo moooo moo moo

mooo moooooooooo, moo moo moooooo moo mo moo mooo. Moo moooooo mooo moo

moooo mooo moooooo mooooo, moo moo Moooooooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo, moo

mooooo mo mooo moooo moo moo mo mo moooooo moo mooooooooo. Mooooo mo moo

sailors joined with them in this attempt, and a twisted turmoil ensued;
moooooo mooooo mooo mooo mo mooo moooooo, moo m moooooo moooooo mooooo;

while standing out of harm's way, the valiant captain danced up and down
moooo mooooooo moo mo mooo'm moo, moo moooooo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooo

mooo m moooo-mooo, moooooo mooo moo mooooooo mo moooooooo mooo moooooooo

moooooooo, moo moooo moo moooo mo moo moooooo-mooo. Mo moooooooo, mo moo

close up to the revolving border of the confusion, and prying into
moooo mo mo moo moooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooooo, moo mooooo mooo

the heart of it with his pike, sought to prick out the object of his
moo moooo mo mo mooo moo mooo, mooooo mo moooo moo moo mooooo mo moo

resentment. But Steelkilt and his desperadoes were too much for them

all; they succeeded in gaining the forecastle deck, where, hastily
moo; mooo moooooooo mo moooooo moo mooooooooo mooo, moooo, moooooo

slewing about three or four large casks in a line with the windlass,
moooooo moooo moooo mo mooo moooo moooo mo m mooo mooo moo mooooooo,

these sea-Parisians entrenched themselves behind the barricade.
moooo moo-Moooooooo mooooooooo mooooooooo mooooo moo moooooooo.

"'Mooo moo mo mooo, mo moooooo!' mooooo moo moooooo, moo mooooooo mooo

with a pistol in each hand, just brought to him by the steward. 'Come
mooo m mooooo mo mooo mooo, mooo moooooo mo moo mo moo moooooo. 'Mooo

out of that, ye cut-throats!'
moo mo mooo, mo moo-moooooo!'

"Moooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooooo, moo mooooooo mo moo mooo moooo,

defied the worst the pistols could do; but gave the captain to
mooooo moo moooo moo moooooo moooo mo; moo mooo moo moooooo mo

mooo mooo moooo moooo moo moo mooo, moo moooooo m mooooo mooooooo, moo

moooo moooooooo moo mooooooooo moooooooo mo mooooo mo moooo mooo.

ringleader.
mooooooooo.

"'Sink the ship?' cried Steelkilt. 'Aye, let her sink. Not a man of us

mo, moo?' moooooo mo moo mooooooo. M mooooo moooo moo moooo mooooooo.




"The Lakeman now patrolled the barricade, all the while keeping his eye
"Moo Moooooo moo moooooooo moo moooooooo, moo moo moooo moooooo moo moo

on the Captain, and jerking out such sentences as these:--'It's not our

moooooo.'




"'Turn to! I make no promises, turn to, I say!'

"'Mooo mo, moo,' moooo moo Moooooo, mooooooo moo moo moo moooooo moo,

'moooo moo m moo mo mo mooo (moo M mo moo mo mooo) moo mooo moooooo

moo moo mooooo, m'mo moo; moo mo moo mooo mooo, moo, mo moo moooo moo

moo'm mo moooooo.'




"'Turn to!' roared the Captain.
"'Mooo mo!' mooooo moo Moooooo.




"Steelkilt glanced round him a moment, and then said:--'I tell you what

it is now, Captain, rather than kill ye, and be hung for such a shabby

"'Down into the forecastle then, down with ye, I'll keep ye there till

ye're sick of it. Down ye go.'
mo'mo mooo mo mo. Mooo mo mo.'




"'Shall we?' cried the ringleader to his men. Most of them were against

mooo moooo mooo moo, mooooooooo mooooooooooo, mooo moooo mooo m mooo.




"As the Lakeman's bare head was just level with the planks, the Captain
"Mo moo Moooooo'm mooo mooo moo mooo moooo mooo moo mooooo, moo Moooooo

mooooooooooo.




"Then opening the slide a little, the Captain whispered something
"Mooo moooooo moo moooo m mooooo, moo Moooooo moooooooo moooooooo

down the crack, closed it, and turned the key upon them--ten in

"All night a wide-awake watch was kept by all the officers, forward and
"Moo moooo m mooo-moooo moooo moo mooo mo moo moo mooooooo, moooooo moo

moooooo moo mooooooo moooo. Moo moo moooo mo mooooooo mooooo mo moooo;

moo moo moo moooo mooooooo mo moooo mooo moooooo mooo mo moo moooo,

mooooooo moooooooo moooooo moo mooo.




"At sunrise the Captain went forward, and knocking on the deck, summoned
"Mo moooooo moo Moooooo mooo moooooo, moo mooooooo mo moo mooo, mooooooo

the prisoners to work; but with a yell they refused. Water was then
moo moooooooo mo mooo; moo mooo m mooo mooo moooooo. Moooo moo mooo

lowered down to them, and a couple of handfuls of biscuit were tossed
moooooo mooo mo mooo, moo m mooooo mo mooooooo mo moooooo mooo mooooo

after it; when again turning the key upon them and pocketing it, the
moooo mo; mooo moooo moooooo moo moo mooo mooo moo moooooooo mo, moo

Captain returned to the quarter-deck. Twice every day for three days
Moooooo mooooooo mo moo moooooo-mooo. Moooo moooo moo moo moooo mooo

this was repeated; but on the fourth morning a confused wrangling, and
mooo moo mooooooo; moo mo moo mooooo moooooo m mooooooo moooooooo, moo

then a scuffling was heard, as the customary summons was delivered; and
mooo m moooooooo moo moooo, mo moo moooooooo moooooo moo moooooooo; moo

suddenly four men burst up from the forecastle, saying they were ready
mooooooo mooo moo moooo mo mooo moo mooooooooo, mooooo mooo mooo moooo

to turn to. The fetid closeness of the air, and a famishing diet, united
mo mooo mo. Moo moooo moooooooo mo moo moo, moo m moooooooo mooo, mooooo

perhaps to some fears of ultimate retribution, had constrained them to
moooooo mo mooo moooo mo mooooooo moooooooooo, moo moooooooooo mooo mo

moooooooo mo mooooooooo. Mooooooooo mo mooo, moo Moooooo mooooooooo moo

demand to the rest, but Steelkilt shouted up to him a terrific hint to
mooooo mo moo mooo, moo Moooooooo moooooo mo mo moo m mooooooo mooo mo

stop his babbling and betake himself where he belonged. On the fifth
mooo moo mooooooo moo mooooo moooooo moooo mo mooooooo. Mo moo moooo

moooooo moooo mooooo mo moo moooooooo mooooo mo mooo moo moo mooo moo

desperate arms below that sought to restrain them. Only three were left.
moooooooo mooo moooo mooo mooooo mo mooooooo mooo. Mooo moooo mooo mooo.




"'Better turn to, now?' said the Captain with a heartless jeer.
"'Mooooo mooo mo, moo?' mooo moo Moooooo mooo m moooooooo mooo.




"'Shut us up again, will ye!' cried Steelkilt.
"'Mooo mo mo moooo, mooo mo!' moooo Moooooooo.




"'Oh certainly,' said the Captain, and the key clicked.
"'Mo moooooooo,' mooo moo Moooooo, moo moo moo moooooo.




"It was at this point, gentlemen, that enraged by the defection of seven
"Mo moo mo mooo moooo, moooooooo, mooo moooooo mo moo moooooooo mo moooo

of his former associates, and stung by the mocking voice that had last
mo moo mooooo mooooooooo, moo moooo mo moo moooooo moooo mooo moo mooo

hailed him, and maddened by his long entombment in a place as black as
mooooo moo, moo mooooooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo mo m moooo mo moooo mo

the bowels of despair; it was then that Steelkilt proposed to the two
moo mooooo mo moooooo; mo moo mooo mooo Moooooooo mooooooo mo moo moo

Canallers, thus far apparently of one mind with him, to burst out of
Moooooooo, mooo moo mooooooooo mo moo mooo mooo moo, mo moooo moo mo

their hole at the next summoning of the garrison; and armed with their
moooo mooo mo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo; moo moooo mooo moooo

keen mincing knives (long, crescentic, heavy implements with a handle
mooo moooooo mooooo (mooo, mooooooooo, moooo mooooooooo mooo m mooooo

at each end) run amuck from the bowsprit to the taffrail; and if by any
mo mooo moo) moo moooo mooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo; moo mo mo moo

devilishness of desperation possible, seize the ship. For himself, he
mooooooooooo mo moooooooooo mooooooo, moooo moo mooo. Moo moooooo, mo

would do this, he said, whether they joined him or not. That was the
moooo mo mooo, mo mooo, moooooo mooo mooooo moo mo moo. Mooo moo moo

last night he should spend in that den. But the scheme met with no
mooo moooo mo mooooo moooo mo mooo moo. Moo moo mooooo moo mooo mo

opposition on the part of the other two; they swore they were ready for
mooooooooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooo moo; mooo moooo mooo mooo moooo moo

that, or for any other mad thing, for anything in short but a surrender.
mooo, mo moo moo moooo moo moooo, moo mooooooo mo moooo moo m moooooooo.

And what was more, they each insisted upon being the first man on deck,
Moo mooo moo mooo, mooo mooo mooooooo mooo moooo moo moooo moo mo mooo,

when the time to make the rush should come. But to this their leader as
mooo moo mooo mo mooo moo mooo mooooo mooo. Moo mo mooo moooo mooooo mo

fiercely objected, reserving that priority for himself; particularly as
mooooooo mooooooo, moooooooo mooo mooooooo moo moooooo; mooooooooooo mo

his two comrades would not yield, the one to the other, in the matter;
moo moo mooooooo moooo moo moooo, moo moo mo moo moooo, mo moo mooooo;

and both of them could not be first, for the ladder would but admit one
moo mooo mo mooo moooo moo mo moooo, moo moo mooooo moooo moo moooo moo

man at a time. And here, gentlemen, the foul play of these miscreants
moo mo m mooo. Moo mooo, moooooooo, moo mooo mooo mo moooo mooooooooo

must come out.
mooo mooo moo.




"Upon hearing the frantic project of their leader, each in his own
"Mooo moooooo moo moooooo moooooo mo moooo mooooo, mooo mo moo moo

separate soul had suddenly lighted, it would seem, upon the same piece
mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo moooooo, mo moooo mooo, mooo moo mooo moooo

of treachery, namely: to be foremost in breaking out, in order to be
mo moooooooo, mooooo: mo mo mooooooo mo mooooooo moo, mo moooo mo mo

the first of the three, though the last of the ten, to surrender; and
moo moooo mo moo moooo, mooooo moo mooo mo moo moo, mo moooooooo; moo

thereby secure whatever small chance of pardon such conduct might merit.
moooooo mooooo mooooooo moooo mooooo mo mooooo mooo moooooo moooo moooo.

But when Steelkilt made known his determination still to lead them to
Moo mooo Moooooooo mooo moooo moo moooooooooooo moooo mo mooo mooo mo

the last, they in some way, by some subtle chemistry of villany, mixed
moo mooo, mooo mo mooo moo, mo mooo mooooo moooooooo mo moooooo, moooo

their before secret treacheries together; and when their leader
moooo mooooo mooooo moooooooooo mooooooo; moo mooo moooo mooooo

fell into a doze, verbally opened their souls to each other in three
mooo mooo m mooo, mooooooo mooooo moooo moooo mo mooo moooo mo moooo

sentences; and bound the sleeper with cords, and gagged him with cords;
moooooooo; moo moooo moo moooooo mooo moooo, moo mooooo moo mooo moooo;

and shrieked out for the Captain at midnight.
moo mooooooo moo moo moo Moooooo mo mooooooo.




"Thinking murder at hand, and smelling in the dark for the blood, he and
"Mooooooo mooooo mo mooo, moo mooooooo mo moo mooo moo moo moooo, mo moo

all his armed mates and harpooneers rushed for the forecastle. In a
moo moo moooo moooo moo moooooooooo mooooo moo moo mooooooooo. Mo m

few minutes the scuttle was opened, and, bound hand and foot, the still
moo moooooo moo moooooo moo mooooo, moo, moooo mooo moo mooo, moo moooo

struggling ringleader was shoved up into the air by his perfidious
mooooooooo mooooooooo moo mooooo mo mooo moo moo mo moo mooooooooo

mooooo, moo mo mooo moooooo moo mooooo mo mooooooo m moo moo moo mooo

fully ripe for murder. But all these were collared, and dragged along
moooo mooo moo mooooo. Moo moo moooo mooo mooooooo, moo moooooo moooo

mooooo moooooo, mooo moooo mooooooo mo mooo, moo moooo mooo mooo mooo

morning. 'Damn ye,' cried the Captain, pacing to and fro before them,
moooooo. 'Mooo mo,' moooo moo Moooooo, mooooo mo moo moo mooooo mooo,

'the vultures would not touch ye, ye villains!'
'moo mooooooo moooo moo moooo mo, mo mooooooo!'




"At sunrise he summoned all hands; and separating those who had rebelled
"Mo moooooo mo mooooooo moo moooo; moo mooooooooo moooo moo moo mooooooo

from those who had taken no part in the mutiny, he told the former that
mooo moooo moo moo moooo mo mooo mo moo mooooo, mo mooo moo mooooo mooo

mo moo m mooo mooo mo mooo mooo moo moooo--moooooo, mooo moo moooo,

mo moooo mo mo--mo moooo mo--moooooo mooooooo mo; moo moo moo moooooo,

moooooooooo moooo mooooo moooooooo, mo moooo moo mooo mo mooo m

mooooooo, mo moo moo moooooooo moooooo moo moooo.

"Just after dark that day, when one watch had retired below, a clamor

moooo moo mo moo moooo.




"But though the Lakeman had induced the seamen to adopt this sort of

moooooo moooo.

"Moo moooo moo mooo mo moo mooooooooo.

"But, gentlemen, a fool saved the would-be murderer from the bloody

mooo moo moo, Mooo.'

faint;--fill up his empty glass!'
moooo;--mooo mo moo moooo moooo!'




"No need, gentlemen; one moment, and I proceed.--Now, gentlemen,
"Mo mooo, moooooooo; moo mooooo, moo M moooooo.--Moo, moooooooo,

so suddenly perceiving the snowy whale within fifty yards of the

moooooo mooooo mooo moo moooo mooooo mooo-moooo. Moo moo moo m moooooo.

mooooo moo moooo mooooo moo moooooo. Moo mooooooo moo moo moooooo mo moo

the line, at the word of command. Moreover, when the four boats were
moo mooo, mo moo mooo mo moooooo. Mooooooo, mooo moo mooo moooo mooo

lowered, the mate's got the start; and none howled more fiercely with
moooooo, moo mooo'm moo moo moooo; moo mooo mooooo mooo mooooooo mooo

moooooo mooo moo Moooooooo, mo mo mooooooo mo moo moo. Moooo m moooo

pull, their harpooneer got fast, and, spear in hand, Radney sprang to
mooo, moooo mooooooooo moo mooo, moo, moooo mo mooo, Mooooo mooooo mo

the bow. He was always a furious man, it seems, in a boat. And now his
moo moo. Mo moo mooooo m moooooo moo, mo moooo, mo m mooo. Moo moo moo

bandaged cry was, to beach him on the whale's topmost back. Nothing
mooooooo moo moo, mo moooo moo mo moo moooo'm moooooo mooo. Moooooo

loath, his bowsman hauled him up and up, through a blinding foam that
moooo, moo moooooo mooooo moo mo moo mo, moooooo m mooooooo mooo mooo

moooo moo moooooooooo mooooooo; mooo mo m mooooo moo mooo mooooo mo

against a sunken ledge, and keeling over, spilled out the standing mate.
moooooo m mooooo moooo, moo moooooo mooo, moooooo moo moo mooooooo mooo.

Mooo moooooo, mo mo mooo mo moo moooo'm mooooooo mooo, moo mooo moooooo,

and was dashed aside by the swell, while Radney was tossed over into the
moo moo mooooo moooo mo moo moooo, moooo Mooooo moo mooooo mooo mooo moo

sea, on the other flank of the whale. He struck out through the spray,
moo, mo moo moooo moooo mo moo moooo. Mo mooooo moo moooooo moo moooo,

and, for an instant, was dimly seen through that veil, wildly seeking to
moo, moo mo moooooo, moo moooo mooo moooooo mooo mooo, mooooo moooooo mo

remove himself from the eye of Moby Dick. But the whale rushed round
mooooo moooooo mooo moo moo mo Mooo Mooo. Moo moo moooo mooooo moooo

in a sudden maelstrom; seized the swimmer between his jaws; and rearing
mo m mooooo moooooooo; mooooo moo moooooo moooooo moo mooo; moo moooooo

high up with him, plunged headlong again, and went down.
mooo mo mooo moo, moooooo mooooooo moooo, moo mooo mooo.




"Meantime, at the first tap of the boat's bottom, the Lakeman had
"Mooooooo, mo moo moooo moo mo moo mooo'm mooooo, moo Moooooo moo

slackened the line, so as to drop astern from the whirlpool; calmly
moooooooo moo mooo, mo mo mo mooo mooooo mooo moo moooooooo; mooooo

looking on, he thought his own thoughts. But a sudden, terrific,
moooooo mo, mo moooooo moo moo mooooooo. Moo m mooooo, mooooooo,

downward jerking of the boat, quickly brought his knife to the line. He
mooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo, moooooo moooooo moo moooo mo moo mooo. Mo

cut it; and the whale was free. But, at some distance, Moby Dick rose
moo mo; moo moo moooo moo mooo. Moo, mo mooo mooooooo, Mooo Mooo mooo

again, with some tatters of Radney's red woollen shirt, caught in the
moooo, mooo mooo moooooo mo Mooooo'm moo moooooo moooo, mooooo mo moo

teeth that had destroyed him. All four boats gave chase again; but the
moooo mooo moo moooooooo moo. Moo mooo moooo mooo moooo moooo; moo moo

whale eluded them, and finally wholly disappeared.
moooo mooooo mooo, moo moooooo mooooo moooooooooo.




"In good time, the Town-Ho reached her port--a savage, solitary
"Mo mooo mooo, moo Mooo-Mo moooooo moo mooo--m mooooo, mooooooo

place--where no civilized creature resided. There, headed by the
moooo--moooo mo moooooooo mooooooo moooooo. Moooo, mooooo mo moo

Lakeman, all but five or six of the foremastmen deliberately deserted
Moooooo, moo moo mooo mo moo mo moo moooooooooo mooooooooooo mooooooo

among the palms; eventually, as it turned out, seizing a large double
moooo moo moooo; mooooooooo, mo mo mooooo moo, moooooo m moooo mooooo

war-canoe of the savages, and setting sail for some other harbor.
moo-moooo mo moo moooooo, moo moooooo mooo moo mooo moooo mooooo.




"The ship's company being reduced to but a handful, the captain called
"Moo mooo'm moooooo moooo moooooo mo moo m moooooo, moo moooooo mooooo

upon the Islanders to assist him in the laborious business of heaving
mooo moo Moooooooo mo mooooo moo mo moo moooooooo mooooooo mo moooooo

down the ship to stop the leak. But to such unresting vigilance over
mooo moo mooo mo mooo moo mooo. Moo mo mooo moooooooo moooooooo mooo

their dangerous allies was this small band of whites necessitated, both
moooo moooooooo mooooo moo mooo moooo mooo mo mooooo mooooooooooo, mooo

by night and by day, and so extreme was the hard work they underwent,
mo moooo moo mo moo, moo mo moooooo moo moo mooo mooo mooo moooooooo,

that upon the vessel being ready again for sea, they were in such a
mooo mooo moo mooooo moooo moooo moooo moo moo, mooo mooo mo mooo m

weakened condition that the captain durst not put off with them in so
mooooooo moooooooo mooo moo moooooo moooo moo moo moo mooo mooo mo mo

heavy a vessel. After taking counsel with his officers, he anchored the
moooo m mooooo. Moooo mooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo, mo mooooooo moo

ship as far off shore as possible; loaded and ran out his two cannon
mooo mo moo moo moooo mo mooooooo; mooooo moo moo moo moo moo mooooo

from the bows; stacked his muskets on the poop; and warning the
mooo moo mooo; moooooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo; moo moooooo moo

Islanders not to approach the ship at their peril, took one man with
Moooooooo moo mo mooooooo moo mooo mo moooo moooo, mooo moo moo mooo

him, and setting the sail of his best whale-boat, steered straight
moo, moo moooooo moo mooo mo moo mooo moooo-mooo, moooooo mooooooo

before the wind for Tahiti, five hundred miles distant, to procure a
mooooo moo mooo moo Mooooo, mooo moooooo moooo moooooo, mo moooooo m

reinforcement to his crew.
moooooooooooo mo moo mooo.




"On the fourth day of the sail, a large canoe was descried, which seemed
"Mo moo mooooo moo mo moo mooo, m moooo moooo moo mooooooo, moooo mooooo

to have touched at a low isle of corals. He steered away from it; but
mo mooo moooooo mo m moo mooo mo mooooo. Mo moooooo mooo mooo mo; moo

the savage craft bore down on him; and soon the voice of Steelkilt
moo mooooo moooo mooo mooo mo moo; moo mooo moo moooo mo Moooooooo

hailed him to heave to, or he would run him under water. The captain
mooooo moo mo moooo mo, mo mo moooo moo moo moooo moooo. Moo moooooo

presented a pistol. With one foot on each prow of the yoked war-canoes,
moooooooo m mooooo. Mooo moo mooo mo mooo mooo mo moo moooo moo-mooooo,

the Lakeman laughed him to scorn; assuring him that if the pistol so
moo Moooooo moooooo moo mo moooo; mooooooo moo mooo mo moo mooooo mo

much as clicked in the lock, he would bury him in bubbles and foam.
mooo mo moooooo mo moo mooo, mo moooo mooo moo mo moooooo moo mooo.




"'What do you want of me?' cried the captain.
"'Mooo mo moo mooo mo mo?' moooo moo moooooo.




"'Where are you bound? and for what are you bound?' demanded Steelkilt;
"'Moooo moo moo moooo? moo moo mooo moo moo moooo?' mooooooo Moooooooo;

'no lies.'
'mo mooo.'




"'I am bound to Tahiti for more men.'
"'M mo moooo mo Mooooo moo mooo moo.'




"'Very good. Let me board you a moment--I come in peace.' With that he
"'Mooo mooo. Moo mo moooo moo m mooooo--M mooo mo moooo.' Mooo mooo mo

leaped from the canoe, swam to the boat; and climbing the gunwale, stood
mooooo mooo moo moooo, mooo mo moo mooo; moo mooooooo moo moooooo, moooo

face to face with the captain.
mooo mo mooo mooo moo moooooo.




"'Cross your arms, sir; throw back your head. Now, repeat after me.
"'Moooo mooo mooo, moo; moooo mooo mooo mooo. Moo, mooooo moooo mo.

As soon as Steelkilt leaves me, I swear to beach this boat on yonder
Mo mooo mo Moooooooo mooooo mo, M moooo mo moooo mooo mooo mo mooooo

island, and remain there six days. If I do not, may lightning strike
mooooo, moo mooooo moooo moo mooo. Mo M mo moo, moo moooooooo mooooo

me!'
mo!'




"'A pretty scholar,' laughed the Lakeman. 'Adios, Senor!' and leaping
"'M mooooo moooooo,' moooooo moo Moooooo. 'Moooo, Moooo!' moo moooooo

into the sea, he swam back to his comrades.
mooo moo moo, mo mooo mooo mo moo mooooooo.




"Watching the boat till it was fairly beached, and drawn up to the
"Mooooooo moo mooo mooo mo moo mooooo moooooo, moo moooo mo mo moo

roots of the cocoa-nut trees, Steelkilt made sail again, and in due time
moooo mo moo moooo-moo moooo, Moooooooo mooo mooo moooo, moo mo moo mooo

arrived at Tahiti, his own place of destination. There, luck befriended
moooooo mo Mooooo, moo moo moooo mo moooooooooo. Moooo, mooo mooooooooo

him; two ships were about to sail for France, and were providentially
moo; moo moooo mooo moooo mo mooo moo Mooooo, moo mooo mooooooooooooo

in want of precisely that number of men which the sailor headed. They
mo mooo mo moooooooo mooo mooooo mo moo moooo moo mooooo mooooo. Mooo

embarked; and so for ever got the start of their former captain, had he
mooooooo; moo mo moo mooo moo moo moooo mo moooo mooooo moooooo, moo mo

been at all minded to work them legal retribution.
mooo mo moo mooooo mo mooo mooo moooo moooooooooo.




"Some ten days after the French ships sailed, the whale-boat arrived,
"Mooo moo mooo moooo moo Mooooo moooo mooooo, moo moooo-mooo moooooo,

and the captain was forced to enlist some of the more civilized
moo moo moooooo moo mooooo mo mooooo mooo mo moo mooo moooooooo

Tahitians, who had been somewhat used to the sea. Chartering a small
Moooooooo, moo moo mooo mooooooo mooo mo moo moo. Mooooooooo m moooo

native schooner, he returned with them to his vessel; and finding all
mooooo mooooooo, mo mooooooo mooo mooo mo moo mooooo; moo moooooo moo

right there, again resumed his cruisings.
moooo moooo, moooo moooooo moo moooooooo.




"Where Steelkilt now is, gentlemen, none know; but upon the island of
"Moooo Moooooooo moo mo, moooooooo, mooo mooo; moo mooo moo mooooo mo

Nantucket, the widow of Radney still turns to the sea which refuses
Moooooooo, moo moooo mo Mooooo moooo moooo mo moo moo moooo moooooo

to give up its dead; still in dreams sees the awful white whale that
mo mooo mo moo mooo; moooo mo mooooo mooo moo moooo moooo moooo mooo

destroyed him.
moooooooo moo.




"'Are you through?' said Don Sebastian, quietly.
"'Moo moo moooooo?' mooo Moo Moooooooo, moooooo.




"'I am, Don.'
"'M mo, Moo.'




"'Then I entreat you, tell me if to the best of your own convictions,
"'Mooo M moooooo moo, mooo mo mo mo moo mooo mo mooo moo moooooooooo,

this your story is in substance really true? It is so passing wonderful!
mooo mooo moooo mo mo moooooooo mooooo mooo? Mo mo mo moooooo moooooooo!

Did you get it from an unquestionable source? Bear with me if I seem to
Moo moo moo mo mooo mo mooooooooooooo mooooo? Mooo mooo mo mo M mooo mo

press.'
moooo.'




"'Also bear with all of us, sir sailor; for we all join in Don
"'Mooo mooo mooo moo mo mo, moo mooooo; moo mo moo mooo mo Moo

Sebastian's suit,' cried the company, with exceeding interest.
Moooooooo'm mooo,' moooo moo moooooo, mooo moooooooo mooooooo.




"'Is there a copy of the Holy Evangelists in the Golden Inn, gentlemen?'
"'Mo moooo m mooo mo moo Mooo Moooooooooo mo moo Mooooo Moo, moooooooo?'




"'Nay,' said Don Sebastian; 'but I know a worthy priest near by, who
"'Moo,' mooo Moo Moooooooo; 'moo M mooo m mooooo mooooo mooo mo, moo

will quickly procure one for me. I go for it; but are you well advised?
mooo moooooo moooooo moo moo mo. M mo moo mo; moo moo moo mooo moooooo?

this may grow too serious.'
mooo moo mooo moo moooooo.'




"'Will you be so good as to bring the priest also, Don?'
"'Mooo moo mo mo mooo mo mo moooo moo mooooo mooo, Moo?'




"'Though there are no Auto-da-Fe's in Lima now,' said one of the company
"'Mooooo moooo moo mo Mooo-mo-Mo'm mo Mooo moo,' mooo moo mo moo moooooo

to another; 'I fear our sailor friend runs risk of the archiepiscopacy.
mo moooooo; 'M mooo moo mooooo mooooo mooo mooo mo moo moooooooooooooo.

Let us withdraw more out of the moonlight. I see no need of this.'
Moo mo mooooooo mooo moo mo moo moooooooo. M moo mo mooo mo mooo.'




"'Excuse me for running after you, Don Sebastian; but may I also beg
"'Mooooo mo moo moooooo moooo moo, Moo Moooooooo; moo moo M mooo moo

that you will be particular in procuring the largest sized Evangelists
mooo moo mooo mo mooooooooo mo moooooooo moo moooooo moooo Moooooooooo

you can.'
moo moo.'




"'This is the priest, he brings you the Evangelists,' said Don Sebastian,
"'Mooo mo moo mooooo, mo mooooo moo moo Moooooooooo,' mooo Moo Moooooooo,

gravely, returning with a tall and solemn figure.
moooooo, moooooooo mooo m mooo moo mooooo mooooo.




"'Let me remove my hat. Now, venerable priest, further into the light,
"'Moo mo mooooo mo moo. Moo, moooooooo mooooo, moooooo mooo moo moooo,

and hold the Holy Book before me that I may touch it.
moo mooo moo Mooo Mooo mooooo mo mooo M moo moooo mo.




"'So help me Heaven, and on my honour the story I have told ye,
"'Mo mooo mo Mooooo, moo mo mo mooooo moo moooo M mooo mooo mo,

gentlemen, is in substance and its great items, true. I know it to be
moooooooo, mo mo moooooooo moo moo moooo moooo, mooo. M mooo mo mo mo

true; it happened on this ball; I trod the ship; I knew the crew; I have
mooo; mo mooooooo mo mooo mooo; M mooo moo mooo; M mooo moo mooo; M mooo

seen and talked with Steelkilt since the death of Radney.'"
mooo moo mooooo mooo Moooooooo moooo moo moooo mo Mooooo.'"










CHAPTER 55. Of the Monstrous Pictures of Whales.
MOOOOOO mo. Mo moo Moooooooo Mooooooo mo Mooooo.







I shall ere long paint to you as well as one can without canvas,
M moooo moo mooo moooo mo moo mo mooo mo moo moo moooooo mooooo,

something like the true form of the whale as he actually appears to the
moooooooo mooo moo mooo mooo mo moo moooo mo mo mooooooo moooooo mo moo

eye of the whaleman when in his own absolute body the whale is moored
moo mo moo mooooooo mooo mo moo moo mooooooo mooo moo moooo mo mooooo

alongside the whale-ship so that he can be fairly stepped upon there.
moooooooo moo moooo-mooo mo mooo mo moo mo mooooo moooooo mooo moooo.

It may be worth while, therefore, previously to advert to those
Mo moo mo moooo moooo, moooooooo, mooooooooo mo mooooo mo moooo

curious imaginary portraits of him which even down to the present day
moooooo moooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo mooo mooo mo moo moooooo moo

confidently challenge the faith of the landsman. It is time to set the
moooooooooo moooooooo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo. Mo mo mooo mo moo moo

world right in this matter, by proving such pictures of the whale all
moooo moooo mo mooo mooooo, mo moooooo mooo mooooooo mo moo moooo moo

wrong.
moooo.




It may be that the primal source of all those pictorial delusions will
Mo moo mo mooo moo mooooo mooooo mo moo moooo moooooooo moooooooo mooo

be found among the oldest Hindoo, Egyptian, and Grecian sculptures. For
mo moooo moooo moo mooooo Mooooo, Mooooooo, moo Moooooo mooooooooo. Moo

ever since those inventive but unscrupulous times when on the marble
mooo moooo moooo moooooooo moo mooooooooooo moooo mooo mo moo mooooo

panellings of temples, the pedestals of statues, and on shields,
mooooooooo mo moooooo, moo moooooooo mo moooooo, moo mo moooooo,

medallions, cups, and coins, the dolphin was drawn in scales of
mooooooooo, mooo, moo moooo, moo moooooo moo moooo mo mooooo mo

chain-armor like Saladin's, and a helmeted head like St. George's; ever
moooo-moooo mooo Moooooo'm, moo m mooooooo mooo mooo Mo. Mooooo'm; mooo

since then has something of the same sort of license prevailed, not
moooo mooo moo moooooooo mo moo mooo mooo mo moooooo moooooooo, moo

only in most popular pictures of the whale, but in many scientific
mooo mo mooo moooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo, moo mo mooo mooooooooo

presentations of him.
moooooooooooo mo moo.




Now, by all odds, the most ancient extant portrait anyways purporting to
Moo, mo moo mooo, moo mooo moooooo mooooo mooooooo moooooo mooooooooo mo

be the whale's, is to be found in the famous cavern-pagoda of Elephanta,
mo moo moooo'm, mo mo mo moooo mo moo mooooo mooooo-mooooo mo Moooooooo,

in India. The Brahmins maintain that in the almost endless sculptures of
mo Moooo. Moo Mooooooo mooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo moooooo mooooooooo mo

that immemorial pagoda, all the trades and pursuits, every conceivable
mooo mooooooooo mooooo, moo moo mooooo moo mooooooo, moooo moooooooooo

avocation of man, were prefigured ages before any of them actually came
moooooooo mo moo, mooo mooooooooo mooo mooooo moo mo mooo mooooooo mooo

into being. No wonder then, that in some sort our noble profession of
mooo moooo. Mo mooooo mooo, mooo mo mooo mooo moo moooo mooooooooo mo

whaling should have been there shadowed forth. The Hindoo whale
moooooo mooooo mooo mooo moooo mooooooo moooo. Moo Mooooo moooo

referred to, occurs in a separate department of the wall, depicting the
mooooooo mo, mooooo mo m mooooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooo, moooooooo moo

incarnation of Vishnu in the form of leviathan, learnedly known as the
moooooooooo mo Mooooo mo moo mooo mo moooooooo, moooooooo moooo mo moo

Matse Avatar. But though this sculpture is half man and half whale, so
Moooo Mooooo. Moo mooooo mooo moooooooo mo mooo moo moo mooo moooo, mo

as only to give the tail of the latter, yet that small section of him is
mo mooo mo mooo moo mooo mo moo mooooo, moo mooo moooo moooooo mo moo mo

all wrong. It looks more like the tapering tail of an anaconda, than the
moo moooo. Mo moooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo mo mo mooooooo, mooo moo

broad palms of the true whale's majestic flukes.
moooo moooo mo moo mooo moooo'm mooooooo mooooo.




But go to the old Galleries, and look now at a great Christian painter's
Moo mo mo moo moo Moooooooo, moo mooo moo mo m moooo Moooooooo moooooo'm

portrait of this fish; for he succeeds no better than the antediluvian
mooooooo mo mooo mooo; moo mo mooooooo mo mooooo mooo moo mooooooooooo

Hindoo. It is Guido's picture of Perseus rescuing Andromeda from the
Mooooo. Mo mo Moooo'm moooooo mo Moooooo mooooooo Moooooooo mooo moo

sea-monster or whale. Where did Guido get the model of such a strange
moo-moooooo mo moooo. Moooo moo Moooo moo moo moooo mo mooo m moooooo

creature as that? Nor does Hogarth, in painting the same scene in his
mooooooo mo mooo? Moo mooo Moooooo, mo mooooooo moo mooo moooo mo moo

own "Perseus Descending," make out one whit better. The huge corpulence
moo "Moooooo Mooooooooo," mooo moo moo mooo mooooo. Moo mooo mooooooooo

of that Hogarthian monster undulates on the surface, scarcely drawing
mo mooo Mooooooooo moooooo moooooooo mo moo moooooo, mooooooo moooooo

one inch of water. It has a sort of howdah on its back, and its
moo mooo mo moooo. Mo moo m mooo mo mooooo mo moo mooo, moo moo

distended tusked mouth into which the billows are rolling, might be
moooooooo mooooo moooo mooo moooo moo moooooo moo moooooo, moooo mo

taken for the Traitors' Gate leading from the Thames by water into the
moooo moo moo Mooooooo' Mooo moooooo mooo moo Mooooo mo moooo mooo moo

Tower. Then, there are the Prodromus whales of old Scotch Sibbald, and
Moooo. Mooo, moooo moo moo Moooooooo mooooo mo moo Mooooo Moooooo, moo

Jonah's whale, as depicted in the prints of old Bibles and the cuts of
Moooo'm moooo, mo mooooooo mo moo mooooo mo moo Mooooo moo moo mooo mo

old primers. What shall be said of these? As for the book-binder's whale
moo moooooo. Mooo moooo mo mooo mo moooo? Mo moo moo mooo-mooooo'm moooo

winding like a vine-stalk round the stock of a descending anchor--as
moooooo mooo m mooo-moooo moooo moo moooo mo m mooooooooo mooooo--mo

stamped and gilded on the backs and title-pages of many books both
moooooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo moo moooo-moooo mo mooo moooo mooo

old and new--that is a very picturesque but purely fabulous creature,
moo moo moo--mooo mo m mooo moooooooooo moo mooooo mooooooo mooooooo,

imitated, I take it, from the like figures on antique vases.
mooooooo, M mooo mo, mooo moo mooo moooooo mo moooooo moooo.

Though universally denominated a dolphin, I nevertheless call this
Mooooo moooooooooo moooooooooo m moooooo, M mooooooooooo mooo mooo

book-binder's fish an attempt at a whale; because it was so intended
mooo-mooooo'm mooo mo moooooo mo m moooo; moooooo mo moo mo mooooooo

when the device was first introduced. It was introduced by an old
mooo moo mooooo moo moooo mooooooooo. Mo moo mooooooooo mo mo moo

Italian publisher somewhere about the 15th century, during the Revival
Moooooo moooooooo moooooooo moooo moo mooo moooooo, mooooo moo Moooooo

of Learning; and in those days, and even down to a comparatively
mo Mooooooo; moo mo moooo mooo, moo mooo mooo mo m moooooooooooo

late period, dolphins were popularly supposed to be a species of the
mooo mooooo, mooooooo mooo moooooooo mooooooo mo mo m moooooo mo moo

Leviathan.
Moooooooo.




In the vignettes and other embellishments of some ancient books you will
Mo moo moooooooo moo moooo mooooooooooooo mo mooo moooooo moooo moo mooo

at times meet with very curious touches at the whale, where all manner
mo moooo mooo mooo mooo moooooo moooooo mo moo moooo, moooo moo mooooo

of spouts, jets d'eau, hot springs and cold, Saratoga and Baden-Baden,
mo mooooo, mooo m'moo, moo moooooo moo mooo, Mooooooo moo Moooo-Moooo,

come bubbling up from his unexhausted brain. In the title-page of the
mooo mooooooo mo mooo moo moooooooooo moooo. Mo moo moooo-mooo mo moo

original edition of the "Advancement of Learning" you will find some
mooooooo moooooo mo moo "Moooooooooo mo Mooooooo" moo mooo mooo mooo

curious whales.
moooooo mooooo.




But quitting all these unprofessional attempts, let us glance at those
Moo mooooooo moo moooo mooooooooooooo mooooooo, moo mo mooooo mo moooo

pictures of leviathan purporting to be sober, scientific delineations,
mooooooo mo moooooooo mooooooooo mo mo moooo, mooooooooo mooooooooooo,

by those who know. In old Harris's collection of voyages there are some
mo moooo moo mooo. Mo moo Mooooo'm mooooooooo mo moooooo moooo moo mooo

plates of whales extracted from a Dutch book of voyages, A.D. 1671,
mooooo mo mooooo moooooooo mooo m Moooo mooo mo moooooo, M.M. mooo,

entitled "A Whaling Voyage to Spitzbergen in the ship Jonas in the
mooooooo "M Moooooo Mooooo mo Moooooooooo mo moo mooo Moooo mo moo

Whale, Peter Peterson of Friesland, master." In one of those plates the
Moooo, Moooo Mooooooo mo Moooooooo, mooooo." Mo moo mo moooo mooooo moo

whales, like great rafts of logs, are represented lying among ice-isles,
mooooo, mooo moooo moooo mo mooo, moo moooooooooo moooo moooo moo-moooo,

with white bears running over their living backs. In another plate, the
mooo moooo moooo moooooo mooo moooo mooooo moooo. Mo moooooo moooo, moo

prodigious blunder is made of representing the whale with perpendicular
mooooooooo moooooo mo mooo mo mooooooooooo moo moooo mooo moooooooooooo

flukes.
mooooo.




Then again, there is an imposing quarto, written by one Captain Colnett,
Mooo moooo, moooo mo mo mooooooo mooooo, moooooo mo moo Moooooo Moooooo,

a Post Captain in the English navy, entitled "A Voyage round Cape Horn
m Mooo Moooooo mo moo Moooooo mooo, mooooooo "M Mooooo moooo Mooo Mooo

into the South Seas, for the purpose of extending the Spermaceti Whale
mooo moo Moooo Mooo, moo moo moooooo mo moooooooo moo Mooooooooo Moooo

Fisheries." In this book is an outline purporting to be a "Picture of
Moooooooo." Mo mooo mooo mo mo moooooo mooooooooo mo mo m "Moooooo mo

a Physeter or Spermaceti whale, drawn by scale from one killed on the
m Mooooooo mo Mooooooooo moooo, moooo mo moooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo

coast of Mexico, August, 1793, and hoisted on deck." I doubt not the
moooo mo Mooooo, Mooooo, mooo, moo moooooo mo mooo." M moooo moo moo

captain had this veracious picture taken for the benefit of his marines.
moooooo moo mooo moooooooo moooooo moooo moo moo moooooo mo moo moooooo.

To mention but one thing about it, let me say that it has an eye which
Mo moooooo moo moo moooo moooo mo, moo mo moo mooo mo moo mo moo moooo

applied, according to the accompanying scale, to a full grown sperm
moooooo, moooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo moooo, mo m mooo moooo moooo

whale, would make the eye of that whale a bow-window some five feet
moooo, moooo mooo moo moo mo mooo moooo m moo-mooooo mooo mooo mooo

long. Ah, my gallant captain, why did ye not give us Jonah looking out
mooo. Mo, mo moooooo moooooo, moo moo mo moo mooo mo Moooo moooooo moo

of that eye!
mo mooo moo!




Nor are the most conscientious compilations of Natural History for
Moo moo moo mooo moooooooooooo mooooooooooo mo Moooooo Moooooo moo

the benefit of the young and tender, free from the same heinousness of
moo moooooo mo moo moooo moo mooooo, mooo mooo moo mooo moooooooooo mo

mistake. Look at that popular work "Goldsmith's Animated Nature." In the
moooooo. Mooo mo mooo moooooo mooo "Moooooooo'm Mooooooo Mooooo." Mo moo

abridged London edition of 1807, there are plates of an alleged "whale"
mooooooo Mooooo moooooo mo mooo, moooo moo mooooo mo mo moooooo "moooo"

and a "narwhale." I do not wish to seem inelegant, but this unsightly
moo m "mooooooo." M mo moo mooo mo mooo moooooooo, moo mooo moooooooo

whale looks much like an amputated sow; and, as for the narwhale, one
moooo moooo mooo mooo mo moooooooo moo; moo, mo moo moo mooooooo, moo

glimpse at it is enough to amaze one, that in this nineteenth century
moooooo mo mo mo mooooo mo moooo moo, mooo mo mooo mooooooooo moooooo

such a hippogriff could be palmed for genuine upon any intelligent
mooo m mooooooooo moooo mo mooooo moo moooooo mooo moo moooooooooo

public of schoolboys.
mooooo mo mooooooooo.




Then, again, in 1825, Bernard Germain, Count de Lacepede, a great
Mooo, moooo, mo mooo, Moooooo Moooooo, Moooo mo Mooooooo, m moooo

naturalist, published a scientific systemized whale book, wherein are
mooooooooo, moooooooo m mooooooooo mooooooooo moooo mooo, moooooo moo

several pictures of the different species of the Leviathan. All these
moooooo mooooooo mo moo moooooooo moooooo mo moo Moooooooo. Moo moooo

are not only incorrect, but the picture of the Mysticetus or Greenland
moo moo mooo moooooooo, moo moo moooooo mo moo Mooooooooo mo Moooooooo

whale (that is to say, the Right whale), even Scoresby, a long
moooo (mooo mo mo moo, moo Moooo moooo), mooo Mooooooo, m mooo

experienced man as touching that species, declares not to have its
moooooooooo moo mo mooooooo mooo moooooo, mooooooo moo mo mooo moo

counterpart in nature.
moooooooooo mo mooooo.




But the placing of the cap-sheaf to all this blundering business was
Moo moo moooooo mo moo moo-moooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo moo

reserved for the scientific Frederick Cuvier, brother to the famous
mooooooo moo moo mooooooooo Moooooooo Mooooo, moooooo mo moo mooooo

Baron. In 1836, he published a Natural History of Whales, in which he
Moooo. Mo mooo, mo moooooooo m Moooooo Moooooo mo Mooooo, mo moooo mo

gives what he calls a picture of the Sperm Whale. Before showing that
moooo mooo mo moooo m moooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo. Mooooo moooooo mooo

picture to any Nantucketer, you had best provide for your summary
moooooo mo moo Moooooooooo, moo moo mooo moooooo moo mooo moooooo

retreat from Nantucket. In a word, Frederick Cuvier's Sperm Whale is not
moooooo mooo Moooooooo. Mo m mooo, Moooooooo Mooooo'm Moooo Moooo mo moo

a Sperm Whale, but a squash. Of course, he never had the benefit of
m Moooo Moooo, moo m mooooo. Mo mooooo, mo moooo moo moo moooooo mo

a whaling voyage (such men seldom have), but whence he derived that
m moooooo mooooo (mooo moo mooooo mooo), moo mooooo mo moooooo mooo

picture, who can tell? Perhaps he got it as his scientific predecessor
moooooo, moo moo mooo? Moooooo mo moo mo mo moo mooooooooo moooooooooo

in the same field, Desmarest, got one of his authentic abortions; that
mo moo mooo moooo, Moooooooo, moo moo mo moo moooooooo moooooooo; mooo

is, from a Chinese drawing. And what sort of lively lads with the pencil
mo, mooo m Moooooo moooooo. Moo mooo mooo mo mooooo mooo mooo moo mooooo

those Chinese are, many queer cups and saucers inform us.
moooo Moooooo moo, mooo moooo mooo moo moooooo mooooo mo.




As for the sign-painters' whales seen in the streets hanging over the
Mo moo moo mooo-mooooooo' mooooo mooo mo moo moooooo moooooo mooo moo

shops of oil-dealers, what shall be said of them? They are generally
moooo mo moo-moooooo, mooo moooo mo mooo mo mooo? Mooo moo moooooooo

Richard III. whales, with dromedary humps, and very savage; breakfasting
Moooooo MOO. mooooo, mooo moooooooo moooo, moo mooo mooooo; mooooooooooo

on three or four sailor tarts, that is whaleboats full of mariners:
mo moooo mo mooo mooooo moooo, mooo mo mooooooooo mooo mo mooooooo:

their deformities floundering in seas of blood and blue paint.
moooo moooooooooo moooooooooo mo mooo mo moooo moo mooo moooo.




But these manifold mistakes in depicting the whale are not so very
Moo moooo mooooooo mooooooo mo moooooooo moo moooo moo moo mo mooo

surprising after all. Consider! Most of the scientific drawings have
mooooooooo moooo moo. Mooooooo! Mooo mo moo mooooooooo mooooooo mooo

been taken from the stranded fish; and these are about as correct as a
mooo moooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo; moo moooo moo moooo mo moooooo mo m

drawing of a wrecked ship, with broken back, would correctly represent
moooooo mo m moooooo mooo, mooo mooooo mooo, moooo moooooooo moooooooo

the noble animal itself in all its undashed pride of hull and spars.
moo moooo mooooo mooooo mo moo moo mooooooo moooo mo mooo moo moooo.

Though elephants have stood for their full-lengths, the living Leviathan
Mooooo moooooooo mooo moooo moo moooo mooo-moooooo, moo mooooo Moooooooo

has never yet fairly floated himself for his portrait. The living whale,
moo moooo moo mooooo moooooo moooooo moo moo mooooooo. Moo mooooo moooo,

in his full majesty and significance, is only to be seen at sea in
mo moo mooo moooooo moo mooooooooooo, mo mooo mo mo mooo mo moo mo

unfathomable waters; and afloat the vast bulk of him is out of sight,
mooooooooooo mooooo; moo mooooo moo mooo mooo mo moo mo moo mo moooo,

like a launched line-of-battle ship; and out of that element it is a
mooo m mooooooo mooo-mo-mooooo mooo; moo moo mo mooo moooooo mo mo m

thing eternally impossible for mortal man to hoist him bodily into the
moooo moooooooo mooooooooo moo mooooo moo mo moooo moo mooooo mooo moo

air, so as to preserve all his mighty swells and undulations. And, not
moo, mo mo mo mooooooo moo moo mooooo mooooo moo moooooooooo. Moo, moo

to speak of the highly presumable difference of contour between a young
mo moooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooo mooooooooo mo moooooo moooooo m moooo

sucking whale and a full-grown Platonian Leviathan; yet, even in the
moooooo moooo moo m mooo-moooo Moooooooo Moooooooo; moo, mooo mo moo

case of one of those young sucking whales hoisted to a ship's deck, such
mooo mo moo mo moooo moooo moooooo mooooo moooooo mo m mooo'm mooo, mooo

is then the outlandish, eel-like, limbered, varying shape of him, that
mo mooo moo mooooooooo, moo-mooo, mooooooo, moooooo moooo mo moo, mooo

his precise expression the devil himself could not catch.
moo moooooo mooooooooo moo moooo moooooo moooo moo moooo.




But it may be fancied, that from the naked skeleton of the stranded
Moo mo moo mo moooooo, mooo mooo moo moooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo

whale, accurate hints may be derived touching his true form. Not at all.
moooo, mooooooo moooo moo mo moooooo mooooooo moo mooo mooo. Moo mo moo.

For it is one of the more curious things about this Leviathan, that
Moo mo mo moo mo moo mooo moooooo mooooo moooo mooo Moooooooo, mooo

his skeleton gives very little idea of his general shape. Though Jeremy
moo mooooooo moooo mooo mooooo mooo mo moo moooooo moooo. Mooooo Mooooo

Bentham's skeleton, which hangs for candelabra in the library of one of
Moooooo'm mooooooo, moooo moooo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooooo mo moo mo

his executors, correctly conveys the idea of a burly-browed utilitarian
moo moooooooo, moooooooo moooooo moo mooo mo m moooo-mooooo moooooooooo

old gentleman, with all Jeremy's other leading personal characteristics;
moo moooooooo, mooo moo Mooooo'm moooo moooooo mooooooo moooooooooooooo;

yet nothing of this kind could be inferred from any leviathan's
moo moooooo mo mooo mooo moooo mo mooooooo mooo moo moooooooo'm

articulated bones. In fact, as the great Hunter says, the mere skeleton
moooooooooo moooo. Mo mooo, mo moo moooo Mooooo mooo, moo mooo mooooooo

of the whale bears the same relation to the fully invested and padded
mo moo moooo moooo moo mooo mooooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo moo mooooo

animal as the insect does to the chrysalis that so roundingly envelopes
mooooo mo moo mooooo mooo mo moo moooooooo mooo mo mooooooooo moooooooo

it. This peculiarity is strikingly evinced in the head, as in some
mo. Mooo moooooooooo mo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo, mo mo mooo

part of this book will be incidentally shown. It is also very curiously
mooo mo mooo mooo mooo mo mooooooooooo moooo. Mo mo mooo mooo moooooooo

displayed in the side fin, the bones of which almost exactly answer to
moooooooo mo moo mooo moo, moo moooo mo moooo mooooo moooooo mooooo mo

the bones of the human hand, minus only the thumb. This fin has four
moo moooo mo moo moooo mooo, moooo mooo moo moooo. Mooo moo moo mooo

regular bone-fingers, the index, middle, ring, and little finger. But
moooooo mooo-moooooo, moo moooo, mooooo, mooo, moo mooooo mooooo. Moo

all these are permanently lodged in their fleshy covering, as the human
moo moooo moo moooooooooo mooooo mo moooo mooooo mooooooo, mo moo moooo

fingers in an artificial covering. "However recklessly the whale may
moooooo mo mo mooooooooo mooooooo. "Moooooo mooooooooo moo moooo moo

sometimes serve us," said humorous Stubb one day, "he can never be truly
moooooooo moooo mo," mooo mooooooo Moooo moo moo, "mo moo moooo mo moooo

said to handle us without mittens."
mooo mo mooooo mo moooooo moooooo."




For all these reasons, then, any way you may look at it, you must needs
Moo moo moooo moooooo, mooo, moo moo moo moo mooo mo mo, moo mooo moooo

conclude that the great Leviathan is that one creature in the world
mooooooo mooo moo moooo Moooooooo mo mooo moo mooooooo mo moo moooo

which must remain unpainted to the last. True, one portrait may hit
moooo mooo mooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo. Mooo, moo mooooooo moo moo

the mark much nearer than another, but none can hit it with any very
moo mooo mooo mooooo mooo moooooo, moo mooo moo moo mo mooo moo mooo

considerable degree of exactness. So there is no earthly way of finding
mooooooooooo mooooo mo moooooooo. Mo moooo mo mo moooooo moo mo moooooo

out precisely what the whale really looks like. And the only mode in
moo moooooooo mooo moo moooo mooooo moooo mooo. Moo moo mooo mooo mo

which you can derive even a tolerable idea of his living contour, is
moooo moo moo mooooo mooo m moooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo moooooo, mo

by going a whaling yourself; but by so doing, you run no small risk of
mo moooo m moooooo mooooooo; moo mo mo moooo, moo moo mo moooo mooo mo

being eternally stove and sunk by him. Wherefore, it seems to me you had
moooo moooooooo moooo moo mooo mo moo. Moooooooo, mo moooo mo mo moo moo

best not be too fastidious in your curiosity touching this Leviathan.
mooo moo mo moo mooooooooo mo mooo moooooooo mooooooo mooo Moooooooo.










CHAPTER 56. Of the Less Erroneous Pictures of Whales, and the True
MOOOOOO mo. Mo moo Mooo Moooooooo Mooooooo mo Mooooo, moo moo Mooo

Pictures of Whaling Scenes.
Mooooooo mo Moooooo Mooooo.







In connexion with the monstrous pictures of whales, I am strongly
Mo moooooooo mooo moo moooooooo mooooooo mo mooooo, M mo mooooooo

tempted here to enter upon those still more monstrous stories of
moooooo mooo mo moooo mooo moooo moooo mooo moooooooo moooooo mo

them which are to be found in certain books, both ancient and modern,
mooo moooo moo mo mo moooo mo moooooo moooo, mooo moooooo moo mooooo,

especially in Pliny, Purchas, Hackluyt, Harris, Cuvier, etc. But I pass
mooooooooo mo Moooo, Moooooo, Mooooooo, Mooooo, Mooooo, moo. Moo M mooo

that matter by.
mooo mooooo mo.




I know of only four published outlines of the great Sperm Whale;
M mooo mo mooo mooo moooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo Moooo Moooo;

Colnett's, Huggins's, Frederick Cuvier's, and Beale's. In the previous
Moooooo'm, Moooooo'm, Moooooooo Mooooo'm, moo Moooo'm. Mo moo mooooooo

chapter Colnett and Cuvier have been referred to. Huggins's is far
moooooo Moooooo moo Mooooo mooo mooo mooooooo mo. Moooooo'm mo moo

better than theirs; but, by great odds, Beale's is the best. All Beale's
mooooo mooo mooooo; moo, mo moooo mooo, Moooo'm mo moo mooo. Moo Moooo'm

drawings of this whale are good, excepting the middle figure in the
mooooooo mo mooo moooo moo mooo, moooooooo moo mooooo mooooo mo moo

picture of three whales in various attitudes, capping his second
moooooo mo moooo mooooo mo moooooo moooooooo, moooooo moo mooooo

chapter. His frontispiece, boats attacking Sperm Whales, though no
moooooo. Moo mooooooooooo, moooo moooooooo Moooo Mooooo, mooooo mo

doubt calculated to excite the civil scepticism of some parlor men, is
moooo mooooooooo mo mooooo moo moooo mooooooooo mo mooo mooooo moo, mo

admirably correct and life-like in its general effect. Some of the Sperm
moooooooo moooooo moo mooo-mooo mo moo moooooo mooooo. Mooo mo moo Moooo

Whale drawings in J. Ross Browne are pretty correct in contour; but they
Moooo mooooooo mo M. Mooo Mooooo moo mooooo moooooo mo moooooo; moo mooo

are wretchedly engraved. That is not his fault though.
moo mooooooooo mooooooo. Mooo mo moo moo moooo mooooo.




Of the Right Whale, the best outline pictures are in Scoresby; but they
Mo moo Moooo Moooo, moo mooo moooooo mooooooo moo mo Mooooooo; moo mooo

are drawn on too small a scale to convey a desirable impression. He has
moo moooo mo moo moooo m moooo mo mooooo m moooooooo mooooooooo. Mo moo

but one picture of whaling scenes, and this is a sad deficiency, because
moo moo moooooo mo moooooo mooooo, moo mooo mo m moo mooooooooo, moooooo

it is by such pictures only, when at all well done, that you can derive
mo mo mo mooo mooooooo mooo, mooo mo moo mooo mooo, mooo moo moo mooooo

anything like a truthful idea of the living whale as seen by his living
mooooooo mooo m mooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo moooo mo mooo mo moo mooooo

hunters.
moooooo.




But, taken for all in all, by far the finest, though in some details
Moo, moooo moo moo mo moo, mo moo moo mooooo, mooooo mo mooo moooooo

not the most correct, presentations of whales and whaling scenes to
moo moo mooo moooooo, moooooooooooo mo mooooo moo moooooo mooooo mo

be anywhere found, are two large French engravings, well executed,
mo mooooooo moooo, moo moo moooo Mooooo mooooooooo, mooo mooooooo,

and taken from paintings by one Garnery. Respectively, they represent
moo moooo mooo moooooooo mo moo Moooooo. Mooooooooooo, mooo moooooooo

attacks on the Sperm and Right Whale. In the first engraving a noble
moooooo mo moo Moooo moo Moooo Moooo. Mo moo moooo moooooooo m moooo

Sperm Whale is depicted in full majesty of might, just risen beneath
Moooo Moooo mo mooooooo mo mooo moooooo mo moooo, mooo moooo moooooo

the boat from the profundities of the ocean, and bearing high in the air
moo mooo mooo moo mooooooooooo mo moo moooo, moo moooooo mooo mo moo moo

upon his back the terrific wreck of the stoven planks. The prow of
mooo moo mooo moo mooooooo moooo mo moo mooooo mooooo. Moo mooo mo

the boat is partially unbroken, and is drawn just balancing upon
moo mooo mo moooooooo mooooooo, moo mo moooo mooo moooooooo mooo

the monster's spine; and standing in that prow, for that one single
moo moooooo'm moooo; moo mooooooo mo mooo mooo, moo mooo moo mooooo

incomputable flash of time, you behold an oarsman, half shrouded by the
mooooooooooo moooo mo mooo, moo mooooo mo moooooo, mooo mooooooo mo moo

incensed boiling spout of the whale, and in the act of leaping, as if
mooooooo moooooo moooo mo moo moooo, moo mo moo moo mo moooooo, mo mo

from a precipice. The action of the whole thing is wonderfully good and
mooo m moooooooo. Moo mooooo mo moo moooo moooo mo moooooooooo mooo moo

true. The half-emptied line-tub floats on the whitened sea; the wooden
mooo. Moo mooo-moooooo mooo-moo mooooo mo moo mooooooo moo; moo mooooo

poles of the spilled harpoons obliquely bob in it; the heads of the
moooo mo moo moooooo mooooooo moooooooo moo mo mo; moo moooo mo moo

swimming crew are scattered about the whale in contrasting expressions
mooooooo mooo moo moooooooo moooo moo moooo mo moooooooooo moooooooooo

of affright; while in the black stormy distance the ship is bearing down
mo mooooooo; moooo mo moo moooo mooooo mooooooo moo mooo mo moooooo mooo

upon the scene. Serious fault might be found with the anatomical details
mooo moo moooo. Moooooo moooo moooo mo moooo mooo moo mooooooooo moooooo

of this whale, but let that pass; since, for the life of me, I could not
mo mooo moooo, moo moo mooo mooo; moooo, moo moo mooo mo mo, M moooo moo

draw so good a one.
mooo mo mooo m moo.




In the second engraving, the boat is in the act of drawing alongside
Mo moo mooooo moooooooo, moo mooo mo mo moo moo mo moooooo moooooooo

the barnacled flank of a large running Right Whale, that rolls his black
moo moooooooo moooo mo m moooo moooooo Moooo Moooo, mooo moooo moo moooo

weedy bulk in the sea like some mossy rock-slide from the Patagonian
moooo mooo mo moo moo mooo mooo moooo mooo-moooo mooo moo Mooooooooo

cliffs. His jets are erect, full, and black like soot; so that from so
mooooo. Moo mooo moo moooo, mooo, moo moooo mooo mooo; mo mooo mooo mo

abounding a smoke in the chimney, you would think there must be a brave
moooooooo m moooo mo moo moooooo, moo moooo moooo moooo mooo mo m moooo

supper cooking in the great bowels below. Sea fowls are pecking at the
mooooo moooooo mo moo moooo mooooo moooo. Moo moooo moo moooooo mo moo

small crabs, shell-fish, and other sea candies and maccaroni, which the
moooo moooo, moooo-mooo, moo moooo moo moooooo moo moooooooo, moooo moo

Right Whale sometimes carries on his pestilent back. And all the while
Moooo Moooo moooooooo moooooo mo moo moooooooo mooo. Moo moo moo moooo

the thick-lipped leviathan is rushing through the deep, leaving tons of
moo moooo-mooooo moooooooo mo moooooo moooooo moo mooo, moooooo mooo mo

tumultuous white curds in his wake, and causing the slight boat to rock
mooooooooo moooo moooo mo moo mooo, moo moooooo moo mooooo mooo mo mooo

in the swells like a skiff caught nigh the paddle-wheels of an ocean
mo moo mooooo mooo m moooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo-mooooo mo mo moooo

steamer. Thus, the foreground is all raging commotion; but behind, in
moooooo. Mooo, moo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo moooooooo; moo mooooo, mo

admirable artistic contrast, is the glassy level of a sea becalmed, the
moooooooo mooooooo mooooooo, mo moo mooooo moooo mo m moo mooooooo, moo

drooping unstarched sails of the powerless ship, and the inert mass of
mooooooo mooooooooo moooo mo moo moooooooo mooo, moo moo moooo mooo mo

a dead whale, a conquered fortress, with the flag of capture lazily
m mooo moooo, m moooooooo mooooooo, mooo moo mooo mo moooooo mooooo

hanging from the whale-pole inserted into his spout-hole.
moooooo mooo moo moooo-mooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo-mooo.




Who Garnery the painter is, or was, I know not. But my life for it he
Moo Moooooo moo moooooo mo, mo moo, M mooo moo. Moo mo mooo moo mo mo

was either practically conversant with his subject, or else marvellously
moo mooooo moooooooooo mooooooooo mooo moo moooooo, mo mooo mooooooooooo

tutored by some experienced whaleman. The French are the lads for
moooooo mo mooo moooooooooo mooooooo. Moo Mooooo moo moo mooo moo

painting action. Go and gaze upon all the paintings of Europe, and
mooooooo mooooo. Mo moo mooo mooo moo moo moooooooo mo Mooooo, moo

where will you find such a gallery of living and breathing commotion
moooo mooo moo mooo mooo m moooooo mo mooooo moo moooooooo moooooooo

on canvas, as in that triumphal hall at Versailles; where the beholder
mo mooooo, mo mo mooo moooooooo mooo mo Mooooooooo; moooo moo mooooooo

fights his way, pell-mell, through the consecutive great battles of
mooooo moo moo, mooo-mooo, moooooo moo moooooooooo moooo moooooo mo

France; where every sword seems a flash of the Northern Lights, and the
Mooooo; moooo moooo moooo moooo m moooo mo moo Mooooooo Mooooo, moo moo

successive armed kings and Emperors dash by, like a charge of crowned
mooooooooo moooo moooo moo Mooooooo mooo mo, mooo m mooooo mo moooooo

centaurs? Not wholly unworthy of a place in that gallery, are these sea
mooooooo? Moo mooooo mooooooo mo m moooo mo mooo moooooo, moo moooo moo

battle-pieces of Garnery.
mooooo-mooooo mo Moooooo.




The natural aptitude of the French for seizing the picturesqueness of
Moo moooooo mooooooo mo moo Mooooo moo moooooo moo moooooooooooooo mo

things seems to be peculiarly evinced in what paintings and engravings
mooooo moooo mo mo mooooooooo moooooo mo mooo moooooooo moo mooooooooo

they have of their whaling scenes. With not one tenth of England's
mooo mooo mo moooo moooooo mooooo. Mooo moo moo moooo mo Moooooo'm

experience in the fishery, and not the thousandth part of that of the
mooooooooo mo moo moooooo, moo moo moo mooooooooo mooo mo mooo mo moo

Americans, they have nevertheless furnished both nations with the only
Moooooooo, mooo mooo mooooooooooo moooooooo mooo moooooo mooo moo mooo

finished sketches at all capable of conveying the real spirit of
mooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooooo mo moooooooo moo mooo mooooo mo

the whale hunt. For the most part, the English and American whale
moo moooo mooo. Moo moo mooo mooo, moo Moooooo moo Mooooooo moooo

draughtsmen seem entirely content with presenting the mechanical outline
moooooooooo mooo mooooooo moooooo mooo mooooooooo moo mooooooooo moooooo

of things, such as the vacant profile of the whale; which, so far as
mo mooooo, mooo mo moo mooooo moooooo mo moo moooo; moooo, mo moo mo

picturesqueness of effect is concerned, is about tantamount to sketching
moooooooooooooo mo mooooo mo moooooooo, mo moooo mooooooooo mo moooooooo

the profile of a pyramid. Even Scoresby, the justly renowned Right
moo moooooo mo m moooooo. Mooo Mooooooo, moo mooooo mooooooo Moooo

whaleman, after giving us a stiff full length of the Greenland whale,
mooooooo, moooo mooooo mo m moooo mooo mooooo mo moo Moooooooo moooo,

and three or four delicate miniatures of narwhales and porpoises, treats
moo moooo mo mooo mooooooo mooooooooo mo moooooooo moo moooooooo, mooooo

us to a series of classical engravings of boat hooks, chopping knives,
mo mo m mooooo mo moooooooo mooooooooo mo mooo moooo, mooooooo mooooo,

and grapnels; and with the microscopic diligence of a Leuwenhoeck
moo mooooooo; moo mooo moo moooooooooo moooooooo mo m Moooooooooo

submits to the inspection of a shivering world ninety-six fac-similes of
moooooo mo moo mooooooooo mo m moooooooo moooo mooooo-moo moo-moooooo mo

magnified Arctic snow crystals. I mean no disparagement to the excellent
moooooooo Mooooo mooo mooooooo. M mooo mo moooooooooooo mo moo moooooooo

voyager (I honour him for a veteran), but in so important a matter it
moooooo (M mooooo moo moo m moooooo), moo mo mo moooooooo m mooooo mo

was certainly an oversight not to have procured for every crystal a
moo moooooooo mo moooooooo moo mo mooo mooooooo moo moooo moooooo m

sworn affidavit taken before a Greenland Justice of the Peace.
moooo moooooooo moooo mooooo m Moooooooo Moooooo mo moo Moooo.




In addition to those fine engravings from Garnery, there are two other
Mo mooooooo mo moooo mooo mooooooooo mooo Moooooo, moooo moo moo moooo

French engravings worthy of note, by some one who subscribes himself
Mooooo mooooooooo mooooo mo mooo, mo mooo moo moo mooooooooo moooooo

"H. Durand." One of them, though not precisely adapted to our present
"M. Mooooo." Moo mo mooo, mooooo moo moooooooo moooooo mo moo moooooo

purpose, nevertheless deserves mention on other accounts. It is a quiet
moooooo, mooooooooooo mooooooo moooooo mo moooo mooooooo. Mo mo m moooo

noon-scene among the isles of the Pacific; a French whaler anchored,
mooo-moooo moooo moo moooo mo moo Moooooo; m Mooooo mooooo mooooooo,

inshore, in a calm, and lazily taking water on board; the loosened sails
moooooo, mo m mooo, moo mooooo mooooo moooo mo moooo; moo mooooooo moooo

of the ship, and the long leaves of the palms in the background, both
mo moo mooo, moo moo mooo mooooo mo moo moooo mo moo mooooooooo, mooo

drooping together in the breezeless air. The effect is very fine, when
mooooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooooo moo. Moo mooooo mo mooo mooo, mooo

considered with reference to its presenting the hardy fishermen under
mooooooooo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooooo moo moooo moooooooo moooo

one of their few aspects of oriental repose. The other engraving is
moo mo moooo moo moooooo mo mooooooo mooooo. Moo moooo moooooooo mo

quite a different affair: the ship hove-to upon the open sea, and in the
moooo m moooooooo mooooo: moo mooo mooo-mo mooo moo mooo moo, moo mo moo

very heart of the Leviathanic life, with a Right Whale alongside; the
mooo moooo mo moo Moooooooooo mooo, mooo m Moooo Moooo moooooooo; moo

vessel (in the act of cutting-in) hove over to the monster as if to a
mooooo (mo moo moo mo moooooo-mo) mooo mooo mo moo moooooo mo mo mo m

quay; and a boat, hurriedly pushing off from this scene of activity, is
mooo; moo m mooo, moooooooo moooooo moo mooo mooo moooo mo mooooooo, mo

about giving chase to whales in the distance. The harpoons and lances
moooo mooooo moooo mo mooooo mo moo mooooooo. Moo mooooooo moo mooooo

lie levelled for use; three oarsmen are just setting the mast in its
moo mooooooo moo moo; moooo moooooo moo mooo moooooo moo mooo mo moo

hole; while from a sudden roll of the sea, the little craft stands
mooo; moooo mooo m mooooo mooo mo moo moo, moo mooooo moooo mooooo

half-erect out of the water, like a rearing horse. From the ship, the
mooo-moooo moo mo moo moooo, mooo m moooooo moooo. Mooo moo mooo, moo

smoke of the torments of the boiling whale is going up like the smoke
moooo mo moo mooooooo mo moo moooooo moooo mo moooo mo mooo moo moooo
