mooo m moooooo mo mooooooo; moo mo mooooooo, m moooo moooo, mooooo mo

with earnest of squalls and rains, seems to quicken the activity of the
mooo moooooo mo moooooo moo moooo, moooo mo moooooo moo mooooooo mo moo

excited seamen.
moooooo mooooo.










CHAPTER 57. Of Whales in Paint; in Teeth; in Wood; in Sheet-Iron; in
MOOOOOO mo. Mo Mooooo mo Moooo; mo Moooo; mo Mooo; mo Moooo-Mooo; mo

Stone; in Mountains; in Stars.
Moooo; mo Moooooooo; mo Moooo.







On Tower-hill, as you go down to the London docks, you may have seen a
Mo Moooo-mooo, mo moo mo mooo mo moo Mooooo moooo, moo moo mooo mooo m

crippled beggar (or KEDGER, as the sailors say) holding a painted board
mooooooo mooooo (mo MOOOOO, mo moo moooooo moo) moooooo m moooooo moooo

before him, representing the tragic scene in which he lost his leg.
mooooo moo, mooooooooooo moo mooooo moooo mo moooo mo mooo moo moo.

There are three whales and three boats; and one of the boats (presumed
Moooo moo moooo mooooo moo moooo moooo; moo moo mo moo moooo (mooooooo

to contain the missing leg in all its original integrity) is being
mo moooooo moo moooooo moo mo moo moo mooooooo moooooooo) mo moooo

crunched by the jaws of the foremost whale. Any time these ten years,
mooooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo moooo. Moo mooo moooo moo moooo,

they tell me, has that man held up that picture, and exhibited that
mooo mooo mo, moo mooo moo mooo mo mooo moooooo, moo moooooooo mooo

stump to an incredulous world. But the time of his justification has
moooo mo mo moooooooooo moooo. Moo moo mooo mo moo moooooooooooo moo

now come. His three whales are as good whales as were ever published in
moo mooo. Moo moooo mooooo moo mo mooo mooooo mo mooo mooo moooooooo mo

Wapping, at any rate; and his stump as unquestionable a stump as any you
Moooooo, mo moo mooo; moo moo moooo mo mooooooooooooo m moooo mo moo moo

will find in the western clearings. But, though for ever mounted on
mooo mooo mo moo moooooo moooooooo. Moo, mooooo moo mooo moooooo mo

that stump, never a stump-speech does the poor whaleman make; but, with
mooo moooo, moooo m moooo-mooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo; moo, mooo

downcast eyes, stands ruefully contemplating his own amputation.
mooooooo mooo, mooooo mooooooo moooooooooooo moo moo mooooooooo.




Throughout the Pacific, and also in Nantucket, and New Bedford, and
Mooooooooo moo Moooooo, moo mooo mo Moooooooo, moo Moo Moooooo, moo

Sag Harbor, you will come across lively sketches of whales and
Moo Mooooo, moo mooo mooo mooooo mooooo mooooooo mo mooooo moo

whaling-scenes, graven by the fishermen themselves on Sperm Whale-teeth,
moooooo-mooooo, mooooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooooo mo Moooo Moooo-moooo,

or ladies' busks wrought out of the Right Whale-bone, and other
mo mooooo' moooo moooooo moo mo moo Moooo Moooo-mooo, moo moooo

like skrimshander articles, as the whalemen call the numerous little
mooo mooooooooooo mooooooo, mo moo mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooooo

ingenious contrivances they elaborately carve out of the rough material,
moooooooo mooooooooooo mooo moooooooooo moooo moo mo moo moooo mooooooo,

in their hours of ocean leisure. Some of them have little boxes
mo moooo moooo mo moooo moooooo. Mooo mo mooo mooo mooooo moooo

of dentistical-looking implements, specially intended for the
mo moooooooooo-moooooo mooooooooo, moooooooo mooooooo moo moo

skrimshandering business. But, in general, they toil with their
moooooooooooooo mooooooo. Moo, mo moooooo, mooo mooo mooo moooo

jack-knives alone; and, with that almost omnipotent tool of the sailor,
mooo-mooooo moooo; moo, mooo mooo mooooo mooooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo,

they will turn you out anything you please, in the way of a mariner's
mooo mooo mooo moo moo mooooooo moo mooooo, mo moo moo mo m moooooo'm

fancy.
moooo.




Long exile from Christendom and civilization inevitably restores a man
Mooo moooo mooo Moooooooooo moo mooooooooooo mooooooooo mooooooo m moo

to that condition in which God placed him, i.e. what is called savagery.
mo mooo moooooooo mo moooo Moo mooooo moo, m.m. mooo mo mooooo mooooooo.

Your true whale-hunter is as much a savage as an Iroquois. I myself am a
Mooo mooo moooo-mooooo mo mo mooo m mooooo mo mo Mooooooo. M mooooo mo m

savage, owning no allegiance but to the King of the Cannibals; and ready
mooooo, mooooo mo mooooooooo moo mo moo Mooo mo moo Moooooooo; moo moooo

at any moment to rebel against him.
mo moo mooooo mo moooo moooooo moo.




Now, one of the peculiar characteristics of the savage in his domestic
Moo, moo mo moo mooooooo moooooooooooooo mo moo mooooo mo moo mooooooo

hours, is his wonderful patience of industry. An ancient Hawaiian
moooo, mo moo moooooooo mooooooo mo mooooooo. Mo moooooo Mooooooo

war-club or spear-paddle, in its full multiplicity and elaboration of
moo-mooo mo moooo-mooooo, mo moo mooo mooooooooooo moo moooooooooo mo

carving, is as great a trophy of human perseverance as a Latin lexicon.
moooooo, mo mo moooo m mooooo mo moooo mooooooooooo mo m Moooo moooooo.

For, with but a bit of broken sea-shell or a shark's tooth, that
Moo, mooo moo m moo mo mooooo moo-moooo mo m moooo'm moooo, mooo

miraculous intricacy of wooden net-work has been achieved; and it has
mooooooooo moooooooo mo mooooo moo-mooo moo mooo mooooooo; moo mo moo

cost steady years of steady application.
mooo mooooo moooo mo mooooo moooooooooo.




As with the Hawaiian savage, so with the white sailor-savage. With the
Mo mooo moo Mooooooo mooooo, mo mooo moo moooo mooooo-mooooo. Mooo moo

same marvellous patience, and with the same single shark's tooth, of
mooo mooooooooo mooooooo, moo mooo moo mooo mooooo moooo'm moooo, mo

his one poor jack-knife, he will carve you a bit of bone sculpture, not
moo moo mooo mooo-moooo, mo mooo moooo moo m moo mo mooo moooooooo, moo

quite as workmanlike, but as close packed in its maziness of design,
moooo mo moooooooooo, moo mo moooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo mo mooooo,

as the Greek savage, Achilles's shield; and full of barbaric spirit
mo moo Moooo mooooo, Mooooooo'm mooooo; moo mooo mo mooooooo mooooo

and suggestiveness, as the prints of that fine old Dutch savage, Albert
moo mooooooooooooo, mo moo mooooo mo mooo mooo moo Moooo mooooo, Mooooo

Durer.
Moooo.




Wooden whales, or whales cut in profile out of the small dark slabs of
Mooooo mooooo, mo mooooo moo mo moooooo moo mo moo moooo mooo moooo mo

the noble South Sea war-wood, are frequently met with in the forecastles
moo moooo Moooo Moo moo-mooo, moo mooooooooo moo mooo mo moo moooooooooo

of American whalers. Some of them are done with much accuracy.
mo Mooooooo moooooo. Mooo mo mooo moo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo.




At some old gable-roofed country houses you will see brass whales hung
Mo mooo moo moooo-mooooo moooooo mooooo moo mooo moo moooo mooooo mooo

by the tail for knockers to the road-side door. When the porter is
mo moo mooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo-mooo mooo. Mooo moo mooooo mo

sleepy, the anvil-headed whale would be best. But these knocking
mooooo, moo moooo-mooooo moooo moooo mo mooo. Moo moooo mooooooo

whales are seldom remarkable as faithful essays. On the spires of some
mooooo moo mooooo mooooooooo mo mooooooo mooooo. Mo moo mooooo mo mooo

old-fashioned churches you will see sheet-iron whales placed there for
moo-moooooooo mooooooo moo mooo moo moooo-mooo mooooo mooooo moooo moo

weather-cocks; but they are so elevated, and besides that are to all
moooooo-moooo; moo mooo moo mo mooooooo, moo moooooo mooo moo mo moo

intents and purposes so labelled with "HANDS OFF!" you cannot examine
moooooo moo mooooooo mo mooooooo mooo "MOOOO MOO!" moo mooooo moooooo

them closely enough to decide upon their merit.
mooo moooooo mooooo mo mooooo mooo moooo moooo.




In bony, ribby regions of the earth, where at the base of high broken
Mo mooo, moooo moooooo mo moo moooo, moooo mo moo mooo mo mooo mooooo

cliffs masses of rock lie strewn in fantastic groupings upon the
mooooo mooooo mo mooo moo mooooo mo moooooooo moooooooo mooo moo

moooo, moo mooo moooo mooooooo mooooo mo mo moo moooooooo moooo mo moo

Leviathan partly merged in grass, which of a windy day breaks against
Moooooooo mooooo mooooo mo moooo, moooo mo m moooo moo mooooo moooooo

them in a surf of green surges.
mooo mo m mooo mo moooo mooooo.




Then, again, in mountainous countries where the traveller is continually
Mooo, moooo, mo moooooooooo moooooooo moooo moo moooooooo mo moooooooooo

girdled by amphitheatrical heights; here and there from some lucky
moooooo mo moooooooooooooo moooooo; mooo moo moooo mooo mooo moooo

moooo mo mooo moo mooo moooo moooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo mo

whales defined along the undulating ridges. But you must be a thorough
mooooo moooooo moooo moo mooooooooo mooooo. Moo moo mooo mo m mooooooo

whaleman, to see these sights; and not only that, but if you wish
mooooooo, mo moo moooo mooooo; moo moo mooo mooo, moo mo moo mooo

mo mooooo mo mooo m moooo moooo, moo mooo mo mooo moo mooo moo moooo

intersecting latitude and longitude of your first stand-point, else
mooooooooooo mooooooo moo moooooooo mo mooo moooo moooo-moooo, mooo

so chance-like are such observations of the hills, that your precise,
mo mooooo-mooo moo mooo mooooooooooo mo moo moooo, mooo mooo moooooo,

previous stand-point would require a laborious re-discovery; like the
mooooooo moooo-moooo moooo moooooo m moooooooo mo-moooooooo; mooo moo

Soloma Islands, which still remain incognita, though once high-ruffed
Mooooo Moooooo, moooo moooo mooooo moooooooo, mooooo mooo mooo-mooooo

Mendanna trod them and old Figuera chronicled them.
Mooooooo mooo mooo moo moo Moooooo mooooooooo mooo.




Nor when expandingly lifted by your subject, can you fail to trace out
Moo mooo moooooooooo mooooo mo mooo moooooo, moo moo mooo mo moooo moo

great whales in the starry heavens, and boats in pursuit of them; as
moooo mooooo mo moo mooooo moooooo, moo moooo mo moooooo mo mooo; mo

when long filled with thoughts of war the Eastern nations saw armies
mooo mooo mooooo mooo mooooooo mo moo moo Moooooo moooooo moo mooooo

locked in battle among the clouds. Thus at the North have I chased
mooooo mo mooooo moooo moo mooooo. Mooo mo moo Moooo mooo M mooooo

Moooooooo moooo moo moooo moo Mooo mooo moo moooooooooo mo moo mooooo

moooo M mooo moooooo moo Mooo-Moooo, moo mooooo moo moooo moooooo moo

mooooo Moooo moo mooooo moo mooooo moooooo mo Mooooo moo moo Mooooo

Fish.
Mooo.




With a frigate's anchors for my bridle-bitts and fasces of harpoons for
Mooo m moooooo'm moooooo moo mo mooooo-moooo moo mooooo mo mooooooo moo

moooo, moooo M moooo moooo mooo moooo moo mooo moo moooooo moooo, mo

moo moooooo moo mooooo moooooo mooo moo moooo moooooooo moooo mooooo moo

mooooooo mooooo mo mooooo moooo!










CHAPTER 58. Brit.
MOOOOOO mo. Mooo.







Steering north-eastward from the Crozetts, we fell in with vast meadows
Mooooooo moooo-mooooooo mooo moo Mooooooo, mo mooo mo mooo mooo moooooo

of brit, the minute, yellow substance, upon which the Right Whale
mo mooo, moo mooooo, mooooo moooooooo, mooo moooo moo Moooo Moooo

largely feeds. For leagues and leagues it undulated round us, so that we
moooooo moooo. Moo moooooo moo moooooo mo moooooooo moooo mo, mo mooo mo

seemed to be sailing through boundless fields of ripe and golden wheat.
mooooo mo mo moooooo moooooo moooooooo mooooo mo mooo moo mooooo moooo.




On the second day, numbers of Right Whales were seen, who, secure from
Mo moo mooooo moo, moooooo mo Moooo Mooooo mooo mooo, moo, mooooo mooo

the attack of a Sperm Whaler like the Pequod, with open jaws sluggishly
moo mooooo mo m Moooo Mooooo mooo moo Mooooo, mooo mooo mooo mooooooooo

swam through the brit, which, adhering to the fringing fibres of that
mooo moooooo moo mooo, moooo, mooooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo mo mooo

wondrous Venetian blind in their mouths, was in that manner separated
mooooooo Mooooooo moooo mo moooo mooooo, moo mo mooo mooooo moooooooo

from the water that escaped at the lip.
mooo moo moooo mooo moooooo mo moo moo.




As morning mowers, who side by side slowly and seethingly advance
Mo moooooo mooooo, moo mooo mo mooo mooooo moo mooooooooo moooooo

their scythes through the long wet grass of marshy meads; even so these
moooo moooooo moooooo moo mooo moo moooo mo mooooo moooo; mooo mo moooo

monsters swam, making a strange, grassy, cutting sound; and leaving
mooooooo mooo, mooooo m moooooo, mooooo, moooooo moooo; moo moooooo

behind them endless swaths of blue upon the yellow sea.*
mooooo mooo moooooo mooooo mo mooo mooo moo mooooo moo.*







*That part of the sea known among whalemen as the "Brazil Banks" does
*Mooo mooo mo moo moo moooo moooo mooooooo mo moo "Mooooo Moooo" mooo

not bear that name as the Banks of Newfoundland do, because of there
moo mooo mooo mooo mo moo Moooo mo Mooooooooooo mo, moooooo mo moooo

being shallows and soundings there, but because of this remarkable
moooo mooooooo moo moooooooo moooo, moo moooooo mo mooo mooooooooo

meadow-like appearance, caused by the vast drifts of brit continually
mooooo-mooo mooooooooo, mooooo mo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo moooooooooo

floating in those latitudes, where the Right Whale is often chased.
mooooooo mo moooo moooooooo, moooo moo Moooo Moooo mo moooo mooooo.







But it was only the sound they made as they parted the brit which at all
Moo mo moo mooo moo moooo mooo mooo mo mooo mooooo moo mooo moooo mo moo

reminded one of mowers. Seen from the mast-heads, especially when they
mooooooo moo mo mooooo. Mooo mooo moo mooo-moooo, mooooooooo mooo mooo

paused and were stationary for a while, their vast black forms looked
mooooo moo mooo mooooooooo moo m moooo, moooo mooo moooo moooo mooooo

more like lifeless masses of rock than anything else. And as in the
mooo mooo mooooooo mooooo mo mooo mooo mooooooo mooo. Moo mo mo moo

great hunting countries of India, the stranger at a distance will
moooo moooooo moooooooo mo Moooo, moo mooooooo mo m mooooooo mooo

sometimes pass on the plains recumbent elephants without knowing them
moooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo moooooooo moooooooo moooooo moooooo mooo

to be such, taking them for bare, blackened elevations of the soil; even
mo mo mooo, mooooo mooo moo mooo, moooooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooo; mooo

so, often, with him, who for the first time beholds this species of the
mo, moooo, mooo moo, moo moo moo moooo mooo moooooo mooo moooooo mo moo

leviathans of the sea. And even when recognised at last, their immense
mooooooooo mo moo moo. Moo mooo mooo mooooooooo mo mooo, moooo moooooo

magnitude renders it very hard really to believe that such bulky masses
moooooooo moooooo mo mooo mooo mooooo mo moooooo mooo mooo moooo mooooo

of overgrowth can possibly be instinct, in all parts, with the same sort
mo mooooooooo moo mooooooo mo mooooooo, mo moo moooo, mooo moo mooo mooo

of life that lives in a dog or a horse.
mo mooo mooo moooo mo m moo mo m moooo.




Indeed, in other respects, you can hardly regard any creatures of the
Mooooo, mo moooo mooooooo, moo moo mooooo mooooo moo moooooooo mo moo

deep with the same feelings that you do those of the shore. For though
mooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo moo mo moooo mo moo moooo. Moo mooooo

some old naturalists have maintained that all creatures of the land are
mooo moo moooooooooo mooo mooooooooo mooo moo moooooooo mo moo mooo moo

of their kind in the sea; and though taking a broad general view of
mo moooo mooo mo moo moo; moo mooooo mooooo m moooo moooooo mooo mo

the thing, this may very well be; yet coming to specialties, where, for
moo moooo, mooo moo mooo mooo mo; moo mooooo mo moooooooooo, moooo, moo

example, does the ocean furnish any fish that in disposition answers to
moooooo, mooo moo moooo moooooo moo mooo mooo mo moooooooooo moooooo mo

the sagacious kindness of the dog? The accursed shark alone can in any
moo moooooooo mooooooo mo moo moo? Moo mooooooo moooo moooo moo mo moo

generic respect be said to bear comparative analogy to him.
moooooo moooooo mo mooo mo mooo moooooooooo moooooo mo moo.




But though, to landsmen in general, the native inhabitants of the
Moo mooooo, mo mooooooo mo moooooo, moo mooooo moooooooooo mo moo

seas have ever been regarded with emotions unspeakably unsocial and
mooo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo mooo mooooooo moooooooooo mooooooo moo

repelling; though we know the sea to be an everlasting terra incognita,
moooooooo; mooooo mo mooo moo moo mo mo mo moooooooooo moooo moooooooo,

so that Columbus sailed over numberless unknown worlds to discover his
mo mooo Mooooooo mooooo mooo mooooooooo moooooo mooooo mo mooooooo moo

one superficial western one; though, by vast odds, the most terrific
moo moooooooooo moooooo moo; mooooo, mo mooo mooo, moo mooo mooooooo

of all mortal disasters have immemorially and indiscriminately befallen
mo moo mooooo moooooooo mooo mooooooooooo moo mooooooooooooooo mooooooo

tens and hundreds of thousands of those who have gone upon the waters;
mooo moo mooooooo mo moooooooo mo moooo moo mooo mooo mooo moo mooooo;

though but a moment's consideration will teach, that however baby man
mooooo moo m mooooo'm moooooooooooo mooo moooo, mooo moooooo mooo moo

may brag of his science and skill, and however much, in a flattering
moo mooo mo moo moooooo moo moooo, moo moooooo mooo, mo m mooooooooo

future, that science and skill may augment; yet for ever and for ever,
mooooo, mooo moooooo moo moooo moo moooooo; moo moo mooo moo moo mooo,

to the crack of doom, the sea will insult and murder him, and pulverize
mo moo moooo mo mooo, moo moo mooo mooooo moo mooooo moo, moo moooooooo

the stateliest, stiffest frigate he can make; nevertheless, by the
moo mooooooooo, mooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo; mooooooooooo, mo moo

continual repetition of these very impressions, man has lost that sense
moooooooo mooooooooo mo moooo mooo moooooooooo, moo moo mooo mooo moooo

of the full awfulness of the sea which aboriginally belongs to it.
mo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo moo moooo mooooooooooo moooooo mo mo.




The first boat we read of, floated on an ocean, that with Portuguese
Moo moooo mooo mo mooo mo, moooooo mo mo moooo, mooo mooo Mooooooooo

vengeance had whelmed a whole world without leaving so much as a widow.
moooooooo moo moooooo m moooo moooo moooooo moooooo mo mooo mo m moooo.

That same ocean rolls now; that same ocean destroyed the wrecked ships
Mooo mooo moooo moooo moo; mooo mooo moooo moooooooo moo moooooo moooo

of last year. Yea, foolish mortals, Noah's flood is not yet subsided;
mo mooo mooo. Moo, moooooo moooooo, Mooo'm moooo mo moo moo mooooooo;

two thirds of the fair world it yet covers.
moo mooooo mo moo mooo moooo mo moo mooooo.




Wherein differ the sea and the land, that a miracle upon one is not a
Moooooo mooooo moo moo moo moo mooo, mooo m moooooo mooo moo mo moo m

miracle upon the other? Preternatural terrors rested upon the Hebrews,
moooooo mooo moo moooo? Moooooooooooo moooooo mooooo mooo moo Moooooo,

when under the feet of Korah and his company the live ground opened
mooo moooo moo mooo mo Moooo moo moo moooooo moo mooo mooooo mooooo

and swallowed them up for ever; yet not a modern sun ever sets, but in
moo moooooooo mooo mo moo mooo; moo moo m mooooo moo mooo mooo, moo mo

precisely the same manner the live sea swallows up ships and crews.
moooooooo moo mooo mooooo moo mooo moo mooooooo mo moooo moo moooo.




But not only is the sea such a foe to man who is an alien to it, but it
Moo moo mooo mo moo moo mooo m moo mo moo moo mo mo moooo mo mo, moo mo

is also a fiend to its own off-spring; worse than the Persian host who
mo mooo m moooo mo moo moo moo-mooooo; moooo mooo moo Moooooo mooo moo

murdered his own guests; sparing not the creatures which itself hath
mooooooo moo moo mooooo; moooooo moo moo moooooooo moooo mooooo mooo

spawned. Like a savage tigress that tossing in the jungle overlays her
moooooo. Mooo m mooooo moooooo mooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo moo

own cubs, so the sea dashes even the mightiest whales against the rocks,
moo mooo, mo moo moo mooooo mooo moo moooooooo mooooo moooooo moo moooo,

and leaves them there side by side with the split wrecks of ships. No
moo mooooo mooo moooo mooo mo mooo mooo moo moooo mooooo mo moooo. Mo

mercy, no power but its own controls it. Panting and snorting like a mad
moooo, mo moooo moo moo moo mooooooo mo. Moooooo moo mooooooo mooo m moo

battle steed that has lost its rider, the masterless ocean overruns the
mooooo moooo mooo moo mooo moo moooo, moo mooooooooo moooo mooooooo moo

globe.
moooo.




Consider the subtleness of the sea; how its most dreaded creatures glide
Mooooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo moo; moo moo mooo moooooo moooooooo moooo

under water, unapparent for the most part, and treacherously hidden
moooo moooo, mooooooooo moo moo mooo mooo, moo moooooooooooo mooooo

beneath the loveliest tints of azure. Consider also the devilish
moooooo moo moooooooo moooo mo moooo. Mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo

brilliance and beauty of many of its most remorseless tribes, as the
mooooooooo moo mooooo mo mooo mo moo mooo moooooooooo mooooo, mo moo

dainty embellished shape of many species of sharks. Consider, once more,
mooooo moooooooooo moooo mo mooo moooooo mo mooooo. Mooooooo, mooo mooo,

the universal cannibalism of the sea; all whose creatures prey upon each
moo moooooooo moooooooooo mo moo moo; moo moooo moooooooo mooo mooo mooo

other, carrying on eternal war since the world began.
moooo, mooooooo mo moooooo moo moooo moo moooo moooo.




Consider all this; and then turn to this green, gentle, and most docile
Mooooooo moo mooo; moo mooo mooo mo mooo moooo, mooooo, moo mooo mooooo

earth; consider them both, the sea and the land; and do you not find a
moooo; mooooooo mooo mooo, moo moo moo moo mooo; moo mo moo moo mooo m

strange analogy to something in yourself? For as this appalling ocean
moooooo moooooo mo moooooooo mo mooooooo? Moo mo mooo moooooooo moooo

surrounds the verdant land, so in the soul of man there lies one insular
moooooooo moo moooooo mooo, mo mo moo mooo mo moo moooo mooo moo moooooo

Tahiti, full of peace and joy, but encompassed by all the horrors of the
Mooooo, mooo mo moooo moo moo, moo moooooooooo mo moo moo moooooo mo moo

half known life. God keep thee! Push not off from that isle, thou canst
mooo moooo mooo. Moo mooo mooo! Mooo moo moo mooo mooo mooo, mooo moooo

never return!
moooo mooooo!







CHAPTER 59. Squid.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooo.







Slowly wading through the meadows of brit, the Pequod still held on her
Mooooo mooooo moooooo moo moooooo mo mooo, moo Mooooo moooo mooo mo moo

way north-eastward towards the island of Java; a gentle air impelling
moo moooo-mooooooo moooooo moo mooooo mo Mooo; m mooooo moo moooooooo

her keel, so that in the surrounding serenity her three tall tapering
moo mooo, mo mooo mo moo moooooooooo mooooooo moo moooo mooo mooooooo

masts mildly waved to that languid breeze, as three mild palms on a
moooo mooooo moooo mo mooo moooooo mooooo, mo moooo mooo moooo mo m

plain. And still, at wide intervals in the silvery night, the lonely,
moooo. Moo moooo, mo mooo moooooooo mo moo moooooo moooo, moo mooooo,

alluring jet would be seen.
mooooooo moo moooo mo mooo.




But one transparent blue morning, when a stillness almost preternatural
Moo moo moooooooooo mooo moooooo, mooo m moooooooo mooooo moooooooooooo

spread over the sea, however unattended with any stagnant calm; when
mooooo mooo moo moo, moooooo mooooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo; mooo

the long burnished sun-glade on the waters seemed a golden finger laid
moo mooo moooooooo moo-moooo mo moo mooooo mooooo m mooooo mooooo mooo

across them, enjoining some secrecy; when the slippered waves whispered
mooooo mooo, moooooooo mooo moooooo; mooo moo moooooooo moooo moooooooo

together as they softly ran on; in this profound hush of the visible
mooooooo mo mooo mooooo moo mo; mo mooo mooooooo mooo mo moo moooooo

sphere a strange spectre was seen by Daggoo from the main-mast-head.
mooooo m moooooo moooooo moo mooo mo Mooooo mooo moo mooo-mooo-mooo.




In the distance, a great white mass lazily rose, and rising higher and
Mo moo mooooooo, m moooo moooo mooo mooooo mooo, moo mooooo mooooo moo

higher, and disentangling itself from the azure, at last gleamed before
mooooo, moo moooooooooooo mooooo mooo moo moooo, mo mooo moooooo mooooo

our prow like a snow-slide, new slid from the hills. Thus glistening
moo mooo mooo m mooo-moooo, moo mooo mooo moo moooo. Mooo mooooooooo

for a moment, as slowly it subsided, and sank. Then once more arose,
moo m mooooo, mo mooooo mo mooooooo, moo mooo. Mooo mooo mooo moooo,

and silently gleamed. It seemed not a whale; and yet is this Moby Dick?
moo mooooooo moooooo. Mo mooooo moo m moooo; moo moo mo mooo Mooo Mooo?

thought Daggoo. Again the phantom went down, but on re-appearing once
moooooo Mooooo. Moooo moo moooooo mooo mooo, moo mo mo-moooooooo mooo

more, with a stiletto-like cry that startled every man from his nod, the
mooo, mooo m mooooooo-mooo moo mooo mooooooo moooo moo mooo moo moo, moo

negro yelled out--"There! there again! there she breaches! right ahead!
moooo mooooo moo--"Moooo! moooo moooo! moooo moo mooooooo! moooo moooo!

The White Whale, the White Whale!"
Moo Moooo Moooo, moo Moooo Moooo!"




Upon this, the seamen rushed to the yard-arms, as in swarming-time the
Mooo mooo, moo mooooo mooooo mo moo mooo-mooo, mo mo mooooooo-mooo moo

bees rush to the boughs. Bare-headed in the sultry sun, Ahab stood on
mooo mooo mo moo mooooo. Mooo-mooooo mo moo mooooo moo, Mooo moooo mo

the bowsprit, and with one hand pushed far behind in readiness to wave
moo mooooooo, moo mooo moo mooo mooooo moo mooooo mo moooooooo mo mooo

his orders to the helmsman, cast his eager glance in the direction
moo mooooo mo moo mooooooo, mooo moo moooo mooooo mo moo moooooooo

indicated aloft by the outstretched motionless arm of Daggoo.
moooooooo moooo mo moo mooooooooooo mooooooooo moo mo Mooooo.




Whether the flitting attendance of the one still and solitary jet had
Moooooo moo mooooooo mooooooooo mo moo moo moooo moo mooooooo moo moo

gradually worked upon Ahab, so that he was now prepared to connect the
moooooooo mooooo mooo Mooo, mo mooo mo moo moo mooooooo mo moooooo moo

ideas of mildness and repose with the first sight of the particular
moooo mo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo moo moooo moooo mo moo mooooooooo

whale he pursued; however this was, or whether his eagerness betrayed
moooo mo moooooo; moooooo mooo moo, mo moooooo moo moooooooo mooooooo

him; whichever way it might have been, no sooner did he distinctly
moo; moooooooo moo mo moooo mooo mooo, mo mooooo moo mo mooooooooo

perceive the white mass, than with a quick intensity he instantly gave
mooooooo moo moooo mooo, mooo mooo m moooo moooooooo mo moooooooo mooo

orders for lowering.
mooooo moo mooooooo.




The four boats were soon on the water; Ahab's in advance, and all
Moo mooo moooo mooo mooo mo moo moooo; Mooo'm mo moooooo, moo moo

swiftly pulling towards their prey. Soon it went down, and while, with
moooooo moooooo moooooo moooo mooo. Mooo mo mooo mooo, moo moooo, mooo

oars suspended, we were awaiting its reappearance, lo! in the same
mooo moooooooo, mo mooo mooooooo moo mooooooooooo, mo! mo moo mooo

spot where it sank, once more it slowly rose. Almost forgetting for
mooo moooo mo mooo, mooo mooo mo mooooo mooo. Mooooo mooooooooo moo

the moment all thoughts of Moby Dick, we now gazed at the most wondrous
moo mooooo moo mooooooo mo Mooo Mooo, mo moo moooo mo moo mooo mooooooo

phenomenon which the secret seas have hitherto revealed to mankind.
mooooooooo moooo moo mooooo mooo mooo mooooooo mooooooo mo moooooo.

A vast pulpy mass, furlongs in length and breadth, of a glancing
M mooo moooo mooo, mooooooo mo mooooo moo moooooo, mo m mooooooo

cream-colour, lay floating on the water, innumerable long arms radiating
moooo-mooooo, moo mooooooo mo moo moooo, moooooooooo mooo mooo moooooooo

from its centre, and curling and twisting like a nest of anacondas, as
mooo moo mooooo, moo moooooo moo mooooooo mooo m mooo mo moooooooo, mo

if blindly to clutch at any hapless object within reach. No perceptible
mo moooooo mo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooooo mooooo moooo. Mo moooooooooo

face or front did it have; no conceivable token of either sensation or
mooo mo moooo moo mo mooo; mo moooooooooo moooo mo mooooo moooooooo mo

instinct; but undulated there on the billows, an unearthly, formless,
mooooooo; moo moooooooo moooo mo moo moooooo, mo moooooooo, mooooooo,

chance-like apparition of life.
mooooo-mooo mooooooooo mo mooo.




As with a low sucking sound it slowly disappeared again, Starbuck still
Mo mooo m moo moooooo moooo mo mooooo moooooooooo moooo, Mooooooo moooo

gazing at the agitated waters where it had sunk, with a wild voice
mooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo moooo mo moo mooo, mooo m mooo moooo

exclaimed--"Almost rather had I seen Moby Dick and fought him, than to
moooooooo--"Mooooo mooooo moo M mooo Mooo Mooo moo mooooo moo, mooo mo

have seen thee, thou white ghost!"
mooo mooo mooo, mooo moooo moooo!"




"What was it, Sir?" said Flask.
"Mooo moo mo, Moo?" mooo Moooo.




"The great live squid, which, they say, few whale-ships ever beheld, and
"Moo moooo mooo moooo, moooo, mooo moo, moo moooo-moooo mooo mooooo, moo

returned to their ports to tell of it."
mooooooo mo moooo moooo mo mooo mo mo."




But Ahab said nothing; turning his boat, he sailed back to the vessel;
Moo Mooo mooo moooooo; moooooo moo mooo, mo mooooo mooo mo moo mooooo;

the rest as silently following.
moo mooo mo mooooooo moooooooo.




Whatever superstitions the sperm whalemen in general have connected with
Mooooooo moooooooooooo moo moooo mooooooo mo moooooo mooo moooooooo mooo

the sight of this object, certain it is, that a glimpse of it being
moo moooo mo mooo mooooo, moooooo mo mo, mooo m moooooo mo mo moooo

so very unusual, that circumstance has gone far to invest it with
mo mooo moooooo, mooo mooooooooooo moo mooo moo mo mooooo mo mooo

portentousness. So rarely is it beheld, that though one and all of them
mooooooooooooo. Mo mooooo mo mo mooooo, mooo mooooo moo moo moo mo mooo

declare it to be the largest animated thing in the ocean, yet very few
moooooo mo mo mo moo moooooo mooooooo moooo mo moo moooo, moo mooo moo

of them have any but the most vague ideas concerning its true nature and
mo mooo mooo moo moo moo mooo moooo moooo mooooooooo moo mooo mooooo moo

form; notwithstanding, they believe it to furnish to the sperm whale
mooo; moooooooooooooo, mooo moooooo mo mo moooooo mo moo moooo moooo

his only food. For though other species of whales find their food above
moo mooo mooo. Moo mooooo moooo moooooo mo mooooo mooo moooo mooo moooo

water, and may be seen by man in the act of feeding, the spermaceti
moooo, moo moo mo mooo mo moo mo moo moo mo moooooo, moo mooooooooo

whale obtains his whole food in unknown zones below the surface; and
moooo moooooo moo moooo mooo mo moooooo moooo moooo moo moooooo; moo

only by inference is it that any one can tell of what, precisely, that
mooo mo moooooooo mo mo mooo moo moo moo mooo mo mooo, moooooooo, mooo

food consists. At times, when closely pursued, he will disgorge what
mooo mooooooo. Mo moooo, mooo moooooo moooooo, mo mooo mooooooo mooo

are supposed to be the detached arms of the squid; some of them thus
moo mooooooo mo mo moo mooooooo mooo mo moo moooo; mooo mo mooo mooo

exhibited exceeding twenty and thirty feet in length. They fancy that
moooooooo moooooooo mooooo moo mooooo mooo mo mooooo. Mooo moooo mooo

the monster to which these arms belonged ordinarily clings by them to
moo moooooo mo moooo moooo mooo mooooooo mooooooooo mooooo mo mooo mo

the bed of the ocean; and that the sperm whale, unlike other species, is
moo moo mo moo moooo; moo mooo moo moooo moooo, mooooo moooo moooooo, mo

supplied with teeth in order to attack and tear it.
mooooooo mooo moooo mo moooo mo mooooo moo mooo mo.




There seems some ground to imagine that the great Kraken of Bishop
Moooo moooo mooo mooooo mo moooooo mooo moo moooo Mooooo mo Mooooo

Pontoppodan may ultimately resolve itself into Squid. The manner in
Moooooooooo moo mooooooooo moooooo mooooo mooo Moooo. Moo mooooo mo

which the Bishop describes it, as alternately rising and sinking, with
moooo moo Mooooo moooooooo mo, mo moooooooooo mooooo moo moooooo, mooo

some other particulars he narrates, in all this the two correspond.
mooo moooo moooooooooo mo mooooooo, mo moo mooo moo moo mooooooooo.

But much abatement is necessary with respect to the incredible bulk he
Moo mooo moooooooo mo moooooooo mooo moooooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo mo

assigns it.
moooooo mo.




By some naturalists who have vaguely heard rumors of the mysterious
Mo mooo moooooooooo moo mooo moooooo moooo mooooo mo moo mooooooooo

creature, here spoken of, it is included among the class of cuttle-fish,
mooooooo, mooo mooooo mo, mo mo mooooooo moooo moo moooo mo mooooo-mooo,

to which, indeed, in certain external respects it would seem to belong,
mo moooo, mooooo, mo moooooo mooooooo mooooooo mo moooo mooo mo mooooo,

but only as the Anak of the tribe.
moo mooo mo moo Mooo mo moo moooo.










CHAPTER 60. The Line.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooo.







With reference to the whaling scene shortly to be described, as well as
Mooo moooooooo mo moo moooooo moooo moooooo mo mo moooooooo, mo mooo mo

for the better understanding of all similar scenes elsewhere presented,
moo moo mooooo moooooooooooo mo moo moooooo mooooo moooooooo moooooooo,

I have here to speak of the magical, sometimes horrible whale-line.
M mooo mooo mo moooo mo moo moooooo, moooooooo mooooooo moooo-mooo.




The line originally used in the fishery was of the best hemp, slightly
Moo mooo mooooooooo mooo mo moo moooooo moo mo moo mooo mooo, mooooooo

vapoured with tar, not impregnated with it, as in the case of ordinary
mooooooo mooo moo, moo moooooooooo mooo mo, mo mo moo mooo mo mooooooo

ropes; for while tar, as ordinarily used, makes the hemp more pliable to
moooo; moo moooo moo, mo mooooooooo mooo, moooo moo mooo mooo moooooo mo

the rope-maker, and also renders the rope itself more convenient to the
moo mooo-moooo, moo mooo moooooo moo mooo mooooo mooo mooooooooo mo moo

sailor for common ship use; yet, not only would the ordinary quantity
mooooo moo mooooo mooo moo; moo, moo mooo moooo moo mooooooo mooooooo

too much stiffen the whale-line for the close coiling to which it must
moo mooo moooooo moo moooo-mooo moo moo moooo moooooo mo moooo mo mooo

be subjected; but as most seamen are beginning to learn, tar in general
mo moooooooo; moo mo mooo mooooo moo moooooooo mo moooo, moo mo moooooo

by no means adds to the rope's durability or strength, however much it
mo mo moooo mooo mo moo mooo'm mooooooooo mo mooooooo, moooooo mooo mo

may give it compactness and gloss.
moo mooo mo moooooooooo moo moooo.




Of late years the Manilla rope has in the American fishery almost
Mo mooo moooo moo Moooooo mooo moo mo moo Mooooooo moooooo mooooo

entirely superseded hemp as a material for whale-lines; for, though not
mooooooo mooooooooo mooo mo m mooooooo moo moooo-moooo; moo, mooooo moo

so durable as hemp, it is stronger, and far more soft and elastic; and
mo moooooo mo mooo, mo mo mooooooo, moo moo mooo mooo moo moooooo; moo

I will add (since there is an aesthetics in all things), is much more
M mooo moo (moooo moooo mo mo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo), mo mooo mooo

handsome and becoming to the boat, than hemp. Hemp is a dusky, dark
mooooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo, mooo mooo. Mooo mo m moooo, mooo

fellow, a sort of Indian; but Manilla is as a golden-haired Circassian
mooooo, m mooo mo Mooooo; moo Moooooo mo mo m mooooo-mooooo Mooooooooo

to behold.
mo mooooo.




The whale-line is only two-thirds of an inch in thickness. At first
Moo moooo-mooo mo mooo moo-mooooo mo mo mooo mo moooooooo. Mo moooo

sight, you would not think it so strong as it really is. By experiment
moooo, moo moooo moo moooo mo mo mooooo mo mo mooooo mo. Mo mooooooooo

its one and fifty yarns will each suspend a weight of one hundred and
moo moo moo moooo moooo mooo mooo moooooo m mooooo mo moo moooooo moo

twenty pounds; so that the whole rope will bear a strain nearly equal
mooooo mooooo; mo mooo moo moooo mooo mooo mooo m mooooo mooooo moooo

to three tons. In length, the common sperm whale-line measures something
mo moooo mooo. Mo mooooo, moo mooooo moooo moooo-mooo mooooooo moooooooo

over two hundred fathoms. Towards the stern of the boat it is spirally
mooo moo moooooo moooooo. Moooooo moo moooo mo moo mooo mo mo mooooooo

coiled away in the tub, not like the worm-pipe of a still though, but so
mooooo mooo mo moo moo, moo mooo moo mooo-mooo mo m moooo mooooo, moo mo

as to form one round, cheese-shaped mass of densely bedded "sheaves," or
mo mo mooo moo moooo, mooooo-mooooo mooo mo moooooo mooooo "moooooo," mo

layers of concentric spiralizations, without any hollow but the "heart,"
mooooo mo mooooooooo mooooooooooooo, moooooo moo mooooo moo moo "moooo,"

or minute vertical tube formed at the axis of the cheese. As the least
mo mooooo mooooooo mooo mooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooooo. Mo moo moooo

tangle or kink in the coiling would, in running out, infallibly take
mooooo mo mooo mo moo moooooo moooo, mo moooooo moo, mooooooooo mooo

somebody's arm, leg, or entire body off, the utmost precaution is used
mooooooo'm moo, moo, mo mooooo mooo moo, moo mooooo mooooooooo mo mooo

in stowing the line in its tub. Some harpooneers will consume almost an
mo moooooo moo mooo mo moo moo. Mooo moooooooooo mooo moooooo mooooo mo

entire morning in this business, carrying the line high aloft and then
mooooo moooooo mo mooo mooooooo, mooooooo moo mooo mooo moooo moo mooo

reeving it downwards through a block towards the tub, so as in the act
moooooo mo moooooooo moooooo m moooo moooooo moo moo, mo mo mo moo moo

of coiling to free it from all possible wrinkles and twists.
mo moooooo mo mooo mo mooo moo mooooooo mooooooo moo mooooo.




In the English boats two tubs are used instead of one; the same line
Mo moo Moooooo moooo moo mooo moo mooo moooooo mo moo; moo mooo mooo

being continuously coiled in both tubs. There is some advantage in this;
moooo mooooooooooo mooooo mo mooo mooo. Moooo mo mooo moooooooo mo mooo;

because these twin-tubs being so small they fit more readily into the
moooooo moooo mooo-mooo moooo mo moooo mooo moo mooo moooooo mooo moo

boat, and do not strain it so much; whereas, the American tub, nearly
mooo, moo mo moo mooooo mo mo mooo; moooooo, moo Mooooooo moo, mooooo

three feet in diameter and of proportionate depth, makes a rather bulky
moooo mooo mo mooooooo moo mo moooooooooooo moooo, moooo m mooooo moooo

freight for a craft whose planks are but one half-inch in thickness; for
moooooo moo m moooo moooo mooooo moo moo moo mooo-mooo mo moooooooo; moo

the bottom of the whale-boat is like critical ice, which will bear up
moo mooooo mo moo moooo-mooo mo mooo mooooooo moo, moooo mooo mooo mo

a considerable distributed weight, but not very much of a concentrated
m mooooooooooo moooooooooo mooooo, moo moo mooo mooo mo m mooooooooooo

one. When the painted canvas cover is clapped on the American line-tub,
moo. Mooo moo moooooo mooooo moooo mo moooooo mo moo Mooooooo mooo-moo,

the boat looks as if it were pulling off with a prodigious great
moo mooo moooo mo mo mo mooo moooooo moo mooo m mooooooooo moooo

wedding-cake to present to the whales.
moooooo-mooo mo moooooo mo moo mooooo.




Both ends of the line are exposed; the lower end terminating in an
Mooo mooo mo moo mooo moo moooooo; moo moooo moo moooooooooo mo mo

eye-splice or loop coming up from the bottom against the side of the
moo-mooooo mo mooo mooooo mo mooo moo mooooo moooooo moo mooo mo moo

tub, and hanging over its edge completely disengaged from everything.
moo, moo moooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooooo mooooooooo mooo mooooooooo.

This arrangement of the lower end is necessary on two accounts. First:
Mooo moooooooooo mo moo moooo moo mo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo. Moooo:

In order to facilitate the fastening to it of an additional line from a
Mo moooo mo mooooooooo moo moooooooo mo mo mo mo mooooooooo mooo mooo m

neighboring boat, in case the stricken whale should sound so deep as
moooooooooo mooo, mo mooo moo mooooooo moooo mooooo moooo mo mooo mo

to threaten to carry off the entire line originally attached to the
mo mooooooo mo moooo moo moo mooooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo mo moo

harpoon. In these instances, the whale of course is shifted like a mug
moooooo. Mo moooo moooooooo, moo moooo mo mooooo mo moooooo mooo m moo

of ale, as it were, from the one boat to the other; though the
mo moo, mo mo mooo, mooo moo moo mooo mo moo moooo; mooooo moo

first boat always hovers at hand to assist its consort. Second: This
moooo mooo mooooo mooooo mo mooo mo mooooo moo moooooo. Mooooo: Mooo

arrangement is indispensable for common safety's sake; for were the
moooooooooo mo moooooooooooo moo mooooo mooooo'm mooo; moo mooo moo

lower end of the line in any way attached to the boat, and were the
moooo moo mo moo mooo mo moo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo moo

whale then to run the line out to the end almost in a single, smoking
moooo mooo mo moo moo mooo moo mo moo moo mooooo mo m mooooo, moooooo

minute as he sometimes does, he would not stop there, for the doomed
mooooo mo mo moooooooo mooo, mo moooo moo mooo moooo, moo moo mooooo

boat would infallibly be dragged down after him into the profundity of
mooo moooo mooooooooo mo moooooo mooo moooo moo mooo moo mooooooooo mo

the sea; and in that case no town-crier would ever find her again.
moo moo; moo mo mooo mooo mo mooo-moooo moooo mooo mooo moo moooo.




Before lowering the boat for the chase, the upper end of the line is
Mooooo mooooooo moo mooo moo moo moooo, moo moooo moo mo moo mooo mo

taken aft from the tub, and passing round the loggerhead there, is again
moooo moo mooo moo moo, moo moooooo moooo moo mooooooooo moooo, mo moooo

carried forward the entire length of the boat, resting crosswise upon
moooooo moooooo moo mooooo mooooo mo moo mooo, moooooo moooooooo mooo

the loom or handle of every man's oar, so that it jogs against his wrist
moo mooo mo mooooo mo moooo moo'm moo, mo mooo mo mooo moooooo moo moooo

in rowing; and also passing between the men, as they alternately sit at
mo mooooo; moo mooo moooooo moooooo moo moo, mo mooo moooooooooo moo mo

the opposite gunwales, to the leaded chocks or grooves in the extreme
moo mooooooo mooooooo, mo moo mooooo mooooo mo moooooo mo moo moooooo

pointed prow of the boat, where a wooden pin or skewer the size of a
moooooo mooo mo moo mooo, moooo m mooooo moo mo mooooo moo mooo mo m

common quill, prevents it from slipping out. From the chocks it hangs
mooooo moooo, mooooooo mo mooo mooooooo moo. Mooo moo mooooo mo moooo

in a slight festoon over the bows, and is then passed inside the boat
mo m mooooo moooooo mooo moo mooo, moo mo mooo mooooo mooooo moo mooo

again; and some ten or twenty fathoms (called box-line) being coiled
moooo; moo mooo moo mo mooooo moooooo (mooooo moo-mooo) moooo mooooo

upon the box in the bows, it continues its way to the gunwale still a
mooo moo moo mo moo mooo, mo moooooooo moo moo mo moo moooooo moooo m

little further aft, and is then attached to the short-warp--the rope
mooooo moooooo moo, moo mo mooo mooooooo mo moo moooo-mooo--moo mooo

which is immediately connected with the harpoon; but previous to that
moooo mo moooooooooo moooooooo mooo moo moooooo; moo mooooooo mo mooo

connexion, the short-warp goes through sundry mystifications too tedious
moooooooo, moo moooo-mooo mooo moooooo mooooo mooooooooooooo moo moooooo

to detail.
mo mooooo.




Thus the whale-line folds the whole boat in its complicated coils,
Mooo moo moooo-mooo moooo moo moooo mooo mo moo moooooooooo moooo,

twisting and writhing around it in almost every direction. All the
mooooooo moo mooooooo mooooo mo mo mooooo moooo moooooooo. Moo moo

oarsmen are involved in its perilous contortions; so that to the timid
moooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooooo; mo mooo mo moo moooo

eye of the landsman, they seem as Indian jugglers, with the deadliest
moo mo moo mooooooo, mooo mooo mo Mooooo mooooooo, mooo moo moooooooo

snakes sportively festooning their limbs. Nor can any son of mortal
mooooo mooooooooo mooooooooo moooo moooo. Moo moo moo moo mo mooooo

woman, for the first time, seat himself amid those hempen intricacies,
moooo, moo moo moooo mooo, mooo moooooo mooo moooo mooooo moooooooooo,

and while straining his utmost at the oar, bethink him that at any
moo moooo moooooooo moo mooooo mo moo moo, moooooo moo mooo mo moo

unknown instant the harpoon may be darted, and all these horrible
moooooo moooooo moo moooooo moo mo mooooo, moo moo moooo mooooooo

contortions be put in play like ringed lightnings; he cannot be thus
moooooooooo mo moo mo mooo mooo mooooo mooooooooo; mo mooooo mo mooo

circumstanced without a shudder that makes the very marrow in his bones
moooooooooooo moooooo m moooooo mooo moooo moo mooo mooooo mo moo moooo

to quiver in him like a shaken jelly. Yet habit--strange thing! what
mo mooooo mo moo mooo m mooooo moooo. Moo moooo--moooooo moooo! mooo

cannot habit accomplish?--Gayer sallies, more merry mirth, better jokes,
mooooo moooo mooooooooo?--Moooo moooooo, mooo moooo moooo, mooooo moooo,

and brighter repartees, you never heard over your mahogany, than you
moo mooooooo moooooooo, moo moooo moooo mooo mooo mooooooo, mooo moo

will hear over the half-inch white cedar of the whale-boat, when thus
mooo mooo mooo moo mooo-mooo moooo moooo mo moo moooo-mooo, mooo mooo

hung in hangman's nooses; and, like the six burghers of Calais before
mooo mo moooooo'm mooooo; moo, mooo moo moo mooooooo mo Mooooo mooooo

King Edward, the six men composing the crew pull into the jaws of death,
Mooo Mooooo, moo moo moo moooooooo moo mooo mooo mooo moo mooo mo moooo,

with a halter around every neck, as you may say.
mooo m mooooo mooooo moooo mooo, mo moo moo moo.




Perhaps a very little thought will now enable you to account for
Moooooo m mooo mooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooo moo mo moooooo moo

those repeated whaling disasters--some few of which are casually
moooo mooooooo moooooo moooooooo--mooo moo mo moooo moo mooooooo

chronicled--of this man or that man being taken out of the boat by the
mooooooooo--mo mooo moo mo mooo moo moooo moooo moo mo moo mooo mo moo

line, and lost. For, when the line is darting out, to be seated then in
mooo, moo mooo. Moo, mooo moo mooo mo moooooo moo, mo mo mooooo mooo mo

the boat, is like being seated in the midst of the manifold whizzings
moo mooo, mo mooo moooo mooooo mo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo

of a steam-engine in full play, when every flying beam, and shaft, and
mo m moooo-mooooo mo mooo mooo, mooo moooo mooooo mooo, moo moooo, moo

wheel, is grazing you. It is worse; for you cannot sit motionless in the
moooo, mo moooooo moo. Mo mo moooo; moo moo mooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo

heart of these perils, because the boat is rocking like a cradle, and
moooo mo moooo mooooo, moooooo moo mooo mo moooooo mooo m mooooo, moo

you are pitched one way and the other, without the slightest warning;
moo moo moooooo moo moo moo moo moooo, moooooo moo moooooooo moooooo;

and only by a certain self-adjusting buoyancy and simultaneousness of
moo mooo mo m moooooo mooo-moooooooo mooooooo moo mooooooooooooooo mo

volition and action, can you escape being made a Mazeppa of, and run
mooooooo moo mooooo, moo moo mooooo moooo mooo m Moooooo mo, moo moo

away with where the all-seeing sun himself could never pierce you out.
mooo mooo moooo moo moo-mooooo moo moooooo moooo moooo mooooo moo moo.




Again: as the profound calm which only apparently precedes and
Moooo: mo moo mooooooo mooo moooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo moo

prophesies of the storm, is perhaps more awful than the storm itself;
mooooooooo mo moo moooo, mo moooooo mooo moooo mooo moo moooo mooooo;

for, indeed, the calm is but the wrapper and envelope of the storm; and
moo, mooooo, moo mooo mo moo moo moooooo moo mooooooo mo moo moooo; moo

contains it in itself, as the seemingly harmless rifle holds the fatal
mooooooo mo mo mooooo, mo moo moooooooo mooooooo moooo moooo moo moooo

powder, and the ball, and the explosion; so the graceful repose of the
mooooo, moo moo mooo, moo moo moooooooo; mo moo mooooooo mooooo mo moo

line, as it silently serpentines about the oarsmen before being brought
mooo, mo mo mooooooo moooooooooo moooo moo moooooo mooooo moooo moooooo

into actual play--this is a thing which carries more of true terror than
mooo mooooo mooo--mooo mo m moooo moooo moooooo mooo mo mooo mooooo mooo

any other aspect of this dangerous affair. But why say more? All men
moo moooo mooooo mo mooo moooooooo mooooo. Moo moo moo mooo? Moo moo

live enveloped in whale-lines. All are born with halters round their
mooo moooooooo mo moooo-moooo. Moo moo mooo mooo moooooo moooo moooo

necks; but it is only when caught in the swift, sudden turn of death,
moooo; moo mo mo mooo mooo mooooo mo moo moooo, mooooo mooo mo moooo,

that mortals realize the silent, subtle, ever-present perils of life.
mooo moooooo moooooo moo mooooo, mooooo, mooo-moooooo mooooo mo mooo.

And if you be a philosopher, though seated in the whale-boat, you would
Moo mo moo mo m moooooooooo, mooooo mooooo mo moo moooo-mooo, moo moooo

not at heart feel one whit more of terror, than though seated before
moo mo moooo mooo moo mooo mooo mo mooooo, mooo mooooo mooooo mooooo

your evening fire with a poker, and not a harpoon, by your side.
mooo moooooo mooo mooo m moooo, moo moo m moooooo, mo mooo mooo.










CHAPTER 61. Stubb Kills a Whale.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooo Moooo m Moooo.







If to Starbuck the apparition of the Squid was a thing of portents, to
Mo mo Mooooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo Moooo moo m moooo mo mooooooo, mo

Queequeg it was quite a different object.
Mooooooo mo moo moooo m moooooooo mooooo.




"When you see him 'quid," said the savage, honing his harpoon in the bow
"Mooo moo moo moo 'mooo," mooo moo mooooo, mooooo moo moooooo mo moo moo

of his hoisted boat, "then you quick see him 'parm whale."
mo moo moooooo mooo, "mooo moo moooo moo moo 'mooo moooo."




The next day was exceedingly still and sultry, and with nothing special
Moo mooo moo moo moooooooooo moooo moo mooooo, moo mooo moooooo moooooo

to engage them, the Pequod's crew could hardly resist the spell of sleep
mo mooooo mooo, moo Mooooo'm mooo moooo mooooo mooooo moo moooo mo moooo

induced by such a vacant sea. For this part of the Indian Ocean through
moooooo mo mooo m mooooo moo. Moo mooo mooo mo moo Mooooo Moooo moooooo

which we then were voyaging is not what whalemen call a lively ground;
moooo mo mooo mooo mooooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo mooo m mooooo mooooo;

that is, it affords fewer glimpses of porpoises, dolphins, flying-fish,
mooo mo, mo moooooo moooo mooooooo mo moooooooo, mooooooo, mooooo-mooo,

and other vivacious denizens of more stirring waters, than those off the
moo moooo moooooooo mooooooo mo mooo mooooooo mooooo, mooo moooo moo moo

Rio de la Plata, or the in-shore ground off Peru.
Moo mo mo Moooo, mo moo mo-moooo mooooo moo Mooo.




It was my turn to stand at the foremast-head; and with my shoulders
Mo moo mo mooo mo moooo mo moo mooooooo-mooo; moo mooo mo moooooooo

leaning against the slackened royal shrouds, to and fro I idly swayed in
moooooo moooooo moo moooooooo moooo moooooo, mo moo moo M mooo mooooo mo

what seemed an enchanted air. No resolution could withstand it; in that
mooo mooooo mo moooooooo moo. Mo mooooooooo moooo moooooooo mo; mo mooo

dreamy mood losing all consciousness, at last my soul went out of my
mooooo mooo mooooo moo moooooooooooo, mo mooo mo mooo mooo moo mo mo

body; though my body still continued to sway as a pendulum will, long
mooo; mooooo mo mooo moooo moooooooo mo mooo mo m mooooooo mooo, mooo

after the power which first moved it is withdrawn.
moooo moo moooo moooo moooo moooo mo mo moooooooo.




Ere forgetfulness altogether came over me, I had noticed that the seamen
Moo moooooooooooo mooooooooo mooo mooo mo, M moo moooooo mooo moo mooooo

at the main and mizzen-mast-heads were already drowsy. So that at last
mo moo mooo moo mooooo-mooo-moooo mooo moooooo mooooo. Mo mooo mo mooo

all three of us lifelessly swung from the spars, and for every swing
moo moooo mo mo mooooooooo moooo mooo moo moooo, moo moo moooo moooo

that we made there was a nod from below from the slumbering helmsman.
mooo mo mooo moooo moo m moo mooo moooo mooo moo mooooooooo mooooooo.

The waves, too, nodded their indolent crests; and across the wide trance
Moo moooo, moo, mooooo moooo mooooooo mooooo; moo mooooo moo mooo mooooo

of the sea, east nodded to west, and the sun over all.
mo moo moo, mooo mooooo mo mooo, moo moo moo mooo moo.




Suddenly bubbles seemed bursting beneath my closed eyes; like vices my
Mooooooo moooooo mooooo mooooooo moooooo mo mooooo mooo; mooo moooo mo

hands grasped the shrouds; some invisible, gracious agency preserved me;
moooo moooooo moo moooooo; mooo moooooooo, mooooooo mooooo moooooooo mo;

with a shock I came back to life. And lo! close under our lee, not forty
mooo m moooo M mooo mooo mo mooo. Moo mo! moooo moooo moo moo, moo moooo

fathoms off, a gigantic Sperm Whale lay rolling in the water like the
moooooo moo, m mooooooo Moooo Moooo moo moooooo mo moo moooo mooo moo

capsized hull of a frigate, his broad, glossy back, of an Ethiopian hue,
mooooooo mooo mo m moooooo, moo moooo, mooooo mooo, mo mo Moooooooo moo,

glistening in the sun's rays like a mirror. But lazily undulating in
mooooooooo mo moo moo'm mooo mooo m mooooo. Moo mooooo mooooooooo mo

the trough of the sea, and ever and anon tranquilly spouting his vapoury
moo mooooo mo moo moo, moo mooo moo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo moo moooooo

jet, the whale looked like a portly burgher smoking his pipe of a warm
moo, moo moooo mooooo mooo m mooooo moooooo moooooo moo mooo mo m mooo

afternoon. But that pipe, poor whale, was thy last. As if struck by some
moooooooo. Moo mooo mooo, mooo moooo, moo moo mooo. Mo mo mooooo mo mooo

enchanter's wand, the sleepy ship and every sleeper in it all at once
moooooooo'm mooo, moo mooooo mooo moo moooo moooooo mo mo moo mo mooo

started into wakefulness; and more than a score of voices from all parts
moooooo mooo moooooooooo; moo mooo mooo m moooo mo mooooo mooo moo moooo

of the vessel, simultaneously with the three notes from aloft, shouted
mo moo mooooo, mooooooooooooo mooo moo moooo moooo mooo moooo, moooooo

forth the accustomed cry, as the great fish slowly and regularly spouted
moooo moo mooooooooo moo, mo moo moooo mooo mooooo moo moooooooo moooooo

the sparkling brine into the air.
moo moooooooo moooo mooo moo moo.




"Clear away the boats! Luff!" cried Ahab. And obeying his own order, he
"Moooo mooo moo moooo! Mooo!" moooo Mooo. Moo moooooo moo moo moooo, mo

dashed the helm down before the helmsman could handle the spokes.
mooooo moo mooo mooo mooooo moo mooooooo moooo mooooo moo mooooo.




The sudden exclamations of the crew must have alarmed the whale; and ere
Moo mooooo mooooooooooo mo moo mooo mooo mooo moooooo moo moooo; moo moo

the boats were down, majestically turning, he swam away to the leeward,
moo moooo mooo mooo, mooooooooooo moooooo, mo mooo mooo mo moo moooooo,

but with such a steady tranquillity, and making so few ripples as he
moo mooo mooo m mooooo mooooooooooo, moo mooooo mo moo moooooo mo mo

swam, that thinking after all he might not as yet be alarmed, Ahab gave
mooo, mooo mooooooo moooo moo mo moooo moo mo moo mo moooooo, Mooo mooo

orders that not an oar should be used, and no man must speak but in
mooooo mooo moo mo moo mooooo mo mooo, moo mo moo mooo moooo moo mo

whispers. So seated like Ontario Indians on the gunwales of the boats,
mooooooo. Mo mooooo mooo Moooooo Moooooo mo moo mooooooo mo moo moooo,

we swiftly but silently paddled along; the calm not admitting of the
mo moooooo moo mooooooo moooooo moooo; moo mooo moo moooooooo mo moo

noiseless sails being set. Presently, as we thus glided in chase, the
moooooooo moooo moooo moo. Moooooooo, mo mo mooo mooooo mo moooo, moo

monster perpendicularly flitted his tail forty feet into the air, and
moooooo moooooooooooooo moooooo moo mooo moooo mooo mooo moo moo, moo

then sank out of sight like a tower swallowed up.
mooo mooo moo mo moooo mooo m moooo moooooooo mo.




"There go flukes!" was the cry, an announcement immediately followed by
"Moooo mo mooooo!" moo moo moo, mo mooooooooooo moooooooooo mooooooo mo

Stubb's producing his match and igniting his pipe, for now a respite was
Moooo'm moooooooo moo moooo moo mooooooo moo mooo, moo moo m moooooo moo

granted. After the full interval of his sounding had elapsed, the whale
moooooo. Moooo moo mooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo moo moooooo, moo moooo

rose again, and being now in advance of the smoker's boat, and much
mooo moooo, moo moooo moo mo moooooo mo moo mooooo'm mooo, moo mooo

nearer to it than to any of the others, Stubb counted upon the honour
mooooo mo mo mooo mo moo mo moo mooooo, Moooo moooooo mooo moo mooooo

of the capture. It was obvious, now, that the whale had at length become
mo moo moooooo. Mo moo moooooo, moo, mooo moo moooo moo mo mooooo mooooo

aware of his pursuers. All silence of cautiousness was therefore no
moooo mo moo mooooooo. Moo moooooo mo mooooooooooo moo moooooooo mo

longer of use. Paddles were dropped, and oars came loudly into play. And
mooooo mo moo. Moooooo mooo moooooo, moo mooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo. Moo

still puffing at his pipe, Stubb cheered on his crew to the assault.
moooo moooooo mo moo mooo, Moooo moooooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooooo.




Yes, a mighty change had come over the fish. All alive to his jeopardy,
Moo, m mooooo mooooo moo mooo mooo moo mooo. Moo moooo mo moo mooooooo,

he was going "head out"; that part obliquely projecting from the mad
mo moo moooo "mooo moo"; mooo mooo moooooooo mooooooooo mooo moo moo

yeast which he brewed.*
moooo moooo mo mooooo.*







*It will be seen in some other place of what a very light substance
*Mo mooo mo mooo mo mooo moooo moooo mo mooo m mooo moooo moooooooo

the entire interior of the sperm whale's enormous head consists. Though
moo mooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo moooo'm mooooooo mooo mooooooo. Mooooo

apparently the most massive, it is by far the most buoyant part about
mooooooooo moo mooo moooooo, mo mo mo moo moo mooo moooooo mooo moooo

him. So that with ease he elevates it in the air, and invariably does
moo. Mo mooo mooo mooo mo mooooooo mo mo moo moo, moo mooooooooo mooo

so when going at his utmost speed. Besides, such is the breadth of the
mo mooo moooo mo moo mooooo moooo. Moooooo, mooo mo moo moooooo mo moo

upper part of the front of his head, and such the tapering cut-water
moooo mooo mo moo moooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo moo mooooooo moo-moooo

formation of the lower part, that by obliquely elevating his head, he
moooooooo mo moo moooo mooo, mooo mo moooooooo moooooooo moo mooo, mo

thereby may be said to transform himself from a bluff-bowed sluggish
moooooo moo mo mooo mo moooooooo moooooo mooo m moooo-moooo mooooooo

galliot into a sharppointed New York pilot-boat.
moooooo mooo m mooooooooooo Moo Mooo moooo-mooo.







"Start her, start her, my men! Don't hurry yourselves; take plenty of
"Moooo moo, moooo moo, mo moo! Moo'm moooo mooooooooo; mooo mooooo mo

time--but start her; start her like thunder-claps, that's all," cried
mooo--moo moooo moo; moooo moo mooo moooooo-moooo, mooo'm moo," moooo

Stubb, spluttering out the smoke as he spoke. "Start her, now; give 'em
Moooo, moooooooooo moo moo moooo mo mo moooo. "Moooo moo, moo; mooo 'mo

the long and strong stroke, Tashtego. Start her, Tash, my boy--start
moo mooo moo mooooo mooooo, Mooooooo. Moooo moo, Mooo, mo moo--moooo

her, all; but keep cool, keep cool--cucumbers is the word--easy,
moo, moo; moo mooo mooo, mooo mooo--moooooooo mo moo mooo--mooo,

easy--only start her like grim death and grinning devils, and raise the
mooo--mooo moooo moo mooo mooo moooo moo mooooooo mooooo, moo moooo moo

buried dead perpendicular out of their graves, boys--that's all. Start
mooooo mooo moooooooooooo moo mo moooo mooooo, mooo--mooo'm moo. Moooo

her!"
moo!"




"Woo-hoo! Wa-hee!" screamed the Gay-Header in reply, raising some
"Moo-moo! Mo-moo!" mooooooo moo Moo-Mooooo mo moooo, moooooo mooo

old war-whoop to the skies; as every oarsman in the strained boat
moo moo-moooo mo moo moooo; mo moooo moooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo

involuntarily bounced forward with the one tremendous leading stroke
moooooooooooo moooooo moooooo mooo moo moo mooooooooo moooooo mooooo

which the eager Indian gave.
moooo moo moooo Mooooo mooo.




But his wild screams were answered by others quite as wild. "Kee-hee!
Moo moo mooo moooooo mooo mooooooo mo mooooo moooo mo mooo. "Moo-moo!

Kee-hee!" yelled Daggoo, straining forwards and backwards on his seat,
Moo-moo!" mooooo Mooooo, moooooooo mooooooo moo moooooooo mo moo mooo,

like a pacing tiger in his cage.
mooo m mooooo moooo mo moo mooo.




"Ka-la! Koo-loo!" howled Queequeg, as if smacking his lips over a
"Mo-mo! Moo-moo!" mooooo Mooooooo, mo mo mooooooo moo mooo mooo m

mouthful of Grenadier's steak. And thus with oars and yells the keels
mooooooo mo Moooooooo'm moooo. Moo mooo mooo mooo moo moooo moo moooo

cut the sea. Meanwhile, Stubb retaining his place in the van, still
moo moo moo. Moooooooo, Moooo moooooooo moo moooo mo moo moo, moooo

encouraged his men to the onset, all the while puffing the smoke from
mooooooooo moo moo mo moo moooo, moo moo moooo moooooo moo moooo mooo

his mouth. Like desperadoes they tugged and they strained, till the
moo moooo. Mooo moooooooooo mooo mooooo moo mooo mooooooo, mooo moo

welcome cry was heard--"Stand up, Tashtego!--give it to him!" The
moooooo moo moo moooo--"Moooo mo, Mooooooo!--mooo mo mo moo!" Moo

harpoon was hurled. "Stern all!" The oarsmen backed water; the same
moooooo moo mooooo. "Moooo moo!" Moo moooooo mooooo moooo; moo mooo

moment something went hot and hissing along every one of their wrists.
mooooo moooooooo mooo moo moo moooooo moooo moooo moo mo moooo mooooo.

It was the magical line. An instant before, Stubb had swiftly caught two
Mo moo moo moooooo mooo. Mo moooooo mooooo, Moooo moo moooooo mooooo moo

additional turns with it round the loggerhead, whence, by reason of its
mooooooooo moooo mooo mo moooo moo mooooooooo, mooooo, mo mooooo mo moo

increased rapid circlings, a hempen blue smoke now jetted up and mingled
moooooooo moooo moooooooo, m mooooo mooo moooo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo

with the steady fumes from his pipe. As the line passed round and
mooo moo mooooo moooo mooo moo mooo. Mo moo mooo mooooo moooo moo

round the loggerhead; so also, just before reaching that point, it
moooo moo mooooooooo; mo mooo, mooo mooooo mooooooo mooo moooo, mo

blisteringly passed through and through both of Stubb's hands, from
mooooooooooo mooooo moooooo moo moooooo mooo mo Moooo'm moooo, mooo

which the hand-cloths, or squares of quilted canvas sometimes worn at
moooo moo mooo-mooooo, mo moooooo mo moooooo mooooo moooooooo mooo mo

these times, had accidentally dropped. It was like holding an enemy's
moooo moooo, moo mooooooooooo moooooo. Mo moo mooo moooooo mo moooo'm

sharp two-edged sword by the blade, and that enemy all the time striving
moooo moo-moooo moooo mo moo moooo, moo mooo moooo moo moo mooo mooooooo

to wrest it out of your clutch.
mo moooo mo moo mo mooo mooooo.




"Wet the line! wet the line!" cried Stubb to the tub oarsman (him seated
"Moo moo mooo! moo moo mooo!" moooo Moooo mo moo moo moooooo (moo mooooo

by the tub) who, snatching off his hat, dashed sea-water into it.* More
mo moo moo) moo, moooooooo moo moo moo, mooooo moo-moooo mooo mo.* Mooo

turns were taken, so that the line began holding its place. The boat now
moooo mooo moooo, mo mooo moo mooo moooo moooooo moo moooo. Moo mooo moo

flew through the boiling water like a shark all fins. Stubb and Tashtego
mooo moooooo moo moooooo moooo mooo m moooo moo mooo. Moooo moo Mooooooo

here changed places--stem for stern--a staggering business truly in that
mooo moooooo mooooo--mooo moo moooo--m mooooooooo mooooooo moooo mo mooo

rocking commotion.
moooooo moooooooo.







*Partly to show the indispensableness of this act, it may here be
*Mooooo mo mooo moo moooooooooooooooo mo mooo moo, mo moo mooo mo

stated, that, in the old Dutch fishery, a mop was used to dash the
mooooo, mooo, mo moo moo Moooo moooooo, m moo moo mooo mo mooo moo

running line with water; in many other ships, a wooden piggin, or
moooooo mooo mooo moooo; mo mooo moooo moooo, m mooooo mooooo, mo

bailer, is set apart for that purpose. Your hat, however, is the most
mooooo, mo moo moooo moo mooo moooooo. Mooo moo, moooooo, mo moo mooo

convenient.
mooooooooo.







From the vibrating line extending the entire length of the upper part of
Mooo moo moooooooo mooo moooooooo moo mooooo mooooo mo moo moooo mooo mo

the boat, and from its now being more tight than a harpstring, you would
moo mooo, moo mooo moo moo moooo mooo moooo mooo m mooooooooo, moo moooo

have thought the craft had two keels--one cleaving the water, the other
mooo moooooo moo moooo moo moo moooo--moo mooooooo moo moooo, moo moooo

the air--as the boat churned on through both opposing elements at once.
moo moo--mo moo mooo moooooo mo moooooo mooo mooooooo mooooooo mo mooo.

A continual cascade played at the bows; a ceaseless whirling eddy in
M moooooooo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooo; m moooooooo mooooooo mooo mo

her wake; and, at the slightest motion from within, even but of a little
moo mooo; moo, mo moo moooooooo mooooo mooo mooooo, mooo moo mo m mooooo

finger, the vibrating, cracking craft canted over her spasmodic gunwale
mooooo, moo moooooooo, mooooooo moooo mooooo mooo moo moooooooo moooooo

into the sea. Thus they rushed; each man with might and main clinging
mooo moo moo. Mooo mooo mooooo; mooo moo mooo moooo moo mooo mooooooo

to his seat, to prevent being tossed to the foam; and the tall form of
mo moo mooo, mo moooooo moooo mooooo mo moo mooo; moo moo mooo mooo mo

Tashtego at the steering oar crouching almost double, in order to bring
Mooooooo mo moo mooooooo moo moooooooo mooooo mooooo, mo moooo mo moooo

down his centre of gravity. Whole Atlantics and Pacifics seemed passed
mooo moo mooooo mo moooooo. Moooo Moooooooo moo Mooooooo mooooo mooooo

as they shot on their way, till at length the whale somewhat slackened
mo mooo mooo mo moooo moo, mooo mo mooooo moo moooo mooooooo moooooooo

his flight.
moo mooooo.




"Haul in--haul in!" cried Stubb to the bowsman! and, facing round
"Mooo mo--mooo mo!" moooo Moooo mo moo moooooo! moo, mooooo moooo

towards the whale, all hands began pulling the boat up to him, while yet
moooooo moo moooo, moo moooo moooo moooooo moo mooo mo mo moo, moooo moo

the boat was being towed on. Soon ranging up by his flank, Stubb, firmly
moo mooo moo moooo moooo mo. Mooo moooooo mo mo moo moooo, Moooo, mooooo

planting his knee in the clumsy cleat, darted dart after dart into the
mooooooo moo mooo mo moo mooooo moooo, mooooo mooo moooo mooo mooo moo

flying fish; at the word of command, the boat alternately sterning
mooooo mooo; mo moo mooo mo moooooo, moo mooo moooooooooo mooooooo

out of the way of the whale's horrible wallow, and then ranging up for
moo mo moo moo mo moo moooo'm mooooooo mooooo, moo mooo moooooo mo moo

another fling.
moooooo moooo.




The red tide now poured from all sides of the monster like brooks down a
Moo moo mooo moo mooooo mooo moo moooo mo moo moooooo mooo mooooo mooo m

hill. His tormented body rolled not in brine but in blood, which bubbled
mooo. Moo moooooooo mooo mooooo moo mo moooo moo mo moooo, moooo moooooo

and seethed for furlongs behind in their wake. The slanting sun playing
moo moooooo moo mooooooo mooooo mo moooo mooo. Moo mooooooo moo moooooo

upon this crimson pond in the sea, sent back its reflection into every
mooo mooo moooooo mooo mo moo moo, mooo mooo moo mooooooooo mooo moooo

face, so that they all glowed to each other like red men. And all
mooo, mo mooo mooo moo mooooo mo mooo moooo mooo moo moo. Moo moo

the while, jet after jet of white smoke was agonizingly shot from the
moo moooo, moo moooo moo mo moooo moooo moo moooooooooo mooo mooo moo

spiracle of the whale, and vehement puff after puff from the mouth of
mooooooo mo moo moooo, moo mooooooo mooo moooo mooo mooo moo moooo mo

the excited headsman; as at every dart, hauling in upon his crooked
moo moooooo mooooooo; mo mo moooo mooo, moooooo mo mooo moo moooooo

lance (by the line attached to it), Stubb straightened it again and
moooo (mo moo mooo mooooooo mo mo), Moooo mooooooooooo mo moooo moo

again, by a few rapid blows against the gunwale, then again and again
moooo, mo m moo moooo moooo moooooo moo moooooo, mooo moooo moo moooo

sent it into the whale.
mooo mo mooo moo moooo.




"Pull up--pull up!" he now cried to the bowsman, as the waning whale
"Mooo mo--mooo mo!" mo moo moooo mo moo moooooo, mo moo mooooo moooo

relaxed in his wrath. "Pull up!--close to!" and the boat ranged along
moooooo mo moo moooo. "Mooo mo!--moooo mo!" moo moo mooo mooooo moooo

the fish's flank. When reaching far over the bow, Stubb slowly churned
moo mooo'm moooo. Mooo mooooooo moo mooo moo moo, Moooo mooooo moooooo

his long sharp lance into the fish, and kept it there, carefully
moo mooo moooo moooo mooo moo mooo, moo mooo mo moooo, moooooooo

churning and churning, as if cautiously seeking to feel after some gold
mooooooo moo mooooooo, mo mo mooooooooo moooooo mo mooo moooo mooo mooo

watch that the whale might have swallowed, and which he was fearful of
moooo mooo moo moooo moooo mooo moooooooo, moo moooo mo moo moooooo mo

breaking ere he could hook it out. But that gold watch he sought was the
mooooooo moo mo moooo mooo mo moo. Moo mooo mooo moooo mo mooooo moo moo

innermost life of the fish. And now it is struck; for, starting from
moooooooo mooo mo moo mooo. Moo moo mo mo mooooo; moo, mooooooo mooo

his trance into that unspeakable thing called his "flurry," the monster
moo mooooo mooo mooo moooooooooo moooo mooooo moo "mooooo," moo moooooo

horribly wallowed in his blood, overwrapped himself in impenetrable,
mooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo, moooooooooo moooooo mo mooooooooooo,

mad, boiling spray, so that the imperilled craft, instantly dropping
moo, moooooo moooo, mo mooo moo mooooooooo moooo, moooooooo mooooooo

astern, had much ado blindly to struggle out from that phrensied
mooooo, moo mooo moo moooooo mo mooooooo moo mooo mooo moooooooo

twilight into the clear air of the day.
mooooooo mooo moo moooo moo mo moo moo.




And now abating in his flurry, the whale once more rolled out into view;
Moo moo moooooo mo moo mooooo, moo moooo mooo mooo mooooo moo mooo mooo;

surging from side to side; spasmodically dilating and contracting his
moooooo mooo mooo mo mooo; moooooooooooo mooooooo moo moooooooooo moo

spout-hole, with sharp, cracking, agonized respirations. At last, gush
moooo-mooo, mooo moooo, mooooooo, mooooooo mooooooooooo. Mo mooo, mooo

after gush of clotted red gore, as if it had been the purple lees of red
moooo mooo mo moooooo moo mooo, mo mo mo moo mooo moo mooooo mooo mo moo

wine, shot into the frighted air; and falling back again, ran dripping
mooo, mooo mooo moo mooooooo moo; moo moooooo mooo moooo, moo mooooooo

down his motionless flanks into the sea. His heart had burst!
mooo moo mooooooooo mooooo mooo moo moo. Moo moooo moo moooo!




"He's dead, Mr. Stubb," said Daggoo.
"Mo'm mooo, Mo. Moooo," mooo Mooooo.




"Yes; both pipes smoked out!" and withdrawing his own from his mouth,
"Moo; mooo moooo mooooo moo!" moo moooooooooo moo moo mooo moo moooo,

Stubb scattered the dead ashes over the water; and, for a moment, stood
Moooo moooooooo moo mooo moooo mooo moo moooo; moo, moo m mooooo, moooo

thoughtfully eyeing the vast corpse he had made.
mooooooooooo mooooo moo mooo mooooo mo moo mooo.










CHAPTER 62. The Dart.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooo.







A word concerning an incident in the last chapter.
M mooo mooooooooo mo mooooooo mo moo mooo moooooo.




According to the invariable usage of the fishery, the whale-boat pushes
Moooooooo mo moo mooooooooo moooo mo moo moooooo, moo moooo-mooo mooooo

off from the ship, with the headsman or whale-killer as temporary
moo mooo moo mooo, mooo moo mooooooo mo moooo-mooooo mo moooooooo

steersman, and the harpooneer or whale-fastener pulling the foremost
moooooooo, moo moo mooooooooo mo moooo-mooooooo moooooo moo mooooooo

oar, the one known as the harpooneer-oar. Now it needs a strong, nervous
moo, moo moo moooo mo moo mooooooooo-moo. Moo mo moooo m mooooo, moooooo

arm to strike the first iron into the fish; for often, in what is called
moo mo mooooo moo moooo mooo mooo moo mooo; moo moooo, mo mooo mo mooooo

a long dart, the heavy implement has to be flung to the distance of
m mooo mooo, moo moooo moooooooo moo mo mo moooo mo moo mooooooo mo

twenty or thirty feet. But however prolonged and exhausting the chase,
mooooo mo mooooo mooo. Moo moooooo moooooooo moo mooooooooo moo moooo,

the harpooneer is expected to pull his oar meanwhile to the uttermost;
moo mooooooooo mo mooooooo mo mooo moo moo moooooooo mo moo moooooooo;

indeed, he is expected to set an example of superhuman activity to the
mooooo, mo mo mooooooo mo moo mo moooooo mo mooooooooo mooooooo mo moo

rest, not only by incredible rowing, but by repeated loud and intrepid
mooo, moo mooo mo mooooooooo mooooo, moo mo mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo

exclamations; and what it is to keep shouting at the top of one's
mooooooooooo; moo mooo mo mo mo mooo mooooooo mo moo moo mo moo'm

compass, while all the other muscles are strained and half started--what
moooooo, moooo moo moo moooo moooooo moo mooooooo moo mooo moooooo--mooo

that is none know but those who have tried it. For one, I cannot bawl
mooo mo mooo mooo moo moooo moo mooo moooo mo. Moo moo, M mooooo mooo

very heartily and work very recklessly at one and the same time. In this
mooo mooooooo moo mooo mooo mooooooooo mo moo moo moo mooo mooo. Mo mooo

straining, bawling state, then, with his back to the fish, all at once
moooooooo, moooooo moooo, mooo, mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo, moo mo mooo

the exhausted harpooneer hears the exciting cry--"Stand up, and give it
moo moooooooo mooooooooo moooo moo mooooooo moo--"Moooo mo, moo mooo mo

to him!" He now has to drop and secure his oar, turn round on his
mo moo!" Mo moo moo mo mooo moo mooooo moo moo, mooo moooo mo moo

centre half way, seize his harpoon from the crotch, and with what little
mooooo mooo moo, moooo moo moooooo mooo moo mooooo, moo mooo mooo mooooo

strength may remain, he essays to pitch it somehow into the whale. No
mooooooo moo mooooo, mo mooooo mo moooo mo moooooo mooo moo moooo. Mo

wonder, taking the whole fleet of whalemen in a body, that out of fifty
mooooo, mooooo moo moooo moooo mo mooooooo mo m mooo, mooo moo mo moooo

fair chances for a dart, not five are successful; no wonder that so many
mooo moooooo moo m mooo, moo mooo moo mooooooooo; mo mooooo mooo mo mooo

hapless harpooneers are madly cursed and disrated; no wonder that some
moooooo moooooooooo moo moooo mooooo moo mooooooo; mo mooooo mooo mooo

of them actually burst their blood-vessels in the boat; no wonder that
mo mooo mooooooo moooo moooo moooo-moooooo mo moo mooo; mo mooooo mooo

some sperm whalemen are absent four years with four barrels; no wonder
mooo moooo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo moooo mooo mooo moooooo; mo mooooo

that to many ship owners, whaling is but a losing concern; for it is the
mooo mo mooo mooo mooooo, moooooo mo moo m mooooo moooooo; moo mo mo moo

harpooneer that makes the voyage, and if you take the breath out of his
mooooooooo mooo moooo moo mooooo, moo mo moo mooo moo mooooo moo mo moo

body how can you expect to find it there when most wanted!
mooo moo moo moo mooooo mo mooo mo moooo mooo mooo mooooo!




Again, if the dart be successful, then at the second critical instant,
Moooo, mo moo mooo mo mooooooooo, mooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo moooooo,

that is, when the whale starts to run, the boatheader and harpooneer
mooo mo, mooo moo moooo mooooo mo moo, moo mooooooooo moo mooooooooo

likewise start to running fore and aft, to the imminent jeopardy of
mooooooo moooo mo moooooo mooo moo moo, mo moo mooooooo mooooooo mo

themselves and every one else. It is then they change places; and
mooooooooo moo moooo moo mooo. Mo mo mooo mooo mooooo mooooo; moo

the headsman, the chief officer of the little craft, takes his proper
moo mooooooo, moo moooo moooooo mo moo mooooo moooo, moooo moo mooooo

station in the bows of the boat.
moooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooo.




Now, I care not who maintains the contrary, but all this is both foolish
Moo, M mooo moo moo moooooooo moo mooooooo, moo moo mooo mo mooo moooooo

and unnecessary. The headsman should stay in the bows from first to
moo moooooooooo. Moo mooooooo mooooo mooo mo moo mooo mooo moooo mo

last; he should both dart the harpoon and the lance, and no rowing
mooo; mo mooooo mooo mooo moo moooooo moo moo moooo, moo mo mooooo

whatever should be expected of him, except under circumstances obvious
mooooooo mooooo mo mooooooo mo moo, mooooo moooo moooooooooooo moooooo

to any fisherman. I know that this would sometimes involve a slight loss
mo moo moooooooo. M mooo mooo mooo moooo moooooooo moooooo m mooooo mooo

of speed in the chase; but long experience in various whalemen of more
mo moooo mo moo moooo; moo mooo mooooooooo mo moooooo mooooooo mo mooo

than one nation has convinced me that in the vast majority of failures
mooo moo mooooo moo moooooooo mo mooo mo moo mooo mooooooo mo mooooooo

in the fishery, it has not by any means been so much the speed of the
mo moo moooooo, mo moo moo mo moo moooo mooo mo mooo moo moooo mo moo

whale as the before described exhaustion of the harpooneer that has
moooo mo moo mooooo moooooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo moo

caused them.
mooooo mooo.




To insure the greatest efficiency in the dart, the harpooneers of this
Mo mooooo moo mooooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooo, moo moooooooooo mo mooo

world must start to their feet from out of idleness, and not from out of
moooo mooo moooo mo moooo mooo mooo moo mo mooooooo, moo moo mooo moo mo

toil.
mooo.










CHAPTER 63. The Crotch.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooooo.







Out of the trunk, the branches grow; out of them, the twigs. So, in
Moo mo moo moooo, moo mooooooo mooo; moo mo mooo, moo moooo. Mo, mo

productive subjects, grow the chapters.
mooooooooo mooooooo, mooo moo mooooooo.




The crotch alluded to on a previous page deserves independent mention.
Moo mooooo moooooo mo mo m mooooooo mooo mooooooo moooooooooo moooooo.

It is a notched stick of a peculiar form, some two feet in length, which
Mo mo m moooooo moooo mo m mooooooo mooo, mooo moo mooo mo mooooo, moooo

is perpendicularly inserted into the starboard gunwale near the bow,
mo moooooooooooooo mooooooo mooo moo moooooooo moooooo mooo moo moo,

for the purpose of furnishing a rest for the wooden extremity of the
moo moo moooooo mo mooooooooo m mooo moo moo mooooo moooooooo mo moo

harpoon, whose other naked, barbed end slopingly projects from the prow.
moooooo, moooo moooo moooo, mooooo moo moooooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo.

Thereby the weapon is instantly at hand to its hurler, who snatches it
Moooooo moo mooooo mo moooooooo mo mooo mo moo mooooo, moo mooooooo mo

up as readily from its rest as a backwoodsman swings his rifle from
mo mo moooooo mooo moo mooo mo m mooooooooooo mooooo moo moooo mooo
