the wall. It is customary to have two harpoons reposing in the crotch,
moo mooo. Mo mo moooooooo mo mooo moo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooo,

respectively called the first and second irons.
mooooooooooo mooooo moo moooo moo mooooo moooo.




But these two harpoons, each by its own cord, are both connected with
Moo moooo moo mooooooo, mooo mo moo moo mooo, moo mooo moooooooo mooo

the line; the object being this: to dart them both, if possible, one
moo mooo; moo mooooo moooo mooo: mo mooo mooo mooo, mo mooooooo, moo

instantly after the other into the same whale; so that if, in the coming
moooooooo moooo moo moooo mooo moo mooo moooo; mo mooo mo, mo moo mooooo

drag, one should draw out, the other may still retain a hold. It is a
mooo, moo mooooo mooo moo, moo moooo moo moooo mooooo m mooo. Mo mo m

doubling of the chances. But it very often happens that owing to the
mooooooo mo moo moooooo. Moo mo mooo moooo moooooo mooo moooo mo moo

instantaneous, violent, convulsive running of the whale upon receiving
moooooooooooo, moooooo, mooooooooo moooooo mo moo moooo mooo moooooooo

the first iron, it becomes impossible for the harpooneer, however
moo moooo mooo, mo moooooo mooooooooo moo moo mooooooooo, moooooo

lightning-like in his movements, to pitch the second iron into him.
moooooooo-mooo mo moo moooooooo, mo moooo moo mooooo mooo mooo moo.

Nevertheless, as the second iron is already connected with the line,
Mooooooooooo, mo moo mooooo mooo mo moooooo moooooooo mooo moo mooo,

and the line is running, hence that weapon must, at all events, be
moo moo mooo mo moooooo, moooo mooo mooooo mooo, mo moo mooooo, mo

anticipatingly tossed out of the boat, somehow and somewhere; else the
mooooooooooooo mooooo moo mo moo mooo, moooooo moo moooooooo; mooo moo

most terrible jeopardy would involve all hands. Tumbled into the water,
mooo mooooooo mooooooo moooo moooooo moo moooo. Moooooo mooo moo moooo,

it accordingly is in such cases; the spare coils of box line (mentioned
mo moooooooooo mo mo mooo moooo; moo moooo moooo mo moo mooo (moooooooo

in a preceding chapter) making this feat, in most instances, prudently
mo m moooooooo moooooo) mooooo mooo mooo, mo mooo moooooooo, moooooooo

practicable. But this critical act is not always unattended with the
moooooooooo. Moo mooo mooooooo moo mo moo mooooo mooooooooo mooo moo

saddest and most fatal casualties.
moooooo moo mooo moooo mooooooooo.




Furthermore: you must know that when the second iron is thrown
Moooooooooo: moo mooo mooo mooo mooo moo mooooo mooo mo mooooo

overboard, it thenceforth becomes a dangling, sharp-edged terror,
moooooooo, mo moooooooooo moooooo m mooooooo, moooo-moooo mooooo,

skittishly curvetting about both boat and whale, entangling the lines,
mooooooooo mooooooooo moooo mooo mooo moo moooo, mooooooooo moo moooo,

or cutting them, and making a prodigious sensation in all directions.
mo moooooo mooo, moo mooooo m mooooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooooo.

Nor, in general, is it possible to secure it again until the whale is
Moo, mo moooooo, mo mo mooooooo mo mooooo mo moooo moooo moo moooo mo

fairly captured and a corpse.
mooooo mooooooo moo m mooooo.




Consider, now, how it must be in the case of four boats all engaging
Mooooooo, moo, moo mo mooo mo mo moo mooo mo mooo moooo moo mooooooo

one unusually strong, active, and knowing whale; when owing to these
moo moooooooo mooooo, mooooo, moo moooooo moooo; mooo moooo mo moooo

qualities in him, as well as to the thousand concurring accidents of
moooooooo mo moo, mo mooo mo mo moo mooooooo mooooooooo moooooooo mo

such an audacious enterprise, eight or ten loose second irons may be
mooo mo moooooooo mooooooooo, moooo mo moo moooo mooooo moooo moo mo

simultaneously dangling about him. For, of course, each boat is supplied
mooooooooooooo mooooooo moooo moo. Moo, mo mooooo, mooo mooo mo mooooooo

with several harpoons to bend on to the line should the first one
mooo moooooo mooooooo mo mooo mo mo moo mooo mooooo moo moooo moo

be ineffectually darted without recovery. All these particulars are
mo moooooooooooo mooooo moooooo mooooooo. Moo moooo moooooooooo moo

faithfully narrated here, as they will not fail to elucidate several
mooooooooo mooooooo mooo, mo mooo mooo moo mooo mo moooooooo moooooo

most important, however intricate passages, in scenes hereafter to be
mooo moooooooo, moooooo moooooooo mooooooo, mo mooooo moooooooo mo mo

painted.
moooooo.










CHAPTER 64. Stubb's Supper.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooo'm Mooooo.







Stubb's whale had been killed some distance from the ship. It was
Moooo'm moooo moo mooo mooooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo. Mo moo

a calm; so, forming a tandem of three boats, we commenced the slow
m mooo; mo, moooooo m mooooo mo moooo moooo, mo moooooooo moo mooo

business of towing the trophy to the Pequod. And now, as we eighteen men
mooooooo mo mooooo moo mooooo mo moo Mooooo. Moo moo, mo mo mooooooo moo

with our thirty-six arms, and one hundred and eighty thumbs and fingers,
mooo moo mooooo-moo mooo, moo moo moooooo moo mooooo mooooo moo moooooo,

slowly toiled hour after hour upon that inert, sluggish corpse in the
mooooo mooooo mooo moooo mooo mooo mooo moooo, mooooooo mooooo mo moo

sea; and it seemed hardly to budge at all, except at long intervals;
moo; moo mo mooooo mooooo mo moooo mo moo, mooooo mo mooo moooooooo;

good evidence was hereby furnished of the enormousness of the mass we
mooo mooooooo moo mooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo mo moo mooo mo

moved. For, upon the great canal of Hang-Ho, or whatever they call
moooo. Moo, mooo moo moooo moooo mo Mooo-Mo, mo mooooooo mooo mooo

it, in China, four or five laborers on the foot-path will draw a bulky
mo, mo Moooo, mooo mo mooo mooooooo mo moo mooo-mooo mooo mooo m moooo

freighted junk at the rate of a mile an hour; but this grand argosy we
moooooooo mooo mo moo mooo mo m mooo mo mooo; moo mooo moooo mooooo mo

towed heavily forged along, as if laden with pig-lead in bulk.
moooo moooooo mooooo moooo, mo mo moooo mooo moo-mooo mo mooo.




Darkness came on; but three lights up and down in the Pequod's
Mooooooo mooo mo; moo moooo mooooo mo moo mooo mo moo Mooooo'm

main-rigging dimly guided our way; till drawing nearer we saw Ahab
mooo-moooooo moooo mooooo moo moo; mooo moooooo mooooo mo moo Mooo

dropping one of several more lanterns over the bulwarks. Vacantly eyeing
mooooooo moo mo moooooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo. Mooooooo mooooo

the heaving whale for a moment, he issued the usual orders for securing
moo moooooo moooo moo m mooooo, mo mooooo moo moooo mooooo moo mooooooo

it for the night, and then handing his lantern to a seaman, went his way
mo moo moo moooo, moo mooo moooooo moo moooooo mo m mooooo, mooo moo moo

into the cabin, and did not come forward again until morning.
mooo moo moooo, moo moo moo mooo moooooo moooo moooo moooooo.




Though, in overseeing the pursuit of this whale, Captain Ahab had
Mooooo, mo mooooooooo moo moooooo mo mooo moooo, Moooooo Mooo moo

evinced his customary activity, to call it so; yet now that the creature
moooooo moo moooooooo mooooooo, mo mooo mo mo; moo moo mooo moo mooooooo

was dead, some vague dissatisfaction, or impatience, or despair, seemed
moo mooo, mooo moooo moooooooooooooo, mo mooooooooo, mo moooooo, mooooo

working in him; as if the sight of that dead body reminded him that
moooooo mo moo; mo mo moo moooo mo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo moo mooo

Moby Dick was yet to be slain; and though a thousand other whales were
Mooo Mooo moo moo mo mo moooo; moo mooooo m mooooooo moooo mooooo mooo

brought to his ship, all that would not one jot advance his grand,
moooooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo moooo moo moo moo moooooo moo moooo,

monomaniac object. Very soon you would have thought from the sound on
mooooooooo mooooo. Mooo mooo moo moooo mooo moooooo mooo moo moooo mo

the Pequod's decks, that all hands were preparing to cast anchor in
moo Mooooo'm moooo, mooo moo moooo mooo moooooooo mo mooo mooooo mo

the deep; for heavy chains are being dragged along the deck, and thrust
moo mooo; moo moooo mooooo moo moooo moooooo moooo moo mooo, moo mooooo

rattling out of the port-holes. But by those clanking links, the vast
mooooooo moo mo moo mooo-moooo. Moo mo moooo mooooooo moooo, moo mooo

corpse itself, not the ship, is to be moored. Tied by the head to the
mooooo mooooo, moo moo mooo, mo mo mo mooooo. Mooo mo moo mooo mo moo

stern, and by the tail to the bows, the whale now lies with its black
moooo, moo mo moo mooo mo moo mooo, moo moooo moo mooo mooo moo moooo

hull close to the vessel's and seen through the darkness of the night,
mooo moooo mo moo mooooo'm moo mooo moooooo moo mooooooo mo moo moooo,

which obscured the spars and rigging aloft, the two--ship and whale,
moooo mooooooo moo moooo moo moooooo moooo, moo moo--mooo moo moooo,

seemed yoked together like colossal bullocks, whereof one reclines while
mooooo moooo mooooooo mooo mooooooo mooooooo, moooooo moo mooooooo moooo

the other remains standing.*
moo moooo moooooo mooooooo.*







*A little item may as well be related here. The strongest and most
*M mooooo mooo moo mo mooo mo moooooo mooo. Moo moooooooo moo mooo

reliable hold which the ship has upon the whale when moored alongside,
mooooooo mooo moooo moo mooo moo mooo moo moooo mooo mooooo moooooooo,

is by the flukes or tail; and as from its greater density that part
mo mo moo mooooo mo mooo; moo mo mooo moo moooooo moooooo mooo mooo

is relatively heavier than any other (excepting the side-fins), its
mo mooooooooo moooooo mooo moo moooo (moooooooo moo mooo-mooo), moo

flexibility even in death, causes it to sink low beneath the surface; so
moooooooooo mooo mo moooo, mooooo mo mo mooo moo moooooo moo moooooo; mo

that with the hand you cannot get at it from the boat, in order to
mooo mooo moo mooo moo mooooo moo mo mo mooo moo mooo, mo moooo mo

put the chain round it. But this difficulty is ingeniously overcome: a
moo moo moooo moooo mo. Moo mooo mooooooooo mo moooooooooo mooooooo: m

small, strong line is prepared with a wooden float at its outer end, and
moooo, mooooo mooo mo mooooooo mooo m mooooo moooo mo moo moooo moo, moo

a weight in its middle, while the other end is secured to the ship. By
m mooooo mo moo mooooo, moooo moo moooo moo mo moooooo mo moo mooo. Mo

adroit management the wooden float is made to rise on the other side
mooooo mooooooooo moo mooooo moooo mo mooo mo mooo mo moo moooo mooo

of the mass, so that now having girdled the whale, the chain is readily
mo moo mooo, mo mooo moo mooooo moooooo moo moooo, moo moooo mo moooooo

made to follow suit; and being slipped along the body, is at last locked
mooo mo mooooo mooo; moo moooo moooooo moooo moo mooo, mo mo mooo mooooo

fast round the smallest part of the tail, at the point of junction with
mooo moooo moo mooooooo mooo mo moo mooo, mo moo moooo mo mooooooo mooo

its broad flukes or lobes.
moo moooo mooooo mo moooo.







If moody Ahab was now all quiescence, at least so far as could be known
Mo moooo Mooo moo moo moo mooooooooo, mo moooo mo moo mo moooo mo moooo

on deck, Stubb, his second mate, flushed with conquest, betrayed an
mo mooo, Moooo, moo mooooo mooo, moooooo mooo mooooooo, mooooooo mo

unusual but still good-natured excitement. Such an unwonted bustle was
moooooo moo moooo mooo-moooooo mooooooooo. Mooo mo mooooooo mooooo moo

he in that the staid Starbuck, his official superior, quietly resigned
mo mo mooo moo moooo Mooooooo, moo mooooooo mooooooo, moooooo mooooooo

to him for the time the sole management of affairs. One small, helping
mo moo moo moo mooo moo mooo mooooooooo mo moooooo. Moo moooo, moooooo

cause of all this liveliness in Stubb, was soon made strangely manifest.
moooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo mo Moooo, moo mooo mooo moooooooo mooooooo.

Stubb was a high liver; he was somewhat intemperately fond of the whale
Moooo moo m mooo moooo; mo moo mooooooo moooooooooooo mooo mo moo moooo

as a flavorish thing to his palate.
mo m moooooooo moooo mo moo mooooo.




"A steak, a steak, ere I sleep! You, Daggoo! overboard you go, and cut
"M moooo, m moooo, moo M moooo! Moo, Mooooo! moooooooo moo mo, moo moo

me one from his small!"
mo moo mooo moo moooo!"




Here be it known, that though these wild fishermen do not, as a general
Mooo mo mo moooo, mooo mooooo moooo mooo moooooooo mo moo, mo m moooooo

thing, and according to the great military maxim, make the enemy defray
moooo, moo moooooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo moooo, mooo moo moooo mooooo

the current expenses of the war (at least before realizing the proceeds
moo moooooo mooooooo mo moo moo (mo moooo mooooo moooooooo moo mooooooo

of the voyage), yet now and then you find some of these Nantucketers
mo moo mooooo), moo moo moo mooo moo mooo mooo mo moooo Mooooooooooo

who have a genuine relish for that particular part of the Sperm Whale
moo mooo m moooooo mooooo moo mooo mooooooooo mooo mo moo Moooo Moooo

designated by Stubb; comprising the tapering extremity of the body.
mooooooooo mo Moooo; mooooooooo moo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo.




About midnight that steak was cut and cooked; and lighted by two
Moooo mooooooo mooo moooo moo moo moo mooooo; moo moooooo mo moo

lanterns of sperm oil, Stubb stoutly stood up to his spermaceti supper
mooooooo mo moooo moo, Moooo moooooo moooo mo mo moo mooooooooo mooooo

at the capstan-head, as if that capstan were a sideboard. Nor was Stubb
mo moo moooooo-mooo, mo mo mooo moooooo mooo m moooooooo. Moo moo Moooo

the only banqueter on whale's flesh that night. Mingling their mumblings
moo mooo moooooooo mo moooo'm moooo mooo moooo. Mooooooo moooo moooooooo

with his own mastications, thousands on thousands of sharks, swarming
mooo moo moo mooooooooooo, moooooooo mo moooooooo mo mooooo, mooooooo

round the dead leviathan, smackingly feasted on its fatness. The few
moooo moo mooo moooooooo, mooooooooo moooooo mo moo moooooo. Moo moo

sleepers below in their bunks were often startled by the sharp slapping
mooooooo moooo mo moooo moooo mooo moooo mooooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo

of their tails against the hull, within a few inches of the sleepers'
mo moooo moooo moooooo moo mooo, mooooo m moo mooooo mo moo mooooooo'

hearts. Peering over the side you could just see them (as before you
mooooo. Moooooo mooo moo mooo moo moooo mooo moo mooo (mo mooooo moo

heard them) wallowing in the sullen, black waters, and turning over on
moooo mooo) moooooooo mo moo mooooo, moooo mooooo, moo moooooo mooo mo

their backs as they scooped out huge globular pieces of the whale of the
moooo moooo mo mooo moooooo moo mooo mooooooo mooooo mo moo moooo mo moo

bigness of a human head. This particular feat of the shark seems all
moooooo mo m moooo mooo. Mooo mooooooooo mooo mo moo moooo moooo moo

but miraculous. How at such an apparently unassailable surface, they
moo mooooooooo. Moo mo mooo mo mooooooooo mooooooooooo moooooo, mooo

contrive to gouge out such symmetrical mouthfuls, remains a part of the
mooooooo mo moooo moo mooo moooooooooo moooooooo, moooooo m mooo mo moo

universal problem of all things. The mark they thus leave on the whale,
moooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo. Moo mooo mooo mooo moooo mo moo moooo,

may best be likened to the hollow made by a carpenter in countersinking
moo mooo mo moooooo mo moo mooooo mooo mo m moooooooo mo mooooooooooooo

for a screw.
moo m moooo.




Though amid all the smoking horror and diabolism of a sea-fight, sharks
Mooooo mooo moo moo moooooo mooooo moo moooooooo mo m moo-moooo, mooooo

will be seen longingly gazing up to the ship's decks, like hungry dogs
mooo mo mooo moooooooo mooooo mo mo moo mooo'm moooo, mooo mooooo mooo

round a table where red meat is being carved, ready to bolt down
moooo m moooo moooo moo mooo mo moooo mooooo, moooo mo mooo mooo

every killed man that is tossed to them; and though, while the valiant
moooo mooooo moo mooo mo mooooo mo mooo; moo mooooo, moooo moo moooooo

butchers over the deck-table are thus cannibally carving each other's
mooooooo mooo moo mooo-moooo moo mooo mooooooooo moooooo mooo moooo'm

live meat with carving-knives all gilded and tasselled, the sharks,
mooo mooo mooo moooooo-mooooo moo mooooo moo moooooooo, moo mooooo,

also, with their jewel-hilted mouths, are quarrelsomely carving away

under the table at the dead meat; and though, were you to turn the whole
moooo moo moooo mo moo mooo mooo; moo mooooo, mooo moo mo mooo moo moooo

affair upside down, it would still be pretty much the same thing, that
mooooo mooooo mooo, mo moooo moooo mo mooooo mooo moo mooo moooo, mooo

is to say, a shocking sharkish business enough for all parties; and
mo mo moo, m mooooooo mooooooo mooooooo mooooo moo moo moooooo; moo

though sharks also are the invariable outriders of all slave ships
mooooo mooooo mooo moo moo mooooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo moooo

crossing the Atlantic, systematically trotting alongside, to be handy in
mooooooo moo Mooooooo, mooooooooooooo mooooooo moooooooo, mo mo moooo mo

case a parcel is to be carried anywhere, or a dead slave to be decently
mooo m mooooo mo mo mo moooooo mooooooo, mo m mooo moooo mo mo mooooooo

buried; and though one or two other like instances might be set down,
mooooo; moo mooooo moo mo moo moooo mooo moooooooo moooo mo moo mooo,

touching the set terms, places, and occasions, when sharks do most
mooooooo moo moo moooo, mooooo, moo moooooooo, mooo mooooo mo mooo

socially congregate, and most hilariously feast; yet is there no
mooooooo mooooooooo, moo mooo moooooooooo moooo; moo mo moooo mo

conceivable time or occasion when you will find them in such countless
moooooooooo mooo mo mooooooo mooo moo mooo mooo mooo mo mooo moooooooo

numbers, and in gayer or more jovial spirits, than around a dead sperm
moooooo, moo mo moooo mo mooo mooooo moooooo, mooo mooooo m mooo moooo

whale, moored by night to a whaleship at sea. If you have never
moooo, mooooo mo moooo mo m moooooooo mo moo. Mo moo mooo moooo

seen that sight, then suspend your decision about the propriety of
mooo mooo moooo, mooo moooooo mooo mooooooo moooo moo moooooooo mo

devil-worship, and the expediency of conciliating the devil.
moooo-moooooo, moo moo mooooooooo mo mooooooooooo moo moooo.




But, as yet, Stubb heeded not the mumblings of the banquet that was

moo moooooooo mooo.

The old black, not in any very high glee at having been previously
Moo moo moooo, moo mo moo mooo mooo mooo mo mooooo mooo mooooooooo

mo moooo moo mooo moo mooo mooo.




"Cook," said Stubb, rapidly lifting a rather reddish morsel to his

moooooooo."

moo moooo?"




"Up dere," said Fleece, holding his tongs straight over his head, and
"Mo mooo," mooo Mooooo, moooooo moo moooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo, moo

keeping it there very solemnly.
moooooo mo moooo mooo mooooooo.




"So, then, you expect to go up into our main-top, do you, cook, when you
"Mo, mooo, moo mooooo mo mo mo mooo moo mooo-moo, mo moo, mooo, mooo moo

are dead? But don't you know the higher you climb, the colder it gets?
moo mooo? Moo moo'm moo mooo moo mooooo moo moooo, moo mooooo mo mooo?

Main-top, eh?"
Mooo-moo, mo?"




"Didn't say dat t'all," said Fleece, again in the sulks.
"Mooo'm moo moo m'moo," mooo Mooooo, moooo mo moo moooo.




"You said up there, didn't you? and now look yourself, and see where
"Moo mooo mo moooo, mooo'm moo? moo moo mooo mooooooo, moo moo moooo

your tongs are pointing. But, perhaps you expect to get into heaven by
mooo moooo moo mooooooo. Moo, moooooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo mooooo mo

crawling through the lubber's hole, cook; but, no, no, cook, you don't
mooooooo moooooo moo mooooo'm mooo, mooo; moo, mo, mo, mooo, moo moo'm

get there, except you go the regular way, round by the rigging. It's a
moo moooo, mooooo moo mo moo moooooo moo, moooo mo moo moooooo. Mo'm m

ticklish business, but must be done, or else it's no go. But none of
mooooooo mooooooo, moo mooo mo mooo, mo mooo mo'm mo mo. Moo mooo mo

us are in heaven yet. Drop your tongs, cook, and hear my orders. Do ye
mo moo mo mooooo moo. Mooo mooo moooo, mooo, moo mooo mo mooooo. Mo mo

hear? Hold your hat in one hand, and clap t'other a'top of your heart,
mooo? Mooo mooo moo mo moo mooo, moo mooo m'moooo m'moo mo mooo moooo,

when I'm giving my orders, cook. What! that your heart, there?--that's
mooo M'm mooooo mo mooooo, mooo. Mooo! mooo mooo moooo, moooo?--mooo'm

your gizzard! Aloft! aloft!--that's it--now you have it. Hold it there
mooo moooooo! Moooo! moooo!--mooo'm mo--moo moo mooo mo. Mooo mo moooo

now, and pay attention."
moo, moo moo moooooooo."




"All 'dention," said the old black, with both hands placed as desired,
"Moo 'moooooo," mooo moo moo moooo, mooo mooo moooo mooooo mo moooooo,

vainly wriggling his grizzled head, as if to get both ears in front at
mooooo moooooooo moo mooooooo mooo, mo mo mo moo mooo mooo mo moooo mo

one and the same time.
moo moo moo mooo mooo.




"Well then, cook, you see this whale-steak of yours was so very bad,
"Mooo mooo, mooo, moo moo mooo moooo-moooo mo moooo moo mo mooo moo,

that I have put it out of sight as soon as possible; you see that, don't
mooo M mooo moo mo moo mo moooo mo mooo mo mooooooo; moo moo mooo, moo'm

you? Well, for the future, when you cook another whale-steak for my
moo? Mooo, moo moo mooooo, mooo moo mooo moooooo moooo-moooo moo mo

private table here, the capstan, I'll tell you what to do so as not to
moooooo moooo mooo, moo moooooo, M'mo mooo moo mooo mo mo mo mo moo mo

spoil it by overdoing. Hold the steak in one hand, and show a live coal
moooo mo mo moooooooo. Mooo moo moooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo m mooo mooo

to it with the other; that done, dish it; d'ye hear? And now to-morrow,
mo mo mooo moo moooo; mooo mooo, mooo mo; m'mo mooo? Moo moo mo-mooooo,

cook, when we are cutting in the fish, be sure you stand by to get
mooo, mooo mo moo moooooo mo moo mooo, mo mooo moo moooo mo mo moo

the tips of his fins; have them put in pickle. As for the ends of the
moo mooo mo moo mooo; mooo mooo moo mo mooooo. Mo moo moo mooo mo moo

flukes, have them soused, cook. There, now ye may go."
mooooo, mooo mooo mooooo, mooo. Moooo, moo mo moo mo."




But Fleece had hardly got three paces off, when he was recalled.
Moo Mooooo moo mooooo moo moooo moooo moo, mooo mo moo mooooooo.




"Cook, give me cutlets for supper to-morrow night in the mid-watch.
"Mooo, mooo mo moooooo moo mooooo mo-mooooo moooo mo moo moo-moooo.

D'ye hear? away you sail, then.--Halloa! stop! make a bow before you
M'mo mooo? mooo moo mooo, mooo.--Mooooo! mooo! mooo m moo mooooo moo

go.--Avast heaving again! Whale-balls for breakfast--don't forget."
mo.--Moooo moooooo moooo! Moooo-moooo moo moooooooo--moo'm mooooo."




"Wish, by gor! whale eat him, 'stead of him eat whale. I'm bressed if
"Mooo, mo moo! moooo moo moo, 'moooo mo moo moo moooo. M'm moooooo mo

he ain't more of shark dan Massa Shark hisself," muttered the old man,
mo moo'm mooo mo moooo moo Moooo Moooo moooooo," mooooooo moo moo moo,

limping away; with which sage ejaculation he went to his hammock.
moooooo mooo; mooo moooo mooo moooooooooo mo mooo mo moo moooooo.










CHAPTER 65. The Whale as a Dish.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooo mo m Mooo.







That mortal man should feed upon the creature that feeds his lamp, and,
Mooo mooooo moo mooooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo moooo moo mooo, moo,

like Stubb, eat him by his own light, as you may say; this seems so
mooo Moooo, moo moo mo moo moo moooo, mo moo moo moo; mooo moooo mo

outlandish a thing that one must needs go a little into the history and
mooooooooo m moooo mooo moo mooo moooo mo m mooooo mooo moo moooooo moo

philosophy of it.
mooooooooo mo mo.




It is upon record, that three centuries ago the tongue of the Right
Mo mo mooo mooooo, mooo moooo moooooooo moo moo mooooo mo moo Moooo

Whale was esteemed a great delicacy in France, and commanded large
Moooo moo mooooooo m moooo mooooooo mo Mooooo, moo moooooooo moooo

prices there. Also, that in Henry VIIIth's time, a certain cook of the
mooooo moooo. Mooo, mooo mo Moooo MOOOoo'm mooo, m moooooo mooo mo moo

court obtained a handsome reward for inventing an admirable sauce to be
moooo mooooooo m mooooooo mooooo moo moooooooo mo moooooooo moooo mo mo

eaten with barbacued porpoises, which, you remember, are a species of
moooo mooo moooooooo moooooooo, moooo, moo mooooooo, moo m moooooo mo

whale. Porpoises, indeed, are to this day considered fine eating. The
moooo. Moooooooo, mooooo, moo mo mooo moo mooooooooo mooo mooooo. Moo

meat is made into balls about the size of billiard balls, and being well
mooo mo mooo mooo moooo moooo moo mooo mo mooooooo moooo, moo moooo mooo

seasoned and spiced might be taken for turtle-balls or veal balls.
mooooooo moo mooooo moooo mo moooo moo mooooo-moooo mo mooo moooo.

The old monks of Dunfermline were very fond of them. They had a great
Moo moo moooo mo Moooooooooo mooo mooo mooo mo mooo. Mooo moo m moooo

porpoise grant from the crown.
mooooooo moooo mooo moo moooo.




The fact is, that among his hunters at least, the whale would by all
Moo mooo mo, mooo moooo moo moooooo mo moooo, moo moooo moooo mo moo

hands be considered a noble dish, were there not so much of him; but
moooo mo mooooooooo m moooo mooo, mooo moooo moo mo mooo mo moo; moo

when you come to sit down before a meat-pie nearly one hundred feet
mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo m mooo-moo mooooo moo moooooo mooo

long, it takes away your appetite. Only the most unprejudiced of men
mooo, mo moooo mooo mooo mooooooo. Mooo moo mooo mooooooooooo mo moo

like Stubb, nowadays partake of cooked whales; but the Esquimaux are not
mooo Moooo, mooooooo moooooo mo mooooo mooooo; moo moo Moooooooo moo moo

so fastidious. We all know how they live upon whales, and have rare
mo mooooooooo. Mo moo mooo moo mooo mooo mooo mooooo, moo mooo mooo

old vintages of prime old train oil. Zogranda, one of their most famous
moo mooooooo mo moooo moo moooo moo. Mooooooo, moo mo moooo mooo mooooo

doctors, recommends strips of blubber for infants, as being exceedingly
moooooo, mooooooooo mooooo mo moooooo moo moooooo, mo moooo moooooooooo

juicy and nourishing. And this reminds me that certain Englishmen, who
moooo moo mooooooooo. Moo mooo moooooo mo mooo moooooo Mooooooooo, moo

long ago were accidentally left in Greenland by a whaling vessel--that
mooo moo mooo mooooooooooo mooo mo Moooooooo mo m moooooo mooooo--mooo

these men actually lived for several months on the mouldy scraps of
moooo moo mooooooo moooo moo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooooo mooooo mo

whales which had been left ashore after trying out the blubber. Among
mooooo moooo moo mooo mooo mooooo moooo mooooo moo moo moooooo. Moooo

the Dutch whalemen these scraps are called "fritters"; which, indeed,
moo Moooo mooooooo moooo mooooo moo mooooo "mooooooo"; moooo, mooooo,

they greatly resemble, being brown and crisp, and smelling something
mooo moooooo mooooooo, moooo moooo moo moooo, moo mooooooo moooooooo

like old Amsterdam housewives' dough-nuts or oly-cooks, when fresh. They
mooo moo Moooooooo mooooooooo' moooo-mooo mo moo-moooo, mooo moooo. Mooo

have such an eatable look that the most self-denying stranger can hardly
mooo mooo mo moooooo mooo mooo moo mooo mooo-moooooo mooooooo moo mooooo

keep his hands off.
mooo moo moooo moo.




But what further depreciates the whale as a civilized dish, is his
Moo mooo moooooo moooooooooo moo moooo mo m moooooooo mooo, mo moo

exceeding richness. He is the great prize ox of the sea, too fat to be
moooooooo mooooooo. Mo mo moo moooo moooo mo mo moo moo, moo moo mo mo

delicately good. Look at his hump, which would be as fine eating as
mooooooooo mooo. Mooo mo moo mooo, moooo moooo mo mo mooo mooooo mo

the buffalo's (which is esteemed a rare dish), were it not such a solid
moo moooooo'm (moooo mo mooooooo m mooo mooo), mooo mo moo mooo m moooo

pyramid of fat. But the spermaceti itself, how bland and creamy that
moooooo mo moo. Moo moo mooooooooo mooooo, moo moooo moo mooooo mooo

is; like the transparent, half-jellied, white meat of a cocoanut in the
mo; mooo moo moooooooooo, mooo-moooooo, moooo mooo mo m mooooooo mo moo

third month of its growth, yet far too rich to supply a substitute for
moooo moooo mo moo mooooo, moo moo moo mooo mo mooooo m mooooooooo moo

butter. Nevertheless, many whalemen have a method of absorbing it into
mooooo. Mooooooooooo, mooo mooooooo mooo m mooooo mo moooooooo mo mooo

some other substance, and then partaking of it. In the long try
mooo moooo moooooooo, moo mooo moooooooo mo mo. Mo moo mooo moo

watches of the night it is a common thing for the seamen to dip their
moooooo mo moo moooo mo mo m mooooo moooo moo moo mooooo mo moo moooo

ship-biscuit into the huge oil-pots and let them fry there awhile. Many
mooo-moooooo mooo moo mooo moo-mooo moo moo mooo moo moooo mooooo. Mooo

a good supper have I thus made.
m mooo mooooo mooo M mooo mooo.




In the case of a small Sperm Whale the brains are accounted a fine dish.
Mo moo mooo mo m moooo Moooo Moooo moo mooooo moo moooooooo m mooo mooo.

The casket of the skull is broken into with an axe, and the two plump,
Moo mooooo mo moo moooo mo mooooo mooo mooo mo moo, moo moo moo moooo,

whitish lobes being withdrawn (precisely resembling two large puddings),
moooooo moooo moooo moooooooo (moooooooo mooooooooo moo moooo mooooooo),

they are then mixed with flour, and cooked into a most delectable mess,
mooo moo mooo moooo mooo moooo, moo mooooo mooo m mooo mooooooooo mooo,

in flavor somewhat resembling calves' head, which is quite a dish among
mo mooooo mooooooo mooooooooo mooooo' mooo, moooo mo moooo m mooo moooo

some epicures; and every one knows that some young bucks among the
mooo mooooooo; moo moooo moo moooo mooo mooo moooo moooo moooo moo

epicures, by continually dining upon calves' brains, by and by get to
mooooooo, mo moooooooooo mooooo mooo mooooo' mooooo, mo moo mo moo mo

have a little brains of their own, so as to be able to tell a
mooo m mooooo mooooo mo moooo moo, mo mo mo mo mooo mo mooo m

calf's head from their own heads; which, indeed, requires uncommon
mooo'm mooo mooo moooo moo moooo; moooo, mooooo, mooooooo mooooooo

discrimination. And that is the reason why a young buck with an
mooooooooooooo. Moo mooo mo moo mooooo moo m moooo mooo mooo mo

intelligent looking calf's head before him, is somehow one of the
moooooooooo moooooo mooo'm mooo mooooo moo, mo moooooo moo mo moo

saddest sights you can see. The head looks a sort of reproachfully at
moooooo mooooo moo moo moo. Moo mooo moooo m mooo mo moooooooooooo mo

him, with an "Et tu Brute!" expression.
moo, mooo mo "Mo mo Moooo!" mooooooooo.




It is not, perhaps, entirely because the whale is so excessively
Mo mo moo, moooooo, mooooooo moooooo moo moooo mo mo moooooooooo

unctuous that landsmen seem to regard the eating of him with abhorrence;
mooooooo mooo mooooooo mooo mo mooooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo;

that appears to result, in some way, from the consideration before
mooo moooooo mo mooooo, mo mooo moo, mooo moo moooooooooooo mooooo

mentioned: i.e. that a man should eat a newly murdered thing of the sea,
moooooooo: m.m. mooo m moo mooooo moo m moooo mooooooo moooo mo moo moo,

and eat it too by its own light. But no doubt the first man that ever
moo moo mo moo mo moo moo moooo. Moo mo moooo moo moooo moo mooo mooo

murdered an ox was regarded as a murderer; perhaps he was hung; and if
mooooooo mo mo moo mooooooo mo m mooooooo; moooooo mo moo mooo; moo mo

he had been put on his trial by oxen, he certainly would have been; and
mo moo mooo moo mo moo moooo mo mooo, mo moooooooo moooo mooo mooo; moo

he certainly deserved it if any murderer does. Go to the meat-market
mo moooooooo mooooooo mo mo moo mooooooo mooo. Mo mo moo mooo-mooooo

of a Saturday night and see the crowds of live bipeds staring up at the
mo m Mooooooo moooo moo moo moo mooooo mo mooo mooooo moooooo mo mo moo

long rows of dead quadrupeds. Does not that sight take a tooth out of
mooo mooo mo mooo mooooooooo. Mooo moo mooo moooo mooo m moooo moo mo

the cannibal's jaw? Cannibals? who is not a cannibal? I tell you it will
moo mooooooo'm moo? Moooooooo? moo mo moo m mooooooo? M mooo moo mo mooo

be more tolerable for the Fejee that salted down a lean missionary in
mo mooo moooooooo moo moo Moooo mooo mooooo mooo m mooo mooooooooo mo

his cellar against a coming famine; it will be more tolerable for that
moo mooooo moooooo m mooooo mooooo; mo mooo mo mooo moooooooo moo mooo

provident Fejee, I say, in the day of judgment, than for thee, civilized
moooooooo Moooo, M moo, mo moo moo mo mooooooo, mooo moo mooo, moooooooo

and enlightened gourmand, who nailest geese to the ground and feastest
moo moooooooooo mooooooo, moo moooooo moooo mo moo mooooo moo mooooooo

on their bloated livers in thy pate-de-foie-gras.
mo moooo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooo-mo-mooo-mooo.




But Stubb, he eats the whale by its own light, does he? and that is
Moo Moooo, mo mooo moo moooo mo moo moo moooo, mooo mo? moo mooo mo

adding insult to injury, is it? Look at your knife-handle, there, my
mooooo mooooo mo mooooo, mo mo? Mooo mo mooo moooo-mooooo, moooo, mo

civilized and enlightened gourmand dining off that roast beef, what is
moooooooo moo moooooooooo mooooooo mooooo moo mooo moooo mooo, mooo mo

that handle made of?--what but the bones of the brother of the very ox
mooo mooooo mooo mo?--mooo moo moo moooo mo moo moooooo mo moo mooo mo

you are eating? And what do you pick your teeth with, after devouring
moo moo mooooo? Moo mooo mo moo mooo mooo moooo mooo, moooo moooooooo

that fat goose? With a feather of the same fowl. And with what quill did
mooo moo moooo? Mooo m moooooo mo moo mooo mooo. Moo mooo mooo moooo moo

the Secretary of the Society for the Suppression of Cruelty to Ganders
moo Moooooooo mo moo Moooooo moo moo Moooooooooo mo Moooooo mo Moooooo

formally indite his circulars? It is only within the last month or two
mooooooo mooooo moo moooooooo? Mo mo mooo mooooo moo mooo moooo mo moo

that that society passed a resolution to patronise nothing but steel
mooo mooo moooooo mooooo m mooooooooo mo moooooooo moooooo moo moooo

pens.
mooo.










CHAPTER 66. The Shark Massacre.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooo Mooooooo.







When in the Southern Fishery, a captured Sperm Whale, after long and
Mooo mo moo Mooooooo Moooooo, m mooooooo Moooo Moooo, moooo mooo moo

weary toil, is brought alongside late at night, it is not, as a general
moooo mooo, mo moooooo moooooooo mooo mo moooo, mo mo moo, mo m moooooo

thing at least, customary to proceed at once to the business of cutting
moooo mo moooo, moooooooo mo moooooo mo mooo mo moo mooooooo mo moooooo

him in. For that business is an exceedingly laborious one; is not very
moo mo. Moo mooo mooooooo mo mo moooooooooo moooooooo moo; mo moo mooo

soon completed; and requires all hands to set about it. Therefore, the
mooo moooooooo; moo mooooooo moo moooo mo moo moooo mo. Moooooooo, moo

common usage is to take in all sail; lash the helm a'lee; and then send
mooooo moooo mo mo mooo mo moo mooo; mooo moo mooo m'moo; moo mooo mooo

every one below to his hammock till daylight, with the reservation that,
moooo moo moooo mo moo moooooo mooo mooooooo, mooo moo moooooooooo mooo,

until that time, anchor-watches shall be kept; that is, two and two for
moooo mooo mooo, mooooo-moooooo moooo mo mooo; mooo mo, moo moo moo moo

an hour, each couple, the crew in rotation shall mount the deck to see
mo mooo, mooo mooooo, moo mooo mo mooooooo moooo moooo moo mooo mo moo

that all goes well.
mooo moo mooo mooo.




But sometimes, especially upon the Line in the Pacific, this plan will
Moo moooooooo, mooooooooo mooo moo Mooo mo moo Moooooo, mooo mooo mooo

not answer at all; because such incalculable hosts of sharks gather
moo mooooo mo moo; moooooo mooo mooooooooooo moooo mo mooooo mooooo

round the moored carcase, that were he left so for six hours, say, on a
moooo moo mooooo moooooo, mooo mooo mo mooo mo moo moo moooo, moo, mo m

stretch, little more than the skeleton would be visible by morning.
moooooo, mooooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo moooo mo moooooo mo moooooo.

In most other parts of the ocean, however, where these fish do not so
Mo mooo moooo moooo mo moo moooo, moooooo, moooo moooo mooo mo moo mo

largely abound, their wondrous voracity can be at times considerably
moooooo mooooo, moooo mooooooo mooooooo moo mo mo moooo mooooooooooo

diminished, by vigorously stirring them up with sharp whaling-spades,
mooooooooo, mo mooooooooo mooooooo mooo mo mooo moooo moooooo-mooooo,

a procedure notwithstanding, which, in some instances, only seems to
m moooooooo moooooooooooooo, moooo, mo mooo moooooooo, mooo moooo mo

tickle them into still greater activity. But it was not thus in the
mooooo mooo mooo moooo moooooo mooooooo. Moo mo moo moo mooo mo moo

present case with the Pequod's sharks; though, to be sure, any man
moooooo mooo mooo moo Mooooo'm mooooo; mooooo, mo mo mooo, moo moo

unaccustomed to such sights, to have looked over her side that night,
mooooooooooo mo mooo mooooo, mo mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo mooo moooo,

would have almost thought the whole round sea was one huge cheese, and
moooo mooo mooooo moooooo moo moooo moooo moo moo moo mooo mooooo, moo

those sharks the maggots in it.
moooo mooooo moo moooooo mo mo.




Nevertheless, upon Stubb setting the anchor-watch after his supper was
Mooooooooooo, mooo Moooo moooooo moo mooooo-moooo moooo moo mooooo moo

concluded; and when, accordingly, Queequeg and a forecastle seaman
moooooooo; moo mooo, moooooooooo, Mooooooo moo m mooooooooo mooooo

came on deck, no small excitement was created among the sharks; for
mooo mo mooo, mo moooo mooooooooo moo moooooo moooo moo mooooo; moo

immediately suspending the cutting stages over the side, and lowering
moooooooooo mooooooooo moo moooooo mooooo mooo moo mooo, moo mooooooo

three lanterns, so that they cast long gleams of light over the turbid
moooo mooooooo, mo mooo mooo mooo mooo mooooo mo moooo mooo moo mooooo

sea, these two mariners, darting their long whaling-spades, kept up an
moo, moooo moo mooooooo, moooooo moooo mooo moooooo-mooooo, mooo mo mo

incessant murdering of the sharks,* by striking the keen steel deep
moooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo,* mo mooooooo moo mooo moooo mooo

into their skulls, seemingly their only vital part. But in the foamy
mooo moooo mooooo, moooooooo moooo mooo moooo mooo. Moo mo moo moooo

confusion of their mixed and struggling hosts, the marksmen could not
moooooooo mo moooo moooo moo mooooooooo moooo, moo mooooooo moooo moo

always hit their mark; and this brought about new revelations of the
mooooo moo moooo mooo; moo mooo moooooo moooo moo moooooooooo mo moo

incredible ferocity of the foe. They viciously snapped, not only at each
mooooooooo mooooooo mo moo moo. Mooo moooooooo moooooo, moo mooo mo mooo

other's disembowelments, but like flexible bows, bent round, and bit
moooo'm moooooooooooooo, moo mooo mooooooo mooo, mooo moooo, moo moo

their own; till those entrails seemed swallowed over and over again by
moooo moo; mooo moooo mooooooo mooooo moooooooo mooo moo mooo moooo mo

the same mouth, to be oppositely voided by the gaping wound. Nor was
moo mooo moooo, mo mo mooooooooo mooooo mo moo mooooo moooo. Moo moo

this all. It was unsafe to meddle with the corpses and ghosts of these
mooo moo. Mo moo mooooo mo mooooo mooo moo moooooo moo mooooo mo moooo

creatures. A sort of generic or Pantheistic vitality seemed to lurk in
moooooooo. M mooo mo moooooo mo Moooooooooo mooooooo mooooo mo mooo mo

their very joints and bones, after what might be called the individual
moooo mooo mooooo moo moooo, moooo mooo moooo mo mooooo moo mooooooooo

life had departed. Killed and hoisted on deck for the sake of his skin,
mooo moo mooooooo. Mooooo moo moooooo mo mooo moo moo mooo mo moo mooo,

one of these sharks almost took poor Queequeg's hand off, when he tried
moo mo moooo mooooo mooooo mooo mooo Mooooooo'm mooo moo, mooo mo moooo

to shut down the dead lid of his murderous jaw.
mo mooo mooo moo mooo moo mo moo moooooooo moo.







*The whaling-spade used for cutting-in is made of the very best steel;
*Moo moooooo-moooo mooo moo moooooo-mo mo mooo mo moo mooo mooo moooo;

is about the bigness of a man's spread hand; and in general shape,
mo moooo moo moooooo mo m moo'm mooooo mooo; moo mo moooooo moooo,

corresponds to the garden implement after which it is named; only its
moooooooooo mo moo mooooo moooooooo moooo moooo mo mo moooo; mooo moo

sides are perfectly flat, and its upper end considerably narrower than
moooo moo moooooooo mooo, moo moo moooo moo mooooooooooo mooooooo mooo

the lower. This weapon is always kept as sharp as possible; and when
moo moooo. Mooo mooooo mo mooooo mooo mo moooo mo mooooooo; moo mooo

being used is occasionally honed, just like a razor. In its socket, a
moooo mooo mo mooooooooooo moooo, mooo mooo m moooo. Mo moo mooooo, m

stiff pole, from twenty to thirty feet long, is inserted for a handle.
moooo mooo, mooo mooooo mo mooooo mooo mooo, mo mooooooo moo m mooooo.







"Queequeg no care what god made him shark," said the savage, agonizingly
"Mooooooo mo mooo mooo moo mooo moo moooo," mooo moo mooooo, moooooooooo

lifting his hand up and down; "wedder Fejee god or Nantucket god; but de
moooooo moo mooo mo moo mooo; "mooooo Moooo moo mo Moooooooo moo; moo mo

god wat made shark must be one dam Ingin."
moo moo mooo moooo mooo mo moo moo Moooo."










CHAPTER 67. Cutting In.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooooo Mo.







It was a Saturday night, and such a Sabbath as followed! Ex officio
Mo moo m Mooooooo moooo, moo mooo m Moooooo mo mooooooo! Mo moooooo

professors of Sabbath breaking are all whalemen. The ivory Pequod was
mooooooooo mo Moooooo mooooooo moo moo mooooooo. Moo moooo Mooooo moo

turned into what seemed a shamble; every sailor a butcher. You would
mooooo mooo mooo mooooo m moooooo; moooo mooooo m moooooo. Moo moooo

have thought we were offering up ten thousand red oxen to the sea gods.
mooo moooooo mo mooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo moo mooo mo moo moo mooo.




In the first place, the enormous cutting tackles, among other ponderous
Mo moo moooo moooo, moo mooooooo moooooo moooooo, moooo moooo moooooooo

things comprising a cluster of blocks generally painted green, and which
mooooo mooooooooo m moooooo mo mooooo moooooooo moooooo moooo, moo moooo

no single man can possibly lift--this vast bunch of grapes was swayed up
mo mooooo moo moo mooooooo mooo--mooo mooo moooo mo mooooo moo mooooo mo

to the main-top and firmly lashed to the lower mast-head, the strongest
mo moo mooo-moo moo mooooo mooooo mo moo moooo mooo-mooo, moo moooooooo

point anywhere above a ship's deck. The end of the hawser-like rope
moooo mooooooo moooo m mooo'm mooo. Moo moo mo moo mooooo-mooo mooo

winding through these intricacies, was then conducted to the windlass,
moooooo moooooo moooo moooooooooo, moo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo,

and the huge lower block of the tackles was swung over the whale; to
moo moo mooo moooo moooo mo moo moooooo moo moooo mooo moo moooo; mo

this block the great blubber hook, weighing some one hundred pounds, was
mooo moooo moo moooo moooooo mooo, mooooooo mooo moo moooooo mooooo, moo

attached. And now suspended in stages over the side, Starbuck and Stubb,
mooooooo. Moo moo moooooooo mo mooooo mooo moo mooo, Mooooooo moo Moooo,

the mates, armed with their long spades, began cutting a hole in the
moo moooo, moooo mooo moooo mooo mooooo, moooo moooooo m mooo mo moo

body for the insertion of the hook just above the nearest of the two
mooo moo moo moooooooo mo moo mooo mooo moooo moo moooooo mo moo moo

side-fins. This done, a broad, semicircular line is cut round the hole,
mooo-mooo. Mooo mooo, m moooo, mooooooooooo mooo mo moo moooo moo mooo,

the hook is inserted, and the main body of the crew striking up a wild
moo mooo mo mooooooo, moo moo mooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooooo mo m mooo

chorus, now commence heaving in one dense crowd at the windlass. When
mooooo, moo mooooooo moooooo mo moo moooo moooo mo moo mooooooo. Mooo

instantly, the entire ship careens over on her side; every bolt in
moooooooo, moo mooooo mooo moooooo mooo mo moo mooo; moooo mooo mo

her starts like the nail-heads of an old house in frosty weather; she
moo mooooo mooo moo mooo-moooo mo mo moo moooo mo mooooo moooooo; moo

trembles, quivers, and nods her frighted mast-heads to the sky. More
mooooooo, moooooo, moo mooo moo mooooooo mooo-moooo mo moo moo. Mooo

and more she leans over to the whale, while every gasping heave of the
moo mooo moo moooo mooo mo moo moooo, moooo moooo moooooo moooo mo moo

windlass is answered by a helping heave from the billows; till at last,
mooooooo mo mooooooo mo m moooooo moooo mooo moo moooooo; mooo mo mooo,

a swift, startling snap is heard; with a great swash the ship rolls
m moooo, moooooooo mooo mo moooo; mooo m moooo moooo moo mooo moooo

upwards and backwards from the whale, and the triumphant tackle rises
moooooo moo moooooooo mooo moo moooo, moo moo mooooooooo mooooo moooo

into sight dragging after it the disengaged semicircular end of the
mooo moooo mooooooo moooo mo moo mooooooooo mooooooooooo moo mo moo

first strip of blubber. Now as the blubber envelopes the whale precisely
moooo moooo mo moooooo. Moo mo moo moooooo moooooooo moo moooo moooooooo

as the rind does an orange, so is it stripped off from the body
mo moo mooo mooo mo mooooo, mo mo mo mooooooo moo mooo moo mooo

precisely as an orange is sometimes stripped by spiralizing it. For the
moooooooo mo mo mooooo mo moooooooo mooooooo mo moooooooooo mo. Moo moo

strain constantly kept up by the windlass continually keeps the whale
mooooo mooooooooo mooo mo mo moo mooooooo moooooooooo moooo moo moooo

rolling over and over in the water, and as the blubber in one strip
moooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo moooo, moo mo moo moooooo mo moo moooo

uniformly peels off along the line called the "scarf," simultaneously
moooooooo moooo moo moooo moo mooo mooooo moo "moooo," mooooooooooooo

cut by the spades of Starbuck and Stubb, the mates; and just as fast as
moo mo moo mooooo mo Mooooooo moo Moooo, moo moooo; moo mooo mo mooo mo

it is thus peeled off, and indeed by that very act itself, it is all the
mo mo mooo mooooo moo, moo mooooo mo mooo mooo moo mooooo, mo mo moo moo

time being hoisted higher and higher aloft till its upper end grazes the
mooo moooo moooooo mooooo moo mooooo moooo mooo moo moooo moo mooooo moo

main-top; the men at the windlass then cease heaving, and for a moment
mooo-moo; moo moo mo moo mooooooo mooo moooo moooooo, moo moo m mooooo

or two the prodigious blood-dripping mass sways to and fro as if let
mo moo moo mooooooooo moooo-mooooooo mooo moooo mo moo moo mo mo moo

down from the sky, and every one present must take good heed to dodge
mooo mooo moo moo, moo moooo moo moooooo mooo mooo mooo mooo mo moooo

it when it swings, else it may box his ears and pitch him headlong
mo mooo mo mooooo, mooo mo moo moo moo mooo moo moooo moo mooooooo

overboard.
moooooooo.




One of the attending harpooneers now advances with a long, keen weapon
Moo mo moo moooooooo moooooooooo moo mooooooo mooo m mooo, mooo mooooo

called a boarding-sword, and watching his chance he dexterously slices
mooooo m mooooooo-moooo, moo mooooooo moo mooooo mo moooooooooo mooooo

out a considerable hole in the lower part of the swaying mass. Into this
moo m mooooooooooo mooo mo moo moooo mooo mo moo moooooo mooo. Mooo mooo

hole, the end of the second alternating great tackle is then hooked
mooo, moo moo mo moo mooooo moooooooooo moooo mooooo mo mooo mooooo

so as to retain a hold upon the blubber, in order to prepare for what
mo mo mo mooooo m mooo mooo moo moooooo, mo moooo mo moooooo moo mooo

follows. Whereupon, this accomplished swordsman, warning all hands to
moooooo. Moooooooo, mooo mooooooooooo moooooooo, moooooo moo moooo mo

stand off, once more makes a scientific dash at the mass, and with a few
moooo moo, mooo mooo moooo m mooooooooo mooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo m moo

sidelong, desperate, lunging slicings, severs it completely in twain;
mooooooo, moooooooo, moooooo mooooooo, mooooo mo mooooooooo mo moooo;

so that while the short lower part is still fast, the long upper strip,
mo mooo moooo moo moooo moooo mooo mo moooo mooo, moo mooo moooo moooo,

called a blanket-piece, swings clear, and is all ready for lowering.
mooooo m moooooo-moooo, mooooo moooo, moo mo moo moooo moo mooooooo.

The heavers forward now resume their song, and while the one tackle is
Moo moooooo moooooo moo mooooo moooo mooo, moo moooo moo moo mooooo mo

peeling and hoisting a second strip from the whale, the other is slowly
moooooo moo mooooooo m mooooo moooo mooo moo moooo, moo moooo mo mooooo

slackened away, and down goes the first strip through the main hatchway
moooooooo mooo, moo mooo mooo moo moooo moooo moooooo moo mooo mooooooo

right beneath, into an unfurnished parlor called the blubber-room. Into
moooo moooooo, mooo mo moooooooooo mooooo mooooo moo moooooo-mooo. Mooo

this twilight apartment sundry nimble hands keep coiling away the long
mooo mooooooo moooooooo mooooo mooooo moooo mooo moooooo mooo moo mooo

blanket-piece as if it were a great live mass of plaited serpents.
moooooo-moooo mo mo mo mooo m moooo mooo mooo mo moooooo mooooooo.

And thus the work proceeds; the two tackles hoisting and lowering
Moo mooo moo mooo mooooooo; moo moo moooooo mooooooo moo mooooooo

simultaneously; both whale and windlass heaving, the heavers singing,
mooooooooooooo; mooo moooo moo mooooooo moooooo, moo moooooo moooooo,

the blubber-room gentlemen coiling, the mates scarfing, the ship
moo moooooo-mooo moooooooo moooooo, moo moooo mooooooo, moo mooo

straining, and all hands swearing occasionally, by way of assuaging the
moooooooo, moo moo moooo mooooooo mooooooooooo, mo moo mo moooooooo moo

general friction.
moooooo mooooooo.










CHAPTER 68. The Blanket.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooooo.







I have given no small attention to that not unvexed subject, the skin of
M mooo moooo mo moooo moooooooo mo mooo moo moooooo moooooo, moo mooo mo

the whale. I have had controversies about it with experienced whalemen
moo moooo. M mooo moo moooooooooooo moooo mo mooo moooooooooo mooooooo

afloat, and learned naturalists ashore. My original opinion remains
mooooo, moo moooooo moooooooooo mooooo. Mo mooooooo moooooo moooooo

unchanged; but it is only an opinion.
moooooooo; moo mo mo mooo mo moooooo.




The question is, what and where is the skin of the whale? Already you
Moo mooooooo mo, mooo moo moooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooo? Moooooo moo

know what his blubber is. That blubber is something of the consistence
mooo mooo moo moooooo mo. Mooo moooooo mo moooooooo mo moo moooooooooo

of firm, close-grained beef, but tougher, more elastic and compact, and
mo mooo, moooo-moooooo mooo, moo moooooo, mooo moooooo moo moooooo, moo

ranges from eight or ten to twelve and fifteen inches in thickness.
mooooo mooo moooo mo moo mo mooooo moo moooooo mooooo mo moooooooo.




Now, however preposterous it may at first seem to talk of any creature's
Moo, moooooo mooooooooooo mo moo mo moooo mooo mo mooo mo moo mooooooo'm

skin as being of that sort of consistence and thickness, yet in point
mooo mo moooo mo mooo mooo mo moooooooooo moo moooooooo, moo mo moooo

of fact these are no arguments against such a presumption; because you
mo mooo moooo moo mo moooooooo moooooo mooo m moooooooooo; moooooo moo

cannot raise any other dense enveloping layer from the whale's body but
mooooo moooo moo moooo moooo mooooooooo moooo mooo moo moooo'm mooo moo

that same blubber; and the outermost enveloping layer of any animal, if
mooo mooo moooooo; moo moo moooooooo mooooooooo moooo mo moo mooooo, mo

reasonably dense, what can that be but the skin? True, from the unmarred
mooooooooo moooo, mooo moo mooo mo moo moo mooo? Mooo, mooo moo mooooooo

dead body of the whale, you may scrape off with your hand an infinitely
mooo mooo mo moo moooo, moo moo mooooo moo mooo mooo mooo mo mooooooooo

thin, transparent substance, somewhat resembling the thinnest shreds
mooo, moooooooooo moooooooo, mooooooo mooooooooo moo mooooooo mooooo

of isinglass, only it is almost as flexible and soft as satin; that is,
mo moooooooo, mooo mo mo mooooo mo mooooooo moo mooo mo moooo; mooo mo,

previous to being dried, when it not only contracts and thickens, but
mooooooo mo moooo moooo, mooo mo moo mooo moooooooo moo mooooooo, moo

becomes rather hard and brittle. I have several such dried bits, which
moooooo mooooo mooo moo moooooo. M mooo moooooo mooo moooo mooo, moooo

I use for marks in my whale-books. It is transparent, as I said before;
M moo moo moooo mo mo moooo-moooo. Mo mo moooooooooo, mo M mooo mooooo;

and being laid upon the printed page, I have sometimes pleased myself
moo moooo mooo mooo moo moooooo mooo, M mooo moooooooo moooooo mooooo

with fancying it exerted a magnifying influence. At any rate, it is
mooo mooooooo mo moooooo m mooooooooo moooooooo. Mo moo mooo, mo mo

pleasant to read about whales through their own spectacles, as you may
mooooooo mo mooo moooo mooooo moooooo moooo moo mooooooooo, mo moo moo

say. But what I am driving at here is this. That same infinitely thin,
moo. Moo mooo M mo moooooo mo mooo mo mooo. Mooo mooo mooooooooo mooo,

isinglass substance, which, I admit, invests the entire body of the
moooooooo moooooooo, moooo, M moooo, moooooo moo mooooo mooo mo moo

whale, is not so much to be regarded as the skin of the creature, as
moooo, mo moo mo mooo mo mo mooooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo, mo

the skin of the skin, so to speak; for it were simply ridiculous to say,
moo mooo mo moo mooo, mo mo moooo; moo mo mooo mooooo mooooooooo mo moo,

that the proper skin of the tremendous whale is thinner and more tender
mooo moo mooooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo moooo mo moooooo moo mooo mooooo

than the skin of a new-born child. But no more of this.
mooo moo mooo mo m moo-mooo moooo. Moo mo mooo mo mooo.




Assuming the blubber to be the skin of the whale; then, when this skin,
Mooooooo moo moooooo mo mo moo mooo mo moo moooo; mooo, mooo mooo mooo,

as in the case of a very large Sperm Whale, will yield the bulk of one
mo mo moo mooo mo m mooo moooo Moooo Moooo, mooo moooo moo mooo mo moo

hundred barrels of oil; and, when it is considered that, in quantity, or
moooooo moooooo mo moo; moo, mooo mo mo mooooooooo mooo, mo mooooooo, mo

rather weight, that oil, in its expressed state, is only three fourths,
mooooo mooooo, mooo moo, mo moo moooooooo moooo, mo mooo moooo moooooo,

and not the entire substance of the coat; some idea may hence be had
moo moo moo mooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo; mooo mooo moo moooo mo moo

of the enormousness of that animated mass, a mere part of whose mere
mo moo mooooooooooo mo mooo mooooooo mooo, m mooo mooo mo moooo mooo

integument yields such a lake of liquid as that. Reckoning ten barrels
mooooooooo mooooo mooo m mooo mo mooooo mo mooo. Moooooooo moo moooooo

to the ton, you have ten tons for the net weight of only three quarters
mo moo moo, moo mooo moo mooo moo moo moo mooooo mo mooo moooo mooooooo

of the stuff of the whale's skin.
mo moo moooo mo moo moooo'm mooo.




In life, the visible surface of the Sperm Whale is not the least among
Mo mooo, moo moooooo moooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo mo moo moo moooo moooo

the many marvels he presents. Almost invariably it is all over obliquely
moo mooo moooooo mo mooooooo. Mooooo mooooooooo mo mo moo mooo moooooooo

crossed and re-crossed with numberless straight marks in thick array,
moooooo moo mo-moooooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo moooo mo moooo moooo,

something like those in the finest Italian line engravings. But these
moooooooo mooo moooo mo moo mooooo Moooooo mooo mooooooooo. Moo moooo

marks do not seem to be impressed upon the isinglass substance above
moooo mo moo mooo mo mo moooooooo mooo moo moooooooo moooooooo moooo

mentioned, but seem to be seen through it, as if they were engraved
moooooooo, moo mooo mo mo mooo moooooo mo, mo mo mooo mooo mooooooo

upon the body itself. Nor is this all. In some instances, to the quick,
mooo moo mooo mooooo. Moo mo mooo moo. Mo mooo moooooooo, mo moo moooo,

observant eye, those linear marks, as in a veritable engraving, but
moooooooo moo, moooo mooooo moooo, mo mo m moooooooo moooooooo, moo

afford the ground for far other delineations. These are hieroglyphical;
mooooo moo mooooo moo moo moooo mooooooooooo. Moooo moo mooooooooooooo;

that is, if you call those mysterious cyphers on the walls of pyramids
mooo mo, mo moo mooo moooo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo moooo mo mooooooo

hieroglyphics, then that is the proper word to use in the present
moooooooooooo, mooo mooo mo moo mooooo mooo mo moo mo moo moooooo

connexion. By my retentive memory of the hieroglyphics upon one Sperm
moooooooo. Mo mo moooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooooooooo mooo moo Moooo

Whale in particular, I was much struck with a plate representing the old
Moooo mo mooooooooo, M moo mooo mooooo mooo m moooo mooooooooooo moo moo

Indian characters chiselled on the famous hieroglyphic palisades on
Mooooo mooooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooooo moooooooo mo

the banks of the Upper Mississippi. Like those mystic rocks, too, the
moo moooo mo moo Moooo Moooooooooo. Mooo moooo mooooo moooo, moo, moo

mystic-marked whale remains undecipherable. This allusion to the Indian
mooooo-mooooo moooo moooooo mooooooooooooo. Mooo mooooooo mo moo Mooooo

rocks reminds me of another thing. Besides all the other phenomena which
moooo moooooo mo mo moooooo moooo. Moooooo moo moo moooo moooooooo moooo

the exterior of the Sperm Whale presents, he not seldom displays the
moo mooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo mooooooo, mo moo mooooo mooooooo moo

back, and more especially his flanks, effaced in great part of the
mooo, moo mooo mooooooooo moo mooooo, moooooo mo moooo mooo mo moo

regular linear appearance, by reason of numerous rude scratches,
moooooo mooooo mooooooooo, mo mooooo mo mooooooo mooo moooooooo,

altogether of an irregular, random aspect. I should say that those New
mooooooooo mo mo moooooooo, mooooo mooooo. M mooooo moo mooo moooo Moo

England rocks on the sea-coast, which Agassiz imagines to bear the marks
Moooooo moooo mo moo moo-moooo, moooo Moooooo mooooooo mo mooo moo moooo

of violent scraping contact with vast floating icebergs--I should say,
mo moooooo mooooooo moooooo mooo mooo mooooooo mooooooo--M mooooo moo,

that those rocks must not a little resemble the Sperm Whale in this
mooo moooo moooo mooo moo m mooooo mooooooo moo Moooo Moooo mo mooo

particular. It also seems to me that such scratches in the whale are
mooooooooo. Mo mooo moooo mo mo mooo mooo moooooooo mo moo moooo moo

probably made by hostile contact with other whales; for I have most
mooooooo mooo mo moooooo moooooo mooo moooo mooooo; moo M mooo mooo

remarked them in the large, full-grown bulls of the species.
mooooooo mooo mo moo moooo, mooo-moooo moooo mo moo moooooo.




A word or two more concerning this matter of the skin or blubber of
M mooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo mooo mooooo mo moo mooo mo moooooo mo

the whale. It has already been said, that it is stript from him in long
moo moooo. Mo moo moooooo mooo mooo, mooo mo mo mooooo mooo moo mo mooo

pieces, called blanket-pieces. Like most sea-terms, this one is very
mooooo, mooooo moooooo-mooooo. Mooo mooo moo-moooo, mooo moo mo mooo

happy and significant. For the whale is indeed wrapt up in his blubber
moooo moo moooooooooo. Moo moo moooo mo mooooo moooo mo mo moo moooooo

as in a real blanket or counterpane; or, still better, an Indian poncho
mo mo m mooo moooooo mo moooooooooo; mo, moooo mooooo, mo Mooooo mooooo

slipt over his head, and skirting his extremity. It is by reason of this
moooo mooo moo mooo, moo mooooooo moo moooooooo. Mo mo mo mooooo mo mooo

cosy blanketing of his body, that the whale is enabled to keep himself
mooo mooooooooo mo moo mooo, mooo moo moooo mo moooooo mo mooo moooooo

comfortable in all weathers, in all seas, times, and tides. What would
moooooooooo mo moo mooooooo, mo moo mooo, moooo, moo moooo. Mooo moooo

become of a Greenland whale, say, in those shuddering, icy seas of the
mooooo mo m Moooooooo moooo, moo, mo moooo mooooooooo, moo mooo mo moo

North, if unsupplied with his cosy surtout? True, other fish are
Moooo, mo mooooooooo mooo moo mooo moooooo? Mooo, moooo mooo moo

found exceedingly brisk in those Hyperborean waters; but these, be it
moooo moooooooooo moooo mo moooo Moooooooooo mooooo; moo moooo, mo mo

observed, are your cold-blooded, lungless fish, whose very bellies
mooooooo, moo mooo mooo-moooooo, mooooooo mooo, moooo mooo moooooo

are refrigerators; creatures, that warm themselves under the lee of
moo moooooooooooo; moooooooo, mooo mooo mooooooooo moooo moo moo mo

an iceberg, as a traveller in winter would bask before an inn fire;
mo moooooo, mo m moooooooo mo mooooo moooo mooo mooooo mo moo mooo;

whereas, like man, the whale has lungs and warm blood. Freeze his blood,
moooooo, mooo moo, moo moooo moo moooo moo mooo moooo. Mooooo moo moooo,

and he dies. How wonderful is it then--except after explanation--that
moo mo mooo. Moo moooooooo mo mo mooo--mooooo moooo moooooooooo--mooo

this great monster, to whom corporeal warmth is as indispensable as it
mooo moooo moooooo, mo mooo moooooooo mooooo mo mo moooooooooooo mo mo

is to man; how wonderful that he should be found at home, immersed
mo mo moo; moo moooooooo mooo mo mooooo mo moooo mo mooo, mooooooo

to his lips for life in those Arctic waters! where, when seamen fall
mo moo mooo moo mooo mo moooo Mooooo mooooo! moooo, mooo mooooo mooo

overboard, they are sometimes found, months afterwards, perpendicularly
moooooooo, mooo moo moooooooo moooo, mooooo mooooooooo, moooooooooooooo

frozen into the hearts of fields of ice, as a fly is found glued
mooooo mooo moo mooooo mo mooooo mo moo, mo m moo mo moooo moooo

in amber. But more surprising is it to know, as has been proved by
mo moooo. Moo mooo mooooooooo mo mo mo mooo, mo moo mooo mooooo mo

experiment, that the blood of a Polar whale is warmer than that of a
mooooooooo, mooo moo moooo mo m Moooo moooo mo mooooo mooo mooo mo m

Borneo negro in summer.
Mooooo moooo mo mooooo.




It does seem to me, that herein we see the rare virtue of a strong
Mo mooo mooo mo mo, mooo mooooo mo moo moo mooo mooooo mo m mooooo

individual vitality, and the rare virtue of thick walls, and the rare
mooooooooo mooooooo, moo moo mooo mooooo mo moooo moooo, moo moo mooo

virtue of interior spaciousness. Oh, man! admire and model thyself after
mooooo mo mooooooo mooooooooooo. Mo, moo! mooooo moo moooo moooooo moooo

the whale! Do thou, too, remain warm among ice. Do thou, too, live in
moo moooo! Mo mooo, moo, mooooo mooo moooo moo. Mo mooo, moo, mooo mo

this world without being of it. Be cool at the equator; keep thy blood
mooo moooo moooooo moooo mo mo. Mo mooo mo moo moooooo; mooo moo moooo

fluid at the Pole. Like the great dome of St. Peter's, and like the
moooo mo moo Mooo. Mooo moo moooo mooo mo Mo. Moooo'm, moo mooo moo

great whale, retain, O man! in all seasons a temperature of thine own.
moooo moooo, mooooo, M moo! mo moo moooooo m moooooooooo mo moooo moo.




But how easy and how hopeless to teach these fine things! Of erections,
Moo moo mooo moo moo mooooooo mo moooo moooo mooo mooooo! Mo moooooooo,

how few are domed like St. Peter's! of creatures, how few vast as the
moo moo moo moooo mooo Mo. Moooo'm! mo moooooooo, moo moo mooo mo moo

whale!
moooo!










CHAPTER 69. The Funeral.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooooo.







Haul in the chains! Let the carcase go astern!
Mooo mo moo mooooo! Moo moo moooooo mo mooooo!




The vast tackles have now done their duty. The peeled white body of the
Moo mooo moooooo mooo moo mooo moooo mooo. Moo mooooo moooo mooo mo moo

beheaded whale flashes like a marble sepulchre; though changed in hue,
mooooooo moooo moooooo mooo m mooooo moooooooo; mooooo moooooo mo moo,

it has not perceptibly lost anything in bulk. It is still colossal.
mo moo moo moooooooooo mooo mooooooo mo mooo. Mo mo moooo mooooooo.

Slowly it floats more and more away, the water round it torn and
Mooooo mo mooooo mooo moo mooo mooo, moo moooo moooo mo mooo moo

splashed by the insatiate sharks, and the air above vexed with rapacious
mooooooo mo moo moooooooo mooooo, moo moo moo moooo moooo mooo moooooooo

flights of screaming fowls, whose beaks are like so many insulting
moooooo mo moooooooo moooo, moooo moooo moo mooo mo mooo moooooooo

poniards in the whale. The vast white headless phantom floats further
mooooooo mo moo moooo. Moo mooo moooo mooooooo moooooo mooooo moooooo

and further from the ship, and every rod that it so floats, what seem
moo moooooo mooo moo mooo, moo moooo moo mooo mo mo mooooo, mooo mooo

square roods of sharks and cubic roods of fowls, augment the murderous
mooooo moooo mo mooooo moo moooo moooo mo moooo, moooooo moo moooooooo

din. For hours and hours from the almost stationary ship that hideous
moo. Moo moooo moo moooo mooo moo mooooo mooooooooo mooo mooo moooooo

sight is seen. Beneath the unclouded and mild azure sky, upon the fair
moooo mo mooo. Moooooo moo moooooooo moo mooo moooo moo, mooo moo mooo

face of the pleasant sea, wafted by the joyous breezes, that great mass
mooo mo moo mooooooo moo, mooooo mo moo mooooo moooooo, mooo moooo mooo

of death floats on and on, till lost in infinite perspectives.
mo moooo mooooo mo moo mo, mooo mooo mo mooooooo mooooooooooo.




There's a most doleful and most mocking funeral! The sea-vultures all in
Moooo'm m mooo moooooo moo mooo moooooo moooooo! Moo moo-mooooooo moo mo

pious mourning, the air-sharks all punctiliously in black or speckled.
moooo mooooooo, moo moo-mooooo moo moooooooooooo mo moooo mo mooooooo.

In life but few of them would have helped the whale, I ween, if
Mo mooo moo moo mo mooo moooo mooo mooooo moo moooo, M mooo, mo

peradventure he had needed it; but upon the banquet of his funeral they
mooooooooooo mo moo mooooo mo; moo mooo moo moooooo mo moo moooooo mooo

most piously do pounce. Oh, horrible vultureism of earth! from which not
mooo moooooo mo mooooo. Mo, mooooooo mooooooooo mo moooo! mooo moooo moo

the mightiest whale is free.
moo moooooooo moooo mo mooo.




Nor is this the end. Desecrated as the body is, a vengeful ghost
Moo mo mooo moo moo. Mooooooooo mo moo mooo mo, m mooooooo moooo

survives and hovers over it to scare. Espied by some timid man-of-war or
mooooooo moo mooooo mooo mo mo moooo. Mooooo mo mooo moooo moo-mo-moo mo

blundering discovery-vessel from afar, when the distance obscuring the
mooooooooo moooooooo-mooooo mooo mooo, mooo moo mooooooo moooooooo moo

swarming fowls, nevertheless still shows the white mass floating in
mooooooo moooo, mooooooooooo moooo moooo moo moooo mooo mooooooo mo

the sun, and the white spray heaving high against it; straightway the
moo moo, moo moo moooo moooo moooooo mooo moooooo mo; moooooooooo moo

whale's unharming corpse, with trembling fingers is set down in the
moooo'm moooooooo mooooo, mooo moooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo mo moo

log--SHOALS, ROCKS, AND BREAKERS HEREABOUTS: BEWARE! And for years
moo--MOOOOO, MOOOO, MOO MOOOOOOO MOOOOOOOOO: MOOOOO! Moo moo moooo

afterwards, perhaps, ships shun the place; leaping over it as silly
mooooooooo, moooooo, moooo mooo moo moooo; moooooo mooo mo mo moooo

sheep leap over a vacuum, because their leader originally leaped there
moooo mooo mooo m mooooo, moooooo moooo mooooo mooooooooo mooooo moooo

when a stick was held. There's your law of precedents; there's your
mooo m moooo moo mooo. Moooo'm mooo moo mo mooooooooo; moooo'm mooo

utility of traditions; there's the story of your obstinate survival of
moooooo mo mooooooooo; moooo'm moo moooo mo mooo moooooooo mooooooo mo

old beliefs never bottomed on the earth, and now not even hovering in
moo moooooo moooo mooooooo mo moo moooo, moo moo moo mooo mooooooo mo

the air! There's orthodoxy!
moo moo! Moooo'm moooooooo!




Thus, while in life the great whale's body may have been a real terror
Mooo, moooo mo mooo moo moooo moooo'm mooo moo mooo mooo m mooo mooooo

to his foes, in his death his ghost becomes a powerless panic to a
mo moo mooo, mo moo moooo moo moooo moooooo m moooooooo moooo mo m

world.
moooo.




Are you a believer in ghosts, my friend? There are other ghosts than
Moo moo m mooooooo mo mooooo, mo mooooo? Moooo moo moooo mooooo mooo

the Cock-Lane one, and far deeper men than Doctor Johnson who believe in
moo Mooo-Mooo moo, moo moo mooooo moo mooo Mooooo Moooooo moo moooooo mo

them.

CHAPTER 70. The Sphynx.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooooo.







It should not have been omitted that previous to completely stripping
Mo mooooo moo mooo mooo moooooo mooo mooooooo mo mooooooooo moooooooo

the body of the leviathan, he was beheaded. Now, the beheading of the
moo mooo mo moo moooooooo, mo moo mooooooo. Moo, moo moooooooo mo moo

Sperm Whale is a scientific anatomical feat, upon which experienced
Moooo Moooo mo m mooooooooo mooooooooo mooo, mooo moooo moooooooooo

whale surgeons very much pride themselves: and not without reason.
moooo mooooooo mooo mooo moooo mooooooooo: moo moo moooooo mooooo.




Consider that the whale has nothing that can properly be called a neck;
Mooooooo mooo moo moooo moo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo mo mooooo m mooo;

on the contrary, where his head and body seem to join, there, in that
mo moo mooooooo, moooo moo mooo moo mooo mooo mo mooo, moooo, mo mooo

very place, is the thickest part of him. Remember, also, that the
mooo moooo, mo moo mooooooo mooo mo moo. Mooooooo, mooo, mooo moo

surgeon must operate from above, some eight or ten feet intervening
moooooo mooo moooooo mooo moooo, mooo moooo mo moo mooo moooooooooo

between him and his subject, and that subject almost hidden in a
moooooo moo moo moo moooooo, moo mooo moooooo mooooo mooooo mo m

discoloured, rolling, and oftentimes tumultuous and bursting sea. Bear
moooooooooo, moooooo, moo mooooooooo mooooooooo moo mooooooo moo. Mooo

in mind, too, that under these untoward circumstances he has to cut many
mo mooo, moo, mooo moooo moooo mooooooo moooooooooooo mo moo mo moo mooo

feet deep in the flesh; and in that subterraneous manner, without so
mooo mooo mo moo moooo; moo mo mooo moooooooooooo mooooo, moooooo mo

much as getting one single peep into the ever-contracting gash thus
mooo mo moooooo moo mooooo mooo mooo moo mooo-moooooooooo mooo mooo

made, he must skilfully steer clear of all adjacent, interdicted parts,
mooo, mo mooo moooooooo moooo moooo mo moo mooooooo, moooooooooo moooo,

and exactly divide the spine at a critical point hard by its insertion
moo moooooo mooooo moo moooo mo m mooooooo moooo mooo mo moo moooooooo

into the skull. Do you not marvel, then, at Stubb's boast, that he
mooo moo moooo. Mo moo moo mooooo, mooo, mo Moooo'm moooo, mooo mo

demanded but ten minutes to behead a sperm whale?
mooooooo moo moo moooooo mo mooooo m moooo moooo?




When first severed, the head is dropped astern and held there by a cable
Mooo moooo moooooo, moo mooo mo moooooo mooooo moo mooo moooo mo m moooo

till the body is stripped. That done, if it belong to a small whale
mooo moo mooo mo mooooooo. Mooo mooo, mo mo mooooo mo m moooo moooo

it is hoisted on deck to be deliberately disposed of. But, with a full
mo mo moooooo mo mooo mo mo mooooooooooo mooooooo mo. Moo, mooo m mooo

grown leviathan this is impossible; for the sperm whale's head embraces
moooo moooooooo mooo mo mooooooooo; moo moo moooo moooo'm mooo mooooooo

nearly one third of his entire bulk, and completely to suspend such a
mooooo moo moooo mo moo mooooo mooo, moo mooooooooo mo moooooo mooo m

burden as that, even by the immense tackles of a whaler, this were as
mooooo mo mooo, mooo mo moo moooooo moooooo mo m mooooo, mooo mooo mo

vain a thing as to attempt weighing a Dutch barn in jewellers' scales.
mooo m moooo mo mo moooooo mooooooo m Moooo mooo mo moooooooo' mooooo.




The Pequod's whale being decapitated and the body stripped, the head was
Moo Mooooo'm moooo moooo moooooooooo moo moo mooo mooooooo, moo mooo moo

hoisted against the ship's side--about half way out of the sea, so that
moooooo moooooo moo mooo'm mooo--moooo mooo moo moo mo moo moo, mo mooo

mo moooo moo mo moooo mooo mo mooooo mo mo moo mooooo moooooo. Moo moooo

with the strained craft steeply leaning over to it, by reason of the
mooo moo mooooooo moooo moooooo moooooo mooo mo mo, mo mooooo mo moo

mooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo moo moooo mooo-mooo, moo moooo mooo-moo

mo mooo mooo mooooooooo mooo m moooo mooo moo moooo; moooo, mooo

blood-dripping head hung to the Pequod's waist like the giant
moooo-mooooooo mooo mooo mo moo Mooooo'm moooo mooo moo moooo

Holofernes's from the girdle of Judith.
Mooooooooo'm mooo moo mooooo mo Mooooo.




When this last task was accomplished it was noon, and the seamen went
Mooo mooo mooo mooo moo mooooooooooo mo moo mooo, moo moo mooooo mooo

below to their dinner. Silence reigned over the before tumultuous but
moooo mo moooo mooooo. Moooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooo mooooooooo moo

moo mooooooo mooo. Mo moooooo mooooo mooo, mooo m moooooooo mooooo

lotus, was more and more unfolding its noiseless measureless leaves upon
moooo, moo mooo moo mooo moooooooo moo moooooooo moooooooooo mooooo mooo

the sea.
moo moo.




A short space elapsed, and up into this noiselessness came Ahab alone
M moooo moooo moooooo, moo mo mooo mooo moooooooooooo mooo Mooo moooo

mooo moo moooo. Mooooo m moo moooo mo moo moooooo-mooo, mo mooooo mo

gaze over the side, then slowly getting into the main-chains he
mooo mooo moo mooo, mooo mooooo moooooo mooo moo mooo-mooooo mo

mooo Moooo'm mooo moooo--moooo moooooooo moooo moooo moo moooo'm

Mooooooooooo--moo mooooooo mo mooo moo moooo mooo mo moo mooo-moooooooo

mass, placed its other end crutch-wise under one arm, and so stood

moooooo mooo mooo mooo moooooooooo moooo mo mooo mooo.




It was a black and hooded head; and hanging there in the midst of so
Mo moo m moooo moo mooooo mooo; moo moooooo moooo mo moo moooo mo mo

intense a calm, it seemed the Sphynx's in the desert. "Speak, thou vast
moooooo m mooo, mo mooooo moo Mooooo'm mo moo mooooo. "Moooo, mooo mooo

and venerable head," muttered Ahab, "which, though ungarnished with a
moo moooooooo mooo," mooooooo Mooo, "moooo, mooooo moooooooooo mooo m

moooo, moo mooo moo moooo moooooo moooo mooo mooooo; moooo, mooooo mooo,

moo mooo mo moo mooooo moooo mooo mo mo mooo. Mo moo mooooo, mooo mooo

dived the deepest. That head upon which the upper sun now gleams, has
moooo moo moooooo. Mooo mooo mooo moooo moo moooo moo moo mooooo, moo

moved amid this world's foundations. Where unrecorded names and navies
moooo mooo mooo moooo'm moooooooooo. Moooo mooooooooo moooo moo mooooo

rust, and untold hopes and anchors rot; where in her murderous hold this
mooo, moo mooooo moooo moo moooooo moo; moooo mo moo moooooooo mooo mooo

frigate earth is ballasted with bones of millions of the drowned; there,
moooooo moooo mo moooooooo mooo moooo mo mooooooo mo moo moooooo; moooo,

in that awful water-land, there was thy most familiar home. Thou hast
mo mooo moooo moooo-mooo, moooo moo moo mooo mooooooo mooo. Mooo mooo

been where bell or diver never went; hast slept by many a sailor's side,
mooo moooo mooo mo moooo moooo mooo; mooo moooo mo mooo m mooooo'm mooo,

where sleepless mothers would give their lives to lay them down. Thou
moooo moooooooo moooooo moooo mooo moooo moooo mo moo mooo mooo. Mooo

saw'st the locked lovers when leaping from their flaming ship; heart
moo'mo moo mooooo mooooo mooo moooooo mooo moooo moooooo mooo; moooo

to heart they sank beneath the exulting wave; true to each other, when
mo moooo mooo mooo moooooo moo mooooooo mooo; mooo mo mooo moooo, mooo

heaven seemed false to them. Thou saw'st the murdered mate when tossed
mooooo mooooo moooo mo mooo. Mooo moo'mo moo mooooooo mooo mooo mooooo

by pirates from the midnight deck; for hours he fell into the deeper
mo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo; moo moooo mo mooo mooo moo mooooo

moooo mooo moooo m moooooooo moooooo mo mooooooooooo, moooooo mooo. M

head! thou hast seen enough to split the planets and make an infidel of
mooo! mooo mooo mooo mooooo mo moooo moo moooooo moo mooo mo moooooo mo

Abraham, and not one syllable is thine!"
Moooooo, moo moo moo mooooooo mo moooo!"




"Sail ho!" cried a triumphant voice from the main-mast-head.
"Mooo mo!" moooo m mooooooooo moooo mooo moo mooo-mooo-mooo.

"Better and better, man. Would now St. Paul would come along that way,
