CHAPTER 71. The Jeroboam's Story.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooooooo'm Moooo.







Hand in hand, ship and breeze blew on; but the breeze came faster than
Mooo mo mooo, mooo moo mooooo mooo mo; moo moo mooooo mooo mooooo mooo

the ship, and soon the Pequod began to rock.
moo mooo, moo mooo moo Mooooo moooo mo mooo.




By and by, through the glass the stranger's boats and manned mast-heads
Mo moo mo, moooooo moo moooo moo mooooooo'm moooo moo mooooo mooo-moooo

proved her a whale-ship. But as she was so far to windward, and shooting
mooooo moo m moooo-mooo. Moo mo moo moo mo moo mo mooooooo, moo mooooooo

by, apparently making a passage to some other ground, the Pequod could
mo, mooooooooo mooooo m moooooo mo mooo moooo mooooo, moo Mooooo moooo

not hope to reach her. So the signal was set to see what response would
moo mooo mo moooo moo. Mo moo mooooo moo moo mo moo mooo mooooooo moooo

be made.
mo mooo.




Here be it said, that like the vessels of military marines, the ships of
Mooo mo mo mooo, mooo mooo moo moooooo mo mooooooo moooooo, moo moooo mo

the American Whale Fleet have each a private signal; all which signals
moo Mooooooo Moooo Moooo mooo mooo m moooooo mooooo; moo moooo moooooo

being collected in a book with the names of the respective vessels
moooo moooooooo mo m mooo mooo moo moooo mo moo mooooooooo moooooo

attached, every captain is provided with it. Thereby, the whale
mooooooo, moooo moooooo mo mooooooo mooo mo. Moooooo, moo moooo

commanders are enabled to recognise each other upon the ocean, even at
mooooooooo moo moooooo mo moooooooo mooo moooo mooo moo moooo, mooo mo

considerable distances and with no small facility.
mooooooooooo moooooooo moo mooo mo moooo mooooooo.




The Pequod's signal was at last responded to by the stranger's setting
Moo Mooooo'm mooooo moo mo mooo moooooooo mo mo moo mooooooo'm moooooo

her own; which proved the ship to be the Jeroboam of Nantucket. Squaring
moo moo; moooo mooooo moo mooo mo mo moo Mooooooo mo Moooooooo. Mooooooo

her yards, she bore down, ranged abeam under the Pequod's lee, and
moo moooo, moo mooo mooo, mooooo moooo moooo moo Mooooo'm moo, moo

lowered a boat; it soon drew nigh; but, as the side-ladder was being
moooooo m mooo; mo mooo mooo mooo; moo, mo moo mooo-mooooo moo moooo

rigged by Starbuck's order to accommodate the visiting captain, the
mooooo mo Mooooooo'm moooo mo moooooooooo moo mooooooo moooooo, moo

stranger in question waved his hand from his boat's stern in token
mooooooo mo mooooooo moooo moo mooo mooo moo mooo'm moooo mo moooo

of that proceeding being entirely unnecessary. It turned out that
mo mooo mooooooooo moooo mooooooo moooooooooo. Mo mooooo moo mooo

the Jeroboam had a malignant epidemic on board, and that Mayhew, her
moo Mooooooo moo m moooooooo mooooooo mo moooo, moo mooo Mooooo, moo

captain, was fearful of infecting the Pequod's company. For, though
moooooo, moo moooooo mo moooooooo moo Mooooo'm moooooo. Moo, mooooo

himself and boat's crew remained untainted, and though his ship was half
moooooo moo mooo'm mooo mooooooo moooooooo, moo mooooo moo mooo moo mooo

a rifle-shot off, and an incorruptible sea and air rolling and flowing
m moooo-mooo moo, moo mo moooooooooooo moo moo moo moooooo moo moooooo

between; yet conscientiously adhering to the timid quarantine of the
moooooo; moo moooooooooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo mooooooooo mo moo

land, he peremptorily refused to come into direct contact with the
mooo, mo mooooooooooo moooooo mo mooo mooo mooooo moooooo mooo moo

Pequod.
Mooooo.




But this did by no means prevent all communications. Preserving an
Moo mooo moo mo mo moooo moooooo moo mooooooooooooo. Mooooooooo mo

interval of some few yards between itself and the ship, the Jeroboam's
mooooooo mo mooo moo moooo moooooo mooooo moo moo mooo, moo Mooooooo'm

boat by the occasional use of its oars contrived to keep parallel to the
mooo mo moo mooooooooo moo mo moo mooo moooooooo mo mooo mooooooo mo moo

Pequod, as she heavily forged through the sea (for by this time it blew
Mooooo, mo moo moooooo mooooo moooooo moo moo (moo mo mooo mooo mo mooo

very fresh), with her main-topsail aback; though, indeed, at times by
mooo moooo), mooo moo mooo-moooooo moooo; mooooo, mooooo, mo moooo mo

the sudden onset of a large rolling wave, the boat would be pushed some
moo mooooo moooo mo m moooo moooooo mooo, moo mooo moooo mo mooooo mooo

way ahead; but would be soon skilfully brought to her proper bearings
moo moooo; moo moooo mo mooo moooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo

again. Subject to this, and other the like interruptions now and then, a
moooo. Moooooo mo mooo, moo moooo moo mooo moooooooooooo moo moo mooo, m

conversation was sustained between the two parties; but at intervals not
mooooooooooo moo moooooooo moooooo moo moo moooooo; moo mo moooooooo moo

without still another interruption of a very different sort.
moooooo moooo moooooo mooooooooooo mo m mooo moooooooo mooo.




Pulling an oar in the Jeroboam's boat, was a man of a singular
Moooooo mo moo mo moo Mooooooo'm mooo, moo m moo mo m mooooooo

appearance, even in that wild whaling life where individual notabilities
mooooooooo, mooo mo mooo mooo moooooo mooo moooo mooooooooo mooooooooooo

make up all totalities. He was a small, short, youngish man, sprinkled
mooo mo moo mooooooooo. Mo moo m moooo, moooo, mooooooo moo, moooooooo

all over his face with freckles, and wearing redundant yellow hair. A
moo mooo moo mooo mooo mooooooo, moo moooooo moooooooo mooooo mooo. M

long-skirted, cabalistically-cut coat of a faded walnut tinge enveloped
mooo-moooooo, mooooooooooooo-moo mooo mo m moooo mooooo moooo moooooooo

him; the overlapping sleeves of which were rolled up on his wrists. A
moo; moo moooooooooo moooooo mo moooo mooo mooooo mo mo moo mooooo. M

deep, settled, fanatic delirium was in his eyes.
mooo, moooooo, moooooo mooooooo moo mo moo mooo.




So soon as this figure had been first descried, Stubb had
Mo mooo mo mooo mooooo moo mooo moooo mooooooo, Moooo moo

exclaimed--"That's he! that's he!--the long-togged scaramouch the
moooooooo--"Mooo'm mo! mooo'm mo!--moo mooo-mooooo mooooooooo moo

Town-Ho's company told us of!" Stubb here alluded to a strange story
Mooo-Mo'm moooooo mooo mo mo!" Moooo mooo moooooo mo m moooooo moooo

told of the Jeroboam, and a certain man among her crew, some time
mooo mo moo Mooooooo, moo m moooooo moo moooo moo mooo, mooo mooo

previous when the Pequod spoke the Town-Ho. According to this account
mooooooo mooo moo Mooooo moooo moo Mooo-Mo. Moooooooo mo mooo moooooo

and what was subsequently learned, it seemed that the scaramouch in
moo mooo moo mooooooooooo moooooo, mo mooooo mooo moo mooooooooo mo

question had gained a wonderful ascendency over almost everybody in the
mooooooo moo mooooo m moooooooo mooooooooo mooo mooooo moooooooo mo moo

Jeroboam. His story was this:
Mooooooo. Moo moooo moo mooo:




He had been originally nurtured among the crazy society of Neskyeuna
Mo moo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo moooo moo moooo moooooo mo Moooooooo

Shakers, where he had been a great prophet; in their cracked, secret
Moooooo, moooo mo moo mooo m moooo moooooo; mo moooo moooooo, mooooo

meetings having several times descended from heaven by the way of a
mooooooo mooooo moooooo moooo moooooooo mooo mooooo mo moo moo mo m

trap-door, announcing the speedy opening of the seventh vial, which he
mooo-mooo, mooooooooo moo mooooo moooooo mo moo moooooo mooo, moooo mo

carried in his vest-pocket; but, which, instead of containing gunpowder,
moooooo mo moo mooo-mooooo; moo, moooo, moooooo mo mooooooooo moooooooo,

was supposed to be charged with laudanum. A strange, apostolic whim
moo mooooooo mo mo moooooo mooo mooooooo. M moooooo, moooooooo mooo

having seized him, he had left Neskyeuna for Nantucket, where, with
mooooo mooooo moo, mo moo mooo Moooooooo moo Moooooooo, moooo, mooo

that cunning peculiar to craziness, he assumed a steady, common-sense
mooo moooooo mooooooo mo moooooooo, mo moooooo m mooooo, mooooo-moooo

exterior, and offered himself as a green-hand candidate for the

Jeroboam's whaling voyage. They engaged him; but straightway upon
Mooooooo'm moooooo mooooo. Mooo moooooo moo; moo moooooooooo mooo

moo mooo'm moooooo moo mo moooo mo mooo, moo mooooooo moooo moo mo m

freshet. He announced himself as the archangel Gabriel, and commanded
moooooo. Mo moooooooo moooooo mo moo moooooooo Moooooo, moo moooooooo

the captain to jump overboard. He published his manifesto, whereby
moo moooooo mo mooo moooooooo. Mo moooooooo moo moooooooo, moooooo

he set himself forth as the deliverer of the isles of the sea and
mo moo moooooo moooo mo moo moooooooo mo moo moooo mo moo moo moo

vicar-general of all Oceanica. The unflinching earnestness with which he
moooo-moooooo mo moo Mooooooo. Moo moooooooooo moooooooooo mooo moooo mo

declared these things;--the dark, daring play of his sleepless, excited
mooooooo moooo mooooo;--moo mooo, mooooo mooo mo moo moooooooo, moooooo

imagination, and all the preternatural terrors of real delirium, united
moooooooooo, moo moo moo moooooooooooo moooooo mo mooo mooooooo, mooooo

to invest this Gabriel in the minds of the majority of the ignorant
mo mooooo mooo Moooooo mo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo

crew, with an atmosphere of sacredness. Moreover, they were afraid of
mooo, mooo mo mooooooooo mo mooooooooo. Mooooooo, mooo mooo mooooo mo

him. As such a man, however, was not of much practical use in the ship,
moo. Mo mooo m moo, moooooo, moo moo mo mooo moooooooo moo mo moo mooo,

especially as he refused to work except when he pleased, the incredulous
mooooooooo mo mo moooooo mo mooo mooooo mooo mo moooooo, moo moooooooooo

captain would fain have been rid of him; but apprised that that
moooooo moooo mooo mooo mooo moo mo moo; moo mooooooo mooo mooo

individual's intention was to land him in the first convenient port, the
mooooooooo'm moooooooo moo mo mooo moo mo moo moooo mooooooooo mooo, moo

archangel forthwith opened all his seals and vials--devoting the ship
moooooooo moooooooo mooooo moo moo moooo moo moooo--mooooooo moo mooo

and all hands to unconditional perdition, in case this intention was
moo moo moooo mo moooooooooooo moooooooo, mo mooo mooo moooooooo moo

carried out. So strongly did he work upon his disciples among the crew,
moooooo moo. Mo mooooooo moo mo mooo mooo moo moooooooo moooo moo mooo,

that at last in a body they went to the captain and told him if Gabriel
mooo mo mooo mo m mooo mooo mooo mo moo moooooo moo mooo moo mo Moooooo

was sent from the ship, not a man of them would remain. He was therefore
moo mooo mooo moo mooo, moo m moo mo mooo moooo mooooo. Mo moo moooooooo

forced to relinquish his plan. Nor would they permit Gabriel to be any
mooooo mo mooooooooo moo mooo. Moo moooo mooo mooooo Moooooo mo mo moo

way maltreated, say or do what he would; so that it came to pass that
moo mooooooooo, moo mo mo mooo mo moooo; mo mooo mo mooo mo mooo mooo

Gabriel had the complete freedom of the ship. The consequence of all
Moooooo moo moo mooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo. Moo moooooooooo mo moo

this was, that the archangel cared little or nothing for the captain and
mooo moo, mooo moo moooooooo moooo mooooo mo moooooo moo moo moooooo moo

mates; and since the epidemic had broken out, he carried a higher hand
moooo; moo moooo moo mooooooo moo mooooo moo, mo moooooo m mooooo mooo

than ever; declaring that the plague, as he called it, was at his sole
mooo mooo; moooooooo mooo moo mooooo, mo mo mooooo mo, moo mo moo mooo

command; nor should it be stayed but according to his good pleasure.
moooooo; moo mooooo mo mo mooooo moo moooooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo.

The sailors, mostly poor devils, cringed, and some of them fawned before
Moo moooooo, mooooo mooo mooooo, moooooo, moo mooo mo mooo mooooo mooooo

him; in obedience to his instructions, sometimes rendering him personal
moo; mo moooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo, moooooooo moooooooo moo mooooooo

homage, as to a god. Such things may seem incredible; but, however
mooooo, mo mo m moo. Mooo mooooo moo mooo mooooooooo; moo, moooooo

wondrous, they are true. Nor is the history of fanatics half so striking
mooooooo, mooo moo mooo. Moo mo moo moooooo mo mooooooo mooo mo mooooooo

in respect to the measureless self-deception of the fanatic himself, as
mo moooooo mo moo moooooooooo mooo-moooooooo mo moo moooooo moooooo, mo

his measureless power of deceiving and bedevilling so many others. But
moo moooooooooo moooo mo moooooooo moo moooooooooo mo mooo mooooo. Moo

it is time to return to the Pequod.
mo mo mooo mo mooooo mo moo Mooooo.




"I fear not thy epidemic, man," said Ahab from the bulwarks, to Captain
"M mooo moo moo mooooooo, moo," mooo Mooo mooo moo mooooooo, mo Moooooo

Mayhew, who stood in the boat's stern; "come on board."
Mooooo, moo moooo mo moo mooo'm moooo; "mooo mo moooo."




But now Gabriel started to his feet.
Moo moo Moooooo moooooo mo moo mooo.

"Moooo, moooo mo moo mooooo, mooooo moo moooooo! Mooooo mo moo mooooooo

plague!"
mooooo!"

moooooo moo mooooo.

It seemed that the Jeroboam had not long left home, when upon speaking
Mo mooooo mooo moo Mooooooo moo moo mooo mooo mooo, mooo mooo mooooooo

moooooooo mo moooooo moo mooo mooo. Mooooooo, Moooooo, moooooooo mo

moo mooo-moooo mooo-mooo, moo moooooo moo moo mo moooooo mooooooo, moo

mo moo mooooooo. Moo, moooo Moooo, moo mooo, moo mooooooo mo mo moo

mooo'm moo, moo mooo moo moo mooooooo mooooo mo moo moooo moo moooooo

moo mooo mooooooooooo mooo moo moooo, moo mooooooo mo moo m mooo mooooo

moo moo mooooo moooo, mo! m moooo moooo mooooo mooo mooo moo moo; mo moo

mo moo moooooo. Mooo moooooo, moo mooooooo mooo, mo mooo mo moooooo

mooo mo moo mooo moo mooooo, moo m mooo mo moo moooooo'm mooo; moo moo

mooo moo mooo mooo.




It is well to parenthesize here, that of the fatal accidents in the
Mo mo mooo mo mooooooooooo mooo, mooo mo moo moooo moooooooo mo moo

Sperm-Whale Fishery, this kind is perhaps almost as frequent as any.
Moooo-Moooo Moooooo, mooo mooo mo moooooo mooooo mo mooooooo mo moo.

Sometimes, nothing is injured but the man who is thus annihilated;
Moooooooo, moooooo mo moooooo moo moo moo moo mo mooo moooooooooo;

oftener the boat's bow is knocked off, or the thigh-board, in which the
moooooo moo mooo'm moo mo moooooo moo, mo moo moooo-moooo, mo moooo moo

headsman stands, is torn from its place and accompanies the body. But
mooooooo mooooo, mo mooo mooo moo moooo moo moooooooooo moo mooo. Moo

strangest of all is the circumstance, that in more instances than one,
moooooooo mo moo mo moo mooooooooooo, mooo mo mooo moooooooo mooo moo,

when the body has been recovered, not a single mark of violence is
mooo moo mooo moo mooo moooooooo, moo m mooooo mooo mo mooooooo mo

discernible; the man being stark dead.
moooooooooo; moo moo moooo moooo mooo.




The whole calamity, with the falling form of Macey, was plainly descried
Moo moooo mooooooo, mooo moo moooooo mooo mo Moooo, moo moooooo mooooooo

from the ship. Raising a piercing shriek--"The vial! the vial!" Gabriel
mooo moo mooo. Moooooo m mooooooo mooooo--"Moo mooo! moo mooo!" Moooooo

called off the terror-stricken crew from the further hunting of the
mooooo moo moo mooooo-mooooooo mooo mooo moo moooooo moooooo mo moo

whale. This terrible event clothed the archangel with added influence;
moooo. Mooo mooooooo moooo moooooo moo moooooooo mooo moooo moooooooo;

because his credulous disciples believed that he had specifically
moooooo moo moooooooo moooooooo mooooooo mooo mo moo mooooooooooo

fore-announced it, instead of only making a general prophecy, which any
mooo-moooooooo mo, moooooo mo mooo mooooo m moooooo mooooooo, moooo moo

one might have done, and so have chanced to hit one of many marks in the
moo moooo mooo mooo, moo mo mooo moooooo mo moo moo mo mooo moooo mo moo

wide margin allowed. He became a nameless terror to the ship.
mooo mooooo moooooo. Mo mooooo m mooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo.




Mayhew having concluded his narration, Ahab put such questions to

there!--beware of the blasphemer's end!"
moooo!--mooooo mo moo mooooooooo'm moo!"




Ahab stolidly turned aside; then said to Mayhew, "Captain, I have
Mooo mooooooo mooooo moooo; mooo mooo mo Mooooo, "Moooooo, M mooo

just bethought me of my letter-bag; there is a letter for one of thy
mooo moooooooo mo mo mo mooooo-moo; moooo mo m mooooo moo moo mo moo

officers, if I mistake not. Starbuck, look over the bag."
mooooooo, mo M moooooo moo. Mooooooo, mooo mooo moo moo."




Every whale-ship takes out a goodly number of letters for various ships,
Moooo moooo-mooo moooo moo m mooooo mooooo mo moooooo moo moooooo moooo,

whose delivery to the persons to whom they may be addressed, depends
moooo mooooooo mo moo moooooo mo mooo mooo moo mo moooooooo, moooooo

upon the mere chance of encountering them in the four oceans. Thus,
mooo moo mooo mooooo mo mooooooooooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo. Mooo,

most letters never reach their mark; and many are only received after
mooo moooooo moooo moooo moooo mooo; moo mooo moo mooo mooooooo moooo

attaining an age of two or three years or more.
moooooooo mo moo mo moo mo moooo moooo mo mooo.




Soon Starbuck returned with a letter in his hand. It was sorely tumbled,
Mooo Mooooooo mooooooo mooo m mooooo mo moo mooo. Mo moo mooooo moooooo,

damp, and covered with a dull, spotted, green mould, in consequence
mooo, moo moooooo mooo m mooo, moooooo, moooo moooo, mo moooooooooo

of being kept in a dark locker of the cabin. Of such a letter, Death
mo moooo mooo mo m mooo mooooo mo moo moooo. Mo mooo m mooooo, Moooo

himself might well have been the post-boy.
moooooo moooo mooo mooo mooo moo mooo-moo.




"Can'st not read it?" cried Ahab. "Give it me, man. Aye, aye, it's but
"Moo'mo moo mooo mo?" moooo Mooo. "Mooo mo mo, moo. Moo, moo, mo'm moo

a dim scrawl;--what's this?" As he was studying it out, Starbuck took a
m moo mooooo;--mooo'm mooo?" Mo mo moo mooooooo mo moo, Mooooooo mooo m

mooooo moo mooooo moooo, moo mo mooo moo, mooo mo mo moo mooo, moooooo

moo mooooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo.

mooooo.










CHAPTER 72. The Monkey-Rope.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooooo-Mooo.







In the tumultuous business of cutting-in and attending to a whale, there
Mo moo mooooooooo mooooooo mo moooooo-mo moo moooooooo mo m moooo, moooo

is much running backwards and forwards among the crew. Now hands are
mo mooo moooooo moooooooo moo mooooooo moooo moo mooo. Moo moooo moo

wanted here, and then again hands are wanted there. There is no staying
mooooo mooo, moo mooo moooo moooo moo mooooo moooo. Moooo mo mo moooooo

in any one place; for at one and the same time everything has to be done
mo moo moo moooo; moo mo moo moo moo mooo mooo mooooooooo moo mo mo mooo

everywhere. It is much the same with him who endeavors the description
mooooooooo. Mo mo mooo moo mooo mooo moo moo moooooooo moo moooooooooo

of the scene. We must now retrace our way a little. It was mentioned
mo moo moooo. Mo mooo moo moooooo moo moo m mooooo. Mo moo moooooooo

that upon first breaking ground in the whale's back, the blubber-hook
mooo mooo moooo mooooooo mooooo mo moo moooo'm mooo, moo moooooo-mooo

was inserted into the original hole there cut by the spades of the
moo mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo moooo moo mo moo mooooo mo moo

mates. But how did so clumsy and weighty a mass as that same hook
moooo. Moo moo moo mo mooooo moo moooooo m mooo mo mooo mooo mooo

get fixed in that hole? It was inserted there by my particular friend
moo moooo mo mooo mooo? Mo moo mooooooo moooo mo mo mooooooooo mooooo

Queequeg, whose duty it was, as harpooneer, to descend upon the
Mooooooo, moooo mooo mo moo, mo mooooooooo, mo moooooo mooo moo

monster's back for the special purpose referred to. But in very many
moooooo'm mooo moo moo moooooo moooooo mooooooo mo. Moo mo mooo mooo

cases, circumstances require that the harpooneer shall remain on the
moooo, moooooooooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooooooo moooo mooooo mo moo

whale till the whole flensing or stripping operation is concluded. The
moooo mooo moo moooo mooooooo mo moooooooo moooooooo mo moooooooo. Moo

whale, be it observed, lies almost entirely submerged, excepting the
moooo, mo mo mooooooo, mooo mooooo mooooooo moooooooo, moooooooo moo

immediate parts operated upon. So down there, some ten feet below the
moooooooo moooo mooooooo mooo. Mo mooo moooo, mooo moo mooo moooo moo

level of the deck, the poor harpooneer flounders about, half on the
moooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo mooooooooo moooooooo moooo, mooo mo moo

whale and half in the water, as the vast mass revolves like a tread-mill
moooo moo mooo mo moo moooo, mo moo mooo mooo mooooooo mooo m moooo-mooo

beneath him. On the occasion in question, Queequeg figured in the
moooooo moo. Mo moo mooooooo mo mooooooo, Mooooooo moooooo mo moo

Highland costume--a shirt and socks--in which to my eyes, at least,
Mooooooo moooooo--m moooo moo moooo--mo moooo mo mo mooo, mo moooo,

he appeared to uncommon advantage; and no one had a better chance to
mo mooooooo mo mooooooo moooooooo; moo mo moo moo m mooooo mooooo mo

observe him, as will presently be seen.
moooooo moo, mo mooo moooooooo mo mooo.




Being the savage's bowsman, that is, the person who pulled the bow-oar
Moooo moo mooooo'm moooooo, mooo mo, moo mooooo moo mooooo moo moo-moo

in his boat (the second one from forward), it was my cheerful duty to
mo moo mooo (moo mooooo moo mooo moooooo), mo moo mo mooooooo mooo mo

attend upon him while taking that hard-scrabble scramble upon the dead
mooooo mooo moo moooo mooooo mooo mooo-mooooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo

whale's back. You have seen Italian organ-boys holding a dancing-ape by
moooo'm mooo. Moo mooo mooo Moooooo moooo-mooo moooooo m moooooo-moo mo

a long cord. Just so, from the ship's steep side, did I hold Queequeg
m mooo mooo. Mooo mo, mooo moo mooo'm moooo mooo, moo M mooo Mooooooo

down there in the sea, by what is technically called in the fishery
mooo moooo mo moo moo, mo mooo mo moooooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooo

a monkey-rope, attached to a strong strip of canvas belted round his
m mooooo-mooo, mooooooo mo m mooooo moooo mo mooooo mooooo moooo moo

waist.
moooo.




It was a humorously perilous business for both of us. For, before we
Mo moo m mooooooooo mooooooo mooooooo moo mooo mo mo. Moo, mooooo mo

proceed further, it must be said that the monkey-rope was fast at
moooooo moooooo, mo mooo mo mooo mooo moo mooooo-mooo moo mooo mo

both ends; fast to Queequeg's broad canvas belt, and fast to my narrow
mooo mooo; mooo mo Mooooooo'm moooo mooooo mooo, moo mooo mo mo mooooo

leather one. So that for better or for worse, we two, for the time, were
moooooo moo. Mo mooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo, mo moo, moo moo mooo, mooo

wedded; and should poor Queequeg sink to rise no more, then both usage
mooooo; moo mooooo mooo Mooooooo mooo mo mooo mo mooo, mooo mooo moooo

and honour demanded, that instead of cutting the cord, it should drag
moo mooooo mooooooo, mooo moooooo mo moooooo moo mooo, mo mooooo mooo

me down in his wake. So, then, an elongated Siamese ligature united us.
mo mooo mo moo mooo. Mo, mooo, mo moooooooo Moooooo mooooooo mooooo mo.

Queequeg was my own inseparable twin brother; nor could I any way get
Mooooooo moo mo moo moooooooooo mooo moooooo; moo moooo M moo moo moo

rid of the dangerous liabilities which the hempen bond entailed.
moo mo moo moooooooo moooooooooo moooo moo mooooo mooo mooooooo.




So strongly and metaphysically did I conceive of my situation then, that
Mo mooooooo moo mooooooooooooo moo M mooooooo mo mo moooooooo mooo, mooo

while earnestly watching his motions, I seemed distinctly to perceive
moooo moooooooo mooooooo moo moooooo, M mooooo mooooooooo mo mooooooo

that my own individuality was now merged in a joint stock company of
mooo mo moo moooooooooooo moo moo mooooo mo m moooo moooo moooooo mo

two; that my free will had received a mortal wound; and that another's
moo; mooo mo mooo mooo moo mooooooo m mooooo moooo; moo mooo moooooo'm

mistake or misfortune might plunge innocent me into unmerited disaster
moooooo mo mooooooooo moooo mooooo mooooooo mo mooo moooooooo mooooooo

and death. Therefore, I saw that here was a sort of interregnum in
moo moooo. Moooooooo, M moo mooo mooo moo m mooo mo moooooooooo mo

Providence; for its even-handed equity never could have so gross an
Mooooooooo; moo moo mooo-mooooo mooooo moooo moooo mooo mo moooo mo

injustice. And yet still further pondering--while I jerked him now
moooooooo. Moo moo moooo moooooo moooooooo--moooo M mooooo moo moo

and then from between the whale and ship, which would threaten to jam
moo mooo mooo moooooo moo moooo moo mooo, moooo moooo mooooooo mo moo

him--still further pondering, I say, I saw that this situation of mine
moo--moooo moooooo moooooooo, M moo, M moo mooo mooo moooooooo mo mooo

was the precise situation of every mortal that breathes; only, in most
moo moo moooooo moooooooo mo moooo mooooo mooo mooooooo; mooo, mo mooo

cases, he, one way or other, has this Siamese connexion with a plurality
moooo, mo, moo moo mo moooo, moo mooo Moooooo moooooooo mooo m moooooooo

of other mortals. If your banker breaks, you snap; if your apothecary by
mo moooo moooooo. Mo mooo mooooo mooooo, moo mooo; mo mooo mooooooooo mo

mistake sends you poison in your pills, you die. True, you may say
moooooo moooo moo mooooo mo mooo moooo, moo moo. Mooo, moo moo moo

that, by exceeding caution, you may possibly escape these and the
mooo, mo moooooooo moooooo, moo moo mooooooo mooooo moooo moo moo

multitudinous other evil chances of life. But handle Queequeg's
moooooooooooo moooo mooo moooooo mo mooo. Moo mooooo Mooooooo'm

monkey-rope heedfully as I would, sometimes he jerked it so, that I came
mooooo-mooo moooooooo mo M moooo, moooooooo mo mooooo mo mo, mooo M mooo

very near sliding overboard. Nor could I possibly forget that, do what I
mooo mooo moooooo moooooooo. Moo moooo M mooooooo mooooo mooo, mo mooo M

would, I only had the management of one end of it.*
moooo, M mooo moo moo mooooooooo mo moo moo mo mo.*







*The monkey-rope is found in all whalers; but it was only in the Pequod
*Moo mooooo-mooo mo moooo mo moo moooooo; moo mo moo mooo mo moo Mooooo

that the monkey and his holder were ever tied together. This improvement
mooo moo mooooo moo moo mooooo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo. Mooo moooooooooo

upon the original usage was introduced by no less a man than Stubb,
mooo moo mooooooo moooo moo mooooooooo mo mo mooo m moo mooo Moooo,

in order to afford the imperilled harpooneer the strongest possible
mo moooo mo mooooo moo mooooooooo mooooooooo moo moooooooo mooooooo

guarantee for the faithfulness and vigilance of his monkey-rope holder.
moooooooo moo moo mooooooooooo moo moooooooo mo moo mooooo-mooo mooooo.







I have hinted that I would often jerk poor Queequeg from between the
M mooo mooooo mooo M moooo moooo mooo mooo Mooooooo mooo moooooo moo

whale and the ship--where he would occasionally fall, from the incessant
moooo moo moo mooo--moooo mo moooo mooooooooooo mooo, mooo moo moooooooo

rolling and swaying of both. But this was not the only jamming jeopardy
moooooo moo moooooo mo mooo. Moo mooo moo moo moo mooo moooooo mooooooo

he was exposed to. Unappalled by the massacre made upon them during the
mo moo moooooo mo. Mooooooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mooo mooo mooooo moo

night, the sharks now freshly and more keenly allured by the before pent
moooo, moo mooooo moo moooooo moo mooo mooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mooo

blood which began to flow from the carcass--the rabid creatures swarmed
moooo moooo moooo mo mooo mooo moo moooooo--moo moooo moooooooo moooooo

round it like bees in a beehive.
moooo mo mooo mooo mo m moooooo.




And right in among those sharks was Queequeg; who often pushed them
Moo moooo mo moooo moooo mooooo moo Mooooooo; moo moooo mooooo mooo

aside with his floundering feet. A thing altogether incredible were
moooo mooo moo moooooooooo mooo. M moooo mooooooooo mooooooooo mooo

it not that attracted by such prey as a dead whale, the otherwise
mo moo mooo moooooooo mo mooo mooo mo m mooo moooo, moo moooooooo

miscellaneously carnivorous shark will seldom touch a man.
moooooooooooooo moooooooooo moooo mooo mooooo moooo m moo.




Nevertheless, it may well be believed that since they have such a
Mooooooooooo, mo moo mooo mo mooooooo mooo moooo mooo mooo mooo m

ravenous finger in the pie, it is deemed but wise to look sharp to them.
mooooooo mooooo mo moo moo, mo mo mooooo moo mooo mo mooo moooo mo mooo.

Accordingly, besides the monkey-rope, with which I now and then jerked
Moooooooooo, moooooo moo mooooo-mooo, mooo moooo M moo moo mooo mooooo

the poor fellow from too close a vicinity to the maw of what seemed
moo mooo mooooo mooo moo moooo m mooooooo mo moo moo mo mooo mooooo

a peculiarly ferocious shark--he was provided with still another
m mooooooooo moooooooo moooo--mo moo mooooooo mooo moooo moooooo

protection. Suspended over the side in one of the stages, Tashtego
mooooooooo. Moooooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo mo moo mooooo, Mooooooo

and Daggoo continually flourished over his head a couple of keen
moo Mooooo moooooooooo mooooooooo mooo moo mooo m mooooo mo mooo

moooo-mooooo, moooooooo mooo moooooooooo mo mooo mooooo mo mooo moooo

reach. This procedure of theirs, to be sure, was very disinterested and
moooo. Mooo moooooooo mo mooooo, mo mo mooo, moo mooo moooooooooooo moo

benevolent of them. They meant Queequeg's best happiness, I admit; but
mooooooooo mo mooo. Mooo moooo Mooooooo'm mooo moooooooo, M moooo; moo

in their hasty zeal to befriend him, and from the circumstance that both
mo moooo moooo mooo mo mooooooo moo, moo mooo moo mooooooooooo mooo mooo

mo moo moo mooooo mooo mo moooo mooo mooooo mo moo moooo-moooooo moooo,

those indiscreet spades of theirs would come nearer amputating a leg
moooo mooooooooo mooooo mo mooooo moooo mooo mooooo mooooooooo m moo

than a tail. But poor Queequeg, I suppose, straining and gasping there
mooo m mooo. Moo mooo Mooooooo, M moooooo, moooooooo moo moooooo moooo

with that great iron hook--poor Queequeg, I suppose, only prayed to his
mooo mooo moooo mooo mooo--mooo Mooooooo, M moooooo, mooo mooooo mo moo

Yojo, and gave up his life into the hands of his gods.
Mooo, moo mooo mo moo mooo mooo moo moooo mo moo mooo.




Well, well, my dear comrade and twin-brother, thought I, as I drew in
Mooo, mooo, mo mooo moooooo moo mooo-moooooo, moooooo M, mo M mooo mo

and then slacked off the rope to every swell of the sea--what matters
moo mooo moooooo moo moo mooo mo moooo moooo mo moo moo--mooo moooooo

it, after all? Are you not the precious image of each and all of us men
mo, moooo moo? Moo moo moo moo mooooooo moooo mo mooo moo moo mo mo moo

in this whaling world? That unsounded ocean you gasp in, is Life; those
mo mooo moooooo moooo? Mooo moooooooo moooo moo mooo mo, mo Mooo; moooo

sharks, your foes; those spades, your friends; and what between sharks
mooooo, mooo mooo; moooo mooooo, mooo moooooo; moo mooo moooooo mooooo

and spades you are in a sad pickle and peril, poor lad.
moo mooooo moo moo mo m moo mooooo moo moooo, mooo moo.




But courage! there is good cheer in store for you, Queequeg. For now, as
Moo moooooo! moooo mo mooo moooo mo moooo moo moo, Mooooooo. Moo moo, mo

with blue lips and blood-shot eyes the exhausted savage at last climbs
mooo mooo mooo moo moooo-mooo mooo moo moooooooo mooooo mo mooo mooooo

up the chains and stands all dripping and involuntarily trembling over
mo moo mooooo moo mooooo moo mooooooo moo moooooooooooo moooooooo mooo

the side; the steward advances, and with a benevolent, consolatory
moo mooo; moo moooooo mooooooo, moo mooo m mooooooooo, moooooooooo

glance hands him--what? Some hot Cognac? No! hands him, ye gods! hands
mooooo moooo moo--mooo? Mooo moo Mooooo? Mo! moooo moo, mo mooo! moooo

him a cup of tepid ginger and water!
moo m moo mo moooo mooooo moo moooo!




"Ginger? Do I smell ginger?" suspiciously asked Stubb, coming near.
"Mooooo? Mo M moooo mooooo?" mooooooooooo moooo Moooo, mooooo mooo.

"Moo, mooo mooo mo mooooo," moooooo mooo moo mo moo mooooooo moo. Mooo

moo mooooooo mo mooo mo, Mo. Moooo-Moo, moooo mooo moo mooooo mo mooooo?

mooo."




"There is some sneaking Temperance Society movement about this

moooo mo moooo mooo moo mooo mooo m mooo-moooooo moo?"

"M moooo moo," mooo Mooooooo, "mo mo mooo moooo mooooo."




"Aye, aye, steward," cried Stubb, "we'll teach you to drug a

harpooneer; none of your apothecary's medicine here; you want to poison

mo moo, moo mooooo moo mooooooo, mo mo?"




"It was not me," cried Dough-Boy, "it was Aunt Charity that brought the

mooo mooo mooooo-moo--mo moo mooooo mo."

moooo."

of tea-caddy in the other. The first contained strong spirits, and was

mooooo moooo mo moo moooo.










CHAPTER 73. Stubb and Flask Kill a Right Whale; and Then Have a Talk
MOOOOOO mo. Moooo moo Moooo Mooo m Moooo Moooo; moo Mooo Mooo m Mooo

Over Him.
Mooo Moo.







It must be borne in mind that all this time we have a Sperm Whale's
Mo mooo mo moooo mo mooo mooo moo mooo mooo mo mooo m Moooo Moooo'm

prodigious head hanging to the Pequod's side. But we must let it
mooooooooo mooo moooooo mo moo Mooooo'm mooo. Moo mo mooo moo mo

continue hanging there a while till we can get a chance to attend to it.
mooooooo moooooo moooo m moooo mooo mo moo moo m mooooo mo mooooo mo mo.

For the present other matters press, and the best we can do now for the
Moo moo moooooo moooo moooooo moooo, moo moo mooo mo moo mo moo moo moo

head, is to pray heaven the tackles may hold.
mooo, mo mo mooo mooooo moo moooooo moo mooo.




Now, during the past night and forenoon, the Pequod had gradually
Moo, mooooo moo mooo moooo moo mooooooo, moo Mooooo moo moooooooo

drifted into a sea, which, by its occasional patches of yellow brit,
moooooo mooo m moo, moooo, mo moo mooooooooo moooooo mo mooooo mooo,

gave unusual tokens of the vicinity of Right Whales, a species of the
mooo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo mo Moooo Mooooo, m moooooo mo moo

Leviathan that but few supposed to be at this particular time lurking
Moooooooo mooo moo moo mooooooo mo mo mo mooo mooooooooo mooo moooooo

anywhere near. And though all hands commonly disdained the capture of
mooooooo mooo. Moo mooooo moo moooo mooooooo moooooooo moo moooooo mo

those inferior creatures; and though the Pequod was not commissioned to
moooo mooooooo moooooooo; moo mooooo moo Mooooo moo moo mooooooooooo mo

cruise for them at all, and though she had passed numbers of them near
mooooo moo mooo mo moo, moo mooooo moo moo mooooo moooooo mo mooo mooo

the Crozetts without lowering a boat; yet now that a Sperm Whale
moo Mooooooo moooooo mooooooo m mooo; moo moo mooo m Moooo Moooo

had been brought alongside and beheaded, to the surprise of all, the
moo mooo moooooo moooooooo moo mooooooo, mo moo mooooooo mo moo, moo

announcement was made that a Right Whale should be captured that day, if
mooooooooooo moo mooo mooo m Moooo Moooo mooooo mo mooooooo mooo moo, mo

opportunity offered.
moooooooooo moooooo.




Nor was this long wanting. Tall spouts were seen to leeward; and two
Moo moo mooo mooo moooooo. Mooo mooooo mooo mooo mo moooooo; moo moo

boats, Stubb's and Flask's, were detached in pursuit. Pulling further
moooo, Moooo'm moo Moooo'm, mooo mooooooo mo moooooo. Moooooo moooooo

and further away, they at last became almost invisible to the men at
moo moooooo mooo, mooo mo mooo mooooo mooooo moooooooo mo moo moo mo

the mast-head. But suddenly in the distance, they saw a great heap of
moo mooo-mooo. Moo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo, mooo moo m moooo mooo mo

tumultuous white water, and soon after news came from aloft that one or
mooooooooo moooo moooo, moo mooo moooo mooo mooo mooo moooo mooo moo mo

both the boats must be fast. An interval passed and the boats were in
mooo moo moooo mooo mo mooo. Mo mooooooo mooooo moo moo moooo mooo mo

plain sight, in the act of being dragged right towards the ship by the
moooo moooo, mo moo moo mo moooo moooooo moooo moooooo moo mooo mo moo

towing whale. So close did the monster come to the hull, that at
mooooo moooo. Mo moooo moo moo moooooo mooo mo moo mooo, mooo mo

first it seemed as if he meant it malice; but suddenly going down in a
moooo mo mooooo mo mo mo moooo mo mooooo; moo mooooooo moooo mooo mo m

maelstrom, within three rods of the planks, he wholly disappeared from
moooooooo, mooooo moooo mooo mo moo mooooo, mo mooooo moooooooooo mooo

view, as if diving under the keel. "Cut, cut!" was the cry from the
mooo, mo mo mooooo moooo moo mooo. "Moo, moo!" moo moo moo mooo moo

ship to the boats, which, for one instant, seemed on the point of being
mooo mo moo moooo, moooo, moo moo moooooo, mooooo mo moo moooo mo moooo

brought with a deadly dash against the vessel's side. But having plenty
moooooo mooo m mooooo mooo moooooo moo mooooo'm mooo. Moo mooooo mooooo

of line yet in the tubs, and the whale not sounding very rapidly, they
mo mooo moo mo moo mooo, moo moo moooo moo mooooooo mooo moooooo, mooo

paid out abundance of rope, and at the same time pulled with all their
mooo moo moooooooo mo mooo, moo mo moo mooo mooo mooooo mooo moo moooo

might so as to get ahead of the ship. For a few minutes the struggle was
moooo mo mo mo moo moooo mo moo mooo. Moo m moo moooooo moo mooooooo moo

intensely critical; for while they still slacked out the tightened line
moooooooo mooooooo; moo moooo mooo moooo moooooo moo moo moooooooo mooo

in one direction, and still plied their oars in another, the contending
mo moo moooooooo, moo moooo moooo moooo mooo mo moooooo, moo mooooooooo

strain threatened to take them under. But it was only a few feet advance
mooooo mooooooooo mo mooo mooo moooo. Moo mo moo mooo m moo mooo moooooo

they sought to gain. And they stuck to it till they did gain it; when
mooo mooooo mo mooo. Moo mooo moooo mo mo mooo mooo moo mooo mo; mooo

instantly, a swift tremor was felt running like lightning along the
moooooooo, m moooo mooooo moo mooo moooooo mooo moooooooo moooo moo

keel, as the strained line, scraping beneath the ship, suddenly rose
mooo, mo moo mooooooo mooo, mooooooo moooooo moo mooo, mooooooo mooo

to view under her bows, snapping and quivering; and so flinging off its
mo mooo moooo moo mooo, mooooooo moo moooooooo; moo mo mooooooo moo moo

drippings, that the drops fell like bits of broken glass on the water,
moooooooo, mooo moo moooo mooo mooo mooo mo mooooo moooo mo moo moooo,

while the whale beyond also rose to sight, and once more the boats were
moooo moo moooo mooooo mooo mooo mo moooo, moo mooo mooo moo moooo mooo

free to fly. But the fagged whale abated his speed, and blindly altering
mooo mo moo. Moo moo mooooo moooo mooooo moo moooo, moo moooooo mooooooo

his course, went round the stern of the ship towing the two boats after
moo mooooo, mooo moooo moo moooo mo moo mooo mooooo moo moo moooo moooo

him, so that they performed a complete circuit.
moo, mo mooo mooo moooooooo m mooooooo moooooo.




Meantime, they hauled more and more upon their lines, till close
Mooooooo, mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo mooo moooo moooo, mooo moooo

flanking him on both sides, Stubb answered Flask with lance for
mooooooo moo mo mooo moooo, Moooo mooooooo Moooo mooo moooo moo

lance; and thus round and round the Pequod the battle went, while the
moooo; moo mooo moooo moo moooo moo Mooooo moo mooooo mooo, moooo moo

mooooooooo mo mooooo mooo moo mooooo mooo moooo moo Moooo Moooo'm mooo,

mooooo mo moo moooo moooo mooo moo moooooo, moooooooo mooooooo mo moooo

new gash, as the eager Israelites did at the new bursting fountains that
moo mooo, mo moo moooo Mooooooooo moo mo moo moo mooooooo moooooooo mooo

poured from the smitten rock.
mooooo mooo moo moooooo mooo.




At last his spout grew thick, and with a frightful roll and vomit, he
Mo mooo moo moooo mooo moooo, moo mooo m moooooooo mooo moo moooo, mo

turned upon his back a corpse.
mooooo mooo moo mooo m mooooo.




While the two headsmen were engaged in making fast cords to his flukes,

and in other ways getting the mass in readiness for towing, some
moo mo moooo mooo moooooo moo mooo mo moooooooo moo mooooo, mooo

mooooooooooo mooooo moooooo mooo.




"I wonder what the old man wants with this lump of foul lard," said
"M mooooo mooo moo moo moo moooo mooo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo," mooo

Stubb, not without some disgust at the thought of having to do with so
Moooo, moo moooooo mooo moooooo mo moo moooooo mo mooooo mo mo mooo mo

ignoble a leviathan.
moooooo m moooooooo.




"Wants with it?" said Flask, coiling some spare line in the boat's bow,
"Moooo mooo mo?" mooo Moooo, moooooo mooo moooo mooo mo moo mooo'm moo,

"did you never hear that the ship which but once has a Sperm Whale's
"moo moo moooo mooo mooo moo mooo moooo moo mooo moo m Moooo Moooo'm

mooo moooooo mo moo moooooooo mooo, moo mo moo mooo mooo m Moooo Moooo'm

mo moo mooooooo; moo moo moooo mooo, Moooo, mooo mooo mooo moo moooo

afterwards capsize?"
mooooooooo moooooo?"




"Why not?
"Moo moo?




"I don't know, but I heard that gamboge ghost of a Fedallah saying so,
"M moo'm mooo, moo M moooo mooo moooooo moooo mo m Mooooooo mooooo mo,

and he seems to know all about ships' charms. But I sometimes think
moo mo moooo mo mooo moo moooo moooo' mooooo. Moo M moooooooo moooo

mo'mo moooo moo mooo mo mo mooo mo mooo. M moo'm mooo mooo mooo mooo,

Moooo. Moo moo mooo mooooo moo mooo mooo mo moo mo m mooo mo mooooo mooo

m moooo'm mooo, Moooo?"




"Sink him! I never look at him at all; but if ever I get a chance of a
"Mooo moo! M moooo mooo mo moo mo moo; moo mo mooo M moo m mooooo mo m

dark night, and he standing hard by the bulwarks, and no one by; look

mooo moooo, Moooo"--mooooooo mooo moo moo mooo m mooooooo mooooo mo

both hands--"Aye, will I! Flask, I take that Fedallah to be the devil in
mooo moooo--"Moo, mooo M! Moooo, M mooo mooo Mooooooo mo mo moo moooo mo

disguise. Do you believe that cock and bull story about his having been
mooooooo. Mo moo moooooo mooo mooo moo mooo moooo moooo moo mooooo mooo

stowed away on board ship? He's the devil, I say. The reason why you
mooooo mooo mo moooo mooo? Mo'm moo moooo, M moo. Moo mooooo moo moo

don't see his tail, is because he tucks it up out of sight; he carries
moo'm moo moo mooo, mo moooooo mo moooo mo mo moo mo moooo; mo moooooo

it coiled away in his pocket, I guess. Blast him! now that I think of
mo mooooo mooo mo moo mooooo, M moooo. Moooo moo! moo mooo M moooo mo

it, he's always wanting oakum to stuff into the toes of his boots."
mo, mo'm mooooo moooooo moooo mo moooo mooo moo mooo mo moo moooo."




"He sleeps in his boots, don't he? He hasn't got any hammock; but I've
"Mo mooooo mo moo moooo, moo'm mo? Mo mooo'm moo moo moooooo; moo M'mo

seen him lay of nights in a coil of rigging."
mooo moo moo mo mooooo mo m mooo mo moooooo."

"Mo moooo, moo mo'm moooooo mo moo mooooo mooo; mo moooo mo mooo, mo mo

moo, mo moo moo mo moo moooooo."

"Mooo'm moo moo moo mooo mo mooo mo mo mooo moo moo?"

"Mooooooo mo m mooo mo m moooooo, M moooooo."

"Moooooo?--moooo mooo?"

moooooooo Mooo Mooo."




"Pooh! Stubb, you are skylarking; how can Fedallah do that?"
"Mooo! Moooo, moo moo mooooooooo; moo moo Mooooooo mo mooo?"




"I don't know, Flask, but the devil is a curious chap, and a wicked
"M moo'm mooo, Moooo, moo moo moooo mo m moooooo mooo, moo m mooooo

moooooooooooo, moo moooooooo mo moo moo mooooooo moo mo mooo. Mooo, mo

moo mo mooo, moo moooo moo moooo mooo mo mooooo. Moo moooo, moooooooo

moo moooo moooooooo."

In good time, Flask's saying proved true. As before, the Pequod steeply
Mo mooo mooo, Moooo'm mooooo mooooo mooo. Mo mooooo, moo Mooooo moooooo

leaned over towards the sperm whale's head, now, by the counterpoise of
mooooo mooo moooooo moo moooo moooo'm mooo, moo, mo moo mooooooooooo mo

mooo moooo, moo mooooooo moo mooo mooo; mooooo mooooo mooooooo, moo moo

well believe. So, when on one side you hoist in Locke's head, you go
mooo moooooo. Mo, mooo mo moo mooo moo moooo mo Moooo'm mooo, moo mo

mooo mooo moo; moo moo, mo moo moooo mooo, moooo mo Mooo'm moo moo mooo

back again; but in very poor plight. Thus, some minds for ever keep
mooo moooo; moo mo mooo mooo mooooo. Mooo, mooo moooo moo mooo mooo

trimming boat. Oh, ye foolish! throw all these thunder-heads overboard,
mooooooo mooo. Mo, mo moooooo! moooo moo moooo moooooo-moooo moooooooo,

and then you will float light and right.
moo mooo moo mooo moooo moooo moo moooo.




In disposing of the body of a right whale, when brought alongside the
Mo moooooooo mo moo mooo mo m moooo moooo, mooo moooooo moooooooo moo

ship, the same preliminary proceedings commonly take place as in the
mooo, moo mooo moooooooooo moooooooooo mooooooo mooo moooo mo mo moo

mooo mo m moooo moooo; mooo, mo moo mooooo mooooooo, moo mooo mo moo moo

whole, but in the former the lips and tongue are separately removed and
moooo, moo mo moo mooooo moo mooo moo mooooo moo mooooooooo moooooo moo

moooooo mo mooo, mooo moo moo mooo moooo moooo mooo mooooooo mo mooo mo

called the crown-piece. But nothing like this, in the present case,
mooooo moo moooo-moooo. Moo moooooo mooo mooo, mo moo moooooo mooo,

had been done. The carcases of both whales had dropped astern; and
moo mooo mooo. Moo mooooooo mo mooo mooooo moo moooooo mooooo; moo

the head-laden ship not a little resembled a mule carrying a pair of
moo mooo-moooo mooo moo m mooooo moooooooo m mooo mooooooo m mooo mo

overburdening panniers.
moooooooooooo mooooooo.




Meantime, Fedallah was calmly eyeing the right whale's head, and ever
Mooooooo, Mooooooo moo mooooo mooooo moo moooo moooo'm mooo, moo mooo

moo mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo moooo mo moo moooo mo moo moo

mooo. Moo Mooo moooooo mo mo moooo, mooo moo Mooooo mooooooo moo mooooo;

moooo, mo moo Mooooo'm mooooo moo moooo mo moo mo mooooo mooo mo

moooo mooo, moo mooooooo Mooo'm. Mo moo mooo mooooo mo, Mooooooooo

speculations were bandied among them, concerning all these passing
mooooooooooo mooo moooooo moooo mooo, mooooooooo moo moooo moooooo

things.
mooooo.










CHAPTER 74. The Sperm Whale's Head--Contrasted View.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooo Moooo'm Mooo--Mooooooooo Mooo.







Here, now, are two great whales, laying their heads together; let us
Mooo, moo, moo moo moooo mooooo, mooooo moooo moooo mooooooo; moo mo

join them, and lay together our own.
mooo mooo, moo moo mooooooo moo moo.




Of the grand order of folio leviathans, the Sperm Whale and the Right
Mo moo moooo moooo mo moooo mooooooooo, moo Moooo Moooo moo moo Moooo

Whale are by far the most noteworthy. They are the only whales regularly
Moooo moo mo moo moo mooo mooooooooo. Mooo moo moo mooo mooooo moooooooo

hunted by man. To the Nantucketer, they present the two extremes of all
mooooo mo moo. Mo moo Moooooooooo, mooo moooooo moo moo mooooooo mo moo

the known varieties of the whale. As the external difference between
moo moooo moooooooo mo moo moooo. Mo moo mooooooo mooooooooo moooooo

them is mainly observable in their heads; and as a head of each is this
mooo mo mooooo mooooooooo mo moooo moooo; moo mo m mooo mo mooo mo mooo

moment hanging from the Pequod's side; and as we may freely go from one
mooooo moooooo mooo moo Mooooo'm mooo; moo mo mo moo mooooo mo mooo moo

to the other, by merely stepping across the deck:--where, I should like
mo moo moooo, mo mooooo mooooooo mooooo moo mooo:--moooo, M mooooo mooo

to know, will you obtain a better chance to study practical cetology
mo mooo, mooo moo mooooo m mooooo mooooo mo moooo moooooooo mooooooo

than here?
mooo mooo?




In the first place, you are struck by the general contrast between these
Mo moo moooo moooo, moo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooooooo moooooo moooo

heads. Both are massive enough in all conscience; but there is a certain
moooo. Mooo moo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooooooooo; moo moooo mo m moooooo

mathematical symmetry in the Sperm Whale's which the Right Whale's sadly
mooooooooooo mooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo'm moooo moo Moooo Moooo'm moooo

lacks. There is more character in the Sperm Whale's head. As you behold
moooo. Moooo mo mooo moooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo'm mooo. Mo moo mooooo

it, you involuntarily yield the immense superiority to him, in point
mo, moo moooooooooooo moooo moo moooooo moooooooooo mo moo, mo moooo

of pervading dignity. In the present instance, too, this dignity is
mo moooooooo moooooo. Mo moo moooooo mooooooo, moo, mooo moooooo mo

heightened by the pepper and salt colour of his head at the summit,
mooooooooo mo moo mooooo moo mooo mooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooooo,

giving token of advanced age and large experience. In short, he is what
mooooo moooo mo mooooooo moo moo moooo mooooooooo. Mo moooo, mo mo mooo

the fishermen technically call a "grey-headed whale."
moo moooooooo moooooooooo mooo m "mooo-mooooo moooo."




Let us now note what is least dissimilar in these heads--namely, the two
Moo mo moo mooo mooo mo moooo mooooooooo mo moooo moooo--mooooo, moo moo

most important organs, the eye and the ear. Far back on the side of
mooo moooooooo mooooo, moo moo moo moo moo. Moo mooo mo moo mooo mo

the head, and low down, near the angle of either whale's jaw, if you
moo mooo, moo moo mooo, mooo moo moooo mo mooooo moooo'm moo, mo moo

narrowly search, you will at last see a lashless eye, which you would
mooooooo mooooo, moo mooo mo mooo moo m mooooooo moo, moooo moo moooo

fancy to be a young colt's eye; so out of all proportion is it to the
moooo mo mo m moooo mooo'm moo; mo moo mo moo mooooooooo mo mo mo moo

magnitude of the head.
moooooooo mo moo mooo.




Now, from this peculiar sideway position of the whale's eyes, it is
Moo, mooo mooo mooooooo moooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo'm mooo, mo mo

plain that he can never see an object which is exactly ahead, no more
moooo mooo mo moo moooo moo mo mooooo moooo mo moooooo moooo, mo mooo

than he can one exactly astern. In a word, the position of the whale's
mooo mo moo moo moooooo mooooo. Mo m mooo, moo mooooooo mo moo moooo'm

eyes corresponds to that of a man's ears; and you may fancy, for
mooo moooooooooo mo mooo mo m moo'm mooo; moo moo moo moooo, moo

yourself, how it would fare with you, did you sideways survey objects
mooooooo, moo mo moooo mooo mooo moo, moo moo mooooooo mooooo moooooo

through your ears. You would find that you could only command some
moooooo mooo mooo. Moo moooo mooo mooo moo moooo mooo moooooo mooo

thirty degrees of vision in advance of the straight side-line of sight;
mooooo moooooo mo mooooo mo moooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo-mooo mo moooo;

and about thirty more behind it. If your bitterest foe were walking
moo moooo mooooo mooo mooooo mo. Mo mooo moooooooo moo mooo moooooo

straight towards you, with dagger uplifted in broad day, you would not
mooooooo moooooo moo, mooo mooooo mooooooo mo moooo moo, moo moooo moo

be able to see him, any more than if he were stealing upon you from
mo mooo mo moo moo, moo mooo mooo mo mo mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo

behind. In a word, you would have two backs, so to speak; but, at the
mooooo. Mo m mooo, moo moooo mooo moo moooo, mo mo moooo; moo, mo moo

same time, also, two fronts (side fronts): for what is it that makes the
mooo mooo, mooo, moo mooooo (mooo mooooo): moo mooo mo mo mooo moooo moo

front of a man--what, indeed, but his eyes?
moooo mo m moo--mooo, mooooo, moo moo mooo?




Moreover, while in most other animals that I can now think of, the eyes
Mooooooo, moooo mo mooo moooo moooooo mooo M moo moo moooo mo, moo mooo

are so planted as imperceptibly to blend their visual power, so as to
moo mo moooooo mo moooooooooooo mo moooo moooo mooooo moooo, mo mo mo

produce one picture and not two to the brain; the peculiar position of
moooooo moo moooooo moo moo moo mo moo moooo; moo mooooooo mooooooo mo

the whale's eyes, effectually divided as they are by many cubic feet of
moo moooo'm mooo, moooooooooo moooooo mo mooo moo mo mooo moooo mooo mo

solid head, which towers between them like a great mountain separating
moooo mooo, moooo mooooo moooooo mooo mooo m moooo mooooooo mooooooooo

two lakes in valleys; this, of course, must wholly separate the
moo moooo mo moooooo; mooo, mo mooooo, mooo mooooo mooooooo moo

impressions which each independent organ imparts. The whale, therefore,
moooooooooo moooo mooo moooooooooo moooo moooooo. Moo moooo, moooooooo,

must see one distinct picture on this side, and another distinct
mooo moo moo mooooooo moooooo mo mooo mooo, moo moooooo mooooooo

picture on that side; while all between must be profound darkness and
moooooo mo mooo mooo; moooo moo moooooo mooo mo mooooooo mooooooo moo

nothingness to him. Man may, in effect, be said to look out on the world
moooooooooo mo moo. Moo moo, mo mooooo, mo mooo mo mooo moo mo moo moooo

from a sentry-box with two joined sashes for his window. But with the
mooo m mooooo-moo mooo moo mooooo mooooo moo moo mooooo. Moo mooo moo

whale, these two sashes are separately inserted, making two distinct
moooo, moooo moo mooooo moo mooooooooo mooooooo, mooooo moo mooooooo

windows, but sadly impairing the view. This peculiarity of the whale's
moooooo, moo moooo moooooooo moo mooo. Mooo moooooooooo mo moo moooo'm

eyes is a thing always to be borne in mind in the fishery; and to be
mooo mo m moooo mooooo mo mo moooo mo mooo mo moo moooooo; moo mo mo

remembered by the reader in some subsequent scenes.
mooooooooo mo moo mooooo mo mooo mooooooooo mooooo.




A curious and most puzzling question might be started concerning this
M moooooo moo mooo mooooooo mooooooo moooo mo moooooo mooooooooo mooo

visual matter as touching the Leviathan. But I must be content with a
mooooo mooooo mo mooooooo moo Moooooooo. Moo M mooo mo moooooo mooo m

hint. So long as a man's eyes are open in the light, the act of seeing
mooo. Mo mooo mo m moo'm mooo moo mooo mo moo moooo, moo moo mo mooooo

is involuntary; that is, he cannot then help mechanically seeing
mo moooooooooo; mooo mo, mo mooooo mooo mooo mooooooooooo mooooo

whatever objects are before him. Nevertheless, any one's experience
mooooooo moooooo moo mooooo moo. Mooooooooooo, moo moo'm mooooooooo

will teach him, that though he can take in an undiscriminating sweep of
mooo moooo moo, mooo mooooo mo moo mooo mo mo mooooooooooooooo moooo mo

things at one glance, it is quite impossible for him, attentively,
mooooo mo moo mooooo, mo mo moooo mooooooooo moo moo, moooooooooo,

and completely, to examine any two things--however large or however
moo mooooooooo, mo moooooo moo moo mooooo--moooooo moooo mo moooooo

small--at one and the same instant of time; never mind if they lie side
moooo--mo moo moo moo mooo moooooo mo mooo; moooo mooo mo mooo moo mooo

by side and touch each other. But if you now come to separate these two
mo mooo moo moooo mooo moooo. Moo mo moo moo mooo mo mooooooo moooo moo

objects, and surround each by a circle of profound darkness; then, in
moooooo, moo mooooooo mooo mo m mooooo mo mooooooo mooooooo; mooo, mo

order to see one of them, in such a manner as to bring your mind to
moooo mo moo moo mo mooo, mo mooo m mooooo mo mo moooo mooo mooo mo

bear on it, the other will be utterly excluded from your contemporary
mooo mo mo, moo moooo mooo mo moooooo mooooooo mooo mooo mooooooooooo

consciousness. How is it, then, with the whale? True, both his eyes,
moooooooooooo. Moo mo mo, mooo, mooo moo moooo? Mooo, mooo moo mooo,

in themselves, must simultaneously act; but is his brain so much more
mo mooooooooo, mooo mooooooooooooo moo; moo mo moo moooo mo mooo mooo

comprehensive, combining, and subtle than man's, that he can at the same
moooooooooooo, moooooooo, moo mooooo mooo moo'm, mooo mo moo mo moo mooo

moment of time attentively examine two distinct prospects, one on one
mooooo mo mooo moooooooooo moooooo moo mooooooo moooooooo, moo mo moo

side of him, and the other in an exactly opposite direction? If he
mooo mo moo, moo moo moooo mo mo moooooo mooooooo moooooooo? Mo mo

can, then is it as marvellous a thing in him, as if a man were able
moo, mooo mo mo mo mooooooooo m moooo mo moo, mo mo m moo mooo mooo

simultaneously to go through the demonstrations of two distinct problems
mooooooooooooo mo mo moooooo moo mooooooooooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooooo

in Euclid. Nor, strictly investigated, is there any incongruity in this
mo Mooooo. Moo, mooooooo mooooooooooo, mo moooo moo moooooooooo mo mooo

comparison.
mooooooooo.




It may be but an idle whim, but it has always seemed to me, that the
Mo moo mo moo mo mooo mooo, moo mo moo mooooo mooooo mo mo, mooo moo

extraordinary vacillations of movement displayed by some whales when
moooooooooooo mooooooooooo mo mooooooo moooooooo mo mooo mooooo mooo

beset by three or four boats; the timidity and liability to queer
moooo mo moooo mo mooo moooo; moo mooooooo moo moooooooo mo moooo

frights, so common to such whales; I think that all this indirectly
moooooo, mo mooooo mo mooo mooooo; M moooo mooo moo mooo mooooooooo

proceeds from the helpless perplexity of volition, in which their
mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooooooooo mo mooooooo, mo moooo moooo

divided and diametrically opposite powers of vision must involve them.
moooooo moo moooooooooooo mooooooo mooooo mo mooooo mooo moooooo mooo.




But the ear of the whale is full as curious as the eye. If you are an
Moo moo moo mo moo moooo mo mooo mo moooooo mo moo moo. Mo moo moo mo

entire stranger to their race, you might hunt over these two heads
mooooo mooooooo mo moooo mooo, moo moooo mooo mooo moooo moo moooo

for hours, and never discover that organ. The ear has no external leaf
moo moooo, moo moooo mooooooo mooo moooo. Moo moo moo mo mooooooo mooo

whatever; and into the hole itself you can hardly insert a quill, so
mooooooo; moo mooo moo mooo mooooo moo moo mooooo mooooo m moooo, mo

wondrously minute is it. It is lodged a little behind the eye. With
mooooooooo mooooo mo mo. Mo mo mooooo m mooooo mooooo moo moo. Mooo

respect to their ears, this important difference is to be observed
moooooo mo moooo mooo, mooo moooooooo mooooooooo mo mo mo mooooooo

between the sperm whale and the right. While the ear of the former has
moooooo moo moooo moooo moo moo moooo. Moooo moo moo mo moo mooooo moo

an external opening, that of the latter is entirely and evenly covered
mo mooooooo moooooo, mooo mo moo mooooo mo mooooooo moo mooooo moooooo

over with a membrane, so as to be quite imperceptible from without.
mooo mooo m mooooooo, mo mo mo mo moooo moooooooooooo mooo moooooo.




Is it not curious, that so vast a being as the whale should see the
Mo mo moo moooooo, mooo mo mooo m moooo mo moo moooo mooooo moo moo

world through so small an eye, and hear the thunder through an ear which
moooo moooooo mo moooo mo moo, moo mooo moo moooooo moooooo mo moo moooo

is smaller than a hare's? But if his eyes were broad as the lens of
mo moooooo mooo m mooo'm? Moo mo moo mooo mooo moooo mo moo mooo mo

Herschel's great telescope; and his ears capacious as the porches of
Mooooooo'm moooo moooooooo; moo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo moooooo mo

cathedrals; would that make him any longer of sight, or sharper of
mooooooooo; moooo mooo mooo moo moo mooooo mo moooo, mo moooooo mo

hearing? Not at all.--Why then do you try to "enlarge" your mind?
moooooo? Moo mo moo.--Moo mooo mo moo moo mo "moooooo" mooo mooo?

Subtilize it.
Moooooooo mo.




Let us now with whatever levers and steam-engines we have at hand, cant
Moo mo moo mooo mooooooo mooooo moo moooo-moooooo mo mooo mo mooo, mooo

over the sperm whale's head, that it may lie bottom up; then, ascending
mooo moo moooo moooo'm mooo, mooo mo moo moo mooooo mo; mooo, moooooooo

by a ladder to the summit, have a peep down the mouth; and were it not
mo m mooooo mo moo mooooo, mooo m mooo mooo moo moooo; moo mooo mo moo

that the body is now completely separated from it, with a lantern we
mooo moo mooo mo moo mooooooooo moooooooo mooo mo, mooo m moooooo mo

might descend into the great Kentucky Mammoth Cave of his stomach. But
moooo moooooo mooo moo moooo Mooooooo Moooooo Mooo mo moo moooooo. Moo

let us hold on here by this tooth, and look about us where we are. What
moo mo mooo mo mooo mo mooo moooo, moo mooo moooo mo moooo mo moo. Mooo

a really beautiful and chaste-looking mouth! from floor to ceiling,
m mooooo moooooooo moo mooooo-moooooo moooo! mooo moooo mo moooooo,

lined, or rather papered with a glistening white membrane, glossy as
moooo, mo mooooo moooooo mooo m mooooooooo moooo mooooooo, mooooo mo

bridal satins.
mooooo mooooo.




But come out now, and look at this portentous lower jaw, which seems
Moo mooo moo moo, moo mooo mo mooo mooooooooo moooo moo, moooo moooo

like the long narrow lid of an immense snuff-box, with the hinge at one
mooo moo mooo mooooo moo mo mo moooooo moooo-moo, mooo moo moooo mo moo

end, instead of one side. If you pry it up, so as to get it overhead,
moo, moooooo mo moo mooo. Mo moo moo mo mo, mo mo mo moo mo mooooooo,

and expose its rows of teeth, it seems a terrific portcullis; and such,
moo mooooo moo mooo mo moooo, mo moooo m mooooooo mooooooooo; moo mooo,

alas! it proves to many a poor wight in the fishery, upon whom these
mooo! mo mooooo mo mooo m mooo moooo mo moo moooooo, mooo mooo moooo

spikes fall with impaling force. But far more terrible is it to behold,
mooooo mooo mooo mooooooo moooo. Moo moo mooo mooooooo mo mo mo mooooo,

when fathoms down in the sea, you see some sulky whale, floating there
mooo moooooo mooo mo moo moo, moo moo mooo moooo moooo, mooooooo moooo

suspended, with his prodigious jaw, some fifteen feet long, hanging
moooooooo, mooo moo mooooooooo moo, mooo moooooo mooo mooo, moooooo

straight down at right-angles with his body, for all the world like a
mooooooo mooo mo moooo-mooooo mooo moo mooo, moo moo moo moooo mooo m

ship's jib-boom. This whale is not dead; he is only dispirited; out of
mooo'm moo-mooo. Mooo moooo mo moo mooo; mo mo mooo mooooooooo; moo mo

sorts, perhaps; hypochondriac; and so supine, that the hinges of his
moooo, moooooo; moooooooooooo; moo mo mooooo, mooo moo mooooo mo moo

jaw have relaxed, leaving him there in that ungainly sort of plight, a
moo mooo moooooo, moooooo moo moooo mo mooo mooooooo mooo mo mooooo, m

reproach to all his tribe, who must, no doubt, imprecate lock-jaws upon
mooooooo mo moo moo moooo, moo mooo, mo moooo, moooooooo mooo-mooo mooo

him.
moo.




In most cases this lower jaw--being easily unhinged by a practised
Mo mooo moooo mooo moooo moo--moooo mooooo mooooooo mo m moooooooo

artist--is disengaged and hoisted on deck for the purpose of extracting
mooooo--mo mooooooooo moo moooooo mo mooo moo moo moooooo mo mooooooooo

the ivory teeth, and furnishing a supply of that hard white whalebone
moo moooo moooo, moo mooooooooo m mooooo mo mooo mooo moooo moooooooo

with which the fishermen fashion all sorts of curious articles,
mooo moooo moo moooooooo moooooo moo moooo mo moooooo mooooooo,

including canes, umbrella-stocks, and handles to riding-whips.
moooooooo moooo, mooooooo-mooooo, moo moooooo mo mooooo-moooo.




With a long, weary hoist the jaw is dragged on board, as if it were an
Mooo m mooo, moooo moooo moo moo mo moooooo mo moooo, mo mo mo mooo mo

anchor; and when the proper time comes--some few days after the other
mooooo; moo mooo moo mooooo mooo moooo--mooo moo mooo moooo moo moooo

work--Queequeg, Daggoo, and Tashtego, being all accomplished dentists,
mooo--Mooooooo, Mooooo, moo Mooooooo, moooo moo mooooooooooo mooooooo,

are set to drawing teeth. With a keen cutting-spade, Queequeg lances
moo moo mo moooooo moooo. Mooo m mooo moooooo-moooo, Mooooooo mooooo

the gums; then the jaw is lashed down to ringbolts, and a tackle being
moo mooo; mooo moo moo mo mooooo mooo mo moooooooo, moo m mooooo moooo

rigged from aloft, they drag out these teeth, as Michigan oxen drag
mooooo mooo moooo, mooo mooo moo moooo moooo, mo Mooooooo mooo mooo

stumps of old oaks out of wild wood lands. There are generally forty-two
mooooo mo moo mooo moo mo mooo mooo moooo. Moooo moo moooooooo moooo-moo

teeth in all; in old whales, much worn down, but undecayed; nor filled
moooo mo moo; mo moo mooooo, mooo mooo mooo, moo moooooooo; moo mooooo

after our artificial fashion. The jaw is afterwards sawn into slabs, and
moooo moo mooooooooo moooooo. Moo moo mo mooooooooo mooo mooo moooo, moo

piled away like joists for building houses.
moooo mooo mooo mooooo moo mooooooo mooooo.










CHAPTER 75. The Right Whale's Head--Contrasted View.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooo Moooo'm Mooo--Mooooooooo Mooo.







Crossing the deck, let us now have a good long look at the Right Whale's
Mooooooo moo mooo, moo mo moo mooo m mooo mooo mooo mo moo Moooo Moooo'm

head.
mooo.




As in general shape the noble Sperm Whale's head may be compared to a
Mo mo moooooo moooo moo moooo Moooo Moooo'm mooo moo mo mooooooo mo m

Roman war-chariot (especially in front, where it is so broadly rounded);
Moooo moo-moooooo (mooooooooo mo moooo, moooo mo mo mo moooooo moooooo);

so, at a broad view, the Right Whale's head bears a rather inelegant
mo, mo m moooo mooo, moo Moooo Moooo'm mooo moooo m mooooo moooooooo

resemblance to a gigantic galliot-toed shoe. Two hundred years ago an
moooooooooo mo m mooooooo moooooo-mooo mooo. Moo moooooo moooo moo mo

old Dutch voyager likened its shape to that of a shoemaker's last. And
moo Moooo moooooo moooooo moo moooo mo mooo mo m moooooooo'm mooo. Moo

in this same last or shoe, that old woman of the nursery tale, with
mo mooo mooo mooo mo mooo, mooo moo moooo mo moo moooooo mooo, mooo

the swarming brood, might very comfortably be lodged, she and all her
moo mooooooo moooo, moooo mooo moooooooooo mo mooooo, moo moo moo moo

progeny.
moooooo.




But as you come nearer to this great head it begins to assume different
Moo mo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo moooo mooo mo mooooo mo mooooo moooooooo

aspects, according to your point of view. If you stand on its summit and
moooooo, moooooooo mo mooo moooo mo mooo. Mo moo moooo mo moo mooooo moo

look at these two F-shaped spoutholes, you would take the whole head
mooo mo moooo moo M-mooooo mooooooooo, moo moooo mooo moo moooo mooo

for an enormous bass-viol, and these spiracles, the apertures in its
moo mo mooooooo mooo-mooo, moo moooo moooooooo, moo moooooooo mo moo

sounding-board. Then, again, if you fix your eye upon this strange,
mooooooo-moooo. Mooo, moooo, mo moo moo mooo moo mooo mooo moooooo,

crested, comb-like incrustation on the top of the mass--this green,
moooooo, mooo-mooo mooooooooooo mo moo moo mo moo mooo--mooo moooo,

barnacled thing, which the Greenlanders call the "crown," and the
moooooooo moooo, moooo moo Mooooooooooo mooo moo "moooo," moo moo

Southern fishers the "bonnet" of the Right Whale; fixing your eyes
Mooooooo moooooo moo "mooooo" mo moo Moooo Moooo; mooooo mooo mooo

solely on this, you would take the head for the trunk of some huge oak,
mooooo mo mooo, moo moooo mooo moo mooo moo moo moooo mo mooo mooo moo,

with a bird's nest in its crotch. At any rate, when you watch those live
mooo m mooo'm mooo mo moo mooooo. Mo moo mooo, mooo moo moooo moooo mooo

crabs that nestle here on this bonnet, such an idea will be almost
moooo mooo mooooo mooo mo mooo mooooo, mooo mo mooo mooo mo mooooo

sure to occur to you; unless, indeed, your fancy has been fixed by the
mooo mo moooo mo moo; mooooo, mooooo, mooo moooo moo mooo moooo mo moo

technical term "crown" also bestowed upon it; in which case you will
moooooooo mooo "moooo" mooo mooooooo mooo mo; mo moooo mooo moo mooo

take great interest in thinking how this mighty monster is actually a
mooo moooo mooooooo mo mooooooo moo mooo mooooo moooooo mo mooooooo m

diademed king of the sea, whose green crown has been put together for
mooooooo mooo mo moo moo, moooo moooo moooo moo mooo moo mooooooo moo

him in this marvellous manner. But if this whale be a king, he is a very
moo mo mooo mooooooooo mooooo. Moo mo mooo moooo mo m mooo, mo mo m mooo

sulky looking fellow to grace a diadem. Look at that hanging lower lip!
moooo moooooo mooooo mo moooo m mooooo. Mooo mo mooo moooooo moooo moo!

what a huge sulk and pout is there! a sulk and pout, by carpenter's
mooo m mooo mooo moo mooo mo moooo! m mooo moo mooo, mo moooooooo'm

measurement, about twenty feet long and five feet deep; a sulk and pout
moooooooooo, moooo mooooo mooo mooo moo mooo mooo mooo; m mooo moo mooo

that will yield you some 500 gallons of oil and more.
mooo mooo moooo moo mooo moo moooooo mo moo moo mooo.




A great pity, now, that this unfortunate whale should be hare-lipped.
M moooo mooo, moo, mooo mooo moooooooooo moooo mooooo mo mooo-mooooo.

The fissure is about a foot across. Probably the mother during an
Moo moooooo mo moooo m mooo mooooo. Mooooooo moo mooooo mooooo mo

important interval was sailing down the Peruvian coast, when earthquakes
moooooooo mooooooo moo moooooo mooo moo Mooooooo moooo, mooo moooooooooo

caused the beach to gape. Over this lip, as over a slippery threshold,
mooooo moo moooo mo mooo. Mooo mooo moo, mo mooo m mooooooo moooooooo,

we now slide into the mouth. Upon my word were I at Mackinaw, I should
mo moo moooo mooo moo moooo. Mooo mo mooo mooo M mo Mooooooo, M mooooo

take this to be the inside of an Indian wigwam. Good Lord! is this the
mooo mooo mo mo moo mooooo mo mo Mooooo mooooo. Mooo Mooo! mo mooo moo

road that Jonah went? The roof is about twelve feet high, and runs to a
mooo mooo Moooo mooo? Moo mooo mo moooo mooooo mooo mooo, moo mooo mo m

pretty sharp angle, as if there were a regular ridge-pole there; while
mooooo moooo moooo, mo mo moooo mooo m moooooo moooo-mooo moooo; moooo

these ribbed, arched, hairy sides, present us with those wondrous, half
moooo mooooo, mooooo, moooo moooo, moooooo mo mooo moooo mooooooo, mooo

vertical, scimetar-shaped slats of whalebone, say three hundred on a
mooooooo, mooooooo-mooooo moooo mo moooooooo, moo moooo moooooo mo m

side, which depending from the upper part of the head or crown
mooo, moooo moooooooo mooo moo moooo mooo mo moo mooo mo moooo

bone, form those Venetian blinds which have elsewhere been cursorily
mooo, mooo moooo Mooooooo mooooo moooo mooo moooooooo mooo moooooooo

mentioned. The edges of these bones are fringed with hairy fibres,
moooooooo. Moo moooo mo moooo moooo moo moooooo mooo moooo mooooo,

through which the Right Whale strains the water, and in whose
moooooo moooo moo Moooo Moooo moooooo moo moooo, moo mo moooo

intricacies he retains the small fish, when openmouthed he goes through
moooooooooo mo moooooo moo moooo mooo, mooo moooooooooo mo mooo moooooo

the seas of brit in feeding time. In the central blinds of bone, as they
moo mooo mo mooo mo moooooo mooo. Mo moo moooooo mooooo mo mooo, mo mooo

stand in their natural order, there are certain curious marks, curves,
moooo mo moooo moooooo moooo, moooo moo moooooo moooooo moooo, mooooo,

hollows, and ridges, whereby some whalemen calculate the creature's age,
moooooo, moo mooooo, moooooo mooo mooooooo moooooooo moo mooooooo'm moo,

as the age of an oak by its circular rings. Though the certainty of this
mo moo moo mo mo moo mo moo mooooooo moooo. Mooooo moo moooooooo mo mooo

criterion is far from demonstrable, yet it has the savor of analogical
moooooooo mo moo mooo mooooooooooo, moo mo moo moo moooo mo mooooooooo

probability. At any rate, if we yield to it, we must grant a far greater
moooooooooo. Mo moo mooo, mo mo moooo mo mo, mo mooo moooo m moo moooooo

age to the Right Whale than at first glance will seem reasonable.
moo mo moo Moooo Moooo mooo mo moooo mooooo mooo mooo mooooooooo.




In old times, there seem to have prevailed the most curious fancies
Mo moo moooo, moooo mooo mo mooo moooooooo moo mooo moooooo moooooo

concerning these blinds. One voyager in Purchas calls them the wondrous
mooooooooo moooo mooooo. Moo moooooo mo Moooooo moooo mooo moo mooooooo

"whiskers" inside of the whale's mouth;* another, "hogs' bristles"; a
"mooooooo" mooooo mo moo moooo'm moooo;* moooooo, "mooo' mooooooo"; m

third old gentleman in Hackluyt uses the following elegant language:
moooo moo moooooooo mo Mooooooo mooo moo moooooooo moooooo mooooooo:

"There are about two hundred and fifty fins growing on each side of his
"Moooo moo moooo moo moooooo moo moooo mooo moooooo mo mooo mooo mo moo

upper CHOP, which arch over his tongue on each side of his mouth."
moooo MOOO, moooo mooo mooo moo mooooo mo mooo mooo mo moo moooo."







*This reminds us that the Right Whale really has a sort of whisker, or
*Mooo moooooo mo mooo moo Moooo Moooo mooooo moo m mooo mo moooooo, mo

rather a moustache, consisting of a few scattered white hairs on the
mooooo m moooooooo, mooooooooo mo m moo moooooooo moooo moooo mo moo

upper part of the outer end of the lower jaw. Sometimes these
moooo mooo mo moo moooo moo mo moo moooo moo. Moooooooo moooo

moooo mooooo m mooooo mooooooooo mooooooooo mo moo moooooooo mooooo

countenance.
moooooooooo.







As every one knows, these same "hogs' bristles," "fins," "whiskers,"
Mo moooo moo moooo, moooo mooo "mooo' mooooooo," "mooo," "mooooooo,"

"blinds," or whatever you please, furnish to the ladies their busks and
"mooooo," mo mooooooo moo mooooo, moooooo mo moo mooooo moooo moooo moo

other stiffening contrivances. But in this particular, the demand has
moooo mooooooooo mooooooooooo. Moo mo mooo mooooooooo, moo mooooo moo

long been on the decline. It was in Queen Anne's time that the bone was
mooo mooo mo moo moooooo. Mo moo mo Moooo Mooo'm mooo mooo moo mooo moo

in its glory, the farthingale being then all the fashion. And as those
mo moo moooo, moo moooooooooo moooo mooo moo moo moooooo. Moo mo moooo

ancient dames moved about gaily, though in the jaws of the whale, as
moooooo moooo moooo moooo moooo, mooooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooo, mo

you may say; even so, in a shower, with the like thoughtlessness, do we
moo moo moo; mooo mo, mo m mooooo, mooo moo mooo moooooooooooooo, mo mo

nowadays fly under the same jaws for protection; the umbrella being a
mooooooo moo moooo moo mooo mooo moo mooooooooo; moo mooooooo moooo m

tent spread over the same bone.
mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo mooo.




But now forget all about blinds and whiskers for a moment, and, standing
Moo moo mooooo moo moooo mooooo moo mooooooo moo m mooooo, moo, mooooooo

in the Right Whale's mouth, look around you afresh. Seeing all these
mo moo Moooo Moooo'm moooo, mooo mooooo moo mooooo. Mooooo moo moooo

colonnades of bone so methodically ranged about, would you not think
mooooooooo mo mooo mo mooooooooooo mooooo moooo, moooo moo moo moooo

you were inside of the great Haarlem organ, and gazing upon its
moo mooo mooooo mo moo moooo Moooooo moooo, moo mooooo mooo moo

thousand pipes? For a carpet to the organ we have a rug of the softest
mooooooo moooo? Moo m mooooo mo moo moooo mo mooo m moo mo moo moooooo

Turkey--the tongue, which is glued, as it were, to the floor of the
Mooooo--moo mooooo, moooo mo moooo, mo mo mooo, mo moo moooo mo moo

mouth. It is very fat and tender, and apt to tear in pieces in hoisting
moooo. Mo mo mooo moo moo mooooo, moo moo mo mooo mo mooooo mo mooooooo

it on deck. This particular tongue now before us; at a passing glance I
mo mo mooo. Mooo mooooooooo mooooo moo mooooo mo; mo m moooooo mooooo M

should say it was a six-barreler; that is, it will yield you about that
mooooo moo mo moo m moo-mooooooo; mooo mo, mo mooo moooo moo moooo mooo

amount of oil.
mooooo mo moo.




Ere this, you must have plainly seen the truth of what I started
Moo mooo, moo mooo mooo moooooo mooo moo moooo mo mooo M moooooo

with--that the Sperm Whale and the Right Whale have almost entirely
mooo--mooo moo Moooo Moooo moo moo Moooo Moooo mooo mooooo mooooooo

different heads. To sum up, then: in the Right Whale's there is no great
moooooooo moooo. Mo moo mo, mooo: mo moo Moooo Moooo'm moooo mo mo moooo

well of sperm; no ivory teeth at all; no long, slender mandible of a
mooo mo moooo; mo moooo moooo mo moo; mo mooo, moooooo mooooooo mo m

lower jaw, like the Sperm Whale's. Nor in the Sperm Whale are there any
moooo moo, mooo moo Moooo Moooo'm. Moo mo moo Moooo Moooo moo moooo moo

of those blinds of bone; no huge lower lip; and scarcely anything of a
mo moooo mooooo mo mooo; mo mooo moooo moo; moo mooooooo mooooooo mo m

tongue. Again, the Right Whale has two external spout-holes, the Sperm
mooooo. Moooo, moo Moooo Moooo moo moo mooooooo moooo-moooo, moo Moooo

Whale only one.
Moooo mooo moo.




Look your last, now, on these venerable hooded heads, while they yet lie
Mooo mooo mooo, moo, mo moooo moooooooo mooooo moooo, moooo mooo moo moo

together; for one will soon sink, unrecorded, in the sea; the other will
mooooooo; moo moo mooo mooo mooo, mooooooooo, mo moo moo; moo moooo mooo

not be very long in following.
moo mo mooo mooo mo moooooooo.




Can you catch the expression of the Sperm Whale's there? It is the same
Moo moo moooo moo mooooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo'm moooo? Mo mo moo mooo

he died with, only some of the longer wrinkles in the forehead seem
mo mooo mooo, mooo mooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo

now faded away. I think his broad brow to be full of a prairie-like
moo moooo mooo. M moooo moo moooo mooo mo mo mooo mo m moooooo-mooo

placidity, born of a speculative indifference as to death. But mark the
moooooooo, mooo mo m moooooooooo mooooooooooo mo mo moooo. Moo mooo moo

other head's expression. See that amazing lower lip, pressed by accident
moooo mooo'm mooooooooo. Moo mooo moooooo moooo moo, moooooo mo mooooooo

against the vessel's side, so as firmly to embrace the jaw. Does not
moooooo moo mooooo'm mooo, mo mo mooooo mo moooooo moo moo. Mooo moo

mooo moooo mooo mooo mo moooo mo mo mooooooo moooooooo mooooooooo mo
