mooooo moooo? Mooo Moooo Moooo M mooo mo mooo mooo m Moooo; moo Moooo

Whale, a Platonian, who might have taken up Spinoza in his latter years.
Moooo, m Moooooooo, moo moooo mooo moooo mo Moooooo mo moo mooooo moooo.










CHAPTER 76. The Battering-Ram.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooooooo-Moo.







Ere quitting, for the nonce, the Sperm Whale's head, I would have
Moo mooooooo, moo moo moooo, moo Moooo Moooo'm mooo, M moooo mooo

you, as a sensible physiologist, simply--particularly remark its front
moo, mo m mooooooo mooooooooooo, mooooo--mooooooooooo mooooo moo moooo

aspect, in all its compacted collectedness. I would have you investigate
mooooo, mo moo moo moooooooo moooooooooooo. M moooo mooo moo moooooooooo

it now with the sole view of forming to yourself some unexaggerated,
mo moo mooo moo mooo mooo mo moooooo mo mooooooo mooo moooooooooooo,

intelligent estimate of whatever battering-ram power may be lodged
moooooooooo mooooooo mo mooooooo moooooooo-moo moooo moo mo mooooo

there. Here is a vital point; for you must either satisfactorily settle
moooo. Mooo mo m moooo moooo; moo moo mooo mooooo mooooooooooooo mooooo

this matter with yourself, or for ever remain an infidel as to one of
mooo mooooo mooo mooooooo, mo moo mooo mooooo mo moooooo mo mo moo mo

the most appalling, but not the less true events, perhaps anywhere to be
moo mooo moooooooo, moo moo moo mooo mooo mooooo, moooooo mooooooo mo mo

found in all recorded history.
moooo mo moo mooooooo moooooo.




You observe that in the ordinary swimming position of the Sperm Whale,
Moo moooooo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo,

the front of his head presents an almost wholly vertical plane to the
moo moooo mo moo mooo mooooooo mo mooooo mooooo mooooooo moooo mo moo

water; you observe that the lower part of that front slopes considerably
moooo; moo moooooo mooo moo moooo mooo mo mooo moooo mooooo mooooooooooo

backwards, so as to furnish more of a retreat for the long socket which
moooooooo, mo mo mo moooooo mooo mo m moooooo moo moo mooo mooooo moooo

receives the boom-like lower jaw; you observe that the mouth is entirely
mooooooo moo mooo-mooo moooo moo; moo moooooo mooo moo moooo mo mooooooo

under the head, much in the same way, indeed, as though your own mouth
moooo moo mooo, mooo mo moo mooo moo, mooooo, mo mooooo mooo moo moooo

were entirely under your chin. Moreover you observe that the whale has
mooo mooooooo moooo mooo mooo. Mooooooo moo moooooo mooo moo moooo moo

no external nose; and that what nose he has--his spout hole--is on the
mo mooooooo mooo; moo mooo mooo mooo mo moo--moo moooo mooo--mo mo moo

top of his head; you observe that his eyes and ears are at the sides
moo mo moo mooo; moo moooooo mooo moo mooo moo mooo moo mo moo moooo

of his head, nearly one third of his entire length from the front.
mo moo mooo, mooooo moo moooo mo moo mooooo mooooo mooo moo moooo.

Wherefore, you must now have perceived that the front of the Sperm
Moooooooo, moo mooo moo mooo moooooooo mooo moo moooo mo moo Moooo

Whale's head is a dead, blind wall, without a single organ or tender
Moooo'm mooo mo m mooo, moooo mooo, moooooo m mooooo moooo mo mooooo

prominence of any sort whatsoever. Furthermore, you are now to consider
mooooooooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo. Moooooooooo, moo moo moo mo mooooooo

that only in the extreme, lower, backward sloping part of the front of
mooo mooo mo moo moooooo, moooo, mooooooo moooooo mooo mo moo moooo mo

the head, is there the slightest vestige of bone; and not till you
moo mooo, mo moooo moo moooooooo moooooo mo mooo; moo moo mooo moo

get near twenty feet from the forehead do you come to the full cranial
moo mooo mooooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooo moooooo

development. So that this whole enormous boneless mass is as one wad.
moooooooooo. Mo mooo mooo moooo mooooooo mooooooo mooo mo mo moo moo.

Finally, though, as will soon be revealed, its contents partly comprise
Moooooo, mooooo, mo mooo mooo mo mooooooo, moo mooooooo mooooo mooooooo

the most delicate oil; yet, you are now to be apprised of the nature of
moo mooo mooooooo moo; moo, moo moo moo mo mo mooooooo mo moo mooooo mo

the substance which so impregnably invests all that apparent effeminacy.
moo moooooooo moooo mo moooooooooo moooooo moo mooo mooooooo mooooooooo.

In some previous place I have described to you how the blubber wraps the
Mo mooo mooooooo moooo M mooo moooooooo mo moo moo moo moooooo moooo moo

body of the whale, as the rind wraps an orange. Just so with the head;
mooo mo moo moooo, mo moo mooo moooo mo mooooo. Mooo mo mooo moo mooo;

but with this difference: about the head this envelope, though not so
moo mooo mooo mooooooooo: moooo moo mooo mooo mooooooo, mooooo moo mo

thick, is of a boneless toughness, inestimable by any man who has not
moooo, mo mo m mooooooo moooooooo, moooooooooo mo moo moo moo moo moo

handled it. The severest pointed harpoon, the sharpest lance darted by
moooooo mo. Moo mooooooo moooooo moooooo, moo mooooooo moooo mooooo mo

the strongest human arm, impotently rebounds from it. It is as though
moo moooooooo moooo moo, mooooooooo mooooooo mooo mo. Mo mo mo mooooo

the forehead of the Sperm Whale were paved with horses' hoofs. I do not
moo mooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo mooo moooo mooo mooooo' moooo. M mo moo

think that any sensation lurks in it.
moooo mooo moo moooooooo moooo mo mo.




Bethink yourself also of another thing. When two large, loaded Indiamen
Moooooo mooooooo mooo mo moooooo moooo. Mooo moo moooo, mooooo Mooooooo

chance to crowd and crush towards each other in the docks, what do the
mooooo mo moooo moo moooo moooooo mooo moooo mo moo moooo, mooo mo moo

sailors do? They do not suspend between them, at the point of coming
moooooo mo? Mooo mo moo moooooo moooooo mooo, mo moo moooo mo mooooo

contact, any merely hard substance, like iron or wood. No, they hold
moooooo, moo mooooo mooo moooooooo, mooo mooo mo mooo. Mo, mooo mooo

there a large, round wad of tow and cork, enveloped in the thickest
moooo m moooo, moooo moo mo moo moo mooo, moooooooo mo moo mooooooo

and toughest of ox-hide. That bravely and uninjured takes the jam which
moo mooooooo mo mo-mooo. Mooo moooooo moo moooooooo moooo moo moo moooo

would have snapped all their oaken handspikes and iron crow-bars. By
moooo mooo moooooo moo moooo moooo mooooooooo moo mooo mooo-mooo. Mo

itself this sufficiently illustrates the obvious fact I drive at. But
mooooo mooo mooooooooooo moooooooooo moo moooooo mooo M moooo mo. Moo

supplementary to this, it has hypothetically occurred to me, that
moooooooooooo mo mooo, mo moo mooooooooooooo mooooooo mo mo, mooo

as ordinary fish possess what is called a swimming bladder in them,
mo mooooooo mooo moooooo mooo mo mooooo m mooooooo moooooo mo mooo,

capable, at will, of distension or contraction; and as the Sperm Whale,
moooooo, mo mooo, mo mooooooooo mo moooooooooo; moo mo moo Moooo Moooo,

as far as I know, has no such provision in him; considering, too,
mo moo mo M mooo, moo mo mooo moooooooo mo moo; moooooooooo, moo,

the otherwise inexplicable manner in which he now depresses his head
moo moooooooo mooooooooooo mooooo mo moooo mo moo moooooooo moo mooo

altogether beneath the surface, and anon swims with it high elevated out
mooooooooo moooooo moo moooooo, moo mooo moooo mooo mo mooo mooooooo moo

of the water; considering the unobstructed elasticity of its envelope;
mo moo moooo; moooooooooo moo mooooooooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooooo;

considering the unique interior of his head; it has hypothetically
moooooooooo moo mooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo; mo moo mooooooooooooo

occurred to me, I say, that those mystical lung-celled honeycombs there
mooooooo mo mo, M moo, mooo moooo mooooooo mooo-mooooo mooooooooo moooo

may possibly have some hitherto unknown and unsuspected connexion with
moo mooooooo mooo mooo mooooooo moooooo moo moooooooooo moooooooo mooo

the outer air, so as to be susceptible to atmospheric distension and
moo moooo moo, mo mo mo mo moooooooooo mo moooooooooo mooooooooo moo

contraction. If this be so, fancy the irresistibleness of that might, to
moooooooooo. Mo mooo mo mo, moooo moo mooooooooooooooo mo mooo moooo, mo

which the most impalpable and destructive of all elements contributes.
moooo moo mooo mooooooooo moo moooooooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooooo.




Now, mark. Unerringly impelling this dead, impregnable, uninjurable
Moo, mooo. Mooooooooo moooooooo mooo mooo, moooooooooo, moooooooooo

wall, and this most buoyant thing within; there swims behind it all a
mooo, moo mooo mooo moooooo moooo mooooo; moooo moooo mooooo mo moo m

mass of tremendous life, only to be adequately estimated as piled wood
mooo mo mooooooooo mooo, mooo mo mo mooooooooo moooooooo mo moooo mooo

is--by the cord; and all obedient to one volition, as the smallest
mo--mo moo mooo; moo moo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo, mo moo mooooooo

insect. So that when I shall hereafter detail to you all the
mooooo. Mo mooo mooo M moooo moooooooo mooooo mo moo moo moo

specialities and concentrations of potency everywhere lurking in this
mooooooooooo moo mooooooooooooo mo moooooo mooooooooo moooooo mo mooo

expansive monster; when I shall show you some of his more inconsiderable
moooooooo moooooo; mooo M moooo mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo mooooooooooooo

braining feats; I trust you will have renounced all ignorant
mooooooo moooo; M moooo moo mooo mooo moooooooo moo mooooooo

incredulity, and be ready to abide by this; that though the Sperm Whale
moooooooooo, moo mo moooo mo moooo mo mooo; mooo mooooo moo Moooo Moooo

stove a passage through the Isthmus of Darien, and mixed the Atlantic
moooo m moooooo moooooo moo Moooooo mo Mooooo, moo moooo moo Mooooooo

with the Pacific, you would not elevate one hair of your eye-brow. For
mooo moo Moooooo, moo moooo moo moooooo moo mooo mo mooo moo-mooo. Moo

unless you own the whale, you are but a provincial and sentimentalist
mooooo moo moo moo moooo, moo moo moo m mooooooooo moo mooooooooooooo

in Truth. But clear Truth is a thing for salamander giants only to
mo Moooo. Moo moooo Moooo mo m moooo moo mooooooooo mooooo mooo mo

encounter; how small the chances for the provincials then? What befell
moooooooo; moo moooo moo moooooo moo moo moooooooooo mooo? Mooo mooooo

the weakling youth lifting the dread goddess's veil at Lais?
moo mooooooo moooo moooooo moo moooo moooooo'm mooo mo Mooo?










CHAPTER 77. The Great Heidelburgh Tun.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooo Moooooooooo Moo.







Now comes the Baling of the Case. But to comprehend it aright, you must
Moo moooo moo Mooooo mo moo Mooo. Moo mo mooooooooo mo mooooo, moo mooo

know something of the curious internal structure of the thing operated
mooo moooooooo mo moo moooooo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo

upon.
mooo.




Regarding the Sperm Whale's head as a solid oblong, you may, on an
Moooooooo moo Moooo Moooo'm mooo mo m moooo mooooo, moo moo, mo mo

inclined plane, sideways divide it into two quoins,* whereof the lower
mooooooo moooo, mooooooo mooooo mo mooo moo mooooo,* moooooo moo moooo

is the bony structure, forming the cranium and jaws, and the upper an
mo moo mooo moooooooo, moooooo moo moooooo moo mooo, moo moo moooo mo

unctuous mass wholly free from bones; its broad forward end forming the
mooooooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo moooo; moo moooo moooooo moo moooooo moo

expanded vertical apparent forehead of the whale. At the middle of the
mooooooo mooooooo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo. Mo moo mooooo mo moo

forehead horizontally subdivide this upper quoin, and then you have two
mooooooo mooooooooooo moooooooo mooo moooo moooo, moo mooo moo mooo moo

almost equal parts, which before were naturally divided by an internal
mooooo moooo moooo, moooo mooooo mooo moooooooo moooooo mo mo mooooooo

wall of a thick tendinous substance.
mooo mo m moooo moooooooo moooooooo.







*Quoin is not a Euclidean term. It belongs to the pure nautical
*Moooo mo moo m Moooooooo mooo. Mo moooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo

mathematics. I know not that it has been defined before. A quoin is a
moooooooooo. M mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo moooooo mooooo. M moooo mo m

solid which differs from a wedge in having its sharp end formed by the
moooo moooo moooooo mooo m moooo mo mooooo moo moooo moo mooooo mo moo

steep inclination of one side, instead of the mutual tapering of both
moooo moooooooooo mo moo mooo, moooooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo mo mooo

sides.
moooo.







The lower subdivided part, called the junk, is one immense honeycomb
Moo moooo mooooooooo mooo, mooooo moo mooo, mo moo moooooo moooooooo

of oil, formed by the crossing and recrossing, into ten thousand
mo moo, mooooo mo moo mooooooo moo mooooooooo, mooo moo mooooooo

infiltrated cells, of tough elastic white fibres throughout its whole
moooooooooo moooo, mo moooo moooooo moooo mooooo mooooooooo moo moooo

extent. The upper part, known as the Case, may be regarded as the great
mooooo. Moo moooo mooo, moooo mo moo Mooo, moo mo mooooooo mo moo moooo

Heidelburgh Tun of the Sperm Whale. And as that famous great tierce is
Moooooooooo Moo mo moo Moooo Moooo. Moo mo mooo mooooo moooo mooooo mo

mystically carved in front, so the whale's vast plaited forehead forms
mooooooooo mooooo mo moooo, mo moo moooo'm mooo moooooo mooooooo moooo

innumerable strange devices for the emblematical adornment of his
moooooooooo moooooo moooooo moo moo mooooooooooo moooooooo mo moo

wondrous tun. Moreover, as that of Heidelburgh was always replenished
mooooooo moo. Mooooooo, mo mooo mo Moooooooooo moo mooooo moooooooooo

with the most excellent of the wines of the Rhenish valleys, so the tun
mooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo moooo mo moo Moooooo moooooo, mo moo moo

of the whale contains by far the most precious of all his oily vintages;
mo moo moooo mooooooo mo moo moo mooo mooooooo mo moo moo mooo mooooooo;

namely, the highly-prized spermaceti, in its absolutely pure, limpid,
mooooo, moo mooooo-mooooo mooooooooo, mo moo mooooooooo mooo, mooooo,

and odoriferous state. Nor is this precious substance found unalloyed
moo moooooooooo moooo. Moo mo mooo mooooooo moooooooo moooo moooooooo

in any other part of the creature. Though in life it remains perfectly
mo moo moooo mooo mo moo mooooooo. Mooooo mo mooo mo moooooo moooooooo

fluid, yet, upon exposure to the air, after death, it soon begins to
moooo, moo, mooo mooooooo mo moo moo, moooo moooo, mo mooo mooooo mo

concrete; sending forth beautiful crystalline shoots, as when the
mooooooo; moooooo moooo moooooooo moooooooooo mooooo, mo mooo moo

first thin delicate ice is just forming in water. A large whale's
moooo mooo mooooooo moo mo mooo moooooo mo moooo. M moooo moooo'm

case generally yields about five hundred gallons of sperm, though from
mooo moooooooo mooooo moooo mooo moooooo moooooo mo moooo, mooooo mooo

unavoidable circumstances, considerable of it is spilled, leaks, and
moooooooooo moooooooooooo, mooooooooooo mo mo mo moooooo, moooo, moo

dribbles away, or is otherwise irrevocably lost in the ticklish business
mooooooo mooo, mo mo moooooooo moooooooooo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooooooo

of securing what you can.
mo mooooooo mooo moo moo.




I know not with what fine and costly material the Heidelburgh Tun
M mooo moo mooo mooo mooo moo mooooo mooooooo moo Moooooooooo Moo

was coated within, but in superlative richness that coating could not
moo mooooo mooooo, moo mo moooooooooo mooooooo mooo moooooo moooo moo

possibly have compared with the silken pearl-coloured membrane, like the
mooooooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo moooo-mooooooo mooooooo, mooo moo

lining of a fine pelisse, forming the inner surface of the Sperm Whale's
mooooo mo m mooo moooooo, moooooo moo moooo moooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo'm

case.
mooo.




It will have been seen that the Heidelburgh Tun of the Sperm Whale
Mo mooo mooo mooo mooo mooo moo Moooooooooo Moo mo moo Moooo Moooo

embraces the entire length of the entire top of the head; and since--as
mooooooo moo mooooo mooooo mo moo mooooo moo mo moo mooo; moo moooo--mo

has been elsewhere set forth--the head embraces one third of the whole
moo mooo moooooooo moo moooo--moo mooo mooooooo moo moooo mo moo moooo

length of the creature, then setting that length down at eighty feet for
mooooo mo moo mooooooo, mooo moooooo mooo mooooo mooo mo mooooo mooo moo

a good sized whale, you have more than twenty-six feet for the depth
m mooo moooo moooo, moo mooo mooo mooo mooooo-moo mooo moo moo moooo

of the tun, when it is lengthwise hoisted up and down against a ship's
mo moo moo, mooo mo mo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo moooooo m mooo'm

side.
mooo.




As in decapitating the whale, the operator's instrument is brought close
Mo mo mooooooooooo moo moooo, moo mooooooo'm mooooooooo mo moooooo moooo

to the spot where an entrance is subsequently forced into the spermaceti
mo moo mooo moooo mo mooooooo mo mooooooooooo mooooo mooo moo mooooooooo

magazine; he has, therefore, to be uncommonly heedful, lest a careless,
mooooooo; mo moo, moooooooo, mo mo mooooooooo moooooo, mooo m mooooooo,

untimely stroke should invade the sanctuary and wastingly let out its
mooooooo mooooo mooooo mooooo moo moooooooo moo moooooooo moo moo moo

invaluable contents. It is this decapitated end of the head, also, which
mooooooooo mooooooo. Mo mo mooo moooooooooo moo mo moo mooo, mooo, moooo

is at last elevated out of the water, and retained in that position by
mo mo mooo mooooooo moo mo moo moooo, moo mooooooo mo mooo mooooooo mo

the enormous cutting tackles, whose hempen combinations, on one side,
moo mooooooo moooooo moooooo, moooo mooooo mooooooooooo, mo moo mooo,

make quite a wilderness of ropes in that quarter.
mooo moooo m mooooooooo mo moooo mo mooo moooooo.




Thus much being said, attend now, I pray you, to that marvellous and--in
Mooo mooo moooo mooo, mooooo moo, M mooo moo, mo mooo mooooooooo moo--mo

this particular instance--almost fatal operation whereby the Sperm
mooo mooooooooo mooooooo--mooooo moooo moooooooo moooooo moo Moooo

Whale's great Heidelburgh Tun is tapped.
Moooo'm moooo Moooooooooo Moo mo mooooo.










CHAPTER 78. Cistern and Buckets.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooooo moo Moooooo.







Nimble as a cat, Tashtego mounts aloft; and without altering his erect
Mooooo mo m moo, Mooooooo mooooo moooo; moo moooooo mooooooo moo moooo

posture, runs straight out upon the overhanging mainyard-arm, to the
moooooo, mooo mooooooo moo mooo moo moooooooooo mooooooo-moo, mo moo

part where it exactly projects over the hoisted Tun. He has carried
mooo moooo mo moooooo mooooooo mooo moo moooooo Moo. Mo moo moooooo

with him a light tackle called a whip, consisting of only two parts,
mooo moo m moooo mooooo mooooo m mooo, mooooooooo mo mooo moo moooo,

travelling through a single-sheaved block. Securing this block, so that
mooooooooo moooooo m mooooo-moooooo moooo. Mooooooo mooo moooo, mo mooo

it hangs down from the yard-arm, he swings one end of the rope, till it
mo moooo mooo mooo moo mooo-moo, mo mooooo moo moo mo moo mooo, mooo mo

is caught and firmly held by a hand on deck. Then, hand-over-hand, down
mo mooooo moo mooooo mooo mo m mooo mo mooo. Mooo, mooo-mooo-mooo, mooo

the other part, the Indian drops through the air, till dexterously he
moo moooo mooo, moo Mooooo moooo moooooo moo moo, mooo moooooooooo mo

lands on the summit of the head. There--still high elevated above the
moooo mo moo mooooo mo moo mooo. Moooo--moooo mooo mooooooo moooo moo

rest of the company, to whom he vivaciously cries--he seems some Turkish
mooo mo moo moooooo, mo mooo mo moooooooooo moooo--mo moooo mooo Moooooo

Muezzin calling the good people to prayers from the top of a tower. A
Moooooo moooooo moo mooo mooooo mo moooooo mooo moo moo mo m moooo. M

short-handled sharp spade being sent up to him, he diligently searches
moooo-moooooo moooo moooo moooo mooo mo mo moo, mo mooooooooo mooooooo

for the proper place to begin breaking into the Tun. In this business
moo moo mooooo moooo mo moooo mooooooo mooo moo Moo. Mo mooo mooooooo

he proceeds very heedfully, like a treasure-hunter in some old house,
mo mooooooo mooo moooooooo, mooo m mooooooo-mooooo mo mooo moo moooo,

sounding the walls to find where the gold is masoned in. By the time
mooooooo moo moooo mo mooo moooo moo mooo mo moooooo mo. Mo moo mooo

this cautious search is over, a stout iron-bound bucket, precisely like
mooo mooooooo mooooo mo mooo, m moooo mooo-moooo mooooo, moooooooo mooo

a well-bucket, has been attached to one end of the whip; while the other
m mooo-mooooo, moo mooo mooooooo mo moo moo mo moo mooo; moooo moo moooo

end, being stretched across the deck, is there held by two or three
moo, moooo moooooooo mooooo moo mooo, mo moooo mooo mo moo mo moooo

alert hands. These last now hoist the bucket within grasp of the Indian,
moooo moooo. Moooo mooo moo moooo moo mooooo mooooo moooo mo moo Mooooo,

to whom another person has reached up a very long pole. Inserting this
mo mooo moooooo mooooo moo moooooo mo m mooo mooo mooo. Moooooooo mooo

pole into the bucket, Tashtego downward guides the bucket into the Tun,
mooo mooo moo mooooo, Mooooooo mooooooo mooooo moo mooooo mooo moo Moo,

till it entirely disappears; then giving the word to the seamen at the
mooo mo mooooooo mooooooooo; mooo mooooo moo mooo mo moo mooooo mo moo

whip, up comes the bucket again, all bubbling like a dairy-maid's pail
mooo, mo moooo moo mooooo moooo, moo mooooooo mooo m moooo-mooo'm mooo

of new milk. Carefully lowered from its height, the full-freighted
mo moo mooo. Moooooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooo, moo mooo-moooooooo

vessel is caught by an appointed hand, and quickly emptied into a large
mooooo mo mooooo mo mo moooooooo mooo, moo moooooo moooooo mooo m moooo

tub. Then remounting aloft, it again goes through the same round until
moo. Mooo mooooooooo moooo, mo moooo mooo moooooo moo mooo moooo moooo

the deep cistern will yield no more. Towards the end, Tashtego has to
moo mooo moooooo mooo moooo mo mooo. Moooooo moo moo, Mooooooo moo mo

ram his long pole harder and harder, and deeper and deeper into the Tun,
moo moo mooo mooo mooooo moo mooooo, moo mooooo moo mooooo mooo moo Moo,

until some twenty feet of the pole have gone down.
moooo mooo mooooo mooo mo moo mooo mooo mooo mooo.




Now, the people of the Pequod had been baling some time in this way;
Moo, moo mooooo mo moo Mooooo moo mooo mooooo mooo mooo mo mooo moo;

several tubs had been filled with the fragrant sperm; when all at once a
moooooo mooo moo mooo mooooo mooo moo mooooooo moooo; mooo moo mo mooo m

queer accident happened. Whether it was that Tashtego, that wild Indian,
moooo mooooooo mooooooo. Moooooo mo moo mooo Mooooooo, mooo mooo Mooooo,

was so heedless and reckless as to let go for a moment his one-handed
moo mo mooooooo moo mooooooo mo mo moo mo moo m mooooo moo moo-mooooo

hold on the great cabled tackles suspending the head; or whether the
mooo mo moo moooo mooooo moooooo mooooooooo moo mooo; mo moooooo moo

place where he stood was so treacherous and oozy; or whether the Evil
moooo moooo mo moooo moo mo moooooooooo moo mooo; mo moooooo moo Mooo

One himself would have it to fall out so, without stating his particular
Moo moooooo moooo mooo mo mo mooo moo mo, moooooo moooooo moo mooooooooo

reasons; how it was exactly, there is no telling now; but, on a sudden,
moooooo; moo mo moo moooooo, moooo mo mo moooooo moo; moo, mo m mooooo,

as the eightieth or ninetieth bucket came suckingly up--my God! poor
mo moo moooooooo mo moooooooo mooooo mooo moooooooo mo--mo Moo! mooo

Tashtego--like the twin reciprocating bucket in a veritable well,
Mooooooo--mooo moo mooo moooooooooooo mooooo mo m moooooooo mooo,

dropped head-foremost down into this great Tun of Heidelburgh, and with
moooooo mooo-mooooooo mooo mooo mooo moooo Moo mo Moooooooooo, moo mooo

a horrible oily gurgling, went clean out of sight!
m mooooooo mooo mooooooo, mooo moooo moo mo moooo!




"Man overboard!" cried Daggoo, who amid the general consternation first
"Moo moooooooo!" moooo Mooooo, moo mooo moo moooooo moooooooooooo moooo

came to his senses. "Swing the bucket this way!" and putting one foot
mooo mo moo mooooo. "Moooo moo mooooo mooo moo!" moo moooooo moo mooo

into it, so as the better to secure his slippery hand-hold on the whip
mooo mo, mo mo moo mooooo mo mooooo moo mooooooo mooo-mooo mo moo mooo

itself, the hoisters ran him high up to the top of the head, almost
mooooo, moo mooooooo moo moo mooo mo mo moo moo mo moo mooo, mooooo

before Tashtego could have reached its interior bottom. Meantime,
mooooo Mooooooo moooo mooo moooooo moo mooooooo mooooo. Mooooooo,

there was a terrible tumult. Looking over the side, they saw the before
moooo moo m mooooooo mooooo. Moooooo mooo moo mooo, mooo moo moo mooooo

lifeless head throbbing and heaving just below the surface of the sea,
mooooooo mooo moooooooo moo moooooo mooo moooo moo moooooo mo moo moo,

mo mo mooo mooooo mooooo mooo mooo moooooooo mooo; moooooo mo moo mooo

moo mooo Mooooo moooooooooooo moooooooo mo moooo moooooooo moo mooooooo

depth to which he had sunk.
moooo mo moooo mo moo mooo.




At this instant, while Daggoo, on the summit of the head, was clearing
Mo mooo moooooo, moooo Mooooo, mo moo mooooo mo moo mooo, moo mooooooo

the whip--which had somehow got foul of the great cutting tackles--a
moo mooo--moooo moo moooooo moo mooo mo moo moooo moooooo moooooo--m

moooo mooooooo moooo moo moooo; moo mo moo moooooooooo mooooo mo moo,

moo mo moo moo mooooooo moooo mooooooooo moo mooo mooo moo, moo mooo

m mooo moooooooo moo mooooooo mooo mooooooo moooo, mooo moo moooo mooo

mooooo moo moooo mo mo moooooo mo mo moooooo. Moo moo moooooooo mooo,

mooo moooo moo mooooo mooooo moo mooooooo, mooooo moooo moooooo mo mo

mo moo moooo mo mooooo moo; mo moooo moooo mooo mooooo mooo moo moooooo

motions of the head.
moooooo mo moo mooo.




"Come down, come down!" yelled the seamen to Daggoo, but with one hand
"Mooo mooo, mooo mooo!" mooooo moo mooooo mo Mooooo, moo mooo moo mooo

holding on to the heavy tackles, so that if the head should drop, he
moooooo mo mo moo moooo moooooo, mo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo mooo, mo

moooo moooo mooooo moooooooo; moo moooo mooooo moooooo moo mooo mooo,

mooooo mooooooooo mooooo moooo mo, moo mo mo moooooo moo.




"In heaven's name, man," cried Stubb, "are you ramming home a cartridge

moo mo moo mooo? Moooo, mooo mo!"




"Stand clear of the tackle!" cried a voice like the bursting of a
"Moooo moooo mo moo mooooo!" moooo m moooo mooo moo mooooooo mo m

rocket.
mooooo.




Almost in the same instant, with a thunder-boom, the enormous mass
Mooooo mo moo mooo moooooo, mooo m moooooo-mooo, moo mooooooo mooo

moooooo mooo moo moo, mooo Moooooo'm Moooo-Mooo mooo moo moooooooo; moo

mooooo-moooo Mooooooo moo moooooo moooooo mooo mo moo mooooo mo moo moo!

Moo mooooo moo moo mooooooo mooooo moooooo mooo, mooo m moooo mooooo

mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo. Moo mooo, m mooo mooooo moooooooo mooo mo

moooo Mooooooo moo moooo mo moo mooooo. Moo mooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo

mo mooo mo mooooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo moooo mo mooo. Mooo moooo moo

mooooo mooo m mooo moooooooo, moo mooooo m mooooo moo mooo moo mooo.




"Ha! ha!" cried Daggoo, all at once, from his now quiet, swinging perch

overhead; and looking further off from the side, we saw an arm thrust

forth from the grass over a grave.
moooo mooo moo moooo mooo m moooo.




"Both! both!--it is both!"--cried Daggoo again with a joyful shout; and

long in coming to, and Queequeg did not look very brisk.
mooo mo mooooo mo, moo Mooooooo moo moo mooo mooo moooo.




Now, how had this noble rescue been accomplished? Why, diving after
Moo, moo moo mooo moooo mooooo mooo mooooooooooo? Moo, mooooo moooo

the slowly descending head, Queequeg with his keen sword had made
moo mooooo mooooooooo mooo, Mooooooo mooo moo mooo moooo moo mooo

mooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo, mo mo mo moooooo m moooo mooo moooo; mooo

mooooooo moo moooo, moo mooooo moo mooo moo moo moooooo moo moooooo,

moo mo mooooo moo mooo Mooo mo moo mooo. Mo moooooo, mooo mooo moooo

moooooooo mo moo moo, m moo moo moooooooo; moo mooo moooooo mooo mooo

moo moo mo mo moooo mo mo, moo moooo mooooooo moooo moooooo;--mo moo

mooooo mooo moo moo, moo mo m moooooooo moooo moo mooo, moo moooooo m

mooooooo mooo moo Mooooo; mo mooo mooo moo mooo moooo, mo mooo moooo mo

moo mooo moo moo--mooo mooooooo. Mo moo moo moooo mooo mooooo, mooo moo

doing as well as could be expected.
moooo mo mooo mo moooo mo mooooooo.




And thus, through the courage and great skill in obstetrics of Queequeg,
Moo mooo, moooooo moo moooooo moo moooo moooo mo mooooooooo mo Mooooooo,

moo moooooooooo, mo mooooo, mooooooo mo Mooooooo, moo mooooooooooo

mooooooo moooooooooo; moooo mo m mooooo mo mo moooo mo mo moooooooo.

Midwifery should be taught in the same course with fencing and boxing,
Moooooooo mooooo mo mooooo mo moo mooo mooooo mooo moooooo moo mooooo,

riding and rowing.
mooooo moo mooooo.




I know that this queer adventure of the Gay-Header's will be sure to
M mooo mooo mooo moooo moooooooo mo moo Moo-Mooooo'm mooo mo mooo mo

seem incredible to some landsmen, though they themselves may have either
mooo mooooooooo mo mooo mooooooo, mooooo mooo mooooooooo moo mooo mooooo

mooo mo moooo mo mooo moo'm moooooo mooo m moooooo mooooo; mo mooooooo

which not seldom happens, and with much less reason too than the
moooo moo mooooo moooooo, moo mooo mooo mooo mooooo moo mooo moo

Indian's, considering the exceeding slipperiness of the curb of the
Mooooo'm, moooooooooo moo moooooooo mooooooooooo mo moo mooo mo moo

Sperm Whale's well.
Moooo Moooo'm mooo.




But, peradventure, it may be sagaciously urged, how is this? We thought
Moo, mooooooooooo, mo moo mo moooooooooo moooo, moo mo mooo? Mo moooooo

the tissued, infiltrated head of the Sperm Whale, was the lightest and
moo moooooo, moooooooooo mooo mo moo Moooo Moooo, moo moo mooooooo moo

most corky part about him; and yet thou makest it sink in an element of
mooo moooo mooo moooo moo; moo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo mo mo moooooo mo

a far greater specific gravity than itself. We have thee there. Not at
m moo moooooo mooooooo moooooo mooo mooooo. Mo mooo mooo moooo. Moo mo

all, but I have ye; for at the time poor Tash fell in, the case had been
moo, moo M mooo mo; moo mo moo mooo mooo Mooo mooo mo, moo mooo moo mooo

nearly emptied of its lighter contents, leaving little but the dense
mooooo moooooo mo moo moooooo mooooooo, moooooo mooooo moo moo moooo

tendinous wall of the well--a double welded, hammered substance, as I
moooooooo mooo mo moo mooo--m mooooo mooooo, mooooooo moooooooo, mo M

have before said, much heavier than the sea water, and a lump of which
mooo mooooo mooo, mooo moooooo mooo moo moo moooo, moo m mooo mo moooo

sinks in it like lead almost. But the tendency to rapid sinking in this
moooo mo mo mooo mooo mooooo. Moo moo mooooooo mo moooo moooooo mo mooo

moooooooo moo mo moo moooooo mooooooo mooooooooo mooooooooooo mo moo

moooo moooo mo moo mooo moooooooo mooooooooo mooo mo, mo mooo mo mooo

for performing his agile obstetrics on the run, as you may say. Yes, it
moo mooooooooo moo moooo mooooooooo mo moo moo, mo moo moo moo. Moo, mo

was a running delivery, so it was.
moo m moooooo mooooooo, mo mo moo.




Now, had Tashtego perished in that head, it had been a very precious
Moo, moo Mooooooo mooooooo mo mooo mooo, mo moo mooo m mooo mooooooo

perishing; smothered in the very whitest and daintiest of fragrant
moooooooo; moooooooo mo moo mooo moooooo moo moooooooo mo mooooooo

spermaceti; coffined, hearsed, and tombed in the secret inner chamber

moo moooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo. Mooo moo moooooo moo moo moooooo mo

mo moo mooooo mo m mooooo mooo, moooo mooo moooooooo moooo mo mo, mooo

moooooo moo moo mooo, mo mooooo moo mo, mo mooo mo mooo mooooooo.

How many, think ye, have likewise fallen into Plato's honey head, and
Moo mooo, moooo mo, mooo mooooooo mooooo mooo Moooo'm moooo mooo, moo

sweetly perished there?
moooooo mooooooo moooo?










CHAPTER 79. The Prairie.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooooo.







To scan the lines of his face, or feel the bumps on the head of this
Mo mooo moo moooo mo moo mooo, mo mooo moo moooo mo moo mooo mo mooo

Leviathan; this is a thing which no Physiognomist or Phrenologist has as
Moooooooo; mooo mo m moooo moooo mo Moooooooooooo mo Mooooooooooo moo mo

yet undertaken. Such an enterprise would seem almost as hopeful as for
moo mooooooooo. Mooo mo mooooooooo moooo mooo mooooo mo moooooo mo moo

Lavater to have scrutinized the wrinkles on the Rock of Gibraltar,
Moooooo mo mooo moooooooooo moo mooooooo mo moo Mooo mo Moooooooo,

or for Gall to have mounted a ladder and manipulated the Dome of the
mo moo Mooo mo mooo moooooo m mooooo moo moooooooooo moo Mooo mo moo

Pantheon. Still, in that famous work of his, Lavater not only treats
Mooooooo. Moooo, mo mooo mooooo mooo mo moo, Moooooo moo mooo mooooo

of the various faces of men, but also attentively studies the faces
mo moo moooooo moooo mo moo, moo mooo moooooooooo moooooo moo moooo

of horses, birds, serpents, and fish; and dwells in detail upon the
mo mooooo, moooo, mooooooo, moo mooo; moo mooooo mo mooooo mooo moo

modifications of expression discernible therein. Nor have Gall and
moooooooooooo mo mooooooooo moooooooooo moooooo. Moo mooo Mooo moo

his disciple Spurzheim failed to throw out some hints touching the
moo mooooooo Moooooooo mooooo mo moooo moo mooo moooo mooooooo moo

phrenological characteristics of other beings than man. Therefore,
moooooooooooo moooooooooooooo mo moooo mooooo mooo moo. Moooooooo,

though I am but ill qualified for a pioneer, in the application of these
mooooo M mo moo moo moooooooo moo m moooooo, mo moo moooooooooo mo moooo

two semi-sciences to the whale, I will do my endeavor. I try all things;
moo mooo-mooooooo mo moo moooo, M mooo mo mo mooooooo. M moo moo mooooo;

I achieve what I can.
M moooooo mooo M moo.




Physiognomically regarded, the Sperm Whale is an anomalous creature.
Mooooooooooooooo mooooooo, moo Moooo Moooo mo mo moooooooo mooooooo.

He has no proper nose. And since the nose is the central and most
Mo moo mo mooooo mooo. Moo moooo moo mooo mo moo moooooo moo mooo

conspicuous of the features; and since it perhaps most modifies and
moooooooooo mo moo mooooooo; moo moooo mo moooooo mooo mooooooo moo

finally controls their combined expression; hence it would seem that its
moooooo mooooooo moooo mooooooo mooooooooo; moooo mo moooo mooo mooo moo

entire absence, as an external appendage, must very largely affect
mooooo moooooo, mo mo mooooooo moooooooo, mooo mooo moooooo mooooo

the countenance of the whale. For as in landscape gardening, a spire,
moo moooooooooo mo moo moooo. Moo mo mo moooooooo moooooooo, m moooo,

cupola, monument, or tower of some sort, is deemed almost indispensable
mooooo, mooooooo, mo moooo mo mooo mooo, mo mooooo mooooo moooooooooooo

to the completion of the scene; so no face can be physiognomically in
mo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooo; mo mo mooo moo mo mooooooooooooooo mo

keeping without the elevated open-work belfry of the nose. Dash the nose
moooooo moooooo moo mooooooo mooo-mooo mooooo mo moo mooo. Mooo moo mooo

from Phidias's marble Jove, and what a sorry remainder! Nevertheless,
mooo Moooooo'm mooooo Mooo, moo mooo m moooo moooooooo! Mooooooooooo,

Leviathan is of so mighty a magnitude, all his proportions are so
Moooooooo mo mo mo mooooo m moooooooo, moo moo moooooooooo moo mo

stately, that the same deficiency which in the sculptured Jove were
moooooo, mooo moo mooo mooooooooo moooo mo moo mooooooooo Mooo mooo

hideous, in him is no blemish at all. Nay, it is an added grandeur. A
moooooo, mo moo mo mo moooooo mo moo. Moo, mo mo mo moooo mooooooo. M

nose to the whale would have been impertinent. As on your physiognomical
mooo mo moo moooo moooo mooo mooo moooooooooo. Mo mo mooo mooooooooooooo

voyage you sail round his vast head in your jolly-boat, your noble
mooooo moo mooo moooo moo mooo mooo mo mooo moooo-mooo, mooo moooo

conceptions of him are never insulted by the reflection that he has a
moooooooooo mo moo moo moooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo mo moo m

nose to be pulled. A pestilent conceit, which so often will insist upon
mooo mo mo mooooo. M moooooooo moooooo, moooo mo moooo mooo mooooo mooo

obtruding even when beholding the mightiest royal beadle on his throne.
moooooooo mooo mooo moooooooo moo moooooooo moooo mooooo mo moo mooooo.




In some particulars, perhaps the most imposing physiognomical view to
Mo mooo moooooooooo, moooooo moo mooo mooooooo mooooooooooooo mooo mo

be had of the Sperm Whale, is that of the full front of his head. This
mo moo mo moo Moooo Moooo, mo mooo mo moo mooo moooo mo moo mooo. Mooo

aspect is sublime.
mooooo mo moooooo.




In thought, a fine human brow is like the East when troubled with the
Mo moooooo, m mooo moooo mooo mo mooo moo Mooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo

morning. In the repose of the pasture, the curled brow of the bull has a
moooooo. Mo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo, moo mooooo mooo mo moo mooo moo m

touch of the grand in it. Pushing heavy cannon up mountain defiles, the
moooo mo moo moooo mo mo. Moooooo moooo mooooo mo mooooooo moooooo, moo

elephant's brow is majestic. Human or animal, the mystical brow is as
mooooooo'm mooo mo mooooooo. Moooo mo mooooo, moo mooooooo mooo mo mo

that great golden seal affixed by the German Emperors to their decrees.
mooo moooo mooooo mooo moooooo mo moo Mooooo Mooooooo mo moooo moooooo.

It signifies--"God: done this day by my hand." But in most creatures,
Mo moooooooo--"Moo: mooo mooo moo mo mo mooo." Moo mo mooo moooooooo,

nay in man himself, very often the brow is but a mere strip of alpine
moo mo moo moooooo, mooo moooo moo mooo mo moo m mooo moooo mo mooooo

land lying along the snow line. Few are the foreheads which like
mooo moooo moooo moo mooo mooo. Moo moo moo moooooooo moooo mooo

Shakespeare's or Melancthon's rise so high, and descend so low, that the
Moooooooooo'm mo Mooooooooo'm mooo mo mooo, moo moooooo mo moo, mooo moo

eyes themselves seem clear, eternal, tideless mountain lakes; and all
mooo mooooooooo mooo moooo, moooooo, mooooooo mooooooo moooo; moo moo

above them in the forehead's wrinkles, you seem to track the antlered
moooo mooo mo moo mooooooo'm mooooooo, moo mooo mo moooo moo mooooooo

thoughts descending there to drink, as the Highland hunters track the
mooooooo mooooooooo moooo mo moooo, mo moo Mooooooo moooooo moooo moo

snow prints of the deer. But in the great Sperm Whale, this high and
mooo mooooo mo moo mooo. Moo mo moo moooo Moooo Moooo, mooo mooo moo

mighty god-like dignity inherent in the brow is so immensely amplified,
mooooo moo-mooo moooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo mo mo moooooooo moooooooo,

that gazing on it, in that full front view, you feel the Deity and the
mooo mooooo mo mo, mo mooo mooo moooo mooo, moo mooo moo Moooo moo moo

dread powers more forcibly than in beholding any other object in living
moooo mooooo mooo mooooooo mooo mo moooooooo moo moooo mooooo mo mooooo

nature. For you see no one point precisely; not one distinct feature is
mooooo. Moo moo moo mo moo moooo moooooooo; moo moo mooooooo moooooo mo

revealed; no nose, eyes, ears, or mouth; no face; he has none, proper;
mooooooo; mo mooo, mooo, mooo, mo moooo; mo mooo; mo moo mooo, mooooo;

nothing but that one broad firmament of a forehead, pleated with
moooooo moo mooo moo moooo moooooooo mo m mooooooo, moooooo mooo

riddles; dumbly lowering with the doom of boats, and ships, and men.
moooooo; mooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo mo moooo, moo moooo, moo moo.

Nor, in profile, does this wondrous brow diminish; though that way
Moo, mo moooooo, mooo mooo mooooooo mooo mooooooo; mooooo mooo moo

viewed its grandeur does not domineer upon you so. In profile, you
mooooo moo mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo moo mo. Mo moooooo, moo

plainly perceive that horizontal, semi-crescentic depression in the
moooooo mooooooo mooo mooooooooo, mooo-mooooooooo mooooooooo mo moo

forehead's middle, which, in man, is Lavater's mark of genius.
mooooooo'm mooooo, moooo, mo moo, mo Moooooo'm mooo mo mooooo.




But how? Genius in the Sperm Whale? Has the Sperm Whale ever written
Moo moo? Mooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo? Moo moo Moooo Moooo mooo moooooo

a book, spoken a speech? No, his great genius is declared in his
m mooo, mooooo m mooooo? Mo, moo moooo mooooo mo mooooooo mo moo

doing nothing particular to prove it. It is moreover declared in his
moooo moooooo mooooooooo mo moooo mo. Mo mo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo

pyramidical silence. And this reminds me that had the great Sperm Whale
moooooooooo moooooo. Moo mooo moooooo mo mooo moo moo moooo Moooo Moooo

been known to the young Orient World, he would have been deified by
mooo moooo mo moo moooo Mooooo Moooo, mo moooo mooo mooo moooooo mo

their child-magian thoughts. They deified the crocodile of the Nile,
moooo moooo-mooooo mooooooo. Mooo moooooo moo moooooooo mo moo Mooo,

because the crocodile is tongueless; and the Sperm Whale has no
moooooo moo moooooooo mo mooooooooo; moo moo Moooo Moooo moo mo

tongue, or at least it is so exceedingly small, as to be incapable of
mooooo, mo mo moooo mo mo mo moooooooooo moooo, mo mo mo moooooooo mo

protrusion. If hereafter any highly cultured, poetical nation shall lure
mooooooooo. Mo moooooooo moo mooooo mooooooo, mooooooo mooooo moooo mooo

back to their birth-right, the merry May-day gods of old; and livingly
mooo mo moooo moooo-moooo, moo moooo Moo-moo mooo mo moo; moo mooooooo

enthrone them again in the now egotistical sky; in the now unhaunted
mooooooo mooo moooo mo moo moo moooooooooo moo; mo moo moo moooooooo

hill; then be sure, exalted to Jove's high seat, the great Sperm Whale
mooo; mooo mo mooo, moooooo mo Mooo'm mooo mooo, moo moooo Moooo Moooo

shall lord it.
moooo mooo mo.




Champollion deciphered the wrinkled granite hieroglyphics. But there is
Moooooooooo mooooooooo moo mooooooo moooooo moooooooooooo. Moo moooo mo

no Champollion to decipher the Egypt of every man's and every being's
mo Moooooooooo mo mooooooo moo Moooo mo moooo moo'm moo moooo moooo'm

face. Physiognomy, like every other human science, is but a passing
mooo. Moooooooooo, mooo moooo moooo moooo moooooo, mo moo m moooooo

fable. If then, Sir William Jones, who read in thirty languages, could
moooo. Mo mooo, Moo Moooooo Moooo, moo mooo mo mooooo moooooooo, moooo

not read the simplest peasant's face in its profounder and more subtle
moo mooo moo mooooooo moooooo'm mooo mo moo mooooooooo moo mooo mooooo

meanings, how may unlettered Ishmael hope to read the awful Chaldee of
mooooooo, moo moo mooooooooo Moooooo mooo mo mooo moo moooo Moooooo mo

the Sperm Whale's brow? I but put that brow before you. Read it if you
moo Moooo Moooo'm mooo? M moo moo mooo mooo mooooo moo. Mooo mo mo moo

can.
moo.










CHAPTER 80. The Nut.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moo.







If the Sperm Whale be physiognomically a Sphinx, to the phrenologist his
Mo moo Moooo Moooo mo mooooooooooooooo m Mooooo, mo moo mooooooooooo moo

brain seems that geometrical circle which it is impossible to square.
moooo moooo mooo moooooooooo mooooo moooo mo mo mooooooooo mo mooooo.




In the full-grown creature the skull will measure at least twenty feet
Mo moo mooo-moooo mooooooo moo moooo mooo moooooo mo moooo mooooo mooo

in length. Unhinge the lower jaw, and the side view of this skull is as
mo mooooo. Moooooo moo moooo moo, moo moo mooo mooo mo mooo moooo mo mo

the side of a moderately inclined plane resting throughout on a level
moo mooo mo m mooooooooo mooooooo moooo moooooo mooooooooo mo m moooo

base. But in life--as we have elsewhere seen--this inclined plane is
mooo. Moo mo mooo--mo mo mooo moooooooo mooo--mooo mooooooo moooo mo

angularly filled up, and almost squared by the enormous superincumbent
moooooooo mooooo mo, moo mooooo moooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooooooooooo

mass of the junk and sperm. At the high end the skull forms a crater to
mooo mo moo mooo moo moooo. Mo moo mooo moo moo moooo moooo m mooooo mo

bed that part of the mass; while under the long floor of this crater--in
moo mooo mooo mo moo mooo; moooo moooo moo mooo moooo mo mooo mooooo--mo

another cavity seldom exceeding ten inches in length and as many in
moooooo mooooo mooooo moooooooo moo mooooo mo mooooo moo mo mooo mo

depth--reposes the mere handful of this monster's brain. The brain is at
moooo--moooooo moo mooo moooooo mo mooo moooooo'm moooo. Moo moooo mo mo

least twenty feet from his apparent forehead in life; it is hidden
moooo mooooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo mooooooo mo mooo; mo mo mooooo

away behind its vast outworks, like the innermost citadel within the
mooo mooooo moo mooo mooooooo, mooo moo moooooooo moooooo mooooo moo

amplified fortifications of Quebec. So like a choice casket is it
moooooooo mooooooooooooo mo Mooooo. Mo mooo m mooooo mooooo mo mo

secreted in him, that I have known some whalemen who peremptorily deny
mooooooo mo moo, mooo M mooo moooo mooo mooooooo moo mooooooooooo mooo

that the Sperm Whale has any other brain than that palpable semblance
mooo moo Moooo Moooo moo moo moooo moooo mooo mooo mooooooo moooooooo

of one formed by the cubic-yards of his sperm magazine. Lying in strange
mo moo mooooo mo moo moooo-moooo mo moo moooo mooooooo. Moooo mo moooooo

folds, courses, and convolutions, to their apprehensions, it seems more
moooo, moooooo, moo mooooooooooo, mo moooo moooooooooooo, mo moooo mooo

in keeping with the idea of his general might to regard that mystic part
mo moooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo moooooo moooo mo mooooo mooo mooooo mooo

of him as the seat of his intelligence.
mo moo mo moo mooo mo moo mooooooooooo.




It is plain, then, that phrenologically the head of this Leviathan, in
Mo mo moooo, mooo, mooo moooooooooooooo moo mooo mo mooo Moooooooo, mo

the creature's living intact state, is an entire delusion. As for his
moo mooooooo'm mooooo mooooo moooo, mo mo mooooo mooooooo. Mo moo moo

true brain, you can then see no indications of it, nor feel any. The
mooo moooo, moo moo mooo moo mo moooooooooo mo mo, moo mooo moo. Moo

whale, like all things that are mighty, wears a false brow to the common
moooo, mooo moo mooooo mooo moo mooooo, moooo m moooo mooo mo moo mooooo

world.
moooo.




If you unload his skull of its spermy heaps and then take a rear view
Mo moo mooooo moo moooo mo moo mooooo moooo moo mooo mooo m mooo mooo

of its rear end, which is the high end, you will be struck by its
mo moo mooo moo, moooo mo moo mooo moo, moo mooo mo mooooo mo moo

resemblance to the human skull, beheld in the same situation, and from
moooooooooo mo moo moooo moooo, mooooo mo moo mooo moooooooo, moo mooo

the same point of view. Indeed, place this reversed skull (scaled down
moo mooo moooo mo mooo. Mooooo, moooo mooo mooooooo moooo (mooooo mooo

to the human magnitude) among a plate of men's skulls, and you would
mo moo moooo moooooooo) moooo m moooo mo moo'm mooooo, moo moo moooo

involuntarily confound it with them; and remarking the depressions on
moooooooooooo mooooooo mo mooo mooo; moo moooooooo moo moooooooooo mo

one part of its summit, in phrenological phrase you would say--This
moo mooo mo moo mooooo, mo moooooooooooo mooooo moo moooo moo--Mooo

man had no self-esteem, and no veneration. And by those negations,
moo moo mo mooo-mooooo, moo mo mooooooooo. Moo mo moooo moooooooo,

considered along with the affirmative fact of his prodigious bulk and
mooooooooo moooo mooo moo moooooooooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo moo

power, you can best form to yourself the truest, though not the most
moooo, moo moo mooo mooo mo mooooooo moo mooooo, mooooo moo moo mooo

exhilarating conception of what the most exalted potency is.
mooooooooooo mooooooooo mo mooo moo mooo moooooo moooooo mo.




But if from the comparative dimensions of the whale's proper brain, you
Moo mo mooo moo moooooooooo mooooooooo mo moo moooo'm mooooo moooo, moo

deem it incapable of being adequately charted, then I have another idea
mooo mo moooooooo mo moooo mooooooooo moooooo, mooo M mooo moooooo mooo

for you. If you attentively regard almost any quadruped's spine,
moo moo. Mo moo moooooooooo mooooo mooooo moo moooooooo'm moooo,

you will be struck with the resemblance of its vertebrae to a strung
moo mooo mo mooooo mooo moo moooooooooo mo moo moooooooo mo m mooooo

necklace of dwarfed skulls, all bearing rudimental resemblance to the
mooooooo mo moooooo mooooo, moo moooooo mooooooooo moooooooooo mo moo

skull proper. It is a German conceit, that the vertebrae are absolutely
moooo mooooo. Mo mo m Mooooo moooooo, mooo moo moooooooo moo mooooooooo

undeveloped skulls. But the curious external resemblance, I take it
moooooooooo mooooo. Moo moo moooooo mooooooo moooooooooo, M mooo mo

the Germans were not the first men to perceive. A foreign friend once
moo Moooooo mooo moo moo moooo moo mo mooooooo. M moooooo mooooo mooo

pointed it out to me, in the skeleton of a foe he had slain, and with
moooooo mo moo mo mo, mo moo mooooooo mo m moo mo moo moooo, moo mooo

the vertebrae of which he was inlaying, in a sort of basso-relievo, the
moo moooooooo mo moooo mo moo mooooooo, mo m mooo mo moooo-moooooo, moo

beaked prow of his canoe. Now, I consider that the phrenologists have
mooooo mooo mo moo moooo. Moo, M mooooooo mooo moo moooooooooooo mooo

omitted an important thing in not pushing their investigations from the
moooooo mo moooooooo moooo mo moo moooooo moooo mooooooooooooo mooo moo

cerebellum through the spinal canal. For I believe that much of a man's
mooooooooo moooooo moo mooooo moooo. Moo M moooooo mooo mooo mo m moo'm

character will be found betokened in his backbone. I would rather feel
moooooooo mooo mo moooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo. M moooo mooooo mooo

your spine than your skull, whoever you are. A thin joist of a spine
mooo moooo mooo mooo moooo, moooooo moo moo. M mooo moooo mo m moooo

never yet upheld a full and noble soul. I rejoice in my spine, as in the
moooo moo mooooo m mooo moo moooo mooo. M moooooo mo mo moooo, mo mo moo

firm audacious staff of that flag which I fling half out to the world.
mooo moooooooo moooo mo mooo mooo moooo M moooo mooo moo mo moo moooo.




Apply this spinal branch of phrenology to the Sperm Whale. His cranial
Moooo mooo mooooo mooooo mo mooooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo. Moo moooooo

cavity is continuous with the first neck-vertebra; and in that vertebra
mooooo mo mooooooooo mooo moo moooo mooo-mooooooo; moo mo mooo mooooooo

the bottom of the spinal canal will measure ten inches across, being
moo mooooo mo moo mooooo moooo mooo moooooo moo mooooo mooooo, moooo

eight in height, and of a triangular figure with the base downwards. As
moooo mo mooooo, moo mo m mooooooooo mooooo mooo moo mooo moooooooo. Mo

it passes through the remaining vertebrae the canal tapers in size, but
mo mooooo moooooo moo moooooooo moooooooo moo moooo mooooo mo mooo, moo

for a considerable distance remains of large capacity. Now, of course,
moo m mooooooooooo mooooooo moooooo mo moooo mooooooo. Moo, mo mooooo,

this canal is filled with much the same strangely fibrous substance--the
mooo moooo mo mooooo mooo mooo moo mooo moooooooo moooooo moooooooo--moo

spinal cord--as the brain; and directly communicates with the brain.
mooooo mooo--mo moo moooo; moo mooooooo mooooooooooo mooo moo moooo.

And what is still more, for many feet after emerging from the brain's
Moo mooo mo moooo mooo, moo mooo mooo moooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo'm

cavity, the spinal cord remains of an undecreasing girth, almost
mooooo, moo mooooo mooo moooooo mo mo mooooooooooo moooo, mooooo

equal to that of the brain. Under all these circumstances, would it be
moooo mo mooo mo moo moooo. Moooo moo moooo moooooooooooo, moooo mo mo

unreasonable to survey and map out the whale's spine phrenologically?
mooooooooooo mo mooooo moo moo moo moo moooo'm moooo moooooooooooooo?

For, viewed in this light, the wonderful comparative smallness of his
Moo, mooooo mo mooo moooo, moo moooooooo moooooooooo moooooooo mo moo

brain proper is more than compensated by the wonderful comparative
moooo mooooo mo mooo mooo moooooooooo mo moo moooooooo moooooooooo

magnitude of his spinal cord.
moooooooo mo moo mooooo mooo.




But leaving this hint to operate as it may with the phrenologists, I
Moo moooooo mooo mooo mo moooooo mo mo moo mooo moo moooooooooooo, M

would merely assume the spinal theory for a moment, in reference to the
moooo mooooo mooooo moo mooooo mooooo moo m mooooo, mo moooooooo mo moo

Sperm Whale's hump. This august hump, if I mistake not, rises over one
Moooo Moooo'm mooo. Mooo mooooo mooo, mo M moooooo moo, moooo mooo moo

of the larger vertebrae, and is, therefore, in some sort, the outer
mo moo mooooo moooooooo, moo mo, moooooooo, mo mooo mooo, moo moooo

convex mould of it. From its relative situation then, I should call this
mooooo moooo mo mo. Mooo moo mooooooo moooooooo mooo, M mooooo mooo mooo

high hump the organ of firmness or indomitableness in the Sperm Whale.
mooo mooo moo moooo mo mooooooo mo moooooooooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo.

And that the great monster is indomitable, you will yet have reason to
Moo mooo moo moooo moooooo mo moooooooooo, moo mooo moo mooo mooooo mo

know.
mooo.










CHAPTER 81. The Pequod Meets The Virgin.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooooo Moooo Moo Mooooo.







The predestinated day arrived, and we duly met the ship Jungfrau, Derick
Moo moooooooooooo moo moooooo, moo mo mooo moo moo mooo Mooooooo, Mooooo

De Deer, master, of Bremen.
Mo Mooo, mooooo, mo Mooooo.




At one time the greatest whaling people in the world, the Dutch and
Mo moo mooo moo mooooooo moooooo mooooo mo moo moooo, moo Moooo moo

Germans are now among the least; but here and there at very wide
Moooooo moo moo moooo moo moooo; moo mooo moo moooo mo mooo mooo

intervals of latitude and longitude, you still occasionally meet with
moooooooo mo mooooooo moo moooooooo, moo moooo mooooooooooo mooo mooo

their flag in the Pacific.
moooo mooo mo moo Moooooo.




For some reason, the Jungfrau seemed quite eager to pay her respects.
Moo mooo mooooo, moo Mooooooo mooooo moooo moooo mo moo moo mooooooo.

While yet some distance from the Pequod, she rounded to, and dropping a
Moooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo moo Mooooo, moo moooooo mo, moo mooooooo m

boat, her captain was impelled towards us, impatiently standing in the
mooo, moo moooooo moo mooooooo moooooo mo, moooooooooo mooooooo mo moo

bows instead of the stern.
mooo moooooo mo moo moooo.




"What has he in his hand there?" cried Starbuck, pointing to something
"Mooo moo mo mo moo mooo moooo?" moooo Mooooooo, mooooooo mo moooooooo

wavingly held by the German. "Impossible!--a lamp-feeder!"
mooooooo mooo mo moo Mooooo. "Mooooooooo!--m mooo-mooooo!"




"Not that," said Stubb, "no, no, it's a coffee-pot, Mr. Starbuck; he's
"Moo mooo," mooo Moooo, "mo, mo, mo'm m mooooo-moo, Mo. Mooooooo; mo'm

coming off to make us our coffee, is the Yarman; don't you see that big
mooooo moo mo mooo mo moo mooooo, mo moo Mooooo; moo'm moo moo mooo moo

tin can there alongside of him?--that's his boiling water. Oh! he's all
moo moo moooo moooooooo mo moo?--mooo'm moo moooooo moooo. Mo! mo'm moo

right, is the Yarman."
moooo, mo moo Mooooo."




"Go along with you," cried Flask, "it's a lamp-feeder and an oil-can.
"Mo moooo mooo moo," moooo Moooo, "mo'm m mooo-mooooo moo mo moo-moo.

He's out of oil, and has come a-begging."
Mo'm moo mo moo, moo moo mooo m-moooooo."




However curious it may seem for an oil-ship to be borrowing oil on the
Moooooo moooooo mo moo mooo moo mo moo-mooo mo mo moooooooo moo mo moo

whale-ground, and however much it may invertedly contradict the old
moooo-mooooo, moo moooooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo mooooooooo moo moo

proverb about carrying coals to Newcastle, yet sometimes such a thing
moooooo moooo mooooooo moooo mo Moooooooo, moo moooooooo mooo m moooo

really happens; and in the present case Captain Derick De Deer did
mooooo moooooo; moo mo moo moooooo mooo Moooooo Mooooo Mo Mooo moo

indubitably conduct a lamp-feeder as Flask did declare.
moooooooooo moooooo m mooo-mooooo mo Moooo moo moooooo.




As he mounted the deck, Ahab abruptly accosted him, without at all
Mo mo moooooo moo mooo, Mooo mooooooo mooooooo moo, moooooo mo moo

heeding what he had in his hand; but in his broken lingo, the German
moooooo mooo mo moo mo moo mooo; moo mo moo mooooo moooo, moo Mooooo

soon evinced his complete ignorance of the White Whale; immediately
mooo moooooo moo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo; moooooooooo

turning the conversation to his lamp-feeder and oil can, with some
moooooo moo mooooooooooo mo moo mooo-mooooo moo moo moo, mooo mooo

remarks touching his having to turn into his hammock at night in
moooooo mooooooo moo mooooo mo mooo mooo moo moooooo mo moooo mo

profound darkness--his last drop of Bremen oil being gone, and not a
mooooooo mooooooo--moo mooo mooo mo Mooooo moo moooo mooo, moo moo m

single flying-fish yet captured to supply the deficiency; concluding
mooooo mooooo-mooo moo mooooooo mo mooooo moo mooooooooo; mooooooooo

by hinting that his ship was indeed what in the Fishery is technically
mo moooooo mooo moo mooo moo mooooo mooo mo moo Moooooo mo moooooooooo

called a CLEAN one (that is, an empty one), well deserving the name of
mooooo m MOOOO moo (mooo mo, mo moooo moo), mooo moooooooo moo mooo mo

Jungfrau or the Virgin.
Mooooooo mo moo Mooooo.




His necessities supplied, Derick departed; but he had not gained his
Moo moooooooooo mooooooo, Mooooo mooooooo; moo mo moo moo mooooo moo

ship's side, when whales were almost simultaneously raised from the
mooo'm mooo, mooo mooooo mooo mooooo mooooooooooooo mooooo mooo moo

mast-heads of both vessels; and so eager for the chase was Derick, that
mooo-moooo mo mooo moooooo; moo mo moooo moo moo moooo moo Mooooo, mooo

without pausing to put his oil-can and lamp-feeder aboard, he slewed
moooooo moooooo mo moo moo moo-moo moo mooo-mooooo mooooo, mo mooooo

round his boat and made after the leviathan lamp-feeders.
moooo moo mooo moo mooo moooo moo moooooooo mooo-moooooo.




Now, the game having risen to leeward, he and the other three German
Moo, moo mooo mooooo moooo mo moooooo, mo moo moo moooo moooo Mooooo

boats that soon followed him, had considerably the start of the Pequod's
moooo mooo mooo mooooooo moo, moo mooooooooooo moo moooo mo moo Mooooo'm

keels. There were eight whales, an average pod. Aware of their danger,
moooo. Moooo mooo moooo mooooo, mo moooooo moo. Moooo mo moooo mooooo,

they were going all abreast with great speed straight before the wind,
mooo mooo moooo moo moooooo mooo moooo moooo mooooooo mooooo moo mooo,

rubbing their flanks as closely as so many spans of horses in harness.
moooooo moooo mooooo mo moooooo mo mo mooo moooo mo mooooo mo moooooo.

They left a great, wide wake, as though continually unrolling a great
Mooo mooo m moooo, mooo mooo, mo mooooo moooooooooo moooooooo m moooo

wide parchment upon the sea.
mooo moooooooo mooo moo moo.




Full in this rapid wake, and many fathoms in the rear, swam a huge,
Mooo mo mooo moooo mooo, moo mooo moooooo mo moo mooo, mooo m mooo,

humped old bull, which by his comparatively slow progress, as well as
mooooo moo mooo, moooo mo moo moooooooooooo mooo mooooooo, mo mooo mo

by the unusual yellowish incrustations overgrowing him, seemed afflicted
mo moo moooooo moooooooo moooooooooooo moooooooooo moo, mooooo moooooooo

with the jaundice, or some other infirmity. Whether this whale belonged
mooo moo mooooooo, mo mooo moooo moooooooo. Moooooo mooo moooo mooooooo

to the pod in advance, seemed questionable; for it is not customary for
mo moo moo mo moooooo, mooooo mooooooooooo; moo mo mo moo moooooooo moo

such venerable leviathans to be at all social. Nevertheless, he stuck
mooo moooooooo mooooooooo mo mo mo moo mooooo. Mooooooooooo, mo moooo

to their wake, though indeed their back water must have retarded him,
mo moooo mooo, mooooo mooooo moooo mooo moooo mooo mooo mooooooo moo,

because the white-bone or swell at his broad muzzle was a dashed one,
moooooo moo moooo-mooo mo moooo mo moo moooo mooooo moo m mooooo moo,

like the swell formed when two hostile currents meet. His spout was
mooo moo moooo mooooo mooo moo moooooo mooooooo mooo. Moo moooo moo

short, slow, and laborious; coming forth with a choking sort of gush,
moooo, mooo, moo moooooooo; mooooo moooo mooo m moooooo mooo mo mooo,

and spending itself in torn shreds, followed by strange subterranean
moo mooooooo mooooo mo mooo mooooo, mooooooo mo moooooo mooooooooooo

commotions in him, which seemed to have egress at his other buried
mooooooooo mo moo, moooo mooooo mo mooo mooooo mo moo moooo mooooo

extremity, causing the waters behind him to upbubble.
moooooooo, moooooo moo mooooo mooooo moo mo mooooooo.




"Who's got some paregoric?" said Stubb, "he has the stomach-ache, I'm
"Moo'm moo mooo moooooooo?" mooo Moooo, "mo moo moo moooooo-mooo, M'm

afraid. Lord, think of having half an acre of stomach-ache! Adverse
mooooo. Mooo, moooo mo mooooo mooo mo mooo mo moooooo-mooo! Moooooo

winds are holding mad Christmas in him, boys. It's the first foul wind
moooo moo moooooo moo Moooooooo mo moo, mooo. Mo'm moo moooo mooo mooo

I ever knew to blow from astern; but look, did ever whale yaw so before?
M mooo mooo mo mooo mooo mooooo; moo mooo, moo mooo moooo moo mo mooooo?

it must be, he's lost his tiller."
mo mooo mo, mo'm mooo moo mooooo."




As an overladen Indiaman bearing down the Hindostan coast with a deck
Mo mo moooooooo Mooooooo moooooo mooo moo Moooooooo moooo mooo m mooo

load of frightened horses, careens, buries, rolls, and wallows on her
mooo mo mooooooooo mooooo, moooooo, mooooo, moooo, moo moooooo mo moo

moo; mo moo mooo moo moooo moooo moo mooo mooo, moo moo moo mooo mooooo

moooooo mooo mo moo mooooooo moo-mooo, mooooo moo moooo mo moo moooooo

wake in the unnatural stump of his starboard fin. Whether he had lost
mooo mo moo moooooooo moooo mo moo moooooooo moo. Moooooo mo moo mooo

mooo moo mo mooooo, mo moo mooo mooo moooooo mo, mo mooo mooo mo moo.




"Only wait a bit, old chap, and I'll give ye a sling for that wounded
"Mooo mooo m moo, moo mooo, moo M'mo mooo mo m moooo moo mooo moooooo

arm," cried cruel Flask, pointing to the whale-line near him.
moo," moooo moooo Moooo, mooooooo mo moo moooo-mooo mooo moo.

"Mooo mo moo'm moooo mooo mooo mo," moooo Mooooooo. "Mooo moo, mo moo

German will have him."
Mooooo mooo mooo moo."




With one intent all the combined rival boats were pointed for this
Mooo moo mooooo moo moo mooooooo moooo moooo mooo moooooo moo mooo

one fish, because not only was he the largest, and therefore the most
moo mooo, moooooo moo mooo moo mo moo moooooo, moo moooooooo moo mooo

mooooooo moooo, moo mo moo moooooo mo mooo, moo moo moooo mooooo mooo

Mooooo moooo mooo moooooo; moo mooo moo moooo moooo mo moo moo, Mooooo'm

mooo mo moo mooo, mo moooo mo moooooo mo mooo moo mooo mooooo mooo

my religion to get mad; but I'd like to eat that villainous
mo mooooooo mo moo moo; moo M'm mooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo

Yarman--Pull--won't ye? Are ye going to let that rascal beat ye? Do

it is, men, will ye spit fire or not?"

But the monster's run was a brief one. Giving a sudden gasp, he

moooo moooo moooo moooo, moo mooo mo mo moooooooo. Moooooo, moooo mo moo

mooooooo moooooo mo moo--mo m mooo moooo moooo moooo moooooooo mooo mooo

2000 square feet--the pressure of the water is immense. We all know
mooo mooooo mooo--moo mooooooo mo moo moooo mo moooooo. Mo moo mooo

mooo mo moooooooooo moooooooooo mooooo mo moooooooo moooo mo moooo; mooo

here, above-ground, in the air; how vast, then, the burden of a whale,
mooo, moooo-mooooo, mo moo moo; moo mooo, mooo, moo mooooo mo m moooo,

moooo moooo moo mooooo mo moooo moooooooooo. Moo mooooooo moo moooooooo

it at the weight of twenty line-of-battle ships, with all their guns,
mo mo moo mooooo mo mooooo mooo-mo-mooooo moooo, mooo moo moooo mooo,

and stores, and men on board.
moo mooooo, moo moo mo moooo.




As the three boats lay there on that gently rolling sea, gazing down

Seems it credible that by three such thin threads the great Leviathan
Moooo mo mooooooo mooo mo moooo mooo mooo moooooo moo moooo Moooooooo

was suspended like the big weight to an eight day clock. Suspended? and

mo mooo? Mo moooo mooo mo moooo. Mo mooo moo mooooooo mo mooo mo moo

mooo mo mooooooooooo mooo--"Moooo mooo mooo moo mooo mooo mooooo moooo?

mo moo mooo mooo mooo-mooooo? Moo moooo mo moo mooo mooooo mo moo mooooo

hold, the spear, the dart, nor the habergeon: he esteemeth iron as
mooo, moo moooo, moo mooo, moo moo moooooooo: mo moooooooo mooo mo

straw; the arrow cannot make him flee; darts are counted as stubble;
moooo; moo moooo mooooo mooo moo mooo; moooo moo moooooo mo moooooo;

he laugheth at the shaking of a spear!" This the creature? this he? Oh!
mo mooooooo mo moo moooooo mo m moooo!" Mooo moo mooooooo? mooo mo? Mo!

that unfulfilments should follow the prophets. For with the strength
mooo moooooooooooo mooooo mooooo moo mooooooo. Moo mooo moo mooooooo

mo m mooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo, Moooooooo moo moo moo mooo moooo moo

moooooooo mo moo moo, mo mooo moo mooo moo Mooooo'm mooo-mooooo!




In that sloping afternoon sunlight, the shadows that the three boats

"Stand by, men; he stirs," cried Starbuck, as the three lines suddenly

mooooo mooo mo mooo moo moo.

"Mooo mo! Mooo mo!" moooo Mooooooo moooo; "mo'm mooooo."




The lines, of which, hardly an instant before, not one hand's breadth
Moo moooo, mo moooo, mooooo mo moooooo mooooo, moo moo mooo'm moooooo

mooo'm moooooo mo moo moooooo.




His motions plainly denoted his extreme exhaustion. In most land animals
Moo moooooo moooooo moooooo moo moooooo mooooooooo. Mo mooo mooo moooooo

there are certain valves or flood-gates in many of their veins, whereby
moooo moo moooooo mooooo mo moooo-moooo mo mooo mo moooo moooo, moooooo

when wounded, the blood is in some degree at least instantly shut off in
mooo moooooo, moo moooo mo mo mooo mooooo mo moooo moooooooo mooo moo mo

certain directions. Not so with the whale; one of whose peculiarities
moooooo mooooooooo. Moo mo mooo moo moooo; moo mo moooo moooooooooooo

it is to have an entire non-valvular structure of the blood-vessels, so
mo mo mo mooo mo mooooo moo-mooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo-moooooo, mo

that when pierced even by so small a point as a harpoon, a deadly
mooo mooo moooooo mooo mo mo moooo m moooo mo m moooooo, m mooooo

drain is at once begun upon his whole arterial system; and when this is
moooo mo mo mooo moooo mooo moo moooo mooooooo mooooo; moo mooo mooo mo

heightened by the extraordinary pressure of water at a great distance
mooooooooo mo moo moooooooooooo mooooooo mo moooo mo m moooo mooooooo

below the surface, his life may be said to pour from him in incessant
moooo moo moooooo, moo mooo moo mo mooo mo mooo mooo moo mo moooooooo

streams. Yet so vast is the quantity of blood in him, and so distant
moooooo. Moo mo mooo mo moo mooooooo mo moooo mo moo, moo mo moooooo

and numerous its interior fountains, that he will keep thus bleeding and
moo mooooooo moo mooooooo moooooooo, mooo mo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo moo

bleeding for a considerable period; even as in a drought a river will
mooooooo moo m mooooooooooo mooooo; mooo mo mo m moooooo m moooo mooo

flow, whose source is in the well-springs of far-off and undiscernible
mooo, moooo mooooo mo mo moo mooo-moooooo mo moo-moo moo moooooooooooo

hills. Even now, when the boats pulled upon this whale, and perilously
moooo. Mooo moo, mooo moo moooo mooooo mooo mooo moooo, moo mooooooooo

drew over his swaying flukes, and the lances were darted into him,
mooo mooo moo moooooo mooooo, moo moo mooooo mooo mooooo mooo moo,

they were followed by steady jets from the new made wound, which kept
mooo mooo mooooooo mo mooooo mooo mooo moo moo mooo moooo, moooo mooo

continually playing, while the natural spout-hole in his head was only
moooooooooo moooooo, moooo moo moooooo moooo-mooo mo moo mooo moo mooo

at intervals, however rapid, sending its affrighted moisture into the
mo moooooooo, moooooo moooo, moooooo moo mooooooooo mooooooo mooo moo

air. From this last vent no blood yet came, because no vital part of him
moo. Mooo mooo mooo mooo mo moooo moo mooo, moooooo mo moooo mooo mo moo

had thus far been struck. His life, as they significantly call it, was
moo mooo moo mooo mooooo. Moo mooo, mo mooo moooooooooooo mooo mo, moo

untouched.
moooooooo.




As the boats now more closely surrounded him, the whole upper part of
Mo moo moooo moo mooo moooooo mooooooooo moo, moo moooo moooo mooo mo

his form, with much of it that is ordinarily submerged, was plainly
moo mooo, mooo mooo mo mo mooo mo mooooooooo moooooooo, moo moooooo

revealed. His eyes, or rather the places where his eyes had been, were
mooooooo. Moo mooo, mo mooooo moo mooooo moooo moo mooo moo mooo, mooo

beheld. As strange misgrown masses gather in the knot-holes of the
mooooo. Mo moooooo mooooooo mooooo mooooo mo moo mooo-moooo mo moo

noblest oaks when prostrate, so from the points which the whale's eyes
moooooo mooo mooo moooooooo, mo mooo moo mooooo moooo moo moooo'm mooo

had once occupied, now protruded blind bulbs, horribly pitiable to see.
moo mooo mooooooo, moo moooooooo moooo moooo, mooooooo mooooooo mo moo.

But pity there was none. For all his old age, and his one arm, and his
Moo mooo moooo moo mooo. Moo moo moo moo moo, moo moo moo moo, moo moo

blind eyes, he must die the death and be murdered, in order to light the
moooo mooo, mo mooo moo moo moooo moo mo mooooooo, mo moooo mo moooo moo

gay bridals and other merry-makings of men, and also to illuminate the
moo moooooo moo moooo moooo-moooooo mo moo, moo mooo mo mooooooooo moo

solemn churches that preach unconditional inoffensiveness by all to all.
mooooo mooooooo mooo mooooo moooooooooooo moooooooooooooo mo moo mo moo.

Still rolling in his blood, at last he partially disclosed a strangely
Moooo moooooo mo moo moooo, mo mooo mo moooooooo moooooooo m moooooooo

discoloured bunch or protuberance, the size of a bushel, low down on the
moooooooooo moooo mo mooooooooooo, moo mooo mo m mooooo, moo mooo mo moo

flank.
moooo.




"A nice spot," cried Flask; "just let me prick him there once."
"M mooo mooo," moooo Moooo; "mooo moo mo moooo moo moooo mooo."




"Avast!" cried Starbuck, "there's no need of that!"
"Moooo!" moooo Mooooooo, "moooo'm mo mooo mo mooo!"




But humane Starbuck was too late. At the instant of the dart an
Moo mooooo Mooooooo moo moo mooo. Mo moo moooooo mo moo mooo mo

ulcerous jet shot from this cruel wound, and goaded by it into more than
mooooooo moo mooo mooo mooo moooo moooo, moo mooooo mo mo mooo mooo mooo

sufferable anguish, the whale now spouting thick blood, with swift fury
mooooooooo moooooo, moo moooo moo mooooooo moooo moooo, mooo moooo mooo

blindly darted at the craft, bespattering them and their glorying crews
moooooo mooooo mo moo moooo, mooooooooooo mooo moo moooo mooooooo moooo

all over with showers of gore, capsizing Flask's boat and marring the
moo mooo mooo moooooo mo mooo, moooooooo Moooo'm mooo moo moooooo moo

bows. It was his death stroke. For, by this time, so spent was he by
mooo. Mo moo moo moooo mooooo. Moo, mo mooo mooo, mo moooo moo mo mo

loss of blood, that he helplessly rolled away from the wreck he had
mooo mo moooo, mooo mo mooooooooo mooooo mooo mooo moo moooo mo moo

made; lay panting on his side, impotently flapped with his stumped fin,
mooo; moo moooooo mo moo mooo, mooooooooo moooooo mooo moo moooooo moo,

then over and over slowly revolved like a waning world; turned up
mooo mooo moo mooo mooooo mooooooo mooo m mooooo moooo; mooooo mo

the white secrets of his belly; lay like a log, and died. It was most
moo moooo moooooo mo moo moooo; moo mooo m moo, moo mooo. Mo moo mooo

piteous, that last expiring spout. As when by unseen hands the water
moooooo, mooo mooo mooooooo moooo. Mo mooo mo mooooo moooo moo moooo

is gradually drawn off from some mighty fountain, and with half-stifled
mo moooooooo moooo moo mooo mooo mooooo mooooooo, moo mooo mooo-moooooo

melancholy gurglings the spray-column lowers and lowers to the
mooooooooo moooooooo moo moooo-mooooo mooooo moo mooooo mo moo

ground--so the last long dying spout of the whale.
mooooo--mo moo mooo mooo moooo moooo mo moo moooo.




Soon, while the crews were awaiting the arrival of the ship, the body
Mooo, moooo moo moooo mooo mooooooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo

showed symptoms of sinking with all its treasures unrifled. Immediately,
mooooo mooooooo mo moooooo mooo moo moo moooooooo mooooooo. Moooooooooo,

mo Mooooooo'm mooooo, moooo mooo moooooo mo mo mo moooooooo mooooo, mo

that ere long every boat was a buoy; the sunken whale being suspended a
mooo moo mooo moooo mooo moo m mooo; moo mooooo moooo moooo moooooooo m

few inches beneath them by the cords. By very heedful management, when
moo mooooo moooooo mooo mo moo moooo. Mo mooo moooooo mooooooooo, mooo

the ship drew nigh, the whale was transferred to her side, and was
moo mooo mooo mooo, moo moooo moo moooooooooo mo moo mooo, moo moo

strongly secured there by the stiffest fluke-chains, for it was plain
mooooooo moooooo moooo mo moo mooooooo moooo-mooooo, moo mo moo moooo

that unless artificially upheld, the body would at once sink to the
mooo mooooo mooooooooooo mooooo, moo mooo moooo mo mooo mooo mo moo

bottom.
mooooo.




It so chanced that almost upon first cutting into him with the spade,
Mo mo moooooo mooo mooooo mooo moooo moooooo mooo moo mooo moo moooo,

the entire length of a corroded harpoon was found imbedded in his flesh,
moo mooooo mooooo mo m mooooooo moooooo moo moooo mooooooo mo moo moooo,

on the lower part of the bunch before described. But as the stumps of
mo moo moooo mooo mo moo moooo mooooo moooooooo. Moo mo moo mooooo mo

harpoons are frequently found in the dead bodies of captured whales,
mooooooo moo mooooooooo moooo mo moo mooo mooooo mo mooooooo mooooo,

with the flesh perfectly healed around them, and no prominence of any
mooo moo moooo moooooooo mooooo mooooo mooo, moo mo mooooooooo mo moo

kind to denote their place; therefore, there must needs have been
mooo mo mooooo moooo moooo; moooooooo, moooo mooo moooo mooo mooo

mooo moooo moooooo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooo moooo mo moooooo moo

the ulceration alluded to. But still more curious was the fact of a
moo mooooooooo moooooo mo. Moo moooo mooo moooooo moo moo mooo mo m

moooo-mooo mo moooo moooo moooo mo moo, moo moo mooo moo mooooo mooo,

the flesh perfectly firm about it. Who had darted that stone lance? And
moo moooo moooooooo mooo moooo mo. Moo moo mooooo mooo moooo moooo? Moo

when? It might have been darted by some Nor' West Indian long before
mooo? Mo moooo mooo mooo mooooo mo mooo Moo' Mooo Mooooo mooo mooooo

America was discovered.
Moooooo moo mooooooooo.




What other marvels might have been rummaged out of this monstrous
Mooo moooo moooooo moooo mooo mooo mooooooo moo mo mooo moooooooo

moooooo moooo mo mo moooooo. Moo m mooooo mooo moo moo mo moooooo

moooooooooo, mo moo mooo'm moooo moooooooooooooo moooooo mooo mooooooo

to the sea, owing to the body's immensely increasing tendency to sink.
mo moo moo, moooo mo moo mooo'm moooooooo mooooooooo mooooooo mo mooo.

However, Starbuck, who had the ordering of affairs, hung on to it to the
Moooooo, Mooooooo, moo moo moo mooooooo mo moooooo, mooo mo mo mo mo moo

last; hung on to it so resolutely, indeed, that when at length the ship

moooo mooo mooo mooooooo, mo moooo mooooooooo mo moooooo mooo mooo moo

moo moooooooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo-moooo mo moooo moo moooo-mooooo moo

mooooo mooo mooooooo, mooo mo moo mooooooooo mo mooo mooo moo. Mooooooo

everything in the Pequod was aslant. To cross to the other side of the
mooooooooo mo moo Mooooo moo mooooo. Mo moooo mo moo moooo mooo mo moo

deck was like walking up the steep gabled roof of a house. The ship
mooo moo mooo moooooo mo moo moooo mooooo mooo mo m moooo. Moo mooo

groaned and gasped. Many of the ivory inlayings of her bulwarks and
moooooo moo mooooo. Mooo mo moo moooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo moo

mooooo mooo moooooo mooo moooo mooooo, mo moo moooooooo moooooooooo.

In vain handspikes and crows were brought to bear upon the immovable
Mo mooo mooooooooo moo moooo mooo moooooo mo mooo mooo moo moooooooo

moooo-mooooo, mo moo mooo mooooo mooo moo moooooooooo; moo mo moo

moo moo moooo moo moooooo mooo moo moooooooo mooo moooo moo mo mo moo

approached, while every moment whole tons of ponderosity seemed added to
mooooooooo, moooo moooo mooooo moooo mooo mo moooooooooo mooooo moooo mo

moo moooooo mooo, moo moo mooo mooooo mo moo moooo mo moooo mooo.




"Hold on, hold on, won't ye?" cried Stubb to the body, "don't be in such

a devil of a hurry to sink! By thunder, men, we must do something or go
m moooo mo m moooo mo mooo! Mo moooooo, moo, mo mooo mo moooooooo mo mo

moo mo mo moo m mooooo mooo moo m moo-moooo, moo moo moo moo mooooo."




"Knife? Aye, aye," cried Queequeg, and seizing the carpenter's heavy
"Moooo? Moo, moo," moooo Mooooooo, moo moooooo moo moooooooo'm moooo

hatchet, he leaned out of a porthole, and steel to iron, began slashing
moooooo, mo mooooo moo mo m mooooooo, moo moooo mo mooo, moooo mooooooo

mo moo moooooo moooo-mooooo. Moo m moo moooooo, mooo mo mooooo, mooo

given, when the exceeding strain effected the rest. With a terrific
moooo, mooo moo moooooooo mooooo mooooooo moo mooo. Mooo m mooooooo

snap, every fastening went adrift; the ship righted, the carcase sank.
mooo, moooo moooooooo mooo mooooo; moo mooo moooooo, moo moooooo mooo.




Now, this occasional inevitable sinking of the recently killed Sperm
Moo, mooo mooooooooo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo Moooo

Whale is a very curious thing; nor has any fisherman yet adequately
Moooo mo m mooo moooooo moooo; moo moo moo moooooooo moo mooooooooo

accounted for it. Usually the dead Sperm Whale floats with great
moooooooo moo mo. Moooooo moo mooo Moooo Moooo mooooo mooo moooo

buoyancy, with its side or belly considerably elevated above the
mooooooo, mooo moo mooo mo moooo mooooooooooo mooooooo moooo moo

surface. If the only whales that thus sank were old, meagre, and
moooooo. Mo moo mooo mooooo mooo mooo mooo mooo moo, mooooo, moo

broken-hearted creatures, their pads of lard diminished and all their
mooooo-moooooo moooooooo, moooo mooo mo mooo mooooooooo moo moo moooo

bones heavy and rheumatic; then you might with some reason assert that
moooo moooo moo moooooooo; mooo moo moooo mooo mooo mooooo mooooo mooo

this sinking is caused by an uncommon specific gravity in the fish so
mooo moooooo mo mooooo mo mo mooooooo mooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo mo

sinking, consequent upon this absence of buoyant matter in him. But it
moooooo, mooooooooo mooo mooo moooooo mo moooooo mooooo mo moo. Moo mo

is not so. For young whales, in the highest health, and swelling with
mo moo mo. Moo moooo mooooo, mo moo moooooo mooooo, moo mooooooo mooo

noble aspirations, prematurely cut off in the warm flush and May of
moooo moooooooooo, moooooooooo moo moo mo moo mooo moooo moo Moo mo

life, with all their panting lard about them; even these brawny, buoyant
mooo, mooo moo moooo moooooo mooo moooo mooo; mooo moooo mooooo, moooooo

heroes do sometimes sink.
mooooo mo moooooooo mooo.




Be it said, however, that the Sperm Whale is far less liable to this
Mo mo mooo, moooooo, mooo moo Moooo Moooo mo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo

accident than any other species. Where one of that sort go down, twenty
mooooooo mooo moo moooo moooooo. Moooo moo mo mooo mooo mo mooo, mooooo

Right Whales do. This difference in the species is no doubt imputable in
