Moooo Mooooo mo. Mooo mooooooooo mo moo moooooo mo mo moooo moooooooo mo

no small degree to the greater quantity of bone in the Right Whale;
mo moooo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooooooo mo mooo mo moo Moooo Moooo;

his Venetian blinds alone sometimes weighing more than a ton; from this
moo Mooooooo mooooo moooo moooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo m moo; mooo mooo

incumbrance the Sperm Whale is wholly free. But there are instances
moooooooooo moo Moooo Moooo mo mooooo mooo. Moo moooo moo moooooooo

where, after the lapse of many hours or several days, the sunken whale
moooo, moooo moo moooo mo mooo moooo mo moooooo mooo, moo mooooo moooo

again rises, more buoyant than in life. But the reason of this
moooo moooo, mooo moooooo mooo mo mooo. Moo moo mooooo mo mooo

is obvious. Gases are generated in him; he swells to a prodigious
mo moooooo. Moooo moo moooooooo mo moo; mo mooooo mo m mooooooooo

magnitude; becomes a sort of animal balloon. A line-of-battle ship could
moooooooo; moooooo m mooo mo mooooo moooooo. M mooo-mo-mooooo mooo moooo

hardly keep him under then. In the Shore Whaling, on soundings, among
mooooo mooo moo moooo mooo. Mo moo Moooo Moooooo, mo moooooooo, moooo

the Bays of New Zealand, when a Right Whale gives token of sinking, they
moo Mooo mo Moo Moooooo, mooo m Moooo Moooo moooo moooo mo moooooo, mooo

fasten buoys to him, with plenty of rope; so that when the body has gone
mooooo moooo mo moo, mooo mooooo mo mooo; mo mooo mooo moo mooo moo mooo

down, they know where to look for it when it shall have ascended again.
mooo, mooo mooo moooo mo mooo moo mo mooo mo moooo mooo mooooooo moooo.




It was not long after the sinking of the body that a cry was heard from
Mo moo moo mooo moooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo mooo m moo moo moooo mooo

the Pequod's mast-heads, announcing that the Jungfrau was again lowering
moo Mooooo'm mooo-moooo, mooooooooo mooo moo Mooooooo moo moooo mooooooo

her boats; though the only spout in sight was that of a Fin-Back,
moo moooo; mooooo moo mooo moooo mo moooo moo mooo mo m Moo-Mooo,

belonging to the species of uncapturable whales, because of its
moooooooo mo moo moooooo mo mooooooooooo mooooo, moooooo mo moo

incredible power of swimming. Nevertheless, the Fin-Back's spout is so
mooooooooo moooo mo mooooooo. Mooooooooooo, moo Moo-Mooo'm moooo mo mo

similar to the Sperm Whale's, that by unskilful fishermen it is often
moooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo'm, mooo mo moooooooo moooooooo mo mo moooo

mistaken for it. And consequently Derick and all his host were now in
mooooooo moo mo. Moo mooooooooooo Mooooo moo moo moo mooo mooo moo mo

valiant chase of this unnearable brute. The Virgin crowding all sail,
moooooo moooo mo mooo mooooooooo moooo. Moo Mooooo mooooooo moo mooo,

made after her four young keels, and thus they all disappeared far to
mooo moooo moo mooo moooo moooo, moo mooo mooo moo moooooooooo moo mo

leeward, still in bold, hopeful chase.
moooooo, moooo mo mooo, moooooo moooo.




Oh! many are the Fin-Backs, and many are the Dericks, my friend.
Mo! mooo moo moo Moo-Moooo, moo mooo moo moo Moooooo, mo mooooo.










CHAPTER 82. The Honour and Glory of Whaling.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooooo moo Moooo mo Moooooo.







There are some enterprises in which a careful disorderliness is the true
Moooo moo mooo moooooooooo mo moooo m moooooo mooooooooooooo mo moo mooo

method.
mooooo.




The more I dive into this matter of whaling, and push my researches up
Moo mooo M mooo mooo mooo mooooo mo moooooo, moo mooo mo mooooooooo mo

to the very spring-head of it so much the more am I impressed with its
mo moo mooo mooooo-mooo mo mo mo mooo moo mooo mo M moooooooo mooo moo

great honourableness and antiquity; and especially when I find so many
moooo mooooooooooooo moo moooooooo; moo mooooooooo mooo M mooo mo mooo

great demi-gods and heroes, prophets of all sorts, who one way or other
moooo mooo-mooo moo mooooo, mooooooo mo moo moooo, moo moo moo mo moooo

have shed distinction upon it, I am transported with the reflection
mooo mooo moooooooooo mooo mo, M mo moooooooooo mooo moo mooooooooo

that I myself belong, though but subordinately, to so emblazoned a
mooo M mooooo mooooo, mooooo moo moooooooooooo, mo mo mooooooooo m

fraternity.
mooooooooo.




The gallant Perseus, a son of Jupiter, was the first whaleman; and
Moo moooooo Moooooo, m moo mo Moooooo, moo moo moooo mooooooo; moo

to the eternal honour of our calling be it said, that the first whale
mo moo moooooo mooooo mo moo moooooo mo mo mooo, mooo moo moooo moooo

attacked by our brotherhood was not killed with any sordid intent. Those
mooooooo mo moo moooooooooo moo moo mooooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo. Moooo

were the knightly days of our profession, when we only bore arms to
mooo moo mooooooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo, mooo mo mooo mooo mooo mo

succor the distressed, and not to fill men's lamp-feeders. Every one
mooooo moo mooooooooo, moo moo mo mooo moo'm mooo-moooooo. Moooo moo

knows the fine story of Perseus and Andromeda; how the lovely Andromeda,
moooo moo mooo moooo mo Moooooo moo Moooooooo; moo moo mooooo Moooooooo,

the daughter of a king, was tied to a rock on the sea-coast, and as
moo mooooooo mo m mooo, moo mooo mo m mooo mo moo moo-moooo, moo mo

Leviathan was in the very act of carrying her off, Perseus, the prince
Moooooooo moo mo moo mooo moo mo mooooooo moo moo, Moooooo, moo mooooo

of whalemen, intrepidly advancing, harpooned the monster, and delivered
mo mooooooo, mooooooooo moooooooo, moooooooo moo moooooo, moo moooooooo

and married the maid. It was an admirable artistic exploit, rarely
moo moooooo moo mooo. Mo moo mo moooooooo mooooooo moooooo, mooooo

achieved by the best harpooneers of the present day; inasmuch as this
mooooooo mo moo mooo moooooooooo mo moo moooooo moo; mooooooo mo mooo

Leviathan was slain at the very first dart. And let no man doubt this
Moooooooo moo moooo mo moo mooo moooo mooo. Moo moo mo moo moooo mooo

Arkite story; for in the ancient Joppa, now Jaffa, on the Syrian coast,
Mooooo moooo; moo mo moo moooooo Moooo, moo Moooo, mo moo Mooooo moooo,

in one of the Pagan temples, there stood for many ages the vast skeleton
mo moo mo moo Moooo moooooo, moooo moooo moo mooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo

of a whale, which the city's legends and all the inhabitants asserted to
mo m moooo, moooo moo mooo'm moooooo moo moo moo moooooooooo mooooooo mo

be the identical bones of the monster that Perseus slew. When the Romans
mo moo moooooooo moooo mo moo moooooo mooo Moooooo mooo. Mooo moo Mooooo

took Joppa, the same skeleton was carried to Italy in triumph. What
mooo Moooo, moo mooo mooooooo moo moooooo mo Moooo mo moooooo. Mooo

seems most singular and suggestively important in this story, is this:
moooo mooo mooooooo moo mooooooooooo moooooooo mo mooo moooo, mo mooo:

it was from Joppa that Jonah set sail.
mo moo mooo Moooo mooo Moooo moo mooo.




Akin to the adventure of Perseus and Andromeda--indeed, by some supposed
Mooo mo moo moooooooo mo Moooooo moo Moooooooo--mooooo, mo mooo mooooooo

to be indirectly derived from it--is that famous story of St. George and
mo mo mooooooooo moooooo mooo mo--mo mooo mooooo moooo mo Mo. Mooooo moo

the Dragon; which dragon I maintain to have been a whale; for in many
moo Mooooo; moooo mooooo M mooooooo mo mooo mooo m moooo; moo mo mooo

old chronicles whales and dragons are strangely jumbled together, and
moo mooooooooo mooooo moo moooooo moo moooooooo moooooo mooooooo, moo

often stand for each other. "Thou art as a lion of the waters, and as a
moooo moooo moo mooo moooo. "Mooo moo mo m mooo mo moo mooooo, moo mo m

dragon of the sea," saith Ezekiel; hereby, plainly meaning a whale;
mooooo mo moo moo," moooo Moooooo; mooooo, moooooo moooooo m moooo;

in truth, some versions of the Bible use that word itself. Besides, it
mo moooo, mooo mooooooo mo moo Moooo moo mooo mooo mooooo. Moooooo, mo

would much subtract from the glory of the exploit had St. George but
moooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo mo moo moooooo moo Mo. Mooooo moo

encountered a crawling reptile of the land, instead of doing battle
moooooooooo m mooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo, moooooo mo moooo mooooo

with the great monster of the deep. Any man may kill a snake, but only a
mooo moo moooo moooooo mo moo mooo. Moo moo moo mooo m moooo, moo mooo m

Perseus, a St. George, a Coffin, have the heart in them to march boldly
Moooooo, m Mo. Mooooo, m Mooooo, mooo moo moooo mo mooo mo moooo mooooo

up to a whale.
mo mo m moooo.




Let not the modern paintings of this scene mislead us; for though
Moo moo moo mooooo moooooooo mo mooo moooo moooooo mo; moo mooooo

the creature encountered by that valiant whaleman of old is vaguely
moo mooooooo moooooooooo mo mooo moooooo mooooooo mo moo mo moooooo

represented of a griffin-like shape, and though the battle is depicted
moooooooooo mo m moooooo-mooo moooo, moo mooooo moo mooooo mo mooooooo

on land and the saint on horseback, yet considering the great ignorance
mo mooo moo moo moooo mo moooooooo, moo moooooooooo moo moooo moooooooo

of those times, when the true form of the whale was unknown to artists;
mo moooo moooo, mooo moo mooo mooo mo moo moooo moo moooooo mo moooooo;

and considering that as in Perseus' case, St. George's whale might have
moo moooooooooo mooo mo mo Moooooo' mooo, Mo. Mooooo'm moooo moooo mooo

crawled up out of the sea on the beach; and considering that the animal
moooooo mo moo mo moo moo mo moo moooo; moo moooooooooo mooo moo mooooo

ridden by St. George might have been only a large seal, or sea-horse;
mooooo mo Mo. Mooooo moooo mooo mooo mooo m moooo mooo, mo moo-moooo;

bearing all this in mind, it will not appear altogether incompatible
moooooo moo mooo mo mooo, mo mooo moo mooooo mooooooooo mooooooooooo

with the sacred legend and the ancientest draughts of the scene, to
mooo moo mooooo mooooo moo moo mooooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo, mo

hold this so-called dragon no other than the great Leviathan himself. In
mooo mooo mo-mooooo mooooo mo moooo mooo moo moooo Moooooooo moooooo. Mo

fact, placed before the strict and piercing truth, this whole story will
mooo, mooooo mooooo moo mooooo moo mooooooo moooo, mooo moooo moooo mooo

fare like that fish, flesh, and fowl idol of the Philistines, Dagon by
mooo mooo mooo mooo, moooo, moo mooo mooo mo moo Moooooooooo, Moooo mo

name; who being planted before the ark of Israel, his horse's head and
mooo; moo moooo moooooo mooooo moo moo mo Mooooo, moo moooo'm mooo moo

both the palms of his hands fell off from him, and only the stump or
mooo moo moooo mo moo moooo mooo moo mooo moo, moo mooo moo moooo mo

fishy part of him remained. Thus, then, one of our own noble stamp, even
moooo mooo mo moo mooooooo. Mooo, mooo, moo mo moo moo moooo moooo, mooo

a whaleman, is the tutelary guardian of England; and by good rights, we
m mooooooo, mo moo mooooooo mooooooo mo Moooooo; moo mo mooo mooooo, mo

harpooneers of Nantucket should be enrolled in the most noble order
moooooooooo mo Moooooooo mooooo mo mooooooo mo moo mooo moooo moooo

of St. George. And therefore, let not the knights of that honourable
mo Mo. Mooooo. Moo moooooooo, moo moo moo moooooo mo mooo mooooooooo

company (none of whom, I venture to say, have ever had to do with a
moooooo (mooo mo mooo, M moooooo mo moo, mooo mooo moo mo mo mooo m

whale like their great patron), let them never eye a Nantucketer with
moooo mooo moooo moooo mooooo), moo mooo moooo moo m Moooooooooo mooo

disdain, since even in our woollen frocks and tarred trowsers we are
moooooo, moooo mooo mo moo moooooo mooooo moo mooooo mooooooo mo moo

much better entitled to St. George's decoration than they.
mooo mooooo mooooooo mo Mo. Mooooo'm mooooooooo mooo mooo.




Whether to admit Hercules among us or not, concerning this I long
Moooooo mo moooo Mooooooo moooo mo mo moo, mooooooooo mooo M mooo

remained dubious: for though according to the Greek mythologies, that
mooooooo moooooo: moo mooooo moooooooo mo moo Moooo moooooooooo, mooo

antique Crockett and Kit Carson--that brawny doer of rejoicing good
moooooo Mooooooo moo Moo Mooooo--mooo mooooo mooo mo moooooooo mooo

deeds, was swallowed down and thrown up by a whale; still, whether
moooo, moo moooooooo mooo moo mooooo mo mo m moooo; moooo, moooooo

that strictly makes a whaleman of him, that might be mooted. It nowhere
mooo mooooooo moooo m mooooooo mo moo, mooo moooo mo mooooo. Mo moooooo

appears that he ever actually harpooned his fish, unless, indeed,
moooooo mooo mo mooo mooooooo moooooooo moo mooo, mooooo, mooooo,

from the inside. Nevertheless, he may be deemed a sort of involuntary
mooo moo mooooo. Mooooooooooo, mo moo mo mooooo m mooo mo moooooooooo

whaleman; at any rate the whale caught him, if he did not the whale. I
mooooooo; mo moo mooo moo moooo mooooo moo, mo mo moo moo moo moooo. M

claim him for one of our clan.
moooo moo moo moo mo moo mooo.




But, by the best contradictory authorities, this Grecian story of
Moo, mo moo mooo moooooooooooo moooooooooo, mooo Moooooo moooo mo

Hercules and the whale is considered to be derived from the still more
Mooooooo moo moo moooo mo mooooooooo mo mo moooooo mooo moo moooo mooo

ancient Hebrew story of Jonah and the whale; and vice versa; certainly
moooooo Mooooo moooo mo Moooo moo moo moooo; moo mooo moooo; moooooooo

they are very similar. If I claim the demigod then, why not the prophet?
mooo moo mooo moooooo. Mo M moooo moo moooooo mooo, moo moo moo moooooo?




Nor do heroes, saints, demigods, and prophets alone comprise the whole
Moo mo mooooo, mooooo, mooooooo, moo mooooooo moooo mooooooo moo moooo

roll of our order. Our grand master is still to be named; for like royal
mooo mo moo moooo. Moo moooo mooooo mo moooo mo mo moooo; moo mooo moooo

kings of old times, we find the head waters of our fraternity in nothing
moooo mo moo moooo, mo mooo moo mooo mooooo mo moo mooooooooo mo moooooo

short of the great gods themselves. That wondrous oriental story is now
moooo mo moo moooo mooo mooooooooo. Mooo mooooooo mooooooo moooo mo moo

to be rehearsed from the Shaster, which gives us the dread Vishnoo, one
mo mo moooooooo mooo moo Moooooo, moooo moooo mo moo moooo Moooooo, moo

of the three persons in the godhead of the Hindoos; gives us this divine
mo moo moooo moooooo mo moo moooooo mo moo Moooooo; moooo mo mooo mooooo

Vishnoo himself for our Lord;--Vishnoo, who, by the first of his ten
Moooooo moooooo moo moo Mooo;--Moooooo, moo, mo moo moooo mo moo moo

earthly incarnations, has for ever set apart and sanctified the whale.
moooooo mooooooooooo, moo moo mooo moo moooo moo mooooooooo moo moooo.

When Brahma, or the God of Gods, saith the Shaster, resolved to recreate
Mooo Mooooo, mo moo Moo mo Mooo, moooo moo Moooooo, mooooooo mo mooooooo

the world after one of its periodical dissolutions, he gave birth to
moo moooo moooo moo mo moo mooooooooo mooooooooooo, mo mooo moooo mo

Vishnoo, to preside over the work; but the Vedas, or mystical books,
Moooooo, mo moooooo mooo moo mooo; moo moo Moooo, mo mooooooo moooo,

whose perusal would seem to have been indispensable to Vishnoo before
moooo moooooo moooo mooo mo mooo mooo moooooooooooo mo Moooooo mooooo

beginning the creation, and which therefore must have contained
moooooooo moo mooooooo, moo moooo moooooooo mooo mooo moooooooo

something in the shape of practical hints to young architects, these
moooooooo mo moo moooo mo moooooooo moooo mo moooo mooooooooo, moooo

Vedas were lying at the bottom of the waters; so Vishnoo became
Moooo mooo moooo mo moo mooooo mo moo mooooo; mo Moooooo mooooo

incarnate in a whale, and sounding down in him to the uttermost depths,
moooooooo mo m moooo, moo mooooooo mooo mo moo mo moo moooooooo mooooo,

rescued the sacred volumes. Was not this Vishnoo a whaleman, then? even
moooooo moo mooooo moooooo. Moo moo mooo Moooooo m mooooooo, mooo? mooo

as a man who rides a horse is called a horseman?
mo m moo moo moooo m moooo mo mooooo m mooooooo?




Perseus, St. George, Hercules, Jonah, and Vishnoo! there's a member-roll
Moooooo, Mo. Mooooo, Mooooooo, Moooo, moo Moooooo! moooo'm m mooooo-mooo

for you! What club but the whaleman's can head off like that?
moo moo! Mooo mooo moo moo mooooooo'm moo mooo moo mooo mooo?










CHAPTER 83. Jonah Historically Regarded.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooo Mooooooooooo Mooooooo.







Reference was made to the historical story of Jonah and the whale in the
Moooooooo moo mooo mo moo mooooooooo moooo mo Moooo moo moo moooo mo moo

preceding chapter. Now some Nantucketers rather distrust this historical
moooooooo moooooo. Moo mooo Mooooooooooo mooooo mooooooo mooo mooooooooo

story of Jonah and the whale. But then there were some sceptical Greeks
moooo mo Moooo moo moo moooo. Moo mooo moooo mooo mooo moooooooo Mooooo

and Romans, who, standing out from the orthodox pagans of their times,
moo Mooooo, moo, mooooooo moo mooo moo mooooooo mooooo mo moooo moooo,

equally doubted the story of Hercules and the whale, and Arion and the
moooooo moooooo moo moooo mo Mooooooo moo moo moooo, moo Moooo moo moo

dolphin; and yet their doubting those traditions did not make those
moooooo; moo moo moooo mooooooo moooo mooooooooo moo moo mooo moooo

traditions one whit the less facts, for all that.
mooooooooo moo mooo moo mooo moooo, moo moo mooo.




One old Sag-Harbor whaleman's chief reason for questioning the Hebrew
Moo moo Moo-Mooooo mooooooo'm moooo mooooo moo moooooooooo moo Mooooo

story was this:--He had one of those quaint old-fashioned Bibles,
moooo moo mooo:--Mo moo moo mo moooo mooooo moo-moooooooo Mooooo,

embellished with curious, unscientific plates; one of which represented
moooooooooo mooo moooooo, mooooooooooo mooooo; moo mo moooo moooooooooo

Jonah's whale with two spouts in his head--a peculiarity only true
Moooo'm moooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo--m moooooooooo mooo mooo

with respect to a species of the Leviathan (the Right Whale, and the
mooo moooooo mo m moooooo mo moo Moooooooo (moo Moooo Moooo, moo moo

varieties of that order), concerning which the fishermen have this
moooooooo mo mooo moooo), mooooooooo moooo moo moooooooo mooo mooo

saying, "A penny roll would choke him"; his swallow is so very small.
mooooo, "M moooo mooo moooo moooo moo"; moo moooooo mo mo mooo moooo.

But, to this, Bishop Jebb's anticipative answer is ready. It is not
Moo, mo mooo, Mooooo Mooo'm mooooooooooo mooooo mo moooo. Mo mo moo

necessary, hints the Bishop, that we consider Jonah as tombed in the
moooooooo, moooo moo Mooooo, mooo mo mooooooo Moooo mo mooooo mo moo

whale's belly, but as temporarily lodged in some part of his mouth. And
moooo'm moooo, moo mo moooooooooo mooooo mo mooo mooo mo moo moooo. Moo

this seems reasonable enough in the good Bishop. For truly, the
mooo moooo mooooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo Mooooo. Moo moooo, moo

Right Whale's mouth would accommodate a couple of whist-tables, and
Moooo Moooo'm moooo moooo moooooooooo m mooooo mo moooo-mooooo, moo

comfortably seat all the players. Possibly, too, Jonah might have
moooooooooo mooo moo moo moooooo. Mooooooo, moo, Moooo moooo mooo

ensconced himself in a hollow tooth; but, on second thoughts, the Right
moooooooo moooooo mo m mooooo moooo; moo, mo mooooo mooooooo, moo Moooo

Whale is toothless.
Moooo mo moooooooo.




Another reason which Sag-Harbor (he went by that name) urged for his
Moooooo mooooo moooo Moo-Mooooo (mo mooo mo mooo mooo) moooo moo moo

want of faith in this matter of the prophet, was something obscurely in
mooo mo moooo mo mooo mooooo mo moo moooooo, moo moooooooo moooooooo mo

reference to his incarcerated body and the whale's gastric juices. But
moooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo mooo moo moo moooo'm moooooo mooooo. Moo

this objection likewise falls to the ground, because a German exegetist
mooo moooooooo mooooooo moooo mo moo mooooo, moooooo m Mooooo moooooooo

supposes that Jonah must have taken refuge in the floating body of a
mooooooo mooo Moooo mooo mooo moooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mo m

DEAD whale--even as the French soldiers in the Russian campaign turned
MOOO moooo--mooo mo moo Mooooo mooooooo mo moo Moooooo mooooooo mooooo

their dead horses into tents, and crawled into them. Besides, it has
moooo mooo mooooo mooo moooo, moo moooooo mooo mooo. Moooooo, mo moo

been divined by other continental commentators, that when Jonah was
mooo moooooo mo moooo moooooooooo mooooooooooo, mooo mooo Moooo moo

thrown overboard from the Joppa ship, he straightway effected his escape
mooooo moooooooo mooo moo Moooo mooo, mo moooooooooo mooooooo moo mooooo

to another vessel near by, some vessel with a whale for a figure-head;
mo moooooo mooooo mooo mo, mooo mooooo mooo m moooo moo m mooooo-mooo;

and, I would add, possibly called "The Whale," as some craft are
moo, M moooo moo, mooooooo mooooo "Moo Moooo," mo mooo moooo moo

nowadays christened the "Shark," the "Gull," the "Eagle." Nor have there
mooooooo mooooooooo moo "Moooo," moo "Mooo," moo "Moooo." Moo mooo moooo

been wanting learned exegetists who have opined that the whale mentioned
mooo moooooo moooooo mooooooooo moo mooo mooooo mooo moo moooo moooooooo

in the book of Jonah merely meant a life-preserver--an inflated bag
mo moo mooo mo Moooo mooooo moooo m mooo-moooooooo--mo mooooooo moo

of wind--which the endangered prophet swam to, and so was saved from a
mo mooo--moooo moo mooooooooo moooooo mooo mo, moo mo moo moooo mooo m

watery doom. Poor Sag-Harbor, therefore, seems worsted all round. But
mooooo mooo. Mooo Moo-Mooooo, moooooooo, moooo moooooo moo moooo. Moo

he had still another reason for his want of faith. It was this, if I
mo moo moooo moooooo mooooo moo moo mooo mo moooo. Mo moo mooo, mo M

remember right: Jonah was swallowed by the whale in the Mediterranean
mooooooo moooo: Moooo moo moooooooo mo moo moooo mo moo Moooooooooooo

Sea, and after three days he was vomited up somewhere within three days'
Moo, moo moooo moooo mooo mo moo moooooo mo moooooooo mooooo moooo mooo'

journey of Nineveh, a city on the Tigris, very much more than three
moooooo mo Moooooo, m mooo mo moo Mooooo, mooo mooo mooo mooo moooo

days' journey across from the nearest point of the Mediterranean coast.
mooo' moooooo mooooo mooo moo moooooo moooo mo moo Moooooooooooo moooo.

How is that?
Moo mo mooo?




But was there no other way for the whale to land the prophet within that
Moo moo moooo mo moooo moo moo moo moooo mo mooo moo moooooo mooooo mooo

short distance of Nineveh? Yes. He might have carried him round by the
moooo mooooooo mo Moooooo? Moo. Mo moooo mooo moooooo moo moooo mo moo

way of the Cape of Good Hope. But not to speak of the passage through
moo mo moo Mooo mo Mooo Mooo. Moo moo mo moooo mo moo moooooo moooooo

the whole length of the Mediterranean, and another passage up the
moo moooo mooooo mo moo Moooooooooooo, moo moooooo moooooo mo moo

Persian Gulf and Red Sea, such a supposition would involve the complete
Moooooo Mooo moo Moo Moo, mooo m moooooooooo moooo moooooo moo mooooooo

circumnavigation of all Africa in three days, not to speak of the Tigris
mooooooooooooooo mo moo Mooooo mo moooo mooo, moo mo moooo mo moo Mooooo

waters, near the site of Nineveh, being too shallow for any whale to
mooooo, mooo moo mooo mo Moooooo, moooo moo moooooo moo moo moooo mo

swim in. Besides, this idea of Jonah's weathering the Cape of Good Hope
mooo mo. Moooooo, mooo mooo mo Moooo'm mooooooooo moo Mooo mo Mooo Mooo

at so early a day would wrest the honour of the discovery of that great
mo mo moooo m moo moooo moooo moo mooooo mo moo moooooooo mo mooo moooo

headland from Bartholomew Diaz, its reputed discoverer, and so make
mooooooo mooo Moooooooooo Mooo, moo moooooo mooooooooo, moo mo mooo

modern history a liar.
mooooo moooooo m mooo.




But all these foolish arguments of old Sag-Harbor only evinced his
Moo moo moooo moooooo moooooooo mo moo Moo-Mooooo mooo moooooo moo

foolish pride of reason--a thing still more reprehensible in him, seeing
moooooo moooo mo mooooo--m moooo moooo mooo moooooooooooo mo moo, mooooo

that he had but little learning except what he had picked up from the
mooo mo moo moo mooooo mooooooo mooooo mooo mo moo mooooo mo mooo moo

sun and the sea. I say it only shows his foolish, impious pride, and
moo moo moo moo. M moo mo mooo moooo moo moooooo, moooooo moooo, moo

abominable, devilish rebellion against the reverend clergy. For by a
mooooooooo, mooooooo moooooooo moooooo moo mooooooo mooooo. Moo mo m

Portuguese Catholic priest, this very idea of Jonah's going to Nineveh
Mooooooooo Mooooooo mooooo, mooo mooo mooo mo Moooo'm moooo mo Moooooo

via the Cape of Good Hope was advanced as a signal magnification of
moo moo Mooo mo Mooo Mooo moo mooooooo mo m mooooo moooooooooooo mo

the general miracle. And so it was. Besides, to this day, the highly
moo moooooo moooooo. Moo mo mo moo. Moooooo, mo mooo moo, moo mooooo

enlightened Turks devoutly believe in the historical story of Jonah. And
moooooooooo Moooo mooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooooooo moooo mo Moooo. Moo

some three centuries ago, an English traveller in old Harris's Voyages,
mooo moooo moooooooo moo, mo Moooooo moooooooo mo moo Mooooo'm Moooooo,

speaks of a Turkish Mosque built in honour of Jonah, in which Mosque was
mooooo mo m Moooooo Mooooo moooo mo mooooo mo Moooo, mo moooo Mooooo moo

a miraculous lamp that burnt without any oil.
m mooooooooo mooo mooo moooo moooooo moo moo.










CHAPTER 84. Pitchpoling.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooooooooo.







To make them run easily and swiftly, the axles of carriages are
Mo mooo mooo moo mooooo moo moooooo, moo moooo mo moooooooo moo

anointed; and for much the same purpose, some whalers perform an
mooooooo; moo moo mooo moo mooo moooooo, mooo moooooo moooooo mo

analogous operation upon their boat; they grease the bottom. Nor is it
moooooooo moooooooo mooo moooo mooo; mooo mooooo moo mooooo. Moo mo mo

to be doubted that as such a procedure can do no harm, it may possibly
mo mo moooooo mooo mo mooo m moooooooo moo mo mo mooo, mo moo mooooooo

be of no contemptible advantage; considering that oil and water are
mo mo mo mooooooooooo moooooooo; moooooooooo mooo moo moo moooo moo

hostile; that oil is a sliding thing, and that the object in view is to
moooooo; mooo moo mo m moooooo moooo, moo mooo moo mooooo mo mooo mo mo

make the boat slide bravely. Queequeg believed strongly in anointing
mooo moo mooo moooo moooooo. Mooooooo mooooooo mooooooo mo moooooooo

his boat, and one morning not long after the German ship Jungfrau
moo mooo, moo moo moooooo moo mooo moooo moo Mooooo mooo Mooooooo

disappeared, took more than customary pains in that occupation; crawling
moooooooooo, mooo mooo mooo moooooooo moooo mo mooo mooooooooo; mooooooo

under its bottom, where it hung over the side, and rubbing in the
moooo moo mooooo, moooo mo mooo mooo moo mooo, moo moooooo mo moo

unctuousness as though diligently seeking to insure a crop of hair from
mooooooooooo mo mooooo mooooooooo moooooo mo mooooo m mooo mo mooo mooo

the craft's bald keel. He seemed to be working in obedience to some
moo moooo'm mooo mooo. Mo mooooo mo mo moooooo mo moooooooo mo mooo

particular presentiment. Nor did it remain unwarranted by the event.
mooooooooo mooooooooooo. Moo moo mo mooooo moooooooooo mo moo moooo.




Towards noon whales were raised; but so soon as the ship sailed down to
Moooooo mooo mooooo mooo mooooo; moo mo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo mooo mo

them, they turned and fled with swift precipitancy; a disordered flight,
mooo, mooo mooooo moo mooo mooo moooo mooooooooooo; m mooooooooo mooooo,

as of Cleopatra's barges from Actium.
mo mo Moooooooo'm mooooo mooo Mooooo.




Nevertheless, the boats pursued, and Stubb's was foremost. By great
Mooooooooooo, moo moooo moooooo, moo Moooo'm moo mooooooo. Mo moooo

exertion, Tashtego at last succeeded in planting one iron; but the
mooooooo, Mooooooo mo mooo moooooooo mo mooooooo moo mooo; moo moo

stricken whale, without at all sounding, still continued his horizontal
mooooooo moooo, moooooo mo moo mooooooo, moooo moooooooo moo mooooooooo

flight, with added fleetness. Such unintermitted strainings upon the
mooooo, mooo moooo moooooooo. Mooo moooooooooooo mooooooooo mooo moo

planted iron must sooner or later inevitably extract it. It became
moooooo mooo mooo mooooo mo moooo mooooooooo moooooo mo. Mo mooooo

imperative to lance the flying whale, or be content to lose him. But
mooooooooo mo moooo moo mooooo moooo, mo mo moooooo mo mooo moo. Moo

to haul the boat up to his flank was impossible, he swam so fast and
mo mooo moo mooo mo mo moo moooo moo mooooooooo, mo mooo mo mooo moo

furious. What then remained?
moooooo. Mooo mooo mooooooo?




Of all the wondrous devices and dexterities, the sleights of hand and
Mo moo moo mooooooo moooooo moo moooooooooo, moo mooooooo mo mooo moo

countless subtleties, to which the veteran whaleman is so often forced,
moooooooo mooooooooo, mo moooo moo moooooo mooooooo mo mo moooo mooooo,

none exceed that fine manoeuvre with the lance called pitchpoling. Small
mooo mooooo mooo mooo moooooooo mooo moo moooo mooooo moooooooooo. Moooo

sword, or broad sword, in all its exercises boasts nothing like it. It
moooo, mo moooo moooo, mo moo moo moooooooo mooooo moooooo mooo mo. Mo

is only indispensable with an inveterate running whale; its grand
mo mooo moooooooooooo mooo mo mooooooooo moooooo moooo; moo moooo

fact and feature is the wonderful distance to which the long lance is
mooo moo moooooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooo mo moooo moo mooo moooo mo

accurately darted from a violently rocking, jerking boat, under extreme
mooooooooo mooooo mooo m moooooooo moooooo, moooooo mooo, moooo moooooo

headway. Steel and wood included, the entire spear is some ten or twelve
moooooo. Moooo moo mooo mooooooo, moo mooooo moooo mo mooo moo mo mooooo

feet in length; the staff is much slighter than that of the harpoon,
mooo mo mooooo; moo moooo mo mooo mooooooo mooo mooo mo moo moooooo,

and also of a lighter material--pine. It is furnished with a small rope
moo mooo mo m moooooo mooooooo--mooo. Mo mo moooooooo mooo m moooo mooo

called a warp, of considerable length, by which it can be hauled back to
mooooo m mooo, mo mooooooooooo mooooo, mo moooo mo moo mo mooooo mooo mo

the hand after darting.
moo mooo moooo moooooo.




But before going further, it is important to mention here, that though
Moo mooooo moooo moooooo, mo mo moooooooo mo moooooo mooo, mooo mooooo

the harpoon may be pitchpoled in the same way with the lance, yet it
moo moooooo moo mo mooooooooo mo moo mooo moo mooo moo moooo, moo mo

is seldom done; and when done, is still less frequently successful,
mo mooooo mooo; moo mooo mooo, mo moooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooooo,

on account of the greater weight and inferior length of the harpoon as
mo moooooo mo moo moooooo mooooo moo mooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooo mo

compared with the lance, which in effect become serious drawbacks. As a
mooooooo mooo moo moooo, moooo mo mooooo mooooo moooooo moooooooo. Mo m

general thing, therefore, you must first get fast to a whale, before any
moooooo moooo, moooooooo, moo mooo moooo moo mooo mo m moooo, mooooo moo

pitchpoling comes into play.
moooooooooo moooo mooo mooo.




Look now at Stubb; a man who from his humorous, deliberate coolness and
Mooo moo mo Moooo; m moo moo mooo moo mooooooo, mooooooooo mooooooo moo

equanimity in the direst emergencies, was specially qualified to excel
mooooooooo mo moo mooooo moooooooooo, moo moooooooo moooooooo mo moooo

in pitchpoling. Look at him; he stands upright in the tossed bow of the
mo moooooooooo. Mooo mo moo; mo mooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo moo mo moo

flying boat; wrapt in fleecy foam, the towing whale is forty feet ahead.
mooooo mooo; moooo mo mooooo mooo, moo mooooo moooo mo moooo mooo moooo.

Handling the long lance lightly, glancing twice or thrice along its
Mooooooo moo mooo moooo moooooo, mooooooo moooo mo mooooo moooo moo

length to see if it be exactly straight, Stubb whistlingly gathers up
mooooo mo moo mo mo mo moooooo mooooooo, Moooo moooooooooo moooooo mo

the coil of the warp in one hand, so as to secure its free end in his
moo mooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooo, mo mo mo mooooo moo mooo moo mo moo

grasp, leaving the rest unobstructed. Then holding the lance full before
moooo, moooooo moo mooo mooooooooooo. Mooo moooooo moo moooo mooo mooooo

his waistband's middle, he levels it at the whale; when, covering
moo moooooooo'm mooooo, mo mooooo mo mo moo moooo; mooo, mooooooo

him with it, he steadily depresses the butt-end in his hand, thereby
moo mooo mo, mo mooooooo moooooooo moo mooo-moo mo moo mooo, moooooo

elevating the point till the weapon stands fairly balanced upon his
moooooooo moo moooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo mooooo mooooooo mooo moo

palm, fifteen feet in the air. He minds you somewhat of a juggler,
mooo, moooooo mooo mo moo moo. Mo moooo moo mooooooo mo m moooooo,

balancing a long staff on his chin. Next moment with a rapid, nameless
moooooooo m mooo moooo mo moo mooo. Mooo mooooo mooo m moooo, mooooooo

impulse, in a superb lofty arch the bright steel spans the foaming
moooooo, mo m mooooo moooo mooo moo mooooo moooo moooo moo moooooo

distance, and quivers in the life spot of the whale. Instead of
mooooooo, moo moooooo mo moo mooo mooo mo moo moooo. Moooooo mo

sparkling water, he now spouts red blood.
moooooooo moooo, mo moo mooooo moo moooo.




"That drove the spigot out of him!" cried Stubb. "'Tis July's immortal
"Mooo moooo moo mooooo moo mo moo!" moooo Moooo. "'Moo Mooo'm mooooooo

Fourth; all fountains must run wine today! Would now, it were old
Mooooo; moo moooooooo mooo moo mooo moooo! Moooo moo, mo mooo moo

Orleans whiskey, or old Ohio, or unspeakable old Monongahela! Then,
Moooooo moooooo, mo moo Mooo, mo moooooooooo moo Moooooooooo! Mooo,

Tashtego, lad, I'd have ye hold a canakin to the jet, and we'd drink
Mooooooo, moo, M'm mooo mo mooo m moooooo mo moo moo, moo mo'm moooo

round it! Yea, verily, hearts alive, we'd brew choice punch in the
moooo mo! Moo, mooooo, mooooo moooo, mo'm mooo mooooo moooo mo moo

spread of his spout-hole there, and from that live punch-bowl quaff the
mooooo mo moo moooo-mooo moooo, moo mooo mooo mooo moooo-mooo moooo moo

living stuff."
mooooo moooo."




Again and again to such gamesome talk, the dexterous dart is repeated,
Moooo moo moooo mo mooo mooooooo mooo, moo moooooooo mooo mo mooooooo,

the spear returning to its master like a greyhound held in skilful
moo moooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo mooo m moooooooo mooo mo moooooo

leash. The agonized whale goes into his flurry; the tow-line is
moooo. Moo mooooooo moooo mooo mooo moo mooooo; moo moo-mooo mo

slackened, and the pitchpoler dropping astern, folds his hands, and
moooooooo, moo moo mooooooooo mooooooo mooooo, moooo moo moooo, moo

mutely watches the monster die.
mooooo moooooo moo moooooo moo.










CHAPTER 85. The Fountain.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooooooo.







That for six thousand years--and no one knows how many millions of ages
Mooo moo moo mooooooo moooo--moo mo moo moooo moo mooo mooooooo mo mooo

before--the great whales should have been spouting all over the sea,
mooooo--moo moooo mooooo mooooo mooo mooo mooooooo moo mooo moo moo,

and sprinkling and mistifying the gardens of the deep, as with so
moo mooooooooo moo mooooooooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo, mo mooo mo

many sprinkling or mistifying pots; and that for some centuries back,
mooo mooooooooo mo mooooooooo mooo; moo mooo moo mooo moooooooo mooo,

thousands of hunters should have been close by the fountain of the
moooooooo mo moooooo mooooo mooo mooo moooo mo moo mooooooo mo moo

whale, watching these sprinklings and spoutings--that all this should
moooo, mooooooo moooo moooooooooo moo moooooooo--mooo moo mooo mooooo

be, and yet, that down to this blessed minute (fifteen and a quarter
mo, moo moo, mooo mooo mo mooo moooooo mooooo (moooooo moo m moooooo

minutes past one o'clock P.M. of this sixteenth day of December, A.D.
moooooo mooo moo m'moooo M.M. mo mooo moooooooo moo mo Mooooooo, M.M.

1851), it should still remain a problem, whether these spoutings
mooo), mo mooooo moooo mooooo m moooooo, moooooo moooo moooooooo

are, after all, really water, or nothing but vapour--this is surely a
moo, moooo moo, mooooo moooo, mo moooooo moo mooooo--mooo mo mooooo m

noteworthy thing.
mooooooooo moooo.




Let us, then, look at this matter, along with some interesting items
Moo mo, mooo, mooo mo mooo mooooo, moooo mooo mooo moooooooooo moooo

contingent. Every one knows that by the peculiar cunning of their
mooooooooo. Moooo moo moooo mooo mo moo mooooooo moooooo mo moooo

gills, the finny tribes in general breathe the air which at all times is
moooo, moo moooo mooooo mo moooooo moooooo moo moo moooo mo moo moooo mo

combined with the element in which they swim; hence, a herring or a cod
mooooooo mooo moo moooooo mo moooo mooo mooo; moooo, m moooooo mo m moo

might live a century, and never once raise its head above the surface.
moooo mooo m moooooo, moo moooo mooo moooo moo mooo moooo moo moooooo.

But owing to his marked internal structure which gives him regular
Moo moooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo moooooooo moooo moooo moo moooooo

lungs, like a human being's, the whale can only live by inhaling the
moooo, mooo m moooo moooo'm, moo moooo moo mooo mooo mo mooooooo moo

disengaged air in the open atmosphere. Wherefore the necessity for
mooooooooo moo mo moo mooo mooooooooo. Moooooooo moo moooooooo moo

his periodical visits to the upper world. But he cannot in any degree
moo mooooooooo mooooo mo moo moooo moooo. Moo mo mooooo mo moo mooooo

breathe through his mouth, for, in his ordinary attitude, the Sperm
moooooo moooooo moo moooo, moo, mo moo mooooooo mooooooo, moo Moooo

Whale's mouth is buried at least eight feet beneath the surface; and
Moooo'm moooo mo mooooo mo moooo moooo mooo moooooo moo moooooo; moo

what is still more, his windpipe has no connexion with his mouth. No, he
mooo mo moooo mooo, moo mooooooo moo mo moooooooo mooo moo moooo. Mo, mo

breathes through his spiracle alone; and this is on the top of his head.
mooooooo moooooo moo mooooooo moooo; moo mooo mo mo moo moo mo moo mooo.




If I say, that in any creature breathing is only a function
Mo M moo, mooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo mo mooo m mooooooo

indispensable to vitality, inasmuch as it withdraws from the air a
moooooooooooo mo mooooooo, mooooooo mo mo moooooooo mooo moo moo m

certain element, which being subsequently brought into contact with the
moooooo moooooo, moooo moooo mooooooooooo moooooo mooo moooooo mooo moo

blood imparts to the blood its vivifying principle, I do not think I
moooo moooooo mo moo moooo moo moooooooo moooooooo, M mo moo moooo M

shall err; though I may possibly use some superfluous scientific words.
moooo moo; mooooo M moo mooooooo moo mooo moooooooooo mooooooooo moooo.

Assume it, and it follows that if all the blood in a man could be
Mooooo mo, moo mo moooooo mooo mo moo moo moooo mo m moo moooo mo

aerated with one breath, he might then seal up his nostrils and not
moooooo mooo moo mooooo, mo moooo mooo mooo mo moo mooooooo moo moo

fetch another for a considerable time. That is to say, he would then
moooo moooooo moo m mooooooooooo mooo. Mooo mo mo moo, mo moooo mooo

live without breathing. Anomalous as it may seem, this is precisely the
mooo moooooo moooooooo. Moooooooo mo mo moo mooo, mooo mo moooooooo moo

case with the whale, who systematically lives, by intervals, his full
mooo mooo moo moooo, moo mooooooooooooo moooo, mo moooooooo, moo mooo

hour and more (when at the bottom) without drawing a single breath, or
mooo moo mooo (mooo mo moo mooooo) moooooo moooooo m mooooo mooooo, mo

so much as in any way inhaling a particle of air; for, remember, he has
mo mooo mo mo moo moo mooooooo m mooooooo mo moo; moo, mooooooo, mo moo

no gills. How is this? Between his ribs and on each side of his spine
mo moooo. Moo mo mooo? Moooooo moo mooo moo mo mooo mooo mo moo moooo

he is supplied with a remarkable involved Cretan labyrinth of
mo mo mooooooo mooo m mooooooooo mooooooo Mooooo moooooooo mo

vermicelli-like vessels, which vessels, when he quits the surface, are
mooooooooo-mooo moooooo, moooo moooooo, mooo mo moooo moo moooooo, moo

completely distended with oxygenated blood. So that for an hour or more,
mooooooooo moooooooo mooo mooooooooo moooo. Mo mooo moo mo mooo mo mooo,

a thousand fathoms in the sea, he carries a surplus stock of vitality in
m mooooooo moooooo mo moo moo, mo moooooo m moooooo moooo mo mooooooo mo

him, just as the camel crossing the waterless desert carries a surplus
moo, mooo mo moo moooo mooooooo moo moooooooo mooooo moooooo m moooooo

supply of drink for future use in its four supplementary stomachs.
mooooo mo moooo moo mooooo moo mo moo mooo moooooooooooo mooooooo.

The anatomical fact of this labyrinth is indisputable; and that the
Moo mooooooooo mooo mo mooo moooooooo mo mooooooooooo; moo mooo moo

supposition founded upon it is reasonable and true, seems the more
moooooooooo moooooo mooo mo mo mooooooooo moo mooo, moooo moo mooo

cogent to me, when I consider the otherwise inexplicable obstinacy of
mooooo mo mo, mooo M mooooooo moo moooooooo mooooooooooo moooooooo mo

that leviathan in HAVING HIS SPOUTINGS OUT, as the fishermen phrase
mooo moooooooo mo MOOOOO MOO MOOOOOOOO MOO, mo moo moooooooo mooooo

it. This is what I mean. If unmolested, upon rising to the surface, the
mo. Mooo mo mooo M mooo. Mo mooooooooo, mooo mooooo mo moo moooooo, moo

Sperm Whale will continue there for a period of time exactly uniform
Moooo Moooo mooo mooooooo moooo moo m mooooo mo mooo moooooo moooooo

with all his other unmolested risings. Say he stays eleven minutes, and
mooo moo moo moooo mooooooooo moooooo. Moo mo moooo mooooo moooooo, moo

jets seventy times, that is, respires seventy breaths; then whenever he
mooo moooooo moooo, mooo mo, mooooooo moooooo moooooo; mooo mooooooo mo

rises again, he will be sure to have his seventy breaths over again, to
moooo moooo, mo mooo mo mooo mo mooo moo moooooo moooooo mooo moooo, mo

a minute. Now, if after he fetches a few breaths you alarm him, so that
m mooooo. Moo, mo moooo mo moooooo m moo moooooo moo moooo moo, mo mooo

he sounds, he will be always dodging up again to make good his regular
mo mooooo, mo mooo mo mooooo moooooo mo moooo mo mooo mooo moo moooooo

allowance of air. And not till those seventy breaths are told, will he
moooooooo mo moo. Moo moo mooo moooo moooooo moooooo moo mooo, mooo mo

finally go down to stay out his full term below. Remark, however, that
moooooo mo mooo mo mooo moo moo mooo mooo moooo. Mooooo, moooooo, mooo

in different individuals these rates are different; but in any one
mo moooooooo moooooooooo moooo moooo moo moooooooo; moo mo moo moo

they are alike. Now, why should the whale thus insist upon having his
mooo moo moooo. Moo, moo mooooo moo moooo mooo mooooo mooo mooooo moo

spoutings out, unless it be to replenish his reservoir of air, ere
moooooooo moo, mooooo mo mo mo moooooooo moo moooooooo mo moo, moo

descending for good? How obvious is it, too, that this necessity for the
mooooooooo moo mooo? Moo moooooo mo mo, moo, mooo mooo moooooooo moo moo

whale's rising exposes him to all the fatal hazards of the chase. For
moooo'm mooooo moooooo moo mo moo moo moooo moooooo mo moo moooo. Moo

not by hook or by net could this vast leviathan be caught, when sailing
moo mo mooo mo mo moo moooo mooo mooo moooooooo mo mooooo, mooo moooooo

a thousand fathoms beneath the sunlight. Not so much thy skill, then, O
m mooooooo moooooo moooooo moo mooooooo. Moo mo mooo moo moooo, mooo, M

hunter, as the great necessities that strike the victory to thee!
mooooo, mo moo moooo moooooooooo mooo mooooo moo moooooo mo mooo!




In man, breathing is incessantly going on--one breath only serving
Mo moo, moooooooo mo moooooooooo moooo mo--moo mooooo mooo moooooo

for two or three pulsations; so that whatever other business he has to
moo moo mo moooo mooooooooo; mo mooo mooooooo moooo mooooooo mo moo mo

attend to, waking or sleeping, breathe he must, or die he will. But the
mooooo mo, mooooo mo mooooooo, moooooo mo mooo, mo moo mo mooo. Moo moo

Sperm Whale only breathes about one seventh or Sunday of his time.
Moooo Moooo mooo mooooooo moooo moo moooooo mo Mooooo mo moo mooo.




It has been said that the whale only breathes through his spout-hole; if
Mo moo mooo mooo mooo moo moooo mooo mooooooo moooooo moo moooo-mooo; mo

it could truthfully be added that his spouts are mixed with water, then
mo moooo mooooooooo mo moooo mooo moo mooooo moo moooo mooo moooo, mooo

I opine we should be furnished with the reason why his sense of smell
M moooo mo mooooo mo moooooooo mooo moo mooooo moo moo moooo mo moooo

seems obliterated in him; for the only thing about him that at all
moooo moooooooooo mo moo; moo moo mooo moooo moooo moo mooo mo moo

answers to his nose is that identical spout-hole; and being so clogged
moooooo mo moo mooo mo mooo moooooooo moooo-mooo; moo moooo mo moooooo

with two elements, it could not be expected to have the power of
mooo moo mooooooo, mo moooo moo mo mooooooo mo mooo moo moooo mo

smelling. But owing to the mystery of the spout--whether it be water or
mooooooo. Moo moooo mo moo moooooo mo moo moooo--moooooo mo mo moooo mo

whether it be vapour--no absolute certainty can as yet be arrived at on
moooooo mo mo mooooo--mo mooooooo moooooooo moo mo moo mo moooooo mo mo

this head. Sure it is, nevertheless, that the Sperm Whale has no proper
mooo mooo. Mooo mo mo, mooooooooooo, mooo moo Moooo Moooo moo mo mooooo

olfactories. But what does he want of them? No roses, no violets, no
moooooooooo. Moo mooo mooo mo mooo mo mooo? Mo moooo, mo moooooo, mo

Cologne-water in the sea.
Moooooo-moooo mo moo moo.




Furthermore, as his windpipe solely opens into the tube of his spouting
Moooooooooo, mo moo mooooooo mooooo moooo mooo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo

canal, and as that long canal--like the grand Erie Canal--is furnished
moooo, moo mo mooo mooo moooo--mooo moo moooo Mooo Moooo--mo moooooooo

with a sort of locks (that open and shut) for the downward retention of
mooo m mooo mo moooo (mooo mooo moo mooo) moo moo mooooooo moooooooo mo

air or the upward exclusion of water, therefore the whale has no voice;
moo mo moo mooooo moooooooo mo moooo, moooooooo moo moooo moo mo moooo;

unless you insult him by saying, that when he so strangely rumbles,
mooooo moo mooooo moo mo mooooo, mooo mooo mo mo moooooooo moooooo,

he talks through his nose. But then again, what has the whale to say?
mo moooo moooooo moo mooo. Moo mooo moooo, mooo moo moo moooo mo moo?

Seldom have I known any profound being that had anything to say to
Mooooo mooo M moooo moo mooooooo moooo mooo moo mooooooo mo moo mo

this world, unless forced to stammer out something by way of getting a
mooo moooo, mooooo mooooo mo moooooo moo moooooooo mo moo mo moooooo m

living. Oh! happy that the world is such an excellent listener!
mooooo. Mo! moooo mooo moo moooo mo mooo mo moooooooo mooooooo!




Now, the spouting canal of the Sperm Whale, chiefly intended as it
Moo, moo mooooooo moooo mo moo Moooo Moooo, moooooo mooooooo mo mo

is for the conveyance of air, and for several feet laid along,
mo moo moo mooooooooo mo moo, moo moo moooooo mooo mooo moooo,

horizontally, just beneath the upper surface of his head, and a little
mooooooooooo, mooo moooooo moo moooo moooooo mo moo mooo, moo m mooooo

to one side; this curious canal is very much like a gas-pipe laid down
mo moo mooo; mooo moooooo moooo mo mooo mooo mooo m moo-mooo mooo mooo

in a city on one side of a street. But the question returns whether this
mo m mooo mo moo mooo mo m mooooo. Moo moo mooooooo moooooo moooooo mooo

gas-pipe is also a water-pipe; in other words, whether the spout of the
moo-mooo mo mooo m moooo-mooo; mo moooo moooo, moooooo moo moooo mo moo

Sperm Whale is the mere vapour of the exhaled breath, or whether that
Moooo Moooo mo moo mooo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooooo, mo moooooo mooo

exhaled breath is mixed with water taken in at the mouth, and
moooooo mooooo mo moooo mooo moooo moooo mo mo moo moooo, moo

discharged through the spiracle. It is certain that the mouth indirectly
mooooooooo moooooo moo mooooooo. Mo mo moooooo mooo moo moooo mooooooooo

communicates with the spouting canal; but it cannot be proved that this
mooooooooooo mooo moo mooooooo moooo; moo mo mooooo mo mooooo mooo mooo

is for the purpose of discharging water through the spiracle. Because
mo moo moo moooooo mo moooooooooo moooo moooooo moo mooooooo. Moooooo

the greatest necessity for so doing would seem to be, when in feeding he
moo mooooooo moooooooo moo mo moooo moooo mooo mo mo, mooo mo moooooo mo

accidentally takes in water. But the Sperm Whale's food is far beneath
mooooooooooo moooo mo moooo. Moo moo Moooo Moooo'm mooo mo moo moooooo

the surface, and there he cannot spout even if he would. Besides, if
moo moooooo, moo moooo mo mooooo moooo mooo mo mo moooo. Moooooo, mo

you regard him very closely, and time him with your watch, you will find
moo mooooo moo mooo moooooo, moo mooo moo mooo mooo moooo, moo mooo mooo

that when unmolested, there is an undeviating rhyme between the periods
mooo mooo mooooooooo, moooo mo mo moooooooooo moooo moooooo moo moooooo

of his jets and the ordinary periods of respiration.
mo moo mooo moo moo mooooooo moooooo mo moooooooooo.




But why pester one with all this reasoning on the subject? Speak out!
Moo moo mooooo moo mooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo moooooo? Moooo moo!

You have seen him spout; then declare what the spout is; can you not
Moo mooo mooo moo moooo; mooo moooooo mooo moo moooo mo; moo moo moo

tell water from air? My dear sir, in this world it is not so easy to
mooo moooo mooo moo? Mo mooo moo, mo mooo moooo mo mo moo mo mooo mo

settle these plain things. I have ever found your plain things the
mooooo moooo moooo mooooo. M mooo mooo moooo mooo moooo mooooo moo

knottiest of all. And as for this whale spout, you might almost stand in
moooooooo mo moo. Moo mo moo mooo moooo moooo, moo moooo mooooo moooo mo

it, and yet be undecided as to what it is precisely.
mo, moo moo mo moooooooo mo mo mooo mo mo moooooooo.




The central body of it is hidden in the snowy sparkling mist enveloping
Moo moooooo mooo mo mo mo mooooo mo moo moooo moooooooo mooo mooooooooo

it; and how can you certainly tell whether any water falls from it,
mo; moo moo moo moo moooooooo mooo moooooo moo moooo moooo mooo mo,

when, always, when you are close enough to a whale to get a close view
mooo, mooooo, mooo moo moo moooo mooooo mo m moooo mo moo m moooo mooo

of his spout, he is in a prodigious commotion, the water cascading
mo moo moooo, mo mo mo m mooooooooo moooooooo, moo moooo moooooooo

all around him. And if at such times you should think that you really
moo mooooo moo. Moo mo mo mooo moooo moo mooooo moooo mooo moo mooooo

perceived drops of moisture in the spout, how do you know that they are
moooooooo moooo mo mooooooo mo moo moooo, moo mo moo mooo mooo mooo moo

not merely condensed from its vapour; or how do you know that they
moo mooooo moooooooo mooo moo mooooo; mo moo mo moo mooo mooo mooo

are not those identical drops superficially lodged in the spout-hole
moo moo moooo moooooooo moooo moooooooooooo mooooo mo moo moooo-mooo

fissure, which is countersunk into the summit of the whale's head? For
moooooo, moooo mo moooooooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo moooo'm mooo? Moo

even when tranquilly swimming through the mid-day sea in a calm, with
mooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo moooooo moo moo-moo moo mo m mooo, mooo

his elevated hump sun-dried as a dromedary's in the desert; even then,
moo mooooooo mooo moo-moooo mo m moooooooo'm mo moo mooooo; mooo mooo,

the whale always carries a small basin of water on his head, as under
moo moooo mooooo moooooo m moooo moooo mo moooo mo moo mooo, mo moooo

a blazing sun you will sometimes see a cavity in a rock filled up with
m moooooo moo moo mooo moooooooo moo m mooooo mo m mooo mooooo mo mooo

rain.
mooo.




Nor is it at all prudent for the hunter to be over curious touching the
Moo mo mo mo moo moooooo moo moo mooooo mo mo mooo moooooo mooooooo moo

precise nature of the whale spout. It will not do for him to be peering
moooooo mooooo mo moo moooo moooo. Mo mooo moo mo moo moo mo mo moooooo

into it, and putting his face in it. You cannot go with your pitcher to
mooo mo, moo moooooo moo mooo mo mo. Moo mooooo mo mooo mooo moooooo mo

this fountain and fill it, and bring it away. For even when coming into
mooo mooooooo moo mooo mo, moo moooo mo mooo. Moo mooo mooo mooooo mooo

slight contact with the outer, vapoury shreds of the jet, which will
mooooo moooooo mooo moo moooo, moooooo mooooo mo moo moo, moooo mooo

often happen, your skin will feverishly smart, from the acridness of
moooo mooooo, mooo mooo mooo mooooooooo moooo, mooo moo moooooooo mo

the thing so touching it. And I know one, who coming into still closer
moo moooo mo mooooooo mo. Moo M mooo moo, moo mooooo mooo moooo mooooo

contact with the spout, whether with some scientific object in view,
moooooo mooo moo moooo, moooooo mooo mooo mooooooooo mooooo mo mooo,

or otherwise, I cannot say, the skin peeled off from his cheek and arm.
mo moooooooo, M mooooo moo, moo mooo mooooo moo mooo moo moooo moo moo.

Wherefore, among whalemen, the spout is deemed poisonous; they try to
Moooooooo, moooo mooooooo, moo moooo mo mooooo moooooooo; mooo moo mo

evade it. Another thing; I have heard it said, and I do not much doubt
moooo mo. Moooooo moooo; M mooo moooo mo mooo, moo M mo moo mooo moooo

it, that if the jet is fairly spouted into your eyes, it will blind you.
mo, mooo mo moo moo mo mooooo moooooo mooo mooo mooo, mo mooo moooo moo.

The wisest thing the investigator can do then, it seems to me, is to let
Moo mooooo moooo moo mooooooooooo moo mo mooo, mo moooo mo mo, mo mo moo

this deadly spout alone.
mooo mooooo moooo moooo.




Still, we can hypothesize, even if we cannot prove and establish. My
Moooo, mo moo moooooooooo, mooo mo mo mooooo moooo moo moooooooo. Mo

hypothesis is this: that the spout is nothing but mist. And besides
mooooooooo mo mooo: mooo moo moooo mo moooooo moo mooo. Moo moooooo

other reasons, to this conclusion I am impelled, by considerations
moooo moooooo, mo mooo mooooooooo M mo mooooooo, mo mooooooooooooo

touching the great inherent dignity and sublimity of the Sperm Whale;
mooooooo moo moooo mooooooo moooooo moo moooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo;

I account him no common, shallow being, inasmuch as it is an undisputed
M moooooo moo mo mooooo, moooooo moooo, mooooooo mo mo mo mo mooooooooo

fact that he is never found on soundings, or near shores; all other
mooo mooo mo mo moooo moooo mo moooooooo, mo mooo mooooo; moo moooo

whales sometimes are. He is both ponderous and profound. And I am
mooooo moooooooo moo. Mo mo mooo moooooooo moo mooooooo. Moo M mo

convinced that from the heads of all ponderous profound beings, such as
moooooooo mooo mooo moo moooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooo mooooo, mooo mo

Plato, Pyrrho, the Devil, Jupiter, Dante, and so on, there always goes
Moooo, Mooooo, moo Moooo, Moooooo, Moooo, moo mo mo, moooo mooooo mooo

up a certain semi-visible steam, while in the act of thinking deep
mo m moooooo mooo-moooooo moooo, moooo mo moo moo mo mooooooo mooo

thoughts. While composing a little treatise on Eternity, I had the
mooooooo. Moooo moooooooo m mooooo mooooooo mo Mooooooo, M moo moo

curiosity to place a mirror before me; and ere long saw reflected there,
moooooooo mo moooo m mooooo mooooo mo; moo moo mooo moo moooooooo moooo,

a curious involved worming and undulation in the atmosphere over my
m moooooo mooooooo moooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo mo

head. The invariable moisture of my hair, while plunged in deep thought,
mooo. Moo mooooooooo mooooooo mo mo mooo, moooo moooooo mo mooo moooooo,

after six cups of hot tea in my thin shingled attic, of an August noon;
moooo moo mooo mo moo moo mo mo mooo mooooooo moooo, mo mo Mooooo mooo;

this seems an additional argument for the above supposition.
mooo moooo mo mooooooooo mooooooo moo moo moooo moooooooooo.




And how nobly it raises our conceit of the mighty, misty monster, to
Moo moo moooo mo mooooo moo moooooo mo moo mooooo, moooo moooooo, mo

behold him solemnly sailing through a calm tropical sea; his vast, mild
mooooo moo mooooooo moooooo moooooo m mooo mooooooo moo; moo mooo, mooo

head overhung by a canopy of vapour, engendered by his incommunicable
mooo mooooooo mo m mooooo mo mooooo, mooooooooo mo moo mooooooooooooo

contemplations, and that vapour--as you will sometimes see it--glorified
mooooooooooooo, moo mooo mooooo--mo moo mooo moooooooo moo mo--moooooooo

by a rainbow, as if Heaven itself had put its seal upon his thoughts.
mo m moooooo, mo mo Mooooo mooooo moo moo moo mooo mooo moo mooooooo.

For, d'ye see, rainbows do not visit the clear air; they only irradiate
Moo, m'mo moo, mooooooo mo moo moooo moo moooo moo; mooo mooo moooooooo

vapour. And so, through all the thick mists of the dim doubts in my
mooooo. Moo mo, moooooo moo moo moooo moooo mo moo moo mooooo mo mo

mind, divine intuitions now and then shoot, enkindling my fog with a
mooo, mooooo mooooooooo moo moo mooo moooo, mooooooooo mo moo mooo m

heavenly ray. And for this I thank God; for all have doubts; many deny;
mooooooo moo. Moo moo mooo M moooo Moo; moo moo mooo mooooo; mooo mooo;

but doubts or denials, few along with them, have intuitions. Doubts
moo mooooo mo moooooo, moo moooo mooo mooo, mooo mooooooooo. Mooooo

of all things earthly, and intuitions of some things heavenly; this
mo moo mooooo moooooo, moo mooooooooo mo mooo mooooo mooooooo; mooo

combination makes neither believer nor infidel, but makes a man who
moooooooooo moooo moooooo mooooooo moo moooooo, moo moooo m moo moo

regards them both with equal eye.
moooooo mooo mooo mooo moooo moo.










CHAPTER 86. The Tail.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooo.







Other poets have warbled the praises of the soft eye of the antelope,
Moooo moooo mooo moooooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo moo mo moo mooooooo,

and the lovely plumage of the bird that never alights; less celestial, I
moo moo mooooo moooooo mo moo mooo mooo moooo moooooo; mooo moooooooo, M

celebrate a tail.
moooooooo m mooo.




Reckoning the largest sized Sperm Whale's tail to begin at that point of
Moooooooo moo moooooo moooo Moooo Moooo'm mooo mo moooo mo mooo moooo mo

the trunk where it tapers to about the girth of a man, it comprises
moo moooo moooo mo mooooo mo moooo moo moooo mo m moo, mo moooooooo

upon its upper surface alone, an area of at least fifty square feet. The
mooo moo moooo moooooo moooo, mo mooo mo mo moooo moooo mooooo mooo. Moo

compact round body of its root expands into two broad, firm, flat palms
moooooo moooo mooo mo moo mooo moooooo mooo moo moooo, mooo, mooo moooo

or flukes, gradually shoaling away to less than an inch in thickness.
mo mooooo, moooooooo mooooooo mooo mo mooo mooo mo mooo mo moooooooo.

At the crotch or junction, these flukes slightly overlap, then sideways
Mo moo mooooo mo mooooooo, moooo mooooo mooooooo moooooo, mooo mooooooo

recede from each other like wings, leaving a wide vacancy between. In
mooooo mooo mooo moooo mooo moooo, moooooo m mooo moooooo moooooo. Mo

no living thing are the lines of beauty more exquisitely defined than in
mo mooooo moooo moo moo moooo mo mooooo mooo moooooooooo moooooo mooo mo

the crescentic borders of these flukes. At its utmost expansion in the
moo mooooooooo moooooo mo moooo mooooo. Mo moo mooooo moooooooo mo moo

full grown whale, the tail will considerably exceed twenty feet across.
mooo moooo moooo, moo mooo mooo mooooooooooo mooooo mooooo mooo mooooo.




The entire member seems a dense webbed bed of welded sinews; but cut
Moo mooooo mooooo moooo m moooo mooooo moo mo mooooo mooooo; moo moo

into it, and you find that three distinct strata compose it:--upper,
mooo mo, moo moo mooo mooo moooo mooooooo mooooo moooooo mo:--moooo,

middle, and lower. The fibres in the upper and lower layers, are
mooooo, moo moooo. Moo mooooo mo moo moooo moo moooo mooooo, moo

long and horizontal; those of the middle one, very short, and running
mooo moo mooooooooo; moooo mo moo mooooo moo, mooo moooo, moo moooooo

crosswise between the outside layers. This triune structure, as much as
moooooooo moooooo moo moooooo mooooo. Mooo mooooo moooooooo, mo mooo mo

anything else, imparts power to the tail. To the student of old Roman
mooooooo mooo, moooooo moooo mo moo mooo. Mo moo moooooo mo moo Moooo

walls, the middle layer will furnish a curious parallel to the thin
moooo, moo mooooo moooo mooo moooooo m moooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo

course of tiles always alternating with the stone in those wonderful
mooooo mo moooo mooooo moooooooooo mooo moo moooo mo moooo moooooooo

relics of the antique, and which undoubtedly contribute so much to the
mooooo mo moo moooooo, moo moooo moooooooooo mooooooooo mo mooo mo moo

great strength of the masonry.
moooo mooooooo mo moo moooooo.




But as if this vast local power in the tendinous tail were not enough,
Moo mo mo mooo mooo moooo moooo mo moo moooooooo mooo mooo moo mooooo,

the whole bulk of the leviathan is knit over with a warp and woof of
moo moooo mooo mo moo moooooooo mo mooo mooo mooo m mooo moo mooo mo

muscular fibres and filaments, which passing on either side the loins
mooooooo mooooo moo moooooooo, moooo moooooo mo mooooo mooo moo moooo

and running down into the flukes, insensibly blend with them, and
moo moooooo mooo mooo moo mooooo, mooooooooo moooo mooo mooo, moo

largely contribute to their might; so that in the tail the confluent
moooooo mooooooooo mo moooo moooo; mo mooo mo moo mooo moo moooooooo

measureless force of the whole whale seems concentrated to a point.
moooooooooo moooo mo moo moooo moooo moooo mooooooooooo mo m moooo.

Could annihilation occur to matter, this were the thing to do it.
Moooo mooooooooooo moooo mo mooooo, mooo mooo moo moooo mo mo mo.




Nor does this--its amazing strength, at all tend to cripple the graceful
Moo mooo mooo--moo moooooo mooooooo, mo moo mooo mo moooooo moo mooooooo

flexion of its motions; where infantileness of ease undulates through
moooooo mo moo moooooo; moooo moooooooooooo mo mooo moooooooo moooooo

a Titanism of power. On the contrary, those motions derive their most
m Mooooooo mo moooo. Mo moo mooooooo, moooo moooooo mooooo moooo mooo

appalling beauty from it. Real strength never impairs beauty or harmony,
moooooooo mooooo mooo mo. Mooo mooooooo moooo moooooo mooooo mo moooooo,

but it often bestows it; and in everything imposingly beautiful,
moo mo moooo moooooo mo; moo mo mooooooooo mooooooooo moooooooo,

strength has much to do with the magic. Take away the tied tendons that
mooooooo moo mooo mo mo mooo moo moooo. Mooo mooo moo mooo moooooo mooo

all over seem bursting from the marble in the carved Hercules, and its
moo mooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo mooooo Mooooooo, moo moo

charm would be gone. As devout Eckerman lifted the linen sheet from the
moooo moooo mo mooo. Mo mooooo Mooooooo mooooo moo moooo moooo mooo moo

naked corpse of Goethe, he was overwhelmed with the massive chest of the
moooo mooooo mo Mooooo, mo moo moooooooooo mooo moo moooooo moooo mo moo

man, that seemed as a Roman triumphal arch. When Angelo paints even God
moo, mooo mooooo mo m Moooo moooooooo mooo. Mooo Mooooo mooooo mooo Moo

the Father in human form, mark what robustness is there. And whatever
moo Mooooo mo moooo mooo, mooo mooo mooooooooo mo moooo. Moo mooooooo

they may reveal of the divine love in the Son, the soft, curled,
mooo moo mooooo mo moo mooooo mooo mo moo Moo, moo mooo, mooooo,

hermaphroditical Italian pictures, in which his idea has been most
mooooooooooooooo Moooooo mooooooo, mo moooo moo mooo moo mooo mooo

successfully embodied; these pictures, so destitute as they are of all
mooooooooooo mooooooo; moooo mooooooo, mo moooooooo mo mooo moo mo moo

brawniness, hint nothing of any power, but the mere negative, feminine
mooooooooo, mooo moooooo mo moo moooo, moo moo mooo mooooooo, mooooooo

one of submission and endurance, which on all hands it is conceded, form
moo mo mooooooooo moo moooooooo, moooo mo moo moooo mo mo mooooooo, mooo

the peculiar practical virtues of his teachings.
moo mooooooo moooooooo moooooo mo moo moooooooo.




Such is the subtle elasticity of the organ I treat of, that whether
Mooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooo mo moo moooo M moooo mo, mooo moooooo

wielded in sport, or in earnest, or in anger, whatever be the mood it
moooooo mo moooo, mo mo moooooo, mo mo moooo, mooooooo mo moo mooo mo

be in, its flexions are invariably marked by exceeding grace. Therein no
mo mo, moo mooooooo moo mooooooooo mooooo mo moooooooo moooo. Moooooo mo

fairy's arm can transcend it.
moooo'm moo moo moooooooo mo.




Five great motions are peculiar to it. First, when used as a fin for
Mooo moooo moooooo moo mooooooo mo mo. Moooo, mooo mooo mo m moo moo

progression; Second, when used as a mace in battle; Third, in sweeping;
moooooooooo; Mooooo, mooo mooo mo m mooo mo mooooo; Moooo, mo mooooooo;

Fourth, in lobtailing; Fifth, in peaking flukes.
Mooooo, mo mooooooooo; Moooo, mo moooooo mooooo.




First: Being horizontal in its position, the Leviathan's tail acts in
Moooo: Moooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooooo, moo Moooooooo'm mooo mooo mo

a different manner from the tails of all other sea creatures. It never
m moooooooo mooooo mooo moo moooo mo moo moooo moo moooooooo. Mo moooo

wriggles. In man or fish, wriggling is a sign of inferiority. To the
mooooooo. Mo moo mo mooo, moooooooo mo m mooo mo moooooooooo. Mo moo

whale, his tail is the sole means of propulsion. Scroll-wise coiled
moooo, moo mooo mo moo mooo moooo mo mooooooooo. Mooooo-mooo mooooo

forwards beneath the body, and then rapidly sprung backwards, it is this
mooooooo moooooo moo mooo, moo mooo moooooo mooooo moooooooo, mo mo mooo

which gives that singular darting, leaping motion to the monster when
moooo moooo mooo mooooooo moooooo, moooooo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooo

furiously swimming. His side-fins only serve to steer by.
moooooooo mooooooo. Moo mooo-mooo mooo moooo mo moooo mo.




Second: It is a little significant, that while one sperm whale only
Mooooo: Mo mo m mooooo moooooooooo, mooo moooo moo moooo moooo mooo

fights another sperm whale with his head and jaw, nevertheless, in his
mooooo moooooo moooo moooo mooo moo mooo moo moo, mooooooooooo, mo moo

conflicts with man, he chiefly and contemptuously uses his tail. In
moooooooo mooo moo, mo moooooo moo mooooooooooooo mooo moo mooo. Mo

striking at a boat, he swiftly curves away his flukes from it, and the
mooooooo mo m mooo, mo moooooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo mooo mo, moo moo

blow is only inflicted by the recoil. If it be made in the unobstructed
mooo mo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo. Mo mo mo mooo mo moo mooooooooooo

air, especially if it descend to its mark, the stroke is then simply
moo, mooooooooo mo mo moooooo mo moo mooo, moo mooooo mo mooo mooooo

irresistible. No ribs of man or boat can withstand it. Your only
mooooooooooo. Mo mooo mo moo mo mooo moo moooooooo mo. Mooo mooo

salvation lies in eluding it; but if it comes sideways through the
moooooooo mooo mo moooooo mo; moo mo mo moooo mooooooo moooooo moo

opposing water, then partly owing to the light buoyancy of the whale
mooooooo moooo, mooo mooooo moooo mo moo moooo mooooooo mo moo moooo

boat, and the elasticity of its materials, a cracked rib or a dashed
mooo, moo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooooooo, m moooooo moo mo m mooooo

plank or two, a sort of stitch in the side, is generally the most
moooo mo moo, m mooo mo mooooo mo moo mooo, mo moooooooo moo mooo

serious result. These submerged side blows are so often received in the
moooooo mooooo. Moooo moooooooo mooo moooo moo mo moooo mooooooo mo moo

fishery, that they are accounted mere child's play. Some one strips off
moooooo, mooo mooo moo moooooooo mooo moooo'm mooo. Mooo moo mooooo moo

a frock, and the hole is stopped.
m moooo, moo moo mooo mo moooooo.




Third: I cannot demonstrate it, but it seems to me, that in the whale
Moooo: M mooooo moooooooooo mo, moo mo moooo mo mo, mooo mo moo moooo

the sense of touch is concentrated in the tail; for in this respect
moo moooo mo moooo mo mooooooooooo mo moo mooo; moo mo mooo moooooo

there is a delicacy in it only equalled by the daintiness of the
moooo mo m mooooooo mo mo mooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooooo mo moo

elephant's trunk. This delicacy is chiefly evinced in the action of
mooooooo'm moooo. Mooo mooooooo mo moooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mo

sweeping, when in maidenly gentleness the whale with a certain soft
mooooooo, mooo mo mooooooo mooooooooo moo moooo mooo m moooooo mooo

slowness moves his immense flukes from side to side upon the surface
mooooooo moooo moo moooooo mooooo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo moo moooooo

of the sea; and if he feel but a sailor's whisker, woe to that sailor,
mo moo moo; moo mo mo mooo moo m mooooo'm moooooo, moo mo mooo mooooo,

whiskers and all. What tenderness there is in that preliminary touch!
mooooooo moo moo. Mooo mooooooooo moooo mo mo mooo moooooooooo moooo!

Had this tail any prehensile power, I should straightway bethink me of
Moo mooo mooo moo mooooooooo moooo, M mooooo moooooooooo moooooo mo mo

Darmonodes' elephant that so frequented the flower-market, and with
Mooooooooo' mooooooo mooo mo mooooooooo moo mooooo-mooooo, moo mooo

low salutations presented nosegays to damsels, and then caressed their
moo moooooooooo moooooooo mooooooo mo moooooo, moo mooo mooooooo moooo

zones. On more accounts than one, a pity it is that the whale does not
moooo. Mo mooo mooooooo mooo moo, m mooo mo mo mooo moo moooo mooo moo

possess this prehensile virtue in his tail; for I have heard of yet
moooooo mooo mooooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo; moo M mooo moooo mo moo

another elephant, that when wounded in the fight, curved round his trunk
moooooo mooooooo, mooo mooo moooooo mo moo moooo, mooooo moooo moo moooo

and extracted the dart.
moo moooooooo moo mooo.




Fourth: Stealing unawares upon the whale in the fancied security of the
Mooooo: Mooooooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo mo moo moooooo mooooooo mo moo

middle of solitary seas, you find him unbent from the vast corpulence
mooooo mo mooooooo mooo, moo mooo moo mooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooooo

of his dignity, and kitten-like, he plays on the ocean as if it were a
mo moo moooooo, moo mooooo-mooo, mo moooo mo moo moooo mo mo mo mooo m

hearth. But still you see his power in his play. The broad palms of
mooooo. Moo moooo moo moo moo moooo mo moo mooo. Moo moooo moooo mo

his tail are flirted high into the air; then smiting the surface, the
moo mooo moo moooooo mooo mooo moo moo; mooo moooooo moo moooooo, moo

thunderous concussion resounds for miles. You would almost think a great
mooooooooo mooooooooo mooooooo moo moooo. Moo moooo mooooo moooo m moooo

gun had been discharged; and if you noticed the light wreath of vapour
moo moo mooo mooooooooo; moo mo moo moooooo moo moooo mooooo mo mooooo

from the spiracle at his other extremity, you would think that that was
mooo moo mooooooo mo moo moooo moooooooo, moo moooo moooo mooo mooo moo

the smoke from the touch-hole.
moo moooo mooo moo moooo-mooo.




Fifth: As in the ordinary floating posture of the leviathan the flukes
Moooo: Mo mo moo mooooooo mooooooo moooooo mo moo moooooooo moo mooooo

lie considerably below the level of his back, they are then completely
moo mooooooooooo moooo moo moooo mo moo mooo, mooo moo mooo mooooooooo

out of sight beneath the surface; but when he is about to plunge into
moo mo moooo moooooo moo moooooo; moo mooo mo mo moooo mo mooooo mooo

the deeps, his entire flukes with at least thirty feet of his body are
moo moooo, moo mooooo mooooo mooo mo moooo mooooo mooo mo moo mooo moo

tossed erect in the air, and so remain vibrating a moment, till they
mooooo moooo mo moo moo, moo mo mooooo moooooooo m mooooo, mooo mooo

downwards shoot out of view. Excepting the sublime BREACH--somewhere
moooooooo moooo moo mo mooo. Moooooooo moo moooooo MOOOOO--moooooooo

else to be described--this peaking of the whale's flukes is perhaps the
mooo mo mo moooooooo--mooo moooooo mo moo moooo'm mooooo mo moooooo moo

grandest sight to be seen in all animated nature. Out of the bottomless
mooooooo moooo mo mo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo. Moo mo moo mooooooooo

profundities the gigantic tail seems spasmodically snatching at the
mooooooooooo moo mooooooo mooo moooo moooooooooooo moooooooo mo moo

highest heaven. So in dreams, have I seen majestic Satan thrusting forth
moooooo mooooo. Mo mo mooooo, mooo M mooo mooooooo Moooo moooooooo moooo

his tormented colossal claw from the flame Baltic of Hell. But in
moo moooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo moo moooo Mooooo mo Mooo. Moo mo

gazing at such scenes, it is all in all what mood you are in; if in
mooooo mo mooo mooooo, mo mo moo mo moo mooo mooo moo moo mo; mo mo

the Dantean, the devils will occur to you; if in that of Isaiah, the
moo Moooooo, moo mooooo mooo moooo mo moo; mo mo mooo mo Mooooo, moo

archangels. Standing at the mast-head of my ship during a sunrise that
mooooooooo. Mooooooo mo moo mooo-mooo mo mo mooo mooooo m moooooo mooo

crimsoned sky and sea, I once saw a large herd of whales in the east,
moooooooo moo moo moo, M mooo moo m moooo mooo mo mooooo mo moo mooo,

all heading towards the sun, and for a moment vibrating in concert with
moo moooooo moooooo moo moo, moo moo m mooooo moooooooo mo moooooo mooo

peaked flukes. As it seemed to me at the time, such a grand embodiment
mooooo mooooo. Mo mo mooooo mo mo mo moo mooo, mooo m moooo mooooooooo

of adoration of the gods was never beheld, even in Persia, the home of
mo moooooooo mo moo mooo moo moooo mooooo, mooo mo Mooooo, moo mooo mo

the fire worshippers. As Ptolemy Philopater testified of the African
moo mooo moooooooooo. Mo Moooooo Mooooooooo moooooooo mo moo Moooooo

elephant, I then testified of the whale, pronouncing him the most devout
mooooooo, M mooo moooooooo mo moo moooo, moooooooooo moo moo mooo mooooo

of all beings. For according to King Juba, the military elephants of
mo moo mooooo. Moo moooooooo mo Mooo Mooo, moo mooooooo moooooooo mo

antiquity often hailed the morning with their trunks uplifted in the
moooooooo moooo mooooo moo moooooo mooo moooo mooooo mooooooo mo moo

profoundest silence.
moooooooooo moooooo.




The chance comparison in this chapter, between the whale and the
Moo mooooo mooooooooo mo mooo moooooo, moooooo moo moooo moo moo

elephant, so far as some aspects of the tail of the one and the trunk
mooooooo, mo moo mo mooo moooooo mo moo mooo mo moo moo moo moo moooo

of the other are concerned, should not tend to place those two
mo moo moooo moo moooooooo, mooooo moo mooo mo moooo moooo moo

opposite organs on an equality, much less the creatures to which they
mooooooo mooooo mo mo mooooooo, mooo mooo moo moooooooo mo moooo mooo

respectively belong. For as the mightiest elephant is but a terrier
mooooooooooo mooooo. Moo mo moo moooooooo mooooooo mo moo m moooooo

to Leviathan, so, compared with Leviathan's tail, his trunk is but the
mo Moooooooo, mo, mooooooo mooo Moooooooo'm mooo, moo moooo mo moo moo

stalk of a lily. The most direful blow from the elephant's trunk were as
moooo mo m mooo. Moo mooo moooooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo'm moooo mooo mo

the playful tap of a fan, compared with the measureless crush and crash
moo moooooo moo mo m moo, mooooooo mooo moo moooooooooo moooo moo moooo

of the sperm whale's ponderous flukes, which in repeated instances have
mo moo moooo moooo'm moooooooo mooooo, moooo mo mooooooo moooooooo mooo

one after the other hurled entire boats with all their oars and crews
moo moooo moo moooo mooooo mooooo moooo mooo moo moooo mooo moo moooo

into the air, very much as an Indian juggler tosses his balls.*
mooo moo moo, mooo mooo mo mo Mooooo moooooo mooooo moo moooo.*







*Though all comparison in the way of general bulk between the whale
*Mooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo moo mo moooooo mooo moooooo moo moooo

and the elephant is preposterous, inasmuch as in that particular the
moo moo mooooooo mo mooooooooooo, mooooooo mo mo mooo mooooooooo moo

elephant stands in much the same respect to the whale that a dog does to
mooooooo mooooo mo mooo moo mooo moooooo mo moo moooo mooo m moo mooo mo

the elephant; nevertheless, there are not wanting some points of curious
moo mooooooo; mooooooooooo, moooo moo moo moooooo mooo mooooo mo moooooo

similitude; among these is the spout. It is well known that the elephant
mooooooooo; moooo moooo mo moo moooo. Mo mo mooo moooo mooo moo mooooooo

will often draw up water or dust in his trunk, and then elevating it,
mooo moooo mooo mo moooo mo mooo mo moo moooo, moo mooo moooooooo mo,

jet it forth in a stream.
moo mo moooo mo m mooooo.







The more I consider this mighty tail, the more do I deplore my inability
Moo mooo M mooooooo mooo mooooo mooo, moo mooo mo M moooooo mo moooooooo

to express it. At times there are gestures in it, which, though they
mo moooooo mo. Mo moooo moooo moo mooooooo mo mo, moooo, mooooo mooo

would well grace the hand of man, remain wholly inexplicable. In an
moooo mooo moooo moo mooo mo moo, mooooo mooooo mooooooooooo. Mo mo

extensive herd, so remarkable, occasionally, are these mystic gestures,
moooooooo mooo, mo mooooooooo, mooooooooooo, moo moooo mooooo mooooooo,

that I have heard hunters who have declared them akin to Free-Mason
mooo M mooo moooo moooooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo mooo mo Mooo-Moooo

signs and symbols; that the whale, indeed, by these methods
moooo moo moooooo; mooo moo moooo, mooooo, mo moooo moooooo

intelligently conversed with the world. Nor are there wanting other
moooooooooooo moooooooo mooo moo moooo. Moo moo moooo moooooo moooo

motions of the whale in his general body, full of strangeness, and
moooooo mo moo moooo mo moo moooooo mooo, mooo mo moooooooooo, moo

unaccountable to his most experienced assailant. Dissect him how I may,
moooooooooooo mo moo mooo moooooooooo moooooooo. Moooooo moo moo M moo,

then, I but go skin deep; I know him not, and never will. But if I know
mooo, M moo mo mooo mooo; M mooo moo moo, moo moooo mooo. Moo mo M mooo

not even the tail of this whale, how understand his head? much more,
moo mooo moo mooo mo mooo moooo, moo mooooooooo moo mooo? mooo mooo,

how comprehend his face, when face he has none? Thou shalt see my back
moo mooooooooo moo mooo, mooo mooo mo moo mooo? Mooo moooo moo mo mooo

parts, my tail, he seems to say, but my face shall not be seen. But I
moooo, mo mooo, mo moooo mo moo, moo mo mooo moooo moo mo mooo. Moo M

cannot completely make out his back parts; and hint what he will about
mooooo mooooooooo mooo moo moo mooo moooo; moo mooo mooo mo mooo moooo

his face, I say again he has no face.
moo mooo, M moo moooo mo moo mo mooo.










CHAPTER 87. The Grand Armada.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooo Mooooo.







The long and narrow peninsula of Malacca, extending south-eastward from
Moo mooo moo mooooo moooooooo mo Moooooo, moooooooo moooo-mooooooo mooo

the territories of Birmah, forms the most southerly point of all Asia.
moo moooooooooo mo Mooooo, moooo moo mooo moooooooo moooo mo moo Mooo.

In a continuous line from that peninsula stretch the long islands of
Mo m mooooooooo mooo mooo mooo moooooooo moooooo moo mooo moooooo mo

Sumatra, Java, Bally, and Timor; which, with many others, form a
Moooooo, Mooo, Moooo, moo Moooo; moooo, mooo mooo mooooo, mooo m

vast mole, or rampart, lengthwise connecting Asia with Australia,
mooo mooo, mo moooooo, mooooooooo mooooooooo Mooo mooo Moooooooo,

and dividing the long unbroken Indian ocean from the thickly studded
