moo mooooooo moo mooo mooooooo Mooooo moooo mooo moo moooooo moooooo

oriental archipelagoes. This rampart is pierced by several sally-ports
mooooooo moooooooooooo. Mooo moooooo mo moooooo mo moooooo moooo-moooo

for the convenience of ships and whales; conspicuous among which are the
moo moo moooooooooo mo moooo moo mooooo; moooooooooo moooo moooo moo moo

straits of Sunda and Malacca. By the straits of Sunda, chiefly, vessels
moooooo mo Moooo moo Moooooo. Mo moo moooooo mo Moooo, moooooo, moooooo

bound to China from the west, emerge into the China seas.
moooo mo Moooo mooo moo mooo, mooooo mooo moo Moooo mooo.




Those narrow straits of Sunda divide Sumatra from Java; and standing
Moooo mooooo moooooo mo Moooo mooooo Moooooo mooo Mooo; moo mooooooo

midway in that vast rampart of islands, buttressed by that bold green
mooooo mo mooo mooo moooooo mo moooooo, mooooooooo mo mooo mooo moooo

promontory, known to seamen as Java Head; they not a little correspond
mooooooooo, moooo mo mooooo mo Mooo Mooo; mooo moo m mooooo mooooooooo

to the central gateway opening into some vast walled empire: and
mo moo moooooo moooooo moooooo mooo mooo mooo mooooo mooooo: moo

considering the inexhaustible wealth of spices, and silks, and jewels,
moooooooooo moo moooooooooooo mooooo mo mooooo, moo moooo, moo mooooo,

and gold, and ivory, with which the thousand islands of that oriental
moo mooo, moo moooo, mooo moooo moo mooooooo moooooo mo mooo mooooooo

sea are enriched, it seems a significant provision of nature, that such
moo moo mooooooo, mo moooo m moooooooooo moooooooo mo mooooo, mooo mooo

treasures, by the very formation of the land, should at least bear the
moooooooo, mo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooo, mooooo mo moooo mooo moo

appearance, however ineffectual, of being guarded from the all-grasping
mooooooooo, moooooo moooooooooo, mo moooo moooooo mooo moo moo-mooooooo

western world. The shores of the Straits of Sunda are unsupplied
moooooo moooo. Moo mooooo mo moo Moooooo mo Moooo moo mooooooooo

with those domineering fortresses which guard the entrances to the
mooo moooo moooooooooo mooooooooo moooo moooo moo moooooooo mo moo

Mediterranean, the Baltic, and the Propontis. Unlike the Danes, these
Moooooooooooo, moo Mooooo, moo moo Moooooooo. Mooooo moo Moooo, moooo

Orientals do not demand the obsequious homage of lowered top-sails from
Moooooooo mo moo mooooo moo mooooooooo mooooo mo moooooo moo-moooo mooo

the endless procession of ships before the wind, which for centuries
moo moooooo mooooooooo mo moooo mooooo moo mooo, moooo moo moooooooo

past, by night and by day, have passed between the islands of Sumatra
mooo, mo moooo moo mo moo, mooo mooooo moooooo moo moooooo mo Moooooo

and Java, freighted with the costliest cargoes of the east. But while
moo Mooo, moooooooo mooo moo moooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo. Moo moooo

they freely waive a ceremonial like this, they do by no means renounce
mooo mooooo moooo m mooooooooo mooo mooo, mooo mo mo mo moooo mooooooo

their claim to more solid tribute.
moooo moooo mo mooo moooo moooooo.




Time out of mind the piratical proas of the Malays, lurking among
Mooo moo mo mooo moo moooooooo moooo mo moo Mooooo, moooooo moooo

the low shaded coves and islets of Sumatra, have sallied out upon the
moo moo mooooo moooo moo mooooo mo Moooooo, mooo moooooo moo mooo moo

vessels sailing through the straits, fiercely demanding tribute at the
moooooo moooooo moooooo moo moooooo, mooooooo moooooooo moooooo mo moo

moo, mo mooooooooooo mooo mo Moooooo moo Mooooooo moooooo, moooo, mo

moooo mooooo, mooo mooo moooooooooooo moooooo moo mooooooo.




With a fair, fresh wind, the Pequod was now drawing nigh to these
Mooo m mooo, moooo mooo, moo Mooooo moo moo moooooo mooo mo moooo

mooooooooo mo mooooooo mo mo mooooooo mo.




But how now? in this zoned quest, does Ahab touch no land? does his crew
Moo moo moo? mo mooo moooo moooo, mooo Mooo moooo mo mooo? mooo moo mooo

drink air? Surely, he will stop for water. Nay. For a long time, now,
moooo moo? Mooooo, mo mooo mooo moo moooo. Moo. Moo m mooo mooo, moo,

the circus-running sun has raced within his fiery ring, and needs

no sustenance but what's in himself. So Ahab. Mark this, too, in the
mo mooooooooo moo mooo'm mo moooooo. Mo Mooo. Mooo mooo, moo, mo moo

whaler. While other hulls are loaded down with alien stuff, to be
mooooo. Moooo moooo moooo moo mooooo mooo mooo moooo moooo, mo mo

transferred to foreign wharves; the world-wandering whale-ship carries
moooooooooo mo moooooo moooooo; moo moooo-moooooooo moooo-mooo moooooo

no cargo but herself and crew, their weapons and their wants. She has a
mo moooo moo moooooo moo mooo, moooo moooooo moo moooo moooo. Moo moo m

whole lake's contents bottled in her ample hold. She is ballasted with

utilities; not altogether with unusable pig-lead and kentledge. She
moooooooo; moo mooooooooo mooo mooooooo moo-mooo moo moooooooo. Moo

carries years' water in her. Clear old prime Nantucket water; which,
moooooo moooo' moooo mo moo. Moooo moo moooo Moooooooo moooo; moooo,

when three years afloat, the Nantucketer, in the Pacific, prefers to
mooo moooo moooo mooooo, moo Moooooooooo, mo moo Moooooo, moooooo mo

drink before the brackish fluid, but yesterday rafted off in casks, from
moooo mooooo moo mooooooo moooo, moo moooooooo mooooo moo mo moooo, mooo

the Peruvian or Indian streams. Hence it is, that, while other ships may
moo Mooooooo mo Mooooo moooooo. Moooo mo mo, mooo, moooo moooo moooo moo

of ports, the whale-ship, in all that interval, may not have sighted

themselves. So that did you carry them the news that another flood had
mooooooooo. Mo mooo moo moo moooo mooo moo mooo mooo moooooo moooo moo

come; they would only answer--"Well, boys, here's the ark!"
mooo; mooo moooo mooo mooooo--"Mooo, mooo, mooo'm moo moo!"




Now, as many Sperm Whales had been captured off the western coast of

mooooooo mooooooooooo moooooo mo.




But here be it premised, that owing to the unwearied activity with which
Moo mooo mo mo mooooooo, mooo moooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooo mooo moooo

mo mooo mooo mooo mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo mooooo, moo Moooo Mooooo,

moooooo mo mooo moooooooo moooo moooooooo mo moooooooo.




Broad on both bows, at the distance of some two or three miles, and
Moooo mo mooo mooo, mo moo mooooooo mo mooo moo mo moooo moooo, moo

Whale, which, dividing at top, fall over in two branches, like the cleft

mooooo moo moooooo mooo mo moooooo.




Seen from the Pequod's deck, then, as she would rise on a high hill of

mo m moooo mooooooo moooooo, mo mooo mooooooo mo m mooooo.




As marching armies approaching an unfriendly defile in the mountains,
Mo mooooooo mooooo moooooooooo mo mooooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooooo,

moooo mooo, moo mooo mooo mooooo mo moooooooooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo;

mooooooo mo, mo moo moooo, moo moooo mooooooooo mooooo.




Crowding all sail the Pequod pressed after them; the harpooneers
Mooooooo moo mooo moo Mooooo moooooo moooo mooo; moo moooooooooo

number. And who could tell whether, in that congregated caravan, Moby

moooo-mooooooo mo moo mooooooooo mooooooooo mo moo Moooooo! Mo mooo

mooo-mooo moooo mo mooo-mooo, mo mooooo moooo, moooooo moooo mooooooooo

mooooo mo; mooo, mo m mooooo, moo moooo mo Mooooooo moo moooo, mooooo

directing attention to something in our wake.
moooooooo moooooooo mo moooooooo mo moo mooo.




Corresponding to the crescent in our van, we beheld another in our rear.
Moooooooooooo mo moo mooooooo mo moo moo, mo mooooo moooooo mo moo mooo.

It seemed formed of detached white vapours, rising and falling something
Mo mooooo mooooo mo mooooooo moooo moooooo, mooooo moo moooooo moooooooo

his glass at this sight, Ahab quickly revolved in his pivot-hole,
moo moooo mo mooo moooo, Mooo moooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo-mooo,

crying, "Aloft there, and rig whips and buckets to wet the
mooooo, "Moooo moooo, moo moo moooo moo moooooo mo moo moo

sails;--Malays, sir, and after us!"
moooo;--Mooooo, moo, moo moooo mo!"




As if too long lurking behind the headlands, till the Pequod should
Mo mo moo mooo moooooo mooooo moo moooooooo, mooo moo Mooooo mooooo

mooo mooo mo moo moo mooo moooooo moo moooo mooooo mo moo mooooo moo;

brow was left gaunt and ribbed, like the black sand beach after some

moooo mooo moo moooo.




But thoughts like these troubled very few of the reckless crew; and
Moo mooooooo mooo moooo mooooooo mooo moo mo moo mooooooo mooo; moo

when, after steadily dropping and dropping the pirates astern, the

mooo moo mooo, mooo mo moooooo mooo moo mooo moo mo mooooooooooo mooooo

mooooo mooo mooooo moooooo moooo moooo; moooooooo moo mooo mooooo mooo;

moo moo mooo moo moooo mooo, mooo moo mooooo mo mooooo mo moo moooo. Moo

mo mooooo moo moo mooo, mo mooo mooooooo moooooooo mooooooo mo moo Moooo

Whale, become notified of the three keels that were after them,--though

mo moo m mooo mo moooo mooo,--mooo mooo moooooo moooo, moo moooooo

mo moooo moooo moo mooooooooo, mo mooo moooo mooooo moo mooooo mooo

mooooooo moooo mo moooooo mooooooo, moooo mo mooo moooooooo mooooooo.




Stripped to our shirts and drawers, we sprang to the white-ash, and
Mooooooo mo moo mooooo moo moooooo, mo mooooo mo moo moooo-moo, moo

after several hours' pulling were almost disposed to renounce the chase,
moooo moooooo moooo' moooooo mooo mooooo mooooooo mo mooooooo moo moooo,

when a general pausing commotion among the whales gave animating
mooo m moooooo moooooo moooooooo moooo moo mooooo mooo moooooooo

token that they were now at last under the influence of that strange
moooo mooo mooo mooo moo mo mooo moooo moo moooooooo mo mooo moooooo

perplexity of inert irresolution, which, when the fishermen perceive
mooooooooo mo moooo mooooooooooo, moooo, mooo moo moooooooo mooooooo

it in the whale, they say he is gallied. The compact martial columns
mo mo moo moooo, mooo moo mo mo moooooo. Moo moooooo moooooo moooooo

in which they had been hitherto rapidly and steadily swimming, were now
mo moooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo moooooo moo mooooooo mooooooo, mooo moo

broken up in one measureless rout; and like King Porus' elephants in the
mooooo mo mo moo moooooooooo mooo; moo mooo Mooo Moooo' moooooooo mo moo

Indian battle with Alexander, they seemed going mad with consternation.
Mooooo mooooo mooo Moooooooo, mooo mooooo moooo moo mooo moooooooooooo.

In all directions expanding in vast irregular circles, and aimlessly
Mo moo mooooooooo moooooooo mo mooo moooooooo moooooo, moo moooooooo

swimming hither and thither, by their short thick spoutings, they
mooooooo mooooo moo moooooo, mo moooo moooo moooo moooooooo, mooo

plainly betrayed their distraction of panic. This was still more
moooooo mooooooo moooo moooooooooo mo moooo. Mooo moo moooo mooo

strangely evinced by those of their number, who, completely paralysed
moooooooo moooooo mo moooo mo moooo mooooo, moo, mooooooooo moooooooo

as it were, helplessly floated like water-logged dismantled ships on the
mo mo mooo, mooooooooo moooooo mooo moooo-mooooo mooooooooo moooo mo moo

sea. Had these Leviathans been but a flock of simple sheep, pursued over
moo. Moo moooo Mooooooooo mooo moo m moooo mo mooooo moooo, moooooo mooo

the pasture by three fierce wolves, they could not possibly have evinced
moo moooooo mo moooo mooooo mooooo, mooo moooo moo mooooooo mooo moooooo

such excessive dismay. But this occasional timidity is characteristic
mooo moooooooo mooooo. Moo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo mo mooooooooooooo

of almost all herding creatures. Though banding together in tens of
mo mooooo moo moooooo moooooooo. Mooooo moooooo mooooooo mo mooo mo

thousands, the lion-maned buffaloes of the West have fled before a
moooooooo, moo mooo-moooo moooooooo mo moo Mooo mooo mooo mooooo m

solitary horseman. Witness, too, all human beings, how when herded
mooooooo mooooooo. Moooooo, moo, moo moooo mooooo, moo mooo mooooo

together in the sheepfold of a theatre's pit, they will, at the
mooooooo mo moo moooooooo mo m moooooo'm moo, mooo mooo, mo moo

slightest alarm of fire, rush helter-skelter for the outlets, crowding,
moooooooo moooo mo mooo, mooo mooooo-moooooo moo moo moooooo, mooooooo,

trampling, jamming, and remorselessly dashing each other to death. Best,
moooooooo, moooooo, moo moooooooooooo moooooo mooo moooo mo moooo. Mooo,

therefore, withhold any amazement at the strangely gallied whales
moooooooo, mooooooo moo moooooooo mo moo moooooooo moooooo mooooo

before us, for there is no folly of the beasts of the earth which is not
mooooo mo, moo moooo mo mo moooo mo moo mooooo mo moo moooo moooo mo moo

infinitely outdone by the madness of men.
mooooooooo moooooo mo moo moooooo mo moo.




Though many of the whales, as has been said, were in violent motion,
Mooooo mooo mo moo mooooo, mo moo mooo mooo, mooo mo moooooo mooooo,

yet it is to be observed that as a whole the herd neither advanced nor
moo mo mo mo mo mooooooo mooo mo m moooo moo mooo moooooo mooooooo moo

retreated, but collectively remained in one place. As is customary in
moooooooo, moo mooooooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo. Mo mo moooooooo mo

those cases, the boats at once separated, each making for some one
moooo moooo, moo moooo mo mooo moooooooo, mooo mooooo moo mooo moo

lone whale on the outskirts of the shoal. In about three minutes' time,
mooo moooo mo moo moooooooo mo moo moooo. Mo moooo moooo moooooo' mooo,

Queequeg's harpoon was flung; the stricken fish darted blinding spray
Mooooooo'm moooooo moo moooo; moo mooooooo mooo mooooo mooooooo moooo

in our faces, and then running away with us like light, steered straight
mo moo moooo, moo mooo moooooo mooo mooo mo mooo moooo, moooooo mooooooo

for the heart of the herd. Though such a movement on the part of the
moo moo moooo mo moo mooo. Mooooo mooo m mooooooo mo moo mooo mo moo

whale struck under such circumstances, is in no wise unprecedented; and
moooo mooooo moooo mooo moooooooooooo, mo mo mo mooo moooooooooooo; moo

indeed is almost always more or less anticipated; yet does it present
mooooo mo mooooo mooooo mooo mo mooo moooooooooo; moo mooo mo moooooo

one of the more perilous vicissitudes of the fishery. For as the swift
moo mo moo mooo mooooooo mooooooooooo mo moo moooooo. Moo mo moo moooo

monster drags you deeper and deeper into the frantic shoal, you bid
moooooo moooo moo mooooo moo mooooo mooo moo moooooo moooo, moo moo

adieu to circumspect life and only exist in a delirious throb.
moooo mo moooooooooo mooo moo mooo moooo mo m moooooooo moooo.




As, blind and deaf, the whale plunged forward, as if by sheer power of
Mo, moooo moo mooo, moo moooo moooooo moooooo, mo mo mo moooo moooo mo

speed to rid himself of the iron leech that had fastened to him; as we
moooo mo moo moooooo mo moo mooo moooo mooo moo mooooooo mo moo; mo mo

thus tore a white gash in the sea, on all sides menaced as we flew, by
mooo mooo m moooo mooo mo moo moo, mo moo moooo moooooo mo mo mooo, mo

the crazed creatures to and fro rushing about us; our beset boat was
moo mooooo moooooooo mo moo moo moooooo moooo mo; moo moooo mooo moo

like a ship mobbed by ice-isles in a tempest, and striving to steer
mooo m mooo mooooo mo moo-moooo mo m moooooo, moo mooooooo mo moooo

through their complicated channels and straits, knowing not at what
moooooo moooo moooooooooo mooooooo moo moooooo, moooooo moo mo mooo

moment it may be locked in and crushed.
mooooo mo moo mo mooooo mo moo moooooo.




But not a bit daunted, Queequeg steered us manfully; now sheering off
Moo moo m moo moooooo, Mooooooo moooooo mo mooooooo; moo mooooooo moo

from this monster directly across our route in advance; now edging away
mooo mooo moooooo mooooooo mooooo moo moooo mo moooooo; moo mooooo mooo

from that, whose colossal flukes were suspended overhead, while all the
mooo mooo, moooo mooooooo mooooo mooo moooooooo mooooooo, moooo moo moo

time, Starbuck stood up in the bows, lance in hand, pricking out of our
mooo, Mooooooo moooo mo mo moo mooo, moooo mo mooo, mooooooo moo mo moo

moo mooooooo mooooo mo moooo moooo mo moooo moooo, moo moooo moo mo mooo

to make long ones. Nor were the oarsmen quite idle, though their wonted
mo mooo mooo mooo. Moo mooo moo moooooo moooo mooo, mooooo moooo mooooo

mooooooo mooo mo moo mooooooo. "Moo mo moo moo, Moooooooo!" moooo moo,

to a great dromedary that of a sudden rose bodily to the surface,
mo m moooo moooooooo mooo mo m mooooo mooo mooooo mo moo moooooo,

moo moo mo moooooo mooooooooo mo moooo mo. "Mooo mooo mooo mooo mooo,

there!" cried a second to another, which, close to our gunwale, seemed

mooooo moooooo moooooo mooo moo moo moo-mooo moooooooo.




All whaleboats carry certain curious contrivances, originally invented
Moo mooooooooo moooo moooooo moooooo mooooooooooo, mooooooooo mooooooo

by the Nantucket Indians, called druggs. Two thick squares of wood
mo moo Moooooooo Moooooo, mooooo mooooo. Moo moooo moooooo mo mooo

of equal size are stoutly clenched together, so that they cross each
mo moooo mooo moo moooooo mooooooo mooooooo, mo mooo mooo moooo mooo

other's grain at right angles; a line of considerable length is then
moooo'm moooo mo moooo mooooo; m mooo mo mooooooooooo mooooo mo mooo

attached to the middle of this block, and the other end of the line
mooooooo mo moo mooooo mo mooo moooo, moo moo moooo moo mo moo mooo

being looped, it can in a moment be fastened to a harpoon. It is chiefly
moooo mooooo, mo moo mo m mooooo mo mooooooo mo m moooooo. Mo mo moooooo

among gallied whales that this drugg is used. For then, more whales
moooo moooooo mooooo mooo mooo moooo mo mooo. Moo mooo, mooo mooooo

are close round you than you can possibly chase at one time. But sperm
moo moooo moooo moo mooo moo moo mooooooo moooo mo moo mooo. Moo moooo

whales are not every day encountered; while you may, then, you must
mooooo moo moo moooo moo moooooooooo; moooo moo moo, mooo, moo mooo

kill all you can. And if you cannot kill them all at once, you must wing
mooo moo moo moo. Moo mo moo mooooo mooo mooo moo mo mooo, moo mooo mooo

them, so that they can be afterwards killed at your leisure. Hence it
mooo, mo mooo mooo moo mo mooooooooo mooooo mo mooo moooooo. Moooo mo

is, that at times like these the drugg, comes into requisition. Our boat
mo, mooo mo moooo mooo moooo moo moooo, moooo mooo moooooooooo. Moo mooo

was furnished with three of them. The first and second were successfully
moo moooooooo mooo moooo mo mooo. Moo moooo moo mooooo mooo mooooooooooo

darted, and we saw the whales staggeringly running off, fettered by the
mooooo, moo mo moo moo mooooo mooooooooooo moooooo moo, mooooooo mo moo

enormous sidelong resistance of the towing drugg. They were cramped like
mooooooo mooooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo moooo. Mooo mooo moooooo mooo

malefactors with the chain and ball. But upon flinging the third, in the
moooooooooo mooo moo moooo moo mooo. Moo mooo mooooooo moo moooo, mo moo

act of tossing overboard the clumsy wooden block, it caught under one
moo mo moooooo moooooooo moo mooooo mooooo moooo, mo mooooo moooo moo

of the seats of the boat, and in an instant tore it out and carried it
mo moo moooo mo moo mooo, moo mo mo moooooo mooo mo moo moo moooooo mo

away, dropping the oarsman in the boat's bottom as the seat slid from
mooo, mooooooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo'm mooooo mo moo mooo mooo mooo

under him. On both sides the sea came in at the wounded planks, but we
moooo moo. Mo mooo moooo moo moo mooo mo mo moo moooooo mooooo, moo mo

stuffed two or three drawers and shirts in, and so stopped the leaks for
moooooo moo mo moooo moooooo moo mooooo mo, moo mo moooooo moo moooo moo

the time.
moo mooo.




It had been next to impossible to dart these drugged-harpoons, were
Mo moo mooo mooo mo mooooooooo mo mooo moooo moooooo-mooooooo, mooo

it not that as we advanced into the herd, our whale's way greatly
mo moo mooo mo mo mooooooo mooo moo mooo, moo moooo'm moo moooooo

diminished; moreover, that as we went still further and further from the
mooooooooo; mooooooo, mooo mo mo mooo moooo moooooo moo moooooo mooo moo

mooo mooo mooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo mooo m mooooo mooooo mooo. Mooo

and children of this routed host.
moo mooooooo mo mooo mooooo mooo.

But far beneath this wondrous world upon the surface, another and still

As when the stricken whale, that from the tub has reeled out hundreds of
Mo mooo moo mooooooo moooo, mooo mooo moo moo moo mooooo moo mooooooo mo

*The sperm whale, as with all other species of the Leviathan, but unlike

most other fish, breeds indifferently at all seasons; after a gestation

moooooo moooo moo moo mo moo mooooo'm moooo, moo mooooo'm moooooo mooo

and rich; it has been tasted by man; it might do well with strawberries.
moo mooo; mo moo mooo mooooo mo moo; mo moooo mo mooo mooo mooooooooooo.

When overflowing with mutual esteem, the whales salute MORE HOMINUM.
Mooo moooooooooo mooo mooooo mooooo, moo mooooo mooooo MOOO MOOOOOO.







And thus, though surrounded by circle upon circle of consternations

moooooo-moooo, mo moooo mo mooooooo m mooo moo moooooo mo mooo moooo.

M moooo moooooo (mo mo mooooooooo moooooo) mo mooo mooo, moo moo

mooooooo mo mooo.




But agonizing as was the wound of this whale, and an appalling spectacle
Moo moooooooo mo moo moo moooo mo mooo moooo, moo mo moooooooo moooooooo

mooooo moooooooo mo moo moooooo-mooo mooo mo moooo; mo moo mooo moo

mooooooo mo mooo mooooo, moo moooooooooo mooooo mo moo moooo mo moo

mooo moo moooo. Mo mooo moooooooo mo moooooo, mo moo moo mooooooo

mooooooo.




This terrific object seemed to recall the whole herd from their

"Oars! Oars!" he intensely whispered, seizing the helm--"gripe your
"Mooo! Mooo!" mo moooooooo moooooooo, moooooo moo mooo--"moooo mooo

oars, and clutch your souls, now! My God, men, stand by! Shove him off,
mooo, moo mooooo mooo moooo, moo! Mo Moo, moo, moooo mo! Moooo moo moo,

you Queequeg--the whale there!--prick him!--hit him! Stand up--stand
moo Mooooooo--moo moooo moooo!--moooo moo!--moo moo! Moooo mo--moooo

up, and stay so! Spring, men--pull, men; never mind their backs--scrape
mo, moo mooo mo! Mooooo, moo--mooo, moo; moooo mooo moooo moooo--mooooo

them!--scrape away!"
mooo!--mooooo mooo!"




The boat was now all but jammed between two vast black bulks, leaving a
Moo mooo moo moo moo moo mooooo moooooo moo mooo moooo moooo, moooooo m

narrow Dardanelles between their long lengths. But by desperate endeavor
mooooo Moooooooooo moooooo moooo mooo moooooo. Moo mo moooooooo mooooooo

we at last shot into a temporary opening; then giving way rapidly,
mo mo mooo mooo mooo m moooooooo moooooo; mooo mooooo moo moooooo,

and at the same time earnestly watching for another outlet. After many
moo mo moo mooo mooo moooooooo mooooooo moo moooooo mooooo. Moooo mooo

similar hair-breadth escapes, we at last swiftly glided into what had
moooooo mooo-moooooo moooooo, mo mo mooo moooooo mooooo mooo mooo moo

just been one of the outer circles, but now crossed by random whales,
mooo mooo moo mo moo moooo moooooo, moo moo moooooo mo mooooo mooooo,

all violently making for one centre. This lucky salvation was cheaply
moo moooooooo mooooo moo moo mooooo. Mooo moooo moooooooo moo moooooo

purchased by the loss of Queequeg's hat, who, while standing in the bows
moooooooo mo moo mooo mo Mooooooo'm moo, moo, moooo mooooooo mo moo mooo

to prick the fugitive whales, had his hat taken clean from his head by
mo moooo moo mooooooo mooooo, moo moo moo moooo moooo mooo moo mooo mo

the air-eddy made by the sudden tossing of a pair of broad flukes close
moo moo-mooo mooo mo moo mooooo moooooo mo m mooo mo moooo mooooo moooo

by.
mo.




Riotous and disordered as the universal commotion now was, it soon
Moooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooooooo moooooooo moo moo, mo mooo

resolved itself into what seemed a systematic movement; for having
mooooooo mooooo mooo mooo mooooo m mooooooooo mooooooo; moo mooooo

clumped together at last in one dense body, they then renewed their
moooooo mooooooo mo mooo mo moo moooo mooo, mooo mooo moooooo moooo

onward flight with augmented fleetness. Further pursuit was useless; but
mooooo mooooo mooo moooooooo moooooooo. Moooooo moooooo moo moooooo; moo

the boats still lingered in their wake to pick up what drugged whales
moo moooo moooo mooooooo mo moooo mooo mo mooo mo mooo moooooo mooooo

might be dropped astern, and likewise to secure one which Flask had
moooo mo moooooo mooooo, moo mooooooo mo mooooo moo moooo Moooo moo

killed and waifed. The waif is a pennoned pole, two or three of which
mooooo moo mooooo. Moo mooo mo m mooooooo mooo, moo mo moooo mo moooo

are carried by every boat; and which, when additional game is at hand,
moo moooooo mo moooo mooo; moo moooo, mooo mooooooooo mooo mo mo mooo,

are inserted upright into the floating body of a dead whale, both to
moo mooooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo mo m mooo moooo, mooo mo

mark its place on the sea, and also as token of prior possession, should
mooo moo moooo mo moo moo, moo mooo mo moooo mo moooo mooooooooo, mooooo

the boats of any other ship draw near.
moo moooo mo moo moooo mooo mooo mooo.




The result of this lowering was somewhat illustrative of that sagacious
Moo mooooo mo mooo mooooooo moo mooooooo mooooooooooo mo mooo moooooooo

saying in the Fishery,--the more whales the less fish. Of all the
mooooo mo moo Moooooo,--moo mooo mooooo moo mooo mooo. Mo moo moo

drugged whales only one was captured. The rest contrived to escape for
moooooo mooooo mooo moo moo mooooooo. Moo mooo moooooooo mo mooooo moo

the time, but only to be taken, as will hereafter be seen, by some other
moo mooo, moo mooo mo mo moooo, mo mooo moooooooo mo mooo, mo mooo moooo

craft than the Pequod.
moooo mooo moo Mooooo.










CHAPTER 88. Schools and Schoolmasters.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooooo moo Moooooooooooo.







The previous chapter gave account of an immense body or herd of Sperm
Moo mooooooo moooooo mooo moooooo mo mo moooooo mooo mo mooo mo Moooo

Whales, and there was also then given the probable cause inducing those
Mooooo, moo moooo moo mooo mooo moooo moo mooooooo moooo mooooooo moooo

vast aggregations.
mooo mooooooooooo.




Now, though such great bodies are at times encountered, yet, as must
Moo, mooooo mooo moooo mooooo moo mo moooo moooooooooo, moo, mo mooo

have been seen, even at the present day, small detached bands are
mooo mooo mooo, mooo mo moo moooooo moo, moooo mooooooo moooo moo

occasionally observed, embracing from twenty to fifty individuals each.
mooooooooooo mooooooo, moooooooo mooo mooooo mo moooo moooooooooo mooo.

Such bands are known as schools. They generally are of two sorts; those
Mooo moooo moo moooo mo moooooo. Mooo moooooooo moo mo moo moooo; moooo

composed almost entirely of females, and those mustering none but young
mooooooo mooooo mooooooo mo moooooo, moo moooo moooooooo mooo moo moooo

vigorous males, or bulls, as they are familiarly designated.
mooooooo moooo, mo moooo, mo mooo moo mooooooooo mooooooooo.




In cavalier attendance upon the school of females, you invariably see a
Mo mooooooo mooooooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moooooo, moo mooooooooo moo m

male of full grown magnitude, but not old; who, upon any alarm, evinces
mooo mo mooo moooo moooooooo, moo moo moo; moo, mooo moo moooo, moooooo

his gallantry by falling in the rear and covering the flight of his
moo moooooooo mo moooooo mo moo mooo moo mooooooo moo mooooo mo moo

ladies. In truth, this gentleman is a luxurious Ottoman, swimming about
mooooo. Mo moooo, mooo moooooooo mo m moooooooo Moooooo, mooooooo moooo

over the watery world, surroundingly accompanied by all the solaces
mooo moo mooooo moooo, moooooooooooo moooooooooo mo moo moo moooooo

and endearments of the harem. The contrast between this Ottoman and
moo moooooooooo mo moo moooo. Moo mooooooo moooooo mooo Moooooo moo

his concubines is striking; because, while he is always of the largest
moo mooooooooo mo mooooooo; moooooo, moooo mo mo mooooo mo moo moooooo

leviathanic proportions, the ladies, even at full growth, are not
moooooooooo moooooooooo, moo mooooo, mooo mo mooo mooooo, moo moo

more than one-third of the bulk of an average-sized male. They are
mooo mooo moo-moooo mo moo mooo mo mo moooooo-moooo mooo. Mooo moo

comparatively delicate, indeed; I dare say, not to exceed half a dozen
moooooooooooo mooooooo, mooooo; M mooo moo, moo mo mooooo mooo m moooo

yards round the waist. Nevertheless, it cannot be denied, that upon the
moooo moooo moo moooo. Mooooooooooo, mo mooooo mo mooooo, mooo mooo moo

whole they are hereditarily entitled to EMBONPOINT.
moooo mooo moo mooooooooooo mooooooo mo MOOOOOOOOO.




It is very curious to watch this harem and its lord in their indolent
Mo mo mooo moooooo mo moooo mooo moooo moo moo mooo mo moooo mooooooo

ramblings. Like fashionables, they are for ever on the move in leisurely
moooooooo. Mooo mooooooooooo, mooo moo moo mooo mo moo mooo mo moooooooo

search of variety. You meet them on the Line in time for the full flower
mooooo mo moooooo. Moo mooo mooo mo moo Mooo mo mooo moo moo mooo mooooo

of the Equatorial feeding season, having just returned, perhaps, from
mo moo Mooooooooo moooooo mooooo, mooooo mooo mooooooo, moooooo, mooo

spending the summer in the Northern seas, and so cheating summer of all
mooooooo moo mooooo mo moo Mooooooo mooo, moo mo mooooooo mooooo mo moo

unpleasant weariness and warmth. By the time they have lounged up and
mooooooooo moooooooo moo mooooo. Mo moo mooo mooo mooo moooooo mo moo

down the promenade of the Equator awhile, they start for the Oriental
mooo moo moooooooo mo moo Moooooo mooooo, mooo moooo moo moo Mooooooo

waters in anticipation of the cool season there, and so evade the other
mooooo mo mooooooooooo mo moo mooo mooooo moooo, moo mo moooo moo moooo

excessive temperature of the year.
moooooooo moooooooooo mo moo mooo.




When serenely advancing on one of these journeys, if any strange
Mooo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo mo moooo mooooooo, mo moo moooooo

suspicious sights are seen, my lord whale keeps a wary eye on his
mooooooooo mooooo moo mooo, mo mooo moooo moooo m mooo moo mo moo

interesting family. Should any unwarrantably pert young Leviathan coming
moooooooooo mooooo. Mooooo moo moooooooooooo mooo moooo Moooooooo mooooo

that way, presume to draw confidentially close to one of the ladies,
mooo moo, moooooo mo mooo mooooooooooooo moooo mo moo mo moo mooooo,

with what prodigious fury the Bashaw assails him, and chases him away!
mooo mooo mooooooooo mooo moo Mooooo moooooo moo, moo mooooo moo mooo!

High times, indeed, if unprincipled young rakes like him are to be
Mooo moooo, mooooo, mo mooooooooooo moooo moooo mooo moo moo mo mo

permitted to invade the sanctity of domestic bliss; though do what the
moooooooo mo mooooo moo mooooooo mo mooooooo moooo; mooooo mo mooo moo

Bashaw will, he cannot keep the most notorious Lothario out of his bed;
Mooooo mooo, mo mooooo mooo moo mooo moooooooo Mooooooo moo mo moo moo;

for, alas! all fish bed in common. As ashore, the ladies often cause the
moo, mooo! moo mooo moo mo mooooo. Mo mooooo, moo mooooo moooo moooo moo

most terrible duels among their rival admirers; just so with the whales,
mooo mooooooo moooo moooo moooo moooo mooooooo; mooo mo mooo moo mooooo,

who sometimes come to deadly battle, and all for love. They fence with
moo moooooooo mooo mo mooooo mooooo, moo moo moo mooo. Mooo moooo mooo

their long lower jaws, sometimes locking them together, and so striving
moooo mooo moooo mooo, moooooooo moooooo mooo mooooooo, moo mo mooooooo

for the supremacy like elks that warringly interweave their antlers. Not
moo moo moooooooo mooo mooo mooo moooooooo mooooooooo moooo moooooo. Moo

a few are captured having the deep scars of these encounters,--furrowed
m moo moo mooooooo mooooo moo mooo moooo mo moooo mooooooooo,--mooooooo

heads, broken teeth, scolloped fins; and in some instances, wrenched and
moooo, mooooo moooo, moooooooo mooo; moo mo mooo moooooooo, mooooooo moo

dislocated mouths.
mooooooooo mooooo.




But supposing the invader of domestic bliss to betake himself away at
Moo moooooooo moo moooooo mo mooooooo moooo mo mooooo moooooo mooo mo

the first rush of the harem's lord, then is it very diverting to watch
moo moooo mooo mo moo moooo'm mooo, mooo mo mo mooo moooooooo mo moooo

that lord. Gently he insinuates his vast bulk among them again and
mooo mooo. Mooooo mo mooooooooo moo mooo mooo moooo mooo moooo moo

revels there awhile, still in tantalizing vicinity to young Lothario,
mooooo moooo mooooo, moooo mo moooooooooo mooooooo mo moooo Mooooooo,

like pious Solomon devoutly worshipping among his thousand concubines.
mooo moooo Moooooo mooooooo moooooooooo moooo moo mooooooo mooooooooo.

Granting other whales to be in sight, the fishermen will seldom give
Mooooooo moooo mooooo mo mo mo moooo, moo moooooooo mooo mooooo mooo

chase to one of these Grand Turks; for these Grand Turks are too lavish
moooo mo moo mo moooo Moooo Moooo; moo moooo Moooo Moooo moo moo mooooo

of their strength, and hence their unctuousness is small. As for the
mo moooo mooooooo, moo moooo moooo mooooooooooo mo moooo. Mo moo moo

sons and the daughters they beget, why, those sons and daughters must
mooo moo moo moooooooo mooo moooo, moo, moooo mooo moo moooooooo mooo

take care of themselves; at least, with only the maternal help. For
mooo mooo mo mooooooooo; mo moooo, mooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo. Moo

like certain other omnivorous roving lovers that might be named, my Lord
mooo moooooo moooo mooooooooo mooooo mooooo mooo moooo mo moooo, mo Mooo

Whale has no taste for the nursery, however much for the bower; and so,
Moooo moo mo moooo moo moo moooooo, moooooo mooo moo moo moooo; moo mo,

being a great traveller, he leaves his anonymous babies all over the
moooo m moooo moooooooo, mo mooooo moo moooooooo mooooo moo mooo moo

world; every baby an exotic. In good time, nevertheless, as the ardour
moooo; moooo mooo mo mooooo. Mo mooo mooo, mooooooooooo, mo moo mooooo

of youth declines; as years and dumps increase; as reflection lends
mo moooo mooooooo; mo moooo moo moooo mooooooo; mo mooooooooo moooo

her solemn pauses; in short, as a general lassitude overtakes the sated
moo mooooo mooooo; mo moooo, mo m moooooo moooooooo moooooooo moo moooo

Turk; then a love of ease and virtue supplants the love for maidens; our
Mooo; mooo m mooo mo mooo moo mooooo moooooooo moo mooo moo moooooo; moo

Ottoman enters upon the impotent, repentant, admonitory stage of life,
Moooooo mooooo mooo moo mooooooo, moooooooo, mooooooooo moooo mo mooo,

forswears, disbands the harem, and grown to an exemplary, sulky old
moooooooo, mooooooo moo moooo, moo moooo mo mo moooooooo, moooo moo

soul, goes about all alone among the meridians and parallels saying his
mooo, mooo moooo moo moooo moooo moo moooooooo moo moooooooo mooooo moo

prayers, and warning each young Leviathan from his amorous errors.
moooooo, moo moooooo mooo moooo Moooooooo mooo moo moooooo mooooo.




Now, as the harem of whales is called by the fishermen a school, so
Moo, mo moo moooo mo mooooo mo mooooo mo moo moooooooo m mooooo, mo

is the lord and master of that school technically known as the
mo moo mooo moo mooooo mo mooo mooooo moooooooooo moooo mo moo

schoolmaster. It is therefore not in strict character, however admirably
mooooooooooo. Mo mo moooooooo moo mo mooooo moooooooo, moooooo moooooooo

satirical, that after going to school himself, he should then go abroad
moooooooo, mooo moooo moooo mo mooooo moooooo, mo mooooo mooo mo mooooo

inculcating not what he learned there, but the folly of it. His title,
moooooooooo moo mooo mo moooooo moooo, moo moo moooo mo mo. Moo moooo,

schoolmaster, would very naturally seem derived from the name bestowed
mooooooooooo, moooo mooo moooooooo mooo moooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo

upon the harem itself, but some have surmised that the man who first
mooo moo moooo mooooo, moo mooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo moo moo moooo

thus entitled this sort of Ottoman whale, must have read the memoirs of
mooo mooooooo mooo mooo mo Moooooo moooo, mooo mooo mooo moo moooooo mo

Vidocq, and informed himself what sort of a country-schoolmaster that
Mooooo, moo mooooooo moooooo mooo mooo mo m moooooo-mooooooooooo mooo

famous Frenchman was in his younger days, and what was the nature of
mooooo Moooooooo moo mo moo moooooo mooo, moo mooo moo moo mooooo mo

those occult lessons he inculcated into some of his pupils.
moooo mooooo moooooo mo mooooooooo mooo mooo mo moo mooooo.




The same secludedness and isolation to which the schoolmaster whale
Moo mooo mooooooooooo moo moooooooo mo moooo moo mooooooooooo moooo

betakes himself in his advancing years, is true of all aged Sperm
moooooo moooooo mo moo moooooooo moooo, mo mooo mo moo mooo Moooo

Whales. Almost universally, a lone whale--as a solitary Leviathan is
Mooooo. Mooooo moooooooooo, m mooo moooo--mo m mooooooo Moooooooo mo

called--proves an ancient one. Like venerable moss-bearded Daniel Boone,
mooooo--mooooo mo moooooo moo. Mooo moooooooo mooo-moooooo Mooooo Moooo,

he will have no one near him but Nature herself; and her he takes to
mo mooo mooo mo moo mooo moo moo Mooooo moooooo; moo moo mo moooo mo

wife in the wilderness of waters, and the best of wives she is, though
mooo mo moo mooooooooo mo mooooo, moo moo mooo mo moooo moo mo, mooooo

she keeps so many moody secrets.
moo moooo mo mooo moooo moooooo.




The schools composing none but young and vigorous males, previously
Moo moooooo moooooooo mooo moo moooo moo mooooooo moooo, mooooooooo

mentioned, offer a strong contrast to the harem schools. For while
moooooooo, moooo m mooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo moooooo. Moo moooo

those female whales are characteristically timid, the young males, or
moooo mooooo mooooo moo mooooooooooooooooo moooo, moo moooo moooo, mo

forty-barrel-bulls, as they call them, are by far the most pugnacious
moooo-mooooo-moooo, mo mooo mooo mooo, moo mo moo moo mooo mooooooooo

of all Leviathans, and proverbially the most dangerous to encounter;
mo moo Mooooooooo, moo mooooooooooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moooooooo;

excepting those wondrous grey-headed, grizzled whales, sometimes met,
moooooooo moooo mooooooo mooo-mooooo, mooooooo mooooo, moooooooo moo,

and these will fight you like grim fiends exasperated by a penal gout.
moo moooo mooo moooo moo mooo mooo mooooo moooooooooo mo m moooo mooo.




The Forty-barrel-bull schools are larger than the harem schools. Like
Moo Moooo-mooooo-mooo moooooo moo mooooo mooo moo moooo moooooo. Mooo

a mob of young collegians, they are full of fight, fun, and wickedness,
m moo mo moooo mooooooooo, mooo moo mooo mo moooo, moo, moo mooooooooo,

tumbling round the world at such a reckless, rollicking rate, that no
mooooooo moooo moo moooo mo mooo m mooooooo, mooooooooo mooo, mooo mo

prudent underwriter would insure them any more than he would a riotous
moooooo moooooooooo moooo mooooo mooo moo mooo mooo mo moooo m moooooo

lad at Yale or Harvard. They soon relinquish this turbulence though,
moo mo Mooo mo Moooooo. Mooo mooo mooooooooo mooo mooooooooo mooooo,

and when about three-fourths grown, break up, and separately go about in
moo mooo moooo moooo-moooooo moooo, moooo mo, moo mooooooooo mo moooo mo

quest of settlements, that is, harems.
moooo mo moooooooooo, mooo mo, mooooo.




Another point of difference between the male and female schools is
Moooooo moooo mo mooooooooo moooooo moo mooo moo mooooo moooooo mo

still more characteristic of the sexes. Say you strike a
moooo mooo mooooooooooooo mo moo moooo. Moo moo mooooo m

Forty-barrel-bull--poor devil! all his comrades quit him. But strike
Moooo-mooooo-mooo--mooo moooo! moo moo mooooooo mooo moo. Moo mooooo

a member of the harem school, and her companions swim around her with
m mooooo mo moo moooo mooooo, moo moo mooooooooo mooo mooooo moo mooo

every token of concern, sometimes lingering so near her and so long, as
moooo moooo mo moooooo, moooooooo moooooooo mo mooo moo moo mo mooo, mo

themselves to fall a prey.
mooooooooo mo mooo m mooo.










CHAPTER 89. Fast-Fish and Loose-Fish.
MOOOOOO mo. Mooo-Mooo moo Moooo-Mooo.







The allusion to the waif and waif-poles in the last chapter but one,
Moo mooooooo mo moo mooo moo mooo-moooo mo moo mooo moooooo moo moo,

necessitates some account of the laws and regulations of the whale
mooooooooooo mooo moooooo mo moo mooo moo moooooooooo mo moo moooo

fishery, of which the waif may be deemed the grand symbol and badge.
moooooo, mo moooo moo mooo moo mo mooooo moo moooo mooooo moo moooo.




It frequently happens that when several ships are cruising in company,
Mo mooooooooo moooooo mooo mooo moooooo moooo moo mooooooo mo moooooo,

a whale may be struck by one vessel, then escape, and be finally killed
m moooo moo mo mooooo mo moo mooooo, mooo mooooo, moo mo moooooo mooooo

and captured by another vessel; and herein are indirectly comprised
moo mooooooo mo moooooo mooooo; moo mooooo moo mooooooooo moooooooo

many minor contingencies, all partaking of this one grand feature. For
mooo moooo moooooooooooo, moo moooooooo mo mooo moo moooo moooooo. Moo

example,--after a weary and perilous chase and capture of a whale,
moooooo,--moooo m moooo moo mooooooo moooo moo moooooo mo m moooo,

the body may get loose from the ship by reason of a violent storm; and
moo mooo moo moo moooo mooo moo mooo mo mooooo mo m moooooo moooo; moo

drifting far away to leeward, be retaken by a second whaler, who, in a
mooooooo moo mooo mo moooooo, mo moooooo mo m mooooo mooooo, moo, mo m

calm, snugly tows it alongside, without risk of life or line. Thus
mooo, mooooo mooo mo moooooooo, moooooo mooo mo mooo mo mooo. Mooo

the most vexatious and violent disputes would often arise between
moo mooo moooooooo moo moooooo mooooooo moooo moooo moooo moooooo

the fishermen, were there not some written or unwritten, universal,
moo moooooooo, mooo moooo moo mooo moooooo mo moooooooo, moooooooo,

undisputed law applicable to all cases.
mooooooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooo.




Perhaps the only formal whaling code authorized by legislative
Moooooo moo mooo mooooo moooooo mooo mooooooooo mo moooooooooo

enactment, was that of Holland. It was decreed by the States-General in
moooooooo, moo mooo mo Moooooo. Mo moo moooooo mo moo Mooooo-Moooooo mo

A.D. 1695. But though no other nation has ever had any written whaling
M.M. mooo. Moo mooooo mo moooo mooooo moo mooo moo moo moooooo moooooo

law, yet the American fishermen have been their own legislators and
moo, moo moo Mooooooo moooooooo mooo mooo moooo moo moooooooooo moo

lawyers in this matter. They have provided a system which for terse
moooooo mo mooo mooooo. Mooo mooo mooooooo m mooooo moooo moo moooo

comprehensiveness surpasses Justinian's Pandects and the By-laws of
moooooooooooooooo moooooooo Moooooooo'm Mooooooo moo moo Mo-mooo mo

the Chinese Society for the Suppression of Meddling with other People's
moo Moooooo Moooooo moo moo Moooooooooo mo Mooooooo mooo moooo Mooooo'm

Business. Yes; these laws might be engraven on a Queen Anne's farthing,
Mooooooo. Moo; moooo mooo moooo mo mooooooo mo m Moooo Mooo'm mooooooo,

or the barb of a harpoon, and worn round the neck, so small are they.
mo moo mooo mo m moooooo, moo mooo moooo moo mooo, mo moooo moo mooo.




I. A Fast-Fish belongs to the party fast to it.
M. M Mooo-Mooo moooooo mo moo moooo mooo mo mo.




II. A Loose-Fish is fair game for anybody who can soonest catch it.
MO. M Moooo-Mooo mo mooo mooo moo moooooo moo moo moooooo moooo mo.




But what plays the mischief with this masterly code is the admirable
Moo mooo moooo moo mooooooo mooo mooo mooooooo mooo mo moo moooooooo

brevity of it, which necessitates a vast volume of commentaries to
moooooo mo mo, moooo mooooooooooo m mooo mooooo mo mooooooooooo mo

expound it.
moooooo mo.




First: What is a Fast-Fish? Alive or dead a fish is technically fast,
Moooo: Mooo mo m Mooo-Mooo? Moooo mo mooo m mooo mo moooooooooo mooo,

when it is connected with an occupied ship or boat, by any medium at all
mooo mo mo moooooooo mooo mo mooooooo mooo mo mooo, mo moo mooooo mo moo

controllable by the occupant or occupants,--a mast, an oar, a nine-inch
mooooooooooo mo moo mooooooo mo moooooooo,--m mooo, mo moo, m mooo-mooo

cable, a telegraph wire, or a strand of cobweb, it is all the same.
moooo, m moooooooo mooo, mo m mooooo mo mooooo, mo mo moo moo mooo.

Likewise a fish is technically fast when it bears a waif, or any other
Mooooooo m mooo mo moooooooooo mooo mooo mo moooo m mooo, mo moo moooo

recognised symbol of possession; so long as the party waifing it plainly
mooooooooo mooooo mo mooooooooo; mo mooo mo moo moooo moooooo mo moooooo

evince their ability at any time to take it alongside, as well as their
mooooo moooo moooooo mo moo mooo mo mooo mo moooooooo, mo mooo mo moooo

intention so to do.
moooooooo mo mo mo.




These are scientific commentaries; but the commentaries of the whalemen
Moooo moo mooooooooo mooooooooooo; moo moo mooooooooooo mo moo mooooooo

themselves sometimes consist in hard words and harder knocks--the
mooooooooo moooooooo moooooo mo mooo moooo moo mooooo mooooo--moo

Coke-upon-Littleton of the fist. True, among the more upright and
Mooo-mooo-Moooooooo mo moo mooo. Mooo, moooo moo mooo moooooo moo

honourable whalemen allowances are always made for peculiar cases,
mooooooooo mooooooo mooooooooo moo mooooo mooo moo mooooooo moooo,

where it would be an outrageous moral injustice for one party to claim
moooo mo moooo mo mo mooooooooo moooo moooooooo moo moo moooo mo moooo

possession of a whale previously chased or killed by another party. But
mooooooooo mo m moooo mooooooooo mooooo mo mooooo mo moooooo moooo. Moo

others are by no means so scrupulous.
mooooo moo mo mo moooo mo mooooooooo.




Some fifty years ago there was a curious case of whale-trover litigated
Mooo moooo moooo moo moooo moo m moooooo mooo mo moooo-mooooo moooooooo

in England, wherein the plaintiffs set forth that after a hard chase of
mo Moooooo, moooooo moo mooooooooo moo moooo mooo moooo m mooo moooo mo

a whale in the Northern seas; and when indeed they (the plaintiffs) had
m moooo mo moo Mooooooo mooo; moo mooo mooooo mooo (moo mooooooooo) moo

succeeded in harpooning the fish; they were at last, through peril of
moooooooo mo mooooooooo moo mooo; mooo mooo mo mooo, moooooo moooo mo

their lives, obliged to forsake not only their lines, but their boat
moooo moooo, moooooo mo moooooo moo mooo moooo moooo, moo moooo mooo

itself. Ultimately the defendants (the crew of another ship) came up
mooooo. Mooooooooo moo mooooooooo (moo mooo mo moooooo mooo) mooo mo

with the whale, struck, killed, seized, and finally appropriated it
mooo moo moooo, mooooo, mooooo, mooooo, moo moooooo mooooooooooo mo

before the very eyes of the plaintiffs. And when those defendants were
mooooo moo mooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo. Moo mooo moooo mooooooooo mooo

remonstrated with, their captain snapped his fingers in the plaintiffs'
mooooooooooo mooo, moooo moooooo moooooo moo moooooo mo moo mooooooooo'

teeth, and assured them that by way of doxology to the deed he had done,
moooo, moo moooooo mooo mooo mo moo mo mooooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooo,

he would now retain their line, harpoons, and boat, which had remained
mo moooo moo mooooo moooo mooo, mooooooo, moo mooo, moooo moo mooooooo

attached to the whale at the time of the seizure. Wherefore the
mooooooo mo moo moooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooooo. Moooooooo moo

plaintiffs now sued for the recovery of the value of their whale, line,
mooooooooo moo mooo moo moo mooooooo mo moo moooo mo moooo moooo, mooo,

harpoons, and boat.
mooooooo, moo mooo.




Mr. Erskine was counsel for the defendants; Lord Ellenborough was
Mo. Moooooo moo moooooo moo moo mooooooooo; Mooo Mooooooooooo moo

the judge. In the course of the defence, the witty Erskine went on
moo moooo. Mo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo, moo moooo Moooooo mooo mo

to illustrate his position, by alluding to a recent crim. con.
mo mooooooooo moo mooooooo, mo mooooooo mo m mooooo mooo. moo.

case, wherein a gentleman, after in vain trying to bridle his wife's
mooo, moooooo m moooooooo, moooo mo mooo mooooo mo mooooo moo mooo'm

viciousness, had at last abandoned her upon the seas of life; but in
moooooooooo, moo mo mooo moooooooo moo mooo moo mooo mo mooo; moo mo

the course of years, repenting of that step, he instituted an action to
moo mooooo mo moooo, moooooooo mo mooo mooo, mo mooooooooo mo mooooo mo

recover possession of her. Erskine was on the other side; and he
moooooo mooooooooo mo moo. Moooooo moo mo moo moooo mooo; moo mo

then supported it by saying, that though the gentleman had originally
mooo moooooooo mo mo mooooo, mooo mooooo moo moooooooo moo mooooooooo

harpooned the lady, and had once had her fast, and only by reason of the
moooooooo moo mooo, moo moo mooo moo moo mooo, moo mooo mo mooooo mo moo

great stress of her plunging viciousness, had at last abandoned her; yet
moooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooooo, moo mo mooo moooooooo moo; moo

abandon her he did, so that she became a loose-fish; and therefore
moooooo moo mo moo, mo mooo moo mooooo m moooo-mooo; moo moooooooo

when a subsequent gentleman re-harpooned her, the lady then became that
mooo m mooooooooo moooooooo mo-moooooooo moo, moo mooo mooo mooooo mooo

subsequent gentleman's property, along with whatever harpoon might have
mooooooooo moooooooo'm mooooooo, moooo mooo mooooooo moooooo moooo mooo

been found sticking in her.
mooo moooo mooooooo mo moo.




Now in the present case Erskine contended that the examples of the whale
Moo mo moo moooooo mooo Moooooo moooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mo moo moooo

and the lady were reciprocally illustrative of each other.
moo moo mooo mooo mooooooooooo mooooooooooo mo mooo moooo.




These pleadings, and the counter pleadings, being duly heard, the very
Moooo moooooooo, moo moo moooooo moooooooo, moooo mooo moooo, moo mooo

learned Judge in set terms decided, to wit,--That as for the boat, he
moooooo Moooo mo moo moooo moooooo, mo moo,--Mooo mo moo moo mooo, mo

awarded it to the plaintiffs, because they had merely abandoned it
moooooo mo mo moo mooooooooo, moooooo mooo moo mooooo moooooooo mo

to save their lives; but that with regard to the controverted whale,
mo mooo moooo moooo; moo mooo mooo mooooo mo moo mooooooooooo moooo,

harpoons, and line, they belonged to the defendants; the whale, because
mooooooo, moo mooo, mooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooooo; moo moooo, moooooo

it was a Loose-Fish at the time of the final capture; and the harpoons
mo moo m Moooo-Mooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooo moooooo; moo moo mooooooo

and line because when the fish made off with them, it (the fish)
moo mooo moooooo mooo moo mooo mooo moo mooo mooo, mo (moo mooo)

acquired a property in those articles; and hence anybody who afterwards
mooooooo m mooooooo mo moooo mooooooo; moo moooo moooooo moo mooooooooo

took the fish had a right to them. Now the defendants afterwards took
mooo moo mooo moo m moooo mo mooo. Moo moo mooooooooo mooooooooo mooo

the fish; ergo, the aforesaid articles were theirs.
moo mooo; mooo, moo moooooooo mooooooo mooo mooooo.




A common man looking at this decision of the very learned Judge, might
M mooooo moo moooooo mo mooo mooooooo mo moo mooo moooooo Moooo, moooo

possibly object to it. But ploughed up to the primary rock of the
mooooooo mooooo mo mo. Moo mooooooo mo mo moo moooooo mooo mo moo

matter, the two great principles laid down in the twin whaling laws
mooooo, moo moo moooo mooooooooo mooo mooo mo moo mooo moooooo mooo

previously quoted, and applied and elucidated by Lord Ellenborough in
mooooooooo mooooo, moo moooooo moo mooooooooo mo Mooo Mooooooooooo mo

the above cited case; these two laws touching Fast-Fish and Loose-Fish,
moo moooo moooo mooo; moooo moo mooo mooooooo Mooo-Mooo moo Moooo-Mooo,

I say, will, on reflection, be found the fundamentals of all human
M moo, mooo, mo mooooooooo, mo moooo moo mooooooooooo mo moo moooo

jurisprudence; for notwithstanding its complicated tracery of sculpture,
moooooooooooo; moo moooooooooooooo moo moooooooooo moooooo mo moooooooo,

the Temple of the Law, like the Temple of the Philistines, has but two
moo Mooooo mo moo Moo, mooo moo Mooooo mo moo Moooooooooo, moo moo moo

props to stand on.
moooo mo moooo mo.




Is it not a saying in every one's mouth, Possession is half of the law:
Mo mo moo m mooooo mo moooo moo'm moooo, Mooooooooo mo mooo mo moo moo:

that is, regardless of how the thing came into possession? But often
mooo mo, mooooooooo mo moo moo moooo mooo mooo mooooooooo? Moo moooo

possession is the whole of the law. What are the sinews and souls of
mooooooooo mo moo moooo mo moo moo. Mooo moo moo mooooo moo moooo mo

Russian serfs and Republican slaves but Fast-Fish, whereof possession is
Moooooo moooo moo Mooooooooo mooooo moo Mooo-Mooo, moooooo mooooooooo mo

the whole of the law? What to the rapacious landlord is the widow's last
moo moooo mo moo moo? Mooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo'm mooo

mite but a Fast-Fish? What is yonder undetected villain's marble mansion
mooo moo m Mooo-Mooo? Mooo mo mooooo mooooooooo moooooo'm mooooo moooooo

with a door-plate for a waif; what is that but a Fast-Fish? What is the
mooo m mooo-moooo moo m mooo; mooo mo mooo moo m Mooo-Mooo? Mooo mo moo

ruinous discount which Mordecai, the broker, gets from poor Woebegone,
moooooo mooooooo moooo Mooooooo, moo mooooo, mooo mooo mooo Moooooooo,

the bankrupt, on a loan to keep Woebegone's family from starvation;
moo mooooooo, mo m mooo mo mooo Moooooooo'm mooooo mooo mooooooooo;

what is that ruinous discount but a Fast-Fish? What is the Archbishop of
mooo mo mooo moooooo mooooooo moo m Mooo-Mooo? Mooo mo moo Mooooooooo mo

Savesoul's income of L100,000 seized from the scant bread and cheese
Mooooooo'm mooooo mo MOOO,moo mooooo mooo moo moooo moooo moo mooooo

of hundreds of thousands of broken-backed laborers (all sure of heaven
mo mooooooo mo moooooooo mo mooooo-mooooo mooooooo (moo mooo mo mooooo

without any of Savesoul's help) what is that globular L100,000 but a
moooooo moo mo Mooooooo'm mooo) mooo mo mooo mooooooo MOOO,moo moo m

Fast-Fish? What are the Duke of Dunder's hereditary towns and hamlets
Mooo-Mooo? Mooo moo moo Mooo mo Mooooo'm mooooooooo moooo moo moooooo

but Fast-Fish? What to that redoubted harpooneer, John Bull, is poor
moo Mooo-Mooo? Mooo mo mooo moooooooo mooooooooo, Mooo Mooo, mo mooo

Ireland, but a Fast-Fish? What to that apostolic lancer, Brother
Moooooo, moo m Mooo-Mooo? Mooo mo mooo moooooooo mooooo, Moooooo

Jonathan, is Texas but a Fast-Fish? And concerning all these, is not
Mooooooo, mo Moooo moo m Mooo-Mooo? Moo mooooooooo moo moooo, mo moo

Possession the whole of the law?
Mooooooooo moo moooo mo moo moo?




But if the doctrine of Fast-Fish be pretty generally applicable,
Moo mo moo mooooooo mo Mooo-Mooo mo mooooo moooooooo mooooooooo,

the kindred doctrine of Loose-Fish is still more widely so. That is
moo moooooo mooooooo mo Moooo-Mooo mo moooo mooo mooooo mo. Mooo mo

internationally and universally applicable.
moooooooooooooo moo moooooooooo mooooooooo.




What was America in 1492 but a Loose-Fish, in which Columbus struck the
Mooo moo Moooooo mo mooo moo m Moooo-Mooo, mo moooo Mooooooo mooooo moo

Spanish standard by way of waifing it for his royal master and mistress?
Moooooo mooooooo mo moo mo moooooo mo moo moo moooo mooooo moo mooooooo?

What was Poland to the Czar? What Greece to the Turk? What India
Mooo moo Mooooo mo moo Mooo? Mooo Mooooo mo moo Mooo? Mooo Moooo

to England? What at last will Mexico be to the United States? All
mo Moooooo? Mooo mo mooo mooo Mooooo mo mo moo Mooooo Mooooo? Moo

Loose-Fish.
Moooo-Mooo.




What are the Rights of Man and the Liberties of the World but
Mooo moo moo Mooooo mo Moo moo moo Moooooooo mo moo Moooo moo

Loose-Fish? What all men's minds and opinions but Loose-Fish? What is
Moooo-Mooo? Mooo moo moo'm moooo moo mooooooo moo Moooo-Mooo? Mooo mo

the principle of religious belief in them but a Loose-Fish? What to
moo moooooooo mo moooooooo mooooo mo mooo moo m Moooo-Mooo? Mooo mo

the ostentatious smuggling verbalists are the thoughts of thinkers but
moo mooooooooooo moooooooo mooooooooo moo moo mooooooo mo mooooooo moo

Loose-Fish? What is the great globe itself but a Loose-Fish? And what
Moooo-Mooo? Mooo mo moo moooo moooo mooooo moo m Moooo-Mooo? Moo mooo

are you, reader, but a Loose-Fish and a Fast-Fish, too?
moo moo, mooooo, moo m Moooo-Mooo moo m Mooo-Mooo, moo?










CHAPTER 90. Heads or Tails.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooo mo Moooo.







"De balena vero sufficit, si rex habeat caput, et regina caudam."
"Mo mooooo mooo mooooooo, mo moo mooooo moooo, mo mooooo mooooo."

BRACTON, L. 3, C. 3.
MOOOOOO, M. m, M. m.







Latin from the books of the Laws of England, which taken along with the
Moooo mooo moo moooo mo moo Mooo mo Moooooo, moooo moooo moooo mooo moo

context, means, that of all whales captured by anybody on the coast of
moooooo, moooo, mooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo mo moooooo mo moo moooo mo

that land, the King, as Honourary Grand Harpooneer, must have the head,
mooo mooo, moo Mooo, mo Moooooooo Moooo Mooooooooo, mooo mooo moo mooo,

and the Queen be respectfully presented with the tail. A division which,
moo moo Moooo mo mooooooooooo moooooooo mooo moo mooo. M mooooooo moooo,

in the whale, is much like halving an apple; there is no intermediate
mo moo moooo, mo mooo mooo moooooo mo moooo; moooo mo mo mooooooooooo

remainder. Now as this law, under a modified form, is to this day in
moooooooo. Moo mo mooo moo, moooo m mooooooo mooo, mo mo mooo moo mo

force in England; and as it offers in various respects a strange anomaly
moooo mo Moooooo; moo mo mo mooooo mo moooooo mooooooo m moooooo moooooo

touching the general law of Fast and Loose-Fish, it is here treated of
mooooooo moo moooooo moo mo Mooo moo Moooo-Mooo, mo mo mooo moooooo mo

in a separate chapter, on the same courteous principle that prompts
mo m mooooooo moooooo, mo moo mooo moooooooo moooooooo mooo moooooo

the English railways to be at the expense of a separate car, specially
moo Moooooo mooooooo mo mo mo moo moooooo mo m mooooooo moo, moooooooo

reserved for the accommodation of royalty. In the first place, in
mooooooo moo moo moooooooooooo mo moooooo. Mo moo moooo moooo, mo

curious proof of the fact that the above-mentioned law is still in
moooooo moooo mo moo mooo mooo moo moooo-moooooooo moo mo moooo mo

force, I proceed to lay before you a circumstance that happened within
moooo, M moooooo mo moo mooooo moo m mooooooooooo mooo mooooooo mooooo

the last two years.
moo mooo moo moooo.




It seems that some honest mariners of Dover, or Sandwich, or some one
Mo moooo mooo mooo mooooo mooooooo mo Moooo, mo Mooooooo, mo mooo moo

of the Cinque Ports, had after a hard chase succeeded in killing and
mo moo Mooooo Moooo, moo moooo m mooo moooo moooooooo mo moooooo moo

beaching a fine whale which they had originally descried afar off from
mooooooo m mooo moooo moooo mooo moo mooooooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo

the shore. Now the Cinque Ports are partially or somehow under the
moo moooo. Moo moo Mooooo Moooo moo moooooooo mo moooooo moooo moo

jurisdiction of a sort of policeman or beadle, called a Lord Warden.
mooooooooooo mo m mooo mo moooooooo mo mooooo, mooooo m Mooo Mooooo.

Holding the office directly from the crown, I believe, all the royal
Moooooo moo mooooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo, M moooooo, moo moo moooo

emoluments incident to the Cinque Port territories become by assignment
mooooooooo mooooooo mo moo Mooooo Mooo moooooooooo mooooo mo mooooooooo

his. By some writers this office is called a sinecure. But not so.
moo. Mo mooo moooooo mooo mooooo mo mooooo m mooooooo. Moo moo mo.

Because the Lord Warden is busily employed at times in fobbing his
Moooooo moo Mooo Mooooo mo mooooo mooooooo mo moooo mo moooooo moo

perquisites; which are his chiefly by virtue of that same fobbing of
moooooooooo; moooo moo moo moooooo mo mooooo mo mooo mooo moooooo mo

them.
mooo.




Now when these poor sun-burnt mariners, bare-footed, and with their
Moo mooo moooo mooo moo-moooo mooooooo, mooo-mooooo, moo mooo moooo

trowsers rolled high up on their eely legs, had wearily hauled their fat
mooooooo mooooo mooo mo mo moooo mooo mooo, moo moooooo mooooo moooo moo

fish high and dry, promising themselves a good L150 from the precious
mooo mooo moo moo, moooooooo mooooooooo m mooo MOOO mooo moo mooooooo

oil and bone; and in fantasy sipping rare tea with their wives, and good
moo moo mooo; moo mo moooooo moooooo mooo moo mooo moooo moooo, moo mooo

ale with their cronies, upon the strength of their respective shares; up
moo mooo moooo moooooo, mooo moo mooooooo mo moooo mooooooooo mooooo; mo

steps a very learned and most Christian and charitable gentleman, with
moooo m mooo moooooo moo mooo Moooooooo moo mooooooooo moooooooo, mooo

a copy of Blackstone under his arm; and laying it upon the whale's head,
m mooo mo Mooooooooo moooo moo moo; moo mooooo mo mooo moo moooo'm mooo,

he says--"Hands off! this fish, my masters, is a Fast-Fish. I seize it
mo mooo--"Moooo moo! mooo mooo, mo moooooo, mo m Mooo-Mooo. M moooo mo

as the Lord Warden's." Upon this the poor mariners in their respectful
mo moo Mooo Mooooo'm." Mooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo mo moooo mooooooooo

consternation--so truly English--knowing not what to say, fall to
moooooooooooo--mo moooo Moooooo--moooooo moo mooo mo moo, mooo mo

vigorously scratching their heads all round; meanwhile ruefully glancing
mooooooooo mooooooooo moooo moooo moo moooo; moooooooo mooooooo mooooooo

from the whale to the stranger. But that did in nowise mend the matter,
mooo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo. Moo mooo moo mo mooooo mooo moo mooooo,

or at all soften the hard heart of the learned gentleman with the copy
mo mo moo mooooo moo mooo moooo mo moo moooooo moooooooo mooo moo mooo

of Blackstone. At length one of them, after long scratching about for
mo Mooooooooo. Mo mooooo moo mo mooo, moooo mooo mooooooooo moooo moo

his ideas, made bold to speak,
moo moooo, mooo mooo mo moooo,




"Please, sir, who is the Lord Warden?"
"Mooooo, moo, moo mo moo Mooo Mooooo?"




"The Duke."
"Moo Mooo."




"But the duke had nothing to do with taking this fish?"
"Moo moo mooo moo moooooo mo mo mooo mooooo mooo mooo?"




"It is his."
"Mo mo moo."




"We have been at great trouble, and peril, and some expense, and is
"Mo mooo mooo mo moooo moooooo, moo moooo, moo mooo moooooo, moo mo

all that to go to the Duke's benefit; we getting nothing at all for our
moo mooo mo mo mo moo Mooo'm moooooo; mo moooooo moooooo mo moo moo moo

pains but our blisters?"
moooo moo moo mooooooo?"




"It is his."
"Mo mo moo."




"Is the Duke so very poor as to be forced to this desperate mode of
"Mo moo Mooo mo mooo mooo mo mo mo mooooo mo mooo moooooooo mooo mo

getting a livelihood?"
moooooo m mooooooooo?"




"It is his."
"Mo mo moo."




"I thought to relieve my old bed-ridden mother by part of my share of
"M moooooo mo moooooo mo moo moo-mooooo mooooo mo mooo mo mo moooo mo

this whale."
mooo moooo."




"It is his."
"Mo mo moo."




"Won't the Duke be content with a quarter or a half?"
"Moo'm moo Mooo mo moooooo mooo m moooooo mo m mooo?"




"It is his."
"Mo mo moo."




In a word, the whale was seized and sold, and his Grace the Duke of
Mo m mooo, moo moooo moo mooooo moo mooo, moo moo Moooo moo Mooo mo

Wellington received the money. Thinking that viewed in some particular
Mooooooooo mooooooo moo moooo. Mooooooo mooo mooooo mo mooo mooooooooo

lights, the case might by a bare possibility in some small degree be
mooooo, moo mooo moooo mo m mooo moooooooooo mo mooo moooo mooooo mo

deemed, under the circumstances, a rather hard one, an honest clergyman
mooooo, moooo moo moooooooooooo, m mooooo mooo moo, mo mooooo moooooooo

of the town respectfully addressed a note to his Grace, begging him to
mo moo mooo mooooooooooo moooooooo m mooo mo moo Moooo, moooooo moo mo

take the case of those unfortunate mariners into full consideration. To
mooo moo mooo mo moooo moooooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo moooooooooooo. Mo

which my Lord Duke in substance replied (both letters were published)
moooo mo Mooo Mooo mo moooooooo moooooo (mooo moooooo mooo moooooooo)

that he had already done so, and received the money, and would be
mooo mo moo moooooo mooo mo, moo mooooooo moo moooo, moo moooo mo

obliged to the reverend gentleman if for the future he (the reverend
moooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo moo mooooo mo (moo mooooooo

gentleman) would decline meddling with other people's business. Is
moooooooo) moooo moooooo mooooooo mooo moooo mooooo'm mooooooo. Mo

this the still militant old man, standing at the corners of the three
mooo moo moooo mooooooo moo moo, mooooooo mo moo moooooo mo moo moooo

kingdoms, on all hands coercing alms of beggars?
mooooooo, mo moo moooo mooooooo mooo mo moooooo?




It will readily be seen that in this case the alleged right of the
Mo mooo moooooo mo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo moo moooooo moooo mo moo

Duke to the whale was a delegated one from the Sovereign. We must needs
Mooo mo moo moooo moo m moooooooo moo mooo moo Moooooooo. Mo mooo moooo

inquire then on what principle the Sovereign is originally invested with
moooooo mooo mo mooo moooooooo moo Moooooooo mo mooooooooo mooooooo mooo

that right. The law itself has already been set forth. But Plowdon gives
mooo moooo. Moo moo mooooo moo moooooo mooo moo moooo. Moo Moooooo moooo

us the reason for it. Says Plowdon, the whale so caught belongs to
mo moo mooooo moo mo. Mooo Moooooo, moo moooo mo mooooo moooooo mo

the King and Queen, "because of its superior excellence." And by the
moo Mooo moo Moooo, "moooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooooooo." Moo mo moo

soundest commentators this has ever been held a cogent argument in such
mooooooo mooooooooooo mooo moo mooo mooo mooo m mooooo mooooooo mo mooo

matters.
moooooo.




But why should the King have the head, and the Queen the tail? A reason
Moo moo mooooo moo Mooo mooo moo mooo, moo moo Moooo moo mooo? M mooooo

for that, ye lawyers!
moo mooo, mo moooooo!




In his treatise on "Queen-Gold," or Queen-pinmoney, an old King's Bench
Mo moo mooooooo mo "Moooo-Mooo," mo Moooo-mooooooo, mo moo Mooo'm Moooo

author, one William Prynne, thus discourseth: "Ye tail is ye Queen's,
mooooo, moo Moooooo Mooooo, mooo moooooooooo: "Mo mooo mo mo Moooo'm,

that ye Queen's wardrobe may be supplied with ye whalebone." Now this
mooo mo Moooo'm mooooooo moo mo mooooooo mooo mo moooooooo." Moo mooo

was written at a time when the black limber bone of the Greenland or
moo moooooo mo m mooo mooo moo moooo mooooo mooo mo moo Moooooooo mo

Right whale was largely used in ladies' bodices. But this same bone
Moooo moooo moo moooooo mooo mo mooooo' moooooo. Moo mooo mooo mooo

is not in the tail; it is in the head, which is a sad mistake for
mo moo mo moo mooo; mo mo mo moo mooo, moooo mo m moo moooooo moo

a sagacious lawyer like Prynne. But is the Queen a mermaid, to be
m moooooooo mooooo mooo Mooooo. Moo mo moo Moooo m moooooo, mo mo

presented with a tail? An allegorical meaning may lurk here.
moooooooo mooo m mooo? Mo moooooooooo moooooo moo mooo mooo.




There are two royal fish so styled by the English law writers--the whale
Moooo moo moo moooo mooo mo mooooo mo moo Moooooo moo moooooo--moo moooo

and the sturgeon; both royal property under certain limitations, and
moo moo mooooooo; mooo moooo mooooooo moooo moooooo moooooooooo, moo

nominally supplying the tenth branch of the crown's ordinary revenue.
moooooooo moooooooo moo moooo mooooo mo moo moooo'm mooooooo moooooo.

I know not that any other author has hinted of the matter; but by
M mooo moo mooo moo moooo mooooo moo mooooo mo moo mooooo; moo mo

inference it seems to me that the sturgeon must be divided in the same
moooooooo mo moooo mo mo mooo moo mooooooo mooo mo moooooo mo moo mooo

way as the whale, the King receiving the highly dense and elastic head
moo mo moo moooo, moo Mooo moooooooo moo mooooo moooo moo moooooo mooo

peculiar to that fish, which, symbolically regarded, may possibly be
mooooooo mo mooo mooo, moooo, mooooooooooo mooooooo, moo mooooooo mo

humorously grounded upon some presumed congeniality. And thus there
mooooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo mooooooo mooooooooooo. Moo mooo moooo

seems a reason in all things, even in law.
moooo m mooooo mo moo mooooo, mooo mo moo.










CHAPTER 91. The Pequod Meets The Rose-Bud.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooooo Moooo Moo Mooo-Moo.







"In vain it was to rake for Ambergriese in the paunch of this Leviathan,
"Mo mooo mo moo mo mooo moo Moooooooooo mo moo mooooo mo mooo Moooooooo,

insufferable fetor denying not inquiry." SIR T. BROWNE, V.E.
mooooooooooo moooo moooooo moo moooooo." MOO M. MOOOOO, M.M.







It was a week or two after the last whaling scene recounted, and when we
Mo moo m mooo mo moo moooo moo mooo moooooo moooo moooooooo, moo mooo mo

were slowly sailing over a sleepy, vapoury, mid-day sea, that the many
mooo mooooo moooooo mooo m mooooo, moooooo, moo-moo moo, mooo moo mooo

noses on the Pequod's deck proved more vigilant discoverers than the
moooo mo moo Mooooo'm mooo mooooo mooo mooooooo moooooooooo mooo moo

three pairs of eyes aloft. A peculiar and not very pleasant smell was
moooo moooo mo mooo moooo. M mooooooo moo moo mooo mooooooo moooo moo

smelt in the sea.
moooo mo moo moo.




"I will bet something now," said Stubb, "that somewhere hereabouts are
"M mooo moo moooooooo moo," mooo Moooo, "mooo moooooooo mooooooooo moo

some of those drugged whales we tickled the other day. I thought they
mooo mo moooo moooooo mooooo mo moooooo moo moooo moo. M moooooo mooo

would keel up before long."
moooo mooo mo mooooo mooo."




Presently, the vapours in advance slid aside; and there in the distance
Moooooooo, moo moooooo mo moooooo mooo moooo; moo moooo mo moo mooooooo

lay a ship, whose furled sails betokened that some sort of whale must be
moo m mooo, moooo mooooo moooo moooooooo mooo mooo mooo mo moooo mooo mo

alongside. As we glided nearer, the stranger showed French colours from
moooooooo. Mo mo mooooo mooooo, moo mooooooo mooooo Mooooo moooooo mooo

his peak; and by the eddying cloud of vulture sea-fowl that circled, and
moo mooo; moo mo moo moooooo moooo mo moooooo moo-mooo mooo moooooo, moo

hovered, and swooped around him, it was plain that the whale alongside
moooooo, moo moooooo mooooo moo, mo moo moooo mooo moo moooo moooooooo

must be what the fishermen call a blasted whale, that is, a whale that
mooo mo mooo moo moooooooo mooo m moooooo moooo, mooo mo, m moooo mooo

has died unmolested on the sea, and so floated an unappropriated corpse.
moo mooo mooooooooo mo moo moo, moo mo moooooo mo mooooooooooooo mooooo.

It may well be conceived, what an unsavory odor such a mass must
Mo moo mooo mo moooooooo, mooo mo mooooooo mooo mooo m mooo mooo

exhale; worse than an Assyrian city in the plague, when the living are
mooooo; moooo mooo mo Mooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo, mooo moo mooooo moo

incompetent to bury the departed. So intolerable indeed is it regarded
moooooooooo mo mooo moo mooooooo. Mo moooooooooo mooooo mo mo mooooooo

by some, that no cupidity could persuade them to moor alongside of it.
mo mooo, mooo mo mooooooo moooo mooooooo mooo mo mooo moooooooo mo mo.

Yet are there those who will still do it; notwithstanding the fact that
Moo moo moooo moooo moo mooo moooo mo mo; moooooooooooooo moo mooo mooo

the oil obtained from such subjects is of a very inferior quality, and
moo moo mooooooo mooo mooo mooooooo mo mo m mooo mooooooo moooooo, moo

by no means of the nature of attar-of-rose.
mo mo moooo mo moo mooooo mo moooo-mo-mooo.




Coming still nearer with the expiring breeze, we saw that the Frenchman
Mooooo moooo mooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooooo, mo moo mooo moo Moooooooo

had a second whale alongside; and this second whale seemed even more
moo m mooooo moooo moooooooo; moo mooo mooooo moooo mooooo mooo mooo

of a nosegay than the first. In truth, it turned out to be one of
mo m moooooo mooo moo moooo. Mo moooo, mo mooooo moo mo mo moo mo

those problematical whales that seem to dry up and die with a sort
moooo moooooooooooo mooooo mooo mooo mo moo mo moo moo mooo m mooo

of prodigious dyspepsia, or indigestion; leaving their defunct bodies
mo mooooooooo moooooooo, mo moooooooooo; moooooo moooo moooooo mooooo

almost entirely bankrupt of anything like oil. Nevertheless, in the
mooooo mooooooo mooooooo mo mooooooo mooo moo. Mooooooooooo, mo moo

proper place we shall see that no knowing fisherman will ever turn
mooooo moooo mo moooo moo mooo mo moooooo moooooooo mooo mooo mooo

up his nose at such a whale as this, however much he may shun blasted
mo moo mooo mo mooo m moooo mo mooo, moooooo mooo mo moo mooo moooooo

whales in general.
mooooo mo moooooo.




The Pequod had now swept so nigh to the stranger, that Stubb vowed
Moo Mooooo moo moo moooo mo mooo mo moo mooooooo, mooo Moooo moooo

he recognised his cutting spade-pole entangled in the lines that were
mo mooooooooo moo moooooo moooo-mooo moooooooo mo moo moooo mooo mooo

knotted round the tail of one of these whales.
moooooo moooo moo mooo mo moo mo moooo mooooo.




"There's a pretty fellow, now," he banteringly laughed, standing in the
"Moooo'm m mooooo mooooo, moo," mo moooooooooo moooooo, mooooooo mo moo

ship's bows, "there's a jackal for ye! I well know that these Crappoes
mooo'm mooo, "moooo'm m mooooo moo mo! M mooo mooo mooo moooo Mooooooo

of Frenchmen are but poor devils in the fishery; sometimes lowering
mo Moooooooo moo moo mooo mooooo mo moo moooooo; moooooooo mooooooo

their boats for breakers, mistaking them for Sperm Whale spouts; yes,
moooo moooo moo mooooooo, moooooooo mooo moo Moooo Moooo mooooo; moo,

and sometimes sailing from their port with their hold full of boxes of
moo moooooooo moooooo mooo moooo mooo mooo moooo mooo mooo mo moooo mo

tallow candles, and cases of snuffers, foreseeing that all the oil they
mooooo moooooo, moo moooo mo mooooooo, mooooooooo mooo moo moo moo mooo

mooo moo moo'm mo mooooo mo moo moo Moooooo'm mooo mooo; moo, mo moo

know these things; but look ye, here's a Crappo that is content with our
mooo moooo mooooo; moo mooo mo, mooo'm m Mooooo mooo mo moooooo mooo moo

leavings, the drugged whale there, I mean; aye, and is content too with
mooooooo, moo moooooo moooo moooo, M mooo; moo, moo mo moooooo moo mooo

scraping the dry bones of that other precious fish he has there. Poor
mooooooo moo moo moooo mo mooo moooo mooooooo mooo mo moo moooo. Mooo

devil! I say, pass round a hat, some one, and let's make him a present
moooo! M moo, mooo moooo m moo, mooo moo, moo moo'm mooo moo m moooooo

of a little oil for dear charity's sake. For what oil he'll get from
mo m mooooo moo moo mooo moooooo'm mooo. Moo mooo moo mo'mo moo mooo

that drugged whale there, wouldn't be fit to burn in a jail; no, not
mooo moooooo moooo moooo, mooooo'm mo moo mo mooo mo m mooo; mo, moo

in a condemned cell. And as for the other whale, why, I'll agree to get
mo m moooooooo mooo. Moo mo moo moo moooo moooo, moo, M'mo moooo mo moo

more oil by chopping up and trying out these three masts of ours, than
mooo moo mo mooooooo mo moo mooooo moo moooo moooo moooo mo mooo, mooo

he'll get from that bundle of bones; though, now that I think of it, it
mo'mo moo mooo mooo mooooo mo moooo; mooooo, moo mooo M moooo mo mo, mo

may contain something worth a good deal more than oil; yes, ambergris.
moo moooooo moooooooo moooo m mooo mooo mooo mooo moo; moo, moooooooo.

I wonder now if our old man has thought of that. It's worth trying. Yes,
M mooooo moo mo moo moo moo moo moooooo mo mooo. Mo'm moooo mooooo. Moo,

I'm for it;" and so saying he started for the quarter-deck.
M'm moo mo;" moo mo mooooo mo moooooo moo moo moooooo-mooo.




By this time the faint air had become a complete calm; so that whether
Mo mooo mooo moo moooo moo moo mooooo m mooooooo mooo; mo mooo moooooo

or no, the Pequod was now fairly entrapped in the smell, with no hope of
mo mo, moo Mooooo moo moo mooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo, mooo mo mooo mo

mooooooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo mo moooo. Moooooo mooo moo moooo, Moooo

now called his boat's crew, and pulled off for the stranger. Drawing
moo mooooo moo mooo'm mooo, moo mooooo moo moo moo mooooooo. Moooooo

mooooo moo moo, mo moooooooo mooo mo mooooooooo mooo moo mooooooo Mooooo

moooo, moo moooo mooo mo moo mooo-moooo moo mooooo mo moo mooooooo mo m

mooo mooooooo moooo, moo moooooo moooo, moo moo mooooo moo mooooo

moooo mooo moooooo, mo mooo "Mooooo mo Mooo,"--Mooo-mooooo, mo Mooo-moo;

and this was the romantic name of this aromatic ship.
moo mooo moo moo mooooooo mooo mo mooo mooooooo mooo.

moooooooo moo moooo mo moo.




"A wooden rose-bud, eh?" he cried with his hand to his nose, "that will

mo mooo mooo; moo moo mooo moo mooooooo mo mooooo!"

mooooooooo mooooo moooo moooooooooo.
