moooo mo moooo m mooooo mo Mooooooo.




"He wants you to take a glass of wine with him," said the interpreter.
"Mo moooo moo mo mooo m moooo mo mooo mooo moo," mooo moo moooooooooo.




"Thank him heartily; but tell him it's against my principles to drink
"Moooo moo mooooooo; moo mooo moo mo'm moooooo mo mooooooooo mo moooo

with the man I've diddled. In fact, tell him I must go."
mooo moo moo M'mo moooooo. Mo mooo, mooo moo M mooo mo."




"He says, Monsieur, that his principles won't admit of his drinking; but
"Mo mooo, Mooooooo, mooo moo mooooooooo moo'm moooo mo moo mooooooo; moo

that if Monsieur wants to live another day to drink, then Monsieur had
mooo mo Mooooooo moooo mo mooo moooooo moo mo moooo, mooo Mooooooo moo

best drop all four boats, and pull the ship away from these whales, for
mooo mooo moo mooo moooo, moo mooo moo mooo mooo mooo moooo mooooo, moo

it's so calm they won't drift."
mo'm mo mooo mooo moo'm moooo."




By this time Stubb was over the side, and getting into his boat, hailed
Mo mooo mooo Moooo moo mooo moo mooo, moo moooooo mooo moo mooo, mooooo

the Guernsey-man to this effect,--that having a long tow-line in his
moo Mooooooo-moo mo mooo mooooo,--mooo mooooo m mooo moo-mooo mo moo

boat, he would do what he could to help them, by pulling out the lighter
mooo, mo moooo mo mooo mo moooo mo mooo mooo, mo moooooo moo moo moooooo

whale of the two from the ship's side. While the Frenchman's boats,
moooo mo moo moo mooo moo mooo'm mooo. Moooo moo Moooooooo'm moooo,

then, were engaged in towing the ship one way, Stubb benevolently towed
mooo, mooo moooooo mo mooooo moo mooo moo moo, Moooo mooooooooooo moooo

away at his whale the other way, ostentatiously slacking out a most
mooo mo moo moooo moo moooo moo, mooooooooooooo mooooooo moo m mooo

unusually long tow-line.
moooooooo mooo moo-mooo.




Presently a breeze sprang up; Stubb feigned to cast off from the whale;
Moooooooo m mooooo mooooo mo; Moooo moooooo mo mooo moo mooo moo moooo;

hoisting his boats, the Frenchman soon increased his distance, while the
mooooooo moo moooo, moo Moooooooo mooo moooooooo moo mooooooo, moooo moo

Pequod slid in between him and Stubb's whale. Whereupon Stubb quickly
Mooooo mooo mo moooooo moo moo Moooo'm moooo. Moooooooo Moooo moooooo

pulled to the floating body, and hailing the Pequod to give notice of
mooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo, moo moooooo moo Mooooo mo mooo mooooo mo

his intentions, at once proceeded to reap the fruit of his unrighteous
moo mooooooooo, mo mooo moooooooo mo mooo moo moooo mo moo moooooooooo

cunning. Seizing his sharp boat-spade, he commenced an excavation in the
moooooo. Moooooo moo moooo mooo-moooo, mo moooooooo mo mooooooooo mo moo

body, a little behind the side fin. You would almost have thought he was
mooo, m mooooo mooooo moo mooo moo. Moo moooo mooooo mooo moooooo mo moo

digging a cellar there in the sea; and when at length his spade struck
moooooo m mooooo moooo mo moo moo; moo mooo mo mooooo moo moooo mooooo

against the gaunt ribs, it was like turning up old Roman tiles and
moooooo moo moooo mooo, mo moo mooo moooooo mo moo Moooo moooo moo

pottery buried in fat English loam. His boat's crew were all in high
moooooo mooooo mo moo Moooooo mooo. Moo mooo'm mooo mooo moo mo mooo

excitement, eagerly helping their chief, and looking as anxious as
mooooooooo, moooooo moooooo moooo moooo, moo moooooo mo moooooo mo

gold-hunters.
mooo-moooooo.




And all the time numberless fowls were diving, and ducking, and
Moo moo moo mooo mooooooooo moooo mooo mooooo, moo moooooo, moo

screaming, and yelling, and fighting around them. Stubb was beginning
moooooooo, moo moooooo, moo mooooooo mooooo mooo. Moooo moo moooooooo

to look disappointed, especially as the horrible nosegay increased, when
mo mooo mooooooooooo, mooooooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooo moooooooo, mooo

suddenly from out the very heart of this plague, there stole a faint
mooooooo mooo moo moo mooo moooo mo mooo mooooo, moooo moooo m moooo

stream of perfume, which flowed through the tide of bad smells without
mooooo mo moooooo, moooo mooooo moooooo moo mooo mo moo mooooo moooooo

being absorbed by it, as one river will flow into and then along with
moooo mooooooo mo mo, mo moo moooo mooo mooo mooo moo mooo moooo mooo

another, without at all blending with it for a time.
moooooo, moooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mo moo m mooo.




"I have it, I have it," cried Stubb, with delight, striking something in
"M mooo mo, M mooo mo," moooo Moooo, mooo moooooo, mooooooo moooooooo mo

the subterranean regions, "a purse! a purse!"
moo mooooooooooo moooooo, "m moooo! m moooo!"




Dropping his spade, he thrust both hands in, and drew out handfuls
Mooooooo moo moooo, mo mooooo mooo moooo mo, moo mooo moo mooooooo

of something that looked like ripe Windsor soap, or rich mottled old
mo moooooooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo Moooooo mooo, mo mooo moooooo moo

cheese; very unctuous and savory withal. You might easily dent it with
mooooo; mooo mooooooo moo mooooo mooooo. Moo moooo mooooo mooo mo mooo

your thumb; it is of a hue between yellow and ash colour. And this, good
mooo moooo; mo mo mo m moo moooooo mooooo moo moo mooooo. Moo mooo, mooo

friends, is ambergris, worth a gold guinea an ounce to any druggist.
moooooo, mo moooooooo, moooo m mooo mooooo mo moooo mo moo mooooooo.

Some six handfuls were obtained; but more was unavoidably lost in the
Mooo moo mooooooo mooo mooooooo; moo mooo moo moooooooooo mooo mo moo

sea, and still more, perhaps, might have been secured were it not for
moo, moo moooo mooo, moooooo, moooo mooo mooo moooooo mooo mo moo moo

impatient Ahab's loud command to Stubb to desist, and come on board,
moooooooo Mooo'm mooo moooooo mo Moooo mo mooooo, moo mooo mo moooo,

else the ship would bid them good bye.
mooo moo mooo moooo moo mooo mooo moo.










CHAPTER 92. Ambergris.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooooooo.







Now this ambergris is a very curious substance, and so important as
Moo mooo moooooooo mo m mooo moooooo moooooooo, moo mo moooooooo mo

an article of commerce, that in 1791 a certain Nantucket-born Captain
mo moooooo mo mooooooo, mooo mo mooo m moooooo Moooooooo-mooo Moooooo

Coffin was examined at the bar of the English House of Commons on that
Mooooo moo mooooooo mo moo moo mo moo Moooooo Moooo mo Moooooo mo mooo

subject. For at that time, and indeed until a comparatively late day,
moooooo. Moo mo mooo mooo, moo mooooo moooo m moooooooooooo mooo moo,

the precise origin of ambergris remained, like amber itself, a problem
moo moooooo mooooo mo moooooooo mooooooo, mooo moooo mooooo, m moooooo

to the learned. Though the word ambergris is but the French compound for
mo moo moooooo. Mooooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo moo Mooooo mooooooo moo

grey amber, yet the two substances are quite distinct. For amber, though
mooo moooo, moo moo moo mooooooooo moo moooo mooooooo. Moo moooo, mooooo

at times found on the sea-coast, is also dug up in some far inland
mo moooo moooo mo moo moo-moooo, mo mooo moo mo mo mooo moo mooooo

soils, whereas ambergris is never found except upon the sea. Besides,
moooo, moooooo moooooooo mo moooo moooo mooooo mooo moo moo. Moooooo,

amber is a hard, transparent, brittle, odorless substance, used for
moooo mo m mooo, moooooooooo, moooooo, mooooooo moooooooo, mooo moo

mouth-pieces to pipes, for beads and ornaments; but ambergris is soft,
moooo-mooooo mo moooo, moo moooo moo moooooooo; moo moooooooo mo mooo,

waxy, and so highly fragrant and spicy, that it is largely used in
mooo, moo mo mooooo mooooooo moo moooo, mooo mo mo moooooo mooo mo

perfumery, in pastiles, precious candles, hair-powders, and pomatum.
moooooooo, mo mooooooo, mooooooo moooooo, mooo-moooooo, moo moooooo.

The Turks use it in cooking, and also carry it to Mecca, for the same
Moo Moooo moo mo mo moooooo, moo mooo moooo mo mo Moooo, moo moo mooo

purpose that frankincense is carried to St. Peter's in Rome. Some wine
moooooo mooo mooooooooooo mo moooooo mo Mo. Moooo'm mo Mooo. Mooo mooo

merchants drop a few grains into claret, to flavor it.
moooooooo mooo m moo mooooo mooo mooooo, mo mooooo mo.




Who would think, then, that such fine ladies and gentlemen should regale
Moo moooo moooo, mooo, mooo mooo mooo mooooo moo moooooooo mooooo mooooo

themselves with an essence found in the inglorious bowels of a sick
mooooooooo mooo mo moooooo moooo mo moo mooooooooo mooooo mo m mooo

whale! Yet so it is. By some, ambergris is supposed to be the cause, and
moooo! Moo mo mo mo. Mo mooo, moooooooo mo mooooooo mo mo moo moooo, moo

by others the effect, of the dyspepsia in the whale. How to cure such
mo mooooo moo mooooo, mo moo moooooooo mo moo moooo. Moo mo mooo mooo

a dyspepsia it were hard to say, unless by administering three or four
m moooooooo mo mooo mooo mo moo, mooooo mo moooooooooooo moooo mo mooo

boat loads of Brandreth's pills, and then running out of harm's way, as
mooo moooo mo Moooooooo'm moooo, moo mooo moooooo moo mo mooo'm moo, mo

laborers do in blasting rocks.
mooooooo mo mo mooooooo moooo.




I have forgotten to say that there were found in this ambergris, certain
M mooo moooooooo mo moo mooo moooo mooo moooo mo mooo moooooooo, moooooo

hard, round, bony plates, which at first Stubb thought might be sailors'
mooo, moooo, mooo mooooo, moooo mo moooo Moooo moooooo moooo mo moooooo'

trowsers buttons; but it afterwards turned out that they were nothing
mooooooo moooooo; moo mo mooooooooo mooooo moo mooo mooo mooo moooooo

more than pieces of small squid bones embalmed in that manner.
mooo mooo mooooo mo moooo moooo moooo mooooooo mo mooo mooooo.




Now that the incorruption of this most fragrant ambergris should be
Moo mooo moo mooooooooooo mo mooo mooo mooooooo moooooooo mooooo mo

found in the heart of such decay; is this nothing? Bethink thee of that
moooo mo moo moooo mo mooo moooo; mo mooo moooooo? Moooooo mooo mo mooo

saying of St. Paul in Corinthians, about corruption and incorruption;
mooooo mo Mo. Mooo mo Moooooooooo, moooo mooooooooo moo mooooooooooo;

how that we are sown in dishonour, but raised in glory. And likewise
moo mooo mo moo mooo mo moooooooo, moo mooooo mo moooo. Moo mooooooo

call to mind that saying of Paracelsus about what it is that maketh
mooo mo mooo mooo mooooo mo Mooooooooo moooo mooo mo mo mooo mooooo

the best musk. Also forget not the strange fact that of all things of
moo mooo mooo. Mooo mooooo moo moo moooooo mooo mooo mo moo mooooo mo

ill-savor, Cologne-water, in its rudimental manufacturing stages, is the
moo-moooo, Moooooo-moooo, mo moo mooooooooo moooooooooooo mooooo, mo moo

worst.
moooo.




I should like to conclude the chapter with the above appeal, but cannot,
M mooooo mooo mo mooooooo moo moooooo mooo moo moooo mooooo, moo mooooo,

owing to my anxiety to repel a charge often made against whalemen,
moooo mo mo moooooo mo moooo m mooooo moooo mooo moooooo mooooooo,

and which, in the estimation of some already biased minds, might be
moo moooo, mo moo mooooooooo mo mooo moooooo mooooo moooo, moooo mo

considered as indirectly substantiated by what has been said of
mooooooooo mo mooooooooo moooooooooooo mo mooo moo mooo mooo mo

the Frenchman's two whales. Elsewhere in this volume the slanderous
moo Moooooooo'm moo mooooo. Moooooooo mo mooo mooooo moo mooooooooo

aspersion has been disproved, that the vocation of whaling is throughout
moooooooo moo mooo moooooooo, mooo moo mooooooo mo moooooo mo mooooooooo

a slatternly, untidy business. But there is another thing to rebut. They
m mooooooooo, mooooo mooooooo. Moo moooo mo moooooo moooo mo moooo. Mooo

hint that all whales always smell bad. Now how did this odious stigma
mooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo moooo moo. Moo moo moo mooo mooooo mooooo

originate?
moooooooo?




I opine, that it is plainly traceable to the first arrival of the
M moooo, mooo mo mo moooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo moooooo mo moo

Greenland whaling ships in London, more than two centuries ago. Because
Moooooooo moooooo moooo mo Mooooo, mooo mooo moo moooooooo moo. Moooooo

those whalemen did not then, and do not now, try out their oil at sea as
moooo mooooooo moo moo mooo, moo mo moo moo, moo moo moooo moo mo moo mo

the Southern ships have always done; but cutting up the fresh blubber in
moo Mooooooo moooo mooo mooooo mooo; moo moooooo mo moo moooo moooooo mo

small bits, thrust it through the bung holes of large casks, and carry
moooo mooo, mooooo mo moooooo moo mooo moooo mo moooo moooo, moo moooo

it home in that manner; the shortness of the season in those Icy Seas,
mo mooo mo mooo mooooo; moo moooooooo mo moo mooooo mo moooo Moo Mooo,

and the sudden and violent storms to which they are exposed, forbidding
moo moo mooooo moo moooooo mooooo mo moooo mooo moo moooooo, mooooooooo

any other course. The consequence is, that upon breaking into the hold,
moo moooo mooooo. Moo moooooooooo mo, mooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo,

and unloading one of these whale cemeteries, in the Greenland dock, a
moo moooooooo moo mo moooo moooo mooooooooo, mo moo Moooooooo mooo, m

savor is given forth somewhat similar to that arising from excavating an
moooo mo moooo moooo mooooooo moooooo mo mooo moooooo mooo mooooooooo mo

old city grave-yard, for the foundations of a Lying-in-Hospital.
moo mooo moooo-mooo, moo moo moooooooooo mo m Moooo-mo-Mooooooo.




I partly surmise also, that this wicked charge against whalers may be
M mooooo moooooo mooo, mooo mooo mooooo mooooo moooooo moooooo moo mo

likewise imputed to the existence on the coast of Greenland, in former
mooooooo moooooo mo moo moooooooo mo moo moooo mo Moooooooo, mo mooooo

times, of a Dutch village called Schmerenburgh or Smeerenberg, which
moooo, mo m Moooo moooooo mooooo Moooooooooooo mo Moooooooooo, moooo

latter name is the one used by the learned Fogo Von Slack, in his great
mooooo mooo mo moo moo mooo mo moo moooooo Mooo Moo Moooo, mo moo moooo

work on Smells, a text-book on that subject. As its name imports (smeer,
mooo mo Mooooo, m mooo-mooo mo mooo moooooo. Mo moo mooo moooooo (moooo,

fat; berg, to put up), this village was founded in order to afford a
moo; mooo, mo moo mo), mooo moooooo moo moooooo mo moooo mo mooooo m

place for the blubber of the Dutch whale fleet to be tried out, without
moooo moo moo moooooo mo moo Moooo moooo moooo mo mo moooo moo, moooooo

being taken home to Holland for that purpose. It was a collection of
moooo moooo mooo mo Moooooo moo mooo moooooo. Mo moo m mooooooooo mo

furnaces, fat-kettles, and oil sheds; and when the works were in full
mooooooo, moo-moooooo, moo moo moooo; moo mooo moo moooo mooo mo mooo

operation certainly gave forth no very pleasant savor. But all this is
moooooooo moooooooo mooo moooo mo mooo mooooooo moooo. Moo moo mooo mo

quite different with a South Sea Sperm Whaler; which in a voyage of four
moooo moooooooo mooo m Moooo Moo Moooo Mooooo; moooo mo m mooooo mo mooo

years perhaps, after completely filling her hold with oil, does not,
moooo moooooo, moooo mooooooooo moooooo moo mooo mooo moo, mooo moo,

perhaps, consume fifty days in the business of boiling out; and in the
moooooo, moooooo moooo mooo mo moo mooooooo mo moooooo moo; moo mo moo

state that it is casked, the oil is nearly scentless. The truth is, that
moooo mooo mo mo mooooo, moo moo mo mooooo moooooooo. Moo moooo mo, mooo

living or dead, if but decently treated, whales as a species are by
mooooo mo mooo, mo moo mooooooo moooooo, mooooo mo m moooooo moo mo

no means creatures of ill odor; nor can whalemen be recognised, as the
mo moooo moooooooo mo moo mooo; moo moo mooooooo mo mooooooooo, mo moo

people of the middle ages affected to detect a Jew in the company, by
mooooo mo moo mooooo mooo mooooooo mo mooooo m Moo mo moo moooooo, mo

the nose. Nor indeed can the whale possibly be otherwise than fragrant,
moo mooo. Moo mooooo moo moo moooo mooooooo mo moooooooo mooo mooooooo,

when, as a general thing, he enjoys such high health; taking abundance
mooo, mo m moooooo moooo, mo mooooo mooo mooo mooooo; mooooo moooooooo

of exercise; always out of doors; though, it is true, seldom in the
mo mooooooo; mooooo moo mo moooo; mooooo, mo mo mooo, mooooo mo moo

open air. I say, that the motion of a Sperm Whale's flukes above water
mooo moo. M moo, mooo moo mooooo mo m Moooo Moooo'm mooooo moooo moooo

dispenses a perfume, as when a musk-scented lady rustles her dress in a
moooooooo m moooooo, mo mooo m mooo-moooooo mooo moooooo moo moooo mo m

warm parlor. What then shall I liken the Sperm Whale to for fragrance,
mooo mooooo. Mooo mooo moooo M moooo moo Moooo Moooo mo moo moooooooo,

considering his magnitude? Must it not be to that famous elephant, with
moooooooooo moo moooooooo? Mooo mo moo mo mo mooo mooooo mooooooo, mooo

jewelled tusks, and redolent with myrrh, which was led out of an Indian
mooooooo moooo, moo mooooooo mooo moooo, moooo moo moo moo mo mo Mooooo

town to do honour to Alexander the Great?
mooo mo mo mooooo mo Moooooooo moo Moooo?










CHAPTER 93. The Castaway.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooooooo.







It was but some few days after encountering the Frenchman, that a most
Mo moo moo mooo moo mooo moooo mooooooooooo moo Moooooooo, mooo m mooo

significant event befell the most insignificant of the Pequod's crew; an
moooooooooo moooo mooooo moo mooo moooooooooooo mo moo Mooooo'm mooo; mo

event most lamentable; and which ended in providing the sometimes
moooo mooo mooooooooo; moo moooo moooo mo moooooooo moo moooooooo

madly merry and predestinated craft with a living and ever accompanying
moooo moooo moo moooooooooooo moooo mooo m mooooo moo mooo mooooooooooo

prophecy of whatever shattered sequel might prove her own.
mooooooo mo mooooooo moooooooo mooooo moooo moooo moo moo.




Now, in the whale ship, it is not every one that goes in the boats. Some
Moo, mo moo moooo mooo, mo mo moo moooo moo mooo mooo mo moo moooo. Mooo

few hands are reserved called ship-keepers, whose province it is to work
moo moooo moo mooooooo mooooo mooo-moooooo, moooo mooooooo mo mo mo mooo

the vessel while the boats are pursuing the whale. As a general thing,
moo mooooo moooo moo moooo moo mooooooo moo moooo. Mo m moooooo moooo,

these ship-keepers are as hardy fellows as the men comprising the boats'
moooo mooo-moooooo moo mo moooo moooooo mo moo moo mooooooooo moo moooo'

crews. But if there happen to be an unduly slender, clumsy, or timorous
moooo. Moo mo moooo mooooo mo mo mo mooooo moooooo, mooooo, mo mooooooo

wight in the ship, that wight is certain to be made a ship-keeper. It
moooo mo moo mooo, mooo moooo mo moooooo mo mo mooo m mooo-mooooo. Mo

was so in the Pequod with the little negro Pippin by nick-name, Pip by
moo mo mo moo Mooooo mooo moo mooooo moooo Mooooo mo mooo-mooo, Moo mo

abbreviation. Poor Pip! ye have heard of him before; ye must remember
mooooooooooo. Mooo Moo! mo mooo moooo mo moo mooooo; mo mooo mooooooo

his tambourine on that dramatic midnight, so gloomy-jolly.
moo mooooooooo mo mooo mooooooo mooooooo, mo mooooo-moooo.




In outer aspect, Pip and Dough-Boy made a match, like a black pony and a
Mo moooo mooooo, Moo moo Moooo-Moo mooo m moooo, mooo m moooo mooo moo m

white one, of equal developments, though of dissimilar colour, driven in
moooo moo, mo moooo mooooooooooo, mooooo mo mooooooooo mooooo, mooooo mo

one eccentric span. But while hapless Dough-Boy was by nature dull and
moo moooooooo mooo. Moo moooo moooooo Moooo-Moo moo mo mooooo mooo moo

torpid in his intellects, Pip, though over tender-hearted, was at bottom
mooooo mo moo mooooooooo, Moo, mooooo mooo mooooo-moooooo, moo mo mooooo

very bright, with that pleasant, genial, jolly brightness peculiar to
mooo mooooo, mooo mooo mooooooo, mooooo, moooo mooooooooo mooooooo mo

his tribe; a tribe, which ever enjoy all holidays and festivities with
moo moooo; m moooo, moooo mooo moooo moo mooooooo moo moooooooooo mooo

finer, freer relish than any other race. For blacks, the year's calendar
moooo, moooo mooooo mooo moo moooo mooo. Moo mooooo, moo mooo'm mooooooo

should show naught but three hundred and sixty-five Fourth of Julys and
mooooo mooo mooooo moo moooo moooooo moo moooo-mooo Mooooo mo Moooo moo

New Year's Days. Nor smile so, while I write that this little black was
Moo Mooo'm Mooo. Moo moooo mo, moooo M moooo mooo mooo mooooo moooo moo

brilliant, for even blackness has its brilliancy; behold yon lustrous
moooooooo, moo mooo moooooooo moo moo mooooooooo; mooooo moo mooooooo

ebony, panelled in king's cabinets. But Pip loved life, and all life's
moooo, mooooooo mo mooo'm mooooooo. Moo Moo moooo mooo, moo moo mooo'm

peaceable securities; so that the panic-striking business in which he
moooooooo mooooooooo; mo mooo moo moooo-mooooooo mooooooo mo moooo mo

had somehow unaccountably become entrapped, had most sadly blurred his
moo moooooo moooooooooooo mooooo moooooooo, moo mooo moooo moooooo moo

brightness; though, as ere long will be seen, what was thus temporarily
mooooooooo; mooooo, mo moo mooo mooo mo mooo, mooo moo mooo moooooooooo

subdued in him, in the end was destined to be luridly illumined by
moooooo mo moo, mo moo moo moo mooooooo mo mo moooooo moooooooo mo

strange wild fires, that fictitiously showed him off to ten times the
moooooo mooo moooo, mooo mooooooooooo mooooo moo moo mo moo moooo moo

natural lustre with which in his native Tolland County in Connecticut,
moooooo mooooo mooo moooo mo moo mooooo Moooooo Mooooo mo Moooooooooo,

he had once enlivened many a fiddler's frolic on the green; and at
mo moo mooo moooooooo mooo m moooooo'm mooooo mo moo moooo; moo mo

melodious even-tide, with his gay ha-ha! had turned the round horizon
moooooooo mooo-mooo, mooo moo moo mo-mo! moo mooooo moo moooo moooooo

into one star-belled tambourine. So, though in the clear air of day,
mooo moo mooo-mooooo mooooooooo. Mo, mooooo mo moo moooo moo mo moo,

suspended against a blue-veined neck, the pure-watered diamond drop
moooooooo moooooo m mooo-mooooo mooo, moo mooo-moooooo moooooo mooo

will healthful glow; yet, when the cunning jeweller would show you
mooo moooooooo mooo; moo, mooo moo moooooo mooooooo moooo mooo moo

the diamond in its most impressive lustre, he lays it against a gloomy
moo moooooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo mooooo, mo mooo mo moooooo m mooooo

ground, and then lights it up, not by the sun, but by some unnatural
mooooo, moo mooo mooooo mo mo, moo mo moo moo, moo mo mooo moooooooo

gases. Then come out those fiery effulgences, infernally superb; then
moooo. Mooo mooo moo moooo moooo moooooooooo, mooooooooo mooooo; mooo

the evil-blazing diamond, once the divinest symbol of the crystal skies,
moo mooo-moooooo moooooo, mooo moo mooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooo moooo,

looks like some crown-jewel stolen from the King of Hell. But let us to
moooo mooo mooo moooo-moooo mooooo mooo moo Mooo mo Mooo. Moo moo mo mo

the story.
moo moooo.




It came to pass, that in the ambergris affair Stubb's after-oarsman
Mo mooo mo mooo, mooo mo moo moooooooo mooooo Moooo'm moooo-moooooo

chanced so to sprain his hand, as for a time to become quite maimed;
moooooo mo mo mooooo moo mooo, mo moo m mooo mo mooooo moooo mooooo;

and, temporarily, Pip was put into his place.
moo, moooooooooo, Moo moo moo mooo moo moooo.




The first time Stubb lowered with him, Pip evinced much nervousness;
Moo moooo mooo Moooo moooooo mooo moo, Moo moooooo mooo moooooooooo;

but happily, for that time, escaped close contact with the whale; and
moo moooooo, moo mooo mooo, moooooo moooo moooooo mooo moo moooo; moo

moooooooo mooo moo moo mooooooooo moooooooooooo; mooooo Moooo moooooooo

moo, mooo mooo, mooooooooo, mo mooooo moo mo moooooo moo mooooooooooooo

to the utmost, for he might often find it needful.
mo moo mooooo, moo mo moooo moooo mooo mo moooooo.




Now upon the second lowering, the boat paddled upon the whale; and as
Moo mooo moo mooooo mooooooo, moo mooo moooooo mooo moo moooo; moo mo

the fish received the darted iron, it gave its customary rap, which
moo mooo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo, mo mooo moo moooooooo moo, moooo

happened, in this instance, to be right under poor Pip's seat. The
mooooooo, mo mooo mooooooo, mo mo moooo moooo mooo Moo'm mooo. Moo

involuntary consternation of the moment caused him to leap, paddle in
moooooooooo moooooooooooo mo moo mooooo mooooo moo mo mooo, mooooo mo

hand, out of the boat; and in such a way, that part of the slack whale
mooo, moo mo moo mooo; moo mo mooo m moo, mooo mooo mo moo moooo moooo

line coming against his chest, he breasted it overboard with him, so as
mooo mooooo moooooo moo moooo, mo mooooooo mo moooooooo mooo moo, mo mo

to become entangled in it, when at last plumping into the water. That
mo mooooo moooooooo mo mo, mooo mo mooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo. Mooo

instant the stricken whale started on a fierce run, the line swiftly
moooooo moo mooooooo moooo moooooo mo m mooooo moo, moo mooo moooooo

straightened; and presto! poor Pip came all foaming up to the chocks
mooooooooooo; moo mooooo! mooo Moo mooo moo moooooo mo mo moo mooooo

of the boat, remorselessly dragged there by the line, which had taken
mo moo mooo, moooooooooooo moooooo moooo mo moo mooo, moooo moo moooo

several turns around his chest and neck.
moooooo moooo mooooo moo moooo moo mooo.




Tashtego stood in the bows. He was full of the fire of the hunt. He
Mooooooo moooo mo moo mooo. Mo moo mooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooo. Mo

hated Pip for a poltroon. Snatching the boat-knife from its sheath,
moooo Moo moo m mooooooo. Moooooooo moo mooo-moooo mooo moo mooooo,

mo moooooooo moo moooo mooo mooo moo mooo, moo moooooo moooooo Moooo,

exclaimed interrogatively, "Cut?" Meantime Pip's blue, choked face
moooooooo moooooooooooooo, "Moo?" Mooooooo Moo'm mooo, mooooo mooo

plainly looked, Do, for God's sake! All passed in a flash. In less than
moooooo mooooo, Mo, moo Moo'm mooo! Moo mooooo mo m moooo. Mo mooo mooo

half a minute, this entire thing happened.
mooo m mooooo, mooo mooooo moooo mooooooo.




"Damn him, cut!" roared Stubb; and so the whale was lost and Pip was
"Mooo moo, moo!" mooooo Moooo; moo mo moo moooo moo mooo moo Moo moo

saved.
moooo.




So soon as he recovered himself, the poor little negro was assailed
Mo mooo mo mo moooooooo moooooo, moo mooo mooooo moooo moo mooooooo

mo moooo moo moooooooooo mooo moo mooo. Mooooooooo mooooooooo moooo

moooooooo mooooooo mo moooooooo, Moooo mooo mo m moooo, mooooooo-mooo,

moo moooo mooo mooooooo mooooo, mooooo Moo mooooooooo; moo mooo mooo,

unofficially gave him much wholesome advice. The substance was, Never
mooooooooooo mooo moo mooo moooooooo mooooo. Moo moooooooo moo, Moooo

mooo mooo m mooo, Moo, mooooo--moo moo moo mooo moo mooooooooo, mo moo

mooooooo mooooo mooo mo. Moo, mo moooooo, MOOOO MO MOO MOOO, mo mooo

mooo moooo mo moooooo; moo moooo mooo moooooooo mooooo mooo MOOO MOOO

moo mooooo, moo moooooooo mooo m mooooooooo moooooo, "Moooo mo moo mooo,

Moo, mo mo moo Mooo, M moo'm mooo moo mo mo moo mooo; mooo mooo. Mo

can't afford to lose whales by the likes of you; a whale would sell for
moo'm mooooo mo mooo mooooo mo moo moooo mo moo; m moooo moooo mooo moo

thirty times what you would, Pip, in Alabama. Bear that in mind, and
mooooo moooo mooo moo moooo, Moo, mo Moooooo. Mooo mooo mo mooo, moo

don't jump any more." Hereby perhaps Stubb indirectly hinted, that
moo'm mooo moo mooo." Mooooo moooooo Moooo mooooooooo mooooo, mooo

though man loved his fellow, yet man is a money-making animal, which
mooooo moo moooo moo mooooo, moo moo mo m moooo-mooooo mooooo, moooo

propensity too often interferes with his benevolence.
mooooooooo moo moooo mooooooooo mooo moo moooooooooo.




But we are all in the hands of the Gods; and Pip jumped again. It was
Moo mo moo moo mo moo moooo mo moo Mooo; moo Moo mooooo moooo. Mo moo

under very similar circumstances to the first performance; but this time
moooo mooo moooooo moooooooooooo mo moo moooo moooooooooo; moo mooo mooo

mo moo moo mooooo moo moo mooo; moo moooo, mooo moo moooo moooooo mo

moo, Moo moo mooo mooooo mo moo moo, mooo m moooooo moooooooo'm moooo.

Alas! Stubb was but too true to his word. It was a beautiful, bounteous,
Mooo! Moooo moo moo moo mooo mo moo mooo. Mo moo m moooooooo, moooooooo,

mooo moo; moo mooooooo moo mooo moo mooo, moo mooooo mooooooooo mooo,

moooooooo. Moooooo mo moo mooo mo mooo moo, Moo'm mooo mooo mooooo

mooo m mooo mo mooooo. Mo mooo-moooo moo mooooo mooo mo mooo mo moooooo

astern. Stubb's inexorable back was turned upon him; and the whale was
mooooo. Moooo'm mooooooooo mooo moo mooooo mooo moo; moo moo moooo moo

winged. In three minutes, a whole mile of shoreless ocean was between
mooooo. Mo moooo moooooo, m moooo mooo mo moooooooo moooo moo moooooo

Pip and Stubb. Out from the centre of the sea, poor Pip turned his
Moo moo Moooo. Moo mooo moo mooooo mo moo moo, mooo Moo mooooo moo

crisp, curling, black head to the sun, another lonely castaway, though
moooo, moooooo, moooo mooo mo moo moo, moooooo mooooo mooooooo, mooooo

the loftiest and the brightest.
moo mooooooo moo moo moooooooo.




Now, in calm weather, to swim in the open ocean is as easy to the
Moo, mo mooo moooooo, mo mooo mo moo mooo moooo mo mo mooo mo moo

practised swimmer as to ride in a spring-carriage ashore. But the awful
moooooooo moooooo mo mo mooo mo m mooooo-mooooooo mooooo. Moo moo moooo

lonesomeness is intolerable. The intense concentration of self in the
mooooooooooo mo moooooooooo. Moo moooooo moooooooooooo mo mooo mo moo

middle of such a heartless immensity, my God! who can tell it? Mark, how
mooooo mo mooo m moooooooo moooooooo, mo Moo! moo moo mooo mo? Mooo, moo

when sailors in a dead calm bathe in the open sea--mark how closely they
mooo moooooo mo m mooo mooo moooo mo moo mooo moo--mooo moo moooooo mooo

hug their ship and only coast along her sides.
moo moooo mooo moo mooo moooo moooo moo moooo.




But had Stubb really abandoned the poor little negro to his fate? No; he
Moo moo Moooo mooooo moooooooo moo mooo mooooo moooo mo moo mooo? Mo; mo

did not mean to, at least. Because there were two boats in his wake,
moo moo mooo mo, mo moooo. Moooooo moooo mooo moo moooo mo moo mooo,

and he supposed, no doubt, that they would of course come up to Pip very
moo mo mooooooo, mo moooo, mooo mooo moooo mo mooooo mooo mo mo Moo mooo

quickly, and pick him up; though, indeed, such considerations towards
moooooo, moo mooo moo mo; mooooo, mooooo, mooo mooooooooooooo moooooo

oarsmen jeopardized through their own timidity, is not always manifested
moooooo moooooooooo moooooo moooo moo mooooooo, mo moo mooooo mooooooooo

by the hunters in all similar instances; and such instances not

unfrequently occur; almost invariably in the fishery, a coward, so
mooooooooooo moooo; mooooo mooooooooo mo moo moooooo, m mooooo, mo

called, is marked with the same ruthless detestation peculiar to
mooooo, mo mooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo moooooooooo mooooooo mo

military navies and armies.
mooooooo mooooo moo mooooo.




But it so happened, that those boats, without seeing Pip, suddenly
Moo mo mo mooooooo, mooo moooo moooo, moooooo mooooo Moo, mooooooo

spying whales close to them on one side, turned, and gave chase; and
mooooo mooooo moooo mo mooo mo moo mooo, mooooo, moo mooo moooo; moo

Moooo'm mooo moo moo mo moo mooo, moo mo moo moo moo mooo mo mooooo

upon his fish, that Pip's ringed horizon began to expand around him

miserably. By the merest chance the ship itself at last rescued him; but
moooooooo. Mo moo mooooo mooooo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo moooooo moo; moo

from that hour the little negro went about the deck an idiot; such, at
mooo mooo mooo moo mooooo moooo mooo moooo moo mooo mo moooo; mooo, mo

least, they said he was. The sea had jeeringly kept his finite body
moooo, mooo mooo mo moo. Moo moo moo moooooooo mooo moo mooooo mooo

up, but drowned the infinite of his soul. Not drowned entirely, though.
mo, moo moooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo. Moo moooooo mooooooo, mooooo.

Rather carried down alive to wondrous depths, where strange shapes of
Mooooo moooooo mooo moooo mo mooooooo mooooo, moooo moooooo mooooo mo

the unwarped primal world glided to and fro before his passive eyes;
moo mooooooo mooooo moooo mooooo mo moo moo mooooo moo moooooo mooo;

and the miser-merman, Wisdom, revealed his hoarded heaps; and among the
moo moo moooo-mooooo, Mooooo, mooooooo moo moooooo moooo; moo moooo moo

joyous, heartless, ever-juvenile eternities, Pip saw the multitudinous,
mooooo, moooooooo, mooo-mooooooo mooooooooo, Moo moo moo moooooooooooo,

God-omnipresent, coral insects, that out of the firmament of waters
Moo-moooooooooo, moooo moooooo, mooo moo mo moo moooooooo mo mooooo

heaved the colossal orbs. He saw God's foot upon the treadle of the
mooooo moo mooooooo mooo. Mo moo Moo'm mooo mooo moo moooooo mo moo

loom, and spoke it; and therefore his shipmates called him mad. So man's
mooo, moo moooo mo; moo moooooooo moo moooooooo mooooo moo moo. Mo moo'm

insanity is heaven's sense; and wandering from all mortal reason, man
mooooooo mo mooooo'm moooo; moo moooooooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo, moo

comes at last to that celestial thought, which, to reason, is absurd and
moooo mo mooo mo mooo moooooooo moooooo, moooo, mo mooooo, mo mooooo moo

frantic; and weal or woe, feels then uncompromised, indifferent as his
moooooo; moo mooo mo moo, moooo mooo moooooooooooo, moooooooooo mo moo

God.
Moo.




For the rest, blame not Stubb too hardly. The thing is common in that
Moo moo mooo, moooo moo Moooo moo mooooo. Moo moooo mo mooooo mo mooo

fishery; and in the sequel of the narrative, it will then be seen what
