like abandonment befell myself.
mooo moooooooooo mooooo mooooo.










CHAPTER 94. A Squeeze of the Hand.
MOOOOOO mo. M Moooooo mo moo Mooo.







That whale of Stubb's, so dearly purchased, was duly brought to
Mooo moooo mo Moooo'm, mo mooooo moooooooo, moo mooo moooooo mo

the Pequod's side, where all those cutting and hoisting operations
moo Mooooo'm mooo, moooo moo moooo moooooo moo mooooooo mooooooooo

previously detailed, were regularly gone through, even to the baling of
mooooooooo mooooooo, mooo moooooooo mooo moooooo, mooo mo moo mooooo mo

the Heidelburgh Tun, or Case.
moo Moooooooooo Moo, mo Mooo.




While some were occupied with this latter duty, others were employed
Moooo mooo mooo mooooooo mooo mooo mooooo mooo, mooooo mooo mooooooo

in dragging away the larger tubs, so soon as filled with the sperm; and
mo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo mooo, mo mooo mo mooooo mooo moo moooo; moo

when the proper time arrived, this same sperm was carefully manipulated
mooo moo mooooo mooo moooooo, mooo mooo moooo moo moooooooo moooooooooo

ere going to the try-works, of which anon.
moo moooo mo moo moo-moooo, mo moooo mooo.




It had cooled and crystallized to such a degree, that when, with several
Mo moo mooooo moo mooooooooooo mo mooo m mooooo, mooo mooo, mooo moooooo

others, I sat down before a large Constantine's bath of it, I found
mooooo, M moo mooo mooooo m moooo Moooooooooo'm mooo mo mo, M moooo

it strangely concreted into lumps, here and there rolling about in the
mo moooooooo moooooooo mooo moooo, mooo moo moooo moooooo moooo mo moo

liquid part. It was our business to squeeze these lumps back into fluid.
mooooo mooo. Mo moo moo mooooooo mo moooooo moooo moooo mooo mooo moooo.

A sweet and unctuous duty! No wonder that in old times this sperm was
M moooo moo mooooooo mooo! Mo mooooo mooo mo moo moooo mooo moooo moo

such a favourite cosmetic. Such a clearer! such a sweetener! such a
mooo m moooooooo mooooooo. Mooo m moooooo! mooo m moooooooo! mooo m

softener! such a delicious molifier! After having my hands in it for
mooooooo! mooo m moooooooo mooooooo! Moooo mooooo mo moooo mo mo moo

only a few minutes, my fingers felt like eels, and began, as it were, to
mooo m moo moooooo, mo moooooo mooo mooo mooo, moo moooo, mo mo mooo, mo

serpentine and spiralise.
mooooooooo moo moooooooo.




As I sat there at my ease, cross-legged on the deck; after the bitter
Mo M moo moooo mo mo mooo, moooo-mooooo mo moo mooo; moooo moo mooooo

exertion at the windlass; under a blue tranquil sky; the ship under
mooooooo mo moo mooooooo; moooo m mooo mooooooo moo; moo mooo moooo

indolent sail, and gliding so serenely along; as I bathed my hands among
mooooooo mooo, moo moooooo mo mooooooo moooo; mo M mooooo mo moooo moooo

those soft, gentle globules of infiltrated tissues, woven almost within
moooo mooo, mooooo mooooooo mo moooooooooo moooooo, moooo mooooo mooooo

the hour; as they richly broke to my fingers, and discharged all their
moo mooo; mo mooo mooooo moooo mo mo moooooo, moo mooooooooo moo moooo

opulence, like fully ripe grapes their wine; as I snuffed up that
mooooooo, mooo moooo mooo mooooo moooo mooo; mo M moooooo mo mooo

uncontaminated aroma,--literally and truly, like the smell of spring
mooooooooooooo moooo,--moooooooo moo moooo, mooo moo moooo mo mooooo

violets; I declare to you, that for the time I lived as in a musky
moooooo; M moooooo mo moo, mooo moo moo mooo M moooo mo mo m moooo

meadow; I forgot all about our horrible oath; in that inexpressible
mooooo; M mooooo moo moooo moo mooooooo mooo; mo mooo moooooooooooo

sperm, I washed my hands and my heart of it; I almost began to credit
moooo, M mooooo mo moooo moo mo moooo mo mo; M mooooo moooo mo mooooo

the old Paracelsan superstition that sperm is of rare virtue in allaying
moo moo Mooooooooo mooooooooooo mooo moooo mo mo mooo mooooo mo mooooooo

the heat of anger; while bathing in that bath, I felt divinely free from
moo mooo mo moooo; moooo moooooo mo mooo mooo, M mooo mooooooo mooo mooo

all ill-will, or petulance, or malice, of any sort whatsoever.
moo moo-mooo, mo moooooooo, mo mooooo, mo moo mooo mooooooooo.




Squeeze! squeeze! squeeze! all the morning long; I squeezed that sperm
Moooooo! moooooo! moooooo! moo moo moooooo mooo; M mooooooo mooo moooo

till I myself almost melted into it; I squeezed that sperm till a
mooo M mooooo mooooo mooooo mooo mo; M mooooooo mooo moooo mooo m

strange sort of insanity came over me; and I found myself unwittingly
moooooo mooo mo mooooooo mooo mooo mo; moo M moooo mooooo moooooooooo

squeezing my co-laborers' hands in it, mistaking their hands for the
moooooooo mo mo-mooooooo' moooo mo mo, moooooooo moooo moooo moo moo

gentle globules. Such an abounding, affectionate, friendly, loving
mooooo mooooooo. Mooo mo moooooooo, mooooooooooo, mooooooo, mooooo

feeling did this avocation beget; that at last I was continually
moooooo moo mooo moooooooo moooo; mooo mo mooo M moo moooooooooo

squeezing their hands, and looking up into their eyes sentimentally; as
moooooooo moooo moooo, moo moooooo mo mooo moooo mooo moooooooooooo; mo

much as to say,--Oh! my dear fellow beings, why should we longer cherish
mooo mo mo moo,--Mo! mo mooo mooooo mooooo, moo mooooo mo mooooo moooooo

any social acerbities, or know the slightest ill-humor or envy! Come;
moo mooooo mooooooooo, mo mooo moo moooooooo moo-moooo mo mooo! Mooo;

let us squeeze hands all round; nay, let us all squeeze ourselves into
moo mo moooooo moooo moo moooo; moo, moo mo moo moooooo moooooooo mooo

each other; let us squeeze ourselves universally into the very milk and
mooo moooo; moo mo moooooo moooooooo moooooooooo mooo moo mooo mooo moo

sperm of kindness.
moooo mo mooooooo.




Would that I could keep squeezing that sperm for ever! For now, since by
Moooo mooo M moooo mooo moooooooo mooo moooo moo mooo! Moo moo, moooo mo

many prolonged, repeated experiences, I have perceived that in all cases
mooo moooooooo, mooooooo moooooooooo, M mooo moooooooo mooo mo moo moooo

man must eventually lower, or at least shift, his conceit of attainable
moo mooo mooooooooo moooo, mo mo moooo moooo, moo moooooo mo mooooooooo

felicity; not placing it anywhere in the intellect or the fancy; but in
mooooooo; moo moooooo mo mooooooo mo moo moooooooo mo moo moooo; moo mo

the wife, the heart, the bed, the table, the saddle, the fireside, the
moo mooo, moo moooo, moo moo, moo moooo, moo mooooo, moo mooooooo, moo

country; now that I have perceived all this, I am ready to squeeze case
moooooo; moo mooo M mooo moooooooo moo mooo, M mo moooo mo moooooo mooo

eternally. In thoughts of the visions of the night, I saw long rows of
moooooooo. Mo mooooooo mo moo moooooo mo moo moooo, M moo mooo mooo mo

angels in paradise, each with his hands in a jar of spermaceti.
mooooo mo mooooooo, mooo mooo moo moooo mo m moo mo mooooooooo.




Now, while discoursing of sperm, it behooves to speak of other things
Moo, moooo moooooooooo mo moooo, mo mooooooo mo moooo mo moooo mooooo

akin to it, in the business of preparing the sperm whale for the
mooo mo mo, mo moo mooooooo mo moooooooo moo moooo moooo moo moo

try-works.
moo-moooo.




First comes white-horse, so called, which is obtained from the tapering
Moooo moooo moooo-moooo, mo mooooo, moooo mo mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo

part of the fish, and also from the thicker portions of his flukes. It
mooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo mooo moo moooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooo. Mo

is tough with congealed tendons--a wad of muscle--but still contains
mo moooo mooo moooooooo moooooo--m moo mo mooooo--moo moooo mooooooo

some oil. After being severed from the whale, the white-horse is first
mooo moo. Moooo moooo moooooo mooo moo moooo, moo moooo-moooo mo moooo

cut into portable oblongs ere going to the mincer. They look much like
moo mooo mooooooo moooooo moo moooo mo moo mooooo. Mooo mooo mooo mooo

blocks of Berkshire marble.
mooooo mo Moooooooo mooooo.




Plum-pudding is the term bestowed upon certain fragmentary parts of the
Mooo-moooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo mooo moooooo moooooooooo moooo mo moo

whale's flesh, here and there adhering to the blanket of blubber, and
moooo'm moooo, mooo moo moooo mooooooo mo moo moooooo mo moooooo, moo

often participating to a considerable degree in its unctuousness. It is
moooo moooooooooooo mo m mooooooooooo mooooo mo moo mooooooooooo. Mo mo

a most refreshing, convivial, beautiful object to behold. As its name
m mooo mooooooooo, moooooooo, moooooooo mooooo mo mooooo. Mo moo mooo

imports, it is of an exceedingly rich, mottled tint, with a bestreaked
moooooo, mo mo mo mo moooooooooo mooo, moooooo mooo, mooo m mooooooooo

snowy and golden ground, dotted with spots of the deepest crimson and
moooo moo mooooo mooooo, mooooo mooo moooo mo moo moooooo moooooo moo

purple. It is plums of rubies, in pictures of citron. Spite of reason,
mooooo. Mo mo moooo mo mooooo, mo mooooooo mo mooooo. Moooo mo mooooo,

it is hard to keep yourself from eating it. I confess, that once I stole
mo mo mooo mo mooo mooooooo mooo mooooo mo. M moooooo, mooo mooo M moooo

behind the foremast to try it. It tasted something as I should conceive
mooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mo. Mo mooooo moooooooo mo M mooooo mooooooo

a royal cutlet from the thigh of Louis le Gros might have tasted,
m moooo mooooo mooo moo moooo mo Moooo mo Mooo moooo mooo mooooo,

supposing him to have been killed the first day after the venison
moooooooo moo mo mooo mooo mooooo moo moooo moo moooo moo moooooo

season, and that particular venison season contemporary with an
mooooo, moo mooo mooooooooo moooooo mooooo mooooooooooo mooo mo

unusually fine vintage of the vineyards of Champagne.
moooooooo mooo moooooo mo moo moooooooo mo Moooooooo.




There is another substance, and a very singular one, which turns up in
Moooo mo moooooo moooooooo, moo m mooo mooooooo moo, moooo moooo mo mo

the course of this business, but which I feel it to be very puzzling
moo mooooo mo mooo mooooooo, moo moooo M mooo mo mo mo mooo mooooooo

adequately to describe. It is called slobgollion; an appellation
mooooooooo mo mooooooo. Mo mo mooooo moooooooooo; mo moooooooooo

original with the whalemen, and even so is the nature of the substance.
mooooooo mooo moo mooooooo, moo mooo mo mo moo mooooo mo moo moooooooo.

It is an ineffably oozy, stringy affair, most frequently found in the
Mo mo mo moooooooo mooo, moooooo mooooo, mooo mooooooooo moooo mo moo

tubs of sperm, after a prolonged squeezing, and subsequent decanting.
mooo mo moooo, moooo m moooooooo moooooooo, moo mooooooooo moooooooo.

I hold it to be the wondrously thin, ruptured membranes of the case,
M mooo mo mo mo moo mooooooooo mooo, mooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo,

coalescing.
mooooooooo.




Gurry, so called, is a term properly belonging to right whalemen, but
Moooo, mo mooooo, mo m mooo mooooooo moooooooo mo moooo mooooooo, moo

sometimes incidentally used by the sperm fishermen. It designates the
moooooooo mooooooooooo mooo mo moo moooo moooooooo. Mo mooooooooo moo

dark, glutinous substance which is scraped off the back of the Greenland
mooo, moooooooo moooooooo moooo mo moooooo moo moo mooo mo moo Moooooooo

or right whale, and much of which covers the decks of those inferior
mo moooo moooo, moo mooo mo moooo mooooo moo moooo mo moooo mooooooo

souls who hunt that ignoble Leviathan.
moooo moo mooo mooo moooooo Moooooooo.




Nippers. Strictly this word is not indigenous to the whale's vocabulary.
Moooooo. Mooooooo mooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooo'm mooooooooo.

But as applied by whalemen, it becomes so. A whaleman's nipper is
Moo mo moooooo mo mooooooo, mo moooooo mo. M mooooooo'm mooooo mo

a short firm strip of tendinous stuff cut from the tapering part of
m moooo mooo moooo mo moooooooo moooo moo mooo moo mooooooo mooo mo

Leviathan's tail: it averages an inch in thickness, and for the rest, is
Moooooooo'm mooo: mo mooooooo mo mooo mo moooooooo, moo moo moo mooo, mo

about the size of the iron part of a hoe. Edgewise moved along the
moooo moo mooo mo moo mooo mooo mo m moo. Mooooooo moooo moooo moo

oily deck, it operates like a leathern squilgee; and by nameless
mooo mooo, mo mooooooo mooo m mooooooo mooooooo; moo mo mooooooo

blandishments, as of magic, allures along with it all impurities.
moooooooooooo, mo mo moooo, moooooo moooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo.




But to learn all about these recondite matters, your best way is at once
Moo mo moooo moo moooo moooo moooooooo moooooo, mooo mooo moo mo mo mooo

to descend into the blubber-room, and have a long talk with its inmates.
mo moooooo mooo moo moooooo-mooo, moo mooo m mooo mooo mooo moo moooooo.

This place has previously been mentioned as the receptacle for the
Mooo moooo moo mooooooooo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooooo moo moo

blanket-pieces, when stript and hoisted from the whale. When the proper
moooooo-mooooo, mooo mooooo moo moooooo mooo moo moooo. Mooo moo mooooo

time arrives for cutting up its contents, this apartment is a scene of
mooo moooooo moo moooooo mo moo mooooooo, mooo moooooooo mo m moooo mo

terror to all tyros, especially by night. On one side, lit by a dull
mooooo mo moo moooo, mooooooooo mo moooo. Mo moo mooo, moo mo m mooo

lantern, a space has been left clear for the workmen. They generally
moooooo, m moooo moo mooo mooo moooo moo moo moooooo. Mooo moooooooo

go in pairs,--a pike-and-gaffman and a spade-man. The whaling-pike is
mo mo moooo,--m mooo-moo-moooooo moo m moooo-moo. Moo moooooo-mooo mo

similar to a frigate's boarding-weapon of the same name. The gaff is
moooooo mo m moooooo'm mooooooo-mooooo mo moo mooo mooo. Moo mooo mo

something like a boat-hook. With his gaff, the gaffman hooks on to a
moooooooo mooo m mooo-mooo. Mooo moo mooo, moo moooooo moooo mo mo m

sheet of blubber, and strives to hold it from slipping, as the ship
moooo mo moooooo, moo moooooo mo mooo mo mooo mooooooo, mo moo mooo

pitches and lurches about. Meanwhile, the spade-man stands on the sheet
moooooo moo moooooo moooo. Moooooooo, moo moooo-moo mooooo mo moo moooo

itself, perpendicularly chopping it into the portable horse-pieces. This
mooooo, moooooooooooooo mooooooo mo mooo moo mooooooo moooo-mooooo. Mooo

spade is sharp as hone can make it; the spademan's feet are shoeless;
moooo mo moooo mo mooo moo mooo mo; moo mooooooo'm mooo moo mooooooo;

the thing he stands on will sometimes irresistibly slide away from
moo moooo mo mooooo mo mooo moooooooo mooooooooooo moooo mooo mooo

him, like a sledge. If he cuts off one of his own toes, or one of his
moo, mooo m mooooo. Mo mo mooo moo moo mo moo moo mooo, mo moo mo moo

assistants', would you be very much astonished? Toes are scarce among
mooooooooo', moooo moo mo mooo mooo mooooooooo? Mooo moo mooooo moooo

veteran blubber-room men.
moooooo moooooo-mooo moo.










CHAPTER 95. The Cassock.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moooooo.







Had you stepped on board the Pequod at a certain juncture of this
Moo moo moooooo mo moooo moo Mooooo mo m moooooo mooooooo mo mooo

post-mortemizing of the whale; and had you strolled forward nigh the
mooo-moooooooooo mo moo moooo; moo moo moo mooooooo moooooo mooo moo

windlass, pretty sure am I that you would have scanned with no small
mooooooo, mooooo mooo mo M mooo moo moooo mooo moooooo mooo mo moooo

curiosity a very strange, enigmatical object, which you would have seen
moooooooo m mooo moooooo, moooooooooo mooooo, moooo moo moooo mooo mooo

there, lying along lengthwise in the lee scuppers. Not the wondrous
moooo, moooo moooo mooooooooo mo moo moo mooooooo. Moo moo mooooooo

cistern in the whale's huge head; not the prodigy of his unhinged lower
moooooo mo moo moooo'm mooo mooo; moo moo moooooo mo moo mooooooo moooo

jaw; not the miracle of his symmetrical tail; none of these would so
moo; moo moo moooooo mo moo moooooooooo mooo; mooo mo moooo moooo mo

surprise you, as half a glimpse of that unaccountable cone,--longer than
mooooooo moo, mo mooo m moooooo mo mooo moooooooooooo mooo,--mooooo mooo

a Kentuckian is tall, nigh a foot in diameter at the base, and jet-black
m Mooooooooo mo mooo, mooo m mooo mo mooooooo mo moo mooo, moo moo-moooo

as Yojo, the ebony idol of Queequeg. And an idol, indeed, it is; or,
mo Mooo, moo moooo mooo mo Mooooooo. Moo mo mooo, mooooo, mo mo; mo,

rather, in old times, its likeness was. Such an idol as that found in
mooooo, mo moo moooo, moo mooooooo moo. Mooo mo mooo mo mooo moooo mo

the secret groves of Queen Maachah in Judea; and for worshipping which,
moo mooooo mooooo mo Moooo Moooooo mo Moooo; moo moo moooooooooo moooo,

King Asa, her son, did depose her, and destroyed the idol, and burnt it
Mooo Moo, moo moo, moo mooooo moo, moo moooooooo moo mooo, moo moooo mo

for an abomination at the brook Kedron, as darkly set forth in the 15th
moo mo moooooooooo mo moo moooo Mooooo, mo mooooo moo moooo mo moo mooo

chapter of the First Book of Kings.
moooooo mo moo Moooo Mooo mo Moooo.




Look at the sailor, called the mincer, who now comes along, and assisted
Mooo mo moo mooooo, mooooo moo mooooo, moo moo moooo moooo, moo mooooooo

by two allies, heavily backs the grandissimus, as the mariners call it,
mo moo mooooo, moooooo moooo moo mooooooooooo, mo moo mooooooo mooo mo,

and with bowed shoulders, staggers off with it as if he were a grenadier
moo mooo moooo moooooooo, mooooooo moo mooo mo mo mo mo mooo m moooooooo

carrying a dead comrade from the field. Extending it upon the forecastle
mooooooo m mooo moooooo mooo moo moooo. Moooooooo mo mooo moo mooooooooo

deck, he now proceeds cylindrically to remove its dark pelt, as an
mooo, mo moo mooooooo moooooooooooo mo mooooo moo mooo mooo, mo mo

African hunter the pelt of a boa. This done he turns the pelt inside
Moooooo mooooo moo mooo mo m moo. Mooo mooo mo moooo moo mooo mooooo

out, like a pantaloon leg; gives it a good stretching, so as almost to
moo, mooo m moooooooo moo; moooo mo m mooo mooooooooo, mo mo mooooo mo

double its diameter; and at last hangs it, well spread, in the rigging,
mooooo moo mooooooo; moo mo mooo moooo mo, mooo mooooo, mo moo moooooo,

to dry. Ere long, it is taken down; when removing some three feet of it,
mo moo. Moo mooo, mo mo moooo mooo; mooo mooooooo mooo moooo mooo mo mo,

towards the pointed extremity, and then cutting two slits for arm-holes
moooooo moo moooooo moooooooo, moo mooo moooooo moo moooo moo moo-moooo

at the other end, he lengthwise slips himself bodily into it. The mincer
mo moo moooo moo, mo mooooooooo moooo moooooo mooooo mooo mo. Moo mooooo

now stands before you invested in the full canonicals of his calling.
moo mooooo mooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo mo moo moooooo.

Immemorial to all his order, this investiture alone will adequately
Mooooooooo mo moo moo moooo, mooo moooooooooo moooo mooo mooooooooo

protect him, while employed in the peculiar functions of his office.
moooooo moo, moooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo.




That office consists in mincing the horse-pieces of blubber for the
Mooo mooooo mooooooo mo moooooo moo moooo-mooooo mo moooooo moo moo

pots; an operation which is conducted at a curious wooden horse, planted
mooo; mo moooooooo moooo mo moooooooo mo m moooooo mooooo moooo, moooooo

endwise against the bulwarks, and with a capacious tub beneath it, into
moooooo moooooo moo mooooooo, moo mooo m moooooooo moo moooooo mo, mooo

which the minced pieces drop, fast as the sheets from a rapt orator's
moooo moo mooooo mooooo mooo, mooo mo moo mooooo mooo m mooo mooooo'm

desk. Arrayed in decent black; occupying a conspicuous pulpit; intent
mooo. Moooooo mo mooooo moooo; moooooooo m moooooooooo mooooo; mooooo

on bible leaves; what a candidate for an archbishopric, what a lad for a
mo moooo mooooo; mooo m moooooooo moo mo moooooooooooo, mooo m moo moo m

Pope were this mincer!*
Mooo mooo mooo mooooo!*







*Bible leaves! Bible leaves! This is the invariable cry from the mates
*Moooo mooooo! Moooo mooooo! Mooo mo moo mooooooooo moo mooo moo moooo

to the mincer. It enjoins him to be careful, and cut his work into as
mo moo mooooo. Mo moooooo moo mo mo moooooo, moo moo moo mooo mooo mo

thin slices as possible, inasmuch as by so doing the business of
mooo mooooo mo mooooooo, mooooooo mo mo mo moooo moo mooooooo mo

boiling out the oil is much accelerated, and its quantity considerably
moooooo moo moo moo mo mooo moooooooooo, moo moo mooooooo mooooooooooo

increased, besides perhaps improving it in quality.
moooooooo, moooooo moooooo moooooooo mo mo moooooo.










CHAPTER 96. The Try-Works.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Moo-Moooo.







Besides her hoisted boats, an American whaler is outwardly distinguished
Moooooo moo moooooo moooo, mo Mooooooo mooooo mo moooooooo moooooooooooo

by her try-works. She presents the curious anomaly of the most solid
mo moo moo-moooo. Moo mooooooo moo moooooo moooooo mo moo mooo moooo

masonry joining with oak and hemp in constituting the completed ship.
moooooo moooooo mooo moo moo mooo mo mooooooooooo moo moooooooo mooo.

It is as if from the open field a brick-kiln were transported to her
Mo mo mo mo mooo moo mooo moooo m moooo-mooo mooo moooooooooo mo moo

planks.
mooooo.




The try-works are planted between the foremast and mainmast, the most
Moo moo-moooo moo moooooo moooooo moo mooooooo moo mooooooo, moo mooo

roomy part of the deck. The timbers beneath are of a peculiar strength,
moooo mooo mo moo mooo. Moo moooooo moooooo moo mo m mooooooo mooooooo,

fitted to sustain the weight of an almost solid mass of brick and
mooooo mo moooooo moo mooooo mo mo mooooo moooo mooo mo moooo moo

mortar, some ten feet by eight square, and five in height. The
mooooo, mooo moo mooo mo moooo mooooo, moo mooo mo mooooo. Moo

foundation does not penetrate the deck, but the masonry is firmly
mooooooooo mooo moo moooooooo moo mooo, moo moo moooooo mo mooooo

secured to the surface by ponderous knees of iron bracing it on all
moooooo mo moo moooooo mo moooooooo moooo mo mooo moooooo mo mo moo

sides, and screwing it down to the timbers. On the flanks it is cased
moooo, moo mooooooo mo mooo mo moo moooooo. Mo moo mooooo mo mo moooo

with wood, and at top completely covered by a large, sloping, battened
mooo mooo, moo mo moo mooooooooo moooooo mo m moooo, moooooo, mooooooo

hatchway. Removing this hatch we expose the great try-pots, two in
mooooooo. Mooooooo mooo moooo mo mooooo moo moooo moo-mooo, moo mo

number, and each of several barrels' capacity. When not in use, they are
mooooo, moo mooo mo moooooo moooooo' mooooooo. Mooo moo mo moo, mooo moo

kept remarkably clean. Sometimes they are polished with soapstone
mooo mooooooooo moooo. Moooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo moooooooo

and sand, till they shine within like silver punch-bowls. During the
moo mooo, mooo mooo moooo mooooo mooo mooooo moooo-moooo. Mooooo moo

night-watches some cynical old sailors will crawl into them and coil
moooo-moooooo mooo moooooo moo moooooo mooo moooo mooo mooo moo mooo

themselves away there for a nap. While employed in polishing them--one
mooooooooo mooo moooo moo m moo. Moooo mooooooo mo moooooooo mooo--moo

man in each pot, side by side--many confidential communications
moo mo mooo moo, mooo mo mooo--mooo mooooooooooo mooooooooooooo

are carried on, over the iron lips. It is a place also for profound
moo moooooo mo, mooo moo mooo mooo. Mo mo m moooo mooo moo mooooooo

mathematical meditation. It was in the left hand try-pot of the Pequod,
mooooooooooo mooooooooo. Mo moo mo moo mooo mooo moo-moo mo moo Mooooo,

with the soapstone diligently circling round me, that I was first
mooo moo moooooooo mooooooooo mooooooo moooo mo, mooo M moo moooo

indirectly struck by the remarkable fact, that in geometry all bodies
mooooooooo mooooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo, mooo mo mooooooo moo mooooo

gliding along the cycloid, my soapstone for example, will descend from
moooooo moooo moo moooooo, mo moooooooo moo moooooo, mooo moooooo mooo

any point in precisely the same time.
moo moooo mo moooooooo moo mooo mooo.




Removing the fire-board from the front of the try-works, the bare
Mooooooo moo mooo-moooo mooo moo moooo mo moo moo-moooo, moo mooo

masonry of that side is exposed, penetrated by the two iron mouths of
moooooo mo mooo mooo mo moooooo, mooooooooo mo moo moo mooo mooooo mo

the furnaces, directly underneath the pots. These mouths are fitted
moo mooooooo, mooooooo mooooooooo moo mooo. Moooo mooooo moo mooooo

with heavy doors of iron. The intense heat of the fire is prevented
mooo moooo moooo mo mooo. Moo moooooo mooo mo moo mooo mo moooooooo

from communicating itself to the deck, by means of a shallow reservoir
mooo moooooooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo, mo moooo mo m moooooo moooooooo

extending under the entire inclosed surface of the works. By a tunnel
moooooooo moooo moo mooooo mooooooo moooooo mo moo moooo. Mo m mooooo

inserted at the rear, this reservoir is kept replenished with water as
mooooooo mo moo mooo, mooo moooooooo mo mooo moooooooooo mooo moooo mo

fast as it evaporates. There are no external chimneys; they open direct
mooo mo mo mooooooooo. Moooo moo mo mooooooo mooooooo; mooo mooo mooooo

from the rear wall. And here let us go back for a moment.
mooo moo mooo mooo. Moo mooo moo mo mo mooo moo m mooooo.




It was about nine o'clock at night that the Pequod's try-works were
Mo moo moooo mooo m'moooo mo moooo mooo moo Mooooo'm moo-moooo mooo

first started on this present voyage. It belonged to Stubb to oversee
moooo moooooo mo mooo moooooo mooooo. Mo mooooooo mo Moooo mo moooooo

the business.
moo mooooooo.




"All ready there? Off hatch, then, and start her. You cook, fire the
"Moo moooo moooo? Moo moooo, mooo, moo moooo moo. Moo mooo, mooo moo

works." This was an easy thing, for the carpenter had been thrusting his
moooo." Mooo moo mo mooo moooo, moo moo moooooooo moo mooo moooooooo moo

shavings into the furnace throughout the passage. Here be it said that
mooooooo mooo moo moooooo mooooooooo moo moooooo. Mooo mo mo mooo mooo

in a whaling voyage the first fire in the try-works has to be fed for a
mo m moooooo mooooo moo moooo mooo mo moo moo-moooo moo mo mo moo moo m

time with wood. After that no wood is used, except as a means of quick
mooo mooo mooo. Moooo mooo mo mooo mo mooo, mooooo mo m moooo mo moooo

ignition to the staple fuel. In a word, after being tried out, the
mooooooo mo moo mooooo mooo. Mo m mooo, moooo moooo moooo moo, moo

crisp, shrivelled blubber, now called scraps or fritters, still contains
moooo, mooooooooo moooooo, moo mooooo mooooo mo mooooooo, moooo mooooooo

considerable of its unctuous properties. These fritters feed the flames.
mooooooooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooooooo. Moooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo.

Like a plethoric burning martyr, or a self-consuming misanthrope, once
Mooo m moooooooo moooooo mooooo, mo m mooo-moooooooo moooooooooo, mooo

ignited, the whale supplies his own fuel and burns by his own body.
moooooo, moo moooo mooooooo moo moo mooo moo moooo mo moo moo mooo.

Would that he consumed his own smoke! for his smoke is horrible to
Moooo mooo mo mooooooo moo moo moooo! moo moo moooo mo mooooooo mo

inhale, and inhale it you must, and not only that, but you must live in
mooooo, moo mooooo mo moo mooo, moo moo mooo mooo, moo moo mooo mooo mo

it for the time. It has an unspeakable, wild, Hindoo odor about it, such
mo moo moo mooo. Mo moo mo moooooooooo, mooo, Mooooo mooo moooo mo, mooo

as may lurk in the vicinity of funereal pyres. It smells like the left
mo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo mo mooooooo moooo. Mo mooooo mooo moo mooo

wing of the day of judgment; it is an argument for the pit.
mooo mo moo moo mo mooooooo; mo mo mo mooooooo moo moo moo.




By midnight the works were in full operation. We were clear from the
Mo mooooooo moo moooo mooo mo mooo moooooooo. Mo mooo moooo mooo moo

carcase; sail had been made; the wind was freshening; the wild ocean
moooooo; mooo moo mooo mooo; moo mooo moo mooooooooo; moo mooo moooo

darkness was intense. But that darkness was licked up by the fierce
mooooooo moo moooooo. Moo mooo mooooooo moo mooooo mo mo moo mooooo

flames, which at intervals forked forth from the sooty flues, and
mooooo, moooo mo moooooooo mooooo moooo mooo moo moooo moooo, moo

illuminated every lofty rope in the rigging, as with the famed Greek
moooooooooo moooo moooo mooo mo moo moooooo, mo mooo moo moooo Moooo

fire. The burning ship drove on, as if remorselessly commissioned to
mooo. Moo moooooo mooo moooo mo, mo mo moooooooooooo mooooooooooo mo

some vengeful deed. So the pitch and sulphur-freighted brigs of the
mooo mooooooo mooo. Mo moo moooo moo moooooo-moooooooo moooo mo moo

bold Hydriote, Canaris, issuing from their midnight harbors, with broad
mooo Mooooooo, Moooooo, moooooo mooo moooo mooooooo moooooo, mooo moooo

sheets of flame for sails, bore down upon the Turkish frigates, and
mooooo mo moooo moo moooo, mooo mooo mooo moo Moooooo mooooooo, moo

folded them in conflagrations.
mooooo mooo mo mooooooooooooo.




The hatch, removed from the top of the works, now afforded a wide hearth
Moo moooo, moooooo mooo moo moo mo moo moooo, moo mooooooo m mooo mooooo

in front of them. Standing on this were the Tartarean shapes of the
mo moooo mo mooo. Mooooooo mo mooo mooo moo Moooooooo mooooo mo moo

pagan harpooneers, always the whale-ship's stokers. With huge pronged
moooo moooooooooo, mooooo moo moooo-mooo'm moooooo. Mooo mooo moooooo

poles they pitched hissing masses of blubber into the scalding pots, or
moooo mooo moooooo moooooo mooooo mo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo, mo

stirred up the fires beneath, till the snaky flames darted, curling, out
moooooo mo moo moooo moooooo, mooo moo moooo mooooo mooooo, moooooo, moo

of the doors to catch them by the feet. The smoke rolled away in sullen
mo moo moooo mo moooo mooo mo moo mooo. Moo moooo mooooo mooo mo mooooo

heaps. To every pitch of the ship there was a pitch of the boiling oil,
moooo. Mo moooo moooo mo moo mooo moooo moo m moooo mo moo moooooo moo,

which seemed all eagerness to leap into their faces. Opposite the mouth
moooo mooooo moo moooooooo mo mooo mooo moooo moooo. Mooooooo moo moooo

of the works, on the further side of the wide wooden hearth, was the
mo moo moooo, mo moo moooooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo mooooo, moo moo

windlass. This served for a sea-sofa. Here lounged the watch, when not
mooooooo. Mooo mooooo moo m moo-mooo. Mooo moooooo moo moooo, mooo moo

otherwise employed, looking into the red heat of the fire, till their
moooooooo mooooooo, moooooo mooo moo moo mooo mo moo mooo, mooo moooo

eyes felt scorched in their heads. Their tawny features, now all
mooo mooo mooooooo mo moooo moooo. Moooo moooo mooooooo, moo moo

begrimed with smoke and sweat, their matted beards, and the contrasting
mooooooo mooo moooo moo moooo, moooo mooooo mooooo, moo moo moooooooooo

barbaric brilliancy of their teeth, all these were strangely revealed in
mooooooo mooooooooo mo moooo moooo, moo moooo mooo moooooooo mooooooo mo

the capricious emblazonings of the works. As they narrated to each other
moo mooooooooo mooooooooooo mo moo moooo. Mo mooo mooooooo mo mooo moooo

their unholy adventures, their tales of terror told in words of mirth;
moooo mooooo mooooooooo, moooo moooo mo mooooo mooo mo moooo mo moooo;

as their uncivilized laughter forked upwards out of them, like the
mo moooo moooooooooo mooooooo mooooo moooooo moo mo mooo, mooo moo

flames from the furnace; as to and fro, in their front, the harpooneers
mooooo mooo moo moooooo; mo mo moo moo, mo moooo moooo, moo moooooooooo

wildly gesticulated with their huge pronged forks and dippers; as the
mooooo mooooooooooo mooo moooo mooo moooooo moooo moo moooooo; mo moo

wind howled on, and the sea leaped, and the ship groaned and dived, and
mooo mooooo mo, moo moo moo mooooo, moo moo mooo moooooo moo moooo, moo

yet steadfastly shot her red hell further and further into the blackness
moo moooooooooo mooo moo moo mooo moooooo moo moooooo mooo moo moooooooo

of the sea and the night, and scornfully champed the white bone in
mo moo moo moo moo moooo, moo mooooooooo moooooo moo moooo mooo mo

her mouth, and viciously spat round her on all sides; then the rushing
moo moooo, moo moooooooo mooo moooo moo mo moo moooo; mooo moo moooooo

Pequod, freighted with savages, and laden with fire, and burning
Mooooo, moooooooo mooo moooooo, moo moooo mooo mooo, moo moooooo

a corpse, and plunging into that blackness of darkness, seemed the
m mooooo, moo mooooooo mooo mooo moooooooo mo mooooooo, mooooo moo

material counterpart of her monomaniac commander's soul.
mooooooo moooooooooo mo moo mooooooooo moooooooo'm mooo.




So seemed it to me, as I stood at her helm, and for long hours silently
Mo mooooo mo mo mo, mo M moooo mo moo mooo, moo moo mooo moooo mooooooo

guided the way of this fire-ship on the sea. Wrapped, for that interval,
mooooo moo moo mo mooo mooo-mooo mo moo moo. Moooooo, moo mooo mooooooo,

in darkness myself, I but the better saw the redness, the madness, the
mo mooooooo mooooo, M moo moo mooooo moo moo moooooo, moo moooooo, moo

ghastliness of others. The continual sight of the fiend shapes before
moooooooooo mo mooooo. Moo moooooooo moooo mo moo moooo mooooo mooooo

me, capering half in smoke and half in fire, these at last begat kindred
mo, mooooooo mooo mo moooo moo mooo mo mooo, moooo mo mooo moooo moooooo

visions in my soul, so soon as I began to yield to that unaccountable
moooooo mo mo mooo, mo mooo mo M moooo mo moooo mo mooo moooooooooooo

drowsiness which ever would come over me at a midnight helm.
mooooooooo moooo mooo moooo mooo mooo mo mo m mooooooo mooo.




But that night, in particular, a strange (and ever since inexplicable)
Moo mooo moooo, mo mooooooooo, m moooooo (moo mooo moooo mooooooooooo)

thing occurred to me. Starting from a brief standing sleep, I was
moooo mooooooo mo mo. Mooooooo mooo m moooo mooooooo moooo, M moo

horribly conscious of something fatally wrong. The jaw-bone tiller smote
mooooooo moooooooo mo moooooooo moooooo moooo. Moo moo-mooo mooooo moooo

my side, which leaned against it; in my ears was the low hum of sails,
mo mooo, moooo mooooo moooooo mo; mo mo mooo moo moo moo moo mo moooo,

just beginning to shake in the wind; I thought my eyes were open; I
mooo moooooooo mo moooo mo moo mooo; M moooooo mo mooo mooo mooo; M

was half conscious of putting my fingers to the lids and mechanically
moo mooo moooooooo mo moooooo mo moooooo mo moo mooo moo mooooooooooo

stretching them still further apart. But, spite of all this, I could see
mooooooooo mooo moooo moooooo moooo. Moo, moooo mo moo mooo, M moooo moo

no compass before me to steer by; though it seemed but a minute since I
mo moooooo mooooo mo mo moooo mo; mooooo mo mooooo moo m mooooo moooo M

had been watching the card, by the steady binnacle lamp illuminating it.
moo mooo mooooooo moo mooo, mo moo mooooo mooooooo mooo mooooooooooo mo.

Nothing seemed before me but a jet gloom, now and then made ghastly by
Moooooo mooooo mooooo mo moo m moo moooo, moo moo mooo mooo moooooo mo

flashes of redness. Uppermost was the impression, that whatever swift,
moooooo mo moooooo. Moooooooo moo moo mooooooooo, mooo mooooooo moooo,

rushing thing I stood on was not so much bound to any haven ahead as
moooooo moooo M moooo mo moo moo mo mooo moooo mo moo moooo moooo mo

rushing from all havens astern. A stark, bewildered feeling, as of
moooooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo. M moooo, mooooooooo moooooo, mo mo

death, came over me. Convulsively my hands grasped the tiller, but with
moooo, mooo mooo mo. Mooooooooooo mo moooo moooooo moo mooooo, moo mooo

the crazy conceit that the tiller was, somehow, in some enchanted way,
moo moooo moooooo mooo moo mooooo moo, moooooo, mo mooo moooooooo moo,

inverted. My God! what is the matter with me? thought I. Lo! in my brief
mooooooo. Mo Moo! mooo mo moo mooooo mooo mo? moooooo M. Mo! mo mo moooo

sleep I had turned myself about, and was fronting the ship's stern, with
moooo M moo mooooo mooooo moooo, moo moo mooooooo moo mooo'm moooo, mooo

my back to her prow and the compass. In an instant I faced back, just
mo mooo mo moo mooo moo moo moooooo. Mo mo moooooo M moooo mooo, mooo

in time to prevent the vessel from flying up into the wind, and very
mo mooo mo moooooo moo mooooo mooo mooooo mo mooo moo mooo, moo mooo

probably capsizing her. How glad and how grateful the relief from this
mooooooo moooooooo moo. Moo mooo moo moo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo mooo

unnatural hallucination of the night, and the fatal contingency of being
moooooooo moooooooooooo mo moo moooo, moo moo moooo moooooooooo mo moooo

brought by the lee!
moooooo mo moo moo!




Look not too long in the face of the fire, O man! Never dream with thy
Mooo moo moo mooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooo, M moo! Moooo moooo mooo moo

hand on the helm! Turn not thy back to the compass; accept the first
mooo mo moo mooo! Mooo moo moo mooo mo moo moooooo; mooooo moo moooo

hint of the hitching tiller; believe not the artificial fire, when its
mooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo; moooooo moo moo mooooooooo mooo, mooo moo

redness makes all things look ghastly. To-morrow, in the natural sun,
moooooo moooo moo mooooo mooo moooooo. Mo-mooooo, mo moo moooooo moo,

the skies will be bright; those who glared like devils in the forking
moo moooo mooo mo mooooo; moooo moo mooooo mooo mooooo mo moo moooooo

flames, the morn will show in far other, at least gentler, relief; the
mooooo, moo mooo mooo mooo mo moo moooo, mo moooo moooooo, mooooo; moo

glorious, golden, glad sun, the only true lamp--all others but liars!
mooooooo, mooooo, mooo moo, moo mooo mooo mooo--moo mooooo moo moooo!




Nevertheless the sun hides not Virginia's Dismal Swamp, nor Rome's
Mooooooooooo moo moo moooo moo Mooooooo'm Mooooo Moooo, moo Mooo'm

accursed Campagna, nor wide Sahara, nor all the millions of miles of
mooooooo Mooooooo, moo mooo Mooooo, moo moo moo mooooooo mo moooo mo

deserts and of griefs beneath the moon. The sun hides not the ocean,
moooooo moo mo mooooo moooooo moo mooo. Moo moo moooo moo moo moooo,

which is the dark side of this earth, and which is two thirds of this
moooo mo moo mooo mooo mo mooo moooo, moo moooo mo moo mooooo mo mooo

earth. So, therefore, that mortal man who hath more of joy than sorrow
moooo. Mo, moooooooo, mooo mooooo moo moo mooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo

in him, that mortal man cannot be true--not true, or undeveloped. With
mo moo, mooo mooooo moo mooooo mo mooo--moo mooo, mo moooooooooo. Mooo

books the same. The truest of all men was the Man of Sorrows, and the
moooo moo mooo. Moo mooooo mo moo moo moo moo Moo mo Moooooo, moo moo

truest of all books is Solomon's, and Ecclesiastes is the fine hammered
mooooo mo moo moooo mo Moooooo'm, moo Mooooooooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo

steel of woe. "All is vanity." ALL. This wilful world hath not got hold
moooo mo moo. "Moo mo mooooo." MOO. Mooo mooooo moooo mooo moo moo mooo

of unchristian Solomon's wisdom yet. But he who dodges hospitals and
mo moooooooooo Moooooo'm mooooo moo. Moo mo moo mooooo moooooooo moo

jails, and walks fast crossing graveyards, and would rather talk of
moooo, moo moooo mooo mooooooo mooooooooo, moo moooo mooooo mooo mo

operas than hell; calls Cowper, Young, Pascal, Rousseau, poor devils all
mooooo mooo mooo; moooo Mooooo, Moooo, Mooooo, Mooooooo, mooo mooooo moo

of sick men; and throughout a care-free lifetime swears by Rabelais as
mo mooo moo; moo mooooooooo m mooo-mooo mooooooo mooooo mo Mooooooo mo

passing wise, and therefore jolly;--not that man is fitted to sit
moooooo mooo, moo moooooooo moooo;--moo mooo moo mo mooooo mo moo

down on tomb-stones, and break the green damp mould with unfathomably
mooo mo mooo-mooooo, moo moooo moo moooo mooo moooo mooo mooooooooooo

wondrous Solomon.
mooooooo Moooooo.




But even Solomon, he says, "the man that wandereth out of the way
Moo mooo Moooooo, mo mooo, "moo moo mooo moooooooo moo mo moo moo

of understanding shall remain" (I.E., even while living) "in the
mo moooooooooooo moooo mooooo" (M.M., mooo moooo mooooo) "mo moo

congregation of the dead." Give not thyself up, then, to fire, lest it
mooooooooooo mo moo mooo." Mooo moo moooooo mo, mooo, mo mooo, mooo mo

invert thee, deaden thee; as for the time it did me. There is a wisdom
mooooo mooo, mooooo mooo; mo moo moo mooo mo moo mo. Moooo mo m mooooo

that is woe; but there is a woe that is madness. And there is a Catskill
mooo mo moo; moo moooo mo m moo mooo mo moooooo. Moo moooo mo m Mooooooo

eagle in some souls that can alike dive down into the blackest gorges,
moooo mo mooo moooo mooo moo moooo mooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo mooooo,

and soar out of them again and become invisible in the sunny spaces.
moo mooo moo mo mooo moooo moo mooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo mooooo.

And even if he for ever flies within the gorge, that gorge is in the
Moo mooo mo mo moo mooo moooo mooooo moo moooo, mooo moooo mo mo moo

mountains; so that even in his lowest swoop the mountain eagle is still
moooooooo; mo mooo mooo mo moo mooooo moooo moo mooooooo moooo mo moooo

higher than other birds upon the plain, even though they soar.
mooooo mooo moooo moooo mooo moo moooo, mooo mooooo mooo mooo.










CHAPTER 97. The Lamp.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooo.







Had you descended from the Pequod's try-works to the Pequod's
Moo moo moooooooo mooo moo Mooooo'm moo-moooo mo moo Mooooo'm

forecastle, where the off duty watch were sleeping, for one single
mooooooooo, moooo moo moo mooo moooo mooo mooooooo, moo moo mooooo

moment you would have almost thought you were standing in some
mooooo moo moooo mooo mooooo moooooo moo mooo mooooooo mo mooo

illuminated shrine of canonized kings and counsellors. There they lay
moooooooooo mooooo mo moooooooo moooo moo moooooooooo. Moooo mooo moo

in their triangular oaken vaults, each mariner a chiselled muteness; a
mo moooo mooooooooo moooo mooooo, mooo moooooo m moooooooo mooooooo; m

score of lamps flashing upon his hooded eyes.
moooo mo moooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo mooo.




In merchantmen, oil for the sailor is more scarce than the milk of
Mo moooooooooo, moo moo moo mooooo mo mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo mo

queens. To dress in the dark, and eat in the dark, and stumble in
mooooo. Mo moooo mo moo mooo, moo moo mo moo mooo, moo moooooo mo

darkness to his pallet, this is his usual lot. But the whaleman, as he
mooooooo mo moo mooooo, mooo mo moo moooo moo. Moo moo mooooooo, mo mo

seeks the food of light, so he lives in light. He makes his berth an
moooo moo mooo mo moooo, mo mo moooo mo moooo. Mo moooo moo moooo mo

Aladdin's lamp, and lays him down in it; so that in the pitchiest night
Moooooo'm mooo, moo mooo moo mooo mo mo; mo mooo mo moo moooooooo moooo

the ship's black hull still houses an illumination.
moo mooo'm moooo mooo moooo mooooo mo mooooooooooo.




See with what entire freedom the whaleman takes his handful of
Moo mooo mooo mooooo moooooo moo mooooooo moooo moo moooooo mo

lamps--often but old bottles and vials, though--to the copper cooler at
moooo--moooo moo moo moooooo moo moooo, mooooo--mo moo mooooo mooooo mo

the try-works, and replenishes them there, as mugs of ale at a vat. He
moo moo-moooo, moo moooooooooo mooo moooo, mo mooo mo moo mo m moo. Mo

burns, too, the purest of oil, in its unmanufactured, and, therefore,
moooo, moo, moo mooooo mo moo, mo moo mooooooooooooo, moo, moooooooo,

unvitiated state; a fluid unknown to solar, lunar, or astral
mooooooooo moooo; m moooo moooooo mo moooo, moooo, mo mooooo

contrivances ashore. It is sweet as early grass butter in April. He
mooooooooooo mooooo. Mo mo moooo mo moooo moooo mooooo mo Moooo. Mo

goes and hunts for his oil, so as to be sure of its freshness and
mooo moo moooo moo moo moo, mo mo mo mo mooo mo moo moooooooo moo

genuineness, even as the traveller on the prairie hunts up his own
moooooooooo, mooo mo moo moooooooo mo moo moooooo moooo mo moo moo

supper of game.
mooooo mo mooo.










CHAPTER 98. Stowing Down and Clearing Up.
MOOOOOO mo. Moooooo Mooo moo Mooooooo Mo.







Already has it been related how the great leviathan is afar off
Moooooo moo mo mooo moooooo moo moo moooo moooooooo mo mooo moo

descried from the mast-head; how he is chased over the watery moors, and
mooooooo mooo moo mooo-mooo; moo mo mo mooooo mooo moo mooooo moooo, moo

slaughtered in the valleys of the deep; how he is then towed alongside
moooooooooo mo moo moooooo mo moo mooo; moo mo mo mooo moooo moooooooo

and beheaded; and how (on the principle which entitled the headsman of
moo mooooooo; moo moo (mo moo moooooooo moooo mooooooo moo mooooooo mo

old to the garments in which the beheaded was killed) his great padded
moo mo moo mooooooo mo moooo moo mooooooo moo mooooo) moo moooo mooooo

surtout becomes the property of his executioner; how, in due time, he
moooooo moooooo moo mooooooo mo moo moooooooooo; moo, mo moo mooo, mo

is condemned to the pots, and, like Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego, his
mo moooooooo mo moo mooo, moo, mooo Mooooooo, Moooooo, moo Mooooooo, moo

spermaceti, oil, and bone pass unscathed through the fire;--but now it
mooooooooo, moo, moo mooo mooo moooooooo moooooo moo mooo;--moo moo mo

remains to conclude the last chapter of this part of the description by
moooooo mo mooooooo moo mooo moooooo mo mooo mooo mo moo moooooooooo mo

rehearsing--singing, if I may--the romantic proceeding of decanting off
mooooooooo--moooooo, mo M moo--moo mooooooo mooooooooo mo moooooooo moo

his oil into the casks and striking them down into the hold, where
moo moo mooo moo moooo moo mooooooo mooo mooo mooo moo mooo, moooo

once again leviathan returns to his native profundities, sliding along
mooo moooo moooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooooo, moooooo moooo

beneath the surface as before; but, alas! never more to rise and blow.
moooooo moo moooooo mo mooooo; moo, mooo! moooo mooo mo mooo moo mooo.




While still warm, the oil, like hot punch, is received into the
Moooo moooo mooo, moo moo, mooo moo moooo, mo mooooooo mooo moo

six-barrel casks; and while, perhaps, the ship is pitching and rolling
moo-mooooo moooo; moo moooo, moooooo, moo mooo mo mooooooo moo moooooo

this way and that in the midnight sea, the enormous casks are slewed
mooo moo moo mooo mo moo mooooooo moo, moo mooooooo moooo moo mooooo

round and headed over, end for end, and sometimes perilously scoot
moooo moo mooooo mooo, moo moo moo, moo moooooooo mooooooooo moooo

across the slippery deck, like so many land slides, till at last
mooooo moo mooooooo mooo, mooo mo mooo mooo mooooo, mooo mo mooo

man-handled and stayed in their course; and all round the hoops, rap,
moo-moooooo moo mooooo mo moooo mooooo; moo moo moooo moo moooo, moo,

rap, go as many hammers as can play upon them, for now, EX OFFICIO,
moo, mo mo mooo moooooo mo moo mooo mooo mooo, moo moo, MO MOOOOOO,

every sailor is a cooper.
moooo mooooo mo m mooooo.




At length, when the last pint is casked, and all is cool, then the great
Mo mooooo, mooo moo mooo mooo mo mooooo, moo moo mo mooo, mooo moo moooo

hatchways are unsealed, the bowels of the ship are thrown open, and down
moooooooo moo mooooooo, moo mooooo mo moo mooo moo mooooo mooo, moo mooo

go the casks to their final rest in the sea. This done, the hatches are
mo moo moooo mo moooo moooo mooo mo moo moo. Mooo mooo, moo moooooo moo

replaced, and hermetically closed, like a closet walled up.
mooooooo, moo mooooooooooo mooooo, mooo m mooooo mooooo mo.




In the sperm fishery, this is perhaps one of the most remarkable
Mo moo moooo moooooo, mooo mo moooooo moo mo moo mooo mooooooooo

incidents in all the business of whaling. One day the planks stream with
moooooooo mo moo moo mooooooo mo moooooo. Moo moo moo mooooo mooooo mooo

freshets of blood and oil; on the sacred quarter-deck enormous masses of
mooooooo mo moooo moo moo; mo moo mooooo moooooo-mooo mooooooo mooooo mo

the whale's head are profanely piled; great rusty casks lie about, as
moo moooo'm mooo moo moooooooo moooo; moooo moooo moooo moo moooo, mo

in a brewery yard; the smoke from the try-works has besooted all the
mo m moooooo mooo; moo moooo mooo moo moo-moooo moo mooooooo moo moo

bulwarks; the mariners go about suffused with unctuousness; the entire
mooooooo; moo mooooooo mo moooo mooooooo mooo mooooooooooo; moo mooooo

ship seems great leviathan himself; while on all hands the din is
mooo moooo moooo moooooooo moooooo; moooo mo moo moooo moo moo mo

deafening.
moooooooo.




But a day or two after, you look about you, and prick your ears in this
Moo m moo mo moo moooo, moo mooo moooo moo, moo moooo mooo mooo mo mooo

self-same ship; and were it not for the tell-tale boats and try-works,
mooo-mooo mooo; moo mooo mo moo moo moo mooo-mooo moooo moo moo-moooo,

you would all but swear you trod some silent merchant vessel, with a
moo moooo moo moo moooo moo mooo mooo mooooo mooooooo mooooo, mooo m

most scrupulously neat commander. The unmanufactured sperm oil possesses
mooo mooooooooooo mooo moooooooo. Moo mooooooooooooo moooo moo moooooooo

a singularly cleansing virtue. This is the reason why the decks never
m mooooooooo moooooooo mooooo. Mooo mo moo mooooo moo moo moooo moooo

look so white as just after what they call an affair of oil. Besides,
mooo mo moooo mo mooo moooo mooo mooo mooo mo mooooo mo moo. Moooooo,

from the ashes of the burned scraps of the whale, a potent lye is
mooo moo moooo mo moo mooooo mooooo mo moo moooo, m mooooo moo mo

readily made; and whenever any adhesiveness from the back of the whale
moooooo mooo; moo mooooooo moo mooooooooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo moooo

remains clinging to the side, that lye quickly exterminates it. Hands
moooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo, mooo moo moooooo mooooooooooo mo. Moooo

go diligently along the bulwarks, and with buckets of water and rags
mo mooooooooo moooo moo mooooooo, moo mooo moooooo mo moooo moo mooo

restore them to their full tidiness. The soot is brushed from the lower
moooooo mooo mo moooo mooo mooooooo. Moo mooo mo moooooo mooo moo moooo

rigging. All the numerous implements which have been in use are likewise
moooooo. Moo moo mooooooo mooooooooo moooo mooo mooo mo moo moo mooooooo

faithfully cleansed and put away. The great hatch is scrubbed and placed
mooooooooo mooooooo moo moo mooo. Moo moooo moooo mo mooooooo moo mooooo

upon the try-works, completely hiding the pots; every cask is out of
mooo moo moo-moooo, mooooooooo mooooo moo mooo; moooo mooo mo moo mo

sight; all tackles are coiled in unseen nooks; and when by the combined
moooo; moo moooooo moo mooooo mo mooooo moooo; moo mooo mo moo mooooooo

and simultaneous industry of almost the entire ship's company, the
moo mooooooooooo mooooooo mo mooooo moo mooooo mooo'm moooooo, moo

whole of this conscientious duty is at last concluded, then the crew
moooo mo mooo moooooooooooo mooo mo mo mooo moooooooo, mooo moo mooo

themselves proceed to their own ablutions; shift themselves from top to
mooooooooo moooooo mo moooo moo moooooooo; moooo mooooooooo mooo moo mo

toe; and finally issue to the immaculate deck, fresh and all aglow, as
moo; moo moooooo moooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo, moooo moo moo moooo, mo

bridegrooms new-leaped from out the daintiest Holland.
moooooooooo moo-mooooo mooo moo moo moooooooo Moooooo.




Now, with elated step, they pace the planks in twos and threes, and
Moo, mooo mooooo mooo, mooo mooo moo mooooo mo mooo moo mooooo, moo

humorously discourse of parlors, sofas, carpets, and fine cambrics;
mooooooooo moooooooo mo moooooo, moooo, moooooo, moo mooo mooooooo;

propose to mat the deck; think of having hanging to the top; object not
moooooo mo moo moo mooo; moooo mo mooooo moooooo mo moo moo; mooooo moo

to taking tea by moonlight on the piazza of the forecastle. To hint to
mo mooooo moo mo moooooooo mo moo mooooo mo moo mooooooooo. Mo mooo mo

such musked mariners of oil, and bone, and blubber, were little short
mooo mooooo mooooooo mo moo, moo mooo, moo moooooo, mooo mooooo moooo

of audacity. They know not the thing you distantly allude to. Away, and
mo mooooooo. Mooo mooo moo moo moooo moo moooooooo mooooo mo. Mooo, moo

bring us napkins!
moooo mo moooooo!




But mark: aloft there, at the three mast heads, stand three men intent
Moo mooo: moooo moooo, mo moo moooo mooo moooo, moooo moooo moo mooooo

on spying out more whales, which, if caught, infallibly will again
mo mooooo moo mooo mooooo, moooo, mo mooooo, mooooooooo mooo moooo

soil the old oaken furniture, and drop at least one small grease-spot
mooo moo moo moooo moooooooo, moo mooo mo moooo moo moooo mooooo-mooo

somewhere. Yes; and many is the time, when, after the severest
moooooooo. Moo; moo mooo mo moo mooo, mooo, moooo moo mooooooo

uninterrupted labors, which know no night; continuing straight through
moooooooooooo mooooo, moooo mooo mo moooo; mooooooooo mooooooo moooooo

for ninety-six hours; when from the boat, where they have swelled their
moo mooooo-moo moooo; mooo mooo moo mooo, moooo mooo mooo moooooo moooo

wrists with all day rowing on the Line,--they only step to the deck to
mooooo mooo moo moo mooooo mo moo Mooo,--mooo mooo mooo mo moo mooo mo

carry vast chains, and heave the heavy windlass, and cut and slash, yea,
moooo mooo mooooo, moo moooo moo moooo mooooooo, moo moo moo moooo, moo,

and in their very sweatings to be smoked and burned anew by the combined
moo mo moooo mooo moooooooo mo mo mooooo moo mooooo mooo mo moo mooooooo

fires of the equatorial sun and the equatorial try-works; when, on the
moooo mo moo mooooooooo moo moo moo mooooooooo moo-moooo; mooo, mo moo

heel of all this, they have finally bestirred themselves to cleanse the
mooo mo moo mooo, mooo mooo moooooo moooooooo mooooooooo mo moooooo moo

ship, and make a spotless dairy room of it; many is the time the poor
mooo, moo mooo m mooooooo moooo mooo mo mo; mooo mo moo mooo moo mooo

fellows, just buttoning the necks of their clean frocks, are startled by
moooooo, mooo moooooooo moo moooo mo moooo moooo mooooo, moo mooooooo mo

the cry of "There she blows!" and away they fly to fight another whale,
moo moo mo "Moooo moo moooo!" moo mooo mooo moo mo moooo moooooo moooo,

and go through the whole weary thing again. Oh! my friends, but this
moo mo moooooo moo moooo moooo moooo moooo. Mo! mo moooooo, moo mooo

is man-killing! Yet this is life. For hardly have we mortals by long
mo moo-moooooo! Moo mooo mo mooo. Moo mooooo mooo mo moooooo mo mooo

toilings extracted from this world's vast bulk its small but valuable
mooooooo moooooooo mooo mooo moooo'm mooo mooo moo moooo moo mooooooo

sperm; and then, with weary patience, cleansed ourselves from its
moooo; moo mooo, mooo moooo mooooooo, mooooooo moooooooo mooo moo

defilements, and learned to live here in clean tabernacles of the soul;
moooooooooo, moo moooooo mo mooo mooo mo moooo moooooooooo mo moo mooo;

hardly is this done, when--THERE SHE BLOWS!--the ghost is spouted up,
mooooo mo mooo mooo, mooo--MOOOO MOO MOOOO!--moo moooo mo moooooo mo,

and away we sail to fight some other world, and go through young life's
moo mooo mo mooo mo moooo mooo moooo moooo, moo mo moooooo moooo mooo'm

old routine again.
moo moooooo moooo.




Oh! the metempsychosis! Oh! Pythagoras, that in bright Greece, two
Mo! moo mooooooooooooo! Mo! Mooooooooo, mooo mo mooooo Mooooo, moo

thousand years ago, did die, so good, so wise, so mild; I sailed with
mooooooo moooo moo, moo moo, mo mooo, mo mooo, mo mooo; M mooooo mooo

thee along the Peruvian coast last voyage--and, foolish as I am, taught
mooo moooo moo Mooooooo moooo mooo mooooo--moo, moooooo mo M mo, mooooo

thee, a green simple boy, how to splice a rope!
mooo, m moooo mooooo moo, moo mo mooooo m mooo!










CHAPTER 99. The Doubloon.
MOOOOOO mo. Moo Mooooooo.







Ere now it has been related how Ahab was wont to pace his quarter-deck,
Moo moo mo moo mooo moooooo moo Mooo moo mooo mo mooo moo moooooo-mooo,

taking regular turns at either limit, the binnacle and mainmast; but
mooooo moooooo moooo mo mooooo moooo, moo mooooooo moo mooooooo; moo

in the multiplicity of other things requiring narration it has not been
mo moo mooooooooooo mo moooo mooooo moooooooo moooooooo mo moo moo mooo

added how that sometimes in these walks, when most plunged in his mood,
moooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moooo moooo, mooo mooo moooooo mo moo mooo,

he was wont to pause in turn at each spot, and stand there strangely
mo moo mooo mo moooo mo mooo mo mooo mooo, moo moooo moooo moooooooo

eyeing the particular object before him. When he halted before the
mooooo moo mooooooooo mooooo mooooo moo. Mooo mo mooooo mooooo moo

binnacle, with his glance fastened on the pointed needle in the compass,
mooooooo, mooo moo mooooo mooooooo mo moo moooooo mooooo mo moo moooooo,

that glance shot like a javelin with the pointed intensity of his
mooo mooooo mooo mooo m moooooo mooo moo moooooo moooooooo mo moo

purpose; and when resuming his walk he again paused before the mainmast,
moooooo; moo mooo mooooooo moo mooo mo moooo mooooo mooooo moo mooooooo,

mooo, mo moo mooo moooooo mooooo mooooooo mooo moo moooooo mooo mooo

there, he still wore the same aspect of nailed firmness, only dashed
moooo, mo moooo mooo moo mooo mooooo mo mooooo mooooooo, mooo mooooo

with a certain wild longing, if not hopefulness.
mooo m moooooo mooo moooooo, mo moo moooooooooo.




But one morning, turning to pass the doubloon, he seemed to be newly
Moo moo moooooo, moooooo mo mooo moo mooooooo, mo mooooo mo mo moooo

attracted by the strange figures and inscriptions stamped on it, as
moooooooo mo moo moooooo moooooo moo mooooooooooo moooooo mo mo, mo

though now for the first time beginning to interpret for himself in
mooooo moo moo moo moooo mooo moooooooo mo moooooooo moo moooooo mo

some monomaniac way whatever significance might lurk in them. And some
mooo mooooooooo moo mooooooo mooooooooooo moooo mooo mo mooo. Moo mooo

certain significance lurks in all things, else all things are little
moooooo mooooooooooo moooo mo moo mooooo, mooo moo mooooo moo mooooo

worth, and the round world itself but an empty cipher, except to sell by
moooo, moo moo moooo moooo mooooo moo mo moooo mooooo, mooooo mo mooo mo

the cartload, as they do hills about Boston, to fill up some morass in
moo mooooooo, mo mooo mo moooo moooo Mooooo, mo mooo mo mooo mooooo mo

the Milky Way.
moo Moooo Moo.




Now this doubloon was of purest, virgin gold, raked somewhere out of the
Moo mooo mooooooo moo mo mooooo, mooooo mooo, moooo moooooooo moo mo moo

heart of gorgeous hills, whence, east and west, over golden sands, the
moooo mo mooooooo moooo, mooooo, mooo moo mooo, mooo mooooo moooo, moo

head-waters of many a Pactolus flows. And though now nailed amidst all
mooo-mooooo mo mooo m Mooooooo moooo. Moo mooooo moo mooooo mooooo moo

the rustiness of iron bolts and the verdigris of copper spikes, yet,
moo moooooooo mo mooo moooo moo moo moooooooo mo mooooo mooooo, moo,

untouchable and immaculate to any foulness, it still preserved its Quito
moooooooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo mooooooo, mo moooo moooooooo moo Moooo

glow. Nor, though placed amongst a ruthless crew and every hour passed
mooo. Moo, mooooo mooooo moooooo m mooooooo mooo moo moooo mooo mooooo

by ruthless hands, and through the livelong nights shrouded with thick
mo mooooooo moooo, moo moooooo moo mooooooo mooooo mooooooo mooo moooo

darkness which might cover any pilfering approach, nevertheless every
mooooooo moooo moooo moooo moo moooooooo mooooooo, mooooooooooo moooo

sunrise found the doubloon where the sunset left it last. For it was
moooooo moooo moo mooooooo moooo moo mooooo mooo mo mooo. Moo mo moo

set apart and sanctified to one awe-striking end; and however wanton
moo moooo moo mooooooooo mo moo moo-mooooooo moo; moo moooooo mooooo

in their sailor ways, one and all, the mariners revered it as the white
mo moooo mooooo mooo, moo moo moo, moo mooooooo moooooo mo mo moo moooo

whale's talisman. Sometimes they talked it over in the weary watch by
moooo'm mooooooo. Moooooooo mooo mooooo mo mooo mo moo moooo moooo mo

night, wondering whose it was to be at last, and whether he would ever
moooo, moooooooo moooo mo moo mo mo mo mooo, moo moooooo mo moooo mooo

live to spend it.
mooo mo moooo mo.




Now those noble golden coins of South America are as medals of the sun
Moo moooo moooo mooooo moooo mo Moooo Moooooo moo mo mooooo mo moo moo

and tropic token-pieces. Here palms, alpacas, and volcanoes; sun's disks
moo mooooo moooo-mooooo. Mooo moooo, moooooo, moo moooooooo; moo'm moooo

and stars; ecliptics, horns-of-plenty, and rich banners waving, are in
moo moooo; moooooooo, moooo-mo-mooooo, moo mooo moooooo mooooo, moo mo

luxuriant profusion stamped; so that the precious gold seems almost to
moooooooo moooooooo moooooo; mo mooo moo mooooooo mooo moooo mooooo mo

derive an added preciousness and enhancing glories, by passing through
mooooo mo moooo mooooooooooo moo moooooooo moooooo, mo moooooo moooooo

those fancy mints, so Spanishly poetic.
moooo moooo moooo, mo Moooooooo mooooo.




It so chanced that the doubloon of the Pequod was a most wealthy example
Mo mo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo mo moo Mooooo moo m mooo moooooo moooooo

of these things. On its round border it bore the letters, REPUBLICA DEL
mo moooo mooooo. Mo moo moooo mooooo mo mooo moo moooooo, MOOOOOOOO MOO

ECUADOR: QUITO. So this bright coin came from a country planted in the
MOOOOOO: MOOOO. Mo mooo mooooo mooo mooo mooo m moooooo moooooo mo moo

middle of the world, and beneath the great equator, and named after it;
mooooo mo moo moooo, moo moooooo moo moooo moooooo, moo moooo moooo mo;

and it had been cast midway up the Andes, in the unwaning clime that
moo mo moo mooo mooo mooooo mo moo Moooo, mo moo mooooooo moooo mooo

knows no autumn. Zoned by those letters you saw the likeness of three
moooo mo mooooo. Moooo mo moooo moooooo moo moo moo mooooooo mo moooo

Andes' summits; from one a flame; a tower on another; on the third a
Moooo' moooooo; mooo moo m moooo; m moooo mo moooooo; mo moo moooo m

crowing cock; while arching over all was a segment of the partitioned
moooooo mooo; moooo moooooo mooo moo moo m moooooo mo moo moooooooooo

zodiac, the signs all marked with their usual cabalistics, and the
mooooo, moo moooo moo mooooo mooo moooo moooo moooooooooo, moo moo

keystone sun entering the equinoctial point at Libra.
mooooooo moo mooooooo moo moooooooooo moooo mo Moooo.




Before this equatorial coin, Ahab, not unobserved by others, was now
Mooooo mooo mooooooooo mooo, Mooo, moo mooooooooo mo mooooo, moo moo

pausing.
moooooo.




"There's something ever egotistical in mountain-tops and towers, and
"Moooo'm moooooooo mooo moooooooooo mo mooooooo-mooo moo mooooo, moo

all other grand and lofty things; look here,--three peaks as proud as
moo moooo moooo moo moooo mooooo; mooo mooo,--moooo moooo mo moooo mo

mooooooooo, moo moooooooo, moo mooooooooo mooo, mooo, moo, mo Mooo; moo

moo Mooo; moo mooo moooo mooo mo moo moo moooo mo moo moooooo moooo,

which, like a magician's glass, to each and every man in turn but

of storms, the equinox! and but six months before he wheeled out of a
mo mooooo, moo moooooo! moo moo moo mooooo mooooo mo moooooo moo mo m

mooooo moooooo mo Moooo! Mooo moooo mo moooo! Mo mo mo, mooo. Mooo mo

throes, 't is fit that man should live in pains and die in pangs! So be
mooooo, 'm mo moo mooo moo mooooo mooo mo moooo moo moo mo moooo! Mo mo

mo, mooo! Mooo'm moooo moooo moo moo mo mooo mo. Mo mo mo, mooo."

lest Truth shake me falsely."
mooo Moooo moooo mo moooooo."

"I look, you look, he looks; we look, ye look, they look."
"M mooo, moo mooo, mo moooo; mo mooo, mo mooo, mooo mooo."




"Upon my soul, he's been studying Murray's Grammar! Improving his mind,
"Mooo mo mooo, mo'm mooo mooooooo Mooooo'm Moooooo! Moooooooo moo mooo,

poor fellow! But what's that he says now--hist!"
mooo mooooo! Moo mooo'm mooo mo mooo moo--mooo!"




"I look, you look, he looks; we look, ye look, they look."
"M mooo, moo mooo, mo moooo; mo mooo, mo mooo, mooo mooo."




"Why, he's getting it by heart--hist! again."
"Moo, mo'm moooooo mo mo moooo--mooo! moooo."




"I look, you look, he looks; we look, ye look, they look."
"M mooo, moo mooo, mo moooo; mo mooo, mo mooo, mooo mooo."




"Well, that's funny."
"Mooo, mooo'm moooo."




"And I, you, and he; and we, ye, and they, are all bats; and I'm a crow,
"Moo M, moo, moo mo; moo mo, mo, moo mooo, moo moo mooo; moo M'm m mooo,

especially when I stand a'top of this pine tree here. Caw! caw! caw!
mooooooooo mooo M moooo m'moo mo mooo mooo mooo mooo. Moo! moo! moo!

caw! caw! caw! Ain't I a crow? And where's the scare-crow? There he
moo! moo! moo! Moo'm M m mooo? Moo moooo'm moo moooo-mooo? Moooo mo

stands; two bones stuck into a pair of old trowsers, and two more poked
mooooo; moo moooo moooo mooo m mooo mo moo mooooooo, moo moo mooo moooo

into the sleeves of an old jacket."
mooo moo moooooo mo mo moo mooooo."




"Wonder if he means me?--complimentary!--poor lad!--I could go hang
"Mooooo mo mo moooo mo?--moooooooooooo!--mooo moo!--M moooo mo mooo

myself. Any way, for the present, I'll quit Pip's vicinity. I can stand
mooooo. Moo moo, moo moo moooooo, M'mo mooo Moo'm mooooooo. M moo moooo

the rest, for they have plain wits; but he's too crazy-witty for my
moo mooo, moo mooo mooo moooo mooo; moo mo'm moo moooo-moooo moo mo

sanity. So, so, I leave him muttering."
mooooo. Mo, mo, M moooo moo moooooooo."




"Here's the ship's navel, this doubloon here, and they are all on fire
"Mooo'm moo mooo'm moooo, mooo mooooooo mooo, moo mooo moo moo mo mooo

to unscrew it. But, unscrew your navel, and what's the consequence? Then
mo moooooo mo. Moo, moooooo mooo moooo, moo mooo'm moo moooooooooo? Mooo

again, if it stays here, that is ugly, too, for when aught's nailed to
moooo, mo mo moooo mooo, mooo mo mooo, moo, moo mooo moooo'm mooooo mo

the mast it's a sign that things grow desperate. Ha, ha! old Ahab!
moo mooo mo'm m mooo mooo mooooo mooo moooooooo. Mo, mo! moo Mooo!

the White Whale; he'll nail ye! This is a pine tree. My father, in old
moo Moooo Moooo; mo'mo mooo mo! Mooo mo m mooo mooo. Mo mooooo, mo moo

Tolland county, cut down a pine tree once, and found a silver ring grown
Moooooo mooooo, moo mooo m mooo mooo mooo, moo moooo m mooooo mooo moooo

over in it; some old darkey's wedding ring. How did it get there? And
mooo mo mo; mooo moo mooooo'm moooooo mooo. Moo moo mo moo moooo? Moo

so they'll say in the resurrection, when they come to fish up this old
mo mooo'mo moo mo moo mooooooooooo, mooo mooo mooo mo mooo mo mooo moo

mast, and find a doubloon lodged in it, with bedded oysters for the
mooo, moo mooo m mooooooo mooooo mo mo, mooo mooooo moooooo moo moo

shaggy bark. Oh, the gold! the precious, precious, gold! the green
mooooo mooo. Mo, moo mooo! moo mooooooo, mooooooo, mooo! moo moooo

miser'll hoard ye soon! Hish! hish! God goes 'mong the worlds
moooo'mo moooo mo mooo! Mooo! mooo! Moo mooo 'mooo moo mooooo

blackberrying. Cook! ho, cook! and cook us! Jenny! hey, hey, hey, hey,
moooooooooooo. Mooo! mo, mooo! moo mooo mo! Moooo! moo, moo, moo, moo,

hey, Jenny, Jenny! and get your hoe-cake done!"
moo, Moooo, Moooo! moo moo mooo moo-mooo mooo!"










CHAPTER 100. Leg and Arm.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo moo Moo.




The Pequod, of Nantucket, Meets the Samuel Enderby, of London.
Moo Mooooo, mo Moooooooo, Moooo moo Mooooo Moooooo, mo Mooooo.







"Ship, ahoy! Hast seen the White Whale?"
"Mooo, mooo! Mooo mooo moo Moooo Moooo?"




So cried Ahab, once more hailing a ship showing English colours, bearing
Mo moooo Mooo, mooo mooo moooooo m mooo moooooo Moooooo moooooo, moooooo

down under the stern. Trumpet to mouth, the old man was standing in his
mooo moooo moo moooo. Moooooo mo moooo, moo moo moo moo mooooooo mo moo

hoisted quarter-boat, his ivory leg plainly revealed to the stranger
moooooo moooooo-mooo, moo moooo moo moooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo

captain, who was carelessly reclining in his own boat's bow. He was
moooooo, moo moo mooooooooo moooooooo mo moo moo mooo'm moo. Mo moo

a darkly-tanned, burly, good-natured, fine-looking man, of sixty or
m mooooo-mooooo, moooo, mooo-moooooo, mooo-moooooo moo, mo moooo mo

thereabouts, dressed in a spacious roundabout, that hung round him in
moooooooooo, moooooo mo m mooooooo mooooooooo, mooo mooo moooo moo mo

festoons of blue pilot-cloth; and one empty arm of this jacket streamed
mooooooo mo mooo moooo-moooo; moo moo moooo moo mo mooo mooooo mooooooo

behind him like the broidered arm of a hussar's surcoat.
mooooo moo mooo moo moooooooo moo mo m mooooo'm moooooo.




"Hast seen the White Whale!"
"Mooo mooo moo Moooo Moooo!"




"See you this?" and withdrawing it from the folds that had hidden it,
"Moo moo mooo?" moo moooooooooo mo mooo moo moooo mooo moo mooooo mo,

he held up a white arm of sperm whale bone, terminating in a wooden head
mo mooo mo m moooo moo mo moooo moooo mooo, moooooooooo mo m mooooo mooo

like a mallet.
mooo m mooooo.




"Man my boat!" cried Ahab, impetuously, and tossing about the oars near
"Moo mo mooo!" moooo Mooo, moooooooooo, moo moooooo moooo moo mooo mooo

him--"Stand by to lower!"
moo--"Moooo mo mo moooo!"




In less than a minute, without quitting his little craft, he and his
Mo mooo mooo m mooooo, moooooo mooooooo moo mooooo moooo, mo moo moo

crew were dropped to the water, and were soon alongside of the stranger.
mooo mooo moooooo mo moo moooo, moo mooo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo.

But here a curious difficulty presented itself. In the excitement of the
Moo mooo m moooooo mooooooooo moooooooo mooooo. Mo moo mooooooooo mo moo

moment, Ahab had forgotten that since the loss of his leg he had never
mooooo, Mooo moo moooooooo mooo moooo moo mooo mo moo moo mo moo moooo

once stepped on board of any vessel at sea but his own, and then it was
mooo moooooo mo moooo mo moo mooooo mo moo moo moo moo, moo mooo mo moo

always by an ingenious and very handy mechanical contrivance peculiar to
mooooo mo mo moooooooo moo mooo moooo mooooooooo moooooooooo mooooooo mo

the Pequod, and a thing not to be rigged and shipped in any other
moo Mooooo, moo m moooo moo mo mo mooooo moo moooooo mo moo moooo

vessel at a moment's warning. Now, it is no very easy matter
mooooo mo m mooooo'm moooooo. Moo, mo mo mo mooo mooo mooooo

for anybody--except those who are almost hourly used to it, like
moo moooooo--mooooo moooo moo moo mooooo mooooo mooo mo mo, mooo

whalemen--to clamber up a ship's side from a boat on the open sea; for
mooooooo--mo moooooo mo m mooo'm mooo mooo m mooo mo moo mooo moo; moo

the great swells now lift the boat high up towards the bulwarks, and
moo moooo mooooo moo mooo moo mooo mooo mo moooooo moo mooooooo, moo

then instantaneously drop it half way down to the kelson. So, deprived
mooo moooooooooooooo mooo mo mooo moo mooo mo moo mooooo. Mo, mooooooo

of one leg, and the strange ship of course being altogether unsupplied
mo moo moo, moo moo moooooo mooo mo mooooo moooo mooooooooo mooooooooo

with the kindly invention, Ahab now found himself abjectly reduced to a
mooo moo mooooo moooooooo, Mooo moo moooo moooooo mooooooo moooooo mo m

clumsy landsman again; hopelessly eyeing the uncertain changeful height
mooooo mooooooo moooo; mooooooooo mooooo moo moooooooo moooooooo mooooo

he could hardly hope to attain.
mo moooo mooooo mooo mo mooooo.




It has before been hinted, perhaps, that every little untoward
Mo moo mooooo mooo mooooo, moooooo, mooo moooo mooooo mooooooo

circumstance that befell him, and which indirectly sprang from his
mooooooooooo mooo mooooo moo, moo moooo mooooooooo mooooo mooo moo

luckless mishap, almost invariably irritated or exasperated Ahab. And
mooooooo mooooo, mooooo mooooooooo moooooooo mo moooooooooo Mooo. Moo

in the present instance, all this was heightened by the sight of the
mo moo moooooo mooooooo, moo mooo moo mooooooooo mo moo moooo mo moo

two officers of the strange ship, leaning over the side, by the
moo mooooooo mo moo moooooo mooo, moooooo mooo moo mooo, mo moo

perpendicular ladder of nailed cleets there, and swinging towards him a
moooooooooooo mooooo mo mooooo mooooo moooo, moo mooooooo moooooo moo m

pair of tastefully-ornamented man-ropes; for at first they did not seem
mooo mo mooooooooo-mooooooooo moo-moooo; moo mo moooo mooo moo moo mooo

to bethink them that a one-legged man must be too much of a cripple to
mo moooooo mooo mooo m moo-mooooo moo mooo mo moo mooo mo m moooooo mo

use their sea bannisters. But this awkwardness only lasted a minute,
moo moooo moo mooooooooo. Moo mooo moooooooooo mooo mooooo m mooooo,

because the strange captain, observing at a glance how affairs stood,
moooooo moo moooooo moooooo, moooooooo mo m mooooo moo moooooo moooo,

cried out, "I see, I see!--avast heaving there! Jump, boys, and swing
moooo moo, "M moo, M moo!--moooo moooooo moooo! Mooo, mooo, moo moooo

over the cutting-tackle."
mooo moo moooooo-mooooo."




As good luck would have it, they had had a whale alongside a day or two
Mo mooo mooo moooo mooo mo, mooo moo moo m moooo moooooooo m moo mo moo

previous, and the great tackles were still aloft, and the massive curved
mooooooo, moo moo moooo moooooo mooo moooo moooo, moo moo moooooo mooooo

blubber-hook, now clean and dry, was still attached to the end. This
moooooo-mooo, moo moooo moo moo, moo moooo mooooooo mo moo moo. Mooo

was quickly lowered to Ahab, who at once comprehending it all, slid his
moo moooooo moooooo mo Mooo, moo mo mooo moooooooooooo mo moo, mooo moo

solitary thigh into the curve of the hook (it was like sitting in the
mooooooo moooo mooo moo moooo mo moo mooo (mo moo mooo moooooo mo moo

moooo mo mo mooooo, mo moo mooooo mo mo moooo mooo), moo mooo mooooo moo

word, held himself fast, and at the same time also helped to hoist his
mooo, mooo moooooo mooo, moo mo moo mooo mooo mooo mooooo mo moooo moo

moo mooooo, mo moooooo mooo-mooo-mooo mooo moo mo moo moooooo moooo mo

the tackle. Soon he was carefully swung inside the high bulwarks, and
moo mooooo. Mooo mo moo moooooooo moooo mooooo moo mooo mooooooo, moo

gently landed upon the capstan head. With his ivory arm frankly thrust
mooooo mooooo mooo moo moooooo mooo. Mooo moo moooo moo moooooo mooooo

moooo mo moooooo, moo moooo moooooo mooooooo, moo Mooo, moooooo moo moo

ivory leg, and crossing the ivory arm (like two sword-fish blades)
moooo moo, moo mooooooo moo moooo moo (mooo moo moooo-mooo mooooo)

cried out in his walrus way, "Aye, aye, hearty! let us shake bones
moooo moo mo moo mooooo moo, "Moo, moo, mooooo! moo mo moooo moooo

together!--an arm and a leg!--an arm that never can shrink, d'ye
mooooooo!--mo moo moo m moo!--mo moo mooo moooo moo mooooo, m'mo

see; and a leg that never can run. Where did'st thou see the White
moo; moo m moo mooo moooo moo moo. Moooo moo'mo mooo moo moo Moooo

Whale?--how long ago?"
Moooo?--moo mooo moo?"




"The White Whale," said the Englishman, pointing his ivory arm towards
"Moo Moooo Moooo," mooo moo Mooooooooo, mooooooo moo moooo moo moooooo

the East, and taking a rueful sight along it, as if it had been a
moo Mooo, moo mooooo m mooooo moooo moooo mo, mo mo mo moo mooo m
