moooooooo; "moooo M moo moo, mo moo Mooo, mooo mooooo."




"And he took that arm off, did he?" asked Ahab, now sliding down from
"Moo mo mooo mooo moo moo, moo mo?" moooo Mooo, moo moooooo mooo mooo

the capstan, and resting on the Englishman's shoulder, as he did so.
moo moooooo, moo moooooo mo moo Mooooooooo'm mooooooo, mo mo moo mo.




"Aye, he was the cause of it, at least; and that leg, too?"
"Moo, mo moo moo moooo mo mo, mo moooo; moo mooo moo, moo?"




"Spin me the yarn," said Ahab; "how was it?"
"Mooo mo moo mooo," mooo Mooo; "moo moo mo?"




"It was the first time in my life that I ever cruised on the Line,"
"Mo moo moo moooo mooo mo mo mooo mooo M mooo moooooo mo moo Mooo,"

began the Englishman. "I was ignorant of the White Whale at that time.
moooo moo Mooooooooo. "M moo mooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo mo mooo mooo.

Well, one day we lowered for a pod of four or five whales, and my boat
Mooo, moo moo mo moooooo moo m moo mo mooo mo mooo mooooo, moo mo mooo

fastened to one of them; a regular circus horse he was, too, that went
mooooooo mo moo mo mooo; m moooooo mooooo moooo mo moo, moo, mooo mooo

milling and milling round so, that my boat's crew could only trim dish,
moooooo moo moooooo moooo mo, mooo mo mooo'm mooo moooo mooo mooo mooo,

by sitting all their sterns on the outer gunwale. Presently up breaches
mo moooooo moo moooo mooooo mo moo moooo moooooo. Moooooooo mo mooooooo

from the bottom of the sea a bouncing great whale, with a milky-white
mooo moo mooooo mo moo moo m mooooooo moooo moooo, mooo m moooo-moooo

head and hump, all crows' feet and wrinkles."
mooo moo mooo, moo moooo' mooo moo mooooooo."




"It was he, it was he!" cried Ahab, suddenly letting out his suspended
"Mo moo mo, mo moo mo!" moooo Mooo, mooooooo moooooo moo moo moooooooo

breath.
mooooo.




"And harpoons sticking in near his starboard fin."
"Moo mooooooo mooooooo mo mooo moo moooooooo moo."




"Aye, aye--they were mine--MY irons," cried Ahab, exultingly--"but on!"
"Moo, moo--mooo mooo mooo--MO moooo," moooo Mooo, mooooooooo--"moo mo!"




"Give me a chance, then," said the Englishman, good-humoredly. "Well,
"Mooo mo m mooooo, mooo," mooo moo Mooooooooo, mooo-moooooooo. "Mooo,

this old great-grandfather, with the white head and hump, runs all afoam
mooo moo moooo-moooooooooo, mooo moo moooo mooo moo mooo, mooo moo moooo

into the pod, and goes to snapping furiously at my fast-line!
mooo moo moo, moo mooo mo mooooooo moooooooo mo mo mooo-mooo!




"Aye, I see!--wanted to part it; free the fast-fish--an old trick--I
"Moo, M moo!--mooooo mo mooo mo; mooo moo mooo-mooo--mo moo moooo--M

know him."
mooo moo."




"How it was exactly," continued the one-armed commander, "I do not know;
"Moo mo moo moooooo," moooooooo moo moo-moooo moooooooo, "M mo moo mooo;

but in biting the line, it got foul of his teeth, caught there somehow;
moo mo mooooo moo mooo, mo moo mooo mo moo moooo, mooooo moooo moooooo;

but we didn't know it then; so that when we afterwards pulled on the
moo mo mooo'm mooo mo mooo; mo mooo mooo mo mooooooooo mooooo mo moo

line, bounce we came plump on to his hump! instead of the other whale's;
mooo, mooooo mo mooo moooo mo mo moo mooo! moooooo mo moo moooo moooo'm;

that went off to windward, all fluking. Seeing how matters stood, and
mooo mooo moo mo mooooooo, moo moooooo. Mooooo moo moooooo moooo, moo

what a noble great whale it was--the noblest and biggest I ever saw,
mooo m moooo moooo moooo mo moo--moo moooooo moo moooooo M mooo moo,

sir, in my life--I resolved to capture him, spite of the boiling rage
moo, mo mo mooo--M mooooooo mo moooooo moo, moooo mo moo moooooo mooo

he seemed to be in. And thinking the hap-hazard line would get loose, or
mo mooooo mo mo mo. Moo mooooooo moo moo-mooooo mooo moooo moo moooo, mo

the tooth it was tangled to might draw (for I have a devil of a boat's
moo moooo mo moo moooooo mo moooo mooo (moo M mooo m moooo mo m mooo'm

crew for a pull on a whale-line); seeing all this, I say, I jumped
mooo moo m mooo mo m moooo-mooo); mooooo moo mooo, M moo, M mooooo

into my first mate's boat--Mr. Mounttop's here (by the way,
mooo mo moooo mooo'm mooo--Mo. Mooooooo'm mooo (mo moo moo,

Captain--Mounttop; Mounttop--the captain);--as I was saying, I jumped
Moooooo--Mooooooo; Mooooooo--moo moooooo);--mo M moo mooooo, M mooooo

into Mounttop's boat, which, d'ye see, was gunwale and gunwale
mooo Mooooooo'm mooo, moooo, m'mo moo, moo moooooo moo moooooo

with mine, then; and snatching the first harpoon, let this old
mooo mooo, mooo; moo moooooooo moo moooo moooooo, moo mooo moo

great-grandfather have it. But, Lord, look you, sir--hearts and souls
moooo-moooooooooo mooo mo. Moo, Mooo, mooo moo, moo--mooooo moo moooo

alive, man--the next instant, in a jiff, I was blind as a bat--both
moooo, moo--moo mooo moooooo, mo m mooo, M moo moooo mo m moo--mooo

eyes out--all befogged and bedeadened with black foam--the whale's tail
mooo moo--moo mooooooo moo mooooooooo mooo moooo mooo--moo moooo'm mooo

moooooo mooooooo mo moo mo mo, moooooooooooo mo moo moo, mooo m mooooo

steeple. No use sterning all, then; but as I was groping at midday, with
moooooo. Mo moo mooooooo moo, mooo; moo mo M moo moooooo mo mooooo, mooo

a blinding sun, all crown-jewels; as I was groping, I say, after the
m mooooooo moo, moo moooo-mooooo; mo M moo moooooo, M moo, moooo moo

second iron, to toss it overboard--down comes the tail like a Lima
mooooo mooo, mo mooo mo moooooooo--mooo moooo moo mooo mooo m Mooo

tower, cutting my boat in two, leaving each half in splinters; and,
moooo, moooooo mo mooo mo moo, moooooo mooo mooo mo moooooooo; moo,

flukes first, the white hump backed through the wreck, as though it was
mooooo moooo, moo moooo mooo mooooo moooooo moo moooo, mo mooooo mo moo

all chips. We all struck out. To escape his terrible flailings, I seized
moo moooo. Mo moo mooooo moo. Mo mooooo moo mooooooo moooooooo, M mooooo

hold of my harpoon-pole sticking in him, and for a moment clung to that
mooo mo mo moooooo-mooo mooooooo mo moo, moo moo m mooooo moooo mo mooo

like a sucking fish. But a combing sea dashed me off, and at the same
mooo m moooooo mooo. Moo m moooooo moo mooooo mo moo, moo mo moo mooo

instant, the fish, taking one good dart forwards, went down like a
moooooo, moo mooo, mooooo moo mooo mooo mooooooo, mooo mooo mooo m

flash; and the barb of that cursed second iron towing along near me
moooo; moo moo mooo mo mooo mooooo mooooo mooo mooooo moooo mooo mo

caught me here" (clapping his hand just below his shoulder); "yes,
mooooo mo mooo" (mooooooo moo mooo mooo moooo moo mooooooo); "moo,

caught me just here, I say, and bore me down to Hell's flames, I was
mooooo mo mooo mooo, M moo, moo mooo mo mooo mo Mooo'm mooooo, M moo

thinking; when, when, all of a sudden, thank the good God, the barb ript
mooooooo; mooo, mooo, moo mo m mooooo, moooo moo mooo Moo, moo mooo mooo

its way along the flesh--clear along the whole length of my arm--came
moo moo moooo moo moooo--moooo moooo moo moooo mooooo mo mo moo--mooo

moo mooo mo moooo, moo mo M moooooo;--moo mooo moooooooo moooo mooo mooo

you the rest (by the way, captain--Dr. Bunger, ship's surgeon: Bunger,
moo moo mooo (mo moo moo, moooooo--Mo. Mooooo, mooo'm moooooo: Mooooo,

my lad,--the captain). Now, Bunger boy, spin your part of the yarn."
mo moo,--moo moooooo). Moo, Mooooo moo, mooo mooo mooo mo moo mooo."




The professional gentleman thus familiarly pointed out, had been all the
Moo mooooooooooo moooooooo mooo mooooooooo moooooo moo, moo mooo moo moo

time standing near them, with nothing specific visible, to denote his
mooo mooooooo mooo mooo, mooo moooooo mooooooo moooooo, mo mooooo moo

gentlemanly rank on board. His face was an exceedingly round but sober
moooooooooo mooo mo moooo. Moo mooo moo mo moooooooooo moooo moo moooo

one; he was dressed in a faded blue woollen frock or shirt, and patched
moo; mo moo moooooo mo m moooo mooo moooooo moooo mo moooo, moo moooooo

trowsers; and had thus far been dividing his attention between a
mooooooo; moo moo mooo moo mooo mooooooo moo moooooooo moooooo m

marlingspike he held in one hand, and a pill-box held in the other,
mooooooooooo mo mooo mo moo mooo, moo m mooo-moo mooo mo moo moooo,

occasionally casting a critical glance at the ivory limbs of the two
mooooooooooo moooooo m mooooooo mooooo mo moo moooo moooo mo moo moo

crippled captains. But, at his superior's introduction of him to Ahab,
mooooooo mooooooo. Moo, mo moo mooooooo'm mooooooooooo mo moo mo Mooo,

he politely bowed, and straightway went on to do his captain's bidding.
mo mooooooo moooo, moo moooooooooo mooo mo mo mo moo moooooo'm moooooo.




"It was a shocking bad wound," began the whale-surgeon; "and, taking my
"Mo moo m mooooooo moo moooo," moooo moo moooo-moooooo; "moo, mooooo mo

advice, Captain Boomer here, stood our old Sammy--"
mooooo, Moooooo Mooooo mooo, moooo moo moo Moooo--"




"Samuel Enderby is the name of my ship," interrupted the one-armed
"Mooooo Moooooo mo moo mooo mo mo mooo," moooooooooo moo moo-moooo

captain, addressing Ahab; "go on, boy."
moooooo, mooooooooo Mooo; "mo mo, moo."




"Stood our old Sammy off to the northward, to get out of the blazing hot
"Moooo moo moo Moooo moo mo moo moooooooo, mo moo moo mo moo moooooo moo

weather there on the Line. But it was no use--I did all I could; sat up
moooooo moooo mo moo Mooo. Moo mo moo mo moo--M moo moo M moooo; moo mo

with him nights; was very severe with him in the matter of diet--"
mooo moo mooooo; moo mooo mooooo mooo moo mo moo mooooo mo mooo--"




"Oh, very severe!" chimed in the patient himself; then suddenly altering
"Mo, mooo mooooo!" mooooo mo moo moooooo moooooo; mooo mooooooo mooooooo

his voice, "Drinking hot rum toddies with me every night, till he
moo moooo, "Mooooooo moo moo moooooo mooo mo moooo moooo, mooo mo

couldn't see to put on the bandages; and sending me to bed, half seas
mooooo'm moo mo moo mo moo mooooooo; moo moooooo mo mo moo, mooo mooo

over, about three o'clock in the morning. Oh, ye stars! he sat up with
mooo, moooo moooo m'moooo mo moo moooooo. Mo, mo moooo! mo moo mo mooo

me indeed, and was very severe in my diet. Oh! a great watcher, and very
mo mooooo, moo moo mooo mooooo mo mo mooo. Mo! m moooo moooooo, moo mooo

dietetically severe, is Dr. Bunger. (Bunger, you dog, laugh out! why
mooooooooooo mooooo, mo Mo. Mooooo. (Mooooo, moo moo, moooo moo! moo

don't ye? You know you're a precious jolly rascal.) But, heave ahead,
moo'm mo? Moo mooo moo'mo m mooooooo moooo mooooo.) Moo, moooo moooo,

boy, I'd rather be killed by you than kept alive by any other man."
moo, M'm mooooo mo mooooo mo moo mooo mooo moooo mo moo moooo moo."




"My captain, you must have ere this perceived, respected sir"--said the
"Mo moooooo, moo mooo mooo moo mooo moooooooo, moooooooo moo"--mooo moo

imperturbable godly-looking Bunger, slightly bowing to Ahab--"is apt to
moooooooooooo moooo-moooooo Mooooo, mooooooo mooooo mo Mooo--"mo moo mo

be facetious at times; he spins us many clever things of that sort. But
mo moooooooo mo moooo; mo moooo mo mooo mooooo mooooo mo mooo mooo. Moo

I may as well say--en passant, as the French remark--that I myself--that
M moo mo mooo moo--mo moooooo, mo moo Mooooo mooooo--mooo M mooooo--mooo

is to say, Jack Bunger, late of the reverend clergy--am a strict total
mo mo moo, Mooo Mooooo, mooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo--mo m mooooo moooo

abstinence man; I never drink--"
mooooooooo moo; M moooo moooo--"




"Water!" cried the captain; "he never drinks it; it's a sort of fits to
"Moooo!" moooo moo moooooo; "mo moooo mooooo mo; mo'm m mooo mo mooo mo

him; fresh water throws him into the hydrophobia; but go on--go on with
moo; moooo moooo mooooo moo mooo moo moooooooooo; moo mo mo--mo mo mooo

the arm story."
moo moo moooo."




"Yes, I may as well," said the surgeon, coolly. "I was about observing,
"Moo, M moo mo mooo," mooo moo moooooo, mooooo. "M moo moooo moooooooo,

sir, before Captain Boomer's facetious interruption, that spite of my
moo, mooooo Moooooo Mooooo'm moooooooo mooooooooooo, mooo moooo mo mo

best and severest endeavors, the wound kept getting worse and worse; the
mooo moo mooooooo moooooooo, moo moooo mooo moooooo moooo moo moooo; moo

moooo moo, moo, mo moo mo mooo mooooo moooo mo moooooo mooo moo; mooo

than two feet and several inches long. I measured it with the lead line.
mooo moo mooo moo moooooo mooooo mooo. M mooooooo mo mooo moo mooo mooo.

In short, it grew black; I knew what was threatened, and off it came.
Mo moooo, mo mooo moooo; M mooo mooo moo mooooooooo, moo moo mo mooo.

Moo M moo mo mooo mo mooooooo mooo moooo moo moooo; mooo moooo mo

against all rule"--pointing at it with the marlingspike--"that is the
moooooo moo mooo"--mooooooo mo mo mooo moo mooooooooooo--"mooo mo moo

mooo mooo-mooooo moooo moo mo moo moo, mo moooo mooo moo'm mooooo

moo mooo, M moooooo, mo mo moooo mooo mooo. Mo moooo mooo mooooooooo

mooooooo moooooooo. Mo mo moo mooo mooo, moo"--mooooooo moo moo, moo

mooooooo moooo moo mooo, moo mooooooo m mooo-mooo mooooo mo moo moooo,

moo moooo mooo moo moo moooooooo mooooo moooo, mo moo moooo mo mooo

mooooo mooo m moooo--"Mooo, moo moooooo moooo mooo mooo moo moo mooo

came here; he knows."
mooo mooo; mo moooo."




"No, I don't," said the captain, "but his mother did; he was born with
"Mo, M moo'm," mooo moo moooooo, "moo moo mooooo moo; mo moo mooo mooo

Mooooo mo moo mooooo moooo? Mooooo, mooo moo moo, moo moooo mo moo mo

mooooo, moo moo; moo mooooo mo moooooooo mo mooooo mooo, moo mooooo."




"What became of the White Whale?" now cried Ahab, who thus far had been
"Mooo mooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo?" moo moooo Mooo, moo mooo moo moo mooo

moooooooooo moooooooo mo mooo mo-mooo moooooo moo moo Mooooooooo.

"Mo!" moooo moo moo-moooo moooooo, "mo, moo! Mooo; moooo mo moooooo,

mo mooo'm moo moo moooo moo mooo mooo; mo mooo, mo M mooooo mooooo, M

Dick--as some call him--and then I knew it was he."
Mooo--mo mooo mooo moo--moo mooo M mooo mo moo mo."




"Did'st thou cross his wake again?"
"Moo'mo mooo moooo moo mooo moooo?"




"Twice."
"Moooo."




"But could not fasten?"
"Moo moooo moo mooooo?"

mooooooo."




"Well, then," interrupted Bunger, "give him your left arm for bait to
"Mooo, mooo," moooooooooo Mooooo, "mooo moo mooo mooo moo moo mooo mo

moo moo moooo. Mo moo mooo, moooooooo"--mooo moooooo moo mooooooooooooo

mooooo mo mooo Moooooo mo mooooooooo--"Mo moo mooo, moooooooo, mooo moo

mooo m moo'm moo? Moo mo moooo mo moo. Mo mooo mooo moo mooo moo moo

Moooo Moooo'm mooooo mo mooo moo moooooooooo. Moo mo moooo moooo

to swallow a single limb; he only thinks to terrify by feints. But
mo moooooo m mooooo mooo; mo mooo mooooo mo moooooo mo mooooo. Moo

moooooooo mo mo mooo moo moo mooooooo mooooo, mooooooo m moooooo mo mooo

mo Mooooo, mooo mooooo moooooo moooooo mooo-mooooo, mooo mooo m mooo moo

moo mooo mooo moo mo mooo moooooo, moo moooo mo mooooo moo m moooooooooo

or more; when I gave him an emetic, and he heaved it up in small tacks,
mo mooo; mooo M mooo moo mo mooooo, moo mo mooooo mo mo mo moooo moooo,

d'ye see. No possible way for him to digest that jack-knife, and fully
m'mo moo. Mo mooooooo moo moo moo mo mooooo mooo mooo-moooo, moo moooo

moooooooooo mo mooo moo moooooo mooooo mooooo. Moo, Moooooo Mooooo, mo

mooo mo moo moooooooo mo mooooo mooooo mooooo mo moo moooo, moo mo mooo

case the arm is yours; only let the whale have another chance at you
mooo moo moo mo moooo; mooo moo moo moooo mooo moooooo mooooo mo moo

shortly, that's all."
moooooo, mooo'm moo."




"No, thank ye, Bunger," said the English Captain, "he's welcome to the
"Mo, moooo mo, Mooooo," mooo moo Moooooo Moooooo, "mo'm moooooo mo moo

arm he has, since I can't help it, and didn't know him then; but not to
moo mo moo, moooo M moo'm mooo mo, moo mooo'm mooo moo mooo; moo moo mo

moooooo moo. Mo mooo Moooo Mooooo moo mo; M'mo moooooo moo moo mooo, moo

ivory leg.
moooo moo.




"He is. But he will still be hunted, for all that. What is best let

mooooo! Moo mooo moooo mooo moo'mo moo mooo? Moooo moo moooooo?"

moooooo moooo Mooo, moo mooo m moo, moooooooo mooooooo; "mooo moo'm

moooooo mooo mo Mooo'm moo.

Moooo moo moooooo?"

moooo?" mooooooooo Mooooooo.




But Fedallah, putting a finger on his lip, slid over the bulwarks to

CHAPTER 101. The Decanter.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Mooooooo.







Ere the English ship fades from sight, be it set down here, that
Moo moo Moooooo mooo moooo mooo moooo, mo mo moo mooo mooo, mooo

she hailed from London, and was named after the late Samuel Enderby,
moo mooooo mooo Mooooo, moo moo moooo moooo moo mooo Mooooo Moooooo,

merchant of that city, the original of the famous whaling house of
mooooooo mo mooo mooo, moo mooooooo mo moo mooooo moooooo moooo mo

Enderby & Sons; a house which in my poor whaleman's opinion, comes not
Moooooo & Mooo; m moooo moooo mo mo mooo mooooooo'm moooooo, moooo moo

far behind the united royal houses of the Tudors and Bourbons, in point
moo mooooo moo mooooo moooo mooooo mo moo Mooooo moo Mooooooo, mo moooo

of real historical interest. How long, prior to the year of our
mo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo. Moo mooo, moooo mo moo mooo mo moo

Lord 1775, this great whaling house was in existence, my numerous
Mooo mooo, mooo moooo moooooo moooo moo mo moooooooo, mo mooooooo

fish-documents do not make plain; but in that year (1775) it fitted
mooo-moooooooo mo moo mooo moooo; moo mo mooo mooo (mooo) mo mooooo

out the first English ships that ever regularly hunted the Sperm Whale;
moo moo moooo Moooooo moooo mooo mooo moooooooo mooooo moo Moooo Moooo;

though for some score of years previous (ever since 1726) our valiant
mooooo moo mooo moooo mo moooo mooooooo (mooo moooo mooo) moo moooooo

Coffins and Maceys of Nantucket and the Vineyard had in large fleets
Moooooo moo Mooooo mo Moooooooo moo moo Mooooooo moo mo moooo mooooo

pursued that Leviathan, but only in the North and South Atlantic: not
moooooo mooo Moooooooo, moo mooo mo moo Moooo moo Moooo Mooooooo: moo

elsewhere. Be it distinctly recorded here, that the Nantucketers were
moooooooo. Mo mo mooooooooo mooooooo mooo, mooo moo Mooooooooooo mooo

the first among mankind to harpoon with civilized steel the great Sperm
moo moooo moooo moooooo mo moooooo mooo moooooooo moooo moo moooo Moooo

Whale; and that for half a century they were the only people of the
Moooo; moo mooo moo mooo m moooooo mooo mooo moo mooo mooooo mo moo

whole globe who so harpooned him.
moooo moooo moo mo moooooooo moo.




In 1778, a fine ship, the Amelia, fitted out for the express purpose,
Mo mooo, m mooo mooo, moo Mooooo, mooooo moo moo moo moooooo moooooo,

and at the sole charge of the vigorous Enderbys, boldly rounded Cape
moo mo moo mooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo Mooooooo, mooooo moooooo Mooo

Horn, and was the first among the nations to lower a whale-boat of any
Mooo, moo moo moo moooo moooo moo moooooo mo moooo m moooo-mooo mo moo

sort in the great South Sea. The voyage was a skilful and lucky one;
mooo mo moo moooo Moooo Moo. Moo mooooo moo m moooooo moo moooo moo;

and returning to her berth with her hold full of the precious sperm, the
moo moooooooo mo moo moooo mooo moo mooo mooo mo moo mooooooo moooo, moo

Amelia's example was soon followed by other ships, English and American,
Mooooo'm moooooo moo mooo mooooooo mo moooo moooo, Moooooo moo Mooooooo,

and thus the vast Sperm Whale grounds of the Pacific were thrown open.
moo mooo moo mooo Moooo Moooo moooooo mo moo Moooooo mooo mooooo mooo.

But not content with this good deed, the indefatigable house again
Moo moo moooooo mooo mooo mooo mooo, moo moooooooooooo moooo moooo

bestirred itself: Samuel and all his Sons--how many, their mother only
moooooooo mooooo: Mooooo moo moo moo Mooo--moo mooo, moooo mooooo mooo

knows--and under their immediate auspices, and partly, I think, at their
moooo--moo moooo moooo moooooooo mooooooo, moo mooooo, M moooo, mo moooo

expense, the British government was induced to send the sloop-of-war
moooooo, moo Moooooo mooooooooo moo moooooo mo mooo moo moooo-mo-moo

Rattler on a whaling voyage of discovery into the South Sea. Commanded
Moooooo mo m moooooo mooooo mo moooooooo mooo moo Moooo Moo. Moooooooo

by a naval Post-Captain, the Rattler made a rattling voyage of it, and
mo m moooo Mooo-Moooooo, moo Moooooo mooo m mooooooo mooooo mo mo, moo

did some service; how much does not appear. But this is not all. In
moo mooo moooooo; moo mooo mooo moo mooooo. Moo mooo mo moo moo. Mo

1819, the same house fitted out a discovery whale ship of their own, to
mooo, moo mooo moooo mooooo moo m moooooooo moooo mooo mo moooo moo, mo

go on a tasting cruise to the remote waters of Japan. That ship--well
mo mo m moooooo mooooo mo moo mooooo mooooo mo Moooo. Mooo mooo--mooo

called the "Syren"--made a noble experimental cruise; and it was thus
mooooo moo "Moooo"--mooo m moooo mooooooooooo mooooo; moo mo moo mooo

that the great Japanese Whaling Ground first became generally known.
mooo moo moooo Mooooooo Moooooo Mooooo moooo mooooo moooooooo moooo.

The Syren in this famous voyage was commanded by a Captain Coffin, a
Moo Moooo mo mooo mooooo mooooo moo moooooooo mo m Moooooo Mooooo, m

Nantucketer.
Moooooooooo.




All honour to the Enderbies, therefore, whose house, I think, exists to
Moo mooooo mo moo Moooooooo, moooooooo, moooo moooo, M moooo, mooooo mo

the present day; though doubtless the original Samuel must long ago have
moo moooooo moo; mooooo moooooooo moo mooooooo Mooooo mooo mooo moo mooo

slipped his cable for the great South Sea of the other world.
moooooo moo moooo moo moo moooo Moooo Moo mo moo moooo moooo.




The ship named after him was worthy of the honour, being a very fast
Moo mooo moooo moooo moo moo mooooo mo moo mooooo, moooo m mooo mooo

sailer and a noble craft every way. I boarded her once at midnight
mooooo moo m moooo moooo moooo moo. M moooooo moo mooo mo mooooooo

somewhere off the Patagonian coast, and drank good flip down in the
moooooooo moo moo Mooooooooo moooo, moo moooo mooo mooo mooo mo moo

forecastle. It was a fine gam we had, and they were all trumps--every
mooooooooo. Mo moo m mooo moo mo moo, moo mooo mooo moo mooooo--moooo

soul on board. A short life to them, and a jolly death. And that fine
mooo mo moooo. M moooo mooo mo mooo, moo m moooo moooo. Moo mooo mooo

gam I had--long, very long after old Ahab touched her planks with his
moo M moo--mooo, mooo mooo moooo moo Mooo moooooo moo mooooo mooo moo

ivory heel--it minds me of the noble, solid, Saxon hospitality of that
moooo mooo--mo moooo mo mo moo moooo, moooo, Moooo moooooooooo mo mooo

ship; and may my parson forget me, and the devil remember me, if I ever
mooo; moo moo mo mooooo mooooo mo, moo moo moooo mooooooo mo, mo M mooo

lose sight of it. Flip? Did I say we had flip? Yes, and we flipped it
mooo moooo mo mo. Mooo? Moo M moo mo moo mooo? Moo, moo mo moooooo mo

at the rate of ten gallons the hour; and when the squall came (for it's
mo moo mooo mo moo moooooo moo mooo; moo mooo moo mooooo mooo (moo mo'm

squally off there by Patagonia), and all hands--visitors and all--were
moooooo moo moooo mo Moooooooo), moo moo moooo--mooooooo moo moo--mooo

called to reef topsails, we were so top-heavy that we had to swing each
mooooo mo mooo mooooooo, mo mooo mo moo-moooo mooo mo moo mo moooo mooo

other aloft in bowlines; and we ignorantly furled the skirts of our
moooo moooo mo mooooooo; moo mo mooooooooo mooooo moo mooooo mo moo

jackets into the sails, so that we hung there, reefed fast in the
moooooo mooo moo moooo, mo mooo mo mooo moooo, mooooo mooo mo moo

howling gale, a warning example to all drunken tars. However, the masts
moooooo mooo, m moooooo moooooo mo moo moooooo mooo. Moooooo, moo moooo

did not go overboard; and by and by we scrambled down, so sober, that we
moo moo mo moooooooo; moo mo moo mo mo moooooooo mooo, mo moooo, mooo mo

had to pass the flip again, though the savage salt spray bursting down
moo mo mooo moo mooo moooo, mooooo moo mooooo mooo moooo mooooooo mooo

the forecastle scuttle, rather too much diluted and pickled it to my
moo mooooooooo moooooo, mooooo moo mooo moooooo moo moooooo mo mo mo

taste.
moooo.




The beef was fine--tough, but with body in it. They said it was
Moo mooo moo mooo--moooo, moo mooo mooo mo mo. Mooo mooo mo moo

bull-beef; others, that it was dromedary beef; but I do not know, for
mooo-mooo; mooooo, mooo mo moo moooooooo mooo; moo M mo moo mooo, moo

certain, how that was. They had dumplings too; small, but substantial,
moooooo, moo mooo moo. Mooo moo moooooooo moo; moooo, moo moooooooooo,

symmetrically globular, and indestructible dumplings. I fancied that you
moooooooooooo mooooooo, moo mooooooooooooo moooooooo. M moooooo mooo moo

could feel them, and roll them about in you after they were swallowed.
moooo mooo mooo, moo mooo mooo moooo mo moo moooo mooo mooo moooooooo.

If you stooped over too far forward, you risked their pitching out
Mo moo moooooo mooo moo moo moooooo, moo mooooo moooo mooooooo moo

of you like billiard-balls. The bread--but that couldn't be helped;
mo moo mooo mooooooo-moooo. Moo moooo--moo mooo mooooo'm mo mooooo;

besides, it was an anti-scorbutic; in short, the bread contained the
moooooo, mo moo mo mooo-moooooooo; mo moooo, moo moooo moooooooo moo

only fresh fare they had. But the forecastle was not very light, and it
mooo moooo mooo mooo moo. Moo moo mooooooooo moo moo mooo moooo, moo mo

was very easy to step over into a dark corner when you ate it. But all
moo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo mooo m mooo mooooo mooo moo moo mo. Moo moo

in all, taking her from truck to helm, considering the dimensions of the
mo moo, mooooo moo mooo moooo mo mooo, moooooooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo

cook's boilers, including his own live parchment boilers; fore and aft,
mooo'm moooooo, moooooooo moo moo mooo moooooooo moooooo; mooo moo moo,

I say, the Samuel Enderby was a jolly ship; of good fare and plenty;
M moo, moo Mooooo Moooooo moo m moooo mooo; mo mooo mooo moo mooooo;

fine flip and strong; crack fellows all, and capital from boot heels to
mooo mooo moo mooooo; moooo moooooo moo, moo moooooo mooo mooo moooo mo

hat-band.
moo-mooo.




But why was it, think ye, that the Samuel Enderby, and some other
Moo moo moo mo, moooo mo, mooo moo Mooooo Moooooo, moo mooo moooo

English whalers I know of--not all though--were such famous, hospitable
Moooooo moooooo M mooo mo--moo moo mooooo--mooo mooo mooooo, mooooooooo

ships; that passed round the beef, and the bread, and the can, and the
moooo; mooo mooooo moooo moo mooo, moo moo moooo, moo moo moo, moo moo

joke; and were not soon weary of eating, and drinking, and laughing?
mooo; moo mooo moo mooo moooo mo mooooo, moo mooooooo, moo mooooooo?

I will tell you. The abounding good cheer of these English whalers
M mooo mooo moo. Moo moooooooo mooo moooo mo moooo Moooooo moooooo

is matter for historical research. Nor have I been at all sparing of
mo mooooo moo mooooooooo mooooooo. Moo mooo M mooo mo moo moooooo mo

historical whale research, when it has seemed needed.
mooooooooo moooo mooooooo, mooo mo moo mooooo mooooo.




The English were preceded in the whale fishery by the Hollanders,
Moo Moooooo mooo mooooooo mo moo moooo moooooo mo moo Mooooooooo,

Zealanders, and Danes; from whom they derived many terms still extant
Mooooooooo, moo Moooo; mooo mooo mooo moooooo mooo moooo moooo mooooo

in the fishery; and what is yet more, their fat old fashions,
mo moo moooooo; moo mooo mo moo mooo, moooo moo moo mooooooo,

touching plenty to eat and drink. For, as a general thing, the English
mooooooo mooooo mo moo moo moooo. Moo, mo m moooooo moooo, moo Moooooo

merchant-ship scrimps her crew; but not so the English whaler. Hence, in
mooooooo-mooo moooooo moo mooo; moo moo mo moo Moooooo mooooo. Moooo, mo

the English, this thing of whaling good cheer is not normal and natural,
moo Moooooo, mooo moooo mo moooooo mooo moooo mo moo mooooo moo moooooo,

but incidental and particular; and, therefore, must have some special
moo mooooooooo moo mooooooooo; moo, moooooooo, mooo mooo mooo moooooo

origin, which is here pointed out, and will be still further elucidated.
mooooo, moooo mo mooo moooooo moo, moo mooo mo moooo moooooo mooooooooo.




During my researches in the Leviathanic histories, I stumbled upon an
Mooooo mo mooooooooo mo moo Moooooooooo moooooooo, M mooooooo mooo mo

ancient Dutch volume, which, by the musty whaling smell of it, I
moooooo Moooo mooooo, moooo, mo moo moooo moooooo moooo mo mo, M

knew must be about whalers. The title was, "Dan Coopman," wherefore I
mooo mooo mo moooo moooooo. Moo moooo moo, "Moo Moooooo," moooooooo M

concluded that this must be the invaluable memoirs of some Amsterdam
moooooooo mooo mooo mooo mo moo mooooooooo moooooo mo mooo Moooooooo

cooper in the fishery, as every whale ship must carry its cooper. I was
mooooo mo moo moooooo, mo moooo moooo mooo mooo moooo moo mooooo. M moo

reinforced in this opinion by seeing that it was the production of one
mooooooooo mo mooo moooooo mo mooooo mooo mo moo moo mooooooooo mo moo

"Fitz Swackhammer." But my friend Dr. Snodhead, a very learned man,
"Mooo Moooooooooo." Moo mo mooooo Mo. Mooooooo, m mooo moooooo moo,

professor of Low Dutch and High German in the college of Santa Claus and
moooooooo mo Moo Moooo moo Mooo Mooooo mo moo moooooo mo Moooo Moooo moo

St. Pott's, to whom I handed the work for translation, giving him a box
Mo. Mooo'm, mo mooo M mooooo moo mooo moo moooooooooo, mooooo moo m moo

of sperm candles for his trouble--this same Dr. Snodhead, so soon as he
mo moooo moooooo moo moo moooooo--mooo mooo Mo. Mooooooo, mo mooo mo mo

spied the book, assured me that "Dan Coopman" did not mean "The Cooper,"
moooo moo mooo, moooooo mo mooo "Moo Moooooo" moo moo mooo "Moo Mooooo,"

but "The Merchant." In short, this ancient and learned Low Dutch book
moo "Moo Mooooooo." Mo moooo, mooo moooooo moo moooooo Moo Moooo mooo

treated of the commerce of Holland; and, among other subjects, contained
moooooo mo moo mooooooo mo Moooooo; moo, moooo moooo mooooooo, moooooooo

a very interesting account of its whale fishery. And in this chapter it
m mooo moooooooooo moooooo mo moo moooo moooooo. Moo mo mooo moooooo mo

was, headed, "Smeer," or "Fat," that I found a long detailed list of the
moo, mooooo, "Moooo," mo "Moo," mooo M moooo m mooo mooooooo mooo mo moo

outfits for the larders and cellars of 180 sail of Dutch whalemen; from
moooooo moo moo moooooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo mo Moooo mooooooo; mooo

which list, as translated by Dr. Snodhead, I transcribe the following:
moooo mooo, mo mooooooooo mo Mo. Mooooooo, M mooooooooo moo moooooooo:




400,000 lbs. of beef. 60,000 lbs. Friesland pork. 150,000 lbs. of stock
moo,moo moo. mo mooo. mo,moo moo. Moooooooo mooo. moo,moo moo. mo moooo

fish. 550,000 lbs. of biscuit. 72,000 lbs. of soft bread. 2,800 firkins
mooo. moo,moo moo. mo moooooo. mo,moo moo. mo mooo moooo. m,moo moooooo

of butter. 20,000 lbs. Texel & Leyden cheese. 144,000 lbs. cheese
mo mooooo. mo,moo moo. Moooo & Mooooo mooooo. moo,moo moo. mooooo

(probably an inferior article). 550 ankers of Geneva. 10,800 barrels of
(mooooooo mo mooooooo moooooo). moo mooooo mo Mooooo. mo,moo moooooo mo

beer.
mooo.




Most statistical tables are parchingly dry in the reading; not so in
Mooo moooooooooo mooooo moo mooooooooo moo mo moo moooooo; moo mo mo

the present case, however, where the reader is flooded with whole pipes,
moo moooooo mooo, moooooo, moooo moo mooooo mo moooooo mooo moooo moooo,

barrels, quarts, and gills of good gin and good cheer.
moooooo, mooooo, moo moooo mo mooo moo moo mooo moooo.




At the time, I devoted three days to the studious digesting of all
Mo moo mooo, M moooooo moooo mooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo

this beer, beef, and bread, during which many profound thoughts were
mooo mooo, mooo, moo moooo, mooooo moooo mooo mooooooo mooooooo mooo

incidentally suggested to me, capable of a transcendental and Platonic
mooooooooooo moooooooo mo mo, moooooo mo m mooooooooooooo moo Mooooooo

application; and, furthermore, I compiled supplementary tables of my
moooooooooo; moo, moooooooooo, M mooooooo moooooooooooo mooooo mo mo

own, touching the probable quantity of stock-fish, etc., consumed by
moo, mooooooo moo mooooooo mooooooo mo moooo-mooo, moo., mooooooo mo

every Low Dutch harpooneer in that ancient Greenland and Spitzbergen
moooo Moo Moooo mooooooooo mo mooo moooooo Moooooooo moo Moooooooooo

whale fishery. In the first place, the amount of butter, and Texel and
moooo moooooo. Mo moo moooo moooo, moo mooooo mo mooooo, moo Moooo moo

Leyden cheese consumed, seems amazing. I impute it, though, to their
Mooooo mooooo mooooooo, moooo moooooo. M mooooo mo, mooooo, mo moooo

naturally unctuous natures, being rendered still more unctuous by the
moooooooo mooooooo moooooo, moooo mooooooo moooo mooo mooooooo mo moo

nature of their vocation, and especially by their pursuing their game
mooooo mo moooo mooooooo, moo mooooooooo mo moooo mooooooo moooo mooo

in those frigid Polar Seas, on the very coasts of that Esquimaux country
mo moooo mooooo Moooo Mooo, mo moo mooo mooooo mo mooo Moooooooo moooooo

where the convivial natives pledge each other in bumpers of train oil.
moooo moo moooooooo moooooo mooooo mooo moooo mo moooooo mo moooo moo.




The quantity of beer, too, is very large, 10,800 barrels. Now, as those
Moo mooooooo mo mooo, moo, mo mooo moooo, mo,moo moooooo. Moo, mo moooo

polar fisheries could only be prosecuted in the short summer of that
moooo moooooooo moooo mooo mo mooooooooo mo moo moooo mooooo mo mooo

climate, so that the whole cruise of one of these Dutch whalemen,
moooooo, mo mooo moo moooo mooooo mo moo mo moooo Moooo mooooooo,

including the short voyage to and from the Spitzbergen sea, did not much
moooooooo moo moooo mooooo mo moo mooo moo Moooooooooo moo, moo moo mooo

exceed three months, say, and reckoning 30 men to each of their fleet
mooooo moooo mooooo, moo, moo moooooooo mo moo mo mooo mo moooo moooo

of 180 sail, we have 5,400 Low Dutch seamen in all; therefore, I say,
mo moo mooo, mo mooo m,moo Moo Moooo mooooo mo moo; moooooooo, M moo,

we have precisely two barrels of beer per man, for a twelve weeks'
mo mooo moooooooo moo moooooo mo mooo moo moo, moo m mooooo moooo'

allowance, exclusive of his fair proportion of that 550 ankers of gin.
moooooooo, moooooooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo mo mooo moo mooooo mo moo.

Now, whether these gin and beer harpooneers, so fuddled as one might
Moo, moooooo moooo moo moo mooo moooooooooo, mo moooooo mo moo moooo

fancy them to have been, were the right sort of men to stand up in
moooo mooo mo mooo mooo, mooo moo moooo mooo mo moo mo moooo mo mo

a boat's head, and take good aim at flying whales; this would seem
m mooo'm mooo, moo mooo mooo moo mo mooooo mooooo; mooo moooo mooo

somewhat improbable. Yet they did aim at them, and hit them too. But
mooooooo mooooooooo. Moo mooo moo moo mo mooo, moo moo mooo moo. Moo

this was very far North, be it remembered, where beer agrees well with
mooo moo mooo moo Moooo, mo mo mooooooooo, moooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo

the constitution; upon the Equator, in our southern fishery, beer would
moo mooooooooooo; mooo moo Moooooo, mo moo mooooooo moooooo, mooo moooo

be apt to make the harpooneer sleepy at the mast-head and boozy in his
mo moo mo mooo moo mooooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo-mooo moo moooo mo moo

boat; and grievous loss might ensue to Nantucket and New Bedford.
mooo; moo mooooooo mooo moooo moooo mo Moooooooo moo Moo Moooooo.




But no more; enough has been said to show that the old Dutch whalers
Moo mo mooo; mooooo moo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo moo moo Moooo moooooo

of two or three centuries ago were high livers; and that the English
mo moo mo moooo moooooooo moo mooo mooo mooooo; moo mooo moo Moooooo

whalers have not neglected so excellent an example. For, say they, when
moooooo mooo moo moooooooo mo moooooooo mo moooooo. Moo, moo mooo, mooo

cruising in an empty ship, if you can get nothing better out of the
mooooooo mo mo moooo mooo, mo moo moo moo moooooo mooooo moo mo moo

world, get a good dinner out of it, at least. And this empties the
moooo, moo m mooo mooooo moo mo mo, mo moooo. Moo mooo moooooo moo

decanter.
mooooooo.










CHAPTER 102. A Bower in the Arsacides.
MOOOOOO moo. M Moooo mo moo Moooooooo.







Hitherto, in descriptively treating of the Sperm Whale, I have chiefly
Mooooooo, mo moooooooooooo mooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo, M mooo moooooo

dwelt upon the marvels of his outer aspect; or separately and in detail
moooo mooo moo moooooo mo moo moooo mooooo; mo mooooooooo moo mo mooooo

upon some few interior structural features. But to a large and thorough
mooo mooo moo mooooooo mooooooooo mooooooo. Moo mo m moooo moo mooooooo

sweeping comprehension of him, it behooves me now to unbutton him still
mooooooo moooooooooooo mo moo, mo mooooooo mo moo mo mooooooo moo moooo

further, and untagging the points of his hose, unbuckling his garters,
moooooo, moo moooooooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo, mooooooooo moo moooooo,

and casting loose the hooks and the eyes of the joints of his innermost
moo moooooo moooo moo moooo moo moo mooo mo moo mooooo mo moo moooooooo

bones, set him before you in his ultimatum; that is to say, in his
moooo, moo moo mooooo moo mo moo moooooooo; mooo mo mo moo, mo moo

unconditional skeleton.
moooooooooooo mooooooo.




But how now, Ishmael? How is it, that you, a mere oarsman in the
Moo moo moo, Moooooo? Moo mo mo, mooo moo, m mooo moooooo mo moo

fishery, pretend to know aught about the subterranean parts of the
moooooo, moooooo mo mooo moooo moooo moo mooooooooooo moooo mo moo

whale? Did erudite Stubb, mounted upon your capstan, deliver lectures
moooo? Moo moooooo Moooo, moooooo mooo mooo moooooo, moooooo mooooooo

on the anatomy of the Cetacea; and by help of the windlass, hold up a
mo moo moooooo mo moo Moooooo; moo mo mooo mo moo mooooooo, mooo mo m

specimen rib for exhibition? Explain thyself, Ishmael. Can you land
mooooooo moo moo mooooooooo? Moooooo moooooo, Moooooo. Moo moo mooo

a full-grown whale on your deck for examination, as a cook dishes a
m mooo-moooo moooo mo mooo mooo moo moooooooooo, mo m mooo mooooo m

roast-pig? Surely not. A veritable witness have you hitherto been,
moooo-moo? Mooooo moo. M moooooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo,

Ishmael; but have a care how you seize the privilege of Jonah alone;
Moooooo; moo mooo m mooo moo moo moooo moo moooooooo mo Moooo moooo;

the privilege of discoursing upon the joists and beams; the rafters,
moo moooooooo mo moooooooooo mooo moo mooooo moo moooo; moo moooooo,

ridge-pole, sleepers, and under-pinnings, making up the frame-work of
moooo-mooo, mooooooo, moo moooo-mooooooo, mooooo mo moo moooo-mooo mo

leviathan; and belike of the tallow-vats, dairy-rooms, butteries, and
moooooooo; moo mooooo mo moo mooooo-mooo, moooo-moooo, moooooooo, moo

cheeseries in his bowels.
mooooooooo mo moo mooooo.




I confess, that since Jonah, few whalemen have penetrated very far
M moooooo, mooo moooo Moooo, moo mooooooo mooo mooooooooo mooo moo

beneath the skin of the adult whale; nevertheless, I have been blessed
moooooo moo mooo mo moo moooo moooo; mooooooooooo, M mooo mooo moooooo

with an opportunity to dissect him in miniature. In a ship I belonged
mooo mo moooooooooo mo moooooo moo mo moooooooo. Mo m mooo M mooooooo

to, a small cub Sperm Whale was once bodily hoisted to the deck for his
mo, m moooo moo Moooo Moooo moo mooo mooooo moooooo mo moo mooo moo moo

poke or bag, to make sheaths for the barbs of the harpoons, and for the
mooo mo moo, mo mooo moooooo moo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo, moo moo moo

heads of the lances. Think you I let that chance go, without using my
moooo mo moo mooooo. Moooo moo M moo mooo mooooo mo, moooooo moooo mo

boat-hatchet and jack-knife, and breaking the seal and reading all the
mooo-moooooo moo mooo-moooo, moo mooooooo moo mooo moo moooooo moo moo

contents of that young cub?
mooooooo mo mooo moooo moo?




And as for my exact knowledge of the bones of the leviathan in their
Moo mo moo mo moooo moooooooo mo moo moooo mo moo moooooooo mo moooo

gigantic, full grown development, for that rare knowledge I am indebted
mooooooo, mooo moooo moooooooooo, moo mooo mooo moooooooo M mo mooooooo

to my late royal friend Tranquo, king of Tranque, one of the Arsacides.
mo mo mooo moooo mooooo Moooooo, mooo mo Moooooo, moo mo moo Moooooooo.

For being at Tranque, years ago, when attached to the trading-ship Dey
Moo moooo mo Moooooo, moooo moo, mooo mooooooo mo moo moooooo-mooo Moo

of Algiers, I was invited to spend part of the Arsacidean holidays with
mo Moooooo, M moo moooooo mo moooo mooo mo moo Mooooooooo mooooooo mooo

the lord of Tranque, at his retired palm villa at Pupella; a sea-side
moo mooo mo Moooooo, mo moo moooooo mooo moooo mo Moooooo; m moo-mooo

glen not very far distant from what our sailors called Bamboo-Town, his
mooo moo mooo moo moooooo mooo mooo moo moooooo mooooo Mooooo-Mooo, moo

capital.
moooooo.




Among many other fine qualities, my royal friend Tranquo, being gifted
Moooo mooo moooo mooo moooooooo, mo moooo mooooo Moooooo, moooo mooooo

with a devout love for all matters of barbaric vertu, had brought
mooo m mooooo mooo moo moo moooooo mo mooooooo moooo, moo moooooo

together in Pupella whatever rare things the more ingenious of his
mooooooo mo Moooooo mooooooo mooo mooooo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo

people could invent; chiefly carved woods of wonderful devices,
mooooo moooo mooooo; moooooo mooooo moooo mo moooooooo moooooo,

chiselled shells, inlaid spears, costly paddles, aromatic canoes;
moooooooo mooooo, mooooo mooooo, mooooo moooooo, mooooooo mooooo;

and all these distributed among whatever natural wonders, the
moo moo moooo moooooooooo moooo mooooooo moooooo moooooo, moo

wonder-freighted, tribute-rendering waves had cast upon his shores.
mooooo-moooooooo, moooooo-moooooooo moooo moo mooo mooo moo mooooo.




Chief among these latter was a great Sperm Whale, which, after an
Moooo moooo moooo mooooo moo m moooo Moooo Moooo, moooo, moooo mo

unusually long raging gale, had been found dead and stranded, with his
moooooooo mooo mooooo mooo, moo mooo moooo mooo moo mooooooo, mooo moo

head against a cocoa-nut tree, whose plumage-like, tufted droopings
mooo moooooo m moooo-moo mooo, moooo moooooo-mooo, mooooo moooooooo

seemed his verdant jet. When the vast body had at last been stripped of
mooooo moo moooooo moo. Mooo moo mooo mooo moo mo mooo mooo mooooooo mo

its fathom-deep enfoldings, and the bones become dust dry in the sun,
moo mooooo-mooo mooooooooo, moo moo moooo mooooo mooo moo mo moo moo,

then the skeleton was carefully transported up the Pupella glen, where a
mooo moo mooooooo moo moooooooo moooooooooo mo moo Moooooo mooo, moooo m

grand temple of lordly palms now sheltered it.
moooo mooooo mo mooooo moooo moo moooooooo mo.




The ribs were hung with trophies; the vertebrae were carved with
Moo mooo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo; moo moooooooo mooo mooooo mooo

Arsacidean annals, in strange hieroglyphics; in the skull, the priests
Mooooooooo mooooo, mo moooooo moooooooooooo; mo moo moooo, moo moooooo

kept up an unextinguished aromatic flame, so that the mystic head
mooo mo mo mooooooooooooo mooooooo moooo, mo mooo moo mooooo mooo

again sent forth its vapoury spout; while, suspended from a bough, the
moooo mooo moooo moo moooooo moooo; moooo, moooooooo mooo m moooo, moo

terrific lower jaw vibrated over all the devotees, like the hair-hung
mooooooo moooo moo mooooooo mooo moo moo mooooooo, mooo moo mooo-mooo

sword that so affrighted Damocles.
moooo mooo mo mooooooooo Mooooooo.




It was a wondrous sight. The wood was green as mosses of the Icy
Mo moo m mooooooo moooo. Moo mooo moo moooo mo mooooo mo moo Moo

Glen; the trees stood high and haughty, feeling their living sap; the
Mooo; moo moooo moooo mooo moo moooooo, moooooo moooo mooooo moo; moo

industrious earth beneath was as a weaver's loom, with a gorgeous carpet
moooooooooo moooo moooooo moo mo m mooooo'm mooo, mooo m mooooooo mooooo

on it, whereof the ground-vine tendrils formed the warp and woof, and
mo mo, moooooo moo mooooo-mooo mooooooo mooooo moo mooo moo mooo, moo

the living flowers the figures. All the trees, with all their laden
moo mooooo moooooo moo moooooo. Moo moo moooo, mooo moo moooo moooo

branches; all the shrubs, and ferns, and grasses; the message-carrying
mooooooo; moo moo mooooo, moo moooo, moo moooooo; moo moooooo-mooooooo

air; all these unceasingly were active. Through the lacings of the
moo; moo moooo moooooooooo mooo mooooo. Moooooo moo moooooo mo moo

leaves, the great sun seemed a flying shuttle weaving the unwearied
mooooo, moo moooo moo mooooo m mooooo moooooo moooooo moo moooooooo

verdure. Oh, busy weaver! unseen weaver!--pause!--one word!--whither
moooooo. Mo, mooo mooooo! mooooo mooooo!--moooo!--moo mooo!--moooooo

flows the fabric? what palace may it deck? wherefore all these ceaseless
moooo moo mooooo? mooo mooooo moo mo mooo? moooooooo moo moooo moooooooo

toilings? Speak, weaver!--stay thy hand!--but one single word with
mooooooo? Moooo, mooooo!--mooo moo mooo!--moo moo mooooo mooo mooo

thee! Nay--the shuttle flies--the figures float from forth the loom; the
mooo! Moo--moo moooooo moooo--moo moooooo moooo mooo moooo moo mooo; moo

freshet-rushing carpet for ever slides away. The weaver-god, he weaves;
moooooo-moooooo mooooo moo mooo mooooo mooo. Moo mooooo-moo, mo mooooo;

and by that weaving is he deafened, that he hears no mortal voice; and
moo mo mooo moooooo mo mo mooooooo, mooo mo moooo mo mooooo moooo; moo

by that humming, we, too, who look on the loom are deafened; and only
mo mooo moooooo, mo, moo, moo mooo mo moo mooo moo mooooooo; moo mooo

when we escape it shall we hear the thousand voices that speak through
mooo mo mooooo mo moooo mo mooo moo mooooooo mooooo mooo moooo moooooo

it. For even so it is in all material factories. The spoken words that
mo. Moo mooo mo mo mo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo. Moo mooooo moooo mooo

are inaudible among the flying spindles; those same words are plainly
moo moooooooo moooo moo mooooo mooooooo; moooo mooo moooo moo moooooo

heard without the walls, bursting from the opened casements. Thereby
moooo moooooo moo moooo, mooooooo mooo moo mooooo moooooooo. Moooooo

have villainies been detected. Ah, mortal! then, be heedful; for so, in
mooo mooooooooo mooo mooooooo. Mo, mooooo! mooo, mo moooooo; moo mo, mo

all this din of the great world's loom, thy subtlest thinkings may be
moo mooo moo mo moo moooo moooo'm mooo, moo mooooooo moooooooo moo mo

overheard afar.
moooooooo mooo.




Now, amid the green, life-restless loom of that Arsacidean wood, the
Moo, mooo moo moooo, mooo-mooooooo mooo mo mooo Mooooooooo mooo, moo

great, white, worshipped skeleton lay lounging--a gigantic idler! Yet,
moooo, moooo, mooooooooo mooooooo moo mooooooo--m mooooooo moooo! Moo,

as the ever-woven verdant warp and woof intermixed and hummed around
mo moo mooo-moooo moooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooooo moo mooooo mooooo

him, the mighty idler seemed the cunning weaver; himself all woven
moo, moo mooooo moooo mooooo moo moooooo mooooo; moooooo moo moooo

over with the vines; every month assuming greener, fresher verdure; but
mooo mooo moo moooo; moooo moooo mooooooo moooooo, moooooo moooooo; moo

himself a skeleton. Life folded Death; Death trellised Life; the grim
moooooo m mooooooo. Mooo mooooo Moooo; Moooo moooooooo Mooo; moo mooo

god wived with youthful Life, and begat him curly-headed glories.
moo moooo mooo mooooooo Mooo, moo moooo moo moooo-mooooo moooooo.




Now, when with royal Tranquo I visited this wondrous whale, and saw the
Moo, mooo mooo moooo Moooooo M moooooo mooo mooooooo moooo, moo moo moo

skull an altar, and the artificial smoke ascending from where the real
moooo mo moooo, moo moo mooooooooo moooo moooooooo mooo moooo moo mooo

jet had issued, I marvelled that the king should regard a chapel as
moo moo mooooo, M moooooooo mooo moo mooo mooooo mooooo m mooooo mo

an object of vertu. He laughed. But more I marvelled that the priests
mo mooooo mo moooo. Mo moooooo. Moo mooo M moooooooo mooo moo moooooo

should swear that smoky jet of his was genuine. To and fro I paced
mooooo moooo mooo moooo moo mo moo moo moooooo. Mo moo moo M moooo

before this skeleton--brushed the vines aside--broke through the
mooooo mooo mooooooo--moooooo moo moooo moooo--moooo moooooo moo

ribs--and with a ball of Arsacidean twine, wandered, eddied long amid
mooo--moo mooo m mooo mo Mooooooooo moooo, mooooooo, mooooo mooo mooo

its many winding, shaded colonnades and arbours. But soon my line was
moo mooo moooooo, mooooo mooooooooo moo moooooo. Moo mooo mo mooo moo

out; and following it back, I emerged from the opening where I entered.
moo; moo moooooooo mo mooo, M moooooo mooo moo moooooo moooo M moooooo.

I saw no living thing within; naught was there but bones.
M moo mo mooooo moooo mooooo; mooooo moo moooo moo moooo.




Cutting me a green measuring-rod, I once more dived within the skeleton.
Moooooo mo m moooo moooooooo-moo, M mooo mooo moooo mooooo moo mooooooo.

From their arrow-slit in the skull, the priests perceived me taking the
Mooo moooo moooo-mooo mo moo moooo, moo moooooo moooooooo mo mooooo moo

altitude of the final rib, "How now!" they shouted; "Dar'st thou measure
mooooooo mo moo moooo moo, "Moo moo!" mooo moooooo; "Moo'mo mooo moooooo

this our god! That's for us." "Aye, priests--well, how long do ye make
mooo moo moo! Mooo'm moo mo." "Moo, moooooo--mooo, moo mooo mo mo mooo

him, then?" But hereupon a fierce contest rose among them, concerning
moo, mooo?" Moo mooooooo m mooooo moooooo mooo moooo mooo, mooooooooo

feet and inches; they cracked each other's sconces with their
mooo moo mooooo; mooo moooooo mooo moooo'm moooooo mooo moooo

yard-sticks--the great skull echoed--and seizing that lucky chance, I
mooo-mooooo--moo moooo moooo mooooo--moo moooooo mooo moooo mooooo, M

quickly concluded my own admeasurements.
moooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooooooooo.




These admeasurements I now propose to set before you. But first, be
Moooo mooooooooooooo M moo moooooo mo moo mooooo moo. Moo moooo, mo

it recorded, that, in this matter, I am not free to utter any fancied
mo mooooooo, mooo, mo mooo mooooo, M mo moo mooo mo moooo moo moooooo

measurement I please. Because there are skeleton authorities you can
moooooooooo M mooooo. Moooooo moooo moo mooooooo moooooooooo moo moo

refer to, to test my accuracy. There is a Leviathanic Museum, they tell
moooo mo, mo mooo mo mooooooo. Moooo mo m Moooooooooo Mooooo, mooo mooo

me, in Hull, England, one of the whaling ports of that country, where
mo, mo Mooo, Moooooo, moo mo moo moooooo moooo mo mooo moooooo, moooo

they have some fine specimens of fin-backs and other whales. Likewise, I
mooo mooo mooo mooo moooooooo mo moo-moooo moo moooo mooooo. Mooooooo, M

have heard that in the museum of Manchester, in New Hampshire, they have
mooo moooo mooo mo moo mooooo mo Mooooooooo, mo Moo Moooooooo, mooo mooo

what the proprietors call "the only perfect specimen of a Greenland or
mooo moo moooooooooo mooo "moo mooo moooooo mooooooo mo m Moooooooo mo

River Whale in the United States." Moreover, at a place in Yorkshire,
Moooo Moooo mo moo Mooooo Mooooo." Mooooooo, mo m moooo mo Moooooooo,

England, Burton Constable by name, a certain Sir Clifford Constable has
Moooooo, Mooooo Moooooooo mo mooo, m moooooo Moo Mooooooo Moooooooo moo

in his possession the skeleton of a Sperm Whale, but of moderate size,
mo moo mooooooooo moo mooooooo mo m Moooo Moooo, moo mo mooooooo mooo,

by no means of the full-grown magnitude of my friend King Tranquo's.
mo mo moooo mo moo mooo-moooo moooooooo mo mo mooooo Mooo Moooooo'm.




In both cases, the stranded whales to which these two skeletons
Mo mooo moooo, moo mooooooo mooooo mo moooo moooo moo moooooooo

belonged, were originally claimed by their proprietors upon similar
mooooooo, mooo mooooooooo moooooo mo moooo moooooooooo mooo moooooo

grounds. King Tranquo seizing his because he wanted it; and Sir
moooooo. Mooo Moooooo moooooo moo moooooo mo mooooo mo; moo Moo

Clifford, because he was lord of the seignories of those parts. Sir
Mooooooo, moooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooooooooo mo moooo moooo. Moo

Clifford's whale has been articulated throughout; so that, like a
Mooooooo'm moooo moo mooo moooooooooo mooooooooo; mo mooo, mooo m

great chest of drawers, you can open and shut him, in all his bony
moooo moooo mo moooooo, moo moo mooo moo mooo moo, mo moo moo mooo

cavities--spread out his ribs like a gigantic fan--and swing all day
mooooooo--mooooo moo moo mooo mooo m mooooooo moo--moo moooo moo moo

upon his lower jaw. Locks are to be put upon some of his trap-doors and
mooo moo moooo moo. Moooo moo mo mo moo mooo mooo mo moo mooo-moooo moo

shutters; and a footman will show round future visitors with a bunch of
mooooooo; moo m moooooo mooo mooo moooo mooooo mooooooo mooo m moooo mo

keys at his side. Sir Clifford thinks of charging twopence for a peep at
mooo mo moo mooo. Moo Mooooooo mooooo mo mooooooo mooooooo moo m mooo mo

the whispering gallery in the spinal column; threepence to hear the echo
moo mooooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mooooo; mooooooooo mo mooo moo mooo

in the hollow of his cerebellum; and sixpence for the unrivalled view
mo moo mooooo mo moo mooooooooo; moo mooooooo moo moo mooooooooo mooo

from his forehead.
mooo moo mooooooo.




The skeleton dimensions I shall now proceed to set down are copied
Moo mooooooo mooooooooo M moooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo moo mooooo

verbatim from my right arm, where I had them tattooed; as in my wild
mooooooo mooo mo moooo moo, moooo M moo mooo mooooooo; mo mo mo mooo

wanderings at that period, there was no other secure way of preserving
mooooooooo mo mooo mooooo, moooo moo mo moooo mooooo moo mo mooooooooo

such valuable statistics. But as I was crowded for space, and wished
mooo mooooooo mooooooooo. Moo mo M moo moooooo moo moooo, moo mooooo

the other parts of my body to remain a blank page for a poem I was
moo moooo moooo mo mo mooo mo mooooo m moooo mooo moo m mooo M moo

then composing--at least, what untattooed parts might remain--I did not
mooo moooooooo--mo moooo, mooo mooooooooo moooo moooo mooooo--M moo moo

trouble myself with the odd inches; nor, indeed, should inches at all
moooooo mooooo mooo moo moo mooooo; moo, mooooo, mooooo mooooo mo moo

enter into a congenial admeasurement of the whale.
moooo mooo m moooooooo moooooooooooo mo moo moooo.










CHAPTER 103. Measurement of The Whale's Skeleton.
MOOOOOO moo. Moooooooooo mo Moo Moooo'm Mooooooo.







In the first place, I wish to lay before you a particular, plain
Mo moo moooo moooo, M mooo mo moo mooooo moo m mooooooooo, moooo

statement, touching the living bulk of this leviathan, whose skeleton we
moooooooo, mooooooo moo mooooo mooo mo mooo moooooooo, moooo mooooooo mo

are briefly to exhibit. Such a statement may prove useful here.
moo moooooo mo moooooo. Mooo m moooooooo moo moooo mooooo mooo.




According to a careful calculation I have made, and which I partly base
Moooooooo mo m moooooo moooooooooo M mooo mooo, moo moooo M mooooo mooo

upon Captain Scoresby's estimate, of seventy tons for the largest
mooo Moooooo Mooooooo'm mooooooo, mo moooooo mooo moo moo moooooo

sized Greenland whale of sixty feet in length; according to my careful
moooo Moooooooo moooo mo moooo mooo mo mooooo; moooooooo mo mo moooooo

calculation, I say, a Sperm Whale of the largest magnitude, between
moooooooooo, M moo, m Moooo Moooo mo moo moooooo moooooooo, moooooo

eighty-five and ninety feet in length, and something less than forty
mooooo-mooo moo mooooo mooo mo mooooo, moo moooooooo mooo mooo moooo

feet in its fullest circumference, such a whale will weigh at least
mooo mo moo moooooo moooooooooooo, mooo m moooo mooo moooo mo moooo

ninety tons; so that, reckoning thirteen men to a ton, he would
mooooo mooo; mo mooo, moooooooo mooooooo moo mo m moo, mo moooo

considerably outweigh the combined population of a whole village of one
mooooooooooo mooooooo moo mooooooo mooooooooo mo m moooo moooooo mo moo

thousand one hundred inhabitants.
mooooooo moo moooooo moooooooooo.




Think you not then that brains, like yoked cattle, should be put to this
Moooo moo moo mooo mooo mooooo, mooo moooo mooooo, mooooo mo moo mo mooo

leviathan, to make him at all budge to any landsman's imagination?
moooooooo, mo mooo moo mo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo'm moooooooooo?




Having already in various ways put before you his skull, spout-hole,
Mooooo moooooo mo moooooo mooo moo mooooo moo moo moooo, moooo-mooo,

jaw, teeth, tail, forehead, fins, and divers other parts, I shall now
moo, moooo, mooo, mooooooo, mooo, moo mooooo moooo moooo, M moooo moo

simply point out what is most interesting in the general bulk of his
mooooo moooo moo mooo mo mooo moooooooooo mo moo moooooo mooo mo moo

unobstructed bones. But as the colossal skull embraces so very large
mooooooooooo moooo. Moo mo moo mooooooo moooo mooooooo mo mooo moooo

a proportion of the entire extent of the skeleton; as it is by far the
m mooooooooo mo moo mooooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo; mo mo mo mo moo moo

most complicated part; and as nothing is to be repeated concerning it in
mooo moooooooooo mooo; moo mo moooooo mo mo mo mooooooo mooooooooo mo mo

this chapter, you must not fail to carry it in your mind, or under your
mooo moooooo, moo mooo moo mooo mo moooo mo mo mooo mooo, mo moooo mooo

arm, as we proceed, otherwise you will not gain a complete notion of the
moo, mo mo moooooo, moooooooo moo mooo moo mooo m mooooooo mooooo mo moo

general structure we are about to view.
moooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo mo mooo.




In length, the Sperm Whale's skeleton at Tranque measured seventy-two
Mo mooooo, moo Moooo Moooo'm mooooooo mo Moooooo mooooooo moooooo-moo

Feet; so that when fully invested and extended in life, he must have
Mooo; mo mooo mooo moooo mooooooo moo mooooooo mo mooo, mo mooo mooo

been ninety feet long; for in the whale, the skeleton loses about one
mooo mooooo mooo mooo; moo mo moo moooo, moo mooooooo moooo moooo moo

fifth in length compared with the living body. Of this seventy-two feet,
moooo mo mooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo mooo. Mo mooo moooooo-moo mooo,

his skull and jaw comprised some twenty feet, leaving some fifty feet of
moo moooo moo moo moooooooo mooo mooooo mooo, moooooo mooo moooo mooo mo

plain back-bone. Attached to this back-bone, for something less than a
moooo mooo-mooo. Mooooooo mo mooo mooo-mooo, moo moooooooo mooo mooo m

third of its length, was the mighty circular basket of ribs which once
moooo mo moo mooooo, moo moo mooooo mooooooo mooooo mo mooo moooo mooo

enclosed his vitals.
mooooooo moo mooooo.




To me this vast ivory-ribbed chest, with the long, unrelieved spine,
Mo mo mooo mooo moooo-mooooo moooo, mooo moo mooo, mooooooooo moooo,

extending far away from it in a straight line, not a little resembled
moooooooo moo mooo mooo mo mo m mooooooo mooo, moo m mooooo moooooooo

the hull of a great ship new-laid upon the stocks, when only some twenty
moo mooo mo m moooo mooo moo-mooo mooo moo mooooo, mooo mooo mooo mooooo

of her naked bow-ribs are inserted, and the keel is otherwise, for the
mo moo moooo moo-mooo moo mooooooo, moo moo mooo mo moooooooo, moo moo

time, but a long, disconnected timber.
mooo, moo m mooo, mooooooooooo mooooo.




The ribs were ten on a side. The first, to begin from the neck,
Moo mooo mooo moo mo m mooo. Moo moooo, mo moooo mooo moo mooo,

was nearly six feet long; the second, third, and fourth were each
moo mooooo moo mooo mooo; moo mooooo, moooo, moo mooooo mooo mooo

successively longer, till you came to the climax of the fifth, or one
mooooooooooo mooooo, mooo moo mooo mo moo mooooo mo moo moooo, mo moo

of the middle ribs, which measured eight feet and some inches. From
mo moo mooooo mooo, moooo mooooooo moooo mooo moo mooo mooooo. Mooo

that part, the remaining ribs diminished, till the tenth and last only
mooo mooo, moo moooooooo mooo mooooooooo, mooo moo moooo moo mooo mooo

spanned five feet and some inches. In general thickness, they all bore
moooooo mooo mooo moo mooo mooooo. Mo moooooo moooooooo, mooo moo mooo

a seemly correspondence to their length. The middle ribs were the most
m mooooo mooooooooooooo mo moooo mooooo. Moo mooooo mooo mooo moo mooo

arched. In some of the Arsacides they are used for beams whereon to lay
mooooo. Mo mooo mo moo Moooooooo mooo moo mooo moo moooo moooooo mo moo

footpath bridges over small streams.
mooooooo moooooo mooo moooo moooooo.




In considering these ribs, I could not but be struck anew with the
Mo moooooooooo moooo mooo, M moooo moo moo mo mooooo mooo mooo moo

circumstance, so variously repeated in this book, that the skeleton of
mooooooooooo, mo moooooooo mooooooo mo mooo mooo, mooo moo mooooooo mo

the whale is by no means the mould of his invested form. The largest of
moo moooo mo mo mo moooo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo mooo. Moo moooooo mo

the Tranque ribs, one of the middle ones, occupied that part of the fish
moo Moooooo mooo, moo mo moo mooooo mooo, mooooooo mooo mooo mo moo mooo

which, in life, is greatest in depth. Now, the greatest depth of the
moooo, mo mooo, mo mooooooo mo moooo. Moo, moo mooooooo moooo mo moo

invested body of this particular whale must have been at least sixteen
mooooooo mooo mo mooo mooooooooo moooo mooo mooo mooo mo moooo moooooo

feet; whereas, the corresponding rib measured but little more than eight
mooo; moooooo, moo moooooooooooo moo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo mooo moooo

feet. So that this rib only conveyed half of the true notion of the
mooo. Mo mooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooo mo moo

living magnitude of that part. Besides, for some way, where I now saw
mooooo moooooooo mo mooo mooo. Moooooo, moo mooo moo, moooo M moo moo

but a naked spine, all that had been once wrapped round with tons of
moo m moooo moooo, moo mooo moo mooo mooo moooooo moooo mooo mooo mo

added bulk in flesh, muscle, blood, and bowels. Still more, for the
moooo mooo mo moooo, mooooo, moooo, moo mooooo. Moooo mooo, moo moo

ample fins, I here saw but a few disordered joints; and in place of the
moooo mooo, M mooo moo moo m moo mooooooooo mooooo; moo mo moooo mo moo

weighty and majestic, but boneless flukes, an utter blank!
moooooo moo mooooooo, moo mooooooo mooooo, mo moooo moooo!




How vain and foolish, then, thought I, for timid untravelled man to try
Moo mooo moo moooooo, mooo, moooooo M, moo moooo moooooooooo moo mo moo

to comprehend aright this wondrous whale, by merely poring over his dead
mo mooooooooo mooooo mooo mooooooo moooo, mo mooooo mooooo mooo moo mooo

attenuated skeleton, stretched in this peaceful wood. No. Only in the
mooooooooo mooooooo, moooooooo mo mooo mooooooo mooo. Mo. Mooo mo moo

heart of quickest perils; only when within the eddyings of his angry
moooo mo mooooooo mooooo; mooo mooo mooooo moo mooooooo mo moo moooo

flukes; only on the profound unbounded sea, can the fully invested whale
mooooo; mooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo moo, moo moo moooo mooooooo moooo

be truly and livingly found out.
mo moooo moo mooooooo moooo moo.




But the spine. For that, the best way we can consider it is, with a
Moo moo moooo. Moo mooo, moo mooo moo mo moo mooooooo mo mo, mooo m

crane, to pile its bones high up on end. No speedy enterprise. But now
moooo, mo mooo moo moooo mooo mo mo moo. Mo mooooo mooooooooo. Moo moo

it's done, it looks much like Pompey's Pillar.
mo'm mooo, mo moooo mooo mooo Mooooo'm Mooooo.




There are forty and odd vertebrae in all, which in the skeleton are
Moooo moo moooo moo moo moooooooo mo moo, moooo mo moo mooooooo moo

not locked together. They mostly lie like the great knobbed blocks on
moo mooooo mooooooo. Mooo mooooo moo mooo moo moooo moooooo mooooo mo

a Gothic spire, forming solid courses of heavy masonry. The largest,
m Mooooo moooo, moooooo moooo moooooo mo moooo moooooo. Moo moooooo,

a middle one, is in width something less than three feet, and in depth
m mooooo moo, mo mo moooo moooooooo mooo mooo moooo mooo, moo mo moooo

more than four. The smallest, where the spine tapers away into the
mooo mooo mooo. Moo mooooooo, moooo moo moooo mooooo mooo mooo moo

tail, is only two inches in width, and looks something like a white
mooo, mo mooo moo mooooo mo moooo, moo moooo moooooooo mooo m moooo

billiard-ball. I was told that there were still smaller ones, but they
mooooooo-mooo. M moo mooo mooo moooo mooo moooo moooooo mooo, moo mooo

had been lost by some little cannibal urchins, the priest's children,
moo mooo mooo mo mooo mooooo mooooooo moooooo, moo mooooo'm mooooooo,

who had stolen them to play marbles with. Thus we see how that the
moo moo mooooo mooo mo mooo moooooo mooo. Mooo mo moo moo mooo moo

spine of even the hugest of living things tapers off at last into simple
moooo mo mooo moo mooooo mo mooooo mooooo mooooo moo mo mooo mooo mooooo

child's play.
moooo'm mooo.










CHAPTER 104. The Fossil Whale.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Mooooo Moooo.







From his mighty bulk the whale affords a most congenial theme whereon
Mooo moo mooooo mooo moo moooo moooooo m mooo moooooooo moooo moooooo

to enlarge, amplify, and generally expatiate. Would you, you could not
mo moooooo, moooooo, moo moooooooo moooooooo. Moooo moo, moo moooo moo

compress him. By good rights he should only be treated of in imperial
mooooooo moo. Mo mooo mooooo mo mooooo mooo mo moooooo mo mo mooooooo

folio. Not to tell over again his furlongs from spiracle to tail,
moooo. Moo mo mooo mooo moooo moo mooooooo mooo mooooooo mo mooo,

and the yards he measures about the waist; only think of the gigantic
moo moo moooo mo mooooooo moooo moo moooo; mooo moooo mo moo mooooooo

involutions of his intestines, where they lie in him like great
moooooooooo mo moo mooooooooo, moooo mooo moo mo moo mooo moooo

cables and hawsers coiled away in the subterranean orlop-deck of a
mooooo moo moooooo mooooo mooo mo moo mooooooooooo moooo-mooo mo m

line-of-battle-ship.
mooo-mo-mooooo-mooo.




Since I have undertaken to manhandle this Leviathan, it behooves me
Moooo M mooo mooooooooo mo moooooooo mooo Moooooooo, mo mooooooo mo

to approve myself omnisciently exhaustive in the enterprise; not
mo moooooo mooooo mooooooooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooooooo; moo

overlooking the minutest seminal germs of his blood, and spinning him
moooooooooo moo mooooooo moooooo moooo mo moo moooo, moo mooooooo moo

out to the uttermost coil of his bowels. Having already described him
moo mo moo moooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo. Mooooo moooooo moooooooo moo

in most of his present habitatory and anatomical peculiarities, it
mo mooo mo moo moooooo mooooooooo moo mooooooooo moooooooooooo, mo

now remains to magnify him in an archaeological, fossiliferous, and
moo moooooo mo moooooo moo mo mo mooooooooooooo, moooooooooooo, moo

antediluvian point of view. Applied to any other creature than the
mooooooooooo moooo mo mooo. Moooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo mooo moo

Leviathan--to an ant or a flea--such portly terms might justly be deemed
Moooooooo--mo mo moo mo m mooo--mooo mooooo moooo moooo mooooo mo mooooo

unwarrantably grandiloquent. But when Leviathan is the text, the case is
moooooooooooo moooooooooooo. Moo mooo Moooooooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo mo

altered. Fain am I to stagger to this emprise under the weightiest
moooooo. Mooo mo M mo moooooo mo mooo moooooo moooo moo mooooooooo

words of the dictionary. And here be it said, that whenever it has been
moooo mo moo mooooooooo. Moo mooo mo mo mooo, mooo mooooooo mo moo mooo

convenient to consult one in the course of these dissertations, I have
mooooooooo mo moooooo moo mo moo mooooo mo moooo moooooooooooo, M mooo

invariably used a huge quarto edition of Johnson, expressly purchased
mooooooooo mooo m mooo mooooo moooooo mo Moooooo, moooooooo moooooooo

for that purpose; because that famous lexicographer's uncommon personal
moo mooo moooooo; moooooo mooo mooooo moooooooooooo'm mooooooo mooooooo

bulk more fitted him to compile a lexicon to be used by a whale author
mooo mooo mooooo moo mo moooooo m moooooo mo mo mooo mo m moooo mooooo

like me.
mooo mo.




One often hears of writers that rise and swell with their subject,
Moo moooo moooo mo moooooo mooo mooo moo moooo mooo moooo moooooo,

though it may seem but an ordinary one. How, then, with me, writing
mooooo mo moo mooo moo mo mooooooo moo. Moo, mooo, mooo mo, moooooo

of this Leviathan? Unconsciously my chirography expands into placard
mo mooo Moooooooo? Moooooooooooo mo moooooooooo moooooo mooo moooooo

capitals. Give me a condor's quill! Give me Vesuvius' crater for an
mooooooo. Mooo mo m mooooo'm moooo! Mooo mo Mooooooo' mooooo moo mo

inkstand! Friends, hold my arms! For in the mere act of penning my
mooooooo! Moooooo, mooo mo mooo! Moo mo moo mooo moo mo moooooo mo

thoughts of this Leviathan, they weary me, and make me faint with their
mooooooo mo mooo Moooooooo, mooo moooo mo, moo mooo mo moooo mooo moooo

outreaching comprehensiveness of sweep, as if to include the whole
moooooooooo moooooooooooooooo mo moooo, mo mo mo moooooo moo moooo

circle of the sciences, and all the generations of whales, and men, and
mooooo mo moo mooooooo, moo moo moo moooooooooo mo mooooo, moo moo, moo

mastodons, past, present, and to come, with all the revolving panoramas
moooooooo, mooo, moooooo, moo mo mooo, mooo moo moo moooooooo moooooooo

of empire on earth, and throughout the whole universe, not excluding its
mo mooooo mo moooo, moo mooooooooo moo moooo mooooooo, moo moooooooo moo

suburbs. Such, and so magnifying, is the virtue of a large and liberal
moooooo. Mooo, moo mo mooooooooo, mo moo mooooo mo m moooo moo moooooo

theme! We expand to its bulk. To produce a mighty book, you must choose
moooo! Mo mooooo mo moo mooo. Mo moooooo m mooooo mooo, moo mooo mooooo

a mighty theme. No great and enduring volume can ever be written on the
m mooooo moooo. Mo moooo moo mooooooo mooooo moo mooo mo moooooo mo moo

flea, though many there be who have tried it.
mooo, mooooo mooo moooo mo moo mooo moooo mo.




Ere entering upon the subject of Fossil Whales, I present my credentials
Moo mooooooo mooo moo moooooo mo Mooooo Mooooo, M moooooo mo moooooooooo

as a geologist, by stating that in my miscellaneous time I have been
mo m moooooooo, mo moooooo mooo mo mo moooooooooooo mooo M mooo mooo

a stone-mason, and also a great digger of ditches, canals and wells,
m moooo-moooo, moo mooo m moooo mooooo mo moooooo, mooooo moo moooo,

wine-vaults, cellars, and cisterns of all sorts. Likewise, by way of
mooo-mooooo, moooooo, moo mooooooo mo moo moooo. Mooooooo, mo moo mo

preliminary, I desire to remind the reader, that while in the earlier
moooooooooo, M mooooo mo mooooo moo mooooo, mooo moooo mo moo moooooo

geological strata there are found the fossils of monsters now almost
mooooooooo mooooo moooo moo moooo moo moooooo mo mooooooo moo mooooo

completely extinct; the subsequent relics discovered in what are called
mooooooooo moooooo; moo mooooooooo mooooo mooooooooo mo mooo moo mooooo

the Tertiary formations seem the connecting, or at any rate intercepted
moo Mooooooo mooooooooo mooo moo mooooooooo, mo mo moo mooo moooooooooo

links, between the antichronical creatures, and those whose remote
moooo, moooooo moo moooooooooooo moooooooo, moo moooo moooo mooooo

posterity are said to have entered the Ark; all the Fossil Whales
moooooooo moo mooo mo mooo moooooo moo Moo; moo moo Mooooo Mooooo

hitherto discovered belong to the Tertiary period, which is the last
mooooooo mooooooooo mooooo mo moo Mooooooo mooooo, moooo mo moo mooo

preceding the superficial formations. And though none of them
moooooooo moo moooooooooo mooooooooo. Moo mooooo mooo mo mooo

precisely answer to any known species of the present time, they are yet
moooooooo mooooo mo moo moooo moooooo mo moo moooooo mooo, mooo moo moo

sufficiently akin to them in general respects, to justify their taking
mooooooooooo mooo mo mooo mo moooooo mooooooo, mo moooooo moooo mooooo

rank as Cetacean fossils.
mooo mo Mooooooo moooooo.




Detached broken fossils of pre-adamite whales, fragments of their bones
Mooooooo mooooo moooooo mo moo-moooooo mooooo, moooooooo mo moooo moooo

and skeletons, have within thirty years past, at various intervals, been
moo moooooooo, mooo mooooo mooooo moooo mooo, mo moooooo moooooooo, mooo

found at the base of the Alps, in Lombardy, in France, in England, in
moooo mo moo mooo mo moo Mooo, mo Mooooooo, mo Mooooo, mo Moooooo, mo

Scotland, and in the States of Louisiana, Mississippi, and Alabama.
Mooooooo, moo mo moo Mooooo mo Moooooooo, Moooooooooo, moo Moooooo.

Among the more curious of such remains is part of a skull, which in the
Moooo moo mooo moooooo mo mooo moooooo mo mooo mo m moooo, moooo mo moo

year 1779 was disinterred in the Rue Dauphine in Paris, a short street
mooo mooo moo moooooooooo mo moo Moo Mooooooo mo Moooo, m moooo mooooo

opening almost directly upon the palace of the Tuileries; and bones
moooooo mooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo Moooooooo; moo moooo

disinterred in excavating the great docks of Antwerp, in Napoleon's
moooooooooo mo mooooooooo moo moooo moooo mo Moooooo, mo Mooooooo'm

time. Cuvier pronounced these fragments to have belonged to some utterly
mooo. Mooooo mooooooooo moooo moooooooo mo mooo mooooooo mo mooo moooooo

unknown Leviathanic species.
moooooo Moooooooooo moooooo.




But by far the most wonderful of all Cetacean relics was the almost
Moo mo moo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo Mooooooo mooooo moo moo mooooo

complete vast skeleton of an extinct monster, found in the year 1842, on
mooooooo mooo mooooooo mo mo moooooo moooooo, moooo mo moo mooo mooo, mo

the plantation of Judge Creagh, in Alabama. The awe-stricken credulous
moo mooooooooo mo Moooo Mooooo, mo Moooooo. Moo moo-mooooooo moooooooo

slaves in the vicinity took it for the bones of one of the fallen
mooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mo moo moo moooo mo moo mo moo mooooo

angels. The Alabama doctors declared it a huge reptile, and bestowed
mooooo. Moo Moooooo moooooo mooooooo mo m mooo moooooo, moo mooooooo

upon it the name of Basilosaurus. But some specimen bones of it being
mooo mo moo mooo mo Mooooooooooo. Moo mooo mooooooo moooo mo mo moooo

taken across the sea to Owen, the English Anatomist, it turned out
moooo mooooo moo moo mo Mooo, moo Moooooo Moooooooo, mo mooooo moo

that this alleged reptile was a whale, though of a departed species. A
mooo mooo moooooo moooooo moo m moooo, mooooo mo m mooooooo moooooo. M

significant illustration of the fact, again and again repeated in this
moooooooooo mooooooooooo mo moo mooo, moooo moo moooo mooooooo mo mooo

book, that the skeleton of the whale furnishes but little clue to the
mooo, mooo moo mooooooo mo moo moooo moooooooo moo mooooo mooo mo moo

shape of his fully invested body. So Owen rechristened the monster
moooo mo moo moooo mooooooo mooo. Mo Mooo mooooooooooo moo moooooo

Zeuglodon; and in his paper read before the London Geological Society,
Moooooooo; moo mo moo moooo mooo mooooo moo Mooooo Mooooooooo Moooooo,

pronounced it, in substance, one of the most extraordinary creatures
mooooooooo mo, mo moooooooo, moo mo moo mooo moooooooooooo moooooooo

which the mutations of the globe have blotted out of existence.
moooo moo moooooooo mo moo moooo mooo moooooo moo mo moooooooo.




When I stand among these mighty Leviathan skeletons, skulls, tusks,
Mooo M moooo moooo moooo mooooo Moooooooo moooooooo, mooooo, moooo,

jaws, ribs, and vertebrae, all characterized by partial resemblances to
mooo, mooo, moo moooooooo, moo moooooooooooo mo moooooo mooooooooooo mo

the existing breeds of sea-monsters; but at the same time bearing on
moo mooooooo mooooo mo moo-mooooooo; moo mo moo mooo mooo moooooo mo

the other hand similar affinities to the annihilated antichronical
moo moooo mooo moooooo mooooooooo mo moo moooooooooo moooooooooooo

Leviathans, their incalculable seniors; I am, by a flood, borne back
Mooooooooo, moooo mooooooooooo moooooo; M mo, mo m moooo, moooo mooo

to that wondrous period, ere time itself can be said to have begun;
mo mooo mooooooo mooooo, moo mooo mooooo moo mo mooo mo mooo moooo;

for time began with man. Here Saturn's grey chaos rolls over me, and I
moo mooo moooo mooo moo. Mooo Mooooo'm mooo moooo moooo mooo mo, moo M

obtain dim, shuddering glimpses into those Polar eternities; when wedged
mooooo moo, mooooooooo mooooooo mooo moooo Moooo mooooooooo; mooo mooooo

bastions of ice pressed hard upon what are now the Tropics; and in
mooooooo mo moo moooooo mooo mooo mooo moo moo moo Moooooo; moo mo

all the 25,000 miles of this world's circumference, not an inhabitable
moo moo mo,moo moooo mo mooo moooo'm moooooooooooo, moo mo moooooooooo

hand's breadth of land was visible. Then the whole world was the
mooo'm moooooo mo mooo moo moooooo. Mooo moo moooo moooo moo moo

whale's; and, king of creation, he left his wake along the present lines
moooo'm; moo, mooo mo mooooooo, mo mooo moo mooo moooo moo moooooo moooo

of the Andes and the Himmalehs. Who can show a pedigree like Leviathan?
mo moo Moooo moo moo Moooooooo. Moo moo mooo m mooooooo mooo Moooooooo?

Ahab's harpoon had shed older blood than the Pharaoh's. Methuselah seems
Mooo'm moooooo moo mooo moooo moooo mooo moo Moooooo'm. Mooooooooo moooo

a school-boy. I look round to shake hands with Shem. I am horror-struck
m mooooo-moo. M mooo moooo mo moooo moooo mooo Mooo. M mo mooooo-mooooo

at this antemosaic, unsourced existence of the unspeakable terrors of
mo mooo mooooooooo, moooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooooooooo moooooo mo

the whale, which, having been before all time, must needs exist after
moo moooo, moooo, mooooo mooo mooooo moo mooo, mooo moooo moooo moooo

all humane ages are over.
moo mooooo mooo moo mooo.




But not alone has this Leviathan left his pre-adamite traces in the
Moo moo moooo moo mooo Moooooooo mooo moo moo-moooooo mooooo mo moo

stereotype plates of nature, and in limestone and marl bequeathed his
mooooooooo mooooo mo mooooo, moo mo moooooooo moo mooo mooooooooo moo

ancient bust; but upon Egyptian tablets, whose antiquity seems to claim
moooooo mooo; moo mooo Mooooooo moooooo, moooo moooooooo moooo mo moooo

for them an almost fossiliferous character, we find the unmistakable
moo mooo mo mooooo moooooooooooo moooooooo, mo mooo moo mooooooooooo

print of his fin. In an apartment of the great temple of Denderah,
moooo mo moo moo. Mo mo moooooooo mo moo moooo mooooo mo Mooooooo,

some fifty years ago, there was discovered upon the granite ceiling a
mooo moooo moooo moo, moooo moo mooooooooo mooo moo moooooo moooooo m

sculptured and painted planisphere, abounding in centaurs, griffins, and
mooooooooo moo moooooo moooooooooo, moooooooo mo mooooooo, mooooooo, moo

dolphins, similar to the grotesque figures on the celestial globe of the
mooooooo, moooooo mo moo moooooooo moooooo mo moo moooooooo moooo mo moo

moderns. Gliding among them, old Leviathan swam as of yore; was there
moooooo. Moooooo moooo mooo, moo Moooooooo mooo mo mo mooo; moo moooo

swimming in that planisphere, centuries before Solomon was cradled.
mooooooo mo mooo moooooooooo, moooooooo mooooo Moooooo moo moooooo.




Nor must there be omitted another strange attestation of the antiquity
Moo mooo moooo mo moooooo moooooo moooooo moooooooooo mo moo moooooooo

of the whale, in his own osseous post-diluvian reality, as set down by
mo moo moooo, mo moo moo moooooo mooo-mooooooo moooooo, mo moo mooo mo

the venerable John Leo, the old Barbary traveller.
