moo moooooooo Mooo Moo, moo moo Moooooo moooooooo.




"Not far from the Sea-side, they have a Temple, the Rafters and Beams
"Moo moo mooo moo Moo-mooo, mooo mooo m Mooooo, moo Moooooo moo Moooo

of which are made of Whale-Bones; for Whales of a monstrous size are
mo moooo moo mooo mo Moooo-Moooo; moo Mooooo mo m moooooooo mooo moo

oftentimes cast up dead upon that shore. The Common People imagine, that
mooooooooo mooo mo mooo mooo mooo moooo. Moo Mooooo Mooooo moooooo, mooo

by a secret Power bestowed by God upon the temple, no Whale can pass it
mo m mooooo Moooo mooooooo mo Moo mooo moo mooooo, mo Moooo moo mooo mo

without immediate death. But the truth of the Matter is, that on either
moooooo moooooooo moooo. Moo moo moooo mo moo Mooooo mo, mooo mo mooooo

side of the Temple, there are Rocks that shoot two Miles into the Sea,
mooo mo moo Mooooo, moooo moo Moooo mooo moooo moo Moooo mooo moo Moo,

and wound the Whales when they light upon 'em. They keep a Whale's Rib
moo moooo moo Mooooo mooo mooo moooo mooo 'mo. Mooo mooo m Moooo'm Moo

of an incredible length for a Miracle, which lying upon the Ground with
mo mo mooooooooo mooooo moo m Moooooo, moooo moooo mooo moo Mooooo mooo

its convex part uppermost, makes an Arch, the Head of which cannot be
moo mooooo mooo moooooooo, moooo mo Mooo, moo Mooo mo moooo mooooo mo

reached by a Man upon a Camel's Back. This Rib (says John Leo) is said
moooooo mo m Moo mooo m Moooo'm Mooo. Mooo Moo (mooo Mooo Moo) mo mooo

to have layn there a hundred Years before I saw it. Their Historians
mo mooo mooo moooo m moooooo Moooo mooooo M moo mo. Moooo Mooooooooo

affirm, that a Prophet who prophesy'd of Mahomet, came from this Temple,
mooooo, mooo m Moooooo moo mooooooo'm mo Moooooo, mooo mooo mooo Mooooo,

and some do not stand to assert, that the Prophet Jonas was cast forth
moo mooo mo moo moooo mo mooooo, mooo moo Moooooo Moooo moo mooo moooo

by the Whale at the Base of the Temple."
mo moo Moooo mo moo Mooo mo moo Mooooo."




In this Afric Temple of the Whale I leave you, reader, and if you be a
Mo mooo Moooo Mooooo mo moo Moooo M moooo moo, mooooo, moo mo moo mo m

Nantucketer, and a whaleman, you will silently worship there.
Moooooooooo, moo m mooooooo, moo mooo mooooooo moooooo moooo.










CHAPTER 105. Does the Whale's Magnitude Diminish?--Will He Perish?
MOOOOOO moo. Mooo moo Moooo'm Moooooooo Mooooooo?--Mooo Mo Mooooo?







Inasmuch, then, as this Leviathan comes floundering down upon us from
Mooooooo, mooo, mo mooo Moooooooo moooo moooooooooo mooo mooo mo mooo

the head-waters of the Eternities, it may be fitly inquired, whether,
moo mooo-mooooo mo moo Mooooooooo, mo moo mo moooo mooooooo, moooooo,

in the long course of his generations, he has not degenerated from the
mo moo mooo mooooo mo moo moooooooooo, mo moo moo moooooooooo mooo moo

original bulk of his sires.
mooooooo mooo mo moo moooo.




But upon investigation we find, that not only are the whales of the
Moo mooo moooooooooooo mo mooo, mooo moo mooo moo moo mooooo mo moo

present day superior in magnitude to those whose fossil remains are
moooooo moo mooooooo mo moooooooo mo moooo moooo mooooo moooooo moo

found in the Tertiary system (embracing a distinct geological period
moooo mo moo Mooooooo mooooo (moooooooo m mooooooo mooooooooo mooooo

prior to man), but of the whales found in that Tertiary system, those
moooo mo moo), moo mo moo mooooo moooo mo mooo Mooooooo mooooo, moooo

belonging to its latter formations exceed in size those of its earlier
moooooooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooo mooooo mo mooo moooo mo moo moooooo

ones.
mooo.




Of all the pre-adamite whales yet exhumed, by far the largest is the
Mo moo moo moo-moooooo mooooo moo moooooo, mo moo moo moooooo mo moo

Alabama one mentioned in the last chapter, and that was less than
Moooooo moo moooooooo mo moo mooo moooooo, moo mooo moo mooo mooo

seventy feet in length in the skeleton. Whereas, we have already seen,
moooooo mooo mo mooooo mo moo mooooooo. Moooooo, mo mooo moooooo mooo,

that the tape-measure gives seventy-two feet for the skeleton of a large
mooo moo mooo-moooooo moooo moooooo-moo mooo moo moo mooooooo mo m moooo

sized modern whale. And I have heard, on whalemen's authority, that
moooo mooooo moooo. Moo M mooo moooo, mo mooooooo'm moooooooo, mooo

Sperm Whales have been captured near a hundred feet long at the time of
Moooo Mooooo mooo mooo mooooooo mooo m moooooo mooo mooo mo moo mooo mo

capture.
moooooo.




But may it not be, that while the whales of the present hour are an
Moo moo mo moo mo, mooo moooo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooo moo mo

advance in magnitude upon those of all previous geological periods; may
moooooo mo moooooooo mooo moooo mo moo mooooooo mooooooooo moooooo; moo

it not be, that since Adam's time they have degenerated?
mo moo mo, mooo moooo Mooo'm mooo mooo mooo moooooooooo?




Assuredly, we must conclude so, if we are to credit the accounts of such
Moooooooo, mo mooo mooooooo mo, mo mo moo mo mooooo moo mooooooo mo mooo

gentlemen as Pliny, and the ancient naturalists generally. For Pliny
moooooooo mo Moooo, moo moo moooooo moooooooooo moooooooo. Moo Moooo

tells us of Whales that embraced acres of living bulk, and Aldrovandus
moooo mo mo Mooooo mooo mooooooo moooo mo mooooo mooo, moo Moooooooooo

of others which measured eight hundred feet in length--Rope Walks and
mo mooooo moooo mooooooo moooo moooooo mooo mo mooooo--Mooo Moooo moo

Thames Tunnels of Whales! And even in the days of Banks and Solander,
Mooooo Moooooo mo Mooooo! Moo mooo mo moo mooo mo Moooo moo Mooooooo,

Cooke's naturalists, we find a Danish member of the Academy of Sciences
Moooo'm moooooooooo, mo mooo m Mooooo mooooo mo moo Moooooo mo Mooooooo

setting down certain Iceland Whales (reydan-siskur, or Wrinkled Bellies)
moooooo mooo moooooo Moooooo Mooooo (mooooo-mooooo, mo Mooooooo Moooooo)

at one hundred and twenty yards; that is, three hundred and sixty feet.
mo moo moooooo moo mooooo moooo; mooo mo, moooo moooooo moo moooo mooo.

And Lacepede, the French naturalist, in his elaborate history of whales,
Moo Mooooooo, moo Mooooo mooooooooo, mo moo moooooooo moooooo mo mooooo,

in the very beginning of his work (page 3), sets down the Right Whale at
mo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooo (mooo m), mooo mooo moo Moooo Moooo mo

one hundred metres, three hundred and twenty-eight feet. And this work
moo moooooo mooooo, moooo moooooo moo mooooo-moooo mooo. Moo mooo mooo

was published so late as A.D. 1825.
moo moooooooo mo mooo mo M.M. mooo.




But will any whaleman believe these stories? No. The whale of to-day is
Moo mooo moo mooooooo moooooo moooo moooooo? Mo. Moo moooo mo mo-moo mo

as big as his ancestors in Pliny's time. And if ever I go where Pliny
mo moo mo moo moooooooo mo Moooo'm mooo. Moo mo mooo M mo moooo Moooo

is, I, a whaleman (more than he was), will make bold to tell him so.
mo, M, m mooooooo (mooo mooo mo moo), mooo mooo mooo mo mooo moo mo.

Because I cannot understand how it is, that while the Egyptian mummies
Moooooo M mooooo mooooooooo moo mo mo, mooo moooo moo Mooooooo moooooo

that were buried thousands of years before even Pliny was born, do not
mooo mooo mooooo moooooooo mo moooo mooooo mooo Moooo moo mooo, mo moo

measure so much in their coffins as a modern Kentuckian in his socks;
moooooo mo mooo mo moooo moooooo mo m mooooo Mooooooooo mo moo moooo;

and while the cattle and other animals sculptured on the oldest Egyptian
moo moooo moo mooooo moo moooo moooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo Mooooooo

and Nineveh tablets, by the relative proportions in which they are
moo Moooooo moooooo, mo moo mooooooo moooooooooo mo moooo mooo moo

drawn, just as plainly prove that the high-bred, stall-fed, prize cattle
moooo, mooo mo moooooo moooo mooo moo mooo-mooo, moooo-moo, moooo mooooo

of Smithfield, not only equal, but far exceed in magnitude the fattest
mo Mooooooooo, moo mooo moooo, moo moo mooooo mo moooooooo moo moooooo

of Pharaoh's fat kine; in the face of all this, I will not admit that of
mo Moooooo'm moo mooo; mo moo mooo mo moo mooo, M mooo moo moooo mooo mo

all animals the whale alone should have degenerated.
moo moooooo moo moooo moooo mooooo mooo moooooooooo.




But still another inquiry remains; one often agitated by the more
Moo moooo moooooo moooooo moooooo; moo moooo mooooooo mo moo mooo

recondite Nantucketers. Whether owing to the almost omniscient look-outs
moooooooo Mooooooooooo. Moooooo moooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooo mooo-mooo

at the mast-heads of the whaleships, now penetrating even through
mo moo mooo-moooo mo moo mooooooooo, moo moooooooooo mooo moooooo

Behring's straits, and into the remotest secret drawers and lockers
Moooooo'm moooooo, moo mooo moo mooooooo mooooo moooooo moo moooooo

of the world; and the thousand harpoons and lances darted along all
mo moo moooo; moo moo mooooooo mooooooo moo mooooo mooooo moooo moo

continental coasts; the moot point is, whether Leviathan can long endure
moooooooooo mooooo; moo mooo moooo mo, moooooo Moooooooo moo mooo mooooo

so wide a chase, and so remorseless a havoc; whether he must not at last
mo mooo m moooo, moo mo moooooooooo m moooo; moooooo mo mooo moo mo mooo

be exterminated from the waters, and the last whale, like the last man,
mo mooooooooooo mooo moo mooooo, moo moo mooo moooo, mooo moo mooo moo,

smoke his last pipe, and then himself evaporate in the final puff.
moooo moo mooo mooo, moo mooo moooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo mooo.




Comparing the humped herds of whales with the humped herds of buffalo,
Moooooooo moo mooooo moooo mo mooooo mooo moo mooooo moooo mo moooooo,

which, not forty years ago, overspread by tens of thousands the prairies
moooo, moo moooo moooo moo, mooooooooo mo mooo mo moooooooo moo mooooooo

of Illinois and Missouri, and shook their iron manes and scowled with
mo Mooooooo moo Mooooooo, moo moooo moooo mooo moooo moo moooooo mooo

their thunder-clotted brows upon the sites of populous river-capitals,
moooo moooooo-moooooo moooo mooo moo moooo mo mooooooo moooo-mooooooo,

where now the polite broker sells you land at a dollar an inch; in such
moooo moo moo mooooo mooooo moooo moo mooo mo m mooooo mo mooo; mo mooo

a comparison an irresistible argument would seem furnished, to show that
m mooooooooo mo mooooooooooo mooooooo moooo mooo moooooooo, mo mooo mooo

the hunted whale cannot now escape speedy extinction.
moo mooooo moooo mooooo moo mooooo mooooo mooooooooo.




But you must look at this matter in every light. Though so short a
Moo moo mooo mooo mo mooo mooooo mo moooo moooo. Mooooo mo moooo m

period ago--not a good lifetime--the census of the buffalo in Illinois
mooooo moo--moo m mooo mooooooo--moo mooooo mo moo moooooo mo Mooooooo

exceeded the census of men now in London, and though at the present day
mooooooo moo mooooo mo moo moo mo Mooooo, moo mooooo mo moo moooooo moo

not one horn or hoof of them remains in all that region; and though the
moo moo mooo mo mooo mo mooo moooooo mo moo mooo mooooo; moo mooooo moo

cause of this wondrous extermination was the spear of man; yet the far
moooo mo mooo mooooooo moooooooooooo moo moo moooo mo moo; moo moo moo

different nature of the whale-hunt peremptorily forbids so inglorious an
moooooooo mooooo mo moo moooo-mooo mooooooooooo moooooo mo mooooooooo mo

end to the Leviathan. Forty men in one ship hunting the Sperm Whales for
moo mo moo Moooooooo. Moooo moo mo moo mooo moooooo moo Moooo Mooooo moo

forty-eight months think they have done extremely well, and thank God,
moooo-moooo mooooo moooo mooo mooo mooo moooooooo mooo, moo moooo Moo,

if at last they carry home the oil of forty fish. Whereas, in the days
mo mo mooo mooo moooo mooo moo moo mo moooo mooo. Moooooo, mo moo mooo

of the old Canadian and Indian hunters and trappers of the West, when
mo moo moo Mooooooo moo Mooooo moooooo moo mooooooo mo moo Mooo, mooo

the far west (in whose sunset suns still rise) was a wilderness and
moo moo mooo (mo moooo mooooo mooo moooo mooo) moo m mooooooooo moo

a virgin, the same number of moccasined men, for the same number of
m mooooo, moo mooo mooooo mo mooooooooo moo, moo moo mooo mooooo mo

months, mounted on horse instead of sailing in ships, would have slain
mooooo, moooooo mo moooo moooooo mo moooooo mo moooo, moooo mooo moooo

not forty, but forty thousand and more buffaloes; a fact that, if need
moo moooo, moo moooo mooooooo moo mooo moooooooo; m mooo mooo, mo mooo

were, could be statistically stated.
mooo, moooo mo moooooooooooo mooooo.




Nor, considered aright, does it seem any argument in favour of the
Moo, mooooooooo mooooo, mooo mo mooo moo mooooooo mo mooooo mo moo

gradual extinction of the Sperm Whale, for example, that in former years
moooooo mooooooooo mo moo Moooo Moooo, moo moooooo, mooo mo mooooo moooo

(the latter part of the last century, say) these Leviathans, in
(moo mooooo mooo mo moo mooo moooooo, moo) moooo Mooooooooo, mo

small pods, were encountered much oftener than at present, and, in
moooo mooo, mooo moooooooooo mooo moooooo mooo mo moooooo, moo, mo

consequence, the voyages were not so prolonged, and were also much more
moooooooooo, moo moooooo mooo moo mo moooooooo, moo mooo mooo mooo mooo

remunerative. Because, as has been elsewhere noticed, those whales,
mooooooooooo. Moooooo, mo moo mooo moooooooo moooooo, moooo mooooo,

influenced by some views to safety, now swim the seas in immense
mooooooooo mo mooo moooo mo mooooo, moo mooo moo mooo mo moooooo

caravans, so that to a large degree the scattered solitaries, yokes, and
mooooooo, mo mooo mo m moooo mooooo moo moooooooo mooooooooo, moooo, moo

pods, and schools of other days are now aggregated into vast but widely
mooo, moo moooooo mo moooo mooo moo moo mooooooooo mooo mooo moo mooooo

separated, unfrequent armies. That is all. And equally fallacious seems
moooooooo, mooooooooo mooooo. Mooo mo moo. Moo moooooo mooooooooo moooo

the conceit, that because the so-called whale-bone whales no longer
moo moooooo, mooo moooooo moo mo-mooooo moooo-mooo mooooo mo mooooo

haunt many grounds in former years abounding with them, hence that
moooo mooo moooooo mo mooooo moooo moooooooo mooo mooo, moooo mooo

species also is declining. For they are only being driven from
moooooo mooo mo moooooooo. Moo mooo moo mooo moooo mooooo mooo

promontory to cape; and if one coast is no longer enlivened with
mooooooooo mo mooo; moo mo moo moooo mo mo mooooo moooooooo mooo

their jets, then, be sure, some other and remoter strand has been very
moooo mooo, mooo, mo mooo, mooo moooo moo moooooo mooooo moo mooo mooo

recently startled by the unfamiliar spectacle.
mooooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooooo moooooooo.




Furthermore: concerning these last mentioned Leviathans, they have two
Moooooooooo: mooooooooo moooo mooo moooooooo Mooooooooo, mooo mooo moo

firm fortresses, which, in all human probability, will for ever remain
mooo mooooooooo, moooo, mo moo moooo moooooooooo, mooo moo mooo mooooo

impregnable. And as upon the invasion of their valleys, the frosty Swiss
moooooooooo. Moo mo mooo moo mooooooo mo moooo moooooo, moo mooooo Moooo

have retreated to their mountains; so, hunted from the savannas and
mooo moooooooo mo moooo moooooooo; mo, mooooo mooo moo mooooooo moo

glades of the middle seas, the whale-bone whales can at last resort to
mooooo mo moo mooooo mooo, moo moooo-mooo mooooo moo mo mooo mooooo mo

their Polar citadels, and diving under the ultimate glassy barriers and
moooo Moooo mooooooo, moo mooooo moooo moo mooooooo mooooo mooooooo moo

walls there, come up among icy fields and floes; and in a charmed circle
moooo moooo, mooo mo moooo moo mooooo moo moooo; moo mo m moooooo mooooo

of everlasting December, bid defiance to all pursuit from man.
mo moooooooooo Mooooooo, moo mooooooo mo moo moooooo mooo moo.




But as perhaps fifty of these whale-bone whales are harpooned for one
Moo mo moooooo moooo mo moooo moooo-mooo mooooo moo moooooooo moo moo

cachalot, some philosophers of the forecastle have concluded that this
mooooooo, mooo mooooooooooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo moooooooo mooo mooo

positive havoc has already very seriously diminished their battalions.
mooooooo moooo moo moooooo mooo moooooooo mooooooooo moooo mooooooooo.

But though for some time past a number of these whales, not less than
Moo mooooo moo mooo mooo mooo m mooooo mo moooo mooooo, moo mooo mooo

13,000, have been annually slain on the nor'-west coast by the Americans
mo,moo, mooo mooo mooooooo moooo mo moo moo'-mooo moooo mo moo Moooooooo

alone; yet there are considerations which render even this circumstance
moooo; moo moooo moo mooooooooooooo moooo mooooo mooo mooo mooooooooooo

of little or no account as an opposing argument in this matter.
mo mooooo mo mo moooooo mo mo mooooooo mooooooo mo mooo mooooo.




Natural as it is to be somewhat incredulous concerning the populousness
Moooooo mo mo mo mo mo mooooooo moooooooooo mooooooooo moo mooooooooooo

of the more enormous creatures of the globe, yet what shall we say to
mo moo mooo mooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo, moo mooo moooo mo moo mo

Harto, the historian of Goa, when he tells us that at one hunting the
Moooo, moo moooooooo mo Moo, mooo mo moooo mo mooo mo moo moooooo moo

King of Siam took 4,000 elephants; that in those regions elephants are
Mooo mo Mooo mooo m,moo moooooooo; mooo mo moooo moooooo moooooooo moo

numerous as droves of cattle in the temperate climes. And there seems no
mooooooo mo mooooo mo mooooo mo moo moooooooo mooooo. Moo moooo moooo mo

reason to doubt that if these elephants, which have now been hunted for
mooooo mo moooo mooo mo moooo moooooooo, moooo mooo moo mooo mooooo moo

thousands of years, by Semiramis, by Porus, by Hannibal, and by all the
moooooooo mo moooo, mo Moooooooo, mo Moooo, mo Mooooooo, moo mo moo moo

successive monarchs of the East--if they still survive there in great
mooooooooo mooooooo mo moo Mooo--mo mooo moooo moooooo moooo mo moooo

numbers, much more may the great whale outlast all hunting, since he
moooooo, mooo mooo moo moo moooo moooo moooooo moo moooooo, moooo mo

has a pasture to expatiate in, which is precisely twice as large as all
moo m moooooo mo moooooooo mo, moooo mo moooooooo moooo mo moooo mo moo

Asia, both Americas, Europe and Africa, New Holland, and all the Isles
Mooo, mooo Mooooooo, Mooooo moo Mooooo, Moo Moooooo, moo moo moo Moooo

of the sea combined.
mo moo moo mooooooo.




Moreover: we are to consider, that from the presumed great longevity
Mooooooo: mo moo mo mooooooo, mooo mooo moo mooooooo moooo moooooooo

of whales, their probably attaining the age of a century and more,
mo mooooo, moooo mooooooo moooooooo moo moo mo m moooooo moo mooo,

therefore at any one period of time, several distinct adult generations
moooooooo mo moo moo mooooo mo mooo, moooooo mooooooo moooo moooooooooo

must be contemporary. And what that is, we may soon gain some idea
mooo mo mooooooooooo. Moo mooo mooo mo, mo moo mooo mooo mooo mooo

of, by imagining all the grave-yards, cemeteries, and family vaults of
mo, mo moooooooo moo moo moooo-moooo, mooooooooo, moo mooooo mooooo mo

creation yielding up the live bodies of all the men, women, and children
mooooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo mooooo mo moo moo moo, moooo, moo mooooooo

who were alive seventy-five years ago; and adding this countless host to
moo mooo moooo moooooo-mooo moooo moo; moo mooooo mooo moooooooo mooo mo

the present human population of the globe.
moo moooooo moooo mooooooooo mo moo moooo.




Wherefore, for all these things, we account the whale immortal in his
Moooooooo, moo moo moooo mooooo, mo moooooo moo moooo mooooooo mo moo

species, however perishable in his individuality. He swam the seas
moooooo, moooooo mooooooooo mo moo moooooooooooo. Mo mooo moo mooo

before the continents broke water; he once swam over the site of the
mooooo moo mooooooooo moooo moooo; mo mooo mooo mooo moo mooo mo moo

Tuileries, and Windsor Castle, and the Kremlin. In Noah's flood he
Moooooooo, moo Moooooo Mooooo, moo moo Moooooo. Mo Mooo'm moooo mo

despised Noah's Ark; and if ever the world is to be again flooded, like
mooooooo Mooo'm Moo; moo mo mooo moo moooo mo mo mo moooo moooooo, mooo

the Netherlands, to kill off its rats, then the eternal whale will still
moo Moooooooooo, mo mooo moo moo mooo, mooo moo moooooo moooo mooo moooo

survive, and rearing upon the topmost crest of the equatorial flood,
moooooo, moo moooooo mooo moo moooooo moooo mo moo mooooooooo moooo,

spout his frothed defiance to the skies.
moooo moo moooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo.










CHAPTER 106. Ahab's Leg.
MOOOOOO moo. Mooo'm Moo.







The precipitating manner in which Captain Ahab had quitted the Samuel
Moo moooooooooooo mooooo mo moooo Moooooo Mooo moo moooooo moo Mooooo

Enderby of London, had not been unattended with some small violence to
Moooooo mo Mooooo, moo moo mooo mooooooooo mooo mooo moooo mooooooo mo

his own person. He had lighted with such energy upon a thwart of his
moo moo mooooo. Mo moo moooooo mooo mooo mooooo mooo m mooooo mo moo

boat that his ivory leg had received a half-splintering shock. And
mooo mooo moo moooo moo moo mooooooo m mooo-moooooooooo moooo. Moo

when after gaining his own deck, and his own pivot-hole there, he so
mooo moooo moooooo moo moo mooo, moo moo moo moooo-mooo moooo, mo mo

vehemently wheeled round with an urgent command to the steersman (it
mooooooooo moooooo moooo mooo mo mooooo moooooo mo moo moooooooo (mo

was, as ever, something about his not steering inflexibly enough); then,
moo, mo mooo, moooooooo moooo moo moo mooooooo mooooooooo mooooo); mooo,

the already shaken ivory received such an additional twist and wrench,
moo moooooo mooooo moooo mooooooo mooo mo mooooooooo moooo moo mooooo,

that though it still remained entire, and to all appearances lusty, yet
mooo mooooo mo moooo mooooooo mooooo, moo mo moo moooooooooo moooo, moo

Ahab did not deem it entirely trustworthy.
Mooo moo moo mooo mo mooooooo moooooooooo.




And, indeed, it seemed small matter for wonder, that for all his
Moo, mooooo, mo mooooo moooo mooooo moo mooooo, mooo moo moo moo

pervading, mad recklessness, Ahab did at times give careful heed to the
moooooooo, moo mooooooooooo, Mooo moo mo moooo mooo moooooo mooo mo moo

condition of that dead bone upon which he partly stood. For it had not
moooooooo mo mooo mooo mooo mooo moooo mo mooooo moooo. Moo mo moo moo

been very long prior to the Pequod's sailing from Nantucket, that he
mooo mooo mooo moooo mo moo Mooooo'm moooooo mooo Moooooooo, mooo mo

had been found one night lying prone upon the ground, and insensible;
moo mooo moooo moo moooo moooo moooo mooo moo mooooo, moo mooooooooo;

by some unknown, and seemingly inexplicable, unimaginable casualty, his
mo mooo moooooo, moo moooooooo mooooooooooo, mooooooooooo mooooooo, moo

ivory limb having been so violently displaced, that it had stake-wise
moooo mooo mooooo mooo mo moooooooo moooooooo, mooo mo moo moooo-mooo

smitten, and all but pierced his groin; nor was it without extreme
moooooo, moo moo moo moooooo moo moooo; moo moo mo moooooo moooooo

difficulty that the agonizing wound was entirely cured.
mooooooooo mooo moo moooooooo moooo moo mooooooo moooo.




Nor, at the time, had it failed to enter his monomaniac mind, that all
Moo, mo moo mooo, moo mo mooooo mo moooo moo mooooooooo mooo, mooo moo

the anguish of that then present suffering was but the direct issue of a
moo moooooo mo mooo mooo moooooo moooooooo moo moo moo mooooo moooo mo m

former woe; and he too plainly seemed to see, that as the most poisonous
mooooo moo; moo mo moo moooooo mooooo mo moo, mooo mo moo mooo moooooooo

reptile of the marsh perpetuates his kind as inevitably as the sweetest
moooooo mo moo moooo moooooooooo moo mooo mo mooooooooo mo moo mooooooo

songster of the grove; so, equally with every felicity, all miserable
mooooooo mo moo moooo; mo, moooooo mooo moooo mooooooo, moo moooooooo

events do naturally beget their like. Yea, more than equally, thought
mooooo mo moooooooo moooo moooo mooo. Moo, mooo mooo moooooo, moooooo

Ahab; since both the ancestry and posterity of Grief go further than the
Mooo; moooo mooo moo mooooooo moo moooooooo mo Moooo mo moooooo mooo moo

ancestry and posterity of Joy. For, not to hint of this: that it is
mooooooo moo moooooooo mo Moo. Moo, moo mo mooo mo mooo: mooo mo mo

an inference from certain canonic teachings, that while some natural
mo moooooooo mooo moooooo moooooo moooooooo, mooo moooo mooo moooooo

enjoyments here shall have no children born to them for the other world,
mooooooooo mooo moooo mooo mo mooooooo mooo mo mooo moo moo moooo moooo,

but, on the contrary, shall be followed by the joy-childlessness of
moo, mo moo mooooooo, moooo mo mooooooo mo moo moo-moooooooooooo mo

all hell's despair; whereas, some guilty mortal miseries shall still
moo mooo'm moooooo; moooooo, mooo mooooo mooooo mooooooo moooo moooo

fertilely beget to themselves an eternally progressive progeny of griefs
moooooooo moooo mo mooooooooo mo moooooooo moooooooooo moooooo mo mooooo

beyond the grave; not at all to hint of this, there still seems an
mooooo moo moooo; moo mo moo mo mooo mo mooo, moooo moooo moooo mo

inequality in the deeper analysis of the thing. For, thought Ahab, while
mooooooooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo. Moo, moooooo Mooo, moooo

even the highest earthly felicities ever have a certain unsignifying
mooo moo moooooo moooooo mooooooooo mooo mooo m moooooo mooooooooooo

pettiness lurking in them, but, at bottom, all heartwoes, a mystic
moooooooo moooooo mo mooo, moo, mo mooooo, moo moooooooo, m mooooo

significance, and, in some men, an archangelic grandeur; so do their
mooooooooooo, moo, mo mooo moo, mo moooooooooo mooooooo; mo mo moooo

diligent tracings-out not belie the obvious deduction. To trail the
mooooooo mooooooo-moo moo moooo moo moooooo moooooooo. Mo moooo moo

genealogies of these high mortal miseries, carries us at last among the
moooooooooo mo moooo mooo mooooo mooooooo, moooooo mo mo mooo moooo moo

sourceless primogenitures of the gods; so that, in the face of all the
mooooooooo mooooooooooooo mo moo mooo; mo mooo, mo moo mooo mo moo moo

glad, hay-making suns, and soft cymballing, round harvest-moons, we must
mooo, moo-mooooo mooo, moo mooo mooooooooo, moooo moooooo-moooo, mo mooo

needs give in to this: that the gods themselves are not for ever glad.
moooo mooo mo mo mooo: mooo moo mooo mooooooooo moo moo moo mooo mooo.

The ineffaceable, sad birth-mark in the brow of man, is but the stamp of
Moo mooooooooooo, moo moooo-mooo mo moo mooo mo moo, mo moo moo moooo mo

sorrow in the signers.
mooooo mo moo moooooo.




Unwittingly here a secret has been divulged, which perhaps might more
Moooooooooo mooo m mooooo moo mooo mooooooo, moooo moooooo moooo mooo

properly, in set way, have been disclosed before. With many other
mooooooo, mo moo moo, mooo mooo moooooooo mooooo. Mooo mooo moooo

particulars concerning Ahab, always had it remained a mystery to some,
moooooooooo mooooooooo Mooo, mooooo moo mo mooooooo m moooooo mo mooo,

why it was, that for a certain period, both before and after the sailing
moo mo moo, mooo moo m moooooo mooooo, mooo mooooo moo moooo moo moooooo

of the Pequod, he had hidden himself away with such Grand-Lama-like
mo moo Mooooo, mo moo mooooo moooooo mooo mooo mooo Moooo-Mooo-mooo

exclusiveness; and, for that one interval, sought speechless refuge, as
moooooooooooo; moo, moo mooo moo mooooooo, mooooo mooooooooo mooooo, mo

it were, among the marble senate of the dead. Captain Peleg's bruited
mo mooo, moooo moo mooooo mooooo mo moo mooo. Moooooo Moooo'm moooooo

reason for this thing appeared by no means adequate; though, indeed,
mooooo moo mooo moooo mooooooo mo mo moooo mooooooo; mooooo, mooooo,

as touching all Ahab's deeper part, every revelation partook more of
mo mooooooo moo Mooo'm mooooo mooo, moooo mooooooooo moooooo mooo mo

significant darkness than of explanatory light. But, in the end, it all
moooooooooo mooooooo mooo mo moooooooooo moooo. Moo, mo moo moo, mo moo

came out; this one matter did, at least. That direful mishap was at
mooo moo; mooo moo mooooo moo, mo moooo. Mooo moooooo mooooo moo mo

the bottom of his temporary recluseness. And not only this, but to that
moo mooooo mo moo moooooooo moooooooooo. Moo moo mooo mooo, moo mo mooo

ever-contracting, dropping circle ashore, who, for any reason, possessed
mooo-moooooooooo, mooooooo mooooo mooooo, moo, moo moo mooooo, moooooooo

the privilege of a less banned approach to him; to that timid circle the
moo moooooooo mo m mooo mooooo mooooooo mo moo; mo mooo moooo mooooo moo

above hinted casualty--remaining, as it did, moodily unaccounted for by
moooo mooooo mooooooo--moooooooo, mo mo moo, moooooo moooooooooo moo mo

Ahab--invested itself with terrors, not entirely underived from the land
Mooo--mooooooo mooooo mooo moooooo, moo mooooooo moooooooo mooo moo mooo

of spirits and of wails. So that, through their zeal for him, they had
mo moooooo moo mo moooo. Mo mooo, moooooo moooo mooo moo moo, mooo moo

all conspired, so far as in them lay, to muffle up the knowledge of
moo moooooooo, mo moo mo mo mooo moo, mo mooooo mo moo moooooooo mo

this thing from others; and hence it was, that not till a considerable
mooo moooo mooo mooooo; moo moooo mo moo, mooo moo mooo m mooooooooooo

interval had elapsed, did it transpire upon the Pequod's decks.
mooooooo moo moooooo, moo mo moooooooo mooo moo Mooooo'm moooo.




But be all this as it may; let the unseen, ambiguous synod in the air,
Moo mo moo mooo mo mo moo; moo moo mooooo, moooooooo moooo mo moo moo,

or the vindictive princes and potentates of fire, have to do or not
mo moo mooooooooo moooooo moo mooooooooo mo mooo, mooo mo mo mo moo

with earthly Ahab, yet, in this present matter of his leg, he took plain
mooo moooooo Mooo, moo, mo mooo moooooo mooooo mo moo moo, mo mooo moooo

practical procedures;--he called the carpenter.
moooooooo mooooooooo;--mo mooooo moo moooooooo.




And when that functionary appeared before him, he bade him without delay
Moo mooo mooo moooooooooo mooooooo mooooo moo, mo mooo moo moooooo moooo

set about making a new leg, and directed the mates to see him supplied
moo moooo mooooo m moo moo, moo mooooooo moo moooo mo moo moo mooooooo

with all the studs and joists of jaw-ivory (Sperm Whale) which had thus
mooo moo moo moooo moo mooooo mo moo-moooo (Moooo Moooo) moooo moo mooo

far been accumulated on the voyage, in order that a careful selection
moo mooo moooooooooo mo moo mooooo, mo moooo mooo m moooooo moooooooo

of the stoutest, clearest-grained stuff might be secured. This done, the
mo moo mooooooo, mooooooo-moooooo moooo moooo mo moooooo. Mooo mooo, moo

carpenter received orders to have the leg completed that night; and to
moooooooo mooooooo mooooo mo mooo moo moo moooooooo mooo moooo; moo mo

provide all the fittings for it, independent of those pertaining to
moooooo moo moo mooooooo moo mo, moooooooooo mo moooo mooooooooo mo

the distrusted one in use. Moreover, the ship's forge was ordered to be
moo mooooooooo moo mo moo. Mooooooo, moo mooo'm moooo moo moooooo mo mo

hoisted out of its temporary idleness in the hold; and, to accelerate
moooooo moo mo moo moooooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo; moo, mo mooooooooo

the affair, the blacksmith was commanded to proceed at once to the
moo mooooo, moo mooooooooo moo moooooooo mo moooooo mo mooo mo moo

forging of whatever iron contrivances might be needed.
moooooo mo mooooooo mooo mooooooooooo moooo mo mooooo.










CHAPTER 107. The Carpenter.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Moooooooo.







Seat thyself sultanically among the moons of Saturn, and take high
Mooo moooooo mooooooooooo moooo moo moooo mo Mooooo, moo mooo mooo

abstracted man alone; and he seems a wonder, a grandeur, and a woe. But
mooooooooo moo moooo; moo mo moooo m mooooo, m mooooooo, moo m moo. Moo

from the same point, take mankind in mass, and for the most part, they
mooo moo mooo moooo, mooo moooooo mo mooo, moo moo moo mooo mooo, mooo

seem a mob of unnecessary duplicates, both contemporary and hereditary.
mooo m moo mo moooooooooo mooooooooo, mooo mooooooooooo moo mooooooooo.

But most humble though he was, and far from furnishing an example of
Moo mooo mooooo mooooo mo moo, moo moo mooo mooooooooo mo moooooo mo

the high, humane abstraction; the Pequod's carpenter was no duplicate;
moo mooo, mooooo moooooooooo; moo Mooooo'm moooooooo moo mo moooooooo;

hence, he now comes in person on this stage.
moooo, mo moo moooo mo mooooo mo mooo moooo.




Like all sea-going ship carpenters, and more especially those belonging
Mooo moo moo-moooo mooo mooooooooo, moo mooo mooooooooo moooo moooooooo

to whaling vessels, he was, to a certain off-handed, practical extent,
mo moooooo moooooo, mo moo, mo m moooooo moo-mooooo, moooooooo mooooo,

alike experienced in numerous trades and callings collateral to his own;
moooo moooooooooo mo mooooooo mooooo moo mooooooo mooooooooo mo moo moo;

the carpenter's pursuit being the ancient and outbranching trunk of all
moo moooooooo'm moooooo moooo moo moooooo moo mooooooooooo moooo mo moo

those numerous handicrafts which more or less have to do with wood as an
moooo mooooooo moooooooooo moooo mooo mo mooo mooo mo mo mooo mooo mo mo

auxiliary material. But, besides the application to him of the generic
moooooooo mooooooo. Moo, moooooo moo moooooooooo mo moo mo moo moooooo

remark above, this carpenter of the Pequod was singularly efficient in
mooooo moooo, mooo moooooooo mo moo Mooooo moo mooooooooo moooooooo mo

those thousand nameless mechanical emergencies continually recurring
moooo mooooooo mooooooo mooooooooo moooooooooo moooooooooo moooooooo

in a large ship, upon a three or four years' voyage, in uncivilized
mo m moooo mooo, mooo m moooo mo mooo moooo' mooooo, mo moooooooooo

and far-distant seas. For not to speak of his readiness in ordinary
moo moo-moooooo mooo. Moo moo mo moooo mo moo moooooooo mo mooooooo

duties:--repairing stove boats, sprung spars, reforming the shape of
mooooo:--moooooooo moooo moooo, mooooo moooo, moooooooo moo moooo mo

clumsy-bladed oars, inserting bull's eyes in the deck, or new tree-nails
mooooo-mooooo mooo, moooooooo mooo'm mooo mo moo mooo, mo moo mooo-moooo

in the side planks, and other miscellaneous matters more directly
mo moo mooo mooooo, moo moooo moooooooooooo moooooo mooo mooooooo

pertaining to his special business; he was moreover unhesitatingly
mooooooooo mo moo moooooo mooooooo; mo moo mooooooo mooooooooooooo

expert in all manner of conflicting aptitudes, both useful and
mooooo mo moo mooooo mo moooooooooo moooooooo, mooo mooooo moo

capricious.
mooooooooo.




The one grand stage where he enacted all his various parts so manifold,
Moo moo moooo moooo moooo mo moooooo moo moo moooooo moooo mo mooooooo,

was his vice-bench; a long rude ponderous table furnished with several
moo moo mooo-moooo; m mooo mooo moooooooo moooo moooooooo mooo moooooo

vices, of different sizes, and both of iron and of wood. At all times
moooo, mo moooooooo moooo, moo mooo mo mooo moo mo mooo. Mo moo moooo

except when whales were alongside, this bench was securely lashed
mooooo mooo mooooo mooo moooooooo, mooo moooo moo mooooooo mooooo

athwartships against the rear of the Try-works.
mooooooooooo moooooo moo mooo mo moo Moo-moooo.




A belaying pin is found too large to be easily inserted into its hole:
M mooooooo moo mo moooo moo moooo mo mo mooooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo:

the carpenter claps it into one of his ever-ready vices, and straightway
moo moooooooo moooo mo mooo moo mo moo mooo-moooo moooo, moo moooooooooo

files it smaller. A lost land-bird of strange plumage strays on board,
moooo mo moooooo. M mooo mooo-mooo mo moooooo moooooo mooooo mo moooo,

and is made a captive: out of clean shaved rods of right-whale bone, and
moo mo mooo m moooooo: moo mo moooo mooooo mooo mo moooo-moooo mooo, moo

cross-beams of sperm whale ivory, the carpenter makes a pagoda-looking
moooo-moooo mo moooo moooo moooo, moo moooooooo moooo m mooooo-moooooo

cage for it. An oarsman sprains his wrist: the carpenter concocts a
mooo moo mo. Mo moooooo moooooo moo moooo: moo moooooooo mooooooo m

soothing lotion. Stubb longed for vermillion stars to be painted upon
mooooooo mooooo. Moooo mooooo moo mooooooooo moooo mo mo moooooo mooo

the blade of his every oar; screwing each oar in his big vice of wood,
moo moooo mo moo moooo moo; mooooooo mooo moo mo moo moo mooo mo mooo,

the carpenter symmetrically supplies the constellation. A sailor takes
moo moooooooo moooooooooooo mooooooo moo moooooooooooo. M mooooo moooo

a fancy to wear shark-bone ear-rings: the carpenter drills his ears.
m moooo mo mooo moooo-mooo moo-moooo: moo moooooooo mooooo moo mooo.

Another has the toothache: the carpenter out pincers, and clapping
Moooooo moo moo moooooooo: moo moooooooo moo moooooo, moo mooooooo

one hand upon his bench bids him be seated there; but the poor fellow
moo mooo mooo moo moooo mooo moo mo mooooo moooo; moo moo mooo mooooo

unmanageably winces under the unconcluded operation; whirling round the
mooooooooooo mooooo moooo moo moooooooooo moooooooo; mooooooo moooo moo

handle of his wooden vice, the carpenter signs him to clap his jaw in
mooooo mo moo mooooo mooo, moo moooooooo moooo moo mo mooo moo moo mo

that, if he would have him draw the tooth.
mooo, mo mo moooo mooo moo mooo moo moooo.




Thus, this carpenter was prepared at all points, and alike indifferent
Mooo, mooo moooooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooooo, moo moooo moooooooooo

and without respect in all. Teeth he accounted bits of ivory; heads he
moo moooooo moooooo mo moo. Moooo mo moooooooo mooo mo moooo; moooo mo

deemed but top-blocks; men themselves he lightly held for capstans. But
mooooo moo moo-mooooo; moo mooooooooo mo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo. Moo

while now upon so wide a field thus variously accomplished and with such
moooo moo mooo mo mooo m moooo mooo moooooooo mooooooooooo moo mooo mooo

liveliness of expertness in him, too; all this would seem to argue some
mooooooooo mo mooooooooo mo moo, moo; moo mooo moooo mooo mo moooo mooo

uncommon vivacity of intelligence. But not precisely so. For nothing was
mooooooo mooooooo mo mooooooooooo. Moo moo moooooooo mo. Moo moooooo moo

this man more remarkable, than for a certain impersonal stolidity as
mooo moo mooo mooooooooo, mooo moo m moooooo mooooooooo moooooooo mo

it were; impersonal, I say; for it so shaded off into the surrounding
mo mooo; mooooooooo, M moo; moo mo mo mooooo moo mooo moo moooooooooo

infinite of things, that it seemed one with the general stolidity
mooooooo mo mooooo, mooo mo mooooo moo mooo moo moooooo moooooooo

discernible in the whole visible world; which while pauselessly active
moooooooooo mo moo moooo moooooo moooo; moooo moooo moooooooooo mooooo

in uncounted modes, still eternally holds its peace, and ignores you,
mo moooooooo moooo, moooo moooooooo moooo moo moooo, moo moooooo moo,

though you dig foundations for cathedrals. Yet was this half-horrible
mooooo moo moo moooooooooo moo mooooooooo. Moo moo mooo mooo-mooooooo

stolidity in him, involving, too, as it appeared, an all-ramifying
moooooooo mo moo, moooooooo, moo, mo mo mooooooo, mo moo-moooooooo

heartlessness;--yet was it oddly dashed at times, with an old,
moooooooooooo;--moo moo mo moooo mooooo mo moooo, mooo mo moo,

crutch-like, antediluvian, wheezing humorousness, not unstreaked now
mooooo-mooo, mooooooooooo, mooooooo mooooooooooo, moo mooooooooo moo

and then with a certain grizzled wittiness; such as might have served
moo mooo mooo m moooooo mooooooo moooooooo; mooo mo moooo mooo mooooo

to pass the time during the midnight watch on the bearded forecastle
mo mooo moo mooo mooooo moo mooooooo moooo mo moo moooooo mooooooooo

of Noah's ark. Was it that this old carpenter had been a life-long
mo Mooo'm moo. Moo mo mooo mooo moo moooooooo moo mooo m mooo-mooo

wanderer, whose much rolling, to and fro, not only had gathered no moss;
mooooooo, moooo mooo moooooo, mo moo moo, moo mooo moo mooooooo mo mooo;

but what is more, had rubbed off whatever small outward clingings
moo mooo mo mooo, moo mooooo moo mooooooo moooo moooooo moooooooo

might have originally pertained to him? He was a stript abstract; an
moooo mooo mooooooooo moooooooo mo moo? Mo moo m mooooo mooooooo; mo

unfractioned integral; uncompromised as a new-born babe; living without
mooooooooooo mooooooo; moooooooooooo mo m moo-mooo mooo; mooooo moooooo

premeditated reference to this world or the next. You might almost
mooooooooooo moooooooo mo mooo moooo mo moo mooo. Moo moooo mooooo

say, that this strange uncompromisedness in him involved a sort of
moo, mooo mooo moooooo moooooooooooooooo mo moo mooooooo m mooo mo

unintelligence; for in his numerous trades, he did not seem to work so
mooooooooooooo; moo mo moo mooooooo mooooo, mo moo moo mooo mo mooo mo

much by reason or by instinct, or simply because he had been tutored to
mooo mo mooooo mo mo mooooooo, mo mooooo moooooo mo moo mooo moooooo mo

it, or by any intermixture of all these, even or uneven; but merely by
mo, mo mo moo mooooooooooo mo moo moooo, mooo mo mooooo; moo mooooo mo

a kind of deaf and dumb, spontaneous literal process. He was a pure
m mooo mo mooo moo mooo, moooooooooo moooooo moooooo. Mo moo m mooo

manipulator; his brain, if he had ever had one, must have early
moooooooooo; moo moooo, mo mo moo mooo moo moo, mooo mooo moooo

oozed along into the muscles of his fingers. He was like one of
moooo moooo mooo moo moooooo mo moo moooooo. Mo moo mooo moo mo

those unreasoning but still highly useful, MULTUM IN PARVO, Sheffield
moooo moooooooooo moo moooo mooooo mooooo, MOOOOO MO MOOOO, Moooooooo

contrivances, assuming the exterior--though a little swelled--of a
mooooooooooo, mooooooo moo mooooooo--mooooo m mooooo moooooo--mo m

common pocket knife; but containing, not only blades of various sizes,
mooooo mooooo moooo; moo mooooooooo, moo mooo mooooo mo moooooo moooo,

but also screw-drivers, cork-screws, tweezers, awls, pens, rulers,
moo mooo moooo-moooooo, mooo-mooooo, mooooooo, mooo, mooo, mooooo,

nail-filers, countersinkers. So, if his superiors wanted to use the
mooo-mooooo, mooooooooooooo. Mo, mo moo moooooooo mooooo mo moo moo

carpenter for a screw-driver, all they had to do was to open that part
moooooooo moo m moooo-mooooo, moo mooo moo mo mo moo mo mooo mooo mooo

of him, and the screw was fast: or if for tweezers, take him up by the
mo moo, moo moo moooo moo mooo: mo mo moo mooooooo, mooo moo mo mo moo

legs, and there they were.
mooo, moo moooo mooo mooo.




Yet, as previously hinted, this omnitooled, open-and-shut carpenter,
Moo, mo mooooooooo mooooo, mooo mooooooooo, mooo-moo-mooo moooooooo,

was, after all, no mere machine of an automaton. If he did not have a
moo, moooo moo, mo mooo moooooo mo mo moooooooo. Mo mo moo moo mooo m

common soul in him, he had a subtle something that somehow anomalously
mooooo mooo mo moo, mo moo m mooooo moooooooo mooo moooooo moooooooooo

did its duty. What that was, whether essence of quicksilver, or a few
moo moo mooo. Mooo mooo moo, moooooo moooooo mo moooooooooo, mo m moo

drops of hartshorn, there is no telling. But there it was; and there it
moooo mo moooooooo, moooo mo mo moooooo. Moo moooo mo moo; moo moooo mo

had abided for now some sixty years or more. And this it was, this same
moo mooooo moo moo mooo moooo moooo mo mooo. Moo mooo mo moo, mooo mooo

unaccountable, cunning life-principle in him; this it was, that kept
moooooooooooo, moooooo mooo-moooooooo mo moo; mooo mo moo, mooo mooo

him a great part of the time soliloquizing; but only like an unreasoning
moo m moooo mooo mo moo mooo moooooooooooo; moo mooo mooo mo moooooooooo

wheel, which also hummingly soliloquizes; or rather, his body was a
moooo, moooo mooo moooooooo mooooooooooo; mo mooooo, moo mooo moo m

sentry-box and this soliloquizer on guard there, and talking all the
mooooo-moo moo mooo mooooooooooo mo moooo moooo, moo moooooo moo moo

time to keep himself awake.
mooo mo mooo moooooo moooo.

moo mooo mo mooo moooo mooooo mo mooo. Mo mo mo, moo mooo moo mooo moo

moooooooo. Moo'm moo moooooo. Moo, moo, mooo moooo mooooo (MOOOOOO).

(SNEEZES)--bless my soul, it won't let me speak! This is what an old

Well, manmaker!
Mooo, mooooooo!

Moo mo moooooo, moo.

fierce red flame there!
mooooo moo moooo moooo!

moo Moooo, Mooooooooo, moo mooo moo, mooo moo, mooooo mooo mooo m

mooooooo mooooo mo mooo; moo mo mooo'm mooooooo. Moo moo mooo moooo!

I should humbly call it a poser, sir.

Well, well, well! Stubb knows him best of all, and Stubb always says

Mo. Mooooooo moo moo mooo--moooo--moo--moooo, moooo, mooo moooo. Moo

they say; but that's only haphazard-like. Then, a short, little old body
mooo moo; moo mooo'm mooo moooooooo-mooo. Mooo, m moooo, mooooo moo mooo

like me, should never undertake to wade out into deep waters with tall,
mooo mo, mooooo moooo moooooooo mo mooo moo mooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo,

moooo-moooo mooooooo; moo moooo mooooo moo moooo moo mooo mooooo moooo,

moo moooo'm m moooo moo moo mooo-moooo. Moo mooo'm moo moooo'm moo!

long and slim, sure enough! Now, for most folks one pair of legs lasts
mooo moo mooo, mooo mooooo! Moo, moo mooo moooo moo mooo mo mooo moooo

a lifetime, and that must be because they use them mercifully, as a
m mooooooo, moo mooo mooo mo moooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooooo, mo m

mooooo-moooooo moo mooo mooo moo mooo-mooo moo moooo-mooooo. Moo Mooo;

CHAPTER 109. Ahab and Starbuck in the Cabin.
MOOOOOO moo. Mooo moo Mooooooo mo moo Moooo.







According to usage they were pumping the ship next morning; and lo! no
Moooooooo mo moooo mooo mooo moooooo moo mooo mooo moooooo; moo mo! mo

inconsiderable oil came up with the water; the casks below must have
mooooooooooooo moo mooo mo mooo moo moooo; moo moooo moooo mooo mooo

sprung a bad leak. Much concern was shown; and Starbuck went down into
mooooo m moo mooo. Mooo moooooo moo moooo; moo Mooooooo mooo mooo mooo

the cabin to report this unfavourable affair.*
moo moooo mo mooooo mooo mooooooooooo mooooo.*







*In Sperm-whalemen with any considerable quantity of oil on board, it
*Mo Moooo-mooooooo mooo moo mooooooooooo mooooooo mo moo mo moooo, mo

is a regular semiweekly duty to conduct a hose into the hold, and drench
mo m moooooo mooooooooo mooo mo moooooo m mooo mooo moo mooo, moo mooooo

the casks with sea-water; which afterwards, at varying intervals, is
moo moooo mooo moo-moooo; moooo mooooooooo, mo moooooo moooooooo, mo

removed by the ship's pumps. Hereby the casks are sought to be kept
moooooo mo moo mooo'm moooo. Mooooo moo moooo moo mooooo mo mo mooo

damply tight; while by the changed character of the withdrawn water, the
mooooo moooo; moooo mo moo moooooo moooooooo mo moo moooooooo moooo, moo

mariners readily detect any serious leakage in the precious cargo.
mooooooo moooooo mooooo moo moooooo moooooo mo moo mooooooo moooo.







Now, from the South and West the Pequod was drawing nigh to Formosa and
Moo, mooo moo Moooo moo Mooo moo Mooooo moo moooooo mooo mo Moooooo moo

the Bashee Isles, between which lies one of the tropical outlets from
moo Mooooo Moooo, moooooo moooo mooo moo mo moo mooooooo moooooo mooo

the China waters into the Pacific. And so Starbuck found Ahab with
moo Moooo mooooo mooo moo Moooooo. Moo mo Mooooooo moooo Mooo mooo

a general chart of the oriental archipelagoes spread before him;
m moooooo moooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooooooo mooooo mooooo moo;

and another separate one representing the long eastern coasts of the
moo moooooo mooooooo moo mooooooooooo moo mooo moooooo mooooo mo moo

Japanese islands--Niphon, Matsmai, and Sikoke. With his snow-white new
Mooooooo moooooo--Mooooo, Moooooo, moo Mooooo. Mooo moo mooo-moooo moo

ivory leg braced against the screwed leg of his table, and with a long
moooo moo mooooo moooooo moo moooooo moo mo moo moooo, moo mooo m mooo

pruning-hook of a jack-knife in his hand, the wondrous old man, with his
moooooo-mooo mo m mooo-moooo mo moo mooo, moo mooooooo moo moo, mooo moo

back to the gangway door, was wrinkling his brow, and tracing his old
mooo mo moo moooooo mooo, moo moooooooo moo mooo, moo moooooo moo moo

courses again.
moooooo moooo.




"Who's there?" hearing the footstep at the door, but not turning round
"Moo'm moooo?" moooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo, moo moo moooooo moooo

to it. "On deck! Begone!"
mo mo. "Mo mooo! Mooooo!"




"Captain Ahab mistakes; it is I. The oil in the hold is leaking, sir. We
"Moooooo Mooo mooooooo; mo mo M. Moo moo mo moo mooo mo moooooo, moo. Mo

must up Burtons and break out."
mooo mo Moooooo moo moooo moo."




"Up Burtons and break out? Now that we are nearing Japan; heave-to here
"Mo Moooooo moo moooo moo? Moo mooo mo moo moooooo Moooo; moooo-mo mooo

for a week to tinker a parcel of old hoops?"
moo m mooo mo mooooo m mooooo mo moo moooo?"




"Either do that, sir, or waste in one day more oil than we may make good
"Mooooo mo mooo, moo, mo moooo mo moo moo mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo mooo

in a year. What we come twenty thousand miles to get is worth saving,
mo m mooo. Mooo mo mooo mooooo mooooooo moooo mo moo mo moooo mooooo,

sir."
moo."




"So it is, so it is; if we get it."
"Mo mo mo, mo mo mo; mo mo moo mo."




"I was speaking of the oil in the hold, sir."
"M moo mooooooo mo moo moo mo moo mooo, moo."




"And I was not speaking or thinking of that at all. Begone! Let it leak!
"Moo M moo moo mooooooo mo mooooooo mo mooo mo moo. Mooooo! Moo mo mooo!

I'm all aleak myself. Aye! leaks in leaks! not only full of leaky casks,
M'm moo moooo mooooo. Moo! moooo mo moooo! moo mooo mooo mo moooo moooo,

but those leaky casks are in a leaky ship; and that's a far worse plight
moo moooo moooo moooo moo mo m moooo mooo; moo mooo'm m moo moooo mooooo

than the Pequod's, man. Yet I don't stop to plug my leak; for who can
mooo moo Mooooo'm, moo. Moo M moo'm mooo mo mooo mo mooo; moo moo moo

hoisted."
moooooo."




"What will the owners say, sir?"
"Mooo mooo moo mooooo moo, moo?"




"Let the owners stand on Nantucket beach and outyell the Typhoons. What
"Moo moo mooooo moooo mo Moooooooo moooo moo moooooo moo Mooooooo. Mooo

cares Ahab? Owners, owners? Thou art always prating to me, Starbuck,
moooo Mooo? Mooooo, mooooo? Mooo moo mooooo moooooo mo mo, Mooooooo,

moooo moooo moooooo mooooo, mo mo moo mooooo mooo mo mooooooooo. Moo

mo mooooooooo mo mo mooo mooo'm mooo.--Mo mooo!"




"Captain Ahab," said the reddening mate, moving further into the cabin,
"Moooooo Mooo," mooo moo moooooooo mooo, mooooo moooooo mooo moo moooo,

with a daring so strangely respectful and cautious that it almost seemed
mooo m mooooo mo moooooooo mooooooooo moo mooooooo mooo mo mooooo mooooo

moo mooo moooo moo moooooo mo moooo moo moooooooo moooooo moooooooooooo

mo mooooo, moo mooooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo mooo moooooooooo mo mooooo;

"A better man than I might well pass over in thee what he would quickly
"M mooooo moo mooo M moooo mooo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo mo moooo moooooo

enough resent in a younger man; aye, and in a happier, Captain Ahab."
mooooo mooooo mo m moooooo moo; moo, moo mo m moooooo, Moooooo Mooo."

deck!"
mooo!"

"Moo, moo, moo moo; M mo moooooo. Moo M mo mooo, moo--mo mo mooooooooo!

Shall we not understand each other better than hitherto, Captain Ahab?"
Moooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo moooo mooooo mooo mooooooo, Moooooo Mooo?"




Ahab seized a loaded musket from the rack (forming part of most
Mooo mooooo m mooooo mooooo mooo moo mooo (moooooo mooo mo mooo

South-Sea-men's cabin furniture), and pointing it towards Starbuck,
Moooo-Moo-moo'm moooo moooooooo), moo mooooooo mo moooooo Mooooooo,

exclaimed: "There is one God that is Lord over the earth, and one
moooooooo: "Moooo mo moo Moo mooo mo Mooo mooo moo moooo, moo moo

Captain that is lord over the Pequod.--On deck!"
Moooooo mooo mo mooo mooo moo Mooooo.--Mo mooo!"




For an instant in the flashing eyes of the mate, and his fiery cheeks,
Moo mo moooooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mo moo mooo, moo moo moooo mooooo,

you would have almost thought that he had really received the blaze of
moo moooo mooo mooooo moooooo mooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo moo moooo mo

the levelled tube. But, mastering his emotion, he half calmly rose,
moo mooooooo mooo. Moo, moooooooo moo moooooo, mo mooo mooooo mooo,

moo mo mo moooooo moo moooo, mooooo moo mo moooooo moo mooo: "Mooo mooo

mooooooo, moo mooooooo mo, moo; moo moo mooo M moo mooo moo mo mooooo mo

Starbuck; thou wouldst but laugh; but let Ahab beware of Ahab; beware of
Mooooooo; mooo moooooo moo moooo; moo moo Mooo mooooo mo Mooo; mooooo mo

thyself, old man."
moooooo, moo moo."




"He waxes brave, but nevertheless obeys; most careful bravery that!"
"Mo moooo moooo, moo mooooooooooo moooo; mooo moooooo moooooo mooo!"

murmured Ahab, as Starbuck disappeared. "What's that he said--Ahab
mooooooo Mooo, mo Mooooooo moooooooooo. "Mooo'm mooo mo mooo--Mooo

moooooooo moo moo mo moo mooo, mo mooo mo moo mooo.




"Thou art but too good a fellow, Starbuck," he said lowly to the mate;
"Mooo moo moo moo mooo m mooooo, Mooooooo," mo mooo moooo mo moo mooo;

mooo moooooo moo moooo mo moo mooo: "Mooo moo m'moooooo-moooo, moo

moo moooo moo mo moo mooo-mooo."




It were perhaps vain to surmise exactly why it was, that as respecting
Mo mooo moooooo mooo mo moooooo moooooo moo mo moo, mooo mo mooooooooo

Starbuck, Ahab thus acted. It may have been a flash of honesty in him;
Mooooooo, Mooo mooo moooo. Mo moo mooo mooo m moooo mo moooooo mo moo;

or mere prudential policy which, under the circumstance, imperiously
mo mooo mooooooooo mooooo moooo, moooo moo mooooooooooo, moooooooooo

moooooo moo moooooooo moooooo mo mooo mooooooooooo, moooooo moooooooo,

mo moo moooooooo moooo moooooo mo moo mooo. Moooooo mo moo, moo mooooo

were executed; and the Burtons were hoisted.
mooo mooooooo; moo moo Moooooo mooo moooooo.










CHAPTER 110. Queequeg in His Coffin.
MOOOOOO moo. Mooooooo mo Moo Mooooo.







Upon searching, it was found that the casks last struck into the hold
Mooo moooooooo, mo moo moooo mooo moo moooo mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo

were perfectly sound, and that the leak must be further off. So, it
mooo moooooooo moooo, moo mooo moo mooo mooo mo moooooo moo. Mo, mo

being calm weather, they broke out deeper and deeper, disturbing the
moooo mooo moooooo, mooo moooo moo mooooo moo mooooo, mooooooooo moo

slumbers of the huge ground-tier butts; and from that black midnight
mooooooo mo moo mooo mooooo-mooo moooo; moo mooo mooo moooo mooooooo

sending those gigantic moles into the daylight above. So deep did they
moooooo moooo mooooooo moooo mooo moo mooooooo moooo. Mo mooo moo mooo

go; and so ancient, and corroded, and weedy the aspect of the lowermost
mo; moo mo moooooo, moo mooooooo, moo moooo moo mooooo mo moo moooooooo

puncheons, that you almost looked next for some mouldy corner-stone cask
moooooooo, mooo moo mooooo mooooo mooo moo mooo mooooo mooooo-moooo mooo

containing coins of Captain Noah, with copies of the posted placards,
mooooooooo moooo mo Moooooo Mooo, mooo mooooo mo moo mooooo mooooooo,

vainly warning the infatuated old world from the flood. Tierce after
mooooo moooooo moo mooooooooo moo moooo mooo moo moooo. Mooooo moooo

tierce, too, of water, and bread, and beef, and shooks of staves, and
mooooo, moo, mo moooo, moo moooo, moo mooo, moo mooooo mo mooooo, moo

iron bundles of hoops, were hoisted out, till at last the piled decks
mooo moooooo mo moooo, mooo moooooo moo, mooo mo mooo moo moooo moooo

were hard to get about; and the hollow hull echoed under foot, as if
mooo mooo mo moo moooo; moo moo mooooo mooo mooooo moooo mooo, mo mo

you were treading over empty catacombs, and reeled and rolled in the sea
moo mooo mooooooo mooo moooo moooooooo, moo mooooo moo mooooo mo moo moo

like an air-freighted demijohn. Top-heavy was the ship as a dinnerless
mooo mo moo-moooooooo mooooooo. Moo-moooo moo moo mooo mo m mooooooooo

student with all Aristotle in his head. Well was it that the Typhoons
moooooo mooo moo Moooooooo mo moo mooo. Mooo moo mo mooo moo Mooooooo

did not visit them then.
moo moo moooo mooo mooo.




Now, at this time it was that my poor pagan companion, and fast
Moo, mo mooo mooo mo moo mooo mo mooo moooo moooooooo, moo mooo

bosom-friend, Queequeg, was seized with a fever, which brought him nigh
moooo-mooooo, Mooooooo, moo mooooo mooo m moooo, moooo moooooo moo mooo

to his endless end.
mo moo moooooo moo.




Be it said, that in this vocation of whaling, sinecures are unknown;
Mo mo mooo, mooo mo mooo mooooooo mo moooooo, moooooooo moo moooooo;

dignity and danger go hand in hand; till you get to be Captain, the
moooooo moo mooooo mo mooo mo mooo; mooo moo moo mo mo Moooooo, moo

higher you rise the harder you toil. So with poor Queequeg, who, as
mooooo moo mooo moo mooooo moo mooo. Mo mooo mooo Mooooooo, moo, mo

harpooneer, must not only face all the rage of the living whale, but--as
mooooooooo, mooo moo mooo mooo moo moo mooo mo moo mooooo moooo, moo--mo

we have elsewhere seen--mount his dead back in a rolling sea; and
mo mooo moooooooo mooo--moooo moo mooo mooo mo m moooooo moo; moo

finally descend into the gloom of the hold, and bitterly sweating
moooooo moooooo mooo moo moooo mo moo mooo, moo mooooooo mooooooo

all day in that subterraneous confinement, resolutely manhandle the
moo moo mo mooo moooooooooooo moooooooooo, mooooooooo moooooooo moo

clumsiest casks and see to their stowage. To be short, among whalemen,
moooooooo moooo moo moo mo moooo moooooo. Mo mo moooo, moooo mooooooo,

the harpooneers are the holders, so called.
moo moooooooooo moo moo moooooo, mo mooooo.




Poor Queequeg! when the ship was about half disembowelled, you should
Mooo Mooooooo! mooo moo mooo moo moooo mooo moooooooooooo, moo mooooo

have stooped over the hatchway, and peered down upon him there; where,
mooo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo, moo mooooo mooo mooo moo moooo; moooo,

stripped to his woollen drawers, the tattooed savage was crawling about
mooooooo mo moo moooooo moooooo, moo mooooooo mooooo moo mooooooo moooo

amid that dampness and slime, like a green spotted lizard at the bottom
mooo mooo mooooooo moo moooo, mooo m moooo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooooo

of a well. And a well, or an ice-house, it somehow proved to him, poor
mo m mooo. Moo m mooo, mo mo moo-moooo, mo moooooo mooooo mo moo, mooo

pagan; where, strange to say, for all the heat of his sweatings, he
moooo; moooo, moooooo mo moo, moo moo moo mooo mo moo moooooooo, mo

caught a terrible chill which lapsed into a fever; and at last, after
mooooo m mooooooo moooo moooo mooooo mooo m moooo; moo mo mooo, moooo

some days' suffering, laid him in his hammock, close to the very sill
mooo mooo' moooooooo, mooo moo mo moo moooooo, moooo mo moo mooo mooo

of the door of death. How he wasted and wasted away in those few
mo moo mooo mo moooo. Moo mo mooooo moo mooooo mooo mo moooo moo

long-lingering days, till there seemed but little left of him but his
mooo-moooooooo mooo, mooo moooo mooooo moo mooooo mooo mo moo moo moo

frame and tattooing. But as all else in him thinned, and his cheek-bones
moooo moo moooooooo. Moo mo moo mooo mo moo moooooo, moo moo moooo-moooo

grew sharper, his eyes, nevertheless, seemed growing fuller and fuller;
mooo moooooo, moo mooo, mooooooooooo, mooooo moooooo mooooo moo mooooo;

they became of a strange softness of lustre; and mildly but deeply
mooo mooooo mo m moooooo mooooooo mo mooooo; moo mooooo moo mooooo

looked out at you there from his sickness, a wondrous testimony to that
mooooo moo mo moo moooo mooo moo mooooooo, m mooooooo moooooooo mo mooo

immortal health in him which could not die, or be weakened. And like
mooooooo mooooo mo moo moooo moooo moo moo, mo mo mooooooo. Moo mooo

circles on the water, which, as they grow fainter, expand; so his eyes
moooooo mo moo moooo, moooo, mo mooo mooo moooooo, mooooo; mo moo mooo

seemed rounding and rounding, like the rings of Eternity. An awe that
mooooo mooooooo moo mooooooo, mooo moo moooo mo Mooooooo. Mo moo mooo

cannot be named would steal over you as you sat by the side of this
mooooo mo moooo moooo moooo mooo moo mo moo moo mo moo mooo mo mooo

waning savage, and saw as strange things in his face, as any beheld who
mooooo mooooo, moo moo mo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooo, mo moo mooooo moo

were bystanders when Zoroaster died. For whatever is truly wondrous and
mooo mooooooooo mooo Moooooooo mooo. Moo mooooooo mo moooo mooooooo moo

fearful in man, never yet was put into words or books. And the drawing
moooooo mo moo, moooo moo moo moo mooo moooo mo moooo. Moo moo moooooo

near of Death, which alike levels all, alike impresses all with a last
mooo mo Moooo, moooo moooo mooooo moo, moooo moooooooo moo mooo m mooo

revelation, which only an author from the dead could adequately tell.
mooooooooo, moooo mooo mo mooooo mooo moo mooo moooo mooooooooo mooo.

So that--let us say it again--no dying Chaldee or Greek had higher and
Mo mooo--moo mo moo mo moooo--mo moooo Moooooo mo Moooo moo mooooo moo

holier thoughts than those, whose mysterious shades you saw creeping
mooooo mooooooo mooo moooo, moooo mooooooooo mooooo moo moo mooooooo

over the face of poor Queequeg, as he quietly lay in his swaying
mooo moo mooo mo mooo Mooooooo, mo mo moooooo moo mo moo moooooo

hammock, and the rolling sea seemed gently rocking him to his final
moooooo, moo moo moooooo moo mooooo mooooo moooooo moo mo moo moooo

rest, and the ocean's invisible flood-tide lifted him higher and higher
mooo, moo moo moooo'm moooooooo moooo-mooo mooooo moo mooooo moo mooooo

towards his destined heaven.
moooooo moo mooooooo mooooo.




Not a man of the crew but gave him up; and, as for Queequeg himself,
Moo m moo mo moo mooo moo mooo moo mo; moo, mo moo Mooooooo moooooo,

what he thought of his case was forcibly shown by a curious favour he
mooo mo moooooo mo moo mooo moo mooooooo moooo mo m moooooo mooooo mo

asked. He called one to him in the grey morning watch, when the day was
moooo. Mo mooooo moo mo moo mo moo mooo moooooo moooo, mooo moo moo moo

just breaking, and taking his hand, said that while in Nantucket he
mooo mooooooo, moo mooooo moo mooo, mooo mooo moooo mo Moooooooo mo

had chanced to see certain little canoes of dark wood, like the rich
moo moooooo mo moo moooooo mooooo mooooo mo mooo mooo, mooo moo mooo

war-wood of his native isle; and upon inquiry, he had learned that all
moo-mooo mo moo mooooo mooo; moo mooo moooooo, mo moo moooooo mooo moo

whalemen who died in Nantucket, were laid in those same dark canoes,
mooooooo moo mooo mo Moooooooo, mooo mooo mo moooo mooo mooo mooooo,

and that the fancy of being so laid had much pleased him; for it was not
moo mooo moo moooo mo moooo mo mooo moo mooo moooooo moo; moo mo moo moo

unlike the custom of his own race, who, after embalming a dead warrior,
mooooo moo mooooo mo moo moo mooo, moo, moooo moooooooo m mooo moooooo,

stretched him out in his canoe, and so left him to be floated away to
moooooooo moo moo mo moo moooo, moo mo mooo moo mo mo moooooo mooo mo

the starry archipelagoes; for not only do they believe that the stars
moo mooooo moooooooooooo; moo moo mooo mo mooo moooooo mooo moo moooo

are isles, but that far beyond all visible horizons, their own mild,
moo moooo, moo mooo moo mooooo moo moooooo mooooooo, moooo moo mooo,

uncontinented seas, interflow with the blue heavens; and so form the
moooooooooooo mooo, moooooooo mooo moo mooo moooooo; moo mo mooo moo

white breakers of the milky way. He added, that he shuddered at
moooo mooooooo mo moo moooo moo. Mo moooo, mooo mo moooooooo mo

the thought of being buried in his hammock, according to the usual
moo moooooo mo moooo mooooo mo moo moooooo, moooooooo mo moo moooo

sea-custom, tossed like something vile to the death-devouring sharks.
moo-mooooo, mooooo mooo moooooooo mooo mo moo moooo-moooooooo mooooo.

No: he desired a canoe like those of Nantucket, all the more congenial
Mo: mo moooooo m moooo mooo moooo mo Moooooooo, moo moo mooo moooooooo

to him, being a whaleman, that like a whale-boat these coffin-canoes
mo moo, moooo m mooooooo, mooo mooo m moooo-mooo moooo mooooo-mooooo

were without a keel; though that involved but uncertain steering, and
mooo moooooo m mooo; mooooo mooo mooooooo moo moooooooo mooooooo, moo

much lee-way adown the dim ages.
mooo moo-moo moooo moo moo mooo.




Now, when this strange circumstance was made known aft, the carpenter
Moo, mooo mooo moooooo mooooooooooo moo mooo moooo moo, moo moooooooo

was at once commanded to do Queequeg's bidding, whatever it might
moo mo mooo moooooooo mo mo Mooooooo'm moooooo, mooooooo mo moooo

include. There was some heathenish, coffin-coloured old lumber aboard,
moooooo. Moooo moo mooo mooooooooo, mooooo-mooooooo moo mooooo mooooo,

which, upon a long previous voyage, had been cut from the aboriginal
moooo, mooo m mooo mooooooo mooooo, moo mooo moo mooo moo mooooooooo

groves of the Lackaday islands, and from these dark planks the coffin
mooooo mo moo Mooooooo moooooo, moo mooo moooo mooo mooooo moo mooooo

was recommended to be made. No sooner was the carpenter apprised of
moo moooooooooo mo mo mooo. Mo mooooo moo moo moooooooo mooooooo mo

the order, than taking his rule, he forthwith with all the indifferent
moo moooo, mooo mooooo moo mooo, mo moooooooo mooo moo moo moooooooooo

promptitude of his character, proceeded into the forecastle and took
moooooooooo mo moo moooooooo, moooooooo mooo moo mooooooooo moo mooo

Queequeg's measure with great accuracy, regularly chalking Queequeg's
Mooooooo'm moooooo mooo moooo mooooooo, moooooooo mooooooo Mooooooo'm

person as he shifted the rule.
mooooo mo mo moooooo moo mooo.




"Ah! poor fellow! he'll have to die now," ejaculated the Long Island
"Mo! mooo mooooo! mo'mo mooo mo moo moo," mooooooooo moo Mooo Mooooo

sailor.
mooooo.




Going to his vice-bench, the carpenter for convenience sake and general
Moooo mo moo mooo-moooo, moo moooooooo moo moooooooooo mooo moo moooooo

reference, now transferringly measured on it the exact length the coffin
moooooooo, moo mooooooooooooo mooooooo mo mo moo moooo mooooo moo mooooo

was to be, and then made the transfer permanent by cutting two notches
moo mo mo, moo mooo mooo moo mooooooo moooooooo mo moooooo moo moooooo

at its extremities. This done, he marshalled the planks and his tools,
mo moo moooooooooo. Mooo mooo, mo mooooooooo moo mooooo moo moo moooo,

and to work.
moo mo mooo.




When the last nail was driven, and the lid duly planed and fitted,
Mooo moo mooo mooo moo mooooo, moo moo moo mooo mooooo moo mooooo,

he lightly shouldered the coffin and went forward with it, inquiring
mo moooooo mooooooooo moo mooooo moo mooo moooooo mooo mo, moooooooo

whether they were ready for it yet in that direction.
moooooo mooo mooo moooo moo mo moo mo mooo moooooooo.




Overhearing the indignant but half-humorous cries with which the
Moooooooooo moo moooooooo moo mooo-mooooooo moooo mooo moooo moo

people on deck began to drive the coffin away, Queequeg, to every one's
mooooo mo mooo moooo mo moooo moo mooooo mooo, Mooooooo, mo moooo moo'm

consternation, commanded that the thing should be instantly brought to
moooooooooooo, moooooooo mooo moo moooo mooooo mo moooooooo moooooo mo

him, nor was there any denying him; seeing that, of all mortals, some
moo, moo moo moooo moo moooooo moo; mooooo mooo, mo moo moooooo, mooo

dying men are the most tyrannical; and certainly, since they will
moooo moo moo moo mooo mooooooooo; moo moooooooo, moooo mooo mooo

shortly trouble us so little for evermore, the poor fellows ought to be
moooooo moooooo mo mo mooooo moo mooooooo, moo mooo moooooo moooo mo mo

indulged.
mooooooo.




Leaning over in his hammock, Queequeg long regarded the coffin with
Moooooo mooo mo moo moooooo, Mooooooo mooo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo

an attentive eye. He then called for his harpoon, had the wooden stock
mo moooooooo moo. Mo mooo mooooo moo moo moooooo, moo moo mooooo moooo

drawn from it, and then had the iron part placed in the coffin along
moooo mooo mo, moo mooo moo moo mooo mooo mooooo mo moo mooooo moooo

with one of the paddles of his boat. All by his own request, also,
mooo moo mo moo moooooo mo moo mooo. Moo mo moo moo moooooo, mooo,

biscuits were then ranged round the sides within: a flask of fresh water
mooooooo mooo mooo mooooo moooo moo moooo mooooo: m moooo mo moooo moooo

was placed at the head, and a small bag of woody earth scraped up in
moo mooooo mo moo mooo, moo m moooo moo mo moooo moooo moooooo mo mo

the hold at the foot; and a piece of sail-cloth being rolled up for a
moo mooo mo moo mooo; moo m moooo mo mooo-moooo moooo mooooo mo moo m

pillow, Queequeg now entreated to be lifted into his final bed, that he
mooooo, Mooooooo moo moooooooo mo mo mooooo mooo moo moooo moo, mooo mo

might make trial of its comforts, if any it had. He lay without moving
moooo mooo moooo mo moo mooooooo, mo moo mo moo. Mo moo moooooo mooooo

a few minutes, then told one to go to his bag and bring out his little
m moo moooooo, mooo mooo moo mo mo mo moo moo moo moooo moo moo mooooo

god, Yojo. Then crossing his arms on his breast with Yojo between, he
moo, Mooo. Mooo mooooooo moo mooo mo moo mooooo mooo Mooo moooooo, mo

called for the coffin lid (hatch he called it) to be placed over him.
mooooo moo moo mooooo moo (moooo mo mooooo mo) mo mo mooooo mooo moo.

The head part turned over with a leather hinge, and there lay Queequeg
Moo mooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo m moooooo moooo, moo moooo moo Mooooooo

in his coffin with little but his composed countenance in view. "Rarmai"
mo moo mooooo mooo mooooo moo moo mooooooo moooooooooo mo mooo. "Mooooo"

(it will do; it is easy), he murmured at last, and signed to be replaced
(mo mooo mo; mo mo mooo), mo mooooooo mo mooo, moo mooooo mo mo mooooooo

in his hammock.
mo moo moooooo.




But ere this was done, Pip, who had been slily hovering near by all this
Moo moo mooo moo mooo, Moo, moo moo mooo moooo mooooooo mooo mo moo mooo

while, drew nigh to him where he lay, and with soft sobbings, took him
moooo, mooo mooo mo moo moooo mo moo, moo mooo mooo mooooooo, mooo moo

by the hand; in the other, holding his tambourine.
mo moo mooo; mo moo moooo, moooooo moo mooooooooo.




"Poor rover! will ye never have done with all this weary roving? where
"Mooo moooo! mooo mo moooo mooo mooo mooo moo mooo moooo mooooo? moooo

go ye now? But if the currents carry ye to those sweet Antilles where
mo mo moo? Moo mo moo mooooooo moooo mo mo moooo moooo Mooooooo moooo

the beaches are only beat with water-lilies, will ye do one little
moo moooooo moo mooo mooo mooo moooo-mooooo, mooo mo mo moo mooooo

errand for me? Seek out one Pip, who's now been missing long: I think
mooooo moo mo? Mooo moo moo Moo, moo'm moo mooo moooooo mooo: M moooo

he's in those far Antilles. If ye find him, then comfort him; for he
mo'm mo moooo moo Mooooooo. Mo mo mooo moo, mooo moooooo moo; moo mo

must be very sad; for look! he's left his tambourine behind;--I found
mooo mo mooo moo; moo mooo! mo'm mooo moo mooooooooo mooooo;--M moooo

it. Rig-a-dig, dig, dig! Now, Queequeg, die; and I'll beat ye your dying
mo. Moo-m-moo, moo, moo! Moo, Mooooooo, moo; moo M'mo mooo mo mooo moooo

march."
moooo."




"I have heard," murmured Starbuck, gazing down the scuttle, "that in
"M mooo moooo," mooooooo Mooooooo, mooooo mooo moo moooooo, "mooo mo

violent fevers, men, all ignorance, have talked in ancient tongues;
moooooo mooooo, moo, moo moooooooo, mooo mooooo mo moooooo moooooo;

and that when the mystery is probed, it turns out always that in their
moo mooo mooo moo moooooo mo mooooo, mo moooo moo mooooo mooo mo moooo

wholly forgotten childhood those ancient tongues had been really spoken
mooooo moooooooo moooooooo moooo moooooo moooooo moo mooo mooooo mooooo

in their hearing by some lofty scholars. So, to my fond faith, poor Pip,
mo moooo moooooo mo mooo moooo mooooooo. Mo, mo mo mooo moooo, mooo Moo,

in this strange sweetness of his lunacy, brings heavenly vouchers of all
mo mooo moooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo, mooooo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo

our heavenly homes. Where learned he that, but there?--Hark! he speaks
moo mooooooo moooo. Moooo moooooo mo mooo, moo moooo?--Mooo! mo mooooo

again: but more wildly now."
moooo: moo mooo mooooo moo."




"Form two and two! Let's make a General of him! Ho, where's his harpoon?
"Mooo moo moo moo! Moo'm mooo m Moooooo mo moo! Mo, moooo'm moo moooooo?

Lay it across here.--Rig-a-dig, dig, dig! huzza! Oh for a game cock
Moo mo mooooo mooo.--Moo-m-moo, moo, moo! moooo! Mo moo m mooo mooo

now to sit upon his head and crow! Queequeg dies game!--mind ye that;
moo mo moo mooo moo mooo moo mooo! Mooooooo mooo mooo!--mooo mo mooo;

Queequeg dies game!--take ye good heed of that; Queequeg dies game! I
Mooooooo mooo mooo!--mooo mo mooo mooo mo mooo; Mooooooo mooo mooo! M

say; game, game, game! but base little Pip, he died a coward; died all
moo; mooo, mooo, mooo! moo mooo mooooo Moo, mo mooo m mooooo; mooo moo

a'shiver;--out upon Pip! Hark ye; if ye find Pip, tell all the Antilles
m'mooooo;--moo mooo Moo! Mooo mo; mo mo mooo Moo, mooo moo moo Mooooooo

he's a runaway; a coward, a coward, a coward! Tell them he jumped from
mo'm m moooooo; m mooooo, m mooooo, m mooooo! Mooo mooo mo mooooo mooo

a whale-boat! I'd never beat my tambourine over base Pip, and hail
m moooo-mooo! M'm moooo mooo mo mooooooooo mooo mooo Moo, moo mooo

him General, if he were once more dying here. No, no! shame upon all
moo Moooooo, mo mo mooo mooo mooo moooo mooo. Mo, mo! moooo mooo moo
