moooooo--moooo mooo mooo! Moo 'mo mo moooo mooo Moo, mooo mooooo mooo m

whale-boat. Shame! shame!"
moooo-mooo. Moooo! moooo!"




During all this, Queequeg lay with closed eyes, as if in a dream. Pip
Mooooo moo mooo, Mooooooo moo mooo mooooo mooo, mo mo mo m moooo. Moo

was led away, and the sick man was replaced in his hammock.
moo moo mooo, moo moo mooo moo moo mooooooo mo moo moooooo.




But now that he had apparently made every preparation for death; now
Moo moo mooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo moooo moooooooooo moo moooo; moo

that his coffin was proved a good fit, Queequeg suddenly rallied; soon
mooo moo mooooo moo mooooo m mooo moo, Mooooooo mooooooo moooooo; mooo

there seemed no need of the carpenter's box: and thereupon, when some
moooo mooooo mo mooo mo moo moooooooo'm moo: moo moooooooo, mooo mooo

expressed their delighted surprise, he, in substance, said, that the
moooooooo moooo moooooooo mooooooo, mo, mo moooooooo, mooo, mooo moo

cause of his sudden convalescence was this;--at a critical moment, he
moooo mo moo mooooo moooooooooooo moo mooo;--mo m mooooooo mooooo, mo

had just recalled a little duty ashore, which he was leaving undone;
moo mooo mooooooo m mooooo mooo mooooo, moooo mo moo moooooo mooooo;

and therefore had changed his mind about dying: he could not die yet,
moo moooooooo moo moooooo moo mooo moooo moooo: mo moooo moo moo moo,

he averred. They asked him, then, whether to live or die was a matter of
mo moooooo. Mooo moooo moo, mooo, moooooo mo mooo mo moo moo m mooooo mo

his own sovereign will and pleasure. He answered, certainly. In a word,
moo moo moooooooo mooo moo mooooooo. Mo mooooooo, moooooooo. Mo m mooo,

it was Queequeg's conceit, that if a man made up his mind to live, mere
mo moo Mooooooo'm moooooo, mooo mo m moo mooo mo moo mooo mo mooo, mooo

sickness could not kill him: nothing but a whale, or a gale, or some
mooooooo moooo moo mooo moo: moooooo moo m moooo, mo m mooo, mo mooo

violent, ungovernable, unintelligent destroyer of that sort.
moooooo, mooooooooooo, moooooooooooo moooooooo mo mooo mooo.




Now, there is this noteworthy difference between savage and civilized;
Moo, moooo mo mooo mooooooooo mooooooooo moooooo mooooo moo moooooooo;

that while a sick, civilized man may be six months convalescing,
mooo moooo m mooo, moooooooo moo moo mo moo mooooo mooooooooooo,

generally speaking, a sick savage is almost half-well again in a day.
moooooooo mooooooo, m mooo mooooo mo mooooo mooo-mooo moooo mo m moo.

So, in good time my Queequeg gained strength; and at length after
Mo, mo mooo mooo mo Mooooooo mooooo mooooooo; moo mo mooooo moooo

sitting on the windlass for a few indolent days (but eating with a
moooooo mo moo mooooooo moo m moo mooooooo mooo (moo mooooo mooo m

vigorous appetite) he suddenly leaped to his feet, threw out his arms
mooooooo mooooooo) mo mooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo, moooo moo moo mooo

and legs, gave himself a good stretching, yawned a little bit, and then
moo mooo, mooo moooooo m mooo mooooooooo, mooooo m mooooo moo, moo mooo

springing into the head of his hoisted boat, and poising a harpoon,
moooooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo moooooo mooo, moo moooooo m moooooo,

pronounced himself fit for a fight.
mooooooooo moooooo moo moo m moooo.




With a wild whimsiness, he now used his coffin for a sea-chest; and
Mooo m mooo mooooooooo, mo moo mooo moo mooooo moo m moo-moooo; moo

emptying into it his canvas bag of clothes, set them in order there.
mooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo moo mo moooooo, moo mooo mo moooo moooo.

Many spare hours he spent, in carving the lid with all manner of
Mooo moooo moooo mo moooo, mo moooooo moo moo mooo moo mooooo mo

grotesque figures and drawings; and it seemed that hereby he was
moooooooo moooooo moo mooooooo; moo mo mooooo mooo mooooo mo moo

striving, in his rude way, to copy parts of the twisted tattooing on
mooooooo, mo moo mooo moo, mo mooo moooo mo moo moooooo moooooooo mo

his body. And this tattooing had been the work of a departed prophet and
moo mooo. Moo mooo moooooooo moo mooo moo mooo mo m mooooooo moooooo moo

seer of his island, who, by those hieroglyphic marks, had written out on
mooo mo moo mooooo, moo, mo moooo mooooooooooo moooo, moo moooooo moo mo

his body a complete theory of the heavens and the earth, and a mystical
moo mooo m mooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooo moo moo moooo, moo m mooooooo

treatise on the art of attaining truth; so that Queequeg in his own
mooooooo mo moo moo mo moooooooo moooo; mo mooo Mooooooo mo moo moo

proper person was a riddle to unfold; a wondrous work in one volume; but
mooooo mooooo moo m mooooo mo mooooo; m mooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo; moo

whose mysteries not even himself could read, though his own live heart
moooo moooooooo moo mooo moooooo moooo mooo, mooooo moo moo mooo moooo

beat against them; and these mysteries were therefore destined in
mooo moooooo mooo; moo moooo moooooooo mooo moooooooo mooooooo mo

the end to moulder away with the living parchment whereon they were
moo moo mo moooooo mooo mooo moo mooooo moooooooo moooooo mooo mooo

inscribed, and so be unsolved to the last. And this thought it must
moooooooo, moo mo mo mooooooo mo moo mooo. Moo mooo moooooo mo mooo

have been which suggested to Ahab that wild exclamation of his, when
mooo mooo moooo moooooooo mo Mooo mooo mooo moooooooooo mo moo, mooo

one morning turning away from surveying poor Queequeg--"Oh, devilish
moo moooooo moooooo mooo mooo moooooooo mooo Mooooooo--"Mo, mooooooo

tantalization of the gods!"
moooooooooooo mo moo mooo!"










CHAPTER 111. The Pacific.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Moooooo.







When gliding by the Bashee isles we emerged at last upon the great South
Mooo moooooo mo moo Mooooo moooo mo moooooo mo mooo mooo moo moooo Moooo

Sea; were it not for other things, I could have greeted my dear Pacific
Moo; mooo mo moo moo moooo mooooo, M moooo mooo moooooo mo mooo Moooooo

with uncounted thanks, for now the long supplication of my youth was
mooo moooooooo mooooo, moo moo moo mooo mooooooooooo mo mo moooo moo

answered; that serene ocean rolled eastwards from me a thousand leagues
mooooooo; mooo mooooo moooo mooooo moooooooo mooo mo m mooooooo moooooo

of blue.
mo mooo.




There is, one knows not what sweet mystery about this sea, whose gently
Moooo mo, moo moooo moo mooo moooo moooooo moooo mooo moo, moooo mooooo

awful stirrings seem to speak of some hidden soul beneath; like those
moooo moooooooo mooo mo moooo mo mooo mooooo mooo moooooo; mooo moooo

fabled undulations of the Ephesian sod over the buried Evangelist St.
mooooo moooooooooo mo moo Mooooooo moo mooo moo mooooo Mooooooooo Mo.

John. And meet it is, that over these sea-pastures, wide-rolling watery
Mooo. Moo mooo mo mo, mooo mooo moooo moo-mooooooo, mooo-moooooo mooooo

prairies and Potters' Fields of all four continents, the waves should
mooooooo moo Moooooo' Mooooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo, moo moooo mooooo

rise and fall, and ebb and flow unceasingly; for here, millions of mixed
mooo moo mooo, moo moo moo mooo moooooooooo; moo mooo, mooooooo mo moooo

shades and shadows, drowned dreams, somnambulisms, reveries; all that
mooooo moo moooooo, moooooo mooooo, moooooooooooo, mooooooo; moo mooo

we call lives and souls, lie dreaming, dreaming, still; tossing like
mo mooo moooo moo moooo, moo mooooooo, mooooooo, moooo; moooooo mooo

slumberers in their beds; the ever-rolling waves but made so by their
mooooooooo mo moooo mooo; moo mooo-moooooo moooo moo mooo mo mo moooo

restlessness.
mooooooooooo.




To any meditative Magian rover, this serene Pacific, once beheld, must
Mo moo mooooooooo Mooooo moooo, mooo mooooo Moooooo, mooo mooooo, mooo

ever after be the sea of his adoption. It rolls the midmost waters of
mooo moooo mo moo moo mo moo mooooooo. Mo moooo moo moooooo mooooo mo

the world, the Indian ocean and Atlantic being but its arms. The same
moo moooo, moo Mooooo moooo moo Mooooooo moooo moo moo mooo. Moo mooo

waves wash the moles of the new-built Californian towns, but yesterday
moooo mooo moo moooo mo moo moo-moooo Moooooooooo moooo, moo moooooooo

planted by the recentest race of men, and lave the faded but still
moooooo mo moo moooooooo mooo mo moo, moo mooo moo moooo moo moooo

gorgeous skirts of Asiatic lands, older than Abraham; while all between
mooooooo mooooo mo Moooooo moooo, moooo mooo Moooooo; moooo moo moooooo

float milky-ways of coral isles, and low-lying, endless, unknown
moooo moooo-mooo mo moooo moooo, moo moo-moooo, moooooo, moooooo

Archipelagoes, and impenetrable Japans. Thus this mysterious, divine
Moooooooooooo, moo mooooooooooo Mooooo. Mooo mooo mooooooooo, mooooo

Pacific zones the world's whole bulk about; makes all coasts one bay
Moooooo moooo moo moooo'm moooo mooo moooo; moooo moo mooooo moo moo

to it; seems the tide-beating heart of earth. Lifted by those eternal
mo mo; moooo moo mooo-moooooo moooo mo moooo. Mooooo mo moooo moooooo

swells, you needs must own the seductive god, bowing your head to Pan.
mooooo, moo moooo mooo moo moo moooooooo moo, mooooo mooo mooo mo Moo.




But few thoughts of Pan stirred Ahab's brain, as standing like an
Moo moo mooooooo mo Moo moooooo Mooo'm moooo, mo mooooooo mooo mo

iron statue at his accustomed place beside the mizen rigging, with one
mooo mooooo mo moo mooooooooo moooo mooooo moo moooo moooooo, mooo moo

nostril he unthinkingly snuffed the sugary musk from the Bashee isles
moooooo mo mooooooooooo moooooo moo mooooo mooo mooo moo Mooooo moooo

(in whose sweet woods mild lovers must be walking), and with the other
(mo moooo moooo moooo mooo mooooo mooo mo moooooo), moo mooo moo moooo

consciously inhaled the salt breath of the new found sea; that sea in
moooooooooo moooooo moo mooo mooooo mo moo moo moooo moo; mooo moo mo

which the hated White Whale must even then be swimming. Launched at
moooo moo moooo Moooo Moooo mooo mooo mooo mo mooooooo. Mooooooo mo

length upon these almost final waters, and gliding towards the Japanese
mooooo mooo moooo mooooo moooo mooooo, moo moooooo moooooo moo Mooooooo

cruising-ground, the old man's purpose intensified itself. His firm lips
mooooooo-mooooo, moo moo moo'm moooooo moooooooooo mooooo. Moo mooo mooo

met like the lips of a vice; the Delta of his forehead's veins swelled
moo mooo moo mooo mo m mooo; moo Moooo mo moo mooooooo'm moooo moooooo

like overladen brooks; in his very sleep, his ringing cry ran through
mooo moooooooo mooooo; mo moo mooo moooo, moo moooooo moo moo moooooo

the vaulted hull, "Stern all! the White Whale spouts thick blood!"
moo moooooo mooo, "Moooo moo! moo Moooo Moooo mooooo moooo moooo!"










CHAPTER 112. The Blacksmith.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Mooooooooo.







Availing himself of the mild, summer-cool weather that now reigned in
Mooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo, mooooo-mooo moooooo mooo moo moooooo mo

these latitudes, and in preparation for the peculiarly active
moooo moooooooo, moo mo moooooooooo moo moo mooooooooo mooooo

pursuits shortly to be anticipated, Perth, the begrimed, blistered old
mooooooo moooooo mo mo moooooooooo, Moooo, moo mooooooo, moooooooo moo

blacksmith, had not removed his portable forge to the hold again, after
mooooooooo, moo moo moooooo moo mooooooo moooo mo moo mooo moooo, moooo

concluding his contributory work for Ahab's leg, but still retained
mooooooooo moo mooooooooooo mooo moo Mooo'm moo, moo moooo mooooooo

it on deck, fast lashed to ringbolts by the foremast; being now almost
mo mo mooo, mooo mooooo mo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo; moooo moo mooooo

incessantly invoked by the headsmen, and harpooneers, and bowsmen to do
moooooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooooo, moo moooooooooo, moo moooooo mo mo

some little job for them; altering, or repairing, or new shaping their
mooo mooooo moo moo mooo; mooooooo, mo moooooooo, mo moo moooooo moooo

various weapons and boat furniture. Often he would be surrounded by an
moooooo moooooo moo mooo moooooooo. Moooo mo moooo mo mooooooooo mo mo

eager circle, all waiting to be served; holding boat-spades, pike-heads,
moooo mooooo, moo moooooo mo mo mooooo; moooooo mooo-mooooo, mooo-moooo,

harpoons, and lances, and jealously watching his every sooty movement,
mooooooo, moo mooooo, moo moooooooo mooooooo moo moooo moooo mooooooo,

as he toiled. Nevertheless, this old man's was a patient hammer wielded
mo mo mooooo. Mooooooooooo, mooo moo moo'm moo m moooooo mooooo moooooo

by a patient arm. No murmur, no impatience, no petulance did come from
mo m moooooo moo. Mo mooooo, mo mooooooooo, mo moooooooo moo mooo mooo

him. Silent, slow, and solemn; bowing over still further his chronically
moo. Mooooo, mooo, moo mooooo; mooooo mooo moooo moooooo moo moooooooooo

broken back, he toiled away, as if toil were life itself, and the
mooooo mooo, mo mooooo mooo, mo mo mooo mooo mooo mooooo, moo moo

heavy beating of his hammer the heavy beating of his heart. And so it
moooo moooooo mo moo mooooo moo moooo moooooo mo moo moooo. Moo mo mo

was.--Most miserable!
moo.--Mooo moooooooo!




A peculiar walk in this old man, a certain slight but painful appearing
M mooooooo mooo mo mooo moo moo, m moooooo mooooo moo moooooo moooooooo

yawing in his gait, had at an early period of the voyage excited the
mooooo mo moo mooo, moo mo mo moooo mooooo mo moo mooooo moooooo moo

curiosity of the mariners. And to the importunity of their persisted
moooooooo mo moo mooooooo. Moo mo moo moooooooooo mo moooo moooooooo

questionings he had finally given in; and so it came to pass that every
mooooooooooo mo moo moooooo moooo mo; moo mo mo mooo mo mooo mooo moooo

one now knew the shameful story of his wretched fate.
moo moo mooo moo mooooooo moooo mo moo mooooooo mooo.




Belated, and not innocently, one bitter winter's midnight, on the road
Moooooo, moo moo mooooooooo, moo mooooo mooooo'm mooooooo, mo moo mooo

running between two country towns, the blacksmith half-stupidly felt
moooooo moooooo moo moooooo moooo, moo mooooooooo mooo-mooooooo mooo

the deadly numbness stealing over him, and sought refuge in a leaning,
moo mooooo mooooooo mooooooo mooo moo, moo mooooo mooooo mo m moooooo,

dilapidated barn. The issue was, the loss of the extremities of both
moooooooooo mooo. Moo moooo moo, moo mooo mo moo moooooooooo mo mooo

feet. Out of this revelation, part by part, at last came out the four
mooo. Moo mo mooo mooooooooo, mooo mo mooo, mo mooo mooo moo moo mooo

acts of the gladness, and the one long, and as yet uncatastrophied fifth
mooo mo moo mooooooo, moo moo moo mooo, moo mo moo moooooooooooooo moooo

act of the grief of his life's drama.
moo mo moo moooo mo moo mooo'm moooo.




He was an old man, who, at the age of nearly sixty, had postponedly
Mo moo mo moo moo, moo, mo moo moo mo mooooo moooo, moo moooooooooo

encountered that thing in sorrow's technicals called ruin. He had been
moooooooooo mooo moooo mo mooooo'm mooooooooo mooooo mooo. Mo moo mooo

an artisan of famed excellence, and with plenty to do; owned a house
mo moooooo mo moooo mooooooooo, moo mooo mooooo mo mo; moooo m moooo

and garden; embraced a youthful, daughter-like, loving wife, and three
moo mooooo; mooooooo m mooooooo, mooooooo-mooo, mooooo mooo, moo moooo

blithe, ruddy children; every Sunday went to a cheerful-looking church,
mooooo, moooo mooooooo; moooo Mooooo mooo mo m mooooooo-moooooo mooooo,

planted in a grove. But one night, under cover of darkness, and further
moooooo mo m moooo. Moo moo moooo, moooo moooo mo mooooooo, moo moooooo

concealed in a most cunning disguisement, a desperate burglar slid into
moooooooo mo m mooo moooooo mooooooooooo, m moooooooo moooooo mooo mooo

his happy home, and robbed them all of everything. And darker yet to
moo moooo mooo, moo mooooo mooo moo mo mooooooooo. Moo mooooo moo mo

tell, the blacksmith himself did ignorantly conduct this burglar into
mooo, moo mooooooooo moooooo moo mooooooooo moooooo mooo moooooo mooo

his family's heart. It was the Bottle Conjuror! Upon the opening of that
moo mooooo'm moooo. Mo moo moo Mooooo Mooooooo! Mooo moo moooooo mo mooo

fatal cork, forth flew the fiend, and shrivelled up his home. Now, for
moooo mooo, moooo mooo moo moooo, moo mooooooooo mo moo mooo. Moo, moo

prudent, most wise, and economic reasons, the blacksmith's shop was in
moooooo, mooo mooo, moo mooooooo moooooo, moo mooooooooo'm mooo moo mo

the basement of his dwelling, but with a separate entrance to it; so
moo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo, moo mooo m mooooooo mooooooo mo mo; mo

that always had the young and loving healthy wife listened with no
mooo mooooo moo moo moooo moo mooooo moooooo mooo mooooooo mooo mo

unhappy nervousness, but with vigorous pleasure, to the stout ringing of
moooooo moooooooooo, moo mooo mooooooo mooooooo, mo moo moooo moooooo mo

her young-armed old husband's hammer; whose reverberations, muffled by
moo moooo-moooo moo moooooo'm mooooo; moooo mooooooooooooo, moooooo mo

passing through the floors and walls, came up to her, not unsweetly,
moooooo moooooo moo mooooo moo moooo, mooo mo mo moo, moo moooooooo,

in her nursery; and so, to stout Labor's iron lullaby, the blacksmith's
mo moo moooooo; moo mo, mo moooo Moooo'm mooo moooooo, moo mooooooooo'm

infants were rocked to slumber.
moooooo mooo mooooo mo moooooo.




Oh, woe on woe! Oh, Death, why canst thou not sometimes be timely? Hadst
Mo, moo mo moo! Mo, Moooo, moo moooo mooo moo moooooooo mo mooooo? Moooo

thou taken this old blacksmith to thyself ere his full ruin came upon
mooo moooo mooo moo mooooooooo mo moooooo moo moo mooo mooo mooo mooo

him, then had the young widow had a delicious grief, and her orphans a
moo, mooo moo moo moooo moooo moo m moooooooo moooo, moo moo moooooo m

truly venerable, legendary sire to dream of in their after years; and
moooo moooooooo, moooooooo mooo mo moooo mo mo moooo moooo moooo; moo

all of them a care-killing competency. But Death plucked down some
moo mo mooo m mooo-moooooo mooooooooo. Moo Moooo moooooo mooo mooo

virtuous elder brother, on whose whistling daily toil solely hung the
mooooooo moooo moooooo, mo moooo moooooooo moooo mooo mooooo mooo moo

responsibilities of some other family, and left the worse than useless
mooooooooooooooo mo mooo moooo mooooo, moo mooo moo moooo mooo moooooo

old man standing, till the hideous rot of life should make him easier to
moo moo mooooooo, mooo moo moooooo moo mo mooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo mo

harvest.
moooooo.




Why tell the whole? The blows of the basement hammer every day grew more
Moo mooo moo moooo? Moo moooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo moooo moo mooo mooo

and more between; and each blow every day grew fainter than the last;
moo mooo moooooo; moo mooo mooo moooo moo mooo moooooo mooo moo mooo;

the wife sat frozen at the window, with tearless eyes, glitteringly
moo mooo moo mooooo mo moo mooooo, mooo mooooooo mooo, mooooooooooo

gazing into the weeping faces of her children; the bellows fell; the
mooooo mooo moo moooooo moooo mo moo mooooooo; moo moooooo mooo; moo

forge choked up with cinders; the house was sold; the mother dived
moooo mooooo mo mooo moooooo; moo moooo moo mooo; moo mooooo moooo

down into the long church-yard grass; her children twice followed her
mooo mooo moo mooo mooooo-mooo moooo; moo mooooooo moooo mooooooo moo

thither; and the houseless, familyless old man staggered off a vagabond
moooooo; moo moo moooooooo, mooooooooo moo moo moooooooo moo m mooooooo

in crape; his every woe unreverenced; his grey head a scorn to flaxen
mo moooo; moo moooo moo mooooooooooo; moo mooo mooo m moooo mo mooooo

curls!
moooo!




Death seems the only desirable sequel for a career like this; but Death
Moooo moooo moo mooo moooooooo mooooo moo m mooooo mooo mooo; moo Moooo

is only a launching into the region of the strange Untried; it is but
mo mooo m moooooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo Moooooo; mo mo moo

the first salutation to the possibilities of the immense Remote, the
moo moooo mooooooooo mo moo moooooooooooo mo moo moooooo Mooooo, moo

Wild, the Watery, the Unshored; therefore, to the death-longing eyes of
Mooo, moo Mooooo, moo Mooooooo; moooooooo, mo moo moooo-moooooo mooo mo

such men, who still have left in them some interior compunctions against
mooo moo, moo moooo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo mooooooo mooooooooooo moooooo

suicide, does the all-contributed and all-receptive ocean alluringly
moooooo, mooo moo moo-moooooooooo moo moo-moooooooo moooo mooooooooo

spread forth his whole plain of unimaginable, taking terrors, and
mooooo moooo moo moooo moooo mo mooooooooooo, mooooo moooooo, moo

wonderful, new-life adventures; and from the hearts of infinite
moooooooo, moo-mooo mooooooooo; moo mooo moo mooooo mo mooooooo

Pacifics, the thousand mermaids sing to them--"Come hither,
Mooooooo, moo mooooooo mooooooo mooo mo mooo--"Mooo mooooo,

broken-hearted; here is another life without the guilt of intermediate
mooooo-moooooo; mooo mo moooooo mooo moooooo moo moooo mo mooooooooooo

death; here are wonders supernatural, without dying for them. Come
moooo; mooo moo moooooo mooooooooooo, moooooo moooo moo mooo. Mooo

hither! bury thyself in a life which, to your now equally abhorred and
mooooo! mooo moooooo mo m mooo moooo, mo mooo moo moooooo mooooooo moo

abhorring, landed world, is more oblivious than death. Come hither! put
moooooooo, mooooo moooo, mo mooo moooooooo mooo moooo. Mooo mooooo! moo

up THY gravestone, too, within the churchyard, and come hither, till we
mo MOO mooooooooo, moo, mooooo moo mooooooooo, moo mooo mooooo, mooo mo

marry thee!"
moooo mooo!"




Hearkening to these voices, East and West, by early sunrise, and by fall
Mooooooooo mo moooo mooooo, Mooo moo Mooo, mo moooo moooooo, moo mo mooo

of eve, the blacksmith's soul responded, Aye, I come! And so Perth went
mo moo, moo mooooooooo'm mooo moooooooo, Moo, M mooo! Moo mo Moooo mooo

a-whaling.
m-moooooo.










CHAPTER 113. The Forge.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Moooo.







With matted beard, and swathed in a bristling shark-skin apron, about
Mooo mooooo moooo, moo moooooo mo m moooooooo moooo-mooo moooo, moooo

mid-day, Perth was standing between his forge and anvil, the latter
moo-moo, Moooo moo mooooooo moooooo moo moooo moo moooo, moo mooooo

placed upon an iron-wood log, with one hand holding a pike-head in the
mooooo mooo mo mooo-mooo moo, mooo moo mooo moooooo m mooo-mooo mo moo

coals, and with the other at his forge's lungs, when Captain Ahab came
moooo, moo mooo moo moooo mo moo moooo'm moooo, mooo Moooooo Mooo mooo

along, carrying in his hand a small rusty-looking leathern bag. While
moooo, mooooooo mo moo mooo m moooo moooo-moooooo mooooooo moo. Moooo

yet a little distance from the forge, moody Ahab paused; till at last,
moo m mooooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo, moooo Mooo mooooo; mooo mo mooo,

Perth, withdrawing his iron from the fire, began hammering it upon the
Moooo, moooooooooo moo mooo mooo moo mooo, moooo moooooooo mo mooo moo

anvil--the red mass sending off the sparks in thick hovering flights,
moooo--moo moo mooo moooooo moo moo mooooo mo moooo mooooooo moooooo,

some of which flew close to Ahab.
mooo mo moooo mooo moooo mo Mooo.




"Are these thy Mother Carey's chickens, Perth? they are always flying
"Moo moooo moo Mooooo Moooo'm mooooooo, Moooo? mooo moo mooooo mooooo

in thy wake; birds of good omen, too, but not to all;--look here, they
mo moo mooo; moooo mo mooo mooo, moo, moo moo mo moo;--mooo mooo, mooo

burn; but thou--thou liv'st among them without a scorch."
mooo; moo mooo--mooo moo'mo moooo mooo moooooo m mooooo."




"Because I am scorched all over, Captain Ahab," answered Perth, resting
"Moooooo M mo mooooooo moo mooo, Moooooo Mooo," mooooooo Moooo, moooooo

for a moment on his hammer; "I am past scorching; not easily can'st thou
moo m mooooo mo moo mooooo; "M mo mooo moooooooo; moo mooooo moo'mo mooo

scorch a scar."
mooooo m mooo."




"Well, well; no more. Thy shrunk voice sounds too calmly, sanely woeful
"Mooo, mooo; mo mooo. Moo mooooo moooo mooooo moo mooooo, mooooo mooooo

to me. In no Paradise myself, I am impatient of all misery in others
mo mo. Mo mo Mooooooo mooooo, M mo moooooooo mo moo mooooo mo mooooo

that is not mad. Thou should'st go mad, blacksmith; say, why dost thou
mooo mo moo moo. Mooo mooooo'mo mo moo, mooooooooo; moo, moo mooo mooo

not go mad? How can'st thou endure without being mad? Do the heavens yet
moo mo moo? Moo moo'mo mooo mooooo moooooo moooo moo? Mo moo moooooo moo

hate thee, that thou can'st not go mad?--What wert thou making there?"
mooo mooo, mooo mooo moo'mo moo mo moo?--Mooo mooo mooo mooooo moooo?"




"Welding an old pike-head, sir; there were seams and dents in it."
"Moooooo mo moo mooo-mooo, moo; moooo mooo moooo moo moooo mo mo."




"And can'st thou make it all smooth again, blacksmith, after such hard
"Moo moo'mo mooo mooo mo moo mooooo moooo, mooooooooo, moooo mooo mooo

usage as it had?"
moooo mo mo moo?"




"I think so, sir."
"M moooo mo, moo."




"And I suppose thou can'st smoothe almost any seams and dents; never
"Moo M moooooo mooo moo'mo moooooo mooooo moo moooo moo moooo; moooo

mind how hard the metal, blacksmith?"
mooo moo mooo moo moooo, mooooooooo?"




"Aye, sir, I think I can; all seams and dents but one."
"Moo, moo, M moooo M moo; moo moooo moo moooo moo moo."




"Look ye here, then," cried Ahab, passionately advancing, and leaning
"Mooo mo mooo, mooo," moooo Mooo, mooooooooooo moooooooo, moo moooooo

with both hands on Perth's shoulders; "look ye here--HERE--can ye
mooo mooo moooo mo Moooo'm moooooooo; "mooo mo mooo--MOOO--moo mo

smoothe out a seam like this, blacksmith," sweeping one hand across his
moooooo moo m mooo mooo mooo, mooooooooo," mooooooo moo mooo mooooo moo

ribbed brow; "if thou could'st, blacksmith, glad enough would I lay
mooooo mooo; "mo mooo moooo'mo, mooooooooo, mooo mooooo moooo M moo

my head upon thy anvil, and feel thy heaviest hammer between my eyes.
mo mooo mooo moo moooo, moo mooo moo mooooooo mooooo moooooo mo mooo.

Answer! Can'st thou smoothe this seam?"
Mooooo! Moo'mo mooo moooooo mooo mooo?"




"Oh! that is the one, sir! Said I not all seams and dents but one?"
"Mo! mooo mo moo moo, moo! Mooo M moo moo moooo moo moooo moo moo?"




"Aye, blacksmith, it is the one; aye, man, it is unsmoothable; for
"Moo, mooooooooo, mo mo moo moo; moo, moo, mo mo mooooooooooo; moo

though thou only see'st it here in my flesh, it has worked down into the
mooooo mooo mooo moo'mo mo mooo mo mo moooo, mo moo mooooo mooo mooo moo

bone of my skull--THAT is all wrinkles! But, away with child's play; no
mooo mo mo moooo--MOOO mo moo mooooooo! Moo, mooo mooo moooo'm mooo; mo

more gaffs and pikes to-day. Look ye here!" jingling the leathern bag,
mooo moooo moo moooo mo-moo. Mooo mo mooo!" mooooooo moo mooooooo moo,

as if it were full of gold coins. "I, too, want a harpoon made; one that
mo mo mo mooo mooo mo mooo moooo. "M, moo, mooo m moooooo mooo; moo mooo

a thousand yoke of fiends could not part, Perth; something that will
m mooooooo mooo mo mooooo moooo moo mooo, Moooo; moooooooo mooo mooo

stick in a whale like his own fin-bone. There's the stuff," flinging
moooo mo m moooo mooo moo moo moo-mooo. Moooo'm moo moooo," mooooooo

the pouch upon the anvil. "Look ye, blacksmith, these are the gathered
moo moooo mooo moo moooo. "Mooo mo, mooooooooo, moooo moo moo mooooooo

nail-stubbs of the steel shoes of racing horses."
mooo-mooooo mo moo moooo moooo mo mooooo mooooo."




"Horse-shoe stubbs, sir? Why, Captain Ahab, thou hast here, then, the
"Moooo-mooo mooooo, moo? Moo, Moooooo Mooo, mooo mooo mooo, mooo, moo

best and stubbornest stuff we blacksmiths ever work."
mooo moo moooooooooo moooo mo moooooooooo mooo mooo."




"I know it, old man; these stubbs will weld together like glue from the
"M mooo mo, moo moo; moooo mooooo mooo mooo mooooooo mooo mooo mooo moo

melted bones of murderers. Quick! forge me the harpoon. And forge me
mooooo moooo mo moooooooo. Moooo! moooo mo moo moooooo. Moo moooo mo

first, twelve rods for its shank; then wind, and twist, and hammer these
moooo, mooooo mooo moo moo moooo; mooo mooo, moo moooo, moo mooooo moooo

twelve together like the yarns and strands of a tow-line. Quick! I'll
mooooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo moo moooooo mo m moo-mooo. Moooo! M'mo

blow the fire."
mooo moo mooo."




When at last the twelve rods were made, Ahab tried them, one by one, by
Mooo mo mooo moo mooooo mooo mooo mooo, Mooo moooo mooo, moo mo moo, mo

spiralling them, with his own hand, round a long, heavy iron bolt. "A
mooooooooo mooo, mooo moo moo mooo, moooo m mooo, moooo mooo mooo. "M

flaw!" rejecting the last one. "Work that over again, Perth."
mooo!" moooooooo moo mooo moo. "Mooo mooo mooo moooo, Moooo."




This done, Perth was about to begin welding the twelve into one, when
Mooo mooo, Moooo moo moooo mo moooo moooooo moo mooooo mooo moo, mooo

Ahab stayed his hand, and said he would weld his own iron. As, then,
Mooo mooooo moo mooo, moo mooo mo moooo mooo moo moo mooo. Mo, mooo,

with regular, gasping hems, he hammered on the anvil, Perth passing to
mooo moooooo, moooooo mooo, mo mooooooo mo moo moooo, Moooo moooooo mo

him the glowing rods, one after the other, and the hard pressed forge
moo moo moooooo mooo, moo moooo moo moooo, moo moo mooo moooooo moooo

shooting up its intense straight flame, the Parsee passed silently, and
mooooooo mo moo moooooo mooooooo moooo, moo Mooooo mooooo mooooooo, moo

bowing over his head towards the fire, seemed invoking some curse or
mooooo mooo moo mooo moooooo moo mooo, mooooo mooooooo mooo moooo mo

some blessing on the toil. But, as Ahab looked up, he slid aside.
mooo mooooooo mo moo mooo. Moo, mo Mooo mooooo mo, mo mooo moooo.




"What's that bunch of lucifers dodging about there for?" muttered Stubb,
"Mooo'm mooo moooo mo mooooooo moooooo moooo moooo moo?" mooooooo Moooo,

looking on from the forecastle. "That Parsee smells fire like a fusee;
moooooo mo mooo moo mooooooooo. "Mooo Mooooo mooooo mooo mooo m moooo;

and smells of it himself, like a hot musket's powder-pan."
moo mooooo mo mo moooooo, mooo m moo mooooo'm mooooo-moo."




At last the shank, in one complete rod, received its final heat; and as
Mo mooo moo moooo, mo moo mooooooo moo, mooooooo moo moooo mooo; moo mo

Perth, to temper it, plunged it all hissing into the cask of water near
Moooo, mo mooooo mo, moooooo mo moo moooooo mooo moo mooo mo moooo mooo

by, the scalding steam shot up into Ahab's bent face.
mo, moo mooooooo moooo mooo mo mooo Mooo'm mooo mooo.




"Would'st thou brand me, Perth?" wincing for a moment with the pain;
"Moooo'mo mooo moooo mo, Moooo?" moooooo moo m mooooo mooo moo mooo;

"have I been but forging my own branding-iron, then?"
"mooo M mooo moo moooooo mo moo mooooooo-mooo, mooo?"




"Pray God, not that; yet I fear something, Captain Ahab. Is not this
"Mooo Moo, moo mooo; moo M mooo moooooooo, Moooooo Mooo. Mo moo mooo

harpoon for the White Whale?"
moooooo moo moo Moooo Moooo?"




"For the white fiend! But now for the barbs; thou must make them
"Moo moo moooo moooo! Moo moo moo moo moooo; mooo mooo mooo mooo

thyself, man. Here are my razors--the best of steel; here, and make the
moooooo, moo. Mooo moo mo mooooo--moo mooo mo moooo; mooo, moo mooo moo

barbs sharp as the needle-sleet of the Icy Sea."
moooo moooo mo moo mooooo-moooo mo moo Moo Moo."




For a moment, the old blacksmith eyed the razors as though he would fain
Moo m mooooo, moo moo mooooooooo mooo moo mooooo mo mooooo mo moooo mooo

not use them.
moo moo mooo.




"Take them, man, I have no need for them; for I now neither shave, sup,
"Mooo mooo, moo, M mooo mo mooo moo mooo; moo M moo moooooo moooo, moo,

nor pray till--but here--to work!"
moo mooo mooo--moo mooo--mo mooo!"




Fashioned at last into an arrowy shape, and welded by Perth to the
Moooooooo mo mooo mooo mo mooooo moooo, moo mooooo mo Moooo mo moo

shank, the steel soon pointed the end of the iron; and as the blacksmith
moooo, moo moooo mooo moooooo moo moo mo moo mooo; moo mo moo mooooooooo

was about giving the barbs their final heat, prior to tempering them, he
moo moooo mooooo moo moooo moooo moooo mooo, moooo mo moooooooo mooo, mo

cried to Ahab to place the water-cask near.
moooo mo Mooo mo moooo moo moooo-mooo mooo.




"No, no--no water for that; I want it of the true death-temper. Ahoy,
"Mo, mo--mo moooo moo mooo; M mooo mo mo moo mooo moooo-mooooo. Mooo,

there! Tashtego, Queequeg, Daggoo! What say ye, pagans! Will ye give me
moooo! Mooooooo, Mooooooo, Mooooo! Mooo moo mo, mooooo! Mooo mo mooo mo

as much blood as will cover this barb?" holding it high up. A cluster of
mo mooo moooo mo mooo moooo mooo mooo?" moooooo mo mooo mo. M moooooo mo

dark nods replied, Yes. Three punctures were made in the heathen flesh,
mooo mooo moooooo, Moo. Moooo moooooooo mooo mooo mo moo moooooo moooo,

and the White Whale's barbs were then tempered.
moo moo Moooo Moooo'm moooo mooo mooo mooooooo.




"Ego non baptizo te in nomine patris, sed in nomine diaboli!"
"Moo moo moooooo mo mo mooooo mooooo, moo mo mooooo moooooo!"

deliriously howled Ahab, as the malignant iron scorchingly devoured the
moooooooooo mooooo Mooo, mo moo moooooooo mooo moooooooooo mooooooo moo

baptismal blood.
moooooooo moooo.




Now, mustering the spare poles from below, and selecting one of hickory,
Moo, moooooooo moo moooo moooo mooo moooo, moo moooooooo moo mo moooooo,

with the bark still investing it, Ahab fitted the end to the socket of
mooo moo mooo moooo moooooooo mo, Mooo mooooo moo moo mo moo mooooo mo

the iron. A coil of new tow-line was then unwound, and some fathoms of
moo mooo. M mooo mo moo moo-mooo moo mooo moooooo, moo mooo moooooo mo

it taken to the windlass, and stretched to a great tension. Pressing
mo moooo mo moo mooooooo, moo moooooooo mo m moooo moooooo. Mooooooo

his foot upon it, till the rope hummed like a harp-string, then eagerly
moo mooo mooo mo, mooo moo mooo mooooo mooo m mooo-mooooo, mooo moooooo

bending over it, and seeing no strandings, Ahab exclaimed, "Good! and
moooooo mooo mo, moo mooooo mo mooooooooo, Mooo moooooooo, "Mooo! moo

now for the seizings."
moo moo moo mooooooo."




At one extremity the rope was unstranded, and the separate spread yarns
Mo moo moooooooo moo mooo moo mooooooooo, moo moo mooooooo mooooo moooo

were all braided and woven round the socket of the harpoon; the pole
mooo moo moooooo moo moooo moooo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo; moo mooo

was then driven hard up into the socket; from the lower end the rope
moo mooo mooooo mooo mo mooo moo mooooo; mooo moo moooo moo moo mooo

was traced half-way along the pole's length, and firmly secured so, with
moo mooooo mooo-moo moooo moo mooo'm mooooo, moo mooooo moooooo mo, mooo

intertwistings of twine. This done, pole, iron, and rope--like the Three
mooooooooooooo mo moooo. Mooo mooo, mooo, mooo, moo mooo--mooo moo Moooo

Fates--remained inseparable, and Ahab moodily stalked away with the
Moooo--mooooooo moooooooooo, moo Mooo moooooo moooooo mooo mooo moo

weapon; the sound of his ivory leg, and the sound of the hickory pole,
mooooo; moo moooo mo moo moooo moo, moo moo moooo mo moo moooooo mooo,

both hollowly ringing along every plank. But ere he entered his cabin,
mooo mooooooo moooooo moooo moooo moooo. Moo moo mo moooooo moo moooo,

light, unnatural, half-bantering, yet most piteous sound was heard. Oh,
moooo, moooooooo, mooo-moooooooo, moo mooo moooooo moooo moo moooo. Mo,

Pip! thy wretched laugh, thy idle but unresting eye; all thy strange
Moo! moo mooooooo moooo, moo mooo moo moooooooo moo; moo moo moooooo

mummeries not unmeaningly blended with the black tragedy of the
moooooooo moo moooooooooo moooooo mooo moo moooo moooooo mo moo

melancholy ship, and mocked it!
mooooooooo mooo, moo mooooo mo!










CHAPTER 114. The Gilder.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Mooooo.







Penetrating further and further into the heart of the Japanese cruising
Moooooooooo moooooo moo moooooo mooo moo moooo mo moo Mooooooo mooooooo

ground, the Pequod was soon all astir in the fishery. Often, in mild,
mooooo, moo Mooooo moo mooo moo moooo mo moo moooooo. Moooo, mo mooo,

pleasant weather, for twelve, fifteen, eighteen, and twenty hours on the
mooooooo moooooo, moo mooooo, moooooo, mooooooo, moo mooooo moooo mo moo

stretch, they were engaged in the boats, steadily pulling, or sailing,
moooooo, mooo mooo moooooo mo moo moooo, mooooooo moooooo, mo moooooo,

or paddling after the whales, or for an interlude of sixty or seventy
mo mooooooo moooo moo mooooo, mo moo mo moooooooo mo moooo mo moooooo

minutes calmly awaiting their uprising; though with but small success
moooooo mooooo mooooooo moooo mooooooo; mooooo mooo moo moooo moooooo

for their pains.
moo moooo moooo.




At such times, under an abated sun; afloat all day upon smooth, slow
Mo mooo moooo, moooo mo mooooo moo; mooooo moo moo mooo mooooo, mooo

heaving swells; seated in his boat, light as a birch canoe; and so
moooooo mooooo; mooooo mo moo mooo, moooo mo m moooo moooo; moo mo

sociably mixing with the soft waves themselves, that like hearth-stone
mooooooo mooooo mooo moo mooo moooo mooooooooo, mooo mooo mooooo-moooo

cats they purr against the gunwale; these are the times of dreamy
mooo mooo mooo moooooo moo moooooo; moooo moo moo moooo mo mooooo

quietude, when beholding the tranquil beauty and brilliancy of the
mooooooo, mooo moooooooo moo mooooooo mooooo moo mooooooooo mo moo

ocean's skin, one forgets the tiger heart that pants beneath it; and
moooo'm mooo, moo moooooo moo moooo moooo mooo moooo moooooo mo; moo

would not willingly remember, that this velvet paw but conceals a
moooo moo moooooooo mooooooo, mooo mooo mooooo moo moo mooooooo m

remorseless fang.
moooooooooo mooo.




These are the times, when in his whale-boat the rover softly feels a
Moooo moo moo moooo, mooo mo moo moooo-mooo moo moooo mooooo moooo m

certain filial, confident, land-like feeling towards the sea; that he
moooooo mooooo, moooooooo, mooo-mooo moooooo moooooo moo moo; mooo mo

regards it as so much flowery earth; and the distant ship revealing
moooooo mo mo mo mooo moooooo moooo; moo moo moooooo mooo moooooooo

only the tops of her masts, seems struggling forward, not through high
mooo moo mooo mo moo moooo, moooo mooooooooo moooooo, moo moooooo mooo

rolling waves, but through the tall grass of a rolling prairie: as when
moooooo moooo, moo moooooo moo mooo moooo mo m moooooo moooooo: mo mooo

the western emigrants' horses only show their erected ears, while their
moo moooooo moooooooo' mooooo mooo mooo moooo moooooo mooo, moooo moooo

hidden bodies widely wade through the amazing verdure.
mooooo mooooo mooooo mooo moooooo moo moooooo moooooo.




The long-drawn virgin vales; the mild blue hill-sides; as over these
Moo mooo-moooo mooooo moooo; moo mooo mooo mooo-moooo; mo mooo moooo

there steals the hush, the hum; you almost swear that play-wearied
moooo mooooo moo mooo, moo moo; moo mooooo moooo mooo mooo-moooooo

children lie sleeping in these solitudes, in some glad May-time, when
mooooooo moo mooooooo mo moooo moooooooo, mo mooo mooo Moo-mooo, mooo

the flowers of the woods are plucked. And all this mixes with your most
moo moooooo mo moo moooo moo moooooo. Moo moo mooo moooo mooo mooo mooo

mystic mood; so that fact and fancy, half-way meeting, interpenetrate,
mooooo mooo; mo mooo mooo moo moooo, mooo-moo moooooo, mooooooooooooo,

and form one seamless whole.
moo mooo moo mooooooo moooo.




Nor did such soothing scenes, however temporary, fail of at least as
Moo moo mooo mooooooo mooooo, moooooo moooooooo, mooo mo mo moooo mo

temporary an effect on Ahab. But if these secret golden keys did seem
moooooooo mo mooooo mo Mooo. Moo mo moooo mooooo mooooo mooo moo mooo

to open in him his own secret golden treasuries, yet did his breath upon
mo mooo mo moo moo moo mooooo mooooo mooooooooo, moo moo moo mooooo mooo

them prove but tarnishing.
mooo moooo moo mooooooooo.




Oh, grassy glades! oh, ever vernal endless landscapes in the soul; in
Mo, mooooo mooooo! mo, mooo mooooo moooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooo; mo

ye,--though long parched by the dead drought of the earthy life,--in ye,
mo,--mooooo mooo moooooo mo moo mooo moooooo mo moo mooooo mooo,--mo mo,

men yet may roll, like young horses in new morning clover; and for some
moo moo moo mooo, mooo moooo mooooo mo moo moooooo mooooo; moo moo mooo

few fleeting moments, feel the cool dew of the life immortal on them.
moo mooooooo moooooo, mooo moo mooo moo mo moo mooo mooooooo mo mooo.

Would to God these blessed calms would last. But the mingled, mingling
Moooo mo Moo moooo moooooo moooo moooo mooo. Moo moo moooooo, mooooooo

threads of life are woven by warp and woof: calms crossed by storms, a
moooooo mo mooo moo moooo mo mooo moo mooo: moooo moooooo mo mooooo, m

storm for every calm. There is no steady unretracing progress in this
moooo moo moooo mooo. Moooo mo mo mooooo moooooooooo mooooooo mo mooo

life; we do not advance through fixed gradations, and at the last one
mooo; mo mo moo moooooo moooooo moooo mooooooooo, moo mo moo mooo moo

pause:--through infancy's unconscious spell, boyhood's thoughtless
moooo:--moooooo moooooo'm moooooooooo moooo, moooooo'm moooooooooo

faith, adolescence' doubt (the common doom), then scepticism, then
moooo, moooooooooo' moooo (moo mooooo mooo), mooo mooooooooo, mooo

disbelief, resting at last in manhood's pondering repose of If. But once
moooooooo, moooooo mo mooo mo moooooo'm moooooooo mooooo mo Mo. Moo mooo

gone through, we trace the round again; and are infants, boys, and men,
mooo moooooo, mo moooo moo moooo moooo; moo moo moooooo, mooo, moo moo,

and Ifs eternally. Where lies the final harbor, whence we unmoor no
moo Moo moooooooo. Moooo mooo moo moooo mooooo, mooooo mo mooooo mo

more? In what rapt ether sails the world, of which the weariest will
mooo? Mo mooo mooo moooo moooo moo moooo, mo moooo moo mooooooo mooo

never weary? Where is the foundling's father hidden? Our souls are like
moooo moooo? Moooo mo moo moooooooo'm mooooo mooooo? Moo moooo moo mooo

those orphans whose unwedded mothers die in bearing them: the secret of
moooo moooooo moooo mooooooo moooooo moo mo moooooo mooo: moo mooooo mo

our paternity lies in their grave, and we must there to learn it.
moo moooooooo mooo mo moooo moooo, moo mo mooo moooo mo moooo mo.




And that same day, too, gazing far down from his boat's side into that
Moo mooo mooo moo, moo, mooooo moo mooo mooo moo mooo'm mooo mooo mooo

same golden sea, Starbuck lowly murmured:--
mooo mooooo moo, Mooooooo moooo mooooooo:--




"Loveliness unfathomable, as ever lover saw in his young bride's
"Mooooooooo mooooooooooo, mo mooo moooo moo mo moo moooo moooo'm

eye!--Tell me not of thy teeth-tiered sharks, and thy kidnapping
moo!--Mooo mo moo mo moo moooo-mooooo mooooo, moo moo mooooooooo

cannibal ways. Let faith oust fact; let fancy oust memory; I look deep
mooooooo mooo. Moo moooo mooo mooo; moo moooo mooo mooooo; M mooo mooo

down and do believe."
mooo moo mo moooooo."




And Stubb, fish-like, with sparkling scales, leaped up in that same
Moo Moooo, mooo-mooo, mooo moooooooo mooooo, mooooo mo mo mooo mooo

golden light:--
mooooo moooo:--




"I am Stubb, and Stubb has his history; but here Stubb takes oaths that
"M mo Moooo, moo Moooo moo moo moooooo; moo mooo Moooo moooo moooo mooo

he has always been jolly!"
mo moo mooooo mooo moooo!"










CHAPTER 115. The Pequod Meets The Bachelor.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Mooooo Moooo Moo Mooooooo.







And jolly enough were the sights and the sounds that came bearing down
Moo moooo mooooo mooo moo mooooo moo moo mooooo mooo mooo moooooo mooo

before the wind, some few weeks after Ahab's harpoon had been welded.
mooooo moo mooo, mooo moo moooo moooo Mooo'm moooooo moo mooo mooooo.




It was a Nantucket ship, the Bachelor, which had just wedged in her
Mo moo m Moooooooo mooo, moo Mooooooo, moooo moo mooo mooooo mo moo

last cask of oil, and bolted down her bursting hatches; and now, in glad
mooo mooo mo moo, moo mooooo mooo moo mooooooo moooooo; moo moo, mo mooo

holiday apparel, was joyously, though somewhat vain-gloriously, sailing
moooooo moooooo, moo mooooooo, mooooo mooooooo mooo-mooooooooo, moooooo

round among the widely-separated ships on the ground, previous to
moooo moooo moo mooooo-moooooooo moooo mo moo mooooo, mooooooo mo

pointing her prow for home.
mooooooo moo mooo moo mooo.




The three men at her mast-head wore long streamers of narrow red bunting
Moo moooo moo mo moo mooo-mooo mooo mooo moooooooo mo mooooo moo moooooo

at their hats; from the stern, a whale-boat was suspended, bottom down;
mo moooo mooo; mooo moo moooo, m moooo-mooo moo moooooooo, mooooo mooo;

and hanging captive from the bowsprit was seen the long lower jaw of the
moo moooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo moo mooo moo mooo moooo moo mo moo

last whale they had slain. Signals, ensigns, and jacks of all colours
mooo moooo mooo moo moooo. Moooooo, moooooo, moo moooo mo moo moooooo

were flying from her rigging, on every side. Sideways lashed in each of
mooo mooooo mooo moo moooooo, mo moooo mooo. Mooooooo mooooo mo mooo mo

her three basketed tops were two barrels of sperm; above which, in her
moo moooo mooooooo mooo mooo moo moooooo mo moooo; moooo moooo, mo moo

top-mast cross-trees, you saw slender breakers of the same precious
moo-mooo moooo-moooo, moo moo moooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo

fluid; and nailed to her main truck was a brazen lamp.
moooo; moo mooooo mo moo mooo moooo moo m mooooo mooo.




As was afterwards learned, the Bachelor had met with the most surprising
Mo moo mooooooooo moooooo, moo Mooooooo moo moo mooo moo mooo mooooooooo

success; all the more wonderful, for that while cruising in the same
moooooo; moo moo mooo moooooooo, moo mooo moooo mooooooo mo moo mooo

seas numerous other vessels had gone entire months without securing a
mooo mooooooo moooo moooooo moo mooo mooooo mooooo moooooo mooooooo m

single fish. Not only had barrels of beef and bread been given away to
mooooo mooo. Moo mooo moo moooooo mo mooo moo moooo mooo moooo mooo mo

make room for the far more valuable sperm, but additional supplemental
mooo mooo moo moo moo mooo mooooooo moooo, moo mooooooooo mooooooooooo

casks had been bartered for, from the ships she had met; and these were
moooo moo mooo mooooooo moo, mooo moo moooo moo moo moo; moo moooo mooo

stowed along the deck, and in the captain's and officers' state-rooms.
mooooo moooo moo mooo, moo mo moo moooooo'm moo mooooooo' moooo-moooo.

Even the cabin table itself had been knocked into kindling-wood; and the
Mooo moo moooo moooo mooooo moo mooo moooooo mooo mooooooo-mooo; moo moo

cabin mess dined off the broad head of an oil-butt, lashed down to the
moooo mooo moooo moo moo moooo mooo mo mo moo-mooo, mooooo mooo mo moo

floor for a centrepiece. In the forecastle, the sailors had actually
moooo moo m moooooooooo. Mo moo mooooooooo, moo moooooo moo mooooooo

caulked and pitched their chests, and filled them; it was humorously
moooooo moo moooooo moooo mooooo, moo mooooo mooo; mo moo mooooooooo

added, that the cook had clapped a head on his largest boiler, and
moooo, mooo moo mooo moo moooooo m mooo mo moo moooooo mooooo, moo

filled it; that the steward had plugged his spare coffee-pot and filled
mooooo mo; mooo moo moooooo moo moooooo moo moooo mooooo-moo moo mooooo

it; that the harpooneers had headed the sockets of their irons and
mo; mooo moo moooooooooo moo mooooo moo moooooo mo moooo moooo moo

filled them; that indeed everything was filled with sperm, except the
mooooo mooo; mooo mooooo mooooooooo moo mooooo mooo moooo, mooooo moo

captain's pantaloons pockets, and those he reserved to thrust his hands
moooooo'm mooooooooo moooooo, moo moooo mo mooooooo mo mooooo moo moooo

into, in self-complacent testimony of his entire satisfaction.
mooo, mo mooo-mooooooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooooo.




As this glad ship of good luck bore down upon the moody Pequod, the
Mo mooo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo mooo mooo mooo moo moooo Mooooo, moo

barbarian sound of enormous drums came from her forecastle; and drawing
moooooooo moooo mo mooooooo moooo mooo mooo moo mooooooooo; moo moooooo

still nearer, a crowd of her men were seen standing round her huge
moooo mooooo, m moooo mo moo moo mooo mooo mooooooo moooo moo mooo

try-pots, which, covered with the parchment-like POKE or stomach skin of
moo-mooo, moooo, moooooo mooo moo moooooooo-mooo MOOO mo moooooo mooo mo

the black fish, gave forth a loud roar to every stroke of the clenched
moo moooo mooo, mooo moooo m mooo mooo mo moooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo

hands of the crew. On the quarter-deck, the mates and harpooneers were
moooo mo moo mooo. Mo moo moooooo-mooo, moo moooo moo moooooooooo mooo

dancing with the olive-hued girls who had eloped with them from the
moooooo mooo moo moooo-mooo moooo moo moo mooooo mooo mooo mooo moo

Polynesian Isles; while suspended in an ornamented boat, firmly secured
Mooooooooo Moooo; moooo moooooooo mo mo mooooooooo mooo, mooooo moooooo

aloft between the foremast and mainmast, three Long Island negroes, with
moooo moooooo moo mooooooo moo mooooooo, moooo Mooo Mooooo moooooo, mooo

glittering fiddle-bows of whale ivory, were presiding over the hilarious
mooooooooo mooooo-mooo mo moooo moooo, mooo moooooooo mooo moo moooooooo

jig. Meanwhile, others of the ship's company were tumultuously busy at
moo. Moooooooo, mooooo mo moo mooo'm moooooo mooo mooooooooooo mooo mo

the masonry of the try-works, from which the huge pots had been
moo moooooo mo moo moo-moooo, mooo moooo moo mooo mooo moo mooo

removed. You would have almost thought they were pulling down the cursed
moooooo. Moo moooo mooo mooooo moooooo mooo mooo moooooo mooo moo mooooo

Bastille, such wild cries they raised, as the now useless brick and
Mooooooo, mooo mooo moooo mooo mooooo, mo moo moo moooooo moooo moo

mortar were being hurled into the sea.
mooooo mooo moooo mooooo mooo moo moo.




Lord and master over all this scene, the captain stood erect on the
Mooo moo mooooo mooo moo mooo moooo, moo moooooo moooo moooo mo moo

ship's elevated quarter-deck, so that the whole rejoicing drama was
mooo'm mooooooo moooooo-mooo, mo mooo moo moooo moooooooo moooo moo

full before him, and seemed merely contrived for his own individual
mooo mooooo moo, moo mooooo mooooo moooooooo moo moo moo mooooooooo

diversion.
moooooooo.




And Ahab, he too was standing on his quarter-deck, shaggy and black,
Moo Mooo, mo moo moo mooooooo mo moo moooooo-mooo, mooooo moo moooo,

with a stubborn gloom; and as the two ships crossed each other's
mooo m mooooooo moooo; moo mo moo moo moooo moooooo mooo moooo'm

wakes--one all jubilations for things passed, the other all forebodings
moooo--moo moo moooooooooo moo mooooo mooooo, moo moooo moo moooooooooo

as to things to come--their two captains in themselves impersonated the
mo mo mooooo mo mooo--moooo moo mooooooo mo mooooooooo mooooooooooo moo

whole striking contrast of the scene.
moooo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo.




"Come aboard, come aboard!" cried the gay Bachelor's commander, lifting
"Mooo mooooo, mooo mooooo!" moooo moo moo Mooooooo'm moooooooo, moooooo

a glass and a bottle in the air.
m moooo moo m mooooo mo moo moo.




"Hast seen the White Whale?" gritted Ahab in reply.
"Mooo mooo moo Moooo Moooo?" moooooo Mooo mo moooo.




"No; only heard of him; but don't believe in him at all," said the other
"Mo; mooo moooo mo moo; moo moo'm moooooo mo moo mo moo," mooo moo moooo

good-humoredly. "Come aboard!"
mooo-moooooooo. "Mooo mooooo!"




"Thou art too damned jolly. Sail on. Hast lost any men?"
"Mooo moo moo mooooo moooo. Mooo mo. Mooo mooo moo moo?"




"Not enough to speak of--two islanders, that's all;--but come aboard,
"Moo mooooo mo moooo mo--moo moooooooo, mooo'm moo;--moo mooo mooooo,

old hearty, come along. I'll soon take that black from your brow. Come
moo mooooo, mooo moooo. M'mo mooo mooo mooo moooo mooo mooo mooo. Mooo

along, will ye (merry's the play); a full ship and homeward-bound."
moooo, mooo mo (moooo'm moo mooo); m mooo mooo moo mooooooo-moooo."




"How wondrous familiar is a fool!" muttered Ahab; then aloud, "Thou art
"Moo mooooooo mooooooo mo m mooo!" mooooooo Mooo; mooo moooo, "Mooo moo

a full ship and homeward bound, thou sayst; well, then, call me an empty
m mooo mooo moo mooooooo moooo, mooo moooo; mooo, mooo, mooo mo mo moooo

ship, and outward-bound. So go thy ways, and I will mine. Forward there!
mooo, moo moooooo-moooo. Mo mo moo mooo, moo M mooo mooo. Moooooo moooo!

Set all sail, and keep her to the wind!"
Moo moo mooo, moo mooo moo mo moo mooo!"




And thus, while the one ship went cheerily before the breeze, the other
Moo mooo, moooo moo moo mooo mooo mooooooo mooooo moo mooooo, moo moooo

stubbornly fought against it; and so the two vessels parted; the crew
mooooooooo mooooo moooooo mo; moo mo moo moo moooooo mooooo; moo mooo

of the Pequod looking with grave, lingering glances towards the receding
mo moo Mooooo moooooo mooo moooo, moooooooo moooooo moooooo moo mooooooo

Bachelor; but the Bachelor's men never heeding their gaze for the lively
Mooooooo; moo moo Mooooooo'm moo moooo moooooo moooo mooo moo moo mooooo

revelry they were in. And as Ahab, leaning over the taffrail, eyed the
moooooo mooo mooo mo. Moo mo Mooo, moooooo mooo moo mooooooo, mooo moo

homewardbound craft, he took from his pocket a small vial of sand, and
moooooooooooo moooo, mo mooo mooo moo mooooo m moooo mooo mo mooo, moo

then looking from the ship to the vial, seemed thereby bringing two
mooo moooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo, mooooo moooooo mooooooo moo
