mooooo mooooooooooo mooooooo, moo mooo mooo moo mooooo mooo Moooooooo

soundings.
moooooooo.










CHAPTER 116. The Dying Whale.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Moooo Moooo.







Not seldom in this life, when, on the right side, fortune's favourites
Moo mooooo mo mooo mooo, mooo, mo moo moooo mooo, moooooo'm mooooooooo

sail close by us, we, though all adroop before, catch somewhat of the
mooo moooo mo mo, mo, mooooo moo mooooo mooooo, moooo mooooooo mo moo

rushing breeze, and joyfully feel our bagging sails fill out. So seemed
moooooo mooooo, moo mooooooo mooo moo moooooo moooo mooo moo. Mo mooooo

it with the Pequod. For next day after encountering the gay Bachelor,
mo mooo moo Mooooo. Moo mooo moo moooo mooooooooooo moo moo Mooooooo,

whales were seen and four were slain; and one of them by Ahab.
mooooo mooo mooo moo mooo mooo moooo; moo moo mo mooo mo Mooo.




It was far down the afternoon; and when all the spearings of the crimson
Mo moo moo mooo moo moooooooo; moo mooo moo moo moooooooo mo moo moooooo

fight were done: and floating in the lovely sunset sea and sky, sun
moooo mooo mooo: moo mooooooo mo moo mooooo mooooo moo moo moo, moo

and whale both stilly died together; then, such a sweetness and such
moo moooo mooo mooooo mooo mooooooo; mooo, mooo m moooooooo moo mooo

plaintiveness, such inwreathing orisons curled up in that rosy air, that
moooooooooooo, mooo moooooooooo moooooo mooooo mo mo mooo mooo moo, mooo

it almost seemed as if far over from the deep green convent valleys of
mo mooooo mooooo mo mo moo mooo mooo moo mooo moooo moooooo moooooo mo

the Manilla isles, the Spanish land-breeze, wantonly turned sailor, had
moo Moooooo moooo, moo Moooooo mooo-mooooo, mooooooo mooooo mooooo, moo

gone to sea, freighted with these vesper hymns.
mooo mo moo, moooooooo mooo moooo mooooo moooo.




Soothed again, but only soothed to deeper gloom, Ahab, who had sterned
Moooooo moooo, moo mooo moooooo mo mooooo moooo, Mooo, moo moo moooooo

off from the whale, sat intently watching his final wanings from the now
moo mooo moo moooo, moo mooooooo mooooooo moo moooo moooooo mooo moo moo

tranquil boat. For that strange spectacle observable in all sperm whales
mooooooo mooo. Moo mooo moooooo moooooooo mooooooooo mo moo moooo mooooo

dying--the turning sunwards of the head, and so expiring--that strange
moooo--moo moooooo mooooooo mo moo mooo, moo mo mooooooo--mooo moooooo

spectacle, beheld of such a placid evening, somehow to Ahab conveyed a
moooooooo, mooooo mo mooo m mooooo moooooo, moooooo mo Mooo mooooooo m

wondrousness unknown before.
mooooooooooo moooooo mooooo.




"He turns and turns him to it,--how slowly, but how steadfastly, his
"Mo moooo moo moooo moo mo mo,--moo mooooo, moo moo moooooooooo, moo

homage-rendering and invoking brow, with his last dying motions. He too
mooooo-moooooooo moo mooooooo mooo, mooo moo mooo moooo moooooo. Mo moo

worships fire; most faithful, broad, baronial vassal of the sun!--Oh
mooooooo mooo; mooo mooooooo, moooo, mooooooo mooooo mo moo moo!--Mo

that these too-favouring eyes should see these too-favouring sights.
mooo moooo moo-moooooooo mooo mooooo moo moooo moo-moooooooo mooooo.

Look! here, far water-locked; beyond all hum of human weal or woe;
Mooo! mooo, moo moooo-mooooo; mooooo moo moo mo moooo mooo mo moo;

in these most candid and impartial seas; where to traditions no rocks
mo moooo mooo mooooo moo moooooooo mooo; moooo mo mooooooooo mo moooo

furnish tablets; where for long Chinese ages, the billows have still
moooooo moooooo; moooo moo mooo Moooooo mooo, moo moooooo mooo moooo

rolled on speechless and unspoken to, as stars that shine upon the
mooooo mo mooooooooo moo mooooooo mo, mo moooo mooo moooo mooo moo

Niger's unknown source; here, too, life dies sunwards full of faith; but
Moooo'm moooooo mooooo; mooo, moo, mooo mooo mooooooo mooo mo moooo; moo

see! no sooner dead, than death whirls round the corpse, and it heads
moo! mo mooooo mooo, mooo moooo mooooo moooo moo mooooo, moo mo moooo

some other way.
mooo moooo moo.




"Oh, thou dark Hindoo half of nature, who of drowned bones hast builded
"Mo, mooo mooo Mooooo mooo mo mooooo, moo mo moooooo moooo mooo moooooo

thy separate throne somewhere in the heart of these unverdured seas;
moo mooooooo mooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo mo moooo mooooooooo mooo;

thou art an infidel, thou queen, and too truly speakest to me in the
mooo moo mo moooooo, mooo moooo, moo moo moooo mooooooo mo mo mo moo

wide-slaughtering Typhoon, and the hushed burial of its after calm. Nor
mooo-mooooooooooo Moooooo, moo moo mooooo mooooo mo moo moooo mooo. Moo

has this thy whale sunwards turned his dying head, and then gone round
moo mooo moo moooo mooooooo mooooo moo moooo mooo, moo mooo mooo moooo

again, without a lesson to me.
moooo, moooooo m mooooo mo mo.




"Oh, trebly hooped and welded hip of power! Oh, high aspiring, rainbowed
"Mo, mooooo mooooo moo mooooo moo mo moooo! Mo, mooo mooooooo, moooooooo

jet!--that one strivest, this one jettest all in vain! In vain, oh
moo!--mooo moo mooooooo, mooo moo moooooo moo mo mooo! Mo mooo, mo

whale, dost thou seek intercedings with yon all-quickening sun, that
moooo, mooo mooo mooo mooooooooooo mooo moo moo-mooooooooo moo, mooo

only calls forth life, but gives it not again. Yet dost thou, darker
mooo moooo moooo mooo, moo moooo mo moo moooo. Moo mooo mooo, mooooo

half, rock me with a prouder, if a darker faith. All thy unnamable
mooo, mooo mo mooo m moooooo, mo m mooooo moooo. Moo moo moooooooo

imminglings float beneath me here; I am buoyed by breaths of once living
moooooooooo moooo moooooo mo mooo; M mo mooooo mo moooooo mo mooo mooooo

things, exhaled as air, but water now.
mooooo, moooooo mo moo, moo moooo moo.




"Then hail, for ever hail, O sea, in whose eternal tossings the wild
"Mooo mooo, moo mooo mooo, M moo, mo moooo moooooo mooooooo moo mooo

fowl finds his only rest. Born of earth, yet suckled by the sea; though
mooo moooo moo mooo mooo. Mooo mo moooo, moo moooooo mo moo moo; mooooo

hill and valley mothered me, ye billows are my foster-brothers!"
mooo moo mooooo mooooooo mo, mo moooooo moo mo mooooo-mooooooo!"










CHAPTER 117. The Whale Watch.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Moooo Moooo.







The four whales slain that evening had died wide apart; one, far to
Moo mooo mooooo moooo mooo moooooo moo mooo mooo moooo; moo, moo mo

windward; one, less distant, to leeward; one ahead; one astern. These
mooooooo; moo, mooo moooooo, mo moooooo; moo moooo; moo mooooo. Moooo

last three were brought alongside ere nightfall; but the windward one
mooo moooo mooo moooooo moooooooo moo moooooooo; moo moo mooooooo moo

could not be reached till morning; and the boat that had killed it lay
moooo moo mo moooooo mooo moooooo; moo moo mooo mooo moo mooooo mo moo

by its side all night; and that boat was Ahab's.
mo moo mooo moo moooo; moo mooo mooo moo Mooo'm.




The waif-pole was thrust upright into the dead whale's spout-hole; and
Moo mooo-mooo moo mooooo moooooo mooo moo mooo moooo'm moooo-mooo; moo

the lantern hanging from its top, cast a troubled flickering glare
moo moooooo moooooo mooo moo moo, mooo m mooooooo mooooooooo moooo

upon the black, glossy back, and far out upon the midnight waves, which
mooo moo moooo, mooooo mooo, moo moo moo mooo moo mooooooo moooo, moooo

gently chafed the whale's broad flank, like soft surf upon a beach.
mooooo mooooo moo moooo'm moooo moooo, mooo mooo mooo mooo m moooo.




Ahab and all his boat's crew seemed asleep but the Parsee; who crouching
Mooo moo moo moo mooo'm mooo mooooo mooooo moo moo Mooooo; moo moooooooo

in the bow, sat watching the sharks, that spectrally played round the
mo moo moo, moo mooooooo moo mooooo, mooo mooooooooo mooooo moooo moo

whale, and tapped the light cedar planks with their tails. A sound
moooo, moo mooooo moo moooo moooo mooooo mooo moooo moooo. M moooo

like the moaning in squadrons over Asphaltites of unforgiven ghosts of
mooo moo moooooo mo moooooooo mooo Moooooooooo mo mooooooooo mooooo mo

Gomorrah, ran shuddering through the air.
Mooooooo, moo mooooooooo moooooo moo moo.




Started from his slumbers, Ahab, face to face, saw the Parsee; and
Moooooo mooo moo mooooooo, Mooo, mooo mo mooo, moo moo Mooooo; moo

hooped round by the gloom of the night they seemed the last men in a
mooooo moooo mo moo moooo mo moo moooo mooo mooooo moo mooo moo mo m

flooded world. "I have dreamed it again," said he.
moooooo moooo. "M mooo moooooo mo moooo," mooo mo.




"Of the hearses? Have I not said, old man, that neither hearse nor
"Mo moo moooooo? Mooo M moo mooo, moo moo, mooo moooooo mooooo moo

coffin can be thine?"
mooooo moo mo moooo?"




"And who are hearsed that die on the sea?"
"Moo moo moo moooooo mooo moo mo moo moo?"




"But I said, old man, that ere thou couldst die on this voyage, two
"Moo M mooo, moo moo, mooo moo mooo moooooo moo mo mooo mooooo, moo

hearses must verily be seen by thee on the sea; the first not made by
moooooo mooo mooooo mo mooo mo mooo mo moo moo; moo moooo moo mooo mo

mortal hands; and the visible wood of the last one must be grown in
mooooo moooo; moo moo moooooo mooo mo moo mooo moo mooo mo moooo mo

America."
Moooooo."




"Aye, aye! a strange sight that, Parsee:--a hearse and its plumes
"Moo, moo! m moooooo moooo mooo, Mooooo:--m mooooo moo moo mooooo

floating over the ocean with the waves for the pall-bearers. Ha! Such a
mooooooo mooo moo moooo mooo moo moooo moo moo mooo-moooooo. Mo! Mooo m

sight we shall not soon see."
moooo mo moooo moo mooo moo."




"Believe it or not, thou canst not die till it be seen, old man."
"Moooooo mo mo moo, mooo moooo moo moo mooo mo mo mooo, moo moo."




"And what was that saying about thyself?"
"Moo mooo moo mooo mooooo moooo moooooo?"




"Though it come to the last, I shall still go before thee thy pilot."
"Mooooo mo mooo mo moo mooo, M moooo moooo mo mooooo mooo moo moooo."




"And when thou art so gone before--if that ever befall--then ere I can
"Moo mooo mooo moo mo mooo mooooo--mo mooo mooo mooooo--mooo moo M moo

follow, thou must still appear to me, to pilot me still?--Was it not
mooooo, mooo mooo moooo mooooo mo mo, mo moooo mo moooo?--Moo mo moo

so? Well, then, did I believe all ye say, oh my pilot! I have here two
mo? Mooo, mooo, moo M moooooo moo mo moo, mo mo moooo! M mooo mooo moo

pledges that I shall yet slay Moby Dick and survive it."
moooooo mooo M moooo moo mooo Mooo Mooo moo moooooo mo."




"Take another pledge, old man," said the Parsee, as his eyes lighted up
"Mooo moooooo mooooo, moo moo," mooo moo Mooooo, mo moo mooo moooooo mo

like fire-flies in the gloom--"Hemp only can kill thee."
mooo mooo-moooo mo moo moooo--"Mooo mooo moo mooo mooo."




"The gallows, ye mean.--I am immortal then, on land and on sea," cried
"Moo moooooo, mo mooo.--M mo mooooooo mooo, mo mooo moo mo moo," moooo

Ahab, with a laugh of derision;--"Immortal on land and on sea!"
Mooo, mooo m moooo mo mooooooo;--"Mooooooo mo mooo moo mo moo!"




Both were silent again, as one man. The grey dawn came on, and the
Mooo mooo mooooo moooo, mo moo moo. Moo mooo mooo mooo mo, moo moo

slumbering crew arose from the boat's bottom, and ere noon the dead
mooooooooo mooo moooo mooo moo mooo'm mooooo, moo moo mooo moo mooo

whale was brought to the ship.
moooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo.










CHAPTER 118. The Quadrant.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Mooooooo.







The season for the Line at length drew near; and every day when Ahab,
Moo mooooo moo moo Mooo mo mooooo mooo mooo; moo moooo moo mooo Mooo,

coming from his cabin, cast his eyes aloft, the vigilant helmsman would
mooooo mooo moo moooo, mooo moo mooo moooo, moo mooooooo mooooooo moooo

ostentatiously handle his spokes, and the eager mariners quickly run to
mooooooooooooo mooooo moo mooooo, moo moo moooo mooooooo moooooo moo mo

the braces, and would stand there with all their eyes centrally fixed
moo mooooo, moo moooo moooo moooo mooo moo moooo mooo moooooooo moooo

on the nailed doubloon; impatient for the order to point the ship's
mo moo mooooo mooooooo; moooooooo moo moo moooo mo moooo moo mooo'm

prow for the equator. In good time the order came. It was hard upon high
mooo moo moo moooooo. Mo mooo mooo moo moooo mooo. Mo moo mooo mooo mooo

noon; and Ahab, seated in the bows of his high-hoisted boat, was
mooo; moo Mooo, mooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mooo-moooooo mooo, moo

about taking his wonted daily observation of the sun to determine his
moooo mooooo moo mooooo moooo moooooooooo mo moo moo mo moooooooo moo

latitude.
mooooooo.




Now, in that Japanese sea, the days in summer are as freshets of
Moo, mo mooo Mooooooo moo, moo mooo mo mooooo moo mo mooooooo mo

effulgences. That unblinkingly vivid Japanese sun seems the blazing
moooooooooo. Mooo mooooooooooo moooo Mooooooo moo moooo moo moooooo

focus of the glassy ocean's immeasurable burning-glass. The sky looks
moooo mo moo mooooo moooo'm mooooooooooo moooooo-moooo. Moo moo moooo

lacquered; clouds there are none; the horizon floats; and this nakedness
moooooooo; mooooo moooo moo mooo; moo moooooo mooooo; moo mooo moooooooo

of unrelieved radiance is as the insufferable splendors of God's throne.
mo mooooooooo mooooooo mo mo moo mooooooooooo moooooooo mo Moo'm mooooo.

Well that Ahab's quadrant was furnished with coloured glasses, through
Mooo mooo Mooo'm mooooooo moo moooooooo mooo mooooooo moooooo, moooooo

which to take sight of that solar fire. So, swinging his seated form
moooo mo mooo moooo mo mooo moooo mooo. Mo, mooooooo moo mooooo mooo

to the roll of the ship, and with his astrological-looking instrument
mo moo mooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo moo mooooooooooo-moooooo mooooooooo

placed to his eye, he remained in that posture for some moments to
mooooo mo moo moo, mo mooooooo mo mooo moooooo moo mooo moooooo mo

catch the precise instant when the sun should gain its precise meridian.
moooo moo moooooo moooooo mooo moo moo mooooo mooo moo moooooo mooooooo.

Meantime while his whole attention was absorbed, the Parsee was kneeling
Mooooooo moooo moo moooo moooooooo moo mooooooo, moo Mooooo moo mooooooo

beneath him on the ship's deck, and with face thrown up like Ahab's,
moooooo moo mo moo mooo'm mooo, moo mooo mooo mooooo mo mooo Mooo'm,

was eyeing the same sun with him; only the lids of his eyes half hooded
moo mooooo moo mooo moo mooo moo; mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo mooo mooooo

their orbs, and his wild face was subdued to an earthly passionlessness.
moooo mooo, moo moo mooo mooo moo moooooo mo mo moooooo moooooooooooooo.

At length the desired observation was taken; and with his pencil upon
Mo mooooo moo moooooo moooooooooo moo moooo; moo mooo moo mooooo mooo

his ivory leg, Ahab soon calculated what his latitude must be at that
moo moooo moo, Mooo mooo mooooooooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo mo mo mooo

precise instant. Then falling into a moment's revery, he again looked up
moooooo moooooo. Mooo moooooo mooo m mooooo'm mooooo, mo moooo mooooo mo

towards the sun and murmured to himself: "Thou sea-mark! thou high and
moooooo moo moo moo mooooooo mo moooooo: "Mooo moo-mooo! mooo mooo moo

mighty Pilot! thou tellest me truly where I AM--but canst thou cast the
mooooo Moooo! mooo moooooo mo moooo moooo M MO--moo moooo mooo mooo moo

least hint where I SHALL be? Or canst thou tell where some other thing
moooo mooo moooo M MOOOO mo? Mo moooo mooo mooo moooo mooo moooo moooo

besides me is this moment living? Where is Moby Dick? This instant thou
moooooo mo mo mooo mooooo mooooo? Moooo mo Mooo Mooo? Mooo moooooo mooo

must be eyeing him. These eyes of mine look into the very eye that is
mooo mo mooooo moo. Moooo mooo mo mooo mooo mooo moo mooo moo mooo mo

even now beholding him; aye, and into the eye that is even now equally
mooo moo moooooooo moo; moo, moo mooo moo moo mooo mo mooo moo moooooo

beholding the objects on the unknown, thither side of thee, thou sun!"
moooooooo moo moooooo mo moo moooooo, moooooo mooo mo mooo, mooo moo!"




Then gazing at his quadrant, and handling, one after the other, its
Mooo mooooo mo moo mooooooo, moo mooooooo, moo moooo moo moooo, moo

numerous cabalistical contrivances, he pondered again, and muttered:
mooooooo mooooooooooo mooooooooooo, mo mooooooo moooo, moo mooooooo:

"Foolish toy! babies' plaything of haughty Admirals, and Commodores, and
"Moooooo moo! mooooo' moooooooo mo moooooo Mooooooo, moo Mooooooooo, moo

Captains; the world brags of thee, of thy cunning and might; but what
Mooooooo; moo moooo moooo mo mooo, mo moo moooooo moo moooo; moo mooo

after all canst thou do, but tell the poor, pitiful point, where thou
moooo moo moooo mooo mo, moo mooo moo mooo, moooooo moooo, moooo mooo

thyself happenest to be on this wide planet, and the hand that holds
moooooo moooooooo mo mo mo mooo mooo mooooo, moo moo mooo mooo moooo

thee: no! not one jot more! Thou canst not tell where one drop of water
mooo: mo! moo moo moo mooo! Mooo moooo moo mooo moooo moo mooo mo moooo

or one grain of sand will be to-morrow noon; and yet with thy impotence
mo moo moooo mo mooo mooo mo mo-mooooo mooo; moo moo mooo moo moooooooo

thou insultest the sun! Science! Curse thee, thou vain toy; and cursed
mooo moooooooo moo moo! Moooooo! Moooo mooo, mooo mooo moo; moo mooooo

be all the things that cast man's eyes aloft to that heaven, whose live
mo moo moo mooooo mooo mooo moo'm mooo moooo mo mooo mooooo, moooo mooo

vividness but scorches him, as these old eyes are even now scorched
moooooooo moo mooooooo moo, mo moooo moo mooo moo mooo moo mooooooo

with thy light, O sun! Level by nature to this earth's horizon are the
mooo moo moooo, M moo! Moooo mo mooooo mo mooo moooo'm moooooo moo moo

glances of man's eyes; not shot from the crown of his head, as if God
moooooo mo moo'm mooo; moo mooo mooo moo moooo mo moo mooo, mo mo Moo

had meant him to gaze on his firmament. Curse thee, thou quadrant!"
moo moooo moo mo mooo mo moo moooooooo. Moooo mooo, mooo mooooooo!"

dashing it to the deck, "no longer will I guide my earthly way by thee;
moooooo mo mo moo mooo, "mo mooooo mooo M moooo mo moooooo moo mo mooo;

the level ship's compass, and the level deadreckoning, by log and by
moo moooo mooo'm moooooo, moo moo moooo moooooooooooo, mo moo moo mo

line; THESE shall conduct me, and show me my place on the sea. Aye,"
mooo; MOOOO moooo moooooo mo, moo mooo mo mo moooo mo moo moo. Moo,"

lighting from the boat to the deck, "thus I trample on thee, thou paltry
mooooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo, "mooo M moooooo mo mooo, mooo mooooo

thing that feebly pointest on high; thus I split and destroy thee!"
moooo mooo mooooo mooooooo mo mooo; mooo M moooo moo moooooo mooo!"




As the frantic old man thus spoke and thus trampled with his live
Mo moo moooooo moo moo mooo moooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo moo mooo

and dead feet, a sneering triumph that seemed meant for Ahab, and a
moo mooo mooo, m mooooooo moooooo mooo mooooo moooo moo Mooo, moo m

fatalistic despair that seemed meant for himself--these passed over
mooooooooo moooooo mooo mooooo moooo moo moooooo--moooo mooooo mooo

the mute, motionless Parsee's face. Unobserved he rose and glided away;
moo mooo, mooooooooo Mooooo'm mooo. Mooooooooo mo mooo moo mooooo mooo;

while, awestruck by the aspect of their commander, the seamen clustered
moooo, moooooooo mo moo mooooo mo moooo moooooooo, moo mooooo moooooooo

together on the forecastle, till Ahab, troubledly pacing the deck,
mooooooo mo moo mooooooooo, mooo Mooo, mooooooooo mooooo moo mooo,

shouted out--"To the braces! Up helm!--square in!"
moooooo moo--"Mo moo mooooo! Mo mooo!--mooooo mo!"




In an instant the yards swung round; and as the ship half-wheeled upon
Mo mo moooooo moo moooo moooo moooo; moo mo moo mooo mooo-moooooo mooo

her heel, her three firm-seated graceful masts erectly poised upon
moo mooo, moo moooo mooo-mooooo mooooooo moooo moooooo mooooo mooo

her long, ribbed hull, seemed as the three Horatii pirouetting on one
moo mooo, mooooo mooo, mooooo mo moo moooo Moooooo moooooooooo mo moo

sufficient steed.
mooooooooo moooo.




Standing between the knight-heads, Starbuck watched the Pequod's
Mooooooo moooooo moo mooooo-moooo, Mooooooo moooooo moo Mooooo'm

tumultuous way, and Ahab's also, as he went lurching along the deck.
mooooooooo moo, moo Mooo'm mooo, mo mo mooo mooooooo moooo moo mooo.




"I have sat before the dense coal fire and watched it all aglow, full of
"M mooo moo mooooo moo moooo mooo mooo moo moooooo mo moo moooo, mooo mo

its tormented flaming life; and I have seen it wane at last, down, down,
moo moooooooo moooooo mooo; moo M mooo mooo mo mooo mo mooo, mooo, mooo,

to dumbest dust. Old man of oceans! of all this fiery life of thine,
mo moooooo mooo. Moo moo mo mooooo! mo moo mooo moooo mooo mo moooo,

what will at length remain but one little heap of ashes!"
mooo mooo mo mooooo mooooo moo moo mooooo mooo mo moooo!"




"Aye," cried Stubb, "but sea-coal ashes--mind ye that, Mr.
"Moo," moooo Moooo, "moo moo-mooo moooo--mooo mo mooo, Mo.

Starbuck--sea-coal, not your common charcoal. Well, well; I heard Ahab
Mooooooo--moo-mooo, moo mooo mooooo mooooooo. Mooo, mooo; M moooo Mooo

mutter, 'Here some one thrusts these cards into these old hands of mine;
mooooo, 'Mooo mooo moo moooooo moooo moooo mooo moooo moo moooo mo mooo;

swears that I must play them, and no others.' And damn me, Ahab, but
mooooo mooo M mooo mooo mooo, moo mo mooooo.' Moo mooo mo, Mooo, moo

thou actest right; live in the game, and die in it!"
mooo mooooo moooo; mooo mo moo mooo, moo moo mo mo!"










CHAPTER 119. The Candles.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Moooooo.







Warmest climes but nurse the cruellest fangs: the tiger of Bengal
Moooooo mooooo moo moooo moo moooooooo moooo: moo moooo mo Mooooo

crouches in spiced groves of ceaseless verdure. Skies the most effulgent
mooooooo mo mooooo mooooo mo moooooooo moooooo. Moooo moo mooo moooooooo

but basket the deadliest thunders: gorgeous Cuba knows tornadoes
moo mooooo moo moooooooo mooooooo: mooooooo Mooo moooo moooooooo

that never swept tame northern lands. So, too, it is, that in these
mooo moooo moooo mooo mooooooo moooo. Mo, moo, mo mo, mooo mo moooo

resplendent Japanese seas the mariner encounters the direst of all
moooooooooo Mooooooo mooo moo moooooo mooooooooo moo mooooo mo moo

storms, the Typhoon. It will sometimes burst from out that cloudless
mooooo, moo Moooooo. Mo mooo moooooooo moooo mooo moo mooo moooooooo

sky, like an exploding bomb upon a dazed and sleepy town.
moo, mooo mo moooooooo mooo mooo m moooo moo mooooo mooo.




Towards evening of that day, the Pequod was torn of her canvas, and
Moooooo moooooo mo mooo moo, moo Mooooo moo mooo mo moo mooooo, moo

bare-poled was left to fight a Typhoon which had struck her directly
mooo-moooo moo mooo mo moooo m Moooooo moooo moo mooooo moo mooooooo

ahead. When darkness came on, sky and sea roared and split with the
moooo. Mooo mooooooo mooo mo, moo moo moo mooooo moo moooo mooo moo

thunder, and blazed with the lightning, that showed the disabled masts
moooooo, moo mooooo mooo moo moooooooo, mooo mooooo moo mooooooo moooo

fluttering here and there with the rags which the first fury of the
mooooooooo mooo moo moooo mooo moo mooo moooo moo moooo mooo mo moo

tempest had left for its after sport.
moooooo moo mooo moo moo moooo moooo.




Holding by a shroud, Starbuck was standing on the quarter-deck; at every
Moooooo mo m mooooo, Mooooooo moo mooooooo mo moo moooooo-mooo; mo moooo

flash of the lightning glancing aloft, to see what additional disaster
moooo mo moo moooooooo mooooooo moooo, mo moo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo

might have befallen the intricate hamper there; while Stubb and Flask
moooo mooo mooooooo moo moooooooo mooooo moooo; moooo Moooo moo Moooo

were directing the men in the higher hoisting and firmer lashing of the
mooo moooooooo moo moo mo moo mooooo mooooooo moo mooooo moooooo mo moo

boats. But all their pains seemed naught. Though lifted to the very
moooo. Moo moo moooo moooo mooooo mooooo. Mooooo mooooo mo moo mooo

top of the cranes, the windward quarter boat (Ahab's) did not escape.
moo mo moo mooooo, moo mooooooo moooooo mooo (Mooo'm) moo moo mooooo.

A great rolling sea, dashing high up against the reeling ship's high
M moooo moooooo moo, moooooo mooo mo moooooo moo moooooo mooo'm mooo

teetering side, stove in the boat's bottom at the stern, and left it
moooooooo mooo, moooo mo moo mooo'm mooooo mo moo moooo, moo mooo mo

again, all dripping through like a sieve.
moooo, moo mooooooo moooooo mooo m moooo.




"Bad work, bad work! Mr. Starbuck," said Stubb, regarding the wreck,
"Moo mooo, moo mooo! Mo. Mooooooo," mooo Moooo, moooooooo moo moooo,

"but the sea will have its way. Stubb, for one, can't fight it. You see,
"moo moo moo mooo mooo moo moo. Moooo, moo moo, moo'm moooo mo. Moo moo,

Mr. Starbuck, a wave has such a great long start before it leaps, all
Mo. Mooooooo, m mooo moo mooo m moooo mooo moooo mooooo mo moooo, moo

round the world it runs, and then comes the spring! But as for me, all
moooo moo moooo mo mooo, moo mooo moooo moo mooooo! Moo mo moo mo, moo

the start I have to meet it, is just across the deck here. But never
moo moooo M mooo mo mooo mo, mo mooo mooooo moo mooo mooo. Moo moooo

mind; it's all in fun: so the old song says;"--(SINGS.)
mooo; mo'm moo mo moo: mo moo moo mooo mooo;"--(MOOOO.)




  Oh! jolly is the gale,
  Mo! moooo mo moo mooo,

  And a joker is the whale,
  Moo m moooo mo moo moooo,

  A' flourishin' his tail,--
  M' mooooooooo' moo mooo,--

  Such a funny, sporty, gamy, jesty, joky, hoky-poky lad, is the Ocean, oh!
  Mooo m moooo, mooooo, mooo, moooo, mooo, mooo-mooo moo, mo moo Moooo, mo!




  The scud all a flyin',
  Moo mooo moo m moooo',

  That's his flip only foamin';
  Mooo'm moo mooo mooo mooooo';

  When he stirs in the spicin',--
  Mooo mo moooo mo moo mooooo',--

  Such a funny, sporty, gamy, jesty, joky, hoky-poky lad, is the Ocean, oh!
  Mooo m moooo, mooooo, mooo, moooo, mooo, mooo-mooo moo, mo moo Moooo, mo!




  Thunder splits the ships,
  Moooooo mooooo moo moooo,

  But he only smacks his lips,
  Moo mo mooo mooooo moo mooo,

  A tastin' of this flip,--
  M mooooo' mo mooo mooo,--

  Such a funny, sporty, gamy, jesty, joky, hoky-poky lad, is the Ocean, oh!
  Mooo m moooo, mooooo, mooo, moooo, mooo, mooo-mooo moo, mo moo Moooo, mo!







"Avast Stubb," cried Starbuck, "let the Typhoon sing, and strike his
"Moooo Moooo," moooo Mooooooo, "moo moo Moooooo mooo, moo mooooo moo

harp here in our rigging; but if thou art a brave man thou wilt hold thy
mooo mooo mo moo moooooo; moo mo mooo moo m moooo moo mooo mooo mooo moo

peace."
moooo."




"But I am not a brave man; never said I was a brave man; I am a coward;
"Moo M mo moo m moooo moo; moooo mooo M moo m moooo moo; M mo m mooooo;

and I sing to keep up my spirits. And I tell you what it is, Mr.
moo M mooo mo mooo mo mo moooooo. Moo M mooo moo mooo mo mo, Mo.

Starbuck, there's no way to stop my singing in this world but to cut my
Mooooooo, moooo'm mo moo mo mooo mo moooooo mo mooo moooo moo mo moo mo

throat. And when that's done, ten to one I sing ye the doxology for a
mooooo. Moo mooo mooo'm mooo, moo mo moo M mooo mo moo mooooooo moo m

wind-up."
mooo-mo."




"Madman! look through my eyes if thou hast none of thine own."
"Mooooo! mooo moooooo mo mooo mo mooo mooo mooo mo moooo moo."




"What! how can you see better of a dark night than anybody else, never
"Mooo! moo moo moo moo mooooo mo m mooo moooo mooo moooooo mooo, moooo

mind how foolish?"
mooo moo moooooo?"




"Here!" cried Starbuck, seizing Stubb by the shoulder, and pointing his
"Mooo!" moooo Mooooooo, moooooo Moooo mo moo mooooooo, moo mooooooo moo

hand towards the weather bow, "markest thou not that the gale comes from
mooo moooooo moo moooooo moo, "moooooo mooo moo mooo moo mooo moooo mooo

the eastward, the very course Ahab is to run for Moby Dick? the very
moo mooooooo, moo mooo mooooo Mooo mo mo moo moo Mooo Mooo? moo mooo

mooooo mo moooo mo mooo moo mooo? moo mooo moo mooo moooo; moooo mo

mooo moooo? Mo moo moooo-mooooo, moo; moooo mo mo mooo mo moooo--moo

stand-point is stove, man! Now jump overboard, and sing away, if thou
moooo-moooo mo moooo, moo! Moo mooo moooooooo, moo mooo mooo, mo mooo

must!
mooo!




"I don't half understand ye: what's in the wind?"
"M moo'm mooo mooooooooo mo: mooo'm mo moo mooo?"




"Yes, yes, round the Cape of Good Hope is the shortest way to
"Moo, moo, moooo moo Mooo mo Mooo Mooo mo moo mooooooo moo mo

Nantucket," soliloquized Starbuck suddenly, heedless of Stubb's
Moooooooo," mooooooooooo Mooooooo mooooooo, mooooooo mo Moooo'm

question. "The gale that now hammers at us to stave us, we can turn it
mooooooo. "Moo mooo mooo moo moooooo mo mo mo moooo mo, mo moo mooo mo

into a fair wind that will drive us towards home. Yonder, to windward,
mooo m mooo mooo mooo mooo moooo mo moooooo mooo. Mooooo, mo mooooooo,

all is blackness of doom; but to leeward, homeward--I see it lightens up
moo mo moooooooo mo mooo; moo mo moooooo, mooooooo--M moo mo mooooooo mo

there; but not with the lightning."
moooo; moo moo mooo moo moooooooo."




At that moment in one of the intervals of profound darkness, following
Mo mooo mooooo mo moo mo moo moooooooo mo mooooooo mooooooo, moooooooo

the flashes, a voice was heard at his side; and almost at the same
moo moooooo, m moooo moo moooo mo moo mooo; moo mooooo mo moo mooo

instant a volley of thunder peals rolled overhead.
moooooo m mooooo mo moooooo moooo mooooo mooooooo.




"Who's there?"
"Moo'm moooo?"




"Old Thunder!" said Ahab, groping his way along the bulwarks to his
"Moo Moooooo!" mooo Mooo, moooooo moo moo moooo moo mooooooo mo moo

pivot-hole; but suddenly finding his path made plain to him by elbowed
moooo-mooo; moo mooooooo moooooo moo mooo mooo moooo mo moo mo moooooo

mooooo mo mooo.




Now, as the lightning rod to a spire on shore is intended to carry off
Moo, mo moo moooooooo moo mo m moooo mo moooo mo mooooooo mo moooo moo

the perilous fluid into the soil; so the kindred rod which at sea some
moo mooooooo moooo mooo moo mooo; mo moo moooooo moo moooo mo moo mooo

ships carry to each mast, is intended to conduct it into the water. But
moooo moooo mo mooo mooo, mo mooooooo mo moooooo mo mooo moo moooo. Moo

as this conductor must descend to considerable depth, that its end may
mo mooo moooooooo mooo moooooo mo mooooooooooo moooo, mooo moo moo moo

moooo moo moooooo mooo moo mooo; moo mo mooooooo, mo mooo mooooooooo

mooooo moooo, mo moooo mo mooooo mo mooo moooooo, moooooo moooooooooo

not a little with some of the rigging, and more or less impeding the
moo m mooooo mooo mooo mo moo moooooo, moo mooo mo mooo mooooooo moo

vessel's way in the water; because of all this, the lower parts of a
mooooo'm moo mo moo moooo; moooooo mo moo mooo, moo moooo moooo mo m

ship's lightning-rods are not always overboard; but are generally made
mooo'm moooooooo-mooo moo moo mooooo moooooooo; moo moo moooooooo mooo

in long slender links, so as to be the more readily hauled up into the
mo mooo moooooo moooo, mo mo mo mo moo mooo moooooo mooooo mo mooo moo

mooooo moooooo, mo mooooo mooo mooo moo moo, mo mooooooo moo moooooo.

mo moooo Mooo mo moo mooo. "Moo mooo moooooooo? mooo mooo mooo, mooo moo

moo moo moooo moo mo moooooo; moo moo mo mooooooooo! Moo mooo mo, moo."

"Mooo moooo!" moooo Mooooooo. "Moo mooooooooo! moo mooooooooo!"




All the yard-arms were tipped with a pallid fire; and touched at each

moooo mooooooo moo mooooo mooooo mo moooo.

moo!"




To sailors, oaths are household words; they will swear in the trance of
Mo moooooo, moooo moo moooooooo moooo; mooo mooo moooo mo moo mooooo mo

the calm, and in the teeth of the tempest; they will imprecate curses
moo mooo, moo mo moo moooo mo moo moooooo; mooo mooo moooooooo mooooo

mooo moo moooooo-mooo-mooo, mooo mooo mooo mooooo mooo mo m mooooooo

mooo mo moo mooo."

"Oh! thou clear spirit of clear fire, whom on these seas I as Persian
"Mo! mooo moooo mooooo mo moooo mooo, mooo mo moooo mooo M mo Moooooo

once did worship, till in the sacramental act so burned by thee, that to
mooo moo moooooo, mooo mo moo moooooooooo moo mo mooooo mo mooo, mooo mo

this hour I bear the scar; I now know thee, thou clear spirit, and I now
mooo mooo M mooo moo mooo; M moo mooo mooo, mooo moooo mooooo, moo M moo

know that thy right worship is defiance. To neither love nor reverence
mooo mooo moo moooo moooooo mo mooooooo. Mo moooooo mooo moo moooooooo

wilt thou be kind; and e'en for hate thou canst but kill; and all
mooo mooo mo mooo; moo m'mo moo mooo mooo moooo moo mooo; moo moo

are killed. No fearless fool now fronts thee. I own thy speechless,
moo mooooo. Mo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo mooo. M moo moo mooooooooo,

placeless power; but to the last gasp of my earthquake life will
moooooooo moooo; moo mo moo mooo mooo mo mo mooooooooo mooo mooo

moooooo moo moooooooooooo, mooooooooo moooooo mo mo. Mo moo moooo mo moo

personified impersonal, a personality stands here. Though but a point at
moooooooooo mooooooooo, m moooooooooo mooooo mooo. Mooooo moo m moooo mo

mooo; moooooooo'mo M mooo; mooooooo'mo M mo; moo moooo M moooooo mooo,

moo moooooo moooooooooo moooo mo mo, moo moooo moo moooo mooooo. Moo moo

is pain, and hate is woe. Come in thy lowest form of love, and I will
mo mooo, moo mooo mo moo. Mooo mo moo mooooo mooo mo mooo, moo M mooo

kneel and kiss thee; but at thy highest, come as mere supernal power;
moooo moo mooo mooo; moo mo moo moooooo, mooo mo mooo mooooooo moooo;

moo mooooo mooo moooooooo mooooo mo mooo-moooooooo mooooo, moooo'm mooo

in here that still remains indifferent. Oh, thou clear spirit, of thy
mo mooo mooo moooo moooooo moooooooooo. Mo, mooo moooo mooooo, mo moo

fire thou madest me, and like a true child of fire, I breathe it back to

mooo."

"I own thy speechless, placeless power; said I not so? Nor was it wrung
"M moo moo mooooooooo, moooooooo moooo; mooo M moo mo? Moo moo mo moooo

from me; nor do I now drop these links. Thou canst blind; but I can then
mooo mo; moo mo M moo mooo moooo moooo. Mooo moooo moooo; moo M moo mooo

grope. Thou canst consume; but I can then be ashes. Take the homage of
moooo. Mooo moooo moooooo; moo M moo mooo mo moooo. Mooo moo mooooo mo

these poor eyes, and shutter-hands. I would not take it. The lightning
moooo mooo mooo, moo moooooo-moooo. M moooo moo mooo mo. Moo moooooooo

flashes through my skull; mine eye-balls ache and ache; my whole beaten
moooooo moooooo mo moooo; mooo moo-moooo mooo moo mooo; mo moooo mooooo

moooo moooo mo mooooooo, moo moooooo mo mooo mooooooo mooooo. Mo, mo!

Moo moooooooo, moo mooo M mooo mo mooo. Moooo mooooo mooo mo, mooo

mooo mooo mooo mooo moo? Moooo mooo mo mooooo; moo moooo mo moooooo.

moooooooo moooooo moo moo moooooooo, moooo moooooo moooooo moooooo. M

mooo mooo mo mo, moooo mooo moooooo moo mo moooooo, mo, mooo mooooooooo.

Moooo mo mooo moooooooooo moooo mooooo mooo, mooo moooo mooooo, mo mooo

moo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo, moo moo mooooooooooo mooooooooo. Moooooo

"The boat! the boat!" cried Starbuck, "look at thy boat, old man!"

Ahab's harpoon, the one forged at Perth's fire, remained firmly lashed
Mooo'm moooooo, moo moo mooooo mo Moooo'm mooo, mooooooo mooooo mooooo

mooooooo mooo mo moo moooo mooooo mooo moo mooo moooo m mooo'm moo.

"All your oaths to hunt the White Whale are as binding as mine; and
"Moo mooo moooo mo mooo moo Moooo Moooo moo mo moooooo mo mooo; moo

moo mooo mooo!" Moo mooo moo moooo mo moo mooooo mo mooooooooooo moo

flame.
moooo.




As in the hurricane that sweeps the plain, men fly the neighborhood of
Mo mo moo moooooooo mooo mooooo moo moooo, moo moo moo mooooooooooo mo

some lone, gigantic elm, whose very height and strength but render it so
mooo mooo, mooooooo moo, moooo mooo mooooo moo mooooooo moo mooooo mo mo

mo m mooooo mo mooooo.










CHAPTER 120. The Deck Towards the End of the First Night Watch.

AHAB STANDING BY THE HELM. STARBUCK APPROACHING HIM.
MOOO MOOOOOOO MO MOO MOOO. MOOOOOOO MOOOOOOOOOO MOO.







"We must send down the main-top-sail yard, sir. The band is working loose

and the lee lift is half-stranded. Shall I strike it, sir?"
moo moo moo mooo mo mooo-mooooooo. Moooo M mooooo mo, moo?"

now."
moo."




"Sir!--in God's name!--sir?"
"Moo!--mo Moo'm mooo!--moo?"




"Well."
"Mooo."




"The anchors are working, sir. Shall I get them inboard?"
"Moo moooooo moo moooooo, moo. Moooo M moo mooo moooooo?"




"Strike nothing, and stir nothing, but lash everything. The wind rises,
"Mooooo moooooo, moo mooo moooooo, moo mooo mooooooooo. Moo mooo moooo,

but it has not got up to my table-lands yet. Quick, and see to it.--By
moo mo moo moo moo mo mo mo moooo-moooo moo. Moooo, moo moo mo mo.--Mo

masts and keels! he takes me for the hunch-backed skipper of some
moooo moo moooo! mo moooo mo moo moo moooo-mooooo moooooo mo mooo

coasting smack. Send down my main-top-sail yard! Ho, gluepots! Loftiest
mooooooo moooo. Mooo mooo mo mooo-moo-mooo mooo! Mo, mooooooo! Mooooooo

trucks were made for wildest winds, and this brain-truck of mine now
mooooo mooo mooo moo moooooo moooo, moo mooo moooo-moooo mo mooo moo

sails amid the cloud-scud. Shall I strike that? Oh, none but cowards
moooo mooo moo moooo-mooo. Moooo M mooooo mooo? Mo, mooo moo moooooo

send down their brain-trucks in tempest time. What a hooroosh aloft
mooo mooo moooo moooo-mooooo mo moooooo mooo. Mooo m mooooooo moooo

moooo! M moooo m'mo mooo mo moo moooooo, moo M moo mooo mooo moo moooo

is a noisy malady. Oh, take medicine, take medicine!"
mo m moooo mooooo. Mo, mooo mooooooo, mooo mooooooo!"










CHAPTER 121. Midnight.--The Forecastle Bulwarks.
MOOOOOO moo. Mooooooo.--Moo Mooooooooo Mooooooo.

"No, Stubb; you may pound that knot there as much as you please, but you
"Mo, Moooo; moo moo moooo mooo mooo moooo mo mooo mo moo mooooo, moo moo

moo mo mo moooo moo mooo moo mooo mooooooo? Mooo'm moo mooo moo mooo

moo moooo mo mooooooo moooooo? Mooo, moo; mooo'm moo moo mo?"

mooo mo mo mooooooo; moo moo'm mo, mooo? moo moo mooo mooo mo moo moo mo

sensible."
mooooooo."




"I don't know that, Stubb. You sometimes find it rather hard."
"M moo'm mooo mooo, Moooo. Moo moooooooo mooo mo mooooo mooo."

"Moo, mooo m mooooo'm mooooo moooooo, mo'm mooo mo mo mooooooo, mooo'm

CHAPTER 123. The Musket.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Mooooo.







During the most violent shocks of the Typhoon, the man at the Pequod's
Mooooo moo mooo moooooo mooooo mo moo Moooooo, moo moo mo moo Mooooo'm

jaw-bone tiller had several times been reelingly hurled to the deck by
moo-mooo mooooo moo moooooo moooo mooo moooooooo mooooo mo moo mooo mo

its spasmodic motions, even though preventer tackles had been attached
moo moooooooo moooooo, mooo mooooo moooooooo moooooo moo mooo mooooooo

to it--for they were slack--because some play to the tiller was
mo mo--moo mooo mooo moooo--moooooo mooo mooo mo moo mooooo moo

indispensable.
moooooooooooo.




In a severe gale like this, while the ship is but a tossed shuttlecock
Mo m mooooo mooo mooo mooo, moooo moo mooo mo moo m mooooo moooooooooo

to the blast, it is by no means uncommon to see the needles in the
mo moo moooo, mo mo mo mo moooo mooooooo mo moo moo moooooo mo moo

compasses, at intervals, go round and round. It was thus with the
moooooooo, mo moooooooo, mo moooo moo moooo. Mo moo mooo mooo moo

Pequod's; at almost every shock the helmsman had not failed to notice
Mooooo'm; mo mooooo moooo moooo moo mooooooo moo moo mooooo mo mooooo

the whirling velocity with which they revolved upon the cards; it is
moo mooooooo mooooooo mooo moooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo; mo mo

a sight that hardly anyone can behold without some sort of unwonted
m moooo mooo mooooo mooooo moo mooooo moooooo mooo mooo mo mooooooo

emotion.
moooooo.




Some hours after midnight, the Typhoon abated so much, that through the
Mooo moooo moooo mooooooo, moo Moooooo mooooo mo mooo, mooo moooooo moo

strenuous exertions of Starbuck and Stubb--one engaged forward and the
moooooooo moooooooo mo Mooooooo moo Moooo--moo moooooo moooooo moo moo

other aft--the shivered remnants of the jib and fore and main-top-sails
moooo moo--moo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo moo moo mooo moo mooo-moo-moooo

were cut adrift from the spars, and went eddying away to leeward, like
mooo moo mooooo mooo moo moooo, moo mooo moooooo mooo mo moooooo, mooo

the feathers of an albatross, which sometimes are cast to the winds when
moo mooooooo mo mo moooooooo, moooo moooooooo moo mooo mo moo moooo mooo

that storm-tossed bird is on the wing.
mooo moooo-mooooo mooo mo mo moo mooo.




The three corresponding new sails were now bent and reefed, and a
Moo moooo moooooooooooo moo moooo mooo moo mooo moo mooooo, moo m

storm-trysail was set further aft; so that the ship soon went through
moooo-moooooo moo moo moooooo moo; mo mooo moo mooo mooo mooo moooooo

the water with some precision again; and the course--for the present,
moo moooo mooo mooo moooooooo moooo; moo moo mooooo--moo moo moooooo,

East-south-east--which he was to steer, if practicable, was once more
Mooo-moooo-mooo--moooo mo moo mo moooo, mo moooooooooo, moo mooo mooo

given to the helmsman. For during the violence of the gale, he had only
moooo mo moo mooooooo. Moo mooooo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo, mo moo mooo

steered according to its vicissitudes. But as he was now bringing the
moooooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooooooo. Moo mo mo moo moo mooooooo moo

ship as near her course as possible, watching the compass meanwhile, lo!
mooo mo mooo moo mooooo mo mooooooo, mooooooo moo moooooo moooooooo, mo!

a good sign! the wind seemed coming round astern; aye, the foul breeze
m mooo mooo! moo mooo mooooo mooooo moooo mooooo; moo, moo mooo mooooo

became fair!
mooooo mooo!




Instantly the yards were squared, to the lively song of "HO! THE
Moooooooo moo moooo mooo moooooo, mo moo mooooo mooo mo "MO! MOO

FAIR WIND! OH-YE-HO, CHEERLY MEN!" the crew singing for joy, that so
MOOO MOOO! MO-MO-MO, MOOOOOO MOO!" moo mooo moooooo moo moo, mooo mo

promising an event should so soon have falsified the evil portents
moooooooo mo moooo mooooo mo mooo mooo moooooooo moo mooo mooooooo

preceding it.
moooooooo mo.




In compliance with the standing order of his commander--to report
Mo mooooooooo mooo moo mooooooo moooo mo moo moooooooo--mo mooooo

immediately, and at any one of the twenty-four hours, any decided change
moooooooooo, moo mo moo moo mo moo mooooo-mooo moooo, moo moooooo mooooo

in the affairs of the deck,--Starbuck had no sooner trimmed the yards to
mo moo moooooo mo moo mooo,--Mooooooo moo mo mooooo moooooo moo moooo mo

the breeze--however reluctantly and gloomily,--than he mechanically went
moo mooooo--moooooo moooooooooo moo mooooooo,--mooo mo mooooooooooo mooo

below to apprise Captain Ahab of the circumstance.
moooo mo moooooo Moooooo Mooo mo moo mooooooooooo.




Ere knocking at his state-room, he involuntarily paused before it
Moo mooooooo mo moo moooo-mooo, mo moooooooooooo mooooo mooooo mo

a moment. The cabin lamp--taking long swings this way and that--was
m mooooo. Moo moooo mooo--mooooo mooo mooooo mooo moo moo mooo--moo

burning fitfully, and casting fitful shadows upon the old man's bolted
moooooo mooooooo, moo moooooo mooooo moooooo mooo moo moo moo'm mooooo

door,--a thin one, with fixed blinds inserted, in place of upper panels.
mooo,--m mooo moo, mooo moooo mooooo mooooooo, mo moooo mo moooo mooooo.

The isolated subterraneousness of the cabin made a certain humming
Moo mooooooo moooooooooooooooo mo moo moooo mooo m moooooo moooooo

moooooo mo moooo moooo, mooooo mo moo mooooo moooo mo moo moo mooo mo

the elements. The loaded muskets in the rack were shiningly revealed, as
moo mooooooo. Moo mooooo moooooo mo moo mooo mooo moooooooo mooooooo, mo

mooo moooo moooooo moooooo moo moooooo mooooooo. Mooooooo moo mo mooooo,

moo moooooo, moooo moooooooo moooooo mo mooo moooooo; moo mo moooo mooo

moo moooooo mo mooo mooooooooooooo mooo moo moo moooooo mo mooooo mooo

it for itself.
mo moo mooooo.




"He would have shot me once," he murmured, "yes, there's the very musket

that he pointed at me;--that one with the studded stock; let me touch
mooo mo moooooo mo mo;--mooo moo mooo moo moooooo moooo; moo mo moooo

moooooo, mooo M mooooo moooo mo moo. Mooooo? M mooo moo. Moo, moo; moo

powder in the pan;--that's not good. Best spill it?--wait. I'll cure
mooooo mo moo moo;--mooo'm moo mooo. Mooo moooo mo?--mooo. M'mo mooo

mooooo mo mooo. M'mo mooo moo mooooo mooooo moooo M moooo.--M mooo

to report a fair wind to him. But how fair? Fair for death and
mo mooooo m mooo mooo mo moo. Moo moo mooo? Mooo moo moooo moo

doom,--THAT'S fair for Moby Dick. It's a fair wind that's only fair for
mooo,--MOOO'M mooo moo Mooo Mooo. Mo'm m mooo mooo mooo'm mooo mooo moo

that accursed fish.--The very tube he pointed at me!--the very one;
mooo mooooooo mooo.--Moo mooo mooo mo moooooo mo mo!--moo mooo moo;

THIS one--I hold it here; he would have killed me with the very thing I
MOOO moo--M mooo mo mooo; mo moooo mooo mooooo mo mooo moo mooo moooo M

handle now.--Aye and he would fain kill all his crew. Does he not say
mooooo moo.--Moo moo mo moooo mooo mooo moo moo mooo. Mooo mo moo moo

he will not strike his spars to any gale? Has he not dashed his heavenly
mo mooo moo mooooo moo moooo mo moo mooo? Moo mo moo mooooo moo mooooooo

quadrant? and in these same perilous seas, gropes he not his way by mere
mooooooo? moo mo moooo mooo mooooooo mooo, mooooo mo moo moo moo mo mooo

dead reckoning of the error-abounding log? and in this very Typhoon, did
mooo moooooooo mo moo moooo-moooooooo moo? moo mo mooo mooo Moooooo, moo

mo moo moooo mooo mo moooo mooo mo moooooooo-mooo? Moo moooo mooo mooooo

with him?--Yes, it would make him the wilful murderer of thirty men and
mooo moo?--Moo, mo moooo mooo moo moo mooooo mooooooo mo mooooo moo moo

mooo, mo mooo mooo mooo mo moo mooooo mooo; moo mooo mo mooooo mooo, mo

soul swears this ship will, if Ahab have his way. If, then, he were this
mooo mooooo mooo mooo mooo, mo Mooo mooo moo moo. Mo, mooo, mo mooo mooo

instant--put aside, that crime would not be his. Ha! is he muttering in
moooooo--moo moooo, mooo moooo moooo moo mo moo. Mo! mo mo moooooooo mo

moo moooo? Moo, mooo moooo,--mo moooo, mo'm mooooooo. Mooooooo? moo,

but still alive, and soon awake again. I can't withstand thee, then, old
moo moooo moooo, moo mooo moooo moooo. M moo'm moooooooo mooo, mooo, moo

man. Not reasoning; not remonstrance; not entreaty wilt thou hearken to;
moo. Moo moooooooo; moo mooooooooooo; moo mooooooo mooo mooo moooooo mo;

moo mooo mooo mooooooo. Mooo moooooooo mo moo moo mooo mooooooo, mooo mo

moo mooo moooooooo. Moo, moo moo'mo moo moo mooo moo'm moo moo; moo'mo

moo mo mo moo Moooo. Moooo Moo mooooo!--Moo mo moooo mo moooo moo? mo

mooooo moo?--Mooo moo m mooooooo mo mo moooo mooo? Mooo! mooo mo moooo

this old man's living power from his own living hands? Only a fool
mooo moo moo'm mooooo moooo mooo moo moo mooooo moooo? Mooo m mooo

would try it. Say he were pinioned even; knotted all over with ropes
moooo moo mo. Moo mo mooo mooooooo mooo; moooooo moo mooo mooo moooo

and hawsers; chained down to ring-bolts on this cabin floor; he would

mo mooo moooooo mooo m moooo moooo, mooo. M moooo moo mooooo moo

sight; could not possibly fly his howlings; all comfort, sleep itself,
moooo; moooo moo mooooooo moo moo mooooooo; moo moooooo, moooo mooooo,

moooooooooo mooooo moooo moooo mo mo moo mooo moooooooooo mooooo. Mooo,

then, remains? The land is hundreds of leagues away, and locked Japan
mooo, moooooo? Moo mooo mo mooooooo mo moooooo mooo, moo mooooo Moooo

the nearest. I stand alone here upon an open sea, with two oceans and
moo moooooo. M moooo moooo mooo mooo mo mooo moo, mooo moo mooooo moo

a whole continent between me and law.--Aye, aye, 'tis so.--Is heaven
m moooo moooooooo moooooo mo moo moo.--Moo, moo, 'moo mo.--Mo mooooo

a murderer when its lightning strikes a would-be murderer in his bed,
m mooooooo mooo moo moooooooo moooooo m moooo-mo mooooooo mo moo moo,

moooooooo mooooo moo mooo mooooooo?--Moo moooo M mo m mooooooo, mooo,

if"--and slowly, stealthily, and half sideways looking, he placed the
mo"--moo mooooo, mooooooooo, moo mooo mooooooo moooooo, mo mooooo moo

loaded musket's end against the door.
mooooo mooooo'm moo moooooo moo mooo.




"On this level, Ahab's hammock swings within; his head this way. A
"Mo mooo moooo, Mooo'm moooooo mooooo mooooo; moo mooo mooo moo. M

moo mooooo moo moo; moo moooo moo mooooo."




"Stern all! Oh Moby Dick, I clutch thy heart at last!"

Such were the sounds that now came hurtling from out the old man's
Mooo mooo moo mooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo moo moo moo moo'm

moooooooo moooo, mo mo Mooooooo'm moooo moo mooooo moo mooo mooo moooo

mo moooo.

Mooooooo mooooo moooooooo mooo mo moooo; moo moooooo mooo moo mooo, mo

mooooo moo moooo-mooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo moo moooo.

CHAPTER 124. The Needle.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Mooooo.







Next morning the not-yet-subsided sea rolled in long slow billows of
Mooo moooooo moo moo-moo-mooooooo moo mooooo mo mooo mooo moooooo mo

mighty bulk, and striving in the Pequod's gurgling track, pushed her on
mooooo mooo, moo mooooooo mo moo Mooooo'm mooooooo moooo, mooooo moo mo

like giants' palms outspread. The strong, unstaggering breeze abounded
mooo mooooo' moooo moooooooo. Moo mooooo, mooooooooooo mooooo mooooooo

so, that sky and air seemed vast outbellying sails; the whole world
mo, mooo moo moo moo mooooo mooo moooooooooo moooo; moo moooo moooo

boomed before the wind. Muffled in the full morning light, the invisible
mooooo mooooo moo mooo. Moooooo mo moo mooo moooooo moooo, moo moooooooo

sun was only known by the spread intensity of his place; where his
moo moo mooo moooo mo moo mooooo moooooooo mo moo moooo; moooo moo

bayonet rays moved on in stacks. Emblazonings, as of crowned Babylonian
moooooo mooo moooo mo mo mooooo. Mooooooooooo, mo mo moooooo Mooooooooo

kings and queens, reigned over everything. The sea was as a crucible of
moooo moo mooooo, moooooo mooo mooooooooo. Moo moo moo mo m mooooooo mo

molten gold, that bubblingly leaps with light and heat.
mooooo mooo, mooo mooooooooo moooo mooo moooo moo mooo.




Long maintaining an enchanted silence, Ahab stood apart; and every time
Mooo moooooooooo mo moooooooo moooooo, Mooo moooo moooo; moo moooo mooo

the tetering ship loweringly pitched down her bowsprit, he turned to eye
moo mooooooo mooo mooooooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo, mo mooooo mo moo

the bright sun's rays produced ahead; and when she profoundly settled by
moo mooooo moo'm mooo mooooooo moooo; moo mooo moo mooooooooo moooooo mo

the stern, he turned behind, and saw the sun's rearward place, and how
moo moooo, mo mooooo mooooo, moo moo moo moo'm mooooooo moooo, moo moo

the same yellow rays were blending with his undeviating wake.
moo mooo mooooo mooo mooo mooooooo mooo moo moooooooooo mooo.




"Ha, ha, my ship! thou mightest well be taken now for the sea-chariot of
"Mo, mo, mo mooo! mooo mooooooo mooo mo moooo moo moo moo moo-moooooo mo

the sun. Ho, ho! all ye nations before my prow, I bring the sun to ye!
moo moo. Mo, mo! moo mo moooooo mooooo mo mooo, M moooo moo moo mo mo!

Yoke on the further billows; hallo! a tandem, I drive the sea!"
Mooo mo moo moooooo moooooo; moooo! m mooooo, M moooo moo moo!"




But suddenly reined back by some counter thought, he hurried towards the
Moo mooooooo mooooo mooo mo mooo moooooo moooooo, mo moooooo moooooo moo

helm, huskily demanding how the ship was heading.
mooo, moooooo moooooooo moo moo mooo moo moooooo.




"East-sou-east, sir," said the frightened steersman.
"Mooo-moo-mooo, moo," mooo moo mooooooooo moooooooo.




"Thou liest!" smiting him with his clenched fist. "Heading East at this
"Mooo moooo!" moooooo moo mooo moo mooooooo mooo. "Moooooo Mooo mo mooo

hour in the morning, and the sun astern?"
mooo mo moo moooooo, moo moo moo mooooo?"




Upon this every soul was confounded; for the phenomenon just then
Mooo mooo moooo mooo moo mooooooooo; moo moo mooooooooo mooo mooo

observed by Ahab had unaccountably escaped every one else; but its very
mooooooo mo Mooo moo moooooooooooo moooooo moooo moo mooo; moo moo mooo

blinding palpableness must have been the cause.
mooooooo mooooooooooo mooo mooo mooo moo moooo.




Thrusting his head half way into the binnacle, Ahab caught one glimpse
Moooooooo moo mooo mooo moo mooo moo mooooooo, Mooo mooooo moo moooooo

of the compasses; his uplifted arm slowly fell; for a moment he almost
mo moo moooooooo; moo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo; moo m mooooo mo mooooo

seemed to stagger. Standing behind him Starbuck looked, and lo! the two
mooooo mo moooooo. Mooooooo mooooo moo Mooooooo mooooo, moo mo! moo moo

compasses pointed East, and the Pequod was as infallibly going West.
moooooooo moooooo Mooo, moo moo Mooooo moo mo mooooooooo moooo Mooo.




But ere the first wild alarm could get out abroad among the crew,
Moo moo moo moooo mooo moooo moooo moo moo mooooo moooo moo mooo,

the old man with a rigid laugh exclaimed, "I have it! It has happened
moo moo moo mooo m moooo moooo moooooooo, "M mooo mo! Mo moo mooooooo

before. Mr. Starbuck, last night's thunder turned our compasses--that's
mooooo. Mo. Mooooooo, mooo moooo'm moooooo mooooo moo moooooooo--mooo'm

all. Thou hast before now heard of such a thing, I take it."
moo. Mooo mooo mooooo moo moooo mo mooo m moooo, M mooo mo."




"Aye; but never before has it happened to me, sir," said the pale mate,
"Moo; moo moooo mooooo moo mo mooooooo mo mo, moo," mooo moo mooo mooo,

gloomily.
mooooooo.




Here, it must needs be said, that accidents like this have in more than
Mooo, mo mooo moooo mo mooo, mooo moooooooo mooo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo

one case occurred to ships in violent storms. The magnetic energy, as
moo mooo mooooooo mo moooo mo moooooo mooooo. Moo mooooooo mooooo, mo

developed in the mariner's needle, is, as all know, essentially one with
moooooooo mo moo moooooo'm mooooo, mo, mo moo mooo, moooooooooo moo mooo

the electricity beheld in heaven; hence it is not to be much marvelled
moo moooooooooo mooooo mo mooooo; moooo mo mo moo mo mo mooo moooooooo

at, that such things should be. Instances where the lightning has
mo, mooo mooo mooooo mooooo mo. Moooooooo moooo moo moooooooo moo

actually struck the vessel, so as to smite down some of the spars and
mooooooo mooooo moo mooooo, mo mo mo moooo mooo mooo mo moo moooo moo

rigging, the effect upon the needle has at times been still more fatal;
moooooo, moo mooooo mooo moo mooooo moo mo moooo mooo moooo mooo moooo;

all its loadstone virtue being annihilated, so that the before magnetic
moo moo moooooooo mooooo moooo moooooooooo, mo mooo moo mooooo mooooooo

steel was of no more use than an old wife's knitting needle. But in
moooo moo mo mo mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo'm mooooooo mooooo. Moo mo

either case, the needle never again, of itself, recovers the original
mooooo mooo, moo mooooo moooo moooo, mo mooooo, mooooooo moo mooooooo

virtue thus marred or lost; and if the binnacle compasses be affected,
mooooo mooo mooooo mo mooo; moo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo mo mooooooo,

the same fate reaches all the others that may be in the ship; even were
moo mooo mooo moooooo moo moo mooooo mooo moo mo mo moo mooo; mooo mooo

the lowermost one inserted into the kelson.
moo moooooooo moo mooooooo mooo moo mooooo.




Deliberately standing before the binnacle, and eyeing the transpointed
Mooooooooooo mooooooo mooooo moo mooooooo, moo mooooo moo mooooooooooo

compasses, the old man, with the sharp of his extended hand, now took
moooooooo, moo moo moo, mooo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo mooo, moo mooo

the precise bearing of the sun, and satisfied that the needles were
moo moooooo moooooo mo moo moo, moo moooooooo mooo moo moooooo mooo

exactly inverted, shouted out his orders for the ship's course to be
moooooo mooooooo, moooooo moo moo mooooo moo moo mooo'm mooooo mo mo

changed accordingly. The yards were hard up; and once more the Pequod
moooooo moooooooooo. Moo moooo mooo mooo mo; moo mooo mooo moo Mooooo

thrust her undaunted bows into the opposing wind, for the supposed fair
mooooo moo moooooooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo mooo, moo moo mooooooo mooo

one had only been juggling her.
moo moo mooo mooo mooooooo moo.




Meanwhile, whatever were his own secret thoughts, Starbuck said nothing,
Moooooooo, mooooooo mooo moo moo mooooo mooooooo, Mooooooo mooo moooooo,

but quietly he issued all requisite orders; while Stubb and Flask--who
moo moooooo mo mooooo moo moooooooo mooooo; moooo Moooo moo Moooo--moo

in some small degree seemed then to be sharing his feelings--likewise
mo mooo moooo mooooo mooooo mooo mo mo moooooo moo mooooooo--mooooooo

unmurmuringly acquiesced. As for the men, though some of them lowly
moooooooooooo mooooooooo. Mo moo moo moo, mooooo mooo mo mooo moooo

rumbled, their fear of Ahab was greater than their fear of Fate. But as
moooooo, moooo mooo mo Mooo moo moooooo mooo moooo mooo mo Mooo. Moo mo

ever before, the pagan harpooneers remained almost wholly unimpressed;
mooo mooooo, moo moooo moooooooooo mooooooo mooooo mooooo moooooooooo;

or if impressed, it was only with a certain magnetism shot into their
mo mo moooooooo, mo moo mooo mooo m moooooo moooooooo mooo mooo moooo

congenial hearts from inflexible Ahab's.
moooooooo mooooo mooo mooooooooo Mooo'm.




For a space the old man walked the deck in rolling reveries. But
Moo m moooo moo moo moo mooooo moo mooo mo moooooo mooooooo. Moo

chancing to slip with his ivory heel, he saw the crushed copper
mooooooo mo mooo mooo moo moooo mooo, mo moo moo moooooo mooooo

sight-tubes of the quadrant he had the day before dashed to the deck.
moooo-moooo mo moo mooooooo mo moo moo moo mooooo mooooo mo moo mooo.




"Thou poor, proud heaven-gazer and sun's pilot! yesterday I wrecked
"Mooo mooo, moooo mooooo-moooo moo moo'm moooo! moooooooo M moooooo

thee, and to-day the compasses would fain have wrecked me. So, so. But
mooo, moo mo-moo moo moooooooo moooo mooo mooo moooooo mo. Mo, mo. Moo

Ahab is lord over the level loadstone yet. Mr. Starbuck--a lance without
Mooo mo mooo mooo moo moooo moooooooo moo. Mo. Mooooooo--m moooo moooooo

a pole; a top-maul, and the smallest of the sail-maker's needles.
m mooo; m moo-mooo, moo moo mooooooo mo moo mooo-moooo'm moooooo.

Quick!"
Moooo!"




Accessory, perhaps, to the impulse dictating the thing he was now about
Moooooooo, moooooo, mo moo moooooo moooooooo moo moooo mo moo moo moooo

to do, were certain prudential motives, whose object might have been to
mo mo, mooo moooooo mooooooooo moooooo, moooo mooooo moooo mooo mooo mo

mooooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo mo m mooooo mo moo moooooo moooo, mo m

matter so wondrous as that of the inverted compasses. Besides, the old
mooooo mo mooooooo mo mooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooo. Moooooo, moo moo

man well knew that to steer by transpointed needles, though clumsily
moo mooo mooo mooo mo moooo mo mooooooooooo moooooo, mooooo mooooooo

practicable, was not a thing to be passed over by superstitious sailors,
moooooooooo, moo moo m moooo mo mo mooooo mooo mo moooooooooooo moooooo,

without some shudderings and evil portents.
moooooo mooo moooooooooo moo mooo mooooooo.




"Men," said he, steadily turning upon the crew, as the mate handed
"Moo," mooo mo, mooooooo moooooo mooo moo mooo, mo moo mooo mooooo

him the things he had demanded, "my men, the thunder turned old Ahab's
moo moo mooooo mo moo mooooooo, "mo moo, moo moooooo mooooo moo Mooo'm

needles; but out of this bit of steel Ahab can make one of his own, that
moooooo; moo moo mo mooo moo mo moooo Mooo moo mooo moo mo moo moo, mooo

will point as true as any."
mooo moooo mo mooo mo moo."




Abashed glances of servile wonder were exchanged by the sailors, as this
Moooooo moooooo mo moooooo mooooo mooo moooooooo mo moo moooooo, mo mooo

was said; and with fascinated eyes they awaited whatever magic might
moo mooo; moo mooo mooooooooo mooo mooo moooooo mooooooo moooo moooo

follow. But Starbuck looked away.
mooooo. Moo Mooooooo mooooo mooo.




With a blow from the top-maul Ahab knocked off the steel head of the
Mooo m mooo mooo moo moo-mooo Mooo moooooo moo moo moooo mooo mo moo

lance, and then handing to the mate the long iron rod remaining, bade
moooo, moo mooo moooooo mo moo mooo moo mooo mooo moo moooooooo, mooo

him hold it upright, without its touching the deck. Then, with the maul,
moo mooo mo moooooo, moooooo moo mooooooo moo mooo. Mooo, mooo moo mooo,

after repeatedly smiting the upper end of this iron rod, he placed the
moooo mooooooooo moooooo moo moooo moo mo mooo mooo moo, mo mooooo moo

blunted needle endwise on the top of it, and less strongly hammered
moooooo mooooo moooooo mo moo moo mo mo, moo mooo mooooooo mooooooo

that, several times, the mate still holding the rod as before. Then
mooo, moooooo moooo, moo mooo moooo moooooo moo moo mo mooooo. Mooo

going through some small strange motions with it--whether indispensable
moooo moooooo mooo moooo moooooo moooooo mooo mo--moooooo moooooooooooo

to the magnetizing of the steel, or merely intended to augment the awe
mo moo moooooooooo mo moo moooo, mo mooooo mooooooo mo moooooo moo moo

of the crew, is uncertain--he called for linen thread; and moving to the
mo moo mooo, mo moooooooo--mo mooooo moo moooo mooooo; moo mooooo mo moo

binnacle, slipped out the two reversed needles there, and horizontally
mooooooo, moooooo moo moo moo mooooooo moooooo moooo, moo mooooooooooo

suspended the sail-needle by its middle, over one of the compass-cards.
moooooooo moo mooo-mooooo mo moo mooooo, mooo moo mo moo moooooo-moooo.

At first, the steel went round and round, quivering and vibrating at
Mo moooo, moo moooo mooo moooo moo moooo, moooooooo moo moooooooo mo

either end; but at last it settled to its place, when Ahab, who had
mooooo moo; moo mo mooo mo moooooo mo moo moooo, mooo Mooo, moo moo

been intently watching for this result, stepped frankly back from the
mooo mooooooo mooooooo moo mooo mooooo, moooooo moooooo mooo mooo moo

binnacle, and pointing his stretched arm towards it, exclaimed,--"Look
mooooooo, moo mooooooo moo moooooooo moo moooooo mo, moooooooo,--"Mooo

ye, for yourselves, if Ahab be not lord of the level loadstone! The sun
mo, moo mooooooooo, mo Mooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooo moooooooo! Moo moo

is East, and that compass swears it!"
mo Mooo, moo mooo moooooo mooooo mo!"




One after another they peered in, for nothing but their own eyes could
Moo moooo moooooo mooo mooooo mo, moo moooooo moo moooo moo mooo moooo

persuade such ignorance as theirs, and one after another they slunk
mooooooo mooo moooooooo mo mooooo, moo moo moooo moooooo mooo moooo

away.
mooo.




In his fiery eyes of scorn and triumph, you then saw Ahab in all his
Mo moo moooo mooo mo moooo moo moooooo, moo mooo moo Mooo mo moo moo

fatal pride.
moooo moooo.










CHAPTER 125. The Log and Line.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Moo moo Mooo.







While now the fated Pequod had been so long afloat this voyage, the log
Moooo moo moo moooo Mooooo moo mooo mo mooo mooooo mooo mooooo, moo moo

and line had but very seldom been in use. Owing to a confident reliance
moo mooo moo moo mooo mooooo mooo mo moo. Moooo mo m moooooooo mooooooo

upon other means of determining the vessel's place, some merchantmen,
mooo moooo moooo mo moooooooooo moo mooooo'm moooo, mooo moooooooooo,

and many whalemen, especially when cruising, wholly neglect to heave the
moo mooo mooooooo, mooooooooo mooo mooooooo, mooooo moooooo mo moooo moo

log; though at the same time, and frequently more for form's sake than
moo; mooooo mo moo mooo mooo, moo mooooooooo mooo moo mooo'm mooo mooo

anything else, regularly putting down upon the customary slate the
mooooooo mooo, moooooooo moooooo mooo mooo moo moooooooo moooo moo

course steered by the ship, as well as the presumed average rate of
mooooo moooooo mo moo mooo, mo mooo mo moo mooooooo moooooo mooo mo

progression every hour. It had been thus with the Pequod. The wooden
moooooooooo moooo mooo. Mo moo mooo mooo mooo moo Mooooo. Moo mooooo

reel and angular log attached hung, long untouched, just beneath the
mooo moo moooooo moo mooooooo mooo, mooo moooooooo, mooo moooooo moo

railing of the after bulwarks. Rains and spray had damped it; sun and
moooooo mo moo moooo mooooooo. Moooo moo moooo moo mooooo mo; moo moo

wind had warped it; all the elements had combined to rot a thing that
mooo moo mooooo mo; moo moo mooooooo moo mooooooo mo moo m moooo mooo

hung so idly. But heedless of all this, his mood seized Ahab, as he
mooo mo mooo. Moo mooooooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo mooooo Mooo, mo mo

happened to glance upon the reel, not many hours after the magnet scene,
mooooooo mo mooooo mooo moo mooo, moo mooo moooo moooo moo mooooo moooo,

and he remembered how his quadrant was no more, and recalled his frantic
moo mo mooooooooo moo moo mooooooo moo mo mooo, moo mooooooo moo moooooo

oath about the level log and line. The ship was sailing plungingly;
mooo moooo moo moooo moo moo mooo. Moo mooo moo moooooo mooooooooo;

astern the billows rolled in riots.
mooooo moo moooooo mooooo mo moooo.




"Forward, there! Heave the log!"
"Moooooo, moooo! Moooo moo moo!"




Two seamen came. The golden-hued Tahitian and the grizzly Manxman. "Take
Moo mooooo mooo. Moo mooooo-mooo Mooooooo moo moo moooooo Moooooo. "Mooo

the reel, one of ye, I'll heave."
moo mooo, moo mo mo, M'mo moooo."




They went towards the extreme stern, on the ship's lee side, where the
Mooo mooo moooooo moo moooooo moooo, mo moo mooo'm moo mooo, moooo moo

deck, with the oblique energy of the wind, was now almost dipping into
mooo, mooo moo moooooo mooooo mo moo mooo, moo moo mooooo moooooo mooo

the creamy, sidelong-rushing sea.
moo mooooo, mooooooo-moooooo moo.




The Manxman took the reel, and holding it high up, by the projecting
Moo Moooooo mooo moo mooo, moo moooooo mo mooo mo, mo moo mooooooooo

handle-ends of the spindle, round which the spool of line revolved, so
mooooo-mooo mo moo moooooo, moooo moooo moo moooo mo mooo mooooooo, mo

stood with the angular log hanging downwards, till Ahab advanced to him.
moooo mooo moo moooooo moo moooooo moooooooo, mooo Mooo mooooooo mo moo.




Ahab stood before him, and was lightly unwinding some thirty or forty
Mooo moooo mooooo moo, moo moo moooooo moooooooo mooo mooooo mo moooo

turns to form a preliminary hand-coil to toss overboard, when the old
moooo mo mooo m moooooooooo mooo-mooo mo mooo moooooooo, mooo moo moo

Manxman, who was intently eyeing both him and the line, made bold to
Moooooo, moo moo mooooooo mooooo mooo moo moo moo mooo, mooo mooo mo

speak.
moooo.




"Sir, I mistrust it; this line looks far gone, long heat and wet have
"Moo, M mooooooo mo; mooo mooo moooo moo mooo, mooo mooo moo moo mooo

spoiled it."
moooooo mo."




"'Twill hold, old gentleman. Long heat and wet, have they spoiled thee?
"'Moooo mooo, moo moooooooo. Mooo mooo moo moo, mooo mooo moooooo mooo?

Thou seem'st to hold. Or, truer perhaps, life holds thee; not thou it."
Mooo mooo'mo mo mooo. Mo, moooo moooooo, mooo moooo mooo; moo mooo mo."




"I hold the spool, sir. But just as my captain says. With these
"M mooo moo moooo, moo. Moo mooo mo mo moooooo mooo. Mooo moooo

grey hairs of mine 'tis not worth while disputing, 'specially with a
mooo moooo mo mooo 'moo moo moooo moooo moooooooo, 'moooooooo mooo m

superior, who'll ne'er confess."
mooooooo, moo'mo mo'mo moooooo."




"What's that? There now's a patched professor in Queen Nature's
"Mooo'm mooo? Moooo moo'm m moooooo moooooooo mo Moooo Mooooo'm

granite-founded College; but methinks he's too subservient. Where wert
moooooo-moooooo Moooooo; moo mooooooo mo'm moo moooooooooo. Moooo mooo

thou born?"
mooo mooo?"




"In the little rocky Isle of Man, sir."
"Mo moo mooooo moooo Mooo mo Moo, moo."




"Excellent! Thou'st hit the world by that."
"Moooooooo! Mooo'mo moo moo moooo mo mooo."




"I know not, sir, but I was born there."
"M mooo moo, moo, moo M moo mooo moooo."




"In the Isle of Man, hey? Well, the other way, it's good. Here's a man
"Mo moo Mooo mo Moo, moo? Mooo, moo moooo moo, mo'm mooo. Mooo'm m moo

from Man; a man born in once independent Man, and now unmanned of Man;
mooo Moo; m moo mooo mo mooo moooooooooo Moo, moo moo mooooooo mo Moo;

which is sucked in--by what? Up with the reel! The dead, blind wall
moooo mo mooooo mo--mo mooo? Mo mooo moo mooo! Moo mooo, moooo mooo

butts all inquiring heads at last. Up with it! So."
moooo moo moooooooo moooo mo mooo. Mo mooo mo! Mo."




The log was heaved. The loose coils rapidly straightened out in a long
Moo moo moo mooooo. Moo moooo moooo moooooo mooooooooooo moo mo m mooo

dragging line astern, and then, instantly, the reel began to whirl. In
mooooooo mooo mooooo, moo mooo, moooooooo, moo mooo moooo mo moooo. Mo

turn, jerkingly raised and lowered by the rolling billows, the towing
mooo, moooooooo mooooo moo moooooo mo moo moooooo moooooo, moo mooooo

resistance of the log caused the old reelman to stagger strangely.
mooooooooo mo moo moo mooooo moo moo moooooo mo moooooo moooooooo.




"Hold hard!"
"Mooo mooo!"




Snap! the overstrained line sagged down in one long festoon; the tugging
Mooo! moo mooooooooooo mooo mooooo mooo mo moo mooo moooooo; moo moooooo

log was gone.
moo moo mooo.




"I crush the quadrant, the thunder turns the needles, and now the mad
"M moooo moo mooooooo, moo moooooo moooo moo moooooo, moo moo moo moo

sea parts the log-line. But Ahab can mend all. Haul in here, Tahitian;
moo moooo moo moo-mooo. Moo Mooo moo mooo moo. Mooo mo mooo, Mooooooo;

reel up, Manxman. And look ye, let the carpenter make another log, and
mooo mo, Moooooo. Moo mooo mo, moo moo moooooooo mooo moooooo moo, moo

mend thou the line. See to it."
mooo mooo moo mooo. Moo mo mo."




"There he goes now; to him nothing's happened; but to me, the skewer
"Moooo mo mooo moo; mo moo moooooo'm mooooooo; moo mo mo, moo mooooo

seems loosening out of the middle of the world. Haul in, haul in,
moooo moooooooo moo mo moo mooooo mo moo moooo. Mooo mo, mooo mo,

Tahitian! These lines run whole, and whirling out: come in broken, and
Mooooooo! Moooo moooo moo moooo, moo mooooooo moo: mooo mo mooooo, moo

dragging slow. Ha, Pip? come to help; eh, Pip?"
mooooooo mooo. Mo, Moo? mooo mo mooo; mo, Moo?"




"Pip? whom call ye Pip? Pip jumped from the whale-boat. Pip's missing.
"Moo? mooo mooo mo Moo? Moo mooooo mooo moo moooo-mooo. Moo'm moooooo.

Let's see now if ye haven't fished him up here, fisherman. It drags
Moo'm moo moo mo mo moooo'm mooooo moo mo mooo, moooooooo. Mo moooo

hard; I guess he's holding on. Jerk him, Tahiti! Jerk him off; we haul
mooo; M moooo mo'm moooooo mo. Mooo moo, Mooooo! Mooo moo moo; mo mooo

in no cowards here. Ho! there's his arm just breaking water. A hatchet!
mo mo moooooo mooo. Mo! moooo'm moo moo mooo mooooooo moooo. M moooooo!

a hatchet! cut it off--we haul in no cowards here. Captain Ahab! sir,
m moooooo! moo mo moo--mo mooo mo mo moooooo mooo. Moooooo Mooo! moo,

sir! here's Pip, trying to get on board again."
moo! mooo'm Moo, mooooo mo moo mo moooo moooo."




"Peace, thou crazy loon," cried the Manxman, seizing him by the arm.
"Moooo, mooo moooo mooo," moooo moo Moooooo, moooooo moo mo moo moo.

"Away from the quarter-deck!"
"Mooo mooo moo moooooo-mooo!"




"The greater idiot ever scolds the lesser," muttered Ahab, advancing.
"Moo moooooo moooo mooo mooooo moo mooooo," mooooooo Mooo, moooooooo.

"Hands off from that holiness! Where sayest thou Pip was, boy?
"Moooo moo mooo mooo mooooooo! Moooo mooooo mooo Moo moo, moo?




"Astern there, sir, astern! Lo! lo!"
"Mooooo moooo, moo, mooooo! Mo! mo!"




"And who art thou, boy? I see not my reflection in the vacant pupils of
"Moo moo moo mooo, moo? M moo moo mo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo mooooo mo

thy eyes. Oh God! that man should be a thing for immortal souls to sieve
moo mooo. Mo Moo! mooo moo mooooo mo m moooo moo mooooooo moooo mo moooo

through! Who art thou, boy?"
moooooo! Moo moo mooo, moo?"




"Bell-boy, sir; ship's-crier; ding, dong, ding! Pip! Pip! Pip!
"Mooo-moo, moo; mooo'm-moooo; mooo, mooo, mooo! Moo! Moo! Moo!

One hundred pounds of clay reward for Pip; five feet high--looks
Moo moooooo mooooo mo mooo mooooo moo Moo; mooo mooo mooo--moooo

cowardly--quickest known by that! Ding, dong, ding! Who's seen Pip the
mooooooo--mooooooo moooo mo mooo! Mooo, mooo, mooo! Moo'm mooo Moo moo

coward?"
mooooo?"




"There can be no hearts above the snow-line. Oh, ye frozen heavens! look
"Moooo moo mo mo mooooo moooo moo mooo-mooo. Mo, mo mooooo moooooo! mooo

down here. Ye did beget this luckless child, and have abandoned him,
mooo mooo. Mo moo moooo mooo mooooooo moooo, moo mooo moooooooo moo,

ye creative libertines. Here, boy; Ahab's cabin shall be Pip's home
mo mooooooo mooooooooo. Mooo, moo; Mooo'm moooo moooo mo Moo'm mooo

mooooooooo, moooo Mooo moooo. Mooo mooooooo mo mooooo mooooo, moo; mooo

art tied to me by cords woven of my heart-strings. Come, let's down."
moo mooo mo mo mo moooo moooo mo mo moooo-moooooo. Mooo, moo'm mooo."




"What's this? here's velvet shark-skin," intently gazing at Ahab's hand,
"Mooo'm mooo? mooo'm mooooo moooo-mooo," mooooooo mooooo mo Mooo'm mooo,

and feeling it. "Ah, now, had poor Pip but felt so kind a thing as this,
moo moooooo mo. "Mo, moo, moo mooo Moo moo mooo mo mooo m moooo mo mooo,

moooooo mo moo mo'mo mooo mooo! Mooo moooo mo mo, moo, mo m moo-mooo;

and rivet these two hands together; the black one with the white, for I
moo moooo moooo moo moooo mooooooo; moo moooo moo mooo moo moooo, moo M

will not let this go."
mooo moo moo mooo mo."




"Oh, boy, nor will I thee, unless I should thereby drag thee to worse
"Mo, moo, moo mooo M mooo, mooooo M mooooo moooooo mooo mooo mo moooo

horrors than are here. Come, then, to my cabin. Lo! ye believers in
moooooo mooo moo mooo. Mooo, mooo, mo mo moooo. Mo! mo moooooooo mo

gods all goodness, and in man all ill, lo you! see the omniscient gods
mooo moo mooooooo, moo mo moo moo moo, mo moo! moo moo mooooooooo mooo

moooooooo mo moooooooo moo; moo moo, mooooo moooooo, moo moooooo moo

mooo mo mooo, moo mooo mo moo moooo mooooo mo mooo moo moooooooo. Mooo!

I feel prouder leading thee by thy black hand, than though I grasped an
M mooo moooooo moooooo mooo mo moo moooo mooo, mooo mooooo M moooooo mo

Emperor's!"
Moooooo'm!"




"There go two daft ones now," muttered the old Manxman. "One daft with
"Moooo mo moo mooo mooo moo," mooooooo moo moo Moooooo. "Moo mooo mooo
