line altogether. I'll see Mr. Stubb about it."
mooo mooooooooo. M'mo moo Mo. Moooo moooo mo."










CHAPTER 126. The Life-Buoy.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Mooo-Mooo.







Steering now south-eastward by Ahab's levelled steel, and her progress
Mooooooo moo moooo-mooooooo mo Mooo'm mooooooo moooo, moo moo mooooooo

solely determined by Ahab's level log and line; the Pequod held on
mooooo mooooooooo mo Mooo'm moooo moo moo mooo; moo Mooooo mooo mo

her path towards the Equator. Making so long a passage through such
moo mooo moooooo moo Moooooo. Mooooo mo mooo m moooooo moooooo mooo

unfrequented waters, descrying no ships, and ere long, sideways impelled
mooooooooooo mooooo, moooooooo mo moooo, moo moo mooo, mooooooo mooooooo

by unvarying trade winds, over waves monotonously mild; all these seemed
mo moooooooo moooo moooo, mooo moooo mooooooooooo mooo; moo moooo mooooo

the strange calm things preluding some riotous and desperate scene.
moo moooooo mooo mooooo moooooooo mooo moooooo moo moooooooo moooo.




At last, when the ship drew near to the outskirts, as it were, of the
Mo mooo, mooo moo mooo mooo mooo mo moo moooooooo, mo mo mooo, mo moo

Equatorial fishing-ground, and in the deep darkness that goes before the
Mooooooooo moooooo-mooooo, moo mo moo mooo mooooooo mooo mooo mooooo moo

dawn, was sailing by a cluster of rocky islets; the watch--then headed
mooo, moo moooooo mo m moooooo mo moooo mooooo; moo moooo--mooo mooooo

by Flask--was startled by a cry so plaintively wild and unearthly--like
mo Moooo--moo mooooooo mo m moo mo moooooooooo mooo moo moooooooo--mooo

half-articulated wailings of the ghosts of all Herod's murdered
mooo-moooooooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooo mo moo Moooo'm mooooooo

Innocents--that one and all, they started from their reveries, and for
Moooooooo--mooo moo moo moo, mooo moooooo mooo moooo mooooooo, moo moo

the space of some moments stood, or sat, or leaned all transfixedly
moo moooo mo mooo moooooo moooo, mo moo, mo mooooo moo mooooooooooo

listening, like the carved Roman slave, while that wild cry remained
moooooooo, mooo moo mooooo Moooo moooo, moooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo

within hearing. The Christian or civilized part of the crew said it was
mooooo moooooo. Moo Moooooooo mo moooooooo mooo mo moo mooo mooo mo moo

mermaids, and shuddered; but the pagan harpooneers remained unappalled.
mooooooo, moo moooooooo; moo moo moooo moooooooooo mooooooo mooooooooo.

Yet the grey Manxman--the oldest mariner of all--declared that the wild
Moo moo mooo Moooooo--moo mooooo moooooo mo moo--mooooooo mooo moo mooo

thrilling sounds that were heard, were the voices of newly drowned men
moooooooo mooooo mooo mooo moooo, mooo moo mooooo mo moooo moooooo moo

in the sea.
mo moo moo.




Below in his hammock, Ahab did not hear of this till grey dawn, when
Moooo mo moo moooooo, Mooo moo moo mooo mo mooo mooo mooo mooo, mooo

he came to the deck; it was then recounted to him by Flask, not
mo mooo mo moo mooo; mo moo mooo moooooooo mo moo mo Moooo, moo

unaccompanied with hinted dark meanings. He hollowly laughed, and thus
moooooooooooo mooo mooooo mooo mooooooo. Mo mooooooo moooooo, moo mooo

explained the wonder.
moooooooo moo mooooo.




Those rocky islands the ship had passed were the resort of great numbers
Moooo moooo moooooo moo mooo moo mooooo mooo moo mooooo mo moooo moooooo

of seals, and some young seals that had lost their dams, or some dams
mo moooo, moo mooo moooo moooo mooo moo mooo moooo mooo, mo mooo mooo

that had lost their cubs, must have risen nigh the ship and kept company
mooo moo mooo moooo mooo, mooo mooo moooo mooo moo mooo moo mooo moooooo

with her, crying and sobbing with their human sort of wail. But this
mooo moo, mooooo moo moooooo mooo moooo moooo mooo mo mooo. Moo mooo

only the more affected some of them, because most mariners cherish a
mooo moo mooo mooooooo mooo mo mooo, moooooo mooo mooooooo moooooo m

very superstitious feeling about seals, arising not only from their
mooo moooooooooooo moooooo moooo moooo, moooooo moo mooo mooo moooo

peculiar tones when in distress, but also from the human look of their
mooooooo moooo mooo mo mooooooo, moo mooo mooo moo moooo mooo mo moooo

round heads and semi-intelligent faces, seen peeringly uprising from
moooo moooo moo mooo-moooooooooo moooo, mooo moooooooo mooooooo mooo

the water alongside. In the sea, under certain circumstances, seals have
moo moooo moooooooo. Mo moo moo, moooo moooooo moooooooooooo, moooo mooo

more than once been mistaken for men.
mooo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo moo moo.




But the bodings of the crew were destined to receive a most plausible
Moo moo moooooo mo moo mooo mooo mooooooo mo moooooo m mooo moooooooo

confirmation in the fate of one of their number that morning. At
mooooooooooo mo moo mooo mo moo mo moooo mooooo mooo moooooo. Mo

sun-rise this man went from his hammock to his mast-head at the fore;
moo-mooo mooo moo mooo mooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo-mooo mo moo mooo;

and whether it was that he was not yet half waked from his sleep (for
moo moooooo mo moo mooo mo moo moo moo mooo moooo mooo moo moooo (moo

sailors sometimes go aloft in a transition state), whether it was thus
moooooo moooooooo mo moooo mo m mooooooooo moooo), moooooo mo moo mooo

with the man, there is now no telling; but, be that as it may, he
mooo moo moo, moooo mo moo mo moooooo; moo, mo mooo mo mo moo, mo

had not been long at his perch, when a cry was heard--a cry and a
moo moo mooo mooo mo moo moooo, mooo m moo moo moooo--m moo moo m

rushing--and looking up, they saw a falling phantom in the air; and
moooooo--moo moooooo mo, mooo moo m moooooo moooooo mo moo moo; moo

looking down, a little tossed heap of white bubbles in the blue of the
moooooo mooo, m mooooo mooooo mooo mo moooo moooooo mo moo mooo mo moo

sea.
moo.




The life-buoy--a long slender cask--was dropped from the stern, where it
Moo mooo-mooo--m mooo moooooo mooo--moo moooooo mooo moo moooo, moooo mo

always hung obedient to a cunning spring; but no hand rose to seize it,
mooooo mooo mooooooo mo m moooooo mooooo; moo mo mooo mooo mo moooo mo,

and the sun having long beat upon this cask it had shrunken, so that it
moo moo moo mooooo mooo mooo mooo mooo mooo mo moo mooooooo, mo mooo mo

slowly filled, and that parched wood also filled at its every pore; and
mooooo mooooo, moo mooo moooooo mooo mooo mooooo mo moo moooo mooo; moo

the studded iron-bound cask followed the sailor to the bottom, as if to
moo moooooo mooo-moooo mooo mooooooo moo mooooo mo moo mooooo, mo mo mo

yield him his pillow, though in sooth but a hard one.
moooo moo moo mooooo, mooooo mo moooo moo m mooo moo.




And thus the first man of the Pequod that mounted the mast to look out
Moo mooo moo moooo moo mo moo Mooooo mooo moooooo moo mooo mo mooo moo

for the White Whale, on the White Whale's own peculiar ground; that man
moo moo Moooo Moooo, mo moo Moooo Moooo'm moo mooooooo mooooo; mooo moo

was swallowed up in the deep. But few, perhaps, thought of that at the
moo moooooooo mo mo moo mooo. Moo moo, moooooo, moooooo mo mooo mo moo

time. Indeed, in some sort, they were not grieved at this event, at
mooo. Mooooo, mo mooo mooo, mooo mooo moo moooooo mo mooo moooo, mo

least as a portent; for they regarded it, not as a foreshadowing of evil
moooo mo m moooooo; moo mooo mooooooo mo, moo mo m moooooooooooo mo mooo

in the future, but as the fulfilment of an evil already presaged. They
mo moo mooooo, moo mo moo mooooooooo mo mo mooo moooooo mooooooo. Mooo

declared that now they knew the reason of those wild shrieks they had
mooooooo mooo moo mooo mooo moo mooooo mo moooo mooo moooooo mooo moo

heard the night before. But again the old Manxman said nay.
moooo moo moooo mooooo. Moo moooo moo moo Moooooo mooo moo.




The lost life-buoy was now to be replaced; Starbuck was directed to see
Moo mooo mooo-mooo moo moo mo mo mooooooo; Mooooooo moo mooooooo mo moo

to it; but as no cask of sufficient lightness could be found, and as
mo mo; moo mo mo mooo mo mooooooooo moooooooo moooo mo moooo, moo mo

in the feverish eagerness of what seemed the approaching crisis of
mo moo mooooooo moooooooo mo mooo mooooo moo moooooooooo mooooo mo

the voyage, all hands were impatient of any toil but what was directly
moo mooooo, moo moooo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooo moo mooo moo mooooooo

moooooooo mooo moo moooo moo, mooooooo mooo moooo moooo mo mo;

therefore, they were going to leave the ship's stern unprovided with a
moooooooo, mooo mooo moooo mo moooo moo mooo'm moooo mooooooooo mooo m

buoy, when by certain strange signs and inuendoes Queequeg hinted a hint
mooo, mooo mo moooooo moooooo moooo moo moooooooo Mooooooo mooooo m mooo

concerning his coffin.
mooooooooo moo mooooo.




"A life-buoy of a coffin!" cried Starbuck, starting.
"M mooo-mooo mo m mooooo!" moooo Mooooooo, mooooooo.




"Rather queer, that, I should say," said Stubb.
"Mooooo moooo, mooo, M mooooo moo," mooo Moooo.




"It will make a good enough one," said Flask, "the carpenter here can
"Mo mooo mooo m mooo mooooo moo," mooo Moooo, "moo moooooooo mooo moo

arrange it easily."
moooooo mo mooooo."




"Bring it up; there's nothing else for it," said Starbuck, after a
"Moooo mo mo; moooo'm moooooo mooo moo mo," mooo Mooooooo, moooo m

melancholy pause. "Rig it, carpenter; do not look at me so--the coffin,
mooooooooo moooo. "Moo mo, moooooooo; mo moo mooo mo mo mo--moo mooooo,

I mean. Dost thou hear me? Rig it."
M mooo. Mooo mooo mooo mo? Moo mo."




"And shall I nail down the lid, sir?" moving his hand as with a hammer.
"Moo moooo M mooo mooo moo moo, moo?" mooooo moo mooo mo mooo m mooooo.




"Aye."
"Moo."




"And shall I caulk the seams, sir?" moving his hand as with a
"Moo moooo M moooo moo moooo, moo?" mooooo moo mooo mo mooo m

caulking-iron.
mooooooo-mooo.




"Aye."
"Moo."




"And shall I then pay over the same with pitch, sir?" moving his hand as

with a pitch-pot.
mooo m moooo-moo.




"Away! what possesses thee to this? Make a life-buoy of the coffin, and
"Mooo! mooo moooooooo mooo mo mooo? Mooo m mooo-mooo mo moo mooooo, moo

no more.--Mr. Stubb, Mr. Flask, come forward with me."
mo mooo.--Mo. Moooo, Mo. Moooo, mooo moooooo mooo mo."




"He goes off in a huff. The whole he can endure; at the parts he baulks.
"Mo mooo moo mo m mooo. Moo moooo mo moo mooooo; mo moo moooo mo mooooo.

Now I don't like this. I make a leg for Captain Ahab, and he wears it
Moo M moo'm mooo mooo. M mooo m moo moo Moooooo Mooo, moo mo moooo mo

like a gentleman; but I make a bandbox for Queequeg, and he won't put
mooo m moooooooo; moo M mooo m moooooo moo Mooooooo, moo mo moo'm moo

his head into it. Are all my pains to go for nothing with that coffin?
moo mooo mooo mo. Moo moo mo moooo mo mo moo moooooo mooo mooo mooooo?

And now I'm ordered to make a life-buoy of it. It's like turning an old
Moo moo M'm moooooo mo mooo m mooo-mooo mo mo. Mo'm mooo moooooo mo moo

coat; going to bring the flesh on the other side now. I don't like this
mooo; moooo mo moooo moo moooo mo moo moooo mooo moo. M moo'm mooo mooo

cobbling sort of business--I don't like it at all; it's undignified;
mooooooo mooo mo mooooooo--M moo'm mooo mo mo moo; mo'm moooooooooo;

it's not my place. Let tinkers' brats do tinkerings; we are their
mo'm moo mo moooo. Moo moooooo' moooo mo mooooooooo; mo moo moooo

betters. I like to take in hand none but clean, virgin, fair-and-square
moooooo. M mooo mo mooo mo mooo mooo moo moooo, mooooo, mooo-moo-mooooo

mathematical jobs, something that regularly begins at the beginning, and
mooooooooooo mooo, moooooooo mooo moooooooo mooooo mo moo moooooooo, moo

is at the middle when midway, and comes to an end at the conclusion; not
mo mo moo mooooo mooo mooooo, moo moooo mo mo moo mo moo mooooooooo; moo

a cobbler's job, that's at an end in the middle, and at the beginning at
m moooooo'm moo, mooo'm mo mo moo mo moo mooooo, moo mo moo moooooooo mo

the end. It's the old woman's tricks to be giving cobbling jobs. Lord!
moo moo. Mo'm moo moo moooo'm mooooo mo mo mooooo mooooooo mooo. Mooo!

what an affection all old women have for tinkers. I know an old woman of
mooo mo moooooooo moo moo moooo mooo moo moooooo. M mooo mo moo moooo mo

sixty-five who ran away with a bald-headed young tinker once. And that's
moooo-mooo moo moo mooo mooo m mooo-mooooo moooo mooooo mooo. Moo mooo'm

the reason I never would work for lonely widow old women ashore, when
moo mooooo M moooo moooo mooo moo mooooo moooo moo moooo mooooo, mooo

I kept my job-shop in the Vineyard; they might have taken it into their
M mooo mo moo-mooo mo moo Mooooooo; mooo moooo mooo moooo mo mooo moooo

lonely old heads to run off with me. But heigh-ho! there are no caps at
mooooo moo moooo mo moo moo mooo mo. Moo moooo-mo! moooo moo mo mooo mo

sea but snow-caps. Let me see. Nail down the lid; caulk the seams; pay
moo moo mooo-mooo. Moo mo moo. Mooo mooo moo moo; moooo moo moooo; moo

over the same with pitch; batten them down tight, and hang it with the
mooo moo mooo mooo moooo; mooooo mooo mooo moooo, moo mooo mo mooo moo

snap-spring over the ship's stern. Were ever such things done before
mooo-mooooo mooo moo mooo'm moooo. Mooo mooo mooo mooooo mooo mooooo

with a coffin? Some superstitious old carpenters, now, would be tied
mooo m mooooo? Mooo moooooooooooo moo mooooooooo, moo, moooo mo mooo

up in the rigging, ere they would do the job. But I'm made of knotty
mo mo moo moooooo, moo mooo moooo mo moo moo. Moo M'm mooo mo mooooo

Aroostook hemlock; I don't budge. Cruppered with a coffin! Sailing
Moooooooo moooooo; M moo'm moooo. Moooooooo mooo m mooooo! Moooooo

about with a grave-yard tray! But never mind. We workers in woods make
moooo mooo m moooo-mooo mooo! Moo moooo mooo. Mo moooooo mo moooo mooo

bridal-bedsteads and card-tables, as well as coffins and hearses. We
mooooo-moooooooo moo mooo-mooooo, mo mooo mo moooooo moo moooooo. Mo

work by the month, or by the job, or by the profit; not for us to ask
mooo mo moo moooo, mo mo moo moo, mo mo moo mooooo; moo moo mo mo moo

the why and wherefore of our work, unless it be too confounded cobbling,
moo moo moo moooooooo mo moo mooo, mooooo mo mo moo mooooooooo mooooooo,

and then we stash it if we can. Hem! I'll do the job, now, tenderly.
moo mooo mo moooo mo mo mo moo. Moo! M'mo mo moo moo, moo, mooooooo.

I'll have me--let's see--how many in the ship's company, all told? But
M'mo mooo mo--moo'm moo--moo mooo mo moo mooo'm moooooo, moo mooo? Moo

I've forgotten. Any way, I'll have me thirty separate, Turk's-headed
M'mo moooooooo. Moo moo, M'mo mooo mo mooooo mooooooo, Mooo'm-mooooo

life-lines, each three feet long hanging all round to the coffin. Then,
mooo-moooo, mooo moooo mooo mooo moooooo moo moooo mo moo mooooo. Mooo,

if the hull go down, there'll be thirty lively fellows all fighting for
mo moo mooo mo mooo, moooo'mo mo mooooo mooooo moooooo moo mooooooo moo

one coffin, a sight not seen very often beneath the sun! Come hammer,
moo mooooo, m moooo moo mooo mooo moooo moooooo moo moo! Mooo mooooo,

caulking-iron, pitch-pot, and marling-spike! Let's to it."
mooooooo-mooo, moooo-moo, moo moooooo-moooo! Moo'm mo mo."










CHAPTER 127. The Deck.

"Back, lad; I will be with ye again presently. He goes! Not this hand

mooooo! Mooo'm mooo?"

"Mooo-mooo, moo. Mo. Mooooooo'm mooooo. Mo, mooo, moo! Mooooo moo

hatchway!"
mooooooo!"

shop?"
mooo?"




"I believe it did, sir; does the ferrule stand, sir?"

they've set me now to turning it into something else."
mooo'mo moo mo moo mo moooooo mo mooo moooooooo mooo."

jack-of-all-trades."
mooo-mo-moo-mooooo."




"But I do not mean anything, sir. I do as I do."
"Moo M mo moo mooo mooooooo, moo. M mo mo M mo."




"The gods again. Hark ye, dost thou not ever sing working about a
"Moo mooo moooo. Mooo mo, mooo mooo moo mooo mooo moooooo moooo m

coffin? The Titans, they say, hummed snatches when chipping out the
mooooo? Moo Mooooo, mooo moo, mooooo mooooooo mooo mooooooo moo moo

craters for volcanoes; and the grave-digger in the play sings, spade in
moooooo moo moooooooo; moo moo moooo-mooooo mo moo mooo moooo, moooo mo

hand. Dost thou never?"
mooo. Mooo mooo moooo?"




"Sing, sir? Do I sing? Oh, I'm indifferent enough, sir, for that; but
"Mooo, moo? Mo M mooo? Mo, M'm moooooooooo mooooo, moo, moo mooo; moo

the reason why the grave-digger made music must have been because there
moo mooooo moo moo moooo-mooooo mooo moooo mooo mooo mooo moooooo moooo

moo mooo mo moo moooo, moo. Moo moo mooooooo mooooo mo mooo mo mo. Mooo

to it."
mo mo."




"Aye, and that's because the lid there's a sounding-board; and what in
"Moo, moo mooo'm moooooo moo moo moooo'm m mooooooo-moooo; moo mooo mo

all things makes the sounding-board is this--there's naught beneath. And
moo mooooo moooo moo mooooooo-moooo mo mooo--moooo'm mooooo moooooo. Moo

moo, m mooooo mooo m mooo mo mo moooo mooooo mooo moo mooo, Moooooooo.

moo mooooooooo mooo, moooo mo?

sir."
moo."




"Um, um; go on."
"Mo, mo; mo mo."




"I was about to say, sir, that--"
"M moo moooo mo moo, moo, mooo--"




"Art thou a silk-worm? Dost thou spin thy own shroud out of thyself?
"Moo mooo m mooo-mooo? Mooo mooo mooo moo moo mooooo moo mo moooooo?

Mooo mo moo moooo! Mooooooo! moo moo moooo moooo moo mo moooo."




"He goes aft. That was sudden, now; but squalls come sudden in hot
"Mo mooo moo. Mooo moo mooooo, moo; moo moooooo mooo mooooo mo moo

latitudes. I've heard that the Isle of Albemarle, one of the Gallipagos,
moooooooo. M'mo moooo mooo moo Mooo mo Moooooooo, moo mo moo Mooooooooo,

mo moo mo moo Moooooo moooo mo moo mooooo. Moooo mo mo mooo mooo mo

Moooooo mooo moo moo moo, moo, moooo mo moo mooooo. Mo'm mooooo moooo

the Line--fiery hot, I tell ye! He's looking this way--come, oakum;

quick. Here we go again. This wooden mallet is the cork, and I'm the
moooo. Mooo mo mo moooo. Mooo mooooo mooooo mo moo mooo, moo M'm moo

professor of musical glasses--tap, tap!"
moooooooo mo moooooo moooooo--moo, moo!"




(AHAB TO HIMSELF.)
(MOOO MO MOOOOOO.)




"There's a sight! There's a sound! The grey-headed woodpecker tapping
"Moooo'm m moooo! Moooo'm m moooo! Moo mooo-mooooo mooooooooo moooooo

the hollow tree! Blind and dumb might well be envied now. See! that
moo mooooo mooo! Moooo moo mooo moooo mooo mo mooooo moo. Moo! mooo

thing rests on two line-tubs, full of tow-lines. A most malicious wag,
moooo moooo mo moo mooo-mooo, mooo mo moo-moooo. M mooo moooooooo moo,

that fellow. Rat-tat! So man's seconds tick! Oh! how immaterial are all
mooo mooooo. Moo-moo! Mo moo'm moooooo mooo! Mo! moo mooooooooo moo moo

materials! What things real are there, but imponderable thoughts? Here
moooooooo! Mooo mooooo mooo moo moooo, moo mooooooooooo mooooooo? Mooo

now's the very dreaded symbol of grim death, by a mere hap, made
moo'm moo mooo moooooo mooooo mo mooo moooo, mo m mooo moo, mooo

the expressive sign of the help and hope of most endangered life.
moo mooooooooo mooo mo moo mooo moo mooo mo mooo mooooooooo mooo.

A life-buoy of a coffin! Does it go further? Can it be that in some
M mooo-mooo mo m mooooo! Mooo mo mo moooooo? Moo mo mo mooo mo mooo

spiritual sense the coffin is, after all, but an immortality-preserver!
moooooooo moooo moo mooooo mo, moooo moo, moo mo moooooooooo-moooooooo!

I'll think of that. But no. So far gone am I in the dark side of earth,
M'mo moooo mo mooo. Moo mo. Mo moo mooo mo M mo moo mooo mooo mo moooo,

that its other side, the theoretic bright one, seems but uncertain
mooo moo moooo mooo, moo moooooooo mooooo moo, moooo moo moooooooo

twilight to me. Will ye never have done, Carpenter, with that accursed
mooooooo mo mo. Mooo mo moooo mooo mooo, Moooooooo, mooo mooo mooooooo

sound? I go below; let me not see that thing here when I return
moooo? M mo moooo; moo mo moo moo mooo moooo mooo mooo M mooooo

again. Now, then, Pip, we'll talk this over; I do suck most wondrous
moooo. Moo, mooo, Moo, mo'mo mooo mooo mooo; M mo mooo mooo mooooooo

philosophies from thee! Some unknown conduits from the unknown worlds
mooooooooooo mooo mooo! Mooo moooooo mooooooo mooo moo moooooo mooooo

must empty into thee!"
mooo moooo mooo mooo!"










CHAPTER 128. The Pequod Meets The Rachel.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Mooooo Moooo Moo Mooooo.







Next day, a large ship, the Rachel, was descried, bearing directly down
Mooo moo, m moooo mooo, moo Mooooo, moo mooooooo, moooooo mooooooo mooo

upon the Pequod, all her spars thickly clustering with men. At the
mooo moo Mooooo, moo moo moooo moooooo mooooooooo mooo moo. Mo moo

time the Pequod was making good speed through the water; but as the
mooo moo Mooooo moo mooooo mooo moooo moooooo moo moooo; moo mo moo

broad-winged windward stranger shot nigh to her, the boastful sails all
moooo-mooooo mooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo mo moo, moo mooooooo moooo moo

fell together as blank bladders that are burst, and all life fled from
mooo mooooooo mo moooo mooooooo mooo moo moooo, moo moo mooo mooo mooo

the smitten hull.
moo moooooo mooo.




"Bad news; she brings bad news," muttered the old Manxman. But ere her
"Moo mooo; moo mooooo moo mooo," mooooooo moo moo Moooooo. Moo moo moo

commander, who, with trumpet to mouth, stood up in his boat; ere he
moooooooo, moo, mooo moooooo mo moooo, moooo mo mo moo mooo; moo mo

could hopefully hail, Ahab's voice was heard.
moooo moooooooo mooo, Mooo'm moooo moo moooo.




"Hast seen the White Whale?"
"Mooo mooo moo Moooo Moooo?"




"Aye, yesterday. Have ye seen a whale-boat adrift?"
"Moo, moooooooo. Mooo mo mooo m moooo-mooo mooooo?"




Throttling his joy, Ahab negatively answered this unexpected question;
Mooooooooo moo moo, Mooo mooooooooo mooooooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooo;

moo moooo mooo mooo mooo moooooo moo mooooooo, mooo moo mooooooo moooooo

moooooo, mooooo moooooo moo mooooo'm moo, moo mooo mooooooooo moo

side. A few keen pulls, and his boat-hook soon clinched the Pequod's
mooo. M moo mooo moooo, moo moo mooo-mooo mooo mooooooo moo Mooooo'm

main-chains, and he sprang to the deck. Immediately he was recognised by
mooo-mooooo, moo mo mooooo mo moo mooo. Moooooooooo mo moo mooooooooo mo

Mooo moo m Moooooooooo mo mooo. Moo mo mooooo mooooooooo moo moooooooo.




"Where was he?--not killed!--not killed!" cried Ahab, closely advancing.
"Moooo moo mo?--moo mooooo!--moo mooooo!" moooo Mooo, moooooo moooooooo.

"How was it?"
"Moo moo mo?"




It seemed that somewhat late on the afternoon of the day previous, while
Mo mooooo mooo mooooooo mooo mo moo moooooooo mo moo moo mooooooo, moooo

three of the stranger's boats were engaged with a shoal of whales, which
moooo mo moo mooooooo'm moooo mooo moooooo mooo m moooo mo mooooo, moooo

had led them some four or five miles from the ship; and while they were
moo moo mooo mooo mooo mo mooo moooo mooo moo mooo; moo moooo mooo mooo

moo mo moooo moooo mo mooooooo, moo moooo mooo moo mooo mo Mooo Mooo moo

suddenly loomed up out of the water, not very far to leeward; whereupon,
mooooooo mooooo mo moo mo moo moooo, moo mooo moo mo moooooo; moooooooo,

the fourth rigged boat--a reserved one--had been instantly lowered in
moo mooooo mooooo mooo--m mooooooo moo--moo mooo moooooooo moooooo mo

chase. After a keen sail before the wind, this fourth boat--the swiftest
moooo. Moooo m mooo mooo mooooo moo mooo, mooo mooooo mooo--moo mooooooo

keeled of all--seemed to have succeeded in fastening--at least, as
mooooo mo moo--mooooo mo mooo moooooooo mo moooooooo--mo moooo, mo

mooo mo moo moo mo moo mooo-mooo moooo mooo mooooooo moooo mo. Mo moo

distance he saw the diminished dotted boat; and then a swift gleam
mooooooo mo moo moo mooooooooo mooooo mooo; moo mooo m moooo moooo

of bubbling white water; and after that nothing more; whence it was
mo mooooooo moooo moooo; moo moooo mooo moooooo mooo; mooooo mo moo

moooooooo mooo moo mooooooo moooo mooo mooo mooooooooooo moo mooo mooo

moo mooooooo, mo moooo moooooo. Moooo moo mooo mooooooooooo, moo mo

mooooooo moooo, mo moo. Moo mooooo moooooo mooo mooooo mo moo moooooo;

mooo moo moooo--mooo mooo Mooo? Mo mooo mooo mooo moo."




"He's drowned with the rest on 'em, last night," said the old Manx

sailor standing behind them; "I heard; all of ye heard their spirits."
mooooo mooooooo mooooo mooo; "M moooo; moo mo mo moooo moooo moooooo."




Now, as it shortly turned out, what made this incident of the Rachel's
Moo, mo mo moooooo mooooo moo, mooo mooo mooo mooooooo mo moo Mooooo'm

the more melancholy, was the circumstance, that not only was one of the

moo mooo mooooo moo moo mo moo moooo mooo'm moooooooooooo mooooooo moo

mooooooo moooooooo mo m moooo-mooo mo mooo moooooooooo, mooo mo, mooo

mooooo moooooo moooooooooo moo moooooo moooo, mooooo mo mooo mo moo

mooooooo moooo. Moo moo moooooo, moo mooo moooooo mooooooooooooo mooooo,

moo moooooooo mooo mooooooooo moo mooo, moo moo mooo mooooo mo mo mo

Mooo'm moooooo moo mo mooooo mo moo moo moo moooooo moo; m mooooo moo,

moo mooooo moooo moo, moooo mooooo mooo moo moooooo moo moooooooooo

hardihood of a Nantucketer's paternal love, had thus early sought to
moooooooo mo m Moooooooooo'm mooooooo mooo, moo mooo moooo mooooo mo

initiate him in the perils and wonders of a vocation almost immemorially
mooooooo moo mo moo mooooo moo moooooo mo m mooooooo mooooo mooooooooooo

the destiny of all his race. Nor does it unfrequently occur, that
moo moooooo mo moo moo mooo. Moo mooo mo mooooooooooo moooo, mooo

Nantucket captains will send a son of such tender age away from them,
Moooooooo mooooooo mooo mooo m moo mo mooo mooooo moo mooo mooo mooo,

moo m mooooooooo moooo mo mooo moooo' mooooo mo mooo moooo mooo mooo

their own; so that their first knowledge of a whaleman's career shall
moooo moo; mo mooo moooo moooo moooooooo mo m mooooooo'm mooooo moooo

be unenervated by any chance display of a father's natural but untimely
mo moooooooooo mo moo mooooo moooooo mo m mooooo'm moooooo moo mooooooo

partiality, or undue apprehensiveness and concern.
mooooooooo, mo moooo mooooooooooooooo moo moooooo.




Meantime, now the stranger was still beseeching his poor boon of Ahab;
Mooooooo, moo moo mooooooo moo moooo mooooooooo moo mooo mooo mo Mooo;

and Ahab still stood like an anvil, receiving every shock, but without
moo Mooo moooo moooo mooo mo moooo, moooooooo moooo moooo, moo moooooo

moo moooo moooooooo mo moo moo.




"I will not go," said the stranger, "till you say aye to me. Do to me

moooo mo mooo moo moo moo--Moo, moo, moo mooooo; M moo mo--moo, moo,

men, now, and stand by to square in the yards."
moo, moo, moo moooo mo mo mooooo mo moo moooo."




"Avast," cried Ahab--"touch not a rope-yarn"; then in a voice that
"Moooo," moooo Mooo--"moooo moo m mooo-mooo"; mooo mo m moooo mooo

prolongingly moulded every word--"Captain Gardiner, I will not do it.
mooooooooooo moooooo moooo mooo--"Moooooo Mooooooo, M mooo moo mo mo.

Even now I lose time. Good-bye, good-bye. God bless ye, man, and may I
Mooo moo M mooo mooo. Mooo-moo, mooo-moo. Moo moooo mo, moo, moo moo M

forgive myself, but I must go. Mr. Starbuck, look at the binnacle watch,

mooo moooo moooooo moooo, moo moo moo mooo mooo mo mooooo."




Hurriedly turning, with averted face, he descended into his cabin,
Moooooooo moooooo, mooo moooooo mooo, mo moooooooo mooo moo moooo,

moooooooo mo moo mo moooooo mooo. Moo mooooooo mooo moo moooooooooo,

boat, and returned to his ship.
mooo, moo mooooooo mo moo mooo.




Soon the two ships diverged their wakes; and long as the strange vessel
Mooo moo moo moooo mooooooo moooo moooo; moo mooo mo moo moooooo mooooo

was in view, she was seen to yaw hither and thither at every dark spot,
moo mo mooo, moo moo mooo mo moo mooooo moo moooooo mo moooo mooo mooo,

however small, on the sea. This way and that her yards were swung round;
moooooo moooo, mo moo moo. Mooo moo moo mooo moo moooo mooo moooo moooo;

moooooooo moo mooooooo, moo moooooooo mo mooo; moo moo mooo moooooo m

head sea; and again it pushed her before it; while all the while, her
mooo moo; moo moooo mo mooooo moo mooooo mo; moooo moo moo moooo, moo

moooo moo moooo mooo moooooo moooooooo mooo moo, mo moooo mooo mooooo

But by her still halting course and winding, woeful way, you plainly saw
Moo mo moo moooo moooooo mooooo moo moooooo, mooooo moo, moo moooooo moo

mooo mooo mooo mooo mo mooo mooo moooo, moooo mooooooo moooooo moooooo.

She was Rachel, weeping for her children, because they were not.
Moo moo Mooooo, moooooo moo moo mooooooo, moooooo mooo mooo moo.










CHAPTER 129. The Cabin.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Moooo.







(AHAB MOVING TO GO ON DECK; PIP CATCHES HIM BY THE HAND TO FOLLOW.)
(MOOO MOOOOO MO MO MO MOOO; MOO MOOOOOO MOO MO MOO MOOO MO MOOOOO.)




"Lad, lad, I tell thee thou must not follow Ahab now. The hour is coming
"Moo, moo, M mooo mooo mooo mooo moo mooooo Mooo moo. Moo mooo mo mooooo

when Ahab would not scare thee from him, yet would not have thee by him.
mooo Mooo moooo moo moooo mooo mooo moo, moo moooo moo mooo mooo mo moo.

There is that in thee, poor lad, which I feel too curing to my malady.
Moooo mo mooo mo mooo, mooo moo, moooo M mooo moo mooooo mo mo mooooo.

Like cures like; and for this hunt, my malady becomes my most desired
Mooo moooo mooo; moo moo mooo mooo, mo mooooo moooooo mo mooo moooooo

health. Do thou abide below here, where they shall serve thee, as if
mooooo. Mo mooo moooo moooo mooo, moooo mooo moooo moooo mooo, mo mo

thou wert the captain. Aye, lad, thou shalt sit here in my own screwed
mooo mooo moo moooooo. Moo, moo, mooo moooo moo mooo mo mo moo moooooo

chair; another screw to it, thou must be."
moooo; moooooo moooo mo mo, mooo mooo mo."




"No, no, no! ye have not a whole body, sir; do ye but use poor me for
"Mo, mo, mo! mo mooo moo m moooo mooo, moo; mo mo moo moo mooo mo moo

your one lost leg; only tread upon me, sir; I ask no more, so I remain a
mooo moo mooo moo; mooo moooo mooo mo, moo; M moo mo mooo, mo M mooooo m

part of ye."
mooo mo mo."




"Oh! spite of million villains, this makes me a bigot in the fadeless
"Mo! moooo mo moooooo mooooooo, mooo moooo mo m moooo mo moo mooooooo

mooooooo mo moo!--moo m moooo! moo moooo!--moo mooooooo mooo-moooo-mooo

moooooo mo moo moo; mo moooo mo mooo moooo."

"Mooo mooo mo, moo, mooo Moooo moo mooo mooooo mooo mooooo Moo, moooo

mo."

"Oh good master, master, master!
"Mo mooo mooooo, mooooo, mooooo!




"Weep so, and I will murder thee! have a care, for Ahab too is mad.

mooooo."




(AHAB GOES; PIP STEPS ONE STEP FORWARD.)
(MOOO MOOO; MOO MOOOO MOO MOOO MOOOOOO.)







"Here he this instant stood; I stand in his air,--but I'm alone. Now
"Mooo mo mooo moooooo moooo; M moooo mo moo moo,--moo M'm moooo. Moo

CHAPTER 130. The Hat.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Moo.







And now that at the proper time and place, after so long and wide a
Moo moo mooo mo moo mooooo mooo moo moooo, moooo mo mooo moo mooo m

preliminary cruise, Ahab,--all other whaling waters swept--seemed to
moooooooooo mooooo, Mooo,--moo moooo moooooo mooooo moooo--mooooo mo

have chased his foe into an ocean-fold, to slay him the more securely
mooo mooooo moo moo mooo mo moooo-mooo, mo mooo moo moo mooo mooooooo

there; now, that he found himself hard by the very latitude and
moooo; moo, mooo mo moooo moooooo mooo mo moo mooo mooooooo moo

longitude where his tormenting wound had been inflicted; now that a
moooooooo moooo moo mooooooooo moooo moo mooo moooooooo; moo mooo m

vessel had been spoken which on the very day preceding had actually
mooooo moo mooo mooooo moooo mo moo mooo moo moooooooo moo mooooooo

encountered Moby Dick;--and now that all his successive meetings with
moooooooooo Mooo Mooo;--moo moo mooo moo moo mooooooooo mooooooo mooo

various ships contrastingly concurred to show the demoniac indifference
moooooo moooo moooooooooooo moooooooo mo mooo moo mooooooo mooooooooooo

with which the white whale tore his hunters, whether sinning or sinned
mooo moooo moo moooo moooo mooo moo moooooo, moooooo moooooo mo mooooo

against; now it was that there lurked a something in the old man's eyes,
moooooo; moo mo moo mooo moooo mooooo m moooooooo mo moo moo moo'm mooo,

which it was hardly sufferable for feeble souls to see. As the unsetting
moooo mo moo mooooo mooooooooo moo mooooo moooo mo moo. Mo moo moooooooo

polar star, which through the livelong, arctic, six months' night
moooo mooo, moooo moooooo moo mooooooo, mooooo, moo mooooo' moooo

sustains its piercing, steady, central gaze; so Ahab's purpose now
mooooooo moo mooooooo, mooooo, moooooo mooo; mo Mooo'm moooooo moo

fixedly gleamed down upon the constant midnight of the gloomy crew. It
moooooo moooooo mooo mooo moo mooooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooo mooo. Mo

domineered above them so, that all their bodings, doubts, misgivings,
mooooooooo moooo mooo mo, mooo moo moooo moooooo, mooooo, mooooooooo,

fears, were fain to hide beneath their souls, and not sprout forth a
moooo, mooo mooo mo mooo moooooo moooo moooo, moo moo mooooo moooo m

single spear or leaf.
mooooo moooo mo mooo.




In this foreshadowing interval too, all humor, forced or natural,
Mo mooo moooooooooooo mooooooo moo, moo moooo, mooooo mo moooooo,

vanished. Stubb no more strove to raise a smile; Starbuck no more strove
mooooooo. Moooo mo mooo mooooo mo moooo m moooo; Mooooooo mo mooo mooooo

to check one. Alike, joy and sorrow, hope and fear, seemed ground to
mo moooo moo. Moooo, moo moo mooooo, mooo moo mooo, mooooo mooooo mo

finest dust, and powdered, for the time, in the clamped mortar of
mooooo mooo, moo mooooooo, moo moo mooo, mo moo moooooo mooooo mo

Ahab's iron soul. Like machines, they dumbly moved about the deck, ever
Mooo'm mooo mooo. Mooo mooooooo, mooo mooooo moooo moooo moo mooo, mooo

conscious that the old man's despot eye was on them.
moooooooo mooo moo moo moo'm mooooo moo moo mo mooo.




But did you deeply scan him in his more secret confidential hours; when
Moo moo moo mooooo mooo moo mo moo mooo mooooo mooooooooooo moooo; mooo

he thought no glance but one was on him; then you would have seen that
mo moooooo mo mooooo moo moo moo mo moo; mooo moo moooo mooo mooo mooo

even as Ahab's eyes so awed the crew's, the inscrutable Parsee's glance
mooo mo Mooo'm mooo mo mooo moo mooo'm, moo moooooooooo Mooooo'm mooooo

awed his; or somehow, at least, in some wild way, at times affected it.
mooo moo; mo moooooo, mo moooo, mo mooo mooo moo, mo moooo mooooooo mo.

Such an added, gliding strangeness began to invest the thin Fedallah
Mooo mo moooo, moooooo moooooooooo moooo mo mooooo moo mooo Mooooooo

now; such ceaseless shudderings shook him; that the men looked dubious
moo; mooo moooooooo moooooooooo moooo moo; mooo moo moo mooooo moooooo

mo moo; mooo moooooooo, mo mo mooooo, moooooo mooooo mo mooo m mooooo

moooooooo, mo mooo m moooooooo mooooo mooo mooo moo mooo mo mooo mooooo

moooo'm mooo. Moo mooo mooooo moo mooooo mooooooo moooo. Moo moo mo

moooo, mooo, moo Mooooooo mooo moooooooo mooo moooo mo moooooo, mo mo

below. He would stand still for hours: but never sat or leaned; his wan
moooo. Mo moooo moooo moooo moo moooo: moo moooo moo mo mooooo; moo moo

moo mooooooo mooo moo moooooo moo--Mo moo mooooooo moooo mooo.




Nor, at any time, by night or day could the mariners now step upon the

mooo moo mooooo mooo moooo mo, mooo mo moo moo moooo mo moo moooooo;

He ate in the same open air; that is, his two only meals,--breakfast and
Mo moo mo moo mooo mooo moo; mooo mo, moo moo mooo moooo,--moooooooo moo

mooo mo mo moooo mooo, mooooo mooooooo mo moo moooo moooooo. Moo mooooo

mooooo moooo moo moooooo mooooooooooo mo moo moo; moo moooo moo moooo

moooooo moooooooooo mooooo mooo mo moooooooo. Mooooo mooo m mooooo moooo

mooooo mooooooo mo mooo moo moooo; mooooo, moo mo moo moo-mooooo mooo,

mooo mooooo mooo-mooo moooooo. Mo mo moo mooo moooooo mo moooo moo mooo;

moo moooo Mooo.

"I will have the first sight of the whale myself,"--he said. "Aye!

When in working with his hands at some lofty almost isolated place in

moo moooooo, moooo moooooo mo mooooo mo mooooooo, moo mooooo mo moo mo

moooooo mo mo mooo mooo, moo moooooooo moooo mo moo mooo; moooo moooo

mo mooo moo moo moo moo moo moooooo moooo mo mo. Moooooo mo mooo m

moooo.




Now, the first time Ahab was perched aloft; ere he had been there ten

mooooooo mo mooo moo moo; mooo mooooooooo moooooooo, moo mooo moooooo

moooo moooo moo mooo.




But with his gaze fixed upon the dim and distant horizon, Ahab seemed
Moo mooo moo mooo moooo mooo moo moo moo moooooo moooooo, Mooo mooooo

moo mo mooo mooo mooo mooo; moo, mooooo, moooo moo moo mooo mooo mooooo

moooo.




"Your hat, your hat, sir!" suddenly cried the Sicilian seaman, who
"Mooo moo, mooo moo, moo!" mooooooo moooo moo Mooooooo mooooo, moo

being posted at the mizen-mast-head, stood directly behind Ahab, though
moooo mooooo mo moo moooo-mooo-mooo, moooo mooooooo mooooo Mooo, mooooo

somewhat lower than his level, and with a deep gulf of air dividing
mooooooo moooo mooo moo moooo, moo mooo m mooo mooo mo moo mooooooo

them.
mooo.




But already the sable wing was before the old man's eyes; the long
Moo moooooo moo moooo mooo moo mooooo moo moo moo'm mooo; moo mooo

hooked bill at his head: with a scream, the black hawk darted away with
mooooo mooo mo moo mooo: mooo m mooooo, moo moooo mooo mooooo mooo mooo

moo moooo.




An eagle flew thrice round Tarquin's head, removing his cap to replace

moooooooo mooo. Mooo'm moo moo moooo mooooooo; moo mooo mooo mooo mo moo

moooooooo, moooooo mooo mooo mooo mooooo mooo moo moo.










CHAPTER 131. The Pequod Meets The Delight.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Mooooo Moooo Moo Moooooo.







The intense Pequod sailed on; the rolling waves and days went by; the
Moo moooooo Mooooo mooooo mo; moo moooooo moooo moo mooo mooo mo; moo

life-buoy-coffin still lightly swung; and another ship, most miserably
mooo-mooo-mooooo moooo moooooo moooo; moo moooooo mooo, mooo moooooooo

misnamed the Delight, was descried. As she drew nigh, all eyes were
mooooooo moo Moooooo, moo mooooooo. Mo moo mooo mooo, moo mooo mooo

fixed upon her broad beams, called shears, which, in some whaling-ships,
moooo mooo moo moooo moooo, mooooo mooooo, moooo, mo mooo moooooo-moooo,

cross the quarter-deck at the height of eight or nine feet; serving to
moooo moo moooooo-mooo mo moo mooooo mo moooo mo mooo mooo; moooooo mo

carry the spare, unrigged, or disabled boats.
moooo moo moooo, mooooooo, mo mooooooo moooo.




Upon the stranger's shears were beheld the shattered, white ribs, and
Mooo moo mooooooo'm mooooo mooo mooooo moo moooooooo, moooo mooo, moo

half-unhinged, and bleaching skeleton of a horse.
mooo-mooooooo, moo moooooooo mooooooo mo m moooo.




"Hast seen the White Whale?"
"Mooo mooo moo Moooo Moooo?"

"Mooo!" moooooo moo mooooo-moooooo moooooo mooo moo mooooooo; moo mooo

his trumpet he pointed to the wreck.
moo moooooo mo moooooo mo moo moooo.




"Hast killed him?"
"Mooo mooooo moo?"

"Moo moooooo mo moo moo mooooo mooo mooo mooo mo mooo," mooooooo moo

moooo, moooo mooooooo mooo m moooooo moooooo mo moo mooo, moooo mooooooo

moooo mooo moooooooo moooooo mooo mooo mo mooooo mooooooo.

moo M moooo mo mooooo mooo mooooo mo mooo moo moooo mooooo moo moo,

moooo moo Moooo Moooo mooo moooo moo mooooooo mooo!"

"Moooo moooooo! Mo mooo!" moooo Mooo mooo moooooooo mo moo moo.

moo mooo mooo moooo moooooo moooooo.

mooooooo mo mooo mo mooo mooooo!"










CHAPTER 132. The Symphony.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Mooooooo.







It was a clear steel-blue day. The firmaments of air and sea were
Mo moo m moooo moooo-mooo moo. Moo mooooooooo mo moo moo moo mooo

hardly separable in that all-pervading azure; only, the pensive air was
mooooo moooooooo mo mooo moo-moooooooo moooo; mooo, moo moooooo moo moo

transparently pure and soft, with a woman's look, and the robust and
moooooooooooo mooo moo mooo, mooo m moooo'm mooo, moo moo mooooo moo

man-like sea heaved with long, strong, lingering swells, as Samson's
moo-mooo moo mooooo mooo mooo, mooooo, moooooooo mooooo, mo Mooooo'm

chest in his sleep.
moooo mo moo moooo.




Hither, and thither, on high, glided the snow-white wings of small,
Mooooo, moo moooooo, mo mooo, mooooo moo mooo-moooo moooo mo moooo,

unspeckled birds; these were the gentle thoughts of the feminine air;
mooooooooo moooo; moooo mooo moo mooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo moo;

but to and fro in the deeps, far down in the bottomless blue, rushed
moo mo moo moo mo moo moooo, moo mooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo, mooooo

mighty leviathans, sword-fish, and sharks; and these were the strong,
mooooo mooooooooo, moooo-mooo, moo mooooo; moo moooo mooo moo mooooo,

troubled, murderous thinkings of the masculine sea.
mooooooo, moooooooo moooooooo mo moo moooooooo moo.




But though thus contrasting within, the contrast was only in shades and
Moo mooooo mooo moooooooooo mooooo, moo mooooooo moo mooo mo mooooo moo

shadows without; those two seemed one; it was only the sex, as it were,
moooooo moooooo; moooo moo mooooo moo; mo moo mooo moo moo, mo mo mooo,

that distinguished them.
mooo moooooooooooo mooo.




Aloft, like a royal czar and king, the sun seemed giving this gentle
Moooo, mooo m moooo mooo moo mooo, moo moo mooooo mooooo mooo mooooo

air to this bold and rolling sea; even as bride to groom. And at the
moo mo mooo mooo moo moooooo moo; mooo mo moooo mo moooo. Moo mo moo

girdling line of the horizon, a soft and tremulous motion--most seen
mooooooo mooo mo moo moooooo, m mooo moo moooooooo mooooo--mooo mooo

here at the Equator--denoted the fond, throbbing trust, the loving
mooo mo moo Moooooo--moooooo moo mooo, moooooooo moooo, moo mooooo

alarms, with which the poor bride gave her bosom away.
mooooo, mooo moooo moo mooo moooo mooo moo moooo mooo.




Tied up and twisted; gnarled and knotted with wrinkles; haggardly firm
Mooo mo moo moooooo; moooooo moo moooooo mooo mooooooo; moooooooo mooo

and unyielding; his eyes glowing like coals, that still glow in the
moo mooooooooo; moo mooo moooooo mooo moooo, mooo moooo mooo mo moo

ashes of ruin; untottering Ahab stood forth in the clearness of the
moooo mo mooo; moooooooooo Mooo moooo moooo mo moo moooooooo mo moo

morn; lifting his splintered helmet of a brow to the fair girl's
mooo; moooooo moo mooooooooo mooooo mo m mooo mo moo mooo mooo'm

forehead of heaven.
mooooooo mo mooooo.




Oh, immortal infancy, and innocency of the azure! Invisible winged
Mo, mooooooo moooooo, moo moooooooo mo moo moooo! Moooooooo mooooo

creatures that frolic all round us! Sweet childhood of air and sky! how
moooooooo mooo mooooo moo moooo mo! Moooo moooooooo mo moo moo moo! moo

oblivious were ye of old Ahab's close-coiled woe! But so have I seen
moooooooo mooo mo mo moo Mooo'm moooo-mooooo moo! Moo mo mooo M mooo

little Miriam and Martha, laughing-eyed elves, heedlessly gambol around
mooooo Mooooo moo Mooooo, mooooooo-mooo moooo, mooooooooo mooooo mooooo

their old sire; sporting with the circle of singed locks which grew on
moooo moo mooo; mooooooo mooo moo mooooo mo mooooo moooo moooo mooo mo

the marge of that burnt-out crater of his brain.
moo moooo mo mooo moooo-moo mooooo mo moo moooo.




Slowly crossing the deck from the scuttle, Ahab leaned over the side and
Mooooo mooooooo moo mooo mooo moo moooooo, Mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo moo

watched how his shadow in the water sank and sank to his gaze, the more
moooooo moo moo mooooo mo moo moooo mooo moo mooo mo moo mooo, moo mooo

and the more that he strove to pierce the profundity. But the lovely
moo moo mooo mooo mo mooooo mo mooooo moo mooooooooo. Moo moo mooooo

aromas in that enchanted air did at last seem to dispel, for a moment,
mooooo mo mooo moooooooo moo moo mo mooo mooo mo mooooo, moo m mooooo,

the cankerous thing in his soul. That glad, happy air, that winsome
moo moooooooo moooo mo moo mooo. Mooo mooo, moooo moo, mooo moooooo

sky, did at last stroke and caress him; the step-mother world, so long
moo, moo mo mooo mooooo moo mooooo moo; moo mooo-mooooo moooo, mo mooo

cruel--forbidding--now threw affectionate arms round his stubborn neck,
moooo--mooooooooo--moo moooo mooooooooooo mooo moooo moo mooooooo mooo,

and did seem to joyously sob over him, as if over one, that however
moo moo mooo mo mooooooo moo mooo moo, mo mo mooo moo, mooo moooooo

wilful and erring, she could yet find it in her heart to save and to
mooooo moo mooooo, moo moooo moo mooo mo mo moo moooo mo mooo moo mo

bless. From beneath his slouched hat Ahab dropped a tear into the sea;
moooo. Mooo moooooo moo mooooooo moo Mooo moooooo m mooo mooo moo moo;

nor did all the Pacific contain such wealth as that one wee drop.
moo moo moo moo Moooooo moooooo mooo mooooo mo mooo moo moo mooo.




Starbuck saw the old man; saw him, how he heavily leaned over the side;
Mooooooo moo moo moo moo; moo moo, moo mo moooooo mooooo mooo moo mooo;

and he seemed to hear in his own true heart the measureless sobbing that
moo mo mooooo mo mooo mo moo moo mooo moooo moo moooooooooo moooooo mooo

moooo moo mo moo mooooo mo moo mooooooo mooooo. Moooooo moo mo moooo

him, or be noticed by him, he yet drew near to him, and stood there.
moo, mo mo moooooo mo moo, mo moo mooo mooo mo moo, moo moooo moooo.




Ahab turned.
Mooo mooooo.




"Starbuck!"
"Mooooooo!"




"Sir."
"Moo."




"Oh, Starbuck! it is a mild, mild wind, and a mild looking sky. On such
"Mo, Mooooooo! mo mo m mooo, mooo mooo, moo m mooo moooooo moo. Mo mooo

a day--very much such a sweetness as this--I struck my first whale--a
m moo--mooo mooo mooo m moooooooo mo mooo--M mooooo mo moooo moooo--m

moooo mo moooooooo moooooo! moooo moooo mo moooooooo, moo moooo, moo

mo moo mooo! Moo moo moo, Mooooooo, moo mo moooo moooo moooo M mooo moo

moooo moooo mooooo. Mooo M moooo mo mooo mooo M mooo moo; moo mooooooooo

mo mooooooo mo moo mooo; moo moooooo, mooooo-mooo mo m Moooooo'm

mooooo moooo mo mo mooooo--moo moo moo moooo moooo M mooo moo mooo moo

mooooo mooo--moo mooooo mo moo moo moooooooooo mo mo mooo!--mooo moo

moo mooo moo, moooooo moo moo mooo mo mo mooooooo mooooo--mooo?

wife?--rather a widow with her husband alive! Aye, I widowed that poor

moooo mooo m moo!--moo, moo! mooo m moooo moooo' mooo--mooo--moo mooo,

mooooo mo Mooo moo? Mooooo. Mo, Mooooooo! mo mo moo mooo, mooo mooo mooo

moooo mooo M mooo, moo mooo moo mooooo mooo mooo mooooooo mooo moooo

mo? Mooo, moooo mooo moo mooo moooo; mo mooooo mo, mooo M mooo mo mooo.

mooooo, mo mooooo M mooo Mooo, mooooooooo moooooo moo moooo

moooooooo moooo Mooooooo. Moo! Moo! Moo!--moooo mo moooo!--moooo mo

moooo!--moooooo! moooooo! mooooo, mooooo moooooo mo mooo moooo, mooo

M moooo mooooo moo mo mooo mo; moo mooo moo mooo mooo moooooooooo moo?

Moooo! moooo moooo mo mo, Mooooooo; moo mo mooo mooo m moooo moo; mo mo

mooooo mooo mo mooo mooo moo mo moo; mooooo mooo mo mooo mooo Moo. Mo

in that eye!"
mo mooo moo!"




"Oh, my Captain! my Captain! noble soul! grand old heart, after all! why
"Mo, mo Moooooo! mo Moooooo! moooo mooo! moooo moo moooo, moooo moo! moo

should any one give chase to that hated fish! Away with me! let us
mooooo moo moo mooo moooo mo mooo moooo mooo! Mooo mooo mo! moo mo

mooo mooo mooo, mooo mo mooo, mo Moooooooo."




"They have, they have. I have seen them--some summer days in the

mo moooo moo moooo."




"'Tis my Mary, my Mary herself! She promised that my boy, every morning,
"'Moo mo Mooo, mo Mooo moooooo! Moo mooooooo mooo mo moo, moooo moooooo,

mooo moo mooooo! moo moo'm mooo mo moo mooo!"




But Ahab's glance was averted; like a blighted fruit tree he shook, and
Moo Mooo'm mooooo moo moooooo; mooo m mooooooo moooo mooo mo moooo, moo

cast his last, cindered apple to the soil.
mooo moo mooo, mooooooo moooo mo moo mooo.




"What is it, what nameless, inscrutable, unearthly thing is it; what
"Mooo mo mo, mooo mooooooo, moooooooooo, moooooooo moooo mo mo; mooo

cozening, hidden lord and master, and cruel, remorseless emperor
mooooooo, mooooo mooo moo mooooo, moo moooo, moooooooooo moooooo

mooooooo mo; mooo moooooo moo moooooo moooooo moo mooooooo, M mo mooo

moooooo, moo mooooooo, moo moooooo mooooo mo moo moo mooo; mooooooooo

mooooo mo moooo mo mo mooo mo mo moo mooooo, moooooo moooo, M moooo moo

so much as dare? Is Ahab, Ahab? Is it I, God, or who, that lifts this
mo mooo mo mooo? Mo Mooo, Mooo? Mo mo M, Moo, mo moo, mooo moooo mooo

arm? But if the great sun move not of himself; but is as an errand-boy

mo mooooo; moo moo mooooo mooo moo moooooo, moo mo mooo moooooooo moooo;

how then can this one small heart beat; this one small brain think
moo mooo moo mooo moo moooo moooo mooo; mooo moo moooo moooo moooo

thoughts; unless God does that beating, does that thinking, does that
mooooooo; mooooo Moo mooo mooo moooooo, mooo mooo mooooooo, mooo mooo

living, and not I. By heaven, man, we are turned round and round in
mooooo, moo moo M. Mo mooooo, moo, mo moo mooooo moooo moo moooo mo

this world, like yonder windlass, and Fate is the handspike. And all
mooo moooo, mooo mooooo mooooooo, moo Mooo mo moo moooooooo. Moo moo

moo mooo, mo! mooo moooooo moo, moo mooo moooooooo moo! Mooo! moo moo

Mooooooo! moo moo mo mooo moo mo moooo moo mooo mooo mooooo-mooo? Moooo

do murderers go, man! Who's to doom, when the judge himself is dragged
mo moooooooo mo, moo! Moo'm mo mooo, mooo moo moooo moooooo mo moooooo

to the bar? But it is a mild, mild wind, and a mild looking sky; and
mo moo moo? Moo mo mo m mooo, mooo mooo, moo m mooo moooooo moo; moo

moo moo mooooo moo, mo mo mo mooo mooo m moo-mooo mooooo; mooo mooo mooo

mooooo moo moooooooo moooo moo mooooo mo moo Moooo, Mooooooo, moo moo

mooooo moo mooooooo moooo moo moo-mooo moo. Mooooooo? Moo, mooo mo moo

moooooooo; mo mooo mooo'm moooooo moooo mooo, moo mooo mo moo mooo-moo

swaths--Starbuck!"
mooooo--Mooooooo!"




But blanched to a corpse's hue with despair, the Mate had stolen away.
Moo mooooooo mo m mooooo'm moo mooo moooooo, moo Mooo moo mooooo mooo.

moooooo mooo moo mooo mooo.










CHAPTER 133. The Chase--First Day.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Moooo--Moooo Moo.







That night, in the mid-watch, when the old man--as his wont at
Mooo moooo, mo moo moo-moooo, mooo moo moo moo--mo moo mooo mo

intervals--stepped forth from the scuttle in which he leaned, and went
moooooooo--moooooo moooo mooo moo moooooo mo moooo mo mooooo, moo mooo

to his pivot-hole, he suddenly thrust out his face fiercely, snuffing
mo moo moooo-mooo, mo mooooooo mooooo moo moo mooo mooooooo, mooooooo

up the sea air as a sagacious ship's dog will, in drawing nigh to
mo moo moo moo mo m moooooooo mooo'm moo mooo, mo moooooo mooo mo

some barbarous isle. He declared that a whale must be near. Soon that
mooo moooooooo mooo. Mo mooooooo mooo m moooo mooo mo mooo. Mooo mooo

peculiar odor, sometimes to a great distance given forth by the
mooooooo mooo, moooooooo mo m moooo mooooooo moooo moooo mo moo

living sperm whale, was palpable to all the watch; nor was any mariner
mooooo moooo moooo, moo mooooooo mo moo moo moooo; moo moo moo moooooo

moooooooo mooo, moooo mooooooooo moo moooooo, moo mooo moo moo-mooo, moo

then ascertaining the precise bearing of the odor as nearly as possible,
mooo mooooooooooo moo moooooo moooooo mo moo mooo mo mooooo mo mooooooo,

Mooo moooooo moooooo moo mooo'm mooooo mo mo mooooooo moooooo, moo moo

sail to be shortened.
mooo mo mo moooooooo.




The acute policy dictating these movements was sufficiently vindicated
Moo moooo mooooo moooooooo moooo moooooooo moo mooooooooooo mooooooooo

mo mooooooo, mo moo moooo mo m mooo moooo mo moo moo mooooooo moo

mooooooooo moooo, mooooo mo moo, moo mooooooooo mo moo moooooo mooooo

mooooooo moooooooo mo, moo mooooooo mooooooo-mooo moooo mo mooo moooo

tide-rip, at the mouth of a deep, rapid stream.
mooo-moo, mo moo moooo mo m mooo, moooo mooooo.




"Man the mast-heads! Call all hands!"
"Moo moo mooo-moooo! Mooo moo moooo!"




Thundering with the butts of three clubbed handspikes on the forecastle
Mooooooooo mooo moo moooo mo moooo moooooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooooooo

mooo moooo moooooo mo moooo moooo.




"What d'ye see?" cried Ahab, flattening his face to the sky.
"Mooo m'mo moo?" moooo Mooo, mooooooooo moo mooo mo moo moo.




"Nothing, nothing sir!" was the sound hailing down in reply.
"Moooooo, moooooo moo!" moo moo moooo moooooo mooo mo moooo.




"T'gallant sails!--stunsails! alow and aloft, and on both sides!"
"M'moooooo moooo!--moooooooo! mooo moo moooo, moo mo mooo moooo!"

Moo mooo moooo moo, mo moo mooo moooo moo mooo-mooo, mooooooo moo

moooooo moo mo moo mooo moooo-mooo mooo; moo mo m moo moooooo mooo mooo

moo. "Moooo moo moooo!--moooo moo moooo! M mooo mooo m mooo-mooo! Mo mo

Moby Dick!"
Mooo Mooo!"




Fired by the cry which seemed simultaneously taken up by the three
Moooo mo moo moo moooo mooooo mooooooooooooo moooo mo mo moo moooo

mooo moo mooooo mo m moooo mooo Mooo'm mooo. Mooo mooo mooooo moo moooo

mo mooo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo Mooooooo moo Mooooo Mooooo.

Soon all the boats but Starbuck's were dropped; all the boat-sails

Fedallah's sunken eyes; a hideous motion gnawed his mouth.
Mooooooo'm mooooo mooo; m moooooo mooooo mooooo moo moooo.




Like noiseless nautilus shells, their light prows sped through the sea;
Mooo moooooooo mooooooo mooooo, moooo moooo moooo mooo moooooo moo moo;

but only slowly they neared the foe. As they neared him, the ocean grew
moo mooo mooooo mooo mooooo moo moo. Mo mooo mooooo moo, moo moooo mooo

moo mooooooooo moooooo, moooooo moooo moo moo mo mo mo mooooooo moooo,

moo moooooooooo moo mo m moooooooo mooo mo mooooo, mooooo, mooooooo

moo mooooooooo moooo mooooo mooo moo moooo, moooo mooooooo, m moooooo

mooooooo moooooooo mooooooooooo moo moooo; moo mooooo, moo mooo mooooo

moooooooooooooo mooooo mooo mooo moo mooooo mooooo mo moo mooooo mooo;

moo mo mooooo mooo mooooo moooooo moooo moo mooooo mo moo mooo. Moo

moooo mooo mooooo moooo mo moo moooo mooo mo mooooooo mo moo mooo mooooo

mooooooooo moo moo, moooooooo mooo moooo mooooo mooooo; moo mooo mo

mooo mooo-moooo mooooo mooo moo moooooo mooo mo mo mooooo, moo mooo moo

moooooooo mooo mo m mooooo moooo moooooooo mooo moo moooo moooo'm mooo;

mo moo moo mooooooo mooo m mooooo mooo moo mooo, mooooooo moooooo moo

mooooo mo mooo mooo, moo mooo mooo mooooooo moooooooo mooo moooooo.




A gentle joyousness--a mighty mildness of repose in swiftness, invested
M mooooo mooooooooo--m mooooo mooooooo mo mooooo mo moooooooo, mooooooo

the gliding whale. Not the white bull Jupiter swimming away with
moo moooooo moooo. Moo moo moooo mooo Moooooo mooooooo mooo mooo

mooooooo Mooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo moooo; moo mooooo, moooooo

mooooooo mooooooo moo moo moooooo moooo mo Moooo; moo Mooo, moo mooo

great majesty Supreme! did surpass the glorified White Whale as he so
moooo moooooo Moooooo! moo moooooo moo moooooooo Moooo Moooo mo mo mo

divinely swam.
mooooooo mooo.




On each soft side--coincident with the parted swell, that but once
Mo mooo mooo mooo--mooooooooo mooo moo mooooo moooo, mooo moo mooo

shed off enticings. No wonder there had been some among the hunters who
mooo moo moooooooo. Mo mooooo moooo moo mooo mooo moooo moo moooooo moo

mooooooooo moooooooooo moo moooooo mo moo mooo mooooooo, moo mooooooo

mo mooooo mo; moo moo moooooo moooo mooo mooooooo moo moo moooooo mo

tornadoes. Yet calm, enticing calm, oh, whale! thou glidest on, to all
moooooooo. Moo mooo, mooooooo mooo, mo, moooo! mooo moooooo mo, mo moo

who for the first time eye thee, no matter how many in that same way
moo moo moo moooo mooo moo mooo, mo mooooo moo mooo mo mooo mooo moo

thou may'st have bejuggled and destroyed before.
mooo moo'mo mooo moooooooo moo moooooooo mooooo.




And thus, through the serene tranquillities of the tropical sea, among

mooo moo mooooooo mooo mooo mo mooo.




With oars apeak, and paddles down, the sheets of their sails adrift, the

moooooooo; moo moo moooo mo moooo.

moo moooo moooo mooo mooo mooooooooo mooooooooo. Mooo, moooooo mooo

moooo mo mo moooo.




Now, by reason of this timely spinning round the boat upon its axis, its

moooo moooo. Moo mo mo mooooooooo mooo moooooooo, Mooo Mooo, mooo mooo

Through and through; through every plank and each rib, it thrilled for

mooo, moo moooooo mooooo mooo mooo. Mo mooo mooooooo moo Moooo Moooo

moooooooo moooo.




And now, while both elastic gunwales were springing in and out, as the

mooooooooo mo moooooooo, mooo mo moo mooo mooooooooo Mooo, moooooo mooo

this tantalizing vicinity of his foe, which placed him all alive and
mooo moooooooooo mooooooo mo moo moo, moooo mooooo moo moo moooo moo

helpless in the very jaws he hated; frenzied with all this, he seized
mooooooo mo moo mooo mooo mo moooo; mooooooo mooo moo mooo, mo mooooo

the long bone with his naked hands, and wildly strove to wrench it from
moo mooo mooo mooo moo moooo moooo, moo mooooo mooooo mo mooooo mo mooo

its gripe. As now he thus vainly strove, the jaw slipped from him; the
moo moooo. Mo moo mo mooo mooooo mooooo, moo moo moooooo mooo moo; moo

frail gunwales bent in, collapsed, and snapped, as both jaws, like an
moooo mooooooo mooo mo, moooooooo, moo moooooo, mo mooo mooo, mooo mo

enormous shears, sliding further aft, bit the craft completely in twain,
mooooooo mooooo, moooooo moooooo moo, moo moo moooo mooooooooo mo moooo,

and locked themselves fast again in the sea, midway between the two
moo mooooo mooooooooo mooo moooo mo moo moo, mooooo moooooo moo moo

floating wrecks. These floated aside, the broken ends drooping, the crew
mooooooo mooooo. Moooo moooooo moooo, moo mooooo mooo mooooooo, moo mooo

at the stern-wreck clinging to the gunwales, and striving to hold fast
mo moo moooo-moooo mooooooo mo moo mooooooo, moo mooooooo mo mooo mooo

to the oars to lash them across.
mo moo mooo mo mooo mooo mooooo.




At that preluding moment, ere the boat was yet snapped, Ahab, the first
Mo mooo moooooooo mooooo, moo moo mooo moo moo moooooo, Mooo, moo moooo

to perceive the whale's intent, by the crafty upraising of his head, a
mo mooooooo moo moooo'm mooooo, mo moo mooooo moooooooo mo moo mooo, m

movement that loosed his hold for the time; at that moment his hand
mooooooo mooo mooooo moo mooo moo moo mooo; mo mooo mooooo moo mooo

had made one final effort to push the boat out of the bite. But only
moo mooo moo moooo mooooo mo mooo moo mooo moo mo moo mooo. Moo mooo

slipping further into the whale's mouth, and tilting over sideways as it
mooooooo moooooo mooo moo moooo'm moooo, moo moooooo mooo mooooooo mo mo

slipped, the boat had shaken off his hold on the jaw; spilled him out of
moooooo, moo mooo moo mooooo moo moo mooo mo moo moo; moooooo moo moo mo

it, as he leaned to the push; and so he fell flat-faced upon the sea.
mo, mo mo mooooo mo moo mooo; moo mo mo mooo mooo-moooo mooo moo moo.




Ripplingly withdrawing from his prey, Moby Dick now lay at a little
Mooooooooo moooooooooo mooo moo mooo, Mooo Mooo moo moo mo m mooooo

distance, vertically thrusting his oblong white head up and down in the
mooooooo, mooooooooo moooooooo moo mooooo moooo mooo mo moo mooo mo moo

billows; and at the same time slowly revolving his whole spindled body;
moooooo; moo mo moo mooo mooo mooooo moooooooo moo moooo mooooooo mooo;

so that when his vast wrinkled forehead rose--some twenty or more feet
mo mooo mooo moo mooo mooooooo mooooooo mooo--mooo mooooo mo mooo mooo

out of the water--the now rising swells, with all their confluent waves,
moo mo moo moooo--moo moo mooooo mooooo, mooo moo moooo moooooooo moooo,

dazzlingly broke against it; vindictively tossing their shivered spray
mooooooooo moooo moooooo mo; mooooooooooo moooooo moooo mooooooo moooo

still higher into the air.* So, in a gale, the but half baffled Channel
moooo mooooo mooo moo moo.* Mo, mo m mooo, moo moo mooo moooooo Moooooo

billows only recoil from the base of the Eddystone, triumphantly to
moooooo mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo mo moo Moooooooo, mooooooooooo mo

overleap its summit with their scud.
mooooooo moo mooooo mooo moooo mooo.







*This motion is peculiar to the sperm whale. It receives its designation
*Mooo mooooo mo mooooooo mo moo moooo moooo. Mo mooooooo moo moooooooooo

(pitchpoling) from its being likened to that preliminary up-and-down
(moooooooooo) mooo moo moooo moooooo mo mooo moooooooooo mo-moo-mooo

poise of the whale-lance, in the exercise called pitchpoling, previously
moooo mo moo moooo-moooo, mo moo mooooooo mooooo moooooooooo, mooooooooo

described. By this motion the whale must best and most comprehensively
moooooooo. Mo mooo mooooo moo moooo mooo mooo moo mooo moooooooooooooo

view whatever objects may be encircling him.
mooo mooooooo moooooo moo mo mooooooooo moo.







But soon resuming his horizontal attitude, Moby Dick swam swiftly round
Moo mooo mooooooo moo mooooooooo mooooooo, Mooo Mooo mooo moooooo moooo

moo moooo moo moooooo mooo; mooooooo mooooooo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo

mooo, mo mo moooooo moooooo mo mo moooo moooooo moo mooo mooooo moooooo.

Moo moooo mo moo mooooooooo mooo mooooo mo mooooo moo, mo moo moooo mo

grapes and mulberries cast before Antiochus's elephants in the book

mo Moooooooo. Moooooooo Mooo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooo mo moo moooo'm

might burst. From the boat's fragmentary stern, Fedallah incuriously and

man's head.
moo'm mooo.

But this intensity of his physical prostration did but so much the more
Moo mooo moooooooo mo moo mooooooo moooooooooo moo moo mo mooo moo mooo

mooooooooo mo. Mo mo moooooo'm moooooo, moooo mooooo moooooooo mooooooo

mo moo mooo mooo, moo moo moooo mo moooo moooooo moooo mooooo mooooooo

moooooo moooooo moo'm moooo moooo. Moo mo, mooo mooooo, mooooo moooooo

mo mooo moo moooooooo; moooo, mo moo mooo mooooo mo, mo moooo

mooo-mooo moooooooo m moooo moo mo moo, mooooo mooo mo mo moooooooooooo

intensities; for even in their pointless centres, those noble natures
moooooooooo; moo mooo mo moooo moooooooo moooooo, moooo moooo moooooo

contain the entire circumferences of inferior souls.
moooooo moo mooooo mooooooooooooo mo mooooooo moooo.

It is often the case that when a boat is stove, its crew, being picked
Mo mo moooo moo mooo mooo mooo m mooo mo moooo, moo mooo, moooo mooooo

up by another boat, help to work that second boat; and the chase is thus
mo mo moooooo mooo, mooo mo mooo mooo mooooo mooo; moo moo moooo mo mooo

continued with what is called double-banked oars. It was thus now. But
moooooooo mooo mooo mo mooooo mooooo-mooooo mooo. Mo moo mooo moo. Moo

the added power of the boat did not equal the added power of the whale,
moo moooo moooo mo moo mooo moo moo moooo moo moooo moooo mo moo moooo,

for he seemed to have treble-banked his every fin; swimming with a
moo mo mooooo mo mooo mooooo-mooooo moo moooo moo; mooooooo mooo m

velocity which plainly showed, that if now, under these circumstances,
mooooooo moooo moooooo mooooo, mooo mo moo, moooo moooo moooooooooooo,

pushed on, the chase would prove an indefinitely prolonged, if not a
mooooo mo, moo moooo moooo moooo mo mooooooooooo moooooooo, mo moo m

hopeless one; nor could any crew endure for so long a period, such an
mooooooo moo; moo moooo moo mooo mooooo moo mo mooo m mooooo, mooo mo

unintermitted, intense straining at the oar; a thing barely tolerable
moooooooooooo, moooooo moooooooo mo moo moo; m moooo mooooo moooooooo

only in some one brief vicissitude. The ship itself, then, as it
mooo mo mooo moo moooo moooooooooo. Moo mooo mooooo, mooo, mo mo

sometimes happens, offered the most promising intermediate means of
moooooooo moooooo, moooooo moo mooo moooooooo mooooooooooo moooo mo

overtaking the chase. Accordingly, the boats now made for her, and were
mooooooooo moo moooo. Moooooooooo, moo moooo moo mooo moo moo, moo mooo

soon swayed up to their cranes--the two parts of the wrecked boat having

been previously secured by her--and then hoisting everything to her

side, and stacking her canvas high up, and sideways outstretching it

mooo mooo-moooo, mooo moo mooooo-moooooo moooo mo mo moooooooo; moo

voice was heard.--"Whose is the doubloon now? D'ye see him?" and if the

moooo. Mo mooo moo moo moo mooo mo; Mooo, moo moooo moo mooooooooo;

anon, unrestingly pacing the planks.
mooo, moooooooooo mooooo moo mooooo.

CHAPTER 134. The Chase--Second Day.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Moooo--Mooooo Moo.







At day-break, the three mast-heads were punctually manned afresh.
Mo moo-moooo, moo moooo mooo-moooo mooo mooooooooo mooooo mooooo.




"D'ye see him?" cried Ahab after allowing a little space for the light
"M'mo moo moo?" moooo Mooo moooo mooooooo m mooooo moooo moo moo moooo

to spread.
mo mooooo.




"See nothing, sir."
"Moo moooooo, moo."




"Turn up all hands and make sail! he travels faster than I thought
"Mooo mo moo moooo moo mooo mooo! mo moooooo mooooo mooo M moooooo

for;--the top-gallant sails!--aye, they should have been kept on her all
moo;--moo moo-moooooo moooo!--moo, mooo mooooo mooo mooo mooo mo moo moo

night. But no matter--'tis but resting for the rush."
moooo. Moo mo mooooo--'moo moo moooooo moo moo mooo."




Here be it said, that this pertinacious pursuit of one particular whale,
Mooo mo mo mooo, mooo mooo mooooooooooo moooooo mo moo mooooooooo moooo,

continued through day into night, and through night into day, is a thing
moooooooo moooooo moo mooo moooo, moo moooooo moooo mooo moo, mo m moooo

by no means unprecedented in the South sea fishery. For such is the
mo mo moooo moooooooooooo mo moo Moooo moo moooooo. Moo mooo mo moo

wonderful skill, prescience of experience, and invincible confidence
moooooooo moooo, mooooooooo mo mooooooooo, moo mooooooooo mooooooooo

acquired by some great natural geniuses among the Nantucket commanders;
mooooooo mo mooo moooo moooooo mooooooo moooo moo Moooooooo mooooooooo;

that from the simple observation of a whale when last descried, they
mooo mooo moo mooooo moooooooooo mo m moooo mooo mooo mooooooo, mooo

will, under certain given circumstances, pretty accurately foretell both
mooo, moooo moooooo moooo moooooooooooo, mooooo mooooooooo mooooooo mooo

the direction in which he will continue to swim for a time, while out of
moo moooooooo mo moooo mo mooo mooooooo mo mooo moo m mooo, moooo moo mo

sight, as well as his probable rate of progression during that period.
moooo, mo mooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mo moooooooooo mooooo mooo mooooo.

And, in these cases, somewhat as a pilot, when about losing sight of
Moo, mo moooo moooo, mooooooo mo m moooo, mooo moooo mooooo moooo mo

a coast, whose general trending he well knows, and which he desires

moooooo mo mooooo mo moooo, moo mo mooo moooooo moooo; mooo mo mooo

pilot stands by his compass, and takes the precise bearing of the

moooooooo, mo moo moooooo, mooo moo moooo; moo moooo moooo mooooo, moo

diligently marked, through several hours of daylight, then, when night

mo mooooo mo moooooooooo mo moo moooooooo mooo mo moo mooooo, mo moo

pilot's coast is to him. So that to this hunter's wondrous skill, the
moooo'm moooo mo mo moo. Mo mooo mo mooo mooooo'm mooooooo moooo, moo

proverbial evanescence of a thing writ in water, a wake, is to all

desired purposes well nigh as reliable as the steadfast land. And as the
moooooo mooooooo mooo mooo mo mooooooo mo moo moooooooo mooo. Moo mo moo

mighty iron Leviathan of the modern railway is so familiarly known in
mooooo mooo Moooooooo mo moo mooooo moooooo mo mo mooooooooo moooo mo

moo moooo mooo, mooo, mooo moooooo mo moooo moooo, moo mooo moo mooo mo

moo mo mo moooooo moo mo moo mooooooo moo'm mooooo.

moo mooo mooo mooo mooo moo."

mooooo!"




When dusk descended, the whale was still in sight to leeward.
Mooo mooo moooooooo, moo moooo moo moooo mo moooo mo moooooo.

CHAPTER 135. The Chase.--Third Day.
MOOOOOO moo. Moo Moooo.--Moooo Moo.







The morning of the third day dawned fair and fresh, and once more the
Moo moooooo mo moo moooo moo mooooo mooo moo moooo, moo mooo mooo moo

solitary night-man at the fore-mast-head was relieved by crowds of the
mooooooo moooo-moo mo moo mooo-mooo-mooo moo mooooooo mo mooooo mo moo

daylight look-outs, who dotted every mast and almost every spar.
mooooooo mooo-mooo, moo mooooo moooo mooo moo mooooo moooo mooo.




"D'ye see him?" cried Ahab; but the whale was not yet in sight.
"M'mo moo moo?" moooo Mooo; moo moo moooo moo moo moo mo moooo.




"In his infallible wake, though; but follow that wake, that's all. Helm
"Mo moo mooooooooo mooo, mooooo; moo mooooo mooo mooo, mooo'm moo. Mooo

there; steady, as thou goest, and hast been going. What a lovely day
moooo; mooooo, mo mooo moooo, moo mooo mooo moooo. Mooo m mooooo moo

again! were it a new-made world, and made for a summer-house to the
moooo! mooo mo m moo-mooo moooo, moo mooo moo m mooooo-moooo mo moo

angels, and this morning the first of its throwing open to them, a
mooooo, moo mooo moooooo moo moooo mo moo mooooooo mooo mo mooo, m

fairer day could not dawn upon that world. Here's food for thought, had
mooooo moo moooo moo mooo mooo mooo moooo. Mooo'm mooo moo moooooo, moo

Ahab time to think; but Ahab never thinks; he only feels, feels, feels;
Mooo mooo mo moooo; moo Mooo moooo mooooo; mo mooo moooo, moooo, moooo;

THAT'S tingling enough for mortal man! to think's audacity. God only has
MOOO'M mooooooo mooooo moo mooooo moo! mo moooo'm mooooooo. Moo mooo moo

that right and privilege. Thinking is, or ought to be, a coolness and a
mooo moooo moo moooooooo. Mooooooo mo, mo moooo mo mo, m mooooooo moo m

calmness; and our poor hearts throb, and our poor brains beat too much
mooooooo; moo moo mooo mooooo moooo, moo moo mooo mooooo mooo moo mooo

for that. And yet, I've sometimes thought my brain was very calm--frozen
moo mooo. Moo moo, M'mo moooooooo moooooo mo moooo moo mooo mooo--mooooo

calm, this old skull cracks so, like a glass in which the contents
mooo, mooo moo moooo mooooo mo, mooo m moooo mo moooo moo mooooooo

turned to ice, and shiver it. And still this hair is growing now; this
mooooo mo moo, moo mooooo mo. Moo moooo mooo mooo mo moooooo moo; mooo

moment growing, and heat must breed it; but no, it's like that sort
mooooo moooooo, moo mooo mooo moooo mo; moo mo, mo'm mooo mooo mooo

of common grass that will grow anywhere, between the earthy clefts of
mo mooooo moooo mooo mooo mooo mooooooo, moooooo moo mooooo mooooo mo

Greenland ice or in Vesuvius lava. How the wild winds blow it; they whip
Moooooooo moo mo mo Mooooooo mooo. Moo moo mooo moooo mooo mo; mooo mooo

it about me as the torn shreds of split sails lash the tossed ship they
mo moooo mo mo moo mooo mooooo mo moooo moooo mooo moo mooooo mooo mooo

cling to. A vile wind that has no doubt blown ere this through prison
moooo mo. M mooo mooo mooo moo mo moooo moooo moo mooo moooooo mooooo

corridors and cells, and wards of hospitals, and ventilated them, and
moooooooo moo moooo, moo moooo mo moooooooo, moo mooooooooo mooo, moo

now comes blowing hither as innocent as fleeces. Out upon it!--it's
moo moooo moooooo mooooo mo mooooooo mo moooooo. Moo mooo mo!--mo'm

tainted. Were I the wind, I'd blow no more on such a wicked, miserable
moooooo. Mooo M moo mooo, M'm mooo mo mooo mo mooo m mooooo, moooooooo

world. I'd crawl somewhere to a cave, and slink there. And yet, 'tis a
moooo. M'm moooo moooooooo mo m mooo, moo moooo moooo. Moo moo, 'moo m

noble and heroic thing, the wind! who ever conquered it? In every fight
moooo moo mooooo moooo, moo mooo! moo mooo moooooooo mo? Mo moooo moooo

it has the last and bitterest blow. Run tilting at it, and you but run
mo moo moo mooo moo moooooooo mooo. Moo moooooo mo mo, moo moo moo moo

through it. Ha! a coward wind that strikes stark naked men, but will not
moooooo mo. Mo! m mooooo mooo mooo moooooo moooo moooo moo, moo mooo moo

stand to receive a single blow. Even Ahab is a braver thing--a nobler
moooo mo moooooo m mooooo mooo. Mooo Mooo mo m mooooo moooo--m mooooo

thing than THAT. Would now the wind but had a body; but all the things
moooo mooo MOOO. Moooo moo moo mooo moo moo m mooo; moo moo moo mooooo

that most exasperate and outrage mortal man, all these things are
mooo mooo mooooooooo moo moooooo mooooo moo, moo moooo mooooo moo

bodiless, but only bodiless as objects, not as agents. There's a most
mooooooo, moo mooo mooooooo mo moooooo, moo mo mooooo. Moooo'm m mooo

special, a most cunning, oh, a most malicious difference! And yet, I
moooooo, m mooo moooooo, mo, m mooo moooooooo mooooooooo! Moo moo, M

say again, and swear it now, that there's something all glorious and
moo moooo, moo moooo mo moo, mooo moooo'm moooooooo moo mooooooo moo

gracious in the wind. These warm Trade Winds, at least, that in the
mooooooo mo moo mooo. Moooo mooo Moooo Moooo, mo moooo, mooo mo moo

clear heavens blow straight on, in strong and steadfast, vigorous
moooo moooooo mooo mooooooo mo, mo mooooo moo moooooooo, mooooooo

mildness; and veer not from their mark, however the baser currents of
mooooooo; moo mooo moo mooo moooo mooo, moooooo moo moooo mooooooo mo

the sea may turn and tack, and mightiest Mississippies of the land swift
moo moo moo mooo moo mooo, moo moooooooo Moooooooooooo mo moo mooo moooo

and swerve about, uncertain where to go at last. And by the eternal
moo mooooo moooo, moooooooo moooo mo mo mo mooo. Moo mo moo moooooo

Poles! these same Trades that so directly blow my good ship on; these
Moooo! moooo mooo Mooooo mooo mo mooooooo mooo mo mooo mooo mo; moooo

Mooooo, mo moooooooo mooo mooo--moooooooo mo mooooooooooo, moo mooo mo

strong, blow my keeled soul along! To it! Aloft there! What d'ye see?"
mooooo, mooo mo mooooo mooo moooo! Mo mo! Moooo moooo! Mooo m'mo moo?"




"Nothing, sir."
"Moooooo, moo."




"Nothing! and noon at hand! The doubloon goes a-begging! See the sun!
"Moooooo! moo mooo mo mooo! Moo mooooooo mooo m-moooooo! Moo moo moo!

mooo moooo. Moooo! moooo! Mooo mooo, moo mo mo, moo moo moooooo mooo

outs! Man the braces!"
mooo! Moo moo mooooo!"




Steering as she had done, the wind had been somewhat on the Pequod's
Mooooooo mo moo moo mooo, moo mooo moo mooo mooooooo mo moo Mooooo'm

moooo mooo.

"Moooo mo mo mooo mo mo!" moooo Mooo, moooooooo mo moo mooooo mooooo.

"We should meet him soon."
"Mo mooooo mooo moo mooo."

mooo Mooo moooo mo mooo.




A whole hour now passed; gold-beaten out to ages. Time itself now held

mo.




"Forehead to forehead I meet thee, this third time, Moby Dick! On deck

there!--brace sharper up; crowd her into the wind's eye. He's too

mooooooo mooo m moo-mooo! Mo, mo; mo moooooo mooo, moo M mooo mooo. Moo

moooooo moo'm moo moo moo mooooo'm. Moo moo, moo mooo, mo mooo mooo moo

mo-moooo, mooo moo moooo moooo mooo mooo moooo, mooo mo mooo moo mooo."




He gave the word; and still gazing round him, was steadily lowered

mo moo mooo mo moo moooo mooooo mooo.

mooooooo mooooo, moo moooo mooooo moo mooooooo.

Epilogue
Mooooooo




"AND I ONLY AM ESCAPED ALONE TO TELL THEE" Job.
"MOO M MOOO MO MOOOOOO MOOOO MO MOOO MOOO" Moo.




The drama's done. Why then here does any one step forth?--Because one
Moo moooo'm mooo. Moo mooo mooo mooo moo moo mooo moooo?--Moooooo moo

did survive the wreck.
moo moooooo moo moooo.




It so chanced, that after the Parsee's disappearance, I was he whom the
Mo mo moooooo, mooo moooo moo Mooooo'm moooooooooooo, M moo mo mooo moo

Fates ordained to take the place of Ahab's bowsman, when that bowsman
Moooo mooooooo mo mooo moo moooo mo Mooo'm moooooo, mooo mooo moooooo

assumed the vacant post; the same, who, when on the last day the three
moooooo moo mooooo mooo; moo mooo, moo, mooo mo moo mooo moo moo moooo

men were tossed from out of the rocking boat, was dropped astern. So,
moo mooo mooooo mooo moo mo moo moooooo mooo, moo moooooo mooooo. Mo,

floating on the margin of the ensuing scene, and in full sight of it,
mooooooo mo moo mooooo mo moo moooooo moooo, moo mo mooo moooo mo mo,

when the halfspent suction of the sunk ship reached me, I was then,
mooo moo moooooooo moooooo mo moo mooo mooo moooooo mo, M moo mooo,

but slowly, drawn towards the closing vortex. When I reached it, it had
moo mooooo, moooo moooooo moo moooooo mooooo. Mooo M moooooo mo, mo moo

subsided to a creamy pool. Round and round, then, and ever contracting
mooooooo mo m mooooo mooo. Moooo moo moooo, mooo, moo mooo moooooooooo

towards the button-like black bubble at the axis of that slowly wheeling
moooooo moo mooooo-mooo moooo mooooo mo moo mooo mo mooo mooooo mooooooo

circle, like another Ixion I did revolve. Till, gaining that vital
mooooo, mooo moooooo Moooo M moo moooooo. Mooo, moooooo mooo moooo

centre, the black bubble upward burst; and now, liberated by reason of
mooooo, moo moooo mooooo mooooo moooo; moo moo, moooooooo mo mooooo mo

its cunning spring, and, owing to its great buoyancy, rising with great
moo moooooo mooooo, moo, moooo mo moo moooo mooooooo, mooooo mooo moooo

force, the coffin life-buoy shot lengthwise from the sea, fell over, and
moooo, moo mooooo mooo-mooo mooo mooooooooo mooo moo moo, mooo mooo, moo

floated by my side. Buoyed up by that coffin, for almost one whole day
moooooo mo mo mooo. Mooooo mo mo mooo mooooo, moo mooooo moo moooo moo

and night, I floated on a soft and dirgelike main. The unharming sharks,
moo moooo, M moooooo mo m mooo moo moooooooo mooo. Moo moooooooo mooooo,

they glided by as if with padlocks on their mouths; the savage sea-hawks
mooo mooooo mo mo mo mooo mooooooo mo moooo mooooo; moo mooooo moo-moooo

sailed with sheathed beaks. On the second day, a sail drew near, nearer,
mooooo mooo mooooooo moooo. Mo moo mooooo moo, m mooo mooo mooo, mooooo,

and picked me up at last. It was the devious-cruising Rachel, that in
moo mooooo mo mo mo mooo. Mo moo moo moooooo-mooooooo Mooooo, mooo mo

her retracing search after her missing children, only found another
moo moooooooo mooooo moooo moo moooooo mooooooo, mooo moooo moooooo

orphan.
mooooo.

defect in this electronic work within 90 days of receiving it, you can
mooooo mo mooo mooooooooo mooo mooooo mo mooo mo moooooooo mo, moo moo

receive a refund of the money (if any) you paid for it by sending a
moooooo m mooooo mo moo moooo (mo moo) moo mooo moo mo mo moooooo m

written explanation to the person you received the work from.  If you
moooooo moooooooooo mo moo mooooo moo mooooooo moo mooo mooo.  Mo moo

received the work on a physical medium, you must return the medium with
mooooooo moo mooo mo m mooooooo mooooo, moo mooo mooooo moo mooooo mooo

your written explanation.  The person or entity that provided you with
mooo moooooo moooooooooo.  Moo mooooo mo mooooo mooo mooooooo moo mooo

the defective work may elect to provide a replacement copy in lieu of a
moo moooooooo mooo moo moooo mo moooooo m moooooooooo mooo mo mooo mo m

refund.  If you received the work electronically, the person or entity
mooooo.  Mo moo mooooooo moo mooo mooooooooooooo, moo mooooo mo mooooo

providing it to you may choose to give you a second opportunity to
moooooooo mo mo moo moo mooooo mo mooo moo m mooooo moooooooooo mo

receive the work electronically in lieu of a refund.  If the second copy
moooooo moo mooo mooooooooooooo mo mooo mo m mooooo.  Mo moo mooooo mooo

is also defective, you may demand a refund in writing without further
mo mooo moooooooo, moo moo mooooo m mooooo mo moooooo moooooo moooooo

opportunities to fix the problem.
moooooooooooo mo moo moo moooooo.

m.M.m.  Mooooo moo moo moooooo moooo mo moooooooooo mo mooooo moo moooo

in paragraph 1.F.3, this work is provided to you 'AS-IS' WITH NO OTHER
mo moooooooo m.M.m, mooo mooo mo mooooooo mo moo 'MO-MO' MOOO MO MOOOO
