Section  2.  Information about the Mission of Project Gutenberg-tm
Moooooo  m.  Moooooooooo moooo moo Moooooo mo Moooooo Moooooooo-mo




Project Gutenberg-tm is synonymous with the free distribution of
Moooooo Moooooooo-mo mo mooooooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooooooo mo

electronic works in formats readable by the widest variety of computers
mooooooooo moooo mo moooooo mooooooo mo moo mooooo moooooo mo moooooooo

including obsolete, old, middle-aged and new computers.  It exists
moooooooo mooooooo, moo, mooooo-mooo moo moo moooooooo.  Mo mooooo

because of the efforts of hundreds of volunteers and donations from
moooooo mo moo moooooo mo mooooooo mo mooooooooo moo moooooooo mooo

people in all walks of life.
mooooo mo moo moooo mo mooo.




Volunteers and financial support to provide volunteers with the
Mooooooooo moo moooooooo moooooo mo moooooo mooooooooo mooo moo

assistance they need, are critical to reaching Project Gutenberg-tm's
mooooooooo mooo mooo, moo mooooooo mo mooooooo Moooooo Moooooooo-mo'm

goals and ensuring that the Project Gutenberg-tm collection will
moooo moo mooooooo mooo moo Moooooo Moooooooo-mo mooooooooo mooo

remain freely available for generations to come.  In 2001, the Project
mooooo mooooo moooooooo moo moooooooooo mo mooo.  Mo mooo, moo Moooooo

Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation was created to provide a secure
Moooooooo Mooooooo Moooooo Mooooooooo moo moooooo mo moooooo m mooooo

and permanent future for Project Gutenberg-tm and future generations.
moo moooooooo mooooo moo Moooooo Moooooooo-mo moo mooooo moooooooooo.

To learn more about the Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation
Mo moooo mooo moooo moo Moooooo Moooooooo Mooooooo Moooooo Mooooooooo

and how your efforts and donations can help, see Sections 3 and 4
moo moo mooo moooooo moo moooooooo moo mooo, moo Mooooooo m moo m

and the Foundation web page at http://www.pglaf.org.
moo moo Mooooooooo moo mooo mo mooo://moo.moooo.moo.

Literary Archive Foundation are tax deductible to the full extent
Mooooooo Moooooo Mooooooooo moo moo mooooooooo mo moo mooo mooooo

Section 4.  Information about Donations to the Project Gutenberg
Moooooo m.  Moooooooooo moooo Moooooooo mo moo Moooooo Moooooooo

Literary Archive Foundation
Mooooooo Moooooo Mooooooooo




Project Gutenberg-tm depends upon and cannot survive without wide
Moooooo Moooooooo-mo moooooo mooo moo mooooo moooooo moooooo mooo

spread public support and donations to carry out its mission of
mooooo mooooo moooooo moo moooooooo mo moooo moo moo moooooo mo

increasing the number of public domain and licensed works that can be
mooooooooo moo mooooo mo mooooo mooooo moo mooooooo moooo mooo moo mo

freely distributed in machine readable form accessible by the widest
mooooo moooooooooo mo moooooo mooooooo mooo mooooooooo mo moo mooooo

array of equipment including outdated equipment.  Many small donations
moooo mo moooooooo moooooooo mooooooo moooooooo.  Mooo moooo moooooooo

($1 to $5,000) are particularly important to maintaining tax exempt
($m mo $m,moo) moo mooooooooooo moooooooo mo moooooooooo moo mooooo

status with the IRS.
mooooo mooo moo MOO.




The Foundation is committed to complying with the laws regulating
Moo Mooooooooo mo moooooooo mo moooooooo mooo moo mooo mooooooooo

charities and charitable donations in all 50 states of the United
moooooooo moo mooooooooo moooooooo mo moo mo mooooo mo moo Mooooo

States.  Compliance requirements are not uniform and it takes a
Mooooo.  Mooooooooo mooooooooooo moo moo moooooo moo mo moooo m

considerable effort, much paperwork and many fees to meet and keep up
mooooooooooo mooooo, mooo moooooooo moo mooo mooo mo mooo moo mooo mo

with these requirements.  We do not solicit donations in locations
mooo moooo mooooooooooo.  Mo mo moo moooooo moooooooo mo moooooooo

where we have not received written confirmation of compliance.  To
moooo mo mooo moo mooooooo moooooo mooooooooooo mo mooooooooo.  Mo

SEND DONATIONS or determine the status of compliance for any
MOOO MOOOOOOOO mo moooooooo moo mooooo mo mooooooooo moo moo

particular state visit http://pglaf.org
mooooooooo moooo moooo mooo://moooo.moo




While we cannot and do not solicit contributions from states where we
Moooo mo mooooo moo mo moo moooooo moooooooooooo mooo mooooo moooo mo

have not met the solicitation requirements, we know of no prohibition
mooo moo moo moo mooooooooooo mooooooooooo, mo mooo mo mo moooooooooo

against accepting unsolicited donations from donors in such states who
moooooo moooooooo moooooooooo moooooooo mooo mooooo mo mooo mooooo moo

approach us with offers to donate.
mooooooo mo mooo mooooo mo mooooo.




International donations are gratefully accepted, but we cannot make
Moooooooooooo moooooooo moo mooooooooo mooooooo, moo mo mooooo mooo

any statements concerning tax treatment of donations received from
moo mooooooooo mooooooooo moo moooooooo mo moooooooo mooooooo mooo

outside the United States.  U.S. laws alone swamp our small staff.
moooooo moo Mooooo Mooooo.  M.M. mooo moooo moooo moo moooo moooo.




Please check the Project Gutenberg Web pages for current donation
Mooooo moooo moo Moooooo Moooooooo Moo moooo moo moooooo mooooooo

methods and addresses.  Donations are accepted in a number of other
moooooo moo moooooooo.  Moooooooo moo mooooooo mo m mooooo mo moooo

ways including checks, online payments and credit card donations.
mooo moooooooo mooooo, mooooo mooooooo moo mooooo mooo moooooooo.

To donate, please visit: http://pglaf.org/donate
Mo mooooo, mooooo moooo: mooo://moooo.moo/mooooo







Section 5.  General Information About Project Gutenberg-tm electronic
Moooooo m.  Moooooo Moooooooooo Moooo Moooooo Moooooooo-mo mooooooooo

works.
moooo.




Professor Michael S. Hart is the originator of the Project Gutenberg-tm
Moooooooo Moooooo M. Mooo mo moo mooooooooo mo moo Moooooo Moooooooo-mo

concept of a library of electronic works that could be freely shared
moooooo mo m moooooo mo mooooooooo moooo mooo moooo mo mooooo mooooo

with anyone.  For thirty years, he produced and distributed Project
mooo mooooo.  Moo mooooo moooo, mo mooooooo moo moooooooooo Moooooo

Gutenberg-tm eBooks with only a loose network of volunteer support.
Moooooooo-mo mOoooo mooo mooo m moooo moooooo mo moooooooo moooooo.







Project Gutenberg-tm eBooks are often created from several printed
Moooooo Moooooooo-mo mOoooo moo moooo moooooo mooo moooooo moooooo

editions, all of which are confirmed as Public Domain in the U.S.
mooooooo, moo mo moooo moo moooooooo mo Mooooo Mooooo mo moo M.M.

unless a copyright notice is included.  Thus, we do not necessarily
mooooo m moooooooo mooooo mo mooooooo.  Mooo, mo mo moo moooooooooo

keep eBooks in compliance with any particular paper edition.
mooo mOoooo mo mooooooooo mooo moo mooooooooo moooo moooooo.







Most people start at our Web site which has the main PG search facility:
Mooo mooooo moooo mo moo Moo mooo moooo moo moo mooo MO mooooo mooooooo:




     http://www.gutenberg.org
     mooo://moo.moooooooo.moo




This Web site includes information about Project Gutenberg-tm,
Mooo Moo mooo mooooooo moooooooooo moooo Moooooo Moooooooo-mo,

including how to make donations to the Project Gutenberg Literary
moooooooo moo mo mooo moooooooo mo moo Moooooo Moooooooo Mooooooo

Archive Foundation, how to help produce our new eBooks, and how to
Moooooo Mooooooooo, moo mo mooo moooooo moo moo mOoooo, moo moo mo

subscribe to our email newsletter to hear about new eBooks.
moooooooo mo moo moooo mooooooooo mo mooo moooo moo mOoooo.
